GE09ram_1-7u:3: 1.001.002a ko nv asmin sāmprataṃ loke guṇavān kaś ca vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:4: 1.001.002c dharmajñaś ca kṛtajñaś ca satyavākyo dṛḍhavrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5: 1.001.003a cāritreṇa ca ko yuktaḥ sarvabhūteṣu ko hitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6: 1.001.003c vidvān kaḥ kaḥ samarthaś ca kaś caikapriyadarśanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8: 1.001.004c kasya bibhyati devāś ca jātaroṣasya saṃyuge
GE09ram_1-7u:9: 1.001.005a etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me 1.001.005c maharṣe tvaṃ samartho 'si jñātum evaṃvidhaṃ naram
GE09ram_1-7u:10: 1.001.006a śrutvā caitat trilokajño vālmīker nārado vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11: 1.001.006c śrūyatām iti cāmantrya prahṛṣṭo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:12: 1.001.007a bahavo durlabhāś caiva ye tvayā kīrtitā guṇāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13: 1.001.007c mune vakṣyāmy ahaṃ buddhvā tair yuktaḥ śrūyatāṃ naraḥ 1.001.008a ikṣvākuvaṃśaprabhavo rāmo nāma janaiḥ śrutaḥ 1.001.008c niyatātmā mahāvīryo dyutimān dhṛtimān vaśī 1.001.009a buddhimān nītimān vāgmī śrīmāñ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ 1.001.009c vipulāṃso mahābāhuḥ kambugrīvo mahāhanuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18: 1.001.012a dharmajñaḥ satyasaṃdhaś ca prajānāṃ ca hite rataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19: 1.001.012c yaśasvī jñānasaṃpannaḥ śucir vaśyaḥ samādhimān 1.001.013a rakṣitā jīvalokasya dharmasya parirakṣitā
GE09ram_1-7u:23: 1.001.015a sarvadābhigataḥ sadbhiḥ samudra iva sindhubhiḥ 1.001.015c āryaḥ sarvasamaś caiva
GE09ram_1-7u:25: 1.001.016c samudra iva gāmbhīrye dhairyeṇa himavān iva
GE09ram_1-7u:26: 1.001.017a viṣṇunā sadṛśo vīrye somavat priyadarśanaḥ 1.001.017c kālāgnisadṛśaḥ krodhe kṣamayā pṛthivīsamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:27: 1.001.018a dhanadena samas tyāge satye dharma ivāparaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:29: 1.001.019a jyeṣṭhaṃ śreṣṭhaguṇair yuktaṃ priyaṃ daśarathaḥ sutam
GE09ram_1-7u:30: 1.001.019c yauvarājyena saṃyoktum aicchat prītyā mahīpatiḥ 1.001.020a tasyābhiṣekasaṃbhārān dṛṣṭvā bhāryātha kaikayī
GE09ram_1-7u:31: 1.001.020c pūrvaṃ dattavarā devī varam enam ayācata
GE09ram_1-7u:33: 1.001.021a sa satyavacanād rājā dharmapāśena saṃyataḥ 1.001.021c vivāsayām āsa sutaṃ rāmaṃ daśarathaḥ priyam
GE09ram_1-7u:34: 1.001.022a sa jagāma vanaṃ vīraḥ pratijñām anupālayan
GE09ram_1-7u:36: 1.001.023a taṃ vrajantaṃ priyo bhrātā lakṣmaṇo 'nujagāma ha
GE09ram_1-7u:39: 1.001.024c sītāpy anugatā rāmaṃ śaśinaṃ rohiṇī yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:40: 1.001.025a paurair anugato dūraṃ pitrā daśarathena ca
GE09ram_1-7u:42: 1.001.026a te vanena vanaṃ gatvā nadīs tīrtvā bahūdakāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:44: 1.001.027a ramyam āvasathaṃ kṛtvā ramamāṇā vane trayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:45: 1.001.027c devagandharvasaṃkāśās tatra te nyavasan sukham 1.001.028a citrakūṭaṃ gate rāme putraśokāturas tadā 1.001.028c rājā daśarathaḥ svargaṃ jagāma vilapan sutam
GE09ram_1-7u:46: 1.001.029a mṛte tu tasmin bharato vasiṣṭhapramukhair dvijaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:47: 1.001.029c niyujyamāno rājyāya naicchad rājyaṃ mahābalaḥ 1.001.029e sa jagāma vanaṃ vīro rāmapādaprasādakaḥ 1.001.030a pāduke cāsya rājyāya nyāsaṃ dattvā punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:48: 1.001.030c nivartayām āsa tato bharataṃ bharatāgrajaḥ 1.001.031a sa kāmam anavāpyaiva rāmapādāv upaspṛśan 1.001.031c nandigrāme 'karod rājyaṃ rāmāgamanakāṅkṣayā 1.001.032a rāmas tu punar ālakṣya nāgarasya janasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:49: 1.001.032c tatrāgamanam ekāgre daṇḍakān praviveśa ha 1.001.033a virādhaṃ rākṣasaṃ hatvā śarabhaṅgaṃ dadarśa ha
GE09ram_1-7u:50: 1.001.033c sutīkṣṇaṃ cāpy agastyaṃ ca agastya bhrātaraṃ tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:52: 1.001.034c khaḍgaṃ ca paramaprītas tūṇī cākṣayasāyakau 1.001.035a vasatas tasya rāmasya vane vanacaraiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:53: 1.001.035c ṛṣayo 'bhyāgaman sarve vadhāyāsurarakṣasām 1.001.036a tena tatraiva vasatā janasthānanivāsinī
GE09ram_1-7u:56: 1.001.037c kharaṃ triśirasaṃ caiva dūṣaṇaṃ caiva rākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:57: 1.001.038a nijaghāna raṇe rāmas teṣāṃ caiva padānugān
GE09ram_1-7u:58: 1.001.038c rakṣasāṃ nihatāny āsan sahasrāṇi caturdaśa 1.001.039a tato jñātivadhaṃ śrutvā rāvaṇaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ 1.001.039c sahāyaṃ varayām āsa mārīcaṃ nāma rākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:59: 1.001.040a vāryamāṇaḥ subahuśo mārīcena sa rāvaṇaḥ 1.001.040c na virodho balavatā kṣamo rāvaṇa tena te
GE09ram_1-7u:60: 1.001.041a anādṛtya tu tad vākyaṃ rāvaṇaḥ kālacoditaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:62: 1.001.042a tena māyāvinā dūram apavāhya nṛpātmajau 1.001.042c jahāra bhāryāṃ rāmasya gṛdhraṃ hatvā jaṭāyuṣam
GE09ram_1-7u:63: 1.001.043a gṛdhraṃ ca nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛtāṃ śrutvā ca maithilīm 1.001.043c rāghavaḥ śokasaṃtapto
GE09ram_1-7u:64: 1.001.044a tatas tenaiva śokena gṛdhraṃ dagdhvā jaṭāyuṣam
GE09ram_1-7u:65: 1.001.044c mārgamāṇo vane sītāṃ rākṣasaṃ saṃdadarśa ha
GE09ram_1-7u:66: 1.001.045a kabandhaṃ nāma rūpeṇa vikṛtaṃ ghoradarśanam 1.001.045c taṃ nihatya mahābāhur dadāha svargataś ca saḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:67: 1.001.046a sa cāsya kathayām āsa śabarīṃ dharmacāriṇīm
GE09ram_1-7u:70: 1.001.047a śabaryā pūjitaḥ samyag rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ 1.001.047c pampātīre hanumatā saṃgato vānareṇa ha 1.001.048a hanumadvacanāc caiva sugrīveṇa samāgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:71: 1.001.048c sugrīvāya ca tat sarvaṃ śaṃsad rāmo mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:73: 1.001.049c rāmāyāveditaṃ sarvaṃ praṇayād duḥkhitena ca 1.001.049e vālinaś ca balaṃ tatra kathayām āsa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:74: 1.001.050a pratijñātaṃ ca rāmeṇa tadā vālivadhaṃ prati
GE09ram_1-7u:75: 1.001.050c sugrīvaḥ śaṅkitaś cāsīn nityaṃ vīryeṇa rāghave
GE09ram_1-7u:76: 1.001.051a rāghavaḥ pratyayārthaṃ tu dundubheḥ kāyam uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:78: 1.001.052a bibheda ca punaḥ sālān saptaikena maheṣuṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:79: 1.001.052c giriṃ rasātalaṃ caiva janayan pratyayaṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:80: 1.001.053a tataḥ prītamanās tena viśvastaḥ sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:81: 1.001.053c kiṣkindhāṃ rāmasahito jagāma ca guhāṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:83: 1.001.054c tena nādena mahatā nirjagāma harīśvaraḥ 1.001.055a tataḥ sugrīvavacanād dhatvā vālinam āhave 1.001.055c sugrīvam eva tad rājye rāghavaḥ pratyapādayat
GE09ram_1-7u:84: 1.001.056a sa ca sarvān samānīya vānarān vānararṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:85: 1.001.056c diśaḥ prasthāpayām āsa didṛkṣur janakātmajām 1.001.057a tato gṛdhrasya vacanāt saṃpāter hanumān balī
GE09ram_1-7u:87: 1.001.058a tatra laṅkāṃ samāsādya purīṃ rāvaṇapālitām 1.001.058c dadarśa sītāṃ dhyāyantīm aśokavanikāṃ gatām 1.001.059a nivedayitvābhijñānaṃ pravṛttiṃ ca nivedya ca 1.001.059c samāśvāsya ca vaidehīṃ mardayām āsa toraṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:88: 1.001.060a pañca senāgragān hatvā sapta mantrisutān api
GE09ram_1-7u:89: 1.001.060c śūram akṣaṃ ca niṣpiṣya grahaṇaṃ samupāgamat
GE09ram_1-7u:90: 1.001.061a astreṇonmuham ātmānaṃ jñātvā paitāmahād varāt 1.001.061c marṣayan rākṣasān vīro yantriṇas tān yadṛcchayā
GE09ram_1-7u:91: 1.001.062a tato dagdhvā purīṃ laṅkām ṛte sītāṃ ca maithilīm 1.001.062c rāmāya priyam ākhyātuṃ punar āyān mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:93: 1.001.063c nyavedayad ameyātmā dṛṣṭā sīteti tattvataḥ 1.001.064a tataḥ sugrīvasahito gatvā tīraṃ mahodadheḥ 1.001.064c samudraṃ kṣobhayām āsa śarair ādityasaṃnibhaiḥ 1.001.065a darśayām āsa cātmānaṃ samudraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:94: 1.001.065c samudravacanāc caiva nalaṃ setum akārayat 1.001.066a tena gatvā purīṃ laṅkāṃ hatvā rāvaṇam āhave
GE09ram_1-7u:95: 1.001.066c abhyaṣiñcat sa laṅkāyāṃ rākṣasendraṃ vibhīṣaṇam 1.001.067a karmaṇā tena mahatā trailokyaṃ sacarācaram 1.001.067c sadevarṣigaṇaṃ tuṣṭaṃ rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:97: 1.001.068c kṛtakṛtyas tadā rāmo vijvaraḥ pramumoda ha
GE09ram_1-7u:98: 1.001.069a devatābhyo varān prāpya samutthāpya ca vānarān
GE09ram_1-7u:99: 1.001.069c puṣpakaṃ tat samāruhya nandigrāmaṃ yayau tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:101: 1.001.070c rāmaḥ sītām anuprāpya rājyaṃ punar avāptavān
GE09ram_1-7u:102: 1.001.071a prahṛṣṭamudito lokas tuṣṭaḥ puṣṭaḥ sudhārmikaḥ 1.001.071c nirāyamo arogaś ca
GE09ram_1-7u:103: 1.001.072a na putramaraṇaṃ ke cid drakṣyanti puruṣāḥ kva cit 1.001.072c nāryaś cāvidhavā nityaṃ bhaviṣyanti pativratāḥ 1.001.073a na vātajaṃ bhayaṃ kiṃ cin nāpsu majjanti jantavaḥ 1.001.073c na cāgrijaṃ bhayaṃ kiṃ cid yathā kṛtayuge tathā 1.001.074a aśvamedhaśatair iṣṭvā tathā bahusuvarṇakaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:104: 1.001.074c gavāṃ koṭyayutaṃ dattvā vidvadbhyo vidhipūrvakam 1.001.075a rājavaṃśāñ śataguṇān sthāpayiṣyati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:105: 1.001.075c cāturvarṇyaṃ ca loke 'smin sve sve dharme niyokṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:107: 1.001.076c rāmo rājyam upāsitvā brahmalokaṃ gamiṣyati 1.001.077a idaṃ pavitraṃ pāpaghnaṃ puṇyaṃ vedaiś ca saṃmitam
GE09ram_1-7u:108: 1.001.077c yaḥ paṭhed rāmacaritaṃ sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate 1.001.078a etad ākhyānam āyuṣyaṃ paṭhan rāmāyaṇaṃ naraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:109: 1.001.078c saputrapautraḥ sagaṇaḥ pretya svarge mahīyate 1.001.079a paṭhan dvijo vāgṛṣabhatvam īyāt; syāt kṣatriyo bhūmipatitvam
GE09ram_1-7u:111: 1.001.079c vaṇigjanaḥ paṇyaphalatvam īyāj; janaś ca śūdro 'pi mahattvam īyāt 1.002.001a nāradasya tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvā vākyaviśāradaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:112: 1.002.001c pūjayām āsa dharmātmā sahaśiṣyo mahāmuniḥ 1.002.002a yathāvat pūjitas tena devarṣir nāradas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:114: 1.002.003a sa muhūtaṃ gate tasmin devalokaṃ munis tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:115: 1.002.003c jagāma tamasātīraṃ jāhnavyās tv avidūrataḥ 1.002.004a sa tu tīraṃ samāsādya tamasāyā mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:116: 1.002.004c śiṣyam āha sthitaṃ pārśve dṛṣṭvā tīrtham akardamam
GE09ram_1-7u:117: 1.002.005a akardamam idaṃ tīrthaṃ bharadvāja niśāmaya 1.002.005c ramaṇīyaṃ prasannāmbu sanmanuṣyamano yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:118: 1.002.006a nyasyatāṃ kalaśas tāta dīyatāṃ valkalaṃ mama
GE09ram_1-7u:120: 1.002.007a evam ukto bharadvājo vālmīkena mahātmanā 1.002.007c prāyacchata munes tasya valkalaṃ niyato guroḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:121: 1.002.008a sa śiṣyahastād ādāya valkalaṃ niyatendriyaḥ 1.002.008c vicacāra ha paśyaṃs tat sarvato vipulaṃ vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:122: 1.002.009a tasyābhyāśe tu mithunaṃ carantam anapāyinam 1.002.009c dadarśa bhagavāṃs tatra krauñcayoś cāruniḥsvanam 1.002.010a tasmāt tu mithunād ekaṃ pumāṃsaṃ pāpaniścayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:123: 1.002.010c jaghāna vairanilayo niṣādas tasya paśyataḥ 1.002.011a taṃ śoṇitaparītāṅgaṃ veṣṭamānaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:124: 1.002.011c bhāryā tu nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā rurāva karuṇāṃ giram
GE09ram_1-7u:125: 1.002.012a tathā tu taṃ dvijaṃ dṛṣṭvā niṣādena nipātitam
GE09ram_1-7u:126: 1.002.012c ṛṣer dharmātmanas tasya kāruṇyaṃ samapadyata 1.002.013a tataḥ karuṇaveditvād adharmo 'yam iti dvijaḥ 1.002.013c niśāmya rudatīṃ krauñcīm idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:127: 1.002.014a mā niṣāda pratiṣṭhāṃ tvam agamaḥ śāśvatīṃ samāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:128: 1.002.014c yat krauñcamithunād ekam avadhīḥ kāmamohitam 1.002.015a tasyaivaṃ bruvataś cintā babhūva hṛdi vīkṣataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:129: 1.002.015c śokārtenāsya śakuneḥ kim idaṃ vyāhṛtaṃ mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:130: 1.002.016a cintayan sa mahāprājñaś cakāra matimān matim
GE09ram_1-7u:131: 1.002.016c śiṣyaṃ caivābravīd vākyam idaṃ sa munipuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:133: 1.002.017c śokārtasya pravṛtto me śloko bhavatu nānyathā
GE09ram_1-7u:134: 1.002.018a śiṣyas tu tasya bruvato muner vākyam anuttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:136: 1.002.019a so 'bhiṣekaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā tīrthe tasmin yathāvidhi 1.002.019c tam eva cintayann artham upāvartata vai muniḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:137: 1.002.020a bharadvājas tataḥ śiṣyo vinītaḥ śrutavān guroḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:139: 1.002.021a sa praviśyāśramapadaṃ śiṣyeṇa saha dharmavit 1.002.021c upaviṣṭaḥ kathāś cānyāś cakāra dhyānam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:140: 1.002.022a ājagāma tato brahmā lokakartā svayaṃprabhuḥ 1.002.022c caturmukho mahātejā draṣṭuṃ taṃ munipuṃgavam 1.002.023a vālmīkir atha taṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasotthāya vāg yataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:141: 1.002.023c prāñjaliḥ prayato bhūtvā tasthau paramavismitaḥ 1.002.024a pūjayām āsa taṃ devaṃ pādyārghyāsanavandanaiḥ 1.002.024c praṇamya vidhivac cainaṃ pṛṣṭvānāmayam avyayam 1.002.025a athopaviśya bhagavān āsane paramārcite
GE09ram_1-7u:143: 1.002.026a upaviṣṭe tadā tasmin sākṣāl lokapitāmahe 1.002.026c tad gatenaiva manasā vālmīkir dhyānam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:145: 1.002.027c yas tādṛśaṃ cāruravaṃ krauñcaṃ hanyād akāraṇāt
GE09ram_1-7u:146: 1.002.028a śocann eva muhuḥ krauñcīm upaślokam imaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:148: 1.002.029a tam uvāca tato brahmā prahasan munipuṃgavam
GE09ram_1-7u:149: 1.002.029c śloka eva tvayā baddho nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:150: 1.002.030a macchandād eva te brahman pravṛtteyaṃ sarasvatī
GE09ram_1-7u:151: 1.002.030c rāmasya caritaṃ kṛtsnaṃ kuru tvam ṛṣisattama
GE09ram_1-7u:152: 1.002.031a dharmātmano guṇavato loke rāmasya dhīmataḥ 1.002.031c vṛttaṃ kathaya dhīrasya yathā te nāradāc chrutam
GE09ram_1-7u:153: 1.002.032a rahasyaṃ ca prakāśaṃ ca yad vṛttaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ 1.002.032c rāmasya saha saumitre rākṣasānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:154: 1.002.033a vaidehyāś caiva yad vṛttaṃ prakāśaṃ yadi vā rahaḥ 1.002.033c tac cāpy aviditaṃ sarvaṃ viditaṃ te bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:155: 1.002.034a na te vāg anṛtā kāvye kā cid atra bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:156: 1.002.034c kuru rāma kathāṃ puṇyāṃ ślokabaddhāṃ manoramām
GE09ram_1-7u:157: 1.002.035a yāvat sthāsyanti girayaḥ saritaś ca mahītale
GE09ram_1-7u:159: 1.002.036a yāvad rāmasya ca kathā tvatkṛtā pracariṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:160: 1.002.036c tāvad ūrdhvam adhaś ca tvaṃ mallokeṣu nivatsyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:161: 1.002.037a ity uktvā bhagavān brahmā tatraivāntaradhīyata 1.002.037c tataḥ saśiṣyo vālmīkir munir vismayam āyayau
GE09ram_1-7u:162: 1.002.038a tasya śiṣyās tataḥ sarve jaguḥ ślokam imaṃ punaḥ 1.002.038c muhur muhuḥ prīyamāṇāḥ prāhuś ca bhṛśavismitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:163: 1.002.039a samākṣaraiś caturbhir yaḥ pādair gīto maharṣiṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:165: 1.002.040a tasya buddhir iyaṃ jātā vālmīker bhāvitātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:166: 1.002.040c kṛtsnaṃ rāmāyaṇaṃ kāvyam īdṛśaiḥ karavāṇy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:169: 1.002.041c samākṣaraiḥ ślokaśatair yaśasvino; yaśaskaraṃ kāvyam udāradhīr

GE09ram_1-7u:175: 1.003.004c jānakyāś ca vivāhaṃ ca dhanuṣaś ca vibhedanam

GE09ram_1-7u:182: 1.003.009c prasādanaṃ ca rāmasya pituś ca salilakriyām
GE09ram_1-7u:186: 1.003.011c śūrpaṇakhyāś ca saṃvādaṃ virūpakaraṇaṃ tathā 1.003.012a vadhaṃ kharatriśirasor utthānaṃ rāvaṇasya ca 1.003.012c mārīcasya vadhaṃ caiva vaidehyā haraṇaṃ tathā

GE09ram_1-7u:196: 1.003.021a abhijñānapradānaṃ ca sītāyāś cāpi bhāṣaṇam 1.003.021c rākṣasītarjanaṃ caiva
GE09ram_1-7u:197: 1.003.022a maṇipradānaṃ sītāyā vṛkṣabhaṅgaṃ tathaiva ca 1.003.022c rākṣasīvidravaṃ caiva kiṃkarāṇāṃ nibarhaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:199: 1.003.023c pratiplavanam evātha madhūnāṃ haraṇaṃ tathā 1.003.024a rāghavāśvāsanaṃ caiva maṇiniryātanaṃ tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:200: 1.003.024c saṃgamaṃ ca samudrasya nalasetoś ca bandhanam
GE09ram_1-7u:201: 1.003.025a pratāraṃ ca samudrasya rātrau laṅkāvarodhanam 1.003.025c vibhīṣaṇena saṃsargaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:203: 1.003.026c rāvaṇasya vināśaṃ ca sītāvāptim areḥ pure
GE09ram_1-7u:204: 1.003.027a bibhīṣaṇābhiṣekaṃ ca puṣpakasya ca darśanam 1.003.027c ayodhyāyāś ca gamanaṃ bharatena samāgamam 1.003.028a rāmābhiṣekābhyudayaṃ sarvasainyavisarjanam 1.003.028c svarāṣṭrarañjanaṃ caiva vaidehyāś ca visarjanam 1.003.029a anāgataṃ ca yat kiṃ cid rāmasya vasudhātale
GE09ram_1-7u:205: 1.003.029c tac cakārottare kāvye vālmīkir bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:206: 1.004.001a prāptarājyasya rāmasya vālmīkir bhagavān ṛṣiḥ 1.004.001c cakāra caritaṃ kṛtsnaṃ vicitrapadam ātmavān 1.004.002a kṛtvā tu tan mahāprājñaḥ sabhaviṣyaṃ sahottaram
GE09ram_1-7u:207: 1.004.002c cintayām āsa ko nv etat prayuñjīyād iti prabhuḥ 1.004.003a tasya cintayamānasya maharṣer bhāvitātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:208: 1.004.003c agṛhṇītāṃ tataḥ pādau muniveṣau kuśīlavau 1.004.004a kuśīlavau tu dharmajñau rājaputrau yaśasvinau 1.004.004c bhrātarau svarasaṃpannau dadarśāśramavāsinau

GE09ram_1-7u:211: 1.004.006a kāvyaṃ rāmāyaṇaṃ kṛtsnaṃ sītāyāś caritaṃ mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:212: 1.004.006c paulastya vadham ity eva cakāra caritavrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:213: 1.004.007a pāṭhye geye ca madhuraṃ pramāṇais tribhir anvitam
GE09ram_1-7u:216: 1.004.008c bībhatsādirasair yuktaṃ kāvyam etad agāyatām 1.004.009a tau tu gāndharvatattvajñau sthāna mūrcchana kovidau
GE09ram_1-7u:217: 1.004.009c bhrātarau svarasaṃpannau gandharvāv iva rūpiṇau 1.004.010a rūpalakṣaṇasaṃpannau madhurasvarabhāṣiṇau 1.004.010c bimbād ivoddhṛtau bimbau rāmadehāt tathāparau 1.004.011a tau rājaputrau kārtsnyena dharmyam ākhyānam uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:218: 1.004.011c vāco vidheyaṃ tat sarvaṃ kṛtvā kāvyam aninditau
GE09ram_1-7u:219: 1.004.012a ṛṣīṇāṃ ca dvijātīnāṃ sādhūnāṃ ca samāgame
GE09ram_1-7u:220: 1.004.012c yathopadeśaṃ tattvajñau jagatus tau samāhitau 1.004.012e mahātmānau mahābhāgau
GE09ram_1-7u:221: 1.004.013a tau kadā cit sametānām ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām
GE09ram_1-7u:222: 1.004.013c āsīnānāṃ samīpasthāv idaṃ kāvyam agāyatām 1.004.014a tac chrutvā munayaḥ sarve bāṣpaparyākulekṣaṇāḥ 1.004.014c sādhu sādhv ity tāv ūcatuḥ paraṃ vismayam āgatāḥ 1.004.015a te prītamanasaḥ sarve munayo dharmavatsalāḥ 1.004.015c praśaśaṃsuḥ praśastavyau gāyamānau kuśīlavau
GE09ram_1-7u:223: 1.004.016a aho gītasya mādhuryaṃ ślokānāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:224: 1.004.016c ciranirvṛttam apy etat pratyakṣam iva darśitam
GE09ram_1-7u:225: 1.004.017a praviśya tāv ubhau suṣṭhu tadā bhāvam agāyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:226: 1.004.017c sahitau madhuraṃ raktaṃ saṃpannaṃ svarasaṃpadā 1.004.018a evaṃ praśasyamānau tau tapaḥślāghyair maharṣibhiḥ 1.004.018c saṃraktataram atyarthaṃ madhuraṃ tāv agāyatām 1.004.019a prītaḥ kaś cin munis tābhyāṃ saṃsthitaḥ kalaśaṃ dadau 1.004.019c prasanno valkalaṃ kaś cid dadau tābhyāṃ mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:227: 1.004.020a āścaryam idam ākhyānaṃ muninā saṃprakīrtitam 1.004.020c paraṃ kavīnām ādhāraṃ samāptaṃ ca yathākramam
GE09ram_1-7u:228: 1.004.021a praśasyamānau sarvatra kadā cit tatra gāyakau
GE09ram_1-7u:230: 1.004.022a svaveśma cānīya tato bhrātarau sakuśīlavau 1.004.022c pūjayām āsa pūjārhau rāmaḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ 1.004.023a āsīnaḥ kāñcane divye sa ca siṃhāsane prabhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:231: 1.004.023c upopaviṣṭaiḥ sacivair bhrātṛbhiś ca paraṃtapaḥ 1.004.024a dṛṣṭvā tu rūpasaṃpannau tāv ubhau vīṇinau tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:232: 1.004.024c uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmaḥ śatrughnaṃ bharataṃ tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:233: 1.004.025a śrūyatām idam ākhyānam anayor devavarcasoḥ 1.004.025c vicitrārthapadaṃ samyag gāyator madhurasvaram
GE09ram_1-7u:234: 1.004.026a imau munī pārthivalakṣmaṇānvitau; kuśīlavau caiva mahātapasvinau
GE09ram_1-7u:235: 1.004.026c mamāpi tad bhūtikaraṃ pracakṣate; mahānubhāvaṃ caritaṃ nibodhata
GE09ram_1-7u:236: 1.004.027a tatas tu tau rāmavacaḥ pracoditāv; agāyatāṃ mārgavidhānasaṃpadā 1.004.027c sa cāpi rāmaḥ pariṣadgataḥ śanair; bubhūṣayāsaktamanā babhūva 1.005.001a sarvāpūrvam iyaṃ yeṣām āsīt kṛtsnā vasuṃdharā
GE09ram_1-7u:238: 1.005.002a yeṣāṃ sa sagaro nāma sāgaro yena khānitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:239: 1.005.002c ṣaṣṭiḥ putrasahasrāṇi yaṃ yāntaṃ paryavārayan 1.005.003a ikṣvākūṇām idaṃ teṣāṃ rājñāṃ vaṃśe mahātmanām
GE09ram_1-7u:240: 1.005.003c mahad utpannam ākhyānaṃ rāmāyaṇam iti śrutam

GE09ram_1-7u:250: 1.005.009a tāṃ tu rājā daśaratho mahārāṣṭravivardhanaḥ 1.005.009c purīm āvāsayām āsa divi devapatir yathā

GE09ram_1-7u:255: 1.005.013c vājivāraṇasaṃpūrṇāṃ gobhir uṣṭraiḥ kharais tathā 1.005.014a sāmantarājasaṅghaiś ca balikarmabhir āvṛtām
GE09ram_1-7u:261: 1.005.017c śālitaṇḍulasaṃpūrṇām ikṣukāṇḍarasodakām 1.005.018a dundubhībhir mṛdaṅgaiś ca vīṇābhiḥ paṇavais tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:262: 1.005.018c nāditāṃ bhṛśam atyarthaṃ pṛthivyāṃ tām anuttamām
GE09ram_1-7u:263: 1.005.019a vimānam iva siddhānāṃ tapasādhigataṃ divi 1.005.019c suniveśitaveśmāntāṃ narottamasamāvṛtām 1.005.020a ye ca bāṇair na vidhyanti viviktam aparāparam
GE09ram_1-7u:264: 1.005.020c śabdavedhyaṃ ca vitataṃ laghuhastā viśāradāḥ 1.005.021a siṃhavyāghravarāhāṇāṃ mattānāṃ nadatāṃ vane
GE09ram_1-7u:265: 1.005.021c hantāro niśitaiḥ śastrair balād bāhubalair api
GE09ram_1-7u:266: 1.005.022a tādṛśānāṃ sahasrais tām abhipūrṇāṃ mahārathaiḥ 1.005.022c purīm āvāsayām āsa rājā daśarathas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:267: 1.005.023a tām agnimadbhir guṇavadbhir āvṛtāṃ; dvijottamair vedaṣaḍaṅgapāragaiḥ 1.005.023c sahasradaiḥ satyaratair mahātmabhir; maharṣikalpair ṛṣibhiś ca

GE09ram_1-7u:271: 1.006.003c dhanaiś ca saṃcayaiś cānyaiḥ śakravaiśravaṇopamaḥ 1.006.004a yathā manur mahātejā lokasya parirakṣitā 1.006.004c tathā daśaratho rājā vasañ jagad apālayat
GE09ram_1-7u:273: 1.006.005c pālitā sā purī śreṣṭhendreṇa ivāmarāvatī 1.006.006a tasmin puravare hṛṣṭā dharmātmanā bahu śrutāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:274: 1.006.006c narās tuṣṭādhanaiḥ svaiḥ svair alubdhāḥ satyavādinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:275: 1.006.007a nālpasaṃnicayaḥ kaś cid āsīt tasmin purottame
GE09ram_1-7u:277: 1.006.008a kāmī vā na kadaryo vā nṛśaṃsaḥ puruṣaḥ kva cit
GE09ram_1-7u:278: 1.006.008c draṣṭuṃ śakyam ayodhyāyāṃ nāvidvān na ca nāstikaḥ

GE09ram_1-7u:282: 1.006.010c nāmṛṣṭo nānuliptāṅgo nāsugandhaś ca vidyate 1.006.011a nāmṛṣṭabhojī nādātā nāpy
GE09ram_1-7u:283: 1.006.011c nāhastābharaṇo vāpi dṛśyate nāpy anātmavān 1.006.012a nānāhitāgnir nāyajvā vipro nāpy asahasradaḥ 1.006.012c kaś cid āsīd ayodhyāyāṃ na ca nirvṛttasaṃkaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:285: 1.006.013c dānādhyayanaśīlāś ca saṃyatāś ca pratigrahe 1.006.014a na nāstiko nānṛtako na kaś cid abahuśrutaḥ

GE09ram_1-7u:287: 1.006.015a na dīnaḥ kṣiptacitto vā vyathito vāpi kaś cana 1.006.015c kaś cin naro vā nārī vā nāśrīmān nāpy arūpavān
GE09ram_1-7u:288: 1.006.015e draṣṭuṃ śakyam ayodhyāyāṃ nāpi rājanyabhaktimān 1.006.016a varṇeṣv agryacaturtheṣu
GE09ram_1-7u:289: 1.006.016c dīrghāyuṣo narāḥ sarve dharmaṃ satyaṃ ca saṃśritāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:290: 1.006.017a kṣatraṃ brahmamukhaṃ cāsīd vaiśyāḥ kṣatram anuvratāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:291: 1.006.017c śūdrāḥ svadharmaniratās trīn varṇān upacāriṇaḥ 1.006.018a sā tenekṣvākunāthena purī suparirakṣitā
GE09ram_1-7u:292: 1.006.018c yathā purastān manunā mānavendreṇa dhīmatā 1.006.019a yodhānām agnikalpānāṃ peśalānām amarṣiṇām

GE09ram_1-7u:295: 1.006.021a vindhyaparvapajair mattaiḥ pūrṇā haimavatair api 1.006.021c madānvitair atibalair mātaṅgaiḥ parvatopamaiḥ

GE09ram_1-7u:297: 1.006.022c bhadramandrair bhadramṛgair mṛgamandraiś ca sā purī

GE09ram_1-7u:299: 1.006.024a tāṃ satyanāmāṃ dṛḍhatoraṇārgalām; gṛhair vicitrair upaśobhitāṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:301: 1.006.024c purīm ayodhyāṃ nṛsahasrasaṃkulāṃ; śaśāsa vai śakrasamo

GE09ram_1-7u:305: 1.007.004a śrīmantaś ca mahātmānaḥ śāstrajñā dṛḍhavikramāḥ 1.007.004c kīrtimantaḥ praṇihitā yathā vacanakāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:306: 1.007.005a tejaḥkṣamāyaśaḥprāptāḥ smitapūrvābhibhāṣiṇaḥ 1.007.005c krodhāt kāmārthahetor vā na brūyur anṛtaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:307: 1.007.006a teṣām aviditaṃ kiṃ cit sveṣu nāsti pareṣu vā 1.007.006c kriyamāṇaṃ kṛtaṃ vāpi cāreṇāpi cikīrṣitam 1.007.007a kuśalā vyavahāreṣu sauhṛdeṣu parīkṣitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:308: 1.007.007c prāptakālaṃ yathā daṇḍaṃ dhārayeyuḥ suteṣv api
GE09ram_1-7u:309: 1.007.008a kośasaṃgrahaṇe yuktā balasya ca parigrahe 1.007.008c ahitaṃ cāpi puruṣaṃ na vihiṃsyur adūṣakam
GE09ram_1-7u:310: 1.007.009a vīrāṃś ca niyatotsāhā rāja śāstram anuṣṭhitāḥ

GE09ram_1-7u:313: 1.007.011c nāsīt pure vā rāṣṭre vā mṛṣāvādī naraḥ kva cit

GE09ram_1-7u:315: 1.007.012c praśāntaṃ sarvam evāsīd rāṣṭraṃ puravaraṃ ca tat
GE09ram_1-7u:316: 1.007.013a suvāsasaḥ suveśāś ca te ca sarve suśīlinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:317: 1.007.013c hitārthaṃ ca narendrasya jāgrato nayacakṣuṣā 1.007.014a gurau guṇagṛhītāś ca prakhyātāś ca parākramaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:318: 1.007.014c videśeṣv api vijñātāḥ sarvato buddhiniścayāt 1.007.015a īdṛśais tair amātyais tu rājā daśaratho 'naghaḥ

GE09ram_1-7u:322: kuśalaiḥ samarthaiḥ 1.007.017c sa pārthivo dīptim avāpa yuktas; tejomayair gobhir ivodito
GE09ram_1-7u:324: 1.008.001a tasya tv evaṃ prabhāvasya dharmajñasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:325: 1.008.001c sutārthaṃ tapyamānasya nāsīd vaṃśakaraḥ sutaḥ 1.008.002a cintayānasya tasyaivaṃ buddhir āsīn mahātmanaḥ 1.008.002c sutārthaṃ vājimedhena kimarthaṃ na yajāmy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:326: 1.008.003a sa niścitāṃ matiṃ kṛtvā yaṣṭavyam iti buddhimān
GE09ram_1-7u:327: 1.008.003c mantribhiḥ saha dharmātmā sarvair eva kṛtātmabhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:329: 1.008.004c śīghram ānaya me sarvān gurūṃs tān sapurohitān
GE09ram_1-7u:330: 1.008.005a etac chrutvā rahaḥ sūto rājānam idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:332: 1.008.006a sanatkumāro bhagavān pūrvaṃ kathitavān kathām 1.008.006c ṛṣīṇāṃ saṃnidhau rājaṃs tava putrāgamaṃ prati
GE09ram_1-7u:333: 1.008.007a kāśyapasya tu putro 'sti vibhāṇḍaka iti śrutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:334: 1.008.007c ṛṣyaśṛṅga iti khyātas tasya putro bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:335: 1.008.008a sa vane nityasaṃvṛddho munir vanacaraḥ sadā
GE09ram_1-7u:336: 1.008.008c nānyaṃ jānāti viprendro nityaṃ pitranuvartanāt 1.008.009a dvaividhyaṃ brahmacaryasya bhaviṣyati mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:337: 1.008.009c lokeṣu prathitaṃ rājan vipraiś ca kathitaṃ sadā
GE09ram_1-7u:339: 1.008.010c agniṃ śuśrūṣamāṇasya pitaraṃ ca yaśasvinam 1.008.011a etasminn eva kāle tu romapādaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:340: 1.008.011c aṅgeṣu prathitā rājā bhaviṣyati mahābalaḥ 1.008.012a tasya vyatikramād rājño bhaviṣyati sudāruṇā 1.008.012c anāvṛṣṭiḥ sughorā vai sarvabhūtabhayāvahā
GE09ram_1-7u:341: 1.008.013a anāvṛṣṭyāṃ tu vṛttāyāṃ rājā duḥkhasamanvitaḥ 1.008.013c brāhmaṇāñ śrutavṛddhāṃś ca samānīya pravakṣyati 1.008.014a bhavantaḥ śrutadharmāṇo loke cāritravedinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:342: 1.008.014c samādiśantu niyamaṃ prāyaścittaṃ yathā bhavet 1.008.015a vakṣyanti te mahīpālaṃ brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ 1.008.015c vibhāṇḍakasutaṃ rājan sarvopāyair ihānaya
GE09ram_1-7u:343: 1.008.016a ānāyya ca mahīpāla ṛṣyaśṛṅgaṃ susatkṛtam 1.008.016c prayaccha kanyāṃ śāntāṃ vai vidhinā susamāhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:344: 1.008.017a teṣāṃ tu vacanaṃ śrutvā rājā cintāṃ prapatsyate
GE09ram_1-7u:345: 1.008.017c kenopāyena vai śakyam ihānetuṃ sa vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:346: 1.008.018a tato rājā viniścitya saha mantribhir ātmavān
GE09ram_1-7u:347: 1.008.018c purohitam amātyāṃś ca preṣayiṣyati satkṛtān 1.008.019a te tu rājño vacaḥ śrutvā vyathitā vanatānanāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:348: 1.008.019c na gacchema ṛṣer bhītā anuneṣyanti taṃ nṛpam
GE09ram_1-7u:349: 1.008.020a vakṣyanti cintayitvā te tasyopāyāṃś ca tān kṣamān
GE09ram_1-7u:350: 1.008.020c āneṣyāmo vayaṃ vipraṃ na ca doṣo bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:351: 1.008.021a evam aṅgādhipenaiva gaṇikābhir ṛṣeḥ sutaḥ 1.008.021c ānīto 'varṣayad devaḥ śāntā cāsmai pradīyate
GE09ram_1-7u:352: 1.008.022a ṛṣyaśṛṅgas tu jāmātā putrāṃs tava vidhāsyati
GE09ram_1-7u:354: 1.008.023a atha hṛṣṭo daśarathaḥ sumantraṃ pratyabhāṣata 1.008.023c yatharṣyaśṛṅgas tv ānīto vistareṇa tvayocyatām 1.009.001a sumantraś codito rājñā provācedaṃ vacas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:355: 1.009.001c yatharṣyaśṛṅgas tv ānītaḥ śṛṇu me mantribhiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:357: 1.009.002c upāyo nirapāyo 'yam asmābhir abhicintitaḥ 1.009.003a ṛṣyaśṛṅgo vanacaras tapaḥsvādhyāyane
GE09ram_1-7u:358: 1.009.003c anabhijñaḥ sa nārīṇāṃ viṣayāṇāṃ sukhasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:361: 1.009.005a gaṇikās tatra gacchantu rūpavatyaḥ svalaṃkṛtāḥ 1.009.005c pralobhya vividhopāyair āneṣyantīha satkṛtāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:362: 1.009.006a śrutvā tatheti rājā ca pratyuvāca purohitam
GE09ram_1-7u:363: 1.009.006c purohito mantriṇaś ca tathā cakruś ca te tadā 1.009.007a vāramukhyās tu tac chrutvā vanaṃ praviviśur mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:366: 1.009.008c pituḥ sa nityasaṃtuṣṭo nāticakrāma cāśramāt 1.009.009a na tena janmaprabhṛti dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ tapasvinā 1.009.009c strī vā pumān vā yac cānyat sattvaṃ nagara rāṣṭrajam
GE09ram_1-7u:367: 1.009.010a tataḥ kadā cit taṃ deśam ājagāma yadṛcchayā
GE09ram_1-7u:368: 1.009.010c vibhāṇḍakasutas tatra tāś cāpaśyad varāṅganāḥ 1.009.011a tāś citraveṣāḥ pramadā gāyantyo madhurasvaraiḥ 1.009.011c ṛṣiputram upāgamya sarvā vacanam abruvan 1.009.012a kas tvaṃ kiṃ vartase brahmañ jñātum icchāmahe vayam 1.009.012c ekas tvaṃ vijane ghore vane carasi śaṃsa naḥ 1.009.013a adṛṣṭarūpās tās tena kāmyarūpā vane striyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:369: 1.009.013c hārdāt tasya matir jātā ākhyātuṃ pitaraṃ svakam
GE09ram_1-7u:371: 1.009.014c ṛṣyaśṛṅga iti khyātaṃ nāma karma ca me bhuvi 1.009.015a ihāśramapado 'smākaṃ samīpe śubhadarśanāḥ 1.009.015c kariṣye vo 'tra pūjāṃ vai sarveṣāṃ vidhipūrvakam
GE09ram_1-7u:372: 1.009.016a ṛṣiputravacaḥ śrutvā sarvāsāṃ matir āsa vai
GE09ram_1-7u:373: 1.009.016c tad āśramapadaṃ draṣṭuṃ jagmuḥ sarvāś ca tena ha 1.009.017a gatānāṃ tu tataḥ pūjām ṛṣiputraś cakāra ha
GE09ram_1-7u:374: 1.009.017c idam arghyam idaṃ pādyam idaṃ mūlaṃ phalaṃ ca naḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:375: 1.009.018a pratigṛhya tu tāṃ pūjāṃ sarvā eva samutsukāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:376: 1.009.018c ṛṣer bhītāś ca śīghraṃ tu gamanāya matiṃ dadhuḥ 1.009.019a asmākam api mukhyāni phalānīmāni vai dvija
GE09ram_1-7u:377: 1.009.019c gṛhāṇa prati bhadraṃ te bhakṣayasva ca mā ciram 1.009.020a tatas tās taṃ samāliṅgya sarvā harṣasamanvitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:378: 1.009.020c modakān pradadus tasmai bhakṣyāṃś ca vividhāñ śubhān
GE09ram_1-7u:379: 1.009.021a tāni cāsvādya tejasvī phalānīti sma manyate
GE09ram_1-7u:381: 1.009.022a āpṛcchya ca tadā vipraṃ vratacaryāṃ nivedya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:382: 1.009.022c gacchanti smāpadeśāt tā bhītās tasya pituḥ striyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:383: 1.009.023a gatāsu tāsu sarvāsu kāśyapasyātmajo dvijaḥ 1.009.023c asvasthahṛdayaś cāsīd duḥkhaṃ sma parivartate 1.009.024a tato 'paredyus taṃ deśam ājagāma sa vīryavān 1.009.024c manojñā yatra tā dṛṣṭā vāramukhyāḥ svalaṃkṛtāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:384: 1.009.025a dṛṣṭvaiva ca tadā vipram āyāntaṃ hṛṣṭa mānasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:385: 1.009.025c upasṛtya tataḥ sarvās tās tam ūcur idaṃ vacaḥ 1.009.026a ehy āśramapadaṃ saumya asmākam iti cābruvan
GE09ram_1-7u:386: 1.009.026c tatrāpy eṣa vidhiḥ śrīmān viśeṣeṇa bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:387: 1.009.027a śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tāsāṃ sarvāsāṃ hṛdayaṃgamam
GE09ram_1-7u:388: 1.009.027c gamanāya matiṃ cakre taṃ ca ninyus tadā striyaḥ 1.009.028a tatra cānīyamāne tu vipre tasmin mahātmani
GE09ram_1-7u:389: 1.009.028c vavarṣa sahasā devo jagat prahlādayaṃs tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:390: 1.009.029a varṣeṇaivāgataṃ vipraṃ viṣayaṃ svaṃ narādhipaḥ 1.009.029c pratyudgamya muniṃ prahvaḥ śirasā ca mahīṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:391: 1.009.030a arghyaṃ ca pradadau tasmai nyāyataḥ susamāhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:392: 1.009.030c vavre prasādaṃ viprendrān mā vipraṃ manyur āviśet
GE09ram_1-7u:393: 1.009.031a antaḥpuraṃ praviśyāsmai kanyāṃ dattvā yathāvidhi 1.009.031c śāntāṃ śāntena manasā rājā harṣam avāpa saḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:394: 1.009.032a evaṃ sa nyavasat tatra sarvakāmaiḥ supūjitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:395: 1.009.032c ṛṣyaśṛṅgo mahātejāḥ śāntayā saha bhāryayā 1.010.001a bhūya eva ca rājendra śṛṇu me vacanaṃ hitam 1.010.001c yathā sa devapravaraḥ kathayām āsa buddhimān
GE09ram_1-7u:396: 1.010.002a ikṣvākūṇāṃ kule jāto bhaviṣyati sudhārmikaḥ 1.010.002c rājā daśaratho nāmnā śrīmān satyapratiśravaḥ 1.010.003a aṅgarājena sakhyaṃ ca tasya rājño bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:397: 1.010.003c kanyā cāsya mahābhāgā śāntā nāma bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:398: 1.010.004a putras tv aṅgasya rājñas tu romapāda iti śrutaḥ 1.010.004c taṃ sa rājā daśaratho gamiṣyati mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:399: 1.010.005a anapatyo 'smi dharmātmañ śāntā bhāryā mama kratum 1.010.005c āhareta tvayājñaptaḥ saṃtānārthaṃ kulasya ca 1.010.006a śrutvā rājño 'tha tad vākyaṃ manasā sa vicintya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:400: 1.010.006c pradāsyate putravantaṃ śāntā bhartāram ātmavān 1.010.007a pratigṛhya ca taṃ vipraṃ sa rājā vigatajvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:402: 1.010.008a taṃ ca rājā daśaratho yaṣṭukāmaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:404: 1.010.009a yajñārthaṃ prasavārthaṃ ca svargārthaṃ ca nareśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:405: 1.010.009c labhate ca sa taṃ kāmaṃ dvija mukhyād viśāṃ patiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:408: 1.010.011a evaṃ sa devapravaraḥ pūrvaṃ kathitavān kathām
GE09ram_1-7u:409: 1.010.011c sanatkumāro bhagavān purā devayuge prabhuḥ 1.010.012a sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla tam ānaya susatkṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:410: 1.010.012c svayam eva mahārāja gatvā sabalavāhanaḥ 1.010.013a anumānya vasiṣṭhaṃ ca sūtavākyaṃ niśamya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:411: 1.010.013c sāntaḥpuraḥ sahāmātyaḥ prayayau yatra sa dvijaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:412: 1.010.014a vanāni saritaś caiva vyatikramya śanaiḥ śanaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:413: 1.010.014c abhicakrāma taṃ deśaṃ yatra vai munipuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:416: 1.010.016a tato rājā yathānyāyaṃ pūjāṃ cakre viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:417: 1.010.016c sakhitvāt tasya vai rājñaḥ prahṛṣṭenāntarātmanā 1.010.017a romapādena cākhyātam ṛṣiputrāya dhīmate
GE09ram_1-7u:418: 1.010.017c sakhyaṃ saṃbandhakaṃ caiva tadā taṃ pratyapūjayat
GE09ram_1-7u:419: 1.010.018a evaṃ susatkṛtas tena sahoṣitvā nararṣabhaḥ 1.010.018c saptāṣṭadivasān rājā rājānam idam abravīt 1.010.019a śāntā tava sutā rājan saha bhartrā viśāmpate
GE09ram_1-7u:420: 1.010.019c madīyaṃ nagaraṃ yātu kāryaṃ hi mahad udyatam
GE09ram_1-7u:421: 1.010.020a tatheti rājā saṃśrutya gamanaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:422: 1.010.020c uvāca vacanaṃ vipraṃ gaccha tvaṃ saha bhāryayā
GE09ram_1-7u:423: 1.010.021a ṛṣiputraḥ pratiśrutya tathety āha nṛpaṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:424: 1.010.021c sa nṛpeṇābhyanujñātaḥ prayayau saha bhāryayā 1.010.022a tāv anyonyāñjaliṃ kṛtvā snehāt saṃśliṣya corasā
GE09ram_1-7u:425: 1.010.022c nanandatur daśaratho romapādaś ca vīryavān 1.010.023a tataḥ suhṛdam āpṛcchya prasthito raghunandanaḥ 1.010.023c paurebhyaḥ preṣayām āsa dūtān vai śīghragāminaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:426: 1.010.023e kriyatāṃ nagaraṃ sarvaṃ kṣipram eva svalaṃkṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:427: 1.010.024a tataḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ paurās te śrutvā rājānam āgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:428: 1.010.024c tathā pracakrus tat sarvaṃ rājñā yat preṣitaṃ tadā 1.010.025a tataḥ svalaṃkṛtaṃ rājā nagaraṃ praviveśa ha
GE09ram_1-7u:430: 1.010.026a tataḥ pramuditāḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā vai nāgarā dvijam
GE09ram_1-7u:432: 1.010.027a antaḥpuraṃ praveśyainaṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā tu śāstrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:434: 1.010.028a antaḥpurāṇi sarvāṇi śāntāṃ dṛṣṭvā tathāgatām 1.010.028c saha bhartrā viśālākṣīṃ prītyānandam upāgaman 1.010.029a pūjyamānā ca tābhiḥ sā rājñā caiva viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:435: 1.010.029c uvāsa tatra sukhitā kaṃ cit kālaṃ saha dvijā 1.011.001a tataḥ kāle bahutithe kasmiṃś cit sumanohare
GE09ram_1-7u:437: 1.011.002a tataḥ prasādya śirasā taṃ vipraṃ devavarṇinam
GE09ram_1-7u:438: 1.011.002c yajñāya varayām āsa saṃtānārthaṃ kulasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:439: 1.011.003a tatheti ca sa rājānam uvāca ca susatkṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:440: 1.011.003c saṃbhārāḥ saṃbhriyantāṃ te turagaś ca vimucyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:441: 1.011.004a tato rājābravīd vākyaṃ sumantraṃ mantrisattamam 1.011.004c sumantrāvāhaya kṣipram ṛtvijo brahmavādinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:442: 1.011.005a tataḥ sumantras tvaritaṃ gatvā tvaritavikramaḥ 1.011.005c samānayat sa tān viprān samastān vedapāragān
GE09ram_1-7u:443: 1.011.006a suyajñaṃ vāmadevaṃ ca jābālim atha kāśyapam
GE09ram_1-7u:444: 1.011.006c purohitaṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ ca ye cānye dvijasattamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:445: 1.011.007a tān pūjayitvā dharmātmā rājā daśarathas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:446: 1.011.007c idaṃ dharmārthasahitaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ vacanam abravīt 1.011.008a mama lālapyamānasya putrārthaṃ nāsti vai sukham
GE09ram_1-7u:447: 1.011.008c tadarthaṃ hayamedhena yakṣyāmīti matir mama 1.011.009a tad ahaṃ yaṣṭum icchāmi śāstradṛṣṭena karmaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:448: 1.011.009c ṛṣiputraprabhāvena kāmān prāpsyāmi cāpy aham 1.011.010a tataḥ sādhv iti tad vākyaṃ brāhmaṇāḥ pratyapūjayan
GE09ram_1-7u:449: 1.011.010c vasiṣṭhapramukhāḥ sarve pārthivasya mukhāc cyutam 1.011.011a ṛṣyaśṛṅgapurogāś ca pratyūcur nṛpatiṃ tadā 1.011.011c saṃbhārāḥ saṃbhriyantāṃ te turagaś ca vimucyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:451: 1.011.012c yasya te dhārmikī buddhir iyaṃ putrārtham āgatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:452: 1.011.013a tataḥ prīto 'bhavad rājā śrutvā tad dvijabhāṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:453: 1.011.013c amātyāṃś cābravīd rājā harṣeṇedaṃ śubhākṣaram 1.011.014a gurūṇāṃ vacanāc chīghraṃ saṃbhārāḥ saṃbhriyantu me
GE09ram_1-7u:455: 1.011.015a sarayvāś cottare tīre yajñabhūmir vidhīyatām 1.011.015c śāntayaś cābhivardhantāṃ yathākalpaṃ yathāvidhi
GE09ram_1-7u:456: 1.011.016a śakyaḥ kartum ayaṃ yajñaḥ sarveṇāpi mahīkṣitā
GE09ram_1-7u:457: 1.011.016c nāparādho bhavet kaṣṭo yady asmin kratusattame
GE09ram_1-7u:458: 1.011.017a chidraṃ hi mṛgayante 'tra vidvāṃso brahmarākṣasāḥ 1.011.017c vidhihīnasya yajñasya sadyaḥ kartā vinaśyati 1.011.018a tad yathāvidhi pūrvaṃ me kratur eṣa samāpyate
GE09ram_1-7u:459: 1.011.018c tathāvidhānaṃ kriyatāṃ samarthāḥ karaṇeṣv iha 1.011.019a tatheti ca tataḥ sarve mantriṇaḥ pratyapūjayan
GE09ram_1-7u:460: 1.011.019c pārthivendrasya tad vākyaṃ yathājñaptam akurvata 1.011.020a tato dvijās te dharmajñam astuvan pārthivarṣabham
GE09ram_1-7u:461: 1.011.020c anujñātās tataḥ sarve punar jagmur yathāgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:462: 1.011.021a gatānāṃ tu dvijātīnāṃ mantriṇas tān narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:463: 1.011.021c visarjayitvā svaṃ veśma praviveśa mahā dyutiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:464: 1.012.001a punaḥ prāpte vasante tu pūrṇaḥ saṃvatsaro 'bhavat
GE09ram_1-7u:465: 1.012.001c abhivādya vasiṣṭhaṃ ca nyāyataḥ pratipūjya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:466: 1.012.002a abravīt praśritaṃ vākyaṃ prasavārthaṃ dvijottamam 1.012.002c yajño me kriyatāṃ vipra yathoktaṃ munipuṃgava
GE09ram_1-7u:467: 1.012.003a yathā na vighnaḥ kriyate yajñāṅgeṣu vidhīyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:468: 1.012.003c bhavān snigdhaḥ suhṛn mahyaṃ guruś ca paramo bhavān 1.012.004a voḍhavyo bhavatā caiva bhāro yajñasya codyataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:469: 1.012.004c tatheti ca sa rājānam abravīd dvijasattamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:470: 1.012.005a kariṣye sarvam evaitad bhavatā yat samarthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:472: 1.012.006a sthāpatye niṣṭhitāṃś caiva vṛddhān paramadhārmikān 1.012.006c karmāntikāñ śilpakārān vardhakīn khanakān api 1.012.007a gaṇakāñ śilpinaś caiva tathaiva naṭanartakān 1.012.007c tathā śucīñ śāstravidaḥ puruṣān subahuśrutān 1.012.008a yajñakarma samīhantāṃ bhavanto rājaśāsanāt
GE09ram_1-7u:473: 1.012.008c iṣṭakā bahusāhasrī śīghram ānīyatām iti 1.012.009a aupakāryāḥ kriyantāṃ ca rājñāṃ bahuguṇānvitāḥ 1.012.009c brāhmaṇāvasathāś caiva kartavyāḥ śataśaḥ śubhāḥ 1.012.010a bhakṣyānnapānair bahubhiḥ samupetāḥ suniṣṭhitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:475: 1.012.011a āvāsā bahubhakṣyā vai sarvakāmair upasthitāḥ 1.012.011c tathā jānapadasyāpi janasya bahuśobhanam
GE09ram_1-7u:476: 1.012.012a dātavyam annaṃ vidhivat satkṛtya na tu līlayā
GE09ram_1-7u:477: 1.012.012c sarvavarṇā yathā pūjāṃ prāpnuvanti susatkṛtāḥ 1.012.013a na cāvajñā prayoktavyā kāmakrodhavaśād api 1.012.013c yajñakarmasu ye 'vyagrāḥ puruṣāḥ śilpinas tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:478: 1.012.014a teṣām api viśeṣeṇa pūjā kāryā yathākramam
GE09ram_1-7u:479: 1.012.014c yathā sarvaṃ suvihitaṃ na kiṃ cit parihīyate
GE09ram_1-7u:480: 1.012.015a tathā bhavantaḥ kurvantu prītisnigdhena cetasā 1.012.015c tataḥ sarve samāgamya vasiṣṭham idam abruvan
GE09ram_1-7u:481: 1.012.016a yathoktaṃ tat kariṣyāmo na kiṃ cit parihāsyate
GE09ram_1-7u:482: 1.012.016c tataḥ sumantram āhūya vasiṣṭho vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:483: 1.012.017a nimantrayasya nṛpatīn pṛthivyāṃ ye ca dhārmikāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:484: 1.012.017c brāhmaṇān kṣatriyān vaiśyāñ śūdrāṃś caiva sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:487: 1.012.019a niṣṭhitaṃ sarvaśāstreṣu tathā vedeṣu niṣṭhitam 1.012.019c tam ānaya mahābhāgaṃ svayam eva susatkṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:488: 1.012.019e pūrvasaṃbandhinaṃ jñātvā tataḥ pūrvaṃ bravīmi te
GE09ram_1-7u:489: 1.012.020a tathā kāśipatiṃ snigdhaṃ satataṃ priyavādinam 1.012.020c sadvṛttaṃ devasaṃkāśaṃ svayam evānayasva ha 1.012.021a tathā kekayarājānaṃ vṛddhaṃ paramadhārmikam
GE09ram_1-7u:490: 1.012.021c śvaśuraṃ rājasiṃhasya saputraṃ tam ihānaya 1.012.022a aṅgeśvaraṃ mahābhāgaṃ romapādaṃ susatkṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:491: 1.012.022c vayasyaṃ rājasiṃhasya tam ānaya yaśasvinam 1.012.023a prācīnān sindhusauvīrān saurāṣṭhreyāṃś ca pārthivān 1.012.023c dākṣiṇātyān narendrāṃś ca samastān ānayasva ha
GE09ram_1-7u:492: 1.012.024a santi snigdhāś ca ye cānye rājānaḥ pṛthivītale
GE09ram_1-7u:493: 1.012.024c tān ānaya yathākṣipraṃ sānugān sahabāndhavān 1.012.025a vasiṣṭhavākyaṃ tac chrutvā sumantras tvaritas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:494: 1.012.025c vyādiśat puruṣāṃs tatra rājñām ānayane śubhān
GE09ram_1-7u:495: 1.012.026a svayam eva hi dharmātmā prayayau muniśāsanāt
GE09ram_1-7u:496: 1.012.026c sumantras tvarito bhūtvā samānetuṃ mahīkṣitaḥ 1.012.027a te ca karmāntikāḥ sarve vasiṣṭhāya ca dhīmate
GE09ram_1-7u:497: 1.012.027c sarvaṃ nivedayanti sma yajñe yad upakalpitam
GE09ram_1-7u:498: 1.012.028a tataḥ prīto dvijaśreṣṭhas tān sarvān punar abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:499: 1.012.028c avajñayā na dātavyaṃ kasya cil līlayāpi vā
GE09ram_1-7u:500: 1.012.028e avajñayā kṛtaṃ hanyād dātāraṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:501: 1.012.029a tataḥ kaiś cid ahorātrair upayātā mahīkṣitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:502: 1.012.029c bahūni ratnāny ādāya rājño daśarathasya ha
GE09ram_1-7u:503: 1.012.030a tato vasiṣṭhaḥ suprīto rājānam idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:504: 1.012.030c upayātā naravyāghra rājānas tava śāsanāt 1.012.031a mayāpi satkṛtāḥ sarve yathārhaṃ rājasattamāḥ 1.012.031c yajñiyaṃ ca kṛtaṃ rājan puruṣaiḥ susamāhitaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:505: 1.012.032a niryātu ca bhavān yaṣṭuṃ yajñāyatanam antikāt
GE09ram_1-7u:506: 1.012.032c sarvakāmair upahṛtair upetaṃ vai samantataḥ 1.012.033a tathā vasiṣṭhavacanād ṛṣyaśṛṅgasya cobhayoḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:507: 1.012.033c śubhe divasa nakṣatre niryāto jagatīpatiḥ 1.012.034a tato vasiṣṭhapramukhāḥ sarva eva dvijottamāḥ 1.012.034c ṛṣyaśṛṅgaṃ puraskṛtya yajñakarmārabhaṃs tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:508: 1.013.001a atha saṃvatsare pūrṇe tasmin prāpte turaṅgame
GE09ram_1-7u:510: 1.013.002a ṛṣyaśṛṅgaṃ puraskṛtya karma cakrur dvijarṣabhāḥ 1.013.002c aśvamedhe mahāyajñe rājño 'sya sumahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:511: 1.013.003a karma kurvanti vidhivad yājakā vedapāragāḥ 1.013.003c yathāvidhi yathānyāyaṃ parikrāmanti śāstrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:512: 1.013.004a pravargyaṃ śāstrataḥ kṛtvā tathaivopasadaṃ dvijāḥ 1.013.004c cakruś ca vidhivat sarvam adhikaṃ karma śāstrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:513: 1.013.005a abhipūjya tato hṛṣṭāḥ sarve cakrur yathāvidhi
GE09ram_1-7u:515: 1.013.006a na cāhutam abhūt tatra skhalitaṃ vāpi kiṃ cana 1.013.006c dṛśyate brahmavat sarvaṃ kṣemayuktaṃ hi cakrire
GE09ram_1-7u:516: 1.013.007a na teṣv ahaḥsu śrānto vā kṣudhito vāpi dṛśyate 1.013.007c nāvidvān brāhmaṇas tatra nāśatānucaras tathā 1.013.008a brāhmaṇā bhuñjate nityaṃ nāthavantaś ca bhuñjate
GE09ram_1-7u:517: 1.013.008c tāpasā bhujate cāpi śramaṇā bhuñjate tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:518: 1.013.009a vṛddhāś ca vyādhitāś caiva striyo bālās tathaiva ca 1.013.009c aniśaṃ bhuñjamānānāṃ na tṛptir upalabhyate 1.013.010a dīyatāṃ dīyatām annaṃ vāsāṃsi vividhāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:519: 1.013.010c iti saṃcoditās tatra tathā cakrur anekaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:520: 1.013.011a annakūṭāś ca bahavo dṛśyante parvatopamāḥ 1.013.011c divase divase tatra siddhasya vidhivat tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:521: 1.013.012a annaṃ hi vidhivat svādu praśaṃsanti dvijarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:522: 1.013.012c aho tṛptāḥ sma bhadraṃ te iti śuśrāva rāghavaḥ 1.013.013a svalaṃkṛtāś ca puruṣā brāhmaṇān paryaveṣayan 1.013.013c upāsate ca tān anye sumṛṣṭamaṇikuṇḍalāḥ 1.013.014a karmāntare tadā viprā hetuvādān bahūn api
GE09ram_1-7u:524: 1.013.015a divase divase tatra saṃstare kuśalā dvijāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:525: 1.013.015c sarvakarmāṇi cakrus te yathāśāstraṃ pracoditāḥ 1.013.016a nāṣaḍaṅgavid atrāsīn nāvrato nābahuśrutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:526: 1.013.016c sadasyas tasya vai rājño nāvādakuśalo dvijaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:527: 1.013.017a prāpte yūpocchraye tasmin ṣaḍ bailvāḥ khādirās tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:528: 1.013.017c tāvanto bilvasahitāḥ parṇinaś ca tathāpare 1.013.018a śleṣmātakamayo diṣṭo devadārumayas
GE09ram_1-7u:529: 1.013.018c dvāv eva tatra vihitau bāhuvyastaparigrahau 1.013.019a kāritāḥ sarva evaite śāstrajñair yajñakovidaiḥ 1.013.019c śobhārthaṃ tasya yajñasya kāñcanālaṃkṛtā bhavan 1.013.020a vinyastā vidhivat sarve śilpibhiḥ sukṛtā dṛḍhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:531: 1.013.021a ācchāditās te vāsobhiḥ puṣpair gandhaiś ca bhūṣitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:532: 1.013.021c saptarṣayo dīptimanto virājante yathā divi 1.013.022a iṣṭakāś ca yathānyāyaṃ kāritāś ca pramāṇataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:534: 1.013.022e sa cityo rājasiṃhasya saṃcitaḥ kuśalair dvijaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:536: 1.013.023c niyuktās tatra paśavas tat tad uddiśya daivatam
GE09ram_1-7u:537: 1.013.024a uragāḥ pakṣiṇaś caiva yathāśāstraṃ pracoditāḥ 1.013.024c śāmitre tu hayas tatra tathā jala carāś ca ye
GE09ram_1-7u:538: 1.013.025a ṛtvigbhiḥ sarvam evaitan niyuktaṃ śāstratas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:539: 1.013.025c paśūnāṃ triśataṃ tatra yūpeṣu niyataṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:540: 1.013.025e aśvaratnottamaṃ tasya rājño daśarathasya ha 1.013.026a kausalyā taṃ hayaṃ tatra paricarya samantataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:541: 1.013.026c kṛpāṇair viśaśāsainaṃ tribhiḥ paramayā mudā 1.013.027a patatriṇā tadā sārdhaṃ susthitena ca cetasā
GE09ram_1-7u:542: 1.013.027c avasad rajanīm ekāṃ kausalyā dharmakāmyayā 1.013.028a hotādhvaryus tathodgātā hayena samayojayan
GE09ram_1-7u:543: 1.013.028c mahiṣyā parivṛtthyātha vāvātām aparāṃ tathā 1.013.029a patatriṇas tasya vapām uddhṛtya niyatendriyaḥ 1.013.029c ṛtvik parama saṃpannaḥ śrapayām āsa śāstrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:544: 1.013.030a dhūmagandhaṃ vapāyās tu jighrati sma narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:545: 1.013.030c yathākālaṃ yathānyāyaṃ nirṇudan pāpam ātmanaḥ 1.013.031a hayasya yāni cāṅgāni tāni sarvāṇi brāhmaṇāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:546: 1.013.031c agnau prāsyanti vidhivat samastāḥ ṣoḍaśartvijaḥ 1.013.032a plakṣaśākhāsu yajñānām anyeṣāṃ kriyate haviḥ 1.013.032c aśvamedhasya caikasya vaitaso bhāga iṣyate 1.013.033a tryaho 'śvamedhaḥ saṃkhyātaḥ kalpasūtreṇa brāhmaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:547: 1.013.033c catuṣṭomam ahas tasya prathamaṃ parikalpitam 1.013.034a ukthyaṃ dvitīyaṃ saṃkhyātam atirātraṃ tathottaram 1.013.034c kāritās tatra bahavo vihitāḥ śāstradarśanāt 1.013.035a jyotiṣṭomāyuṣī caiva atirātrau ca nirmitau 1.013.035c abhijid viśvajic caiva aptoryāmo mahākratuḥ 1.013.036a prācīṃ hotre dadau rājā diśaṃ svakulavardhanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:548: 1.013.036c adhvaryave pratīcīṃ tu brahmaṇe dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE09ram_1-7u:549: 1.013.037a udgātre tu tathodīcīṃ dakṣiṇaiṣā vinirmitā 1.013.037c aśvamedhe mahāyajñe svayambhuvihite
GE09ram_1-7u:550: 1.013.038a kratuṃ samāpya tu tadā nyāyataḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:551: 1.013.038c ṛtvigbhyo hi dadau rājā dharāṃ tāṃ kratuvardhanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:552: 1.013.039a ṛtvijas tv abruvan sarve rājānaṃ gatakalmaṣam
GE09ram_1-7u:553: 1.013.039c bhavān eva mahīṃ kṛtsnām eko rakṣitum arhati
GE09ram_1-7u:554: 1.013.040a na bhūmyā kāryam asmākaṃ na hi śaktāḥ sma pālane
GE09ram_1-7u:555: 1.013.040c ratāḥ svādhyāyakaraṇe vayaṃ nityaṃ hi bhūmipa
GE09ram_1-7u:556: 1.013.040e niṣkrayaṃ kiṃ cid eveha prayacchatu bhavān iti
GE09ram_1-7u:557: 1.013.041a gavāṃ śatasahasrāṇi daśa tebhyo dadau nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:559: 1.013.042a ṛtvijas tu tataḥ sarve pradaduḥ sahitā vasu
GE09ram_1-7u:560: 1.013.042c ṛṣyaśṛṅgāya munaye vasiṣṭhāya ca dhīmate 1.013.043a tatas te nyāyataḥ kṛtvā pravibhāgaṃ dvijottamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:561: 1.013.043c suprītamanasaḥ sarve pratyūcur muditā bhṛśam 1.013.044a tataḥ prītamanā rājā prāpya yajñam anuttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:564: 1.013.045c kulasya vardhanaṃ tat tu kartum arhasi suvrata
GE09ram_1-7u:565: 1.013.046a tatheti ca sa rājānam uvāca dvijasattamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:566: 1.013.046c bhaviṣyanti sutā rājaṃś catvāras te kulodvahāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:567: 1.014.001a medhāvī tu tato dhyātvā sa kiṃ cid idam uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:568: 1.014.001c labdhasaṃjñas tatas taṃ tu vedajño nṛpam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:570: 1.014.002c atharvaśirasi proktair mantraiḥ siddhāṃ vidhānataḥ 1.014.003a tataḥ prākramad iṣṭiṃ tāṃ putrīyāṃ putra kāraṇāt
GE09ram_1-7u:571: 1.014.003c juhāva cāgnau tejasvī mantradṛṣṭena karmaṇā 1.014.004a tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:573: 1.014.005a tāḥ sametya yathānyāyaṃ tasmin sadasi devatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:574: 1.014.005c abruvaṃl lokakartāraṃ brahmāṇaṃ vacanaṃ mahat 1.014.006a bhagavaṃs tvatprasādena rāvaṇo nāma rākṣasaḥ 1.014.006c sarvānno bādhate vīryāc chāsituṃ taṃ na śaknumaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:575: 1.014.007a tvayā tasmai varo dattaḥ prītena bhagavan purā
GE09ram_1-7u:576: 1.014.007c mānayantaś ca taṃ nityaṃ sarvaṃ tasya kṣamāmahe
GE09ram_1-7u:577: 1.014.008a udvejayati lokāṃs trīn ucchritān dveṣṭi durmatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:579: 1.014.009a ṛṣīn yakṣān sagandharvān asurān brāhmaṇāṃs tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:581: 1.014.010a nainaṃ sūryaḥ pratapati pārśve vāti na mārutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:582: 1.014.010c calormimālī taṃ dṛṣṭvā samudro 'pi na kampate 1.014.011a tan manan no bhayaṃ tasmād rākṣasād ghoradarśanāt
GE09ram_1-7u:583: 1.014.011c vadhārthaṃ tasya bhagavann upāyaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:584: 1.014.012a evam uktaḥ suraiḥ sarvaiś cintayitvā tato 'bravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:585: 1.014.012c hantāyaṃ vihitas tasya vadhopāyo durātmanaḥ 1.014.013a tena gandharvayakṣāṇāṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:586: 1.014.013c avadhyo 'smīti vāg uktā tathety uktaṃ ca tan mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:587: 1.014.014a nākīrtayad avajñānāt tad rakṣo mānuṣāṃs tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:588: 1.014.014c tasmāt sa mānuṣād vadhyo mṛtur nānyo 'sya vidyate
GE09ram_1-7u:589: 1.014.015a etac chrutvā priyaṃ vākyaṃ brahmaṇā samudāhṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:590: 1.014.015c devā maharṣayaḥ sarve prahṛṣṭās te 'bhavaṃs tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:591: 1.014.016a etasminn antare viṣṇur upayāto mahādyutiḥ 1.014.016c brahmaṇā ca samāgamya tatra tasthau samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:592: 1.014.017a tam abruvan surāḥ sarve samabhiṣṭūya saṃnatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:593: 1.014.017c tvāṃ niyokṣyāmahe viṣṇo lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā 1.014.018a rājño daśarathasya tvam ayodhyādhipater vibho 1.014.018c dharmajñasya vadānyasya maharṣisamatejasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:594: 1.014.018e tasya bhāryāsu tisṛṣu hrīśrīkīrtyupamāsu ca 1.014.018g viṣṇo putratvam āgaccha kṛtvātmānaṃ caturvidham 1.014.019a tatra tvaṃ mānuṣo bhūtvā pravṛddhaṃ lokakaṇṭakam
GE09ram_1-7u:595: 1.014.019c avadhyaṃ daivatair viṣṇo samare jahi rāvaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:596: 1.014.020a sa hi devān sagandharvān siddhāṃś ca ṛṣisattamān
GE09ram_1-7u:597: 1.014.020c rākṣaso rāvaṇo mūrkho vīryotsekena bādhate 1.014.021a tad uddhataṃ rāvaṇam ṛddhatejasaṃ; pravṛddhadarpaṃ tridaśeśvaradviṣam 1.014.021c virāvaṇaṃ sādhu tapasvikaṇṭakaṃ; tapasvinām uddhara taṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:599: 1.015.001a tato nārāyaṇo viṣṇur niyuktaḥ surasattamaiḥ 1.015.001c jānann api surān evaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:600: 1.015.002a upāyaḥ ko vadhe tasya rākṣasādhipateḥ surāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:601: 1.015.002c yam ahaṃ taṃ samāsthāya nihanyām ṛṣikaṇṭakam
GE09ram_1-7u:602: 1.015.003a evam uktāḥ surāḥ sarve pratyūcur viṣṇum avyayam
GE09ram_1-7u:603: 1.015.003c mānuṣīṃ tanum āsthāya rāvaṇaṃ jahi saṃyuge
GE09ram_1-7u:604: 1.015.004a sa hi tepe tapas tīvraṃ dīrghakālam ariṃdama
GE09ram_1-7u:606: 1.015.005a saṃtuṣṭaḥ pradadau tasmai rākṣasāya varaṃ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:607: 1.015.005c nānāvidhebhyo bhūtebhyo bhayaṃ nānyatra mānuṣāt 1.015.006a avajñātāḥ purā tena varadānena mānavāḥ 1.015.006c tasmāt tasya vadho dṛṣṭo mānuṣebhyaḥ paraṃtapa
GE09ram_1-7u:608: 1.015.007a ity etad vacanaṃ śrutvā surāṇāṃ viṣṇur ātmavān
GE09ram_1-7u:609: 1.015.007c pitaraṃ rocayām āsa tadā daśarathaṃ nṛpam
GE09ram_1-7u:610: 1.015.008a sa cāpy aputro nṛpatis tasmin kāle mahādyutiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:611: 1.015.008c ayajat putriyām iṣṭiṃ putrepsur arisūdanaḥ 1.015.009a tato vai yajamānasya pāvakād atulaprabham 1.015.009c prādurbhūtaṃ mahad bhūtaṃ mahāvīryaṃ mahābalam 1.015.010a kṛṣṇaṃ raktāmbaradharaṃ raktāsyaṃ dundubhisvanam
GE09ram_1-7u:613: 1.015.011a śubhalakṣaṇasaṃpannaṃ divyābharaṇabhūṣitam 1.015.011c śailaśṛṅgasamutsedhaṃ dṛptaśārdūlavikramam 1.015.012a divākarasamākāraṃ dīptānalaśikhopamam 1.015.012c taptajāmbūnadamayīṃ rājatāntaparicchadām 1.015.013a divyapāyasasaṃpūrṇāṃ pātrīṃ patnīm iva priyām 1.015.013c pragṛhya vipulāṃ dorbhyāṃ svayaṃ māyāmayīm iva
GE09ram_1-7u:614: 1.015.014a samavekṣyābravīd vākyam idaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam 1.015.014c prājāpatyaṃ naraṃ viddhi mām ihābhyāgataṃ nṛpa
GE09ram_1-7u:615: 1.015.015a tataḥ paraṃ tadā rājā pratyuvāca kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:616: 1.015.015c bhagavan svāgataṃ te 'stu kim ahaṃ karavāṇi te
GE09ram_1-7u:617: 1.015.016a atho punar idaṃ vākyaṃ prājāpatyo naro 'bravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:618: 1.015.016c rājann arcayatā devān adya prāptam idaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:619: 1.015.017a idaṃ tu naraśārdūla pāyasaṃ devanirmitam 1.015.017c prajākaraṃ gṛhāṇa tvaṃ dhanyam ārogyavardhanam 1.015.018a bhāryāṇām anurūpāṇām aśnīteti prayaccha vai 1.015.018c tāsu tvaṃ lapsyase putrān yadarthaṃ yajase nṛpa
GE09ram_1-7u:620: 1.015.019a tatheti nṛpatiḥ prītaḥ śirasā pratigṛhyatām 1.015.019c pātrīṃ devānnasaṃpūrṇāṃ devadattāṃ hiraṇmayīm
GE09ram_1-7u:621: 1.015.020a abhivādya ca tad bhūtam adbhutaṃ priyadarśanam
GE09ram_1-7u:623: 1.015.021a tato daśarathaḥ prāpya pāyasaṃ devanirmitam 1.015.021c babhūva paramaprītaḥ prāpya vittam ivādhanaḥ 1.015.022a tatas tad adbhutaprakhyaṃ bhūtaṃ paramabhāsvaram 1.015.022c saṃvartayitvā tat karma tatraivāntaradhīyata
GE09ram_1-7u:627: 1.015.024c pāyasaṃ pratigṛhṇīṣva putrīyaṃ tv idam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:628: 1.015.025a kausalyāyai narapatiḥ pāyasārdhaṃ dadau tadā 1.015.025c ardhād ardhaṃ dadau cāpi sumitrāyai narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:631: 1.015.027a anucintya sumitrāyai punar eva mahīpatiḥ 1.015.027c evaṃ tāsāṃ dadau rājā bhāryāṇāṃ pāyasaṃ pṛthak
GE09ram_1-7u:632: 1.015.028a tās tv etat pāyasaṃ prāpya narendrasyottamāḥ striyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:634: 1.016.001a putratvaṃ tu gate viṣṇau rājñas tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:635: 1.016.001c uvāca devatāḥ sarvāḥ svayambhūr bhagavān idam
GE09ram_1-7u:636: 1.016.002a satyasaṃdhasya vīrasya sarveṣāṃ no hitaiṣiṇaḥ 1.016.002c viṣṇoḥ sahāyān balinaḥ sṛjadhvaṃ kāmarūpiṇaḥ 1.016.003a māyāvidaś ca śūrāṃś ca vāyuvegasamāñjave 1.016.003c nayajñān buddhisaṃpannān viṣṇutulyaparākramān
GE09ram_1-7u:639: 1.016.005a apsaraḥsu ca mukhyāsu gandharvīṇāṃ tanūṣu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:641: 1.016.006a kiṃnarīṇāṃ ca gātreṣu vānarīṇāṃ tanūṣu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:643: 1.016.007a te tathoktā bhagavatā tat pratiśrutya śāsanam
GE09ram_1-7u:644: 1.016.007c janayām āsur evaṃ te putrān vānararūpiṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:646: 1.016.008c cāraṇāś ca sutān vīrān sasṛjur vanacāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:651: 1.016.011a yasya devasya yad rūpaṃ veṣo yaś ca parākramaḥ 1.016.011c ajāyata samastena tasya tasya sutaḥ pṛthak
GE09ram_1-7u:652: 1.016.012a golāṅgūlīṣu cotpannāḥ ke cit saṃmatavikramāḥ 1.016.012c ṛkṣīṣu ca tathā jātā vānarāḥ kiṃnarīṣu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:655: 1.016.014a vicālayeyuḥ śailendrān bhedayeyuḥ sthirān drumān 1.016.014c kṣobhayeyuś ca vegena samudraṃ saritāṃ patim
GE09ram_1-7u:656: 1.016.015a dārayeyuḥ kṣitiṃ padbhyām āplaveyur mahārṇavam 1.016.015c nabhastalaṃ viśeyuś ca gṛhṇīyur api toyadān
GE09ram_1-7u:657: 1.016.016a gṛhṇīyur api mātaṅgān mattān pravrajato vane
GE09ram_1-7u:658: 1.016.016c nardamānāṃś ca nādena pātayeyur vihaṃgamān 1.016.017a īdṛśānāṃ prasūtāni harīṇāṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:660: 1.016.017e babhūvur yūthapaśreṣṭhā vīrāṃś cājanayan harīn 1.016.018a anye ṛkṣavataḥ prasthān upatasthuḥ sahasraśaḥ 1.016.018c anye nānāvidhāñ śailān kānanāni ca bhejire
GE09ram_1-7u:661: 1.016.019a sūryaputraṃ ca sugrīvaṃ śakraputraṃ ca vālinam
GE09ram_1-7u:662: 1.016.019c bhrātarāv upatasthus te sarva eva harīśvarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:663: 1.016.020a tair meghavṛndācalatulyakāyair; mahābalair vānarayūthapālaiḥ 1.016.020c babhūva bhūr bhīmaśarīrarūpaiḥ; samāvṛtā rāmasahāyahetoḥ 1.017.001a nirvṛtte tu kratau tasmin hayamedhe mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:664: 1.017.001c pratigṛhya surā bhāgān pratijagmur yathāgatam 1.017.002a samāptadīkṣāniyamaḥ patnīgaṇasamanvitaḥ 1.017.002c praviveśa purīṃ rājā sabhṛtyabalavāhanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:665: 1.017.003a yathārhaṃ pūjitās tena rājñā vai pṛthivīśvarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:666: 1.017.003c muditāḥ prayayur deśān praṇamya munipuṃgavam 1.017.004a gateṣu pṛthivīśeṣu rājā daśarathaḥ punaḥ 1.017.004c praviveśa purīṃ śrīmān puraskṛtya dvijottamān 1.017.005a śāntayā prayayau sārdham ṛṣyaśṛṅgaḥ supūjitaḥ 1.017.005c anvīyamāno rājñātha sānuyātreṇa dhīmatā
GE09ram_1-7u:668: 1.017.006c viṣṇor ardhaṃ mahābhāgaṃ putram ikṣvākunandanam 1.017.007a kausalyā śuśubhe tena putreṇāmitatejasā
GE09ram_1-7u:669: 1.017.007c yathā vareṇa devānām aditir vajrapāṇinā 1.017.008a bharato nāma kaikeyyāṃ jajñe satyaparākramaḥ 1.017.008c sākṣād viṣṇoś caturbhāgaḥ sarvaiḥ samudito guṇaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:672: 1.017.010a rājñaḥ putrā mahātmānaś catvāro jajñire pṛthak
GE09ram_1-7u:674: 1.017.011a atītyaikādaśāhaṃ tu nāma karma tathākarot 1.017.011c jyeṣṭhaṃ rāmaṃ mahātmānaṃ bharataṃ kaikayīsutam 1.017.012a saumitriṃ lakṣmaṇam iti śatrughnam aparaṃ tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:675: 1.017.012c vasiṣṭhaḥ paramaprīto nāmāni kṛtavāṃs tadā 1.017.012e teṣāṃ janmakriyādīni sarvakarmāṇy
GE09ram_1-7u:676: 1.017.013a teṣāṃ ketur iva jyeṣṭho rāmo ratikaraḥ pituḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:677: 1.017.013c babhūva bhūyo bhūtānāṃ svayambhūr iva saṃmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:678: 1.017.014a sarve vedavidaḥ śūrāḥ sarve lokahite ratāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:679: 1.017.014c sarve jñānopasaṃpannāḥ sarve samuditā guṇaiḥ 1.017.015a teṣām api mahātejā rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ 1.017.015c bālyāt prabhṛti susnigdho lakṣmaṇo lakṣmivardhanaḥ 1.017.016a rāmasya lokarāmasya bhrātur jyeṣṭhasya nityaśaḥ 1.017.016c sarvapriyakaras tasya rāmasyāpi śarīrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:681: 1.017.017c na ca tena vinā nidrāṃ labhate puruṣottamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:682: 1.017.017e mṛṣṭam annam upānītam aśnāti na hi taṃ vinā 1.017.018a yadā hi hayam ārūḍho mṛgayāṃ yāti rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:683: 1.017.018c tadainaṃ pṛṣṭhato 'bhyeti sadhanuḥ paripālayan 1.017.019a bharatasyāpi śatrughno lakṣmaṇāvarajo hi saḥ 1.017.019c prāṇaiḥ priyataro nityaṃ tasya cāsīt tathā priyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:684: 1.017.020a sa caturbhir mahābhāgaiḥ putrair daśarathaḥ priyaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:685: 1.017.020c babhūva paramaprīto devair iva pitāmahaḥ 1.017.021a te yadā jñānasaṃpannāḥ sarve samuditā guṇaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:686: 1.017.021c hrīmantaḥ kīrtimantaś ca sarvajñā dīrghadarśinaḥ 1.017.022a atha rājā daśarathas teṣāṃ dārakriyāṃ prati
GE09ram_1-7u:687: 1.017.022c cintayām āsa dharmātmā sopādhyāyaḥ sabāndhavaḥ 1.017.023a tasya cintayamānasya mantrimadhye mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:689: 1.017.024a sa rājño darśanākāṅkṣī dvārādhyakṣān uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:690: 1.017.024c śīghram ākhyāta māṃ prāptaṃ kauśikaṃ gādhinaḥ sutam
GE09ram_1-7u:691: 1.017.025a tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya rājaveśma pradudruvuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:692: 1.017.025c saṃbhrāntamanasaḥ sarve tena vākyena coditāḥ 1.017.026a te gatvā rājabhavanaṃ viśvāmitram ṛṣiṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:693: 1.017.026c prāptam āvedayām āsur nṛpāyekṣvākave tadā 1.017.027a teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā sapurodhāḥ samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:694: 1.017.027c pratyujjagāma saṃhṛṣṭo brahmāṇam iva vāsavaḥ 1.017.028a sa dṛṣṭvā jvalitaṃ dīptyā tāpasaṃ saṃśitavratam
GE09ram_1-7u:696: 1.017.029a sa rājñaḥ pratigṛhyārghyaṃ śāstradṛṣṭtena karmaṇā 1.017.029c kuśalaṃ cāvyayaṃ caiva paryapṛcchan narādhipam 1.017.030a vasiṣṭhaṃ ca samāgamya kuśalaṃ munipuṃgavaḥ 1.017.030c ṛṣīṃś ca tān yathā nyāyaṃ mahābhāgān uvāca ha 1.017.031a te sarve hṛṣṭamanasas tasya rājño niveśanam
GE09ram_1-7u:697: 1.017.031c viviśuḥ pūjitās tatra niṣeduś ca yathārthataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:698: 1.017.032a atha hṛṣṭamanā rājā viśvāmitraṃ mahāmunim 1.017.032c uvāca paramodāro hṛṣṭas tam abhipūjayan 1.017.033a yathāmṛtasya saṃprāptir yathā varṣam anūdake 1.017.033c yathā sadṛśadāreṣu putrajanmāprajasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:699: 1.017.033e pranaṣṭasya yathā lābho yathā harṣo mahodaye
GE09ram_1-7u:700: 1.017.033g tathaivāgamanaṃ manye svāgataṃ te mahāmune 1.017.034a kaṃ ca te paramaṃ kāmaṃ karomi kim u harṣitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:701: 1.017.034c pātrabhūto 'si me vipra diṣṭyā prāpto 'si dhārmika
GE09ram_1-7u:702: 1.017.034e adya me saphalaṃ janma jīvitaṃ ca sujīvitam
GE09ram_1-7u:704: 1.017.035c brahmarṣitvam anuprāptaḥ pūjyo 'si bahudhā mayā 1.017.036a tad adbhutam idaṃ vipra pavitraṃ paramaṃ mama
GE09ram_1-7u:705: 1.017.036c śubhakṣetragataś cāhaṃ tava saṃdarśanāt prabho 1.017.037a brūhi yat prārthitaṃ tubhyaṃ kāryam āgamanaṃ prati
GE09ram_1-7u:707: 1.017.038a kāryasya na vimarśaṃ ca gantum arhasi kauśika
GE09ram_1-7u:708: 1.017.038c kartā cāham aśeṣeṇa daivataṃ hi bhavān mama
GE09ram_1-7u:709: 1.017.039a iti hṛdayasukhaṃ niśamya vākyaṃ; śrutisukham ātmavatā vinītam
GE09ram_1-7u:711: 1.017.039c prathitaguṇayaśā guṇair viśiṣṭaḥ; parama ṛṣiḥ paramaṃ jagāma harṣam 1.018.001a tac chrutvā rājasiṃhasya vākyam adbhutavistaram 1.018.001c hṛṣṭaromā mahātejā viśvāmitro 'bhyabhāṣata
GE09ram_1-7u:712: 1.018.002a sadṛśaṃ rājaśārdūla tavaitad bhuvi nānyataḥ 1.018.002c mahāvaṃśaprasūtasya vasiṣṭhavyapadeśinaḥ 1.018.003a yat tu me hṛdgataṃ vākyaṃ tasya kāryasya niścayam 1.018.003c kuruṣva rājaśārdūla bhava satyapratiśravaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:713: 1.018.004a ahaṃ niyamam ātiṣṭha siddhyarthaṃ puruṣarṣabha 1.018.004c tasya vighnakarau dvau tu rākṣasau kāmarūpiṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:714: 1.018.005a vrate me bahuśaś cīrṇe samāptyāṃ rākṣasāv imau
GE09ram_1-7u:715: 1.018.005c mārīcaś ca subāhuś ca vīryavantau suśikṣitau
GE09ram_1-7u:716: 1.018.005e tau māṃsarudhiraugheṇa vediṃ tām abhyavarṣatām 1.018.006a avadhūte tathā bhūte tasmin niyamaniścaye 1.018.006c kṛtaśramo nirutsāhas tasmād deśād apākrame 1.018.007a na ca me krodham utsraṣṭuṃ buddhir bhavati pārthiva 1.018.007c tathābhūtā hi sā caryā na śāpas tatra mucyate 1.018.008a svaputraṃ rājaśārdūla rāmaṃ satyaparākramam
GE09ram_1-7u:717: 1.018.008c kākapakṣadharaṃ śūraṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ me dātum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:718: 1.018.009a śakto hy eṣa mayā gupto divyena svena tejasā 1.018.009c rākṣasā ye vikartāras teṣām api vināśane
GE09ram_1-7u:719: 1.018.010a śreyaś cāsmai pradāsyāmi bahurūpaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:720: 1.018.010c trayāṇām api lokānāṃ yena khyātiṃ gamiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:721: 1.018.011a na ca tau rāmam āsādya śaktau sthātuṃ kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_1-7u:722: 1.018.011c na ca tau rāghavād anyo hantum utsahate pumān 1.018.012a vīryotsiktau hi tau pāpau kālapāśavaśaṃ gatau
GE09ram_1-7u:723: 1.018.012c rāmasya rājaśārdūla na paryāptau mahātmanaḥ 1.018.013a na ca putrakṛtaṃ snehaṃ kartum arhasi pārthiva
GE09ram_1-7u:724: 1.018.013c ahaṃ te pratijānāmi hatau tau viddhi rākṣasau
GE09ram_1-7u:725: 1.018.014a ahaṃ vedmi mahātmānaṃ rāmaṃ satyaparākramam 1.018.014c vasiṣṭho 'pi mahātejā ye ceme tapasi sthitāḥ 1.018.015a yadi te dharmalābhaṃ ca yaśaś ca paramaṃ bhuvi 1.018.015c sthiram icchasi rājendra rāmaṃ me dātum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:726: 1.018.016a yady abhyanujñāṃ kākutstha dadate tava mantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:727: 1.018.016c vasiṣṭha pramukhāḥ sarve tato rāmaṃ visarjaya
GE09ram_1-7u:728: 1.018.017a abhipretam asaṃsaktam ātmajaṃ dātum arhasi 1.018.017c daśarātraṃ hi yajñasya rāmaṃ rājīvalocanam 1.018.018a nātyeti kālo yajñasya yathāyaṃ mama rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:729: 1.018.018c tathā kuruṣva bhadraṃ te mā ca śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:730: 1.018.019a ity evam uktvā dharmātmā dharmārthasahitaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:732: 1.018.020a iti hṛdayamanovidāraṇaṃ; munivacanaṃ tad atīva śuśruvān
GE09ram_1-7u:733: 1.018.020c narapatir agamad bhayaṃ mahad; vyathitamanāḥ pracacāla cāsanāt
GE09ram_1-7u:734: 1.019.001a tac chrutvā rājaśārdūla viśvāmitrasya bhāṣitam 1.019.001c muhūrtam iva niḥsaṃjñaḥ saṃjñāvān idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:736: 1.019.002c na yuddhayogyatām asya paśyāmi saha rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:737: 1.019.003a iyam akṣauhiṇī pūrṇā yasyāhaṃ patir īśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:738: 1.019.003c anayā saṃvṛto gatvā yodhāhaṃ tair niśācaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:739: 1.019.004a ime śūrāś ca vikrāntā bhṛtyā me 'straviśāradāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:740: 1.019.004c yogyā rakṣogaṇair yoddhuṃ na rāmaṃ netum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:741: 1.019.005a aham eva dhanuṣpāṇir goptā samaramūrdhani 1.019.005c yāvat prāṇān dhariṣyāmi tāvad yotsye niśācaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:742: 1.019.006a nirvighnā vratavaryā sā bhaviṣyati surakṣitā 1.019.006c ahaṃ tatra gamiṣyāmil na rāma netum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:743: 1.019.007a bālo hy akṛtavidyaś ca na ca vetti balābalam 1.019.007c na cāstrabalasaṃyukto na ca yuddhaviśāradaḥ 1.019.007e na cāsau rakṣasāṃ yogyaḥ kūṭayuddhā hi te dhruvam 1.019.008a viprayukto hi rāmeṇa muhūrtam api notsahe
GE09ram_1-7u:744: 1.019.008c jīvituṃ muniśārdūla na rāmaṃ netum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:745: 1.019.009a yadi vā rāghavaṃ brahman netum icchasi suvrata
GE09ram_1-7u:746: 1.019.009c caturaṅgasamāyuktaṃ mayā saha ca taṃ naya
GE09ram_1-7u:747: 1.019.010a ṣaṣṭir varṣasahasrāṇi jātasya mama kauśikaḥ 1.019.010c duḥkhenotpāditaś cāyaṃ na rāmaṃ netum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:748: 1.019.011a caturṇām ātmajānāṃ hi prītiḥ paramikā mama
GE09ram_1-7u:749: 1.019.011c jyeṣṭhaṃ dharmapradhānaṃ ca na rāmaṃ netum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:750: 1.019.012a kiṃ vīryā rākṣasās te ca kasya putrāś ca ke ca te 1.019.012c kathaṃ pramāṇāḥ ke caitān rakṣanti munipuṃgava
GE09ram_1-7u:751: 1.019.013a kathaṃ ca pratikartavyaṃ teṣāṃ rāmeṇa rakṣasām
GE09ram_1-7u:752: 1.019.013c māmakair vā balair brahman mayā vā kūṭayodhinām
GE09ram_1-7u:753: 1.019.014a sarvaṃ me śaṃsa bhagavan kathaṃ teṣāṃ mayā raṇe 1.019.014c sthātavyaṃ duṣṭabhāvānāṃ vīryotsiktā hi rākṣasāḥ 1.019.015a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā viśvāmitro 'bhyabhāṣata
GE09ram_1-7u:755: 1.019.016a sa brahmaṇā dattavaras trailokyaṃ bādhate bhṛśam
GE09ram_1-7u:756: 1.019.016c mahābalo mahāvīryo rākṣasair bahubhir vṛtaḥ 1.019.017a śrūyate hi mahāvīryo rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ 1.019.017c sākṣād vaiśravaṇabhrātā putro viśvaraso muneḥ 1.019.018a yadā svayaṃ na yajñasya vighnakartā mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:757: 1.019.018c tena saṃcoditau tau tu rākṣasau sumahā balau
GE09ram_1-7u:758: 1.019.018e mārīcaś ca subāhuś ca yajñavighnaṃ kariṣyataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:759: 1.019.019a ity ukto muninā tena rājovāca muniṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:760: 1.019.019c na hi śakto 'smi saṃgrāme sthātuṃ tasya durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:761: 1.019.020a sa tvaṃ prasādaṃ dharmajña kuruṣva mama putrake
GE09ram_1-7u:763: 1.019.021a na śaktā rāvaṇaṃ soḍhuṃ kiṃ punar mānavā yudhi 1.019.021c sa hi vīryavatāṃ vīryam ādatte yudhi rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:764: 1.019.022a tena cāhaṃ na śakto 'smi saṃyoddhuṃ tasya vā balaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:765: 1.019.022c sabalo vā muniśreṣṭha sahito vā mamātmajaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:766: 1.019.023a katham apy amaraprakhyaṃ saṃgrāmāṇām akovidam 1.019.023c bālaṃ me tanayaṃ brahman naiva dāsyāmi putrakam
GE09ram_1-7u:767: 1.019.024a atha kālopamau yuddhe sutau sundopasundayoḥ 1.019.024c yajñavighnakarau tau te naiva dāsyāmi putrakam
GE09ram_1-7u:768: 1.019.025a mārīcaś ca subāhuś ca vīryavantau suśikṣitau
GE09ram_1-7u:769: 1.019.025c tayor anyatareṇāhaṃ yoddhā syāṃ sasuhṛdgaṇaḥ 1.020.001a tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya snehaparyākulākṣaram 1.020.001c samanyuḥ kauśiko vākyaṃ pratyuvaca mahīpatim 1.020.002a pūrvam arthaṃ pratiśrutya pratijñāṃ hātum icchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:770: 1.020.002c rāgavāṇām ayukto 'yaṃ kulasyāsya viparyayaḥ 1.020.003a yad idaṃ te kṣamaṃ rājan gamiṣyāmi yathāgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:771: 1.020.003c mithyāpratijñaḥ kākutstha sukhī bhava sabāndhavaḥ 1.020.004a tasya roṣaparītasya viśvāmitrasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:772: 1.020.004c cacāla vasudhā kṛtsnā viveśa ca bhayaṃ surān
GE09ram_1-7u:773: 1.020.005a trastarūpaṃ tu vijñāya jagat sarvaṃ mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:774: 1.020.005c nṛpatiṃ suvrato dhīro vasiṣṭho vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:775: 1.020.006a ikṣvākūṇāṃ kule jātaḥ sākṣād dharma ivāparaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:776: 1.020.006c dhṛtimānsuvrataḥ śrīmān na dharmaṃ hātum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:777: 1.020.007a triṣu lokeṣu vikhyāto dharmātmā iti rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:778: 1.020.007c svadharmaṃ pratipadyasva nādharmaṃ voḍhum arhasi 1.020.008a saṃśrutyaivaṃ kariṣyāmīty akurvāṇasya rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:779: 1.020.008c iṣṭāpūrtavadho bhūyāt tasmād rāmaṃ visarjaya 1.020.009a kṛtāstram akṛtāstraṃ vā nainaṃ śakṣyanti rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:781: 1.020.010a eṣa vigrahavān dharma eṣa vīryavatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:782: 1.020.010c eṣa buddhyādhiko loke tapasaś ca parāyaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:784: 1.020.011c nainam anyaḥ pumān vetti na ca vetsyanti ke cana
GE09ram_1-7u:785: 1.020.012a na devā narṣayaḥ ke cin nāsurā na ca rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:786: 1.020.012c gandharvayakṣapravarāḥ sakiṃnaramahoragāḥ 1.020.013a sarvāstrāṇi kṛśāśvasya putrāḥ paramadhārmikāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:787: 1.020.013c kauśikāya purā dattā yadā rājyaṃ praśāsati
GE09ram_1-7u:790: 1.020.015a jayā ca suprabhā caiva dakṣakanye sumadhyame
GE09ram_1-7u:792: 1.020.016a pañcāśataṃ sutāṃl lebhe jayā nāma varān purā
GE09ram_1-7u:794: 1.020.017a suprabhājanayac cāpi putrān pañcāśataṃ punaḥ 1.020.017c saṃhārān nāma durdharṣān durākrāmān balīyasaḥ 1.020.018a tāni cāstrāṇi vetty eṣa yathāvat kuśikātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:795: 1.020.018c apūrvāṇāṃ ca janane śakto bhūyaś ca dharmavit
GE09ram_1-7u:796: 1.020.019a evaṃ vīryo mahātejā viśvāmitro mahātapāḥ 1.020.019c na rāmagamane rājan saṃśayaṃ gantum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:797: 1.021.001a tathā vasiṣṭhe bruvati rājā daśarathaḥ sutam
GE09ram_1-7u:799: 1.021.002a kṛtasvastyayanaṃ mātrā pitrā daśarathena ca 1.021.002c purodhasā vasiṣṭhena maṅgalair abhimantritam
GE09ram_1-7u:800: 1.021.003a sa putraṃ mūrdhny upāghrāya rājā daśarathaḥ priyam
GE09ram_1-7u:802: 1.021.004a tato vāyuḥ sukhasparśo virajasko vavau tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:806: 1.021.006a viśvāmitro yayāv agre tato rāmo mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:807: 1.021.006c kākapakṣadharo dhanvī taṃ ca saumitrir anvagāt
GE09ram_1-7u:808: 1.021.007a kalāpinau dhanuṣpāṇī śobhayānau diśo daśa 1.021.007c viśvāmitraṃ mahātmānaṃ triśīrṣāv iva pannagau 1.021.007e anujagmatur akṣudrau pitāmaham ivāśvinau
GE09ram_1-7u:810: 1.021.008c sthāṇuṃ devam ivācintyaṃ kumārāv iva pāvakī
GE09ram_1-7u:811: 1.021.009a adhyardhayojanaṃ gatvā sarayvā dakṣiṇe taṭe 1.021.009c rāmeti madhurā vāṇīṃ viśvāmitro 'bhyabhāṣata
GE09ram_1-7u:812: 1.021.010a gṛhāṇa vatsa salilaṃ mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:813: 1.021.010c mantragrāmaṃ gṛhāṇa tvaṃ balām atibalāṃ tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:814: 1.021.011a na śramo na jvaro vā te na rūpasya viparyayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:815: 1.021.011c na ca suptaṃ pramattaṃ vā dharṣayiṣyanti nairṛtāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:816: 1.021.012a na bāhvoḥ sadṛśo vīrye pṛthivyām asti kaś cana 1.021.012c triṣu lokeṣu vā rāma na bhavet sadṛśas tava 1.021.013a na saubhāgye na dākṣiṇye na jñāne buddhiniścaye
GE09ram_1-7u:817: 1.021.013c nottare pratipattavyo samo loke tavānagha 1.021.014a etadvidyādvaye labdhe bhavitā nāsti te samaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:818: 1.021.014c balā cātibalā caiva sarvajñānasya mātarau 1.021.015a kṣutpipāse na te rāma bhaviṣyete
GE09ram_1-7u:819: 1.021.015c balām atibalāṃ caiva paṭhataḥ pathi rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:820: 1.021.015e vidyādvayam adhīyāne yaśaś cāpy atulaṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_1-7u:821: 1.021.016a pitāmahasute hy ete vidye tejaḥsamanvite 1.021.016c pradātuṃ tava kākutstha sadṛśas tvaṃ hi dhārmika
GE09ram_1-7u:822: 1.021.017a kāmaṃ bahuguṇāḥ sarve tvayy ete nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:823: 1.021.017c tapasā saṃbhṛte caite bahurūpe bhaviṣyataḥ 1.021.018a tato rāmo jalaṃ spṛṣṭvā prahṛṣṭavadanaḥ śuciḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:824: 1.021.018c pratijagrāha te vidye maharṣer bhāvitātmanaḥ 1.021.018e vidyāsamudito rāmaḥ śuśubhe bhūrivikramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:826: 1.021.019c ūṣus tāṃ rajanīṃ tatra sarayvāṃ susukhaṃ trayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:827: 1.022.001a prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ 1.022.001c abhyabhāṣata kākutsthaṃ śayānaṃ parṇasaṃstare
GE09ram_1-7u:828: 1.022.002a kausalyā suprajā rāma pūrvā saṃdhyā pravartate
GE09ram_1-7u:829: 1.022.002c uttiṣṭha naraśārdūla kartavyaṃ daivam āhnikam 1.022.003a tasyarṣeḥ paramodāraṃ vacaḥ śrutvā nṛpātmajau 1.022.003c snātvā kṛtodakau vīrau jepatuḥ paramaṃ japam
GE09ram_1-7u:831: 1.022.004c abhivādyābhisaṃhṛṣṭau gamanāyopatasthatuḥ 1.022.005a tau prayāte mahāvīryau divyaṃ tripathagāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_1-7u:832: 1.022.005c dadṛśāte tatas tatra sarayvāḥ saṃgame śubhe
GE09ram_1-7u:835: 1.022.007a taṃ dṛṣṭvā paramaprītau rāghavau puṇyam āśramam
GE09ram_1-7u:836: 1.022.007c ūcatus taṃ mahātmānaṃ viśvāmitram idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:837: 1.022.008a kasyāyam āśramaḥ puṇyaḥ ko nv asmin vasate pumān 1.022.008c bhagavañ śrotum icchāvaḥ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi nau
GE09ram_1-7u:838: 1.022.009a tayos tad vacanaṃ śrutvā prahasya munipuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:839: 1.022.009c abravīc chrūyatāṃ rāma yasyāyaṃ pūrva āśramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:840: 1.022.010a kandarpo mūrtimān āsīt kāma ity ucyate budhaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:841: 1.022.011a tapasyantam iha sthāṇuṃ niyamena samāhitam 1.022.011c kṛtodvāhaṃ tu deveśaṃ gacchantaṃ samarudgaṇam 1.022.011e dharṣayām āsa durmedhā huṃkṛtaś ca mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:842: 1.022.012a dagdhasya tasya raudreṇa cakṣuṣā raghunandana 1.022.012c vyaśīryanta śarīrāt svāt sarvagātrāṇi durmateḥ 1.022.013a tasya gātraṃ hataṃ tatra nirdagdhasya mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:843: 1.022.013c aśarīraḥ kṛtaḥ kāmaḥ krodhād deveśvareṇa ha
GE09ram_1-7u:844: 1.022.014a anaṅga iti vikhyātas tadā prabhṛti rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:845: 1.022.014c sa cāṅgaviṣayaḥ śrīmān yatrāṅgaṃ sa mumoca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:846: 1.022.015a tasyāyam āśramaḥ puṇyas tasyeme munayaḥ purā
GE09ram_1-7u:847: 1.022.015c śiṣyā dharmaparā vīra teṣāṃ pāpaṃ na vidyate
GE09ram_1-7u:848: 1.022.016a ihādya rajanīṃ rāma vasema śubhadarśana 1.022.016c puṇyayoḥ saritor madhye śvas tariṣyāmahe vayam
GE09ram_1-7u:849: 1.022.017a teṣāṃ saṃvadatāṃ tatra tapo dīrgheṇa cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_1-7u:850: 1.022.017c vijñāya paramaprītā munayo harṣam āgaman 1.022.018a arghyaṃ pādyaṃ tathātithyaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:853: 1.022.019c nyavasan susukhaṃ tatra kāmāśramapade tadā 1.023.001a tataḥ prabhāte vimale kṛtāhnikam ariṃdamau 1.023.001c viśvāmitraṃ puraskṛtya nadyās tīram upāgatau 1.023.002a te ca sarve mahātmāno munayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:854: 1.023.002c upasthāpya śubhāṃ nāvaṃ viśvāmitram athābruvan 1.023.003a ārohatu bhavān nāvaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:855: 1.023.003c ariṣṭaṃ gaccha panthānaṃ mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:856: 1.023.004a viśvāmitras tathety uktvā tān ṛṣīn abhipūjya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:857: 1.023.004c tatāra sahitas tābhyāṃ saritaṃ sāgaraṃ gamām
GE09ram_1-7u:858: 1.023.005a atha rāmaḥ sarinmadhye papraccha munipuṅgavam 1.023.005c vāriṇo bhidyamānasya kim ayaṃ tumulo dhvaniḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:859: 1.023.006a rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā kautūhala samanvitam 1.023.006c kathayām āsa dharmātmā tasya śabdasya niścayam
GE09ram_1-7u:860: 1.023.007a kailāsaparvate rāma manasā nirmitaṃ saraḥ 1.023.007c brahmaṇā naraśārdūla tenedaṃ mānasaṃ saraḥ 1.023.008a tasmāt susrāva sarasaḥ sāyodhyām upagūhate 1.023.008c saraḥpravṛttā sarayūḥ puṇyā brahmasaraścyutā
GE09ram_1-7u:861: 1.023.009a tasyāyam atulaḥ śabdo jāhnavīm abhivartate 1.023.009c vārisaṃkṣobhajo rāma praṇāmaṃ niyataḥ kuru 1.023.010a tābhyāṃ tu tāv ubhau kṛtvā praṇāmam atidhārmikau
GE09ram_1-7u:862: 1.023.010c tīraṃ dakṣiṇam āsādya jagmatur laghuvikramau 1.023.011a sa vanaṃ ghorasaṃkāśaṃ dṛṣṭvā nṛpavarātmajaḥ 1.023.011c aviprahatam aikṣvākaḥ papraccha munipuṃgavam
GE09ram_1-7u:863: 1.023.012a aho vanam idaṃ durgaṃ jhillikāgaṇanāditam 1.023.012c bhairavaiḥ śvāpadaiḥ kīrṇaṃ śakuntair dāruṇāravaiḥ 1.023.013a nānāprakāraiḥ śakunair vāśyadbhir bhairavasvanaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:864: 1.023.013c siṃhavyāghravarāhaiś ca vāraṇaiś cāpi śobhitam 1.023.014a dhavāśvakarṇakakubhair bilvatindukapāṭalaiḥ 1.023.014c saṃkīrṇaṃ badarībhiś ca kiṃ nv idaṃ dāruṇaṃ vanam 1.023.015a tam uvāca mahātejā viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ 1.023.015c śrūyatāṃ vatsa kākutstha yasyaitad dāruṇaṃ vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:865: 1.023.016a etau janapadau sphītau pūrvam āstāṃ narottama
GE09ram_1-7u:866: 1.023.016c maladāś ca karūṣāś ca devanirmāṇa nirmitau
GE09ram_1-7u:867: 1.023.017a purā vṛtravadhe rāma malena samabhiplutam 1.023.017c kṣudhā caiva sahasrākṣaṃ brahmahatyā yadāviśat 1.023.018a tam indraṃ snāpayan devā ṛṣayaś ca tapodhanāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:868: 1.023.018c kalaśaiḥ snāpayām āsur malaṃ cāsya pramocayan
GE09ram_1-7u:869: 1.023.019a iha bhūmyāṃ malaṃ dattvā dattvā kāruṣam eva ca 1.023.019c śarīrajaṃ mahendrasya tato harṣaṃ prapedire 1.023.020a nirmalo niṣkarūṣaś ca śucir indro yadābhavat
GE09ram_1-7u:870: 1.023.020c dadau deśasya suprīto varaṃ prabhur anuttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:871: 1.023.021a imau janapadau sthītau khyātiṃ loke gamiṣyataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:872: 1.023.021c maladāś ca karūṣāś ca mamāṅgamaladhāriṇau 1.023.022a sādhu sādhv iti taṃ devāḥ pākaśāsanam abruvan
GE09ram_1-7u:873: 1.023.022c deśasya pūjāṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛtāṃ śakreṇa dhīmatā
GE09ram_1-7u:874: 1.023.023a etau janapadau sthītau dīrghakālam ariṃdama 1.023.023c maladāś ca karūṣāś ca muditau dhanadhānyataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:875: 1.023.024a kasya cit tv atha kālasya yakṣī vai kāmarūpiṇī 1.023.024c balaṃ nāgasahasrasya dhārayantī tadā hy abhūt
GE09ram_1-7u:876: 1.023.025a tāṭakā nāma bhadraṃ te bhāryā sundasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:877: 1.023.025c mārīco rākṣasaḥ putro yasyāḥ śakraparākramaḥ 1.023.026a imau janapadau nityaṃ vināśayati rāghava 1.023.026c maladāṃś ca karūṣāṃś ca tāṭakā duṣṭacāriṇī
GE09ram_1-7u:878: 1.023.027a seyaṃ panthānam āvārya vasaty atyardhayojane 1.023.027c ata eva ca gantavyaṃ tāṭakāyā vanaṃ yataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:880: 1.023.028c manniyogād imaṃ deśaṃ kuru niṣkaṇṭakaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:881: 1.023.029a na hi kaś cid imaṃ deśaṃ śakroty āgantum īdṛśam
GE09ram_1-7u:882: 1.023.029c yakṣiṇyā ghorayā rāma utsāditam asahyayā 1.023.030a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yathaitad daruṇaṃ vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:883: 1.023.030c yakṣyā cotsāditaṃ sarvam adyāpi na nivartate
GE09ram_1-7u:884: 1.024.001a atha tasyāprameyasya muner vacanam uttamam 1.024.001c śrutvā puruṣaśārdūlaḥ pratyuvāca śubhāṃ giram 1.024.002a alpavīryā yadā yakṣāḥ śrūyante munipuṃgava 1.024.002c kathaṃ nāgasahasrasya dhārayaty abalā balam 1.024.003a viśvāmitro 'bravīd vākyaṃ śṛṇu yena balottarā
GE09ram_1-7u:885: 1.024.003c varadānakṛtaṃ vīryaṃ dhārayaty abalā balam 1.024.004a pūrvam āsīn mahāyakṣaḥ suketur nāma vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:886: 1.024.004c anapatyaḥ śubhācāraḥ sa ca tepe mahat tapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:887: 1.024.005a pitāmahas tu suprītas tasya yakṣapates tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:888: 1.024.005c kanyāratnaṃ dadau rāma tāṭakāṃ nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:889: 1.024.006a dadau nāgasahasrasya balaṃ cāsyāḥ pitāmahaḥ 1.024.006c na tv eva putraṃ yakṣāya dadau brahmā mahāyaśāḥ 1.024.007a tāṃ tu jātāṃ vivardhantīṃ rūpayauvanaśālinīm 1.024.007c jambhaputrāya sundāya dadau bhāryāṃ yaśasvinīm 1.024.008a kasya cit tv atha kālalsya yakṣī putraṃ vyajāyata 1.024.008c mārīcaṃ nāma durdharṣaṃ yaḥ śāpād rākṣaso 'bhavat
GE09ram_1-7u:890: 1.024.009a sunde tu nihate rāma agastyam ṛṣisattamam
GE09ram_1-7u:891: 1.024.009c tāṭakā saha putreṇa pradharṣayitum icchati 1.024.010a rākṣasatvaṃ bhajasveti mārīcaṃ vyājahāra saḥ 1.024.010c agastyaḥ paramakruddhas tāṭakām api śaptavān 1.024.011a puruṣādī mahāyakṣī virūpā vikṛtānanā
GE09ram_1-7u:892: 1.024.011c idaṃ rūpam apahāya dāruṇaṃ rūpam astu te
GE09ram_1-7u:894: 1.024.012c deśam utsādayaty enam agastyacaritaṃ śubham 1.024.013a enāṃ rāghava durvṛttāṃ yakṣīṃ paramadāruṇām 1.024.013c gobrāhmaṇahitārthāya jahi duṣṭaparākramām
GE09ram_1-7u:895: 1.024.014a na hy enāṃ śāpasaṃsṛṣṭāṃ kaś cid utsahate pumān 1.024.014c nihantuṃ triṣu lokeṣu tvām ṛte raghunandana
GE09ram_1-7u:896: 1.024.015a na hi te strīvadhakṛte ghṛṇā kāryā narottama
GE09ram_1-7u:899: 1.024.016c adharmyāṃ jahi kākutsha dharmo hy asyā na vidyate 1.024.017a śrūyate hi purā śakro virocanasutāṃ nṛpa
GE09ram_1-7u:900: 1.024.017c pṛthivīṃ hantum icchantīṃ mantharām abhyasūdayat 1.024.018a viṣṇunā ca purā rāma bhṛgupatnī dṛḍhavratā
GE09ram_1-7u:901: 1.024.018c anindraṃ lokam icchantī kāvyamātā niṣūditā 1.024.019a etaiś cānyaiś ca bahubhī rājaputramahātmabhiḥ 1.024.019c adharmaniratā nāryo hatāḥ puruṣasattamaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:902: 1.025.001a muner vacanam aklībaṃ śrutvā naravarātmajaḥ 1.025.001c rāghavaḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā pratyuvāca dṛḍhavrataḥ 1.025.002a pitur vacananirdeśāt pitur vacanagauravāt
GE09ram_1-7u:905: 1.025.003c pitrā daśarathenāhaṃ nāvajñeyaṃ ca tad vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:906: 1.025.004a so 'haṃ pitur vacaḥ śrutvā śāsanād brahma vādinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:907: 1.025.004c kariṣyāmi na saṃdehas tāṭakāvadham uttamam 1.025.005a gobrāhmaṇahitārthāya deśasyāsya sukhāya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:908: 1.025.005c tava caivāprameyasya vacanaṃ kartum udyataḥ 1.025.006a evam uktvā dhanurmadhye baddhvā muṣṭim ariṃdamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:909: 1.025.006c jyāśabdam akarot tīvraṃ diśaḥ śabdena pūrayan
GE09ram_1-7u:910: 1.025.007a tena śabdena vitrastās tāṭakā vanavāsinaḥ 1.025.007c tāṭakā ca susaṃkruddhā tena śabdena mohitā
GE09ram_1-7u:911: 1.025.008a taṃ śabdam abhinidhyāya rākṣasī krodhamūrchitā 1.025.008c śrutvā cābhyadravad vegād yataḥ śabdo viniḥsṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:912: 1.025.009a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ kruddhāṃ vikṛtāṃ vikṛtānanām
GE09ram_1-7u:914: 1.025.010a paśya lakṣmaṇa yakṣiṇyā bhairavaṃ dāruṇaṃ vapuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:915: 1.025.010c bhidyeran darśanād asyā bhīrūṇāṃ hṛdayāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:916: 1.025.011a enāṃ paśya durādharṣāṃ māyā balasamanvitām 1.025.011c vinivṛttāṃ karomy adya
GE09ram_1-7u:917: 1.025.012a na hy enām utsahe hantuṃ strīsvabhāvena rakṣitām
GE09ram_1-7u:918: 1.025.012c vīryaṃ cāsyā gatiṃ cāpi haniṣyāmīti me matiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:919: 1.025.013a evaṃ bruvāṇe rāme tu tāṭakā krodhamūrchitā
GE09ram_1-7u:920: 1.025.013c udyamya bāhū garjantī rāmam evābhyadhāvata 1.025.014a tām āpatantīṃ vegena vikrāntām aśanīm iva
GE09ram_1-7u:921: 1.025.014c śareṇorasi vivyādha sā papāta mamāra ca
GE09ram_1-7u:922: 1.025.015a tāṃ hatāṃ bhīmasaṃkāśāṃ dṛṣṭvā surapatis tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:923: 1.025.015c sādhu sādhv iti kākutsthaṃ surāś ca samapūjayan
GE09ram_1-7u:925: 1.025.016c surāś ca sarve saṃhṛṣṭā viśvāmitram athābruvan
GE09ram_1-7u:926: 1.025.017a mune kauśike bhadraṃ te sendrāḥ sarve marudgaṇāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:927: 1.025.017c toṣitāḥ karmaṇānena snehaṃ darśaya rāghave 1.025.018a prajāpater bhṛśāśvasya putrān satyaparākramān
GE09ram_1-7u:929: 1.025.019a pātrabhūtaś ca te brahmaṃs tavānugamane dhṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:930: 1.025.019c kartavyaṃ ca mahat karma surāṇāṃ rājasūnunā
