GE09ram_1-7u:1807: 1.054.009a saṃdura iva nirvego bhagnadaṃṣṭra ivoragaḥ 1.054.009c uparakta ivādityaḥ sadyo niṣprabhatāṃ gataḥ 1.054.010a hataputrabalo dīno lūnapakṣa iva dvijaḥ 1.054.010c hatadarpo hatotsāho nirvedaṃ samapadyata
GE09ram_1-7u:1808: 1.054.011a sa putram ekaṃ rājyāya pālayeti niyujya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:1812: 1.054.013a kena cit tv atha kālena deveśo vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:1813: 1.054.013c darśayām āsa varado viśvāmitraṃ mahāmunim 1.054.014a kimarthaṃ tapyase rājan brūhi yat te vivakṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:1814: 1.054.014c varado 'smi varo yas te kāṅkṣitaḥ so 'bhidhīyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:1815: 1.054.015a evam uktas tu devena viśvāmitro mahātapāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:1816: 1.054.015c praṇipatya mahādevam idaṃ vacanam abravīt 1.054.016a yadi tuṣṭo mahādeva dhanurvedo mamānagha 1.054.016c sāṅgopāṅgopaniṣadaḥ sarahasyaḥ pradīyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:1817: 1.054.017a yāni deveṣu cāstrāṇi dānaveṣu maharṣiṣu 1.054.017c gandharvayakṣarakṣaḥsu pratibhāntu
GE09ram_1-7u:1818: 1.054.018a tava prasādād bhavatu devadeva mamepsitam 1.054.018c evam astv iti deveśo vākyam uktvā divaṃ gataḥ 1.054.019a prāpya cāstrāṇi rājarṣir viśvāmitro mahābalaḥ 1.054.019c darpeṇa mahatā yukto darpapūrṇo 'bhavat tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:1819: 1.054.020a vivardhamāno vīryeṇa samudra iva parvaṇi 1.054.020c hatam eva tadā mene vasiṣṭham
GE09ram_1-7u:1821: 1.054.021c yais tat tapovanaṃ sarvaṃ nirdagdhaṃ cāstratejasā
GE09ram_1-7u:1822: 1.054.022a udīryamāṇam astraṃ tad viśvāmitrasya dhīmataḥ 1.054.022c dṛṣṭvā vipradrutā bhītā munayaḥ śataśo diśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:1823: 1.054.023a vasiṣṭhasya ca ye śiṣyās tathaiva mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:1824: 1.054.023c vidravanti bhayād bhītā nānādigbhyaḥ sahasraśaḥ 1.054.024a vasiṣṭhasyāśramapadaṃ śūnyam āsīn mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:1825: 1.054.024c muhūrtam iva niḥśabdam āsīd īriṇasaṃnibham 1.054.025a vadato vai vasiṣṭhasya mā bhaiṣṭeti muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:1826: 1.054.025c nāśayāmy adya gādheyaṃ nīhāram iva bhāskaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:1827: 1.054.026a evam uktvā mahātejā vasiṣṭho japatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:1828: 1.054.026c viśvāmitraṃ tadā vākyaṃ saroṣam idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:1829: 1.054.027a āśramaṃ cirasaṃvṛddhaṃ yad vināśitavān asi 1.054.027c durācāro 'si yan mūḍha tasmāt tvaṃ na bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:1830: 1.054.028a ity uktvā paramakruddho daṇḍam udyamya satvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:1831: 1.054.028c vidhūma iva kālāgnir yamadaṇḍam ivāparam 1.055.001a evam ukto vasiṣṭhena viśvāmitro mahābalaḥ 1.055.001c āgneyam astram utkṣipya tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:1832: 1.055.002a vasiṣṭho bhagavān krodhād idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:1833: 1.055.003a kṣatrabandho sthito 'smy eṣa yad balaṃ tad vidarśaya 1.055.003c nāśayāmy eṣa te darpaṃ śastrasya tava gādhija
GE09ram_1-7u:1834: 1.055.004a kva ca te kṣatriyabalaṃ kva ca brahmabalaṃ mahat 1.055.004c paśya brahmabalaṃ divyaṃ mama kṣatriyapāṃsana 1.055.005a tasyāstraṃ gādhiputrasya ghoram āgneyam uttamam 1.055.005c brahmadaṇḍena tac chāntam agner vega ivāmbhasā
GE09ram_1-7u:1835: 1.055.006a vāruṇaṃ caiva raudraṃ ca aindraṃ pāśupataṃ tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:1836: 1.055.006c aiṣīkaṃ cāpi cikṣepa ruṣito gādhinandanaḥ 1.055.007a mānavaṃ mohanaṃ caiva gāndharvaṃ svāpanaṃ tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:1838: 1.055.008a śoṣaṇaṃ dāraṇaṃ caiva vajram astraṃ sudurjayam
GE09ram_1-7u:1839: 1.055.008c brahmapāśaṃ kālapāśaṃ vāruṇaṃ pāśam eva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:1840: 1.055.009a pinākāstraṃ ca dayitaṃ śuṣkārdre aśanī tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:1841: 1.055.009c daṇḍāstram atha paiśācaṃ krauñcam astraṃ tathāiva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:1842: 1.055.010a dharmacakraṃ kālacakraṃ viṣṇucakraṃ tathaiva ca 1.055.010c vāyavyaṃ mathanaṃ caiva astraṃ hayaśiras tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:1843: 1.055.011a śaktidvayaṃ ca cikṣepa kaṅkālaṃ musalaṃ tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:1844: 1.055.011c vaidyādharaṃ mahāstraṃ ca kālāstram atha dāruṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:1845: 1.055.012a triśūlam astraṃ ghoraṃ ca kāpālam atha kaṅkaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:1846: 1.055.012c etāny astrāṇi cikṣepa sarvāṇi raghunandana 1.055.013a vasiṣṭhe japatāṃ śreṣṭhe tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE09ram_1-7u:1847: 1.055.013c tāni sarvāṇi daṇḍena grasate brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:1848: 1.055.014a teṣu śānteṣu brahmāstraṃ kṣiptavān gādhinandanaḥ 1.055.014c tad astram udyataṃ dṛṣṭvā devāḥ sāgnipurogamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:1849: 1.055.015a devarṣayaś ca saṃbhrāntā gandharvāḥ samahoragāḥ 1.055.015c trailokyam āsīt saṃtrastaṃ brahmāstre samudīrite 1.055.016a tad apy astraṃ mahāghoraṃ brāhmaṃ brāhmeṇa tejasā
GE09ram_1-7u:1850: 1.055.016c vasiṣṭho grasate sarvaṃ brahmadaṇḍena rāghava 1.055.017a brahmāstraṃ grasamānasya vasiṣṭhasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:1851: 1.055.017c trailokyamohanaṃ raudraṃ rūpam āsīt sudāruṇam 1.055.018a romakūpeṣu sarveṣu vasiṣṭhasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:1852: 1.055.018c marīcya iva niṣpetur agner dhūmākulārciṣaḥ 1.055.019a prājvalad brahmadaṇḍaś ca vasiṣṭhasya karodyataḥ 1.055.019c vidhūma iva kālāgnir yamadaṇḍa ivāparaḥ 1.055.020a tato 'stuvan munigaṇā vasiṣṭhaṃ japatāṃ varam
GE09ram_1-7u:1853: 1.055.020c amoghaṃ te balaṃ brahmaṃs tejo dhāraya tejasā
GE09ram_1-7u:1854: 1.055.021a nigṛhītas tvayā brahman viśvāmitro mahātapāḥ 1.055.021c prasīda japatāṃ śreṣṭha lokāḥ santu gatavyathāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:1855: 1.055.022a evam ukto mahātejāḥ śamaṃ cakre mahātapāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:1857: 1.055.023a dhig balaṃ kṣatriyabalaṃ brahmatejobalaṃ balam 1.055.023c ekena brahmadaṇḍena sarvāstrāṇi hatāni me 1.055.024a tad etat samavekṣyāhaṃ prasannendriyamānasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:1858: 1.055.024c tapo mahat samāsthāsye yad vai brahmatvakārakam
GE09ram_1-7u:1859: 1.056.001a tataḥ saṃtaptahṛdayaḥ smaran nigraham ātmanaḥ 1.056.001c viniḥśvasya viniḥśvasya kṛtavairo mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:1860: 1.056.002a sa dakṣiṇāṃ diśaṃ gatvā mahiṣyā saha rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:1861: 1.056.002c tatāpa paramaṃ ghoraṃ viśvāmitro mahātapāḥ 1.056.002e phalamūlāśano dāntaś cacāra paramaṃ tapaḥ 1.056.003a athāsya jajñire putrāḥ satyadharmaparāyaṇāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:1863: 1.056.004a pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ 1.056.004c abravīn madhuraṃ vākyaṃ viśvāmitraṃ tapodhanam 1.056.005a jitā rājarṣilokās te tapasā kuśikātmaja 1.056.005c anena tapasā tvāṃ hi rājarṣir iti vidmahe
GE09ram_1-7u:1864: 1.056.006a evam uktvā mahātejā jagāma saha daivataiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:1866: 1.056.007a viśvāmitro 'pi tac chrutvā hriyā kiṃ cid avāṅmukhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:1867: 1.056.007c duḥkhena mahatāviṣṭaḥ samanyur idam abravīt 1.056.008a tapaś ca sumahat taptaṃ rājarṣir iti māṃ viduḥ 1.056.008c devāḥ sarṣigaṇāḥ sarve nāsti manye tapaḥphalam
GE09ram_1-7u:1868: 1.056.009a evaṃ niścitya manasā bhūya eva mahātapāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:1869: 1.056.009c tapaś cacāra kākutstha paramaṃ paramātmavān 1.056.010a etasminn eva kāle tu satyavādī jitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:1870: 1.056.010c triśaṅkur iti vikhyāta ikṣvāku kulanandanaḥ 1.056.011a tasya buddhiḥ samutpannā yajeyam iti rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:1871: 1.056.011c gaccheyaṃ svaśarīreṇa devānāṃ paramāṃ gatim 1.056.012a sa vasiṣṭhaṃ samāhūya kathayām āsa cintitam
GE09ram_1-7u:1872: 1.056.012c aśakyam iti cāpy ukto vasiṣṭhena mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:1873: 1.056.013a pratyākhyāto vasiṣṭhena sa yayau dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE09ram_1-7u:1874: 1.056.013c vasiṣṭhā dīrgha tapasas tapo yatra hi tepire
GE09ram_1-7u:1877: 1.056.015a so 'bhigamya mahātmānaḥ sarvān eva guroḥ sutān 1.056.015c abhivādyānupūrvyeṇa hriyā kiṃ cid avāṅmukhaḥ 1.056.015e abravīt sumahātejāḥ sarvān eva kṛtāñjaliḥ 1.056.016a śaraṇaṃ vaḥ prapadye 'haṃ śaraṇyāñ śaraṇāgataḥ 1.056.016c pratyākhyāto 'smi bhadraṃ vo vasiṣṭhena mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:1878: 1.056.017a yaṣṭukāmo mahāyajñaṃ tad anujñātum arthatha 1.056.017c guruputrān ahaṃ sarvān namaskṛtya prasādaye 1.056.018a śirasā praṇato yāce brāhmaṇāṃs tapasi sthitān
GE09ram_1-7u:1879: 1.056.018c te māṃ bhavantaḥ siddhyarthaṃ yājayantu samāhitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:1880: 1.056.018e saśarīro yathāhaṃ hi devalokam avāpnuyām 1.056.019a pratyākhyāto vasiṣṭhena gatim anyāṃ tapodhanāḥ 1.056.019c guruputrān ṛte sarvān nāhaṃ paśyāmi kāṃ cana
GE09ram_1-7u:1881: 1.056.020a ikṣvākūṇāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ purodhāḥ paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:1882: 1.056.020c tasmād anantaraṃ sarve bhavanto daivataṃ mama
GE09ram_1-7u:1883: 1.057.001a tatas triśaṅkor vacanaṃ śrutvā krodhasamanvitam 1.057.001c ṛṣiputraśataṃ rāma rājānam idam abravīt 1.057.002a pratyākhyāto 'si durbuddhe guruṇā satyavādinā
GE09ram_1-7u:1884: 1.057.002c taṃ kathaṃ samatikramya śākhāntaram upeyivān 1.057.003a ikṣvākūṇāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ purodhāḥ paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:1885: 1.057.003c na cātikramituṃ śakyaṃ vacanaṃ satyavādinaḥ 1.057.004a aśakyam iti covāca vasiṣṭho bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:1886: 1.057.004c taṃ vayaṃ vai samāhartuṃ kratuṃ śaktāḥ kathaṃ tava 1.057.005a bāliśas tvaṃ naraśreṣṭha gamyatāṃ svapuraṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:1887: 1.057.005c yājane bhagavāñ śaktas trailokyasyāpi pārthiva 1.057.006a teṣāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā
GE09ram_1-7u:1888: 1.057.006c sa rājā punar evaitān idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:1890: 1.057.007c anyāṃ gatiṃ gamiṣyāmi svasti vo 'stu tapodhanāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:1891: 1.057.008a ṛṣiputrās tu tac chrutvā vākyaṃ ghorābhisaṃhitam
GE09ram_1-7u:1893: 1.057.008e evam uktvā mahātmāno viviśus te svam āśramam
GE09ram_1-7u:1894: 1.057.009a atha rātryāṃ vyatītāyāṃ rājā caṇḍālatāṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:1897: 1.057.010a taṃ dṛṣṭvā mantriṇaḥ sarve tyaktvā caṇḍālarūpiṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:1899: 1.057.011a eko hi rājā kākutstha jagāma paramātmavān
GE09ram_1-7u:1901: 1.057.012a viśvāmitras tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā rājānaṃ viphalīkṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:1902: 1.057.012c caṇḍālarūpiṇaṃ rāma muniḥ kāruṇyam āgataḥ 1.057.013a kāruṇyāt sa mahātejā vākyaṃ parama dhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:1903: 1.057.013c idaṃ jagāda bhadraṃ te rājānaṃ ghoradarśanam
GE09ram_1-7u:1904: 1.057.014a kim āgamanakāryaṃ te rājaputra mahābala 1.057.014c ayodhyādhipate vīra śāpāc caṇḍālatāṃ gataḥ 1.057.015a atha tad vākyam ākarṇya rājā caṇḍālatāṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:1905: 1.057.015c abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ vākyajño vākyakovidam 1.057.016a pratyākhyāto 'smi guruṇā guruputrais tathaiva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:1906: 1.057.016c anavāpyaiva taṃ kāmaṃ mayā prāpto viparyayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:1907: 1.057.017a saśarīro divaṃ yāyām iti me saumyadarśanam
GE09ram_1-7u:1908: 1.057.017c mayā ceṣṭaṃ kratuśataṃ tac ca nāvāpyate phalam
GE09ram_1-7u:1909: 1.057.018a anṛtaṃ nokta pūrvaṃ me na ca vakṣye kadā cana
GE09ram_1-7u:1910: 1.057.018c kṛcchreṣv api gataḥ saumya kṣatradharmeṇa te śape
GE09ram_1-7u:1911: 1.057.019a yajñair bahuvidhair iṣṭaṃ prajā dharmeṇa pālitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:1912: 1.057.019c guravaś ca mahātmānaḥ śīlavṛttena toṣitāḥ 1.057.020a dharme prayatamānasya yajñaṃ cāhartum icchataḥ 1.057.020c paritoṣaṃ na gacchanti guravo munipuṃgava 1.057.021a daivam eva paraṃ manye pauruṣaṃ tu nirarthakam
GE09ram_1-7u:1913: 1.057.021c daivenākramyate sarvaṃ daivaṃ hi paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:1914: 1.057.022a tasya me paramārtasya prasādam abhikāṅkṣataḥ 1.057.022c kartum arhasi bhadraṃ te daivopahatakarmaṇaḥ 1.057.023a nānyāṃ gatiṃ gamiṣyāmi nānyaḥ śaraṇam asti me
GE09ram_1-7u:1916: 1.058.001a uktavākyaṃ tu rājānaṃ kṛpayā kuśikātmajaḥ 1.058.001c abravīn madhuraṃ vākyaṃ sākṣāc caṇḍālarūpiṇam 1.058.002a ikṣvāko svāgataṃ vatsa jānāmi tvāṃ sudhārmikam
GE09ram_1-7u:1917: 1.058.002c śaraṇaṃ te bhaviṣyāmi mā bhaiṣīr nṛpapuṃgava

GE09ram_1-7u:2056: 1.062.007c tapaso hi mahāvighno viśvāmitram upāgataḥ 1.062.008a tasyāṃ vasantyāṃ varṣāṇi pañca pañca ca rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:2058: 1.062.009a atha kāle gate tasmin viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2060: 1.062.010a buddhir muneḥ samutpannā sāmarṣā raghunandana 1.062.010c sarvaṃ surāṇāṃ karmaitat tapo'paharaṇaṃ mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:2063: 1.062.012a viniḥśvasan munivaraḥ paścāt tāpena duḥkhitaḥ 1.062.013a bhītām apsarasaṃ dṛṣṭvā vepantīṃ prāñjaliṃ sthitām
GE09ram_1-7u:2064: 1.062.013c menakāṃ madhurair vākyair visṛjya kuśikātmajaḥ 1.062.013e uttaraṃ parvataṃ rāma viśvāmitro jagāma ha
GE09ram_1-7u:2065: 1.062.014a sa kṛtvā naiṣṭhikīṃ buddhiṃ jetukāmo mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2066: 1.062.014c kauśikītīram āsādya tapas tepe sudāruṇam 1.062.015a tasya varṣasahasraṃ tu ghoraṃ tapa upāsataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2067: 1.062.015c uttare parvate rāma devatānām abhūd bhayam
GE09ram_1-7u:2068: 1.062.016a amantrayan samāgamya sarve sarṣigaṇāḥ surāḥ 1.062.016c maharṣiśabdaṃ labhatāṃ sādhv ayaṃ kuśikātmajaḥ 1.062.017a devatānāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā sarvalokapitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2069: 1.062.017c abravīn madhuraṃ vākyaṃ viśvāmitraṃ tapodhanam 1.062.018a maharṣe svāgataṃ vatsa tapasogreṇa toṣitaḥ 1.062.018c mahattvam ṛṣimukhyatvaṃ dadāmi tava kauśika 1.062.019a brahmaṇaḥ sa vacaḥ śrutvā viśvāmitras tapodhanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2070: 1.062.019c prāñjaliḥ praṇato bhūtvā pratyuvāca pitāmaham 1.062.020a brahmarṣi śabdam atulaṃ svārjitaiḥ karmabhiḥ śubhaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2071: 1.062.020c yadi me bhagavān āha tato 'haṃ vijitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2072: 1.062.021a tam uvāca tato brahmā na tāvat tvaṃ jitendriyaḥ 1.062.021c yatasva muniśārdūla ity uktvā tridivaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2074: 1.062.022c ūrdhvabāhur nirālambo vāyubhakṣas tapaś caran 1.062.023a dharme pañcatapā bhūtvā varṣāsv ākāśasaṃśrayaḥ 1.062.023c śiśire salilasthāyī rātryahāni tapodhanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2075: 1.062.024a evaṃ varṣasahasraṃ hi tapo ghoram upāgamat
GE09ram_1-7u:2076: 1.062.024c tasmin saṃtapyamāne tu viśvāmitre mahāmunau 1.062.025a saṃbhramaḥ sumahān āsīt surāṇāṃ vāsavasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:2077: 1.062.025c rambhām apsarasaṃ śakraḥ saha sarvair marudgaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2078: 1.062.026a uvācātmahitaṃ vākyam ahitaṃ kauśikasya ca 1.063.001a surakāryam idaṃ rambhe kartavyaṃ sumahat tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:2080: 1.063.002a tathoktā sāpsarā rāma sahasrākṣeṇa dhīmatā 1.063.002c vrīḍitā prāñjalir bhūtvā pratyuvāca sureśvaram 1.063.003a ayaṃ surapate ghoro viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ 1.063.003c krodham utsrakṣyate ghoraṃ mayi deva na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2081: 1.063.003e tato hi me bhayaṃ deva prasādaṃ kartum arhasi 1.063.004a tām uvāca sahasrākṣo vepamānāṃ kṛtāñjalim 1.063.004c mā bhaiṣi rambhe bhadraṃ te kuruṣva mama śāsanam 1.063.005a kokilo hṛdayagrāhī mādhave ruciradrume
GE09ram_1-7u:2082: 1.063.005c ahaṃ kandarpasahitaḥ sthāsyāmi tava pārśvataḥ 1.063.006a tvaṃ hi rūpaṃ bahuguṇaṃ kṛtvā paramabhāsvaram
GE09ram_1-7u:2083: 1.063.006c tam ṛṣiṃ kauśikaṃ rambhe bhedayasva tapasvinam
GE09ram_1-7u:2084: 1.063.007a sā śrutvā vacanaṃ tasya kṛtvā rūpam anuttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:2085: 1.063.007c lobhayām āsa lalitā viśvāmitraṃ śucismitā 1.063.008a kokilasya tu śuśrāva valgu vyāharataḥ svanam
GE09ram_1-7u:2086: 1.063.008c saṃprahṛṣṭena manasā tata enām udaikṣata 1.063.009a atha tasya ca śabdena gītenāpratimena
GE09ram_1-7u:2087: 1.063.009c darśanena ca rambhāyā muniḥ saṃdeham āgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2088: 1.063.010a sahasrākṣasya tat karma vijñāya munipuṃgavaḥ 1.063.010c rambhāṃ krodhasamāviṣṭaḥ śaśāpa kuśikātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2089: 1.063.011a yan māṃ lobhayase rambhe kāmakrodhajayaiṣiṇam 1.063.011c daśavarṣasahasrāṇi śailī sthāsyasi durbhage
GE09ram_1-7u:2092: 1.063.013a evam uktvā mahātejā viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ 1.063.013c aśaknuvan dhārayituṃ kopaṃ saṃtāpam āgataḥ 1.063.014a tasya śāpena mahatā rambhā śailī tadābhavat
GE09ram_1-7u:2093: 1.063.014c vacaḥ śrutvā ca kandarpo maharṣeḥ sa ca nirgataḥ 1.063.015a kopena sa mahātejās tapo 'paharaṇe kṛte
GE09ram_1-7u:2094: 1.063.015c indriyair ajitai rāma na lebhe śāntim ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2095: 1.064.001a atha haimavatīṃ rāma diśaṃ tyaktvā mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2096: 1.064.001c pūrvāṃ diśam anuprāpya tapas tepe sudāruṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:2097: 1.064.002a maunaṃ varṣasahasrasya kṛtvā vratam anuttamam 1.064.002c cakārāpratimaṃ rāma tapaḥ paramaduṣkaram
GE09ram_1-7u:2098: 1.064.003a pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu kāṣṭhabhūtaṃ mahāmunim 1.064.003c vighnair bahubhir ādhūtaṃ krodho nāntaram āviśat
GE09ram_1-7u:2100: 1.064.004c mohitās tejasā tasya tapasā mandaraśmayaḥ 1.064.004e kaśmalopahatāḥ sarve pitāmaham
GE09ram_1-7u:2101: 1.064.005a bahubhiḥ kāraṇair deva viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ 1.064.005c lobhitaḥ krodhitaś caiva tapasā cābhivardhate 1.064.006a na hy asya vṛjinaṃ kiṃ cid dṛśyate sūkṣmam apy atha
GE09ram_1-7u:2102: 1.064.006c na dīyate yadi tv asya manasā yad abhīpsitam 1.064.006e vināśayati trailokyaṃ tapasā sacarācaram
GE09ram_1-7u:2103: 1.064.006g vyākulāś ca diśaḥ sarvā na ca kiṃ cit prakāśate
GE09ram_1-7u:2104: 1.064.007a sāgarāḥ kṣubhitāḥ sarve viśīryante ca parvatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2105: 1.064.007c prakampate ca pṛthivī vāyur vāti bhṛśākulaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2106: 1.064.008a buddhiṃ na kurute yāvan nāśe deva mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2107: 1.064.008c tāvat prasādyo bhagavān agnirūpo mahādyutiḥ 1.064.009a kālāgninā yathā pūrvaṃ trailokyaṃ dahyate 'khilam
GE09ram_1-7u:2108: 1.064.009c devarājye cikīrṣeta dīyatām asya yan matam
GE09ram_1-7u:2110: 1.064.010c viśvāmitraṃ mahātmānaṃ vākyaṃ madhuram abruvan 1.064.011a brahmarṣe svāgataṃ te 'stu tapasā sma sutoṣitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2111: 1.064.011c brāhmaṇyaṃ tapasogreṇa prāptavān asi kauśika 1.064.012a dīrgham āyuś ca te brahman dadāmi samarudgaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2112: 1.064.012c svasti prāpnuhi bhadraṃ te gaccha saumya yathāsukham
GE09ram_1-7u:2113: 1.064.013a pitāmahavacaḥ śrutvā sarveṣāṃ ca divaukasām 1.064.013c kṛtvā praṇāmaṃ mudito vyājahāra mahāmuniḥ 1.064.014a brāhmaṇyaṃ yadi me prāptaṃ dīrgham āyus tathaiva ca 1.064.014c oṃkāro 'tha vaṣaṭkāro vedāś ca varayantu mām 1.064.015a kṣatravedavidāṃ śreṣṭho brahmavedavidām api
GE09ram_1-7u:2114: 1.064.015c brahmaputro vasiṣṭho mām evaṃ vadatu devatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2115: 1.064.015e yady ayaṃ paramaḥ kāmaḥ kṛto yāntu surarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2116: 1.064.016a tataḥ prasādito devair vasiṣṭho japatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2117: 1.064.016c sakhyaṃ cakāra brahmarṣir evam astv iti cābravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:2118: 1.064.017a brahmarṣitvaṃ na saṃdehaḥ sarvaṃ saṃpatsyate tava
GE09ram_1-7u:2119: 1.064.017c ity uktvā devatāś cāpi sarvā jagmur yathāgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:2121: 1.064.018c pūjayām āsa brahmarṣiṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ japatāṃ varam
GE09ram_1-7u:2122: 1.064.019a kṛtakāmo mahīṃ sarvāṃ cacāra tapasi sthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2123: 1.064.019c evaṃ tv anena brāhmaṇyaṃ prāptaṃ rāma mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:2124: 1.064.020a eṣa rāma muniśreṣṭha eṣa vigrahavāṃs tapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2125: 1.064.020c eṣa dharmaḥ paro nityaṃ vīryasyaiṣa parāyaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:2127: 1.064.021c janakaḥ prāñjalir vākyam uvāca kuśikātmajam 1.064.022a dhanyo 'smy anugṛhīto 'smi yasya me munipuṃgava
GE09ram_1-7u:2128: 1.064.022c yajñaṃ kākutstha sahitaḥ prāptavān asi dhārmika
GE09ram_1-7u:2130: 1.064.023c guṇā bahuvidhāḥ prāptās tava saṃdarśanān mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:2131: 1.064.024a vistareṇa ca te brahman kīrtyamānaṃ mahat tapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2132: 1.064.024c śrutaṃ mayā mahātejo rāmeṇa ca mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:2133: 1.064.025a sadasyaiḥ prāpya ca sadaḥ śrutās te bahavo guṇāḥ 1.064.026a aprameyaṃ tapas tubhyam aprameyaṃ ca te balam
GE09ram_1-7u:2134: 1.064.026c aprameyā guṇāś caiva nityaṃ te kuśikātmaja
GE09ram_1-7u:2135: 1.064.027a tṛptir āścaryabhūtānāṃ kathānāṃ nāsti me vibho
GE09ram_1-7u:2137: 1.064.028a śvaḥ prabhāte mahātejo draṣṭum arhasi māṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2138: 1.064.028c svāgataṃ tapasāṃ śreṣṭha mām anujñātum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:2139: 1.064.029a evam uktvā muniśreṣṭhaṃ vaideho mithilādhipaḥ 1.064.029c pradakṣiṇaṃ cakārāśu sopādhyāyaḥ sabāndhavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2141: 1.064.030c svaṃ vāṭam abhicakrāma pūjyamāno maharṣibhiḥ 1.065.001a tataḥ prabhāte vimale kṛtakarmā narādhipaḥ 1.065.001c viśvāmitraṃ mahātmānam ājuhāva sarāghavam
GE09ram_1-7u:2142: 1.065.002a tam arcayitvā dharmātmā śāstradṛṣṭtena karmaṇā 1.065.002c rāghavau ca mahātmānau tadā vākyam uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:2143: 1.065.003a bhagavan svāgataṃ te 'stu kiṃ karomi tavānagha
GE09ram_1-7u:2144: 1.065.003c bhavān ājñāpayatu mām ājñāpyo bhavatā hy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:2145: 1.065.004a evam uktaḥ sa dharmātmā janakena mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:2146: 1.065.004c pratyuvāca munir vīraṃ vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ 1.065.005a putrau daśarathasyemau kṣatriyau lokaviśrutau
GE09ram_1-7u:2147: 1.065.005c draṣṭukāmau dhanuḥ śreṣṭhaṃ yad etat tvayi tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_1-7u:2148: 1.065.006a etad darśaya bhadraṃ te kṛtakāmau nṛpātmajau
GE09ram_1-7u:2149: 1.065.006c darśanād asya dhanuṣo yatheṣṭaṃ pratiyāsyataḥ 1.065.007a evam uktas tu janakaḥ pratyuvāca mahāmunim
GE09ram_1-7u:2150: 1.065.007c śrūyatām asya dhanuṣo yad artham iha tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_1-7u:2151: 1.065.008a devarāta iti khyāto nimeḥ ṣaṣṭho mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2152: 1.065.008c nyāso 'yaṃ tasya bhagavan haste datto mahātmanā 1.065.009a dakṣayajñavadhe pūrvaṃ dhanur āyamya vīryavān 1.065.009c rudras tu tridaśān roṣāt salilam idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:2153: 1.065.010a yasmād bhāgārthino bhāgān nākalpayata me surāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2154: 1.065.010c varāṅgāni mahārhāṇi dhanuṣā śātayāmi vaḥ 1.065.011a tato vimanasaḥ sarve devā vai munipuṃgava
GE09ram_1-7u:2156: 1.065.012a prītiyuktaḥ sa sarveṣāṃ dadau teṣāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_1-7u:2157: 1.065.013a tad etad devadevasya dhanūratnaṃ mahātmanaḥ 1.065.013c nyāsabhūtaṃ tadā nyastam asmākaṃ pūrvake vibho
GE09ram_1-7u:2158: 1.065.014a atha me kṛṣataḥ kṣetraṃ lāṅgalād utthitā mama
GE09ram_1-7u:2159: 1.065.014c kṣetraṃ śodhayatā labdhvā nāmnā sīteti viśrutā
GE09ram_1-7u:2160: 1.065.015a bhūtalād utthitā sā tu vyavardhata mamātmajā
GE09ram_1-7u:2161: 1.065.015c vīryaśulketi me kanyā sthāpiteyam ayonijā 1.065.016a bhūtalād utthitāṃ tāṃ tu vardhamānāṃ mamātmajām
GE09ram_1-7u:2162: 1.065.016c varayām āsur āgamya rājāno munipuṃgava 1.065.017a teṣāṃ varayatāṃ kanyāṃ sarveṣāṃ pṛthivīkṣitām 1.065.017c vīryaśulketi bhagavan na dadāmi sutām aham
GE09ram_1-7u:2163: 1.065.018a tataḥ sarve nṛpatayaḥ sametya munipuṃgava 1.065.018c mithilām abhyupāgamya vīryaṃ jijñāsavas tadā 1.065.019a teṣāṃ jijñāsamānānāṃ vīryaṃ dhanur upāhṛtam 1.065.019c na śekur grahaṇe tasya dhanuṣas tolane 'pi vā
GE09ram_1-7u:2164: 1.065.020a teṣāṃ vīryavatāṃ vīryam alpaṃ jñātvā mahāmune
GE09ram_1-7u:2165: 1.065.020c pratyākhyātā nṛpatayas tan nibodha tapodhana 1.065.021a tataḥ paramakopena rājāno
GE09ram_1-7u:2166: 1.065.021c arundhan mithilāṃ sarve vīryasaṃdeham āgatāḥ 1.065.022a ātmānam avadhūtaṃ te vijñāya munipuṃgava 1.065.022c roṣeṇa mahatāviṣṭāḥ pīḍayan mithilāṃ purīm 1.065.023a tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe kṣayaṃ yātāni sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2168: 1.065.024a tato devagaṇān sarvāṃs tapasāhaṃ prasādayam 1.065.024c daduś ca paramaprītāś caturaṅgabalaṃ surāḥ 1.065.025a tato bhagnā nṛpatayo hanyamānā diśo yayuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2170: 1.065.026a tad etan muniśārdūla dhanuḥ paramabhāsvaram 1.065.026c rāmalakṣmaṇayoś cāpi darśayiṣyāmi suvrata
GE09ram_1-7u:2171: 1.065.027a yady asya dhanuṣo rāmaḥ kuryād āropaṇaṃ mune
GE09ram_1-7u:2172: 1.065.027c sutām ayonijāṃ sītāṃ dadyāṃ dāśarather aham
GE09ram_1-7u:2173: 1.066.001a janakasya vacaḥ śrutvā viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ 1.066.001c dhanur darśaya rāmāya iti hovāca pārthivam
GE09ram_1-7u:2174: 1.066.002a tataḥ sa rājā janakaḥ sacivān vyādideśa ha
GE09ram_1-7u:2176: 1.066.003a janakena samādiṣṭhāḥ sacivāḥ prāviśan purīm 1.066.003c tad dhanuḥ purataḥ kṛtvā nirjagmuḥ pārthivājñayā
GE09ram_1-7u:2177: 1.066.004a nṛpāṃ śatāni pañcāśad vyāyatānāṃ mahātmanām 1.066.004c mañjūṣām aṣṭacakrāṃ tāṃ samūhas te kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_1-7u:2178: 1.066.005a tām ādāya tu mañjūṣām āyatīṃ yatra tad dhanuḥ 1.066.005c suropamaṃ te janakam ūcur nṛpati mantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2179: 1.066.006a idaṃ dhanurvaraṃ rājan pūjitaṃ sarvarājabhiḥ 1.066.006c mithilādhipa rājendra darśanīyaṃ yadīcchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:2180: 1.066.007a teṣāṃ nṛpo vacaḥ śrutvā kṛtāñjalir abhāṣata
GE09ram_1-7u:2181: 1.066.007c viśvāmitraṃ mahātmānaṃ tau cobhau rāmalakṣmaṇau 1.066.008a idaṃ dhanurvaraṃ brahmañ janakair abhipūjitam 1.066.008c rājabhiś ca mahāvīryair aśakyaṃ pūrituṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:2182: 1.066.009a naitat suragaṇāḥ sarve nāsurā na ca rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2183: 1.066.009c gandharvayakṣapravarāḥ sakiṃnaramahoragāḥ 1.066.010a kva gatir mānuṣāṇāṃ ca dhanuṣo 'sya prapūraṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:2185: 1.066.011a tad etad dhanuṣāṃ śreṣṭham ānītaṃ munipuṃgava
GE09ram_1-7u:2187: 1.066.012a viśvāmitras tu dharmātmā śrutvā janakabhāṣitam 1.066.012c vatsa rāma dhanuḥ paśya iti rāghavam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:2188: 1.066.013a maharṣer vacanād rāmo yatra tiṣṭhati tad dhanuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2189: 1.066.013c mañjūṣāṃ tām apāvṛtya dṛṣṭvā dhanur athābravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:2190: 1.066.014a idaṃ dhanurvaraṃ brahman saṃspṛśāmīha pāṇinā 1.066.014c yatnavāṃś ca bhaviṣyāmi tolane pūraṇe 'pi vā
GE09ram_1-7u:2191: 1.066.015a bāḍham ity eva taṃ rājā muniś ca samabhāṣata 1.066.015c līlayā sa dhanur madhye jagrāha vacanān muneḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2193: 1.066.016c āropayat sa dharmātmā salīlam iva tad dhanuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2194: 1.066.017a āropayitvā maurvīṃ ca pūrayām āsa vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:2195: 1.066.017c tad babhañja dhanur madhye naraśreṣṭho mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2196: 1.066.018a tasya śabdo mahān āsīn nirghātasamaniḥsvanaḥ 1.066.018c bhūmikampaś ca sumahān parvatasyeva dīryataḥ 1.066.019a nipetuś ca narāḥ sarve tena śabdena mohitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2197: 1.066.019c vrajayitvā munivaraṃ rājānaṃ tau ca rāghavau
GE09ram_1-7u:2198: 1.066.020a pratyāśvasto jane tasmin rājā vigatasādhvasaḥ 1.066.020c uvāca prāñjalir vākyaṃ vākyajño munipuṃgavam 1.066.021a bhagavan dṛṣṭavīryo me rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ 1.066.021c atyadbhutam acintyaṃ ca atarkitam idaṃ mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:2199: 1.066.022a janakānāṃ kule kīrtim āhariṣyati me sutā
GE09ram_1-7u:2200: 1.066.022c sītā bhartāram āsādya rāmaṃ daśarathātmajam 1.066.023a mama satyā pratijñā ca vīryaśulketi kauśika
GE09ram_1-7u:2201: 1.066.023c sītā prāṇair bahumatā deyā rāmāya me sutā
GE09ram_1-7u:2203: 1.066.024c mama kauśika bhadraṃ te ayodhyāṃ tvaritā rathaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2204: 1.066.025a rājānaṃ praśritair vākyair ānayantu puraṃ mama
GE09ram_1-7u:2205: 1.066.025c pradānaṃ vīryaśulkāḥ kathayantu ca sarvaśaḥ 1.066.026a muniguptau ca kākutsthau kathayantu nṛpāya vai
GE09ram_1-7u:2206: 1.066.026c prīyamāṇaṃ tu rājānam ānayantu suśīghragāḥ 1.066.027a kauśikaś ca tathety āha rājā cābhāṣya mantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2207: 1.066.027c ayodhyāṃ preṣayām āsa dharmātmā kṛtaśāsanāt 1.067.001a janakena samādiṣṭā dūtās te klāntavāhanāḥ 1.067.001c trirātram uṣitvā mārge te 'yodhyāṃ prāviśan purīm 1.067.002a te rājavacanād dūtā rājaveśmapraveśitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2208: 1.067.002c dadṛśur devasaṃkāśaṃ vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam 1.067.003a baddhāñjalipuṭāḥ sarve dūtā vigatasādhvasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2209: 1.067.003c rājānaṃ prayatā vākyam abruvan madhurākṣaram 1.067.004a maithilo janako rājā
GE09ram_1-7u:2211: 1.067.005a muhur muhur madhurayā snehasaṃyuktayā girā 1.067.005c janakas tvāṃ mahārāja pṛcchate sapuraḥsaram 1.067.006a pṛṣṭvā kuśalam avyagraṃ vaideho mithilādhipaḥ 1.067.006c kauśikānumate vākyaṃ bhavantam idam abravīt 1.067.007a pūrvaṃ pratijñā viditā vīryaśulkā mamātmajā 1.067.007c rājānaś ca kṛtāmarṣā nirvīryā vimukhīkṛtāḥ 1.067.008a seyaṃ mama sutā rājan viśvāmitra puraḥsaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2212: 1.067.008c yadṛcchayāgatair vīrair nirjitā tava putrakaiḥ 1.067.009a tac ca rājan dhanur divyaṃ madhye bhagnaṃ mahātmanā 1.067.009c rāmeṇa hi mahārāja mahatyāṃ janasaṃsadi 1.067.010a asmai deyā mayā sītā vīryaśulkā mahātmane
GE09ram_1-7u:2213: 1.067.010c pratijñāṃ tartum icchāmi tad anujñātum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:2215: 1.067.011c śīghram āgaccha bhadraṃ te draṣṭum arhasi rāghavau
GE09ram_1-7u:2216: 1.067.012a prītiṃ ca mama rājendra nirvartayitum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:2217: 1.067.012c putrayor ubhayor eva prītiṃ tvam api lapsyase
GE09ram_1-7u:2218: 1.067.013a evaṃ videhādhipatir madhuraṃ vākyam abravīt 1.067.013c viśvāmitrābhyanujñātaḥ śatānandamate sthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2219: 1.067.014a dūtavākyaṃ tu tac chrutvā rājā paramaharṣitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2220: 1.067.014c vasiṣṭhaṃ vāmadevaṃ ca mantriṇo 'nyāṃś ca so 'bravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:2222: 1.067.015c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā videheṣu vasaty asau
GE09ram_1-7u:2223: 1.067.016a dṛṣṭavīryas tu kākutstho janakena mahātmanā 1.067.016c saṃpradānaṃ sutāyās tu rāghave kartum icchati
GE09ram_1-7u:2224: 1.067.017a yadi vo rocate vṛttaṃ janakasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2225: 1.067.017c purīṃ gacchāmahe śīghraṃ mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2226: 1.067.018a mantriṇo bāḍham ity āhuḥ saha sarvair maharṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2227: 1.067.018c suprītaś cābravīd rājā śvo yātreti sa mantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2228: 1.067.019a mantriṇas tu narendrasya rātriṃ paramasatkṛtāḥ 1.067.019c ūṣuḥ pramuditāḥ sarve guṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ samanvitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2229: 1.068.001a tato rātryāṃ vyatītāyāṃ sopādhyāyaḥ sabāndhavaḥ 1.068.001c rājā daśaratho hṛṣṭaḥ sumantram idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:2230: 1.068.002a adya sarve dhanādhyakṣā dhanam ādāya puṣkalam
GE09ram_1-7u:2232: 1.068.003a caturaṅgabalaṃ cāpi śīghraṃ niryātu sarvaśaḥ 1.068.003c mamājñāsamakālaṃ ca yānayugyam anuttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:2233: 1.068.004a vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca jābālir atha kāśyapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2234: 1.068.004c mārkaṇḍeyaś ca dīrghāyur ṛṣiḥ kātyāyanas tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:2235: 1.068.005a ete dvijāḥ prayāntv agre syandanaṃ yojayasva me
GE09ram_1-7u:2236: 1.068.005c yathā kālātyayo na syād dūtā hi tvarayanti mām 1.068.006a vacanāc ca narendrasya sā senā caturaṅgiṇī
GE09ram_1-7u:2238: 1.068.007a gatvā caturahaṃ mārgaṃ videhān abhyupeyivān 1.068.007c rājā tu janakaḥ śrīmāñ śrutvā pūjām akalpayat
GE09ram_1-7u:2239: 1.068.008a tato rājānam āsādya vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam
GE09ram_1-7u:2240: 1.068.008c janako mudito rājā harṣaṃ ca paramaṃ yayau
GE09ram_1-7u:2241: 1.068.008e uvāca na naraśreṣṭho naraśreṣṭhaṃ mudānvitam 1.068.009a svāgataṃ te mahārāja diṣṭyā prāpto 'si rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:2242: 1.068.009c putrayor ubhayoḥ prītiṃ lapsyase vīryanirjitām 1.068.010a diṣṭyā prāpto mahātejā vasiṣṭho bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2243: 1.068.010c saha sarvair dvijaśreṣṭhair devair iva śatakratuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2244: 1.068.011a diṣṭyā me nirjitā vighnā diṣṭyā me pūjitaṃ kulam 1.068.011c rāghavaiḥ saha saṃbandhād vīryaśreṣṭhair mahātmabhiḥ 1.068.012a śvaḥ prabhāte narendrendra nirvartayitum arhasi 1.068.012c yajñasyānte naraśreṣṭha vivāham ṛṣisaṃmatam
GE09ram_1-7u:2245: 1.068.013a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā ṛṣimadhye narādhipaḥ 1.068.013c vākyaṃ vākyavidāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ pratyuvāca mahīpatim 1.068.014a pratigraho dātṛvaśaḥ śrutam etan mayā purā
GE09ram_1-7u:2246: 1.068.014c yathā vakṣyasi dharmajña tat kariṣyāmahe vayam
GE09ram_1-7u:2247: 1.068.015a tad dharmiṣṭhaṃ yaśasyaṃ ca vacanaṃ satyavādinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2248: 1.068.015c śrutvā videhādhipatiḥ paraṃ vismayam āgataḥ 1.068.016a tataḥ sarve munigaṇāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2249: 1.068.016c harṣeṇa mahatā yuktās tāṃ niśām avasan sukham
GE09ram_1-7u:2250: 1.068.017a rājā ca rāghavau putrau niśāmya pariharṣitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2253: 1.068.018c yajñasya ca sutābhyāṃ ca kṛtvā rātrim uvāsa ha 1.069.001a tataḥ prabhāte janakaḥ kṛtakarmā maharṣibhiḥ 1.069.001c uvāca vākyaṃ vākyajñaḥ śatānandaṃ purohitam 1.069.002a bhrātā mama mahātejā yavīyān atidhārmikaḥ 1.069.002c kuśadhvaja iti khyātaḥ purīm adhyavasac chubhām
GE09ram_1-7u:2255: 1.069.003c sāṃkāśyāṃ puṇyasaṃkāśāṃ vimānam iva puṣpakam 1.069.004a tam ahaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi yajñagoptā sa me mataḥ 1.069.004c prītiṃ so 'pi mahātejā iṃmāṃ bhoktā mayā saha 1.069.005a śāsanāt tu narendrasya prayayuḥ śīghravājibhiḥ 1.069.005c samānetuṃ naravyāghraṃ viṣṇum indrājñayā yathā 1.069.006a ājñayā tu narendrasya ājagāma kuśadhvajaḥ 1.069.007a sa dadarśa mahātmānaṃ janakaṃ dharmavatsalam 1.069.007c so 'bhivādya śatānandaṃ rājānaṃ cāpi dhārmikam
GE09ram_1-7u:2256: 1.069.008a rājārhaṃ paramaṃ divyam āsanaṃ cādhyarohata 1.069.008c upaviṣṭāv ubhau tau tu bhrātarāv amitaujasau
GE09ram_1-7u:2257: 1.069.009a preṣayām āsatur vīrau mantriśreṣṭhaṃ sudāmanam 1.069.009c gaccha mantripate śīghram aikṣvākam amitaprabham 1.069.009e ātmajaiḥ saha durdharṣam ānayasva samantriṇam 1.069.010a aupakāryāṃ sa gatvā tu raghūṇāṃ kulavardhanam
GE09ram_1-7u:2258: 1.069.010c dadarśa śirasā cainam abhivādyedam abravīt 1.069.011a ayodhyādhipate vīra vaideho
GE09ram_1-7u:2259: 1.069.011c sa tvāṃ draṣṭuṃ vyavasitaḥ sopādhyāyapurohitam 1.069.012a mantriśreṣṭhavacaḥ śrutvā rājā sarṣigaṇas tadā 1.069.012c sabandhur agamat tatra janako yatra vartate
GE09ram_1-7u:2260: 1.069.013a sa rājā mantrisahitaḥ sopādhyāyaḥ sabāndhavaḥ 1.069.013c vākyaṃ vākyavidāṃ śreṣṭho vaideham idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:2262: 1.069.014c vaktā sarveṣu kṛtyeṣu vasiṣṭho bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2264: 1.069.015c eṣa vakṣyati dharmātmā vasiṣṭho me yathākramam
GE09ram_1-7u:2265: 1.069.016a tūṣṇīṃbhūte daśarathe vasiṣṭho bhagavān ṛṣiḥ 1.069.016c uvāca vākyaṃ vākyajño vaidehaṃ sapurohitam 1.069.017a avyaktaprabhavo brahmā śāśvato nitya avyayaḥ 1.069.017c tasmān marīciḥ saṃjajñe marīceḥ kaśyapaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2266: 1.069.018a vivasvān kaśyapāj jajñe manur vaivaivataḥ smṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2267: 1.069.018c manuḥ prajāpatiḥ pūrvam ikṣvākus tu manoḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2268: 1.069.019a tam ikṣvākum ayodhyāyāṃ rājānaṃ viddhi pūrvakam
GE09ram_1-7u:2269: 1.069.019c ikṣvākos tu sutaḥ śrīmān vikukṣir udapadyata
GE09ram_1-7u:2270: 1.069.020a vikukṣes tu mahātejā bāṇaḥ putraḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_1-7u:2271: 1.069.020c bāṇasya tu mahātejā anaraṇyaḥ pratāpavān 1.069.021a anaraṇyāt pṛthur jajñe triśaṅkus tu pṛthoḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2272: 1.069.021c triśaṅkor abhavat putro dhundhumāro mahāyaśāḥ 1.069.022a dhundhumārān mahātejā yuvanāśvo mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2274: 1.069.023a māndhātus tu sutaḥ śrīmān susaṃdhir udapadyata
GE09ram_1-7u:2275: 1.069.023c susaṃdher api putrau dvau dhruvasaṃdhiḥ prasenajit
GE09ram_1-7u:2276: 1.069.024a yaśasvī dhruvasaṃdhes tu bharato nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2277: 1.069.024c bharatāt tu mahātejā asito nāma jāyata
GE09ram_1-7u:2278: 1.069.025a saha tena gareṇaiva jātaḥ sa sagaro 'bhavat
GE09ram_1-7u:2281: 1.069.026c bhagīrathāt kakutsthaś ca kakutsthasya raghus tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:2282: 1.069.027a raghos tu putras tejasvī pravṛddhaḥ puruṣādakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2283: 1.069.027c kalmāṣapādo hy abhavat tasmāj jātas tu śaṅkhaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2285: 1.069.028c śīghragas tv agnivarṇasya śīghragasya maruḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2286: 1.069.029a maroḥ praśuśrukas tv āsīd ambarīṣaḥ praśuśrukāt
GE09ram_1-7u:2287: 1.069.029c ambarīṣasya putro 'bhūn nahuṣaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ 1.069.030a nahuṣasya yayātis tu nābhāgas tu yayātijaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2289: 1.069.030e tasmād daśarathāj jātau bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau 1.069.031a ādivaṃśaviśuddhānāṃ rājñāṃ paramadharmiṇām
GE09ram_1-7u:2291: 1.069.032a rāmalakṣmaṇayor arthe tvatsute varaye nṛpa 1.069.032c sadṛśābhyāṃ naraśreṣṭha sadṛśe dātum arhasi 1.070.001a evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ janakaḥ pratyuvāca kṛtāñjaliḥ 1.070.001c śrotum arhasi bhadraṃ te kulaṃ naḥ kīrtitaṃ param 1.070.002a pradāne hi muniśreṣṭha kulaṃ niravaśeṣataḥ 1.070.002c vaktavyaṃ kulajātena tan nibodha mahāmune 1.070.003a rājābhūt triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ svena karmaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:2293: 1.070.004a tasya putro mithir nāma janako mithi putrakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2294: 1.070.004c prathamo janako nāma janakād apy udāvasuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2295: 1.070.005a udāvasos tu dharmātmā jāto vai nandivardhanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2296: 1.070.005c nandivardhana putras tu suketur nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2297: 1.070.006a suketor api dharmātmā devarāto mahābalaḥ 1.070.006c devarātasya rājarṣer bṛhadratha iti śrutaḥ 1.070.007a bṛhadrathasya śūro 'bhūn mahāvīraḥ pratāpavān 1.070.007c mahāvīrasya dhṛtimān sudhṛtiḥ satyavikramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2298: 1.070.008a sudhṛter api dharmātmā dhṛṣṭaketuḥ sudhārmikaḥ 1.070.008c dhṛṣṭaketos tu rājarṣer haryaśva iti viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2299: 1.070.009a haryaśvasya maruḥ putro maroḥ putraḥ pratīndhakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2300: 1.070.009c pratīndhakasya dharmātmā rājā kīrtirathaḥ sutaḥ 1.070.010a putraḥ kīrtirathasyāpi devamīḍha iti smṛtaḥ 1.070.010c devamīḍhasya vibudho vibudhasya mahīdhrakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2303: 1.070.012a mahāroṃṇas tu dharmātmā svarṇaromā vyajāyata 1.070.012c svarṇaroṃṇas tu rājarṣer hrasvaromā vyajāyata 1.070.013a tasya putradvayaṃ jajñe dharmajñasya mahātmanaḥ 1.070.013c jyeṣṭho 'ham anujo bhrātā mama vīraḥ kuśadhvajaḥ 1.070.014a māṃ tu jyeṣṭhaṃ pitā rājye so 'bhiṣicya narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2304: 1.070.014c kuśadhvajaṃ samāveśya bhāraṃ mayi vanaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2305: 1.070.015a vṛddhe pitari svaryāte dharmeṇa dhuram āvaham
GE09ram_1-7u:2306: 1.070.015c bhrātaraṃ devasaṃkāśaṃ snehāt paśyan kuśadhvajam 1.070.016a kasya cit tv atha kālasya sāṃkāśyād agamat purāt 1.070.016c sudhanvā vīryavān rājā mithilām avarodhakaḥ 1.070.017a sa ca me preṣayām āsa śaivaṃ dhanur anuttamam 1.070.017c sītā kanyā ca padmākṣī mahyaṃ vai dīyatām iti 1.070.018a tasyāpradānād brahmarṣe yuddham āsīn mayā saha
GE09ram_1-7u:2307: 1.070.018c sa hato 'bhimukho rājā sudhanvā tu mayā raṇe 1.070.019a nihatya taṃ muniśreṣṭha sudhanvānaṃ narādhipam 1.070.019c sāṃkāśye bhrātaraṃ śūram abhyaṣiñcaṃ kuśadhvajam 1.070.020a kanīyān eṣa me bhrātā ahaṃ jyeṣṭho mahāmune
GE09ram_1-7u:2308: 1.070.020c dadāmi paramaprīto vadhvau te munipuṃgava 1.070.021a sītāṃ rāmāya bhadraṃ te ūrmilāṃ lakṣmaṇāya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:2309: 1.070.021c vīryaśulkāṃ mama sutāṃ sītāṃ surasutopamām 1.070.022a dvitīyām ūrmilāṃ caiva trir vadāmi na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2310: 1.070.022c dadāmi paramaprīto vadhvau te raghunandana 1.070.023a rāmalakṣmaṇayo rājan godānaṃ kārayasva ha 1.070.023c pitṛkāryaṃ ca bhadraṃ te tato vaivāhikaṃ kuru
GE09ram_1-7u:2311: 1.070.024a maghā hy adya mahābāho tṛtīye divase prabho
GE09ram_1-7u:2312: 1.070.024c phalgunyām uttare rājaṃs tasmin vaivāhikaṃ kuru
GE09ram_1-7u:2313: 1.070.024e rāmalakṣmaṇayor arthe dānaṃ kāryaṃ sukhodayam 1.071.001a tam uktavantaṃ vaidehaṃ viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ 1.071.001c uvāca vacanaṃ vīraṃ vasiṣṭhasahito nṛpam 1.071.002a acintyāny aprameyāni kulāni narapuṃgava
GE09ram_1-7u:2314: 1.071.002c ikṣvākūṇāṃ videhānāṃ naiṣāṃ tulyo 'sti kaś cana 1.071.003a sadṛśo dharmasaṃbandhaḥ sadṛśo rūpasaṃpadā
GE09ram_1-7u:2315: 1.071.003c rāmalakṣmaṇayo rājan sītā cormilayā saha 1.071.004a vaktavyaṃ na naraśreṣṭha śrūyatāṃ vacanaṃ mama
GE09ram_1-7u:2316: 1.071.005a bhrātā yavīyān dharmajña eṣa rājā kuśadhvajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2317: 1.071.005c asya dharmātmano rājan rūpeṇāpratimaṃ bhuvi 1.071.005e sutā dvayaṃ naraśreṣṭha patnyarthaṃ varayāmahe 1.071.006a bharatasya kumārasya śatrughnasya ca dhīmataḥ 1.071.006c varayema sute rājaṃs tayor arthe mahātmanoḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2322: 1.071.009a viśvāmitravacaḥ śrutvā vasiṣṭhasya mate tadā 1.071.009c janakaḥ prāñjalir vākyam uvāca munipuṃgavau 1.071.010a sadṛśaṃ kulasaṃbandhaṃ yad ājñāpayathaḥ svayam 1.071.010c evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ vaḥ kuśadhvajasute ime
GE09ram_1-7u:2323: 1.071.010e patnyau bhajetāṃ sahitau śatrughnabharatāv ubhau 1.071.011a ekāhnā rājaputrīṇāṃ catasḥṇāṃ mahāmune
GE09ram_1-7u:2324: 1.071.011c pāṇīn gṛhṇantu catvāro rājaputrā mahābalāḥ 1.071.012a uttare divase brahman phalgunībhyāṃ manīṣiṇaḥ 1.071.012c vaivāhikaṃ praśaṃsanti bhago yatra prajāpatiḥ 1.071.013a evam uktvā vacaḥ saumyaṃ pratyutthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2325: 1.071.013c ubhau munivarau rājā janako vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:2326: 1.071.014a paro dharmaḥ kṛto mahyaṃ śiṣyo 'smi bhavatoḥ sadā 1.071.014c imāny āsanamukhyāni āsetāṃ munipuṃgavau
GE09ram_1-7u:2327: 1.071.015a yathā daśarathasyeyaṃ tathāyodhyā purī mama 1.071.015c prabhutve nāsit saṃdeho yathārhaṃ kartum arhathaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2328: 1.071.016a tathā bruvati vaidehe janake raghunandanaḥ 1.071.016c rājā daśaratho hṛṣṭaḥ pratyuvāca mahīpatim 1.071.017a yuvām asaṃkhyeya guṇau bhrātarau mithileśvarau 1.071.017c ṛṣayo rājasaṃghāś ca bhavadbhyām abhipūjitāḥ 1.071.018a svasti prāpnuhi bhadraṃ te gamiṣyāmi svam ālayam
GE09ram_1-7u:2329: 1.071.018c śrāddhakarmāṇi sarvāṇi vidhāsya iti cābravīt 1.071.019a tam āpṛṣṭvā narapatiṃ rājā daśarathas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:2330: 1.071.019c munīndrau tau puraskṛtya jagāmāśu mahāyaśāḥ 1.071.020a sa gatvā nilayaṃ rājā śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā vidhānataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2331: 1.071.020c prabhāte kālyam utthāya cakre godānam uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:2333: 1.071.021c ekaikaśo dadau rājā putrān uddhiśya dharmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2336: 1.071.023a vittam anyac ca subahu dvijebhyo raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2337: 1.071.023c dadau godānam uddiśya putrāṇāṃ putravatsalaḥ 1.071.024a sa sutaiḥ kṛtagodānair vṛtaś ca nṛpatis tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:2338: 1.071.024c lokapālair ivābhāti vṛtaḥ saumyaḥ prajāpatiḥ 1.072.001a yasmiṃs tu divase rājā cakre godānam uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:2339: 1.072.001c tasmiṃs tu divase śūro yudhājit samupeyivān
GE09ram_1-7u:2341: 1.072.002c dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭvā ca kuśalaṃ rājānam idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:2342: 1.072.003a kekayādhipatī rājā snehāt kuśalam abravīt 1.072.003c yeṣāṃ kuśalakāmo 'si teṣāṃ saṃpraty anāmayam
GE09ram_1-7u:2343: 1.072.004a svasrīyaṃ mama rājendra draṣṭukāmo mahīpate 1.072.004c tadartham upayāto 'ham ayodhyāṃ raghunandana 1.072.005a śrutvā tv ahaym ayodhyāyāṃ vivāhārthaṃ tāv ātmajān
GE09ram_1-7u:2344: 1.072.005c mithilām upayātās tu tvayā saha mahīpate
GE09ram_1-7u:2346: 1.072.006c atha rājā daśarathaḥ priyātithim upasthima 1.072.007a dṛṣṭvā paramasatkāraiḥ pūjārhaṃ samapūjayat
GE09ram_1-7u:2347: 1.072.007c tatas tām uṣito rātriṃ saha putrair mahātmabhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2348: 1.072.008a ṛṣīṃs tadā puraskṛtya yajñavāṭam upāgamat 1.072.008c yukte muhūrte vijaye sarvābharaṇabhūṣitaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2350: 1.072.009a vasiṣṭhaṃ purataḥ kṛtvā maharṣīn aparān api
GE09ram_1-7u:2354: 1.072.011c svadharmaṃ pratipadyasva kṛtvā vaivāhyam uttamam 1.072.012a ity uktaḥ paramodāro vasiṣṭhena mahātmanā 1.072.012c pratyuvāca mahātejā vākyaṃ paramadharmavit
GE09ram_1-7u:2355: 1.072.013a kaḥ sthitaḥ pratihāro me kasyājñā saṃpratīkṣyate
GE09ram_1-7u:2356: 1.072.013c svagṛhe ko vicāro 'sti yathā rājyam idaṃ tava
GE09ram_1-7u:2358: 1.072.014c mama kanyā muniśreṣṭha dīptā vahner ivārciṣaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2360: 1.072.015c avighnaṃ kurutāṃ rājā kimarthaṃ hi vilambyate
GE09ram_1-7u:2361: 1.072.016a tadvākyaṃ janakenoktaṃ śrutvā daśarathas tadā 1.072.016c praveśayām āsa sutān sarvān ṛṣigaṇān api
GE09ram_1-7u:2363: 1.072.017c iyaṃ sītā mama sutā sahadharmacarī tava
GE09ram_1-7u:2364: 1.072.017e pratīccha caināṃ bhadraṃ te pāṇiṃ gṛhṇīṣva pāṇinā
GE09ram_1-7u:2365: 1.072.018a lakṣmaṇāgaccha bhadraṃ te ūrmilām udyatāṃ mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:2366: 1.072.018c pratīccha pāṇiṃ gṛhṇīṣva mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2367: 1.072.019a tam evam uktvā janako bharataṃ cābhyabhāṣata
GE09ram_1-7u:2368: 1.072.019c gṛhāṇa pāṇiṃ māṇḍavyāḥ pāṇinā raghunandana 1.072.020a śatrughnaṃ cāpi dharmātmā abravīj janakeśvaraḥ 1.072.020c śrutakīrtyā mahābāho pāṇiṃ gṛhṇīṣva pāṇinā 1.072.021a sarve bhavantaḥ saṃyāś ca sarve sucaritavratāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2369: 1.072.021c patnībhiḥ santu kākutsthā mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2370: 1.072.022a janakasya vacaḥ śrutvā pāṇīn pāṇibhir aspṛśan
GE09ram_1-7u:2371: 1.072.022c catvāras te catasṛṇāṃ vasiṣṭhasya mate sthitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2372: 1.072.023a agniṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā vediṃ rājānam eva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:2373: 1.072.023c ṛṣīṃś caiva mahātmānaḥ saha bhāryā raghūttamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2374: 1.072.023e yathoktena tathā cakrur vivāhaṃ vidhipūrvakam 1.072.024a puṣpavṛṣṭir mahaty āsīd antarikṣāt subhāsvarā 1.072.024c divyadundubhinirghoṣair gītavāditranisvanaiḥ 1.072.025a nanṛtuś cāpsaraḥsaṃghā gandharvāś ca jaguḥ kalam
GE09ram_1-7u:2375: 1.072.025c vivāhe raghumukhyānāṃ tad adbhutam ivābhavat 1.072.026a īdṛśe vartamāne tu tūryodghuṣṭaninādite
GE09ram_1-7u:2376: 1.072.026c trir agniṃ te parikramya ūhur bhāryā mahaujasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2377: 1.072.027a athopakāryāṃ jagmus te sadārā raghunandanaḥ 1.072.027c rājāpy anuyayau paśyan sarṣisaṃghaḥ sabāndhavaḥ 1.073.001a atha rātryāṃ vyatītāyāṃ viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ 1.073.001c āpṛcchya tau ca rājānau jagāmottaraparvatam 1.073.002a viśvāmitro gate rājā vaidehaṃ mithilādhipam 1.073.002c āpṛcchyātha jagāmāśu rājā daśarathaḥ purīm 1.073.003a atha rājā videhānāṃ dadau kanyādhanaṃ bahu
GE09ram_1-7u:2379: 1.073.004a kambalānāṃ ca mukhyānāṃ kṣaumakoṭyambarāṇi ca 1.073.004c hastyaśvarathapādātaṃ divyarūpaṃ svalaṃkṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:2380: 1.073.005a dadau kanyā pitā tāsāṃ dāsīdāsam anuttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:2381: 1.073.005c hiraṇyasya suvarṇasya muktānāṃ vidrumasya ca 1.073.006a dadau paramasaṃhṛṣṭaḥ kanyādhanam anuttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:2382: 1.073.006c dattvā bahudhanaṃ rājā samanujñāpya pārthivam 1.073.007a praviveśa svanilayaṃ mithilāṃ mithileśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2383: 1.073.007c rājāpy ayodhyādhipatiḥ saha putrair mahātmabhiḥ 1.073.008a ṛṣīn sarvān puraskṛtya jagāma sabalānugaḥ 1.073.008c gacchantaṃ tu naravyāghraṃ sarṣisaṃghaṃ sarāghavam 1.073.009a ghorāḥ sma pakṣiṇo vāco vyāharanti tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2384: 1.073.009c bhaumāś caiva mṛgāḥ sarve gacchanti sma pradakṣiṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:2385: 1.073.010a tān dṛṣṭvā rājaśārdūlo vasiṣṭhaṃ paryapṛcchata 1.073.010c asaumyāḥ pakṣiṇo ghorā mṛgāś cāpi pradakṣiṇāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2386: 1.073.010e kim idaṃ hṛdayotkampi mano mama viṣīdati
GE09ram_1-7u:2387: 1.073.011a rājño daśarathasyaitac chrutvā vākyaṃ mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2388: 1.073.011c uvāca madhurāṃ vāṇīṃ śrūyatām asya yat phalam
GE09ram_1-7u:2389: 1.073.012a upasthitaṃ bhayaṃ ghoraṃ divyaṃ pakṣimukhāc cyutam
GE09ram_1-7u:2390: 1.073.012c mṛgāḥ praśamayanty ete saṃtāpas tyajyatām ayam
GE09ram_1-7u:2391: 1.073.013a teṣāṃ saṃvadatāṃ tatra vāyuḥ prādur babhūva ha
GE09ram_1-7u:2392: 1.073.013c kampayan medinīṃ sarvāṃ pātayaṃś ca drumāṃḥ śubhān
GE09ram_1-7u:2393: 1.073.014a tamasā saṃvṛtaḥ sūryaḥ sarvā na prababhur diśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2394: 1.073.014c bhasmanā cāvṛtaṃ sarvaṃ saṃmūḍham iva tad balam
GE09ram_1-7u:2395: 1.073.015a vasiṣṭha ṛṣayaś cānye rājā ca sasutas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:2396: 1.073.015c sasaṃjñā iva tatrāsan sarvam anyad vicetanam
GE09ram_1-7u:2397: 1.073.016a tasmiṃs tamasi ghore tu bhasmacchanneva sā camūḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2399: 1.073.017a kailāsam iva durdharṣaṃ kālāgnim iva duḥsaham
GE09ram_1-7u:2400: 1.073.017c jvalantam iva tejobhir durnirīkṣyaṃ pṛthagjanaiḥ 1.073.018a skandhe cāsajya paraśuṃ dhanur vidyudgaṇopamam 1.073.018c pragṛhya śaramukhyaṃ ca tripuraghnaṃ yathā haram
GE09ram_1-7u:2401: 1.073.019a taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīmasaṃkāśaṃ jvalantam iva pāvakam
GE09ram_1-7u:2403: 1.073.019e saṃgatā munayaḥ sarve saṃjajalpur atho mithaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2405: 1.073.020c pūrvaṃ kṣatravadhaṃ kṛtvā gatamanyur gatajvaraḥ 1.073.020e kṣatrasyotsādanaṃ bhūyo na khalv asya cikīrṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:2406: 1.073.021a evam uktvārghyam ādāya bhārgavaṃ bhīmadarśanam 1.073.021c ṛṣayo rāma rāmeti madhurāṃ vācam abruvan
GE09ram_1-7u:2407: 1.073.022a pratigṛhya tu tāṃ pūjām ṛṣidattāṃ pratāpavān
GE09ram_1-7u:2409: 1.074.001a rāma dāśarathe vīra vīryaṃ te śrūyate 'dhutam
GE09ram_1-7u:2410: 1.074.001c dhanuṣo bhedanaṃ caiva nikhilena mayā śrutam
GE09ram_1-7u:2411: 1.074.002a tad adbhutam acintyaṃ ca bhedanaṃ dhanuṣas tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:2412: 1.074.002c tac chrutvāham anuprāpto dhanur gṛhyāparaṃ śubham
GE09ram_1-7u:2413: 1.074.003a tad idaṃ ghorasaṃkāśaṃ jāmadagnyaṃ mahad dhanuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2414: 1.074.003c pūrayasva śareṇaiva svabalaṃ darśayasva ca 1.074.004a tad ahaṃ te balaṃ dṛṣṭvā dhanuṣo 'sya prapūraṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:2415: 1.074.004c dvandvayuddhaṃ pradāsyāmi vīryaślāghyam idaṃ tava 1.074.005a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rājā daśarataḥs tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:2416: 1.074.005c viṣaṇṇavadano dīnaḥ prāñjalir vākyam abravīt 1.074.006a kṣatraroṣāt praśāntas tvaṃ brāhmaṇasya mahāyaśāḥ 1.074.006c bālānāṃ mama putrāṇām abhayaṃ dātum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:2418: 1.074.007c sahasrākṣe pratijñāya śastraṃ nikṣiptavān asi 1.074.008a sa tvaṃ dharmaparo bhūtvā kāśyapāya vasuṃdharām
GE09ram_1-7u:2420: 1.074.009a mama sarvavināśāya saṃprāptas tvaṃ mahāmune 1.074.009c na caikasmin hate rāme sarve jīvāmahe vayam
GE09ram_1-7u:2421: 1.074.010a bruvaty evaṃ daśarathe jāmadagnyaḥ pratāpavān 1.074.010c anādṛtyaiva tad vākyaṃ rāmam evābhyabhāṣata 1.074.011a ime dve dhanuṣī śreṣṭhe divye lokābhiviśrute
GE09ram_1-7u:2422: 1.074.011c dṛḍhe balavatī mukhye sukṛte viśvakarmaṇā 1.074.012a atisṛṣṭaṃ surair ekaṃ tryambakāya yuyutsave 1.074.012c tripuraghnaṃ naraśreṣṭha bhagnaṃ kākutsha yat tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:2423: 1.074.013a idaṃ dvitīyaṃ durdharṣaṃ viṣṇor dattaṃ surottamaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2424: 1.074.013c samānasāraṃ kākutstha raudreṇa dhanuṣā tv idam
GE09ram_1-7u:2425: 1.074.014a tadā tu devatāḥ sarvāḥ pṛcchanti sma pitāmaham
GE09ram_1-7u:2427: 1.074.015a abhiprāyaṃ tu vijñāya devatānāṃ pitāmahaḥ 1.074.015c virodhaṃ janayām āsa tayoḥ satyavatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2428: 1.074.016a virodhe ca mahad yuddham abhavad romaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:2430: 1.074.017a tadā taj jṛmbhitaṃ śaivaṃ dhanur bhīmaparākramam
GE09ram_1-7u:2432: 1.074.018a devais tadā samāgamya sarṣisaṃghaiḥ sacāraṇaiḥ 1.074.018c yācitau praśamaṃ tatra jagmatus tau surottamau
GE09ram_1-7u:2433: 1.074.019a jṛmbhitaṃ tad dhanur dṛṣṭvā śaivaṃ viṣṇuparākramaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2434: 1.074.019c adhikaṃ menire viṣṇuṃ devāḥ sarṣigaṇās tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:2435: 1.074.020a dhanū rudras tu saṃkruddho videheṣu mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2436: 1.074.020c devarātasya rājarṣer dadau haste sasāyakam 1.074.021a idaṃ ca viṣṇavaṃ rāma dhanuḥ parapuraṃjayam
GE09ram_1-7u:2437: 1.074.021c ṛcīke bhārgave prādād viṣṇuḥ sa nyāsam uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:2439: 1.074.022c pitur mama dadau divyaṃ jamadagner mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2441: 1.074.023c arjuno vidadhe mṛtyuṃ prākṛtāṃ buddhim āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2442: 1.074.024a vadham apratirūpaṃ tu pituḥ śrutvā sudāruṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:2443: 1.074.024c kṣatram utsādayaṃ roṣāj jātaṃ jātam anekaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2444: 1.074.025a pṛthivīṃ cākhilāṃ prāpya kāśyapāya mahātmane 1.074.025c yajñasyānte tadā rāma dakṣiṇāṃ puṇyakarmaṇe 1.074.026a dattvā mahendranilayas tapobalasamanvitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2445: 1.074.026c śrutavān dhanuṣo bhedaṃ tato 'haṃ drutam āgataḥ 1.074.027a tad idaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ rāma pitṛpaitāmahaṃ mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:2447: 1.074.028a yojayasva dhanuḥ śreṣṭhe śaraṃ parapuraṃjayam 1.074.028c yadi śaknoṣi kākutstha dvandvaṃ dāsyāmi te tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2448: 1.075.001a śrutvā taj jāmadagnyasya vākyaṃ dāśarathis tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:2449: 1.075.001c gauravād yantritakathaḥ pitū rāmam athābravīt 1.075.002a śrutavān asmi yat karma kṛtavān asi bhārgava
GE09ram_1-7u:2450: 1.075.002c anurundhyāmahe brahman pitur ānṛṇyam āsthitaḥ 1.075.003a vīryahīnam ivāśaktaṃ kṣatradharmeṇa bhārgava
GE09ram_1-7u:2451: 1.075.003c avajānāmi me tejaḥ paśya me 'dya parākramam
GE09ram_1-7u:2452: 1.075.004a ity uktvā rāghavaḥ kruddho bhārgavasya varāyudham
GE09ram_1-7u:2453: 1.075.004c śaraṃ ca pratisaṃgṛhya hastāl laghuparākramaḥ 1.075.005a āropya sa dhanū rāmaḥ śaraṃ sajyaṃ cakāra ha 1.075.005c jāmadagnyaṃ tato rāmaṃ rāmaḥ kruddho 'bravīd vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2455: 1.075.006c tasmāc chakto na te rāma moktuṃ prāṇaharaṃ śaram 1.075.007a imāṃ vā tvadgatiṃ rāma tapobalasamārjitān 1.075.007c lokān apratimān vāpi haniṣyāmi yad icchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:2456: 1.075.008a na hy ayaṃ vaiṣṇavo divyaḥ śaraḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2458: 1.075.009a varāyudhadharaṃ rāma draṣṭuṃ sarṣigaṇāḥ surāḥ 1.075.009c pitāmahaṃ puraskṛtya sametās tatra saṃghaśaḥ 1.075.010a gandharvāpsarasaś caiva siddhacāraṇakiṃnarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2459: 1.075.010c yakṣarākṣasanāgāś ca tad draṣṭuṃ mahad adbhutam
GE09ram_1-7u:2460: 1.075.011a jaḍīkṛte tadā loke rāme varadhanurdhare 1.075.011c nirvīryo jāmadagnyo 'sau ramo rāmam udaikṣata
GE09ram_1-7u:2462: 1.075.012c rāmaṃ kamala patrākṣaṃ mandaṃ mandam uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:2463: 1.075.013a kāśyapāya mayā dattā yadā pūrvaṃ vasuṃdharā
GE09ram_1-7u:2464: 1.075.013c viṣaye me na vastavyam iti māṃ kāśyapo 'bravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:2465: 1.075.014a so 'haṃ guruvacaḥ kurvan pṛthivyāṃ na vase niśām
GE09ram_1-7u:2466: 1.075.014c iti pratijñā kākutstha kṛtā vai kāśyapasya ha
GE09ram_1-7u:2467: 1.075.015a tad imāṃ tvaṃ gatiṃ vīra hantuṃ nārhasi rāghava 1.075.015c manojavaṃ gamiṣyāmi mahendraṃ parvatottamam
GE09ram_1-7u:2468: 1.075.016a lokās tv apratimā rāma nirjitās tapasā mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:2469: 1.075.016c jahi tāñ śaramukhyena mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2470: 1.075.017a akṣayyaṃ madhuhantāraṃ jānāmi tvāṃ sureśvaram 1.075.017c dhanuṣo 'sya parāmarśāt svasti te 'stu paraṃtapa
GE09ram_1-7u:2471: 1.075.018a ete suragaṇāḥ sarve nirīkṣante samāgatāḥ 1.075.018c tvām apratimakarmāṇam apratidvandvam
GE09ram_1-7u:2472: 1.075.019a na ceyaṃ mama kākutstha vrīḍā bhavitum arhati
GE09ram_1-7u:2473: 1.075.019c tvayā trailokyanāthena yad ahaṃ vimukhīkṛtaḥ 1.075.020a śaram apratimaṃ rāma moktum arhasi suvrata
GE09ram_1-7u:2475: 1.075.021a tathā bruvati rāme tu jāmadagnye pratāpavān
GE09ram_1-7u:2476: 1.075.021c rāmo dāśarathiḥ śrīmāṃś cikṣepa śaram uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:2477: 1.075.022a tato vitimirāḥ sarvā diśā copadiśas tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:2478: 1.075.022c surāḥ sarṣigaṇā rāmaṃ praśaśaṃsur udāyudham 1.075.023a rāmaṃ dāśarathiṃ rāmo jāmadagnyaḥ praśasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:2480: 1.076.001a gate rāme praśāntātmā rāmo dāśarathir dhanuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2482: 1.076.002a abhivādya tato rāmo vasiṣṭha pramukhān ṛṣīn
GE09ram_1-7u:2483: 1.076.002c pitaraṃ vihvalaṃ dṛṣṭvā provāca raghunandanaḥ 1.076.003a jāmadagnyo gato rāmaḥ prayātu caturaṅgiṇī 1.076.003c ayodhyābhimukhī senā tvayā nāthena pālitā 1.076.004a rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā rājā daśarathaḥ sutam
GE09ram_1-7u:2484: 1.076.004c bāhubhyāṃ saṃpariṣvajya mūrdhni cāghrāya rāghavam 1.076.005a gato rāma iti śrutvā hṛṣṭaḥ pramudito nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2485: 1.076.005c codayām āsa tāṃ senāṃ jagāmāśu tataḥ purīm
GE09ram_1-7u:2489: 1.076.007c saṃpūrṇāṃ prāviśad rājā janaughaiḥ samalaṃkṛtām 1.076.008a kausalyā ca sumitrā ca kaikeyī ca sumadhyamā
GE09ram_1-7u:2490: 1.076.008c vadhūpratigrahe yuktā yāś cānyā rājayoṣitaḥ 1.076.009a tataḥ sītāṃ mahābhāgām ūrmilāṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:2493: 1.076.010c devatāyatanāny āśu sarvās tāḥ pratyapūjayan 1.076.011a abhivādyābhivādyāṃś ca sarvā rājasutās tadā 1.076.011c remire muditāḥ sarvā bhartṛbhiḥ sahitā rahaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2494: 1.076.012a kṛtadārāḥ kṛtāstrāś ca sadhanāḥ sasuhṛjjanāḥ 1.076.012c śuśrūṣamāṇāḥ pitaraṃ vartayanti nararṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2495: 1.076.013a teṣām atiyaśā loke rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ 1.076.013c svayambhūr iva bhūtānāṃ babhūva guṇavattaraḥ 1.076.014a rāmas tu sītayā sārdhaṃ vijahāra bahūn ṛtūn
GE09ram_1-7u:2496: 1.076.014c manasvī tadgatas tasyā nityaṃ hṛdi samarpitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2497: 1.076.015a priyā tu sītā rāmasya dārāḥ pitṛkṛtā iti
GE09ram_1-7u:2498: 1.076.015c guṇād rūpaguṇāc cāpi prītir bhūyo vyavardhata
GE09ram_1-7u:2499: 1.076.016a tasyāś ca bhartā dviguṇaṃ hṛdaye parivartate
GE09ram_1-7u:2500: 1.076.016c antarjātam api vyaktam ākhyāti hṛdayaṃ hṛdā
GE09ram_1-7u:2501: 1.076.017a tasya bhūyo viśeṣeṇa maithilī janakātmajā 1.076.017c devatābhiḥ samā rūpe sītā śrīr iva rūpiṇī
GE09ram_1-7u:2502: 1.076.018a tayā sa rājarṣisuto 'bhirāmayā; sameyivān uttamarājakanyayā 1.076.018c atīva rāmaḥ śuśubhe 'tikāmayā; vibhuḥ śriyā viṣṇur
GE09ram_1-7u:2504: 2.001.001a kasya cit tv atha kālasya rājā daśarathaḥ sutam 2.001.001c bharataṃ kekayīputram abravīd raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2505: 2.001.002a ayaṃ kekayarājasya putro vasati putraka 2.001.002c tvāṃ netum āgato vīra yudhājin mātulas tava
GE09ram_1-7u:2508: 2.001.004a āpṛcchya pitaraṃ śūro rāmaṃ cākliṣṭakāriṇam 2.001.004c mātṝṃś cāpi naraśreṣṭhaḥ śatrughnasahito yayau 2.001.005a yudhājit prāpya bharataṃ saśatrughnaṃ praharṣitaḥ 2.001.005c svapuraṃ prāviśad vīraḥ pitā tasya tutoṣa ha
GE09ram_1-7u:2509: 2.001.006a sa tatra nyavasad bhrātrā saha satkārasatkṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2511: 2.001.007a tatrāpi nivasantau tau tarpyamāṇau ca kāmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2512: 2.001.007c bhrātarau smaratāṃ vīrau vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam
GE09ram_1-7u:2513: 2.001.008a rājāpi tau mahātejāḥ sasmāra proṣitau sutau
GE09ram_1-7u:2515: 2.001.009a sarva eva tu tasyeṣṭāś catvāraḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2516: 2.001.009c svaśarīrād vinirvṛttāś catvāra iva bāhavaḥ 2.001.010a teṣām api mahātejā rāmo ratikaraḥ pituḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2517: 2.001.010c svayambhūr iva bhūtānāṃ babhūva guṇavattaraḥ 2.001.011a gate ca bharate rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2518: 2.001.011c pitaraṃ devasaṃkāśaṃ pūjayām āsatus tadā 2.001.012a pitur ājñāṃ puraskṛtya paurakāryāṇi sarvaśaḥ 2.001.012c cakāra rāmo dharmātmā priyāṇi ca hitāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:2521: 2.001.014a evaṃ daśarathaḥ prīto brāhmaṇā naigamās tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:2523: 2.001.015a sa hi nityaṃ praśāntātmā mṛdupūrvaṃ ca bhāṣate
GE09ram_1-7u:2525: 2.001.016a kathaṃ cid upakāreṇa kṛtenaikena tuṣyati 2.001.016c na smaraty apakārāṇāṃ śatam apy ātmavattayā
GE09ram_1-7u:2526: 2.001.017a śīlavṛddhair jñānavṛddhair vayovṛddhaiś ca sajjanaiḥ 2.001.017c kathayann āsta vai nityam astrayogyāntareṣv api
GE09ram_1-7u:2527: 2.001.018a kalyāṇābhijanaḥ sādhur adīnaḥ satyavāg ṛjuḥ 2.001.018c vṛddhair abhivinītaś ca dvijair dharmārthadarśibhiḥ 2.001.019a dharmārthakāmatattvajñaḥ smṛtimān pratibhāvanān
GE09ram_1-7u:2529: 2.001.020a śāstrajñaś ca kṛtajñaś ca puruṣāntarakovidaḥ 2.001.020c yaḥ pragrahānugrahayor yathānyāyaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2531: 2.001.021c śraiṣṭhyaṃ śāstrasamūheṣu prāpto vyāmiśrakeṣv api 2.001.022a arthadharmau ca saṃgṛhya sukhatantro na cālasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2533: 2.001.023a ārohe vinaye caiva yukto vāraṇavājinām 2.001.023c dhanurvedavidāṃ śreṣṭho loke
GE09ram_1-7u:2535: 2.001.024c apradhṛṣyaś ca saṃgrāme kruddhair api surāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2536: 2.001.025a anasūyo jitakrodho na dṛpto na ca matsarī
GE09ram_1-7u:2537: 2.001.025c na cāvamantā bhūtānāṃ na ca kālavaśānugaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2538: 2.001.026a evaṃ śraiṣṭhair guṇair yuktaḥ prajānāṃ pārthivātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2539: 2.001.026c saṃmatas triṣu lokeṣu vasudhāyāḥ kṣamāguṇaiḥ 2.001.026e buddhyā bṛhaspates tulyo vīryeṇāpi śacīpateḥ 2.001.027a tathā sarvaprajākāntaiḥ prītisaṃjananaiḥ pituḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2540: 2.001.027c guṇair viruruce rāmo dīptaḥ sūrya ivāṃśubhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2543: 2.001.029a etais tu bahubhir yuktaṃ guṇair anupamaiḥ sutam
GE09ram_1-7u:2544: 2.001.029c dṛṣṭvā daśaratho rājā cakre cintāṃ paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2545: 2.001.030a eṣā hy asya parā prītir hṛdi saṃparivartate
GE09ram_1-7u:2546: 2.001.030c kadā nāma sutaṃ drakṣyāmy abhiṣiktam ahaṃ priyam
GE09ram_1-7u:2548: 2.001.031c mattaḥ priyataro loke parjanya iva vṛṣṭimān
GE09ram_1-7u:2550: 2.001.032c mahīdharasamo dhṛtyāṃ mattaś ca guṇavattaraḥ 2.001.033a mahīm aham imāṃ kṛtsnām adhitiṣṭhantam ātmajam
GE09ram_1-7u:2551: 2.001.033c anena vayasā dṛṣṭvā yathā svargam avāpnuyām
GE09ram_1-7u:2552: 2.001.034a taṃ samīkṣya mahārājo yuktaṃ samuditair guṇaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2553: 2.001.034c niścitya sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ yuvarājam amanyata 2.001.035a nānānagaravāstavyān pṛthagjānapadān api
GE09ram_1-7u:2555: 2.001.036a atha rājavitīrṇeṣu vividheṣv āsaneṣu ca 2.001.036c rājānam evābhimukhā niṣedur niyatā nṛpāḥ 2.001.037a sa labdhamānair vinayānvitair nṛpaiḥ; purālayair jānapadaiś ca
GE09ram_1-7u:2557: 2.001.037c upopaviṣṭair nṛpatir vṛto babhau; sahasracakṣur bhagavān ivāmaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2558: 2.002.001a tataḥ pariṣadaṃ sarvām āmantrya vasudhādhipaḥ 2.002.001c hitam uddharṣaṇaṃ cedam uvācāpratimaṃ vacaḥ 2.002.002a dundubhisvanakalpena gambhīreṇānunādinā 2.002.002c svareṇa mahatā rājā jīgmūta iva nādayan
GE09ram_1-7u:2561: 2.002.004a mayāpy ācaritaṃ pūrvaiḥ panthānam anugacchatā 2.002.004c prajā nityam atandreṇa yathāśakty abhirakṣatā 2.002.005a idaṃ śarīraṃ kṛtsnasya lokasya caratā hitam
GE09ram_1-7u:2562: 2.002.005c pāṇḍur asyātapatrasyac chāyāyāṃ jaritaṃ mayā 2.002.006a prāpya varṣasahasrāṇi bahūny āyūṃṣi jīvitaḥ 2.002.006c jīrṇasyāsya śarīrasya viśrāntim abhirocaye
GE09ram_1-7u:2565: 2.002.008a so 'haṃ viśramam icchāmi putraṃ kṛtvā prajāhite 2.002.008c saṃnikṛṣṭān imān sarvān anumānya dvijarṣabhān 2.002.009a anujāto hi me sarvair guṇair jyeṣṭho mamātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2567: 2.002.010a taṃ candram iva puṣyeṇa yuktaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam
GE09ram_1-7u:2569: 2.002.011a anurūpaḥ sa vo nātho lakṣmīvāṃl lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2570: 2.002.011c trailokyam api nāthena yena syān nāthavattaram
GE09ram_1-7u:2571: 2.002.012a anena śreyasā sadyaḥ saṃyojyāham imāṃ mahīm
GE09ram_1-7u:2572: 2.002.012c gatakleśo bhaviṣyāmi sute tasmin niveśya vai
GE09ram_1-7u:2573: 2.002.013a iti bruvantaṃ muditāḥ pratyanandan nṛpā nṛpam
GE09ram_1-7u:2574: 2.002.013c vṛṣṭimantaṃ mahāmeghaṃ nardantam iva barhiṇaḥ 2.002.014a tasya dharmārthaviduṣo bhāvam ājñāya sarvaśaḥ 2.002.014c ūcuś ca manasā jñātvā vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam
GE09ram_1-7u:2575: 2.002.015a anekavarṣasāhasro vṛddhas tvam asi pārthiva 2.002.015c sa rāmaṃ yuvarājānam abhiṣiñcasva pārthivam 2.002.016a iti tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rājā teṣāṃ manaḥpriyam
GE09ram_1-7u:2576: 2.002.016c ajānann iva jijñāsur idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:2577: 2.002.017a kathaṃ nu mayi dharmeṇa pṛthivīm anuśāsati
GE09ram_1-7u:2578: 2.002.017c bhavanto draṣṭum icchanti yuvarājaṃ mamātmajam 2.002.018a te tam ūcur mahātmānaṃ paurajānapadaiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:2579: 2.002.018c bahavo nṛpa kalyāṇā guṇāḥ putrasya santi te
GE09ram_1-7u:2580: 2.002.019a divyair guṇaiḥ śakrasamo rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ 2.002.019c ikṣvākubhyo hi sarvebhyo 'py atirakto viśāmpate 2.002.020a rāmaḥ satpuruṣo loke satyadharmaparāyaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2581: 2.002.020c dharmajñaḥ satyasaṃdhaś ca śīlavān anasūyakaḥ 2.002.021a kṣāntaḥ sāntvayitā ślakṣṇaḥ kṛtajño vijitendriyaḥ 2.002.021c mṛduś ca sthiracittaś ca sadā bhavyo 'nasūyakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2582: 2.002.022a priyavādī ca bhūtānāṃ satyavādī ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2584: 2.002.023a tenāsyehātulā kīrtir yaśas tejaś ca vardhate
GE09ram_1-7u:2586: 2.002.024a yadā vrajati saṃgrāmaṃ grāmārthe nagarasya vā
GE09ram_1-7u:2588: 2.002.025a saṃgrāmāt punar āgamya kuñjareṇa rathena vā
GE09ram_1-7u:2589: 2.002.025c paurān svajanavan nityaṃ kuśalaṃ paripṛcchati 2.002.026a putreṣv agniṣu dāreṣu preṣyaśiṣyagaṇeṣu ca 2.002.026c nikhilenānupūrvyā ca pitā putrān ivaurasān 2.002.027a śuśrūṣante ca vaḥ śiṣyāḥ kaccit karmasu daṃśitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2591: 2.002.028a vyasaneṣu manuṣyāṇāṃ bhṛśaṃ bhavati duḥkhitaḥ 2.002.028c utsaveṣu ca sarveṣu piteva parituṣyati 2.002.029a satyavādī maheṣvāso vṛddhasevī jitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2592: 2.002.029c vatsaḥ śreyasi jātas te diṣṭyāsau tava rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2593: 2.002.029e diṣṭyā putraguṇair yukto mārīca iva kaśyapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2594: 2.002.030a balam ārogyam āyuś ca rāmasya viditātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2595: 2.002.030c āśaṃsate janaḥ sarvo rāṣṭre puravare tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:2596: 2.002.031a abhyantaraś ca bāhyaś ca paurajānapado janaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2597: 2.002.031c striyo vṛddhās taruṇyaś ca sāyaṃprātaḥ samāhitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2598: 2.002.032a sarvān devān namasyanti rāmasyārthe yaśasvinaḥ 2.002.032c teṣām āyācitaṃ deva tvatprasādāt samṛdhyatām 2.002.033a rāmam indīvaraśyāmaṃ sarvaśatrunibarhaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:2600: 2.002.034a taṃ devadevopamam ātmajaṃ te; sarvasya lokasya hite niviṣṭam
GE09ram_1-7u:2601: 2.002.034c hitāya naḥ kṣipram udārajuṣṭaṃ; mudābhiṣektuṃ varada tvam
GE09ram_1-7u:2604: 2.003.001c pratigṛhyābravīd rājā tebhyaḥ priyahitaṃ vacaḥ 2.003.002a aho 'smi paramaprītaḥ prabhāvaś cātulo mama
GE09ram_1-7u:2605: 2.003.002c yan me jyeṣṭhaṃ priyaṃ putraṃ yauvarājyastham icchatha
GE09ram_1-7u:2606: 2.003.003a iti pratyarcya tān rājā brāhmaṇān idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:2607: 2.003.003c vasiṣṭhaṃ vāmadevaṃ ca teṣām evopaśṛṇvatām 2.003.004a caitraḥ śrīmān ayaṃ māsaḥ puṇyaḥ puṣpitakānanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2609: 2.003.005a kṛtam ity eva cābrūtām abhigamya jagatpatim
GE09ram_1-7u:2611: 2.003.006a tataḥ sumantraṃ dyutimān rājā vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:2612: 2.003.006c rāmaḥ kṛtātmā bhavatā śīghram ānīiyatām iti
GE09ram_1-7u:2613: 2.003.007a sa tatheti pratijñāya sumantro rājaśāsanāt 2.003.007c rāmaṃ tatrānayāṃ cakre rathena rathināṃ varam
GE09ram_1-7u:2614: 2.003.008a atha tatra samāsīnās tadā daśarathaṃ nṛpam
GE09ram_1-7u:2615: 2.003.008c prācyodīcyāḥ pratīcyāś ca dākṣiṇātyāś ca bhūmipāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2616: 2.003.009a mlecchāś cāryāś ca ye cānye vanaśailāntavāsinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2617: 2.003.009c upāsāṃ cakrire sarve taṃ devā iva vāsavam
GE09ram_1-7u:2618: 2.003.010a teṣāṃ madhye sa rājarṣir marutām iva vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2624: 2.003.013a gharmābhitaptāḥ parjanyaṃ hlādayantam iva prajāḥ 2.003.013c na tatarpa samāyāntaṃ paśyamāno narādhipaḥ 2.003.014a avatārya sumantras taṃ rāghavaṃ syandanottamāt 2.003.014c pituḥ samīpaṃ gacchantaṃ prāñjaliḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nvagāt
GE09ram_1-7u:2625: 2.003.015a sa taṃ kailāsaśṛṅgābhaṃ prāsādaṃ narapuṃgavaḥ 2.003.015c āruroha nṛpaṃ draṣṭuṃ saha sūtena rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2626: 2.003.016a sa prāñjalir abhipretya praṇataḥ pitur antike
GE09ram_1-7u:2627: 2.003.016c nāma svaṃ śrāvayan rāmo vavande caraṇau pituḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2628: 2.003.017a taṃ dṛṣṭvā praṇataṃ pārśve kṛtāñjalipuṭaṃ nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2629: 2.003.017c gṛhyāñjalau samākṛṣya sasvaje priyam ātmajam 2.003.018a tasmai cābhyudyataṃ śrīmān maṇikāñcanabhūṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:2630: 2.003.018c dideśa rājā ruciraṃ rāmāya paramāsanam 2.003.019a tad āsanavaraṃ prāpya vyadīpayata rāghavaḥ 2.003.019c svayeva prabhayā merum udaye vimalo raviḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2631: 2.003.020a tena vibhrājitā tatra sā sabhābhivyarocata 2.003.020c vimalagrahanakṣatrā śāradī dyaur ivendunā
GE09ram_1-7u:2632: 2.003.021a taṃ paśyamāno nṛpatis tutoṣa priyam ātmajam
GE09ram_1-7u:2634: 2.003.022a sa taṃ sasmitam ābhāṣya putraṃ putravatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2635: 2.003.022c uvācedaṃ vaco rājā devendram iva kaśyapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2636: 2.003.023a jyeṣṭhāyām asi me patnyāṃ sadṛśyāṃ sadṛśaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2637: 2.003.023c utpannas tvaṃ guṇaśreṣṭho mama rāmātmajaḥ priyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2638: 2.003.024a tvayā yataḥ prajāś cemāḥ svaguṇair anurañjitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2639: 2.003.024c tasmāt tvaṃ puṣyayogena yauvarājyam avāpnuhi 2.003.025a kāmatas tvaṃ prakṛtyaiva vinīto guṇavān asi
GE09ram_1-7u:2640: 2.003.025c guṇavaty api tu snehāt putra vakṣyāmi te hitam 2.003.026a bhūyo vinayam āsthāya bhava nityaṃ jitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2642: 2.003.027a parokṣayā vartamāno vṛttyā pratyakṣayā tathā 2.003.027c amātyaprabhṛtīḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtīś cānurañjaya
GE09ram_1-7u:2644: 2.003.028c tasya nandanti mitrāṇi labdhvāmṛtam ivāmarāḥ 2.003.028e tasmāt putra tvam ātmānaṃ niyamyaiva samācara
GE09ram_1-7u:2645: 2.003.029a tac chrutvā suhṛdas tasya rāmasya priyakāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2646: 2.003.029c tvaritāḥ śīghram abhyetya kausalyāyai nyavedayan 2.003.030a sā hiraṇyaṃ ca gāś caiva ratnāni vividhāni ca 2.003.030c vyādideśa priyākhyebhyaḥ kausalyā pramadottamā
GE09ram_1-7u:2647: 2.003.031a athābhivādya rājānaṃ ratham āruhya rāghavaḥ 2.003.031c yayau svaṃ dyutimad veśma janaughaiḥ pratipūjitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2648: 2.003.032a te cāpi paurā nṛpater vacas tac; chrutvā tadā lābham iveṣṭam āpya 2.003.032c narendram āmantya gṛhāṇi gatvā; devān samānarcur atīva hṛṣṭāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2649: 2.004.001a gateṣv atha nṛpo bhūyaḥ paureṣu saha mantribhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2650: 2.004.001c mantrayitvā tataś cakre niścayajñaḥ sa niścayam
GE09ram_1-7u:2651: 2.004.002a śva eva puṣyo bhavitā śvo 'bhiṣecyeta me sutaḥ 2.004.002c rāmo rājīvatāmrākṣo yauvarājya iti prabhuḥ 2.004.003a athāntargṛham āviśya rājā daśarathas tadā 2.004.003c sūtam ājñāpayām āsa rāmaṃ punar ihānaya
GE09ram_1-7u:2652: 2.004.004a pratigṛhya sa tadvākyaṃ sūtaḥ punar upāyayau
GE09ram_1-7u:2653: 2.004.004c rāmasya bhavanaṃ śīghraṃ rāmam ānayituṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2654: 2.004.005a dvāḥsthair āveditaṃ tasya rāmāyāgamanaṃ punaḥ 2.004.005c śrutvaiva cāpi rāmas taṃ prāptaṃ śaṅkānvito 'bhavat
GE09ram_1-7u:2655: 2.004.006a praveśya cainaṃ tvaritaṃ rāmo vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:2656: 2.004.006c yad āgamanakṛtyaṃ te bhūyas tad brūhy aśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2657: 2.004.007a tam uvāca tataḥ sūto rājā tvāṃ draṣṭum icchati 2.004.007c śrutvā pramāṇam atra tvaṃ gamanāyetarāya vā
GE09ram_1-7u:2659: 2.004.008c prayayau rājabhavanaṃ punar draṣṭuṃ nareśvaram 2.004.009a taṃ śrutvā samanuprāptaṃ rāmaṃ daśaratho nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2660: 2.004.009c praveśayām āsa gṛhaṃ vivikṣuḥ priyam uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:2661: 2.004.010a praviśann eva ca śrīmān rāghavo bhavanaṃ pituḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2662: 2.004.010c dadarśa pitaraṃ dūrāt praṇipatya kṛtāñjaliḥ 2.004.011a praṇamantaṃ samutthāpya taṃ pariṣvajya bhūmipaḥ 2.004.011c pradiśya cāsmai ruciram āsanaṃ punar abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:2663: 2.004.012a rāma vṛddho 'smi dīrghāyur bhuktā bhogā mayepsitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2665: 2.004.013a jātam iṣṭam apatyaṃ me tvam adyānupamaṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_1-7u:2666: 2.004.013c dattam iṣṭam adhītaṃ ca mayā puruṣasattama
GE09ram_1-7u:2667: 2.004.014a anubhūtāni ceṣṭāni mayā vīra sukhāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:2669: 2.004.015a na kiṃ cin mama kartavyaṃ tavānyatrābhiṣecanāt
GE09ram_1-7u:2670: 2.004.015c ato yat tvām ahaṃ brūyāṃ tan me tvaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:2671: 2.004.016a adya prakṛtayaḥ sarvās tvām icchanti narādhipam
GE09ram_1-7u:2672: 2.004.016c atas tvāṃ yuvarājānam abhiṣekṣyāmi putraka 2.004.017a api cādyāśubhān rāma svapnān paśyāmi dāruṇān
GE09ram_1-7u:2673: 2.004.017c sanirghātā maholkāś ca patantīha mahāsvanāḥ 2.004.018a avaṣṭabdhaṃ ca me rāma nakṣatraṃ dāruṇair grahaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2675: 2.004.019a prāyeṇa hi nimittānām īdṛśānāṃ samudbhave 2.004.019c rājā vā mṛtyum āpnoti ghorāṃ vāpadam ṛcchati
GE09ram_1-7u:2676: 2.004.020a tad yāvad eva me ceto na vimuhyati rāghava 2.004.020c tāvad evābhiṣiñcasva calā hi prāṇināṃ matiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2677: 2.004.021a adya candro 'bhyupagataḥ puṣyāt pūrvaṃ punar vasum
GE09ram_1-7u:2678: 2.004.021c śvaḥ puṣya yogaṃ niyataṃ vakṣyante daivacintakāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2680: 2.004.022c śvas tvāham abhiṣekṣyāmi yauvarājye paraṃtapa 2.004.023a tasmāt tvayādya vratinā niśeyaṃ niyatātmanā 2.004.023c saha vadhvopavastavyā darbhaprastaraśāyinā
GE09ram_1-7u:2681: 2.004.024a suhṛdaś cāpramattās tvāṃ rakṣantv adya samantataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2682: 2.004.024c bhavanti bahuvighnāni kāryāṇy evaṃvidhāni hi 2.004.025a viproṣitaś ca bharato yāvad eva purād itaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2683: 2.004.025c tāvad evābhiṣekas te prāptakālo mato mama
GE09ram_1-7u:2684: 2.004.026a kāmaṃ khalu satāṃ vṛtte bhrātā te bharataḥ sthitaḥ 2.004.026c jyeṣṭhānuvartī dharmātmā sānukrośo jitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2685: 2.004.027a kiṃ tu cittaṃ manuṣyāṇām anityam iti me matiḥ 2.004.027c satāṃ ca dharmanityānāṃ kṛtaśobhi ca rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:2686: 2.004.028a ity uktaḥ so 'bhyanujñātaḥ śvobhāviny abhiṣecane 2.004.028c vrajeti rāmaḥ pitaram abhivādyābhyayād gṛham 2.004.029a praviśya cātmano veśma rājñoddiṣṭe 'bhiṣecane
GE09ram_1-7u:2687: 2.004.029c tasmin kṣaṇe vinirgatya mātur antaḥpuraṃ yayau
GE09ram_1-7u:2688: 2.004.030a tatra tāṃ pravaṇām eva mātaraṃ kṣaumavāsinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:2689: 2.004.030c vāgyatāṃ devatāgāre dadarśa yācatīṃ śriyam 2.004.031a prāg eva cāgatā tatra sumitrā lakṣmaṇas tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:2690: 2.004.031c sītā cānāyitā śrutvā priyaṃ rāmābhiṣecanam 2.004.032a tasmin kāle hi kausalyā tasthāv āmīlitekṣaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:2695: 2.004.034c uvāca vacanaṃ rāmo harṣayaṃs tām idaṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:2697: 2.004.035c bhavitā śvo 'bhiṣeko me yathā me śāsanaṃ pituḥ 2.004.036a sītayāpy upavastavyā rajanīyaṃ mayā saha 2.004.036c evam ṛtvigupādhyāyaiḥ saha mām uktavān pitā
GE09ram_1-7u:2698: 2.004.037a yāni yāny atra yogyāni śvobhāviny abhiṣecane
GE09ram_1-7u:2699: 2.004.037c tāni me maṅgalāny adya vaidehyāś caiva kāraya
GE09ram_1-7u:2700: 2.004.038a etac chrutvā tu kausalyā cirakālābhikāṅkṣitam 2.004.038c harṣabāṣpakalaṃ vākyam idaṃ rāmam abhāṣata 2.004.039a vatsa rāma ciraṃ jīva hatās te paripanthinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2701: 2.004.039c jñātīn me tvaṃ śriyā yuktaḥ sumitrāyāś ca nandaya 2.004.040a kalyāṇe bata nakṣatre mayi jāto 'si putraka
GE09ram_1-7u:2702: 2.004.040c yena tvayā daśaratho guṇair ārādhitaḥ pitā
GE09ram_1-7u:2703: 2.004.041a amoghaṃ bata me kṣāntaṃ puruṣe puṣkarekṣaṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:2704: 2.004.041c yeyam ikṣvākurājyaśrīḥ putra tvāṃ saṃśrayiṣyati 2.004.042a ity evam ukto mātredaṃ rāmo bhāratam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:2705: 2.004.042c prāñjaliṃ prahvam āsīnam abhivīkṣya smayann iva
GE09ram_1-7u:2706: 2.004.043a lakṣmaṇemāṃ mayā sārdhaṃ praśādhi tvaṃ vasuṃdharām
GE09ram_1-7u:2707: 2.004.043c dvitīyaṃ me 'ntarātmānaṃ tvām iyaṃ śrīr upasthitā
GE09ram_1-7u:2708: 2.004.044a saumitre bhuṅkṣva bhogāṃs tvam iṣṭān rājyaphalāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:2709: 2.004.044c jīvitaṃ ca hi rājyaṃ ca tvadartham abhikāmaye
GE09ram_1-7u:2710: 2.004.045a ity uktvā lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmo mātarāv abhivādya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:2711: 2.004.045c abhyanujñāpya sītāṃ ca jagāma svaṃ niveśanam
GE09ram_1-7u:2712: 2.005.001a saṃdiśya rāmaṃ nṛpatiḥ śvobhāviny abhiṣecane 2.005.001c purohitaṃ samāhūya vasiṣṭham idam abravīt 2.005.002a gacchopavāsaṃ kākutsthaṃ kārayādya tapodhana
GE09ram_1-7u:2714: 2.005.003a tatheti ca sa rājānam uktvā vedavidāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2715: 2.005.003c svayaṃ vasiṣṭho bhagavān yayau rāmaniveśanam 2.005.004a sa rāmabhavanaṃ prāpya
GE09ram_1-7u:2716: 2.005.004c tisraḥ kakṣyā rathenaiva viveśa munisattamaḥ 2.005.005a tam āgatam ṛṣiṃ rāmas tvarann iva sasaṃbhramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2717: 2.005.005c mānayiṣyan sa mānārhaṃ niścakrāma niveśanāt 2.005.006a abhyetya tvaramāṇaś ca rathābhyāśaṃ manīṣiṇaḥ 2.005.006c tato 'vatārayām āsa parigṛhya rathāt svayam
GE09ram_1-7u:2718: 2.005.007a sa cainaṃ praśritaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃbhāṣyābhiprasādya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:2719: 2.005.007c priyārhaṃ harṣayan rāmam ity uvāca purohitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2720: 2.005.008a prasannas te pitā rāma yauvarājyam avāpsyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:2721: 2.005.008c upavāsaṃ bhavān adya karotu saha sītayā
GE09ram_1-7u:2722: 2.005.009a prātas tvām abhiṣektā hi yauvarājye narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2723: 2.005.009c pitā daśarathaḥ prītyā yayātiṃ nahuṣo yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:2724: 2.005.010a ity uktvā sa tadā rāmam upavāsaṃ yatavratam
GE09ram_1-7u:2725: 2.005.010c mantravat kārayām āsa vaidehyā sahitaṃ muniḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2726: 2.005.011a tato yathāvad rāmeṇa sa rājño gurur arcitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2728: 2.005.012a suhṛdbhis tatra rāmo 'pi tān anujñāpya sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2729: 2.005.012c sabhājito viveśātha tān anujñāpya sarvaśaḥ 2.005.013a hṛṣṭanārī narayutaṃ rāmaveśma tadā babhau 2.005.013c yathā mattadvijagaṇaṃ praphullanalinaṃ saraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2731: 2.005.014c nirgatya dadṛśe mārgaṃ vasiṣṭho janasaṃvṛtam 2.005.015a vṛndavṛndair ayodhyāyāṃ rājamārgāḥ samantataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2734: 2.005.017a siktasaṃmṛṣṭarathyā hi tad ahar vanamālinī 2.005.017c āsīd ayodhyā nagarī samucchritagṛhadhvajā
GE09ram_1-7u:2735: 2.005.018a tadā hy ayodhyā nilayaḥ sastrībālābalo janaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2736: 2.005.018c rāmābhiṣekam ākāṅkṣann ākāṅkṣann udayaṃ raveḥ 2.005.019a prajālaṃkārabhūtaṃ ca janasyānandavardhanam
GE09ram_1-7u:2737: 2.005.019c utsuko 'bhūj jano draṣṭuṃ tam ayodhyā mahotsavam 2.005.020a evaṃ taṃ janasaṃbādhaṃ rājamārgaṃ purohitaḥ 2.005.020c vyūhann iva janaughaṃ taṃ śanai rāja kulaṃ yayau 2.005.021a sitābhraśikharaprakhyaṃ prāsadam adhiruhya saḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2739: 2.005.022a tam āgatam abhiprekṣya hitvā rājāsanaṃ nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2740: 2.005.022c papraccha sa ca tasmai tat kṛtam ity abhyavedayat 2.005.023a guruṇā tv abhyanujñāto manujaughaṃ visṛjya tam
GE09ram_1-7u:2741: 2.005.023c viveśāntaḥpuraṃ rājā siṃho giriguhām iva 2.005.024a tad agryaveṣapramadājanākulaṃ; mahendraveśmapratimaṃ niveśanam 2.005.024c vyadīpayaṃś cāru viveśa pārthivaḥ; śaśīva tārāgaṇasaṃkulaṃ nabhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2742: 2.006.001a gate purohite rāmaḥ snāto niyatamānasaḥ 2.006.001c saha patnyā viśālākṣyā nārāyaṇam upāgamat 2.006.002a pragṛhya śirasā pātrīṃ haviṣo vidhivat tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:2744: 2.006.003a śeṣaṃ ca haviṣas tasya prāśyāśāsyātmanaḥ priyam
GE09ram_1-7u:2745: 2.006.003c dhyāyan nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ svāstīrṇe kuśasaṃstare 2.006.004a vāgyataḥ saha vaidehyā bhūtvā niyatamānasaḥ 2.006.004c śrīmaty āyatane viṣṇoḥ śiśye naravarātmajaḥ 2.006.005a ekayāmāvaśiṣṭāyāṃ rātryāṃ prativibudhya saḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2746: 2.006.005c alaṃkāravidhiṃ kṛtsnaṃ kārayām āsa veśmanaḥ 2.006.006a tatra śṛṇvan sukhā vācaḥ sūtamāgadhabandinām 2.006.006c pūrvāṃ saṃdhyām upāsīno jajāpa yatamānasaḥ 2.006.007a tuṣṭāva praṇataś caiva śirasā madhusūdanam 2.006.007c vimalakṣaumasaṃvīto vācayām āsa ca dvijān 2.006.008a teṣāṃ puṇyāhaghoṣo 'tha gambhīramadhuras tadā 2.006.008c ayodhyāṃ pūrayām āsa tūryaghoṣānunāditaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2747: 2.006.009a kṛtopavāsaṃ tu tadā vaidehyā saha rāghavam
GE09ram_1-7u:2748: 2.006.009c ayodhyā nilayaḥ śrutvā sarvaḥ pramudito janaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2749: 2.006.010a tataḥ paurajanaḥ sarvaḥ śrutvā rāmābhiṣecanam 2.006.010c prabhātāṃ rajanīṃ dṛṣṭvā cakre śobhāṃ parāṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2751: 2.006.011c catuṣpatheṣu rathyāsu caityeṣv aṭṭālakeṣu ca 2.006.012a nānāpaṇyasamṛddheṣu vaṇijām āpaṇeṣu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:2752: 2.006.012c kuṭumbināṃ samṛddheṣu śrīmatsu bhavaneṣu ca 2.006.013a sabhāsu caiva sarvāsu vṛkṣeṣv ālakṣiteṣu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:2753: 2.006.013c dhvajāḥ samucchritāś citrāḥ patākāś cābhavaṃs tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:2755: 2.006.014c manaḥkarṇasukhā vācaḥ śuśruvuś ca tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2756: 2.006.015a rāmābhiṣekayuktāś ca kathāś cakrur mitho janāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2757: 2.006.015c rāmābhiṣeke saṃprāpte catvareṣu gṛheṣu ca 2.006.016a bālā api krīḍamānā gṛhadvāreṣu saṃghaśaḥ 2.006.016c rāmābhiṣekasaṃyuktāś cakrur eva mithaḥ kathāḥ 2.006.017a kṛtapuṣpopahāraś ca dhūpagandhādhivāsitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2758: 2.006.017c rājamārgaḥ kṛtaḥ śrīmān paurai rāmābhiṣecane 2.006.018a prakāśīkaraṇārthaṃ ca
GE09ram_1-7u:2759: 2.006.018c dīpavṛkṣāṃs tathā cakrur anu rathyāsu sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2760: 2.006.019a alaṃkāraṃ purasyaivaṃ kṛtvā tat puravāsinaḥ 2.006.019c ākāṅkṣamāṇā rāmasya yauvarājyābhiṣecanam
GE09ram_1-7u:2761: 2.006.020a sametya saṃghaśaḥ sarve catvareṣu sabhāsu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:2762: 2.006.020c kathayanto mithas tatra praśaśaṃsur janādhipam 2.006.021a aho mahātmā rājāyam
GE09ram_1-7u:2763: 2.006.021c jñātvā yo vṛddham ātmānaṃ rāmaṃ rājye 'hbiṣekṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:2764: 2.006.022a sarve hy anugṛhītāḥ sma yan no rāmo mahīpatiḥ 2.006.022c cirāya bhavitā goptā
GE09ram_1-7u:2766: 2.006.023c yathā ca bhrātṛṣu snigdhas tathāsmāsv api rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2769: 2.006.025a evaṃvidhaṃ kathayatāṃ paurāṇāṃ śuśruvus tadā 2.006.025c digbhyo 'pi śrutavṛttāntāḥ prāptā jānapadā janāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2770: 2.006.026a te tu digbhyaḥ purīṃ prāptā draṣṭuṃ rāmābhiṣecanam
GE09ram_1-7u:2771: 2.006.026c rāmasya pūrayām āsuḥ purīṃ jānapadā janāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2772: 2.006.027a janaughais tair visarpadbhiḥ śuśruve tatra nisvanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2774: 2.006.028a tatas tad indrakṣayasaṃnibhaṃ puraṃ; didṛkṣubhir jānapadair upāgataiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2775: 2.006.028c samantataḥ sasvanam ākulaṃ babhau; samudrayādobhir ivārṇavodakam 2.007.001a jñātidāsī yato jātā kaikeyyās tu sahoṣitā
GE09ram_1-7u:2778: 2.007.002c ayodhyāṃ mantharā tasmāt prāsādād anvavaikṣata 2.007.003a patākābhir varārhābhir dhvajaiś ca samalaṃkṛtām 2.007.003c siktāṃ candanatoyaiś ca śiraḥsnātajanair vṛtām 2.007.004a avidūre sthitāṃ dṛṣṭvā dhātrīṃ papraccha mantharā
GE09ram_1-7u:2780: 2.007.005a rāmamātā dhanaṃ kiṃ nu janebhyaḥ saṃprayacchati
GE09ram_1-7u:2781: 2.007.005c atimātraṃ praharṣo 'yaṃ kiṃ janasya ca śaṃsa me 2.007.005e kārayiṣyati kiṃ vāpi saṃprahṛṣṭo mahīpatiḥ 2.007.006a vidīryamāṇā harṣeṇa dhātrī paramayā mudā 2.007.006c ācacakṣe 'tha kubjāyai bhūyasīṃ rāghave śriyam
GE09ram_1-7u:2782: 2.007.007a śvaḥ puṣyeṇa jitakrodhaṃ yauvarājyena rāghavam 2.007.007c rājā daśaratho rāmam
GE09ram_1-7u:2783: 2.007.008a dhātryās tu vacanaṃ śrutvā kubjā kṣipram amarṣitā
GE09ram_1-7u:2785: 2.007.009a sā dahyamānā kopena mantharā pāpadarśinī 2.007.009c śayānām etya kaikeyīm idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:2786: 2.007.010a uttiṣṭha mūḍhe kiṃ śeṣe bhayaṃ tvām abhivartate
GE09ram_1-7u:2787: 2.007.010c upaplutamahaughena kim ātmānaṃ na budhyase 2.007.011a aniṣṭe subhagākāre saubhāgyena
GE09ram_1-7u:2788: 2.007.011c calaṃ hi tava saubhāgyaṃ nadyaḥ srota ivoṣṇage
GE09ram_1-7u:2789: 2.007.012a evam uktā tu kaikeyī ruṣṭayā paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2790: 2.007.012c kubjayā pāpadarśinyā viṣādam agamat param 2.007.013a kaikeyī tv abravīt kubjāṃ kaccit kṣemaṃ na manthare 2.007.013c viṣaṇṇavadanāṃ hi tvāṃ lakṣaye bhṛśaduḥkhitām 2.007.014a mantharā tu vacaḥ śrutvā kaikeyyā madhurākṣaram
GE09ram_1-7u:2792: 2.007.015a sā viṣaṇṇatarā bhūtvā kubjā tasyā hitaiṣiṇī
GE09ram_1-7u:2793: 2.007.015c viṣādayantī provāca bhedayantī ca rāghavam 2.007.016a akṣemaṃ sumahad devi pravṛttaṃ tvadvināśanam 2.007.016c rāmaṃ daśaratho rājā yauvarājye 'bhiṣekṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:2794: 2.007.017a sāsmy agādhe bhaye magnā duḥkhaśokasamanvitā 2.007.017c dahyamānānaleneva tvaddhitārtham
GE09ram_1-7u:2795: 2.007.018a tava duḥkhena kaikeyi mama duḥkhaṃ mahad bhavet
GE09ram_1-7u:2796: 2.007.018c tvadvṛddhau mama vṛddhiś ca bhaved atra na saṃśayaḥ 2.007.019a narādhipakule jātā mahiṣī tvaṃ mahīpateḥ 2.007.019c ugratvaṃ rājadharmāṇāṃ kathaṃ devi na budhyase
GE09ram_1-7u:2797: 2.007.020a dharmavādī śaṭho bhartā ślakṣṇavādī ca dāruṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2798: 2.007.020c śuddhabhāve na jānīṣe tenaivam atisaṃdhitā 2.007.021a upasthitaṃ payuñjānas tvayi sāntvam anarthakam 2.007.021c arthenaivādya te bhartā kausalyāṃ yojayiṣyati 2.007.022a apavāhya sa duṣṭātmā bharataṃ tava bandhuṣu
GE09ram_1-7u:2799: 2.007.022c kālyaṃ sthāpayitā rāmaṃ rājye nihatakaṇṭake 2.007.023a śatruḥ patipravādena mātreva hitakāmyayā
GE09ram_1-7u:2800: 2.007.023c āśīviṣa ivāṅkena bāle paridhṛtas tvayā 2.007.024a yathā hi kuryāt sarpo vā śatrur vā pratyupekṣitaḥ 2.007.024c rājñā daśarathenādya saputrā tvaṃ tathā kṛtā
GE09ram_1-7u:2802: 2.007.025c rāmaṃ sthāpayatā rājye sānubandhā hatā hy asi
