GE09ram_1-7u:2803: 2.007.026a sā prāptakālaṃ kaikeyi kṣipraṃ kuru hitaṃ tava
GE09ram_1-7u:2804: 2.007.026c trāyasva putram ātmānaṃ māṃ ca vismayadarśane
GE09ram_1-7u:2805: 2.007.027a mantharāyā vacaḥ śrutvā śayanāt sa śubhānanā
GE09ram_1-7u:2806: 2.007.027c evam ābharaṇaṃ tasyai kubjāyai pradadau śubham
GE09ram_1-7u:2807: 2.007.028a dattvā tv ābharaṇaṃ tasyai kubjāyai pramadottamā
GE09ram_1-7u:2808: 2.007.028c kaikeyī mantharāṃ hṛṣṭā punar evābravīd idam
GE09ram_1-7u:2809: 2.007.029a idaṃ tu manthare mahyam ākhyāsi paramaṃ priyam
GE09ram_1-7u:2810: 2.007.029c etan me priyam ākhyātuḥ kiṃ vā bhūyaḥ karomi te
GE09ram_1-7u:2811: 2.007.030a rāme vā bharate vāhaṃ viśeṣaṃ nopalakṣaye
GE09ram_1-7u:2812: 2.007.030c tasmāt tuṣṭāsmi yad rājā rāmaṃ rājye 'bhiṣekṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:2813: 2.007.031a na me paraṃ kiṃ cid itas tvayā punaḥ; priyaṃ priyārhe suvacaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:2814: vaco varam 2.007.031c tathā hy avocas tvam ataḥ priyottaraṃ; varaṃ paraṃ te pradadāmi taṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:2815: 2.008.001a mantharā tv abhyasūyyainām utsṛjyābharaṇaṃ ca tat
GE09ram_1-7u:2817: 2.008.002a harṣaṃ kim idam asthāne kṛtavaty asi bāliśe
GE09ram_1-7u:2820: 2.008.003c yauvarājyena mahatā śvaḥ puṣyeṇa dvijottamaiḥ 2.008.004a prāptāṃ sumahatīṃ prītiṃ pratītāṃ tāṃ hatadviṣam
GE09ram_1-7u:2821: 2.008.004c upasthāsyasi kausalyāṃ dāsīva tvaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ 2.008.005a hṛṣṭāḥ khalu bhaviṣyanti rāmasya paramāḥ striyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2822: 2.008.005c aprahṛṣṭā bhaviṣyanti snuṣās te bharatakṣaye 2.008.006a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā paramaprītāṃ bruvantīṃ mantharāṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2823: 2.008.006c rāmasyaiva guṇān devī kaikeyī praśaśaṃsa ha
GE09ram_1-7u:2824: 2.008.007a dharmajño gurubhir dāntaḥ kṛtajñaḥ satyavāk śuciḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2825: 2.008.007c rāmo rājñaḥ suto jyeṣṭho yauvarājyam ato 'rhati
GE09ram_1-7u:2826: 2.008.008a bhrātṝn bhṛtyāṃś ca dīrghāyuḥ pitṛvat pālayiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:2827: 2.008.008c saṃtapyase kathaṃ kubje śrutvā rāmābhiṣecanam 2.008.009a bharataś cāpi rāmasya dhruvaṃ varṣaśatāt param
GE09ram_1-7u:2829: 2.008.010a sā tvam abhyudaye prāpte vartamāne ca manthare
GE09ram_1-7u:2830: 2.008.010c bhaviṣyati ca kalyāṇe kimarthaṃ paritapyase 2.008.010e kausalyāto 'tiriktaṃ ca sa tu śuśrūṣate hi mām
GE09ram_1-7u:2831: 2.008.011a kaikeyyā vacanaṃ śrutvā mantharā bhṛśaduḥkhitā 2.008.011c dīrgham uṣṇaṃ viniḥśvasya kaikeyīm idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:2834: 2.008.013a bhavitā rāghavo rājā rāghavasya ca yaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2835: 2.008.013c rājavaṃśāt tu bharataḥ kaikeyi parihāsyate 2.008.014a na hi rājñaḥ sutāḥ sarve rājye tiṣṭhanti bhāmini 2.008.014c sthāpyamāneṣu sarveṣu sumahān anayo bhavet 2.008.015a tasmāj jyeṣṭhe hi kaikeyi rājyatantrāṇi pārthivāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2836: 2.008.015c sthāpayanty anavadyāṅgi guṇavatsv itareṣv api 2.008.016a asāv atyantanirbhagnas tava putro bhaviṣyati 2.008.016c anāthavat sukhebhyaś ca rājavaṃśāc ca vatsale
GE09ram_1-7u:2837: 2.008.017a sāhaṃ tvadarthe saṃprāptā tvaṃ tu māṃ nāvabudhyase
GE09ram_1-7u:2838: 2.008.017c sapatnivṛddhau yā me tvaṃ pradeyaṃ dātum icchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:2839: 2.008.018a dhruvaṃ tu bharataṃ rāmaḥ prāpya rājyam akaṇṭakam
GE09ram_1-7u:2840: 2.008.018c deśāntaraṃ nāyayitvā lokāntaram athāpi vā 2.008.019a bāla eva hi mātulyaṃ bharato nāyitas tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:2841: 2.008.019c saṃnikarṣāc ca sauhārdaṃ jāyate sthāvareṣv api
GE09ram_1-7u:2842: 2.008.020a goptā hi rāmaṃ saumitrir lakṣmaṇaṃ cāpi rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2843: 2.008.020c aśvinor iva saubhrātraṃ tayor lokeṣu viśrutam
GE09ram_1-7u:2844: 2.008.021a tasmān na lakṣmaṇe rāmaḥ pāpaṃ kiṃ cit kariṣyati 2.008.021c rāmas tu bharate pāpaṃ kuryād iti na saṃśayaḥ 2.008.022a tasmād rājagṛhād eva vanaṃ gacchatu te sutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2845: 2.008.022c etad dhi rocate mahyaṃ bhṛśaṃ cāpi hitaṃ tava 2.008.023a evaṃ te jñātipakṣasya śreyaś caiva bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:2846: 2.008.023c yadi ced bharato dharmāt pitryaṃ rājyam avāpsyati
GE09ram_1-7u:2847: 2.008.024a sa te sukhocito bālo rāmasya sahajo ripuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2848: 2.008.024c samṛdhārthasya naṣṭārtho jīviṣyati kathaṃ vaśe 2.008.025a abhidrutam ivāraṇye siṃhena gajayūthapam
GE09ram_1-7u:2849: 2.008.025c pracchādyamānaṃ rāmeṇa bharataṃ trātum arhasi 2.008.026a darpān nirākṛtā pūrvaṃ tvayā saubhāgyavattayā 2.008.026c rāmamātā sapatnī te kathaṃ vairaṃ na yātayet
GE09ram_1-7u:2850: 2.008.027a yadā hi rāmaḥ pṛthivīm avāpsyati; dhruvaṃ pranaṣṭo bharato
GE09ram_1-7u:2852: 2.008.027c ato hi saṃcintaya rājyam ātmaje; parasya cādyaiva vivāsa
GE09ram_1-7u:2854: 2.009.001a evam uktā tu kaikeyī krodhena jvalitānanā
GE09ram_1-7u:2855: 2.009.001c dīrgham uṣṇaṃ viniḥśvasya mantharām idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:2856: 2.009.002a adya rāmam itaḥ kṣipraṃ vanaṃ prasthāpayāmy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:2858: 2.009.003a idaṃ tv idānīṃ saṃpaśya kenopāyena manthare
GE09ram_1-7u:2859: 2.009.003c bharataḥ prāpnuyād rājyaṃ na tu rāmaḥ kathaṃ cana 2.009.004a evam uktā tayā devyā mantharā pāpadarśinī
GE09ram_1-7u:2860: 2.009.004c rāmārtham upahiṃsantī kaikeyīm idam abravīt 2.009.005a hantedānīṃ pravakṣyāmi kaikeyi śrūyatāṃ ca me
GE09ram_1-7u:2861: 2.009.005c yathā te bharato rājyaṃ putraḥ prāpsyati kevalam
GE09ram_1-7u:2862: 2.009.006a śrutvaivaṃ vacanaṃ tasyā mantharāyās tu kaikayī
GE09ram_1-7u:2863: 2.009.006c kiṃ cid utthāya śayanāt svāstīrṇād idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:2864: 2.009.007a kathaya tvaṃ mamopāyaṃ kenopāyena manthare 2.009.007c bharataḥ prāpnuyād rājyaṃ na tu rāmaḥ kathaṃ cana 2.009.008a evam uktā tayā devyā mantharā pāpadarśinī
GE09ram_1-7u:2865: 2.009.008c rāmārtham upahiṃsantī kubjā vacanam abravīt 2.009.009a tava devāsure yuddhe saha rājarṣibhiḥ patiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2866: 2.009.009c agacchat tvām upādāya devarājasya sāhyakṛt 2.009.010a diśam āsthāya kaikeyi dakṣiṇāṃ daṇḍakān prati
GE09ram_1-7u:2867: 2.009.010c vaijayantam iti khyātaṃ puraṃ yatra timidhvajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2868: 2.009.011a sa śambara iti khyātaḥ śatamāyo mahāsuraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2869: 2.009.011c dadau śakrasya saṃgrāmaṃ devasaṃghair anirjitaḥ 2.009.012a tasmin mahati saṃgrāme rājā daśarathas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:2870: 2.009.012c apavāhya tvayā devi saṃgrāmān naṣṭacetanaḥ 2.009.013a tatrāpi vikṣataḥ śastraiḥ patis te rakṣitas tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:2871: 2.009.013c tuṣṭena tena dattau te dvau varau śubhadarśane
GE09ram_1-7u:2872: 2.009.014a sa tvayoktaḥ patir devi yadeccheyaṃ tadā varau
GE09ram_1-7u:2873: 2.009.014c gṛhṇīyām iti tat tena tathety uktaṃ mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:2874: 2.009.014e anabhijñā hy ahaṃ devi tvayaiva kathitaṃ purā
GE09ram_1-7u:2875: 2.009.015a tau varau yāca bhartāraṃ bharatasyābhiṣecanam 2.009.015c pravrājanaṃ ca rāmasya tvaṃ varṣāṇi caturdaśa
GE09ram_1-7u:2878: 2.009.016e mā smainaṃ pratyudīkṣethā mā cainam abhibhāṣathāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2879: 2.009.017a dayitā tvaṃ sadā bhartur atra me nāsti saṃśayaḥ 2.009.017c tvatkṛte ca mahārājo viśed api hutāśanam
GE09ram_1-7u:2880: 2.009.018a na tvāṃ krodhayituṃ śakto na kruddhāṃ pratyudīkṣitum
GE09ram_1-7u:2881: 2.009.018c tava priyārthaṃ rājā hi prāṇān api parityajet
GE09ram_1-7u:2882: 2.009.019a na hy atikramituṃ śaktas tava vākyaṃ mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2885: 2.009.020c dadyād daśaratho rājā mā sma teṣu manaḥ kṛthāḥ 2.009.021a yau tau devāsure yuddhe varau daśaratho 'dadāt
GE09ram_1-7u:2886: 2.009.021c tau smāraya mahābhāge so 'rtho mā tvām atikramet
GE09ram_1-7u:2887: 2.009.022a yadā tu te varaṃ dadyāt svayam utthāpya rāghavaḥ 2.009.022c vyavasthāpya mahārājaṃ tvam imaṃ vṛṇuyā varam
GE09ram_1-7u:2888: 2.009.023a rāmaṃ pravrājayāraṇye nava varṣāṇi pañca ca
GE09ram_1-7u:2889: 2.009.023c bharataḥ kriyatāṃ rājā pṛthivyāṃ pārthivarṣabhaḥ 2.009.024a evaṃ pravrājitaś caiva rāmo 'rāmo bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:2890: 2.009.024c bharataś ca hatāmitras tava rājā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:2891: 2.009.025a yena kālena rāmaś ca vanāt pratyāgamiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:2892: 2.009.025c tena kālena putras te kṛtamūlo bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:2893: 2.009.025e saṃgṛhītamanuṣyaś ca suhṛdbhiḥ sārdham ātmavān 2.009.026a prāptakālaṃ tu te manye rājānaṃ vītasādhvasā
GE09ram_1-7u:2895: 2.009.027a anartham artharūpeṇa grāhitā sā tatas tayā
GE09ram_1-7u:2896: 2.009.027c hṛṣṭā pratītā kaikeyī mantharām idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:2897: 2.009.028a kubje tvāṃ nābhijānāmi śreṣṭhāṃ śreṣṭhābhidhāyinīm 2.009.028c pṛthivyām asi kubjānām uttamā buddhiniścaye 2.009.029a tvam eva tu mamārtheṣu nityayuktā hitaiṣiṇī
GE09ram_1-7u:2898: 2.009.029c nāhaṃ samavabudhyeyaṃ kubje rājñaś cikīrṣitam 2.009.030a santi duḥsaṃsthitāḥ kubjā vakrāḥ paramapāpikāḥ 2.009.030c tvaṃ padmam iva vātena saṃnatā priyadarśanā
GE09ram_1-7u:2899: 2.009.031a uras te 'bhiniviṣṭaṃ vai yāvat skandhāt samunnatam
GE09ram_1-7u:2900: 2.009.031c adhastāc codaraṃ śāntaṃ sunābham iva lajjitam
GE09ram_1-7u:2902: 2.009.032c jaṅghe bhṛśam upanyaste pādau cāpy āyatāv ubhau
GE09ram_1-7u:2903: 2.009.033a tvam āyatābhyāṃ sakthibhyāṃ manthare kṣaumavāsini 2.009.033c agrato mama gacchantī rājahaṃsīva rājase 2.009.034a tavedaṃ sthagu yad dīrghaṃ rathaghoṇam ivāyatam
GE09ram_1-7u:2904: 2.009.034c matayaḥ kṣatravidyāś ca māyāś cātra vasanti te
GE09ram_1-7u:2905: 2.009.035a atra te pratimokṣyāmi mālāṃ kubje hiraṇmayīm
GE09ram_1-7u:2906: 2.009.035c abhiṣikte ca bharate rāghave ca vanaṃ gate
GE09ram_1-7u:2907: 2.009.036a jātyena ca suvarṇena suniṣṭaptena sundari 2.009.036c labdhārthā ca pratītā ca lepayiṣyāmi te sthagu
GE09ram_1-7u:2908: 2.009.037a mukhe ca tilakaṃ citraṃ jātarūpamayaṃ śubham
GE09ram_1-7u:2909: 2.009.037c kārayiṣyāmi te kubje śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:2910: 2.009.038a paridhāya śubhe vastre devadeva cariṣyasi 2.009.038c candram āhvayamānena mukhenāpratimānanā
GE09ram_1-7u:2911: 2.009.038e gamiṣyasi gatiṃ mukhyāṃ garvayantī dviṣajjanam 2.009.039a tavāpi kubjāḥ kubjāyāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2912: 2.009.039c pādau paricariṣyanti yathaiva tvaṃ sadā mama
GE09ram_1-7u:2913: 2.009.040a iti praśasyamānā sā kaikeyīm idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:2914: 2.009.040c śayānāṃ śayane śubhre vedyām agniśikhām iva
GE09ram_1-7u:2915: 2.009.041a gatodake setubandho na kalyāṇi vidhīyate 2.009.041c uttiṣṭha kuru kalyāṇaṃ rājānam anudarśaya 2.009.042a tathā protsāhitā devī gatvā mantharayā saha
GE09ram_1-7u:2918: 2.009.043c avamucya varārhāṇi śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca 2.009.044a tato hemopamā tatra kubjā vākyaṃ vaśaṃ gatā
GE09ram_1-7u:2919: 2.009.044c saṃviśya bhūmau kaikeyī mantharām idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:2920: 2.009.045a iha vā māṃ mṛtāṃ kubje nṛpāyāvedayiṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:2921: 2.009.045c vanaṃ tu rāghave prāpte bharataḥ prāpsyati kṣitim
GE09ram_1-7u:2922: 2.009.046a athaitad uktvā vacanaṃ sudāruṇaṃ; nidhāya sarvābharaṇāni bhāminī
GE09ram_1-7u:2923: 2.009.046c asaṃvṛtām āstaraṇena medinīṃ; tadādhiśiśye patiteva kinnarī
GE09ram_1-7u:2925: 2.009.047c narendrapatnī vimanā babhūva sā; tamovṛtā dyaur iva magnatārakā
GE09ram_1-7u:2927: 2.010.001c priyārhāṃ priyam ākhyātuṃ viveśāntaḥpuraṃ vaśī 2.010.002a tāṃ tatra patitāṃ bhūmau śayānām atathocitām
GE09ram_1-7u:2929: 2.010.003a sa vṛddhas taruṇīṃ bhāryāṃ prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasīm
GE09ram_1-7u:2931: 2.010.004a kareṇum iva digdhena viddhāṃ mṛgayuṇā vane
GE09ram_1-7u:2932: 2.010.004c mahāgaja ivāraṇye snehāt parimamarśa tām 2.010.005a parimṛśya ca pāṇibhyām abhisaṃtrastacetanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2933: 2.010.005c kāmī kamalapatrākṣīm uvāca vanitām idam 2.010.006a na te 'ham abhijānāmi krodham ātmani saṃśritam
GE09ram_1-7u:2934: 2.010.006c devi kenābhiyuktāsi kena vāsi vimānitā 2.010.007a yad idaṃ mama duḥkhāya śeṣe kalyāṇi pāṃsuṣu
GE09ram_1-7u:2935: 2.010.007c bhūmau śeṣe kimarthaṃ tvaṃ mayi kalyāṇa cetasi
GE09ram_1-7u:2937: 2.010.008a santi me kuśalā vaidyā abhituṣṭāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2938: 2.010.008c sukhitāṃ tvāṃ kariṣyanti vyādhim ācakṣva bhāmini
GE09ram_1-7u:2939: 2.010.009a kasya vā te priyaṃ kāryaṃ kena vā vipriyaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:2940: 2.010.009c kaḥ priyaṃ labhatām adya ko vā sumahad apriyam 2.010.010a avadhyo vadhyatāṃ ko vā vadhyaḥ ko vā vimucyatām 2.010.010c daridraḥ ko bhavatv āḍhyo dravyavān vāpy akiṃcanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2941: 2.010.011a ahaṃ caiva madīyāś ca sarve tava vaśānugāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2942: 2.010.011c na te kaṃ cid abhiprāyaṃ vyāhantum aham utsahe 2.010.012a ātmano jīvitenāpi brūhi yan manasecchasi 2.010.012c yāvad āvartate cakraṃ tāvatī me vasuṃdharā
GE09ram_1-7u:2943: 2.010.013a tathoktā sā samāśvastā vaktukāmā tad apriyam
GE09ram_1-7u:2945: 2.010.014a nāsmi viprakṛtā deva kena cin na vimānitā
GE09ram_1-7u:2946: 2.010.014c abhiprāyas tu me kaś cit tam icchāmi tvayā kṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:2947: 2.010.015a pratijñāṃ pratijānīṣva yadi tvaṃ kartum icchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:2948: 2.010.015c atha tad vyāhariṣyāmi yad abhiprārthitaṃ mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:2949: 2.010.016a evam uktas tayā rājā priyayā strīvaśaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2950: 2.010.016c tām uvāca mahātejāḥ kaikeyīm īṣadutsmitaḥ 2.010.017a avalipte na jānāsi tvattaḥ priyataro mama
GE09ram_1-7u:2951: 2.010.017c manujo manujavyāghrād rāmād anyo na vidyate
GE09ram_1-7u:2952: 2.010.018a bhadre hṛdayam apy etad anumṛśśyoddharasva me
GE09ram_1-7u:2953: 2.010.018c etat samīkṣya kaikeyi brūhi yat sādhu manyase
GE09ram_1-7u:2954: 2.010.019a balam ātmani paśyantī na māṃ śaṅkitum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:2955: 2.010.019c kariṣyāmi tava prītiṃ sukṛtenāpi te śape
GE09ram_1-7u:2956: 2.010.020a tena vākyena saṃhṛṣṭā tam abhiprāyam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2958: 2.010.021a yathākrameṇa śapasi varaṃ mama dadāsi ca
GE09ram_1-7u:2959: 2.010.021c tac chṛṇvantu trayastriṃśad devāḥ sendrapurogamāḥ 2.010.022a candrādityau nabhaś caiva grahā rātryahanī diśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2960: 2.010.022c jagac ca pṛthivī caiva sagandharvā sarākṣasā
GE09ram_1-7u:2962: 2.010.023c yāni cānyāni bhūtāni jānīyur bhāṣitaṃ tava
GE09ram_1-7u:2964: 2.010.024c varaṃ mama dadāty eṣa tan me śṛṇvantu devatāḥ 2.010.025a iti devī maheṣvāsaṃ parigṛhyābhiśasya ca 2.010.025c tataḥ param uvācedaṃ varadaṃ kāmamohitam 2.010.026a varau yau me tvayā deva tadā dattau mahīpate 2.010.026c tau tāvad aham adyaiva vakṣyāmi śṛṇu me vacaḥ 2.010.027a abhiṣeka samārambho rāghavasyopakalpitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2966: 2.010.028a nava pañca ca varṣāṇi daṇḍakāraṇyam āśritaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2968: 2.010.029a bharato bhajatām adya yauvarājyam akaṇṭakam 2.010.029c adya caiva hi paśyeyaṃ prayāntaṃ rāghavaṃ vane
GE09ram_1-7u:2969: 2.010.030a tataḥ śrutvā mahārāja kaikeyyā dāruṇaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2970: 2.010.030c vyathito vilavaś caiva vyāghrīṃ dṛṣṭvā yathā mṛgaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2971: 2.010.031a asaṃvṛtāyām āsīno jagatyāṃ dīrgham ucchvasan 2.010.031c aho dhig iti sāmarṣo vācam uktvā narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2973: 2.010.032a cireṇa tu nṛpaḥ saṃjñāṃ pratilabhya suduḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2974: 2.010.032c kaikeyīm abravīt kruddhaḥ pradahann iva cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_1-7u:2976: 2.010.033c kiṃ kṛtaṃ tava rāmeṇa pāpe pāpaṃ mayāpi vā 2.010.034a sadā te jananī tulyāṃ vṛttiṃ vahati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:2977: 2.010.034c tasyaiva tvam anarthāya kiṃnimittam ihodyatā 2.010.035a tvaṃ mayātmavināśāya bhavanaṃ svaṃ praveśitā 2.010.035c avijñānān nṛpasutā vyālī tīkṣṇaviṣā yathā 2.010.036a jīvaloko yadā sarvo rāmasyeha guṇastavam 2.010.036c aparādhaṃ kam uddiśya tyakṣyāmīṣṭam ahaṃ sutam
GE09ram_1-7u:2978: 2.010.037a kausalyāṃ vā sumitrāṃ vā tyajeyam api vā śriyam 2.010.037c jīvitaṃ vātmano rāmaṃ na tv eva pitṛvatsalam
GE09ram_1-7u:2979: 2.010.038a parā bhavati me prītir dṛṣṭvā tanayam agrajam
GE09ram_1-7u:2980: 2.010.038c apaśyatas tu me rāmaṃ naṣṭā bhavati cetanā
GE09ram_1-7u:2981: 2.010.039a tiṣṭhel loko vinā sūryaṃ sasyaṃ vā salilaṃ vinā 2.010.039c na tu rāmaṃ vinā dehe tiṣṭhet tu mama jīvitam
GE09ram_1-7u:2982: 2.010.040a tad alaṃ tyajyatām eṣa niścayaḥ pāpaniścaye
GE09ram_1-7u:2983: 2.010.040c api te caraṇau mūrdhnā spṛśāmy eṣa prasīda me 2.010.041a sa bhūmipālo vilapann anāthavat; striyā gṛhīto dṛhaye
GE09ram_1-7u:2985: 2.010.041c papāta devyāś caraṇau prasāritāv; ubhāv asaṃspṛśya yathāturas
GE09ram_1-7u:2988: 2.011.001c yayātim iva puṇyānte devalokāt paricyutam 2.011.002a anartharūpā siddhārthā abhītā bhayadarśinī
GE09ram_1-7u:2989: 2.011.002c punar ākārayām āsa tam eva varam aṅganā
GE09ram_1-7u:2990: 2.011.003a tvaṃ katthase mahārāja satyavādī dṛḍhavrataḥ 2.011.003c mama cemaṃ varaṃ kasmād vidhārayitum icchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:2991: 2.011.004a evam uktas tu kaikeyyā rājā daśarathas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:2992: 2.011.004c pratyuvāca tataḥ kruddho muhūrtaṃ vihvalann iva
GE09ram_1-7u:2993: 2.011.005a mṛte mayi gate rāme vanaṃ manujapuṃgave
GE09ram_1-7u:2994: 2.011.005c hantānārye mamāmitre rāmaḥ pravrājito vanam 2.011.006a yadi satyaṃ bravīmy etat tad asatyaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:2995: 2.011.006c akīrtir atulā loke dhruvaṃ paribhavaś ca me
GE09ram_1-7u:2997: 2.011.007c astam abhyagamat sūryo rajanī cābhyavartata 2.011.008a sa triyāmā tathārtasya
GE09ram_1-7u:2998: 2.011.008c rājño vilapamānasya na vyabhāsata śarvarī 2.011.009a tathaivoṣṇaṃ viniḥśvasya vṛddho daśaratho nṛpaḥ 2.011.009c vilalāpārtavad duḥkhaṃ gaganāsaktalocanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3000: 2.011.010c atha vā gamyatāṃ śīghraṃ nāham icchāmi nirghṛṇām
GE09ram_1-7u:3001: 2.011.010e nṛśaṃsāṃ kaikeyīṃ draṣṭuṃ yatkṛte vyasanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:3002: 2.011.011a evam uktvā tato rājā kaikeyīṃ saṃyatāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3003: 2.011.011c prasādayām āsa punaḥ kaikeyīṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:3005: 2.011.012c prasādaḥ kriyatāṃ devi bhadre rājño viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3006: 2.011.013a śūnyena khalu suśroṇi mayedaṃ samudāhṛtam 2.011.013c kuru sādhu prasādaṃ me bāle sahṛdayā hy asi 2.011.014a viśuddhabhāvasya hi duṣṭabhāvā; tāmrekṣaṇasyāśrukalasya rājñaḥ 2.011.014c śrutvā vicitraṃ karuṇaṃ vilāpaṃ; bhartur nṛśaṃsā na cakāra vākyam 2.011.015a tataḥ sa rājā punar eva mūrchitaḥ; priyām atuṣṭāṃ pratikūlabhāṣiṇīm
GE09ram_1-7u:3007: 2.011.015c samīkṣya putrasya vivāsanaṃ prati; kṣitau visaṃjño nipapāta
GE09ram_1-7u:3009: 2.012.001a putraśokārditaṃ pāpā visaṃjñaṃ patitaṃ bhuvi 2.012.001c viveṣṭamānam udīkṣya saikṣvākam idam abravīt 2.012.002a pāpaṃ kṛtveva kim idaṃ mama saṃśrutya saṃśravam
GE09ram_1-7u:3010: 2.012.002c śeṣe kṣititale sannaḥ sthityāṃ sthātuṃ tvam arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:3011: 2.012.003a āhuḥ satyaṃ hi paramaṃ dharmaṃ dharmavido janāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3012: 2.012.003c satyam āśritya hi mayā tvaṃ ca dharmaṃ pracoditaḥ 2.012.004a saṃśrutya śaibyaḥ śyenāya svāṃ tanuṃ jagatīpatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3013: 2.012.004c pradāya pakṣiṇo rājañ jagāma gatim uttamām
GE09ram_1-7u:3014: 2.012.005a tatha hy alarkas tejasvī brāhmaṇe vedapārage
GE09ram_1-7u:3015: 2.012.005c yācamāne svake netre uddhṛtyāvimanā dadau 2.012.006a saritāṃ tu patiḥ svalpāṃ maryādāṃ satyam anvitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3016: 2.012.006c satyānurodhāt samaye velāṃ khāṃ nātivartate 2.012.007a samayaṃ ca mamāryemaṃ yadi tvaṃ na kariṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:3017: 2.012.007c agratas te parityaktā parityakṣyāmi jīvitam 2.012.008a evaṃ pracodito rājā kaikeyyā nirviśaṅkayā 2.012.008c nāśakat pāśam unmoktuṃ balir indrakṛtaṃ yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:3019: 2.012.009c sa dhuryo vai parispandan yugacakrāntaraṃ yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:3020: 2.012.010a vihvalābhyāṃ ca netrābhyām apaśyann iva bhūmipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3021: 2.012.010c kṛcchrād dhairyeṇa saṃstabhya kaikeyīm idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:3022: 2.012.011a yas te mantrakṛtaḥ pāṇir agnau pāpe mayā dhṛtaḥ 2.012.011c taṃ tyajāmi svajaṃ caiva tava putraṃ saha tvayā 2.012.012a tataḥ pāpasamācārā kaikeyī pārthivaṃ punaḥ 2.012.012c uvāca paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ vākyajñā roṣamūrchitā 2.012.013a kim idaṃ bhāṣase rājan vākyaṃ gararujopamam
GE09ram_1-7u:3023: 2.012.013c ānāyayitum akliṣṭaṃ putraṃ rāmam ihārhasi 2.012.014a sthāpya rājye mama sutaṃ kṛtvā rāmaṃ vanecaram
GE09ram_1-7u:3024: 2.012.014c niḥsapatnāṃ ca māṃ kṛtvā kṛtakṛtyo bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:3025: 2.012.015a sa nunna iva tīkṣeṇa pratodena hayottamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3027: 2.012.016a dharmabandhena baddho 'smi naṣṭā ca mama cetanā
GE09ram_1-7u:3028: 2.012.016c jyeṣṭhaṃ putraṃ priyaṃ rāmaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi dhārmikam
GE09ram_1-7u:3029: 2.012.017a iti rājño vacaḥ śrutvā kaikeyī tadanantaram
GE09ram_1-7u:3030: 2.012.017c svayam evābravīt sūtaṃ gaccha tvaṃ rāmam ānaya
GE09ram_1-7u:3031: 2.012.018a tataḥ sa rājā taṃ sūtaṃ sannaharṣaḥ sutaṃ prati 2.012.018c śokāraktekṣaṇaḥ śrīmān udvīkṣyovāca dhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3032: 2.012.019a sumantraḥ karuṇaṃ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā dīnaṃ ca pārthivam
GE09ram_1-7u:3033: 2.012.019c pragṛhītāñjaliḥ kiṃ cit tasmād deśād apākraman
GE09ram_1-7u:3034: 2.012.020a yadā vaktuṃ svayaṃ dainyān na śaśāka mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3035: 2.012.020c tadā sumantraṃ mantrajñā kaikeyī pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:3036: 2.012.021a sumantra rāmaṃ drakṣyāmi śīghram ānaya sundaram
GE09ram_1-7u:3037: 2.012.021c sa manyamānaḥ kalyāṇaṃ hṛdayena nananda ca
GE09ram_1-7u:3038: 2.012.022a sumantraś cintayām āsa tvaritaṃ coditas tayā
GE09ram_1-7u:3039: 2.012.022c vyaktaṃ rāmo 'bhiṣekārtham ihāyāsyati dharmavit 2.012.023a iti sūto matiṃ kṛtvā harṣeṇa mahatā punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3041: 2.012.024a tataḥ purastāt sahasā vinirgato; mahīpatīn dvāragatān vilokayan
GE09ram_1-7u:3042: 2.012.024c dadarśa paurān vividhān mahādhanān; upasthitān dvāram upetya
GE09ram_1-7u:3044: 2.013.001a te tu tāṃ rajanīm uṣya brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3046: 2.013.002a amātyā balamukhyāś ca mukhyā ye nigamasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:3050: 2.013.004a kāñcanā jalakumbhāś ca bhadrapīṭhaṃ svalaṃkṛtam 2.013.004c rāmaś ca samyagāstīrṇo bhāsvarā vyāghracarmaṇā 2.013.005a gaṅgāyamunayoḥ puṇyāt saṃgamād āhṛtaṃ jalam 2.013.005c yāś cānyāḥ saritaḥ puṇyā hradāḥ kūpāḥ sarāṃsi ca 2.013.006a prāgvāhāś cordhvavāhāś ca tiryagvāhāḥ samāhitāḥ 2.013.006c tābhyaś caivāhṛtaṃ toyaṃ samudrebhyaś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3051: 2.013.007a kṣaudraṃ dadhighṛtaṃ lājā dharbhāḥ sumanasaḥ payaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3052: 2.013.007c salājāḥ kṣīribhiś channā ghaṭāḥ kāñcanarājatāḥ 2.013.007e padmotpalayutā bhānti pūrṇāḥ paramavāriṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:3054: 2.013.008c sajjaṃ tiṣṭhati rāmasya vālavyajanam uttamam 2.013.009a candramaṇḍalasaṃkāśam ātapatraṃ ca pāṇḍuram
GE09ram_1-7u:3056: 2.013.010a pāṇḍuraś ca vṛṣaḥ sajjaḥ pāṇḍurāśvaś ca susthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3057: 2.013.010c prasrutaś ca gajaḥ śrīmān aupavāhyaḥ pratīkṣate
GE09ram_1-7u:3058: 2.013.011a aṣṭau kanyāś ca maṅgalyāḥ sarvābharaṇabhūṣitāḥ 2.013.011c vāditrāṇi ca sarvāṇi bandinaś ca tathāpare
GE09ram_1-7u:3061: 2.013.013a te rājavacanāt tatra samavetā mahīpatim 2.013.013c apaśyanto 'bruvan ko nu rājño naḥ prativedayet 2.013.014a na paśyāmaś ca rājānam uditaś ca divākaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3062: 2.013.014c yauvarājyābhiṣekaś ca sajjo rāmasya dhīmataḥ 2.013.015a iti teṣu bruvāṇeṣu sārvabhaumān mahīpatīn 2.013.015c abravīt tān idaṃ sarvān sumantro rājasatkṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3063: 2.013.016a ayaṃ pṛcchāmi vacanāt sukham āyuṣmatām aham
GE09ram_1-7u:3067: 2.013.018a gatā bhagavatī rātrirahaḥ śivam upasthitam 2.013.018c budhyasva nṛpaśārdūla kuru kāryam anantaram 2.013.019a brāhmaṇā balamukhyāś ca naigamāś cāgatā nṛpa
GE09ram_1-7u:3069: 2.013.020a stuvantaṃ taṃ tadā sūtaṃ sumantraṃ mantrakovidam
GE09ram_1-7u:3070: 2.013.020c pratibudhya tato rājā idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:3071: 2.013.021a na caiva saṃprasuto 'ham ānayed āśu rāghavam
GE09ram_1-7u:3072: 2.013.021c iti rājā daśarathaḥ sūtaṃ tatrānvaśāt punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3073: 2.013.022a sa rājavacanaṃ śrutvā śirasā pratipūjya tam
GE09ram_1-7u:3074: 2.013.022c nirjagāma nṛpāvāsān manyamānaḥ priyaṃ mahat 2.013.023a prapanno rājamārgaṃ ca patākā dhvajaśobhitam 2.013.023c sa sūtas tatra śuśrāva rāmādhikaraṇāḥ kathāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3077: 2.013.025a mahākapāṭapihitaṃ vitardiśataśobhitam 2.013.025c kāñcanapratimaikāgraṃ maṇividrumatoraṇam 2.013.026a śāradābhraghanaprakhyaṃ dīptaṃ meruguhopamam
GE09ram_1-7u:3079: 2.013.027a sa vājiyuktena rathena sārathir; narākulaṃ rājakulaṃ vilokayan
GE09ram_1-7u:3080: 2.013.027c tataḥ samāsādya mahādhanaṃ mahat; prahṛṣṭaromā sa babhūva
GE09ram_1-7u:3083: 2.013.028c avāryamāṇaḥ praviveśa sārathiḥ; prabhūtaratnaṃ makaro yathārṇavam
GE09ram_1-7u:3084: 2.014.001a sa tad antaḥpuradvāraṃ samatītya janākulam 2.014.001c praviviktāṃ tataḥ kakṣyām āsasāda purāṇavit 2.014.002a prāsakārmukabibhradbhir yuvabhir mṛṣṭakuṇḍalaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3086: 2.014.003a tatra kāṣāyiṇo vṛddhān vetrapāṇīn svalaṃkṛtān 2.014.003c dadarśa viṣṭhitān dvāri stryadhyakṣān susamāhitān 2.014.004a te samīkṣya samāyāntaṃ rāmapriyacikīrṣavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3088: 2.014.005a prativeditam ājñāya sūtam abhyantaraṃ pituḥ 2.014.005c tatraivānāyayām āsa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3090: 2.014.006c dādarśa sūtaḥ paryaṅke sauvaṇo sottaracchade 2.014.007a varāharudhirābheṇa śucinā ca sugandhinā
GE09ram_1-7u:3093: 2.014.008c upetaṃ sītayā bhūyaś citrayā śaśinaṃ yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:3094: 2.014.009a taṃ tapantam ivādityam upapannaṃ svatejasā 2.014.009c vavande varadaṃ bandī niyamajño vinītavat 2.014.010a prāñjalis tu sukhaṃ pṛṣṭvā vihāraśayanāsane 2.014.010c rājaputram uvācedaṃ sumantro rājasatkṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3095: 2.014.011a kausalyā suprabhā deva pitā tvaṃ draṣṭum icchati
GE09ram_1-7u:3096: 2.014.011c mahiṣyā saha kaikeyyā gamyatāṃ tatra māciram
GE09ram_1-7u:3097: 2.014.012a evam uktas tu saṃhṛṣṭo narasiṃho mahādyutiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3098: 2.014.012c tataḥ saṃmānayām āsa sītām idam uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:3099: 2.014.013a devi devaś ca devī ca samāgamya madantare
GE09ram_1-7u:3100: 2.014.013c mantreyete dhruvaṃ kiṃ cid abhiṣecanasaṃhitam 2.014.014a lakṣayitvā hy abhiprāyaṃ priyakāmā sudakṣiṇā 2.014.014c saṃcodayati rājānaṃ madarthaṃ madirekṣaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:3101: 2.014.015a yādṛśī pariṣat tatra tādṛśo dūta āgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3103: 2.014.016a hanta śīghram ito gatvā drakṣyāmi ca mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3104: 2.014.016c saha tvaṃ parivāreṇa sukham āssva ramasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:3107: 2.014.018a sa sarvān arthino dṛṣṭvā sametya pratinandya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:3109: 2.014.019a muṣṇantam iva cakṣūṃṣi prabhayā hemavarcasaṃ 2.014.019c kareṇuśiśukalpaiś ca yuktaṃ paramavājibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3110: 2.014.020a hariyuktaṃ sahasrākṣo ratham indra ivāśugam 2.014.020c prayayau tūrṇam āsthāya rāghavo jvalitaḥ śriyā
GE09ram_1-7u:3111: 2.014.021a sa parjanya ivākāśe svanavān abhinādayan 2.014.021c niketān niryayau śrīmān mahābhrād iva candramāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3113: 2.014.022c jugopa bhrātaraṃ bhrātā ratham āsthāya pṛṣṭhataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3116: 2.014.024a sa rāghavas tatra kathāpralāpaṃ; śuśrāva lokasya samāgatasya
GE09ram_1-7u:3117: 2.014.024c ātmādhikārā vividhāś ca vācaḥ; prahṛṣṭarūpasya pure janasya
GE09ram_1-7u:3118: 2.014.025a eṣa śriyaṃ gacchati rāghavo 'dya; rājaprasādād vipulāṃ gamiṣyan
GE09ram_1-7u:3119: 2.014.025c ete vayaṃ sarvasamṛddhakāmā; yeṣām ayaṃ no bhavitā praśāstā 2.014.025e lābho janasyāsya yad eṣa sarvaṃ; prapatsyate rāṣṭram idaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:3121: 2.014.026a sa ghoṣavadbhiś ca hayaiḥ sanāgaiḥ; puraḥsaraiḥ svastikasūtamāgadhaiḥ 2.014.026c mahīyamānaḥ pravaraiś ca vādakair; abhiṣṭuto vaiśravaṇo yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:3123: 2.014.027a kareṇumātaṅgarathāśvasaṃkulaṃ; mahājanaughaiḥ paripūrṇacatvaram 2.014.027c prabhūtaratnaṃ bahupaṇyasaṃcayaṃ; dadarśa rāmo ruciraṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:3125: 2.015.001a sa rāmo ratham āsthāya saṃprahṛṣṭasuhṛjjanaḥ 2.015.001c apaśyan nagaraṃ śrīmān
GE09ram_1-7u:3126: 2.015.002a sa gṛhair abhrasaṃkāśaiḥ pāṇḍurair upaśobhitam 2.015.002c rājamārgaṃ yayau rāmo
GE09ram_1-7u:3127: 2.015.003a śobhamānam asaṃbādhaṃ taṃ rājapatham uttamam 2.015.003c saṃvṛtaṃ vividhaiḥ paṇyair bhakṣyair uccāvacair api
GE09ram_1-7u:3128: 2.015.004a āśīrvādān bahūñ śṛṇvan suhṛdbhiḥ samudīritān 2.015.004c yathārhaṃ cāpi saṃpūjya sarvān eva narān yayau
GE09ram_1-7u:3131: 2.015.006a yathā sma lālitāḥ pitrā yathā pūrvaiḥ pitāmahaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3132: 2.015.006c tataḥ sukhataraṃ sarve rāme vatsyāma rājani
GE09ram_1-7u:3133: 2.015.007a alam adya hi bhuktena paramārthair alaṃ ca naḥ 2.015.007c yathā paśyāma niryāntaṃ rāmaṃ rājye pratiṣṭhitam
GE09ram_1-7u:3134: 2.015.008a ato hi na priyataraṃ nānyat kiṃ cid bhaviṣyati 2.015.008c yathābhiṣeko rāmasya
GE09ram_1-7u:3135: 2.015.009a etāś cānyāś ca suhṛdām udāsīnaḥ kathāḥ śubhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3136: 2.015.009c ātmasaṃpūjanīḥ śṛṇvan yayau rāmo mahāpatham 2.015.010a na hi tasmān manaḥ kaś cic cakṣuṣī vā narottamāt
GE09ram_1-7u:3138: 2.015.011a sarveṣāṃ sa hi dharmātmā varṇānāṃ kurute dayām
GE09ram_1-7u:3139: 2.015.011c caturṇāṃ hi vayaḥsthānāṃ tena te tam anuvratāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3141: 2.015.012c rājaputraḥ pitur veśma praviveśa śriyā jvalan
GE09ram_1-7u:3142: 2.015.013a sa sarvāḥ samatikramya kakṣyā daśarathātmajaḥ 2.015.013c saṃnivartya janaṃ sarvaṃ śuddhāntaḥpuram abhyagāt 2.015.014a tataḥ praviṣṭe pitur antikaṃ tadā; janaḥ sa sarvo mudito nṛpātmaje 2.015.014c pratīkṣate tasya punaḥ sma nirgamaṃ; yathodayaṃ candramasaḥ saritpatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3143: 2.016.001a sa dadarśāsane rāmo niṣaṇṇaṃ pitaraṃ śubhe
GE09ram_1-7u:3145: 2.016.002a sa pituś caraṇau pūrvam abhivādya vinītavat
GE09ram_1-7u:3146: 2.016.002c tato vavande caraṇau kaikeyyāḥ susamāhitaḥ 2.016.003a rāmety uktvā ca vacanaṃ vāṣpaparyākulekṣaṇaḥ 2.016.003c śaśāka nṛpatir dīno nekṣituṃ nābhibhāṣitum 2.016.004a tad apūrvaṃ narapater dṛṣṭvā rūpaṃ bhayāvaham
GE09ram_1-7u:3147: 2.016.004c rāmo 'pi bhayam āpannaḥ padā spṛṣṭveva pannagam 2.016.005a indriyair aprahṛṣṭais taṃ śokasaṃtāpakarśitam
GE09ram_1-7u:3149: 2.016.006a ūrmi mālinam akṣobhyaṃ kṣubhyantam iva sāgaram
GE09ram_1-7u:3150: 2.016.006c upaplutam ivādityam uktānṛtam ṛṣiṃ yathā 2.016.007a acintyakalpaṃ hi pitus taṃ śokam upadhārayan
GE09ram_1-7u:3151: 2.016.007c babhūva saṃrabdhataraḥ samudra iva parvaṇi 2.016.008a cintayām āsa ca tadā rāmaḥ pitṛhite rataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3152: 2.016.008c kiṃsvid adyaiva nṛpatir na māṃ pratyabhinandati
GE09ram_1-7u:3153: 2.016.009a anyadā māṃ pitā dṛṣṭvā kupito 'pi prasīdati
GE09ram_1-7u:3154: 2.016.009c tasya mām adya saṃprekṣya kimāyāsaḥ pravartate
GE09ram_1-7u:3155: 2.016.010a sa dīna iva śokārto viṣaṇṇavadanadyutiḥ 2.016.010c kaikeyīm abhivādyaiva rāmo vacanam abravīt 2.016.011a kaccin mayā nāparādham ajñānād yena me pitā
GE09ram_1-7u:3156: 2.016.011c kupitas tan mamācakṣva tvaṃ caivainaṃ prasādaya
GE09ram_1-7u:3157: 2.016.012a vivarṇavadano dīno na hi mām abhibhāṣate
GE09ram_1-7u:3158: 2.016.012c śārīro mānaso vāpi kaccid enaṃ na bādhate
GE09ram_1-7u:3159: 2.016.012e saṃtāpo vābhitāpo vā durlabhaṃ hi sadā sukham
GE09ram_1-7u:3160: 2.016.013a kaccin na kiṃ cid bharate kumāre priyadarśane
GE09ram_1-7u:3161: 2.016.013c śatrughne vā mahāsattve mātṝṇāṃ vā mamāśubham
GE09ram_1-7u:3162: 2.016.014a atoṣayan mahārājam akurvan vā pitur vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3163: 2.016.014c muhūrtam api neccheyaṃ jīvituṃ kupite nṛpe
GE09ram_1-7u:3164: 2.016.015a yatomūlaṃ naraḥ paśyet prādurbhāvam ihātmanaḥ 2.016.015c kathaṃ tasmin na varteta pratyakṣe sati daivate
GE09ram_1-7u:3165: 2.016.016a kaccit te paruṣaṃ kiṃ cid abhimānāt pitā mama 2.016.016c ukto bhavatyā kopena yatrāsya lulitaṃ manaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3166: 2.016.017a etad ācakṣva me devi tattvena paripṛcchataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3167: 2.016.017c kiṃnimittam apūrvo 'yaṃ vikāro manujādhipe 2.016.018a ahaṃ hi vacanād rājñaḥ pateyam api pāvake
GE09ram_1-7u:3168: 2.016.018c bhakṣayeyaṃ viṣaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ majjeyam api cārṇave
GE09ram_1-7u:3169: 2.016.018e niyukto guruṇā pitrā nṛpeṇa ca hitena ca
GE09ram_1-7u:3170: 2.016.019a tad brūhi vacanaṃ devi rājño yad abhikāṅkṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:3171: 2.016.019c kariṣye pratijāne ca rāmo dvir nābhibhāṣate
GE09ram_1-7u:3173: 2.016.020c uvāca rāmaṃ kaikeyī vacanaṃ bhṛśadāruṇam 2.016.021a purā devāsure yuddhe pitrā te mama rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:3174: 2.016.021c rakṣitena varau dattau saśalyena mahāraṇe 2.016.022a tatra me yācito rājā bharatasyābhiṣecanam 2.016.022c gamanaṃ daṇḍakāraṇye tava cādyaiva rāghava 2.016.023a yadi satyapratijñaṃ tvaṃ pitaraṃ kartum icchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:3175: 2.016.023c ātmānaṃ ca narareṣṭha mama vākyam idaṃ śṛṇu
GE09ram_1-7u:3176: 2.016.024a sa nideśe pitus tiṣṭha yathā tena pratiśrutam
GE09ram_1-7u:3177: 2.016.024c tvayāraṇyaṃ praveṣṭavyaṃ nava varṣāṇi pañca ca
GE09ram_1-7u:3178: 2.016.025a sapta sapta ca varṣāṇi daṇḍakāraṇyam āśritaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3179: 2.016.025c abhiṣekam imaṃ tyaktvā jaṭācīradharo vasa 2.016.026a bharataḥ kosalapure praśāstu vasudhām imām 2.016.026c nānāratnasamākīrṇaṃ savājirathakuñjarām 2.016.027a tad apriyam amitraghno vacanaṃ maraṇopamam 2.016.027c śrutvā na vivyathe rāmaḥ kaikeyīṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:3180: 2.016.028a evam astu gamiṣyāmi vanaṃ vastum ahaṃ tv ataḥ 2.016.028c jaṭācīradharo rājñaḥ pratijñām anupālayan
GE09ram_1-7u:3181: 2.016.029a idaṃ tu jñātum icchāmi kimarthaṃ māṃ mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3183: 2.016.030a manyur na ca tvayā kāryo devi brūhi tavāgrataḥ 2.016.030c yāsyāmi bhava suprītā vanaṃ cīrajaṭādharaḥ 2.016.031a hitena guruṇā pitrā kṛtajñena nṛpeṇa ca
GE09ram_1-7u:3184: 2.016.031c niyujyamāno viśrabdhaṃ kiṃ na kuryād ahaṃ priyam
GE09ram_1-7u:3185: 2.016.032a alīkaṃ mānasaṃ tv ekaṃ hṛdayaṃ dahatīva me
GE09ram_1-7u:3186: 2.016.032c svayaṃ yan nāha māṃ rājā bharatasyābhiṣecanam
GE09ram_1-7u:3187: 2.016.033a ahaṃ hi sītāṃ rājyaṃ ca prāṇān iṣṭān dhanāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:3188: 2.016.033c hṛṣṭo bhrātre svayaṃ dadyāṃ bharatāyāpracoditaḥ 2.016.034a kiṃ punar manujendreṇa svayaṃ pitrā pracoditaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3189: 2.016.034c tava ca priyakāmārthaṃ pratijñām anupālayan 2.016.035a tad āśvāsaya hīmaṃ tvaṃ kiṃ nv idaṃ yan mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3191: 2.016.036a gacchantu caivānayituṃ dūtāḥ śīghrajavair hayaiḥ 2.016.036c bharataṃ mātulakulād adyaiva nṛpaśāsanāt
GE09ram_1-7u:3193: 2.016.037c avicārya pitur vākyaṃ samāvastuṃ caturdaśa 2.016.038a sā hṛṣṭā tasya tadvākyaṃ śrutvā rāmasya kaikayī
GE09ram_1-7u:3194: 2.016.038c prasthānaṃ śraddadhānā hi tvarayām āsa rāghavam
GE09ram_1-7u:3195: 2.016.039a evaṃ bhavatu yāsyanti dūtāḥ śīghrajavair hayaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3197: 2.016.040a tava tv ahaṃ kṣamaṃ manye notsukasya vilambanam
GE09ram_1-7u:3198: 2.016.040c rāma tasmād itaḥ śīghraṃ vanaṃ tvaṃ gantum arhasi 2.016.041a vrīḍānvitaḥ svayaṃ yac ca nṛpas tvāṃ nābhibhāṣate
GE09ram_1-7u:3199: 2.016.041c naitat kiṃ cin naraśreṣṭha manyur eṣo 'panīyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:3200: 2.016.042a yāvat tvaṃ na vanaṃ yātaḥ purād asmād abhitvaran 2.016.042c pitā tāvan na te rāma snāsyate bhokṣyate 'pi vā
GE09ram_1-7u:3201: 2.016.043a dhik kaṣṭam iti niḥśvasya rājā śokapariplutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3202: 2.016.043c mūrchito nyapatat tasmin paryaṅke hemabhūṣite 2.016.044a rāmo 'py utthāpya rājānaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:3203: 2.016.044c kaśayevāhato vājī vanaṃ gantuṃ kṛtatvaraḥ 2.016.045a tad apriyam anāryāyā vacanaṃ dāruṇodaram 2.016.045c śrutvā gatavyatho rāmaḥ kaikeyīṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:3204: 2.016.046a nāham arthaparo devi lokam āvastum utsahe
GE09ram_1-7u:3205: 2.016.046c viddhi mām ṛṣibhis tulyaṃ kevalaṃ dharmam āsthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:3206: 2.016.047a yad atrabhavataḥ kiṃ cic chakyaṃ kartuṃ priyaṃ mayā 2.016.047c prāṇān api parityajya sarvathā kṛtam eva tat
GE09ram_1-7u:3207: 2.016.048a na hy ato dharmacaraṇaṃ kiṃ cid asti mahattaram 2.016.048c yathā pitari śuśrūṣā tasya vā vacanakriyā
GE09ram_1-7u:3209: 2.016.049c vane vatsyāmi vijane varṣāṇīha caturdaśa 2.016.050a na nūnaṃ mayi kaikeyi kiṃ cid āśaṃsase guṇam 2.016.050c yad rājānam avocas tvaṃ mameśvaratarā satī
GE09ram_1-7u:3210: 2.016.051a yāvan mātaram āpṛcche sītāṃ cānunayāmy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:3212: 2.016.052a bharataḥ pālayed rājyaṃ śuśrūṣec ca pitur yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:3213: 2.016.052c tahā bhavatyā kartavyaṃ sa hi dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3214: 2.016.053a sa rāmasya vacaḥ śrutvā bhṛśaṃ duḥkhahataḥ pitā
GE09ram_1-7u:3215: 2.016.053c śokād aśaknuvan bāṣpaṃ praruroda mahāsvanam 2.016.054a vanditvā caraṇau rāmo visaṃjñasya pitus tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:3216: 2.016.054c kaikeyyāś cāpy anāryāyā niṣpapāta mahādyutiḥ 2.016.055a sa rāmaḥ pitaraṃ kṛtvā kaikeyīṃ ca pradakṣiṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:3217: 2.016.055c niṣkramyāntaḥpurāt tasmāt svaṃ dadarśa suhṛjjanam 2.016.056a taṃ bāṣpaparipūrṇākṣaḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nujagāma ha
GE09ram_1-7u:3219: 2.016.057a ābhiṣecanikaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ kṛtvā rāmaḥ pradakṣiṇam 2.016.057c śanair jagāma sāpekṣo dṛṣṭiṃ tatrāvicālayan 2.016.058a na cāsya mahatīṃ lakṣmīṃ rājyanāśo 'pakarṣati
GE09ram_1-7u:3220: 2.016.058c lokakāntasya kāntatvaṃ śītaraśmer iva kṣapā 2.016.059a na vanaṃ gantukāmasya tyajataś ca vasuṃdharām
GE09ram_1-7u:3222: 2.016.060a dhārayan manasā duḥkham indriyāṇi nigṛhya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:3224: 2.016.061a praviśya veśmātibhṛśaṃ mudānvitaṃ; samīkṣya tāṃ cārthavipattim
GE09ram_1-7u:3228: 2.017.001a rāmas tu bhṛśam āyasto niḥśvasann iva kuñjaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3229: 2.017.001c jagāma sahito bhrātrā mātur antaḥpuraṃ vaśī
GE09ram_1-7u:3231: 2.017.002c upaviṣṭaṃ gṛhadvāri tiṣṭhataś cāparān bahūn 2.017.003a praviśya prathamāṃ kakṣyāṃ dvitīyāyāṃ dadarśa saḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3233: 2.017.004a praṇamya rāmas tān vṛddhāṃs tṛtīyāyāṃ dadarśa saḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3234: 2.017.004c striyo vṛddhāś ca bālāś ca dvārarakṣaṇatatparāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3235: 2.017.005a vardhayitvā prahṛṣṭās tāḥ praviśya ca gṛhaṃ striyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3236: 2.017.005c nyavedayanta tvaritā rāma mātuḥ priyaṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:3237: 2.017.006a kausalyāpi tadā devī rātriṃ sthitvā samāhitā
GE09ram_1-7u:3238: 2.017.006c prabhāte tv akarot pūjāṃ viṣṇoḥ putrahitaiṣiṇī
GE09ram_1-7u:3239: 2.017.007a sā kṣaumavasanā hṛṣṭā nityaṃ vrataparāyaṇā 2.017.007c agniṃ juhoti sma tadā mantravat kṛtamaṅgalā
GE09ram_1-7u:3240: 2.017.008a praviśya ca tadā rāmo mātur antaḥpuraṃ śubham
GE09ram_1-7u:3241: 2.017.008c dadarśa mātaraṃ tatra hāvayantīṃ hutāśanam 2.017.009a sā cirasyātmajaṃ dṛṣṭvā mātṛnandanam āgatam 2.017.009c abhicakrāma saṃhṛṣṭā kiśoraṃ vaḍavā yathā 2.017.010a tam uvāca durādharṣaṃ rāghavaṃ sutam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3242: 2.017.010c kausalyā putravātsalyād idaṃ priyahitaṃ vacaḥ 2.017.011a vṛddhānāṃ dharmaśīlānāṃ rājarṣīṇāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_1-7u:3243: 2.017.011c prāpnuhy āyuś ca kīrtiṃ ca dharmaṃ copahitaṃ kule 2.017.012a satyapratijñaṃ pitaraṃ rājānaṃ paśya rāghava 2.017.012c adyaiva hi tvāṃ dharmātmā yauvarājye 'bhiṣekṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:3244: 2.017.013a mātaraṃ rāghavaḥ kiṃ cit prasāryāñjalim abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:3245: 2.017.013c sa svabhāvavinītaś ca gauravāc ca tadānataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3246: 2.017.014a devi nūnaṃ na jānīṣe mahad bhayam upasthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:3247: 2.017.014c idaṃ tava ca duḥkhāya vaidehyā lakṣmaṇasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:3248: 2.017.015a caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi vatsyāmi vijane vane
GE09ram_1-7u:3249: 2.017.015c madhumūlaphalair jīvan hitvā munivad āmiṣam 2.017.016a bharatāya mahārājo yauvarājyaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:3250: 2.017.016c māṃ punar daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ vivāsayati tāpasaṃ 2.017.017a tām aduḥkhocitāṃ dṛṣṭvā patitāṃ kadalīm iva
GE09ram_1-7u:3251: 2.017.017c rāmas tūtthāpayām āsa mātaraṃ gatacetasaṃ 2.017.018a upāvṛtyotthitāṃ dīnāṃ vaḍavām iva vāhitām 2.017.018c pāṃśuguṇṭhitasarvāgnīṃ vimamarśa ca pāṇinā
GE09ram_1-7u:3252: 2.017.019a sā rāghavam upāsīnam asukhārtā sukhocitā 2.017.019c uvāca puruṣavyāghram upaśṛṇvati
GE09ram_1-7u:3253: 2.017.020a yadi putra na jāyethā mama śokāya rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:3254: 2.017.020c na sma duḥkham ato bhūyaḥ paśyeyam aham aprajā 2.017.021a eka eva hi vandhyāyāḥ śoko bhavati mānavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3255: 2.017.021c aprajāsmīti saṃtāpo na hy anyaḥ putra vidyate
GE09ram_1-7u:3256: 2.017.022a na dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ kalyāṇaṃ sukhaṃ vā patipauruṣe
GE09ram_1-7u:3257: 2.017.022c api putre vipaśyeyam iti rāmāsthitaṃ mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:3258: 2.017.023a sā bahūny amanojñāni vākyāni hṛdayacchidām 2.017.023c ahaṃ śroṣye sapatnīnām avarāṇāṃ varā satī
GE09ram_1-7u:3259: 2.017.023e ato duḥkhataraṃ kiṃ nu pramadānāṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:3260: 2.017.024a tvayi saṃnihite 'py evam aham āsaṃ nirākṛtā
GE09ram_1-7u:3261: 2.017.024c kiṃ punaḥ proṣite tāta dhruvaṃ maraṇam eva me 2.017.025a yo hi māṃ sevate kaś cid atha vāpy anuvartate
GE09ram_1-7u:3262: 2.017.025c kaikeyyāḥ putram anvīkṣya sa jano nābhibhāṣate
GE09ram_1-7u:3263: 2.017.026a daśa sapta ca varṣāṇi tava jātasya rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:3265: 2.017.027a upavāsaiś ca yogaiś ca bahubhiś ca pariśramaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3266: 2.017.027c duḥkhaṃ saṃvardhito moghaṃ tvaṃ hi durgatayā mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:3267: 2.017.028a sthiraṃ tu hṛdayaṃ manye mamedaṃ yan na dīryate 2.017.028c prāvṛṣīva mahānadyāḥ spṛṣṭaṃ kūlaṃ navāmbhasā 2.017.029a mamaiva nūnaṃ maraṇaṃ na vidyate; na cāvakāśo 'sti yamakṣaye mama 2.017.029c yad antako 'dyaiva na māṃ jihīrṣati; prasahya siṃho rudatīṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:3268: mṛgīm iva 2.017.030a sthiraṃ hi nūnaṃ hṛdayaṃ mamāyasaṃ; na bhidyate yad bhuvi nāvadīryate 2.017.030c anena duḥkhena ca deham arpitaṃ; dhruvaṃ hy akāle maraṇaṃ na vidyate
GE09ram_1-7u:3269: 2.017.031a idaṃ tu duḥkhaṃ yad anarthakāni me; vratāni dānāni ca saṃyamāś ca hi
GE09ram_1-7u:3270: 2.017.031c tapaś ca taptaṃ yad apatyakāraṇāt; suniṣphalaṃ bījam ivoptam
GE09ram_1-7u:3272: 2.017.032a yadi hy akāle maraṇaṃ svayecchayā; labheta kaś cid guru duḥkha karśitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3273: 2.017.032c gatāham adyaiva pareta saṃsadaṃ; vinā tvayā dhenur ivātmajena vai 2.017.033a bhṛśam asukham amarṣitā tadā; bahu vilalāpa samīkṣya rāghavam
GE09ram_1-7u:3274: 2.017.033c vyasanam upaniśāmya sā mahat; sutam iva baddham avekṣya kiṃnarī 2.018.001a tathā tu vilapantīṃ tāṃ kausalyāṃ rāmamātaram
GE09ram_1-7u:3275: 2.018.001c uvāca lakṣmaṇo dīnas tat kālasadṛśaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3276: 2.018.002a na rocate mamāpy etad ārye yad rāghavo vanam 2.018.002c tyaktvā rājyaśriyaṃ gacchet striyā vākyavaśaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3277: 2.018.003a viparītaś ca vṛddhaś ca viṣayaiś ca pradharṣitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3278: 2.018.003c nṛpaḥ kim iva na brūyāc codyamānaḥ samanmathaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3279: 2.018.004a nāsyāparādhaṃ paśyāmi nāpi doṣaṃ tathā vidham
GE09ram_1-7u:3280: 2.018.004c yena nirvāsyate rāṣṭrād vanavāsāya rāghavaḥ 2.018.005a na taṃ paśyāmy ahaṃ loke parokṣam api yo naraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3281: 2.018.005c amitro 'pi nirasto 'pi yo 'sya doṣam udāharet 2.018.006a devakalpam ṛjuṃ dāntaṃ ripūṇām api vatsalam
GE09ram_1-7u:3282: 2.018.006c avekṣamāṇaḥ ko dharmaṃ tyajet putram akāraṇāt
GE09ram_1-7u:3283: 2.018.007a tad idaṃ vacanaṃ rājñaḥ punar bālyam upeyuṣaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3284: 2.018.007c putraḥ ko hṛdaye kuryād rājavṛttam anusmaran
GE09ram_1-7u:3285: 2.018.008a yāvad eva na jānāti kaś cid artham imaṃ naraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3286: 2.018.008c tāvad eva mayā sādham ātmasthaṃ kuru śāsanam
GE09ram_1-7u:3287: 2.018.009a mayā pārśve sadhanuṣā tava guptasya rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:3289: 2.018.010a nirmanuṣyām imāṃ sarvām ayodhyāṃ manujarṣabha 2.018.010c kariṣyāmi śarais tīkṣṇair yadi sthāsyati vipriye
GE09ram_1-7u:3290: 2.018.011a bharatasyātha pakṣyo vā yo vāsya hitam icchati
GE09ram_1-7u:3291: 2.018.011c sarvān etān vadhiṣyāmi mṛdur hi paribhūyate
GE09ram_1-7u:3292: 2.018.012a tvayā caiva mayā caiva kṛtvā vairam anuttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:3293: 2.018.012c kasya śaktiḥ śriyaṃ dātuṃ bharatāyāriśāsana 2.018.013a anurakto 'smi bhāvena bhrātaraṃ devi tattvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3294: 2.018.013c satyena dhanuṣā caiva datteneṣṭena te śape
GE09ram_1-7u:3295: 2.018.014a dīptam agnim araṇyaṃ vā yadi rāmaḥ pravekṣyate
GE09ram_1-7u:3296: 2.018.014c praviṣṭaṃ tatra māṃ devi tvaṃ pūrvam avadhāraya
GE09ram_1-7u:3297: 2.018.015a harāmi vīryād duḥkhaṃ te tamaḥ sūrya ivoditaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3298: 2.018.015c devī paśyatu me vīryaṃ rāghavaś caiva paśyatu
GE09ram_1-7u:3299: 2.018.016a etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā lakṣmaṇasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3300: 2.018.016c uvāca rāmaṃ kausalyā rudantī śokalālasā 2.018.017a bhrātus te vadataḥ putra lakṣmaṇasya śrutaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:3301: 2.018.017c yad atrānantaraṃ tat tvaṃ kuruṣva yadi rocate
GE09ram_1-7u:3302: 2.018.018a na cādharmyaṃ vacaḥ śrutvā sapatnyā mama bhāṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:3303: 2.018.018c vihāya śokasaṃtaptāṃ gantum arhasi mām itaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3304: 2.018.019a dharmajña yadi dharmiṣṭho dharmaṃ caritum icchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:3305: 2.018.019c śuśrūṣa mām ihasthas tvaṃ cara dharmam anuttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:3306: 2.018.020a śuśrūṣur jananīṃ putra svagṛhe niyato vasan
GE09ram_1-7u:3307: 2.018.020c pareṇa tapasā yuktaḥ kāśyapas tridivaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3308: 2.018.021a yathaiva rājā pūjyas te gauraveṇa tathā hy aham 2.018.021c tvāṃ nāham anujānāmi na gantavyam ito vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:3309: 2.018.022a tvadviyogān na me kāryaṃ jīvitena sukhena vā
GE09ram_1-7u:3310: 2.018.022c tvayā saha mama śreyas tṛṇānām api bhakṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:3311: 2.018.023a yadi tvaṃ yāsyasi vanaṃ tyaktvā māṃ śokalālasām
GE09ram_1-7u:3312: 2.018.023c ahaṃ prāyam ihāsiṣye na hi śakṣyāmi jīvitum
GE09ram_1-7u:3313: 2.018.024a tatas tvaṃ prāpsyase putra nirayaṃ lokaviśrutam
GE09ram_1-7u:3314: 2.018.024c brahmahatyām ivādharmāt samudraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ 2.018.025a vilapantīṃ tathā dīnāṃ kausalyāṃ jananīṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3315: 2.018.025c uvāca rāmo dharmātmā vacanaṃ dharmasaṃhitam 2.018.026a nāsti śaktiḥ pitur vākyaṃ samatikramituṃ mama
GE09ram_1-7u:3316: 2.018.026c prasādaye tvāṃ śirasā gantum icchāmy ahaṃ vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:3317: 2.018.027a ṛṣiṇā ca pitur vākyaṃ kurvatā vratacāriṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:3318: 2.018.027c gaur hatā jānatā dharmaṃ kaṇḍunāpi vipaścitā
GE09ram_1-7u:3319: 2.018.028a asmākaṃ ca kule pūrvaṃ sagarasyājñayā pituḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3320: 2.018.028c khanadbhiḥ sāgarair bhūtim avāptaḥ sumahān vadhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3321: 2.018.029a jāmadagnyena rāmeṇa reṇukā jananī svayam 2.018.029c kṛttā paraśunāraṇye pitur
GE09ram_1-7u:3322: 2.018.030a na khalv etan mayaikena kriyate pitṛśāsanam
GE09ram_1-7u:3324: 2.018.031a tad etat tu mayā kāryaṃ kriyate bhuvi nānyathā 2.018.031c pitur hi vacanaṃ kurvan na kaś cin nāma hīyate
GE09ram_1-7u:3325: 2.018.032a tām evam uktvā jananīṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ punar abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:3326: 2.018.032c tava lakṣmaṇa jānāmi mayi sneham anuttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:3327: 2.018.032e abhiprāyam avijñāya satyasya ca śamasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:3328: 2.018.033a dharmo hi paramo loke dharme satyaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE09ram_1-7u:3329: 2.018.033c dharmasaṃśritam etac ca pitur vacanam uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:3330: 2.018.034a saṃśrutya ca pitur vākyaṃ mātur vā brāhmaṇasya vā 2.018.034c na kartavyaṃ vṛthā vīra dharmam āśritya tiṣṭhatā
GE09ram_1-7u:3331: 2.018.035a so 'haṃ na śakṣyāmi pitur niyogam ativartitum 2.018.035c pitur hi vacanād vīra kaikeyyāhaṃ pracoditaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3332: 2.018.036a tad enāṃ visṛjānāryāṃ kṣatradharmāśritāṃ matim 2.018.036c dharmam āśraya mā taikṣṇyaṃ madbuddhir anugamyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:3333: 2.018.037a tam evam uktvā sauhārdād bhrātaraṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3334: 2.018.037c uvāca bhūyaḥ kausalyāṃ prāñjaliḥ śirasānataḥ 2.018.038a anumanyasva māṃ devi gamiṣyantam ito vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:3335: 2.018.038c śāpitāsi mama prāṇaiḥ kuru svastyayanāni me
GE09ram_1-7u:3336: 2.018.038e tīrṇapratijñaś ca vanāt punar eṣyāmy ahaṃ purīm
GE09ram_1-7u:3337: 2.018.039a yaśo hy ahaṃ kevalarājyakāraṇān; na pṛṣṭhataḥ kartum alaṃ mahodayam 2.018.039c adīrghakāle na tu devi jīvite; vṛṇe 'varām adya mahīm adharmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3338: 2.018.040a prasādayan naravṛṣabhaḥ sa mātaraṃ; parākramāj jigamiṣur eva
GE09ram_1-7u:3340: 2.018.040c athānujaṃ bhṛśam anuśāsya darśanaṃ; cakāra tāṃ hṛdi jananīṃ pradakṣiṇam 2.019.001a atha taṃ vyathayā dīnaṃ saviśeṣam amarṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:3342: 2.019.002a āsādya rāmaḥ saumitriṃ suhṛdaṃ bhrātaraṃ priyam
GE09ram_1-7u:3343: 2.019.002c uvācedaṃ sa dhairyeṇa dhārayan sattvam ātmavān
GE09ram_1-7u:3344: 2.019.003a saumitre yo 'bhiṣekārthe mama saṃbhārasaṃbhramaḥ 2.019.003c abhiṣekanivṛttyarthe so 'stu saṃbhārasaṃbhramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3346: 2.019.004c mātā naḥ sā yathā na syāt saviśaṅkā tathā kuru
GE09ram_1-7u:3347: 2.019.005a tasyāḥ śaṅkāmayaṃ duḥkhaṃ muhūrtam api notsahe
GE09ram_1-7u:3349: 2.019.006a na buddhipūrvaṃ nābuddhaṃ smarāmīha kadā cana
GE09ram_1-7u:3350: 2.019.006c mātṝṇāṃ vā pitur vāhaṃ kṛtam alpaṃ ca vipriyam 2.019.007a satyaḥ satyābhisaṃdhaś ca nityaṃ satyaparākramaḥ 2.019.007c paralokabhayād bhīto nirbhayo 'stu pitā mama 2.019.008a tasyāpi hi bhaved asmin karmaṇy apratisaṃhṛte
GE09ram_1-7u:3351: 2.019.008c satyaṃ neti manas tāpas tasya tāpas tapec ca mām
GE09ram_1-7u:3352: 2.019.009a abhiṣekavidhānaṃ tu tasmāt saṃhṛtya lakṣmaṇa 2.019.009c anvag evāham icchāmi vanaṃ gantum itaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3353: 2.019.010a mama pravrājanād adya kṛtakṛtyā nṛpātmajā 2.019.010c sutaṃ bharatam avyagram abhiṣecayitā tataḥ 2.019.011a mayi cīrājinadhare jaṭāmaṇḍaladhāriṇi
GE09ram_1-7u:3355: 2.019.012a buddhiḥ praṇītā yeneyaṃ manaś ca susamāhitam
GE09ram_1-7u:3356: 2.019.012c tat tu nārhāmi saṃkleṣṭuṃ pravrajiṣyāmi māciram
GE09ram_1-7u:3357: 2.019.013a kṛtāntas tv eva saumitre draṣṭavyo matpravāsane
GE09ram_1-7u:3358: 2.019.013c rājyasya ca vitīrṇasya punar eva nivartane
GE09ram_1-7u:3359: 2.019.014a kaikeyyāḥ pratipattir hi kathaṃ syān mama pīḍane
GE09ram_1-7u:3360: 2.019.014c yadi bhāvo na daivo 'yaṃ kṛtāntavihito bhavet 2.019.015a jānāsi hi yathā saumya na mātṛṣu mamāntaram
GE09ram_1-7u:3361: 2.019.015c bhūtapūrvaṃ viśeṣo vā tasyā mayi sute 'pi vā
GE09ram_1-7u:3363: 2.019.016c ugrair vākyair ahaṃ tasyā nānyad daivāt samarthaye
GE09ram_1-7u:3365: 2.019.017c brūyāt sā prākṛteva strī matpīḍāṃ bhartṛsaṃnidhau
GE09ram_1-7u:3366: 2.019.018a yad acintyaṃ tu tad daivaṃ bhūteṣv api na hanyate
GE09ram_1-7u:3367: 2.019.018c vyaktaṃ mayi ca tasyāṃ ca patito hi viparyayaḥ 2.019.019a kaś cid daivena saumitre yoddhum utsahate pumān
GE09ram_1-7u:3368: 2.019.019c yasya na grahaṇaṃ kiṃ cit karmaṇo 'nyatra dṛśyate
GE09ram_1-7u:3370: 2.019.020c yasya kiṃ cit tathā bhūtaṃ nanu daivasya karma tat
GE09ram_1-7u:3371: 2.019.021a vyāhate 'py abhiṣeke me paritāpo na vidyate 2.019.021c tasmād aparitāpaḥ saṃs tvam apy anuvidhāya mām
GE09ram_1-7u:3373: 2.019.022a na lakṣmaṇāsmin mama rājyavighne; mātā yavīyasy atiśaṅkanīyā
GE09ram_1-7u:3374: 2.019.022c daivābhipannā hi vadanty aniṣṭaṃ; jānāsi daivaṃ ca tathā prabhāvam 2.020.001a iti bruvati rāme tu lakṣmaṇo 'dhaḥśirā muhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3375: 2.020.001c śrutvā madhyaṃ jagāmeva manasā duḥkhaharṣayoḥ 2.020.002a tadā tu baddhvā bhrukuṭīṃ bhruvor madhye nararṣabha
GE09ram_1-7u:3376: 2.020.002c niśaśvāsa mahāsarpo bilastha iva roṣitaḥ 2.020.003a tasya duṣprativīkṣyaṃ tad bhrukuṭīsahitaṃ tadā 2.020.003c babhau kruddhasya siṃhasya mukhasya sadṛśaṃ mukham
GE09ram_1-7u:3377: 2.020.004a agrahas taṃ vidhunvaṃs tu hastī hastam ivātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3378: 2.020.004c tiryag ūrdhvaṃ śarīre ca pātayitvā śirodharām
GE09ram_1-7u:3379: 2.020.005a agrākṣṇā vīkṣamāṇas tu tiryag bhrātaram abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:3380: 2.020.005c asthāne saṃbhramo yasya jāto vai sumahān ayam
GE09ram_1-7u:3381: 2.020.006a dharmadoṣaprasaṅgena lokasyānatiśaṅkayā 2.020.006c kathaṃ hy etad asaṃbhrāntas tvadvidho vaktum arhati
GE09ram_1-7u:3382: 2.020.007a yathā daivam aśauṇḍīraṃ śauṇḍīraḥ kṣatriyarṣabhaḥ 2.020.007c kiṃ nāma kṛpaṇaṃ daivam aśaktam abhiśaṃsasi
GE09ram_1-7u:3383: 2.020.008a pāpayos tu kathaṃ nāma tayoḥ śaṅkā na vidyate 2.020.008c santi dharmopadhāḥ ślakṣṇā dharmātman kiṃ na budhyase
GE09ram_1-7u:3385: 2.020.009c yeneyam āgatā dvaidhaṃ tava buddhir mahīpate
GE09ram_1-7u:3386: 2.020.009e sa hi dharmo mama dveṣyaḥ prasaṅgād yasya muhyasi 2.020.010a yady api pratipattis te daivī cāpi tayor matam 2.020.010c tathāpy upekṣaṇīyaṃ te na me tad api rocate 2.020.011a viklavo vīryahīno yaḥ sa daivam anuvartate
GE09ram_1-7u:3387: 2.020.011c vīrāḥ saṃbhāvitātmāno na daivaṃ paryupāsate 2.020.012a daivaṃ puruṣakāreṇa yaḥ samarthaḥ prabādhitum 2.020.012c na daivena vipannārthaḥ puruṣaḥ so 'vasīdati
GE09ram_1-7u:3388: 2.020.013a drakṣyanti tv adya daivasya pauruṣaṃ puruṣasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:3389: 2.020.013c daivamānuṣayor adya vyaktā vyaktir bhaviṣyati 2.020.014a adya matpauruṣahataṃ daivaṃ drakṣyanti vai janāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3390: 2.020.014c yad daivād āhataṃ te 'dya dṛṣṭaṃ rājyābhiṣecanam 2.020.015a atyaṅkuśam ivoddāmaṃ gajaṃ madabaloddhatam
GE09ram_1-7u:3391: 2.020.015c pradhāvitam ahaṃ daivaṃ pauruṣeṇa nivartaye 2.020.016a lokapālāḥ samastās te nādya rāmābhiṣecanam 2.020.016c na ca kṛtsnās trayo lokā vihanyuḥ kiṃ punaḥ pitā
GE09ram_1-7u:3392: 2.020.017a yair vivāsas tavāraṇye mitho rājan samarthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3393: 2.020.017c araṇye te vivatsyanti caturdaśa samās tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:3394: 2.020.018a ahaṃ tadāśāṃ chetsyāmi pitus tasyāś ca yā tava 2.020.018c abhiṣekavighātena putrarājyāya vartate
GE09ram_1-7u:3395: 2.020.019a madbalena viruddhāya na syād daivabalaṃ tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:3396: 2.020.019c prabhaviṣyati duḥkhāya yathograṃ pauruṣaṃ mama 2.020.020a ūrdhvaṃ varṣasahasrānte prajāpālyam anantaram
GE09ram_1-7u:3397: 2.020.020c āryaputrāḥ kariṣyanti vanavāsaṃ gate tvayi 2.020.021a pūrvarājarṣivṛttyā hi vanavāso vidhīyate
GE09ram_1-7u:3398: 2.020.021c prajā nikṣipya putreṣu putravat paripālane 2.020.022a sa ced rājany anekāgre rājyavibhramaśaṅkayā 2.020.022c naivam icchasi dharmātman rājyaṃ rāma tvam ātmani
GE09ram_1-7u:3399: 2.020.023a pratijāne ca te vīra mā bhūvaṃ vīralokabhāk
GE09ram_1-7u:3400: 2.020.023c rājyaṃ ca tava rakṣeyam ahaṃ veleva sāgaram
GE09ram_1-7u:3401: 2.020.024a maṅgalair abhiṣiñcasva tatra tvaṃ vyāpṛto bhava
GE09ram_1-7u:3402: 2.020.024c aham eko mahīpālān alaṃ vārayituṃ balāt
GE09ram_1-7u:3403: 2.020.025a na śobhārthāv imau bāhū na dhanur bhūṣaṇāya me 2.020.025c nāsirābandhanārthāya na śarāḥ stambhahetavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3404: 2.020.026a amitradamanārthaṃ me sarvam etac catuṣṭayam 2.020.026c na cāhaṃ kāmaye 'tyarthaṃ yaḥ syāc chatrur mato mama 2.020.027a asinā tīkṣṇadhāreṇa vidyuccalitavarcasā
GE09ram_1-7u:3405: 2.020.027c pragṛhītena vai śatruṃ vajriṇaṃ vā na kalpaye
GE09ram_1-7u:3406: 2.020.028a khaḍganiṣpeṣaniṣpiṣṭair gahanā duścarā ca me 2.020.028c hastyaśvanarahastoruśirobhir bhavitā mahī
GE09ram_1-7u:3407: 2.020.029a khaḍgadhārā hatā me 'dya dīpyamānā ivādrayaḥ 2.020.029c patiṣyanti dvipā bhūmau meghā iva savidyutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3408: 2.020.030a baddhagodhāṅgulitrāṇe pragṛhītaśarāsane 2.020.030c kathaṃ puruṣamānī syāt puruṣāṇāṃ mayi sthite
GE09ram_1-7u:3409: 2.020.031a bahubhiś caikam atyasyann ekena ca bahūñ janān
GE09ram_1-7u:3411: 2.020.032a adya me 'straprabhāvasya prabhāvaḥ prabhaviṣyati 2.020.032c rājñaś cāprabhutāṃ kartuṃ prabhutvaṃ ca tava prabho
GE09ram_1-7u:3413: 2.020.033c vasūnāṃ ca vimokṣasya suhṛdāṃ pālanasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:3414: 2.020.034a anurūpāv imau bāhū rāma karma kariṣyataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3416: 2.020.035a bravīhi ko 'dyaiva mayā viyujyatāṃ; tavāsuhṛt prāṇayaśaḥ suhṛjjanaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3417: 2.020.035c yathā taveyaṃ vasudhā vaśe bhavet; tathaiva māṃ śādhi tavāsmi kiṃkaraḥ 2.020.036a vimṛjya bāṣpaṃ parisāntvya cāsakṛt; sa lakṣmaṇaṃ rāghavavaṃśavardhanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3418: 2.020.036c uvāca pitrye vacane vyavasthitaṃ; nibodha mām eṣa hi saumya satpathaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3419: 2.021.001a taṃ samīkṣya tv avahitaṃ pitur nirdeśapālane
GE09ram_1-7u:3420: 2.021.001c kausalyā bāṣpasaṃruddhā vaco dharmiṣṭham abravīt 2.021.002a adṛṣṭaduḥkho dharmātmā
GE09ram_1-7u:3421: 2.021.002c mayi jāto daśarathāt katham uñchena vartayet
GE09ram_1-7u:3422: 2.021.003a yasya bhṛtyāś ca dāsāś ca mṛṣṭāny annāni bhuñjate 2.021.003c kathaṃ sa bhokṣyate nātho vane mūlaphalāny ayam
GE09ram_1-7u:3423: 2.021.004a ka etac chraddadhec chrutvā kasya vā na bhaved bhayam
GE09ram_1-7u:3424: 2.021.004c guṇavān dayito rājño rāghavo yad vivāsyate
GE09ram_1-7u:3425: 2.021.005a tvayā vihīnām iha māṃ śokāgnir atulo mahān
GE09ram_1-7u:3426: 2.021.005c pradhakṣyati yathā kakṣaṃ citrabhānur himātyaye 2.021.006a kathaṃ hi dhenuḥ svaṃ vatsaṃ gacchantaṃ nānugacchati
GE09ram_1-7u:3427: 2.021.006c ahaṃ tvānugamiṣyāmi yatra putra gamiṣyasi 2.021.007a tathā nigaditaṃ mātrā tad vākyaṃ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3429: 2.021.008a kaikeyyā vañcito rājā mayi cāraṇyam āśrite
GE09ram_1-7u:3430: 2.021.008c bhavatyā ca parityakto na nūnaṃ vartayiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:3431: 2.021.009a bhartuḥ kila parityāgo nṛśaṃsaḥ kevalaṃ striyāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3432: 2.021.009c sa bhavatyā na kartavyo manasāpi vigarhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3433: 2.021.010a yāvaj jīvati kākutsthaḥ pitā me jagatīpatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3434: 2.021.010c śuśrūṣā kriyatāṃ tāvat sa hi dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3435: 2.021.011a evam uktā tu rāmeṇa kausalyā śubha darśanā
GE09ram_1-7u:3436: 2.021.011c tathety uvāca suprītā rāmam akliṣṭakāriṇam 2.021.012a evam uktas tu vacanaṃ rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3437: 2.021.012c bhūyas tām abravīd vākyaṃ mātaraṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitām
GE09ram_1-7u:3438: 2.021.013a mayā caiva bhavatyā ca kartavyaṃ vacanaṃ pituḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3439: 2.021.013c rājā bhartā guruḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sarveṣām īśvaraḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3440: 2.021.014a imāni tu mahāraṇye vihṛtya nava pañca ca
GE09ram_1-7u:3441: 2.021.014c varṣāṇi paramaprītaḥ sthāsyāmi vacane tava 2.021.015a evam uktā priyaṃ putraṃ bāṣpapūrṇānanā tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:3442: 2.021.015c uvāca paramārtā tu kausalyā putravatsalā 2.021.016a āsāṃ rāma sapatnīnāṃ vastuṃ madhye na me kṣamam 2.021.016c naya mām api kākutstha vanaṃ vanyaṃ mṛgīṃ yathā 2.021.016e yadi te gamane buddhiḥ kṛtā pitur apekṣayā
GE09ram_1-7u:3443: 2.021.017a tāṃ tathā rudatīṃ rāmo rudan vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:3444: 2.021.017c jīvantyā hi striyā bhartā daivataṃ prabhur eva ca 2.021.017e bhavatyā mama caivādya rājā prabhavati prabhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3446: 2.021.018c bhavatīm anuvarteta sa hi dharmarataḥ sadā
GE09ram_1-7u:3447: 2.021.019a yathā mayi tu niṣkrānte putraśokena pārthivaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3448: 2.021.019c śramaṃ nāvāpnuyāt kiṃ cid apramattā tathā kuru
GE09ram_1-7u:3450: 2.021.020c bhartāraṃ nānuvarteta sā ca pāpagatir bhavet
GE09ram_1-7u:3451: 2.021.021a śuśrūṣam eva kurvīta bhartuḥ priyahite ratā
GE09ram_1-7u:3452: 2.021.021c eṣa dharmaḥ purā dṛṣṭo loke vede śrutaḥ smṛtaḥ 2.021.022a pūjyās te matkṛte devi brāhmaṇāś caiva suvratāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3454: 2.021.023a prāpsyase paramaṃ kāmaṃ mayi pratyāgate sati
GE09ram_1-7u:3455: 2.021.023c yadi dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭho dhārayiṣyati jīvitam 2.021.024a evam uktā tu rāmeṇa bāṣpaparyākulekṣaṇā 2.021.024c kausalyā putraśokārtā rāmaṃ vacanam abravīt 2.021.024e gaccha putra tvam ekāgro bhadraṃ te 'stu sadā vibho 2.021.025a tathā hi rāmaṃ vanavāsaniścitaṃ; samīkṣya devī parameṇa cetasā
GE09ram_1-7u:3456: 2.021.025c uvāca rāmaṃ śubhalakṣaṇaṃ vaco; babhūva ca svastyayanābhikāṅkṣiṇī
GE09ram_1-7u:3457: 2.022.001a sāpanīya tam āyāsam upaspṛśya jalaṃ śuci
GE09ram_1-7u:3458: 2.022.001c cakāra mātā rāmasya maṅgalāni manasvinī 2.022.002a svasti sādhyāś ca viśve ca marutaś ca maharṣayaḥ 2.022.002c svasti dhātā vidhātā ca svasti pūṣā bhago 'ryamā
GE09ram_1-7u:3459: 2.022.003a ṛtavaś caiva pakṣāś ca māsāḥ saṃvatsarāḥ kṣapāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3460: 2.022.003c dināni ca muhūrtāś ca svasti kurvantu te sadā 2.022.004a smṛtir dhṛtiś ca dharmaś ca pāntu tvāṃ putra sarvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3461: 2.022.004c skandaś ca bhagavān devaḥ somaś ca sabṛhaspatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3462: 2.022.005a saptarṣayo nāradaś ca te tvāṃ rakṣantu sarvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3463: 2.022.005c nakṣatrāṇi ca sarvāṇi grahāś ca sahadevatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3465: 2.022.006a plavagā vṛścikā daṃśā maśakāś caiva kānane
GE09ram_1-7u:3466: 2.022.006c sarīsṛpāś ca kīṭāś ca mā bhūvan gahane tava 2.022.007a mahādvipāś ca siṃhāś ca vyāghrā ṛkṣāś ca daṃṣṭriṇaḥ 2.022.007c mahiṣāḥ śṛṅgiṇo raudrā na te druhyantu putraka
GE09ram_1-7u:3467: 2.022.008a nṛmāṃsabhojanā raudrā ye cānye sattvajātayaḥ 2.022.008c mā ca tvāṃ hiṃsiṣuḥ putra mayā saṃpūjitās tv iha
GE09ram_1-7u:3468: 2.022.009a āgamās te śivāḥ santu sidhyantu ca parākramāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3469: 2.022.009c sarvasaṃpattayo rāma svastimān gaccha putraka 2.022.010a svasti te 'stv āntarikṣebhyaḥ pārthivebhyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3470: 2.022.010c sarvebhyaś caiva devebhyo ye ca te paripanthinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3472: 2.022.011c ye ca śeṣāḥ surās te tvāṃ rakṣantu vanavāsinam 2.022.012a iti mālyaiḥ suragaṇān gandhaiś cāpi yaśasvinī
GE09ram_1-7u:3475: 2.022.013c vṛtranāśe samabhavat tat te bhavatu maṅgalam
GE09ram_1-7u:3476: 2.022.014a yan maṅgalaṃ suparṇasya vinatākalpayat purā 2.022.014c amṛtaṃ prārthayānasya tat te bhavatu maṅgalam
GE09ram_1-7u:3477: 2.022.015a oṣadhīṃ cāpi siddhārthāṃ viśalyakaraṇīṃ śubhām 2.022.015c cakāra rakṣāṃ kausalyā mantrair abhijajāpa ca
GE09ram_1-7u:3478: 2.022.016a ānamya mūrdhni cāghrāya pariṣvajya yaśasvinī 2.022.016c avadat putra siddhārtho gaccha rāma yathāsukham
GE09ram_1-7u:3479: 2.022.017a arogaṃ sarvasiddhārtham ayodhyāṃ punar āgatam 2.022.017c paśyāmi tvāṃ sukhaṃ vatsa susthitaṃ rājaveśmani
GE09ram_1-7u:3480: 2.022.018a mayārcitā devagaṇāḥ śivādayo; maharṣayo bhūtamahāsuroragāḥ 2.022.018c abhiprayātasya vanaṃ cirāya te; hitāni kāṅkṣantu diśaś ca rāghava 2.022.019a itīva cāśrupratipūrṇalocanā; samāpya ca svastyayanaṃ yathāvidhi
GE09ram_1-7u:3481: 2.022.019c pradakṣiṇaṃ caiva cakāra rāghavaṃ; punaḥ punaś cāpi nipīḍya sasvaje 2.022.020a tathā tu devyā sa kṛtapradakṣiṇo; nipīḍya mātuś caraṇau punaḥ punaḥ 2.022.020c jagāma sītānilayaṃ mahāyaśāḥ; sa rāghavaḥ prajvalitaḥ svayā śriyā 2.023.001a abhivādya tu kausalyāṃ rāmaḥ saṃprasthito vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:3482: 2.023.001c kṛtasvastyayano mātrā dharmiṣṭhe vartmani sthitaḥ 2.023.002a virājayan rājasuto rājamārgaṃ narair vṛtam 2.023.002c hṛdayāny āmamantheva janasya guṇavattayā
GE09ram_1-7u:3483: 2.023.003a vaidehī cāpi tat sarvaṃ na śuśrāva tapasvinī
GE09ram_1-7u:3484: 2.023.003c tad eva hṛdi tasyāś ca yauvarājyābhiṣecanam
GE09ram_1-7u:3485: 2.023.004a devakāryaṃ sma sā kṛtvā kṛtajñā hṛṣṭacetanā
GE09ram_1-7u:3487: 2.023.005a praviveśātha rāmas tu svaveśma suvibhūṣitam 2.023.005c prahṛṣṭajanasaṃpūrṇaṃ hriyā kiṃ cid avāṅmukhaḥ 2.023.006a atha sītā samutpatya vepamānā ca taṃ patim
GE09ram_1-7u:3489: 2.023.007a vivarṇavadanaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ prasvinnam amarṣaṇam 2.023.007c āha duḥkhābhisaṃtaptā kim idānīm idaṃ prabho
GE09ram_1-7u:3490: 2.023.008a adya bārhaspataḥ śrīmān yuktaḥ puṣyo na rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:3491: 2.023.008c procyate brāhmaṇaiḥ prājñaiḥ kena tvam asi durmanāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3492: 2.023.009a na te śataśalākena jalaphenanibhena ca 2.023.009c āvṛtaṃ vadanaṃ valgu chatreṇābhivirājate
GE09ram_1-7u:3495: 2.023.011a vāgmino bandinaś cāpi prahṛṣṭās tvaṃ nararṣabha
GE09ram_1-7u:3496: 2.023.011c stuvanto nādya dṛśyante maṅgalaiḥ sūtamāgadhāḥ 2.023.012a na te kṣaudraṃ ca dadhi ca brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ 2.023.012c mūrdhni mūrdhāvasiktasya dadhati sma vidhānataḥ 2.023.013a na tvāṃ prakṛtayaḥ sarvā śreṇīmukhyāś ca bhūṣitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3499: 2.023.014c mukhyaḥ puṣyaratho yuktaḥ kiṃ na gacchati te 'grataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3500: 2.023.015a na hastī cāgrataḥ śrīmāṃs tava lakṣaṇapūjitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3501: 2.023.015c prayāṇe lakṣyate vīra kṛṣṇameghagiri prabhaḥ 2.023.016a na ca kāñcanacitraṃ te paśyāmi priyadarśana
GE09ram_1-7u:3503: 2.023.017a abhiṣeko yadā sajjaḥ kim idānīm idaṃ tava
GE09ram_1-7u:3504: 2.023.017c apūrvo mukhavarṇaś ca na praharṣaś ca lakṣyate
GE09ram_1-7u:3505: 2.023.018a itīva vilapantīṃ tāṃ provāca raghunandanaḥ 2.023.018c sīte tatrabhavāṃs tāta pravrājayati māṃ vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:3506: 2.023.019a kule mahati saṃbhūte dharmajñe dharmacāriṇi 2.023.019c śṛṇu jānaki yenedaṃ krameṇābhyāgataṃ mama 2.023.020a rājñā satyapratijñena pitrā daśarathena me 2.023.020c kaikeyyai prītamanasā purā dattau mahāvarau 2.023.021a tayādya mama sajje 'sminn abhiṣeke nṛpodyate 2.023.021c pracoditaḥ sa samayo dharmeṇa pratinirjitaḥ 2.023.022a caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi vastavyaṃ daṇḍake mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:3507: 2.023.022c pitrā me bharataś cāpi yauvarājye niyojitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3508: 2.023.022e so 'haṃ tvām āgato draṣṭuṃ prasthito vijanaṃ vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:3509: 2.023.023a bharatasya samīpe te nāhaṃ kathyaḥ kadā cana
GE09ram_1-7u:3510: 2.023.023c ṛddhiyuktā hi puruṣā na sahante parastavam
GE09ram_1-7u:3511: 2.023.023e tasmān na te guṇāḥ kathyā bharatasyāgrato mama
GE09ram_1-7u:3512: 2.023.024a nāpi tvaṃ tena bhartavyā viśeṣeṇa kadā cana
GE09ram_1-7u:3513: 2.023.024c anukūlatayā śakyaṃ samīpe tasya vartitum 2.023.025a ahaṃ cāpi pratijñāṃ tāṃ guroḥ samanupālayan
GE09ram_1-7u:3514: 2.023.025c vanam adyaiva yāsyāmi sthirā bhava manasvini
GE09ram_1-7u:3515: 2.023.026a yāte ca mayi kalyāṇi vanaṃ muniniṣevitam
GE09ram_1-7u:3517: 2.023.027a kālyam utthāya devānāṃ kṛtvā pūjāṃ yathāvidhi
GE09ram_1-7u:3518: 2.023.027c vanditavyo daśarathaḥ pitā mama nareśvaraḥ 2.023.028a mātā ca mama kausalyā vṛddhā saṃtāpakarśitā
GE09ram_1-7u:3519: 2.023.028c dharmam evāgrataḥ kṛtvā tvattaḥ saṃmānam arhati
GE09ram_1-7u:3520: 2.023.029a vanditavyāś ca te nityaṃ yāḥ śeṣā mama mātaraḥ 2.023.029c snehapraṇayasaṃbhogaiḥ samā hi mama mātaraḥ 2.023.030a bhrātṛputrasamau cāpi draṣṭavyau ca viśeṣataḥ 2.023.030c tvayā lakṣmaṇaśatrughnau prāṇaiḥ priyatarau mama 2.023.031a vipriyaṃ na ca kartavyaṃ bharatasya kadā cana
GE09ram_1-7u:3521: 2.023.031c sa hi rājā prabhuś caiva deśasya ca kulasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:3522: 2.023.032a ārādhitā hi śīlena prayatnaiś copasevitāḥ 2.023.032c rājānaḥ saṃprasīdanti prakupyanti
GE09ram_1-7u:3523: 2.023.033a aurasān api putrān hi tyajanty ahitakāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3524: 2.023.033c samarthān saṃpragṛhṇanti janān api narādhipāḥ 2.023.034a ahaṃ gamiṣyāmi mahāvanaṃ priye; tvayā hi vastavyam ihaiva bhāmini 2.023.034c yathā vyalīkaṃ kuruṣe na kasya cit; tathā tvayā kāryam idaṃ vaco mama
GE09ram_1-7u:3525: 2.024.001a evam uktā tu vaidehī priyārhā priyavādinī
GE09ram_1-7u:3526: 2.024.001c praṇayād eva saṃkruddhā bhartāram idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:3527: 2.024.002a āryaputra pitā mātā bhrātā putras tathā snuṣā
GE09ram_1-7u:3528: 2.024.002c svāni puṇyāni bhuñjānāḥ svaṃ svaṃ bhāgyam upāsate
GE09ram_1-7u:3529: 2.024.003a bhartur bhāgyaṃ tu bhāryaikā prāpnoti puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_1-7u:3530: 2.024.003c ataś caivāham ādiṣṭā vane vastavyam ity api
GE09ram_1-7u:3531: 2.024.004a na pitā nātmajo nātmā na mātā na sakhījanaḥ 2.024.004c iha pretya ca nārīṇāṃ patir eko gatiḥ sadā 2.024.005a yadi tvaṃ prasthito durgaṃ vanam adyaiva rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:3532: 2.024.005c agratas te gamiṣyāmi mṛdnantī kuśakaṇṭakān 2.024.006a īrṣyā roṣau bahiṣkṛtya bhuktaśeṣam ivodakam 2.024.006c naya māṃ vīra viśrabdhaḥ pāpaṃ mayi na vidyate 2.024.007a prāsādāgrair vimānair vā vaihāyasagatena vā 2.024.007c sarvāvasthāgatā bhartuḥ pādacchāyā viśiṣyate
GE09ram_1-7u:3533: 2.024.008a anuśiṣṭāsmi mātrā ca pitrā ca vividhāśrayam
GE09ram_1-7u:3534: 2.024.008c nāsmi saṃprati vaktavyā vartitavyaṃ yathā mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:3535: 2.024.009a sukhaṃ vane nivatsyāmi yathaiva bhavane pituḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3536: 2.024.009c acintayantī trīṃl lokāṃś cintayantī pativratam 2.024.010a śuśrūṣamāṇā te nityaṃ niyatā brahmacāriṇī 2.024.010c saha raṃsye tvayā vīra vaneṣu madhugandhiṣu
GE09ram_1-7u:3537: 2.024.011a tvaṃ hi kartuṃ vane śakto rāma saṃparipālanam
GE09ram_1-7u:3538: 2.024.011c anyasya pai janasyeha kiṃ punar mama mānada
GE09ram_1-7u:3539: 2.024.012a phalamūlāśanā nityaṃ bhaviṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ 2.024.012c na te duḥkhaṃ kariṣyāmi nivasantī saha tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:3540: 2.024.013a icchāmi saritaḥ śailān palvalāni vanāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:3541: 2.024.013c draṣṭuṃ sarvatra nirbhītā tvayā nāthena dhīmatā
GE09ram_1-7u:3543: 2.024.014c iccheyaṃ sukhinī draṣṭuṃ tvayā vīreṇa saṃgatā
GE09ram_1-7u:3544: 2.024.015a saha tvayā viśālākṣa raṃsye paramanandinī 2.024.015c evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇāṃ śataṃ vāhaṃ tvayā saha
GE09ram_1-7u:3545: 2.024.016a svarge 'pi ca vinā vāso bhavitā yadi rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:3546: 2.024.016c tvayā mama naravyāghra nāhaṃ tam api rocaye
GE09ram_1-7u:3547: 2.024.017a ahaṃ gamiṣyāmi vanaṃ sudurgamaṃ; mṛgāyutaṃ vānaravāraṇair yutam
GE09ram_1-7u:3548: 2.024.017c vane nivatsyāmi yathā pitur gṛhe; tavaiva pādāv upagṛhya
GE09ram_1-7u:3550: 2.024.018a ananyabhāvām anuraktacetasaṃ; tvayā viyuktāṃ maraṇāya niścitām
GE09ram_1-7u:3551: 2.024.018c nayasva māṃ sādhu kuruṣva yācanāṃ; na te mayāto gurutā bhaviṣyati 2.024.019a tathā bruvāṇām api dharmavatsalo; na ca sma sītāṃ nṛvaro ninīṣati
GE09ram_1-7u:3552: 2.024.019c uvāca caināṃ bahu saṃnivartane; vane nivāsasya ca duḥkhitāṃ prati 2.025.001a sa evaṃ bruvatīṃ sītāṃ dharmajño dharmavatsalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3553: 2.025.001c nivartanārthe dharmātmā vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:3554: 2.025.002a sīte mahākulīnāsi dharme ca niratā sadā
GE09ram_1-7u:3555: 2.025.002c ihācara svadharmaṃ tvaṃ mā yathā manasaḥ sukham
GE09ram_1-7u:3556: 2.025.003a sīte yathā tvāṃ vakṣyāmi tathā kāryaṃ tvayābale
GE09ram_1-7u:3557: 2.025.003c vane doṣā hi bahavo vadatas tān nibodha me 2.025.004a sīte vimucyatām eṣā vanavāsakṛtā matiḥ 2.025.004c bahudoṣaṃ hi kāntāraṃ vanam ity abhidhīyate
GE09ram_1-7u:3558: 2.025.005a hitabuddhyā khalu vaco mayaitad abhidhīyate 2.025.005c sadā sukhaṃ na jānāmi duḥkham eva sadā vanam 2.025.006a girinirjharasaṃbhūtā girikandaravāsinām 2.025.006c siṃhānāṃ ninadā duḥkhāḥ śrotuṃ duḥkham ato vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:3559: 2.025.007a supyate parṇaśayyāsu svayaṃ bhagnāsu bhūtale 2.025.007c rātriṣu śramakhinnena tasmād duḥkhataraṃ vanam 2.025.008a upavāsaś ca kartavyā yathāprāṇena maithili 2.025.008c jaṭābhāraś ca kartavyo valkalāmbaradhāriṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:3560: 2.025.009a atīva vātas timiraṃ bubhukṣā cātra nityaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3561: 2.025.009c bhayāni ca mahānty atra tato duḥkhataraṃ vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:3562: 2.025.010a sarīsṛpāś ca bahavo bahurūpāś ca bhāmini
GE09ram_1-7u:3563: 2.025.010c caranti pṛthivīṃ darpād ato dukhataraṃ vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:3565: 2.025.011c tiṣṭhanty āvṛtya panthānam ato duḥkhataraṃ vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:3566: 2.025.012a pataṃgā vṛścikāḥ kīṭā daṃśāś ca maśakaiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:3567: 2.025.012c bādhante nityam abale sarvaṃ duḥkham ato vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:3568: 2.025.013a drumāḥ kaṇṭakinaś caiva kuśakāśāś ca bhāmini
GE09ram_1-7u:3569: 2.025.013c vane vyākulaśākhāgrās tena duḥkhataraṃ vanam 2.025.014a tad alaṃ te vanaṃ gatvā kṣamaṃ na hi vanaṃ tava
GE09ram_1-7u:3570: 2.025.014c vimṛśann iha paśyāmi bahudoṣataraṃ vanam 2.025.015a vanaṃ tu netuṃ na kṛtā matis tadā; babhūva rāmeṇa yadā
GE09ram_1-7u:3572: 2.025.015c na tasya sītā vacanaṃ cakāra tat; tato 'bravīd rāmam idaṃ suduḥkhitā
GE09ram_1-7u:3573: 2.026.001a etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā sītā rāmasya duḥkhitā
GE09ram_1-7u:3574: 2.026.001c prasaktāśrumukhī mandam idaṃ vacanam abravīt 2.026.002a ye tvayā kīrtitā doṣā vane vastavyatāṃ prati
GE09ram_1-7u:3575: 2.026.002c guṇān ity eva tān viddhi tava snehapuraskṛtān
GE09ram_1-7u:3576: 2.026.003a tvayā ca saha gantavyaṃ mayā gurujanājñayā
GE09ram_1-7u:3577: 2.026.003c tvadviyogena me rāma tyaktavyam iha jīvitam
GE09ram_1-7u:3578: 2.026.004a na ca māṃ tvatsamīpastham api śaknoti rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:3579: 2.026.004c surāṇām īśvaraḥ śakraḥ pradharṣayitum ojasā 2.026.005a patihīnā tu yā nārī na sā śakṣyati jīvitum 2.026.005c kāmam evaṃvidhaṃ rāma tvayā mama vidarśitam
GE09ram_1-7u:3580: 2.026.006a atha cāpi mahāprājña brāhmaṇānāṃ mayā śrutam
GE09ram_1-7u:3581: 2.026.006c purā pitṛgṛhe satyaṃ vastavyaṃ kila me vane
GE09ram_1-7u:3582: 2.026.007a lakṣaṇibhyo dvijātibhyaḥ śrutvāhaṃ vacanaṃ gṛhe 2.026.007c vanavāsakṛtotsāhā nityam eva mahābala
GE09ram_1-7u:3583: 2.026.008a ādeśo vanavāsasya prāptavyaḥ sa mayā kila
GE09ram_1-7u:3584: 2.026.008c sā tvayā saha tatrāhaṃ yāsyāmi priya nānyathā
GE09ram_1-7u:3585: 2.026.009a kṛtādeśā bhaviṣyāmi gamiṣyāmi saha tvayā 2.026.009c kālaś cāyaṃ samutpannaḥ satyavāg bhavatu dvijaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3586: 2.026.010a vanavāse hi jānāmi duḥkhāni bahudhā kila
GE09ram_1-7u:3587: 2.026.010c prāpyante niyataṃ vīra puruṣair akṛtātmabhiḥ 2.026.011a kanyayā ca pitur gehe vanavāsaḥ śruto mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:3588: 2.026.011c bhikṣiṇyāḥ sādhuvṛttāyā mama mātur ihāgrataḥ 2.026.012a prasāditaś ca vai pūrvaṃ tvaṃ vai bahuvidhaṃ prabho 2.026.012c gamanaṃ vanavāsasya kāṅkṣitaṃ hi saha tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:3589: 2.026.013a kṛtakṣaṇāhaṃ bhadraṃ te gamanaṃ prati rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:3590: 2.026.013c vanavāsasya śūrasya caryā hi mama rocate
GE09ram_1-7u:3591: 2.026.014a śuddhātman premabhāvād dhi bhaviṣyāmi vikalmaṣā 2.026.014c bhartāram anugacchantī bhartā hi mama daivatam
GE09ram_1-7u:3592: 2.026.015a pretyabhāve 'pi kalyāṇaḥ saṃgamo me saha tvayā 2.026.015c śrutir hi śrūyate puṇyā brāhmaṇānāṃ yaśasvinām
GE09ram_1-7u:3593: 2.026.016a iha loke ca pitṛbhir yā strī yasya mahāmate 2.026.016c adbhir dattā svadharmeṇa pretyabhāve 'pi tasya sā 2.026.017a evam asmāt svakāṃ nārīṃ suvṛttāṃ hi pativratām
GE09ram_1-7u:3594: 2.026.017c nābhirocayase netuṃ tvaṃ māṃ keneha hetunā
GE09ram_1-7u:3595: 2.026.018a bhaktāṃ pativratāṃ dīnāṃ māṃ samāṃ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3597: 2.026.019a yadi māṃ duḥkhitām evaṃ vanaṃ netuṃ na cecchasi 2.026.019c viṣam agniṃ jalaṃ vāham āsthāsye mṛtyukāraṇāt
GE09ram_1-7u:3598: 2.026.020a evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ taṃ sā yācate gamanaṃ prati
GE09ram_1-7u:3599: 2.026.020c nānumene mahābāhus tāṃ netuṃ vijanaṃ vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:3600: 2.026.021a evam uktā tu sā cintāṃ maithilī samupāgatā
GE09ram_1-7u:3601: 2.026.021c snāpayantīva gām uṣṇair aśrubhir nayanacyutaiḥ 2.026.022a cintayantīṃ tathā tāṃ tu nivartayitum ātmavān
GE09ram_1-7u:3602: 2.026.022c krodhāviṣṭāṃ tu vaidehīṃ kākutstho bahv asāntvayat
GE09ram_1-7u:3603: 2.027.001a sāntvyamānā tu rāmeṇa maithilī janakātmajā 2.027.001c vanavāsanimittāya bhartāram idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:3604: 2.027.002a sā tam uttamasaṃvignā sītā vipulavakṣasaṃ 2.027.002c praṇayāc cābhimānāc ca paricikṣepa rāghavam 2.027.003a kiṃ tvāmanyata vaidehaḥ pitā me mithilādhipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3605: 2.027.003c rāma jāmātaraṃ prāpya striyaṃ puruṣavigraham 2.027.004a anṛtaṃ balaloko 'yam ajñānād yad dhi vakṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:3606: 2.027.004c tejo nāsti paraṃ rāme tapatīva divākare
GE09ram_1-7u:3607: 2.027.005a kiṃ hi kṛtvā viṣaṇṇas tvaṃ kuto vā bhayam asti te
GE09ram_1-7u:3608: 2.027.005c yat parityaktukāmas tvaṃ mām ananyaparāyaṇām 2.027.006a dyumatsenasutaṃ vīra satyavantam anuvratām
GE09ram_1-7u:3609: 2.027.006c sāvitrīm iva māṃ viddhi tvam ātmavaśavartinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:3610: 2.027.007a na tv ahaṃ manasāpy anyaṃ draṣṭāsmi tvadṛte 'nagha
GE09ram_1-7u:3611: 2.027.007c tvayā rāghava gaccheyaṃ yathānyā kulapāṃsanī 2.027.008a svayaṃ tu bhāryāṃ kaumārīṃ ciram adhyuṣitāṃ satīm
GE09ram_1-7u:3612: 2.027.008c śailūṣa iva māṃ rāma parebhyo dātum icchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:3613: 2.027.009a sa mām anādāya vanaṃ na tvaṃ prasthātum arhasi 2.027.009c tapo vā yadi vāraṇyaṃ svargo vā syāt saha tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:3614: 2.027.010a na ca me bhavitā tatra kaś cit pathi pariśramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3615: 2.027.010c pṛṣṭhatas tava gacchantyā vihāraśayaneṣv api 2.027.011a kuśakāśaśareṣīkā ye ca kaṇṭakino drumāḥ 2.027.011c tūlājinasamasparśā mārge mama saha tvayā 2.027.012a mahāvāta samuddhūtaṃ yan mām avakariṣyati 2.027.012c rajo ramaṇa tan manye parārdhyam iva candanam
GE09ram_1-7u:3616: 2.027.013a śādvaleṣu yad āsiṣye vanānte vanagoracā 2.027.013c kuthāstaraṇatalpeṣu kiṃ syāt sukhataraṃ tataḥ 2.027.014a patraṃ mūlaṃ phalaṃ yat tvam alpaṃ vā yadi vā bahu
GE09ram_1-7u:3618: 2.027.015a na mātur na pitus tatra smariṣyāmi na veśmanaḥ 2.027.015c ārtavāny upabhuñjānā puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:3619: 2.027.016a na ca tatra gataḥ kiṃ cid draṣṭum arhasi vipriyam
GE09ram_1-7u:3620: 2.027.016c matkṛte na ca te śoko na bhaviṣyāmi durbharā 2.027.017a yas tvayā saha sa svargo nirayo yas tvayā vinā
GE09ram_1-7u:3621: 2.027.017c iti jānan parāṃ prītiṃ gaccha rāma mayā saha 2.027.018a atha mām evam avyagrāṃ vanaṃ naiva nayiṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:3622: 2.027.018c viṣam adyaiva pāsyāmi mā viśaṃ dviṣatāṃ vaśam
GE09ram_1-7u:3623: 2.027.019a paścād api hi duḥkhena mama naivāsti jīvitam
GE09ram_1-7u:3624: 2.027.019c ujjhitāyās tvayā nātha tadaiva maraṇaṃ varam
GE09ram_1-7u:3625: 2.027.020a idaṃ hi sahituṃ śokaṃ muhūrtam api notsahe
GE09ram_1-7u:3626: 2.027.020c kiṃ punar daśavarṣāṇi trīṇi caikaṃ ca duḥkhitā
GE09ram_1-7u:3627: 2.027.021a iti sā śokasaṃtaptā vilapya karuṇaṃ bahu
GE09ram_1-7u:3628: 2.027.021c cukrośa patim āyastā bhṛśam āliṅgya sasvaram
GE09ram_1-7u:3629: 2.027.022a sā viddhā bahubhir vākyair digdhair iva gajāṅganā
GE09ram_1-7u:3630: 2.027.022c cira saṃniyataṃ bāṣpaṃ mumocāgnim ivāraṇiḥ 2.027.023a tasyāḥ sphaṭikasaṃkāśaṃ vāri saṃtāpasaṃbhavam
GE09ram_1-7u:3632: 2.027.024a tāṃ pariṣvajya bāhubhyāṃ visaṃjñām iva duḥkhitām
GE09ram_1-7u:3633: 2.027.024c uvāca vacanaṃ rāmaḥ pariviśvāsayaṃs tadā 2.027.025a na devi tava duḥkhena svargam apy abhirocaye
GE09ram_1-7u:3634: 2.027.025c na hi me 'sti bhayaṃ kiṃ cit svayambhor iva sarvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3635: 2.027.026a tava sarvam abhiprāyam avijñāya śubhānane 2.027.026c vāsaṃ na rocaye 'raṇye śaktimān api rakṣaṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:3636: 2.027.027a yat sṛṣṭāsi mayā sārdhaṃ vanavāsāya maithili
GE09ram_1-7u:3637: 2.027.027c na vihātuṃ mayā śakyā kīrtir ātmavatā yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:3638: 2.027.028a dharmas tu gajanāsoru sadbhir ācaritaḥ purā
GE09ram_1-7u:3639: 2.027.028c taṃ cāham anuvarte 'dya yathā sūryaṃ suvarcalā
GE09ram_1-7u:3640: 2.027.029a eṣa dharmas tu suśroṇi pitur mātuś ca vaśyatā 2.027.029c ataś cājñāṃ vyatikramya nāhaṃ jīvitum utsahe
GE09ram_1-7u:3641: 2.027.030a sa māṃ pitā yathā śāsti satyadharmapathe sthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3642: 2.027.030c tathā vartitum icchāmi sa hi dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3643: 2.027.030e anugacchasva māṃ bhīru sahadharmacarī bhava 2.027.031a brāhmaṇebhyaś ca ratnāni bhikṣukebhyaś ca bhojanam
GE09ram_1-7u:3644: 2.027.031c dehi cāśaṃsamānebhyaḥ saṃtvarasva ca māciram 2.027.032a anukūlaṃ tu sā bhartur jñātvā gamanam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3645: 2.027.032c kṣipraṃ pramuditā devī dātum evopacakrame 2.027.033a tataḥ prahṛṣṭā paripūrṇamānasā; yaśasvinī bhartur avekṣya
GE09ram_1-7u:3647: 2.027.033c dhanāni ratnāni ca dātum aṅganā; pracakrame dharmabhṛtāṃ manasvinī
GE09ram_1-7u:3649: 2.028.001c sthitaṃ prāggāminaṃ vīraṃ yācamānaṃ kṛtāñjalim 2.028.002a mayādya saha saumitre tvayi gacchati tad vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:3650: 2.028.002c ko bhariṣyati kausalyāṃ sumitrāṃ vā yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:3651: 2.028.003a abhivarṣati kāmair yaḥ parjanyaḥ pṛthivīm iva
GE09ram_1-7u:3653: 2.028.004a sā hi rājyam idaṃ prāpya nṛpasyāśvapateḥ sutā
GE09ram_1-7u:3654: 2.028.004c duḥkhitānāṃ sapatnīnāṃ na kariṣyati śobhanam 2.028.005a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ ślakṣṇayā girā
GE09ram_1-7u:3655: 2.028.005c pratyuvāca tadā rāmaṃ vākyajño vākyakovidam 2.028.006a tavaiva tejasā vīra bharataḥ pūjayiṣyati 2.028.006c kausalyāṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca prayato nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3656: 2.028.007a kausalyā bibhṛyād āryā sahasram api madvidhān
GE09ram_1-7u:3657: 2.028.007c yasyāḥ sahasraṃ grāmāṇāṃ saṃprāptam upajīvanam 2.028.008a dhanur ādāya saśaraṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:3658: 2.028.008c agratas te gamiṣyāmi panthānam anudarśayan 2.028.009a āhariṣyāmi te nityaṃ mūlāni ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:3659: 2.028.009c vanyāni yāni cānyāni svāhārāṇi tapasvinām 2.028.010a bhavāṃs tu saha vaidehyā girisānuṣu raṃsyate
GE09ram_1-7u:3660: 2.028.010c ahaṃ sarvaṃ kariṣyāmi jāgrataḥ svapataś ca te
GE09ram_1-7u:3661: 2.028.011a rāmas tv anena vākyena suprītaḥ pratyuvāca tam
GE09ram_1-7u:3662: 2.028.011c vrajāpṛcchasva saumitre sarvam eva suhṛjjanam 2.028.012a ye ca rājño dadau divye mahātmā varuṇaḥ svayam 2.028.012c janakasya mahāyajñe dhanuṣī raudradarśane
GE09ram_1-7u:3665: 2.028.014a satkṛtya nihitaṃ sarvam etad ācāryasadmani 2.028.014c sa tvam āyudham ādāya kṣipram āvraja lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:3666: 2.028.015a sa suhṛjjanam āmantrya vanavāsāya niścitaḥ 2.028.015c ikṣvākugurum āmantrya jagrāhāyudham uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:3667: 2.028.016a tad divyaṃ rājaśārdūlaḥ satkṛtaṃ mālyabhūṣitam 2.028.016c rāmāya darśayām āsa saumitriḥ sarvam āyudham
GE09ram_1-7u:3668: 2.028.017a tam uvācātmavān rāmaḥ prītyā lakṣmaṇam āgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:3669: 2.028.017c kāle tvam āgataḥ saumya kāṅkṣite mama lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:3670: 2.028.018a ahaṃ pradātum icchāmi yad idaṃ māmakaṃ dhanam
GE09ram_1-7u:3671: 2.028.018c brāhmaṇebhyas tapasvibhyas tvayā saha paraṃtapa 2.028.019a vasantīha dṛḍhaṃ bhaktyā guruṣu dvijasattamāḥ 2.028.019c teṣām api ca me bhūyaḥ sarveṣāṃ copajīvinām
GE09ram_1-7u:3672: 2.028.020a vasiṣṭhaputraṃ tu suyajñam āryaṃ; tvam ānayāśu pravaraṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:3674: 2.028.020c abhiprayāsyāmi vanaṃ samastān; abhyarcya śiṣṭān aparān dvijātīn
GE09ram_1-7u:3675: 2.029.001a tataḥ śāsanam ājñāya bhrātuḥ śubhataraṃ priyam
GE09ram_1-7u:3676: 2.029.001c gatvā sa praviveśāśu suyajñasya niveśanam 2.029.002a taṃ vipram agnyagārasthaṃ vanditvā lakṣmaṇo 'bravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:3678: 2.029.003a tataḥ saṃdhyām upāsyāśu gatvā saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_1-7u:3679: 2.029.003c juṣṭaṃ tat prāviśal lakṣmyā ramyaṃ rāmaniveśanam
GE09ram_1-7u:3680: 2.029.004a tam āgataṃ vedavidaṃ prāñjaliḥ sītayā saha
GE09ram_1-7u:3682: 2.029.005a jātarūpamayair mukhyair aṅgadaiḥ kuṇḍalaiḥ śubhaiḥ 2.029.005c sahema sūtrair maṇibhiḥ keyūrair valayair api
GE09ram_1-7u:3683: 2.029.006a anyaiś ca ratnair bahubhiḥ kākutsthaḥ pratyapūjayat
GE09ram_1-7u:3684: 2.029.006c suyajñaṃ sa tadovāca rāmaḥ sītāpracoditaḥ 2.029.007a hāraṃ ca hemasūtraṃ ca bhāryāyai saumya hāraya
GE09ram_1-7u:3685: 2.029.007c raśanāṃ cādhunā sītā dātum icchati te sakhe
GE09ram_1-7u:3687: 2.029.008c tam apīcchati vaidehī pratiṣṭhāpayituṃ tvayi 2.029.009a nāgaḥ śatruṃ jayo nāma mātulo yaṃ dadau mama 2.029.009c taṃ te gajasahasreṇa dadāmi dvijapuṃgava 2.029.010a ity uktaḥ sa hi rāmeṇa suyajñaḥ pratigṛhya tat 2.029.010c rāmalakṣmaṇasītānāṃ prayuyojāśiṣaḥ śivāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3688: 2.029.011a atha bhrātaram avyagraṃ priyaṃ rāmaḥ priyaṃvadaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3689: 2.029.011c saumitriṃ tam uvācedaṃ brahmeva tridaśeśvaram 2.029.012a agastyaṃ kauśikaṃ caiva tāv ubhau brāhmaṇottamau
GE09ram_1-7u:3690: 2.029.012c arcayāhūya saumitre ratnaiḥ sasyam ivāmbubhiḥ 2.029.013a kausalyāṃ ca ya āśīrbhir bhaktaḥ paryupatiṣṭhati
