GE09ram_1-7u:3691: 2.029.013c ācāryas taittirīyāṇām abhirūpaś ca vedavit 2.029.014a tasya yānaṃ ca dāsīś ca saumitre saṃpradāpaya
GE09ram_1-7u:3692: 2.029.014c kauśeyāni ca vastrāṇi yāvat tuṣyati sa dvijaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3693: 2.029.015a sūtaś citrarathaś cāryaḥ sacivaḥ suciroṣitaḥ 2.029.015c toṣayainaṃ mahārhaiś ca ratnair vastrair dhanais tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:3694: 2.029.016a śālivāhasahasraṃ ca dve śate bhadrakāṃs tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:3695: 2.029.016c vyañjanārthaṃ ca saumitre gosahasram upākuru 2.029.017a tataḥ sa puruṣavyāghras tad dhanaṃ lakṣmaṇaḥ svayam
GE09ram_1-7u:3696: 2.029.017c yathoktaṃ brāhmaṇendrāṇām adadād dhanado yathā 2.029.018a athābravīd bāṣpakalāṃs tiṣṭhataś copajīvinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3698: 2.029.019a lakṣmaṇasya ca yad veśma gṛhaṃ ca yad idaṃ mama
GE09ram_1-7u:3699: 2.029.019c aśūnyaṃ kāryam ekaikaṃ yāvadāgamanaṃ mama 2.029.020a ity uktvā duḥkhitaṃ sarvaṃ janaṃ tam upajīvinam
GE09ram_1-7u:3700: 2.029.020c uvācedaṃ dhanadhyakṣaṃ dhanam ānīyatām iti 2.029.020e tato 'sya dhanam ājahruḥ sarvam evopajīvinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3701: 2.029.021a tataḥ sa puruṣavyāghras tad dhanaṃ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3703: 2.029.022a tatrāsīt piṅgalo gārgyas trijaṭo nāma vai dvijaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3704: 2.029.022c ā pañcamāyāḥ kakṣyāyā nainaṃ kaś cid avārayat
GE09ram_1-7u:3705: 2.029.023a sa rājaputram āsādya trijaṭo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:3706: 2.029.023c nirdhano bahuputro 'smi rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ 2.029.023e uñchavṛttir vane nityaṃ pratyavekṣasva mām iti
GE09ram_1-7u:3707: 2.029.024a tam uvāca tato rāmaḥ parihāsasamanvitam 2.029.024c gavāṃ sahasram apy ekaṃ na tu viśrāṇitaṃ mayā 2.029.024e parikṣipasi daṇḍena yāvat tāvad avāpsyasi 2.029.025a sa śāṭīṃ tvaritaḥ kaṭyāṃ saṃbhrāntaḥ pariveṣṭya tām
GE09ram_1-7u:3708: 2.029.025c āvidhya daṇḍaṃ cikṣepa sarvaprāṇena vegitaḥ 2.029.026a uvāca ca tato rāmas taṃ gārgyam abhisāntvayan
GE09ram_1-7u:3709: 2.029.026c manyur na khalu kartavyaḥ parihāso hy ayaṃ mama 2.029.027a tataḥ sabhāryas trijaṭo mahāmunir; gavām anīkaṃ pratigṛhya
GE09ram_1-7u:3712: 2.030.001a dattvā tu saha vaidehyā brāhmaṇebhyo dhanaṃ bahu
GE09ram_1-7u:3713: 2.030.001c jagmatuḥ pitaraṃ draṣṭuṃ sītayā saha rāghavau
GE09ram_1-7u:3714: 2.030.002a tato gṛhīte duṣprekṣye aśobhetāṃ tadāyudhe 2.030.002c mālādāmabhir āsakte sītayā
GE09ram_1-7u:3716: 2.030.003c adhiruhya janaḥ śrīmān udāsīno vyalokayat 2.030.004a na hi rathyāḥ sma śakyante gantuṃ bahujanākulāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3717: 2.030.004c āruhya tasmāt prāsādān dīnāḥ paśyanti rāghavam
GE09ram_1-7u:3718: 2.030.005a padātiṃ varjitacchatraṃ rāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā tadā janāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3720: 2.030.006a yaṃ yāntam anuyāti sma caturaṅgabalaṃ mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:3721: 2.030.006c tam ekaṃ sītayā sārdham anuyāti sma lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3722: 2.030.007a aiśvaryasya rasajñaḥ san kāmināṃ caiva kāmadaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3723: 2.030.007c necchaty evānṛtaṃ kartuṃ pitaraṃ dharmagauravāt 2.030.008a yā na śakyā purā draṣṭuṃ bhūtair ākāśagair api 2.030.008c tām adya sītāṃ paśyanti rājamārgagatā janāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3725: 2.030.009c varṣam uṣṇaṃ ca śītaṃ ca neṣyaty āśu vivarṇatām 2.030.010a adya nūnaṃ daśarathaḥ sattvam āviśya bhāṣate
GE09ram_1-7u:3726: 2.030.010c na hi rājā priyaṃ putraṃ vivāsayitum arhati
GE09ram_1-7u:3727: 2.030.011a nirguṇasyāpi putrasyā kāthaṃ syād vipravāsanam 2.030.011c kiṃ punar yasya loko 'yaṃ jito vṛttena kevalam
GE09ram_1-7u:3728: 2.030.012a ānṛśaṃsyam anukrośaḥ śrutaṃ śīlaṃ damaḥ śamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3729: 2.030.012c rāghavaṃ śobhayanty ete ṣaḍguṇāḥ puruṣottamam 2.030.013a tasmāt tasyopaghātena prajāḥ paramapīḍitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3731: 2.030.014a pīḍayā pīḍitaṃ sarvaṃ jagad asya jagatpateḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3733: 2.030.015a te lakṣmaṇa iva kṣipraṃ sapatnyaḥ sahabāndhavāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3734: 2.030.015c gacchantam anugacchāmo yena gacchati rāghavaḥ 2.030.016a udyānāni parityajya kṣetrāṇi ca gṛhāṇi ca
GE09ram_1-7u:3740: 2.030.019a vanaṃ nagaram evāstu yena gacchati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3741: 2.030.019c asmābhiś ca parityaktaṃ puraṃ saṃpadyatāṃ vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:3742: 2.030.020a bilāni daṃṣṭriṇaḥ sarve sānūni mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ 2.030.020c asmattyaktaṃ prapadyantāṃ sevyamānaṃ tyajantu ca 2.030.021a ity evaṃ vividhā vāco nānājanasamīritāḥ 2.030.021c śuśrāva rāmaḥ śrutvā ca na vicakre 'sya mānasaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:3744: 2.030.022c jagāma rāmaḥ pitaraṃ didṛkṣuḥ; pitur nideśaṃ vidhivac cikīrṣuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3745: 2.030.023a tat pūrvam aikṣvākasuto mahātmā; rāmo gamiṣyan vanam ārtarūpam
GE09ram_1-7u:3746: 2.030.023c vyatiṣṭhata prekṣya tadā sumantraṃ; pitur mahātmā pratihāraṇārtham
GE09ram_1-7u:3747: 2.030.024a pitur nideśena tu dharmavatsalo; vanapraveśe kṛtabuddhiniścayaḥ 2.030.024c sa rāghavaḥ prekṣya sumantram abravīn; nivedayasvāgamanaṃ nṛpāya me
GE09ram_1-7u:3749: 2.031.001c praviśya nṛpatiṃ sūto niḥśvasantaṃ dadarśa ha
GE09ram_1-7u:3750: 2.031.002a ālokya tu mahāprājñaḥ paramākula cetasaṃ 2.031.002c rāmam evānuśocantaṃ sūtaḥ prāñjalir āsadat 2.031.003a ayaṃ sa puruṣavyāghra dvāri tiṣṭhati te sutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3751: 2.031.003c brāhmaṇebhyo dhanaṃ dattvā sarvaṃ caivopajīvinām 2.031.004a sa tvā paśyatu bhadraṃ te rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3752: 2.031.004c sarvān suhṛda āpṛcchya tvām idānīṃ didṛkṣate
GE09ram_1-7u:3753: 2.031.005a gamiṣyati mahāraṇyaṃ taṃ paśya jagatīpate 2.031.005c vṛtaṃ rājaguṇaiḥ sarvair ādityam iva raśmibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3754: 2.031.006a sa satyavādī dharmātmā gāmbhīryāt sāgaropamaḥ 2.031.006c ākāśa iva niṣpaṅko narendraḥ pratyuvāca tam
GE09ram_1-7u:3755: 2.031.007a sumantrānaya me dārān ye ke cid iha māmakāḥ 2.031.007c dāraiḥ parivṛtaḥ sarvair draṣṭum icchāmi rāghavam
GE09ram_1-7u:3756: 2.031.008a so 'ntaḥpuram atītyaiva striyas tā vākyam abravīt 2.031.008c āryo hvayati vo rājā gamyatāṃ tatra māciram
GE09ram_1-7u:3757: 2.031.009a evam uktāḥ striyaḥ sarvāḥ sumantreṇa nṛpājñayā
GE09ram_1-7u:3758: 2.031.009c pracakramus tad bhavanaṃ bhartur ājñāya śāsanam
GE09ram_1-7u:3759: 2.031.010a ardhasaptaśatās tās tu pramadās tāmralocanāḥ 2.031.010c kausalyāṃ parivāryātha śanair jagmur dhṛtavratāḥ 2.031.011a āgateṣu ca dāreṣu samavekṣya mahīpatiḥ 2.031.011c uvāca rājā taṃ sūtaṃ sumantrānaya me sutam
GE09ram_1-7u:3760: 2.031.012a sa sūto rāmam ādāya lakṣmaṇaṃ maithilīṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:3762: 2.031.013a sa rājā putram āyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā dūrāt kṛtāñjalim
GE09ram_1-7u:3764: 2.031.014a so 'bhidudrāva vegena rāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā viśāṃ patiḥ 2.031.014c tam asaṃprāpya duḥkhārtaḥ papāta bhuvi mūrchitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3765: 2.031.015a taṃ rāmo 'bhyapātat kṣipraṃ lakṣmaṇaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3766: 2.031.015c visaṃjñam iva duḥkhena saśokaṃ nṛpatiṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:3769: 2.031.017a taṃ pariṣvajya bāhubhyāṃ tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:3770: 2.031.017c paryaṅke sītayā sārdhaṃ rudantaḥ samaveśayan 2.031.018a atha rāmo muhūrtena labdhasaṃjñaṃ mahīpatim 2.031.018c uvāca prāñjalir bhūtvā śokārṇavapariplutam
GE09ram_1-7u:3771: 2.031.019a āpṛcche tvāṃ mahārāja sarveṣām īśvaro 'si naḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3772: 2.031.019c prasthitaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ paśya tvaṃ kuśalena mām
GE09ram_1-7u:3773: 2.031.020a lakṣmaṇaṃ cānujānīhi sītā cānveti māṃ vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:3774: 2.031.020c kāraṇair bahubhis tathyair vāryamāṇau na cecchataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3775: 2.031.021a anujānīhi sarvān naḥ śokam utsṛjya mānada
GE09ram_1-7u:3776: 2.031.021c lakṣmaṇaṃ māṃ ca sītāṃ ca prajāpatir iva prajāḥ 2.031.022a pratīkṣamāṇam avyagram anujñāṃ jagatīpateḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3777: 2.031.022c uvāca rarjā saṃprekṣya vanavāsāya rāghavam 2.031.023a ahaṃ rāghava kaikeyyā varadānena mohitaḥ 2.031.023c ayodhyāyās tvam evādya bhava rājā nigṛhya mām
GE09ram_1-7u:3778: 2.031.024a evam ukto nṛpatinā rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3780: 2.031.025a bhavān varṣasahasrāya pṛthivyā nṛpate patiḥ 2.031.025c ahaṃ tv araṇye vatsyāmi na me kāryaṃ tvayānṛtam 2.031.026a śreyase vṛddhaye tāta punarāgamanāya ca 2.031.026c gacchasvāriṣṭam avyagraḥ panthānam akutobhayam
GE09ram_1-7u:3781: 2.031.027a adya tv idānīṃ rajanīṃ putra mā gaccha sarvathā 2.031.027c mātaraṃ māṃ ca saṃpaśyan vasemām adya śarvarīm
GE09ram_1-7u:3782: 2.031.027e tarpitaḥ sarvakāmais tvaṃ śvaḥkāle sādhayiṣyasi 2.031.028a atha rāmas tathā śrutvā pitur ārtasya bhāṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:3783: 2.031.028c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā dīno vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:3784: 2.031.029a prāpsyāmi yān adya guṇān ko me śvastān pradāsyati 2.031.029c apakramaṇam evātaḥ sarvakāmair ahaṃ vṛṇe 2.031.030a iyaṃ sarāṣṭrā sajanā dhanadhānyasamākulā
GE09ram_1-7u:3785: 2.031.030c mayā visṛṣṭā vasudhā bharatāya pradīyatām 2.031.031a apagacchatu te duḥkhaṃ mā bhūr bāṣpapariplutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3786: 2.031.031c na hi kṣubhyati durdharṣaḥ samudraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3787: 2.031.032a naivāhaṃ rājyam icchāmi na sukhaṃ na ca maithilīm 2.031.032c tvām ahaṃ satyam icchāmi nānṛtaṃ puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_1-7u:3788: 2.031.033a puraṃ ca rāṣṭraṃ ca mahī ca kevalā; mayā nisṛṣṭā bharatāya
GE09ram_1-7u:3790: 2.031.033c ahaṃ nideśaṃ bhavato 'nupālayan; vanaṃ gamiṣyāmi cirāya sevitum
GE09ram_1-7u:3791: 2.031.034a mayā nisṛṣṭāṃ bharato mahīm imāṃ; saśailakhaṇḍāṃ sapurāṃ sakānanām
GE09ram_1-7u:3792: 2.031.034c śivāṃ susīmām anuśāstu kevalaṃ; tvayā yad uktaṃ nṛpate yathāstu tat
GE09ram_1-7u:3793: 2.031.035a na me tathā pārthiva dhīyate mano; mahatsu kāmeṣu na cātmanaḥ priye 2.031.035c yathā nideśe tava śiṣṭasaṃmate; vyapaitu duḥkhaṃ tava matkṛte
GE09ram_1-7u:3795: 2.031.036a tad adya naivānagha rājyam avyayaṃ; na sarvakāmān na sukhaṃ na maithilīm
GE09ram_1-7u:3796: 2.031.036c na jīvitaṃ tvām anṛtena yojayan; vṛṇīya satyaṃ vratam astu te tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:3797: 2.031.037a phalāni mūlāni ca bhakṣayan vane; girīṃś ca paśyan saritaḥ sarāṃsi ca
GE09ram_1-7u:3798: 2.031.037c vanaṃ praviśyaiva vicitrapādapaṃ; sukhī bhaviṣyāmi tavāstu
GE09ram_1-7u:3801: 2.032.001c sabāṣpam atiniḥśvasya jagādedaṃ punaḥ punaḥ 2.032.002a sūta ratnasusaṃpūrṇā caturvidhabalā camūḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3803: 2.032.003a rūpājīvā ca śālinyo vaṇijaś ca mahādhanāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3805: 2.032.004a ye cainam upajīvanti ramate yaiś ca vīryataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3806: 2.032.004c teṣāṃ bahuvidhaṃ dattvā tān apy atra niyojaya
GE09ram_1-7u:3807: 2.032.005a nighnan mṛgān kuñjarāṃś ca pibaṃś cāraṇyakaṃ madhu
GE09ram_1-7u:3808: 2.032.005c nadīś ca vividhāḥ paśyan na rājyaṃ saṃsmariṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:3809: 2.032.006a dhānyakośaś ca yaḥ kaś cid dhanakośaś ca māmakaḥ 2.032.006c tau rāmam anugacchetāṃ vasantaṃ nirjane vane
GE09ram_1-7u:3810: 2.032.007a yajan puṇyeṣu deśeṣu visṛjaṃś cāptadakṣiṇāḥ 2.032.007c ṛṣibhiś ca samāgamya pravatsyati sukhaṃ vane
GE09ram_1-7u:3811: 2.032.008a bharataś ca mahābāhur ayodhyāṃ pālayiṣyati 2.032.008c sarvakāmaiḥ punaḥ śrīmān rāmaḥ saṃsādhyatām iti
GE09ram_1-7u:3812: 2.032.009a evaṃ bruvati kākutsthe kaikeyyā bhayam āgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:3813: 2.032.009c mukhaṃ cāpy agamāc cheṣaṃ svaraś cāpi nyarudhyata
GE09ram_1-7u:3814: 2.032.010a sā viṣaṇṇā ca saṃtrastā kaikeyī vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:3815: 2.032.010c rājyaṃ gatajanaṃ sādho pītamaṇḍāṃ surām iva
GE09ram_1-7u:3819: 2.032.011e vahantaṃ kiṃ tudasi māṃ niyujya dhuri māhite
GE09ram_1-7u:3820: 2.032.012a kaikeyī dviguṇaṃ kruddhā rājānam idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:3821: 2.032.012c tavaiva vaṃśe sagaro jyeṣṭhaṃ putram upārudhat
GE09ram_1-7u:3822: 2.032.012e asamañja iti khyātaṃ tathāyaṃ gantum arhati
GE09ram_1-7u:3823: 2.032.013a evam ukto dhig ity eva rājā daśaratho 'bravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:3824: 2.032.013c vrīḍitaś ca janaḥ sarvaḥ sā ca tan nāvabudhyata 2.032.014a tatra vṛddho mahāmātraḥ siddhārtho nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3825: 2.032.014c śucir bahumato rājñaḥ kaikeyīm idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:3826: 2.032.015a asamañjo gṛhītvā tu krīḍitaḥ pathi dārakān
GE09ram_1-7u:3827: 2.032.015c sarayvāḥ prakṣipann apsu ramate tena durmatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3828: 2.032.016a taṃ dṛṣṭvā nāgaraḥ sarve kruddhā rājānam abruvan
GE09ram_1-7u:3829: 2.032.016c asamañjaṃ vṛṣīṇvaikam asmān vā rāṣṭravardhana 2.032.017a tān uvāca tato rājā kiṃnimittam idaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_1-7u:3830: 2.032.017c tāś cāpi rājñā saṃpṛṣṭā vākyaṃ prakṛtayo 'bruvan
GE09ram_1-7u:3831: 2.032.018a krīḍitas tv eṣa naḥ putrān bālān udbhrāntacetanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3832: 2.032.018c sarayvāṃ prakṣipan maurkhyād atulāṃ prītim aśnute
GE09ram_1-7u:3833: 2.032.019a sa tāsāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā prakṛtīnāṃ narādhipa
GE09ram_1-7u:3834: 2.032.019c taṃ tatyājāhitaṃ putraṃ tāsāṃ priyacikīrṣayā 2.032.020a ity evam atyajad rājā sagaro vai sudhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3835: 2.032.020c rāmaḥ kim akarot pāpaṃ yenaivam uparudhyate
GE09ram_1-7u:3836: 2.032.021a śrutvā tu siddhārthavaco rājā śrāntatarasvanaḥ 2.032.021c śokopahatayā vācā kaikeyīm idam abravīt 2.032.022a anuvrajiṣyāmy aham adya rāmaṃ; rājyaṃ parityajya sukhaṃ dhanaṃ ca 2.032.022c sahaiva rājñā bharatena ca tvaṃ; yathā sukhaṃ bhuṅkṣva cirāya rājyam 2.033.001a mahāmātravacaḥ śrutvā rāmo daśarathaṃ tadā 2.033.001c anvabhāṣata vākyaṃ tu vinayajño vinītavat 2.033.002a tyaktabhogasya me rājan vane vanyena jīvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3837: 2.033.002c kiṃ kāryam anuyātreṇa tyaktasaṅgasya sarvataḥ 2.033.003a yo hi dattvā dvipaśreṣṭhaṃ kakṣyāyāṃ kurute manaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3838: 2.033.003c rajjusnehena kiṃ tasya tyajataḥ kuñjarottamam 2.033.004a tathā mama satāṃ śreṣṭha kiṃ dhvajinyā jagatpate
GE09ram_1-7u:3839: 2.033.004c sarvāṇy evānujānāmi cīrāṇy evānayantu me 2.033.005a khanitrapiṭake cobhe mamānayata
GE09ram_1-7u:3840: 2.033.005c caturdaśa vane vāsaṃ varṣāṇi vasato mama
GE09ram_1-7u:3841: 2.033.006a atha cīrāṇi kaikeyī svayam āhṛtya rāghavam
GE09ram_1-7u:3843: 2.033.007a sa cīre puruṣavyāghraḥ kaikeyyāḥ pratigṛhya te
GE09ram_1-7u:3844: 2.033.007c sūkṣmavastram avakṣipya munivastrāṇy avasta ha 2.033.008a lakṣmaṇaś cāpi tatraiva vihāya vasane śubhe
GE09ram_1-7u:3845: 2.033.008c tāpasāc chādane caiva jagrāha pitur agrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3847: 2.033.009c samīkṣya cīraṃ saṃtrastā pṛṣatī vāgurām iva
GE09ram_1-7u:3848: 2.033.010a sā vyapatrapamāṇeva pratigṛhya ca durmanāḥ 2.033.010c gandharvarājapratimaṃ bhartāram idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:3849: 2.033.010e kathaṃ nu cīraṃ badhnanti munayo vanavāsinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3850: 2.033.011a kṛtvā kaṇṭhe ca sā cīram ekam ādāya pāṇinā 2.033.011c tasthau hy akuṣalā tatra vrīḍitā janakātmaja
GE09ram_1-7u:3851: 2.033.012a tasyās tat kṣipram āgamya rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3852: 2.033.012c cīraṃ babandha sītāyāḥ kauśeyasyopari svayam 2.033.013a tasyāṃ cīraṃ vasānāyāṃ nāthavatyām anāthavat 2.033.013c pracukrośa janaḥ sarvo dhik tvāṃ daśarathaṃ tv iti 2.033.014a sa niḥśvasyoṣṇam aikṣvākas tāṃ bhāryām idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:3853: 2.033.014c kaikeyi kuśacīreṇa na sītā gantum arhati
GE09ram_1-7u:3854: 2.033.015a nanu paryāptam etat te pāpe rāmavivāsanam
GE09ram_1-7u:3855: 2.033.015c kim ebhiḥ kṛpaṇair bhūyaḥ pātakair api te kṛtaiḥ 2.033.016a evaṃ bruvantaṃ pitaraṃ rāmaḥ saṃprasthito vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:3856: 2.033.016c avākśirasam āsīnam idaṃ vacanam abravīt 2.033.017a iyaṃ dhārmika kausalyā mama mātā yaśasvinī
GE09ram_1-7u:3857: 2.033.017c vṛddhā cākṣudraśīlā ca na ca tvāṃ devagarhite
GE09ram_1-7u:3858: 2.033.018a mayā vihīnāṃ varada prapannāṃ śokasāgaram 2.033.018c adṛṣṭapūrvavyasanāṃ bhūyaḥ saṃmantum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:3861: 2.033.019c yathā vanasthe mayi śokakarśitā; na jīvitaṃ nyasya yamakṣayaṃ vrajet 2.034.001a rāmasya tu vacaḥ śrutvā muniveṣadharaṃ ca tam
GE09ram_1-7u:3862: 2.034.001c samīkṣya saha bhāryābhī rājā vigatacetanaḥ 2.034.002a nainaṃ duḥkhena saṃtaptaḥ pratyavaikṣata rāghavam 2.034.002c na cainam abhisaṃprekṣya pratyabhāṣata durmanāḥ 2.034.003a sa muhūrtam ivāsaṃjño duḥkhitaś ca mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3864: 2.034.004a manye khalu mayā pūrvaṃ vivatsā bahavaḥ kṛtāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3865: 2.034.004c prāṇino hiṃsitā vāpi tasmād idam upasthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:3866: 2.034.005a na tv evānāgate kāle dehāc cyavati jīvitam
GE09ram_1-7u:3867: 2.034.005c kaikeyyā kliśyamānasya mṛtyur mama na vidyate
GE09ram_1-7u:3869: 2.034.006c vihāya vasane sūkṣme tāpasācchādam ātmajam 2.034.007a ekasyāḥ khalu kaikeyyāḥ kṛte 'yaṃ kliśyate janaḥ 2.034.007c svārthe prayatamānāyāḥ saṃśritya nikṛtiṃ tv imām
GE09ram_1-7u:3870: 2.034.008a evam uktvā tu vacanaṃ bāṣpeṇa pihitekṣṇaha
GE09ram_1-7u:3871: 2.034.008c rāmeti sakṛd evoktvā vyāhartuṃ na śaśāka ha
GE09ram_1-7u:3872: 2.034.009a saṃjñāṃ tu pratilabhyaiva muhūrtāt sa mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3873: 2.034.009c netrābhyām aśrupūrṇābhyāṃ sumantram idam abravīt 2.034.010a aupavāhyaṃ rathaṃ yuktvā tvam āyāhi hayottamaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3874: 2.034.010c prāpayainaṃ mahābhāgam ito janapadāt param 2.034.011a evaṃ manye guṇavatāṃ guṇānāṃ phalam ucyate
GE09ram_1-7u:3875: 2.034.011c pitrā mātrā ca yat sādhur vīro nirvāsyate vanam 2.034.012a rājño vacanam ājñāya sumantraḥ śīghravikramaḥ 2.034.012c yojayitvāyayau tatra ratham aśvair alaṃkṛtam 2.034.013a taṃ rathaṃ rājaputrāya sūtaḥ kanakabhūṣitam 2.034.013c ācacakṣe 'ñjaliṃ kṛtvā yuktaṃ paramavājibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3876: 2.034.014a rājā satvaram āhūya vyāpṛtaṃ vittasaṃcaye 2.034.014c uvāca deśakālajño niścitaṃ sarvataḥ śuci 2.034.015a vāsāṃsi ca mahārhāṇi bhūṣaṇāni varāṇi ca
GE09ram_1-7u:3877: 2.034.015c varṣāṇy etāni saṃkhyāya vaidehyāḥ kṣipram ānaya
GE09ram_1-7u:3878: 2.034.016a narendreṇaivam uktas tu gatvā kośagṛhaṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3879: 2.034.016c prāyacchat sarvam āhṛtya sītāyai kṣipram eva tat
GE09ram_1-7u:3880: 2.034.017a sā sujātā sujātāni vaidehī prasthitā vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:3881: 2.034.017c bhūṣayām āsa gātrāṇi tair vicitrair vibhūṣaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3882: 2.034.018a vyarājayata vaidehī veśma tat suvibhūṣitā 2.034.018c udyato 'ṃśumataḥ kāle khaṃ prabheva vivasvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3883: 2.034.019a tāṃ bhujābhyāṃ pariṣvajya śvaśrūr vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:3884: 2.034.019c anācarantīṃ kṛpaṇaṃ mūdhny upāghrāya maithilīm 2.034.020a asatyaḥ sarvaloke 'smin satataṃ satkṛtāḥ priyaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3886: 2.034.021a sa tvayā nāvamantavyaḥ putraḥ pravrājito mama
GE09ram_1-7u:3887: 2.034.021c tava daivatam astv eṣa nirdhanaḥ sadhano 'pi vā
GE09ram_1-7u:3888: 2.034.022a vijñāya vacanaṃ sītā tasyā dharmārthasaṃhitam 2.034.022c kṛtāñjalir uvācedaṃ śvaśrūm abhimukhe sthitā 2.034.023a kariṣye sarvam evāham āryā yad anuśāsti mām
GE09ram_1-7u:3889: 2.034.023c abhijñāsmi yathā bhartur vartitavyaṃ śrutaṃ ca me
GE09ram_1-7u:3890: 2.034.024a na mām asajjanenāryā samānayitum arhati 2.034.024c dharmād vicalituṃ nāham alaṃ candrād iva prabhā
GE09ram_1-7u:3891: 2.034.025a nātantrī vādyate vīṇā nācakro vartate rathaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3892: 2.034.025c nāpatiḥ sukham edhate yā syād api śatātmajā
GE09ram_1-7u:3893: 2.034.026a mitaṃ dadāti hi pitā mitaṃ mātā mitaṃ sutaḥ 2.034.026c amitasya hi dātāraṃ bhartāraṃ kā na pūjayet
GE09ram_1-7u:3895: 2.034.027c ārye kim avamanyeyaṃ strīṇāṃ bhartā hi daivatam
GE09ram_1-7u:3896: 2.034.028a sītāyā vacanaṃ śrutvā kausalyā hṛdayaṃgamam 2.034.028c śuddhasattvā mumocāśru sahasā duḥkhaharṣajam
GE09ram_1-7u:3898: 2.034.029c rāmaḥ paramadharmajño mātaraṃ vākyam abravīt 2.034.030a amba mā duḥkhitā bhūs tvaṃ paśya tvaṃ pitaraṃ mama
GE09ram_1-7u:3899: 2.034.030c kṣayo hi vanavāsasya kṣipram eva bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:3900: 2.034.031a suptāyās te gamiṣyanti navavarṣāṇi pañca ca
GE09ram_1-7u:3901: 2.034.031c sā samagram iha prāptaṃ māṃ drakṣyasi suhṛdvṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:3902: 2.034.032a etāvad abhinītārtham uktvā sa jananīṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3903: 2.034.032c trayaḥ śataśatārdhā hi dadarśāvekṣya mātaraḥ 2.034.033a tāś cāpi sa tathaivārtā mātṝr daśarathātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3904: 2.034.033c dharmayuktam idaṃ vākyaṃ nijagāda kṛtāñjaliḥ 2.034.034a saṃvāsāt paruṣaṃ kiṃ cid ajñānād vāpi yat kṛtam 2.034.034c tan me samanujānīta sarvāś cāmantrayāmi vaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3905: 2.034.035a jajñe 'tha tāsāṃ saṃnādaḥ krauñcīnām iva niḥsvanaḥ 2.034.035c mānavendrasya bhāryāṇām evaṃ vadati rāghave 2.034.036a murajapaṇavameghaghoṣavad; daśarathaveśma babhūva yat purā
GE09ram_1-7u:3906: 2.034.036c vilapita paridevanākulaṃ; vyasanagataṃ tad abhūt suduḥkhitam
GE09ram_1-7u:3907: 2.035.001a atha rāmaś ca sītā ca lakṣmaṇaś ca kṛtāñjaliḥ 2.035.001c upasaṃgṛhya rājānaṃ cakrur dīnāḥ pradakṣiṇam 2.035.002a taṃ cāpi samanujñāpya dharmajñaḥ sītayā saha
GE09ram_1-7u:3909: 2.035.003a anvakṣaṃ lakṣmaṇo bhrātuḥ kausalyām abhyavādayat 2.035.003c atha mātuḥ sumitrāyā jagrāha caraṇau punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3910: 2.035.004a taṃ vandamānaṃ rudatī mātā saumitrim abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:3911: 2.035.004c hitakāmā mahābāhuṃ mūrdhny upāghrāya lakṣmaṇam 2.035.005a sṛṣṭas tvaṃ vanavāsāya svanuraktaḥ suhṛjjane 2.035.005c rāme pramādaṃ mā kārṣīḥ putra bhrātari gacchati
GE09ram_1-7u:3912: 2.035.006a vyasanī vā samṛddho vā gatir eṣa tavānagha
GE09ram_1-7u:3913: 2.035.006c eṣa loke satāṃ dharmo yaj jyeṣṭhavaśago bhavet
GE09ram_1-7u:3914: 2.035.007a idaṃ hi vṛttam ucitaṃ kulasyāsya sanātanam
GE09ram_1-7u:3915: 2.035.007c dānaṃ dīkṣā ca yajñeṣu tanutyāgo mṛdheṣu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:3916: 2.035.008a rāmaṃ daśarathaṃ viddhi māṃ viddhi janakātmajām
GE09ram_1-7u:3917: 2.035.008c ayodhyām aṭavīṃ viddhi gaccha tāta yathāsukham
GE09ram_1-7u:3918: 2.035.009a tataḥ sumantraḥ kākutsthaṃ prāñjalir vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:3919: 2.035.009c vinīto vinayajñaś ca mātalir vāsavaṃ yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:3920: 2.035.010a ratham āroha bhadraṃ te rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3921: 2.035.010c kṣipraṃ tvāṃ prāpayiṣyāmi yatra māṃ rāma vakṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:3922: 2.035.011a caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi vastavyāni vane tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:3923: 2.035.011c tāny upakramitavyāni yāni devyāsi coditaḥ 2.035.012a taṃ rathaṃ sūryasaṃkāśaṃ sītā hṛṣṭena cetasā
GE09ram_1-7u:3926: 2.035.013c rathopasthe pratinyasya sacarmakaṭhinaṃ ca tat 2.035.014a sītātṛtīyān ārūḍhān dṛṣṭvā dhṛṣṭam acodayat 2.035.014c sumantraḥ saṃmatān aśvān vāyuvegasamāñ jave 2.035.015a prayāte tu mahāraṇyaṃ cirarātrāya rāghave 2.035.015c babhūva nagare mūrcchā balamūrcchā janasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:3929: 2.035.017a tataḥ sabālavṛddhā sā purī paramapīḍitā 2.035.017c rāmam evābhidudrāva gharmārtaḥ salilaṃ yathā 2.035.018a pārśvataḥ pṛṣṭhataś cāpi lambamānās tadunmukhāḥ 2.035.018c bāṣpapūrṇamukhāḥ sarve tam ūcur bhṛśaduḥkhitāḥ 2.035.019a saṃyaccha vājināṃ raśmīn sūta yāhi śanaiḥ śanaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3930: 2.035.019c mukhaṃ drakṣyāmi rāmasya durdarśaṃ no bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:3931: 2.035.020a āyasaṃ hṛdayaṃ nūnaṃ rāmamātur asaṃśayam 2.035.020c yad devagarbhapratime vanaṃ yāti na bhidyate
GE09ram_1-7u:3932: 2.035.021a kṛtakṛtyā hi vaidehī chāyevānugatā patim 2.035.021c na jahāti ratā dharme merum arkaprabhā yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:3933: 2.035.022a aho lakṣmaṇa siddhārthaḥ satatāṃ priyavādinam 2.035.022c bhrātaraṃ devasaṃkāśaṃ yas tvaṃ paricariṣyasi 2.035.023a mahaty eṣā hi te siddhir eṣa cābhyudayo mahān 2.035.023c eṣa svargasya mārgaś ca yad enam anugacchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:3934: 2.035.023e evaṃ vadantas te soḍhuṃ na śekur bāṣpam āgatam 2.035.024a atha rājā vṛtaḥ strībhir dīnābhir dīnacetanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3935: 2.035.024c nirjagāma priyaṃ putraṃ drakṣyāmīti bruvan gṛhāt
GE09ram_1-7u:3936: 2.035.025a śuśruve cāgrataḥ strīṇāṃ rudantīnāṃ mahāsvanaḥ 2.035.025c yathā nādaḥ kareṇūnāṃ baddhe mahati kuñjare
GE09ram_1-7u:3937: 2.035.026a pitā ca rājā kākutsthaḥ śrīmān sannas tadā babhau 2.035.026c paripūrṇaḥ śaśī kāle graheṇopapluto yathā 2.035.027a tato halahalāśabdo jajñe rāmasya pṛṣṭhataḥ 2.035.027c narāṇāṃ prekṣya rājānaṃ sīdantaṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitam 2.035.028a hā rāmeti janāḥ ke cid rāmamāteti cāpare
GE09ram_1-7u:3938: 2.035.028c antaḥpuraṃ samṛddhaṃ ca krośantaṃ paryadevayan 2.035.029a anvīkṣamāṇo rāmas tu viṣaṇṇaṃ bhrāntacetasaṃ 2.035.029c rājānaṃ mātaraṃ caiva dadarśānugatau pathi 2.035.029e dharmapāśena saṃkṣiptaḥ prakāśaṃ nābhyudaikṣata
GE09ram_1-7u:3939: 2.035.030a padātinau ca yānārhāv aduḥkhārhau sukhocitau 2.035.030c dṛṣṭvā saṃcodayām āsa śīghraṃ yāhīti sārathim
GE09ram_1-7u:3940: 2.035.031a na hi tat puruṣavyāghro duḥkhadaṃ darśanaṃ pituḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3941: 2.035.031c mātuś ca sahituṃ śaktas totrārdita iva dvipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3942: 2.035.032a tathā rudantīṃ kausalyāṃ rathaṃ tam anudhāvatīm
GE09ram_1-7u:3943: 2.035.032c krośantīṃ rāma rāmeti hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca
GE09ram_1-7u:3944: 2.035.032e asakṛt praikṣata tadā nṛtyantīm iva mātaram
GE09ram_1-7u:3945: 2.035.033a tiṣṭheti rājā cukroṣa yāhi yāhīti rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3946: 2.035.033c sumantrasya babhūvātmā cakrayor iva cāntarā 2.035.034a nāśrauṣam iti rājānam upālabdho 'pi vakṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:3947: 2.035.034c ciraṃ duḥkhasya pāpiṣṭham iti rāmas tam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:3948: 2.035.035a rāmasya sa vacaḥ kurvann anujñāpya ca taṃ janam 2.035.035c vrajato 'pi hayāñ śīghraṃ codayām āsa sārathiḥ 2.035.036a nyavartata jano rājño rāmaṃ kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:3949: 2.035.036c manasāpy aśruvegaiś ca na nyavartata mānuṣam
GE09ram_1-7u:3950: 2.035.037a yam icchet punar āyāntaṃ nainaṃ dūram anuvrajet
GE09ram_1-7u:3951: 2.035.037c ity amātyā mahārājam ūcur daśarathaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3952: 2.035.038a teṣāṃ vacaḥ sarvaguṇopapannaṃ; prasvinnagātraḥ praviṣaṇṇarūpaḥ 2.035.038c niśamya rājā kṛpaṇaḥ sabhāryo; vyavasthitas taṃ sutam īkṣamāṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3953: 2.036.001a tasmiṃs tu puruṣavyāghre niṣkrāmati kṛtāñjalau 2.036.001c ārtaśabdo hi saṃjajñe strīṇām antaḥpure mahān
GE09ram_1-7u:3955: 2.036.002c yo gatiṃ śaraṇaṃ cāsīt sa nāthaḥ kva nu gacchati
GE09ram_1-7u:3956: 2.036.003a na krudhyaty abhiśasto 'pi krodhanīyāni varjayan 2.036.003c kruddhān prasādayan sarvān samaduḥkhaḥ kva gacchati
GE09ram_1-7u:3957: 2.036.004a kausalyāyāṃ mahātejā yathā mātari vartate 2.036.004c tathā yo vartate 'smāsu mahātmā kva nu gacchati
GE09ram_1-7u:3958: 2.036.005a kaikeyyā kliśyamānena rājñā saṃcodito vanam 2.036.005c paritrātā janasyāsya jagataḥ kva nu gacchati
GE09ram_1-7u:3959: 2.036.006a aho niścetano rājā jīvalokasya saṃpriyam 2.036.006c dharmyaṃ satyavrataṃ rāmaṃ vanavāso pravatsyati 2.036.007a iti sarvā mahiṣyas tā vivatsā iva dhenavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3960: 2.036.007c ruruduś caiva duḥkhārtāḥ sasvaraṃ ca vicukruśuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3961: 2.036.008a sa tam antaḥpure ghoram ārtaśabdaṃ mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3964: 2.036.009c vyasṛjan kavalān nāgā gāvo vatsān na pāyayan
GE09ram_1-7u:3965: 2.036.010a triśaṅkur lohitāṅgaś ca bṛhaspatibudhāv api 2.036.010c dāruṇāḥ somam abhyetya grahāḥ sarve vyavasthitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3966: 2.036.011a nakṣatrāṇi gatārcīṃṣi grahāś ca gatatejasaḥ 2.036.011c viśākhāś ca sadhūmāś ca nabhasi pracakāśire
GE09ram_1-7u:3967: 2.036.012a akasmān nāgaraḥ sarvo jano dainyam upāgamat
GE09ram_1-7u:3968: 2.036.012c āhāre vā vihāre vā na kaś cid akaron manaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3970: 2.036.013c na hṛṣṭo lakṣyate kaś cit sarvaḥ śokaparāyaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3971: 2.036.014a na vāti pavanaḥ śīto na śaśī saumyadarśanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3972: 2.036.014c na sūryas tapate lokaṃ sarvaṃ paryākulaṃ jagat
GE09ram_1-7u:3973: 2.036.015a anarthinaḥ sutāḥ strīṇāṃ bhartāro bhrātaras tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:3974: 2.036.015c sarve sarvaṃ parityajya rāmam evānvacintayan 2.036.016a ye tu rāmasya suhṛdaḥ sarve te mūḍhacetasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3975: 2.036.016c śokabhāreṇa cākrāntāḥ śayanaṃ na juhus tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:3976: 2.036.017a tatas tv ayodhyā rahitā mahātmanā; puraṃdareṇeva mahī saparvatā
GE09ram_1-7u:3977: 2.036.017c cacāla ghoraṃ bhayabhārapīḍitā; sanāgayodhāśvagaṇā nanāda ca
GE09ram_1-7u:3978: 2.037.001a yāvat tu niryatas tasya rajorūpam adṛśyata
GE09ram_1-7u:3980: 2.037.002a yāvad rājā priyaṃ putraṃ paśyaty atyantadhārmikam
GE09ram_1-7u:3982: 2.037.003a na paśyati rajo 'py asya yadā rāmasya bhūmipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:3983: 2.037.003c tadārtaś ca viṣaṇṇaś ca papāta dharaṇītale
GE09ram_1-7u:3984: 2.037.004a tasya dakṣiṇam anvagāt kausalyā bāhum aṅganā
GE09ram_1-7u:3985: 2.037.004c vāmaṃ cāsyānvagāt pārśvaṃ kaikeyī bharatapriyā 2.037.005a tāṃ nayena ca saṃpanno dharmeṇa nivayena ca
GE09ram_1-7u:3986: 2.037.005c uvāca rājā kaikeyīṃ samīkṣya vyathitendriyaḥ 2.037.006a kaikeyi mā mamāṅgāni sprākṣīs tvaṃ duṣṭacāriṇī
GE09ram_1-7u:3987: 2.037.006c na hi tvāṃ draṣṭum icchāmi na bhāryā na ca bāndhavī
GE09ram_1-7u:3988: 2.037.007a ye ca tvām upajīvanti nāhaṃ teṣāṃ na te mama
GE09ram_1-7u:3989: 2.037.007c kevalārthaparāṃ hi tvāṃ tyaktadharmāṃ tyajāmy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:3990: 2.037.008a agṛhṇāṃ yac ca te pāṇim agniṃ paryaṇayaṃ ca yat
GE09ram_1-7u:3991: 2.037.008c anujānāmi tat sarvam asmiṃl loke paratra ca
GE09ram_1-7u:3992: 2.037.009a bharataś cet pratītaḥ syād rājyaṃ prāpyedam avyayam
GE09ram_1-7u:3993: 2.037.009c yan me sa dadyāt pitrarthaṃ mā mā tad dattam āgamat
GE09ram_1-7u:3994: 2.037.010a atha reṇusamudhvastaṃ tam utthāpya narādhipam 2.037.010c nyavartata tadā devī kausalyā śokakarśitā 2.037.011a hatveva brāhmaṇaṃ kāmāt spṛṣṭvāgnim iva pāṇinā
GE09ram_1-7u:3995: 2.037.011c anvatapyata dharmātmā putraṃ saṃcintya tāpasaṃ 2.037.012a nivṛtyaiva nivṛtyaiva sīdato rathavartmasu
GE09ram_1-7u:3996: 2.037.012c rājño nātibabhau rūpaṃ grastasyāṃśumato yathā 2.037.013a vilalāpa ca duḥkhārtaḥ priyaṃ putram anusmaran
GE09ram_1-7u:3997: 2.037.013c nagarāntam anuprāptaṃ buddhvā putram athābravīt 2.037.014a vāhanānāṃ ca mukhyānāṃ vahatāṃ taṃ mamātmajam
GE09ram_1-7u:3998: 2.037.014c padāni pathi dṛśyante sa mahātmā na dṛśyate
GE09ram_1-7u:3999: 2.037.015a sa nūnaṃ kva cid evādya vṛkṣamūlam upāśritaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4000: 2.037.015c kāṣṭhaṃ vā yadi vāśmānam upadhāya śayiṣyate
GE09ram_1-7u:4001: 2.037.016a utthāsyati ca medinyāḥ kṛpaṇaḥ pāṃśuguṇṭhitaḥ 2.037.016c viniḥśvasan prasravaṇāt kareṇūnām ivarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4002: 2.037.017a drakṣyanti nūnaṃ puruṣā dīrghabāhuṃ vanecarāḥ 2.037.017c rāmam utthāya gacchantaṃ lokanātham anāthavat 2.037.018a sakāmā bhava kaikeyi vidhavā rājyam āvasa
GE09ram_1-7u:4003: 2.037.018c na hi taṃ puruṣavyāghraṃ vinā jīvitum utsahe
GE09ram_1-7u:4004: 2.037.019a ity evaṃ vilapan rājā janaughenābhisaṃvṛtaḥ 2.037.019c apasnāta ivāriṣṭaṃ praviveśa
GE09ram_1-7u:4005: 2.037.020a śūnyacatvaraveśmāntāṃ saṃvṛtāpaṇadevatām 2.037.020c klāntadurbaladuḥkhārtāṃ nātyākīrṇamahāpathām 2.037.021a tām avekṣya purīṃ sarvāṃ rāmam evānucintayan
GE09ram_1-7u:4006: 2.037.021c vilapan prāviśad rājā gṛhaṃ sūrya ivāmbudam
GE09ram_1-7u:4008: 2.037.022c rāmeṇa rahitaṃ veśma vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca
GE09ram_1-7u:4009: 2.037.023a kausalyāyā gṛhaṃ śīghraṃ rāma mātur nayantu mām
GE09ram_1-7u:4010: 2.037.023c iti bruvantaṃ rājānam anayan dvāradarśitaḥ 2.037.024a tatas tatra praviṣṭasya kausalyāyā niveśanam 2.037.024c adhiruhyāpi śayanaṃ babhūva lulitaṃ manaḥ 2.037.025a tac ca dṛṣṭvā mahārājo bhujam udyamya vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:4011: 2.037.025c uccaiḥ svareṇa cukrośa hā rāghava jahāsi mām
GE09ram_1-7u:4012: 2.037.026a sukhitā bata taṃ kālaṃ jīviṣyanti narottamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4013: 2.037.026c pariṣvajanto ye rāmaṃ drakṣyanti punar āgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:4014: 2.037.027a na tvāṃ paśyāmi kausalye sādhu māṃ pāṇinā spṛśa 2.037.027c rāmaṃ me 'nugatā dṛṣṭir adyāpi na nivartate
GE09ram_1-7u:4015: 2.037.028a taṃ rāmam evānuvicintayantaṃ; samīkṣya devī śayane narendram
GE09ram_1-7u:4017: 2.038.001a tataḥ samīkṣya śayane sannaṃ śokena pārthivam
GE09ram_1-7u:4018: 2.038.001c kausalyā putraśokārtā tam uvāca mahīpatim 2.038.002a rāghavo naraśārdūla viṣam uptvā dvijihvavat 2.038.002c vicariṣyati kaikeyī nirmukteva hi pannagī 2.038.003a vivāsya rāmaṃ subhagā labdhakāmā samāhitā 2.038.003c trāsayiṣyati māṃ bhūyo duṣṭāhir iva veśmani
GE09ram_1-7u:4019: 2.038.004a atha sma nagare rāmaś caran bhaikṣaṃ gṛhe vaset 2.038.004c kāmakāro varaṃ dātum api dāsaṃ mamātmajam
GE09ram_1-7u:4020: 2.038.005a pātayitvā tu kaikeyyā rāmaṃ sthānād yatheṣṭataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4023: 2.038.006c vanam āviśate nūnaṃ sabhāryaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ 2.038.007a vane tv adṛṣṭaduḥkhānāṃ kaikeyyānumate tvayā 2.038.007c tyaktānāṃ vanavāsāya kā nv avasthā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:4024: 2.038.008a te ratnahīnās taruṇāḥ phalakāle vivāsitāḥ 2.038.008c kathaṃ vatsyanti kṛpaṇāḥ phalamūlaiḥ kṛtāśanāḥ 2.038.009a apīdānīṃ sa kālaḥ syān mama śokakṣayaḥ śivaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4025: 2.038.009c sabhāryaṃ yat saha bhrātrā paśyeyam iha rāghavam
GE09ram_1-7u:4028: 2.038.011a kadā prekṣya naravyāghrāv araṇyāt punarāgatau 2.038.011c nandiṣyati purī hṛṣṭā samudra iva parvaṇi
GE09ram_1-7u:4029: 2.038.012a kadāyodhyāṃ mahābāhuḥ purīṃ vīraḥ pravekṣyati 2.038.012c puraskṛtya rathe sītāṃ vṛṣabho govadhūm iva
GE09ram_1-7u:4032: 2.038.014a kadā sumanasaḥ kanyā dvijātīnāṃ phalāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:4033: 2.038.014c pradiśantyaḥ purīṃ hṛṣṭāḥ kariṣyanti pradakṣiṇam 2.038.015a kadā pariṇato buddhyā vayasā cāmaraprabhaḥ 2.038.015c abhyupaiṣyati dharmajñas trivarṣa iva māṃ lalan
GE09ram_1-7u:4034: 2.038.016a niḥsaṃśayaṃ mayā manye purā vīra kadaryayā
GE09ram_1-7u:4035: 2.038.016c pātu kāmeṣu vatseṣu mātṝṇāṃ śātitāḥ stanāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4036: 2.038.017a sāhaṃ gaur iva siṃhena vivatsā vatsalā kṛtā
GE09ram_1-7u:4037: 2.038.017c kaikeyyā puruṣavyāghra bālavatseva gaur balāt 2.038.018a na hi tāvad guṇair juṣṭaṃ sarvaśāstraviśāradam
GE09ram_1-7u:4038: 2.038.018c ekaputrā vinā putram ahaṃ jīvitum utsahe
GE09ram_1-7u:4039: 2.038.019a na hi me jīvite kiṃ cit sāmartham iha kalpyate
GE09ram_1-7u:4040: 2.038.019c apaśyantyāḥ priyaṃ putraṃ mahābāhuṃ mahābalam 2.038.020a ayaṃ hi māṃ dīpayate samutthitas; tanūjaśokaprabhavo hutāśanaḥ 2.038.020c mahīm imāṃ raśmibhir uttamaprabho; yathā nidāghe bhagavān
GE09ram_1-7u:4042: 2.039.001a vilapantīṃ tathā tāṃ tu kausalyāṃ pramadottamām
GE09ram_1-7u:4043: 2.039.001c idaṃ dharme sthitā dharmyaṃ sumitrā vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:4044: 2.039.002a tavārye sadguṇair yuktaḥ putraḥ sa puruṣottamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4045: 2.039.002c kiṃ te vilapitenaivaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ ruditena vā
GE09ram_1-7u:4046: 2.039.003a yas tavārye gataḥ putras tyaktvā rājyaṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4047: 2.039.003c sādhu kurvan mahātmānaṃ pitaraṃ satyavādinām 2.039.004a śiṣṭair ācarite samyak śaśvat pretya phalodaye
GE09ram_1-7u:4048: 2.039.004c rāmo dharme sthitaḥ śreṣṭho na sa śocyaḥ kadā cana
GE09ram_1-7u:4050: 2.039.005c dayāvān sarvabhūteṣu lābhas tasya mahātmanaḥ 2.039.006a araṇyavāse yad duḥkhaṃ jānatī vai sukhocitā
GE09ram_1-7u:4052: 2.039.007a kīrtibhūtāṃ patākāṃ yo loke bhrāmayati prabhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4053: 2.039.007c damasatyavrataparaḥ kiṃ na prāptas tavātmajaḥ 2.039.008a vyaktaṃ rāmasya vijñāya śaucaṃ māhātmyam uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:4054: 2.039.008c na gātram aṃśubhiḥ sūryaḥ saṃtāpayitum arhati
GE09ram_1-7u:4055: 2.039.009a śivaḥ sarveṣu kāleṣu kānanebhyo viniḥsṛtaḥ 2.039.009c rāghavaṃ yuktaśītoṣṇaḥ seviṣyati sukho 'nilaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4057: 2.039.010c raśmibhiḥ saṃspṛśañ śītaiś candramā hlādayiṣyati 2.039.011a dadau cāstrāṇi divyāni yasmai brahmā mahaujase
GE09ram_1-7u:4058: 2.039.011c dānavendraṃ hataṃ dṛṣṭvā timidhvajasutaṃ raṇe 2.039.012a pṛthivyā saha vaidehyā śriyā ca puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4060: 2.039.013a duḥkhajaṃ visṛjanty asraṃ niṣkrāmantam udīkṣya yam
GE09ram_1-7u:4061: 2.039.013c samutsrakṣyasi netrābhyāṃ kṣipram ānandajaṃ payaḥ 2.039.014a abhivādayamānaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā sasuhṛdaṃ sutam 2.039.014c mudāśru mokṣyase kṣipraṃ meghalekeva vārṣikī 2.039.015a putras te varadaḥ kṣipram ayodhyāṃ punar āgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4063: 2.039.016a niśamya tal lakṣmaṇamātṛvākyaṃ; rāmasya mātur naradevapatnyāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4064: 2.039.016c sadyaḥ śarīre vinanāśa śokaḥ; śaradgato megha ivālpatoyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4066: 2.040.001c anujagmuḥ prayāntaṃ taṃ vanavāsāya mānavāḥ 2.040.002a nivartite 'pi ca balāt suhṛdvarge ca rājini 2.040.002c naiva te saṃnyavartanta rāmasyānugatā ratham 2.040.003a ayodhyānilayānāṃ hi puruṣāṇāṃ mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4067: 2.040.003c babhūva guṇasaṃpannaḥ pūrṇacandra iva priyaḥ 2.040.004a sa yācyamānaḥ kākutsthaḥ svābhiḥ prakṛtibhis tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:4068: 2.040.004c kurvāṇaḥ pitaraṃ satyaṃ vanam evānvapadyata 2.040.005a avekṣamāṇaḥ sasnehaṃ cakṣuṣā prapibann iva 2.040.005c uvāca rāmaḥ snehena tāḥ prajāḥ svāḥ prajā iva 2.040.006a yā prītir bahumānaś ca mayy ayodhyānivāsinām
GE09ram_1-7u:4069: 2.040.006c matpriyārthaṃ viśeṣeṇa bharate sā niveśyatām 2.040.007a sa hi kalyāṇa cāritraḥ kaikeyyānandavardhanaḥ 2.040.007c kariṣyati yathāvad vaḥ priyāṇi ca hitāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:4071: 2.040.008c anurūpaḥ sa vo bhartā bhaviṣyati bhayāpahaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4072: 2.040.009a sa hi rājaguṇair yukto yuvarājaḥ samīkṣitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4073: 2.040.009c api cāpi mayā śiṣṭaiḥ kāryaṃ vo bhartṛśāsanam
GE09ram_1-7u:4074: 2.040.010a na ca tapyed yathā cāsau vanavāsaṃ gate mayi 2.040.010c mahārājas tathā kāryo mama priyacikīrṣayā 2.040.011a yathā yathā dāśarathir dharmam evāsthito 'bhavat
GE09ram_1-7u:4075: 2.040.011c tathā tathā prakṛtayo rāmaṃ patim akāmayan
GE09ram_1-7u:4076: 2.040.012a bāṣpeṇa pihitaṃ dīnaṃ rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_1-7u:4077: 2.040.012c cakarṣeva guṇair baddhvā janaṃ punar ivāsanam
GE09ram_1-7u:4078: 2.040.013a te dvijās trividhaṃ vṛddhā jñānena vayasaujasā
GE09ram_1-7u:4079: 2.040.013c vayaḥprakampaśiraso dūrād ūcur idaṃ vacaḥ 2.040.014a vahanto javanā rāmaṃ bho bho jātyās turaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4080: 2.040.014c nivartadhvaṃ na gantavyaṃ hitā bhavata bhartari
GE09ram_1-7u:4081: 2.040.014e upavāhyas tu vo bhartā nāpavāhyaḥ purād vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:4082: 2.040.015a evam ārtapralāpāṃs tān vṛddhān pralapato dvijān
GE09ram_1-7u:4083: 2.040.015c avekṣya sahasā rāmo rathād avatatāra ha
GE09ram_1-7u:4084: 2.040.016a padbhyām eva jagāmātha sasītaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ 2.040.016c saṃnikṛṣṭapadanyāso rāmo vanaparāyaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4085: 2.040.017a dvijātīṃs tu padātīṃs tān rāmaś cāritravatsalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4086: 2.040.017c na śaśāka ghṛṇācakṣuḥ parimoktuṃ rathena saḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4087: 2.040.018a gacchantam eva taṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ saṃbhrāntamānasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4088: 2.040.018c ūcuḥ paramasaṃtaptā rāmaṃ vākyam idaṃ dvijāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4089: 2.040.019a brāhmaṇyaṃ kṛtsnam etat tvāṃ brahmaṇyam anugacchati
GE09ram_1-7u:4090: 2.040.019c dvijaskandhādhirūḍhās tvām agnayo 'py anuyānty amī 2.040.020a vājapeyasamutthāni chatrāṇy etāni paśya naḥ 2.040.020c pṛṣṭhato 'nuprayātāni haṃsān iva jalātyaye
GE09ram_1-7u:4092: 2.040.021c ebhiś chāyāṃ kariṣyāmaḥ svaiś chatrair vājapeyikaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4093: 2.040.022a yā hi naḥ satataṃ buddhir vedamantrānusāriṇī
GE09ram_1-7u:4094: 2.040.022c tvatkṛte sā kṛtā vatsa vanavāsānusāriṇī 2.040.023a hṛdayeṣv avatiṣṭhante vedā ye naḥ paraṃ dhanam
GE09ram_1-7u:4095: 2.040.023c vatsyanty api gṛheṣv eva dārāś cāritrarakṣitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4096: 2.040.024a na punar niścayaḥ kāryas tvadgatau sukṛtā matiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4097: 2.040.024c tvayi dharmavyapekṣe tu kiṃ syād dharmam avekṣitum
GE09ram_1-7u:4100: 2.040.026a bahūnāṃ vitatā yajñā dvijānāṃ ya ihāgatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4101: 2.040.026c teṣāṃ samāptir āyattā tava vatsa nivartane
GE09ram_1-7u:4102: 2.040.027a bhaktimanti hi bhūtāni jaṃgamājaṃgamāni ca 2.040.027c yācamāneṣu teṣu tvaṃ bhaktiṃ bhakteṣu darśaya
GE09ram_1-7u:4103: 2.040.028a anugaṃtum aśaktās tvāṃ mūlair uddhṛtavegibhiḥ 2.040.028c unnatā vāyuvegena vikrośantīva
GE09ram_1-7u:4104: 2.040.029a niśceṣṭāhārasaṃcārā vṛkṣaikasthānaviṣṭhitāḥ 2.040.029c pakṣiṇo 'pi prayācante sarvabhūtānukampinam 2.040.030a evaṃ vikrośatāṃ teṣāṃ dvijātīnāṃ nivartane 2.040.030c dadṛśe tamasā tatra vārayantīva rāghavam 2.041.001a tatas tu tamasā tīraṃ ramyam āśritya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4105: 2.041.001c sītām udvīkṣya saumitrim idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:4106: 2.041.002a iyam adya niśā pūrvā saumitre prasthitā vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:4107: 2.041.002c vanavāsasya bhadraṃ te sa notkaṇṭhitum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:4108: 2.041.003a paśya śūnyāny araṇyāni rudantīva samantataḥ 2.041.003c yathānilayam āyadbhir nilīnāni mṛgadvijaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4109: 2.041.004a adyāyodhyā tu nagarī rājadhānī pitur mama
GE09ram_1-7u:4110: 2.041.004c sastrīpuṃsā gatān asmāñ śociṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4111: 2.041.005a bharataḥ khalu dharmātmā pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca me
GE09ram_1-7u:4114: 2.041.006c nānuśocāmi pitaraṃ mātaraṃ cāpi lakṣmaṇa 2.041.007a tvayā kāryaṃ naravyāghra mām anuvrajatā kṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:4115: 2.041.007c anveṣṭavyā hi vaidehyā rakṣaṇārthe sahāyatā 2.041.008a adbhir eva tu saumitre vatsyāmy adya niśām imām 2.041.008c etad dhi rocate mahyaṃ vanye 'pi vividhe sati 2.041.009a evam uktvā tu saumitraṃ sumantram api rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4116: 2.041.009c apramattas tvam aśveṣu bhava saumyety uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:4119: 2.041.011a upāsyatu śivāṃ saṃdhyāṃ dṛṣṭvā rātrim upasthitām
GE09ram_1-7u:4120: 2.041.011c rāmasya śayanaṃ cakre sūtaḥ saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_1-7u:4121: 2.041.012a tāṃ śayyāṃ tamasātīre vīkṣya vṛkṣadalaiḥ kṛtām
GE09ram_1-7u:4122: 2.041.012c rāmaḥ saumitriṇāṃ sārdhaṃ sabhāryaḥ saṃviveśa ha
GE09ram_1-7u:4123: 2.041.013a sabhāryaṃ saṃprasuptaṃ taṃ bhrātaraṃ vīkṣya lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4124: 2.041.013c kathayām āsa sūtāya rāmasya vividhān guṇān
GE09ram_1-7u:4125: 2.041.014a jāgrato hy eva tāṃ rātriṃ saumitrer udito raviḥ 2.041.014c sūtasya tamasātīre rāmasya bruvato guṇān 2.041.015a gokulākulatīrāyās tamasāyā vidūrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4126: 2.041.015c avasat tatra tāṃ rātriṃ rāmaḥ prakṛtibhiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:4127: 2.041.016a utthāya tu mahātejāḥ prakṛtīs tā niśāmya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:4128: 2.041.016c abravīd bhrātaraṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ puṇyalakṣaṇam 2.041.017a asmadvyapekṣān saumitre nirapekṣān gṛheṣv api 2.041.017c vṛkṣamūleṣu saṃsuptān paśya lakṣmaṇa sāmpratam 2.041.018a yathaite niyamaṃ paurāḥ kurvanty asmannivartane 2.041.018c api prāṇān asiṣyanti na tu tyakṣyanti niścayam
GE09ram_1-7u:4129: 2.041.019a yāvad eva tu saṃsuptās tāvad eva vayaṃ laghu 2.041.019c ratham āruhya gacchāmaḥ panthānam akutobhayam 2.041.020a ato bhūyo 'pi nedānīm ikṣvākupuravāsinaḥ 2.041.020c svapeyur anuraktā māṃ vṛkṣamūlāni saṃśritāḥ 2.041.021a paurā hy ātmakṛtād duḥkhād vipramocyā nṛpātmajaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4130: 2.041.021c na tu khalv ātmanā yojyā duḥkhena puravāsinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4131: 2.041.022a abravīl lakṣmaṇo rāmaṃ sākṣād dharmam iva sthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:4132: 2.041.022c rocate me mahāprājña kṣipram āruhyatām iti
GE09ram_1-7u:4133: 2.041.023a sūtas tataḥ saṃtvaritaḥ syandanaṃ tair hayottamaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4135: 2.041.024a mohanārthaṃ tu paurāṇāṃ sūtaṃ rāmo 'bravīd vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4136: 2.041.024c udaṅmukhaḥ prayāhi tvaṃ ratham āsthāya sārathe
GE09ram_1-7u:4137: 2.041.025a muhūrtaṃ tvaritaṃ gatvā nirgataya rathaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4138: 2.041.025c yathā na vidyuḥ paurā māṃ tathā kuru samāhitaḥ 2.041.026a rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā tathā cakre sa sārathiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4139: 2.041.026c pratyāgamya ca rāmasya syandanaṃ pratyavedayat 2.041.027a taṃ syandanam adhiṣṭhāya rāghavaḥ saparicchadaḥ 2.041.027c śīghragām ākulāvartāṃ tamasām ataran nadīm 2.041.028a sa saṃtīrya mahābāhuḥ śrīmāñ śivam akaṇṭakam
GE09ram_1-7u:4141: 2.041.029a prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ paurās te rāghavo vinā
GE09ram_1-7u:4144: 2.041.030c ālokam api rāmasya na paśyanti sma duḥkhitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4145: 2.041.031a tato mārgānusāreṇa gatvā kiṃ cit kṣaṇaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4148: 2.041.032c kim idaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmo daivenopahatā iti
GE09ram_1-7u:4150: 2.041.033c ayodhyām agaman sarve purīṃ vyathitasajjanām 2.042.001a anugamya nivṛttānāṃ rāmaṃ nagaravāsinām
GE09ram_1-7u:4152: 2.042.002a svaṃ svaṃ nilayam āgamya putradāraiḥ samāvṛtāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4153: 2.042.002c aśrūṇi mumucuḥ sarve bāṣpeṇa pihitānanāḥ 2.042.003a na cāhṛṣyan na cāmodan vaṇijo na prasārayan
GE09ram_1-7u:4154: 2.042.003c na cāśobhanta paṇyāni nāpacan gṛhamedhinaḥ 2.042.004a naṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā nābhyanandan vipulaṃ vā dhanāgamam
GE09ram_1-7u:4155: 2.042.004c putraṃ prathamajaṃ labdhvā jananī nābhyanandata 2.042.005a gṛhe gṛhe rudantyaś ca bhartāraṃ gṛham āgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:4156: 2.042.005c vyagarhayanto duḥkhārtā vāgbhis totrair iva dvipān
GE09ram_1-7u:4157: 2.042.006a kiṃ nu teṣāṃ gṛhaiḥ kāryaṃ kiṃ dāraiḥ kiṃ dhanena vā
GE09ram_1-7u:4158: 2.042.006c putrair vā kiṃ sukhair vāpi ye na paśyanti rāghavam
GE09ram_1-7u:4159: 2.042.007a ekaḥ satpuruṣo loke lakṣmaṇaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_1-7u:4161: 2.042.008a āpagāḥ kṛtapuṇyās tāḥ padminyaś ca sarāṃsi ca
GE09ram_1-7u:4162: 2.042.008c yeṣu snāsyati kākutstho vigāhya salilaṃ śuci
GE09ram_1-7u:4164: 2.042.009c āpagāś ca mahānūpāḥ sānumantaś ca parvatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4165: 2.042.010a kānanaṃ vāpi śailaṃ vā yaṃ rāmo 'bhigamiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:4166: 2.042.010c priyātithim iva prāptaṃ nainaṃ śakṣyanty anarcitum
GE09ram_1-7u:4167: 2.042.011a vicitrakusumāpīḍā bahumañjaridhāriṇaḥ 2.042.011c akāle cāpi mukhyāni puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:4168: 2.042.011e darśayiṣyanty anukrośād girayo rāmam āgatam 2.042.012a vidarśayanto vividhān bhūyaś citrāṃś ca nirjharān
GE09ram_1-7u:4170: 2.042.013a yatra rāmo bhayaṃ nātra nāsti tatra parābhavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4171: 2.042.013c sa hi śūro mahābāhuḥ putro daśarathasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:4172: 2.042.014a purā bhavati no dūrād anugacchāma rāghavam
GE09ram_1-7u:4173: 2.042.014c pādacchāyā sukhā bhartus tādṛśasya mahātmanaḥ 2.042.014e sa hi nātho janasyāsya sa gatiḥ sa parāyaṇam 2.042.015a vayaṃ paricariṣyāmaḥ sītāṃ yūyaṃ tu rāghavam
GE09ram_1-7u:4174: 2.042.015c iti paurastriyo bhartṝn duḥkhārtās tat tad abruvan
GE09ram_1-7u:4175: 2.042.016a yuṣmākaṃ rāghavo 'raṇye yogakṣemaṃ vidhāsyati 2.042.016c sītā nārījanasyāsya yogakṣemaṃ kariṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:4176: 2.042.017a ko nv anenāpratītena sotkaṇṭhitajanena ca 2.042.017c saṃprīyetāmanojñena vāsena
GE09ram_1-7u:4177: 2.042.018a kaikeyyā yadi ced rājyaṃ syād adharmyam anāthavat
GE09ram_1-7u:4178: 2.042.018c na hi no jīvitenārthaḥ kutaḥ putraiḥ kuto dhanaiḥ 2.042.019a yayā putraś ca bhartā ca tyaktāv aiśvaryakāraṇāt
GE09ram_1-7u:4179: 2.042.019c kaṃ sā parihared anyaṃ kaikeyī kulapāṃsanī
GE09ram_1-7u:4180: 2.042.020a kaikeyyā na vayaṃ rājye bhṛtakā nivasemahi
GE09ram_1-7u:4181: 2.042.020c jīvantyā jātu jīvantyaḥ putrair api śapāmahe
GE09ram_1-7u:4182: 2.042.021a yā putraṃ pārthivendrasya pravāsayati nirghṛṇā 2.042.021c kas tāṃ prāpya sukhaṃ jīved adharmyāṃ duṣṭacāriṇīm
GE09ram_1-7u:4183: 2.042.022a na hi pravrajite rāme jīviṣyati mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4184: 2.042.022c mṛte daśarathe vyaktaṃ vilopas tadanantaram 2.042.023a te viṣaṃ pibatāloḍya kṣīṇapuṇyāḥ sudurgatāḥ 2.042.023c rāghavaṃ vānugacchadhvam aśrutiṃ vāpi gacchata 2.042.024a mithyā pravrājito rāmaḥ sabhāryaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ 2.042.024c bharate saṃniṣṛṣṭāḥ smaḥ saunike paśavo yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:4185: 2.042.025a tās tathā vilapantyas tu nagare nāgarastriyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4186: 2.042.025c cukruśur bhṛśasaṃtaptā mṛtyor iva bhayāgame 2.042.026a tathā striyo rāmanimittam āturā; yathā sute bhrātari vā vivāsite 2.042.026c vilapya dīnā rurudur vicetasaḥ; sutair hi tāsām adhiko hi so
GE09ram_1-7u:4189: 2.043.001c jagāma puruṣavyāghraḥ pitur ājñām anusmaran 2.043.002a tathaiva gacchatas tasya vyapāyād rajanī śivā
GE09ram_1-7u:4190: 2.043.002c upāsya sa śivāṃ saṃdhyāṃ viṣayāntaṃ vyagāhata
GE09ram_1-7u:4191: 2.043.003a grāmān vikṛṣṭasīmāṃs tān puṣpitāni vanāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:4192: 2.043.003c paśyann atiyayau śīghraṃ śarair iva hayottamaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4194: 2.043.004c rājānaṃ dhig daśarathaṃ kāmasya vaśam āgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:4195: 2.043.005a hā nṛśaṃsādya kaikeyī pāpā pāpānubandhinī 2.043.005c tīkṣṇā saṃbhinnamaryādā tīkṣṇe karmaṇi vartate 2.043.006a yā putram īdṛśaṃ rājñaḥ pravāsayati dhārmikam
GE09ram_1-7u:4196: 2.043.006c vana vāse mahāprājñaṃ sānukrośam atandritam 2.043.007a etā vāco manuṣyāṇāṃ grāmasaṃvāsavāsinām
GE09ram_1-7u:4197: 2.043.007c śṛṇvann atiyayau vīraḥ kosalān kosaleśvaraḥ 2.043.008a tato vedaśrutiṃ nāma śivavārivahāṃ nadīm 2.043.008c uttīryābhimukhaḥ prāyād agastyādhyuṣitāṃ diśam
GE09ram_1-7u:4198: 2.043.009a gatvā tu suciraṃ kālaṃ tataḥ śītajalāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_1-7u:4200: 2.043.010a gomatīṃ cāpy atikramya rāghavaḥ śīghragair hayaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4202: 2.043.011a sa mahīṃ manunā rājñā dattām ikṣvākave purā
GE09ram_1-7u:4203: 2.043.011c sphītāṃ rāṣṭrāvṛtāṃ rāmo vaidehīm anvadarśayat 2.043.012a sūta ity eva cābhāṣya sārathiṃ tam abhīkṣṇaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4205: 2.043.013a kadāhaṃ punar āgamya sarayvāḥ puṣpite vane
GE09ram_1-7u:4206: 2.043.013c mṛgayāṃ paryāṭaṣyāmi mātrā pitrā ca saṃgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4208: 2.043.014c ratir hy eṣātulā loke rājarṣigaṇasaṃmatā 2.043.015a sa tam adhvānam aikṣvākaḥ sūtaṃ madhurayā girā
GE09ram_1-7u:4209: 2.043.015c taṃ tam artham abhipretya yayauvākyam udīrayan
GE09ram_1-7u:4210: 2.044.001a viśālān kosalān ramyān yātvā lakṣmaṇapūrvajaḥ 2.044.001c āsasāda mahābāhuḥ śṛṅgaverapuraṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:4211: 2.044.002a tatra tripathagāṃ divyāṃ śivatoyām aśaivalām 2.044.002c dadarśa rāghavo gaṅgāṃ puṇyām ṛṣinisevitām 2.044.003a haṃsasārasasaṃghuṣṭāṃ cakravākopakūjitām 2.044.003c śiṃśumaraiś ca nakraiś ca bhujaṃgaiś ca niṣevitām
GE09ram_1-7u:4213: 2.044.004c sumantram abravīt sūtam ihaivādya vasāmahe 2.044.005a avidūrād ayaṃ nadyā bahupuṣpapravālavān
GE09ram_1-7u:4215: 2.044.006a lakṣaṇaś ca sumantraś ca bāḍham ity eva rāghavam 2.044.006c uktvā tam iṅgudīvṛkṣaṃ tadopayayatur hayaiḥ 2.044.007a rāmo 'bhiyāya taṃ ramyaṃ vṛkṣam ikṣvākunandanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4216: 2.044.007c rathād avātarat tasmāt sabhāryaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ 2.044.008a sumantro 'py avatīryaiva mocayitvā hayottamān
GE09ram_1-7u:4218: 2.044.009a tatra rājā guho nāma rāmasyātmasamaḥ sakhā
GE09ram_1-7u:4219: 2.044.009c niṣādajātyo balavān sthapatiś ceti viśrutaḥ 2.044.010a sa śrutvā puruṣavyāghraṃ rāmaṃ viṣayam āgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:4221: 2.044.011a tato niṣādādhipatiṃ dṛṣṭvā dūrād avasthitam 2.044.011c saha saumitriṇā rāmaḥ samāgacchad guhena saḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4222: 2.044.012a tam ārtaḥ saṃpariṣvajya guho rāghavam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:4223: 2.044.012c yathāyodhyā tathedaṃ te rāma kiṃ karavāṇi te
GE09ram_1-7u:4225: 2.044.013c arghyaṃ copānayat kṣipraṃ vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:4226: 2.044.014a svāgataṃ te mahābāho taveyam akhilā mahī
GE09ram_1-7u:4227: 2.044.014c vayaṃ preṣyā bhavān bhartā sādhu rājyaṃ praśādhi naḥ 2.044.015a bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca peyaṃ ca lehyaṃ cedam upasthitam 2.044.015c śayanāni ca mukhyāni vājināṃ khādanaṃ ca te
GE09ram_1-7u:4228: 2.044.016a guham eva bruvāṇaṃ taṃ rāghavaḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:4229: 2.044.016c arcitāś caiva hṛṣṭāś ca bhavatā sarvathā vayam
GE09ram_1-7u:4230: 2.044.017a padbhyām abhigamāc caiva snehasaṃdarśanena ca 2.044.017c bhujābhyāṃ sādhuvṛttābhyāṃ pīḍayan vākyam abravīt 2.044.018a diṣṭyā tvāṃ guha paśyāmi arogaṃ saha bāndhavaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4231: 2.044.018c api te kūśalaṃ rāṣṭre mitreṣu ca dhaneṣu ca 2.044.019a yat tv idaṃ bhavatā kiṃ cit prītyā samupakalpitam 2.044.019c sarvaṃ tad anujānāmi na hi varte pratigrahe
GE09ram_1-7u:4233: 2.044.020c viddhi praṇihitaṃ dharme tāpasaṃ vanagocaram 2.044.021a aśvānāṃ khādanenāham arthī nānyena kena cit
GE09ram_1-7u:4235: 2.044.022a ete hi dayitā rājñaḥ pitur daśarathasya me
GE09ram_1-7u:4236: 2.044.022c etaiḥ suvihitair aśvair bhaviṣyāmy aham arcitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4237: 2.044.023a aśvānāṃ pratipānaṃ ca khādanaṃ caiva so 'nvaśāt
GE09ram_1-7u:4238: 2.044.023c guhas tatraiva puruṣāṃs tvaritaṃ dīyatām iti
GE09ram_1-7u:4239: 2.044.024a tataś cīrottarāsaṅgaḥ saṃdhyām anvāsya paścimām 2.044.024c jalam evādade bhojyaṃ lakṣmaṇenāhṛtaṃ svayam 2.044.025a tasya bhūmau śayānasya pādau prakṣālya lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4242: 2.044.026c anvajāgrat tato rāmam apramatto dhanurdharaḥ 2.044.027a tathā śayānasya tato 'sya dhīmato; yaśasvino dāśarather mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4243: 2.044.027c adṛṣṭaduḥkhasya sukhocitasya sā; tadā vyatīyāya cireṇa śarvarī
GE09ram_1-7u:4244: 2.045.001a taṃ jāgratam adambhena bhrātur arthāya lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:4245: 2.045.001c guhaḥ saṃtāpasaṃtapto rāghavaṃ vākyam abravīt 2.045.002a iyaṃ tāta sukhā śayyā tvadartham upakalpitā
GE09ram_1-7u:4246: 2.045.002c pratyāśvasihi sādhv asyāṃ rājaputra yathāsukham 2.045.003a ucito 'yaṃ janaḥ sarvaḥ kleśānāṃ tvaṃ sukhocitaḥ 2.045.003c guptyarthaṃ jāgariṣyāmaḥ kākutsthasya vayaṃ niśām 2.045.004a na hi rāmāt priyataro mamāsti bhuvi kaś cana 2.045.004c bravīmy etad ahaṃ satyaṃ satyenaiva ca te śape 2.045.005a asya prasādād āśaṃse loke 'smin sumahad yaśaḥ 2.045.005c dharmāvāptiṃ ca vipulām arthāvāptiṃ ca kevalām
GE09ram_1-7u:4247: 2.045.006a so 'haṃ priyasakhaṃ rāmaṃ śayānaṃ saha sītayā 2.045.006c rakṣiṣyāmi dhanuṣpāṇiḥ sarvato jñātibhiḥ saha 2.045.007a na hi me 'viditaṃ kiṃ cid vane 'smiṃś carataḥ sadā 2.045.007c caturaṅgaṃ hy api balaṃ sumahat prasahemahi
GE09ram_1-7u:4248: 2.045.008a lakṣmaṇas taṃ tadovāca rakṣyamāṇās tvayānagha 2.045.008c nātra bhītā vayaṃ sarve dharmam evānupaśyatā
GE09ram_1-7u:4249: 2.045.009a kathaṃ dāśarathau bhūmau śayāne saha sītayā
GE09ram_1-7u:4250: 2.045.009c śakyā nidrā mayā labdhuṃ jīvitaṃ vā sukhāni vā 2.045.010a yo na devāsuraiḥ sarvaiḥ śakyaḥ prasahituṃ yudhi
GE09ram_1-7u:4251: 2.045.010c taṃ paśya sukhasaṃviṣṭaṃ tṛṇeṣu saha sītayā
GE09ram_1-7u:4252: 2.045.011a yo mantra tapasā labdho vividhaiś ca pariśramaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4254: 2.045.012a asmin pravrajito rājā na ciraṃ vartayiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:4255: 2.045.012c vidhavā medinī nūnaṃ kṣipram eva bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:4258: 2.045.014a kausalyā caiva rājā ca tathaiva jananī mama
GE09ram_1-7u:4259: 2.045.014c nāśaṃse yadi jīvanti sarve te śarvarīm imām
GE09ram_1-7u:4260: 2.045.015a jīved api hi me mātā śatrughnasyānvavekṣayā
GE09ram_1-7u:4261: 2.045.015c tad duḥkhaṃ yat tu kausalyā vīrasūr vinaśiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:4264: 2.045.017c rājye rāmam anikṣipya pitā me vinaśiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:4265: 2.045.018a siddhārthāḥ pitaraṃ vṛttaṃ tasmin kāle hy upasthite
GE09ram_1-7u:4267: 2.045.019a ramyacatvarasaṃsthānāṃ suvibhaktamahāpathām 2.045.019c harmyaprāsādasaṃpannāṃ gaṇikāvaraśobhitām 2.045.020a rathāśvagajasaṃbādhāṃ tūryanādavināditām 2.045.020c sarvakalyāṇasaṃpūrṇāṃ hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākulām 2.045.021a ārāmodyānasaṃpannāṃ samājotsavaśālinīm 2.045.021c sukhitā vicariṣyanti rājadhānīṃ pitur mama 2.045.022a api satyapratijñena sārdhaṃ kuśalinā vayam 2.045.022c nivṛtte vanavāse 'sminn ayodhyāṃ praviśemahi 2.045.023a paridevayamānasya duḥkhārtasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4269: 2.045.024a tathā hi satyaṃ bruvati prajāhite; narendraputre gurusauhṛdād guhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4270: 2.045.024c mumoca bāṣpaṃ vyasanābhipīḍito; jvarāturo nāga iva vyathāturaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4271: 2.046.001a prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ pṛthu vṛkṣā mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4272: 2.046.001c uvāca rāmaḥ saumitriṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ śubhalakṣaṇam 2.046.002a bhāskarodayakālo 'yaṃ gatā bhagavatī niśā
GE09ram_1-7u:4273: 2.046.002c asau sukṛṣṇo vihagaḥ kokilas tāta kūjati
GE09ram_1-7u:4274: 2.046.003a barhiṇānāṃ ca nirghoṣaḥ śrūyate nadatāṃ vane
GE09ram_1-7u:4275: 2.046.003c tarāma jāhnavīṃ saumya śīghragāṃ sāgaraṃgamām 2.046.004a vijñāya rāmasya vacaḥ saumitrir mitranandanaḥ 2.046.004c guham āmantrya sūtaṃ ca so 'tiṣṭhad bhrātur agrataḥ 2.046.005a tataḥ kalāpān saṃnahya khaḍgau baddhvā ca dhanvinau
GE09ram_1-7u:4276: 2.046.005c jagmatur yena tau gaṅgāṃ sītayā saha rāghavau
GE09ram_1-7u:4277: 2.046.006a rāmam eva tu dharmajñam upagamya vinītavat
GE09ram_1-7u:4278: 2.046.006c kim ahaṃ karavāṇīti sūtaḥ prāñjalir abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:4279: 2.046.007a nivartasvety uvācainam etāvad dhi kṛtaṃ mama
GE09ram_1-7u:4280: 2.046.007c yānaṃ vihāya padbhyāṃ tu gamiṣyāmo mahāvanam
GE09ram_1-7u:4281: 2.046.008a ātmānaṃ tv abhyanujñātam avekṣyārtaḥ sa sārathiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4282: 2.046.008c sumantraḥ puruṣavyāghram aikṣvākam idam abravīt 2.046.009a nātikrāntam idaṃ loke puruṣeṇeha kena cit
GE09ram_1-7u:4283: 2.046.009c tava sabhrātṛbhāryasya vāsaḥ prākṛtavad vane 2.046.010a na manye brahmacarye 'sti svadhīte vā phalodayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4284: 2.046.010c mārdavārjavayor vāpi tvāṃ ced vyasanam āgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:4285: 2.046.011a saha rāghava vaidehyā bhrātrā caiva vane vasan
GE09ram_1-7u:4286: 2.046.011c tvaṃ gatiṃ prāpsyase vīra trīṃl lokāṃs tu jayann iva
GE09ram_1-7u:4287: 2.046.012a vayaṃ khalu hatā rāma ye tayāpy upavañcitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4288: 2.046.012c kaikeyyā vaśam eṣyāmaḥ pāpāyā duḥkhabhāginaḥ 2.046.013a iti bruvann ātma samaṃ sumantraḥ sārathis tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:4289: 2.046.013c dṛṣṭvā dura gataṃ rāmaṃ duḥkhārto rurude ciram
GE09ram_1-7u:4290: 2.046.014a tatas tu vigate bāṣpe sūtaṃ spṛṣṭodakaṃ śucim
GE09ram_1-7u:4291: 2.046.014c rāmas tu madhuraṃ vākyaṃ punaḥ punar uvāca tam 2.046.015a ikṣvākūṇāṃ tvayā tulyaṃ suhṛdaṃ nopalakṣaye 2.046.015c yathā daśaratho rājā māṃ na śocet tathā kuru 2.046.016a śokopahata cetāś ca vṛddhaś ca jagatīpatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4292: 2.046.016c kāma bhārāvasannaś ca tasmād etad bravīmi te
GE09ram_1-7u:4293: 2.046.017a yad yad ājñāpayet kiṃ cit sa mahātmā mahīpatiḥ 2.046.017c kaikeyyāḥ priyakāmārthaṃ kāryaṃ tad avikāṅkṣayā 2.046.018a etadarthaṃ hi rājyāni praśāsati nareśvarāḥ 2.046.018c yad eṣāṃ sarvakṛtyeṣu mano na pratihanyate
GE09ram_1-7u:4294: 2.046.019a tad yathā sa mahārājo nālīkam adhigacchati
GE09ram_1-7u:4295: 2.046.019c na ca tāmyati duḥkhena sumantra kuru tat tathā 2.046.020a adṛṣṭaduḥkhaṃ rājānaṃ vṛddham āryaṃ jitendriyam 2.046.020c brūyās tvam abhivādyaiva mama hetor idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4296: 2.046.021a naivāham anuśocāmi lakṣmaṇo na ca maithilī
GE09ram_1-7u:4297: 2.046.021c ayodhyāyāś cyutāś ceti vane vatsyāmaheti vā
GE09ram_1-7u:4298: 2.046.022a caturdaśasu varṣeṣu nivṛtteṣu punaḥ punaḥ 2.046.022c lakṣmaṇaṃ māṃ ca sītāṃ ca drakṣyasi kṣipram āgatān 2.046.023a evam uktvā tu rājānaṃ mātaraṃ ca sumantra me 2.046.023c anyāś ca devīḥ sahitāḥ kaikeyīṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ 2.046.024a ārogyaṃ brūhi kausalyām atha pādābhivandanam 2.046.024c sītāyā mama cāryasya vacanāl lakṣmaṇasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:4299: 2.046.025a brūyāś ca hi mahārājaṃ bharataṃ kṣipram ānaya
GE09ram_1-7u:4300: 2.046.025c āgataś cāpi bharataḥ sthāpyo nṛpamate pade
GE09ram_1-7u:4302: 2.046.026c asmatsaṃtāpajaṃ duḥkhaṃ na tvām abhibhaviṣyati 2.046.027a bharataś cāpi vaktavyo yathā rājani vartase
GE09ram_1-7u:4303: 2.046.027c tathā mātṛṣu vartethāḥ sarvāsv evāviśeṣataḥ 2.046.028a yathā ca tava kaikeyī sumitrā cāviśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4304: 2.046.028c tathaiva devī kausalyā mama mātā viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4306: 2.046.029c tat sarvaṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā snehāt kākutstham abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:4307: 2.046.030a yad ahaṃ nopacāreṇa brūyāṃ snehād aviklavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4308: 2.046.030c bhaktimān iti tat tāvad vākyaṃ tvaṃ kṣantum arhasi 2.046.031a kathaṃ hi tvadvihīno 'haṃ pratiyāsyāmi tāṃ purīm
GE09ram_1-7u:4309: 2.046.031c tava tāta viyogena putraśokākulām iva 2.046.032a sarāmam api tāvan me rathaṃ dṛṣṭvā tadā janaḥ 2.046.032c vinā rāmaṃ rathaṃ dṛṣṭvā vidīryetāpi sā purī
GE09ram_1-7u:4310: 2.046.033a dainyaṃ hi nagarī gacched dṛṣṭvā śūnyam imaṃ ratham 2.046.033c sūtāvaśeṣaṃ svaṃ sainyaṃ hatavīram ivāhave 2.046.034a dūre 'pi nivasantaṃ tvāṃ mānasenāgrataḥ sthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:4311: 2.046.034c cintayantyo 'dya nūnaṃ tvāṃ nirāhārāḥ kṛtāḥ prajāḥ 2.046.035a ārtanādo hi yaḥ paurair muktas tadvipravāsane
GE09ram_1-7u:4312: 2.046.035c rathasthaṃ māṃ niśāmyaiva kuryuḥ śataguṇaṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4313: 2.046.036a ahaṃ kiṃ cāpi vakṣyāmi devīṃ tava suto mayā 2.046.036c nīto 'sau mātulakulaṃ saṃtāpaṃ mā kṛthā iti 2.046.037a asatyam api naivāhaṃ brūyāṃ vacanam īdṛśam
GE09ram_1-7u:4314: 2.046.037c katham apriyam evāhaṃ brūyāṃ satyam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4316: 2.046.038c kathaṃ rathaṃ tvayā hīnaṃ pravakṣyanti hayottamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4317: 2.046.039a yadi me yācamānasya tyāgam eva kariṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:4318: 2.046.039c saratho 'gniṃ pravekṣyāmi tyakta mātra iha tvayā 2.046.040a bhaviṣyanti vane yāni tapovighnakarāṇi te 2.046.040c rathena pratibādhiṣye tāni sattvāni rāghava 2.046.041a tat kṛtena mayā prāptaṃ ratha caryā kṛtaṃ sukham 2.046.041c āśaṃse tvatkṛtenāhaṃ vanavāsakṛtaṃ sukham
GE09ram_1-7u:4319: 2.046.042a prasīdecchāmi te 'raṇye bhavituṃ pratyanantaraḥ 2.046.042c prītyābhihitam icchāmi bhava me patyanantaraḥ 2.046.043a tava śuśrūṣaṇaṃ mūrdhnā kariṣyāmi vane vasan
GE09ram_1-7u:4320: 2.046.043c ayodhyāṃ devalokaṃ vā sarvathā prajahāmy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:4321: 2.046.044a na hi śakyā praveṣṭuṃ sā mayāyodhyā tvayā vinā 2.046.044c rājadhānī mahendrasya yathā duṣkṛtakarmaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:4322: 2.046.045a ime cāpi hayā vīra yadi te vanavāsinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4323: 2.046.045c paricaryāṃ kariṣyanti prāpsyanti paramāṃ gatim 2.046.046a vanavāse kṣayaṃ prāpte mamaiṣa hi manorathaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4324: 2.046.046c yad anena rathenaiva tvāṃ vaheyaṃ purīṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4325: 2.046.047a caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi sahitasya tvayā vane
GE09ram_1-7u:4328: 2.046.048c bhaktaṃ bhṛtyaṃ sthitaṃ sthityāṃ tvaṃ na māṃ hātum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:4329: 2.046.049a evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ dīnaṃ yācamānaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4330: 2.046.049c rāmo bhṛtyānukampī tu sumantram idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:4331: 2.046.050a jānāmi paramāṃ bhaktiṃ mayi te bhartṛvatsala
GE09ram_1-7u:4332: 2.046.050c śṛṇu cāpi yadarthaṃ tvāṃ preṣayāmi purīm itaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4333: 2.046.051a nagarīṃ tvāṃ gataṃ dṛṣṭvā jananī me yavīyasī
GE09ram_1-7u:4334: 2.046.051c kaikeyī pratyayaṃ gacched iti rāmo vanaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4335: 2.046.052a parituṣṭā hi sā devi vanavāsaṃ gate mayi
GE09ram_1-7u:4337: 2.046.053a eṣa me prathamaḥ kalpo yad ambā me yavīyasī 2.046.053c bharatārakṣitaṃ sphītaṃ putrarājyam avāpnuyāt
GE09ram_1-7u:4338: 2.046.054a mama priyārthaṃ rājñaś ca sarathas tvaṃ purīṃ vraja 2.046.054c saṃdiṣṭaś cāsi yānarthāṃs tāṃs tān brūyās tathātathā
GE09ram_1-7u:4339: 2.046.055a ity uktvā vacanaṃ sūtaṃ sāntvayitvā punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4340: 2.046.055c guhaṃ vacanam aklībaṃ rāmo hetumad abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:4341: 2.046.055e jaṭāḥ kṛtvā gamiṣyāmi nyagrodhakṣīram ānaya 2.046.056a tat kṣīraṃ rājaputrāya guhaḥ kṣipram upāharat
GE09ram_1-7u:4342: 2.046.056c lakṣmaṇasyātmanaś caiva rāmas tenākaroj jaṭāḥ 2.046.057a tau tadā cīravasanau
GE09ram_1-7u:4344: 2.046.058a tato vaikhānasaṃ mārgam āsthitaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ 2.046.058c vratam ādiṣṭavān rāmaḥ sahāyaṃ guham abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:4345: 2.046.059a apramatto bale kośe durge janapade tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:4346: 2.046.059c bhavethā guha rājyaṃ hi durārakṣatamaṃ matam
GE09ram_1-7u:4347: 2.046.060a tatas taṃ samanujñāya guham ikṣvākunandanaḥ 2.046.060c jagāma tūrṇam avyagraḥ sabhāryaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ 2.046.061a sa tu dṛṣṭvā nadītīre nāvam ikṣvākunandanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4348: 2.046.061c titīrṣuḥ śīghragāṃ gaṅgām idaṃ lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:4349: 2.046.062a āroha tvaṃ nara vyāghra sthitāṃ nāvam imāṃ śanaiḥ 2.046.062c sītāṃ cāropayānvakṣaṃ parigṛhya manasvinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:4350: 2.046.063a sa bhrātuḥ śāsanaṃ śrutvā sarvam apratikūlayan
GE09ram_1-7u:4351: 2.046.063c āropya maithilīṃ pūrvam ārurohātmavāṃs tataḥ 2.046.064a athāruroha tejasvī svayaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:4352: 2.046.064c tato niṣādādhipatir guho jñātīn acodayat 2.046.065a anujñāya sumantraṃ ca sabalaṃ caiva taṃ guham
GE09ram_1-7u:4353: 2.046.065c āsthāya nāvaṃ rāmas tu codayām āsa nāvikān
GE09ram_1-7u:4354: 2.046.066a tatas taiś coditā sā nauḥ karṇadhārasamāhitā
GE09ram_1-7u:4356: 2.046.067a madhyaṃ tu samanuprāpya bhāgīrathyās tv aninditā
GE09ram_1-7u:4357: 2.046.067c vaidehī prāñjalir bhūtvā tāṃ nadīm idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:4359: 2.046.068c nideśaṃ pālayatv enaṃ gaṅge tvadabhirakṣitaḥ 2.046.069a caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi samagrāṇy uṣya kānane
GE09ram_1-7u:4360: 2.046.069c bhrātrā saha mayā caiva punaḥ pratyāgamiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:4361: 2.046.070a tatas tvāṃ devi subhage kṣemeṇa punar āgatā
GE09ram_1-7u:4363: 2.046.071a tvaṃ hi tripathagā devi brahma lokaṃ samīkṣase
GE09ram_1-7u:4365: 2.046.072a sā tvāṃ devi namasyāmi praśaṃsāmi ca śobhane
GE09ram_1-7u:4366: 2.046.072c prāpta rājye naravyāghra śivena punar āgate
GE09ram_1-7u:4367: 2.046.073a gavāṃ śatasahasrāṇi vastrāṇy annaṃ ca peśalam
GE09ram_1-7u:4369: 2.046.074a tathā saṃbhāṣamāṇā sā sītā gaṅgām aninditā
GE09ram_1-7u:4370: 2.046.074c dakṣiṇā dakṣiṇaṃ tīraṃ kṣipram evābhyupāgamat 2.046.075a tīraṃ tu samanuprāpya nāvaṃ hitvā nararṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4371: 2.046.075c prātiṣṭhata saha bhrātrā vaidehyā ca paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4373: 2.046.076c agrato gaccha saumitre sītā tvām anugacchatu
GE09ram_1-7u:4374: 2.046.077a pṛṣṭhato 'haṃ gamiṣyāmi tvāṃ ca sītāṃ ca pālayan
GE09ram_1-7u:4375: 2.046.077c adya duḥkhaṃ tu vaidehī vanavāsasya vetsyati
GE09ram_1-7u:4376: 2.046.078a gataṃ tu gaṅgāparapāram āśu; rāmaṃ sumantraḥ pratataṃ nirīkṣya
GE09ram_1-7u:4377: 2.046.078c adhvaprakarṣād vinivṛttadṛṣṭir; mumoca bāṣpaṃ vyathitas tapasvī
GE09ram_1-7u:4378: 2.046.079a tau tatra hatvā caturo mahāmṛgān; varāham ṛśyaṃ pṛṣataṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:4380: 2.046.079c ādāya medhyaṃ tvaritaṃ bubhukṣitau; vāsāya kāle yayatur
GE09ram_1-7u:4382: 2.047.001a sa taṃ vṛkṣaṃ samāsādya saṃdhyām anvāsya paścimām
GE09ram_1-7u:4383: 2.047.001c rāmo ramayatāṃ śreṣṭha iti hovāca lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:4384: 2.047.002a adyeyaṃ prathamā rātrir yātā janapadād bahiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4385: 2.047.002c yā sumantreṇa rahitā tāṃ notkaṇṭhitum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:4386: 2.047.003a jāgartavyam atandribhyām adya prabhṛti rātriṣu 2.047.003c yogakṣemo hi sītāyā vartate lakṣmaṇāvayoḥ 2.047.004a rātriṃ kathaṃ cid evemāṃ saumitre vartayāmahe
GE09ram_1-7u:4387: 2.047.004c upāvartāmahe bhūmāv āstīrya svayam ārjitaiḥ 2.047.005a sa tu saṃviśya medinyāṃ mahārhaśayanocitaḥ 2.047.005c imāḥ saumitraye rāmo vyājahāra kathāḥ śubhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4388: 2.047.006a dhruvam adya mahārājo duḥkhaṃ svapiti lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:4389: 2.047.006c kṛtakāmā tu kaikeyī tuṣṭā bhavitum arhati
GE09ram_1-7u:4390: 2.047.007a sā hi devī mahārājaṃ kaikeyī rājyakāraṇāt
GE09ram_1-7u:4391: 2.047.007c api na cyāvayet prāṇān dṛṣṭvā bharatam āgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:4392: 2.047.008a anāthaś caiva vṛddhaś ca mayā caiva vinākṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4393: 2.047.008c kiṃ kariṣyati kāmātmā kaikeyyā vaśam āgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4394: 2.047.009a idaṃ vyasanam ālokya rājñaś ca mativibhramam
GE09ram_1-7u:4395: 2.047.009c kāma evārdhadharmābhyāṃ garīyān iti me matiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4396: 2.047.010a ko hy avidvān api pumān pramadāyāḥ kṛte tyajet 2.047.010c chandānuvartinaṃ putraṃ tāto mām iva lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:4397: 2.047.011a sukhī bata sabhāryaś ca bharataḥ kekayīsutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4398: 2.047.011c muditān kosalān eko yo bhokṣyaty adhirājavat
GE09ram_1-7u:4399: 2.047.012a sa hi sarvasya rājyasya mukham ekaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:4400: 2.047.012c tāte ca vayasātīte mayi cāraṇyam āśrite
GE09ram_1-7u:4401: 2.047.013a arthadharmau parityajya yaḥ kāmam anuvartate 2.047.013c evam āpadyate kṣipraṃ rājā daśaratho yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:4402: 2.047.014a manye daśarathāntāya mama pravrājanāya ca 2.047.014c kaikeyī saumya saṃprāptā rājyāya bharatasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:4404: 2.047.015c kausalyāṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca saṃprabādheta matkṛte
GE09ram_1-7u:4405: 2.047.016a mā sma matkāraṇād devī sumitrā duḥkham āvaset
GE09ram_1-7u:4406: 2.047.016c ayodhyām ita eva tvaṃ kāle praviśa lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:4407: 2.047.017a aham eko gamiṣyāmi sītayā saha daṇḍakān
GE09ram_1-7u:4408: 2.047.017c anāthāyā hi nāthas tvaṃ kausalyāyā bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:4409: 2.047.018a kṣudrakarmā hi kaikeyī dveṣād anyāyyam ācaret
GE09ram_1-7u:4410: 2.047.018c paridadyā hi dharmajñe bharate mama mātaram
GE09ram_1-7u:4411: 2.047.019a nūnaṃ jātyantare kasmiṃḥ striyaḥ putrair viyojitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4412: 2.047.019c jananyā mama saumitre tad apy etad upasthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:4413: 2.047.020a mayā hi cirapuṣṭena duḥkhasaṃvardhitena ca 2.047.020c viprāyujyata kausalyā phalakāle dhig astu mām
GE09ram_1-7u:4414: 2.047.021a mā sma sīmantinī kā cij janayet putram īdṛśam 2.047.021c saumitre yo 'ham ambāyā dadmi śokam anantakam
GE09ram_1-7u:4415: 2.047.022a manye prītiviśiṣṭā sā matto lakṣmaṇasārikā 2.047.022c yasyās tac chrūyate vākyaṃ śuka pādam arer daśa 2.047.023a śocantyāś cālpabhāgyāyā na kiṃ cid upakurvatā
GE09ram_1-7u:4416: 2.047.023c purtreṇa kim aputrāyā mayā kāryam ariṃdama
GE09ram_1-7u:4417: 2.047.024a alpabhāgyā hi me mātā kausalyā rahitā mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:4419: 2.047.025a eko hy aham ayodhyāṃ ca pṛthivīṃ cāpi lakṣmaṇa 2.047.025c tareyam iṣubhiḥ kruddho nanu vīryam akāraṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:4420: 2.047.026a adharmabhaya bhītaś ca paralokasya cānagha 2.047.026c tena lakṣmaṇa nādyāham ātmānam abhiṣecaye 2.047.027a etad anyac ca karuṇaṃ vilapya vijane bahu
GE09ram_1-7u:4421: 2.047.027c aśrupūrṇamukho rāmo niśi tūṣṇīm upāviśat 2.047.028a vilapyoparataṃ rāmaṃ gatārciṣam
GE09ram_1-7u:4422: 2.047.028c samudram iva nirvegam āśvāsayata lakṣmaṇaḥ 2.047.029a dhruvam adya purī rāma ayodhyā yudhināṃ vara
GE09ram_1-7u:4423: 2.047.029c niṣprabhā tvayi niṣkrānte gatacandreva śarvarī 2.047.030a naitad aupayikaṃ rāma yad idaṃ paritapyase
GE09ram_1-7u:4424: 2.047.030c viṣādayasi sītāṃ ca māṃ caiva puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_1-7u:4425: 2.047.031a na ca sītā tvayā hīnā na cāham api rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:4426: 2.047.031c muhūrtam api jīvāvo jalān matsyāv ivoddhṛtau
GE09ram_1-7u:4427: 2.047.032a na hi tātaṃ na śatrughnaṃ na sumitrāṃ paraṃtapa 2.047.032c draṣṭum iccheyam adyāhaṃ svargaṃ vāpi tvayā vinā
GE09ram_1-7u:4428: 2.047.033a sa lakṣmaṇasyottama puṣkalaṃ vaco; niśamya caivaṃ vanavāsam
GE09ram_1-7u:4430: 2.047.033c samāḥ samastā vidadhe paraṃtapaḥ; prapadya dharmaṃ sucirāya
GE09ram_1-7u:4432: 2.048.001a te tu tasmin mahāvṛkṣa uṣitvā rajanīṃ śivām
GE09ram_1-7u:4434: 2.048.002a yatra bhāgīrathī gaṅgā yamunām abhivartate 2.048.002c jagmus taṃ deśam uddiśya vigāhya sumahad vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:4435: 2.048.003a te bhūmim āgān vividhān deśāṃś cāpi manoramān
GE09ram_1-7u:4436: 2.048.003c adṛṣṭapūrvān paśyantas tatra tatra yaśasvinaḥ 2.048.004a yathākṣemeṇa gacchan sa paśyaṃś ca vividhān drumān
GE09ram_1-7u:4437: 2.048.004c nivṛttamātre divase rāmaḥ saumitrim abravīt 2.048.005a prayāgam abhitaḥ paśya saumitre dhūmam unnatam
GE09ram_1-7u:4438: 2.048.005c agner bhagavataḥ ketuṃ manye saṃnihito muniḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4439: 2.048.006a nūnaṃ prāptāḥ sma saṃbhedaṃ gaṅgāyamunayor vayam
GE09ram_1-7u:4440: 2.048.006c tathā hi śrūyate śambdo vāriṇā vārighaṭṭitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4442: 2.048.007c bharadvājāśrame caite dṛśyante vividhā drumāḥ 2.048.008a dhanvinau tau sukhaṃ gatvā lambamāne divākare
GE09ram_1-7u:4443: 2.048.008c gaṅgāyamunayoḥ saṃdhau prāpatur nilayaṃ muneḥ 2.048.009a rāmas tv āśramam āsādya trāsayan mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4444: 2.048.009c gatvā muhūrtam adhvānaṃ bharadvājam upāgamat 2.048.010a tatas tv āśramam āsādya muner darśanakāṅkṣiṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:4447: 2.048.011c rāmaḥ saumitriṇā sārdhaṃ sītayā cābhyavādayat 2.048.012a nyavedayata cātmānaṃ tasmai lakṣmaṇapūrvajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4449: 2.048.013a bhāryā mameyaṃ vaidehī kalyāṇī janakātmajā 2.048.013c māṃ cānuyātā vijanaṃ tapovanam aninditā 2.048.014a pitrā pravrājyamānaṃ māṃ saumitrir anujaḥ priyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4450: 2.048.014c ayam anvagamad bhrātā vanam eva dṛḍhavrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4451: 2.048.015a pitrā niyuktā bhagavan praveṣyāmas tapovanam 2.048.015c dharmam evācariṣyāmas tatra mūlaphalāśanāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4452: 2.048.016a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rājaputrasya dhīmataḥ 2.048.016c upānayata dharmātmā gām arghyam udakaṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4453: 2.048.017a mṛgapakṣibhir āsīno munibhiś ca samantataḥ 2.048.017c rāmam āgatam abhyarcya svāgatenāha taṃ muniḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4454: 2.048.018a pratigṛhya ca tām arcām upaviṣṭaṃ sarāghavam
GE09ram_1-7u:4456: 2.048.019a cirasya khalu kākutstha paśyāmi tvām ihāgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:4457: 2.048.019c śrutaṃ tava mayā cedaṃ vivāsanam akāraṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:4458: 2.048.020a avakāśo vivikto 'yaṃ mahānadyoḥ samāgame 2.048.020c puṇyaś ca ramaṇīyaś ca vasatv iha bhagān sukham 2.048.021a evam uktas tu vacanaṃ bharadvājena rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4459: 2.048.021c pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ rāmaḥ sarvahite rataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4460: 2.048.022a bhagavann ita āsannaḥ paurajānapado janaḥ 2.048.022c āgamiṣyati vaidehīṃ māṃ cāpi prekṣako janaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4461: 2.048.022e anena kāraṇenāham iha vāsaṃ na rocaye
GE09ram_1-7u:4462: 2.048.023a ekānte paśya bhagavann āśramasthānam uttamam 2.048.023c ramate yatra vaidehī sukhārhā janakātmajā 2.048.024a etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ bharadvājo mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4463: 2.048.024c rāghavasya tato vākyam artha grāhakam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:4464: 2.048.025a daśakrośa itas tāta girir yasmin nivatsyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:4465: 2.048.025c maharṣisevitaḥ puṇyaḥ sarvataḥ sukha darśanaḥ 2.048.026a golāṅgūlānucarito vānararkṣaniṣevitaḥ 2.048.026c citrakūṭa iti khyāto gandhamādanasaṃnibhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4466: 2.048.027a yāvatā citra kūṭasya naraḥ śṛṅgāṇy avekṣate
GE09ram_1-7u:4467: 2.048.027c kalyāṇāni samādhatte na pāpe kurute manaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4468: 2.048.028a ṛṣayas tatra bahavo vihṛtya śaradāṃ śatam
GE09ram_1-7u:4469: 2.048.028c tapasā divam ārūḍhāḥ kapālaśirasā saha 2.048.029a praviviktam ahaṃ manye taṃ vāsaṃ bhavataḥ sukham
GE09ram_1-7u:4470: 2.048.029c iha vā vanavāsāya vasa rāma mayā saha
GE09ram_1-7u:4471: 2.048.030a sa rāmaṃ sarvakāmais taṃ bharadvājaḥ priyātithim
GE09ram_1-7u:4472: 2.048.030c sabhāryaṃ saha ca bhrātrā pratijagrāha dharmavit
GE09ram_1-7u:4473: 2.048.031a tasya prayāge rāmasya taṃ maharṣim upeyuṣaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4474: 2.048.031c prapannā rajanī puṇyā citrāḥ kathayataḥ kathāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4475: 2.048.032a prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ tu bharadvājam upāgamat 2.048.032c uvāca naraśārdūlo muniṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:4476: 2.048.033a śarvarīṃ bhavanann adya satyaśīla tavāśrame 2.048.033c uṣitāḥ smeha vasatim anujānātu no bhavān
GE09ram_1-7u:4477: 2.048.034a rātryāṃ tu tasyāṃ vyuṣṭāyāṃ bharadvājo 'bravīd idam
GE09ram_1-7u:4480: 2.048.035c vicaranti vanānteṣu tāni drakṣyasi rāghava 2.048.036a prahṛṣṭakoyaṣṭikakokilasvanair; vināditaṃ taṃ vasudhādharaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:4482: 2.048.036c mṛgaiś ca mattair bahubhiś ca kuñjaraiḥ; suramyam āsādya samāvasāśramam
GE09ram_1-7u:4483: 2.049.001a uṣitvā rajanīṃ tatra rājaputrāv ariṃdamau 2.049.001c maharṣim abhivādyātha jagmatus taṃ giriṃ prati
GE09ram_1-7u:4484: 2.049.002a prasthitāṃś caiva tān prekṣya pitā putrān ivānvagāt
GE09ram_1-7u:4485: 2.049.002c tataḥ pracakrame vaktuṃ vacanaṃ sa mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4487: 2.049.003c tatra yūyaṃ plavaṃ kṛtvā taratāṃśumatīṃ nadīm
GE09ram_1-7u:4488: 2.049.004a tato nyagrodham āsādya mahāntaṃ haritacchadam 2.049.004c vivṛddhaṃ bahubhir vṛkṣaiḥ śyāmaṃ siddhopasevitam 2.049.005a krośamātraṃ tato gatvā nīlaṃ drakṣyatha kānanam
GE09ram_1-7u:4489: 2.049.005c palāśabadarīmiśraṃ rāma vaṃśaiś ca yāmunaiḥ 2.049.006a sa panthāś citrakūṭasya gataḥ subahuśo mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:4490: 2.049.006c ramyo mārdavayuktaś ca vanadāvair vivarjitaḥ 2.049.006e iti panthānam āvedya maharṣiḥ sa nyavartata
GE09ram_1-7u:4491: 2.049.007a upāvṛtte munau tasmin rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:4492: 2.049.007c kṛtapuṇyāḥ sma saumitre munir yan no 'nukampate
GE09ram_1-7u:4493: 2.049.008a iti tau puruṣavyāghrau mantrayitvā manasvinau 2.049.008c sītām evāgrataḥ kṛtvā kālindīṃ jagmatur nadīm
GE09ram_1-7u:4494: 2.049.009a tau kāṣṭhasaṃghāṭam atho cakratuḥ sumahāplavam 2.049.009c cakāra lakṣmaṇaś chittvā sītāyāḥ sukhamānasaṃ 2.049.010a tatra śriyam ivācintyāṃ rāmo dāśarathiḥ priyām
GE09ram_1-7u:4497: 2.049.011c tīrajair bahubhir vṛkṣaiḥ saṃterur yamunāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_1-7u:4498: 2.049.012a te tīrṇāḥ plavam utsṛjya prasthāya yamunāvanāt
GE09ram_1-7u:4499: 2.049.012c śyāmaṃ nyagrodham āseduḥ śītalaṃ haritacchadam 2.049.013a kausalyāṃ caiva paśyeyaṃ sumitrāṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:4500: 2.049.013c iti sītāñjaliṃ kṛtvā paryagachad vanaspatim 2.049.014a krośamātraṃ tato gatvā bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau 2.049.014c bahūn medhyān mṛgān hatvā ceratur yamunāvane
GE09ram_1-7u:4501: 2.049.015a vihṛtya te barhiṇapūganādite; śubhe vane vāraṇavānarāyute
GE09ram_1-7u:4502: 2.049.015c samaṃ nadīvapram upetya saṃmataṃ; nivāsam ājagmur adīnadarśanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4503: 2.050.001a atha rātryāṃ vyatītāyām avasuptam anantaram 2.050.001c prabodhayām āsa śanair lakṣmaṇaṃ raghunandanaḥ 2.050.002a saumitre śṛṇu vanyānāṃ valgu vyāharatāṃ svanam
GE09ram_1-7u:4505: 2.050.003a sa suptaḥ samaye bhrātrā lakṣmaṇaḥ pratibodhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4506: 2.050.003c jahau nidrāṃ ca tandrīṃ ca prasaktaṃ ca pathi śramam
GE09ram_1-7u:4507: 2.050.004a tata utthāya te sarve spṛṣṭvā nadyāḥ śivaṃ jalam 2.050.004c panthānam ṛṣiṇoddiṣṭaṃ citrakūṭasya taṃ yayuḥ 2.050.005a tataḥ saṃprasthitaḥ kāle rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_1-7u:4508: 2.050.005c sītāṃ kamalapatrākṣīm idaṃ vacanam abravīt 2.050.006a ādīptān iva vaidehi sarvataḥ puṣpitān nagān
GE09ram_1-7u:4509: 2.050.006c svaiḥ puṣpaiḥ kiṃśukān paśya mālinaḥ śiśirātyaye
GE09ram_1-7u:4510: 2.050.007a paśya bhallātakān phullān narair anupasevitān 2.050.007c phalapatrair avanatān nūnaṃ śakṣyāmi jīvitum 2.050.008a paśya droṇapramāṇāni lambamānāni lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:4511: 2.050.008c madhūni madhukārībhiḥ saṃbhṛtāni nage nage 2.050.009a eṣa krośati natyūhas taṃ śikhī pratikūjati
GE09ram_1-7u:4513: 2.050.010a mātaṃgayūthānusṛtaṃ pakṣisaṃghānunāditam 2.050.010c citrakūṭam imaṃ paśya pravṛddhaśikharaṃ girim 2.050.011a tatas tau pādacāreṇa gacchantau saha sītayā
GE09ram_1-7u:4514: 2.050.011c ramyam āsedatuḥ śailaṃ citrakūṭaṃ manoramam 2.050.012a taṃ tu parvatam āsādya nānāpakṣigaṇāyutam 2.050.012c ayaṃ vāso bhavet tāvad atra saumya ramemahi
GE09ram_1-7u:4515: 2.050.013a lakṣmaṇānaya dārūṇi dṛḍhāni ca varāṇi ca
GE09ram_1-7u:4517: 2.050.014a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā saumitrir vividhān drumān
GE09ram_1-7u:4518: 2.050.014c ājahāra tataś cakre parṇa śālām ariṃ dama
GE09ram_1-7u:4519: 2.050.015a śuśrūṣamāṇam ekāgram idaṃ vacanam abravīt 2.050.015c aiṇeyaṃ māṃsam āhṛtya śālāṃ yakṣyāmahe vayam
GE09ram_1-7u:4520: 2.050.016a sa lakṣmaṇaḥ kṛṣṇamṛgaṃ hatvā medhyaṃ patāpavān
GE09ram_1-7u:4521: 2.050.016c atha cikṣepa saumitriḥ samiddhe jātavedasi 2.050.017a taṃ tu pakvaṃ samājñāya niṣṭaptaṃ chinnaśoṇitam
GE09ram_1-7u:4522: 2.050.017c lakṣmaṇaḥ puruṣavyāghram atha rāghavam abravīt 2.050.018a ayaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ samāptāṅgaḥ śṛtaḥ kṛṣṇa mṛgo yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:4523: 2.050.018c devatā devasaṃkāśa yajasva kuśalo hy asi
GE09ram_1-7u:4524: 2.050.019a rāmaḥ snātvā tu niyato guṇavāñ japyakovidaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4525: 2.050.019c pāpasaṃśamanaṃ rāmaś cakāra balim uttamam 2.050.020a tāṃ vṛkṣaparṇac chadanāṃ manojñāṃ; yathāpradeśaṃ sukṛtāṃ nivātām
GE09ram_1-7u:4526: 2.050.020c vāsāya sarve viviśuḥ sametāḥ; sabhāṃ yathā deva gaṇāḥ sudharmām 2.050.021a anekanānāmṛgapakṣisaṃkule; vicitrapuṣpastabalair drumair yute
GE09ram_1-7u:4529: 2.050.022a suramyam āsādya tu citrakūṭaṃ; nadīṃ ca tāṃ mālyavatīṃ sutīrthām 2.050.022c nananda hṛṣṭo mṛgapakṣijuṣṭāṃ; jahau ca duḥkhaṃ puravipravāsāt
GE09ram_1-7u:4530: 2.051.001a kathayitvā suduḥkhārtaḥ sumantreṇa ciraṃ saha 2.051.001c rāme dakṣiṇa kūlasthe jagāma svagṛhaṃ guhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4531: 2.051.002a anujñātaḥ sumantro 'tha yojayitvā hayottamān 2.051.002c ayodhyām eva nagarīṃ prayayau gāḍhadurmanāḥ 2.051.003a sa vanāni sugandhīni saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca
GE09ram_1-7u:4532: 2.051.003c paśyann atiyayau śīghraṃ grāmāṇi nagarāṇi ca
GE09ram_1-7u:4534: 2.051.004c ayodhyāṃ samanuprāpya nirānandāṃ dadarśa ha 2.051.005a sa śūnyām iva niḥśabdāṃ dṛṣṭvā paramadurmanāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4536: 2.051.006a kaccin na sagajā sāśvā sajanā sajanādhipā
GE09ram_1-7u:4537: 2.051.006c rāma saṃtāpaduḥkhena dagdhā śokāgninā purī 2.051.006e iti cintāparaḥ sūtas tvaritaḥ praviveśa ha
GE09ram_1-7u:4539: 2.051.007c kva rāma iti pṛcchantaḥ sūtam abhyadravan narāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4540: 2.051.008a teṣāṃ śaśaṃsa gaṅgāyām aham āpṛcchya rāghavam
GE09ram_1-7u:4541: 2.051.008c anujñāto nivṛtto 'smi dhārmikeṇa mahātmanā 2.051.009a te tīrṇā iti vijñāya bāṣpapūrṇamukhā
GE09ram_1-7u:4542: 2.051.009c aho dhig iti niḥśvasya hā rāmeti ca cukruśuḥ 2.051.010a śuśrāva ca vacas teṣāṃ vṛndaṃ vṛndaṃ ca tiṣṭhatām 2.051.010c hatāḥ sma khalu ye neha paśyāma iti rāghavam 2.051.011a dānayajñavivāheṣu samājeṣu mahatsu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:4543: 2.051.011c na drakṣyāmaḥ punar jātu dhārmikaṃ rāmam antarā
GE09ram_1-7u:4544: 2.051.012a kiṃ samarthaṃ janasyāsya kiṃ priyaṃ kiṃ sukhāvaham
GE09ram_1-7u:4545: 2.051.012c iti rāmeṇa nagaraṃ pitṛvat paripālitam 2.051.013a vātāyanagatānāṃ ca strīṇām
GE09ram_1-7u:4548: 2.051.014c yatra rājā daśarathas tad evopayayau gṛham
GE09ram_1-7u:4549: 2.051.015a so 'vatīrya rathāc chīghraṃ rājaveśma praviśya ca 2.051.015c kakṣyāḥ saptābhicakrāma
GE09ram_1-7u:4550: 2.051.016a tato daśarathastrīṇāṃ prāsādebhyas tatas tataḥ 2.051.016c rāmaśokābhitaptānāṃ mandaṃ śuśrāva jalpitam
GE09ram_1-7u:4551: 2.051.017a saha rāmeṇa niryāto vinā rāmam ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4552: 2.051.017c sūtaḥ kiṃ nāma kausalyāṃ śocantīṃ prativakṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:4553: 2.051.018a yathā ca manye durjīvam evaṃ na sukaraṃ dhruvam 2.051.018c ācchidya putre niryāte kausalyā yatra jīvati
GE09ram_1-7u:4554: 2.051.019a satya rūpaṃ tu tadvākyaṃ rājñaḥ strīṇāṃ niśāmayan
GE09ram_1-7u:4555: 2.051.019c pradīptam iva śokena viveśa sahasā gṛham
GE09ram_1-7u:4556: 2.051.020a sa praviśyāṣṭamīṃ kakṣyāṃ rājānaṃ dīnam ātulam
GE09ram_1-7u:4558: 2.051.021a abhigamya tam āsīnaṃ narendram abhivādya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:4560: 2.051.022a sa tūṣṇīm eva tac chrutvā rājā vibhrānta cetanaḥ 2.051.022c mūrchito nyapatad bhūmau rāmaśokābhipīḍitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4562: 2.051.023c uddhṛtya bāhū cukrośa nṛpatau patite kṣitau
GE09ram_1-7u:4563: 2.051.024a sumitrayā tu sahitā kausalyā patitaṃ patim
GE09ram_1-7u:4564: 2.051.024c utthāpayām āsa tadā vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:4565: 2.051.025a imaṃ tasya mahābhāga dūtaṃ duṣkarakāriṇaḥ 2.051.025c vanavāsād anuprāptaṃ kasmān na pratibhāṣase 2.051.026a adyemam anayaṃ kṛtvā vyapatrapasi rāghava 2.051.026c uttiṣṭha sukṛtaṃ te 'stu śoke na syāt sahāyatā
GE09ram_1-7u:4566: 2.051.027a deva yasyā bhayād rāmaṃ nānupṛcchasi sārathim
GE09ram_1-7u:4567: 2.051.027c neha tiṣṭhati kaikeyī viśrabdhaṃ pratibhāṣyatām 2.051.028a sā tathoktvā mahārājaṃ kausalyā śokalālasā 2.051.028c dharaṇyāṃ nipapātāśu bāṣpaviplutabhāṣiṇī
