GE09ram_1-7u:4568: 2.051.029a evaṃ vilapatīṃ dṛṣṭvā kausalyāṃ patitāṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_1-7u:4569: 2.051.029c patiṃ cāvekṣya tāḥ sarvāḥ sasvaraṃ ruruduḥ striyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4570: 2.051.030a tatas tam antaḥpuranādam utthitaṃ; samīkṣya vṛddhās taruṇāś ca mānavāḥ 2.051.030c striyaś ca sarvā ruruduḥ samantataḥ; puraṃ tadāsīt punar eva saṃkulam 2.052.001a pratyāśvasto yadā rājā mohāt pratyāgataḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4572: 2.052.002a vṛddhaṃ paramasaṃtaptaṃ navagraham iva dvipam 2.052.002c viniḥśvasantaṃ dhyāyantam asvastham iva kuñjaram 2.052.003a rājā tu rajasā sūtaṃ dhvastāṅgaṃ samupasthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:4573: 2.052.003c aśru pūrṇamukhaṃ dīnam uvāca paramārtavat 2.052.004a kva nu vatsyati dharmātmā vṛkṣamūlam upāśritaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4575: 2.052.004e bhūmipālātmajo bhūmau śete katham anāthavat 2.052.005a yaṃ yāntam anuyānti sma padāti rathakuñjarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4576: 2.052.005c sa vatsyati kathaṃ rāmo vijanaṃ vanam āśritaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4578: 2.052.006c kathaṃ kumārau vaidehyā sārdhaṃ vanam upasthitau
GE09ram_1-7u:4579: 2.052.007a sukumāryā tapasvinyā sumantra saha sītayā 2.052.007c rājaputrau kathaṃ pādair avaruhya rathād gatau
GE09ram_1-7u:4580: 2.052.008a siddhārthaḥ khalu sūta tvaṃ yena dṛṣṭau mamātmajau
GE09ram_1-7u:4581: 2.052.008c vanāntaṃ praviśantau tāv aśvināv iva mandaram
GE09ram_1-7u:4582: 2.052.009a kim uvāca vaco rāmaḥ kim uvāca ca lakṣmaṇaḥ 2.052.009c sumantra vanam āsādya kim uvāca ca maithilī
GE09ram_1-7u:4583: 2.052.009e āsitaṃ śayitaṃ bhuktaṃ sūta rāmasya kīrtaya
GE09ram_1-7u:4584: 2.052.010a iti sūto narendreṇa coditaḥ sajjamānayā 2.052.010c uvāca vācā rājānaṃ sabāṣpaparirabdhayā
GE09ram_1-7u:4585: 2.052.011a abravīn māṃ mahārāja dharmam evānupālayan 2.052.011c añjaliṃ rāghavaḥ kṛtvā śirasābhipraṇamya ca 2.052.012a sūta madvacanāt tasya tātasya viditātmanaḥ 2.052.012c śirasā vandanīyasya vandyau pādau mahātmanaḥ 2.052.013a sarvam antaḥpuraṃ vācyaṃ sūta mad vacanāt tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:4587: 2.052.014a mātā ca mama kausalyā kuśalaṃ cābhivādanam
GE09ram_1-7u:4588: 2.052.014c devi devasya pādau ca devavat paripālaya
GE09ram_1-7u:4589: 2.052.015a bharataḥ kuśalaṃ vācyo vācyo madvacanena ca
GE09ram_1-7u:4590: 2.052.015c sarvāsv eva yathānyāyaṃ vṛttiṃ vartasva mātṛṣu
GE09ram_1-7u:4593: 2.052.017a ity evaṃ māṃ mahārāja bruvann eva mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4594: 2.052.017c rāmo rājīvatāmrākṣo bhṛśam aśrūṇy avartayat 2.052.018a lakṣmaṇas tu susaṃkruddho niḥśvasan vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:4597: 2.052.019c varadānanimittaṃ vā sarvathā duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtam 2.052.019e rāmasya tu parityāge na hetum upalakṣaye
GE09ram_1-7u:4600: 2.052.021a ahaṃ tāvan mahārāje pitṛtvaṃ nopalakṣaye 2.052.021c bhrātā bhartā ca bandhuś ca pitā ca mama rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4603: 2.052.023a jānakī tu mahārāja niḥśvasantī tapasvinī 2.052.023c bhūtopahatacitteva viṣṭhitā vṛṣmṛtā sthitā
GE09ram_1-7u:4605: 2.052.024c tena duḥkhena rudatī naiva māṃ kiṃ cid abravīt 2.052.025a udvīkṣamāṇā bhartāraṃ mukhena pariśuṣyatā
GE09ram_1-7u:4606: 2.052.025c mumoca sahasā bāṣpaṃ māṃ prayāntam udīkṣya sā
GE09ram_1-7u:4609: 2.052.026c tathaiva sītā rudatī tapasvinī; nirīkṣate rājarathaṃ tathaiva
GE09ram_1-7u:4611: 2.053.001a mama tv aśvā nivṛttasya na prāvartanta vartmani
GE09ram_1-7u:4612: 2.053.001c uṣṇam aśru vimuñcanto rāme saṃprasthite vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:4613: 2.053.002a ubhābhyāṃ rājaputrābhyām atha kṛtvāham ajñalim 2.053.002c prasthito ratham āsthāya tad duḥkham api dhārayan
GE09ram_1-7u:4614: 2.053.003a guheva sārdhaṃ tatraiva sthito 'smi divasān bahūn 2.053.003c āśayā yadi māṃ rāmaḥ punaḥ śabdāpayed iti
GE09ram_1-7u:4617: 2.053.005a na ca sarpanti sattvāni vyālā na prasaranti ca 2.053.005c rāmaśokābhibhūtaṃ tan niṣkūjam abhavad vanam 2.053.006a līnapuṣkarapatrāś ca narendra kaluṣodakāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4619: 2.053.007a jalajāni ca puṣpāṇi mālyāni sthalajāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:4620: 2.053.007c nādya bhānty alpagandhīni phalāni ca yathā puram
GE09ram_1-7u:4621: 2.053.008a praviśantam ayodhyāṃ māṃ na kaś cid abhinandati
GE09ram_1-7u:4622: 2.053.008c narā rāmam apaśyanto niḥśvasanti muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4623: 2.053.009a harmyair vimānaiḥ prāsādair avekṣya ratham āgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:4626: 2.053.010c anyonyam abhivīkṣante vyaktam ārtatarāḥ striyaḥ 2.053.011a nāmitrāṇāṃ na mitrāṇām udāsīnajanasya ca 2.053.011c aham ārtatayā kaṃ cid viśeṣaṃ nopalakṣaye
GE09ram_1-7u:4629: 2.053.013c kausalyā putra hīneva ayodhyā pratibhāti mā
GE09ram_1-7u:4630: 2.053.014a sūtasya vacanaṃ śrutvā vācā paramadīnayā 2.053.014c bāṣpopahatayā rājā taṃ sūtam idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:4632: 2.053.015c mayā na mantrakuśalair vṛddhaiḥ saha samarthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:4633: 2.053.016a na suhṛdbhir na cāmātyair mantrayitvā na naigamaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4634: 2.053.016c mayāyam arthaḥ saṃmohāt strīhetoḥ sahasā kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4635: 2.053.017a bhavitavyatayā nūnam idaṃ vā vyasanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:4636: 2.053.017c kulasyāsya vināśāya prāptaṃ sūta yadṛcchayā 2.053.018a sūta yady asti te kiṃ cin mayāpi sukṛtaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:4637: 2.053.018c tvaṃ prāpayāśu māṃ rāmaṃ prāṇāḥ saṃtvarayanti mām
GE09ram_1-7u:4638: 2.053.019a yad yad yāpi mamaivājñā nivartayatu rāghavam
GE09ram_1-7u:4639: 2.053.019c na śakṣyāmi vinā rāma muhūrtam api jīvitum
GE09ram_1-7u:4640: 2.053.020a atha vāpi mahābāhur gato dūraṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:4641: 2.053.020c mām eva ratham āropya śīghraṃ rāmāya darśaya
GE09ram_1-7u:4643: 2.053.021c yadi jīvāmi sādhv enaṃ paśyeyaṃ saha sītayā
GE09ram_1-7u:4645: 2.053.022c rāmaṃ yadi na paśyāmi gamiṣyāmi yamakṣayam
GE09ram_1-7u:4646: 2.053.023a ato nu kiṃ duḥkhataraṃ yo 'ham ikṣvākunandanam
GE09ram_1-7u:4647: 2.053.023c imām avasthām āpanno neha paśyāmi rāghavam
GE09ram_1-7u:4648: 2.053.024a hā rāma rāmānuja hā hā vaidehi tapasvinī
GE09ram_1-7u:4649: 2.053.024c na māṃ jānīta duḥkhena mriyamāṇam anāthavat
GE09ram_1-7u:4650: 2.053.024e dustaro jīvatā devi mayāyaṃ śokasāgaraḥ 2.053.025a aśobhanaṃ yo 'ham ihādya rāghavaṃ; didṛkṣamāṇo na labhe
GE09ram_1-7u:4652: 2.053.025c itīva rājā vilapan mahāyaśāḥ; papāta tūrṇaṃ śayane sa mūrchitaḥ 2.053.026a iti vilapati pārthive pranaṣṭe; karuṇataraṃ dviguṇaṃ ca
GE09ram_1-7u:4654: 2.053.026c vacanam anuniśamya tasya devī; bhayam agamat punar eva rāmamātā 2.054.001a tato bhūtopasṛṣṭeva vepamānā punaḥ punaḥ 2.054.001c dharaṇyāṃ gatasattveva kausalyā sūtam abravīt 2.054.002a naya māṃ yatra kākutsthaḥ sītā yatra ca lakṣmaṇaḥ 2.054.002c tān vinā kṣaṇam apy atra jīvituṃ notsahe hy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:4655: 2.054.003a nivartaya rathaṃ śīghraṃ daṇḍakān naya mām api
GE09ram_1-7u:4656: 2.054.003c atha tān nānugacchāmi gamiṣyāmi yamakṣayam 2.054.004a bāṣpavegaupahatayā sa vācā sajjamānayā
GE09ram_1-7u:4657: 2.054.004c idam āśvāsayan devīṃ sūtaḥ prāñjalir abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:4658: 2.054.005a tyaja śokaṃ ca mohaṃ ca saṃbhramaṃ duḥkhajaṃ tathā 2.054.005c vyavadhūya ca saṃtāpaṃ vane vatsyati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4659: 2.054.006a lakṣmaṇaś cāpi rāmasya pādau paricaran vane
GE09ram_1-7u:4661: 2.054.007a vijane 'pi vane sītā vāsaṃ prāpya gṛheṣv iva
GE09ram_1-7u:4663: 2.054.008a nāsyā dainyaṃ kṛtaṃ kiṃ cit susūkṣmam api lakṣaye 2.054.008c uciteva pravāsānāṃ vaidehī pratibhāti mā 2.054.009a nagaropavanaṃ gatvā yathā sma ramate purā
GE09ram_1-7u:4664: 2.054.009c tathaiva ramate sītā nirjaneṣu vaneṣv api
GE09ram_1-7u:4666: 2.054.010c rāmā rāme hy adīnātmā vijane 'pi vane satī 2.054.011a tadgataṃ hṛdayaṃ hy asyās tad adhīnaṃ ca jīvitam 2.054.011c ayodhyāpi bhavet tasyā rāma hīnā tathā vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:4667: 2.054.012a pathi pṛcchati vaidehī grāmāṃś ca nagarāṇi ca
GE09ram_1-7u:4668: 2.054.012c gatiṃ dṛṣṭvā nadīnāṃ ca pādapān vividhān api
GE09ram_1-7u:4669: 2.054.013a adhvanā vāta vegena saṃbhrameṇātapena ca 2.054.013c na hi gacchati vaidehyāś candrāṃśusadṛśī prabhā
GE09ram_1-7u:4671: 2.054.014c vadanaṃ tadvadānyāyā vaidehyā na vikampate 2.054.015a alaktarasaraktābhāv alaktarasavarjitau 2.054.015c adyāpi caraṇau tasyāḥ padmakośasamaprabhau
GE09ram_1-7u:4673: 2.054.016c idānīm api vaidehī tadrāgā nyastabhūṣaṇā 2.054.017a gajaṃ vā vīkṣya siṃhaṃ vā vyāghraṃ vā vanam āśritā
GE09ram_1-7u:4674: 2.054.017c nāhārayati saṃtrāsaṃ bāhū rāmasya saṃśritā 2.054.018a na śocyās te na cātmā te śocyo nāpi janādhipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4675: 2.054.018c idaṃ hi caritaṃ loke pratiṣṭhāsyati śāśvatam
GE09ram_1-7u:4676: 2.054.019a vidhūya śokaṃ parihṛṣṭamānasā; maharṣiyāte pathi suvyavasthitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4677: 2.054.019c vane ratā vanyaphalāśanāḥ pituḥ; śubhāṃ pratijñāṃ paripālayanti
GE09ram_1-7u:4679: 2.054.020a tathāpi sūtena suyuktavādinā; nivāryamāṇā sutaśokakarśitā 2.054.020c na caiva devī virarāma kūjitāt; priyeti putreti ca rāghaveti ca 2.055.001a vanaṃ gate dharmapare rāme ramayatāṃ vare
GE09ram_1-7u:4680: 2.055.001c kausalyā rudatī svārtā bhartāram idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:4681: 2.055.002a yady apitriṣu lokeṣu prathitaṃ te mayad yaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4682: 2.055.002c sānukrośo vadānyaś ca priyavādī ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4683: 2.055.003a kathaṃ naravaraśreṣṭha putrau tau saha sītayā
GE09ram_1-7u:4684: 2.055.003c duḥkhitau sukhasaṃvṛddhau vane duḥkhaṃ sahiṣyataḥ 2.055.004a sā nūnaṃ taruṇī śyāmā sukumārī sukhocitā
GE09ram_1-7u:4685: 2.055.004c katham uṣṇaṃ ca śītaṃ ca maithilī prasahiṣyate
GE09ram_1-7u:4687: 2.055.005c vanyaṃ naivāram āhāraṃ kathaṃ sītopabhokṣyate 2.055.006a gītavāditranirghoṣaṃ śrutvā śubham aninditā
GE09ram_1-7u:4688: 2.055.006c kathaṃ kravyādasiṃhānāṃ śabdaṃ śroṣyaty aśobhanam 2.055.007a mahendradhvajasaṃkāśaḥ kva nu śete mahābhujaḥ 2.055.007c bhujaṃ parighasaṃkāśam upadhāya mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4690: 2.055.008c kadā drakṣyāmi rāmasya vadanaṃ puṣkarekṣaṇam 2.055.009a vajrasāramayaṃ nūnaṃ hṛdayaṃ me na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4691: 2.055.009c apaśyantyā na taṃ yad vai phalatīdaṃ sahasradhā
GE09ram_1-7u:4692: 2.055.010a yadi pañcadaśe varṣe rāghavaḥ punar eṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:4693: 2.055.010c jahyād rājyaṃ ca kośaṃ ca bharatenopabhokṣyate
GE09ram_1-7u:4694: 2.055.011a evaṃ kanīyasā bhrātrā bhuktaṃ rājyaṃ viśāṃ pate
GE09ram_1-7u:4695: 2.055.011c bhrātā jyeṣṭhā variṣṭhāś ca kimarthaṃ nāvamaṃsyate
GE09ram_1-7u:4696: 2.055.012a na pareṇāhṛtaṃ bhakṣyaṃ vyāghraḥ khāditum icchati
GE09ram_1-7u:4697: 2.055.012c evam eva naravyāghraḥ paralīḍhaṃ na maṃsyate
GE09ram_1-7u:4698: 2.055.013a havir ājyaṃ puroḍāśāḥ kuśā yūpāś ca khādirāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4699: 2.055.013c naitāni yātayāmāni kurvanti punar adhvare 2.055.014a tathā hy āttam idaṃ rājyaṃ hṛtasārāṃ surām iva 2.055.014c nābhimantum alaṃ rāmo naṣṭasomam ivādhvaram 2.055.015a naivaṃvidham asatkāraṃ rāghavo marṣayiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:4700: 2.055.015c balavān iva śārdūlo bāladher abhimarśanam 2.055.016a sa tādṛśaḥ siṃhabalo vṛṣabhākṣo nararṣabhaḥ 2.055.016c svayam eva hataḥ pitrā jalajenātmajo yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:4701: 2.055.017a dvijāti carito dharmaḥ śāstradṛṣṭaḥ sanātanaḥ 2.055.017c yadi te dharmanirate tvayā putre vivāsite
GE09ram_1-7u:4702: 2.055.018a gatir evāk patir nāryā dvitīyā gatir ātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4703: 2.055.018c tṛtīyā jñātayo rājaṃś caturthī neha vidyate
GE09ram_1-7u:4704: 2.055.019a tatra tvaṃ caiva me nāsti rāmaś ca vanam āśritaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4705: 2.055.019c na vanaṃ gantum icchāmi sarvathā hi hatā tvayā 2.055.020a hataṃ tvayā rājyam idaṃ sarāṣṭraṃ; hatas tathātmā saha
GE09ram_1-7u:4706: mantribhiś ca 2.055.020c hatā saputrāsmi hatāś ca paurāḥ; sutaś ca bhāryā ca tava prahṛṣṭau
GE09ram_1-7u:4707: 2.055.021a imāṃ giraṃ dāruṇaśabdasaṃśritāṃ; niśamya rājāpi mumoha
GE09ram_1-7u:4709: 2.055.021c tataḥ sa śokaṃ praviveśa pārthivaḥ; svaduṣkṛtaṃ cāpi punas
GE09ram_1-7u:4711: 2.056.001a evaṃ tu kruddhayā rājā rāmamātrā saśokayā
GE09ram_1-7u:4712: 2.056.001c śrāvitaḥ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ cintayām āsa duḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4713: 2.056.002a tasya cintayamānasya pratyabhāt karma duṣkṛtam 2.056.002c yad anena kṛtaṃ pūrvam ajñānāc chabdavedhinā
GE09ram_1-7u:4714: 2.056.003a amanās tena śokena rāmaśokena ca prabhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4715: 2.056.003c dahyamānas tu śokābhyāṃ kausalyām āha bhūpatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4717: 2.056.004c vatsalā cānṛśaṃsā ca tvaṃ hi nityaṃ pareṣv api 2.056.005a bhartā tu khalu nārīṇāṃ guṇavān nirguṇo 'pi vā
GE09ram_1-7u:4718: 2.056.005c dharmaṃ vimṛśamānānāṃ pratyakṣaṃ devi daivatam 2.056.006a sā tvaṃ dharmaparā nityaṃ dṛṣṭalokaparāvara 2.056.006c nārhase vipriyaṃ vaktuṃ duḥkhitāpi suduḥkhitam 2.056.007a tad vākyaṃ karuṇaṃ rājñaḥ śrutvā dīnasya bhāṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:4719: 2.056.007c kausalyā vyasṛjad bāṣpaṃ praṇālīva navodakam 2.056.008a sa mūdrhṇi baddhvā rudatī rājñaḥ padmam ivāñjalim
GE09ram_1-7u:4720: 2.056.008c saṃbhramād abravīt trastā tvaramāṇākṣaraṃ vacaḥ 2.056.009a prasīda śirasā yāce bhūmau nitatitāsmi te
GE09ram_1-7u:4721: 2.056.009c yācitāsmi hatā deva hantavyāhaṃ na hi tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:4722: 2.056.010a naiṣā hi sā strī bhavati ślāghanīyena dhīmatā
GE09ram_1-7u:4723: 2.056.010c ubhayor lokayor vīra patyā yā saṃprasādyate
GE09ram_1-7u:4724: 2.056.011a jānāmi dharmaṃ dharmajña tvāṃ jāne satyavādinam
GE09ram_1-7u:4725: 2.056.011c putraśokārtayā tat tu mayā kim api bhāṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:4726: 2.056.012a śoko nāśayate dhairyaṃ śoko nāśayate śrutam
GE09ram_1-7u:4727: 2.056.012c śoko nāśayate sarvaṃ nāsti śokasamo ripuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4728: 2.056.013a śayam āpatitaḥ soḍhuṃ praharo ripuhastataḥ 2.056.013c soḍhum āpatitaḥ śokaḥ susūkṣmo 'pi na śakyate 2.056.014a vanavāsāya rāmasya pañcarātro 'dya gaṇyate
GE09ram_1-7u:4730: 2.056.015a taṃ hi cintayamānāyāḥ śoko 'yaṃ hṛdi vardhate 2.056.015c adīnām iva vegena samudrasalilaṃ mahat 2.056.016a evaṃ hi kathayantyās tu kausalyāyāḥ śubhaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4731: 2.056.016c mandaraśmir abhūt suryo rajanī cābhyavartata 2.056.017a atha prahlādito vākyair devyā kausalyayā nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4732: 2.056.017c śokena ca samākrānto nidrāyā vaśam eyivān
GE09ram_1-7u:4734: 2.057.001c atha rājā daśarathaḥ sa cintām abhyapadyata
GE09ram_1-7u:4736: 2.057.002c āviveśopasargas taṃ tamaḥ sūryam ivāsuram 2.057.003a sa rājā rajanīṃ ṣaṣṭhīṃ rāme pravrajite vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:4737: 2.057.003c ardharātre daśarathaḥ saṃsmaran duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtam 2.057.003e kausalyāṃ putraśokārtām idaṃ vacanam abravīt 2.057.004a yad ācarati kalyāṇi śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham
GE09ram_1-7u:4738: 2.057.004c tad eva labhate bhadre kartā karmajam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4739: 2.057.005a guru lāghavam arthānām ārambhe karmaṇāṃ phalam
GE09ram_1-7u:4740: 2.057.005c doṣaṃ vā yo na jānāti sa bāla iti hocyate
GE09ram_1-7u:4741: 2.057.006a kaś cid āmravaṇaṃ chittvā palāśāṃś ca niṣiñcati
GE09ram_1-7u:4742: 2.057.006c puṣpaṃ dṛṣṭvā phale gṛdhnuḥ sa śocati phalāgame
GE09ram_1-7u:4743: 2.057.007a so 'ham āmravaṇaṃ chittvā palāśāṃś ca nyaṣecayam 2.057.007c rāmaṃ phalāgame tyaktvā paścāc chocāmi durmatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4745: 2.057.008c kumāraḥ śabdavedhīti mayā pāpam idaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:4746: 2.057.008e tad idaṃ me 'nusaṃprāptaṃ devi duḥkhaṃ svayaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:4747: 2.057.009a saṃmohād iha bālena yathā syād bhakṣitaṃ viṣam
GE09ram_1-7u:4748: 2.057.009c evaṃ mamāpy avijñātaṃ śabdavedhyamayaṃ phalam 2.057.010a devy anūḍhā tvam abhavo yuvarājo bhavāmy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:4750: 2.057.011a upāsyahi rasān bhaumāṃs taptvā ca jagad aṃśubhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4751: 2.057.011c paretācaritāṃ bhīmāṃ ravir āviśate diśam 2.057.012a uṣṇam antardadhe sadyaḥ snigdhā dadṛśire ghanāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4755: 2.057.014a tasminn atisukhe kāle dhanuṣmān iṣumān rathī
GE09ram_1-7u:4756: 2.057.014c vyāyāma kṛtasaṃkalpaḥ sarayūm anvagāṃ nadīm 2.057.015a nipāne mahiṣaṃ rātrau gajaṃ vābhyāgataṃ nadīm
GE09ram_1-7u:4757: 2.057.015c anyaṃ vā śvāpadaṃ kaṃ cij jighāṃsur ajitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4758: 2.057.016a athāndhakāre tv aśrauṣaṃ jale kumbhasya paryataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4759: 2.057.016c acakṣur viṣaye ghoṣaṃ vāraṇasyeva nardataḥ 2.057.017a tato 'haṃ śaram uddhṛtya dīptam āśīviṣopamam
GE09ram_1-7u:4760: 2.057.017c amuñcaṃ niśitaṃ bāṇam aham āśīviṣopamam 2.057.018a tatra vāg uṣasi vyaktā prādurāsīd
GE09ram_1-7u:4761: 2.057.018c hā heti patatas toye vāg abhūt tatra mānuṣī 2.057.018e katham asmadvidhe śastraṃ nipatet tu tapasvini
GE09ram_1-7u:4763: 2.057.019c iṣuṇābhihataḥ kena kasya vā kiṃ kṛtaṃ mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:4764: 2.057.020a ṛṣer hi nyasta daṇḍasya vane vanyena jīvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4765: 2.057.020c kathaṃ nu śastreṇa vadho madvidhasya vidhīyate
GE09ram_1-7u:4766: 2.057.021a jaṭābhāradharasyaiva valkalājinavāsasaḥ 2.057.021c ko vadhena mamārthī syāt kiṃ vāsyāpakṛtaṃ mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:4768: 2.057.022c na kaś cit sādhu manyeta yathaiva gurutalpagam
GE09ram_1-7u:4770: 2.057.023c mātaraṃ pitaraṃ cobhāv anuśocāmi madvidhe 2.057.024a tad etān mithunaṃ vṛddhaṃ cirakālabhṛtaṃ mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:4771: 2.057.024c mayi pañcatvam āpanne kāṃ vṛttiṃ vartayiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:4772: 2.057.025a vṛddhau ca mātāpitarāv ahaṃ caikeṣuṇā hataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4773: 2.057.025c kena sma nihatāḥ sarve subālenākṛtātmanā 2.057.026a taṃ giraṃ karuṇāṃ śrutvā mama dharmānukāṅkṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4774: 2.057.026c karābhyāṃ saśaraṃ cāpaṃ vyathitasyāpatad bhuvi 2.057.027a taṃ deśam aham āgamya dīnasattvaḥ sudurmanāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4775: 2.057.027c apaśyam iṣuṇā tīre sarayvās tāpasaṃ hatam
GE09ram_1-7u:4776: 2.057.028a sa mām udvīkṣya netrābhyāṃ trastam asvasthacetasaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:4777: 2.057.028c ity uvāca vacaḥ krūraṃ didhakṣann iva tejasā
GE09ram_1-7u:4778: 2.057.029a kiṃ tavāpakṛtaṃ rājan vane nivasatā mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:4779: 2.057.029c jihīrṣiur ambho gurvarthaṃ yad ahaṃ tāḍitas tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:4780: 2.057.030a ekena khalu bāṇena marmaṇy abhihate mayi
GE09ram_1-7u:4781: 2.057.030c dvāv andhau nihatau vṛddhau mātā janayitā ca me 2.057.031a tau nūnaṃ durbalāv andhau matpratīkṣau pipāsitau
GE09ram_1-7u:4782: 2.057.031c ciram āśākṛtāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ kaṣṭāṃ saṃdhārayiṣyataḥ 2.057.032a na nūnaṃ tapaso vāsti phalayogaḥ śrutasya vā
GE09ram_1-7u:4783: 2.057.032c pitā yan māṃ na jānāti śayānaṃ patitaṃ bhuvi 2.057.033a jānann api ca kiṃ kuryād aśaktir aparikramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4784: 2.057.033c bhidyamānam ivāśaktas trātum anyo nago nagam
GE09ram_1-7u:4785: 2.057.034a pitus tvam eva me gatvā śīghram ācakṣva rāghava 2.057.034c na tvām anudahet kruddho vanaṃ vahnir ivaidhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4786: 2.057.035a iyam ekapadī rājan yato me pitur āśramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4787: 2.057.035c taṃ prasādaya gatvā tvaṃ na tvāṃ sa kupitaḥ śapet
GE09ram_1-7u:4788: 2.057.036a viśalyaṃ kuru māṃ rājan marma me niśitaḥ śaraḥ 2.057.036c ruṇaddhi mṛdu sotsedhaṃ tīram amburayo yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:4789: 2.057.037a na dvijātir ahaṃ rājan mā bhūt te manaso vyathā
GE09ram_1-7u:4790: 2.057.037c śūdrāyām asmi vaiśyena jāto janapadādhipa 2.057.038a itīva vadataḥ kṛcchrād
GE09ram_1-7u:4791: 2.057.038c tasya tv ānamyamānasya taṃ bāṇam aham uddharam
GE09ram_1-7u:4792: 2.057.039a jalārdragātraṃ tu vilapya kṛcchān; marmavraṇaṃ saṃtatam ucchasantam
GE09ram_1-7u:4793: 2.057.039c tataḥ sarayvāṃ tam ahaṃ śayānaṃ; samīkṣya bhadre subhṛśaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:4795: 2.058.001a tad ajñānān mahat pāpaṃ kṛtvā saṃkulitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4796: 2.058.001c ekas tv acintayaṃ buddhyā kathaṃ nu sukṛtaṃ bhavet 2.058.002a tatas taṃ ghaṭam ādaya pūrṇaṃ paramavāriṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:4797: 2.058.002c āśramaṃ tam ahaṃ prāpya yathākhyātapathaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4798: 2.058.003a tatrāhaṃ durbalāv andhau vṛddhāv apariṇāyakau 2.058.003c apaśyaṃ tasya pitarau lūnapakṣāv iva dvijau
GE09ram_1-7u:4800: 2.058.004c tām āśāṃ matkṛte hīnāv udāsīnāv anāthavat
GE09ram_1-7u:4801: 2.058.005a padaśabdaṃ tu me śrutvā munir vākyam abhāṣata
GE09ram_1-7u:4802: 2.058.005c kiṃ cirāyasi me putra pānīyaṃ kṣipram ānaya
GE09ram_1-7u:4803: 2.058.006a yannimittam idaṃ tāta salile krīḍitaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:4804: 2.058.006c utkaṇṭhitā te māteyaṃ praviśa kṣipram āśramam
GE09ram_1-7u:4805: 2.058.007a yad vyalīkaṃ kṛtaṃ putra mātrā te yadi vā mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:4806: 2.058.007c na tan manasi kartavyaṃ tvayā tāta tapasvinā
GE09ram_1-7u:4807: 2.058.008a tvaṃ gatis tv agatīnāṃ ca cakṣus tvaṃ hīnacakṣuṣām 2.058.008c samāsaktās tvayi prāṇāḥ kiṃ cin nau nābhibhāṣase
GE09ram_1-7u:4808: 2.058.009a munim avyaktayā vācā tam ahaṃ sajjamānayā
GE09ram_1-7u:4809: 2.058.009c hīnavyañjanayā prekṣya bhīto bhīta ivābruvam 2.058.010a manasaḥ karma ceṣṭābhir abhisaṃstabhya vāgbalam 2.058.010c ācacakṣe tv ahaṃ tasmai putravyasanajaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_1-7u:4811: 2.058.011c sajjanāvamataṃ duḥkham idaṃ prāptaṃ svakarmajam 2.058.012a bhagavaṃś cāpahasto 'haṃ sarayūtīram āgataḥ 2.058.012c jighāṃsuḥ śvāpadaṃ kiṃ cin nipāne vāgataṃ gajam
GE09ram_1-7u:4812: 2.058.013a tatra śruto mayā śabdo jale kumbhasya pūryataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4813: 2.058.013c dvipo 'yam iti matvā hi bāṇenābhihato mayā 2.058.014a gatvā nadyās tatas tīram apaśyam iṣuṇā hṛdi
GE09ram_1-7u:4814: 2.058.014c vinirbhinnaṃ gataprāṇaṃ śayānaṃ bhuvi tāpasaṃ 2.058.015a bhagavañ śabdam ālakṣya mayā gajajighāṃsunā 2.058.015c visṛṣṭo 'mbhasi nārācas tena te nihataḥ sutaḥ 2.058.016a sa coddhṛtena bāṇena tatraiva svargam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4815: 2.058.016c bhagavantāv ubhau śocann andhāv iti vilapya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:4816: 2.058.017a ajñānād bhavataḥ putraḥ sahasābhihato mayā 2.058.017c śeṣam evaṃgate yat syāt tat prasīdatu me muniḥ 2.058.018a sa tac chrutvā vacaḥ krūraṃ niḥśvasañ śokakarśitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4817: 2.058.018c mām uvāca mahātejāḥ kṛtāñjalim upasthitam 2.058.019a yady etad aśubhaṃ karma na sma me kathayeḥ svayam
GE09ram_1-7u:4818: 2.058.019c phalen mūrdhā sma te rājan sadyaḥ śatasahasradhā
GE09ram_1-7u:4819: 2.058.020a kṣatriyeṇa vadho rājan vānaprasthe viśeṣataḥ 2.058.020c jñānapūrvaṃ kṛtaḥ sthānāc cyāvayed api vajriṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:4820: 2.058.021a ajñānād dhi kṛtaṃ yasmād idaṃ tenaiva jīvasi
GE09ram_1-7u:4821: 2.058.021c api hy adya kulaṃ nasyād rāghavāṇāṃ kuto bhavān 2.058.022a naya nau nṛpa taṃ deśam iti māṃ cābhyabhāṣata 2.058.022c adya taṃ draṣṭum icchāvaḥ putraṃ paścimadarśanam
GE09ram_1-7u:4822: 2.058.023a rudhireṇāvasitāṅgaṃ prakīrṇājinavāsasaṃ 2.058.023c śayānaṃ bhuvi niḥsaṃjñaṃ dharmarājavaśaṃ gatam 2.058.024a athāham ekas taṃ deśaṃ nītvā tau bhṛśaduḥkhitau
GE09ram_1-7u:4823: 2.058.024c asparśayam ahaṃ putraṃ taṃ muniṃ saha bhāryayā
GE09ram_1-7u:4824: 2.058.025a tau putram ātmanaḥ spṛṣṭvā tam āsādya tapasvinau
GE09ram_1-7u:4826: 2.058.026a na nv ahaṃ te priyaḥ putra mātaraṃ paśya dhārmika
GE09ram_1-7u:4827: 2.058.026c kiṃ nu nāliṅgase putra sukumāra vaco vada
GE09ram_1-7u:4828: 2.058.027a kasya vāpararātre 'haṃ śroṣyāmi hṛdayaṃgamam 2.058.027c adhīyānasya madhuraṃ śāstraṃ vānyad viśeṣataḥ 2.058.028a ko māṃ saṃdhyām upāsyaiva snātvā hutahutāśanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4830: 2.058.029a kandamūlaphalaṃ hṛtvā ko māṃ priyam ivātithim
GE09ram_1-7u:4832: 2.058.030a imām andhāṃ ca vṛddhāṃ ca mātaraṃ te tapasvinīm 2.058.030c kathaṃ putra bhariṣyāmi kṛpaṇāṃ putragardhinīm 2.058.031a tiṣṭha mā mā gamaḥ putra yamasya sadanaṃ prati 2.058.031c śvo mayā saha gantāsi jananyā ca samedhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4833: 2.058.032a ubhāv api ca śokārtāv anāthau kṛpaṇau vane
GE09ram_1-7u:4834: 2.058.032c kṣipram eva gamiṣyāvas tvayā hīnau yamakṣayam
GE09ram_1-7u:4835: 2.058.033a tato vaivasvataṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ pravakṣyāmi bhāratīm
GE09ram_1-7u:4836: 2.058.033c kṣamatāṃ dharmarājo me bibhṛyāt pitarāv ayam
GE09ram_1-7u:4838: 2.058.034c tena satyena gacchāśu ye lokāḥ śastrayodhinām
GE09ram_1-7u:4839: 2.058.035a yānti śūrā gatiṃ yāṃ ca saṃgrāmeṣv anivartinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4840: 2.058.035c hatās tv abhimukhāḥ putra gatiṃ tāṃ paramāṃ vraja 2.058.036a yāṃ gatiṃ sagaraḥ śaibyo dilīpo janamejayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4841: 2.058.036c nahuṣo dhundhumāraś ca prāptās tāṃ gaccha putraka
GE09ram_1-7u:4842: 2.058.037a yā gatiḥ sarvasādhūnāṃ svādhyāyāt patasaś ca yā
GE09ram_1-7u:4844: 2.058.038a gosahasrapradātṝṇāṃ yā yā gurubhṛtām api 2.058.038c dehanyāsakṛtāṃ yā ca tāṃ gatiṃ gaccha putraka
GE09ram_1-7u:4845: 2.058.038e na hi tv asmin kule jāto gacchaty akuśalāṃ gatim
GE09ram_1-7u:4846: 2.058.039a evaṃ sa kṛpaṇaṃ tatra paryadevayatāsakṛt 2.058.039c tato 'smai kartum udakaṃ pravṛttaḥ saha bhāryayā 2.058.040a sa tu divyena rūpeṇa muniputraḥ svakarmabhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4847: 2.058.040c āśvāsya ca muhūrtaṃ tu pitarau vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:4848: 2.058.041a sthānam asmi mahat prāpto bhavatoḥ paricāraṇāt
GE09ram_1-7u:4849: 2.058.041c bhavantāv api ca kṣipraṃ mama mūlam upaiṣyataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4850: 2.058.042a evam uktvā tu divyena vimānena vapuṣmatā
GE09ram_1-7u:4851: 2.058.042c āruroha divaṃ kṣipraṃ muniputro jitendriyaḥ 2.058.043a sa kṛtvā tūdakaṃ tūrṇaṃ tāpasaḥ saha bhāryayā
GE09ram_1-7u:4852: 2.058.043c mām uvāca mahātejāḥ kṛtāñjalim upasthitam 2.058.044a adyaiva jahi māṃ rājan maraṇe nāsti me vyathā 2.058.044c yac chareṇaikaputraṃ māṃ tvam akārṣīr aputrakam
GE09ram_1-7u:4853: 2.058.045a tvayā tu yad avijñānān nihato me sutaḥ śuciḥ 2.058.045c tena tvām abhiśapsyāmi suduḥkham atidāruṇam 2.058.046a putravyasanajaṃ duḥkhaṃ yad etan mama sāmpratam
GE09ram_1-7u:4854: 2.058.046c evaṃ tvaṃ putraśokena rājan kālaṃ kariṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:4855: 2.058.047a tasmān mām āgataṃ bhadre tasyodārasya tadvacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4856: 2.058.047c yad ahaṃ putraśokena saṃtyakṣyāmy adya jīvitam
GE09ram_1-7u:4857: 2.058.048a yadi māṃ saṃspṛśed rāmaḥ sakṛd adyālabheta vā
GE09ram_1-7u:4858: 2.058.048c na tan me sadṛśaṃ devi yan mayā rāghave kṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:4859: 2.058.049a cakṣuṣā tvāṃ na paśyāmi smṛtir mama vilupyate
GE09ram_1-7u:4860: 2.058.049c dūtā vaivasvatasyaite kausalye tvarayanti mām 2.058.050a atas tu kiṃ duḥkhataraṃ yad ahaṃ jīvitakṣaye
GE09ram_1-7u:4861: 2.058.050c na hi paśyāmi dharmajñaṃ rāmaṃ satyaparākyamam
GE09ram_1-7u:4862: 2.058.051a na te manuṣyā devās te ye cāruśubhakuṇḍalam
GE09ram_1-7u:4863: 2.058.051c mukhaṃ drakṣyanti rāmasya varṣe pañcadaśe punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4865: 2.058.052c dhanyā drakṣyanti rāmasya tārādhipanibhaṃ mukham 2.058.053a sadṛśaṃ śāradasyendoḥ phullasya kamalasya ca 2.058.053c sugandhi mama nāthasya dhanyā drakṣyanti tanmukham
GE09ram_1-7u:4866: 2.058.054a nivṛttavanavāsaṃ tam ayodhyāṃ punar āgatam 2.058.054c drakṣyanti sukhino rāmaṃ śukraṃ mārgagataṃ yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:4867: 2.058.055a ayam ātmabhavaḥ śoko mām anātham acetanam
GE09ram_1-7u:4868: 2.058.055c saṃsādayati vegena yathā kūlaṃ nadīrayaḥ 2.058.056a hā rāghava mahābāho hā mamāyāsa
GE09ram_1-7u:4869: 2.058.056c rājā daśarathaḥ śocañ jīvitāntam upāgamat 2.058.057a tathā tu dīnaṃ kathayan narādhipaḥ; priyasya putrasya vivāsanāturaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4879: 2.059.004c upaninyus tathāpy anyāḥ kumārī bahulāḥ striyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4880: 2.059.005a atha yāḥ kosalendrasya śayanaṃ pratyanantarāḥ 2.059.005c tāḥ striyas tu samāgamya bhartāraṃ pratyabodhayan
GE09ram_1-7u:4881: 2.059.006a tā vepathuparītāś ca rājñaḥ prāṇeṣu śaṅkitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4883: 2.059.007a atha saṃvepamanānāṃ strīṇāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca pārthivam
GE09ram_1-7u:4884: 2.059.007c yat tad āśaṅkitaṃ pāpaṃ tasya jajñe viniścayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4885: 2.059.008a tataḥ pracukruśur dīnāḥ sasvaraṃ tā varāṅganāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4888: 2.059.009c kausalyā ca sumitrāca tyaktanidre babhūvatuḥ 2.059.010a kausalyā ca sumitrā ca dṛṣṭvā spṛṣṭvā ca pārthivam 2.059.010c hā nātheti parikruśya petatur dharaṇītale 2.059.011a sā kosalendraduhitā veṣṭamānā mahītale
GE09ram_1-7u:4889: 2.059.011c na babhrāja rajodhvastā tāreva gaganacyutā 2.059.012a tat samuttrastasaṃbhrāntaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:4892: 2.059.013c babhūva naradevasya sadma diṣṭāntam īyuṣaḥ 2.059.014a atītam ājñāya tu pārthivarṣabhaṃ; yaśasvinaṃ saṃparivārya patnayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4893: 2.059.014c bhṛśaṃ rudantyaḥ karuṇaṃ suduḥkhitāḥ; pragṛhya bāhū vyalapann
GE09ram_1-7u:4895: 2.060.001a tam agnim iva saṃśāntam ambuhīnam ivārṇavam
GE09ram_1-7u:4896: 2.060.001c hataprabham ivādityaṃ svargathaṃ prekṣya bhūmipam 2.060.002a kausalyā bāṣpapūrṇākṣī vividhaṃ śokakarśitā
GE09ram_1-7u:4897: 2.060.002c upagṛhya śiro rājñaḥ kaikeyīṃ pratyabhāṣata 2.060.003a sakāmā bhava kaikeyi bhuṅkṣva rājyam akaṇṭakam
GE09ram_1-7u:4898: 2.060.003c tyaktvā rājānam ekāgrā nṛśaṃse duṣṭacāriṇi 2.060.004a vihāya māṃ gato rāmo bhartā ca svargato mama 2.060.004c vipathe sārthahīneva nāhaṃ jīvitum utsahe 2.060.005a bhartāraṃ taṃ parityajya kā strī daivatam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4899: 2.060.005c icchej jīvitum anyatra kaikeyyās tyaktadharmaṇaḥ 2.060.006a na lubdho budhyate doṣān kiṃ pākam iva bhakṣayan 2.060.006c kubjānimittaṃ kaikeyyā rāghavāṇān kulaṃ hatam 2.060.007a aniyoge niyuktena rājñā rāmaṃ vivāsitam 2.060.007c sabhāryaṃ janakaḥ śrutvā patitapsyaty ahaṃ yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:4900: 2.060.008a rāmaḥ kamalapatrākṣo jīvanāśam ito gataḥ 2.060.008c videharājasya sutā tahā sītā tapasvinī 2.060.008e duḥkhasyānucitā duḥkhaṃ vane paryudvijiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:4902: 2.060.009c niśamya nūnaṃ saṃstrastā rāghavaṃ saṃśrayiṣyati 2.060.010a vṛddhaś caivālpaputraś ca vaidehīm anicintayan 2.060.010c so 'pi śokasamāviṣṭo nanu tyakṣyati jīvitam
GE09ram_1-7u:4903: 2.060.011a tāṃ tataḥ saṃpariṣvajya vilapantīṃ tapasvinīm 2.060.011c vyapaninyuḥ suduḥkhārtāṃ kausalyāṃ vyāvahārikāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4905: 2.060.012c rājñaḥ sarvāṇy athādiṣṭāś cakruḥ karmāṇy anantaram
GE09ram_1-7u:4906: 2.060.013a na tu saṃkalanaṃ rājño vinā putreṇa mantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4907: 2.060.013c sarvajñāḥ kartum īṣus te tato rakṣanti bhūmipam
GE09ram_1-7u:4908: 2.060.014a tailadroṇyāṃ tu sacivaiḥ śāyitaṃ taṃ narādhipam
GE09ram_1-7u:4909: 2.060.014c hā mṛto 'yam iti jñātvā striyas tāḥ paryadevayan 2.060.015a bāhūn udyamya kṛpaṇā netraprasravaṇair mukhaiḥ 2.060.015c rudantyaḥ śokasaṃtaptāḥ kṛpaṇaṃ paryadevayan
GE09ram_1-7u:4911: 2.060.016c purī nārājatāyodhyā hīnā rājñā mahātmanā 2.060.017a bāṣpaparyākulajanā hāhābhūtakulāṅganā 2.060.017c śūnyacatvaraveśmāntā na babhrāja yathāpuram
GE09ram_1-7u:4912: 2.060.018a gataprabhā dyaur iva bhāskaraṃ vinā; vyapetanakṣatragaṇeva śarvarī 2.060.018c purī babhāse rahitā mahātmanā; na cāsrakaṇṭhākulamārgacatvarā 2.060.019a narāś ca nāryaś ca sametya saṃghaśo; vigarhamāṇā bharatasya mātaram
GE09ram_1-7u:4913: 2.060.019c tadā nagaryāṃ naradevasaṃkṣaye; babhūvur ārtā na ca śarma lebhire
GE09ram_1-7u:4914: 2.061.001a vyatītāyāṃ tu śarvaryām ādityasyodaye tataḥ 2.061.001c sametya rājakartāraḥ sabhām īyur dvijātayaḥ 2.061.002a mārkaṇḍeyo 'tha maudgalyo vāmadevaś ca kāśyapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4915: 2.061.002c kātyayano gautamaś ca jābāliś ca mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4916: 2.061.003a ete dvijāḥ sahāmātyaiḥ pṛthag vācam udīrayan
GE09ram_1-7u:4918: 2.061.004a atītā śarvarī duḥkhaṃ yā no varṣaśatopamā
GE09ram_1-7u:4919: 2.061.004c asmin pañcatvam āpanne putraśokena pārthive 2.061.005a svargataś ca mahārājo rāmaś cāraṇyam āśritaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4920: 2.061.005c lakṣmaṇaś cāpi tejasvī rāmeṇaiva gataḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:4923: 2.061.007a ikṣvākūṇām ihādyaiva kaś cid rājā vidhīyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:4924: 2.061.007c arājakaṃ hi no rāṣṭraṃ na vināśam avāpnuyāt
GE09ram_1-7u:4926: 2.061.008c abhivarṣati parjanyo mahīṃ divyena vāriṇā 2.061.009a nārājake janapade bījamuṣṭiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4927: 2.061.009c nārākake pituḥ putro bhāryā vā vartate vaśe
GE09ram_1-7u:4928: 2.061.010a arājake dhanaṃ nāsti nāsti bhāryāpy arājake
GE09ram_1-7u:4929: 2.061.010c idam atyāhitaṃ cānyat kutaḥ satyam arājake
GE09ram_1-7u:4930: 2.061.011a nārājake janapade kārayanti sabhāṃ narāḥ 2.061.011c udyānāni ca ramyāṇi hṛṣṭāḥ puṇyagṛhāṇi ca
GE09ram_1-7u:4932: 2.061.012c satrāṇy anvāsate dāntā brāhmaṇāḥ saṃśitavratāḥ 2.061.013a nārājake janapade
GE09ram_1-7u:4933: 2.061.013c utsavāś ca samājāś ca vardhante rāṣṭravardhanāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4937: 2.061.015c narā niryānty araṇyāni nārībhiḥ saha kāminaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4942: 2.061.018a nārājake janapade caraty ekacaro vaśī 2.061.018c bhāvayann ātmanātmānaṃ yatrasāyaṃgṛho
GE09ram_1-7u:4944: 2.061.019c na cāpy arājake senā śatrūn viṣahate yudhi
GE09ram_1-7u:4945: 2.061.020a yathā hy anudakā nadyo yathā vāpy atṛṇaṃ vanam 2.061.020c agopālā yathā gāvas tathā rāṣṭram arājakam
GE09ram_1-7u:4946: 2.061.021a nārājake janapade svakaṃ bhavati kasya cit
GE09ram_1-7u:4947: 2.061.021c matsyā iva narā nityaṃ bhakṣayanti parasparam
GE09ram_1-7u:4950: 2.061.023a aho tama ivedaṃ syān na prajñāyeta kiṃ cana 2.061.023c rājā cen na bhaveṃl loke vibhajan sādhvasādhunī
GE09ram_1-7u:4951: 2.061.024a jīvaty api mahārāje tavaiva vacanaṃ vayam
GE09ram_1-7u:4952: 2.061.024c nātikramāmahe sarve velāṃ prāpyeva sāgaraḥ 2.061.025a sa naḥ samīkṣya dvijavaryavṛttaṃ; nṛpaṃ vinā rājyam
GE09ram_1-7u:4954: 2.061.025c kumāram ikṣvākusutaṃ vadānyaṃ; tvam eva rājānam ihābhiṣiñcaya
GE09ram_1-7u:4955: 2.062.001a teṣāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā vasiṣṭhaḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:4956: 2.062.001c mitrāmātyagaṇān sarvān brāhmaṇāṃs tān idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4957: 2.062.002a yad asau mātulakule pure rājagṛhe sukhī
GE09ram_1-7u:4958: 2.062.002c bharato vasati bhrātrā śatrughnena samanvitaḥ 2.062.003a tac chīghraṃ javanā dūtā gacchantu tvaritair hayaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4959: 2.062.003c ānetuṃ bhrātarau vīrau kiṃ samīkṣāmahe vayam
GE09ram_1-7u:4960: 2.062.004a gacchantv iti tataḥ sarve vasiṣṭhaṃ vākyam abruvan
GE09ram_1-7u:4961: 2.062.004c teṣāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā vasiṣṭho vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:4963: 2.062.005c śrūyatām itikartavyaṃ sarvān eva bravīmi vaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4964: 2.062.006a puraṃ rājagṛhaṃ gatvā śīghraṃ śīghrajavair hayaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4965: 2.062.006c tyaktaśokair idaṃ vācyaḥ śāsanād bharato mama
GE09ram_1-7u:4966: 2.062.007a purohitas tvāṃ kuśalaṃ prāha sarve ca mantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4967: 2.062.007c tvaramāṇaś ca niryāhi kṛtyam ātyayikaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:4968: 2.062.008a mā cāsmai proṣitaṃ rāmaṃ mā cāsmai pitaraṃ mṛtam 2.062.008c bhavantaḥ śaṃsiṣur gatvā rāghavāṇām imaṃ kṣayam
GE09ram_1-7u:4969: 2.062.009a kauśeyāni ca vastrāṇi bhūṣaṇāni varāṇi ca
GE09ram_1-7u:4970: 2.062.009c kṣipram ādāya rājñaś ca bharatasya ca gacchata
GE09ram_1-7u:4972: 2.062.010a te hastina pure gaṅgāṃ tīrtvā pratyaṅmukhā yayuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4977: 2.062.012c abhigamyābhivādyaṃ taṃ kuliṅgāṃ prāviśan purīm 2.062.013a abhikālaṃ tataḥ prāpya tejo'bhibhavanāc cyutāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4978: 2.062.013c yayur madhyena bāhlīkān sudāmānaṃ ca parvatam
GE09ram_1-7u:4979: 2.062.013e viṣṇoḥ padaṃ prekṣamāṇā vipāśāṃ cāpi śālmalīm
GE09ram_1-7u:4980: 2.062.014a te śrāntavāhanā dūtā vikṛṣṭena satā pathā
GE09ram_1-7u:4981: 2.062.014c giri vrajaṃ pura varaṃ śīghram āsedur añjasā
GE09ram_1-7u:4982: 2.062.015a bhartuḥ priyārthaṃ kularakṣaṇārthaṃ; bhartuś ca vaṃśasya
GE09ram_1-7u:4984: 2.062.015c aheḍamānās tvarayā sma dūtā; rātryāṃ tu te tat puram eva yātāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4985: 2.063.001a yām eva rātriṃ te dūtāḥ praviśanti sma tāṃ purīm
GE09ram_1-7u:4986: 2.063.001c bharatenāpi tāṃ rātriṃ svapno dṛṣṭo 'yam apriyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4987: 2.063.002a vyuṣṭām eva tu tāṃ rātriṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ svapnam apriyam
GE09ram_1-7u:4990: 2.063.003c āyāsaṃ hi vineṣyantaḥ sabhāyāṃ cakrire kathāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4991: 2.063.004a vādayanti tathā śāntiṃ lāsayanty api cāpare
GE09ram_1-7u:4992: 2.063.004c nāṭakāny apare prāhur hāsyāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:4993: 2.063.005a sa tair mahātmā bharataḥ sakhibhiḥ priya vādibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4994: 2.063.005c goṣṭhīhāsyāni kurvadbhir na prāhṛṣyata rāghavaḥ 2.063.006a tam abravīt priyasakho bharataṃ sakhibhir vṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:4995: 2.063.006c suhṛdbhiḥ paryupāsīnaḥ kiṃ sakhe nānumodase 2.063.007a evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ suhṛdaṃ bharataḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:4996: 2.063.007c śṛṇu tvaṃ yan nimittaṃme dainyam etad upāgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:4997: 2.063.008a svapne pitaram adrākṣaṃ malinaṃ muktamūrdhajam 2.063.008c patantam adriśikharāt kaluṣe gomaye hrade 2.063.009a plavamānaś ca me dṛṣṭaḥ sa tasmin gomayahrade
GE09ram_1-7u:4998: 2.063.009c pibann añjalinā tailaṃ hasann iva muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:4999: 2.063.010a tatas tilodanaṃ bhuktvā punaḥ punar adhaḥśirāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5001: 2.063.011a svapne 'pi sāgaraṃ śuṣkaṃ candraṃ ca patitaṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_1-7u:5002: 2.063.011c sahasā cāpi saṃśantaṃ jvalitaṃ jātavedasaṃ 2.063.012a avadīrṇāṃ ca pṛthivīṃ śuṣkāṃś ca vividhān drumān
GE09ram_1-7u:5003: 2.063.012c ahaṃ paśyāmi vidhvastān sadhūmāṃś caiva pārvatān
GE09ram_1-7u:5004: 2.063.013a pīṭhe kārṣṇāyase cainaṃ niṣaṇṇaṃ kṛṣṇavāsasaṃ 2.063.013c prahasanti sma rājānaṃ pramadāḥ kṛṣṇapiṅgalāḥ 2.063.014a tvaramāṇaś ca dharmātmā raktamālyānulepanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5006: 2.063.015a evam etan mayā dṛṣṭam imāṃ rātriṃ bhayāvahām
GE09ram_1-7u:5007: 2.063.015c ahaṃ rāmo 'tha vā rājā lakṣmaṇo vā mariṣyati 2.063.016a naro yānena yaḥ svapne kharayuktena yāti hi
GE09ram_1-7u:5008: 2.063.016c acirāt tasya dhūmāgraṃ citāyāṃ saṃpradṛśyate 2.063.016e etannimittaṃ dīno 'haṃ tan na vaḥ pratipūjaye
GE09ram_1-7u:5009: 2.063.017a śuṣyatīva ca me kaṇṭho na svastham iva me manaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5010: 2.063.017c jugupsann iva cātmānaṃ na ca paśyāmi kāraṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:5011: 2.063.018a imāṃ hi duḥsvapnagatiṃ niśāmya tām; anekarūpām avitarkitāṃ purā
GE09ram_1-7u:5012: 2.063.018c bhayaṃ mahat tad dhṛdayān na yāti me; vicintya rājānam acintyadarśanam
GE09ram_1-7u:5013: 2.064.001a bharate bruvati svapnaṃ dūtās te klāntavāhanāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5015: 2.064.002a samāgamya tu rājñā ca rājaputreṇa cārcitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5016: 2.064.002c rājñaḥ pādau gṛhītvā tu tam ūcur bharataṃ vacaḥ 2.064.003a purohitas tvā kuśalaṃ prāha sarve ca mantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5017: 2.064.003c tvaramāṇaś ca niryāhi kṛtyam ātyayikaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:5018: 2.064.004a atra viṃśatikoṭyas tu nṛpater mātulasya te
GE09ram_1-7u:5019: 2.064.004c daśakoṭyas tu saṃpūrṇās tathaiva ca nṛpātmaja
GE09ram_1-7u:5020: 2.064.005a pratigṛhya ca tat sarvaṃ svanuraktaḥ suhṛjjane
GE09ram_1-7u:5021: 2.064.005c dūtān uvāca bharataḥ kāmaiḥ saṃpratipūjya tān
GE09ram_1-7u:5022: 2.064.006a kaccit sukuśalī rājā pitā daśaratho mama
GE09ram_1-7u:5023: 2.064.006c kaccic cārāgatā rāme lakṣmaṇe vā mahātmani
GE09ram_1-7u:5024: 2.064.007a āryā ca dharmaniratā dharmajñā dharmadarśinī 2.064.007c arogā cāpi kausalyā mātā rāmasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5025: 2.064.008a kaccit sumitrā dharmajñā jananī lakṣmaṇasya yā
GE09ram_1-7u:5026: 2.064.008c śatrughnasya ca vīrasya sārogā cāpi madhyamā
GE09ram_1-7u:5027: 2.064.009a ātmakāmā sadā caṇḍī krodhanā prājñamāninī 2.064.009c arogā cāpi kaikeyī mātā me kim uvāca ha 2.064.010a evam uktās tu te dūtā bharatena mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:5028: 2.064.010c ūcuḥ saṃpraśritaṃ vākyam idaṃ taṃ bharataṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:5029: 2.064.010e kuśalās te naravyāghra yeṣāṃ kuśalam icchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:5030: 2.064.011a bharataś cāpi tān dūtān evam ukto 'bhyabhāṣata
GE09ram_1-7u:5032: 2.064.012a evam uktvā tu tān dūtān bharataḥ pārthivātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5033: 2.064.012c dūtaiḥ saṃcodito vākyaṃ mātāmaham uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:5034: 2.064.013a rājan pitur gamiṣyāmi sakāśaṃ dūtacoditaḥ 2.064.013c punar apy aham eṣyāmi yadā me tvaṃ smariṣyasi 2.064.014a bharatenaivam uktas tu nṛpo mātāmahas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:5035: 2.064.014c tam uvāca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ śirasy āghrāya rāghavam
GE09ram_1-7u:5036: 2.064.015a gaccha tātānujāne tvāṃ kaikeyī suprajās tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:5037: 2.064.015c mātaraṃ kuśalaṃ brūyāḥ pitaraṃ ca paraṃtapa
GE09ram_1-7u:5038: 2.064.016a purohitaṃ ca kuśalaṃ ye cānye dvijasattamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5039: 2.064.016c tau ca tāta maheṣvāsau bhrātaru rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:5040: 2.064.017a tasmai hastyuttamāṃś citrān kambalān ajināni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:5041: 2.064.017c abhisatkṛtya kaikeyo bharatāya dhanaṃ dadau 2.064.018a rukma niṣkasahasre dve ṣoḍaśāśvaśatāni ca 2.064.018c satkṛtya kaikeyī putraṃ kekayo dhanam ādiśat
GE09ram_1-7u:5042: 2.064.019a tathāmātyān abhipretān viśvāsyāṃś ca guṇānvitān 2.064.019c dadāv aśvapatiḥ śīghraṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:5043: 2.064.020a airāvatān aindraśirān nāgān vai priyadarśanān 2.064.020c kharāñ śīghrān susaṃyuktān mātulo 'smai dhanaṃ dadau 2.064.021a antaḥpure 'tisaṃvṛddhān vyāghravīryabalānvitān
GE09ram_1-7u:5044: 2.064.021c daṃṣṭrāyudhān mahākāyāñ śunaś copāyanaṃ dadau 2.064.022a sa mātāmaham āpṛcchya mātulaṃ ca yudhājitam
GE09ram_1-7u:5045: 2.064.022c ratham āruhya bharataḥ śatrughnasahito yayau 2.064.023a rathān maṇḍalacakrāṃś ca yojayitvā paraḥśatam 2.064.023c uṣṭrago'śvakharair bhṛtyā bharataṃ yāntam anvayuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5046: 2.064.024a balena gupto bharato mahātmā; sahāryakasyātmasamair amātyaiḥ 2.064.024c ādāya śatrughnam apetaśatrur; gṛhād yayau siddha ivendralokāt
GE09ram_1-7u:5047: 2.065.001a sa prāṅmukho rājagṛhād abhiniryāya vīryavān 2.065.001c hrādinīṃ dūrapārāṃ ca pratyaksrotas taraṅgiṇīm 2.065.001e śatadrūm atarac chrīmān nadīm ikṣvākunandanaḥ 2.065.002a eladhāne nadīṃ tīrtvā prāpya cāparaparpaṭān 2.065.002c śilām ākurvatīṃ tīrtvā āgneyaṃ śalyakartanam 2.065.003a satyasaṃdhaḥ śuciḥ śrīmān prekṣamāṇaḥ śilāvahām 2.065.003c atyayāt sa mahāśailān vanaṃ caitrarathaṃ prati
GE09ram_1-7u:5048: 2.065.004a veginīṃ ca kuliṅgākhyāṃ hrādinīṃ parvatāvṛtām 2.065.004c yamunāṃ prāpya saṃtīrṇo balam āśvāsayat tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:5049: 2.065.005a śītīkṛtya tu gātrāṇi klāntān āśvāsya vājinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5050: 2.065.005c tatra snātvā ca pītvā ca prāyād ādāya codakam 2.065.006a rājaputro mahāraṇyam
GE09ram_1-7u:5051: 2.065.006c bhadro bhadreṇa yānena mārutaḥ kham ivātyayāt
GE09ram_1-7u:5053: 2.065.007c varūthaṃ ca yayau ramyaṃ grāmaṃ daśarathātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5054: 2.065.008a tatra ramye vane vāsaṃ kṛtvāsau prāṅmukho yayau
GE09ram_1-7u:5055: 2.065.008c udyānam ujjihānāyāḥ priyakā yatra pādapāḥ 2.065.009a sālāṃs tu priyakān prāpya śīghrān āsthāya vājinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5056: 2.065.009c anujñāpyātha bharato vāhinīṃ tvarito yayau 2.065.010a vāsaṃ kṛtvā sarvatīrthe tīrtvā cottānakāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_1-7u:5057: 2.065.010c anyā nadīś ca vividhāḥ pārvatīyais turaṃgamaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5059: 2.065.011c tatāra ca naravyāghro lauhitye sa kapīvatīm
GE09ram_1-7u:5060: 2.065.011e ekasāle sthāṇumatīṃ vinate gomatīṃ nadīm 2.065.012a kaliṅga nagare cāpi prāpya sālavanaṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:5062: 2.065.013a vanaṃ ca samatītyāśu śarvaryām aruṇodaye 2.065.013c ayodhyāṃ manunā rājñā nirmitāṃ sa dadarśa ha
GE09ram_1-7u:5063: 2.065.014a tāṃ purīṃ puruṣavyāghraḥ saptarātroṣiṭaḥ pathi 2.065.014c ayodhyām agrato dṛṣṭvā rathe sārathim abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:5064: 2.065.015a eṣā nātipratītā me puṇyodyānā yaśasvinī 2.065.015c ayodhyā dṛśyate dūrāt sārathe pāṇḍumṛttikā 2.065.016a yajvabhir guṇasaṃpannair brāhmaṇair vedapāragaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5066: 2.065.017a ayodhyāyāṃ purāśabdaḥ śrūyate tumulo mahān 2.065.017c samantān naranārīṇāṃ tam adya na śṛṇomy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:5067: 2.065.018a udyānāni hi sāyāhne krīḍitvoparatair naraiḥ 2.065.018c samantād vipradhāvadbhiḥ prakāśante mamānyadā
GE09ram_1-7u:5069: 2.065.019c araṇyabhūteva purī sārathe pratibhāti me 2.065.020a na hy atra yānair dṛśyante na gajair na ca vājibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5070: 2.065.020c niryānto vābhiyānto vā naramukhyā yathāpuram 2.065.021a aniṣṭāni ca pāpāni paśyāmi vividhāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:5071: 2.065.021c nimittāny amanojñāni tena sīdati te manaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5073: 2.065.022c dvāḥsthair utthāya vijayaṃ pṛṣṭas taiḥ sahito yayau
GE09ram_1-7u:5074: 2.065.023a sa tv anekāgrahṛdayo dvāḥsthaṃ pratyarcya taṃ janam
GE09ram_1-7u:5075: 2.065.023c sūtam aśvapateḥ klāntam abravīt tatra rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5076: 2.065.024a śrutā no yādṛśāḥ pūrvaṃ nṛpatīnāṃ vināśane
GE09ram_1-7u:5077: 2.065.024c ākārās tān ahaṃ sarvān iha paśyāmi sārathe
GE09ram_1-7u:5078: 2.065.025a malinaṃ cāśrupūrṇākṣaṃ dīnaṃ dhyānaparaṃ kṛśam 2.065.025c sastrī puṃsaṃ ca paśyāmi janam utkaṇṭhitaṃ pure
GE09ram_1-7u:5079: 2.065.026a ity evam uktvā bharataḥ sūtaṃ taṃ dīnamānasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5080: 2.065.026c tāny aniṣṭāny ayodhyāyāṃ prekṣya rājagṛhaṃ yayau
GE09ram_1-7u:5082: 2.065.027c dṛṣṭvā purīm indrapurī prakāśāṃ; duḥkhena saṃpūrṇataro babhūva
GE09ram_1-7u:5083: 2.065.028a bahūni paśyan manaso 'priyāṇi; yāny annyadā nāsya pure babhūvuḥ 2.065.028c avākśirā dīnamanā nahṛṣṭaḥ; pitur mahātmā praviveśa veśma
GE09ram_1-7u:5084: 2.066.001a apaśyaṃs tu tatas tatra pitaraṃ pitur ālaye
GE09ram_1-7u:5085: 2.066.001c jagāma bharato draṣṭuṃ mātaraṃ mātur ālaye
GE09ram_1-7u:5086: 2.066.002a anuprāptaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā kaikeyī proṣitaṃ sutam
GE09ram_1-7u:5087: 2.066.002c utpapāta tadā hṛṣṭā tyaktvā sauvarṇamānasaṃ 2.066.003a sa praviśyaiva dharmātmā svagṛhaṃ śrīvivarjitam 2.066.003c bharataḥ prekṣya jagrāha jananyāś caraṇau śubhau
GE09ram_1-7u:5088: 2.066.004a taṃ mūrdhni samupāghrāya pariṣvajya yaśasvinam 2.066.004c aṅke bharatam āropya praṣṭuṃ samupacakrame 2.066.005a adya te kati cid rātryaś cyutasyāryakaveśmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5089: 2.066.005c api nādhvaśramaḥ śīghraṃ rathenāpatatas tava 2.066.006a āryakas te sukuśalo yudhājin mātulas tava
GE09ram_1-7u:5090: 2.066.006c pravāsāc ca sukhaṃ putra sarvaṃ me vaktum arhasi 2.066.007a evaṃ pṛṣṭhas tu kaikeyyā priyaṃ pārthivanandanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5091: 2.066.007c ācaṣṭa bharataḥ sarvaṃ mātre rājīvalocanaḥ 2.066.008a adya me saptamī rātriś cyutasyāryakaveśmanaḥ 2.066.008c ambāyāḥ kuśalī tāto yudhājin mātulaś ca me
GE09ram_1-7u:5092: 2.066.009a yan me dhanaṃ ca ratnaṃ ca dadau rājā paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5093: 2.066.009c pariśrāntaṃ pathy abhavat tato 'haṃ pūrvam āgataḥ 2.066.010a rājavākyaharair dūtais tvaryamāṇo 'ham āgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5094: 2.066.010c yad ahaṃ praṣṭum icchāmi tad ambā vaktum arhasi 2.066.011a śūnyo 'yaṃ śayanīyas te paryaṅko hemabhūṣitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5095: 2.066.011c na cāyam ikṣvākujanaḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ pratibhāti me
GE09ram_1-7u:5096: 2.066.012a rājā bhavati bhūyiṣṭhgam ihāmbāyā niveśane 2.066.012c tam ahaṃ nādya paśyāmi draṣṭum icchann ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5097: 2.066.013a pitur grahīṣye caraṇau taṃ mamākhyāhi pṛcchataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5098: 2.066.013c āhosvid amba jyeṣṭhāyāḥ kausalyāyā niveśane 2.066.014a taṃ pratyuvāca kaikeyī priyavad ghoram apriyam
GE09ram_1-7u:5100: 2.066.014e yā gatiḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ te pitā gataḥ 2.066.015a tac chrutvā bharato vākyaṃ dharmābhijanavāñ śuciḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5102: 2.066.016a tataḥ śokena saṃvītaḥ pitur maraṇaduḥkhitaḥ 2.066.016c vilalāpa mahātejā bhrāntākulitacetanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5103: 2.066.017a etat suruciraṃ bhāti pitur me śayanaṃ purā
GE09ram_1-7u:5104: 2.066.017c tad idaṃ na vibhāty adya vihīnaṃ tena dhīmatā 2.066.018a tam ārtaṃ devasaṃkāśaṃ samīkṣya patitaṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_1-7u:5105: 2.066.018c utthāpayitvā śokārtaṃ vacanaṃ cedam abravīt 2.066.019a uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha kiṃ śeṣe rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ 2.066.019c tvadvidhā na hi śocanti santaḥ sadasi saṃmatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5106: 2.066.020a sa rudatyā ciraṃ kālaṃ bhūmau viparivṛtya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:5107: 2.066.020c jananīṃ pratyuvācedaṃ śokair bahubhir āvṛtaḥ 2.066.021a abhiṣekṣyati rāmaṃ tu rājā yajñaṃ nu yakṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:5108: 2.066.021c ity ahaṃ kṛtasaṃkalpo hṛṣṭo yātrām ayāsiṣam
GE09ram_1-7u:5109: 2.066.022a tad idaṃ hy anyathā bhūtaṃ vyavadīrṇaṃ mano mama 2.066.022c pitaraṃ yo na paśyāmi nityaṃ priyahite ratam
GE09ram_1-7u:5110: 2.066.023a amba kenātyagād rājā vyādhinā mayy anāgate
GE09ram_1-7u:5111: 2.066.023c dhanyā rāmādayaḥ sarve yaiḥ pitā saṃskṛtaḥ svayam
GE09ram_1-7u:5112: 2.066.024a na nūnaṃ māṃ mahārājaḥ prāptaṃ jānāti kīrtimān
GE09ram_1-7u:5113: 2.066.024c upajighred dhi māṃ mūrdhni tātaḥ saṃnamya satvaram
GE09ram_1-7u:5114: 2.066.025a kva sa pāṇiḥ sukhasparśas tātasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ 2.066.025c yena māṃ rajasā dhvastam abhīkṣṇaṃ parimārjati
GE09ram_1-7u:5115: 2.066.026a yo me bhrātā pitā bandhur yasya dāso 'smi dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5116: 2.066.026c tasya māṃ śīghram ākhyāhi rāmasyākliṣṭa karmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5117: 2.066.027a pitā hi bhavati jyeṣṭho dharmam āryasya jānataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5118: 2.066.027c tasya pādau grahīṣyāmi sa hīdānīṃ gatir mama
GE09ram_1-7u:5119: 2.066.028a ārye kim abravīd rājā pitā me satyavikramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5120: 2.066.028c paścimaṃ sādhusaṃdeśam icchāmi śrotum ātmanaḥ 2.066.029a iti pṛṣṭā yathātattvaṃ kaikeyī vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:5121: 2.066.029c rāmeti rājā vilapan hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca
GE09ram_1-7u:5122: 2.066.029e sa mahātmā paraṃ lokaṃ gato gatimatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5123: 2.066.030a imāṃ tu paścimāṃ vācaṃ vyājahāra pitā tava
GE09ram_1-7u:5124: 2.066.030c kāla dharmaparikṣiptaḥ pāśair iva mahāgajaḥ 2.066.031a siddhārthās tu narā rāmam āgataṃ sītayā saha
GE09ram_1-7u:5125: 2.066.031c lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābāhuṃ drakṣyanti punar āgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:5126: 2.066.032a tac chrutvā viṣasādaiva dvitīyā priyaśaṃsanāt 2.066.032c viṣaṇṇavadano bhūtvā bhūyaḥ papraccha mātaram 2.066.033a kva cedānīṃ sa dharmātmā kausalyānandavardhanaḥ 2.066.033c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā sītayā ca samaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5127: 2.066.034a tathā pṛṣṭā yathātattvam ākhyātum upacakrame 2.066.034c mātāsya yugapad vākyaṃ vipriyaṃ priyaśaṅkayā 2.066.035a sa hi rājasutaḥ putra cīravāsā mahāvanam
GE09ram_1-7u:5128: 2.066.035c daṇḍakān saha vaidehyā lakṣmaṇānucaro gataḥ 2.066.036a tac chrutvā bharatas trasto bhrātuś cāritraśaṅkayā
GE09ram_1-7u:5129: 2.066.036c svasya vaṃśasya māhātmyāt praṣṭuṃ samupacakrame 2.066.037a kaccin na brāhmaṇavadhaṃ hṛtaṃ rāmeṇa kasya cit
GE09ram_1-7u:5130: 2.066.037c kaccin nāḍhyo daridro vā tenāpāpo vihiṃsitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5132: 2.066.038c kasmāt sa daṇḍakāraṇye bhrūṇaheva vivāsitaḥ 2.066.039a athāsya capalā mātā tat svakarma yathātatham
GE09ram_1-7u:5134: 2.066.040a na brāhmaṇa dhanaṃ kiṃcid dhṛtaṃ rāmeṇa kasya cit 2.066.040c kaś cin nāḍhyo daridro vā tenāpāpo vihiṃsitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5135: 2.066.040e na rāmaḥ paradārāṃś ca cakṣurbhyām api paśyati
GE09ram_1-7u:5136: 2.066.041a mayā tu putra śrutvaiva rāmasyaivābhiṣecanam 2.066.041c yācitas te pitā rājyaṃ rāmasya ca vivāsanam
GE09ram_1-7u:5137: 2.066.042a sa svavṛttiṃ samāsthāya pitā te tat tathākarot
GE09ram_1-7u:5138: 2.066.042c rāmaś ca sahasaumitriḥ preṣitaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_1-7u:5139: 2.066.043a tam apaśyan priyaṃ putraṃ mahīpālo mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5141: 2.066.044a tvayā tv idānīṃ dharmajña rājatvam avalambyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:5142: 2.066.044c tvatkṛte hi mayā sarvam idam evaṃvidhaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:5143: 2.066.045a tat putra śīghraṃ vidhinā vidhijñair; vasiṣṭhamukhyaiḥ sahito dvijendraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5144: 2.066.045c saṃkālya rājānam adīnasattvam; ātmānam urvyām abhiṣecayasva
GE09ram_1-7u:5145: 2.067.001a śrutvā tu pitaraṃ vṛttaṃ bhrātaru ca vivāsitau
GE09ram_1-7u:5146: 2.067.001c bharato duḥkhasaṃtapta idaṃ vacanam abravīt 2.067.002a kiṃ nuṇkāryaṃ hatasyeha mama rājyena śocataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5147: 2.067.002c vihīnasyātha pitrā ca bhrātrā pitṛsamena ca
GE09ram_1-7u:5148: 2.067.003a duḥkhe me duḥkham akaror vraṇe kṣāram ivādadhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5149: 2.067.003c rājānaṃ pretabhāvasthaṃ kṛtvā rāmaṃ ca tāpasaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:5150: 2.067.004a kulasya tvam abhāvāya kālarātrir ivāgatā 2.067.004c aṅgāram upagūhya sma pitā me nāvabuddhavān
GE09ram_1-7u:5151: 2.067.005a kausalyā ca sumitrā ca putraśokābhipīḍite 2.067.005c duṣkaraṃ yadi jīvetāṃ prāpya tvāṃ jananīṃ mama
GE09ram_1-7u:5152: 2.067.006a nanu tv āryo 'pi dharmātmā tvayi vṛttim anuttamām
GE09ram_1-7u:5153: 2.067.006c vartate guruvṛttijño yathā mātari vartate 2.067.007a tathā jyeṣṭhā hi me mātā kausalyā dīrghadarśinī
GE09ram_1-7u:5154: 2.067.007c tvayi dharmaṃ samāsthāya bhaginyām iva vartate
GE09ram_1-7u:5156: 2.067.008c prasthāpya vanavāsāya kathaṃ pāpe na śocasi
GE09ram_1-7u:5158: 2.067.009c pravrājya cīravasanaṃ kiṃ nu paśyasi kāraṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:5159: 2.067.010a lubdhāyā vidito manye na te 'haṃ rāghavaṃ prati 2.067.010c tathā hy anartho rājyārthaṃ tvayā nīto mahān ayam 2.067.011a ahaṃ hi puruṣavyāghrāv apaśyan rāmalakṣmaṇau 2.067.011c kena śaktiprabhāvena rājyaṃ rakṣitum utsahe 2.067.012a taṃ hi nityaṃ mahārājo balavantaṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5162: 2.067.013c damyo dhuram ivāsādya saheyaṃ kena caujasā
GE09ram_1-7u:5163: 2.067.014a atha vā me bhavec chaktir yogair buddhibalena vā 2.067.014c sakāmāṃ na kariṣyāmi tvām ahaṃ putragardhinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:5165: 2.067.015a ity evam uktvā bharato mahātmā; priyetarair vākyagaṇais tudaṃs
GE09ram_1-7u:5167: 2.067.015c śokāturaś cāpi nanāda bhūyaḥ; siṃho yathā parvatagahvarasthaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5168: 2.068.001a tāṃ tathā garhayitvā tu mātaraṃ bharatas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:5169: 2.068.001c roṣeṇa mahatāviṣṭaḥ punar evābravīd vacaḥ 2.068.002a rājyād bhraṃśasva kaikeyi nṛśaṃse duṣṭacāriṇi 2.068.002c parityaktā ca dharmeṇa mā mṛtaṃ rudatī bhava
GE09ram_1-7u:5170: 2.068.003a kiṃ nu te 'dūṣayad rājā rāmo vā bhṛśadhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5171: 2.068.003c yayor mṛtyur vivāsaś ca tvatkṛte tulyam āgatau
GE09ram_1-7u:5172: 2.068.004a bhrūṇahatyām asi prāptā kulasyāsya vināśanāt 2.068.004c kaikeyi narakaṃ gaccha mā ca bhartuḥ salokatām
GE09ram_1-7u:5173: 2.068.005a yat tvayā hīdṛśaṃ pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ ghoreṇa karmaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:5174: 2.068.005c sarvalokapriyaṃ hitvā mamāpy āpāditaṃ bhayam 2.068.006a tvatkṛte me pitā vṛtto rāmaś cāraṇyam āśritaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5175: 2.068.006c ayaśo jīvaloke ca tvayāhaṃ pratipāditaḥ 2.068.007a mātṛrūpe mamāmitre nṛśaṃse
GE09ram_1-7u:5176: 2.068.007c na te 'ham abhibhāṣyo 'smi durvṛtte patighātini 2.068.008a kausalyā ca sumitrā ca yāś cānyā mama mātaraḥ 2.068.008c duḥkhena mahatāviṣṭās tvāṃ prāpya kuladūṣiṇīm 2.068.009a na tvam aśvapateḥ kanyā dharmarājasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5177: 2.068.009c rākṣasī tatra jātāsi kulapradhvaṃsinī pituḥ 2.068.010a yat tvayā dhārmiko rāmo nityaṃ satyaparāyaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5178: 2.068.010c vanaṃ prasthāpito duḥkhāt pitā ca tridivaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5179: 2.068.011a yat pradhānāsi tat pāpaṃ mayi pitrā vinākṛte
GE09ram_1-7u:5180: 2.068.011c bhrātṛbhyāṃ ca parityakte sarvalokasya cāpriye 2.068.012a kausalyāṃ dharmasaṃyuktāṃ viyuktāṃ pāpaniścaye
GE09ram_1-7u:5181: 2.068.012c kṛtvā kaṃ prāpsyase tv adya lokaṃ nirayagāminī
GE09ram_1-7u:5182: 2.068.013a kiṃ nāvabudhyase krūre niyataṃ bandhusaṃśrayam 2.068.013c jyeṣṭhaṃ pitṛsamaṃ rāmaṃ kausalyāyātmasaṃbhavam
GE09ram_1-7u:5183: 2.068.014a aṅgapratyaṅgajaḥ putro hṛdayāc cāpi jāyate 2.068.014c tasmāt priyataro mātuḥ priyatvān na tu bāndhavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5184: 2.068.015a anyadā kila dharmajñā surabhiḥ surasaṃmatā 2.068.015c vahamānau dadarśorvyāṃ putrau vigatacetasau
GE09ram_1-7u:5185: 2.068.016a tāv ardhadivase śrāntau dṛṣṭvā putrau mahītale
GE09ram_1-7u:5187: 2.068.017a adhastād vrajatas tasyāḥ surarājño mahātmanaḥ 2.068.017c bindavaḥ patitā gātre sūkṣmāḥ surabhigandhinaḥ 2.068.018a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā śokasaṃtaptāṃ vajrapāṇir yaśasvinīm 2.068.018c indraḥ prāñjalir udvignaḥ surarājo 'bravīd vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5188: 2.068.019a bhayaṃ kaccin na cāsmāsu kutaś cid vidyate mahat 2.068.019c kuto nimittaḥ śokas te brūhi sarvahitaiṣiṇi
GE09ram_1-7u:5189: 2.068.020a evam uktā tu surabhiḥ surarājena dhīmatā
GE09ram_1-7u:5190: 2.068.020c patyuvāca tato dhīrā vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradā 2.068.021a śāntaṃ pātaṃ na vaḥ kiṃ cit kutaś cid amarādhipa
GE09ram_1-7u:5191: 2.068.021c ahaṃ tu magnau śocāmi svaputrau viṣame sthitau
GE09ram_1-7u:5192: 2.068.022a etau dṛṣṭvā kṛṣau dīnau sūryaraśmipratāpinau 2.068.022c vadhyamānau balīvardau karṣakeṇa surādhipa
GE09ram_1-7u:5193: 2.068.023a mama kāyāt prasūtau hi duḥkhitau bhāra pīḍitau
GE09ram_1-7u:5194: 2.068.023c yau dṛṣṭvā paritapye 'haṃ nāsti putrasamaḥ priyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5195: 2.068.024a yasyāḥ putra sahasrāṇi sāpi śocati kāmadhuk
GE09ram_1-7u:5196: 2.068.024c kiṃ punar yā vinā rāmaṃ kausalyā vartayiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:5197: 2.068.025a ekaputrā ca sādhvī ca vivatseyaṃ tvayā kṛtā
GE09ram_1-7u:5198: 2.068.025c tasmāt tvaṃ satataṃ duḥkhaṃ pretya ceha ca lapsyase 2.068.026a ahaṃ hy apacitiṃ bhrātuḥ pituś ca sakalām imām 2.068.026c vardhanaṃ yaśasaś cāpi kariṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5200: 2.068.027c svayam eva pravekṣyāmi vanaṃ muniniṣevitam 2.068.028a iti nāga ivāraṇye tomarāṅkuśacoditaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5201: 2.068.028c papāta bhuvi saṃkruddho niḥśvasann iva pannagaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5202: 2.068.029a saṃraktanetraḥ śithilāmbaras tadā; vidhūtasarvābharaṇaḥ paraṃtapaḥ 2.068.029c babhūva bhūmau patito nṛpātmajaḥ; śacīpateḥ ketur ivotsavakṣaye
GE09ram_1-7u:5203: 2.069.001a tathaiva krośatas tasya bharatasya mahātmanaḥ 2.069.001c kausalyā śabdam ājñāya sumitrām idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:5204: 2.069.002a āgataḥ krūrakāryāyāḥ kaikeyyā bharataḥ sutaḥ 2.069.002c tam ahaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi bharataṃ dīrghadarśinam
GE09ram_1-7u:5205: 2.069.003a evam uktvā sumitrāṃ sā vivarṇā malināmbarā
GE09ram_1-7u:5206: 2.069.003c pratasthe bharato yatra vepamānā vicetanā 2.069.004a sa tu rāmānujaś cāpi śatrughnasahitas
GE09ram_1-7u:5207: 2.069.004c pratasthe bharato yatra kausalyāyā niveśanam 2.069.005a tataḥ śatrughna bharatau kausalyāṃ prekṣya duḥkhitau
GE09ram_1-7u:5210: 2.069.006c idaṃ te rājyakāmasya rājyaṃ prāptam akaṇṭakam
GE09ram_1-7u:5211: 2.069.006e saṃprāptaṃ bata kaikeyyā śīghraṃ krūreṇa karmaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:5212: 2.069.007a prasthāpya cīravasanaṃ putraṃ me vanavāsinam 2.069.007c kaikeyī kaṃ guṇaṃ tatra paśyati krūradarśinī
GE09ram_1-7u:5213: 2.069.008a kṣipraṃ mām api kaikeyī prasthāpayitum arhati
GE09ram_1-7u:5214: 2.069.008c hiraṇyanābho yatrāste suto me sumahāyaśāḥ 2.069.009a atha vā svayam evāhaṃ sumitrānucarā
GE09ram_1-7u:5215: 2.069.009c agnihotraṃ puraskṛtya prasthāsye yatra rāghavaḥ 2.069.010a kāmaṃ vā svayam evādya tatra māṃ netum arhasi 2.069.010c yatrāsau puruṣavyāghras tapyate me tapaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5216: 2.069.011a idaṃ hi tava vistīrṇaṃ dhanadhānyasamācitam 2.069.011c hastyaśvarathasaṃpūrṇaṃ rājyaṃ niryātitaṃ tayā
GE09ram_1-7u:5217: 2.069.012a evaṃ vilapamānāṃ tāṃ bharataḥ prāñjalis tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:5218: 2.069.012c kausalyāṃ pratyuvācedaṃ śokair bahubhir āvṛtām 2.069.013a ārye kasmād ajānantaṃ garhase mām akilbiṣam
GE09ram_1-7u:5219: 2.069.013c vipulāṃ ca mama prītiṃ sthirāṃ jānāsi rāghave
GE09ram_1-7u:5220: 2.069.014a kṛtā śāstrānugā buddhir mā bhūt tasya kadā cana 2.069.014c satyasaṃdhaḥ satāṃ śreṣṭho yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5221: 2.069.015a praiṣyaṃ pāpīyasāṃ yātu sūryaṃ ca prati mehatu
GE09ram_1-7u:5222: 2.069.015c hantu pādena gāṃ suptāṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5223: 2.069.016a kārayitvā mahat karma bhartā bhṛtyam anarthakam
GE09ram_1-7u:5224: 2.069.016c adharmo yo 'sya so 'syās tu yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5226: 2.069.017c tatas tu druhyatāṃ pāpaṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5229: 2.069.019a saṃśrutya ca tapasvibhyaḥ satre vai yajñadakṣiṇām
GE09ram_1-7u:5232: 2.069.020c mā sma kārṣīt satāṃ dharmaṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5233: 2.069.021a upadiṣṭaṃ susūkṣmārthaṃ śāstraṃ yatnena dhīmatā 2.069.021c sa nāśayatu duṣṭātmā yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5234: 2.069.022a pāyasaṃ kṛsaraṃ chāgaṃ vṛthā so 'śnātu nirghṛṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5236: 2.069.023a putrair dāraiś ca bhṛtyaiś ca svagṛhe parivāritaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5237: 2.069.023c sa eko mṛṣṭam aśnātu yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5238: 2.069.024a rājastrībālavṛddhānāṃ vadhe yat pāpam ucyate 2.069.024c bhṛtyatyāge ca yat pāpaṃ tat pāpaṃ pratipadyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:5239: 2.069.025a ubhe saṃdhye śayānasya yat pāpaṃ parikalpyate
GE09ram_1-7u:5240: 2.069.025c tac ca pāpaṃ bhavet tasya yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5241: 2.069.026a yad agnidāyake pāpaṃ yat pāpaṃ gurutalpage
GE09ram_1-7u:5242: 2.069.026c mitradrohe ca yat pāpaṃ tat pāpaṃ pratipadyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:5243: 2.069.027a devatānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca mātā pitros tathaiva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:5244: 2.069.027c mā sma kārṣīt sa śuśrūṣāṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5245: 2.069.028a satāṃ lokāt satāṃ kīrtyāḥ sajjuṣṭāt karmaṇas tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:5248: 2.069.029c evam āśvasayann eva duḥkhārto nipapāta ha
GE09ram_1-7u:5249: 2.069.030a tathā tu śapathaiḥ kaṣṭaiḥ śapamānam acetanam
GE09ram_1-7u:5250: 2.069.030c bharataṃ śokasaṃtaptaṃ kausalyā vākyam abravīt 2.069.031a mama duḥkham idaṃ putra bhūyaḥ samupajāyate
GE09ram_1-7u:5251: 2.069.031c śapathaiḥ śapamāno hi prāṇān uparuṇatsi me
GE09ram_1-7u:5252: 2.069.032a diṣṭyā na calito dharmād ātmā te sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5253: 2.069.032c vatsa satyapratijño me satāṃ lokān avāpsyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:5255: 2.069.033c mohāc ca śokasaṃrodhād babhūva lulitaṃ manaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5257: 2.069.034c muhur muhur niḥśvasataś ca dīrghaṃ; sā tasya śokena jagāma rātriḥ 2.070.001a tam evaṃ śokasaṃtaptaṃ bharataṃ kekayīsutam 2.070.001c uvāca vadatāṃ śreṣṭho vasiṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhavāg ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5258: 2.070.002a alaṃ śokena bhadraṃ te rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5259: 2.070.002c prāptakālaṃ narapateḥ kuru saṃyānam uttaram 2.070.003a vasiṣṭhasya vacaḥ śrutvā bharato dhāraṇāṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5260: 2.070.003c pretakāryāṇi sarvāṇi kārayām āsa dharmavit 2.070.004a uddhṛtaṃ tailasaṃkledāt sa tu bhūmau niveśitam
GE09ram_1-7u:5263: 2.070.005c tato daśarathaṃ putro vilalāpa suduḥkhitaḥ 2.070.006a kiṃ te vyavasitaṃ rājan proṣite mayy anāgate
GE09ram_1-7u:5264: 2.070.006c vivāsya rāmaṃ dharmajñaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_1-7u:5265: 2.070.007a kva yāsyasi mahārāja hitvemaṃ duḥkhitaṃ janam
GE09ram_1-7u:5267: 2.070.008a yogakṣemaṃ tu te rājan ko 'smin kalpayitā pure 2.070.008c tvayi prayāte svas tāta rāme ca vanam āśrite 2.070.009a vidhavā pṛthivī rājaṃs tvayā hīnā na rājate
GE09ram_1-7u:5268: 2.070.009c hīnacandreva rajanī nagarī pratibhāti mām 2.070.010a evaṃ vilapamānaṃ taṃ bharataṃ dīnamānasaṃ 2.070.010c abravīd vacanaṃ bhūyo vasiṣṭhas tu mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5269: 2.070.011a pretakāryāṇi yāny asya kartavyāni viśāmpateḥ 2.070.011c tāny avyagraṃ mahābāho kriyatām avicāritam 2.070.012a tatheti bharato vākyaṃ vasiṣṭhasyābhipūjya tat 2.070.012c ṛtvikpurohitācāryāṃs tvarayām āsa sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5270: 2.070.013a ye tv agrato narendrasya agny agārād bahiṣkṛtāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5271: 2.070.013c ṛtvigbhir yājakaiś caiva te hriyante yathāvidhi
GE09ram_1-7u:5273: 2.070.014c bāṣpakaṇṭhā vimanasas tam ūhuḥ paricārakāḥ 2.070.015a hiraṇyaṃ ca suvarṇaṃ ca vāsāṃsi vividhāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:5274: 2.070.015c prakiranto janā mārgaṃ nṛpater agrato yayuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5276: 2.070.016c devadārūṇi cāhṛtya citāṃ cakrus tathāpare 2.070.017a gandhān uccāvacāṃś cānyāṃs tatra dattvātha bhūmipam
GE09ram_1-7u:5277: 2.070.017c tataḥ saṃveśayām āsuś citāmadhye tam ṛtvijaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5278: 2.070.018a tathā hutāśanaṃ hutvā jepus tasya tadartvijaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5279: 2.070.018c jaguś ca te yathāśāstraṃ tatra sāmāni sāmagāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5280: 2.070.019a śibikābhiś ca yānaiś ca yathārhaṃ tasya yoṣitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5281: 2.070.019c nagarān niryayus tatra vṛddhaiḥ parivṛtās tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:5282: 2.070.020a prasavyaṃ cāpi taṃ cakrur ṛtvijo 'gnicitaṃ nṛpam
GE09ram_1-7u:5283: 2.070.020c striyaś ca śokasaṃtaptāḥ kausalyā pramukhās tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:5284: 2.070.021a krauñcīnām iva nārīṇāṃ ninādas tatra śuśruve
GE09ram_1-7u:5285: 2.070.021c ārtānāṃ karuṇaṃ kāle krośantīnāṃ sahasraśaḥ 2.070.022a tato rudantyo vivaśā vilapya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5287: 2.070.023a kṛtodakaṃ te bharatena sārdhaṃ; nṛpāṅganā mantripurohitāś ca
GE09ram_1-7u:5288: 2.070.023c puraṃ praviśyāśruparītanetrā; bhūmau daśāhaṃ vyanayanta duḥkham
GE09ram_1-7u:5289: 2.071.001a tato daśāhe 'tigate kṛtaśauco nṛpātmajaḥ 2.071.001c dvādaśe 'hani saṃprāpte śrāddhakarmāṇy akārayat
GE09ram_1-7u:5290: 2.071.002a brāhmaṇebhyo dadau ratnaṃ dhanam annaṃ ca puṣkalam
GE09ram_1-7u:5291: 2.071.002c bāstikaṃ bahuśuklaṃ ca gāś cāpi śataśas tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:5292: 2.071.003a dāsīdāsaṃ ca yānaṃ ca veśmāni sumahānti ca
GE09ram_1-7u:5293: 2.071.003c brāhmaṇebhyo dadau putro rājñas tasyaurdhvadaihikam 2.071.004a tataḥ prabhātasamaye divase 'tha trayodaśe
GE09ram_1-7u:5296: 2.071.005c citāmūle pitur vākyam idam āha suduḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5297: 2.071.006a tāta yasmin niṣṛṣṭo 'haṃ tvayā bhrātari rāghave
GE09ram_1-7u:5298: 2.071.006c tasmin vanaṃ pravrajite śūnye tyakto 'smy ahaṃ tvayā 2.071.007a yathāgatir anāthāyāḥ putraḥ pravrājito vanam 2.071.007c tām ambāṃ tāta kausalyāṃ tyaktvā tvaṃ kva gato nṛpa
GE09ram_1-7u:5299: 2.071.008a dṛṣṭvā bhasmāruṇaṃ tac ca dagdhāsthisthānamaṇḍalam 2.071.008c pituḥ śarīra nirvāṇaṃ niṣṭanan viṣasāda ha
GE09ram_1-7u:5300: 2.071.009a sa tu dṛṣṭvā rudan dīnaḥ papāta dharaṇītale
GE09ram_1-7u:5301: 2.071.009c utthāpyamānaḥ śakrasya yantra dhvaja iva cyutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5302: 2.071.010a abhipetus tataḥ sarve tasyāmātyāḥ śucivratam 2.071.010c antakāle nipatitaṃ yayātim ṛṣayo yathā 2.071.011a śatrughnaś cāpi bharataṃ dṛṣṭvā śokapariplutam 2.071.011c visaṃjño nyapatad bhūmau bhūmipālam anusmaran 2.071.012a unmatta iva niścetā vilalāpa suduḥkhitaḥ 2.071.012c smṛtvā pitur guṇāṅgāni tāni tāni tadā tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:5305: 2.071.014a sukumāraṃ ca bālaṃ ca satataṃ lālitaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:5306: 2.071.014c kva tāta bharataṃ hitvā vilapantaṃ gato bhavān
GE09ram_1-7u:5307: 2.071.015a nanu bhojyeṣu pāneṣu vastreṣv ābharaṇeṣu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:5308: 2.071.015c pravārayasi naḥ sarvāṃs tan naḥ ko 'dya kariṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:5309: 2.071.016a avadāraṇa kāle tu pṛthivī nāvadīryate 2.071.016c vihīnā yā tvayā rājñā dharmajñena
GE09ram_1-7u:5310: 2.071.017a pitari svargam āpanne rāme cāraṇyam āśrite
GE09ram_1-7u:5311: 2.071.017c kiṃ me jīvita sāmarthyaṃ pravekṣyāmi hutāśanam
GE09ram_1-7u:5312: 2.071.018a hīno bhrātrā ca pitrā ca śūnyām ikṣvākupālitām
GE09ram_1-7u:5313: 2.071.018c ayodhyāṃ na pravekṣyāmi pravekṣyāmi tapovanam 2.071.019a tayor vilapitaṃ śrutvā vyasanaṃ cānvavekṣya tat
GE09ram_1-7u:5314: 2.071.019c bhṛśam ārtatarā bhūyaḥ sarva evānugāminaḥ 2.071.020a tato viṣaṇṇau śrāntau ca śatrughna bharatāv ubhau
GE09ram_1-7u:5316: 2.071.021a tataḥ prakṛtimān vaidyaḥ pitur eṣāṃ purohitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5317: 2.071.021c vasiṣṭho bharataṃ vākyam utthāpya tam uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:5318: 2.071.022a trīṇi dvandvāni bhūteṣu pravṛttāny aviśeṣataḥ 2.071.022c teṣu cāparihāryeṣu naivaṃ bhavitum arhati 2.071.023a sumantraś cāpi śatrughnam utthāpyābhiprasādya ca 2.071.023c śrāvayām āsa tattvajñaḥ sarvabhūtabhavābhavau
GE09ram_1-7u:5319: 2.071.024a utthitau tau naravyāghrau prakāśete yaśasvinau 2.071.024c varṣātapapariklinnau pṛthag indradhvajāv iva
GE09ram_1-7u:5321: 2.071.025c amātyās tvarayanti sma tanayau cāparāḥ kriyāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5322: 2.072.001a atra yātrāṃ samīhantaṃ śatrughno lakṣmaṇānujaḥ 2.072.001c bharataṃ śokasaṃtaptam idaṃ vacanam abravīt 2.072.002a gatir yaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ duḥkhe kiṃ punar ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5323: 2.072.002c sa rāmaḥ sattva saṃpannaḥ striyā pravrājito vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:5324: 2.072.003a balavān vīrya saṃpanno lakṣmaṇo nāma yo 'py asau
GE09ram_1-7u:5325: 2.072.003c kiṃ na mocayate rāmaṃ kṛtvāpi pitṛnigraham
GE09ram_1-7u:5326: 2.072.004a pūrvam eva tu nigrāhyaḥ samavekṣya nayānayau
GE09ram_1-7u:5327: 2.072.004c utpathaṃ yaḥ samārūḍho nāryā rājā vaśaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5328: 2.072.005a iti saṃbhāṣamāṇe tu śatrughne lakṣmaṇānuje 2.072.005c prāgdvāre 'bhūt tadā kubjā
GE09ram_1-7u:5330: 2.072.006c mekhalā dāmabhiś citrai rajjubaddheva vānarī 2.072.007a tāṃ samīkṣya tadā dvāḥstho bhṛśaṃ pāpasya kāriṇīm
GE09ram_1-7u:5332: 2.072.008a yasyāḥ kṛte vane rāmo nyastadehaś ca vaḥ pitā 2.072.008c seyaṃ pāpā nṛśaṃsā ca tasyāḥ kuru yathāmati
GE09ram_1-7u:5333: 2.072.009a śatrughnaś ca tad ājñāya vacanaṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5334: 2.072.009c antaḥpuracarān sarvān ity uvāca dhṛtavrataḥ 2.072.010a tīvram utpāditaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhrātṝṇāṃ me tathā pituḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5335: 2.072.010c yayā seyaṃ nṛśaṃsasya karmaṇaḥ phalam aśnutām
GE09ram_1-7u:5336: 2.072.011a evam uktā ca tenāśu sakhī janasamāvṛtā
GE09ram_1-7u:5337: 2.072.011c gṛhītā balavat kubjā sā tadgṛham anādayat
GE09ram_1-7u:5338: 2.072.012a tataḥ subhṛśa saṃtaptas tasyāḥ sarvaḥ sakhījanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5339: 2.072.012c kruddham ājñāya śatrughnaṃ vyapalāyata sarvaśaḥ 2.072.013a amantrayata kṛtsnaś ca tasyāḥ sarvasakhījanaḥ 2.072.013c yathāyaṃ samupakrānto niḥśeṣaṃ naḥ kariṣyati 2.072.014a sānukrośāṃ vadānyāṃ ca dharmajñāṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:5340: 2.072.014c kausalyāṃ śaraṇaṃ yāmaḥ sā hi no 'stu dhruvā gatiḥ 2.072.015a sa ca roṣeṇa tāmrākṣaḥ śatrughnaḥ śatrutāpanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5341: 2.072.015c vicakarṣa tadā kubjāṃ krośantīṃ pṛthivītale 2.072.016a tasyā hy ākṛṣyamāṇāyā mantharāyās tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5342: 2.072.016c citraṃ bahuvidhaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ pṛthivyāṃ tad vyaśīryata
GE09ram_1-7u:5344: 2.072.017c aśobhata tadā bhūyaḥ śāradaṃ gaganaṃ yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:5345: 2.072.018a sa balī balavat krodhād gṛhītvā puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5346: 2.072.018c kaikeyīm abhinirbhartsya babhāṣe paruṣaṃ vacaḥ 2.072.019a tair vākyaiḥ paruṣair duḥkhaiḥ kaikeyī bhṛśaduḥkhitā
GE09ram_1-7u:5347: 2.072.019c śatrughna bhayasaṃtrastā putraṃ śaraṇam āgatā 2.072.020a tāṃ prekṣya bharataḥ kruddhaṃ śatrughnam idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:5348: 2.072.020c avadhyāḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ pramadāḥ kṣamyatām iti 2.072.021a hanyām aham imāṃ pāpāṃ kaikeyīṃ duṣṭacāriṇīm
GE09ram_1-7u:5349: 2.072.021c yadi māṃ dhārmiko rāmo nāsūyen mātṛghātakam
GE09ram_1-7u:5350: 2.072.022a imām api hatāṃ kubjāṃ yadi jānāti rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5351: 2.072.022c tvāṃ ca māṃ caiva dharmātmā nābhibhāṣiṣyate dhruvam
GE09ram_1-7u:5352: 2.072.023a bharatasya vacaḥ śrutvā śatrughno lakṣmaṇānujaḥ 2.072.023c nyavartata tato roṣāt tāṃ mumoca ca mantharām
GE09ram_1-7u:5353: 2.072.024a sā pādamūle kaikeyyā mantharā nipapāta ha
GE09ram_1-7u:5354: 2.072.024c niḥśvasantī suduḥkhārtā kṛpaṇaṃ vilalāpa ca 2.072.025a śatrughnavikṣepavimūḍhasaṃjñāṃ; samīkṣya kubjāṃ bharatasya mātā
GE09ram_1-7u:5355: 2.072.025c śanaiḥ samāśvāsayad ārtarūpāṃ; krauñcīṃ vilagnām iva vīkṣamāṇām
GE09ram_1-7u:5357: 2.073.001c sametya rājakartāro bharataṃ vākyam abruvan 2.073.002a gato daśarathaḥ svargaṃ yo no gurutaro guruḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5358: 2.073.002c rāmaṃ pravrājya vai jyeṣṭhaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_1-7u:5359: 2.073.003a tvam adya bhava no rājā rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5360: 2.073.003c saṃgatyā nāparādhnoti rājyam etad anāyakam 2.073.004a ābhiṣecanikaṃ sarvam idam ādāya rāghava 2.073.004c pratīkṣate tvāṃ svajanaḥ śreṇayaś ca nṛpātmaja
GE09ram_1-7u:5361: 2.073.005a rājyaṃ gṛhāṇa bharata pitṛpaitāmahaṃ mahat 2.073.005c abhiṣecaya cātmānaṃ pāhi cāsmān nararṣabha 2.073.006a ābhiṣecanikaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ kṛtvā sarvaṃ pradakṣiṇam 2.073.006c bharatas taṃ janaṃ sarvaṃ pratyuvāca dhṛtavrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5362: 2.073.007a jyeṣṭhasya rājatā nityam ucitā hi kulasya naḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5363: 2.073.007c naivaṃ bhavanto māṃ vaktum arhanti kuśalā janāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5364: 2.073.008a rāmaḥ pūrvo hi no bhrātā bhaviṣyati mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5365: 2.073.008c ahaṃ tv araṇye vatsyāmi varṣāṇi nava pañca ca 2.073.009a yujyatāṃ mahatī senā
GE09ram_1-7u:5366: 2.073.009c ānayiṣyāmy ahaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ bhrātaraṃ rāghavaṃ vanāt
GE09ram_1-7u:5367: 2.073.010a ābhiṣecanikaṃ caiva sarvam etad upaskṛtam 2.073.010c puraskṛtya gamiṣyāmi rāmahetor vanaṃ prati 2.073.011a tatraiva taṃ naravyāghram abhiṣicya puraskṛtam 2.073.011c āneṣyāmi tu vai rāmaṃ havyavāham ivādhvarāt
GE09ram_1-7u:5368: 2.073.012a na sakāmā kariṣyāmi svam imāṃ mātṛgandhinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:5369: 2.073.012c vane vatsyāmy ahaṃ durge rāmo rājā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:5370: 2.073.013a kriyatāṃ śilpibhiḥ panthāḥ samāni viṣamāṇi ca
GE09ram_1-7u:5372: 2.073.014a evaṃ saṃbhāṣamāṇaṃ taṃ rāmahetor nṛpātmajam 2.073.014c pratyuvāca janaḥ sarvaḥ śrīmadvākyam anuttamam 2.073.015a evaṃ te bhāṣamāṇasya padmā śrīr upatiṣṭhatām
GE09ram_1-7u:5373: 2.073.015c yas tvaṃ jyeṣṭhe nṛpasute pṛthivīṃ dātum icchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:5374: 2.073.016a anuttamaṃ tad vacanaṃ nṛpātmaja; prabhāṣitaṃ saṃśravaṇe niśamya
GE09ram_1-7u:5376: 2.073.016c praharṣajās taṃ prati bāṣpabindavo; nipetur āryānananetrasaṃbhavāḥ 2.073.017a ūcus te vacanam idaṃ niśamya hṛṣṭāḥ; sāmātyāḥ sapariṣado viyātaśokāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5377: 2.073.017c panthānaṃ naravarabhaktimāñ janaś ca; vyādiṣṭas tava vacanāc ca śilpivargaḥ 2.074.001a atha bhūmipradeśajñāḥ sūtrakarmaviśāradāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5378: 2.074.001c svakarmābhiratāḥ śūrāḥ khanakā yantrakās tathā 2.074.002a karmāntikāḥ sthapatayaḥ puruṣā yantrakovidāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5379: 2.074.002c tathā vardhakayaś caiva mārgiṇo vṛkṣatakṣakāḥ 2.074.003a kūpakārāḥ sudhākārā vaṃśakarmakṛtas tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:5380: 2.074.003c samarthā ye ca draṣṭāraḥ puratas te pratasthire
GE09ram_1-7u:5381: 2.074.004a sa tu harṣāt tam uddeśaṃ janaugho vipulaḥ prayān 2.074.004c aśobhata mahāvegaḥ sāgarasyeva parvaṇi
GE09ram_1-7u:5382: 2.074.005a te svavāraṃ samāsthāya vartmakarmāṇi kovidāḥ 2.074.005c karaṇair vividhopetaiḥ purastāt saṃpratasthire
GE09ram_1-7u:5383: 2.074.006a latāvallīś ca gulmāṃś ca sthāṇūn aśmana eva ca 2.074.006c janās te cakrire mārgaṃ chindanto vividhān drumān
GE09ram_1-7u:5384: 2.074.007a avṛkṣeṣu ca deśeṣu ke cid vṛkṣān aropayan
GE09ram_1-7u:5385: 2.074.007c ke cit kuṭhāraiṣ ṭaṅkaiś ca dātraiś chindan kva cit kva cit 2.074.008a apare vīraṇastambān balino balavattarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5386: 2.074.008c vidhamanti sma durgāṇi sthalāni ca tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5388: 2.074.009c nimnabhāgāṃs tathā ke cit samāṃś cakruḥ samantataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5389: 2.074.010a babandhur bandhanīyāṃś ca kṣodyān saṃcukṣudus tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:5390: 2.074.010c bibhidur bhedanīyāṃś ca tāṃs tān deśān narās tadā 2.074.011a acireṇaiva kālena parivāhān bahūdakān
GE09ram_1-7u:5394: 2.074.013a candanodakasaṃsikto nānākusumabhūṣitaḥ 2.074.013c bahv aśobhata senāyāḥ panthāḥ svargapathopamaḥ 2.074.014a ājñāpyātha yathājñapti yuktās te 'dhikṛtā narāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5396: 2.074.015a yo niveśas tv abhipreto bharatasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5397: 2.074.015c bhūyas taṃ śobhayām āsur bhūṣābhir bhūṣaṇopamam
GE09ram_1-7u:5398: 2.074.016a nakṣatreṣu praśasteṣu muhūrteṣu ca tadvidaḥ 2.074.016c niveśaṃ sthāpayām āsur bharatasya mahātmanaḥ 2.074.017a bahupāṃsucayāś cāpi parikhāparivāritāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5399: 2.074.017c tatrendrakīlapratimāḥ pratolīvaraśobhitāḥ 2.074.018a prāsādamālāsaṃyuktāḥ saudhaprākārasaṃvṛtāḥ 2.074.018c patākā śobhitāḥ sarve sunirmitamahāpathāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5401: 2.074.019c samucchritair niveśās te babhuḥ śakrapuropamāḥ 2.074.020a jāhnavīṃ tu samāsādya vividhadruma kānanām 2.074.020c śītalāmalapānīyāṃ mahāmīnasamākulām 2.074.021a sacandratārāgaṇamaṇḍitaṃ yathā; nabhaḥkṣapāyām amalaṃ virājate
GE09ram_1-7u:5402: 2.074.021c narendramārgaḥ sa tathā vyarājata; krameṇa ramyaḥ śubhaśilpinirmitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5403: 2.075.001a tato nāndīmukhīṃ rātriṃ bharataṃ sūtamāgadhāḥ 2.075.001c tuṣṭuvur vāgviśeṣajñāḥ stavair maṅgalasaṃhitaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5405: 2.075.002c dadhmuḥ śaṅkhāṃś ca śataśo vādyāṃś coccāvacasvarān
GE09ram_1-7u:5406: 2.075.003a sa tūrya ghoṣaḥ sumahān divam āpūrayann iva
GE09ram_1-7u:5407: 2.075.003c bharataṃ śokasaṃtaptaṃ bhūyaḥ śokair arandhrayat 2.075.004a tato prabuddho bharatas taṃ ghoṣaṃ saṃnivartya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:5408: 2.075.004c nāhaṃ rājeti cāpy uktvā śatrughnam idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:5409: 2.075.005a paśya śatrughna kaikeyyā lokasyāpakṛtaṃ mahat 2.075.005c visṛjya mayi duḥkhāni rājā daśaratho gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5411: 2.075.006c paribhramati rājaśrīr naur ivākarṇikā jale 2.075.007a ity evaṃ bharataṃ prekṣya vilapantaṃ vicetanam
GE09ram_1-7u:5412: 2.075.007c kṛpaṇaṃ ruruduḥ sarvāḥ sasvaraṃ yoṣitas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:5413: 2.075.008a tathā tasmin vilapati vasiṣṭho rājadharmavit 2.075.008c sabhām ikṣvākunāthasya praviveśa mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5415: 2.075.009c sudharmām iva dharmātmā sagaṇaḥ pratyapadyata 2.075.010a sa kāñcanamayaṃ pīṭhaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:5416: 2.075.010c adhyāsta sarvavedajño dūtān anuśaśāsa ca 2.075.011a brāhmaṇān kṣatriyān yodhān amātyān gaṇaballabhān 2.075.011c kṣipram ānayatāvyagrāḥ kṛtyam ātyayikaṃ hi naḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5418: 2.075.012c rathair aśvair gajaiś cāpi janānām upagacchatām
GE09ram_1-7u:5419: 2.075.013a tato bharatam āyāntaṃ śatakratum ivāmarāḥ 2.075.013c pratyanandan prakṛtayo yathā daśarathaṃ tathā 2.075.014a hrada iva timināgasaṃvṛtaḥ; stimitajalo maṇiśaṅkhaśarkaraḥ 2.075.014c daśarathasutaśobhitā sabhā; sadaśaratheva babhau yathā purā
GE09ram_1-7u:5420: 2.076.001a tām āryagaṇasaṃpūrṇāṃ bharataḥ pragrahāṃ sabhām 2.076.001c dadarśa buddhisaṃpannaḥ pūrṇacandrāṃ niśām iva 2.076.002a āsanāni yathānyāyam āryāṇāṃ viśatāṃ tadā 2.076.002c adṛśyata ghanāpāye pūrṇacandreva śarvarī
GE09ram_1-7u:5421: 2.076.003a rājñas tu prakṛtīḥ sarvāḥ samagrāḥ prekṣya dharmavit
GE09ram_1-7u:5422: 2.076.003c idaṃ purohito vākyaṃ bharataṃ mṛdu cābravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:5423: 2.076.004a tāta rājā daśarathaḥ svargato dharmam ācaran
GE09ram_1-7u:5424: 2.076.004c dhana dhānyavatīṃ sphītāṃ pradāya pṛthivīṃ tava
GE09ram_1-7u:5425: 2.076.005a rāmas tathā satyadhṛtiḥ satāṃ dharmam anusmaran
GE09ram_1-7u:5426: 2.076.005c nājahāt pitur ādeśaṃ śaśī jyotsnām ivoditaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5427: 2.076.006a pitrā bhrātrā ca te dattaṃ rājyaṃ nihatakaṇṭakam
GE09ram_1-7u:5428: 2.076.006c tad bhuṅkṣva muditāmātyaḥ kṣipram evābhiṣecaya 2.076.007a udīcyāś ca pratīcyāś ca dākṣiṇātyāś ca kevalāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5429: 2.076.007c koṭyāparāntāḥ sāmudrā ratnāny abhiharantu te 2.076.008a tac chrutvā bharato vākyaṃ śokenābhipariplutaḥ 2.076.008c jagāma manasā rāmaṃ dharmajño dharmakāṅkṣayā 2.076.009a sa bāṣpakalayā vācā kalahaṃsasvaro yuvā 2.076.009c vilalāpa sabhāmadhye jagarhe ca purohitam 2.076.010a caritabrahmacaryasya vidyā snātasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5430: 2.076.010c dharme prayatamānasya ko rājyaṃ madvidho haret
GE09ram_1-7u:5431: 2.076.011a kathaṃ daśarathāj jāto bhaved rājyāpahārakaḥ 2.076.011c rājyaṃ cāhaṃ ca rāmasya dharmaṃ vaktum ihārhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:5432: 2.076.012a jyeṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhaś ca dharmātmā dilīpanahuṣopamaḥ 2.076.012c labdhum arhati kākutstho rājyaṃ daśaratho yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:5433: 2.076.013a anāryajuṣṭam asvargyaṃ kuryāṃ pāpam ahaṃ yadi
GE09ram_1-7u:5434: 2.076.013c ikṣvākūṇām ahaṃ loke bhaveyaṃ kulapāṃsanaḥ 2.076.014a yad dhi mātrā kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ nāhaṃ tad abhirocaye 2.076.014c ihastho vanadurgasthaṃ namasyāmi kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5435: 2.076.015a rāmam evānugacchāmi sa rājā dvipadāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5436: 2.076.015c trayāṇām api lokānāṃ rāghavo rājyam arhati
GE09ram_1-7u:5437: 2.076.016a tad vākyaṃ dharmasaṃyuktaṃ śrutvā sarve sabhāsadaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5438: 2.076.016c harṣān mumucur aśrūṇi rāme nihitacetasaḥ 2.076.017a yadi tv āryaṃ na śakṣyāmi vinivartayituṃ vanāt
GE09ram_1-7u:5439: 2.076.017c vane tatraiva vatsyāmi yathāryo lakṣmaṇas tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:5440: 2.076.018a sarvopāyaṃ tu vartiṣye vinivartayituṃ balāt 2.076.018c samakṣam ārya miśrāṇāṃ sādhūnāṃ guṇavartinām 2.076.019a evam uktvā tu dharmātmā bharato bhrātṛvatsalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5442: 2.076.020a tūrṇam utthāya gaccha tvaṃ sumantra mama śāsanāt
GE09ram_1-7u:5443: 2.076.020c yātrām ājñāpaya kṣipraṃ balaṃ caiva samānaya
GE09ram_1-7u:5444: 2.076.021a evam uktaḥ sumantras tu bharatena mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:5445: 2.076.021c prahṛṣṭaḥ so 'diśat sarvaṃ yathā saṃdiṣṭam iṣṭavat
GE09ram_1-7u:5446: 2.076.022a tāḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ prakṛtayo balādhyakṣā balasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:5447: 2.076.022c śrutvā yātrāṃ samājñaptāṃ rāghavasya nivartane 2.076.023a tato yodhāṅganāḥ sarvā bhartṝn sarvān gṛhegṛhe
GE09ram_1-7u:5448: 2.076.023c yātrā gamanam ājñāya tvarayanti sma harṣitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5449: 2.076.024a te hayair gorathaiḥ śīghraiḥ syandanaiś ca manojavaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5450: 2.076.024c saha yodhair balādhyakṣā balaṃ sarvam acodayan
GE09ram_1-7u:5451: 2.076.025a sajjaṃ tu tad balaṃ dṛṣṭvā bharato gurusaṃnidhau
GE09ram_1-7u:5453: 2.076.026a bharatasya tu tasyājñāṃ pratigṛhya praharṣitaḥ 2.076.026c rathaṃ gṛhītvā prayayau yuktaṃ paramavājibhiḥ 2.076.027a sa rāghavaḥ satyadhṛtiḥ pratāpavān; bruvan suyuktaṃ dṛḍhasatyavikramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5456: 2.076.028a tūṇa samutthāya sumantra gaccha; balasya yogāya balapradhānān
GE09ram_1-7u:5457: 2.076.028c ānetum icchāmi hi taṃ vanasthaṃ; prasādya rāmaṃ jagato hitāya
GE09ram_1-7u:5458: 2.076.029a sa sūtaputro bharatena samyag; ājñāpitaḥ saṃparipūrṇakāmaḥ 2.076.029c śaśāsa sarvān prakṛtipradhānān; balasya mukhyāṃś ca suhṛjjanaṃ ca 2.076.030a tataḥ samutthāya kule kule te; rājanyavaiśyā vṛṣalāś ca viprāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5459: 2.076.030c ayūyujann uṣṭrarathān kharāṃś ca; nāgān hayāṃś caiva
GE09ram_1-7u:5461: 2.077.001a tataḥ samutthitaḥ kālyam āsthāya syandanottamam 2.077.001c prayayau bharataḥ śīghraṃ rāmadarśanakāṅkṣayā
GE09ram_1-7u:5462: 2.077.002a agrataḥ prayayus tasya sarve mantripurodhasaḥ 2.077.002c adhiruhya hayair yuktān rathān sūryarathopamān 2.077.003a navanāgasahasrāṇi kalpitāni yathāvidhi
GE09ram_1-7u:5463: 2.077.003c anvayur bharataṃ yāntam ikṣvāku kulanandanam 2.077.004a ṣaṣṭhī rathasahasrāṇi dhanvino vividhāyudhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5464: 2.077.004c anvayur bharataṃ yāntaṃ rājaputraṃ yaśasvinam 2.077.005a śataṃ sahasrāṇy aśvānāṃ samārūḍhāni rāghavam 2.077.005c anvayur bharataṃ yāntaṃ rājaputraṃ yaśasvinam 2.077.006a kaikeyī ca sumitrā ca kausalyā ca yaśasvinī
GE09ram_1-7u:5466: 2.077.007a prayātāś cāryasaṃghātā rāmaṃ draṣṭuṃ salakṣmaṇam 2.077.007c tasyaiva ca kathāś citrāḥ kurvāṇā hṛṣṭamānasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5468: 2.077.008c kadā drakṣyāmahe rāmaṃ jagataḥ śokanāśanam 2.077.009a dṛṣṭa eva hi naḥ śokam apaneṣyati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5469: 2.077.009c tamaḥ sarvasya lokasya samudyann iva bhāskaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5470: 2.077.010a ity evaṃ kathayantas te saṃprahṛṣṭāḥ kathāḥ śubhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5471: 2.077.010c pariṣvajānāś cānyonyaṃ yayur nāgarikās tadā 2.077.011a ye ca tatrāpare sarve saṃmatā ye ca naigamāḥ 2.077.011c rāmaṃ prati yayur hṛṣṭāḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtayas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:5472: 2.077.012a maṇi kārāś ca ye ke cit kumbhakārāś ca śobhanāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5473: 2.077.012c sūtrakarmakṛtaś caiva ye ca śastropajīvinaḥ 2.077.013a māyūrakāḥ krākacikā rocakā vedhakās tathā 2.077.013c dantakārāḥ sudhākārās tathā gandhopajīvinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5475: 2.077.014c snāpakācchādakā vaidyā dhūpakāḥ śauṇḍikās tathā 2.077.015a rajakās tunnavāyāś ca grāmaghoṣamahattarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:5476: 2.077.015c śailūṣāś ca saha strībhir yānti kaivartakās tathā
