GE09ram_1-7u:6367: 2.098.047c hanmi tīvreṇa daṇḍena daṇḍārhāṃ pāpakāriṇīm 2.098.048a kathaṃ daśarathāj jātaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6368: 2.098.048c jānan dharmam adharmiṣṭhaṃ kuryāṃ karma jugupsitam
GE09ram_1-7u:6369: 2.098.049a guruḥ kriyāvān vṛddhaś ca rājā pretaḥ piteti ca 2.098.049c tātaṃ na parigarheyaṃ daivataṃ ceti saṃsadi
GE09ram_1-7u:6370: 2.098.050a ko hi dharmārthayor hīnam īdṛśaṃ karma kilbiṣam
GE09ram_1-7u:6371: 2.098.050c striyāḥ priyacikīrṣuḥ san kuryād dharmajña dharmavit
GE09ram_1-7u:6372: 2.098.051a antakāle hi bhūtāni muhyantīti purāśrutiḥ 2.098.051c rājñaivaṃ kurvatā loke pratyakṣā sā śrutiḥ kṛtā
GE09ram_1-7u:6373: 2.098.052a sādhv artham abhisaṃdhāya krodhān mohāc ca sāhasāt
GE09ram_1-7u:6374: 2.098.052c tātasya yad atikrāntaṃ pratyāharatu tad bhavān
GE09ram_1-7u:6375: 2.098.053a pitur hi samatikrāntaṃ putro yaḥ sādhu manyate
GE09ram_1-7u:6376: 2.098.053c tad apatyaṃ mataṃ loke viparītam ato 'nyathā
GE09ram_1-7u:6377: 2.098.054a tad apatyaṃ bhavān astu mā bhavān duṣkṛtaṃ pituḥ 2.098.054c abhipat tat kṛtaṃ karma loke dhīravigarhitam
GE09ram_1-7u:6378: 2.098.055a kaikeyīṃ māṃ ca tātaṃ ca suhṛdo bāndhavāṃś ca naḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6379: 2.098.055c paurajānapadān sarvāṃs trātu sarvam idaṃ bhavān
GE09ram_1-7u:6380: 2.098.056a kva cāraṇyaṃ kva ca kṣātraṃ kva jaṭāḥ kva ca pālanam
GE09ram_1-7u:6381: 2.098.056c īdṛśaṃ vyāhataṃ karma na bhavān kartum arhati
GE09ram_1-7u:6382: 2.098.057a atha kleśajam eva tvaṃ dharmaṃ caritum icchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:6383: 2.098.057c dharmeṇa caturo varṇān pālayan kleśam āpnuhi
GE09ram_1-7u:6384: 2.098.058a caturṇām āśramāṇāṃ hi gārhasthyaṃ śreṣṭham āśramam
GE09ram_1-7u:6385: 2.098.058c āhur dharmajña dharmajñās taṃ kathaṃ tyaktum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:6386: 2.098.059a śrutena bālaḥ sthānena janmanā bhavato hy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:6387: 2.098.059c sa kathaṃ pālayiṣyāmi bhūmiṃ bhavati tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_1-7u:6388: 2.098.060a hīnabuddhiguṇo bālo hīnaḥ sthānena cāpy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:6389: 2.098.060c bhavatā ca vinā bhūto na vartayitum utsahe
GE09ram_1-7u:6390: 2.098.061a idaṃ nikhilam avyagraṃ pitryaṃ rājyam akaṇṭakam
GE09ram_1-7u:6391: 2.098.061c anuśādhi svadharmeṇa dharmajña saha bāndhavaiḥ 2.098.062a ihaiva tvābhiṣiñcantu dharmajña saha bāndhavaiḥ 2.098.062c ṛtvijaḥ savasiṣṭhāś ca mantravan mantrakovidāḥ 2.098.063a abhiṣiktas tvam asmābhir ayodhyāṃ pālane vraja
GE09ram_1-7u:6392: 2.098.063c vijitya tarasā lokān marudbhir iva vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6393: 2.098.064a ṛṇāni trīṇy apākurvan durhṛdaḥ sādhu nirdahan
GE09ram_1-7u:6394: 2.098.064c suhṛdas tarpayan kāmais tvam evātrānuśādhi mām
GE09ram_1-7u:6396: 2.098.065c adya bhītāḥ pālayantāṃ durhṛdas te diśo daśa
GE09ram_1-7u:6397: 2.098.066a ākrośaṃ mama mātuś ca pramṛjya puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_1-7u:6398: 2.098.066c adya tatra bhavantaṃ ca pitaraṃ rakṣa kilbiṣāt
GE09ram_1-7u:6400: 2.098.067c bāndhaveṣu ca sarveṣu bhūteṣv iva maheśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6401: 2.098.068a atha vā pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā vanam eva bhavān itaḥ 2.098.068c gamiṣyati gamiṣyāmi bhavatā sārdham apy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:6402: 2.098.069a tathāpi rāmo bharatena tāmyata; prasādyamānaḥ śirasā mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6403: 2.098.069c na caiva cakre gamanāya sattvavān; matiṃ pitus tadvacane
GE09ram_1-7u:6405: 2.098.070a tad adbhutaṃ sthairyam avekṣya rāghave; samaṃ jano harṣam avāpa duḥkhitaḥ 2.098.070c na yāty ayodhyām iti duḥkhito 'bhavat; sthirapratijñatvam avekṣya harṣitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6406: 2.098.071a tam ṛtvijo naigamayūthavallabhās; tathā visaṃjñāśrukalāś ca
GE09ram_1-7u:6408: 2.098.071c tathā bruvāṇaṃ bharataṃ pratuṣṭuvuḥ; praṇamya rāmaṃ ca yayācire saha 2.099.001a punar evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu bharataṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6410: 2.099.002a upapannam idaṃ vākyaṃ yat tvam evam abhāṣathāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6411: 2.099.002c jātaḥ putro daśarathāt kaikeyyāṃ rājasattamāt 2.099.003a purā bhrātaḥ pitā naḥ sa mātaraṃ te samudvahan 2.099.003c mātāmahe samāśrauṣīd rājyaśulkam anuttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:6412: 2.099.004a devāsure ca saṃgrāme jananyai tava pārthivaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6413: 2.099.004c saṃprahṛṣṭo dadau rājā varam ārādhitaḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6414: 2.099.005a tataḥ sā saṃpratiśrāvya tava mātā yaśasvinī
GE09ram_1-7u:6415: 2.099.005c ayācata naraśreṣṭhaṃ dvau varau varavarṇinī 2.099.006a tava rājyaṃ naravyāghra mama pravrājanaṃ tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:6416: 2.099.006c tac ca rājā tathā tasyai niyuktaḥ pradadau varam 2.099.007a tena pitrāham apy atra niyuktaḥ puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_1-7u:6417: 2.099.007c caturdaśa vane vāsaṃ varṣāṇi varadānikam 2.099.008a so 'haṃ vanam idaṃ prāpto nirjanaṃ lakṣmaṇānvitaḥ 2.099.008c śītayā cāpratidvandvaḥ satyavāde sthitaḥ pituḥ 2.099.009a bhavān api tathety eva pitaraṃ satyavādinam
GE09ram_1-7u:6418: 2.099.009c kartum arhati rājendraṃ kṣipram evābhiṣecanāt 2.099.010a ṛṇān mocaya rājānaṃ matkṛte bharata prabhum
GE09ram_1-7u:6419: 2.099.010c pitaraṃ trāhi dharmajña mātaraṃ cābhinandaya 2.099.011a śrūyate hi purā tāta śrutir gītā yaśasvinī
GE09ram_1-7u:6420: 2.099.011c gayena yajamānena gayeṣv eva pitṝn prati
GE09ram_1-7u:6421: 2.099.012a puṃ nāmnā narakād yasmāt pitaraṃ trāyate sutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6422: 2.099.012c tasmāt putra iti proktaḥ pitṝn yat pāti vā sutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6423: 2.099.013a eṣṭavyā bahavaḥ putrā guṇavanto bahuśrutāḥ 2.099.013c teṣāṃ vai samavetānām api kaś cid gayāṃ vrajet 2.099.014a evaṃ rājarṣayaḥ sarve pratītā rājanandana 2.099.014c tasmāt trāhi naraśreṣṭha pitaraṃ narakāt prabho
GE09ram_1-7u:6424: 2.099.015a ayodhyāṃ gaccha bharata prakṛtīr anurañjaya 2.099.015c śatrughna sahito vīra saha sarvair dvijātibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6425: 2.099.016a pravekṣye daṇḍakāraṇyam aham apy avilambayan 2.099.016c ābhyāṃ tu sahito rājan vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca
GE09ram_1-7u:6426: 2.099.017a tvaṃ rājā bhava bharata svayaṃ narāṇāṃ; vanyānām aham api
GE09ram_1-7u:6427: rājarāṇ mṛgāṇām 2.099.017c gaccha tvaṃ puravaram adya saṃprahṛṣṭaḥ; saṃhṛṣṭas tv aham api daṇḍakān pravekṣye
GE09ram_1-7u:6428: 2.099.018a chāyāṃ te dinakarabhāḥ prabādhamānaṃ; varṣatraṃ bharata karotu
GE09ram_1-7u:6429: mūrdhni śītām 2.099.018c eteṣām aham api kānanadrumāṇāṃ; chāyāṃ tām atiśayinīṃ sukhaṃ śrayiṣye 2.099.019a śatrughnaḥ kuśalamatis tu te sahāyaḥ; saumitrir mama viditaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6431: 2.099.019c catvāras tanayavarā vayaṃ narendraṃ; satyasthaṃ bharata carāma
GE09ram_1-7u:6432: mā viṣādam 2.100.001a āśvāsayantaṃ bharataṃ jābālir brāhmaṇottamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6433: 2.100.001c uvāca rāmaṃ dharmajñaṃ dharmāpetam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6434: 2.100.002a sādhu rāghava mā bhūt te buddhir evaṃ nirarthakā 2.100.002c prākṛtasya narasyeva ārya buddhes tapasvinaḥ 2.100.003a kaḥ kasya puruṣo bandhuḥ kim āpyaṃ kasya kena cit
GE09ram_1-7u:6435: 2.100.003c yad eko jāyate jantur eka eva vinaśyati
GE09ram_1-7u:6436: 2.100.004a tasmān mātā pitā ceti rāma sajjeta yo naraḥ 2.100.004c unmatta iva sa jñeyo nāsti kācid dhi kasya cit
GE09ram_1-7u:6437: 2.100.005a yathā grāmāntaraṃ gacchan naraḥ kaś cit kva cid vaset
GE09ram_1-7u:6439: 2.100.006a evam eva manuṣyāṇāṃ pitā mātā gṛhaṃ vasu
GE09ram_1-7u:6440: 2.100.006c āvāsamātraṃ kākutstha sajjante nātra sajjanāḥ 2.100.007a pitryaṃ rājyaṃ samutsṛjya sa nārhati narottama
GE09ram_1-7u:6441: 2.100.007c āsthātuṃ kāpathaṃ duḥkhaṃ viṣamaṃ bahukaṇṭakam 2.100.008a samṛddhāyām ayodhyāyām ātmānam abhiṣecaya
GE09ram_1-7u:6442: 2.100.008c ekaveṇīdharā hi tvāṃ nagarī saṃpratīkṣate 2.100.009a rājabhogān anubhavan mahārhān
GE09ram_1-7u:6443: 2.100.009c vihara tvam ayodhyāyāṃ yathā śakras triviṣṭape
GE09ram_1-7u:6444: 2.100.010a na te kaś cid daśarataḥs tvaṃ ca tasya na kaś cana 2.100.010c anyo rājā tvam anyaś ca tasmāt kuru yad ucyate
GE09ram_1-7u:6445: 2.100.011a gataḥ sa nṛpatis tatra gantavyaṃ yatra tena vai 2.100.011c pravṛttir eṣā martyānāṃ tvaṃ tu mithyā vihanyase
GE09ram_1-7u:6446: 2.100.012a arthadharmaparā ye ye tāṃs tāñ śocāmi netarān
GE09ram_1-7u:6447: 2.100.012c te hi duḥkham iha prāpya vināśaṃ pretya bhejire 2.100.013a aṣṭakā pitṛdaivatyam ity ayaṃ prasṛto janaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6448: 2.100.013c annasyopadravaṃ paśya mṛto hi kim aśiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:6449: 2.100.014a yadi bhuktam ihānyena deham anyasya gacchati
GE09ram_1-7u:6450: 2.100.014c dadyāt pravasataḥ śrāddhaṃ na tat pathy aśanaṃ bhavet 2.100.015a dānasaṃvananā hy ete granthā medhāvibhiḥ kṛtāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6451: 2.100.015c yajasva dehi dīkṣasva tapas tapyasva saṃtyaja
GE09ram_1-7u:6452: 2.100.016a sa nāsti param ity eva kuru buddhiṃ mahāmate 2.100.016c pratyakṣaṃ yat tad ātiṣṭha parokṣaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kuru
GE09ram_1-7u:6454: 2.100.017c rājyaṃ tvaṃ pratigṛhṇīṣva bharatena prasāditaḥ 2.101.001a jābāles tu vacaḥ śrutvā rāmaḥ satyātmanāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6455: 2.101.001c uvāca parayā yuktyā svabuddhyā cāvipannayā 2.101.002a bhavān me priyakāmārthaṃ vacanaṃ yad ihoktavān
GE09ram_1-7u:6458: 2.101.003c mānaṃ na labhate satsu bhinnacāritradarśanaḥ 2.101.004a kulīnam akulīnaṃ vā vīraṃ puruṣamāninam 2.101.004c cāritram eva vyākhyāti śuciṃ vā yadi vāśucim
GE09ram_1-7u:6459: 2.101.005a anārays tv ārya saṃkāśaḥ śaucād dhīnas tathā śuciḥ 2.101.005c lakṣaṇyavad alakṣaṇyo duḥśīlaḥ śīlavān iva 2.101.006a adharmaṃ dharmaveṣeṇa yadīmaṃ lokasaṃkaram
GE09ram_1-7u:6462: 2.101.007c bahu maṃsyati māṃ loke durvṛttaṃ lokadūṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:6463: 2.101.008a kasya yāsyāmy ahaṃ vṛttaṃ kena vā svargam āpnuyām 2.101.008c anayā vartamāno 'haṃ vṛttyā hīnapratijñayā 2.101.009a kāmavṛttas tv ayaṃ lokaḥ kṛtsnaḥ samupavartate
GE09ram_1-7u:6464: 2.101.009c yadvṛttāḥ santi rājānas tadvṛttāḥ santi hi prajāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6465: 2.101.010a satyam evānṛśaṃsyaṃ ca rājavṛttaṃ sanātanam 2.101.010c tasmāt satyātmakaṃ rājyaṃ satye lokaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6466: 2.101.011a ṛṣayaś caiva devāś ca satyam eva hi menire 2.101.011c satyavādī hi loke 'smin paramaṃ gacchati kṣayam
GE09ram_1-7u:6467: 2.101.012a udvijante yathā sarpān narād anṛtavādinaḥ 2.101.012c dharmaḥ satyaṃ paro loke mūlaṃ svargasya cocyate
GE09ram_1-7u:6468: 2.101.013a satyam eveśvaro loke satyaṃ padmā samāśritā
GE09ram_1-7u:6469: 2.101.013c satyamūlāni sarvāṇi satyān nāsti paraṃ padam
GE09ram_1-7u:6470: 2.101.014a dattam iṣṭaṃ hutaṃ caiva taptāni ca tapāṃsi ca 2.101.014c vedāḥ satyapratiṣṭhānās tasmāt satyaparo bhavet 2.101.015a ekaḥ pālayate lokam ekaḥ pālayate kulam
GE09ram_1-7u:6471: 2.101.015c majjaty eko hi niraya ekaḥ svarge mahīyate
GE09ram_1-7u:6472: 2.101.016a so 'haṃ pitur nideśaṃ tu kimarthaṃ nānupālaye 2.101.016c satyapratiśravaḥ satyaṃ satyena samayīkṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6473: 2.101.017a naiva lobhān na mohād vā na cājñānāt tamo'nvitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6474: 2.101.017c setuṃ satyasya bhetsyāmi guroḥ satyapratiśravaḥ 2.101.018a asatyasaṃdhasya sataś
GE09ram_1-7u:6475: 2.101.018c naiva devā na pitaraḥ pratīcchantīti naḥ śrutam
GE09ram_1-7u:6476: 2.101.019a pratyagātmam imaṃ dharmaṃ satyaṃ paśyāmy ahaṃ svayam
GE09ram_1-7u:6477: 2.101.019c bhāraḥ satpuruṣācīrṇas tad artham abhinandyate 2.101.020a kṣātraṃ dharmam ahaṃ tyakṣye hy adharmaṃ dharmasaṃhitam
GE09ram_1-7u:6478: 2.101.020c kṣudraur nṛśaṃsair lubdhaiś ca sevitaṃ pāpakarmabhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6479: 2.101.021a kāyena kurute pāpaṃ manasā saṃpradhārya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:6480: 2.101.021c anṛtaṃ jihvayā cāha trividhaṃ karma pātakam
GE09ram_1-7u:6481: 2.101.022a bhūmiḥ kīrtir yaśo lakṣmīḥ puruṣaṃ prārthayanti hi
GE09ram_1-7u:6482: 2.101.022c svargasthaṃ cānubadhnanti satyam eva bhajeta tat
GE09ram_1-7u:6483: 2.101.023a śreṣṭhaṃ hy anāryam eva syād yad bhavān avadhārya mām
GE09ram_1-7u:6484: 2.101.023c āha yuktikarair vākyair idaṃ bhadraṃ kuruṣva ha
GE09ram_1-7u:6485: 2.101.024a kathaṃ hy ahaṃ pratijñāya vanavāsam imaṃ guroḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6486: 2.101.024c bharatasya kariṣyāmi vaco hitvā guror vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6487: 2.101.025a sthirā mayā pratijñātā pratijñā gurusaṃnidhau 2.101.025c prahṛṣṭamānasā devī kaikeyī cābhavat tadā 2.101.026a vanavāsaṃ vasann evaṃ śucir niyatabhojanaḥ 2.101.026c mūlaiḥ puṣpaiḥ phalaiḥ puṇyaiḥ pitṝn devāṃś ca tarpayan 2.101.027a saṃtuṣṭapañcavargo 'haṃ lokayātrāṃ pravartaye 2.101.027c akuhaḥ śraddadhānaḥ san kāryākāryavicakṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6488: 2.101.028a karmabhūmim imāṃ prāpya kartavyaṃ karma yac chubham
GE09ram_1-7u:6489: 2.101.028c agnir vāyuś ca somaś ca karmaṇāṃ phalabhāginaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6490: 2.101.029a śataṃ kratūnām āhṛtya devarāṭ tridivaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6491: 2.101.029c tapāṃsy ugrāṇi cāsthāya divaṃ yātā maharṣayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6492: 2.101.030a satyaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca parākramaṃ ca; bhūtānukampāṃ priyavāditāṃ ca
GE09ram_1-7u:6493: 2.101.030c dvijātidevātithipūjanaṃ ca; panthānam āhus tridivasya santaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6494: 2.101.031a dharme ratāḥ satpuruṣaiḥ sametās; tejasvino dānaguṇapradhānāḥ 2.101.031c ahiṃsakā vītamalāś ca loke; bhavanti pūjyā munayaḥ pradhānāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6495: 2.102.001a kruddham ājñāya rāma tu vasiṣṭhaḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:6496: 2.102.001c jābālir api jānīte lokasyāsya gatāgatim 2.102.001e nivartayitu kāmas tu tvām etad vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:6497: 2.102.002a imāṃ lokasamutpattiṃ lokanātha nibodha me 2.102.002c sarvaṃ salilam evāsīt pṛthivī yatra nirmitā
GE09ram_1-7u:6498: 2.102.002e tataḥ samabhavad brahmā svayambhūr daivataiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:6499: 2.102.003a sa varāhas tato bhūtvā projjahāra vasuṃdharām
GE09ram_1-7u:6500: 2.102.003c asṛjac ca jagat sarvaṃ saha putraiḥ kṛtātmabhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6501: 2.102.004a ākāśaprabhavo brahmā śāśvato nitya avyayaḥ 2.102.004c tasmān marīciḥ saṃjajñe marīceḥ kaśyapaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6502: 2.102.005a vivasvān kaśyapāj jajñe manur vaivastavaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6503: 2.102.005c sa tu prajāpatiḥ pūrvam ikṣvākus tu manoḥ sutaḥ 2.102.006a yasyeyaṃ prathamaṃ dattā samṛddhā manunā mahī
GE09ram_1-7u:6504: 2.102.006c tam ikṣvākum ayodhyāyāṃ rājānaṃ viddhi pūrvakam
GE09ram_1-7u:6505: 2.102.007a ikṣvākos tu sutaḥ śrīmān kukṣir eveti viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6506: 2.102.007c kukṣer athātmajo vīro vikukṣir udapadyata 2.102.008a vikukṣes tu mahātejā bāṇaḥ putraḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_1-7u:6507: 2.102.008c bāṇasya tu mahābāhur anaraṇyo mahāyaśāḥ 2.102.009a nānā vṛṣṭir babhūvāsmin na durbhikṣaṃ satāṃ vare
GE09ram_1-7u:6508: 2.102.009c anaraṇye mahārāje taskaro vāpi kaś cana
GE09ram_1-7u:6509: 2.102.010a anaraṇyān mahābāhuḥ pṛthū rājā babhūva ha
GE09ram_1-7u:6510: 2.102.010c tasmāt pṛthor mahārājas triśaṅkur udapadyata 2.102.010e sa satyavacanād vīraḥ saśarīro divaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6511: 2.102.011a triśaṅkor abhavat sūnur dhundhumāro mahāyaśāḥ 2.102.011c dhundhumārān mahātejā yuvanāśvo vyajāyata
GE09ram_1-7u:6512: 2.102.012a yuvanāśva sutaḥ śrīmān māndhātā samapadyata 2.102.012c māndhātus tu mahātejāḥ susaṃdhir udapadyata 2.102.013a susaṃdher api putrau dvau dhruvasaṃdhiḥ prasenajit
GE09ram_1-7u:6513: 2.102.013c yaśasvī dhruvasaṃdhes tu bharato ripusūdanaḥ 2.102.014a bharatāt tu mahābāhor asito nāma jāyata
GE09ram_1-7u:6515: 2.102.014e haihayās tālajaṅghāś ca śūrāś ca śaśabindavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6516: 2.102.015a tāṃs tu sarvān prativyūhya yuddhe rājā pravāsitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6517: 2.102.015c sa ca śailavare ramye babhūvābhirato muniḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6518: 2.102.015e dve cāsya bhārye garbhiṇyau babhūvatur iti śrutiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6519: 2.102.016a bhārgavaś cyavano nāma himavantam upāśritaḥ 2.102.016c tam ṛṣiṃ samupāgamya kālindī tv abhyavādayat
GE09ram_1-7u:6520: 2.102.017a sa tām abhyavadad vipro varepsuṃ putrajanmani
GE09ram_1-7u:6521: 2.102.017c tataḥ sā gṛham āgamya devī putraṃ vyajāyata
GE09ram_1-7u:6522: 2.102.018a sapatnyā tu garas tasyai datto garbhajighāṃsayā
GE09ram_1-7u:6523: 2.102.018c gareṇa saha tenaiva jātaḥ sa sagaro 'bhavat
GE09ram_1-7u:6524: 2.102.019a sa rājā sagaro nāma yaḥ samudram akhānayat
GE09ram_1-7u:6525: 2.102.019c iṣṭvā parvaṇi vegena trāsayantam imāḥ prajāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6526: 2.102.020a asamañjas tu putro 'bhūt sagarasyeti naḥ śrutam
GE09ram_1-7u:6527: 2.102.020c jīvann eva sa pitrā tu nirastaḥ pāpakarmakṛt
GE09ram_1-7u:6528: 2.102.021a aṃśumān iti putro 'bhūd asamañjasya vīryavān 2.102.021c dilīpo 'ṃśumataḥ putro dilīpasya bhagīrathaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6529: 2.102.022a bhagīrathāt kakutsthas tu kākutsthā yena tu smṛtāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6530: 2.102.022c kakutsthasya tu putro 'bhūd raghur yena tu rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6531: 2.102.023a raghos tu putras tejasvī pravṛddhaḥ puruṣādakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6532: 2.102.023c kalmāṣapādaḥ saudāsa ity evaṃ prathito bhuvi
GE09ram_1-7u:6534: 2.102.024c yas tu tad vīryam āsādya sahaseno vyanīnaśat
GE09ram_1-7u:6535: 2.102.025a śaṅkhaṇasya tu putro 'bhūc chūraḥ śrīmān sudarśanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6537: 2.102.026a śīghragasya maruḥ putro maroḥ putraḥ praśuśrukaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6538: 2.102.026c praśuśrukasya putro 'bhūd ambarīṣo mahādyutiḥ 2.102.027a ambarīṣasya putro 'bhūn nahuṣaḥ satyavikramaḥ 2.102.027c nahuṣasya ca nābhāgaḥ putraḥ paramadhārmikaḥ 2.102.028a ajaś ca suvrataś caiva nābhāgasya sutāv ubhau
GE09ram_1-7u:6539: 2.102.028c ajasya caiva dharmātmā rājā daśarathaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6540: 2.102.029a tasya jyeṣṭho 'si dāyādo rāma ity abhiviśrutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6541: 2.102.029c tad gṛhāṇa svakaṃ rājyam avekṣasva jagan nṛpa
GE09ram_1-7u:6542: 2.102.030a ikṣvākūṇāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ rājā bhavati pūrvajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6544: 2.102.031a sa rāghavāṇāṃ kuladharmam ātmanaḥ; sanātanaṃ nādya vihātum
GE09ram_1-7u:6546: 2.102.031c prabhūtaratnām anuśādhi medinīṃ; prabhūtarāṣṭrāṃ pitṛvan mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6547: 2.103.001a vasiṣṭhas tu tadā rāmam uktvā rājapurohitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6548: 2.103.001c abravīd dharmasaṃyuktaṃ punar evāparaṃ vacaḥ 2.103.002a puruṣasyeha jātasya bhavanti guravas trayaḥ 2.103.002c ācāryaś caiva kākutstha pitā mātā ca rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:6549: 2.103.003a pitā hy enaṃ janayati puruṣaṃ puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_1-7u:6550: 2.103.003c prajñāṃ dadāti cācāryas tasmāt sa gurur ucyate
GE09ram_1-7u:6551: 2.103.004a sa te 'haṃ pitur ācāryas tava caiva paraṃtapa 2.103.004c mama tvaṃ vacanaṃ kurvan nātivarteḥ satāṃ gatim
GE09ram_1-7u:6552: 2.103.005a imā hi te pariṣadaḥ śreṇayaś ca samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6553: 2.103.005c eṣu tāta caran dharmaṃ nātivarteḥ satāṃ gatim
GE09ram_1-7u:6554: 2.103.006a vṛddhāyā dharmaśīlāyā mātur nārhasy avartitum 2.103.006c asyās tu vacanaṃ kurvan nātivarteḥ satāṃ gatim
GE09ram_1-7u:6555: 2.103.007a bharatasya vacaḥ kurvan yācamānasya rāghava 2.103.007c ātmānaṃ nātivartes tvaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:6556: 2.103.008a evaṃ madhuram uktas tu guruṇā rāghavaḥ svayam
GE09ram_1-7u:6558: 2.103.009a yan mātāpitarau vṛttaṃ tanaye kurutaḥ sadā
GE09ram_1-7u:6559: 2.103.009c na supratikaraṃ tat tu mātrā pitrā ca yat kṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:6560: 2.103.010a yathāśakti pradānena snāpanāc chādanena ca 2.103.010c nityaṃ ca priyavādena tathā saṃvardhanena ca
GE09ram_1-7u:6561: 2.103.011a sa hi rājā janayitā pitā daśaratho mama
GE09ram_1-7u:6562: 2.103.011c ājñātaṃ yan mayā tasya na tan mithyā bhaviṣyati 2.103.012a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa bharataḥ pratyanantaram
GE09ram_1-7u:6564: 2.103.013a iha me sthaṇḍile śīghraṃ kuśān āstara sārathe
GE09ram_1-7u:6565: 2.103.013c āryaṃ pratyupavekṣyāmi yāvan me na prasīdati
GE09ram_1-7u:6566: 2.103.014a anāhāro nirāloko dhanahīno yathā dvijaḥ 2.103.014c śeṣye purastāc chālāyā yāvan na pratiyāsyati
GE09ram_1-7u:6567: 2.103.015a sa tu rāmam avekṣantaṃ sumantraṃ prekṣya durmanāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6568: 2.103.015c kuśottaram upasthāpya bhūmāv evāstarat svayam 2.103.016a tam uvāca mahātejā rāmo rājarṣisattamāḥ 2.103.016c kiṃ māṃ bharata kurvāṇaṃ tāta pratyupavekṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:6569: 2.103.017a brāhmaṇo hy ekapārśvena narān roddhum ihārhati
GE09ram_1-7u:6570: 2.103.017c na tu mūrdhāvasiktānāṃ vidhiḥ pratyupaveśane 2.103.018a uttiṣṭha naraśārdūla hitvaitad dāruṇaṃ vratam 2.103.018c puravaryām itaḥ kṣipram ayodhyāṃ yāhi rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:6571: 2.103.019a āsīnas tv eva bharataḥ paurajānapadaṃ janam
GE09ram_1-7u:6572: 2.103.019c uvāca sarvataḥ prekṣya kim āryaṃ nānuśāsatha
GE09ram_1-7u:6573: 2.103.020a te tam ūcur mahātmānaṃ paurajānapadā janāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6574: 2.103.020c kākutstham abhijānīmaḥ samyag vadati rāghavaḥ 2.103.021a eṣo 'pi hi mahābhāgaḥ pitur vacasi tiṣṭhati 2.103.021c ata eva na śaktāḥ smo vyāvartayitum añjasā
GE09ram_1-7u:6575: 2.103.022a teṣām ājñāya vacanaṃ rāmo vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:6576: 2.103.022c evaṃ nibodha vacanaṃ suhṛdāṃ dharmacakṣuṣām 2.103.023a etac caivobhayaṃ śrutvā samyak saṃpaśya rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:6577: 2.103.023c uttiṣṭha tvaṃ mahābāho māṃ ca spṛśa tathodakam
GE09ram_1-7u:6578: 2.103.024a athotthāya jalaṃ spṛṣṭvā bharato vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:6579: 2.103.024c śṛṇvantu me pariṣado mantriṇaḥ śreṇayas tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:6580: 2.103.025a na yāce pitaraṃ rājyaṃ nānuśāsāmi mātaram
GE09ram_1-7u:6582: 2.103.026a yadi tv avaśyaṃ vastavyaṃ kartavyaṃ ca pitur vacaḥ 2.103.026c aham eva nivatsyāmi caturdaśa vane samāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6583: 2.103.027a dharmātmā tasya tathyena bhrātur vākyena vismitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6584: 2.103.027c uvāca rāmaḥ saṃprekṣya paurajānapadaṃ janam 2.103.028a vikrītam āhitaṃ krītaṃ yat pitrā jīvatā mama
GE09ram_1-7u:6585: 2.103.028c na tal lopayituṃ śakyaṃ mayā vā bharatena vā 2.103.029a upadhir na mayā kāryo vanavāse jugupsitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6586: 2.103.029c yuktam uktaṃ ca kaikeyyā pitrā me sukṛtaṃ kṛtam 2.103.030a jānāmi bharataṃ kṣāntaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:6587: 2.103.030c sarvam evātra kalyāṇaṃ satyasaṃdhe mahātmani 2.103.031a anena dharmaśīlena vanāt pratyāgataḥ punaḥ 2.103.031c bhrātrā saha bhaviṣyāmi pṛthivyāḥ patir uttamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6588: 2.103.032a vṛto rājā hi kaikeyyā mayā tad vacanaṃ kṛtam 2.103.032c anṛtān mocayānena pitaraṃ taṃ mahīpatim 2.104.001a tam apratimatejobhyāṃ bhrātṛbhyāṃ romaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:6589: 2.104.001c vismitāḥ saṃgamaṃ prekṣya samavetā maharṣayaḥ 2.104.002a antarhitās tv ṛṣigaṇāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6590: 2.104.002c tau bhrātarau mahātmānau kākutsthau praśaśaṃsire 2.104.003a sa dhanyo yasya putrau dvau dharmajñau dharmavikramau
GE09ram_1-7u:6591: 2.104.003c śrutvā vayaṃ hi saṃbhāṣām ubhayoḥ spṛhayāmahe
GE09ram_1-7u:6592: 2.104.004a tatas tv ṛṣigaṇāḥ kṣipraṃ daśagrīvavadhaiṣiṇaḥ 2.104.004c bharataṃ rājaśārdūlam ity ūcuḥ saṃgatā vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6593: 2.104.005a kule jāta mahāprājña mahāvṛtta mahāyaśaḥ 2.104.005c grāhyaṃ rāmasya vākyaṃ te pitaraṃ yady avekṣase
GE09ram_1-7u:6594: 2.104.006a sadānṛṇam imaṃ rāmaṃ vayam icchāmahe pituḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6595: 2.104.006c anṛṇatvāc ca kaikeyyāḥ svargaṃ daśaratho gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6596: 2.104.007a etāvad uktvā vacanaṃ gandharvāḥ samaharṣayaḥ 2.104.007c rājarṣayaś caiva tathā sarve svāṃ svāṃ gatiṃ gatāḥ 2.104.008a hlāditas tena vākyena śubhena śubhadarśanaḥ 2.104.008c rāmaḥ saṃhṛṣṭavadanas tān ṛṣīn abhyapūjayat 2.104.009a srastagātras tu bharataḥ sa vācā sajjamānayā
GE09ram_1-7u:6597: 2.104.009c kṛtāñjalir idaṃ vākyaṃ rāghavaṃ punar abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:6599: 2.104.010c kartum arhasi kākutstha mama mātuś ca yācanām
GE09ram_1-7u:6600: 2.104.011a rakṣituṃ sumahad rājyam aham ekas tu notsahe
GE09ram_1-7u:6601: 2.104.011c paurajānapadāṃś cāpi raktān rañjayituṃ tathā 2.104.012a jñātayaś ca hi yodhāś ca mitrāṇi suhṛdaś ca naḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6602: 2.104.012c tvām eva pratikāṅkṣante parjanyam iva karṣakāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6603: 2.104.013a idaṃ rājyaṃ mahāprājña sthāpaya pratipadya hi
GE09ram_1-7u:6604: 2.104.013c śaktimān asi kākutstha lokasya paripālane 2.104.014a ity uktvā nyapatad bhrātuḥ pādayor bharatas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:6605: 2.104.014c bhṛśaṃ saṃprārthayām āsa rāmam evaṃ priyaṃ vadaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6606: 2.104.015a tam aṅke bhrātaraṃ kṛtvā rāmo vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:6608: 2.104.016a āgatā tvām iyaṃ buddhiḥ svajā vainayikī ca yā 2.104.016c bhṛśam utsahase tāta rakṣituṃ pṛthivīm api
GE09ram_1-7u:6609: 2.104.017a amātyaiś ca suhṛdbhiś ca buddhimadbhiś ca mantribhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6610: 2.104.017c sarvakāryāṇi saṃmantrya sumahānty api kāraya 2.104.018a lakṣmīś candrād apeyād vā himavān vā himaṃ tyajet 2.104.018c atīyāt sāgaro velāṃ na pratijñām ahaṃ pituḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6611: 2.104.019a kāmād vā tāta lobhād vā mātrā tubhyam idaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:6612: 2.104.019c na tan manasi kartavyaṃ vartitavyaṃ ca mātṛvat
GE09ram_1-7u:6613: 2.104.020a evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ bharataḥ kausalyāsutam abravīt 2.104.020c tejasādityasaṃkāśaṃ pratipaccandradarśanam 2.104.021a adhirohārya pādābhyāṃ pāduke hemabhūṣite
GE09ram_1-7u:6614: 2.104.021c ete hi sarvalokasya yogakṣemaṃ vidhāsyataḥ 2.104.022a so 'dhiruhya naravyāghraḥ pāduke hy avaruhya ca 2.104.022c prāyacchat sumahātejā bharatāya mahātmane
GE09ram_1-7u:6615: 2.104.023a sa pāduke te bharataḥ pratāpavān; svalaṃkṛte saṃparigṛhya dharmavit
GE09ram_1-7u:6616: 2.104.023c pradakṣiṇaṃ caiva cakāra rāghavaṃ; cakāra caivottamanāgamūrdhani 2.104.024a athānupūrvyāt pratipūjya taṃ janaṃ; gurūṃś ca mantriprakṛtīs
GE09ram_1-7u:6620: 2.104.025a taṃ mātaro bāṣpagṛhītakaṇṭho; duḥkhena nāmantrayituṃ hi śekuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6621: 2.104.025c sa tv eva mātṝr abhivādya sarvā; rudan kuṭīṃ svāṃ praviveśa rāmaḥ 2.105.001a tataḥ śirasi kṛtvā tu pāduke bharatas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:6622: 2.105.001c āruroha rathaṃ hṛṣṭaḥ śatrughnena samanvitaḥ 2.105.002a vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca jābāliś ca dṛḍhavrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6623: 2.105.002c agrataḥ prayayuḥ sarve mantriṇo mantrapūjitāḥ 2.105.003a mandākinīṃ nadīṃ ramyāṃ prāṅmukhās te yayus tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:6624: 2.105.003c pradakṣiṇaṃ ca kurvāṇāś citrakūṭaṃ mahāgirim 2.105.004a paśyan dhātusahasrāṇi ramyāṇi vividhāni ca 2.105.004c prayayau tasya pārśvena sasainyo bharatas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:6625: 2.105.005a adūrāc citrakūṭasya dadarśa bharatas tadā 2.105.005c āśramaṃ yatra sa munir bharadvājaḥ kṛtālayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6626: 2.105.006a sa tam āśramam āgamya bharadvājasya buddhimān
GE09ram_1-7u:6627: 2.105.006c avatīrya rathāt pādau vavande kulanandanaḥ 2.105.007a tato hṛṣṭo bharadvājo bharataṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:6628: 2.105.007c api kṛtyaṃ kṛtaṃ tāta rāmeṇa ca samāgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:6629: 2.105.008a evam uktas tu bharato bharadvājena dhīmatā
GE09ram_1-7u:6631: 2.105.009a sa yācyamāno guruṇā mayā ca dṛḍhavikramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6632: 2.105.009c rāghavaḥ paramaprīto vasiṣṭhaṃ vākyam abravīt 2.105.010a pituḥ pratijñāṃ tām eva pālayiṣyāmi tattvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6633: 2.105.010c caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi ya pratijñā pitur mama
GE09ram_1-7u:6634: 2.105.011a evam ukto mahāprājño vasiṣṭhaḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:6635: 2.105.011c vākyajño vākyakuśalaṃ rāghavaṃ vacanaṃ mahat 2.105.012a ete prayaccha saṃhṛṣṭaḥ pāduke hemabhūṣite 2.105.012c ayodhyāyāṃ mahāprājña yogakṣemakare tava
GE09ram_1-7u:6636: 2.105.013a evam ukto vasiṣṭhena rāghavaḥ prāṅmukhaḥ sthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6637: 2.105.013c pāduke hemavikṛte mama rājyāya te dadau
GE09ram_1-7u:6639: 2.105.014c ayodhyām eva gacchāmi gṛhītvā pāduke śubhe
GE09ram_1-7u:6640: 2.105.015a etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ bharatasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6641: 2.105.015c bharadvājaḥ śubhataraṃ munir vākyam udāharat 2.105.016a naitac citraṃ naravyāghra śīlavṛttavatāṃ vara 2.105.016c yad āryaṃ tvayi tiṣṭhet tu nimne vṛṣṭim ivodakam 2.105.017a amṛtaḥ sa mahābāhuḥ pitā daśarathas tava
GE09ram_1-7u:6642: 2.105.017c yasya tvam īdṛśaḥ putro dharmātmā dharmavatsalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6643: 2.105.018a tam ṛṣiṃ tu mahātmānam uktavākyaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6644: 2.105.018c āmantrayitum ārebhe caraṇāv upagṛhya ca 2.105.019a tataḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā bharadvājaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6645: 2.105.019c bharatas tu yayau śrīmān ayodhyāṃ saha mantribhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6646: 2.105.020a yānaiś ca śakaṭaiś caiva hayaiś nāgaiś ca sā camūḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6648: 2.105.021a tatas te yamunāṃ divyāṃ nadīṃ tīrtvormimālinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:6649: 2.105.021c dadṛśus tāṃ punaḥ sarve gaṅgāṃ śivajalāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_1-7u:6650: 2.105.022a tāṃ ramyajalasaṃpūrṇāṃ saṃtīrya saha bāndhavaḥ 2.105.022c śṛṅgaverapuraṃ ramyaṃ praviveśa sasainikaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6651: 2.105.023a śṛṅgaverapurād bhūya ayodhyāṃ saṃdadarśa ha 2.105.023c bharato duḥkhasaṃtaptaḥ sārathiṃ cedam abravīt 2.105.024a sārathe paśya vidhvastā ayodhyā na prakāśate
GE09ram_1-7u:6654: 2.106.001c ayodhyāṃ bharataḥ kṣipraṃ praviveśa mahāyaśāḥ 2.106.002a biḍālolūkacaritām ālīnanaravāraṇām 2.106.002c timirābhyāhatāṃ kālīm aprakāśāṃ niśām iva 2.106.003a rāhuśatroḥ priyāṃ patnīṃ śriyā prajvalitaprabhām 2.106.003c graheṇābhyutthitenaikāṃ rohiṇīm iva pīḍitām
GE09ram_1-7u:6655: 2.106.004a alpoṣṇakṣubdhasalilāṃ gharmottaptavihaṃgamām 2.106.004c līnamīnajhaṣagrāhāṃ kṛśāṃ girinadīm iva
GE09ram_1-7u:6657: 2.106.005c havirabhyukṣitāṃ paścāc chikhāṃ vipralayaṃ gatām 2.106.006a vidhvastakavacāṃ rugṇagajavājirathadhvajām 2.106.006c hatapravīrām āpannāṃ camūm iva mahāhave 2.106.007a saphenāṃ sasvanāṃ bhūtvā sāgarasya samutthitām 2.106.007c praśāntamārutoddhūtāṃ jalormim iva niḥsvanām
GE09ram_1-7u:6658: 2.106.008a tyaktāṃ yajñāyudhaiḥ sarvair abhirūpaiś ca yājakaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6659: 2.106.008c sutyākāle vinirvṛtte vediṃ gataravām iva 2.106.009a goṣṭhamadhye sthitām ārtām acarantīṃ navaṃ tṛṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:6660: 2.106.009c govṛṣeṇa parityaktāṃ gavāṃ patnīm ivotsukām 2.106.010a prabhākarālaiḥ susnigdhaiḥ prajvaladbhir ivottamaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6661: 2.106.010c viyuktāṃ maṇibhir jātyair navāṃ muktāvalīm iva
GE09ram_1-7u:6662: 2.106.011a sahasā calitāṃ sthānān mahīṃ puṇyakṣayād gatām
GE09ram_1-7u:6663: 2.106.011c saṃhṛtadyutivistārāṃ tārām iva divaś cyutām 2.106.012a puṣpanaddhāṃ vasantānte
GE09ram_1-7u:6670: 2.106.015c upayuktodakāṃ bhagnāṃ prapāṃ nipatitām iva 2.106.016a vipulāṃ vitatāṃ caiva yuktapāśāṃ tarasvinām 2.106.016c bhūmau bāṇair viniṣkṛttāṃ patitāṃ jyām ivāyudhāt
GE09ram_1-7u:6672: 2.106.017c nikṣiptabhāṇḍām utsṛṣṭāṃ kiśorīm iva durbalām 2.106.018a prāvṛṣi pravigāḍhāyāṃ praviṣṭasyābhra maṇḍalam
GE09ram_1-7u:6673: 2.106.018c pracchannāṃ nīlajīmūtair bhāskarasya prabhām iva 2.106.019a bharatas tu rathasthaḥ sañ śrīmān daśarathātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6674: 2.106.019c vāhayantaṃ rathaśreṣṭhaṃ sārathiṃ vākyam abravīt 2.106.020a kiṃ nu khalv adya gambhīro mūrchito na niśamyate 2.106.020c yathāpuram ayodhyāyāṃ gītavāditraniḥsvanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6675: 2.106.021a vāruṇīmadagandhāś ca mālyagandhaś ca mūrchitaḥ 2.106.021c dhūpitāgarugandhaś ca na pravāti samantataḥ 2.106.022a yānapravaraghoṣaś ca snigdhaś ca hayaniḥsvanaḥ 2.106.022c pramattagajanādaś ca mahāṃś ca rathaniḥsvanaḥ 2.106.022e nedānīṃ śrūyate puryām asyāṃ rāme vivāsite
GE09ram_1-7u:6676: 2.106.023a taruṇaiś cāru veṣaiś ca narair unnatagāmibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6677: 2.106.023c saṃpatadbhir ayodhyāyāṃ na vibhānti mahāpathāḥ 2.106.024a evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ jalpan viveśa vasatiṃ pituḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6678: 2.106.024c tena hīnāṃ narendreṇa siṃhahīnāṃ guhām iva
GE09ram_1-7u:6679: 2.107.001a tato nikṣipya mātṝh sa ayodhyāyāṃ dṛḍhavrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6680: 2.107.001c bharataḥ śokasaṃtapto gurūn idam athābravīt 2.107.002a nandigrāmaṃ gamiṣyāmi sarvān āmantraye 'dya vaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6681: 2.107.002c tatra duḥkham idaṃ sarvaṃ sahiṣye rāghavaṃ vinā
GE09ram_1-7u:6682: 2.107.003a gataś ca hi divaṃ rājā vanasthaś ca gurur mama
GE09ram_1-7u:6683: 2.107.003c rāmaṃ pratīkṣe rājyāya sa hi rājā mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6684: 2.107.004a etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ bharatasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6685: 2.107.004c abruvan mantriṇaḥ sarve vasiṣṭhaś ca purohitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6686: 2.107.005a sadṛśaṃ ślāghanīyaṃ ca yad uktaṃ bharata tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:6687: 2.107.005c vacanaṃ bhrātṛvātsalyād anurūpaṃ tavaiva tat 2.107.006a nityaṃ te bandhulubdhasya tiṣṭhato bhrātṛsauhṛde 2.107.006c āryamārgaṃ prapannasya nānumanyeta kaḥ pumān 2.107.007a mantriṇāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā yathābhilaṣitaṃ priyam 2.107.007c abravīt sārathiṃ vākyaṃ ratho me yujyatām iti
GE09ram_1-7u:6688: 2.107.008a prahṛṣṭavadanaḥ sarvā mātṝh samabhivādya saḥ 2.107.008c āruroha rathaṃ śrīmāñ śatrughnena samanvitaḥ 2.107.009a āruhya tu rathaṃ śīghraṃ śatrughnabharatāv ubhau
GE09ram_1-7u:6690: 2.107.010a agrato puravas tatra vasiṣṭha pramukhā dvijāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6692: 2.107.011a balaṃ ca tad anāhūtaṃ gajāśvarathasaṃkulam 2.107.011c prayayau bharate yāte sarve ca puravāsinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6693: 2.107.012a rathasthaḥ sa tu dharmātmā bharato bhrātṛvatsalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6694: 2.107.012c nandigrāmaṃ yayau tūrṇaṃ śirasy ādhāya pāduke
GE09ram_1-7u:6695: 2.107.013a tatas tu bharataḥ kṣipraṃ nandigrāmaṃ praviśya saḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6696: 2.107.013c avatīrya rathāt tūrṇaṃ gurūn idam uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:6697: 2.107.014a etad rājyaṃ mama bhrātrā dattaṃ saṃnyāsavat svayam
GE09ram_1-7u:6699: 2.107.014e tam imaṃ pālayiṣyāmi rāghavāgamanaṃ prati 2.107.015a kṣipraṃ saṃyojayitvā tu rāghavasya punaḥ svayam
GE09ram_1-7u:6700: 2.107.015c caraṇau tau tu rāmasya drakṣyāmi sahapādukau
GE09ram_1-7u:6701: 2.107.016a tato nikṣiptabhāro 'haṃ rāghaveṇa samāgataḥ 2.107.016c nivedya gurave rājyaṃ bhajiṣye guruvṛttitām 2.107.017a rāghavāya ca saṃnyāsaṃ dattveme varapāduke 2.107.017c rājyaṃ cedam ayodhyāṃ ca dhūtapāpo bhavāmi ca
GE09ram_1-7u:6702: 2.107.018a abhiṣikte tu kākutsthe prahṛṣṭamudite jane 2.107.018c prītir mama yaśaś caiva bhaved rājyāc caturguṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:6703: 2.107.019a evaṃ tu vilapan dīno bharataḥ sa mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6708: 2.107.021c bhrātur vacanakārī ca pratijñāpāragas tadā 2.107.022a pāduke tv abhiṣicyātha nandigrāme 'vasat tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:6709: 2.107.022c bharataḥ śāsanaṃ sarvaṃ pādukābhyāṃ nyavedayat 2.108.001a pratiprayāte bharate vasan rāmas tapovane 2.108.001c lakṣayām āsa sodvegam athautsukyaṃ tapasvinām 2.108.002a ye tatra citrakūṭasya purastāt tāpasāśrame 2.108.002c rāmam āśritya niratās tān alakṣayad utsukān
GE09ram_1-7u:6710: 2.108.003a nayanair bhṛkuṭībhiś ca rāmaṃ nirdiśya śaṅkitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6711: 2.108.003c anyonyam upajalpantaḥ śanaiś cakrur mithaḥ kathāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6712: 2.108.004a teṣām autsukyam ālakṣya rāmas tv ātmani śaṅkitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6713: 2.108.004c kṛtāñjalir uvācedam ṛṣiṃ kulapatiṃ tataḥ 2.108.005a na kaccid bhagavan kiṃ cit pūrvavṛttam idaṃ mayi 2.108.005c dṛśyate vikṛtaṃ yena vikriyante tapasvinaḥ 2.108.006a pramādāc caritaṃ kaccit kiṃ cin nāvarajasya me
GE09ram_1-7u:6715: 2.108.007a kaccic chuśrūṣamāṇā vaḥ śuśrūṣaṇaparā mayi 2.108.007c pramadābhyucitāṃ vṛttiṃ sītā yuktaṃ na vartate
GE09ram_1-7u:6716: 2.108.008a atharṣir jarayā vṛddhas tapasā ca jarāṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6719: 2.108.009c calanaṃ tāta vaidehyās tapasviṣu viśeṣataḥ 2.108.010a tvannimittam idaṃ tāvat tāpasān prati vartate
GE09ram_1-7u:6720: 2.108.010c rakṣobhyas tena saṃvignāḥ kathayanti mithaḥ kathāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6721: 2.108.011a rāvaṇāvarajaḥ kaś cit kharo nāmeha rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6723: 2.108.012a dhṛṣṭaś ca jitakāśī ca nṛśaṃsaḥ puruṣādakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6724: 2.108.012c avaliptaś ca pāpaś ca tvāṃ ca tāta na mṛṣyate
GE09ram_1-7u:6725: 2.108.013a tvaṃ yadā prabhṛti hy asminn āśrame tāta vartase 2.108.013c tadā prabhṛti rakṣāṃsi viprakurvanti tāpasān 2.108.014a darśayanti hi bībhatsaiḥ krūrair bhīṣaṇakair api
GE09ram_1-7u:6726: 2.108.014c nānā rūpair virūpaiś ca rūpair asukhadarśanaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6727: 2.108.015a apraśastair aśucibhiḥ saṃprayojya ca tāpasān 2.108.015c pratighnanty aparān kṣipram anāryāḥ purataḥ sthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6728: 2.108.016a teṣu teṣv āśramasthāneṣv abuddham avalīya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:6730: 2.108.017a apakṣipanti srugbhāṇḍān agnīn siñcanti vāriṇā 2.108.017c kalaśāṃś ca pramṛdnanti havane samupasthite 2.108.018a tair durātmabhir āviṣṭān āśramān prajihāsavaḥ 2.108.018c gamanāyānyadeśasya codayanty ṛṣayo 'dya mām
GE09ram_1-7u:6731: 2.108.019a tat purā rāma śārīrām upahiṃsāṃ tapasviṣu
GE09ram_1-7u:6732: 2.108.019c darśayati hi duṣṭās te tyakṣyāma imam āśramam
GE09ram_1-7u:6733: 2.108.020a bahumūlaphalaṃ citram avidūrād ito vanam 2.108.020c purāṇāśramam evāhaṃ śrayiṣye sagaṇaḥ punaḥ 2.108.021a kharas tvayy api cāyuktaṃ purā tāta pravartate
GE09ram_1-7u:6734: 2.108.021c sahāsmābhir ito gaccha yadi buddhiḥ pravartate
GE09ram_1-7u:6735: 2.108.022a sakalatrasya saṃdeho nityaṃ yat tasya rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:6736: 2.108.022c samarthasyāpi hi sato vāso duḥkha ihādya te
GE09ram_1-7u:6737: 2.108.023a ity uktavantaṃ rāmas taṃ rājaputras tapasvinam
GE09ram_1-7u:6738: 2.108.023c na śaśākottarair vākyair avaroddhuṃ samutsukam 2.108.024a abhinandya samāpṛcchya samādhāya ca rāghavam 2.108.024c sa jagāmāśramaṃ tyaktvā kulaiḥ kulapatiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:6739: 2.108.025a rāmaḥ saṃsādhya tv ṛṣigaṇam anugamanād; deśāt tasmāccit kulapatim abhivādyarṣim 2.108.025c samyakprītais tair anumata upadiṣṭārthaḥ; puṇyaṃ vāsāya svanilayam upasaṃpede 2.108.026a āśramaṃ tv ṛṣivirahitaṃ prabhuḥ; kṣaṇam api na jahau sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6740: 2.108.026c rāghavaṃ hi satatam anugatās; tāpasāś carṣicaritadhṛtaguṇāḥ 2.109.001a rāghavas tv apayāteṣu tapasviṣu vicintayan 2.109.001c na tatrārocayad vāsaṃ kāraṇair bahubhis tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:6741: 2.109.002a iha me bharato dṛṣṭo mātaraś ca sanāgarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6742: 2.109.002c sā ca me smṛtir anveti tān nityam anuśocataḥ 2.109.003a skandhāvāraniveśena tena tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6743: 2.109.003c hayahastikarīṣaiś ca upamardaḥ kṛto bhṛśam 2.109.004a tasmād anyatra gacchāma iti saṃcintya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6744: 2.109.004c prātiṣṭhata sa vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca saṃgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6745: 2.109.005a so 'trer āśramam āsādya taṃ vavande mahāyaśāḥ 2.109.005c taṃ cāpi bhagavān atriḥ putravat pratyapadyata
GE09ram_1-7u:6746: 2.109.006a svayam ātithyam ādiśya sarvam asya susatkṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:6747: 2.109.006c saumitriṃ ca mahābhāgāṃ sītāṃ ca samasāntvayat
GE09ram_1-7u:6748: 2.109.007a patnīṃ ca tam anuprāptāṃ vṛddhām āmantrya satkṛtām
GE09ram_1-7u:6749: 2.109.007c sāntvayām āsa dharmajñaḥ sarvabhūtahite rataḥ 2.109.008a anasūyāṃ mahābhāgāṃ tāpasīṃ dharmacāriṇīm
GE09ram_1-7u:6751: 2.109.009a rāmāya cācacakṣe tāṃ tāpasīṃ dharmacāriṇīm 2.109.009c daśa varṣāṇy anāvṛṣṭyā dagdhe loke nirantaram
GE09ram_1-7u:6752: 2.109.010a yayā mūlaphale sṛṣṭe jāhnavī ca pravartitā
GE09ram_1-7u:6753: 2.109.010c ugreṇa tapasā yuktā niyamaiś cāpy alaṃkṛtā
GE09ram_1-7u:6754: 2.109.011a daśavarṣasahasrāṇi yayā taptaṃ mahat tapaḥ 2.109.011c anasūyāvratais tāta pratyūhāś ca nibarhitāḥ 2.109.012a devakāryanimittaṃ ca yayā saṃtvaramāṇayā
GE09ram_1-7u:6755: 2.109.012c daśarātraṃ kṛtvā rātriḥ seyaṃ māteva te 'nagha
GE09ram_1-7u:6756: 2.109.013a tām imāṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ namaskāryāṃ yaśasvinīm 2.109.013c abhigacchatu vaidehī vṛddhām akrodhanāṃ sadā 2.109.014a evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ tathety uktvā sa rāghavaḥ 2.109.014c sītām uvāca dharmajñām idaṃ vacanam uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:6757: 2.109.015a rājaputri śrutaṃ tv etan muner asya samīritam
GE09ram_1-7u:6759: 2.109.016a anasūyeti yā loke karmabhiḥ kyātim āgatā
GE09ram_1-7u:6760: 2.109.016c tāṃ śīghram abhigaccha tvam abhigamyāṃ tapasvinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:6761: 2.109.017a sītā tv etad vacaḥ śrutvā rāghavasya hitaiṣiṇī
GE09ram_1-7u:6762: 2.109.017c tām atripatnīṃ dharmajñām abhicakrāma maithilī 2.109.018a śithilāṃ valitāṃ vṛddhāṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:6763: 2.109.018c satataṃ vepamānāṅgīṃ pravāte kadalī yathā 2.109.019a tāṃ tu sītā mahābhāgām anasūyāṃ pativratām
GE09ram_1-7u:6764: 2.109.019c abhyavādayad avyagrā svaṃ nāma samudāharat 2.109.020a abhivādya ca vaidehī tāpasīṃ tām aninditām
GE09ram_1-7u:6766: 2.109.021a tataḥ sītāṃ mahābhāgāṃ dṛṣṭvā tāṃ dharmacāriṇīm
GE09ram_1-7u:6767: 2.109.021c sāntvayanty abravīd dhṛṣṭā diṣṭyā dharmam avekṣase
GE09ram_1-7u:6768: 2.109.022a tyaktvā jñātijanaṃ sīte mānam ṛddhiṃ ca mānini
GE09ram_1-7u:6769: 2.109.022c avaruddhaṃ vane rāmaṃ diṣṭyā tvam anugacchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:6770: 2.109.023a nagarastho vanastho vā pāpo vā yadi vāśubhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6771: 2.109.023c yāsāṃ strīṇāṃ priyo bhartā tāsāṃ lokā mahodayāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6772: 2.109.024a duḥśīlaḥ kāmavṛtto vā dhanair vā parivarjitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6773: 2.109.024c strīṇām ārya svabhāvānāṃ paramaṃ daivataṃ patiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6774: 2.109.025a nāto viśiṣṭaṃ paśyāmi bāndhavaṃ vimṛśanty aham
GE09ram_1-7u:6775: 2.109.025c sarvatra yogyaṃ vaidehi tapaḥ kṛtam ivāvyayam
GE09ram_1-7u:6776: 2.109.026a na tv evam avagacchanti guṇa doṣam asat striyaḥ 2.109.026c kāmavaktavyahṛdayā bhartṛnāthāś caranti yāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6777: 2.109.027a prāpnuvanty ayaśaś caiva dharmabhraṃśaṃ ca maithili
GE09ram_1-7u:6778: 2.109.027c akārya vaśam āpannāḥ striyo yāḥ khalu tad vidhāḥ 2.109.028a tvadvidhās tu guṇair yuktā dṛṣṭalokaparāvarāḥ 2.109.028c striyaḥ svarge cariṣyanti yathā puṇyakṛtas tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:6779: 2.110.001a sā tv evam uktā vaidehī anasūyān asūyayā
GE09ram_1-7u:6780: 2.110.001c pratipūjya vaco mandaṃ pravaktum upacakrame 2.110.002a naitad āścaryam āryāyā yan māṃ tvam anubhāṣase
GE09ram_1-7u:6781: 2.110.002c viditaṃ tu mamāpy etad yathā nāryāḥ patir guruḥ 2.110.003a yady apy eṣa bhaved bhartā mamārye vṛttavarjitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6782: 2.110.003c advaidham upavartavyas tathāpy eṣa mayā bhavet
GE09ram_1-7u:6783: 2.110.004a kiṃ punar yo guṇaślāghyaḥ sānukrośo jitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6784: 2.110.004c sthirānurāgo dharmātmā mātṛvartī pitṛ priyaḥ 2.110.005a yāṃ vṛttiṃ vartate rāmaḥ kausalyāyāṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6785: 2.110.005c tām eva nṛpanārīṇām anyāsām api vartate
GE09ram_1-7u:6786: 2.110.006a sakṛd dṛṣṭāsv api strīṣu nṛpeṇa nṛpavatsalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6787: 2.110.006c mātṛvad vartate vīro mānam utsṛjya dharmavit
GE09ram_1-7u:6788: 2.110.007a āgacchantyāś ca vijanaṃ vanam evaṃ bhayāvaham
GE09ram_1-7u:6789: 2.110.007c samāhitaṃ hi me śvaśrvā hṛdaye yat sthitaṃ mama 2.110.008a prāṇipradānakāle ca yat purā tv agnisaṃnidhau
GE09ram_1-7u:6790: 2.110.008c anuśiṣṭā jananyāsmi vākyaṃ tad api me dhṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:6791: 2.110.009a navīkṛtaṃ tu tat sarvaṃ vākyais te dharmacāriṇi
GE09ram_1-7u:6792: 2.110.009c patiśuśrūṣaṇān nāryās tapo nānyad vidhīyate 2.110.010a sāvitrī patiśuśrūṣāṃ kṛtvā svarge mahīyate 2.110.010c tathā vṛttiś ca yātā tvaṃ patiśuśrūṣayā divam
GE09ram_1-7u:6793: 2.110.011a variṣṭhā sarvanārīṇām eṣā ca divi devatā
GE09ram_1-7u:6794: 2.110.011c rohiṇī ca vinā candraṃ muhūrtam api dṛśyate
GE09ram_1-7u:6795: 2.110.012a evaṃvidhāś ca pravarāḥ striyo bhartṛdṛḍhavratāḥ 2.110.012c devaloke mahīyante puṇyena svena karmaṇā 2.110.013a tato 'nasūyā saṃhṛṣṭā śrutvoktaṃ sītayā vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6796: 2.110.013c śirasy āghrāya covāca maithilīṃ harṣayanty uta
GE09ram_1-7u:6797: 2.110.014a niyamair vividhair āptaṃ tapo hi mahad asti me 2.110.014c tat saṃśritya balaṃ sīte chandaye tvāṃ śucivrate
GE09ram_1-7u:6798: 2.110.015a upapannaṃ ca yuktaṃ ca vacanaṃ tava maithili
GE09ram_1-7u:6799: 2.110.015c prītā cāsmy ucitaṃ kiṃ te karavāṇi bravīhi me 2.110.015e kṛtam ity abravīt sītā tapobalasamanvitām 2.110.016a sā tv evam uktā dharmajñā tayā prītatarābhavat
GE09ram_1-7u:6800: 2.110.016c saphalaṃ ca praharṣaṃ te hanta sīte karomy aham 2.110.017a idaṃ divyaṃ varaṃ mālyaṃ vastram ābharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:6801: 2.110.017c aṅgarāgaṃ ca vaidehi mahārham anulepanam 2.110.018a mayā dattam idaṃ sīte tava gātrāṇi śobhayet
GE09ram_1-7u:6802: 2.110.018c anurūpam asaṃkliṣṭaṃ nityam eva bhaviṣyati 2.110.019a aṅgarāgeṇa divyena liptāṅgī
GE09ram_1-7u:6803: 2.110.019c śobhayiṣyāmi bhartāraṃ yathā śrīr viṣṇum avyayam
GE09ram_1-7u:6804: 2.110.020a sā vastram aṅgarāgaṃ ca bhūṣaṇāni srajas tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:6806: 2.110.021a pratigṛhya ca tat sītā prītidānaṃ yaśasvinī
GE09ram_1-7u:6808: 2.110.022a tathā sītām upāsīnām anasūyā dṛḍhavratā 2.110.022c vacanaṃ praṣṭum ārebhe kathāṃ kāṃ cid anupriyām
GE09ram_1-7u:6809: 2.110.023a svayaṃvare kila prāptā tvam anena yaśasvinā
GE09ram_1-7u:6810: 2.110.023c rāghaveṇeti me sīte kathā śrutim upāgatā
GE09ram_1-7u:6811: 2.110.024a tāṃ kathāṃ śrotum icchāmi vistareṇa ca maithili
GE09ram_1-7u:6812: 2.110.024c yathānubhūtaṃ kārtsnyena tan me tvaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:6813: 2.110.025a evam uktā tu sā sītā tāṃ tato dharmacāriṇīm 2.110.025c śrūyatām iti coktvā vai kathayām āsa tāṃ kathām 2.110.026a mithilādhipatir vīro janako nāma dharmavit 2.110.026c kṣatradharmaṇy abhirato nyāyataḥ śāsti medinīm 2.110.027a tasya lāṅgalahastasya karṣataḥ kṣetramaṇḍalam
GE09ram_1-7u:6814: 2.110.027c ahaṃ kilotthitā bhittvā jagatīṃ nṛpateḥ sutā
GE09ram_1-7u:6815: 2.110.028a sa māṃ dṛṣṭvā narapatir muṣṭivikṣepatatparaḥ 2.110.028c pāṃśu guṇṭhita sarvāṅgīṃ vismito janako 'bhavat
GE09ram_1-7u:6816: 2.110.029a anapatyena ca snehād aṅkam āropya ca svayam
GE09ram_1-7u:6817: 2.110.029c mameyaṃ tanayety uktvā sneho mayi nipātitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6818: 2.110.030a antarikṣe ca vāg uktāpratimā mānuṣī kila
GE09ram_1-7u:6819: 2.110.030c evam etan narapate dharmeṇa tanayā tava
GE09ram_1-7u:6820: 2.110.031a tataḥ prahṛṣṭo dharmātmā pitā me mithilādhipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6821: 2.110.031c avāpto vipulām ṛddhiṃ mām avāpya narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6822: 2.110.032a dattvā cāsmīṣṭavad devyai jyeṣṭhāyai puṇyakarmaṇā 2.110.032c tayā saṃbhāvitā cāsmi snigdhayā mātṛsauhṛdāt 2.110.033a patisaṃyogasulabhaṃ vayo dṛṣṭvā tu me pitā
GE09ram_1-7u:6823: 2.110.033c cintām abhyagamad dīno vittanāśād ivādhanaḥ 2.110.034a sadṛśāc cāpakṛṣṭāc ca loke kanyāpitā janāt
GE09ram_1-7u:6824: 2.110.034c pradharṣaṇām avāpnoti śakreṇāpi samo bhuvi 2.110.035a tāṃ dharṣaṇām adūrasthāṃ saṃdṛśyātmani pārthivaḥ 2.110.035c cinntārṇavagataḥ pāraṃ nāsasādāplavo yatha
GE09ram_1-7u:6825: 2.110.036a ayonijāṃ hi māṃ jñātvā nādhyagacchat sa cintayan
GE09ram_1-7u:6826: 2.110.036c sadṛśaṃ cānurūpaṃ ca mahīpālaḥ patiṃ mama
GE09ram_1-7u:6827: 2.110.037a tasya buddhir iyaṃ jātā cintayānasya saṃtatam
GE09ram_1-7u:6828: 2.110.037c svayaṃ varaṃ tanūjāyāḥ kariṣyāmīti dhīmataḥ 2.110.038a mahāyajñe tadā tasya varuṇena mahātmanā 2.110.038c dattaṃ dhanurvaraṃ prītyā tūṇī cākṣayya sāyakau
GE09ram_1-7u:6829: 2.110.039a asaṃcālyaṃ manuṣyaiś ca yatnenāpi ca gauravāt
GE09ram_1-7u:6830: 2.110.039c tan na śaktā namayituṃ svapneṣv api narādhipāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6831: 2.110.040a tad dhanuḥ prāpya me pitrā vyāhṛtaṃ satyavādinā
GE09ram_1-7u:6832: 2.110.040c samavāye narendrāṇāṃ pūrvam āmantrya pārthivān 2.110.041a idaṃ ca dhanur udyamya sajyaṃ yaḥ kurute naraḥ 2.110.041c tasya me duhitā bhāryā bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6833: 2.110.042a tac ca dṛṣṭvā dhanuḥśreṣṭhaṃ gauravād girisaṃnibham
GE09ram_1-7u:6834: 2.110.042c abhivādya nṛpā jagmur aśaktās tasya tolane
GE09ram_1-7u:6836: 2.110.043c viśvāmitreṇa sahito yajñaṃ draṣṭuṃ samāgataḥ 2.110.044a lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ 2.110.044c viśvāmitras tu dharmātmā mama pitrā supūjitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6837: 2.110.045a provāca pitaraṃ tatra rāghavo rāmalakṣmaṇau 2.110.045c sutau daśarathasyemau
GE09ram_1-7u:6838: 2.110.045e ity uktas tena vipreṇa tad dhanuḥ samupānayat
GE09ram_1-7u:6839: 2.110.046a nimeṣāntaramātreṇa tad ānamya sa vīryavān 2.110.046c jyāṃ samāropya jhaṭiti pūrayām āsa vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:6840: 2.110.047a tena pūrayatā vegān madhye bhagnaṃ dvidhā dhanuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6843: 2.110.048c udyatā dātum udyamya jalabhājanam uttamam 2.110.049a dīyamānāṃ na tu tadā pratijagrāha
GE09ram_1-7u:6844: 2.110.049c avijñāya pituś chandam ayodhyādhipateḥ prabhoḥ 2.110.050a tataḥ śvaśuram āmantrya vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam
GE09ram_1-7u:6845: 2.110.050c mama pitrā ahaṃ dattā rāmāya viditātmane
GE09ram_1-7u:6846: 2.110.051a mama caivānujā sādhvī ūrmilā priyadarśanā 2.110.051c bhāryārthe lakṣmaṇasyāpi dattā pitrā mama svayam
GE09ram_1-7u:6847: 2.110.052a evaṃ dattāsmi rāmāya tadā tasmin svayaṃ vare
GE09ram_1-7u:6848: 2.110.052c anuraktā ca dharmeṇa patiṃ vīryavatāṃ varam
GE09ram_1-7u:6849: 2.111.001a anasūyā tu dharmajñā śrutvā tāṃ mahatīṃ kathām
GE09ram_1-7u:6850: 2.111.001c paryaṣvajata bāhubhyāṃ śirasy āghrāya maithilīm 2.111.002a vyaktākṣarapadaṃ citraṃ bhāṣitaṃ madhuraṃ tvayā 2.111.002c yathā svayaṃvaraṃ vṛttaṃ tat sarvaṃ hi śrutaṃ mayā 2.111.003a rame 'haṃ kathayā te tu dṛṣḍhaṃ madhurabhāṣiṇi 2.111.003c ravir astaṃ gataḥ śrīmān upohya rajanīṃ śivām
GE09ram_1-7u:6851: 2.111.004a divasaṃ prati kīrṇānām āhārārthaṃ patatriṇām 2.111.004c saṃdhyākāle nilīnānāṃ nidrārthaṃ śrūyate dhvaniḥ 2.111.005a ete cāpy abhiṣekārdrā munayaḥ phalaśodhanāḥ 2.111.005c sahitā upavartante salilāplutavalkalāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6854: 2.111.007a alpaparṇā hi taravo ghanībhūtāḥ samantataḥ 2.111.007c viprakṛṣṭe 'pi ye deśe na prakāśanti vai diśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6856: 2.111.008c tapovanamṛgā hy ete veditīrtheṣu śerate 2.111.009a saṃpravṛttā niśā sīte nakṣatrasamalaṃkṛtā
GE09ram_1-7u:6859: 2.111.010c kathayantyā hi madhuraṃ tvayāhaṃ paritoṣitā 2.111.011a alaṃkuru ca tāvat tvaṃ pratyakṣaṃ mama maithili
GE09ram_1-7u:6860: 2.111.011c prītiṃ janaya me vatsa divyālaṃkāraśobhinī 2.111.012a sā tadā samalaṃkṛtya sītā surasutopamā 2.111.012c praṇamya śirasā tasyai rāmaṃ tv abhimukhī yayau
GE09ram_1-7u:6861: 2.111.013a tathā tu bhūṣitāṃ sītāṃ dadarśa vadatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6862: 2.111.013c rāghavaḥ prītidānena tapasvinyā jaharṣa ca 2.111.014a nyavedayat tataḥ sarvaṃ sītā rāmāya maithilī
GE09ram_1-7u:6864: 2.111.015a prahṛṣṭas tv abhavad rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6865: 2.111.015c maithilyāḥ satkriyāṃ dṛṣṭvā mānuṣeṣu sudurlabhām 2.111.016a tatas tāṃ sarvarīṃ prītaḥ puṇyāṃ śaśinibhānanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6866: 2.111.016c arcitas tāpasaiḥ siddhair uvāsa raghunandanaḥ 2.111.017a tasyāṃ rātryāṃ vyatītāyām abhiṣicya hutāgnikān 2.111.017c āpṛcchetāṃ naravyāghrau tāpasān vanagocarān
GE09ram_1-7u:6867: 2.111.018a tāv ūcus te vanacarās tāpasā dharmacāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6868: 2.111.018c vanasya tasya saṃcāraṃ rākṣasaiḥ samabhiplutam 2.111.019a eṣa panthā maharṣīṇāṃ phalāny āharatāṃ vane
GE09ram_1-7u:6869: 2.111.019c anena tu vanaṃ durgaṃ gantuṃ rāghava te kṣamam 2.111.020a itīva taiḥ prāñjalibhis tapasvibhir; dvijaiḥ kṛtasvastyayanaḥ paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6870: 2.111.020c vanaṃ sabhāryaḥ praviveśa rāghavaḥ; salakṣmaṇaḥ sūrya ivābhramaṇḍalam
GE09ram_1-7u:6871: 3.001.001a praviśya tu mahāraṇyaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyam ātmavān 3.001.001c dadarśa rāmo durdharṣas
GE09ram_1-7u:6873: 3.001.002c yathā pradīptaṃ durdharśaṃ gagane sūryamaṇḍalam 3.001.003a śaraṇyaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ susamṛṣṭājiraṃ sadā
GE09ram_1-7u:6874: 3.001.003c pūjitaṃ copanṛttaṃ ca nityam apsarasāṃ gaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6875: 3.001.004a viśālair agniśaraṇaiḥ srugbhāṇḍair ajinaiḥ kuśaiḥ 3.001.004c samidbhis toyakalaśaiḥ phalamūlaiś ca śobhitam 3.001.005a āraṇyaiś ca mahāvṛkṣaiḥ puṇyaiḥ svāduphalair vṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:6877: 3.001.006a puṣpair vanyaiḥ parikṣiptaṃ padminyā ca sapadmayā
GE09ram_1-7u:6879: 3.001.007a sūryavaiśvānarābhaiś ca purāṇair munibhir vṛtam 3.001.007c puṇyaiś a niyatāhāraiḥ śobhitaṃ paramarṣibhiḥ 3.001.008a tad brahmabhavanaprakhyaṃ brahmaghoṣanināditam
GE09ram_1-7u:6881: 3.001.009a tad dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ śrīmāṃs tāpasāśramamaṇḍalam 3.001.009c abhyagacchan mahātejā vijyaṃ kṛtvā mahad dhanuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6882: 3.001.010a divyajñānopapannās te rāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā maharṣayaḥ 3.001.010c abhyagacchaṃs tadā prītā vaidehīṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:6883: 3.001.011a te taṃ somam ivodyantaṃ dṛṣṭvā vai dharmacāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6887: 3.001.013a vaidehīṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmaṃ netrair animiṣair iva
GE09ram_1-7u:6888: 3.001.013c āścaryabhūtān dadṛśuḥ sarve te vanacāriṇaḥ 3.001.014a atrainaṃ hi mahābhāgāḥ sarvabhūtahite ratāḥ 3.001.014c atithiṃ parṇaśālāyāṃ rāghavaṃ saṃnyaveśayan
GE09ram_1-7u:6889: 3.001.015a tato rāmasya satkṛtya vidhinā pāvakopamāḥ 3.001.015c ājahrus te mahābhāgāḥ salilaṃ dharmacāriṇaḥ 3.001.016a mūlaṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ vanyam āśramaṃ ca mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6891: 3.001.017a dharmapālo janasyāsya śaraṇyaś ca mahāyaśāḥ 3.001.017c pūjanīyaś ca mānyaś ca rājā daṇḍadharo guruḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6892: 3.001.018a indrasyaiva caturbhāgaḥ prajā rakṣati rāghava 3.001.018c rājā tasmād vanān bhogān bhuṅkte lokanamaskṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6893: 3.001.019a te vayaṃ bhavatā rakṣyā bhavadviṣayavāsinaḥ 3.001.019c nagarastho vanastho vā tvaṃ no rājā janeśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6894: 3.001.020a nyastadaṇḍā vayaṃ rājañ jitakrodhā jitendriyāḥ 3.001.020c rakṣitavyās tvayā śaśvad garbhabhūtās tapodhanāḥ 3.001.021a evam uktvā phalair mūlaiḥ puṣpair vanyaiś ca rāghavam 3.001.021c anyaiś ca vividhāhāraiḥ salakṣmaṇam apūjayan 3.001.022a tathānye tāpasāḥ siddhā rāmaṃ vaiśvānaropamāḥ 3.001.022c nyāyavṛttā yathānyāyaṃ tarpayām āsur īśvaram 3.002.001a kṛtātithyo 'tha rāmas tu sūryasyodayanaṃ prati
GE09ram_1-7u:6895: 3.002.001c āmantrya sa munīn sarvān vanam evānvagāhata
GE09ram_1-7u:6898: 3.002.003c lakṣmaṇānugato rāmo vanamadhyaṃ dadarśa ha 3.002.004a vanamadhye tu kākutsthas tasmin ghoramṛgāyute 3.002.004c dadarśa giriśṛṅgābhaṃ puruṣādaṃ mahāsvanam
GE09ram_1-7u:6900: 3.002.005c bībhatsaṃ viṣamaṃ dīrghaṃ vikṛtaṃ ghoradarśanam 3.002.006a vasānaṃ carmavaiyāghraṃ vasārdraṃ rudhirokṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:6902: 3.002.007a trīn siṃhāṃś caturo vyāghrān dvau vṛkau pṛṣatān daśa 3.002.007c saviṣāṇaṃ vasādigdhaṃ gajasya ca śiro mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:6904: 3.002.008c sa rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva sītāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca maithilīm 3.002.009a abhyadhāvat susaṃkruddhaḥ prajāḥ kāla ivāntakaḥ 3.002.009c sa kṛtvā bhairavaṃ nādaṃ cālayann iva medinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:6908: 3.002.011c kathaṃ tāpasayor vāṃ ca vāsaḥ pramadayā saha
GE09ram_1-7u:6909: 3.002.012a adharmacāriṇau pāpau kau yuvāṃ munidūṣakau 3.002.012c ahaṃ vanam idaṃ durgaṃ virāgho nāma rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6910: 3.002.013a carāmi sāyudho nityam ṛṣimāṃsāni bhakṣayan 3.002.013c iyaṃ nārī varārohā mama bharyā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:6911: 3.002.013e yuvayoḥ pāpayoś cāhaṃ pāsyāmi rudhiraṃ mṛdhe
GE09ram_1-7u:6912: 3.002.014a tasyaivaṃ bruvato dhṛṣṭaṃ virādhasya durātmanaḥ 3.002.014c śrutvā sagarvitaṃ vākyaṃ saṃbhrāntā janakātmajā 3.002.014e sītā prāvepatodvegāt pravāte kadalī yathā 3.002.015a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ sītāṃ virādhāṅkagatāṃ śubhām
GE09ram_1-7u:6913: 3.002.015c abravīl lakṣmaṇaṃ vākyaṃ mukhena pariśuṣyatā 3.002.016a paśya saumya narendrasya
GE09ram_1-7u:6914: 3.002.016c mama bhāryāṃ śubhācārāṃ virādhāṅke praveśitām 3.002.016e atyanta sukhasaṃvṛddhāṃ rājaputrīṃ yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:6915: 3.002.017a yad abhipretam asmāsu priyaṃ vara vṛtaṃ ca yat 3.002.017c kaikeyyās tu susaṃvṛttaṃ kṣipram adyaiva lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:6916: 3.002.018a yā na tuṣyati rājyena putrārthe dīrghadarśinī
GE09ram_1-7u:6917: 3.002.018c yayāhaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ hitaḥ prasthāpito vanam 3.002.018e adyedānīṃ sakāmā sā yā mātā mama madhyamā
GE09ram_1-7u:6918: 3.002.019a parasparśāt tu vaidehyā na duḥkhataram asti me
GE09ram_1-7u:6919: 3.002.019c pitur vināśāt saumitre svarājyaharaṇāt tathā 3.002.020a iti bruvati kākutsthe
GE09ram_1-7u:6920: 3.002.020c abravīl lakṣmaṇaḥ kruddho ruddho nāga iva śvasan
GE09ram_1-7u:6921: 3.002.021a anātha iva bhūtānāṃ nāthas tvaṃ vāsavopamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6922: 3.002.021c mayā preṣyeṇa kākutstha kimarthaṃ paritapsyase 3.002.022a śareṇa nihatasyādya mayā kruddhena rakṣasaḥ 3.002.022c virādhasya gatāsor hi mahī pāsyati śoṇitam
GE09ram_1-7u:6923: 3.002.023a rājyakāme mama krodho bharate yo babhūva ha
GE09ram_1-7u:6924: 3.002.023c taṃ virādhe vimokṣyāmi vajrī vajram ivācale
GE09ram_1-7u:6925: 3.002.024a mama bhujabalavegavegitaḥ; patatu śaro 'sya mahān mahorasi 3.002.024c vyapanayatu tanoś ca jīvitaṃ; patatu tataś ca mahīṃ vighūrṇitaḥ 3.003.001a athovāca punar vākyaṃ virādhaḥ pūrayan vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:6926: 3.003.001c ātmānaṃ pṛcchate brūtaṃ kau yuvāṃ kva gamiṣyathaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6927: 3.003.002a tam uvāca tato rāmo rākṣasaṃ jvalitānanam
GE09ram_1-7u:6929: 3.003.003a kṣatriyo vṛttasaṃpannau viddhi nau vanagocarau 3.003.003c tvāṃ tu veditum icchāvaḥ kas tvaṃ carasi daṇḍakān 3.003.004a tam uvāca virādhas tu rāmaṃ satyaparākramam
GE09ram_1-7u:6930: 3.003.004c hanta vakṣyāmi te rājan nibodha mama rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:6931: 3.003.005a putraḥ kila jayasyāhaṃ mātā mama śatahradā
GE09ram_1-7u:6932: 3.003.005c virādha iti mām āhuḥ pṛthivyāṃ sarvarākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6933: 3.003.006a tapasā cāpi me prāptā brahmaṇo hi prasādajā
GE09ram_1-7u:6934: 3.003.006c śastreṇāvadhyatā loke 'cchedyābhedyatvam eva ca 3.003.007a utsṛjya pramadām enām anapekṣau yathāgatam 3.003.007c tvaramāṇau pālayethāṃ na vāṃ jīvitam ādade
GE09ram_1-7u:6937: 3.003.009a kṣudra dhik tvāṃ tu hīnārthaṃ mṛtyum anveṣase dhruvam 3.003.009c raṇe saṃprāpsyase tiṣṭha na me jīvan gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:6938: 3.003.010a tataḥ sajyaṃ dhanuḥ kṛtvā rāmaḥ suniśitāñ śarān
GE09ram_1-7u:6939: 3.003.010c suśīghram abhisaṃdhāya rākṣasaṃ nijaghāna ha 3.003.011a dhanuṣā jyāguṇavatā saptabāṇān mumoca ha 3.003.011c rukmapuṅkhān mahāvegān suparṇānilatulyagān
GE09ram_1-7u:6940: 3.003.012a te śarīraṃ virādhasya bhittvā barhiṇavāsasaḥ 3.003.012c nipetuḥ śoṇitādigdhā dharaṇyāṃ pāvakopamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6941: 3.003.013a sa vinadya mahānādaṃ śūlaṃ śakradhvajopamam 3.003.013c pragṛhyāśobhata tadā vyāttānana ivāntakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6942: 3.003.014a tac chūlaṃ vajrasaṃkāśaṃ gagane jvalanopamam 3.003.014c dvābhyāṃ śarābhyāṃ ciccheda rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6943: 3.003.015a tasya raudrasya saumitrir bāhuṃ savyaṃ babhañja ha
GE09ram_1-7u:6944: 3.003.015c rāmas tu dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ tarasā tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6945: 3.003.016a sa bhagnabāhuḥ saṃvigno nipapātāśu rākṣasaḥ 3.003.016c dharaṇyāṃ meghasaṃkāśo vajrabhinna ivācalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6946: 3.003.016e idaṃ provāca kākutsthaṃ virādhaḥ puruṣarṣabham 3.003.017a kausalyā suprajās tāta rāmas tvaṃ vidito mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:6947: 3.003.017c vaidehī ca mahābhāgā lakṣmaṇaś ca mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6948: 3.003.018a abhiśāpād ahaṃ ghorāṃ praviṣṭo rākṣasīṃ tanum
GE09ram_1-7u:6949: 3.003.018c tumburur nāma gandharvaḥ śapto vaiśvaraṇena hi
GE09ram_1-7u:6950: 3.003.019a prasādyamānaś ca mayā so 'bravīn māṃ mahāyaśāḥ 3.003.019c yadā dāśarathī rāmas tvāṃ vadhiṣyati saṃyuge
GE09ram_1-7u:6951: 3.003.020a tadā prakṛtim āpanno bhavān svargaṃ gamiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:6952: 3.003.020c iti vaiśravaṇo rājā rambhāsaktam uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:6953: 3.003.021a anupasthīyamāno māṃ saṃkruddho vyajahāra ha 3.003.021c tava prasādān mukto 'ham abhiśāpāt sudāruṇāt 3.003.021e bhavanaṃ svaṃ gamiṣyāmi svasti vo 'stu paraṃtapa
GE09ram_1-7u:6954: 3.003.022a ito vasati dharmātmā śarabhaṅgaḥ pratāpavān 3.003.022c adhyardhayojane tāta maharṣiḥ sūryasaṃnibhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6955: 3.003.023a taṃ kṣipram abhigaccha tvaṃ sa te śreyo vidhāsyati 3.003.023c avaṭe cāpi māṃ rāma nikṣipya kuśalī vraja
GE09ram_1-7u:6956: 3.003.024a rakṣasāṃ gatasattvānām eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ 3.003.024c avaṭe ye nidhīyante teṣāṃ lokāḥ sanātanāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6957: 3.003.025a evam uktvā tu kākutsthaṃ virādhaḥ śarapīḍitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6959: 3.003.026a taṃ muktakaṇṭham utkṣipya śaṅkukarṇaṃ mahāsvanam 3.003.026c virādhaṃ prākṣipac chvabhre nadantaṃ bhairavasvanam 3.003.027a tatas tu tau kāñcanacitrakārmukau; nihatya rakṣaḥ parigṛhya
GE09ram_1-7u:6961: 3.003.027c vijahratus tau muditau mahāvane; divi sthitau candradivākarāv
GE09ram_1-7u:6963: 3.004.001a hatvā tu taṃ bhīmabalaṃ virādhaṃ rākṣasaṃ vane
GE09ram_1-7u:6964: 3.004.001c tataḥ sītāṃ pariṣvajya samāśvāsya ca vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:6965: 3.004.001e abravīl lakṣmaṇāṃ rāmo bhrātaraṃ dīptatejasaṃ 3.004.002a kaṣṭaṃ vanam idaṃ durgaṃ na ca smo vanagocarāḥ 3.004.002c abhigacchāmahe śīghraṃ śarabhaṅgaṃ tapodhanam
GE09ram_1-7u:6968: 3.004.004c samīpe śarabhaṅgasya dadarśa mahad adbhutam 3.004.005a vibhrājamānaṃ vapuṣā
GE09ram_1-7u:6971: 3.004.006c tadvidhair eva bahubhiḥ pūjyamānaṃ mahātmabhiḥ 3.004.007a haribhir vājibhir yuktam antarikṣagataṃ ratham 3.004.007c dadarśādūratas tasya taruṇādityasaṃnibham
GE09ram_1-7u:6974: 3.004.009c gṛhīte vananārībhyāṃ dhūyamāne ca mūrdhani 3.004.010a gandharvāmarasiddhāś ca bahavaḥ paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6975: 3.004.010c antarikṣagataṃ devaṃ vāgbhir agryābhir īḍire 3.004.011a dṛṣṭvā śatakratuṃ tatra rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:6976: 3.004.011c ye hayāḥ puruhūtasya purā śakrasya naḥ śrutāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6977: 3.004.011e antarikṣagatā divyās ta ime harayo dhruvam
GE09ram_1-7u:6978: 3.004.012a ime ca puruṣavyāghra ye tiṣṭhanty abhito ratham
GE09ram_1-7u:6979: 3.004.012c śataṃ śataṃ kuṇḍalino yuvānaḥ khaḍgapāṇayaḥ 3.004.013a urodeśeṣu sarveṣāṃ hārā
GE09ram_1-7u:6981: 3.004.014a etad dhi kila devānāṃ vayo bhavati nityadā
GE09ram_1-7u:6983: 3.004.015a ihaiva saha vaidehyā muhūrtaṃ tiṣṭha lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:6984: 3.004.015c yāvaj janāmy ahaṃ vyaktaṃ ka eṣa dyutimān rathe 3.004.016a tam evam uktvā saumitrim ihaiva sthīyatām iti
GE09ram_1-7u:6986: 3.004.017a tataḥ samabhigacchantaṃ prekṣya rāmaṃ śacīpatiḥ 3.004.017c śarabhaṅgam anujñāpya vibudhān idam abravīt 3.004.018a ihopayāty asau rāmo yāvan māṃ nābhibhāṣate
GE09ram_1-7u:6987: 3.004.018c niṣṭhāṃ nayata tāvat tu tato māṃ draṣṭum arhati 3.004.019a jitavantaṃ kṛtārthaṃ ca draṣṭāham acirād imam
GE09ram_1-7u:6988: 3.004.019c karma hy anena kartavyaṃ mahad anyaiḥ suduṣkaram
GE09ram_1-7u:6989: 3.004.020a iti vajrī tam āmantrya mānayitvā ca tāpasaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:6990: 3.004.020c rathena hariyuktena yayau divam ariṃdamaḥ 3.004.021a prayāte tu sahasrākṣe rāghavaḥ saparicchadaḥ 3.004.021c agnihotram upāsīnaṃ śarabhaṅgam upāgamat
GE09ram_1-7u:6991: 3.004.022a tasya pādau ca saṃgṛhya rāmaḥ sītā ca lakṣmaṇaḥ 3.004.022c niṣedus tadanujñātā labdhavāsā nimantritāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6992: 3.004.023a tataḥ śakropayānaṃ tu paryapṛcchat sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6993: 3.004.023c śarabhaṅgaś ca tat sarvaṃ rāghavāya nyavedayat
GE09ram_1-7u:6994: 3.004.024a mām eṣa varado rāma brahmalokaṃ ninīṣati
GE09ram_1-7u:6995: 3.004.024c jitam ugreṇa tapasā duṣprāpam akṛtātmabhiḥ 3.004.025a ahaṃ jñātvā naravyāghra vartamānam adūrataḥ 3.004.025c brahmalokaṃ na gacchāmi tvām adṛṣṭvā priyātithim
GE09ram_1-7u:6997: 3.004.026c akṣayā naraśārdūla jitā lokā mayā śubhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:6998: 3.004.026e brāhmyāś ca nākapṛṣṭhyāś ca pratigṛhṇīṣva māmakān
GE09ram_1-7u:7000: 3.004.027c ṛṣiṇā śarabhaṅgena rāghavo vākyam abravīt 3.004.028a aham evāhariṣyāmi sarvāṃl lokān mahāmune 3.004.028c āvāsaṃ tv aham icchāmi pradiṣṭam iha kānane
GE09ram_1-7u:7001: 3.004.029a rāghaveṇaivam uktas tu śakratulyabalena vai 3.004.029c śarabhaṅgo mahāprājñaḥ punar evābravīd vacaḥ 3.004.030a sutīkṣṇam abhigaccha tvaṃ śucau deśe tapasvinam
GE09ram_1-7u:7002: 3.004.030c ramaṇīye vanoddeśe sa te vāsaṃ vidhāsyati
GE09ram_1-7u:7003: 3.004.031a eṣa panthā naravyāghra muhūrtaṃ paśya tāta mām
GE09ram_1-7u:7004: 3.004.031c yāvaj jahāmi gātrāṇi jīrṇaṃ tvacam ivoragaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7005: 3.004.032a tato 'gniṃ sa samādhāya hutvā cājyena mantravit 3.004.032c śarabhaṅgo mahātejāḥ praviveśa hutāśanam
GE09ram_1-7u:7006: 3.004.033a tasya romāṇi keśāṃś ca dadāhāgnir mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7007: 3.004.033c jīrṇaṃ tvacaṃ tathāsthīni yac ca māṃsaṃ ca śoṇitam 3.004.034a sa ca pāvakasaṃkāśaḥ kumāraḥ samapadyata 3.004.034c utthāyāgnicayāt tasmāc charabhaṅgo vyarocata
GE09ram_1-7u:7008: 3.004.035a sa lokān āhitāgnīnām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca mahātmanām
GE09ram_1-7u:7009: 3.004.035c devānāṃ ca vyatikramya brahmalokaṃ vyarohata 3.004.036a sa puṇyakarmā bhuvane dvijarṣabhaḥ; pitāmahaṃ sānucaraṃ dadarśa
GE09ram_1-7u:7011: 3.004.036c pitāmahaś cāpi samīkṣya taṃ dvijaṃ; nananda susvāgatam ity
GE09ram_1-7u:7012: uvāca ha 3.005.001a śarabhaṅge divaṃ prāpte munisaṃghāḥ samāgatāḥ 3.005.001c abhyagacchanta kākutsthaṃ rāmaṃ jvalitatejasaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:7014: 3.005.002c aśmakuṭṭāś ca bahavaḥ patrāhārāś ca tāpasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7020: 3.005.005c sarve brāhmyā śriyā juṣṭā dṛḍhayogasamāhitāḥ 3.005.005e śarabhaṅgāśrame rāmam abhijagmuś ca tāpasāḥ 3.005.006a abhigamya ca dharmajñā rāmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam
GE09ram_1-7u:7022: 3.005.007a tvam ikṣvākukulasyāsya pṛthivyāś ca mahārathaḥ 3.005.007c pradhānaś cāsi nāthaś ca devānāṃ maghavān iva
GE09ram_1-7u:7023: 3.005.008a viśrutas triṣu lokeṣu yaśasā vikrameṇa ca
GE09ram_1-7u:7024: 3.005.008c pitṛvratatvaṃ satyaṃ ca tvayi dharmaś ca puṣkalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7025: 3.005.009a tvām āsādya mahātmānaṃ dharmajñaṃ dharmavatsalam 3.005.009c arthitvān nātha vakṣyāmas tac ca naḥ kṣantum arhasi 3.005.010a adhārmas tu mahāṃs tāta bhavet tasya mahīpateḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7026: 3.005.010c yo hared baliṣaḍbhāgaṃ na ca rakṣati putravat
GE09ram_1-7u:7027: 3.005.011a yuñjānaḥ svān iva prāṇān prāṇair iṣṭān sutān iva 3.005.011c nityayuktaḥ sadā rakṣan sarvān viṣayavāsinaḥ 3.005.012a prāpnoti śāśvatīṃ rāma kīrtiṃ sa bahuvārṣikīm
GE09ram_1-7u:7028: 3.005.012c brahmaṇaḥ sthānam āsādya tatra cāpi mahīyate
GE09ram_1-7u:7029: 3.005.013a yat karoti paraṃ dharmaṃ munir mūlaphalāśanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7030: 3.005.013c tatra rājñaś caturbhāgaḥ prajā dharmeṇa rakṣataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7032: 3.005.014c tvan nātho 'nāthavad rāma rākṣasair vadhyate bhṛśam
GE09ram_1-7u:7033: 3.005.015a ehi paśya śarīrāṇi munīnāṃ bhāvitātmanām 3.005.015c hatānāṃ rākṣasair ghorair bahūnāṃ bahudhā vane
GE09ram_1-7u:7035: 3.005.016c citrakūṭālayānāṃ ca kriyate kadanaṃ mahat 3.005.017a evaṃ vayaṃ na mṛṣyāmo viprakāraṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:7036: 3.005.017c kriyamāṇaṃ vane ghoraṃ rakṣobhir bhīmakarmabhiḥ 3.005.018a tatas tvāṃ śaraṇārthaṃ ca śaraṇyaṃ samupasthitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7037: 3.005.018c paripālaya no rāma vadhyamānān niśācaraiḥ 3.005.019a etac chrutvā tu kākutsthas tāpasānāṃ tapasvinām
GE09ram_1-7u:7038: 3.005.019c idaṃ provāca dharmātmā sarvān eva tapasvinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7039: 3.005.019e naivam arhatha māṃ vaktum ājñāpyo 'haṃ tapasvinam
GE09ram_1-7u:7041: 3.005.020c tasya me 'yaṃ vane vāso bhaviṣyati mahāphalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7042: 3.005.020e tapasvināṃ raṇe śatrūn hantum icchāmi rākṣasān
GE09ram_1-7u:7043: 3.005.021a dattvā varaṃ cāpi tapodhanānāṃ; dharme dhṛtātmā sahalakṣmaṇena
GE09ram_1-7u:7044: 3.005.021c tapodhanaiś cāpi sahārya vṛttaḥ; sutīṣkṇam evābhijagāma vīraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7045: 3.006.001a rāmas tu sahito bhrātrā sītayā ca paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7046: 3.006.001c sutīkṣṇasyāśramapadaṃ jagāma saha tair dvijaiḥ 3.006.002a sa gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ nadīs tīrtva bahūdakāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7047: 3.006.002c dadarśa vipulaṃ śailaṃ mahāmegham ivonnatam 3.006.003a tatas tad ikṣvākuvarau satataṃ vividhair drumaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7048: 3.006.003c kānanaṃ tau viviśatuḥ sītayā saha rāghavau
GE09ram_1-7u:7049: 3.006.004a praviṣṭas tu vanaṃ ghoraṃ bahupuṣpaphaladrumam 3.006.004c dadarśāśramam ekānte
GE09ram_1-7u:7051: 3.006.005c rāmaḥ sutīkṣṇaṃ vidhivat tapovṛddham abhāṣata 3.006.006a rāmo 'ham asmi bhagavan bhavantaṃ draṣṭum āgataḥ 3.006.006c tan mābhivada dharmajña maharṣe satyavikrama 3.006.007a sa nirīkṣya tato vīraṃ rāmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam
GE09ram_1-7u:7052: 3.006.007c samāśliṣya ca bāhubhyām idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:7053: 3.006.008a svāgataṃ khalu te vīra rāma dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE09ram_1-7u:7056: 3.006.009c devalokam ito vīra dehaṃ tyaktvā mahītale
GE09ram_1-7u:7057: 3.006.010a citrakūṭam upādāya rājyabhraṣṭo 'si me śrutaḥ 3.006.010c ihopayātaḥ kākutstho devarājaḥ śatakratuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7058: 3.006.010e sarvāṃl lokāñ jitān āha mama puṇyena karmaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:7059: 3.006.011a teṣu devarṣijuṣṭeṣu jiteṣu tapasā mayā 3.006.011c matprasādāt sabhāryas tvaṃ viharasva salakṣmaṇaḥ 3.006.012a tam ugratapasaṃ dīptaṃ maharṣiṃ satyavādinam 3.006.012c pratyuvācātmavān rāmo brahmāṇam iva vāsavaḥ 3.006.013a aham evāhariṣyāmi svayaṃ lokān mahāmune 3.006.013c āvāsaṃ tv aham icchāmi pradiṣṭam iha kānane
GE09ram_1-7u:7060: 3.006.014a bhavān sarvatra kuśalaḥ sarvabhūtahite rataḥ 3.006.014c ākhyātaḥ śarabhaṅgena gautamena mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:7061: 3.006.015a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa maharṣir lokaviśrutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7062: 3.006.015c abravīn madhuraṃ vākyaṃ harṣeṇa mahatāplutaḥ 3.006.016a ayam evāśramo rāma guṇavān ramyatām iha
GE09ram_1-7u:7064: 3.006.017a imam āśramam āgamya mṛgasaṃghā mahāyaśāḥ 3.006.017c aṭitvā pratigacchanti lobhayitvākutobhayāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7065: 3.006.018a tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya maharṣer lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7066: 3.006.018c uvāca vacanaṃ dhīro vikṛṣya saśaraṃ dhanuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7067: 3.006.019a tān ahaṃ sumahābhāga mṛgasaṃghān samāgatān 3.006.019c hanyāṃ niśitadhāreṇa śareṇāśanivarcasā
GE09ram_1-7u:7068: 3.006.020a bhavāṃs tatrābhiṣajyeta kiṃ syāt kṛcchrataraṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7069: 3.006.020c etasminn āśrame vāsaṃ ciraṃ tu na samarthaye
GE09ram_1-7u:7070: 3.006.021a tam evam uktvā varadaṃ rāmaḥ saṃdhyām upāgamat
GE09ram_1-7u:7071: 3.006.021c anvāsya paścimāṃ saṃdhyāṃ tatra vāsam akalpayat
GE09ram_1-7u:7072: 3.006.022a tataḥ śubhaṃ tāpasabhojyam annaṃ; svayaṃ sutīkṣṇaḥ puruṣarṣabhābhyām
GE09ram_1-7u:7073: 3.006.022c tābhyāṃ susatkṛtya dadau mahātmā; saṃdhyānivṛttau rajanīṃ samīkṣya
GE09ram_1-7u:7075: 3.007.001c pariṇamya niśāṃ tatra prabhāte pratyabudhyata 3.007.002a utthāya tu yathākālaṃ rāghavaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_1-7u:7077: 3.007.003a atha te 'gniṃ surāṃś caiva vaidehī rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:7078: 3.007.003c kālyaṃ vidhivad abhyarcya tapasviśaraṇe vane 3.007.004a udayanntaṃ dinakaraṃ dṛṣṭvā vigatakalmaṣāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7079: 3.007.004c sutīkṣṇam abhigamyedaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ vacanam abruvan 3.007.005a sukhoṣitāḥ sma bhagavaṃs tvayā pūjyena pūjitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7080: 3.007.005c āpṛcchāmaḥ prayāsyāmo munayas tvarayanti naḥ 3.007.006a tvarāmahe vayaṃ draṣṭuṃ kṛtsnam āśramamaṇḍalam 3.007.006c ṛṣīṇāṃ puṇyaśīlānāṃ daṇḍakāraṇyavāsinām
GE09ram_1-7u:7082: 3.007.007c dharmanityais tapodāntair viśikhair iva pāvakaiḥ 3.007.008a aviṣahyātapo yāvat sūryo nātivirājite
GE09ram_1-7u:7084: 3.007.009a tāvad icchāmahe gantum ity uktvā caraṇau muneḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7085: 3.007.009c vavande sahasaumitriḥ sītayā saha rāghavaḥ 3.007.010a tau saṃspṛśantau caraṇāv utthāpya munipuṃgavaḥ 3.007.010c gāḍham āliṅgya sasneham idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:7086: 3.007.011a ariṣṭaṃ gaccha panthānaṃ rāma saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_1-7u:7089: 3.007.012c eṣāṃ tapasvināṃ vīra tapasā bhāvitātmanām 3.007.013a suprājyaphalamūlāni puṣpitāni vanāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:7095: 3.007.016a gamyatāṃ vatsa saumitre bhavān api ca gacchatu
GE09ram_1-7u:7096: 3.007.016c āgantavyaṃ ca te dṛṣṭvā punar evāśramaṃ mama
GE09ram_1-7u:7097: 3.007.017a evam uktas tathety uktvā kākutsthaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7098: 3.007.017c pradakṣiṇaṃ muniṃ kṛtā prasthātum upacakrame 3.007.018a tataḥ śubhatare tūṇī dhanuṣī cāyatekṣaṇā 3.007.018c dadau sītā tayor bhrātroḥ khaḍgau ca vimalau tataḥ 3.007.019a ābadhya ca śubhe tūṇī cāpe cādāya sasvane
GE09ram_1-7u:7099: 3.007.019c niṣkrāntāv āśramād gantum ubhau tau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:7101: 3.008.001c vaidehī snigdhayā vācā bhartāram idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:7102: 3.008.002a ayaṃ dharmaḥ susūkṣmeṇa vidhinā prāpyate mahān
GE09ram_1-7u:7103: 3.008.002c nivṛttena ca śakyo 'yaṃ vyasanāt kāmajād iha
GE09ram_1-7u:7104: 3.008.003a trīṇy eva vyasanāny atra kāmajāni bhavanty uta
GE09ram_1-7u:7105: 3.008.003c mithyā vākyaṃ paramakaṃ tasmād gurutarāv ubhau
GE09ram_1-7u:7106: 3.008.003e paradārābhigamanaṃ vinā vairaṃ ca raudratā 3.008.004a mithyāvākyaṃ na te bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:7108: 3.008.005a tac ca sarvaṃ mahābāho śakyaṃ voḍhuṃ jitendriyaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7109: 3.008.005c tava vaśyendriyatvaṃ ca jānāmi śubhadarśana 3.008.006a tṛtīyaṃ yad idaṃ raudraṃ paraprāṇābhihiṃsanam 3.008.006c nirvairaṃ kriyate mohāt tac ca te samupasthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:7111: 3.008.007c ṛṣīṇāṃ rakṣaṇārthāya vadhaḥ saṃyati rakṣasām 3.008.008a etannimittaṃ ca vanaṃ daṇḍakā iti viśrutam
GE09ram_1-7u:7112: 3.008.008c prasthitas tvaṃ saha bhrātrā dhṛtabāṇaśarāsanaḥ 3.008.009a tatas tvāṃ prasthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā mama cintākulaṃ manaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7113: 3.008.009c tvad vṛttaṃ cintayantyā vai bhaven niḥśreyasaṃ hitam
GE09ram_1-7u:7114: 3.008.010a na hi me rocate vīra gamanaṃ daṇḍakān prati 3.008.010c kāraṇaṃ tatra vakṣyāmi vadantyāḥ śrūyatāṃ mama
GE09ram_1-7u:7115: 3.008.011a tvaṃ hi bāṇadhanuṣpāṇir bhrātrā saha vanaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7116: 3.008.011c dṛṣṭvā vanacarān sarvān kaccit kuryāḥ śaravyayam
GE09ram_1-7u:7117: 3.008.012a kṣatriyāṇām iha dhanur hutāśasyendhanāni ca 3.008.012c samīpataḥ sthitaṃ tejobalam ucchrayate bhṛśam 3.008.013a purā kila mahābāho tapasvī satyavāk śuciḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7118: 3.008.013c kasmiṃś cid abhavat puṇye vane ratamṛgadvije
GE09ram_1-7u:7119: 3.008.014a tasyaiva tapaso vighnaṃ kartum indraḥ śacīpatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7120: 3.008.014c khaḍgapāṇir athāgacchad āśramaṃ bhaṭa rūpadhṛk 3.008.015a tasmiṃs tad āśramapade nihitaḥ khaḍga uttamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7121: 3.008.015c sa nyāsavidhinā dattaḥ puṇye tapasi tiṣṭhataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7122: 3.008.016a sa tac chastram anuprāpya nyāsarakṣaṇatatparaḥ 3.008.016c vane tu vicaraty eva rakṣan pratyayam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7123: 3.008.017a yatra gacchaty upādātuṃ mūlāni ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:7124: 3.008.017c na vinā yāti taṃ khaḍgaṃ nyāsarakṣaṇatatparaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7125: 3.008.018a nityaṃ śastraṃ parivahan krameṇa sa tapodhanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7126: 3.008.018c cakāra raudrīṃ svāṃ buddhiṃ tyaktvā tapasi niścayam
GE09ram_1-7u:7128: 3.008.019c tasya śastrasya saṃvāsāj jagāma narakaṃ muniḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7129: 3.008.020a snehāc ca bahumānāc ca smāraye tvāṃ na śikṣaye 3.008.020c na kathaṃ cana sā kāryā hṛhītadhanuṣā tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:7130: 3.008.021a buddhir vairaṃ vinā hantuṃ rākṣasān daṇḍakāśritān
GE09ram_1-7u:7131: 3.008.021c aparādhaṃ vinā hantuṃ lokān vīra na kāmaye
GE09ram_1-7u:7132: 3.008.022a kṣatriyāṇāṃ tu vīrāṇāṃ vaneṣu niyatātmanām 3.008.022c dhanuṣā kāryam etāvad ārtānām abhirakṣaṇam 3.008.023a kva ca śastraṃ kva ca vanaṃ kva ca kṣātraṃ tapaḥ kva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:7133: 3.008.023c vyāviddham idam asmābhir deśadharmas tu pūjyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:7134: 3.008.024a tad āryakaluṣā buddhir jāyate śastrasevanāt 3.008.024c punar gatvā tv ayodhyāyāṃ kṣatradharmaṃ cariṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:7135: 3.008.025a akṣayā tu bhavet prītiḥ śvaśrū śvaśurayor mama
GE09ram_1-7u:7136: 3.008.025c yadi rājyaṃ hi saṃnyasya bhaves tvaṃ nirato muniḥ 3.008.026a dharmād arthaḥ prabhavati dharmāt prabhavate sukham
GE09ram_1-7u:7137: 3.008.026c dharmeṇa labhate sarvaṃ dharmasāram idaṃ jagat
GE09ram_1-7u:7138: 3.008.027a ātmānaṃ niyamais tais taiḥ karṣayitvā prayatnataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7139: 3.008.027c prāpyate nipuṇair dharmo na sukhāl labhyate sukham
GE09ram_1-7u:7140: 3.008.028a nityaṃ śucimatiḥ saumya cara dharmaṃ tapovane
GE09ram_1-7u:7141: 3.008.028c sarvaṃ hi viditaṃ tubhyaṃ trailokyam api tattvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7142: 3.008.029a strīcāpalād etad udāhṛtaṃ me; dharmaṃ ca vaktuṃ tava kaḥ samarthaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7143: 3.008.029c vicārya buddhyā tu sahānujena; yad rocate tat kuru mācireṇa 3.009.001a vākyam etat tu vaidehyā vyāhṛtaṃ bhartṛbhaktayā
GE09ram_1-7u:7144: 3.009.001c śrutvā dharme sthito rāmaḥ pratyuvācātha maithilīm
GE09ram_1-7u:7145: 3.009.002a hitam uktaṃ tvayā devi snigdhayā sadṛśaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7146: 3.009.002c kulaṃ vyapadiśantyā ca dharmajñe janakātmaje 3.009.003a kiṃ tu vakṣyāmy ahaṃ devi tvayaivoktam idaṃ vacaḥ 3.009.003c kṣatriyair dhāryate cāpo nārtaśabdo bhaved iti
GE09ram_1-7u:7147: 3.009.004a te cārtā daṇḍakāraṇye munayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ 3.009.004c māṃ sīte svayam āgamya śaraṇyāḥ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7149: 3.009.005c na labhante sukhaṃ bhītā rākṣasaiḥ krūrakarmabhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7150: 3.009.006a kāle kāle ca niratā niyamair vividhair vane
GE09ram_1-7u:7153: 3.009.007c asmān abhyavapadyeti mām ūcur dvijasattamāḥ 3.009.008a mayā tu vacanaṃ śrutvā teṣām evaṃ mukhāc cyutam 3.009.008c kṛtvā caraṇaśuśrūṣāṃ vākyam etad udāhṛtam 3.009.009a prasīdantu bhavanto me hrīr eṣā hi mamātulā
GE09ram_1-7u:7154: 3.009.009c yadīdṛśair ahaṃ viprair upastheyair upasthitaḥ 3.009.009e kiṃ karomīti ca mayā vyāhṛtaṃ dvijasaṃnidhau
GE09ram_1-7u:7155: 3.009.010a sarvair eva samāgamya vāg iyaṃ samudāhṛtā
GE09ram_1-7u:7157: 3.009.010e arditāḥ sma bhṛśaṃ rāma bhavān nas trātum arhati 3.009.011a homakāle tu saṃprāpte parvakāleṣu cānagha 3.009.011c dharṣayanti sma durdharṣā rākṣasāḥ piśitāśanāḥ 3.009.012a rākṣasair dharṣitānāṃ ca tāpasānāṃ tapasvinām 3.009.012c gatiṃ mṛgayamāṇānāṃ bhavān naḥ paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7158: 3.009.013a kāmaṃ tapaḥ prabhāvena śaktā hantuṃ niśācarān
GE09ram_1-7u:7159: 3.009.013c cirārjitaṃ tu necchāmas tapaḥ khaṇḍayituṃ vayam
GE09ram_1-7u:7160: 3.009.014a bahuvighnaṃ taponityaṃ duścaraṃ caiva rāghava 3.009.014c tena śāpaṃ na muñcāmo bhakṣyamāṇāś ca rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7162: 3.009.015c rakṣanas tvaṃ saha bhrātrā tvannāthā hi vayaṃ vane 3.009.016a mayā caitad vacaḥ śrutvā kārtsnyena paripālanam
GE09ram_1-7u:7164: 3.009.017a saṃśrutya ca na śakṣyāmi jīvamānaḥ pratiśravam
GE09ram_1-7u:7165: 3.009.017c munīnām anyathā kartuṃ satyam iṣṭaṃ hi me sadā 3.009.018a apy ahaṃ jīvitaṃ jahyāṃ tvāṃ vā sīte salakṣmaṇām 3.009.018c na tu pratijñāṃ saṃśrutya brāhmaṇebhyo viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7166: 3.009.019a tad avaśyaṃ mayā kāryam ṛṣīṇāṃ paripālanam
GE09ram_1-7u:7167: 3.009.019c anuktenāpi vaidehi pratijñāya tu kiṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7168: 3.009.020a mama snehāc ca sauhārdād idam uktaṃ tvayā vacaḥ 3.009.020c parituṣṭo 'smy ahaṃ sīte na hy aniṣṭo 'nuśiṣyate
GE09ram_1-7u:7169: 3.009.020e sadṛśaṃ cānurūpaṃ ca kulasya tava śobhane
GE09ram_1-7u:7170: 3.009.021a ity evam uktvā vacanaṃ mahātmā; sītāṃ priyāṃ maithila
GE09ram_1-7u:7172: 3.009.021c rāmo dhanuṣmān sahalakṣmaṇena; jagāma ramyāṇi tapovanāni
GE09ram_1-7u:7173: 3.010.001a agrataḥ prayayau rāmaḥ sītā madhye sumadhyamā
GE09ram_1-7u:7175: 3.010.002a tau paśyamānau vividhāñ śailaprasthān vanāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:7176: 3.010.002c nadīś ca vividhā ramyā jagmatuḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_1-7u:7178: 3.010.003c sarāṃsi ca sapadmāni yutāni jalajaiḥ khagaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7179: 3.010.004a yūthabaddhāṃś ca pṛṣatān madonmattān viṣāṇinaḥ 3.010.004c mahiṣāṃś ca varāhāṃś ca gajāṃś ca drumavairiṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7180: 3.010.005a te gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ lambamāne divākare
GE09ram_1-7u:7181: 3.010.005c dadṛśuḥ sahitā ramyaṃ taṭākaṃ yojanāyatam 3.010.006a padmapuṣkarasaṃbādhaṃ gajayūthair
GE09ram_1-7u:7184: 3.010.007c gītavāditranirghoṣo na tu kaś cana dṛśyate
GE09ram_1-7u:7185: 3.010.008a tataḥ kautūhalād rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7186: 3.010.008c muniṃ dharmabhṛtaṃ nāma praṣṭuṃ samupacakrame 3.010.009a idam atyadbhutaṃ śrutvā sarveṣāṃ no mahāmune
GE09ram_1-7u:7187: 3.010.009c kautūhalaṃ mahaj jātaṃ kim idaṃ sādhu kathyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:7188: 3.010.010a tenaivam ukto dharmātmā rāghaveṇa munis tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:7189: 3.010.010c prabhāvaṃ sarasaḥ kṛtsnam ākhyātum upacakrame 3.010.011a idaṃ pañcāpsaro nāma taṭākaṃ sārvakālikam 3.010.011c nirmitaṃ tapasā rāma muninā māṇḍakarṇinā 3.010.012a sa hi tepe tapas tīvraṃ māṇḍakarṇir mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7191: 3.010.013a tataḥ pravyathitāḥ sarve devāḥ sāgnipurogamāḥ 3.010.013c abruvan vacanaṃ sarve paraspara samāgatāḥ 3.010.013e asmakaṃ kasya cit sthānam eṣa prārthayate muniḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7192: 3.010.014a tataḥ kartuṃ tapovighnaṃ sarvair devair niyojitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7193: 3.010.014c pradhānāpsarasaḥ pañcavidyuccalitavarcasaḥ 3.010.015a apsarobhis tatas tābhir munir dṛṣṭaparāvaraḥ 3.010.015c nīto madanavaśyatvaṃ surāṇāṃ kāryasiddhaye
GE09ram_1-7u:7194: 3.010.016a tāś caivāpsarasaḥ pañcamuneḥ patnītvam āgatāḥ 3.010.016c taṭāke nirmitaṃ tāsām asminn antarhitaṃ gṛham
GE09ram_1-7u:7196: 3.010.017c ramayanti tapoyogān muniṃ yauvanam āsthitam 3.010.018a tāsāṃ saṃkrīḍamānānām eṣa vāditraniḥsvanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7198: 3.010.019a āścaryam iti tasyaitad vacanaṃ bhāvitātmanaḥ 3.010.019c rāghavaḥ pratijagrāha saha bhrātrā mahāyaśāḥ 3.010.020a evaṃ kathayamānasya dadarśāśramamaṇḍalam
GE09ram_1-7u:7199: 3.010.020c kuśacīraparikṣiptaṃ nānāvṛkṣasamāvṛtam 3.010.021a praviśya saha vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7200: 3.010.021c tadā tasmin sa kākutsthaḥ śrīmaty āśramamaṇḍale
GE09ram_1-7u:7201: 3.010.022a uṣitvā susukhaṃ tatra pūrjyamāno maharṣibhiḥ 3.010.022c jagāma cāśramāṃs teṣāṃ paryāyeṇa tapasvinām 3.010.023a yeṣām uṣitavān pūrvaṃ sakāśe sa mahāstravit
GE09ram_1-7u:7202: 3.010.023c kva cit paridaśān māsān ekaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ kva cit 3.010.024a kva cic ca caturo māsān pañcaṣaṭ cāparān kva cit
GE09ram_1-7u:7203: 3.010.024c aparatrādhikān māsān adhyardham adhikaṃ kva cit
GE09ram_1-7u:7204: 3.010.025a trīn māsān aṣṭamāsāṃś ca rāghavo nyavasat sukham
GE09ram_1-7u:7205: 3.010.025c tathā saṃvasatas tasya munīnām āśrameṣu vai
GE09ram_1-7u:7206: 3.010.025e ramataś cānukulyena yayuḥ saṃvatsarā daśa 3.010.026a parisṛtya ca dharmajño rāghavaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_1-7u:7207: 3.010.026c sutīkṣṇasyāśramaṃ śrīmān punar evājagāma ha 3.010.027a sa tam āśramam āgamya munibhiḥ pratipūjitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7208: 3.010.027c tatrāpi nyavasad rāmaḥ kaṃ cit kālam ariṃdamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7209: 3.010.028a athāśramastho vinayāt kadā cit taṃ mahāmunim
GE09ram_1-7u:7210: 3.010.028c upāsīnaḥ sa kākutsthaḥ sutīkṣṇam idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:7211: 3.010.029a asminn araṇye bhagavann agastyo munisattamaḥ 3.010.029c vasatīti mayā nityaṃ kathāḥ kathayatāṃ śrutam
GE09ram_1-7u:7212: 3.010.030a na tu jānāmi taṃ deśaṃ vanasyāsya mahattayā
GE09ram_1-7u:7213: 3.010.030c kutrāśramapadaṃ puṇyaṃ maharṣes tasya dhīmataḥ 3.010.031a prasādāt tatra bhavataḥ sānujaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_1-7u:7215: 3.010.032a manoratho mahān eṣa hṛdi saṃparivartate 3.010.032c yad ahaṃ taṃ munivaraṃ śuśrūṣeyam api svayam
GE09ram_1-7u:7216: 3.010.033a iti rāmasya sa muniḥ śrutvā dharmātmano vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7218: 3.010.034a aham apy etad eva tvāṃ vaktukāmaḥ salakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:7219: 3.010.034c agastyam abhigaccheti sītayā saha rāghava 3.010.035a diṣṭyā tv idānīm arthe 'smin svayam eva bravīṣi mām
GE09ram_1-7u:7220: 3.010.035c aham ākhyāsi te vatsa yatrāgastyo mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7221: 3.010.036a yojanāny āśramāt tāta yāhi catvāri vai tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7222: 3.010.036c dakṣiṇena mahāñ śrīmān agastyabhrātur āśramaḥ 3.010.037a sthalaprāye vanoddeśe
GE09ram_1-7u:7224: 3.010.038a padminyo vividhās tatra prasannasalilāḥ śivāḥ 3.010.038c haṃsakāraṇḍavākīrṇāś cakravākopaśobhitāḥ 3.010.039a tatraikāṃ rajanīm uṣya prabhāte rāma gamyatām
