GE09ram_1-7u:7225: 3.010.039c dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āsthāya vanakhaṇḍasya pārśvataḥ 3.010.040a tatrāgastyāśramapadaṃ gatvā yojanam antaram
GE09ram_1-7u:7227: 3.010.040e raṃsyate tatra vaidehī lakṣmaṇaś ca tvayā saha
GE09ram_1-7u:7228: 3.010.041a sa hi ramyo vanoddeśo bahupādapasaṃkulaḥ 3.010.041c yadi buddhiḥ kṛtā draṣṭum agastyaṃ taṃ mahāmunim
GE09ram_1-7u:7229: 3.010.041e adyaiva gamane buddhiṃ rocayasva mahāyaśaḥ 3.010.042a iti rāmo muneḥ śrutvā saha bhrātrābhivādya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:7231: 3.010.043a paśyan vanāni citrāṇi parvapāṃś cābhrasaṃnibhān 3.010.043c sarāṃsi saritaś caiva pathi mārgavaśānugāḥ 3.010.044a sutīkṣṇenopadiṣṭena gatvā tena pathā sukham 3.010.044c idaṃ paramasaṃhṛṣṭo vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇam abravīt 3.010.045a etad evāśramapadaṃ nūnaṃ tasya mahātmanaḥ 3.010.045c agastyasya muner bhrātur dṛśyate puṇyakarmaṇaḥ 3.010.046a yathā hīme vanasyāsya jñātāḥ pathi sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7232: 3.010.046c saṃnatāḥ phalabhareṇa puṣpabhāreṇa ca drumāḥ 3.010.047a pippalīnāṃ ca pakvānāṃ vanād asmād upāgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7234: 3.010.048a tatra tatra ca dṛśyante saṃkṣiptāḥ kāṣṭhasaṃcayāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7235: 3.010.048c lūnāś ca pathi dṛśyante darbhā vaidūryavarcasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7238: 3.010.050a vivikteṣu ca tīrtheṣu kṛtasnānā dvijātayaḥ 3.010.050c puṣpopahāraṃ kurvanti kusumaiḥ svayam ārjitaiḥ 3.010.051a tat sutīkṣṇasya vacanaṃ yathā saumya mayā śrutam
GE09ram_1-7u:7239: 3.010.051c agastyasyāśramo bhrātur nūnam eṣa bhaviṣyati 3.010.052a nigṛhya tarasā mṛtyuṃ lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā 3.010.052c yasya bhrātrā kṛteyaṃ dik śaraṇyā puṇyakarmaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:7240: 3.010.053a ihaikadā kila krūro vātāpir api celvalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7241: 3.010.053c bhrātarau sahitāv āstāṃ brāhmaṇaghnau mahāsurau 3.010.054a dhārayan brāhmaṇaṃ rūpam ilvalaḥ saṃskṛtaṃ vadan
GE09ram_1-7u:7242: 3.010.054c āmantrayati viprān sa śrāddham uddiśya nirghṛṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7243: 3.010.055a bhrātaraṃ saṃskṛtaṃ bhrātā tatas taṃ meṣarūpiṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:7244: 3.010.055c tān dvijān bhojayām āsa śrāddhadṛṣṭena karmaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:7246: 3.010.056c vātāpe niṣkramasveti svareṇa mahatā vadan 3.010.057a tato bhrātur vacaḥ śrutvā vātāpir meṣavan nadan
GE09ram_1-7u:7247: 3.010.057c bhittvā bhitvā śarīrāṇi brāhmaṇānāṃ viniṣpatat 3.010.058a brāhmaṇānāṃ sahasrāṇi tair evaṃ kāmarūpibhiḥ 3.010.058c vināśitāni saṃhatya nityaśaḥ piśitāśanaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7248: 3.010.059a agastyena tadā devaiḥ prārthitena maharṣiṇā 3.010.059c anubhūya kila śrāddhe bhakṣitaḥ sa mahāsuraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7249: 3.010.060a tataḥ saṃpannam ity uktvā dattvā hastāvasecanam
GE09ram_1-7u:7251: 3.010.061a taṃ tathā bhāṣamāṇaṃ tu bhrātaraṃ vipraghātinam
GE09ram_1-7u:7252: 3.010.061c abravīt prahasan dhīmān agastyo munisattamaḥ 3.010.062a kuto niṣkramituṃ śaktir mayā jīrṇasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7253: 3.010.062c bhrātus te meṣa rūpasya gatasya yamasādanam
GE09ram_1-7u:7254: 3.010.063a atha tasya vacaḥ śrutvā bhrātur nidhanasaṃśritam
GE09ram_1-7u:7255: 3.010.063c pradharṣayitum ārebhe muniṃ krodhān niśācaraḥ 3.010.064a so 'bhyadravad dvijendraṃ taṃ muninā dīptatejasā
GE09ram_1-7u:7258: 3.010.065c viprānukampayā yena karmedaṃ duṣkaraṃ kṛtam 3.010.066a evaṃ kathayamānasya tasya saumitriṇā saha 3.010.066c rāmasyāstaṃ gataḥ sūryaḥ saṃdhyākālo 'bhyavartata
GE09ram_1-7u:7259: 3.010.067a upāsya paścimāṃ saṃdhyāṃ saha bhrātrā yathāvidhi
GE09ram_1-7u:7261: 3.010.068a samyak pratigṛhītas tu muninā tena rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7262: 3.010.068c nyavasat tāṃ niśām ekāṃ prāśya mūlaphalāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:7263: 3.010.069a tasyāṃ rātryāṃ vyatītāyāṃ vimale sūryamaṇḍale 3.010.069c bhrātaraṃ tam agastyasya āmantrayata rāghavaḥ 3.010.070a abhivādaye tvā bhagavan sukham adhyuṣito niśām
GE09ram_1-7u:7264: 3.010.070c āmantraye tvāṃ gacchāmi guruṃ te draṣṭum agrajam
GE09ram_1-7u:7265: 3.010.071a gamyatām iti tenokto jagāma raghunandanaḥ 3.010.071c yathoddiṣṭena mārgeṇa vanaṃ tac cāvalokayan 3.010.072a nīvārān panasāṃs tālāṃs timiśān vañjulān dhavān
GE09ram_1-7u:7266: 3.010.072c ciribilvān madhūkāṃś ca bilvān api ca tindukān
GE09ram_1-7u:7268: 3.010.073c dadarśa rāmaḥ śataśas tatra kāntārapādapān 3.010.074a hastihastair vimṛditān vānarair upaśobhitān
GE09ram_1-7u:7269: 3.010.074c mattaiḥ śakunisaṃghaiś ca śataśaḥ pratināditān 3.010.075a tato 'bravīt samīpasthaṃ rāmo rājīvalocanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7271: 3.010.076a snigdhapatrā yathā vṛkṣā yathā kṣāntā mṛgadvijāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7273: 3.010.077a agastya iti vikhyāto loke svenaiva karmaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:7274: 3.010.077c āśramo dṛśyate tasya pariśrānta śramāpahaḥ 3.010.078a prājyadhūmākulavanaś cīramālāpariṣkṛtaḥ 3.010.078c praśāntamṛgayūthaś ca nānāśakunināditaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7275: 3.010.079a nigṛhya tarasā mṛtyuṃ lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā 3.010.079c dakṣiṇā dik kṛtā yena śaraṇyā
GE09ram_1-7u:7276: 3.010.080a tasyedam āśramapadaṃ prabhāvād yasya rākṣasaiḥ 3.010.080c dig iyaṃ dakṣiṇā trāsād dṛśyate nopabhujyate
GE09ram_1-7u:7277: 3.010.081a yadā prabhṛti cākrāntā dig iyaṃ puṇyakarmaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:7278: 3.010.081c tadā prabhṛti nirvairāḥ praśāntā rajanīcarāḥ 3.010.082a nāmnā ceyaṃ bhagavato dakṣiṇā dik pradakṣiṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:7279: 3.010.082c prathitā triṣu lokeṣu durdharṣā krūrakarmabhiḥ 3.010.083a mārgaṃ niroddhuṃ satataṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:7280: 3.010.083c saṃdeśaṃ pālayaṃs tasya vindhyaśaulo na vardhate
GE09ram_1-7u:7281: 3.010.084a ayaṃ dīrghāyuṣas tasya loke viśrutakarmaṇaḥ 3.010.084c agastyasyāśramaḥ śrīmān
GE09ram_1-7u:7282: 3.010.085a eṣa lokārcitaḥ sādhur hite nityaṃ rataḥ satām
GE09ram_1-7u:7283: 3.010.085c asmān adhigatān eṣa śreyasā yojayiṣyati 3.010.086a ārādhayiṣyāmy atrāham agastyaṃ taṃ mahāmunim 3.010.086c śeṣaṃ ca vanavāsasya saumya vatsyāmy ahaṃ prabho
GE09ram_1-7u:7284: 3.010.087a atra devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7286: 3.010.088a nātra jīven mṛṣāvādī krūro vā yadi vā śaṭhaḥ 3.010.088c nṛśaṃsaḥ kāma vṛtto vā munir eṣa tathāvidhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7287: 3.010.089a atra devāś ca yakṣāś ca nāgāś ca patagaiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:7289: 3.010.090a atra siddhā mahātmāno vimānaiḥ sūryasaṃnibhaiḥ 3.010.090c tyaktvā dehān navair dehaiḥ svaryātāḥ paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7290: 3.010.091a yakṣatvam amaratvaṃ ca rājyāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:7291: 3.010.091c atra devāḥ prayacchanti bhūtair ārādhitāḥ śubhaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7293: 3.010.092c nivedayeha māṃ prāptam ṛṣaye saha sītayā
GE09ram_1-7u:7295: 3.011.001c agastyaśiṣyam āsādya vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:7296: 3.011.002a rājā daśaratho nāma jyeṣṭhas tasya suto balī
GE09ram_1-7u:7297: 3.011.002c rāmaḥ prāpto muniṃ draṣṭuṃ bhāryayā saha sītayā
GE09ram_1-7u:7298: 3.011.003a lakṣmaṇo nāma tasyāhaṃ bhrātā tv avarajo hitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7299: 3.011.003c anukūlaś ca bhaktaś ca yadi te śrotram āgataḥ 3.011.004a te vayaṃ vanam atyugraṃ praviṣṭāḥ pitṛśāsanāt
GE09ram_1-7u:7300: 3.011.004c draṣṭum icchāmahe sarve bhagavantaṃ nivedyatām 3.011.005a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā lakṣmaṇasya tapodhanaḥ 3.011.005c tathety uktvāgniśaraṇaṃ praviveśa niveditum
GE09ram_1-7u:7301: 3.011.006a sa praviśya muni śreṣṭhaṃ tapasā duṣpradharṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:7303: 3.011.007a putrau daśarathasyemau rāmo lakṣmaṇa eva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:7304: 3.011.007c praviṣṭāv āśramapadaṃ sītayā saha bhāryayā 3.011.008a draṣṭuṃ bhavantam āyātau śuśrūṣārtham ariṃdamau 3.011.008c yad atrānantaraṃ tattvam ājñāpayitum arhasi 3.011.009a tataḥ śiṣyād upaśrutya prāptaṃ rāmaṃ salakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:7305: 3.011.009c vaidehīṃ ca mahābhāgām idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:7306: 3.011.010a diṣṭyā rāmaś cirasyādya draṣṭuṃ māṃ samupāgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7307: 3.011.010c manasā kāṅkṣitaṃ hy asya mayāpy āgamanaṃ prati
GE09ram_1-7u:7308: 3.011.011a gamyatāṃ satkṛto rāmaḥ sabhāryaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ 3.011.011c praveśyatāṃ samīpaṃ me kiṃ cāsau na praveśitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7309: 3.011.012a evam uktas tu muninā dharmajñena mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:7311: 3.011.013a tato niṣkramya saṃbhrāntaḥ śiṣyo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:7312: 3.011.013c kvāsau rāmo muniṃ draṣṭum etu praviśatu svayam
GE09ram_1-7u:7314: 3.011.014c darśayām āsa kākutsthaṃ sītāṃ ca janakātmajām
GE09ram_1-7u:7315: 3.011.015a taṃ śiṣyaḥ praśritaṃ vākyam agastyavacanaṃ bruvan
GE09ram_1-7u:7317: 3.011.016a praviveśa tato rāmaḥ sītayā sahalakṣmaṇaḥ 3.011.016c praśāntahariṇākīrṇam āśramaṃ hy avalokayan
GE09ram_1-7u:7318: 3.011.017a sa tatra brahmaṇaḥ sthānam agneḥ sthānaṃ tathaiva ca 3.011.017c viṣṇoḥ sthānaṃ mahendrasya sthānaṃ caiva vivasvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7319: 3.011.018a somasthānaṃ bhagasthānaṃ sthānaṃ kauberam eva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:7320: 3.011.018c dhātur vidhātuḥ sthānaṃ ca vāyoḥ sthānaṃ tathaiva ca 3.011.019a tataḥ śiṣyaiḥ parivṛto munir apy abhiniṣpatat
GE09ram_1-7u:7321: 3.011.019c taṃ dadarśāgrato rāmo munīnāṃ dīptatejasaṃ 3.011.019e abravīd vacanaṃ vīro lakṣmaṇaṃ lakṣmivardhanam 3.011.020a eṣa lakṣmaṇa niṣkrāmaty agastyo bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7323: 3.011.021a evam uktvā mahābāhur agastyaṃ sūryavarcasaṃ 3.011.021c jagrāha paramaprītas tasya pādau paraṃtapaḥ 3.011.022a abhivādya tu dharmātmā tasthau rāmaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7324: 3.011.022c sītayā saha vaidehyā tadā rāma salakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7326: 3.011.023c kuśalapraśnam uktvā ca āsyatām iti so 'bravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:7327: 3.011.024a agniṃ hutvā pradāyārghyam atithiṃ pratipūjya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:7328: 3.011.024c vānaprasthena dharmeṇa sa teṣāṃ bhojanaṃ dadau
GE09ram_1-7u:7330: 3.011.025c uvāca rāmam āsīnaṃ prāñjaliṃ dharmakovidam 3.011.026a anyathā khalu kākutstha tapasvī samudācaran 3.011.026c duḥsākṣīva pare loke svāni māṃsāni bhakṣayet
GE09ram_1-7u:7331: 3.011.027a rājā sarvasya lokasya dharmacārī mahārathaḥ 3.011.027c pūjanīyaś ca mānyaś ca bhavān prāptaḥ priyātithiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7332: 3.011.028a evam uktvā phalair mūlaiḥ puṣpaiś cānyaiś ca rāghavam 3.011.028c pūjayitvā yathākāmaṃ punar eva tato 'bravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:7333: 3.011.029a idaṃ divyaṃ mahac cāpaṃ hemavajravibhūṣitam 3.011.029c vaiṣṇavaṃ puruṣavyāghra nirmitaṃ viśvakarmaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:7335: 3.011.030c datto mama mahendreṇa tūṇī cākṣayasāyakau 3.011.031a saṃpūrṇau niśitair bāṇair jvaladbhir iva pāvakaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7336: 3.011.031c mahārājata kośo 'yam asir hemavibhūṣitaḥ 3.011.032a anena dhanuṣā rāma hatvā saṃkhye mahāsurān
GE09ram_1-7u:7337: 3.011.032c ājahāra śriyaṃ dīptāṃ purā viṣṇur divaukasām
GE09ram_1-7u:7338: 3.011.033a tad dhanus tau ca tūṇīrau śaraṃ khaḍgaṃ ca mānada
GE09ram_1-7u:7339: 3.011.033c jayāya pratigṛhṇīṣva vajraṃ vajradharo yathā 3.011.034a evam uktvā mahātejāḥ samastaṃ tad varāyudham
GE09ram_1-7u:7340: 3.011.034c dattvā rāmāya bhagavān agastyaḥ punar abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:7341: 3.012.001a rāma prīto 'smi bhadraṃ te parituṣṭo 'smi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:7342: 3.012.001c abhivādayituṃ yan māṃ prāptau sthaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_1-7u:7343: 3.012.002a adhvaśrameṇa vāṃ khedo bādhate pracuraśramaḥ 3.012.002c vyaktam utkaṇṭhate cāpi maithilī janakātmajā 3.012.003a eṣā hi sukumārī ca duḥkhaiś ca na vimānitā 3.012.003c prājyadoṣaṃ vanaṃ praptā bhartṛsnehapracoditā
GE09ram_1-7u:7344: 3.012.004a yathaiṣā ramate rāma iha sītā tathā kuru
GE09ram_1-7u:7345: 3.012.004c duṣkaraṃ kṛtavaty eṣā vane tvām anugacchatī
GE09ram_1-7u:7346: 3.012.005a eṣā hi prakṛtiḥ strīṇām āsṛṣṭe raghunandana
GE09ram_1-7u:7347: 3.012.005c samastham anurajyante viṣamasthaṃ tyajanti ca 3.012.006a śatahradānāṃ lolatvaṃ śastrāṇāṃ tīkṣṇatāṃ tathā 3.012.006c garuḍānilayoḥ śaighryam anugacchanti yoṣitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7348: 3.012.007a iyaṃ tu bhavato bhāryā doṣair etair vivarjitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7349: 3.012.007c ślāghyā ca vyapadeśyā ca yathā devī hy arundhatī 3.012.008a alaṃkṛto 'yaṃ deśaś ca yatra saumitriṇā saha 3.012.008c vaidehyā cānayā rāma vatsyasi tvam ariṃdama
GE09ram_1-7u:7350: 3.012.009a evam uktas tu muninā rāghavaḥ saṃyatāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7351: 3.012.009c uvāca praśritaṃ vākyam ṛṣiṃ dīptam ivānalam
GE09ram_1-7u:7354: 3.012.011a kiṃ tu vyādiśa me deśaṃ sodakaṃ bahukānanam
GE09ram_1-7u:7355: 3.012.011c yatrāśramapadaṃ kṛtvā vaseyaṃ nirataḥ sukham 3.012.012a tato 'bravīn muni śreṣṭhaḥ śrutvā rāmasya bhāṣitam 3.012.012c dhyātvā muhūrtaṃ dharmātmā dhīro dhīrataraṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7357: 3.012.013c deśo bahumṛgaḥ śrīmān pañcavaṭy abhiviśrutaḥ 3.012.014a tatra gatvāśramapadaṃ kṛtvā saumitriṇā saha 3.012.014c ramasva tvaṃ pitur vākyaṃ yathoktam anupālayan
GE09ram_1-7u:7358: 3.012.015a vidito hy eṣa vṛttānto mama sarvas tavānagha
GE09ram_1-7u:7359: 3.012.015c tapasaś ca prabhāvena snehād daśarathasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:7360: 3.012.016a hṛdayasthaś ca te chando vijñātas tapasā mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:7361: 3.012.016c iha vāsaṃ pratijñāya mayā saha tapovane
GE09ram_1-7u:7362: 3.012.017a ataś ca tvām ahaṃ brūmi gaccha pañcavaṭīm iti 3.012.017c sa hi ramyo vanoddeśo maithilī tatra raṃsyate
GE09ram_1-7u:7363: 3.012.018a sa deśaḥ ślāghanīyaś ca nātidūre ca rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:7364: 3.012.018c godāvaryāḥ samīpe ca maithilī tatra raṃsyate
GE09ram_1-7u:7365: 3.012.019a prājyamūlaphalaiś caiva nānādvija gaṇair yutaḥ 3.012.019c viviktaś ca mahābāho puṇyo ramyas tathaiva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:7366: 3.012.020a bhavān api sadāraś ca śaktaś ca parirakṣaṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:7367: 3.012.020c api cātra vasan rāmas tāpasān pālayiṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:7368: 3.012.021a etad ālakṣyate vīra madhukānāṃ mahad vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:7372: 3.012.023a agastyenaivam uktas tu rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_1-7u:7373: 3.012.023c sātkṛtyāmantrayām āsa tam ṛṣiṃ satyavādinam 3.012.024a tau tu tenābhyanujñātau
GE09ram_1-7u:7374: 3.012.024c tadāśramāt pañcavaṭīṃ jagmatuḥ saha sītayā 3.012.025a gṛhītacāpau tu narādhipātmajau; viṣaktatūṇī samareṣv akātarau
GE09ram_1-7u:7375: 3.012.025c yathopadiṣṭena pathā maharṣiṇā; prajagmatuḥ pañcavaṭīṃ samāhitau
GE09ram_1-7u:7376: 3.013.001a atha pañcavaṭīṃ gacchann antarā raghunandanaḥ 3.013.001c āsasāda mahākāyaṃ gṛdhraṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:7377: 3.013.002a taṃ dṛṣṭvā tau mahābhāgau vanasthaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:7378: 3.013.002c menāte rākṣasaṃ pakṣiṃ bruvāṇau ko bhavān iti
GE09ram_1-7u:7379: 3.013.003a sa tau madhurayā vācā saumyayā prīṇayann iva
GE09ram_1-7u:7380: 3.013.003c uvāca vatsa māṃ viddhi vayasyaṃ pitur ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7381: 3.013.004a sa taṃ pitṛsakhaṃ buddhvā pūjayām āsa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7382: 3.013.004c sa tasya kulam avyagram atha papraccha nāma ca 3.013.005a rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā kulam ātmānam eva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:7385: 3.013.006c tān me nigadataḥ sarvān āditaḥ śṛṇu rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:7386: 3.013.007a kardamaḥ prathamas teṣāṃ vikṛtas tadanantaram 3.013.007c śeṣaś ca saṃśrayaś caiva bahuputraś ca vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:7387: 3.013.008a sthāṇur marīcir atriś ca kratuś caiva mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7388: 3.013.008c pulastyaś cāṅgirāś caiva pracetāḥ pulahas tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:7389: 3.013.009a dakṣo vivasvān aparo 'riṣṭanemiś ca rāghava 3.013.009c kaśyapaś ca mahātejās teṣām āsīc ca paścimaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7390: 3.013.010a prajāpates tu dakṣasya babhūvur iti naḥ śrutam
GE09ram_1-7u:7391: 3.013.010c ṣaṣṭir duhitaro rāma yaśasvinyo mahāyaśaḥ 3.013.011a kaśyapaḥ pratijagrāha tāsām aṣṭau sumadhyamāḥ 3.013.011c aditiṃ ca ditiṃ caiva danūm api ca kālakām 3.013.012a tāmrāṃ krodhavaśāṃ caiva manuṃ cāpy analām api
GE09ram_1-7u:7392: 3.013.012c tās tu kanyās tataḥ prītaḥ kaśyapaḥ punar abravīt 3.013.013a putrāṃs trailokyabhartṝn vai janayiṣyatha mat samān
GE09ram_1-7u:7393: 3.013.013c aditis tan manā rāma ditiś ca danur eva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:7394: 3.013.014a kālakā ca mahābāho śeṣās tv amanaso 'bhavan
GE09ram_1-7u:7395: 3.013.014c adityāṃ jajñire devās trayastriṃśad ariṃdama 3.013.015a ādityā vasavo rudrā aśvinau ca paraṃtapa
GE09ram_1-7u:7396: 3.013.015c ditis tv ajanayat putrān daityāṃs tāta yaśasvinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7397: 3.013.016a teṣām iyaṃ vasumatī purāsīt savanārṇavā 3.013.016c danus tv ajanayat putram aśvagrīvam ariṃdama
GE09ram_1-7u:7398: 3.013.017a narakaṃ kālakaṃ caiva kālakāpi vyajāyata 3.013.017c krauñcīṃ bhāsīṃ tathā śyenīṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrīṃ tathā śukīm
GE09ram_1-7u:7399: 3.013.018a tāmrāpi suṣuve kanyāḥ pañcaitā lokaviśrutāḥ 3.013.018c ulūkāñ janayat krauñcī bhāsī bhāsān vyajāyata
GE09ram_1-7u:7400: 3.013.019a śyenī śyenāṃś ca gṛdhrāṃś ca vyajāyata sutejasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7401: 3.013.019c dhṛtarāṣṭrī tu haṃsāṃś ca kalahaṃsāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7402: 3.013.020a cakravākāṃś ca bhadraṃ te vijajñe sāpi bhāminī
GE09ram_1-7u:7403: 3.013.020c śukī natāṃ vijajñe tu natāyā vinatā sutā
GE09ram_1-7u:7405: 3.013.021c mṛgīṃ ca mṛgamandāṃ ca harīṃ bhadramadām api
GE09ram_1-7u:7406: 3.013.022a mātaṅgīm atha śārdūlīṃ śvetāṃ ca surabhīṃ tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:7408: 3.013.023a apatyaṃ tu mṛgāḥ sarve mṛgyā naravarottama
GE09ram_1-7u:7409: 3.013.023c ṛṣkāś ca mṛgamandāyāḥ sṛmarāś camarās tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:7410: 3.013.024a tatas tv irāvatīṃ nāma jajñe bhadramadā sutām
GE09ram_1-7u:7411: 3.013.024c tasyās tv airāvataḥ putro lokanātho mahāgajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7412: 3.013.025a haryāś ca harayo 'patyaṃ vānarāś ca tapasvinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7413: 3.013.025c golāṅgūlāṃś ca śārdūlī vyāghrāṃś cājanayat sutān
GE09ram_1-7u:7414: 3.013.026a mātaṅgyās tv atha mātaṅgā apatyaṃ manujarṣabha
GE09ram_1-7u:7415: 3.013.026c diśāgajaṃ tu śvetākṣaṃ śvetā vyajanayat sutam
GE09ram_1-7u:7416: 3.013.027a tato duhitarau rāma surabhir devy ajāyata
GE09ram_1-7u:7417: 3.013.027c rohiṇīṃ nāma bhadraṃ te gandharvīṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:7418: 3.013.028a rohiṇy ajanayad gā vai gandharvī vājinaḥ sutān
GE09ram_1-7u:7419: 3.013.028c surasājanayan nāgān rāma kadrūś ca pannagān
GE09ram_1-7u:7420: 3.013.029a manur manuṣyāñ janayat kaśyapasya mahātmanaḥ 3.013.029c brāhmaṇān kṣatriyān vaiśyāñ śūdrāṃś ca manujarṣabha
GE09ram_1-7u:7421: 3.013.030a mukhato brāhmaṇā jātā urasaḥ kṣatriyās tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:7422: 3.013.030c ūrubhyāṃ jajñire vaiśyāḥ padbhyāṃ śūdrā iti śrutiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7423: 3.013.031a sarvān puṇyaphalān vṛkṣān analāpi vyajāyata 3.013.031c vinatā ca śukī pautrī kadrūś ca surasā svasā 3.013.032a kadrūr nāgasahaskraṃ tu vijajñe dharaṇīdharam 3.013.032c dvau putrau vinatāyās tu garuḍo 'ruṇa eva ca 3.013.033a tasmāj jāto 'ham aruṇāt saṃpātiś ca mamāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7424: 3.013.033c jaṭāyur iti māṃ viddhi śyenīputram ariṃdama
GE09ram_1-7u:7426: 3.013.034c sītāṃ ca tāta rakṣiṣye tvayi yāte salakṣmaṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:7427: 3.013.035a jaṭāyuṣaṃ tu pratipūjya rāghavo; mudā pariṣvajya ca saṃnato
GE09ram_1-7u:7429: 3.013.035c pitur hi śuśrāva sakhitvam ātmavāñ; jaṭāyuṣā saṃkathitaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7431: 3.013.036a sa tatra sītāṃ paridāya maithilīṃ; sahaiva tenātibalena pakṣiṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:7432: 3.013.036c jagāma tāṃ pañcavaṭīṃ salakṣmaṇo; ripūn didhakṣañ śalabhān
GE09ram_1-7u:7435: 3.014.001c uvāca bhrātaraṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ dīptatejasaṃ 3.014.002a āgatāḥ sma yathoddiṣṭam amuṃ deśaṃ maharṣiṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:7436: 3.014.002c ayaṃ pañcavaṭī deśaḥ saumya puṣpitakānanaḥ 3.014.003a sarvataś cāryatāṃ dṛṣṭiḥ kānane nipuṇo hy asi
GE09ram_1-7u:7437: 3.014.003c āśramaḥ katarasmin no deśe bhavati saṃmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7438: 3.014.004a ramate yatra vaidehī tvam ahaṃ caiva lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:7441: 3.014.005c saṃnikṛṣṭaṃ ca yatra syāt samitpuṣpakuśodakam 3.014.006a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakmaṇaḥ saṃyatāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7442: 3.014.006c sītā samakṣaṃ kākutstham idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:7443: 3.014.007a paravān asmi kākutstha tvayi varṣaśataṃ sthite
GE09ram_1-7u:7444: 3.014.007c svayaṃ tu rucire deśe kriyatām iti māṃ vada 3.014.008a suprītas tena vākyena lakṣmaṇasya mahādyutiḥ 3.014.008c vimṛśan rocayām āsa deśaṃ sarvaguṇānvitam 3.014.009a sa taṃ ruciram ākramya deśam āśramakarmaṇi
GE09ram_1-7u:7445: 3.014.009c haste gṛhītvā hastena rāmaḥ saumitrim abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:7446: 3.014.010a ayaṃ deśaḥ samaḥ śrīmān puṣpitair tarubhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7447: 3.014.010c ihāśramapadaṃ saumya yathāvat kartum arhasi 3.014.011a iyam ādityasaṃkāśaiḥ padmaiḥ surabhigandhibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7448: 3.014.011c adūre dṛśyate ramyā padminī padmaśobhitā 3.014.012a yathākhyātam agastyena muninā
GE09ram_1-7u:7449: 3.014.012c iyaṃ godāvarī ramyā puṣpitais tarubhir vṛtā
GE09ram_1-7u:7450: 3.014.013a haṃsakāraṇḍavākīrṇā cakravākopaśobhitā 3.014.013c nātidūre na cāsanne mṛgayūthanipīḍitā
GE09ram_1-7u:7452: 3.014.014c dṛśyante girayaḥ saumya phullais tarubhir āvṛtāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7453: 3.014.015a sauvarṇe rājatais tāmrair deśe deśe ca dhātubhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7455: 3.014.016a sālais tālais tamālaiś ca kharjūraiḥ panasāmrakaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7456: 3.014.016c nīvārais timiśaiś caiva puṃnāgaiś copaśobhitāḥ 3.014.017a cūtair aśokais tilakaiś campakaiḥ ketakair api
GE09ram_1-7u:7457: 3.014.017c puṣpagulmalatopetais tais tais tarubhir āvṛtāḥ 3.014.018a candanaiḥ syandanair nīpaiḥ panasair lakucair api
GE09ram_1-7u:7458: 3.014.018c dhavāśvakarṇakhadiraiḥ śamīkiṃśukapāṭalaiḥ 3.014.019a idaṃ puṇyam idaṃ medhyam idaṃ bahumṛgadvijam
GE09ram_1-7u:7459: 3.014.019c iha vatsyāma saumitre sārdham etena pakṣiṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:7460: 3.014.020a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā
GE09ram_1-7u:7463: 3.014.021c sustambhāṃ maskarair dīrghaiḥ kṛtavaṃśāṃ suśobhanām 3.014.022a sa gatvā lakṣmaṇaḥ śrīmān nadīṃ godāvarīṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:7464: 3.014.022c snātvā padmāni cādāya saphalaḥ punar āgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7465: 3.014.023a tataḥ puṣpabaliṃ kṛtvā śāntiṃ ca sa yathāvidhi
GE09ram_1-7u:7466: 3.014.023c darśayām āsa rāmāya tad āśramapadaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:7467: 3.014.024a sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛtaṃ saumyam āśramaṃ saha sītayā 3.014.024c rāghavaḥ parṇaśālāyāṃ harṣam āhārayat param 3.014.025a susaṃhṛṣṭaḥ pariṣvajya bāhubhyāṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ tadā 3.014.025c atisnigdhaṃ ca gāḍhaṃ ca vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:7468: 3.014.026a prīto 'smi te mahat karma tvayā kṛtam idaṃ prabho
GE09ram_1-7u:7469: 3.014.026c pradeyo yannimittaṃ te pariṣvaṅgo mayā kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7470: 3.014.027a bhāvajñena kṛtajñena dharmajñena ca lakṣmaṇa 3.014.027c tvayā putreṇa dharmātmā na saṃvṛttaḥ pitā mama
GE09ram_1-7u:7471: 3.014.028a evaṃ lakṣmaṇam uktvā tu rāghavo lakṣmivardhanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7472: 3.014.028c tasmin deśe bahuphale nyavasat sa sukhaṃ vaśī
GE09ram_1-7u:7473: 3.014.029a kaṃ cit kālaṃ sa dharmātmā sītayā lakṣmaṇena ca 3.014.029c anvāsyamāno nyavasat svargaloke yathāmaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7474: 3.015.001a vasatas tasya tu mukhaṃ rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7475: 3.015.001c śaradvyapāye hemanta ṛtur iṣṭaḥ pravartate 3.015.002a sa kadā cit prabhātāyāṃ śarvaryāṃ raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7476: 3.015.002c prayayāv abhiṣekārthaṃ ramyaṃ godāvarīṃ nadīm 3.015.003a prahvaḥ kalaśahastas taṃ sītayā saha vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:7478: 3.015.004a ayaṃ sa kālaḥ saṃprāptaḥ priyo yas te priyaṃvada 3.015.004c alaṃkṛta ivābhāti yena saṃvatsaraḥ śubhaḥ 3.015.005a nīhāraparuṣo lokaḥ pṛṣhivī sasyamālinī
GE09ram_1-7u:7484: 3.015.008a sevamāne dṛḍhaṃ sūrye diśam antakasevitām 3.015.008c vihīnatilakeva strī nottarā dik prakāśate 3.015.009a prakṛtyā himakośāḍhyo dūrasūryaś ca sāmpratam 3.015.009c yathārthanāmā suvyaktaṃ himavān himavān giriḥ 3.015.010a atyantasukhasaṃcārā madhyāhne sparśataḥ sukhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7487: 3.015.011c śūnyāraṇyā himadhvastā divasā bhānti sāmpratam 3.015.012a nivṛttākāśaśayanāḥ puṣyanītā himāruṇāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7488: 3.015.012c śītā vṛddhatarāyāmās triyāmā yānti sāmpratam 3.015.013a ravisaṃkrāntasaubhābyas tuṣārāruṇamaṇḍalaḥ 3.015.013c niḥśvāsāndha ivādarśaś candramā na prakāśate 3.015.014a jyotsnā tuṣāramalinā paurṇamāsyāṃ na rājate 3.015.014c sīteva cātapa śyāmā lakṣyate na tu śobhate
GE09ram_1-7u:7489: 3.015.015a prakṛtyā śītalasparśo himaviddhaś ca sāmpratam 3.015.015c pravāti paścimo vāyuḥ kāle dviguṇaśītalaḥ 3.015.016a bāṣpacchannān araṇyāni yavagodhūmavanti ca
GE09ram_1-7u:7492: 3.015.017c śobhante kiṃ cidālambāḥ śālayaḥ kanakaprabhāḥ 3.015.018a mayūkhair upasarpadbhir
GE09ram_1-7u:7493: 3.015.018c dūram abhyuditaḥ sūryaḥ śaśāṅka iva lakṣyate
GE09ram_1-7u:7494: 3.015.019a agrāhyavīryaḥ pūrvāhṇe madhyāhne sparśataḥ sukhaḥ 3.015.019c saṃraktaḥ kiṃ cid āpāṇḍur ātapaḥ śobhate kṣitau
GE09ram_1-7u:7497: 3.015.021a avaśyāyatamonaddhā nīhāratamasāvṛtāḥ 3.015.021c prasuptā iva lakṣyante vipuṣpā vanarājayaḥ 3.015.022a bāṣpasaṃchannasalilā rutavijñeyasārasāḥ 3.015.022c himārdravālukais tīraiḥ sarito bhānti sāmpratam 3.015.023a tuṣārapatanāc caiva mṛdutvād bhāskarasya ca 3.015.023c śaityād agāgrastham api prāyeṇa rasavaj jalam
GE09ram_1-7u:7499: 3.015.024c nālaśeṣā himadhvastā na bhānti kamalākarāḥ 3.015.025a asmiṃs tu puruṣavyāghra kāle duḥkhasamanvitaḥ 3.015.025c tapaś carati dharmātmā tvadbhaktyā bharataḥ pure
GE09ram_1-7u:7500: 3.015.026a tyaktvā rājyaṃ ca mānaṃ ca bhogāṃś ca vividhān bahūn
GE09ram_1-7u:7501: 3.015.026c tapasvī niyatāhāraḥ śete śīte mahītale 3.015.027a so 'pi velām imāṃ nūnam abhiṣekārtham udyataḥ 3.015.027c vṛtaḥ prakṛtibhir nityaṃ prayāti sarayūṃ nadīm
GE09ram_1-7u:7503: 3.015.028c kathaṃ tv apararātreṣu sarayūm avagāhate 3.015.029a padmapatrekṣaṇaḥ śyāmaḥ śrīmān nirudaro mahān 3.015.029c dharmajñaḥ satyavādī ca hrī niṣedho jitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7505: 3.015.030c saṃtyajya vividhān saukhyān āryaṃ sarvātmanāśritaḥ 3.015.031a jitaḥ svargas tava bhrātrā bharatena mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:7506: 3.015.031c vanastham api tāpasye yas tvām anuvidhīyate
GE09ram_1-7u:7507: 3.015.032a na pitryam anuvarntante mātṛkaṃ dvipadā iti
GE09ram_1-7u:7509: 3.015.033a bhartā daśaratho yasyāḥ sādhuś ca bharataḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7510: 3.015.033c kathaṃ nu sāmbā kaikeyī tādṛśī krūradarśinī
GE09ram_1-7u:7511: 3.015.034a ity evaṃ lakṣmaṇe vākyaṃ snehād bruvati dharmike
GE09ram_1-7u:7513: 3.015.035a na te 'mbā madhyamā tāta garhitavyā kathaṃ cana 3.015.035c tām evekṣvākunāthasya bharatasya kathāṃ kuru 3.015.036a niścitāpi hi me buddhir vanavāse dṛḍhavratā
GE09ram_1-7u:7515: 3.015.037a ity evaṃ vilapaṃs tatra prāpya godāvarīṃ nadīm
GE09ram_1-7u:7517: 3.015.038a tarpayitvātha salilais te pitṝn daivatāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:7518: 3.015.038c stuvanti smoditaṃ sūryaṃ devatāś ca samāhitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7519: 3.015.039a kṛtābhiṣekaḥ sa rarāja rāmaḥ; sītādvitīyaḥ saha lakṣmaṇena
GE09ram_1-7u:7520: 3.015.039c kṛtābhiṣekas tv agarājaputryā; rudraḥ sanandir bhagavān iveśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7521: 3.016.001a kṛtābhiṣeko rāmas tu sītā saumitrir eva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:7522: 3.016.001c tasmād godāvarītīrāt tato jagmuḥ svam āśramam
GE09ram_1-7u:7523: 3.016.002a āśramaṃ tam upāgamya rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ 3.016.002c kṛtvā paurvāhṇikaṃ karma parṇaśālām upāgamat 3.016.003a sa rāmaḥ parṇaśālāyām āsīnaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_1-7u:7524: 3.016.003c virarāja mahābāhuś citrayā candramā iva 3.016.003e lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā cakāra vividhāḥ kathāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7526: 3.016.004c taṃ deśaṃ rākṣasī kā cid ājagāma yadṛcchayā
GE09ram_1-7u:7527: 3.016.005a sā tu śūrpaṇakhā nāma daśagrīvasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7528: 3.016.005c bhaginī rāmam āsādya dadarśa tridaśopamam 3.016.006a siṃhoraskaṃ mahābāhuṃ padmapatranibhekṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:7532: 3.016.008a sumukhaṃ durmukhī rāmaṃ vṛttamadhyaṃ mahodarī 3.016.008c viśālākṣaṃ virūpākṣī sukeśaṃ tāmramūrdhajā
GE09ram_1-7u:7533: 3.016.009a priyarūpaṃ virūpā sā susvaraṃ bhairavasnavā 3.016.009c taruṇaṃ dāruṇā vṛddhā dakṣiṇaṃ vāmabhāṣiṇī 3.016.010a nyāyavṛttaṃ sudurvṛttā priyam apriyadarśanā
GE09ram_1-7u:7536: 3.016.011c āgatas tvam imaṃ deśaṃ kathaṃ rākṣasasevitam
GE09ram_1-7u:7537: 3.016.012a evam uktas tu rākṣasyā śūrpaṇakhyā paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7539: 3.016.013a āsīd daśaratho nāma rājā tridaśavikramaḥ 3.016.013c tasyāham agrajaḥ putro rāmo nāma janaiḥ śrutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7540: 3.016.014a bhrātāyaṃ lakṣmaṇo nāma yavīyān mām anuvrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7541: 3.016.014c iyaṃ bhāryā ca vaidehī mama sīteti viśrutā
GE09ram_1-7u:7542: 3.016.015a niyogāt tu narendrasya pitur mātuś ca yantritaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7543: 3.016.015c dharmārthaṃ dharmakāṅkṣī ca vanaṃ vastum ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7544: 3.016.016a tvāṃ tu veditum icchāmi kathyatāṃ kāsi kasya vā 3.016.016c iha vā kiṃnimittaṃ tvam āgatā brūhi tattvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7545: 3.016.017a sābravīd vacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasī madanārditā 3.016.017c śrūyatāṃ rāma vakṣyāmi tattvārthaṃ vacanaṃ mama
GE09ram_1-7u:7546: 3.016.018a ahaṃ śūrpaṇakhā nāma rākṣasī kāmarūpiṇī 3.016.018c araṇyaṃ vicarāmīdam ekā sarvabhayaṃkarā
GE09ram_1-7u:7547: 3.016.019a rāvaṇo nāma me bhrātā rākṣaso rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7548: 3.016.019c pravṛddhanidraś ca sadā kumbhakarṇo mahābalaḥ 3.016.020a vibhīṣaṇas tu dharmātmā na tu rākṣasaceṣṭitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7549: 3.016.020c prakhyātavīryau ca raṇe bhrātarau kharadūṣaṇau 3.016.021a tān ahaṃ samatikrāntā rāma tvāpūrvadarśanāt 3.016.021c samupetāsmi bhāvena bhartāraṃ puruṣottamam
GE09ram_1-7u:7550: 3.016.021e cirāya bhava bhartā me sītayā kiṃ kariṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:7551: 3.016.022a vikṛtā ca virūpā ca na seyaṃ sadṛśī tava 3.016.022c aham evānurūpā te bhāryā rūpeṇa paśya mām
GE09ram_1-7u:7552: 3.016.023a imāṃ virūpām asatīṃ karālāṃ nirṇatodarīm 3.016.023c anena saha te bhrātrā bhakṣayiṣyāmi
GE09ram_1-7u:7553: 3.016.024a tataḥ parvataśṛṅgāṇi vanāni vividhāni ca 3.016.024c paśyan saha mayā kānta daṇḍakān
GE09ram_1-7u:7554: 3.016.025a ity evam uktaḥ kākutsthaḥ prahasya madirekṣaṇām
GE09ram_1-7u:7555: 3.016.025c idaṃ vacanam ārebhe vaktuṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ 3.017.001a tāṃ tu śūrpaṇakhāṃ rāmaḥ kāmapāśāvapāśitām 3.017.001c svecchayā ślakṣṇayā vācā smitapūrvam athābravīt 3.017.002a kṛtadāro 'smi bhavati bhāryeyaṃ dayitā mama
GE09ram_1-7u:7556: 3.017.002c tvadvidhānāṃ tu nārīṇāṃ suduḥkhā sasapatnatā 3.017.003a anujas tv eṣa me bhrātā śīlavān priyadarśanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7557: 3.017.003c śrīmān akṛtadāraś ca lakṣmaṇo nāma vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:7558: 3.017.004a apūrvī bhāryayā cārthī taruṇaḥ priyadarśanaḥ 3.017.004c anurūpaś ca te bhartā rūpasyāsya bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:7559: 3.017.005a enaṃ bhaja viśālākṣi bhartāraṃ bhrātaraṃ mama
GE09ram_1-7u:7560: 3.017.005c asapatnā varārohe merum arkaprabhā yathā 3.017.006a iti rāmeṇa sā proktā rākṣasī
GE09ram_1-7u:7561: 3.017.006c visṛjya rāmaṃ sahasā tato lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:7562: 3.017.007a asya rūpasya te yuktā bhāryāhaṃ varavarṇinī
GE09ram_1-7u:7563: 3.017.007c mayā saha sukhaṃ sarvān daṇḍakān vicariṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:7564: 3.017.008a evam uktas tu saumitrī rākṣasyā vākyakovidaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7565: 3.017.008c tataḥ śūrpaṇakhīṃ smitvā lakṣmaṇo yuktam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:7566: 3.017.009a kathaṃ dāsasya me dāsī bhāryā bhavitum icchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:7569: 3.017.010c āryasya tvaṃ viśālākṣi bhāryā bhava yavīyasī
GE09ram_1-7u:7570: 3.017.011a etāṃ virūpām asatīṃ karālāṃ nirṇatodarīm 3.017.011c bhāryāṃ vṛddhāṃ parityajya tvām evaiṣa bhajiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:7571: 3.017.012a ko hi rūpam idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ saṃtyajya varavarṇini
GE09ram_1-7u:7572: 3.017.012c mānuṣeṣu varārohe kuryād bhāvaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ 3.017.013a iti sā lakṣmaṇenoktā karālā nirṇatodarī 3.017.013c manyate tad vacaḥ satyaṃ parihāsāvicakṣaṇā 3.017.014a sā rāmaṃ parṇaśālāyām upaviṣṭaṃ paraṃtapam 3.017.014c sītayā saha durdharṣam abravīt kāmamohitā 3.017.015a imāṃ virūpām asatīṃ karālāṃ nirṇatodarīm 3.017.015c vṛddhāṃ bhāryām avaṣṭabhya na māṃ tvaṃ bahu manyase 3.017.016a adyemāṃ bhakṣayiṣyāmi paśyatas tava mānuṣīm 3.017.016c tvayā saha cariṣyāmi niḥsapatnā yathāsukham 3.017.017a ity uktvā mṛgaśāvākṣīm alātasadṛśekṣaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:7573: 3.017.017c abhyadhāvat susaṃkruddhā maholkā rohiṇīm iva 3.017.018a tāṃ mṛtyupāśapratimām āpatantīṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7574: 3.017.018c nigṛhya rāmaḥ kupitas tato lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:7575: 3.017.019a krūrair anāryaiḥ saumitre parihāsaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_1-7u:7576: 3.017.019c na kāryaḥ paśya vaidehīṃ kathaṃ cit saumya jīvatīm 3.017.020a imāṃ virūpām asatīm atimattāṃ mahodarīm 3.017.020c rākṣasīṃ puruṣavyāghra virūpayitum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:7577: 3.017.021a ity ukto lakṣmaṇas tasyāḥ kruddho rāmasya paśyataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7578: 3.017.021c uddhṛtya khaḍgaṃ ciccheda karṇanāsaṃ mahābalaḥ 3.017.022a nikṛttakarṇanāsā tu visvaraṃ sā vinadya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:7579: 3.017.022c yathāgataṃ pradudrāva ghorā śūrpaṇakhā vanam 3.017.023a sā virūpā mahāghorā rākṣasī śoṇitokṣitā 3.017.023c nanāda vividhān nādān yathā prāvṛṣi toyadaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7580: 3.017.024a sā vikṣarantī rudhiraṃ bahudhā ghoradarśanā 3.017.024c pragṛhya bāhū garjantī praviveśa mahāvanam 3.017.025a tatas tu sā rākṣasasaṃgha saṃvṛtaṃ; kharaṃ janasthānagataṃ virūpitā
GE09ram_1-7u:7581: 3.017.025c upetya taṃ bhrātaram ugratejasaṃ; papāta bhūmau gaganād
GE09ram_1-7u:7583: 3.017.026a tataḥ sabhāryaṃ bhayamohamūrchitā; salakṣmaṇaṃ rāghavam āgataṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:7585: 3.017.026c virūpaṇaṃ cātmani śoṇitokṣitā; śaśaṃsa sarvaṃ bhaginī kharasya sā 3.018.001a tāṃ tathā patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā virūpāṃ śoṇitokṣitām
GE09ram_1-7u:7586: 3.018.001c bhaginīṃ krodhasaṃtaptaḥ kharaḥ papraccha rākṣasaḥ 3.018.002a balavikramasaṃpannā kāmagā kāmarūpiṇī
GE09ram_1-7u:7587: 3.018.002c imām avasthāṃ nītā tvaṃ kenāntakasamā gatā
GE09ram_1-7u:7589: 3.018.003c ko 'yam evaṃ mahāvīryas tvāṃ virūpāṃ cakāra ha
GE09ram_1-7u:7590: 3.018.004a na hi paśyāmy ahaṃ loke yaḥ kuryān mama vipriyam
GE09ram_1-7u:7592: 3.018.005a adyāhaṃ mārgaṇaiḥ prāṇān ādāsye jīvitāntakaiḥ 3.018.005c salile kṣīram āsaktaṃ niṣpibann iva sārasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7594: 3.018.006c saphenaṃ rudhiraṃ raktaṃ medinī kasya pāsyati
GE09ram_1-7u:7595: 3.018.007a kasya patrarathāḥ kāyān māṃsam utkṛtya saṃgatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7596: 3.018.007c prahṛṣṭā bhakṣayiṣyanti nihatasya mayā raṇe 3.018.008a taṃ na devā na gandharvā na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7597: 3.018.008c mayāpakṛṣṭaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ śaktās trātuṃ mahāhave 3.018.009a upalabhya śanaiḥ saṃjñāṃ taṃ me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:7598: 3.018.009c yena tvaṃ durvinītena vane vikramya nirjitā
GE09ram_1-7u:7599: 3.018.010a iti bhrātur vacaḥ śrutvā kruddhasya ca viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7600: 3.018.010c tataḥ śūrpaṇakhā vākyaṃ sabāṣpam idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:7602: 3.018.011c puṇḍarīkaviśālākṣau cīrakṛṣṇājināmbarau 3.018.012a gandharvarājapratimau pārthivavyañjanānvitau 3.018.012c devau vā mānuṣau vā tau na tarkayitum utsahe 3.018.013a taruṇī rūpasaṃpannā sarvābharaṇabhūṣitā
GE09ram_1-7u:7603: 3.018.013c dṛṣṭā tatra mayā nārī tayor madhye sumadhyamā
GE09ram_1-7u:7604: 3.018.014a tābhyām ubhābhyāṃ saṃbhūya pramadām adhikṛtya tām
GE09ram_1-7u:7605: 3.018.014c imām avasthāṃ nītāhaṃ yathānāthāsatī tathā 3.018.015a tasyāś cānṛjuvṛttāyās tayoś ca hatayor aham
GE09ram_1-7u:7606: 3.018.015c saphenaṃ pātum icchāmi rudhiraṃ raṇamūrdhani 3.018.016a eṣa me prathamaḥ kāmaḥ kṛtas tāta tvayā bhavet 3.018.016c tasyās tayoś ca rudhiraṃ pibeyam aham āhave
GE09ram_1-7u:7607: 3.018.017a iti tasyāṃ bruvāṇāyāṃ caturdaśa mahābalān 3.018.017c vyādideśa kharaḥ kruddho rākṣasān antakopamān 3.018.018a mānuṣau śastrasaṃpannau cīrakṛṣṇājināmbarau
GE09ram_1-7u:7608: 3.018.018c praviṣṭau daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ ghoraṃ pramadayā saha 3.018.019a tau hatvā tāṃ ca durvṛttām upāvartitum arhatha
GE09ram_1-7u:7609: 3.018.019c iyaṃ ca rudhiraṃ teṣāṃ bhaginī mama pāsyati
GE09ram_1-7u:7611: 3.018.020c śīghraṃ saṃpadyatāṃ gatvā tau pramathya svatejasā
GE09ram_1-7u:7612: 3.018.021a iti pratisamādiṣṭā rākṣasās te caturdaśa 3.018.021c tatra jagmus tayā sārdhaṃ ghanā vāteritā yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:7613: 3.019.001a tataḥ śūrpaṇakhā ghorā rāghavāśramam āgatā 3.019.001c rakṣasām ācacakṣe tau bhrātarau saha sītayā
GE09ram_1-7u:7614: 3.019.002a te rāmaṃ parṇaśālāyām upaviṣṭaṃ mahābalam 3.019.002c dadṛśuḥ sītayā sārdhaṃ vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca
GE09ram_1-7u:7615: 3.019.003a tān dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ śrīmān āgatāṃ tāṃ ca rākṣasīm 3.019.003c abravīd bhrātaraṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ dīptatejasaṃ 3.019.004a muhūrtaṃ bhava saumitre sītāyāḥ pratyanantaraḥ 3.019.004c imān asyā vadhiṣyāmi padavīm āgatān iha
GE09ram_1-7u:7616: 3.019.005a vākyam etat tataḥ śrutvā rāmasya viditātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7617: 3.019.005c tatheti lakṣmaṇo vākyaṃ rāmasya pratyapūjayat 3.019.006a rāghavo 'pi mahac cāpaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:7618: 3.019.006c cakāra sajyaṃ dharmātmā tāni rakṣāṃsi cābravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:7620: 3.019.007c praviṣṭau sītayā sārdhaṃ duścaraṃ daṇḍakāvanam 3.019.008a phalamūlāśanau dāntau tāpasau dharmacāriṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:7622: 3.019.009a yuṣmān pāpātmakān hantuṃ viprakārān mahāvane 3.019.009c ṛṣīṇāṃ tu niyogena prāpto 'haṃ saśarāsanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7624: 3.019.010c yadi prāṇair ihārtho vo nivartadhvaṃ niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7625: 3.019.011a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasās te caturdaśa
GE09ram_1-7u:7626: 3.019.011c ūcur vācaṃ susaṃkruddhā brahmaghnaḥ śūlapāṇayaḥ 3.019.012a saṃraktanayanā ghorā rāmaṃ raktāntalocanam
GE09ram_1-7u:7628: 3.019.013a krodham utpādya no bhartuḥ kharasya sumahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7629: 3.019.013c tvam eva hāsyase prāṇān adyāsmābhir hato yudhi
GE09ram_1-7u:7630: 3.019.014a kā hi te śaktir ekasya bahūnāṃ raṇamūrdhani
GE09ram_1-7u:7631: 3.019.014c asmākam agrataḥ sthātuṃ kiṃ punar yoddhum āhave
GE09ram_1-7u:7632: 3.019.015a ebhir bāhuprayuktair naḥ parighaiḥ śūlapaṭṭiśaiḥ 3.019.015c prāṇāṃs tyakṣyasi vīryaṃ ca dhanuś ca karapīḍitam
GE09ram_1-7u:7633: 3.019.016a ity evam uktvā saṃrabdhā rākṣasās te caturdaśa
GE09ram_1-7u:7635: 3.019.016e cikṣipus tāni śūlāni rāghavaṃ prati durjayam
GE09ram_1-7u:7636: 3.019.017a tāni śūlāni kākutsthaḥ samastāni caturdaśa 3.019.017c tāvadbhir eva ciccheda śaraiḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇaiḥ 3.019.018a tataḥ paścān mahātejā nārācān sūryasaṃnibhān 3.019.018c jagrāha paramakruddhaś caturdaśa śilāśitān
GE09ram_1-7u:7637: 3.019.019a gṛhītvā dhanur āyamya lakṣyān uddiśya rākṣasān
GE09ram_1-7u:7638: 3.019.019c mumoca rāghavo bāṇān vajrān iva śatakratuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7639: 3.019.020a rukmapuṅkhāś ca viśikhāḥ pradīptā hemabhūṣaṇāḥ 3.019.020c antarikṣe maholkānāṃ babhūvus tulyavarcasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7640: 3.019.021a te bhittvā rakṣasāṃ vegād vakṣāṃsi rudhirāplutāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7642: 3.019.022a te bhinnahṛdayā bhūmau chinnamūlā iva drumāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7644: 3.019.023a tān bhūmau patitān dṛṣṭvā rākṣasī krodhamūrchitā
GE09ram_1-7u:7645: 3.019.023c paritrastā punas tatra vyasṛjad bhairavaṃ ravam
GE09ram_1-7u:7646: 3.019.024a sā nadantī mahānādaṃ javāc chūrpaṇakhā punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7647: 3.019.024c upagamya kharaṃ sā tu kiṃ cit saṃśuṣka śoṇitā 3.019.024e papāta punar evārtā saniryāseva vallarī 3.019.025a nipātitān prekṣya raṇe tu rākṣasān; pradhāvitā śūrpaṇakhā punas
GE09ram_1-7u:7649: 3.019.025c vadhaṃ ca teṣāṃ nikhilena rakṣasāṃ; śaśaṃsa sarvaṃ bhaginī
GE09ram_1-7u:7650: kharasya sā 3.020.001a sa punaḥ patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā krodhāc chūrpaṇakhāṃ kharaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7651: 3.020.001c uvāca vyaktatā vācā tām anarthārtham āgatām
GE09ram_1-7u:7652: 3.020.002a mayā tv idānīṃ śūrās te rākṣasā rudhirāśanāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7653: 3.020.002c tvatpriyārthaṃ vinirdiṣṭāḥ kimarthaṃ rudyate punaḥ 3.020.003a bhaktāś caivānuraktāś ca hitāś ca mama nityaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7654: 3.020.003c ghnanto 'pi na nihantavyā na na kuryur vaco mama
GE09ram_1-7u:7655: 3.020.004a kim etac chrotum icchāmi kāraṇaṃ yatkṛte punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7656: 3.020.004c hā nātheti vinardantī sarpavad veṣṭase kṣitau
GE09ram_1-7u:7657: 3.020.005a anāthavad vilapasi kiṃ nu nāthe mayi sthite
GE09ram_1-7u:7658: 3.020.005c uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha mā bhaiṣīr vaiklavyaṃ tyajyatām iha
GE09ram_1-7u:7659: 3.020.006a ity evam uktā durdharṣā khareṇa parisāntvitā
GE09ram_1-7u:7660: 3.020.006c vimṛjya nayane sāsre kharaṃ bhrātaram abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:7661: 3.020.007a preṣitāś ca tvayā śūrā rākṣasās te caturdaśa
GE09ram_1-7u:7662: 3.020.007c nihantuṃ rāghavaṃ ghorā matpriyārthaṃ salakṣmaṇam 3.020.008a te tu rāmeṇa sāmarṣāḥ śūlapaṭṭiśapāṇayaḥ 3.020.008c samare nihatāḥ sarve sāyakair marmabhedibhiḥ 3.020.009a tān bhūmau patitān dṛṣṭvā kṣaṇenaiva mahābalān
GE09ram_1-7u:7663: 3.020.009c rāmasya ca mahat karma mahāṃs trāso 'bhavan mama
GE09ram_1-7u:7664: 3.020.010a sāsmi bhītā samudvignā viṣaṇṇā ca niśācara
GE09ram_1-7u:7665: 3.020.010c śaraṇaṃ tvāṃ punaḥ prāptā sarvato bhayadarśinī
GE09ram_1-7u:7666: 3.020.011a viṣādanakrādhyuṣite paritrāsormimālini 3.020.011c kiṃ māṃ na trāyase magnāṃ vipule śokasāgare
GE09ram_1-7u:7667: 3.020.012a ete ca nihatā bhūmau rāmeṇa niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7668: 3.020.012c ye ca me padavīṃ prāptā rākṣasāḥ piśitāśanāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7669: 3.020.013a mayi te yady anukrośo yadi rakṣaḥsu teṣu ca 3.020.013c rāmeṇa yadi śaktis te tejo vāsti niśācara
GE09ram_1-7u:7671: 3.020.014a yadi rāmaṃ mamāmitram adya tvaṃ na vadhiṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:7672: 3.020.014c tava caivāgrataḥ prāṇāṃs tyakṣyāmi nirapatrapā 3.020.015a buddhyāham anupaśyāmi na tvaṃ rāmasya saṃyuge
GE09ram_1-7u:7673: 3.020.015c sthātuṃ pratimukhe śaktaḥ sacāpasya mahāraṇe 3.020.016a śūramānī na śūras tvaṃ mithyāropitavikramaḥ 3.020.016c mānuṣau yan na śaknoṣi hantuṃ tau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:7675: 3.020.017c niḥsattvasyālpavīryasya vāsas te kīdṛśas tv iha
GE09ram_1-7u:7677: 3.020.018c sa hi tejaḥsamāyukto rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ 3.020.018e bhrātā cāsya mahāvīryo yena cāsmi virūpitā
GE09ram_1-7u:7678: 3.021.001a evam ādharṣitaḥ śūraḥ śūrpaṇakhyā kharas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:7679: 3.021.001c uvāca rakṣasāṃ madhye kharaḥ kharataraṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7680: 3.021.002a tavāpamānaprabhavaḥ krodho 'yam atulo mama 3.021.002c na śakyate dhārayituṃ lavaṇāmbha ivotthitam 3.021.003a na rāmaṃ gaṇaye vīryān mānuṣaṃ kṣīṇajīvitam
GE09ram_1-7u:7681: 3.021.003c ātmā duścaritaiḥ prāṇān hato yo 'dya vimokṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:7682: 3.021.004a bāṣpaḥ saṃhriyatām eṣa saṃbhramaś ca vimucyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:7683: 3.021.004c ahaṃ rāmaḥ saha bhrātrā nayāmi yamasādanam
GE09ram_1-7u:7685: 3.021.005c rāmasya rudhiraṃ raktam uṣṇaṃ pāsyasi rākṣasi
GE09ram_1-7u:7686: 3.021.006a sā prahṛṣṭvā vacaḥ śrutvā kharasya vadanāc cyutam
GE09ram_1-7u:7687: 3.021.006c praśaśaṃsa punar maurkhyād bhrātaraṃ rakṣasāṃ varam
GE09ram_1-7u:7688: 3.021.007a tayā paruṣitaḥ pūrvaṃ punar eva praśaṃsitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7689: 3.021.007c abravīd dūṣaṇaṃ nāma kharaḥ senāpatiṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:7695: 3.021.010c sarvodyogam udīrṇānāṃ rakṣasāṃ saumya kāraya 3.021.011a upasthāpaya me kṣipraṃ rathaṃ saumya dhanūṃṣi ca
GE09ram_1-7u:7696: 3.021.011c śarāṃś ca citrān khaḍgāṃś ca śaktīś ca vividhāḥ śitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7697: 3.021.012a agre niryātum icchāmi paulastyānāṃ mahātmanām 3.021.012c vadhārthaṃ durvinītasya rāmasya raṇakovidaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7698: 3.021.013a iti tasya bruvāṇasya sūryavarṇaṃ mahāratham 3.021.013c sadaśvaiḥ śabalair yuktam ācacakṣe 'tha dūṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7701: 3.021.015a matsyaiḥ puṣpair drumaiḥ śailaiś candrasūryaiś ca kāñcanaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7702: 3.021.015c māṅgalyaiḥ pakṣisaṃghaiś ca tārābhiś ca samāvṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:7703: 3.021.016a dhvajanistriṃśasaṃpannaṃ kiṅkiṇīkavibhūṣitam 3.021.016c sadaśvayuktaṃ so 'marṣād āruroha rathaṃ kharaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7704: 3.021.017a niśāmya taṃ rathagataṃ rāakṣasā bhīmavikramāḥ 3.021.017c tasthuḥ saṃparivāryainaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ ca mahābalam 3.021.018a kharas tu tān maheṣvāsān ghoracarmāyudhadhvajān 3.021.018c niryātety abravīd dṛṣṭvā rathasthaḥ sarvarākṣasān 3.021.019a tatas tad rākṣasaṃ sainyaṃ ghoracarmāyudhadhvajam 3.021.019c nirjagāma janasthānān mahānādaṃ mahājavam
GE09ram_1-7u:7705: 3.021.020a mudgaraiḥ paṭṭiśaiḥ śūlaiḥ sutīkṣṇaiś ca paraśvadhaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7706: 3.021.020c khaḍgaiś cakraiś ca hastasthair bhrājamānaiś ca tomaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7707: 3.021.021a śaktibhiḥ patighair ghorair atimātraiś ca kārmukaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7711: 3.021.023a tāṃs tv abhidravato dṛṣṭvā rākṣasān bhīmavikramān
GE09ram_1-7u:7712: 3.021.023c kharasyāpi rathaḥ kiṃ cij jagāma tadanantaram
GE09ram_1-7u:7713: 3.021.024a tatas tāñ śabalān aśvāṃs taptakāñcanabhūṣitān 3.021.024c kharasya matam ājñāya sārathiḥ samacodayat 3.021.025a sa codito rathaḥ śīghraṃ kharasya ripughātinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7714: 3.021.025c śabdenāpūrayām āsa diśaś ca pratiśas tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:7715: 3.021.026a pravṛddhamanyus tu kharaḥ kharasvano; ripor vadhārthaṃ tvarito
GE09ram_1-7u:7717: 3.021.026c acūcudat sārathim unnadan punar; mahābalo megha ivāśmavarṣavān
GE09ram_1-7u:7718: 3.022.001a tat prayātaṃ balaṃ ghoram aśivaṃ śoṇitodakam
GE09ram_1-7u:7720: 3.022.002a nipetus turagās tasya rathayuktā mahājavāḥ 3.022.002c same puṣpacite deśe rājamārge yadṛcchayā 3.022.003a śyāmaṃ rudhiraparyantaṃ babhūva pariveṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:7722: 3.022.004a tato dhvajam upāgamya hemadaṇḍaṃ samucchritam 3.022.004c samākramya mahākāyas tasthau gṛdhraḥ sudāruṇaḥ 3.022.005a janasthānasamīpe ca samākramya kharasvanāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7723: 3.022.005c visvarān vividhāṃś cakrur māṃsādā mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ 3.022.006a vyājahruś ca padīptāyāṃ diśi vai bhairavasvanam
GE09ram_1-7u:7724: 3.022.006c aśivā yātu dāhānāṃ śivā ghorā mahāsvanāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7725: 3.022.007a prabhinnagirisaṃkāśās toyaśoṣitadhāriṇaḥ 3.022.007c ākāśaṃ tad anākāśaṃ cakrur bhīmā balāhakāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7726: 3.022.008a babhūva timiraṃ ghoram uddhataṃ romaharṣaṇam 3.022.008c diśo vā vidiśo vāpi suvyaktaṃ na cakāśire
GE09ram_1-7u:7728: 3.022.009c kharasyābhimukhaṃ nedus tadā ghorā mṛgāḥ khagāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7732: 3.022.011c jagrāha sūryaṃ svarbhānur aparvaṇi mahāgrahaḥ 3.022.012a pravāti mārutaḥ śīghraṃ niṣprabho 'bhūd divākaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7733: 3.022.012c utpetuś ca vinā rātriṃ tārāḥ khadyotasaprabhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7735: 3.022.013c tasmin kṣaṇe babhūvuś ca vinā puṣpaphalair drumāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7736: 3.022.014a uddhūtaś ca vinā vātaṃ reṇur jaladharāruṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7737: 3.022.014c vīcīkūcīti vāśyanto babhūvus tatra sārikāḥ 3.022.015a ulkāś cāpi sanirghoṣā nipetur ghoradarśanāḥ 3.022.015c pracacāla mahī cāpi saśailavanakānanā
GE09ram_1-7u:7738: 3.022.016a kharasya ca rathasthasya nardamānasya dhīmataḥ 3.022.016c prākampata bhujaḥ savyaḥ kharaś cāsyāvasajjata 3.022.017a sāsrā saṃpadyate dṛṣṭiḥ paśyamānasya sarvataḥ 3.022.017c lalāṭe ca rujā jātā na ca mohān nyavartata 3.022.018a tān samīkṣya mahotpātān utthitān romaharṣaṇān 3.022.018c abravīd rākṣasān sarvān prahasan sa kharas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:7739: 3.022.019a mahotpātān imān sarvān utthitān ghoradarśanān 3.022.019c na cintayāmy ahaṃ vīryād balavān durbalān iva
GE09ram_1-7u:7740: 3.022.020a tārā api śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ pātayeyaṃ nabhastalāt
GE09ram_1-7u:7741: 3.022.020c mṛtyuṃ maraṇadharmeṇa saṃkruddho yojayāmy aham 3.022.021a rāghavaṃ taṃ balotsiktaṃ bhrātaraṃ cāpi lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:7742: 3.022.021c ahatvā sāyakais tīkṣṇair nopāvartitum utsahe 3.022.022a sakāmā bhaginī me 'stu pītvā tu rudhiraṃ tayoḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7743: 3.022.022c yannimittaṃ tu rāmasya lakṣmaṇasya viparyayaḥ 3.022.023a na kva cit prāptapūrvo me saṃyugeṣu parājayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7744: 3.022.023c yuṣmākam etat pratyakṣaṃ nānṛtaṃ kathayāmy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:7746: 3.022.024c vajrahastaṃ raṇe hanyāṃ kiṃ punas tau ca mānuṣau 3.022.025a sā tasya garjitaṃ śrutvā rākṣasasya mahācamūḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7749: 3.022.026c ṛṣayo devagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca saha cāraṇaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7751: 3.022.027c svasti gobrāhmaṇebhyo 'stu lokānāṃ ye ca saṃmatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7752: 3.022.028a jayatāṃ rāghavo yuddhe paulastyān rajanīcarān 3.022.028c cakrā hasto yathā yuddhe sarvān asurapuṃgavān
GE09ram_1-7u:7753: 3.022.029a etac cānyac ca bahuśo bruvāṇāḥ paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7754: 3.022.029c dadṛśur vāhinīṃ teṣāṃ rākṣasānāṃ gatāyuṣām 3.022.030a rathena tu kharo vegāt sainyasyāgrād viniḥsṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7755: 3.022.030c taṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasaṃ bhūyo rākṣasāś ca viniḥsṛtāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7756: 3.022.031a śyena gāmī pṛthugrīvo yajñaśatrur vihaṃgamaḥ 3.022.031c durjayaḥ karavīrākṣaḥ paruṣaḥ kālakārmukaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7758: 3.022.032c dvādaśaite mahāvīryāḥ pratasthur abhitaḥ kharam 3.022.033a mahākapālaḥ sthūlākṣaḥ pramāthī triśirās tathā 3.022.033c catvāra ete senāgryā dūṣaṇaṃ pṛṣṭhato 'nvayuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7759: 3.022.034a sā bhīmavegā samarābhikāmā; sudāruṇā rākṣasavīra senā
GE09ram_1-7u:7760: 3.022.034c tau rājaputrau sahasābhyupetā; mālāgrahāṇām iva candrasūryau
GE09ram_1-7u:7761: 3.023.001a āśramaṃ prati yāte tu khare kharaparākrame
GE09ram_1-7u:7762: 3.023.001c tān evautpātikān rāmaḥ saha bhrātrā dadarśa ha
GE09ram_1-7u:7763: 3.023.002a tān utpātān mahāghorān utthitān romaharṣaṇān 3.023.002c prajānām ahitān dṛṣṭvā vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:7766: 3.023.004a amī rudhiradhārās tu visṛjantaḥ kharasvanān 3.023.004c vyomni meghā vivartante paruṣā gardabhāruṇāḥ 3.023.005a sadhūmāś ca śarāḥ sarve mama yuddhābhinandinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7767: 3.023.005c rukmapṛṣṭhāni cāpāni viveṣṭante ca lakṣmaṇa 3.023.006a yādṛśā iha kūjanti pakṣiṇo vanacāriṇaḥ 3.023.006c agrato no bhayaṃ prāptaṃ saṃśayo jīvitasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:7768: 3.023.007a saṃprahāras tu sumahān bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7769: 3.023.007c ayam ākhyāti me bāhuḥ sphuramāṇo muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7770: 3.023.008a saṃnikarṣe tu naḥ śūra jayaṃ śatroḥ parājayam
GE09ram_1-7u:7771: 3.023.008c suprabhaṃ ca prasannaṃ ca tava vaktraṃ hi lakṣyate 3.023.009a udyatānāṃ hi yuddhārthaṃ yeṣāṃ bhavati lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7772: 3.023.009c niṣprabhaṃ vadanaṃ teṣāṃ bhavaty āyuḥ parikṣayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7773: 3.023.010a anāgatavidhānaṃ tu kartavyaṃ śubham icchatā 3.023.010c āpadaṃ śaṅkamānena puruṣeṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:7774: 3.023.011a tasmād gṛhītvā vaidehīṃ śarapāṇir dhanurdharaḥ 3.023.011c guhām āśrayaśailasya durgāṃ pādapasaṃkulām
GE09ram_1-7u:7775: 3.023.012a pratikūlitum icchāmi na hi vākyam idaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:7776: 3.023.012c śāpito mama pādābhyāṃ gamyatāṃ vatsa māciram
GE09ram_1-7u:7777: 3.023.013a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_1-7u:7778: 3.023.013c śarān ādāya cāpaṃ ca guhāṃ durgāṃ samāśrayat
GE09ram_1-7u:7779: 3.023.014a tasmin praviṣṭe tu guhāṃ lakṣmaṇe saha sītayā
GE09ram_1-7u:7780: 3.023.014c hanta niryuktam ity uktvā rāmaḥ kavacam āviśat
GE09ram_1-7u:7783: 3.023.016a sa cāpam udyamya mahac charān ādāya vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:7784: 3.023.016c babhūvāvasthitas tatra jyāsvanaiḥ pūrayan diśaḥ 3.023.017a tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca saha cāraṇaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7785: 3.023.017c ūcuḥ paramasaṃtrastā guhyakāś ca parasparam 3.023.018a caturdaśa sahasrāṇi rakṣasāṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:7786: 3.023.018c ekaś ca rāmo dharmātmā kathaṃ yuddhaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:7790: 3.023.020c cāpāni vispharayatāṃ jṛmbhatāṃ cāpy abhīkṣṇaśaḥ 3.023.021a vipraghuṣṭasvanānāṃ ca dundubhīṃś cāpi nighnatām 3.023.021c teṣāṃ sutumulaḥ śabdaḥ pūrayām āsa tad vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:7791: 3.023.022a tena śabdena vitrastāḥ śvāpadā vanacāriṇaḥ 3.023.022c dudruvur yatra niḥśabdaṃ pṛṣṭhato nāvalokayan 3.023.023a tat tv anīkaṃ mahāvegaṃ rāmaṃ samupasarpata
GE09ram_1-7u:7794: 3.023.024c dadarśa kharasainyaṃ tad yuddhābhimukham udyatam 3.023.025a vitatya ca dhanur bhīmaṃ tūṇyāś coddhṛtya sāyakān
GE09ram_1-7u:7795: 3.023.025c krodham āhārayat tīvraṃ vadhārthaṃ sarvarakṣasām 3.023.026a duṣprekṣyaḥ so 'bhavat kruddho yugāntāgnir iva jvalan
GE09ram_1-7u:7796: 3.023.026c taṃ dṛṣṭvā tejasāviṣṭaṃ prāvyathan vanadevatāḥ 3.023.027a tasya kruddhasya rūpaṃ tu rāmasya dadṛśe tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:7797: 3.023.027c dakṣasyeva kratuṃ hantum udyatasya pinākinaḥ 3.024.001a avaṣṭabdhadhanuṃ rāmaṃ kruddhaṃ ca ripughātinam 3.024.001c dadarśāśramam āgamya kharaḥ saha puraḥsaraiḥ 3.024.002a taṃ dṛṣṭvā saguṇaṃ cāpam udyamya kharaniḥsvanam
GE09ram_1-7u:7798: 3.024.002c rāmasyābhimukhaṃ sūtaṃ codyatām ity acodayat 3.024.003a sa kharasyājñayā sūtas turagān samacodayat 3.024.003c yatra rāmo mahābāhur eko dhunvan dhanuḥ sthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7799: 3.024.004a taṃ tu niṣpatitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve te rajanīcarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7801: 3.024.005a sa teṣāṃ yātudhānānāṃ madhye rato gataḥ kharaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7802: 3.024.005c babhūva madhye tārāṇāṃ lohitāṅga ivoditaḥ 3.024.006a tatas taṃ bhīmadhanvānaṃ kruddhāḥ sarve niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7803: 3.024.006c rāmaṃ nānāvidhaiḥ śastrair abhyavarṣanta durjayam 3.024.007a mudgarair āyasaiḥ śūlaiḥ prāsaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7804: 3.024.007c rākṣasāḥ samare rāmaṃ nijaghnū roṣatatparāḥ 3.024.008a te balāhakasaṃkāśā mahānādā
GE09ram_1-7u:7805: 3.024.008c abhyadhāvanta kākutsthaṃ rāmaṃ yuddhe jighāṃsavaḥ 3.024.009a te rāme śaravarṣāṇi vyasṛjan rakṣasāṃ guṇāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7806: 3.024.009c śailendram iva dhārābhir varṣamāṇā mahādhanāḥ 3.024.010a sa taiḥ parivṛto ghorai rāghavo rakṣasāṃ gaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7807: 3.024.010c tithiṣv iva mahādevo vṛtaḥ pāriṣadāṃ gaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7808: 3.024.011a tāni muktāni śastrāṇi yātudhānaiḥ sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7809: 3.024.011c pratijagrāha viśikhair nadyoghān iva sāgaraḥ 3.024.012a sa taiḥ praharaṇair ghorair bhinnagātro na vivyathe
GE09ram_1-7u:7810: 3.024.012c rāmaḥ pradīptair bahubhir vajrair iva mahācalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7811: 3.024.013a sa viddhaḥ kṣatajādigdhaḥ sarvagātreṣu rāghavaḥ 3.024.013c babhūva rāmaḥ saṃdhyābhrair divākara ivāvṛtaḥ 3.024.014a viṣedur devagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ 3.024.014c ekaṃ sahastrair bahubhis tadā dṛṣṭvā samāvṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:7815: 3.024.016c mumoca līlayā rāmaḥ kaṅkapatrān ajihmagān 3.024.017a te śarāḥ śatrusainyeṣu muktā rāmeṇa līlayā
GE09ram_1-7u:7816: 3.024.017c ādadū rakṣasāṃ prāṇān pāśāḥ kālakṛtā iva
GE09ram_1-7u:7817: 3.024.018a bhittvā rākṣasadehāṃs tāṃs te śarā rudhirāplutāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7819: 3.024.019a asaṃkhyeyās tu rāmasya sāyakāś cāpamaṇḍalāt 3.024.019c viniṣpetur atīvogrā rakṣaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7820: 3.024.020a tair dhanūṃṣi dhvajāgrāṇi varmāṇi ca śirāṃsi ca
GE09ram_1-7u:7822: 3.024.021a tato nālīkanārācais tīkṣṇāgraiś ca vikarṇibhiḥ 3.024.021c bhīmam ārtasvaraṃ cakrur bhidyamānā niśācarāḥ 3.024.022a tat sainyaṃ niśitair bāṇair arditaṃ marmabhedibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7823: 3.024.022c rāmeṇa na sukhaṃ lebhe śuṣkaṃ vanam ivāgninā
GE09ram_1-7u:7824: 3.024.023a ke cid bhīmabalāḥ śūrāḥ śūlān khaḍgān paraśvadhān
GE09ram_1-7u:7826: 3.024.024a tāni bāṇair mahābāhuḥ śastrāṇy āvārya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7827: 3.024.024c jahāra samare prāṇāṃś ciccheda ca śirodharān
GE09ram_1-7u:7828: 3.024.025a avaśiṣṭāś ca ye tatra viṣaṇṇāś ca niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7830: 3.024.026a tān sarvān punar ādāya samāśvāsya ca dūṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7831: 3.024.026c abhyadhāvata kākutsthaṃ kruddho rudram ivāntakaḥ 3.024.027a nivṛttās tu punaḥ sarve dūṣaṇāśrayanirbhayāḥ 3.024.027c rāmam evābhyadhāvanta sālatālaśilāyudhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7832: 3.024.028a tad babhūvādbhutaṃ yuddhaṃ tumulaṃ romaharṣaṇam 3.024.028c rāmasyāsya mahāghoraṃ punas teṣāṃ ca rakṣasām
GE09ram_1-7u:7833: 3.025.001a tad drumāṇāṃ śilānāṃ ca varṣaṃ prāṇaharaṃ mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:7835: 3.025.002a pratigṛhya ca tad varaṃ nimīlita ivarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7836: 3.025.002c rāmaḥ krodhaṃ paraṃ bheje vadhārthaṃ sarvarakṣasām
GE09ram_1-7u:7837: 3.025.003a tataḥ krodhasamāviṣṭaḥ pradīpta iva tejasā 3.025.003c śarair abhyakirat sainyaṃ sarvataḥ sahadūṣaṇam 3.025.004a tataḥ senāpatiḥ kruddho dūṣaṇaḥ śatrudūṣaṇaḥ 3.025.004c jagrāha giriśṛṅgābhaṃ parighaṃ romaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:7839: 3.025.005c āyasaiḥ śaṅkubhis tīkṣṇaiḥ kīrṇaṃ paravasokṣitām 3.025.006a vajrāśanisamasparśaṃ paragopuradāraṇam 3.025.006c taṃ mahoragasaṃkāśaṃ pragṛhya parighaṃ raṇe 3.025.006e dūṣaṇo 'bhyapatad rāmaṃ krūrakarmā niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7841: 3.025.007c dvābhyāṃ śarābhyāṃ ciccheda sahastābharaṇau bhujau 3.025.008a bhraṣṭas tasya mahākāyaḥ papāta raṇamūrdhani 3.025.008c parighaś chinnahastasya śakradhvaja ivāgrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7842: 3.025.009a sa karābhyāṃ vikīrṇābhyāṃ papāta bhuvi dūṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7844: 3.025.010a dṛṣṭvā taṃ patitaṃ bhūmau dūṣaṇaṃ nihataṃ raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:7845: 3.025.010c sādhu sādhv iti kākutsthaṃ sarvabhūtāny apūjayan
GE09ram_1-7u:7846: 3.025.011a etasminn antare kruddhās trayaḥ senāgrayāyinaḥ 3.025.011c saṃhatyābhyadravan rāmaṃ mṛtyupāśāvapāśitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7847: 3.025.011e mahākapālaḥ sthūlākṣaḥ pramāthī ca mahābalaḥ 3.025.012a mahākapālo vipulaṃ śūlam udyamya rākṣasaḥ 3.025.012c sthūlākṣaḥ paṭṭiśaṃ gṛhya pramāthī ca paraśvadham
GE09ram_1-7u:7848: 3.025.013a dṛṣṭvaivāpatatas tāṃs tu rāghavaḥ sāyakaiḥ śitaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7849: 3.025.013c tīkṣṇāgraiḥ pratijagrāha saṃprāptān atithīn iva 3.025.014a mahākapālasya śiraś ciccheda raghunaṅganaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7850: 3.025.014c asaṃkhyeyais tu bāṇaughaiḥ pramamātha pramāthinam 3.025.015a sthūlākṣasyākṣiṇī tīkṣṇaiḥ pūrayām āsa sāyakaiḥ 3.025.015c sa papāta hato bhūmau viṭapīva mahādrumaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7852: 3.025.016c jaghanaśeṣaṃ tejasvī tasya sainyasya sāyakaiḥ 3.025.017a te rukmapuṅkhā viśikhāḥ sadhūmā iva pāvakāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7853: 3.025.017c nijaghnus tāni rakṣāṃsi vajrā iva mahādrumān
GE09ram_1-7u:7854: 3.025.018a rakṣasāṃ tu śataṃ rāmaḥ śatenaikena karṇinā
GE09ram_1-7u:7855: 3.025.018c sahasraṃ ca sahasreṇa jaghāna raṇamūrdhani 3.025.019a tair bhinnavarmābharaṇāś
GE09ram_1-7u:7857: 3.025.020a tair muktakeśaiḥ samare patitaiḥ śoṇitokṣitaiḥ 3.025.020c āstīrṇā vasudhā kṛtsnā mahāvediḥ kuśair iva
GE09ram_1-7u:7858: 3.025.021a kṣaṇena tu mahāghoraṃ vanaṃ nihatarākṣasaṃ 3.025.021c babhūva niraya prakhyaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:7860: 3.025.022c hatāny ekena rāmeṇa mānuṣeṇa padātinā 3.025.023a tasya sainyasya sarvasya kharaḥ śeṣo mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7861: 3.025.023c rākṣasas triśirāś caiva rāmaś ca ripusūdanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7862: 3.025.024a tatas tu tad bhīmabalaṃ mahāhave; samīkṣya rāmeṇa hataṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:7864: 3.025.024c rathena rāmaṃ mahatā kharas tataḥ; samāsasādendra ivodyatāśaniḥ 3.026.001a kharaṃ tu rāmābhimukhaṃ prayāntaṃ vāhinīpatiḥ 3.026.001c rākṣasas triśirā nāma saṃnipatyedam abravīt 3.026.002a māṃ niyojaya vikrānta saṃnivartasva sāhasāt 3.026.002c paśya rāmaṃ mahābāhuṃ saṃyuge vinipātitam 3.026.003a pratijānāmi te satyam āyudhaṃ cāham ālabhe
GE09ram_1-7u:7865: 3.026.003c yathā rāmaṃ vadhiṣyāmi vadhārhaṃ sarvarakṣasām 3.026.004a ahaṃ vāsya raṇe mṛtyur eṣa vā samare mama 3.026.004c vinivartya raṇotsāhaṃ muhūrtaṃ prāśniko bhava 3.026.005a prahṛṣṭo vā hate rāme janasthānaṃ prayāsyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:7866: 3.026.005c mayi vā nihate rāmaṃ saṃyugāyopayāsyasi 3.026.006a kharas triśirasā tena mṛtyulobhāt prasāditaḥ 3.026.006c gaccha yudhyety anujñāto rāghavābhimukho yayau 3.026.007a triśirāś ca rathenaiva vājiyuktena bhāsvatā 3.026.007c abhyadravad raṇe rāmaṃ triśṛṅga iva parvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7867: 3.026.008a śaradhārā samūhān sa mahāmegha ivotsṛjan 3.026.008c vyasṛjat sadṛśaṃ nādaṃ jalārdrasyeva dundubheḥ 3.026.009a āgacchantaṃ triśirasaṃ rākṣasaṃ prekṣya rāghavaḥ 3.026.009c dhanuṣā pratijagrāha vidhunvan sāyakāñ śitān 3.026.010a sa saṃprahāras tumulo rāma triśirasor mahān
GE09ram_1-7u:7869: 3.026.011a tatas triśirasā bāṇair lalāṭe tāḍitas tribhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7870: 3.026.011c amarṣī kupito rāmaḥ saṃrabdham idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:7872: 3.026.012c puṣpair iva śarair yasya lalāṭe 'smi parikṣataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7874: 3.026.013a evam uktvā tu saṃrabdhaḥ śarān āśīviṣopamān
GE09ram_1-7u:7875: 3.026.013c triśiro vakṣasi kruddho nijaghāna caturdaśa 3.026.014a caturbhis turagān asya śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ 3.026.014c nyapātayata tejasvī caturas tasya vājinaḥ 3.026.015a aṣṭabhiḥ sāyakaiḥ sūtaṃ rathopasthe nyapātayat 3.026.015c rāmaś ciccheda bāṇena dhvajaṃ cāsya samucchritam
GE09ram_1-7u:7876: 3.026.016a tato hatarathāt tasmād utpatantaṃ niśācaram 3.026.016c bibheda rāmas taṃ bāṇair hṛdaye so 'bhavaj jaḍaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7877: 3.026.017a sāyakaiś cāprameyātmā sāmarṣas tasya rakṣasaḥ 3.026.017c śirāṃsy apātayat trīṇi vegavadbhis tribhiḥ śataiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7879: 3.026.018c nyapatat patitaiḥ pūrvaṃ svaśirobhir niśācaraḥ 3.026.019a hataśeṣās tato bhagnā rākṣasāḥ kharasaṃśrayāḥ 3.026.019c dravanti sma na tiṣṭhanti vyāghratrastā mṛgā iva
GE09ram_1-7u:7880: 3.026.020a tān kharo dravato dṛṣṭvā nivartya ruṣitaḥ svayam
GE09ram_1-7u:7881: 3.026.020c rāmam evābhidudrāva rāhuś candramasaṃ yathā 3.027.001a nihataṃ dūṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā raṇe triśirasā saha
GE09ram_1-7u:7882: 3.027.001c kharasyāpy abhavat trāso dṛṣṭvā rāmasya vikramam
GE09ram_1-7u:7883: 3.027.002a sa dṛṣṭvā rākṣasaṃ sainyam aviṣahyaṃ mahābalam
GE09ram_1-7u:7884: 3.027.002c hatam ekena rāmeṇa dūṣaṇas triśirā api
GE09ram_1-7u:7885: 3.027.003a tad balaṃ hatabhūyiṣṭhaṃ vimanāḥ prekṣya rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7886: 3.027.003c āsasāda kharo rāmaṃ namucir vāsavaṃ yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:7887: 3.027.004a vikṛṣya balavac cāpaṃ nārācān raktabhojanān 3.027.004c kharaś cikṣepa rāmāya kruddhān āśīviṣān iva
GE09ram_1-7u:7888: 3.027.005a jyāṃ vidhunvan subahuśaḥ śikṣayāstrāṇi darśayan 3.027.005c cacāra samare mārgāñ śarai rathagataḥ kharaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7889: 3.027.006a sa sarvāś ca diśo bāṇaiḥ pradiśaś ca mahārathaḥ 3.027.006c pūrayām āsa taṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmo 'pi sumahad dhanuḥ 3.027.007a sa sāyakair durviṣahaiḥ sasphuliṅgair ivāgnibhiḥ 3.027.007c nabhaś cakārāvivaraṃ parjanya iva vṛṣṭibhiḥ 3.027.008a tad babhūva śitair bāṇaiḥ khararāmavisarjitaiḥ 3.027.008c paryākāśam anākāśaṃ sarvataḥ śarasaṃkulam
GE09ram_1-7u:7890: 3.027.009a śarajālāvṛtaḥ sūryo na tadā sma prakāśate
GE09ram_1-7u:7892: 3.027.010a tato nālīkanārācais tīkṣṇāgraiś ca vikarṇibhiḥ 3.027.010c ājaghāna raṇe rāmaṃ totrair iva mahādvipam
GE09ram_1-7u:7893: 3.027.011a taṃ rathasthaṃ dhanuṣpāṇiṃ rākṣasaṃ paryavasthitam 3.027.011c dadṛśuḥ sarvabhūtāni pāśahastam ivāntakam
GE09ram_1-7u:7894: 3.027.012a taṃ siṃham iva vikrāntaṃ siṃhavikrāntagāminam 3.027.012c dṛṣṭvā nodvijate rāmaḥ siṃhaḥ kṣudramṛgaṃ yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:7895: 3.027.013a tataḥ sūryanikāśena rathena mahatā kharaḥ 3.027.013c āsasāda raṇe rāmaṃ pataṅga iva pāvakam
GE09ram_1-7u:7897: 3.027.014c kharaś ciccheda rāmasya darśayan pāṇilāghavam 3.027.015a sa punas tv aparān sapta śarān ādāya varmaṇi 3.027.015c nijaghāna raṇe kruddhaḥ śakrāśanisamaprabhān
GE09ram_1-7u:7898: 3.027.016a tatas tat prahataṃ bāṇaiḥ kharamuktaiḥ suparvabhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7900: 3.027.017a sa śarair arpitaḥ kruddhaḥ sarvagātreṣu rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7901: 3.027.017c rarāja samare rāmo vidhūmo 'gnir iva jvalan 3.027.018a tato gambhīranirhrādaṃ rāmaḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7902: 3.027.018c cakārāntāya sa ripoḥ sajyam anyan mahad dhanuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7903: 3.027.019a sumahad vaiṣṇavaṃ yat tad atisṛṣṭaṃ maharṣiṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:7904: 3.027.019c varaṃ tad dhanur udyamya kharaṃ samabhidhāvata
GE09ram_1-7u:7905: 3.027.020a tataḥ kanakapuṅkhais tu śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ 3.027.020c ciccheda rāmaḥ saṃkruddhaḥ kharasya samare dhvajam
GE09ram_1-7u:7906: 3.027.021a sa darśanīyo bahudhā vicchinnaḥ kāñcano dhvajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7907: 3.027.021c jagāma dharaṇīṃ sūryo devatānām ivājñayā 3.027.022a taṃ caturbhiḥ kharaḥ kruddho rāmaṃ gātreṣu mārgaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7908: 3.027.022c vivyādha hṛdi marmajño mātaṅgam iva tomaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7909: 3.027.023a sa rāmo bahubhir bāṇaiḥ kharakārmukaniḥsṛtaiḥ 3.027.023c viddho rudhirasiktāṅgo babhūva ruṣito bhṛśam 3.027.024a sa dhanur dhanvināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ pragṛhya paramāhave
GE09ram_1-7u:7910: 3.027.024c mumoca parameṣvāsaḥ ṣaṭ śarān abhilakṣitān 3.027.025a śirasy ekena bāṇena dvābhyāṃ bāhvor athārpayat
GE09ram_1-7u:7911: 3.027.025c tribhiś candrārdhavaktraiś ca vakṣasy abhijaghāna ha
GE09ram_1-7u:7912: 3.027.026a tataḥ paścān mahātejā nārācān bhāskaropamān 3.027.026c jighāṃsū rākṣasaṃ kruddhas trayodaśa śilāśitān 3.027.027a tato 'sya yugam ekena caturbhiś caturo hayān 3.027.027c ṣaṣṭhena ca śiraḥ saṃkhye ciccheda kharasāratheḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7913: 3.027.028a tribhis triveṇuṃ balavān dvābhyām akṣaṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7914: 3.027.028c dvādaśena tu bāṇena kharasya saśaraṃ dhanuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7915: 3.027.028e chittvā vajranikāśena rāghavaḥ prahasann iva 3.027.028g trayodaśenendrasamo bibheda samare kharam
GE09ram_1-7u:7917: 3.027.029c gadāpāṇir avaplutya tasthau bhūmau kharas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:7918: 3.027.030a tat karma rāmasya mahārathasya; sametya devāś ca maharṣayaś ca 3.027.030c apūjayan prāñjalayaḥ prahṛṣṭās; tadā vimānāgragatāḥ sametāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7919: 3.028.001a kharaṃ tu virathaṃ rāmo gadāpāṇim avasthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:7920: 3.028.001c mṛdupūrvaṃ mahātejāḥ paruṣaṃ vākyam abravīt 3.028.002a gajāśvarathasaṃbādhe bale mahati tiṣṭhatā
GE09ram_1-7u:7923: 3.028.003c trayāṇām api lokānām īśvaro 'pi na tiṣṭhati 3.028.004a karma lokaviruddhaṃ tu kurvāṇaṃ kṣaṇadācara 3.028.004c tīkṣṇaṃ sarvajano hanti sarpaṃ duṣṭam ivāgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:7924: 3.028.005a lobhāt pāpāni kurvāṇaḥ kāmād vā yo na budhyate 3.028.005c bhraṣṭaḥ paśyati tasyāntaṃ brāhmaṇī karakād iva
GE09ram_1-7u:7926: 3.028.006c kiṃ nu hatvā mahābhāgān phalaṃ prāpsyasi rākṣasa
GE09ram_1-7u:7927: 3.028.007a na ciraṃ pāpakarmāṇaḥ krūrā lokajugupsitāḥ 3.028.007c aiśvaryaṃ prāpya tiṣṭhanti śīrṇamūlā iva drumāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7928: 3.028.008a avaśyaṃ labhate kartā phalaṃ pāpasya karmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7929: 3.028.008c ghoraṃ paryāgate kāle drumaḥ puṣpam ivārtavam
GE09ram_1-7u:7930: 3.028.009a nacirāt prāpyate loke pāpānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalam
GE09ram_1-7u:7932: 3.028.010a pāpam āccaratāṃ ghoraṃ lokasyāpriyam icchatām 3.028.010c aham āsādito rājā prāṇān hantuṃ niśācara
GE09ram_1-7u:7933: 3.028.011a adya hi tvāṃ mayā muktāḥ śarāḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7934: 3.028.011c vidārya nipatiṣyanti valmīkam iva pannagāḥ 3.028.012a ye tvayā daṇḍakāraṇye bhakṣitā dharmacāriṇaḥ 3.028.012c tān adya nihataḥ saṃkhye sasainyo 'nugamiṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:7935: 3.028.013a adya tvāṃ nihataṃ bāṇaiḥ paśyantu paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7936: 3.028.013c nirayasthaṃ vimānasthā ye tvayā hiṃsitāḥ purā
GE09ram_1-7u:7937: 3.028.014a prahara tvaṃ yathākāmaṃ kuru yatnaṃ kulādhama
GE09ram_1-7u:7938: 3.028.014c adya te pātayiṣyāmi śiras tālaphalaṃ yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:7939: 3.028.015a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa kruddhaḥ saṃraktalocanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7940: 3.028.015c pratyuvāca tato rāmaṃ prahasan krodhamūrchitaḥ 3.028.016a prākṛtān rākṣasān hatvā yuddhe daśarathātmaja 3.028.016c ātmanā katham ātmānam apraśasyaṃ praśaṃsasi 3.028.017a vikrāntā balavanto vā ye bhavanti nararṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7941: 3.028.017c kathayanti na te kiṃ cit tejasā svena garvitāḥ 3.028.018a prākṛtās tv akṛtātmāno loke kṣatriyapāṃsanāḥ 3.028.018c nirarthakaṃ vikatthante yathā rāma vikatthase 3.028.019a kulaṃ vyapadiśan vīraḥ samare ko 'bhidhāsyati
GE09ram_1-7u:7942: 3.028.019c mṛtyukāle hi saṃprāpte svayam aprastave stavam
GE09ram_1-7u:7943: 3.028.020a sarvathā tu laghutvaṃ te katthanena vidarśitam
GE09ram_1-7u:7945: 3.028.021a na tu mām iha tiṣṭhantaṃ paśyasi tvaṃ gadādharam 3.028.021c dharādharam ivākampyaṃ parvataṃ dhātubhiś citam 3.028.022a paryāpto 'haṃ gadāpāṇir hantuṃ prāṇān raṇe tava 3.028.022c trayāṇām api lokānāṃ pāśahasta ivāntakaḥ 3.028.023a kāmaṃ bahv api vaktavyaṃ tvayi vakṣyāmi na tv aham
GE09ram_1-7u:7946: 3.028.023c astaṃ gacched dhi savitā yuddhavighras tato bhavet
GE09ram_1-7u:7947: 3.028.024a caturdaśa sahasrāṇi rākṣasānāṃ hatāni te 3.028.024c tvadvināśāt karomy adya teṣām aśrupramārjanam 3.028.025a ity uktvā paramakruddhas tāṃ gadāṃ paramāṅgadām
GE09ram_1-7u:7948: 3.028.025c kharaś cikṣepa rāmāya pradīptām aśaniṃ yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:7949: 3.028.026a kharabāhupramuktā sā pradīptā mahatī gadā 3.028.026c bhasmavṛkṣāṃś ca gulmāṃś ca kṛtvāgāt tatsamīpataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7950: 3.028.027a tām āpatantīṃ jvalitāṃ mṛtyupāśopamāṃ gadā 3.028.027c antarikṣagatāṃ rāmaś ciccheda bahudhā śaraiḥ 3.028.028a sā viśīrṇā śarair bhinnā papāta dharaṇītale
GE09ram_1-7u:7952: 3.029.001a bhittvā tu tāṃ gadāṃ bāṇai rāghavo dharmavatsalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7953: 3.029.001c smayamānaḥ kharaṃ vākyaṃ saṃrabdham idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:7954: 3.029.002a etat te balasarvasvaṃ darśitaṃ rākṣasādhama 3.029.002c śaktihīnataro matto vṛthā tvam upagarjitam 3.029.003a eṣā bāṇavinirbhinnā gadā bhūmitalaṃ gatā 3.029.003c abhidhānapragalbhasya tava pratyayaghātinī
GE09ram_1-7u:7955: 3.029.004a yat tvayoktaṃ vinaṣṭānām idam aśrupramārjanam 3.029.004c rākṣasānāṃ karomīti mithyā tad api te vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7957: 3.029.005c prāṇān apahariṣyāmi garutmān amṛtaṃ yathā 3.029.006a adya te bhinnakaṇṭhasya
GE09ram_1-7u:7958: 3.029.006c vidāritasya madbāṇair mahī pāsyati śoṇitam 3.029.007a pāṃsurūṣitasarvāṅgaḥ srastanyastabhujadvayaḥ 3.029.007c svapsyase gāṃ samāśliṣya durlabhāṃ pramadām iva
GE09ram_1-7u:7960: 3.029.008c bhaviṣyanty aśaraṇyānāṃ śaraṇyā daṇḍakā ime 3.029.009a janasthāne hatasthāne tava rākṣasamaccharaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7961: 3.029.009c nirbhayā vicariṣyanti sarvato munayo vane 3.029.010a adya viprasariṣyanti rākṣasyo
GE09ram_1-7u:7963: 3.029.011a adya śokarasajñās tā bhaviṣyanti niśācara 3.029.011c anurūpakulāḥ patnyo yāsāṃ tvaṃ patir īdṛśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7965: 3.029.012c tvatkṛte śaṅkitair agnau munibhiḥ pātyate haviḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7966: 3.029.013a tam evam abhisaṃrabdhaṃ bruvāṇaṃ rāghavaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:7967: 3.029.013c kharo nirbhartsayām āsa roṣāt kharatara svanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7968: 3.029.014a dṛḍhaṃ khalv avalipto 'si bhayeṣv api ca nirbhayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7969: 3.029.014c vācyāvācyaṃ tato hi tvaṃ mṛtyuvaśyo na budhyase
GE09ram_1-7u:7970: 3.029.015a kālapāśaparikṣiptā bhavanti puruṣā hi ye 3.029.015c kāryākāryaṃ na jānanti te nirastaṣaḍindriyāḥ 3.029.016a evam uktvā tato rāmaṃ saṃrudhya bhṛkuṭiṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7971: 3.029.016c sa dadarśa mahāsālam avidūre niśācaraḥ 3.029.017a raṇe praharaṇasyārthe sarvato hy avalokayan 3.029.017c sa tam utpāṭayām āsa saṃdṛśya daśanacchadam
GE09ram_1-7u:7972: 3.029.018a taṃ samutkṣipya bāhubhyāṃ vinarditvā mahābalaḥ 3.029.018c rāmam uddiśya cikṣepa hatas tvam iti cābravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:7973: 3.029.019a tam āpatantaṃ bāṇaughaiś chittvā rāmaḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_1-7u:7974: 3.029.019c roṣam āhārayat tīvraṃ nihantuṃ samare kharam
GE09ram_1-7u:7975: 3.029.020a jātasvedas tato rāmo roṣād raktāntalocanaḥ 3.029.020c nirbibheda sahasreṇa bāṇānāṃ samare kharam 3.029.021a tasya bāṇāntarād raktaṃ bahu susrāva phenilam
GE09ram_1-7u:7977: 3.029.022a vihvalaḥ sa kṛto bāṇaiḥ kharo rāmeṇa saṃyuge
GE09ram_1-7u:7978: 3.029.022c matto rudhiragandhena tam evābhyadravad drutam 3.029.023a tam āpatantaṃ saṃrabdhaṃ kṛtāstro rudhirāplutam 3.029.023c apasarpat pratipadaṃ kiṃ cit tvaritavikramaḥ 3.029.024a tataḥ pāvakasaṃkāśaṃ badhāya samare śaram 3.029.024c kharasya rāmo jagrāha brahmadaṇḍam ivāparam 3.029.025a sa tad dattaṃ maghavatā surarājena dhīmatā
GE09ram_1-7u:7979: 3.029.025c saṃdadhe ca sa dharmātmā mumoca ca kharaṃ prati 3.029.026a sa vimukto mahābāṇo
GE09ram_1-7u:7980: 3.029.026c rāmeṇa dhanur udyamya kharasyorasi cāpatat 3.029.027a sa papāta kharo bhūmau dahyamānaḥ śarāgninā
GE09ram_1-7u:7982: 3.029.028a sa vṛtra iva vajreṇa phenena namucir yathāa
GE09ram_1-7u:7983: 3.029.028c balo vendrāśanihato nipapāta hataḥ kharaḥ 3.029.029a tato rājarṣayaḥ sarve saṃgatāḥ paramarṣayaḥ 3.029.029c sabhājya muditā rāmam idaṃ vacanam abruvan
GE09ram_1-7u:7986: 3.029.031a ānītas tvam imaṃ deśam upāyena maharṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7987: 3.029.031c eṣāṃ vadhārthaṃ krūrāṇāṃ rakṣasāṃ pāpakarmaṇām 3.029.032a tad idaṃ naḥ kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ tvayā daśarathātmaja
GE09ram_1-7u:7988: 3.029.032c sukhaṃ dharmaṃ cariṣyanti daṇḍakeṣu maharṣayaḥ 3.029.033a etasminn antare vīro lakṣmaṇaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_1-7u:7990: 3.029.034a tato rāmas tu vijayī pūjyamāno maharṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:7992: 3.029.035a taṃ dṛṣṭvā śatruhantāraṃ maharṣīṇāṃ sukhāvaham 3.029.035c babhūva hṛṣṭā vaidehī bhartāraṃ pariṣasvaje 3.030.001a tataḥ śūrpaṇakhā dṛṣṭvā sahasrāṇi caturdaśa 3.030.001c hatāny ekena rāmeṇa rakṣasāṃ bhīmakarmaṇām 3.030.002a dūṣaṇaṃ ca kharaṃ caiva hataṃ triśirasaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:7993: 3.030.002c dṛṣṭvā punar mahānādaṃ nanāda jaladopamā 3.030.003a sā dṛṣṭvā karma rāmasya kṛtam anyaiḥ suduṣkaram
GE09ram_1-7u:7995: 3.030.004a sa dadarśa vimānāgre rāvaṇaṃ dīptatejasaṃ 3.030.004c upopaviṣṭaṃ sacivair marudbhir iva vāsavam 3.030.005a āsīnaṃ sūryasaṃkāśe kāñcane paramāsane
GE09ram_1-7u:7996: 3.030.005c rukmavedigataṃ prājyaṃ jvalantam iva pāvakam 3.030.006a devagandharvabhūtānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca mahātmanām
GE09ram_1-7u:7997: 3.030.006c ajeyaṃ samare śūraṃ vyāttānanam ivāntakam 3.030.007a devāsuravimardeṣu vajrāśanikṛtavraṇam 3.030.007c airāvataviṣāṇāgrair utkṛṣṭakiṇavakṣasaṃ 3.030.008a viṃśadbhujaṃ daśagrīvaṃ darśanīyaparicchadam
GE09ram_1-7u:7999: 3.030.009a snigdhavaidūryasaṃkāśaṃ taptakāñcanakuṇḍalam 3.030.009c subhujaṃ śukladaśanaṃ mahāsyaṃ parvatopamam
GE09ram_1-7u:8001: 3.030.010c āhatāṅgaṃ samastaiś ca devapraharaṇais tathā 3.030.011a akṣobhyāṇāṃ samudrāṇāṃ kṣobhaṇaṃ kṣiprakāriṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:8002: 3.030.011c kṣeptāraṃ parvatāgrāṇāṃ surāṇāṃ ca pramardanam 3.030.012a ucchettāraṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:8004: 3.030.013a purīṃ bhogavatīṃ gatvā parājitya ca vāsukim
GE09ram_1-7u:8005: 3.030.013c takṣakasya priyāṃ bhāryāṃ parājitya jahāra yaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8006: 3.030.014a kailāsaṃ parvataṃ gatvā vijitya naravāhanam 3.030.014c vimānaṃ puṣpakaṃ tasya kāmagaṃ vai jahāra yaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8007: 3.030.015a vanaṃ caitrarathaṃ divyaṃ nalinīṃ nandanaṃ vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:8008: 3.030.015c vināśayati yaḥ krodhād devodyānāni vīryavān 3.030.016a candrasūryau mahābhāgāv uttiṣṭhantau paraṃtapau
GE09ram_1-7u:8011: 3.030.017c purā svayambhuve dhīraḥ śirāṃsy upajahāra yaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8013: 3.030.018c abhayaṃ yasya saṃgrāme mṛtyuto mānuṣād ṛte
GE09ram_1-7u:8014: 3.030.019a mantrar abhituṣṭaṃ puṇyam adhvareṣu dvijātibhiḥ 3.030.019c havirdhāneṣu yaḥ somam upahanti mahābalaḥ 3.030.020a āptayajñaharaṃ krūraṃ brahmaghnaṃ duṣṭacāriṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:8015: 3.030.020c karkaśaṃ niranukrośaṃ prajānām ahite ratam 3.030.020e rāvaṇaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:8016: 3.030.021a rākṣasī bhrātaraṃ krūraṃ sā dadarśa mahābalam
GE09ram_1-7u:8019: 3.030.022a tam abravīd dīptaviśālalocanaṃ; pradarśayitvā bhayamohamūrchitā 3.030.022c sudāruṇaṃ vākyam abhītacāriṇī; mahātmanā śūrpaṇakhā virūpitā
GE09ram_1-7u:8020: 3.031.001a tataḥ śūrpaṇakhā dīnā rāvaṇaṃ lokarāvaṇam 3.031.001c amātyamadhye saṃkruddhā paruṣaṃ vākyam abravīt 3.031.002a pramattaḥ kāmabhogeṣu svairavṛtto niraṅkuśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8021: 3.031.002c samutpannaṃ bhayaṃ ghoraṃ boddhavyaṃ nāvabudhyase 3.031.003a saktaṃ grāmyeṣu bhogeṣu kāmavṛttaṃ mahīpatim 3.031.003c lubdhaṃ na bahu manyante śmaśānāgnim iva prajāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8022: 3.031.004a svayaṃ kāryāṇi yaḥ kāle nānutiṣṭhati pārthivaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8023: 3.031.004c sa tu vai saha rājyena taiś ca kāryair vinaśyati
GE09ram_1-7u:8025: 3.031.005c varjayanti narā dūrān nadīpaṅkam iva dvipāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8026: 3.031.006a ye na rakṣanti viṣayam asvādhīnā narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8027: 3.031.006c te na vṛddhyā prakāśante girayaḥ sāgare yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:8029: 3.031.007c ayuktacāraś capalaḥ kathaṃ rājā bhaviṣyasi 3.031.008a yeṣāṃ cāraś ca kośaś ca nayaś ca jayatāṃ vara
GE09ram_1-7u:8030: 3.031.008c asvādhīnā narendrāṇāṃ prākṛtais te janaiḥ samāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8031: 3.031.009a yasmāt paśyanti dūrasthān sarvān arthān narādhipāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8032: 3.031.009c cāreṇa tasmād ucyante rājāno dīrghacakṣuṣaḥ 3.031.010a ayuktacāraṃ manye tvāṃ prākṛtaiḥ sacivair vṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:8033: 3.031.010c svajanaṃ ca janasthānaṃ hataṃ yo nāvabudhyase
GE09ram_1-7u:8035: 3.031.011c hatāny ekena rāmeṇa kharaś ca sahadūṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8036: 3.031.012a ṛṣīṇām abhayaṃ dattaṃ kṛtakṣemāś ca daṇḍakāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8038: 3.031.013a tvaṃ tu lubdhaḥ pramattaś ca parādhīnaś ca rāvaṇa 3.031.013c viṣaye sve samutpannaṃ bhayaṃ yo nāvabudhyase
GE09ram_1-7u:8039: 3.031.014a tīkṣṇam alpapradātāraṃ pramattaṃ garvitaṃ śaṭham 3.031.014c vyasane sarvabhūtāni nābhidhāvanti pārthivam
GE09ram_1-7u:8042: 3.031.016a nānutiṣṭhati kāryāṇi bhayeṣu na bibheti ca
GE09ram_1-7u:8043: 3.031.016c kṣipraṃ rājyāc cyuto dīnas tṛṇais tulyo bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:8044: 3.031.017a śuṣkakāṣṭhair bhavet kāryaṃ loṣṭair api ca pāṃsubhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8045: 3.031.017c na tu sthānāt paribhraṣṭaiḥ kāryaṃ syād vasudhādhipaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8046: 3.031.018a upabhuktaṃ yathā vāsaḥ srajo vā mṛditā yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:8048: 3.031.019a apramattaś ca yo rājā sarvajño vijitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8049: 3.031.019c kṛtajño dharmaśīlaś ca sa rājā tiṣṭhate ciram
GE09ram_1-7u:8050: 3.031.020a nayanābhyāṃ prasupto 'pi jāgarti nayacakṣuṣā 3.031.020c vyaktakrodhaprasādaś ca sa rājā pūjyate janaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8051: 3.031.021a tvaṃ tu rāvaṇadurbuddhir guṇair etair vivarjitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8052: 3.031.021c yasya te 'viditaś cārai rakṣasāṃ sumahān vadhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8053: 3.031.022a parāvamantā viṣayeṣu saṃgato; nadeśa kālapravibhāga tattvavit
GE09ram_1-7u:8054: 3.031.022c ayuktabuddhir guṇadoṣaniścaye; vipannarājyo na cirād vipatsyate
GE09ram_1-7u:8055: 3.031.023a iti svadoṣān parikīrtitāṃs tayā; samīkṣya buddhyā kṣaṇadācareśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8056: 3.031.023c dhanena darpeṇa balena cānvito; vicintayām āsa ciraṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ 3.032.001a tataḥ śūrpaṇakhāṃ kruddhāṃ bruvatīṃ paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8058: 3.032.002a kaś ca rāmaḥ kathaṃ vīryaḥ kiṃ rūpaḥ kiṃ parākramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8059: 3.032.002c kimarthaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ praviṣṭaś ca suduścaram 3.032.003a āyudhaṃ kiṃ ca rāmasya nihatā yena rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8060: 3.032.003c kharaś ca nihataṃ saṃkhye dūṣaṇas triśirās tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:8061: 3.032.004a ity uktā rākṣasendreṇa rākṣasī krodhamūrchitā 3.032.004c tato rāmaṃ yathānyāyam ākhyātum upacakrame 3.032.005a dīrghabāhur viśālākṣaś cīrakṛṣṇājināmbaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8064: 3.032.006c dīptān kṣipati nārācān sarpān iva mahāviṣān
GE09ram_1-7u:8065: 3.032.007a nādadānaṃ śarān ghorān na muñcantaṃ mahābalam
GE09ram_1-7u:8066: 3.032.007c na kārmukaṃ vikarṣantaṃ rāmaṃ paśyāmi saṃyuge
GE09ram_1-7u:8067: 3.032.008a hanyamānaṃ tu tat sainyaṃ paśyāmi śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8068: 3.032.008c indreṇaivottamaṃ sasyam āhataṃ tv aśmavṛṣṭibhiḥ 3.032.009a rakṣasāṃ bhīmavīryāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi caturdaśa
GE09ram_1-7u:8069: 3.032.009c nihatāni śarais tīkṣṇais tenaikena padātinā 3.032.010a ardhādhikamuhūrtena kharaś ca sahadūṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8070: 3.032.010c ṛṣīṇām abhayaṃ dattaṃ kṛtakṣemāś ca daṇḍakāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8071: 3.032.011a ekā kathaṃ cin muktāhaṃ paribhūya mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:8073: 3.032.012a bhrātā cāsya mahātejā guṇatas tulyavikramaḥ 3.032.012c anuraktaś ca bhaktaś ca lakṣmaṇo nāma vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:8074: 3.032.013a amarṣī durjayo jetā vikrānto buddhimān balī
GE09ram_1-7u:8075: 3.032.013c rāmasya dakṣiṇe bāhur nityaṃ prāṇo bahiṣcaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8076: 3.032.014a rāmasya tu viśālākṣī dharmapatnī yaśasvinī 3.032.014c sītā nāma varārohā vaidehī tanumadhyamā 3.032.015a naiva devī na gandharvā na yakṣī na ca kiṃnarī
GE09ram_1-7u:8077: 3.032.015c tathārūpā mayā nārī dṛṣṭapūrvā mahītale 3.032.016a yasya sītā bhaved bhāryā yaṃ ca hṛṣṭā pariṣvajet 3.032.016c atijīvet sa sarveṣu lokeṣv api puraṃdarāt
GE09ram_1-7u:8078: 3.032.017a sā suśīlā vapuḥślāghyā rūpeṇāpratimā bhuvi 3.032.017c tavānurūpā bhāryā sā tvaṃ ca tasyās tathā patiḥ 3.032.018a tāṃ tu vistīrṇajaghanāṃ pīnottuṅgapayodharām
GE09ram_1-7u:8079: 3.032.018c bhāryārthe tu tavānetum udyatāhaṃ varānanām 3.032.019a tāṃ tu dṛṣṭvādya vaidehīṃ pūrṇacandranibhānanām 3.032.019c manmathasya śarāṇāṃ ca tvaṃ vidheyo bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:8080: 3.032.020a yadi tasyām abhiprāyo bhāryārthe tava jāyate
GE09ram_1-7u:8081: 3.032.020c śīghram uddhriyatāṃ pādo jayārtham iha dakṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8082: 3.032.021a kuru priyaṃ tathā teṣāṃ rakṣasāṃ rākṣaseśvara
GE09ram_1-7u:8084: 3.032.022a taṃ śarair niśitair hatvā lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahāratham
GE09ram_1-7u:8085: 3.032.022c hatanāthāṃ sukhaṃ sītāṃ yathāvad upabhokṣyase 3.032.023a rocate yadi te vākyaṃ mamaitad rākṣaseśvara
GE09ram_1-7u:8086: 3.032.023c kriyatāṃ nirviśaṅkena vacanaṃ mama rāghava 3.032.024a niśamya rāmeṇa śarair ajihmagair; hatāñ janasthānagatān niśācarān
GE09ram_1-7u:8087: 3.032.024c kharaṃ ca buddhvā nihataṃ ca dūṣaṇaṃ; tvam adya kṛtyaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:8088: pratipattum arhasi 3.033.001a tataḥ śūrpaṇakhā vākyaṃ tac chrutvā romaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:8089: 3.033.001c sacivān abhyanujñāya kāryaṃ buddhvā jagāma ha
GE09ram_1-7u:8090: 3.033.002a tat kāryam anugamyātha yathāvad upalabhya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:8091: 3.033.002c doṣāṇāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca saṃpradhārya balābalam
GE09ram_1-7u:8092: 3.033.003a iti kartavyam ity eva kṛtvā niścayam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8093: 3.033.003c sthirabuddhis tato ramyāṃ yānaśālāṃ jagāma ha
GE09ram_1-7u:8094: 3.033.004a yānaśālāṃ tato gatvā pracchannaṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ 3.033.004c sūtaṃ saṃcodayām āsa rathaḥ saṃyujyatām iti
GE09ram_1-7u:8095: 3.033.005a evam uktaḥ kṣaṇenaiva sārathir laghuvikramaḥ 3.033.005c rathaṃ saṃyojayām āsa tasyābhimatam uttamam 3.033.006a kāñcanaṃ ratham āsthāya kāmagaṃ ratnabhūṣitam 3.033.006c piśācavadanair yuktaṃ kharaiḥ kanakabhūṣaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8099: 3.033.008c snigdhavaidūryasaṃkāśas taptakāñcanabhūṣaṇaḥ 3.033.009a daśāsyo viṃśatibhujo darśanīya paricchadaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8101: 3.033.010a kāmagaṃ ratham āsthāya śuśubhe rākṣasādhipaḥ 3.033.010c vidyunmaṇḍalavān meghaḥ sabalāka ivāmbare
GE09ram_1-7u:8107: 3.033.013c sālais tālais tamālaiś ca tarubhiś ca supuṣpitaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8109: 3.033.014c nāgaiḥ suparṇair gandharvaiḥ kiṃnaraiś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8110: 3.033.015a jitakāmaiś ca siddhaiś ca cāmaṇaiś copaśobhitam
GE09ram_1-7u:8111: 3.033.015c ājair vaikhānasair māṣair vālakhilyair marīcipaiḥ 3.033.016a divyābharaṇamālyābhir divyarūpābhir āvṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:8113: 3.033.017a sevitaṃ devapatnībhiḥ śrīmatībhiḥ śriyā vṛtam 3.033.017c devadānavasaṃghaiś ca caritaṃ tv amṛtāśibhiḥ 3.033.018a haṃsakrauñcaplavākīrṇaṃ sārasaiḥ saṃpraṇāditam
GE09ram_1-7u:8120: 3.033.021c vanāni paśyan saumyāni ghrāṇatṛptikarāṇi ca 3.033.022a agarūṇāṃ ca mukhyānāṃ vanāny upavanāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:8121: 3.033.022c takkolānāṃ ca jātyānāṃ phalānāṃ ca sugandhinām
GE09ram_1-7u:8122: 3.033.023a puṣpāṇi ca tamālasya gulmāni maricasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:8123: 3.033.023c muktānāṃ ca samūhāni śuṣyamāṇāni tīrataḥ 3.033.024a śaṅkhānāṃ prastaraṃ caiva pravālanicayaṃ tathā 3.033.024c kāñcanāni ca śailāni rājatāni ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8124: 3.033.025a prasravāṇi manojñāni prasannāni hradāni ca 3.033.025c dhanadhānyopapannāni strīratnair āvṛtāni ca
