GE09ram_1-7u:8126: 3.033.026c taṃ samaṃ sarvataḥ snigdhaṃ mṛdusaṃsparśamārutam 3.033.027a anūpaṃ sindhurājasya dadarśa tridivopamam
GE09ram_1-7u:8127: 3.033.027c tatrāpaśyat sa meghābhaṃ nyagrodham ṛṣibhir vṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:8128: 3.033.028a samantād yasya tāḥ śākhāḥ śatayojanam āyatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8129: 3.033.028c yasya hastinam ādāya mahākāyaṃ ca kaccapam
GE09ram_1-7u:8130: 3.033.028e bhakṣārthaṃ garuḍaḥ śākhām ājagāma mahābalaḥ 3.033.029a tasya tāṃ sahasā śākhāṃ bhāreṇa patagottamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8132: 3.033.030a tatra vaikhānasā māṣā vālakhilyā marīcipāḥ 3.033.030c ajā babhūvur dhūmrāś ca saṃgatāḥ paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8133: 3.033.031a teṣāṃ dayārthaṃ garuḍas tāṃ śākhāṃ śatayojanām
GE09ram_1-7u:8134: 3.033.031c jagāmādāya vegena tau cobhau gajakacchapau 3.033.032a ekapādena dharmātmā bhakṣayitvā tad āmiṣam 3.033.032c niṣādaviṣayaṃ hatvā śākhayā patagottamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8135: 3.033.032e praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe mokṣayitvā mahāmunīn 3.033.033a sa tenaiva praharṣeṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:8136: 3.033.033c amṛtānayanārthaṃ vai cakāra matimān matim 3.033.034a ayojālāni nirmathya bhittvā ratnagṛhaṃ varam 3.033.034c mahendrabhavanād guptam ājahārāmṛtaṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8138: 3.033.035c nāmnā subhadraṃ nyagrodhaṃ dadarśa dhanadānujaḥ 3.033.036a taṃ tu gatvā paraṃ pāraṃ samudrasya nadīpateḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8139: 3.033.036c dadarśāśramam ekānte puṇye ramye vanāntare 3.033.037a tatra kṛṣṇājinadharaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:8140: 3.033.037c dadarśa niyatāhāraṃ mārīcaṃ nāma rākṣasaṃ 3.033.038a sa rāvaṇaḥ samāgamya vidhivat tena rakṣasā
GE09ram_1-7u:8141: 3.033.038c tataḥ paścād idaṃ vākyam abravīd vākyakovidaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8142: 3.034.001a mārīca śrūyatāṃ tāta vacanaṃ mama bhāṣataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8143: 3.034.001c ārto 'smi mama cārtasya bhavān hi paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8144: 3.034.002a jānīṣe tvaṃ janasthānaṃ bhrātā yatra kharo mama
GE09ram_1-7u:8145: 3.034.002c dūṣaṇaś ca mahābāhuḥ svasā śūrpaṇakhā ca me
GE09ram_1-7u:8146: 3.034.003a triśirāś ca mahātejā rākṣasaḥ piśitāśanaḥ 3.034.003c anye ca bahavaḥ śūrā labdhalakṣā
GE09ram_1-7u:8147: 3.034.004a vasanti manniyogena adhivāsaṃ ca rākṣasaḥ 3.034.004c bādhamānā mahāraṇye munīn ye dharmacāriṇaḥ 3.034.005a caturdaśa sahasrāṇi rakṣasāṃ bhīmakarmaṇām
GE09ram_1-7u:8149: 3.034.006a te tv idānīṃ janasthāne vasamānā mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8150: 3.034.006c saṃgatāḥ param āyattā rāmeṇa saha saṃyuge
GE09ram_1-7u:8152: 3.034.007c anuktvā paruṣaṃ kiṃ cic charair vyāpāritaṃ dhanuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8154: 3.034.008c nihatāni śarais tīkṣṇair mānuṣeṇa padātinā 3.034.009a kharaś ca nihataḥ saṃkhye dūṣaṇaś ca nipātitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8155: 3.034.009c hatvā triśirasaṃ cāpi nirbhayā daṇḍakāḥ kṛtāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8156: 3.034.010a pitrā nirastaḥ kruddhena sabhāryaḥ kṣīṇajīvitaḥ 3.034.010c sa hantā tasya sainyasya rāmaḥ kṣatriyapāṃsanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8158: 3.034.011c tyaktadharmas tv adharmātmā bhūtānām ahite rataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8159: 3.034.012a yena vairaṃ vināraṇye sattvam āśritya kevalam
GE09ram_1-7u:8161: 3.034.013a tasya bhāryāṃ janasthānāt sītāṃ surasutopamām 3.034.013c ānayiṣyāmi vikramya sahāyas tatra me bhava
GE09ram_1-7u:8162: 3.034.014a tvayā hy ahaṃ sahāyena pārśvasthena mahābala
GE09ram_1-7u:8163: 3.034.014c bhrātṛbhiś ca surān yuddhe samagrān nābhicintaye
GE09ram_1-7u:8164: 3.034.015a tat sahāyo bhava tvaṃ me samartho hy asi rākṣasa
GE09ram_1-7u:8165: 3.034.015c vīrye yuddhe ca darpe ca na hy asti sadṛśas tava
GE09ram_1-7u:8166: 3.034.016a etadartham ahaṃ prāptas tvatsamīpaṃ niśācara 3.034.016c śṛṇu tat karma sāhāyye yat kāryaṃ vacanān mama 3.034.017a sauvarṇas tvaṃ mṛgo bhūtvā citro rajatabindubhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8167: 3.034.017c āśrame tasya rāmasya sītāyāḥ pramukhe cara
GE09ram_1-7u:8168: 3.034.018a tvāṃ tu niḥsaṃśayaṃ sītā dṛṣṭvā tu mṛgarūpiṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:8169: 3.034.018c gṛhyatām iti bhartāraṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ cābhidhāsyati 3.034.019a tatas tayor apāye tu śūnye sītāṃ yathāsukham
GE09ram_1-7u:8170: 3.034.019c nirābādho hariṣyāmi rāhuś candraprabhām iva 3.034.020a tataḥ paścāt sukhaṃ rāme bhāryāharaṇakarśite 3.034.020c visrabdhaṃ prahariṣyāmi kṛtārthenāntarātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:8171: 3.034.021a tasya rāmakathāṃ śrutvā mārīcasya mahātmanaḥ 3.034.021c śuṣkaṃ samabhavad vaktraṃ paritrasto babhūva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:8172: 3.034.022a sa rāvaṇaṃ trastaviṣaṇṇacetā; mahāvane rāmaparākramajñaḥ 3.034.022c kṛtāñjalis tattvam uvāca vākyaṃ; hitaṃ ca tasmai hitam ātmanaś ca
GE09ram_1-7u:8173: 3.035.001a tac chrutvā rākṣasendrasya vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ 3.035.001c pratyuvāca mahāprājño mārīco rākṣaseśvaram
GE09ram_1-7u:8174: 3.035.002a sulabhāḥ puruṣā rājan satataṃ priyavādinaḥ 3.035.002c apriyasya ca pathyasya vaktā śrotā ca durlabhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8175: 3.035.003a na nūnaṃ budhyase rāmaṃ mahāvīryaṃ guṇonnatam
GE09ram_1-7u:8177: 3.035.004a api svasti bhavet tāta sarveṣāṃ bhuvi rakṣasām
GE09ram_1-7u:8178: 3.035.004c api rāmo na saṃkruddhaḥ kuryāl lokam arākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:8179: 3.035.005a api te jīvitāntāya notpannā janakātmajā 3.035.005c api sītā nimittaṃ ca na bhaved vyasanaṃ mahat 3.035.006a api tvām īśvaraṃ prāpya kāmavṛttaṃ niraṅkuśam
GE09ram_1-7u:8180: 3.035.006c na vinaśyet purī laṅkā tvayā saha sarākṣasā
GE09ram_1-7u:8181: 3.035.007a tvadvidhaḥ kāmavṛtto hi duḥśīlaḥ pāpamantritaḥ 3.035.007c ātmānaṃ svajanaṃ rāṣṭraṃ sa rājā hanti durmatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8182: 3.035.008a na ca pitrā parityakto nāmaryādaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_1-7u:8183: 3.035.008c na lubdho na ca duḥśīlo na ca kṣatriyapāṃsanaḥ 3.035.009a na ca dharmaguṇair hīnaiḥ kausalyānandavardhanaḥ 3.035.009c na ca tīkṣṇo hi bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ ca hite rataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8184: 3.035.010a vañcitaṃ pitaraṃ dṛṣṭvā kaikeyyā satyavādinam 3.035.010c kariṣyāmīti dharmātmā tataḥ pravrajito vanam 3.035.011a kaikeyyāḥ priyakāmārthaṃ pitur daśarathasya ca 3.035.011c hitvā rājyaṃ ca bhogāṃś ca praviṣṭo daṇḍakāvanam
GE09ram_1-7u:8185: 3.035.012a na rāmaḥ karkaśas tāta nāvidvān nājitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8186: 3.035.012c anṛtaṃ na śrutaṃ caiva naiva tvaṃ vaktum arhasi 3.035.013a rāmo vigrahavān dharmaḥ sādhuḥ satyaparākramaḥ 3.035.013c rājā sarvasya lokasya devānām iva vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8187: 3.035.014a kathaṃ tvaṃ tasya vaidehīṃ rakṣitāṃ svena tejasā
GE09ram_1-7u:8188: 3.035.014c icchasi prasabhaṃ hartuṃ prabhām iva vivasvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8190: 3.035.015c rāmāgniṃ sahasā dīptaṃ na praveṣṭuṃ tvam arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:8193: 3.035.017a rājyaṃ sukhaṃ ca saṃtyajya jīvitaṃ ceṣṭam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8195: 3.035.018a aprameyaṃ hi tat tejo yasya sā janakātmajā
GE09ram_1-7u:8196: 3.035.018c na tvaṃ samarthas tāṃ hartuṃ rāmacāpāśrayāṃ vane
GE09ram_1-7u:8198: 3.035.019c dīptasyeva hutāśasya śikhā sītā sumadhyamā 3.035.020a kim udyamaṃ vyartham imaṃ kṛtvā te rākṣasādhipa
GE09ram_1-7u:8199: 3.035.020c dṛṣṭaś cet tvaṃ raṇe tena tad antaṃ tava jīvitam
GE09ram_1-7u:8200: 3.035.020e jīvitaṃ ca sukhaṃ caiva rājyaṃ caiva sudurlabham
GE09ram_1-7u:8201: 3.035.021a sa sarvaiḥ sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ vibhīṣaṇapuraskṛtaiḥ 3.035.021c mantrayitvā tu dharmiṣṭhaiḥ kṛtvā niścayam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8202: 3.035.022a doṣāṇāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca saṃpradhārya balābalam
GE09ram_1-7u:8203: 3.035.022c ātmanaś ca balaṃ jñātvā rāghavasya ca tattvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8204: 3.035.022e hitaṃ hi tava niścitya kṣamaṃ tvaṃ kartum arhasi 3.035.023a ahaṃ tu manye tava na kṣamaṃ raṇe; samāgamaṃ kosalarājasūnunā 3.035.023c idaṃ hi bhūyaḥ śṛṇu vākyam uttamaṃ; kṣamaṃ ca yuktaṃ ca niśācarādhipa 3.036.001a kadā cid apy ahaṃ vīryāt paryaṭan pṛthivīm imām 3.036.001c balaṃ nāgasahasrasya dhārayan parvatopamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8205: 3.036.002a nīlajīmūtasaṃkāśas taptakāñcanakuṇḍalaḥ 3.036.002c bhayaṃ lokasya janayan kirīṭī parighāyudhaḥ 3.036.002e vyacaraṃ daṇḍakāraṇyam ṛṣimāṃsāni bhakṣayan
GE09ram_1-7u:8207: 3.036.003c svayaṃ gatvā daśarathaṃ narendram idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:8208: 3.036.004a ayaṃ rakṣatu māṃ rāmaḥ parvakāle samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8209: 3.036.004c mārīcān me bhayaṃ ghoraṃ samutpannaṃ nareśvara
GE09ram_1-7u:8210: 3.036.005a ity evam ukto dharmātmā rājā daśarathas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:8212: 3.036.006a ūna ṣoḍaśa varṣo 'yam akṛtāstraś ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8213: 3.036.006c kāmaṃ tu mama yat sainyaṃ mayā saha gamiṣyati 3.036.006e badhiṣyāmi muniśreṣṭha śatruṃ tava yathepsitam 3.036.007a ity evam uktaḥ sa munī rājānaṃ punar abravīt 3.036.007c rāmān nānyad balaṃ loke paryāptaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8214: 3.036.008a bālo 'py eṣa mahātejāḥ samarthas tasya nigrahe 3.036.008c gamiṣye rāmam ādāya svasti te 'stu paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8215: 3.036.009a ity evam uktvā sa munis tam ādāya nṛpātmajam 3.036.009c jagāma paramaprīto viśvāmitraḥ svam āśramam 3.036.010a taṃ tadā daṇḍakāraṇye yajñam uddiśya dīkṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:8216: 3.036.010c babhūvāvasthito rāmaś citraṃ visphārayan dhanuḥ 3.036.011a ajātavyañjanaḥ śrīmān bālaḥ śyāmaḥ śubhekṣaṇaḥ 3.036.011c ekavastradharo dhanvī śikhī kanakamālayā
GE09ram_1-7u:8217: 3.036.012a śobhayan daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ dīptena svena tejasā 3.036.012c adṛśyata tadā rāmo bālacandra ivoditaḥ 3.036.013a tato 'haṃ meghasaṃkāśas taptakāñcanakuṇḍalaḥ 3.036.013c balī dattavaro darpād ājagāma tadāśramam 3.036.014a tena dṛṣṭaḥ praviṣṭo 'haṃ sahasaivodyatāyudhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8218: 3.036.014c māṃ tu dṛṣṭvā dhanuḥ sajyam asaṃbhrāntaś cakāra ha 3.036.015a avajānann ahaṃ mohād bālo 'yam iti rāghavam 3.036.015c viśvāmitrasya tāṃ vedim adhyadhāvaṃ kṛtatvaraḥ 3.036.016a tena muktas tato bāṇaḥ śitaḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8219: 3.036.016c tenāhaṃ tāḍitaḥ kṣiptaḥ samudre śatayojane 3.036.017a rāmasya śaravegena nirasto
GE09ram_1-7u:8221: 3.036.017e prāpya saṃjñāṃ cirāt tāta laṅkāṃ prati gataḥ purīm 3.036.018a evam asmi tadā muktaḥ sahāyās te nipātitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8223: 3.036.019a tan mayā vāryamāṇas tvaṃ yadi rāmeṇa vigraham
GE09ram_1-7u:8224: 3.036.019c kariṣyasy āpadaṃ ghorāṃ kṣipraṃ prāpya naśiṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:8226: 3.036.020c rakṣasāṃ caiva saṃtāpam anarthaṃ cāhariṣyasi 3.036.021a harmyaprāsādasaṃbādhāṃ nānāratnavibhūuṣitām 3.036.021c drakṣyasi tvaṃ purīṃ laṅkāṃ vinaṣṭāṃ maithilīkṛte
GE09ram_1-7u:8228: 3.036.022c parapāpair vinaśyanti matsyā nāgahrade yathā 3.036.023a divyacandanadigdhāṅgān divyābharaṇabhūṣitān 3.036.023c drakṣyasy abhihatān bhūmau tava doṣāt tu rākṣasān
GE09ram_1-7u:8229: 3.036.024a hṛtadārān sadārāṃś ca daśavidravato diśaḥ 3.036.024c hataśeṣān aśaraṇān drakṣyasi tvaṃ niśācarān 3.036.025a śarajālaparikṣiptām agnijvālāsamāvṛtām 3.036.025c pradagdhabhavanāṃ laṅkāṃ drakṣyasi tvam asaṃśayam 3.036.026a pramadānāṃ sahasrāṇi tava rājan parigrahaḥ 3.036.026c bhava svadāranirataḥ svakulaṃ rakṣarākṣasa
GE09ram_1-7u:8230: 3.036.027a mānaṃ vṛddhiṃ ca rājyaṃ ca jīvitaṃ ceṣṭam iātmanaḥ 3.036.027c yadīcchasi ciraṃ bhoktuṃ mā kṛthā rāma vipriyam
GE09ram_1-7u:8231: 3.036.028a nivāryamāṇaḥ suhṛdā mayā bhṛśaṃ; prasahya sītāṃ yadi
GE09ram_1-7u:8233: 3.036.028c gamiṣyasi kṣīṇabalaḥ sabāndhavo; yamakṣayaṃ rāmaśarāttajīvitaḥ 3.037.001a evam asmi tadā muktaḥ kathaṃ cit tena saṃyuge 3.037.001c idānīm api yad vṛttaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva yad uttaram 3.037.002a rākṣasābhyām ahaṃ dvābhyām anirviṇṇas tathā kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8238: 3.037.004c atyantaghoro vyacaraṃs tāpasāṃs tān pradharṣayan 3.037.005a nihatya daṇḍakāraṇye tāpasān dharmacāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8239: 3.037.005c rudhirāṇi pibaṃs teṣāṃ tathā māṃsāni bhakṣayan
GE09ram_1-7u:8241: 3.037.006c tadā rudhiramatto 'haṃ vyacaraṃ daṇḍakāvanam 3.037.007a tadāhaṃ daṇḍakāraṇye vicaran dharmadūṣakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8242: 3.037.007c āsādayaṃ tadā rāmaṃ tāpasaṃ dharmam āśritam
GE09ram_1-7u:8243: 3.037.008a vaidehīṃ ca mahābhāgāṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahāratham
GE09ram_1-7u:8248: 3.037.010c jighāṃsur akṛtaprajñas taṃ prahāram anusmaran 3.037.011a tena muktās trayo bāṇāḥ śitāḥ śatrunibarhaṇāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8250: 3.037.012a te bāṇā vajrasaṃkāśāḥ sughorā raktabhojanāḥ 3.037.012c ājagmuḥ sahitāḥ sarve trayaḥ saṃnataparvaṇaḥ 3.037.013a parākramajño rāmasya śaṭho dṛṣṭabhayaḥ purā 3.037.013c samutkrāntas tato muktas tāv ubhau rākṣasau hatau
GE09ram_1-7u:8251: 3.037.014a śareṇa mukto rāmasya kathaṃ cit prāpya jīvitam
GE09ram_1-7u:8253: 3.037.015a vṛkṣe vṛkṣe hi paśyāmi cīrakṛṣṇājināmbaram 3.037.015c gṛhītadhanuṣaṃ rāmaṃ pāśahastam
GE09ram_1-7u:8254: 3.037.016a api rāmasahasrāṇi bhītaḥ paśyāmi rāvaṇa 3.037.016c rāmabhūtam idaṃ sarvam araṇyaṃ pratibhāti me
GE09ram_1-7u:8255: 3.037.017a rāmam eva hi paśyāmi rahite rākṣaseśvara
GE09ram_1-7u:8256: 3.037.017c dṛṣṭvā svapnagataṃ rāmam udbhramāmi vicetanaḥ 3.037.018a rakārādīni nāmāni rāmatrastasya
GE09ram_1-7u:8257: 3.037.018c ratnāni ca rathāś caiva trāsaṃ saṃjanayanti me
GE09ram_1-7u:8258: 3.037.019a ahaṃ tasya prabhāvajño na yuddhaṃ tena te kṣamam 3.037.019c raṇe rāmeṇa yudhyasva kṣamāṃ vā kuru rākṣasa
GE09ram_1-7u:8259: 3.037.019e na te rāmakathā kāryā yadi māṃ draṣṭum icchasi 3.037.020a idaṃ vaco bandhuhitārthinā mayā; yathocyamānaṃ yadi nābhipatsyase
GE09ram_1-7u:8260: 3.037.020c sabāndhavas tyakṣyasi jīvitaṃ raṇe; hato 'dya rāmeṇa śarair ajihmagaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8261: 3.038.001a mārīcena tu tad vākyaṃ kṣamaṃ yuktaṃ ca rāvaṇaḥ 3.038.001c ukto na pratijagrāha martukāma ivauṣadham 3.038.002a taṃ pathyahitavaktāraṃ mārīcaṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8262: 3.038.002c abravīt paruṣaṃ vākyam ayuktaṃ kālacoditaḥ 3.038.003a yat kilaitad ayuktārthaṃ mārīca mayi kathyate
GE09ram_1-7u:8263: 3.038.003c vākyaṃ niṣphalam atyarthaṃ bījam uptam ivoṣare
GE09ram_1-7u:8264: 3.038.004a tvadvākyair na tu māṃ śakyaṃ bhettuṃ rāmasya saṃyuge 3.038.004c pāpaśīlasya mūrkhasya mānuṣasya viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8265: 3.038.005a yas tyaktvā suhṛdo rājyaṃ mātaraṃ pitaraṃ tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:8266: 3.038.005c strīvākyaṃ prākṛtaṃ śrutvā vanam ekapade gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8267: 3.038.006a avaśyaṃ tu mayā tasya saṃyuge kharaghātinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8268: 3.038.006c prāṇaiḥ priyatarā sītā hartavyā tava saṃnidhau
GE09ram_1-7u:8269: 3.038.007a evaṃ me niścitā buddhir hṛdi mārīca vartate
GE09ram_1-7u:8270: 3.038.007c na vyāvartayituṃ śakyā sendrair api surāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8271: 3.038.008a doṣaṃ guṇaṃ vā saṃpṛṣṭas tvam evaṃ vaktum arhasi 3.038.008c apāyaṃ vāpy upāyaṃ vā kāryasyāsya viniścane
GE09ram_1-7u:8272: 3.038.009a saṃpṛṣṭena tu vaktavyaṃ sacivena vipaścitā 3.038.009c udyatāñjalinā rājño ya icched bhūtim ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8273: 3.038.010a vākyam apratikūlaṃ tu mṛdupūrvaṃ śubhaṃ hitam
GE09ram_1-7u:8274: 3.038.010c upacāreṇa yuktaṃ ca vaktavyo vasudhādhipaḥ 3.038.011a sāvamardaṃ tu yad vākyaṃ mārīca hitam ucyate
GE09ram_1-7u:8275: 3.038.011c nābhinandati tad rājā mānārho mānavarjitam 3.038.012a pañcarūpāṇi rājāno dhārayanty
GE09ram_1-7u:8276: 3.038.012c agner indrasya somasya yamasya varuṇasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:8277: 3.038.012e auṣṇyaṃ tathā vikramaṃ ca saumyaṃ daṇḍaṃ prasannatām
GE09ram_1-7u:8278: 3.038.013a tasmāt sarvāsv avasthāsu mānyāḥ pūjyāś ca pārthivāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8279: 3.038.013c tvaṃ tu dharmam avijñāya kevalaṃ moham āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8280: 3.038.014a abhyāgataṃ māṃ daurātmyāt paruṣaṃ vadasīdṛśam 3.038.014c guṇadoṣau na pṛcchāmi kṣamaṃ cātmani rākṣasa
GE09ram_1-7u:8281: 3.038.014e asmiṃs tu sa bhavān kṛtye sāhāryyaṃ kartum arhasi 3.038.015a sauvarṇas tvaṃ mṛgo bhūtvā citro rajatabindubhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8282: 3.038.015c pralobhayitvā vaidehīṃ yatheṣṭaṃ gantum arhasi 3.038.016a tvāṃ tu māyā mṛgaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāñcanaṃ jātavismayā
GE09ram_1-7u:8283: 3.038.016c ānayainam iti kṣipraṃ rāmaṃ vakṣyati maithilī
GE09ram_1-7u:8284: 3.038.017a apakrānte ca kākutsthe lakṣmaṇe ca yathāsukham
GE09ram_1-7u:8285: 3.038.017c ānayiṣyāmi vaidehīṃ sahasrākṣaḥ śacīm iva 3.038.018a evaṃ kṛtvā tv idaṃ kāryaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ gaccha rākṣasa 3.038.018c rājyasyārdhaṃ pradāsyāmi mārīca tava suvrata 3.038.019a gaccha saumya śivaṃ mārgaṃ kāryasyāsya vivṛddhaye
GE09ram_1-7u:8286: 3.038.019c prāpya sītām ayuddhena vañcayitvā tu rāghavam
GE09ram_1-7u:8287: 3.038.019e laṅkāṃ prati gamiṣyāmi kṛtakāryaḥ saha tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:8288: 3.038.020a etat kāryam avaśyaṃ me balād api kariṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:8289: 3.038.020c rājño hi pratikūlastho na jātu sukham edhate
GE09ram_1-7u:8290: 3.038.021a āsādyā taṃ jīvitasaṃśayas te; mṛtyur dhruvo hy adya mayā virudhya
GE09ram_1-7u:8291: 3.038.021c etad yathāvat parigṛhya buddhyā; yad atra pathyaṃ kuru tat tathā tvam 3.039.001a ājñapto rājavad vākyaṃ pratikūlaṃ niśācaraḥ 3.039.001c abravīt paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ mārīco rākṣasādhipam 3.039.002a kenāyam upadiṣṭas te vināśaḥ pāpakarmaṇā 3.039.002c saputrasya sarāṣṭrasya sāmātyasya niśācara
GE09ram_1-7u:8292: 3.039.003a kas tvayā sukhinā rājan nābhinandati pāpakṛt
GE09ram_1-7u:8293: 3.039.003c kenedam upadiṣṭaṃ te mṛtyudvāram upāyataḥ 3.039.004a śatravas tava suvyaktaṃ hīnavīryā niśācara 3.039.004c icchanti tvāṃ vinaśyantam uparuddhaṃ balīyasā 3.039.005a kenedam upadiṣṭaṃ te kṣudreṇāhitavādinā
GE09ram_1-7u:8294: 3.039.005c yas tvām icchati naśyantaṃ svakṛtena niśācara
GE09ram_1-7u:8295: 3.039.006a vadhyāḥ khalu na hanyante sacivās tava rāvaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:8296: 3.039.006c ye tvām utpatham ārūḍhaṃ na nigṛhṇanti sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8297: 3.039.007a amātyaiḥ kāmavṛtto hi rājā kāpatham āśritaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8298: 3.039.007c nigrāhyaḥ sarvathā sadbhir na nigrāhyo nigṛhyase
GE09ram_1-7u:8299: 3.039.008a dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca yaśaś ca jayatāṃ vara
GE09ram_1-7u:8301: 3.039.009a viparyaye tu tat sarvaṃ vyarthaṃ bhavati rāvaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:8303: 3.039.010a rājamūlo hi dharmaś ca jayaś ca jayatāṃ vara 3.039.010c tasmāt sarvāsv avasthāsu rakṣitavyo narādhipaḥ 3.039.011a rājyaṃ pālayituṃ śakyaṃ na tīkṣṇena niśācara
GE09ram_1-7u:8304: 3.039.011c na cāpi pratikūlena nāvinītena rākṣasa 3.039.012a ye tīkṣṇamantrāḥ sacivā bhajyante saha tena vai
GE09ram_1-7u:8305: 3.039.012c viṣameṣu rathāḥ śīghraṃ mandasārathayo yathā 3.039.013a bahavaḥ sādhavo loke yuktadharmam anuṣṭhitāḥ 3.039.013c pareṣām aparādhena vinaṣṭāḥ saparicchadāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8306: 3.039.014a svāminā pratikūlena prajās tīkṣṇena rāvaṇa 3.039.014c rakṣyamāṇā na vardhante meṣā gomāyunā yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:8308: 3.039.015c yeṣāṃ tvaṃ karkaśo rājā durbuddhir ajitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8309: 3.039.016a tad idaṃ kākatālīyaṃ ghoram āsāditaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:8310: 3.039.016c atra kiṃ śobhanaṃ yat tvaṃ sasainyo vinaśiṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:8311: 3.039.017a māṃ nihatya tu rāmo 'sau nacirāt tvāṃ vadhiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:8312: 3.039.017c anena kṛtakṛtyo 'smi mriye yad ariṇā hataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8313: 3.039.018a darśanād eva rāmasya hataṃ mām upadhāraya
GE09ram_1-7u:8314: 3.039.018c ātmānaṃ ca hataṃ viddhi hṛtvā sītāṃ sabāndhavam
GE09ram_1-7u:8315: 3.039.019a ānayiṣyāmi cet sītām āśramāt sahito mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:8316: 3.039.019c naiva tvam asi naivāhaṃ naiva laṅkā na rākṣasāḥ 3.039.020a nivāryamāṇas tu mayā hitaiṣiṇā; na mṛṣyase vākyam idaṃ niśācara 3.039.020c paretakalpā hi gatāyuṣo narā; hitaṃ na gṛhṇanti suhṛdbhir īritam 3.040.001a evam uktvā tu paruṣaṃ mārīco rāvaṇo tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8317: 3.040.001c gacchāvety abravīd dīno bhayād rātriṃcaraprabhoḥ 3.040.002a dṛṣṭāś cāhaṃ punas tena śaracāpāsidhāriṇā 3.040.002c madvidhodyataśastreṇa vinaṣṭaṃ jīvitaṃ ca me 3.040.003a kiṃ tu kartuṃ mayā śakyam evaṃ tvayi durātmani 3.040.003c eṣa gacchāmy ahaṃ tāta svasti te 'stu niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8318: 3.040.004a prahṛṣṭas tv abhavat tena vacanena sa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8319: 3.040.004c pariṣvajya susaṃśliṣṭam idaṃ vacanam abravīt 3.040.005a etac chauṇḍīryayuktaṃ te macchabdād iva bhāṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:8320: 3.040.005c idānīm asi mārīcaḥ pūrvam anyo niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8321: 3.040.006a āruhyatām ayaṃ śīghraṃ khago ratnavibhūṣitaḥ 3.040.006c mayā saha ratho yuktaḥ piśācavadanaiḥ kharaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8322: 3.040.007a tato rāvaṇamārīcau vimānam iva taṃ ratham
GE09ram_1-7u:8323: 3.040.007c āruhya yayatuḥ śīghraṃ tasmād āśramamaṇḍalāt 3.040.008a tathaiva tatra paśyantau pattanāni vanāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:8324: 3.040.008c girīṃś ca saritaḥ sarvā rāṣṭrāṇi nagarāṇi ca
GE09ram_1-7u:8327: 3.040.010a avatīrya rathāt tasmāt tataḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇāt 3.040.010c haste gṛhītvā mārīcaṃ rāvaṇo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:8329: 3.040.011c kriyatāṃ tat sakhe śīghraṃ yadarthaṃ vayam āgatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8330: 3.040.012a sa rāvaṇavacaḥ śrutvā mārīco rākṣasas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:8331: 3.040.012c mṛgo bhūtvāśramadvāri rāmasya vicacāra ha 3.040.013a maṇipravaraśṛṅgāgraḥ sitāsitamukhākṛtiḥ 3.040.013c raktapadmotpalamukha indranīlotpalaśravāḥ 3.040.014a kiṃ cid abhyunnata grīva indranīlanibhodaraḥ 3.040.014c madhūkanibhapārśvaś ca kañjakiñjalkasaṃnibhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8335: 3.040.016c kṣaṇena rākṣaso jāto mṛgaḥ paramaśobhanaḥ 3.040.017a vanaṃ prajvalayan ramyaṃ rāmāśramapadaṃ ca tat
GE09ram_1-7u:8336: 3.040.017c manoharaṃ darśanīyaṃ rūpaṃ kṛtvā sa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8338: 3.040.018c vicaran gacchate samyak śādvalāni samantataḥ 3.040.019a rūpyabinduśataiś citro bhūtvā ca priyadarśanaḥ 3.040.019c viṭapīnāṃ kisalayān bhaṅktvādan vicacāra ha 3.040.020a kadalīgṛhakaṃ gatvā karṇikārān itas tataḥ 3.040.020c samāśrayan mandagatiḥ sītāsaṃdarśanaṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:8341: 3.040.022a punar gatvā nivṛttaś ca vicacāra mṛgottamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8342: 3.040.022c gatvā muhūrtaṃ tvarayā punaḥ pratinivartate 3.040.023a vikrīḍaṃś ca punar bhūmau punar eva niṣīdati
GE09ram_1-7u:8344: 3.040.024a mṛgayūthair anugataḥ punar eva nivartate 3.040.024c sītādarśanam ākāṅkṣan rākṣaso mṛgatāṃ gataḥ 3.040.025a paribhramati citrāṇi maṇḍalāni viniṣpatan
GE09ram_1-7u:8345: 3.040.025c samudvīkṣya ca sarve taṃ mṛgā ye 'nye vanecarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8346: 3.040.026a upagamya samāghrāya vidravanti diśo daśa 3.040.026c rākṣasaḥ so 'pi tān vanyān mṛgān mṛgavadhe rataḥ 3.040.027a pracchādanārthaṃ bhāvasya na bhakṣayati saṃspṛśan 3.040.027c tasminn eva tataḥ kāle vaidehī śubhalocanā
GE09ram_1-7u:8348: 3.040.028c karṇikārān aśokāṃś ca cūṭāṃś ca madirekṣaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:8350: 3.040.029c anarhāraṇyavāsasya sā taṃ ratnamayaṃ mṛgam 3.040.029e muktāmaṇivicitrāṅgaṃ dadarśa
GE09ram_1-7u:8353: 3.040.031a sa ca tāṃ rāma dayitāṃ paśyan māyāmayo mṛgaḥ 3.040.031c vicacāra tatas tatra dīpayann iva tad vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:8354: 3.040.032a adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ nānāratnamayaṃ mṛgam 3.040.032c vismayaṃ paramaṃ sītā jagāma janakātmajā 3.041.001a sā taṃ saṃprekṣya suśroṇī kusumāni vicinvatī
GE09ram_1-7u:8357: 3.041.002c bhartāram api cākrandal lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva sāyudham
GE09ram_1-7u:8359: 3.041.003c vīkṣamāṇau tu taṃ deśaṃ tadā dadṛśatur mṛgam
GE09ram_1-7u:8360: 3.041.004a śaṅkamānas tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇo rāmam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:8361: 3.041.004c tam evainam ahaṃ manye mārīcaṃ rākṣasaṃ mṛgam
GE09ram_1-7u:8362: 3.041.005a caranto mṛgayāṃ hṛṣṭāḥ pāpenopādhinā vane 3.041.005c anena nihatā rāma rājānaḥ kāmarūpiṇā 3.041.006a asya māyāvido māyā mṛgarūpam idaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:8363: 3.041.006c bhānumatpuruṣavyāghra gandharvapurasaṃnibham 3.041.007a mṛgo hy evaṃvidho ratnavicitro nāsti rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:8364: 3.041.007c jagatyāṃ jagatīnātha māyaiṣā hi na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8365: 3.041.008a evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ kākutsthaṃ prativārya śucismitā 3.041.008c uvāca sītā saṃhṛṣṭā chadmanā hṛtacetanā 3.041.009a āryaputrābhirāmo 'sau mṛgo harati me manaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8366: 3.041.009c ānayainaṃ mahābāho krīḍārthaṃ no bhaviṣyati 3.041.010a ihāśramapade 'smākaṃ bahavaḥ puṇyadarśanāḥ 3.041.010c mṛgāś caranti sahitāś camarāḥ sṛmarās tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:8367: 3.041.011a ṛkṣāḥ pṛṣatasaṃghāś ca vānarāḥ kinarās tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:8369: 3.041.012a na cāsya sadṛśo rājan dṛṣṭapūrvo mṛgaḥ purā
GE09ram_1-7u:8370: 3.041.012c tejasā kṣamayā dīptyā yathāyaṃ mṛgasattamaḥ 3.041.013a nānāvarṇavicitrāṅgo ratnabindusamācitaḥ 3.041.013c dyotayan vanam avyagraṃ śobhate śaśisaṃnibhaḥ 3.041.014a aho rūpam aho lakṣmīḥ svarasaṃpac ca śobhanā
GE09ram_1-7u:8372: 3.041.015a yadi grahaṇam abhyeti jīvann eva mṛgas tava
GE09ram_1-7u:8374: 3.041.016a samāptavanavāsānāṃ rājyasthānāṃ ca naḥ punaḥ 3.041.016c antaḥpuravibhūṣārtho mṛga eṣa bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:8375: 3.041.017a bharatasyāryaputrasya śvaśrūṇāṃ mama ca prabho 3.041.017c mṛgarūpam idaṃ divyaṃ vismayaṃ janayiṣyati 3.041.018a jīvan na yadi te 'bhyeti grahaṇaṃ mṛgasattamaḥ 3.041.018c ajinaṃ naraśārdūla ruciraṃ me bhaviṣyati 3.041.019a nihatasyāsya sattvasya jāmbūnadamayatvaci
GE09ram_1-7u:8376: 3.041.019c śaṣpabṛsyāṃ vinītāyām icchāmy aham upāsitum 3.041.020a kāmavṛttam idaṃ raudraṃ strīṇām asadṛśaṃ matam
GE09ram_1-7u:8377: 3.041.020c vapuṣā tv asya sattvasya vismayo janito mama
GE09ram_1-7u:8379: 3.041.021c taruṇādityavarṇena nakṣatrapathavarcasā 3.041.021e babhūva rāghavasyāpi mano vismayam āgatam 3.041.022a evaṃ sītāvacaḥ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā ca mṛgam adbhutam
GE09ram_1-7u:8380: 3.041.022c uvāca rāghavo hṛṣṭo bhrātaraṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8381: 3.041.023a paśya lakṣmaṇa vaidehyāḥ spṛhāṃ mṛgagatām imām
GE09ram_1-7u:8382: 3.041.023c rūpaśreṣṭhatayā hy eṣa mṛgo 'dya na bhaviṣyati 3.041.024a na vane nandanoddeśe na caitrarathasaṃśraye 3.041.024c kutaḥ pṛthivyāṃ saumitre yo 'sya kaś cit samo mṛgaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8384: 3.041.025c śobhante mṛgam āśritya citrāḥ kanakabindubhiḥ 3.041.026a paśyāsya jṛmbhamāṇasya dīptām agniśikhopamām
GE09ram_1-7u:8385: 3.041.026c jihvāṃ mukhān niḥsarantīṃ meghād iva śatahradām
GE09ram_1-7u:8386: 3.041.027a masāragalvarkamukhaḥ śaṅkhamuktānibhodaraḥ 3.041.027c kasya nāmānirūpyo 'sau na mano lobhayen mṛgaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8387: 3.041.028a kasya rūpam idaṃ dṛṣṭvā jāmbūnadamaya prabham
GE09ram_1-7u:8388: 3.041.028c nānāratnamayaṃ divyaṃ na mano vismayaṃ vrajet
GE09ram_1-7u:8389: 3.041.029a māṃsahetor api mṛgān vihārārthaṃ ca dhanvinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8390: 3.041.029c ghnanti lakṣmaṇa rājāno mṛgayāyāṃ mahāvane 3.041.030a dhanāni vyavasāyena vicīyante
GE09ram_1-7u:8392: 3.041.031a tat sāram akhilaṃ nṝṇāṃ dhanaṃ nicayavardhanam
GE09ram_1-7u:8393: 3.041.031c manasā cintitaṃ sarvaṃ yathā śukrasya lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:8395: 3.041.032c tam artham arthaśāstrajñaḥ prāhur arthyāś ca lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:8397: 3.041.033c upavekṣyati vaidehī mayā saha sumadhyamā 3.041.034a na kādalī na priyakī na praveṇī na cāvikī 3.041.034c bhaved etasya sadṛśī sparśaneneti me matiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8398: 3.041.035a eṣa caiva mṛgaḥ śrīmān yaś ca divyo nabhaścaraḥ 3.041.035c ubhāv etau mṛgau divyau tārāmṛgamahīmṛgau 3.041.036a yadi vāyaṃ tathā yan māṃ bhaved vadasi lakṣmaṇa 3.041.036c māyaiṣā rākṣasasyeti kartavyo 'sya vadho mayā 3.041.037a etena hi nṛśaṃsena mārīcenākṛtātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:8399: 3.041.037c vane vicaratā pūrvaṃ hiṃsitā munipuṃgavāḥ 3.041.038a utthāya bahavo yena mṛgayāyāṃ janādhipāḥ 3.041.038c nihatāḥ parameṣvāsās tasmād vadhyas tv ayaṃ mṛgaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8400: 3.041.039a purastād iha vātāpiḥ paribhūya tapasvinaḥ 3.041.039c udarastho dvijān hanti svagarbho 'śvatarīm iva
GE09ram_1-7u:8401: 3.041.040a sa kadā cic cirāl loke āsasāda mahāmunim
GE09ram_1-7u:8402: 3.041.040c agastyaṃ tejasā yuktaṃ bhakṣyas tasya babhūva ha
GE09ram_1-7u:8403: 3.041.041a samutthāne ca tad rūpaṃ kartukāmaṃ samīkṣya tam
GE09ram_1-7u:8404: 3.041.041c utsmayitvā tu bhagavān vātāpim idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:8405: 3.041.042a tvayāvigaṇya vātāpe paribhūtāś ca tejasā 3.041.042c jīvaloke dvijaśreṣṭhās tasmād asi jarāṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8406: 3.041.043a evaṃ tan na bhaved rakṣo vātāpir iva lakṣmaṇa 3.041.043c madvidhaṃ yo 'timanyeta dharmanityaṃ jitendriyam 3.041.044a bhaved dhato 'yaṃ vātāpir agastyeneva mā gatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8407: 3.041.044c iha tvaṃ bhava saṃnaddho yantrito rakṣa maithilīm
GE09ram_1-7u:8408: 3.041.045a asyām āyattam asmākaṃ yat kṛtyaṃ raghunandana
GE09ram_1-7u:8409: 3.041.045c aham enaṃ vadhiṣyāmi grahīṣyāmy atha vā mṛgam
GE09ram_1-7u:8410: 3.041.046a yāvad gacchāmi saumitre mṛgam ānayituṃ drutam
GE09ram_1-7u:8411: 3.041.046c paśya lakṣmaṇa vaidehīṃ mṛgatvaci gataspṛhām 3.041.047a tvacā pradhānayā hy eṣa mṛgo 'dya na bhaviṣyati 3.041.047c apramattena te bhāvyam āśramasthena sītayā 3.041.048a yāvat pṛṣatam ekena sāyakena nihanmy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:8412: 3.041.048c hatvaitac carma ādāya śīghram eṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:8413: 3.041.049a pradakṣiṇenātibalena pakṣiṇā; jaṭāyuṣā buddhimatā ca lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:8414: 3.041.049c bhavāpramattaḥ pratigṛhya maithilīṃ; pratikṣaṇaṃ sarvata eva
GE09ram_1-7u:8416: 3.042.001a tathā tu taṃ samādiśya bhrātaraṃ raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8419: 3.042.002c ābadhya ca kalāpau dvau jagāmodagravikramaḥ 3.042.003a taṃ vañcayāno rājendram āpatantaṃ nirīkṣya vai
GE09ram_1-7u:8421: 3.042.004a baddhāsir dhanur ādāya pradudrāva yato mṛgaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8422: 3.042.004c taṃ sa paśyati rūpeṇa dyotamānam ivāgrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8424: 3.042.005c ativṛttam iṣoḥ pātāl lobhayānaṃ kadā cana
GE09ram_1-7u:8425: 3.042.006a śaṅkitaṃ tu samudbhrāntam utpatantam ivāmbare 3.042.006c daśyamānam adṛśyaṃ ca navoddeśeṣu keṣu cit
GE09ram_1-7u:8426: 3.042.007a chinnābhrair iva saṃvītaṃ śāradaṃ candramaṇḍalam 3.042.007c muhūrtād eva dadṛśe muhur dūrāt prakāśate
GE09ram_1-7u:8428: 3.042.008c āsīt kruddhas tu kākutstho vivaśas tena mohitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8429: 3.042.009a athāvatasthe suśrāntaś chāyām āśritya śādvale 3.042.009c mṛgaiḥ parivṛto vanyair adūrāt pratyadṛśyata 3.042.010a dṛṣṭvā rāmo mahātejās taṃ hantuṃ kṛtaniścayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8430: 3.042.010c saṃdhāya sudṛḍhe cāpe vikṛṣya balavad balī
GE09ram_1-7u:8431: 3.042.011a tam eva mṛgam uddiśya jvalantam iva pannagam
GE09ram_1-7u:8433: 3.042.012a sa bhṛśaṃ mṛgarūpasya vinirbhidya śarottamaḥ 3.042.012c mārīcasyaiva hṛdayaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:8434: 3.042.013a tālamātram athotpatya nyapatat sa śarāturaḥ 3.042.013c vyanadad bhairavaṃ nādaṃ dharaṇyām alpajīvitaḥ 3.042.013e mriyamāṇas tu mārīco jahau tāṃ kṛtrimāṃ tanum
GE09ram_1-7u:8435: 3.042.014a saṃprāptakālam ājñāya cakāra ca tataḥ svaram
GE09ram_1-7u:8436: 3.042.014c sadṛśaṃ rāghavasyaiva hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca
GE09ram_1-7u:8437: 3.042.015a tena marmaṇi nirviddhaḥ śareṇānupamena hi 3.042.015c mṛgarūpaṃ tu tat tyaktvā rākṣasaṃ rūpam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8438: 3.042.015e cakre sa sumahākāyo mārīco jīvitaṃ tyajan
GE09ram_1-7u:8441: 3.042.017a taṃ dṛṣṭvā patitaṃ bhūmau rākṣasaṃ ghoradarśanam
GE09ram_1-7u:8442: 3.042.017c jagāma manasā sītāṃ lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ smaran
GE09ram_1-7u:8443: 3.042.018a hā sīte lakṣmaṇety evam ākruśya tu mahāsvaram
GE09ram_1-7u:8444: 3.042.018c mamāra rākṣasaḥ so 'yaṃ śrutvā sītā kathaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_1-7u:8445: 3.042.019a lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābāhuḥ kām avasthāṃ gamiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:8446: 3.042.019c iti saṃcintya dharmātmā rāmo hṛṣṭatanūruhaḥ 3.042.020a tatra rāmaṃ bhayaṃ tīvram āviveśa viṣādajam
GE09ram_1-7u:8447: 3.042.020c rākṣasaṃ mṛgarūpaṃ taṃ hatvā śrutvā ca tat svaram 3.042.021a nihatya pṛṣataṃ cānyaṃ māṃsam ādāya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8449: 3.043.001a ārtasvaraṃ tu taṃ bhartur vijñāya sadṛśaṃ vane
GE09ram_1-7u:8450: 3.043.001c uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ sītā gaccha jānīhi rāghavam
GE09ram_1-7u:8451: 3.043.002a na hi me jīvitaṃ sthāne hṛdayaṃ vāvatiṣṭhate
GE09ram_1-7u:8452: 3.043.002c krośataḥ paramārtasya śrutaḥ śabdo mayā bhṛśam
GE09ram_1-7u:8453: 3.043.003a ākrandamānaṃ tu vane bhrātaraṃ trātum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:8454: 3.043.003c taṃ kṣipram abhidhāva tvaṃ bhrātaraṃ śaraṇaiṣiṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:8455: 3.043.004a rakṣasāṃ vaśam āpannaṃ siṃhānām iva govṛṣam
GE09ram_1-7u:8456: 3.043.004c na jagāma tathoktas tu bhrātur ājñāya śāsanam
GE09ram_1-7u:8457: 3.043.005a tam uvāca tatas tatra kupitā janakātmajā
GE09ram_1-7u:8458: 3.043.005c saumitre mitrarūpeṇa bhrātus tvam asi śatruvat
GE09ram_1-7u:8459: 3.043.006a yas tvam asyām avasthāyāṃ bhrātaraṃ nābhipadyase
GE09ram_1-7u:8460: 3.043.006c icchasi tvaṃ vinaśyantaṃ rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇa matkṛte
GE09ram_1-7u:8461: 3.043.007a vyasanaṃ te priyaṃ manye sneho bhrātari nāsti te 3.043.007c tena tiṣṭhasi visrabdhas tam apaśyan mahādyutim
GE09ram_1-7u:8462: 3.043.008a kiṃ hi saṃśayam āpanne tasminn iha mayā bhavet 3.043.008c kartavyam iha tiṣṭhantyā yat pradhānas tvam āgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8464: 3.043.009c abravīl lakṣmaṇas trastāṃ sītāṃ mṛgavadhūm iva
GE09ram_1-7u:8466: 3.043.010c rākṣaseṣu piśāceṣu kiṃnareṣu mṛgeṣu ca 3.043.011a dānaveṣu ca ghoreṣu na sa vidyeta śobhane
GE09ram_1-7u:8467: 3.043.011c yo rāmaṃ pratiyudhyeta samare vāsavopamam 3.043.012a avadhyaḥ samare rāmo naivaṃ tvaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:8468: 3.043.012c na tvām asmin vane hātum utsahe rāghavaṃ vinā 3.043.013a anivāryaṃ balaṃ tasya balair balavatām api
GE09ram_1-7u:8469: 3.043.013c tribhir lokaiḥ samudyuktaiḥ seśvaraiḥ sāmarair api
GE09ram_1-7u:8470: 3.043.014a hṛdayaṃ nirvṛtaṃ te 'stu saṃtāpas tyajyatām ayam
GE09ram_1-7u:8471: 3.043.014c āgamiṣyati te bhartā śīghraṃ hatvā mṛgottamam
GE09ram_1-7u:8472: 3.043.015a na sa tasya svaro vyaktaṃ na kaś cid api daivataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8473: 3.043.015c gandharvanagaraprakhyā māyā sā tasya rakṣasaḥ 3.043.016a nyāsabhūtāsi vaidehi nyastā mayi mahātmanā 3.043.016c rāmeṇa tvaṃ varārohe na tvāṃ tyaktum ihotsahe
GE09ram_1-7u:8474: 3.043.017a kṛtavairāś ca kalyāṇi vayam etair niśācaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8475: 3.043.017c kharasya nidhane devi janasthānavadhaṃ prati 3.043.018a rākṣasā vidhinā vāco visṛjanti mahāvane 3.043.018c hiṃsāvihārā vaidehi na cintayitum arhasi 3.043.019a lakṣmaṇenaivam uktā tu kruddhā saṃraktalocanā 3.043.019c abravīt paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ satyavādinam 3.043.020a anārya karuṇārambha nṛśaṃsa kulapāṃsana
GE09ram_1-7u:8476: 3.043.020c ahaṃ tava priyaṃ manye tenaitāni prabhāṣase
GE09ram_1-7u:8477: 3.043.021a naitac citraṃ sapatneṣu pāpaṃ lakṣmaṇa yad bhavet
GE09ram_1-7u:8479: 3.043.022a suduṣṭas tvaṃ vane rāmam ekam eko 'nugacchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:8480: 3.043.022c mama hetoḥ praticchannaḥ prayukto bharatena vā
GE09ram_1-7u:8482: 3.043.023c upasaṃśritya bhartāraṃ kāmayeyaṃ pṛthag janam 3.043.024a samakṣaṃ tava saumitre prāṇāṃs tyakṣye na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8483: 3.043.024c rāmaṃ vinā kṣaṇam api na hi jīvāmi bhūtale 3.043.025a ity uktaḥ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ sītayā somaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:8484: 3.043.025c abravīl lakṣmaṇaḥ sītāṃ prāñjalir vijitendriyaḥ 3.043.026a uttaraṃ notsahe vaktuṃ daivataṃ bhavatī mama
GE09ram_1-7u:8485: 3.043.026c vākyam apratirūpaṃ tu na citraṃ strīṣu maithili
GE09ram_1-7u:8486: 3.043.027a svabhāvas tv eṣa nārīṇām eṣu lokeṣu dṛśyate
GE09ram_1-7u:8487: 3.043.027c vimuktadharmāś capalās tīkṣṇā bhedakarāḥ striyaḥ 3.043.028a upaśṛṇvantu me sarve sākṣibhūtā vanecarāḥ 3.043.028c nyāyavādī yathā vākyam ukto 'haṃ paruṣaṃ tvayā 3.043.029a dhik tvām adya praṇaśya tvaṃ yan mām evaṃ viśaṅkase
GE09ram_1-7u:8489: 3.043.030a gamiṣye yatra kākutsthaḥ svasti te 'stu varānane
GE09ram_1-7u:8490: 3.043.030c rakṣantu tvāṃ viśālākṣi samagrā vanadevatāḥ 3.043.031a nimittāni hi ghorāṇi yāni prādurbhavanti me
GE09ram_1-7u:8491: 3.043.031c api tvāṃ saha rāmeṇa paśyeyaṃ punar āgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8492: 3.043.032a lakṣmaṇenaivam uktā tu rudatī janakātmajā 3.043.032c pratyuvāca tato vākyaṃ tīvraṃ bāṣpapariplutā 3.043.033a godāvarīṃ pravekṣyāmi vinā rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇa 3.043.033c ābandhiṣye 'thavā tyakṣye viṣame deham ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8493: 3.043.034a pibāmi vā viṣaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ pravekṣyāmi hutāśanam
GE09ram_1-7u:8494: 3.043.034c na tv ahaṃ rāghavād anyaṃ padāpi puruṣaṃ spṛśe 3.043.035a iti lakṣmaṇam ākruśya sītā duḥkhasamanvitā 3.043.035c pāṇibhyāṃ rudatī duḥkhād udaraṃ prajaghāna ha
GE09ram_1-7u:8495: 3.043.036a tām ārtarūpāṃ vimanā rudantīṃ; saumitrir ālokya viśālanetrām
GE09ram_1-7u:8496: 3.043.036c āśvāsayām āsa na caiva bhartus; taṃ bhrātaraṃ kiṃ cid uvāca sītā
GE09ram_1-7u:8497: 3.043.037a tatas tu sītām abhivādya lakṣmaṇaḥ; kṛtāñjaliḥ kiṃ cid
GE09ram_1-7u:8499: 3.043.037c avekṣamāṇo bahuśaś ca maithilīṃ; jagāma rāmasya samīpam ātmavān
GE09ram_1-7u:8500: 3.044.001a tayā paruṣam uktas tu kupito rāghavānujaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8501: 3.044.001c sa vikāṅkṣan bhṛśaṃ rāmaṃ pratasthe nacirād iva
GE09ram_1-7u:8502: 3.044.002a tadāsādya daśagrīvaḥ kṣipram antaram āsthitaḥ 3.044.002c abhicakrāma vaidehīṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:8504: 3.044.003c vāme cāṃse 'vasajyātha śubhe yaṣṭikamaṇḍalū 3.044.003e parivrājakarūpeṇa vaidehīṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:8505: 3.044.004a tām āsasādātibalo bhrātṛbhyāṃ rahitāṃ vane 3.044.004c rahitāṃ sūryacandrābhyāṃ saṃdhyām iva mahattamaḥ 3.044.005a tām apaśyat tato bālāṃ rājaputrīṃ yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:8506: 3.044.005c rohiṇīṃ śaśinā hīnāṃ grahavad bhṛśadāruṇaḥ 3.044.006a tam ugraṃ pāpakarmāṇaṃ janasthānaruhā drumāḥ 3.044.006c samīkṣya na prakampante na pravāti ca mārutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8507: 3.044.007a śīghrasrotāś ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā vīkṣantaṃ raktalocanam
GE09ram_1-7u:8508: 3.044.007c stimitaṃ gantum ārebhe bhayād godāvarī nadī
GE09ram_1-7u:8509: 3.044.008a rāmasya tv antaraṃ prepsur daśagrīvas tadantare
GE09ram_1-7u:8510: 3.044.008c upatasthe ca vaidehīṃ bhikṣurūpeṇa rāvaṇaḥ 3.044.009a abhavyo bhavyarūpeṇa bhartāram
GE09ram_1-7u:8511: 3.044.009c abhyavartata vaidehīṃ citrām iva śanaiścaraḥ 3.044.010a sa pāpo bhavyarūpeṇa tṛṇaiḥ kūpa ivāvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8512: 3.044.010c atiṣṭhat prekṣya vaidehīṃ rāmapatnīṃ yaśasvinīm 3.044.011a śubhāṃ ruciradantauṣṭhīṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:8517: 3.044.013c abravīt praśritaṃ vākyaṃ rahite rākṣasādhipaḥ 3.044.014a tām uttamāṃ trilokānāṃ padmahīnām iva śriyam
GE09ram_1-7u:8518: 3.044.014c vibhrājamānāṃ vapuṣā rāvaṇaḥ praśaśaṃsa ha 3.044.015a kā tvaṃ kāñcanavarṇābhe
GE09ram_1-7u:8519: 3.044.015c kamalānāṃ śubhāṃ mālāṃ padminīva ca bibhratī
GE09ram_1-7u:8520: 3.044.016a hrīḥ śrīḥ kīrtiḥ śubhā lakṣmīr apsarā vā śubhānane 3.044.016c bhūtir vā tvaṃ varārohe ratir vā svairacāriṇī
GE09ram_1-7u:8521: 3.044.017a samāḥ śikhariṇaḥ snigdhāḥ pāṇḍurā daśanās tava
GE09ram_1-7u:8522: 3.044.017c viśāle vimale netre raktānte kṛṣṇatārake 3.044.018a viśālaṃ jaghanaṃ pīnam ūrū karikaropamau 3.044.018c etāv upacitau vṛttau sahitau saṃpragalbhitau 3.044.019a pīnonnatamukhau kāntau snigdhatālaphalopamau
GE09ram_1-7u:8525: 3.044.020c mano harasi me rāme nadīkūlam ivāmbhasā
GE09ram_1-7u:8527: 3.044.021c naiva devī na gandharvī na yakṣī na ca kiṃnarī
GE09ram_1-7u:8528: 3.044.022a naivaṃrūpā mayā nārī dṛṣṭapūrvā mahītale 3.044.022c iha vāsaś ca kāntāre cittam unmāthayanti me
GE09ram_1-7u:8529: 3.044.023a sā pratikrāma bhadraṃ te na tvaṃ vastum ihārhasi 3.044.023c rākṣasānām ayaṃ vāso ghorāṇāṃ kāmarūpiṇām 3.044.024a prāsādāgryāṇi ramyāṇi nagaropavanāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:8530: 3.044.024c saṃpannāni sugandhīni yuktāny ācarituṃ tvayā 3.044.025a varaṃ mālyaṃ varaṃ pānaṃ varaṃ vastraṃ ca śobhane 3.044.025c bhartāraṃ ca varaṃ manye tvadyuktam asitekṣaṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:8531: 3.044.026a kā tvaṃ bhavasi rudrāṇāṃ marutāṃ vā śucismite
GE09ram_1-7u:8532: 3.044.026c vasūnāṃ vā varārohe devatā pratibhāsi me
GE09ram_1-7u:8533: 3.044.027a neha gacchantī gandharvā na devā na ca kiṃnarāḥ 3.044.027c rākṣasānām ayaṃ vāsaḥ kathaṃ nu tvam ihāgatā
GE09ram_1-7u:8534: 3.044.028a iha śākhāmṛgāḥ siṃhā dvīpivyāghramṛgās tathā 3.044.028c ṛkṣās tarakṣavaḥ kaṅkāḥ kathaṃ tebhyo na bibhyase
GE09ram_1-7u:8536: 3.044.029c katham ekā mahāraṇye na bibheṣi vanānane
GE09ram_1-7u:8537: 3.044.030a kāsi kasya kutaś ca tvaṃ kiṃnimittaṃ ca daṇḍakān 3.044.030c ekā carasi kalyāṇi ghorān rākṣasasevitān 3.044.031a iti praśastā vaidehī rāvaṇena durātmanā 3.044.031c dvijātiveṣeṇa hi taṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇam āgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:8538: 3.044.031e sarvair atithisatkāraiḥ pūjayām āsa maithilī 3.044.032a upānīyāsanaṃ pūrvaṃ pādyenābhinimantrya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:8539: 3.044.032c abravīt siddham ity eva tadā taṃ saumyadarśanam
GE09ram_1-7u:8540: 3.044.033a dvijātiveṣeṇa samīkṣya maithilī; tam āgataṃ pātrakusumbhadhāriṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:8541: 3.044.033c aśakyam uddveṣṭum upāyadarśanān; nyamantrayad brāhmaṇavad yathāgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:8542: 3.044.034a iyaṃ bṛsī brāhmaṇa kāmam āsyatām; idaṃ ca pādyaṃ pratigṛhyatām iti 3.044.034c idaṃ ca siddhaṃ vanajātam uttamaṃ; tvadartham avyagram ihopabhujyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:8544: 3.044.035c prahasya tasyā haraṇe dhṛtaṃ manaḥ; samarpayām āsa vadhāya
GE09ram_1-7u:8546: 3.044.036a tataḥ suveṣaṃ mṛgayā gataṃ patiṃ; pratīkṣamāṇā sahalakṣmaṇaṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:8547: 3.044.036c nirīkṣamāṇā haritaṃ dadarśa tan; mahad vanaṃ naiva tu rāmalakṣmaṇau 3.045.001a rāvaṇena tu vaidehī tadā pṛṣṭā jihīrṣuṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:8549: 3.045.002a brāhmaṇaś cātithiś caiṣa anukto hi śapeta mām
GE09ram_1-7u:8550: 3.045.002c iti dhyātvā muhūrtaṃ tu sītā vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:8552: 3.045.003c sītā nāmnāsmi bhadraṃ te rāmabhāryā dvijottama
GE09ram_1-7u:8555: 3.045.005a tataḥ saṃvatsarād ūrdhvaṃ samamanyata me patim
GE09ram_1-7u:8558: 3.045.006c kaikeyī nāma bhartāraṃ mamāryā yācate varam
GE09ram_1-7u:8559: 3.045.007a pratigṛhya tu kaikeyī śvaśuraṃ sukṛtena me
GE09ram_1-7u:8561: 3.045.007e dvāv ayācata bhartāraṃ satyasaṃdhaṃ nṛpottamam 3.045.008a nādya bhokṣye na ca svapsye na pāsye 'haṃ kadā cana 3.045.008c eṣa me jīvitasyānto rāmo yady abhiṣicyate
GE09ram_1-7u:8562: 3.045.009a iti bruvāṇāṃ kaikeyīṃ śvaśuro me sa mānadaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8563: 3.045.009c ayācatārthair anvarthair na ca yācñāṃ cakāra sā
GE09ram_1-7u:8564: 3.045.010a mama bhartā mahātejā vayasā pañcaviṃśakaḥ 3.045.010c rāmeti prathito loke guṇavān satyavāk śuciḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8566: 3.045.011a abhiṣekāya tu pituḥ samīpaṃ rāmam āgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:8567: 3.045.011c kaikeyī mama bhartāram ity uvāca drutaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8568: 3.045.012a tava pitrā samājñaptaṃ mamedaṃ śṛṇu rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:8569: 3.045.012c bharatāya pradātavyam idaṃ rājyam akaṇṭakam 3.045.013a tvayā tu khalu vastavyaṃ nava varṣāṇi pañca ca 3.045.013c vane pravraja kākutstha pitaraṃ mocayānṛtāt 3.045.014a tathety uvāca tāṃ rāmaḥ kaikeyīm akutobhayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8570: 3.045.014c cakāra tadvacas tasyā mama bhartā dṛḍhavrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8571: 3.045.015a dadyān na pratigṛhṇīyāt satyabrūyān na cānṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:8572: 3.045.015c etad brāhmaṇa rāmasya vrataṃ dhruvam anuttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:8573: 3.045.016a tasya bhrātā tu vaimātro lakṣmaṇo nāma vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:8575: 3.045.017a sa bhrātā lakṣmaṇo nāma dharmacārī dṛḍhavrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8576: 3.045.017c anvagacchad dhanuṣpāṇiḥ pravrajantaṃ mayā saha 3.045.018a te vayaṃ pracyutā rājyāt kaileyyās tu kṛte trayaḥ 3.045.018c vicarāma dvijaśreṣṭha vanaṃ gambhīram ojasā 3.045.019a samāśvasa muhūrtaṃ tu śakyaṃ vastum iha tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:8577: 3.045.019c āgamiṣyati me bhartā vanyam ādāya puṣkalam
GE09ram_1-7u:8578: 3.045.020a sa tvaṃ nāma ca gotraṃ ca kulam ācakṣva tattvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8579: 3.045.020c ekaś ca daṇḍakāraṇye kimarthaṃ carasi dvija
GE09ram_1-7u:8580: 3.045.021a evaṃ bruvatyāṃ sītāyāṃ rāmapatnyāṃ mahābalaḥ 3.045.021c pratyuvācottaraṃ tīvraṃ rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8582: 3.045.022c ahaṃ sa rāvaṇo nāma sīte rakṣogaṇeśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8583: 3.045.023a tvāṃ tu kāñcanavarṇābhāṃ dṛṣṭvā kauśeyavāsinīm 3.045.023c ratiṃ svakeṣu dāreṣu nādhigacchāmy anindite 3.045.024a bahvīnām uttamastrīṇām āhṛtānām itas tataḥ 3.045.024c sarvāsām eva bhadraṃ te mamāgramahiṣī bhava
GE09ram_1-7u:8584: 3.045.025a laṅkā nāma samudrasya madhye mama mahāpurī
GE09ram_1-7u:8586: 3.045.026a tatra sīte mayā sārdhaṃ vaneṣu vicariṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:8589: 3.045.027c sīte paricariṣyanti bhāryā bhavasi me yadi
GE09ram_1-7u:8590: 3.045.028a rāvaṇenaivam uktā tu kupitā janakātmajā 3.045.028c pratyuvācānavadyāṅgī tam anādṛtya rākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:8592: 3.045.029c mahodadhim ivākṣobhyam ahaṃ rāmam anuvratā 3.045.030a mahābāhuṃ mahoraskaṃ siṃhavikrāntagāminam
GE09ram_1-7u:8593: 3.045.030c nṛsiṃhaṃ siṃhasaṃkāśam ahaṃ rāmam anuvratā 3.045.031a pūrṇacandrānanaṃ vīraṃ rājavatsaṃ jitendriyam
GE09ram_1-7u:8594: 3.045.031c pṛthukīrtiṃ mahābāhum ahaṃ rāmam anuvratā 3.045.032a tvaṃ punar jambukaḥ siṃhīṃ mām ihecchasi durlabhām
GE09ram_1-7u:8595: 3.045.032c nāhaṃ śakyā tvayā spraṣṭum ādityasya prabhā yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:8596: 3.045.033a pādapān kāñcanān nūnaṃ bahūn paśyasi mandabhāk
GE09ram_1-7u:8597: 3.045.033c rāghavasya priyāṃ bhāryāṃ yas tvam icchasi rāvaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:8598: 3.045.034a kṣudhitasya ca siṃhasya mṛgaśatros tarasvinaḥ 3.045.034c āśīviṣasya vadanād daṃṣṭrām ādātum icchasi 3.045.035a mandaraṃ parvataśreṣṭhaṃ pāṇinā hartum icchasi 3.045.035c kālakūṭaṃ viṣaṃ pītvā svastimān gantum icchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:8599: 3.045.036a akṣisūcyā pramṛjasi jihvayā leḍhi ca kṣuram
GE09ram_1-7u:8600: 3.045.036c rāghavasya priyāṃ bhāryām adhigantuṃ tvam icchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:8601: 3.045.037a avasajya śilāṃ kaṇṭhe samudraṃ tartum icchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:8602: 3.045.037c sūryā candramasau cobhau prāṇibhyāṃ hartum icchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:8603: 3.045.037e yo rāmasya priyāṃ bhāryāṃ pradharṣayitum icchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:8604: 3.045.038a agniṃ prajvalitaṃ dṛṣṭvā vastreṇāhartum icchasi 3.045.038c kalyāṇa vṛttāṃ rāmasya yo bhāryāṃ hartum icchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:8605: 3.045.039a ayomukhānāṃ śūlānām agre caritum icchasi 3.045.039c rāmasya sadṛśīṃ bhāryāṃ yo 'dhigantuṃ tvam icchasi 3.045.040a yad antaraṃ siṃhaśṛgālayor vane; yad antaraṃ syandanikāsamudrayoḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8606: 3.045.040c surāgryasauvīrakayor yad antaraṃ; tad antaraṃ dāśarathes
GE09ram_1-7u:8607: tavaiva ca 3.045.041a yad antaraṃ kāñcanasīsalohayor; yad antaraṃ candanavāripaṅkayoḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8608: 3.045.041c yad antaraṃ hastibiḍālayor vane; tad antaraṃ daśarathes tavaiva ca 3.045.042a yad antaraṃ vāyasavainateyayor; yad antaraṃ madgumayūrayor api
GE09ram_1-7u:8609: 3.045.042c yad antaraṃ sārasagṛdhrayor vane; tad antaraṃ dāśarathes
GE09ram_1-7u:8610: tavaiva ca 3.045.043a tasmin sahasrākṣasamaprabhāve; rāme sthite kārmukabāṇapāṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:8611: 3.045.043c hṛtāpi te 'haṃ na jarāṃ gamiṣye; vajraṃ yathā makṣikayāvagīrṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:8612: 3.045.044a itīva tad vākyam aduṣṭabhāvā; sudṛṣṭam uktvā rajanīcaraṃ tam
GE09ram_1-7u:8613: 3.045.044c gātraprakampād vyathitā babhūva; vātoddhatā sā kadalīva tanvī
GE09ram_1-7u:8614: 3.045.045a tāṃ vepamānām upalakṣya sītāṃ; sa rāvaṇo mṛtyusamaprabhāvaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8615: 3.045.045c kulaṃ balaṃ nāma ca karma cātmanaḥ; samācacakṣe bhayakāraṇārtham 3.046.001a evaṃ bruvatyāṃ sītāyāṃ saṃrabdhaḥ paruṣākṣaram 3.046.001c lalāṭe bhrukuṭīṃ kṛtvā rāvaṇaḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:8617: 3.046.002c rāvaṇo nāma bhadraṃ te daśagrīvaḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_1-7u:8619: 3.046.003c vidravanti bhayād bhītā mṛtyor iva sadā prajāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8620: 3.046.004a yena vaiśravaṇo bhrātā vaimātraḥ kāraṇāntare 3.046.004c dvandvam āsāditaḥ krodhād raṇe vikramya nirjitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8621: 3.046.005a madbhayārtaḥ parityajya svam adhiṣṭhānam ṛddhimat 3.046.005c kailāsaṃ parvataśreṣṭham adhyāste naravāhanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8622: 3.046.006a yasya tat puṣpakaṃ nāma vimānaṃ kāmagaṃ śubham
GE09ram_1-7u:8623: 3.046.006c vīryād āvarjitaṃ bhadre yena yāmi vihāyasaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:8624: 3.046.007a mama saṃjātaroṣasya mukhaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva maithili 3.046.007c vidravanti paritrastāḥ surāḥ śakrapurogamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8625: 3.046.008a yatra tiṣṭhāmy ahaṃ tatra māruto vāti śaṅkitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8626: 3.046.008c tīvrāṃśuḥ śiśirāṃśuś ca bhayāt saṃpadyate raviḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8627: 3.046.009a niṣkampapatrās taravo nadyaś ca stimitodakāḥ 3.046.009c bhavanti yatra yatrāhaṃ tiṣṭhāmi ca carāmi ca
GE09ram_1-7u:8628: 3.046.010a mama pāre samudrasya laṅkā nāma purī śubhā
GE09ram_1-7u:8631: 3.046.011c hemakakṣyā purī ramyā vaidūryamaya toraṇā 3.046.012a hastyaśvarathasaṃbhādhā tūryanādavināditā 3.046.012c sarvakāmaphalair vṛkṣaiḥ saṃkulodyānaśobhitā
GE09ram_1-7u:8632: 3.046.013a tatra tvaṃ vasatī sīte rājaputri mayā saha
GE09ram_1-7u:8633: 3.046.013c na sramiṣyasi nārīṇāṃ mānuṣīṇāṃ manasvini 3.046.014a bhuñjānā mānuṣān bhogān divyāṃś ca varavarṇini
GE09ram_1-7u:8634: 3.046.014c na smariṣyasi rāmasya mānuṣasya gatāyuṣaḥ 3.046.015a sthāpayitvā priyaṃ putraṃ rājñā daśarathena yaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8635: 3.046.015c mandavīryaḥ suto jyeṣṭhas tataḥ prasthāpito vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:8636: 3.046.016a tena kiṃ bhraṣṭarājyena rāmeṇa gatacetasā 3.046.016c kariṣyasi viśālākṣi tāpasena
GE09ram_1-7u:8638: 3.046.017c na manmathaśarāviṣṭaṃ pratyākhyātuṃ tvam arhasi 3.046.018a pratyākhyāya hi māṃ bhīru paritāpaṃ gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:8640: 3.046.019a evam uktā tu vaidehī kruddhā saṃraktalocanā
GE09ram_1-7u:8641: 3.046.019c abravīt paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ rahite rākṣasādhipam 3.046.020a kathaṃ vaiśravaṇaṃ devaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:8642: 3.046.020c bhrātaraṃ vyapadiśya tvam aśubhaṃ kartum icchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:8643: 3.046.021a avaśyaṃ vinaśiṣyanti sarve rāvaṇa rākṣasāḥ 3.046.021c yeṣāṃ tvaṃ karkaśo rājā durbuddhir ajitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8644: 3.046.022a apahṛtya śacīṃ bhāryāṃ śakyam indrasya jīvitum
GE09ram_1-7u:8645: 3.046.022c na tu rāmasya bhāryāṃ mām apanīyāsti jīvitam
GE09ram_1-7u:8646: 3.046.023a jīvec ciraṃ vajradharasya hastāc; chacīṃ pradhṛṣyāpratirūparūpām 3.046.023c na mādṛśīṃ rākṣasadharṣayitvā; pītāmṛtasyāpi tavāsti mokṣaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8647: 3.047.001a sītāyā vacanaṃ śrutvā daśagrīvaḥ pratāpavān 3.047.001c haste hastaṃ samāhatya cakāra sumahad vapuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8648: 3.047.002a sa maithilīṃ punar vākyaṃ babhāṣe ca tato bhṛśam 3.047.002c nonmattayā śrutau manye mama vīryaparākramau 3.047.003a udvaheyaṃ bhujābhyāṃ tu medinīm ambare sthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8649: 3.047.003c āpibeyaṃ samudraṃ ca mṛtyuṃ hanyāṃ raṇe sthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8650: 3.047.004a arkaṃ rundhyāṃ śarais tīkṣṇair vibhindyāṃ hi mahītalam
GE09ram_1-7u:8651: 3.047.004c kāmarūpiṇam unmatte paśya māṃ kāmadaṃ patim
GE09ram_1-7u:8652: 3.047.005a evam uktavatas tasya rāvaṇasya śikhiprabhe 3.047.005c kruddhasya hariparyante rakte netre babhūvatuḥ 3.047.006a sadyaḥ saumyaṃ parityajya bhikṣurūpaṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8653: 3.047.006c svaṃ rūpaṃ kālarūpābhaṃ bheje vaiśravaṇānujaḥ 3.047.007a saṃraktanayanaḥ śrīmāṃs
GE09ram_1-7u:8654: 3.047.007c daśāsyaḥ kārmukī bāṇī babhūva kṣaṇadācaraḥ 3.047.008a sa parivrājakacchadma mahākāyo vihāya tat 3.047.008c pratipede svakaṃ rūpaṃ rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ 3.047.009a saṃraktanayanaḥ krodhāj jīmūtanicayaprabhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8655: 3.047.009c raktāmbaradharas tasthau strīratnaṃ prekṣya maithilīm 3.047.010a sa tām asitakeśāntāṃ bhāskarasya prabhām iva
GE09ram_1-7u:8657: 3.047.011a triṣu lokeṣu vikhyātaṃ yadi bhartāram icchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:8658: 3.047.011c mām āśraya varārohe tavāhaṃ sadṛśaḥ patiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8659: 3.047.012a māṃ bhajasva cirāya tvam ahaṃ ślāghyas tava priyaḥ 3.047.012c naiva cāhaṃ kva cid bhadre kariṣye tava vipriyam 3.047.012e tyajyatāṃ mānuṣo bhāvo mayi bhāvaḥ praṇīyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:8660: 3.047.013a rājyāc cyutam asiddhārthaṃ rāmaṃ parimitāyuṣam 3.047.013c kair guṇair anuraktāsi mūḍhe paṇḍitamānini 3.047.014a yaḥ striyā vacanād rājyaṃ vihāya sasuhṛjjanam
GE09ram_1-7u:8661: 3.047.014c asmin vyālānucarite vane vasati durmatiḥ 3.047.015a ity uktvā maithilīṃ vākyaṃ priyārhāṃ priyavādinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:8662: 3.047.015c jagrāha rāvaṇaḥ sītāṃ budhaḥ khe rohiṇīm iva
GE09ram_1-7u:8663: 3.047.016a vāmena sītāṃ padmākṣīṃ mūrdhajeṣu kareṇa saḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8664: 3.047.016c ūrvos tu dakṣiṇenaiva parijagrāha pāṇinā 3.047.017a taṃ dṛṣṭvā giriśṛṅgābhaṃ tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭraṃ mahābhujam 3.047.017c prādravan mṛtyusaṃkāśaṃ bhayārtā vanadevatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8665: 3.047.018a sa ca māyāmayo divyaḥ kharayuktaḥ kharasvanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8667: 3.047.019a tatas tāṃ paruṣair vākyair abhitarjya mahāsvanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8668: 3.047.019c aṅkenādāya vaidehīṃ ratham āropayat tadā 3.047.020a sā gṛhītāticukrośa rāvaṇena
GE09ram_1-7u:8669: 3.047.020c rāmeti sītā duḥkhārtā rāmaṃ dūragataṃ vane
GE09ram_1-7u:8670: 3.047.021a tām akāmāṃ sa kāmārtaḥ pannagendravadhūm iva
GE09ram_1-7u:8672: 3.047.022a tataḥ sā rākṣasendreṇa hriyamāṇā vihāyasā 3.047.022c bhṛśaṃ cukrośa matteva bhrāntacittā yathāturā 3.047.023a hā lakṣmaṇa mahābāho gurucittaprasādaka
GE09ram_1-7u:8673: 3.047.023c hriyamāṇāṃ na jānīṣe rakṣasā kāmarūpiṇā 3.047.024a jīvitaṃ sukham arthāṃś ca dharmahetoḥ parityajan
GE09ram_1-7u:8674: 3.047.024c hriyamāṇām adharmeṇa māṃ rāghava na paśyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:8676: 3.047.025c katham evaṃvidhaṃ pāpaṃ na tvaṃ śādhi hi rāvaṇam 3.047.026a nanu sadyo 'vinītasya dṛśyate karmaṇaḥ phalam
GE09ram_1-7u:8677: 3.047.026c kālo 'py aṅgī bhavaty atra sasyānām iva paktaye
GE09ram_1-7u:8678: 3.047.027a sa karma kṛtavān etat kālopahatacetanaḥ 3.047.027c jīvitāntakaraṃ ghoraṃ rāmād vyasanam āpnuhi 3.047.028a hantedānīṃ sakāmā tu kaikeyī bāndhavaiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:8680: 3.047.029a āmantraye janasthānaṃ karṇikārāṃś ca puṣpitān 3.047.029c kṣipraṃ rāmāya śaṃsadhvaṃ sītāṃ harati rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8681: 3.047.030a mālyavantaṃ śikhariṇaṃ vande prasravaṇaṃ girim 3.047.030c kṣipraṃ rāmāya śaṃsadhvaṃ sītāṃ harati rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8683: 3.047.031c kṣipraṃ rāmāya śaṃsadhvaṃ sītāṃ harati rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8684: 3.047.032a daivatāni ca yānty asmin vane vividhapādape
GE09ram_1-7u:8685: 3.047.032c namaskaromy ahaṃ tebhyo bhartuḥ śaṃsata māṃ hṛtām
GE09ram_1-7u:8686: 3.047.033a yāni kāni cid apy atra sattvāni nivasanty uta 3.047.033c sarvāṇi śaraṇaṃ yāmi mṛgapakṣigaṇān api 3.047.034a hriyamāṇāṃ priyāṃ bhartuḥ prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasīm
GE09ram_1-7u:8688: 3.047.035a viditvā māṃ mahābāhur amutrāpi mahābalaḥ 3.047.035c āneṣyati parākramya vaivasvatahṛtām
GE09ram_1-7u:8689: 3.047.036a rāmāya tu yathātattvaṃ jaṭāyo haraṇaṃ mama
GE09ram_1-7u:8690: 3.047.036c lakṣmaṇāya ca tat sarvam ākhyātavyam aśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8691: 3.048.001a taṃ śabdam avasuptasya jaṭāyur atha śuśruve
GE09ram_1-7u:8692: 3.048.001c niraikṣad rāvaṇaṃ kṣipraṃ vaidehīṃ ca dadarśa saḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8694: 3.048.002c vanaspatigataḥ śrīmān vyājahāra śubhāṃ giram 3.048.003a daśagrīvasthito dharme purāṇe satyasaṃśrayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8695: 3.048.003c jaṭāyur nāma nāmnāhaṃ gṛdhrarājo mahābalaḥ 3.048.004a rājā sarvasya lokasya
GE09ram_1-7u:8696: 3.048.004c lokānāṃ ca hite yukto rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8698: 3.048.005c sītā nāma varārohā yāṃ tvaṃ hartum ihecchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:8699: 3.048.006a kathaṃ rājā sthito dharme paradārān parāmṛśet
GE09ram_1-7u:8702: 3.048.007a na tat samācared dhīro yat paro 'sya vigarhayet
GE09ram_1-7u:8703: 3.048.007c yathātmanas tathānyeṣāṃ dārā rakṣyā vimarśanāt 3.048.008a arthaṃ vā yadi vā kāmaṃ śiṣṭāḥ śāstreṣv anāgatam 3.048.008c vyavasyanty anu rājānaṃ dharmaṃ paurastyanandana 3.048.009a rājā dharmaś ca kāmaś ca dravyāṇāṃ cottamo nidhiḥ 3.048.009c dharmaḥ śubhaṃ vā pāpaṃ vā rājamūlaṃ pravartate
GE09ram_1-7u:8704: 3.048.010a pāpasvabhāvaś capalaḥ kathaṃ tvaṃ rakṣasāṃ vara
GE09ram_1-7u:8705: 3.048.010c aiśvaryam abhisaṃprāpto vimānam iva duṣkṛtī 3.048.011a kāmasvabhāvo yo yasya na sa śakyaḥ pramārjitum
GE09ram_1-7u:8706: 3.048.011c na hi duṣṭātmanām ārya mā vasaty ālaye ciram 3.048.012a viṣaye vā pure vā te yadā rāmo mahābalaḥ 3.048.012c nāparādhyati dharmātmā kathaṃ tasyāparādhyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:8709: 3.048.014a atra brūhi yathāsatyaṃ ko rāmasya vyatikramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8710: 3.048.014c yasya tvaṃ lokanāthasya hṛtvā bhāryāṃ gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:8711: 3.048.015a kṣipraṃ visṛja vaidehīṃ mā tvā ghoreṇa cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_1-7u:8712: 3.048.015c dahed dahana bhūtena vṛtram indrāśanir yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:8713: 3.048.016a sarpam āśīviṣaṃ baddhvā vastrānte nāvabudhyase 3.048.016c grīvāyāṃ pratimuktaṃ ca kālapāśaṃ na paśyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:8714: 3.048.017a sa bhāraḥ saumya bhartavyo yo naraṃ nāvasādayet
GE09ram_1-7u:8715: 3.048.017c tad annam upabhoktavyaṃ jīryate yad anāmayam
GE09ram_1-7u:8716: 3.048.018a yat kṛtvā na bhaved dharmo na kīrtir na yaśo bhuvi
GE09ram_1-7u:8717: 3.048.018c śarīrasya bhavet khedaḥ kas tat karma samācaret
GE09ram_1-7u:8720: 3.048.020a vṛddho 'haṃ tvaṃ yuvā dhanvī sarathaḥ kavacī śarī
GE09ram_1-7u:8721: 3.048.020c tathāpy ādāya vaidehīṃ kuśalī na gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:8722: 3.048.021a na śaktas tvaṃ balād dhartuṃ vaidehīṃ mama paśyataḥ 3.048.021c hetubhir nyāyasaṃyuktair dhruvāṃ vedaśrutīm iva 3.048.022a yudhyasva yadi śūro 'si muhūrtaṃ tiṣṭha rāvaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:8723: 3.048.022c śayiṣyase hato bhūmau yathāpūrvaṃ kharas tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:8724: 3.048.023a asakṛt saṃyuge yena nihatā daityadānavāḥ 3.048.023c nacirāc cīravāsās tvāṃ rāmo yudhi vadhiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:8725: 3.048.024a kiṃ nu śakyaṃ mayā kartuṃ gatau dūraṃ nṛpātmajau 3.048.024c kṣipraṃ tvaṃ naśyase nīca tayor bhīto na saṃśayaḥ 3.048.025a na hi me jīvamānasya nayiṣyasi śubhām imām
GE09ram_1-7u:8726: 3.048.025c sītāṃ kamalapatrākṣīṃ rāmasya mahaṣīṃ priyām 3.048.026a avaśyaṃ tu mayā kāryaṃ priyaṃ tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8727: 3.048.026c jīvitenāpi rāmasya tathā daśarathasya ca 3.048.027a tiṣṭha tiṣṭha daśagrīva muhūrtaṃ paśya rāvaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:8729: 3.048.027e vṛntād iva phalaṃ tvāṃ tu pātayeyaṃ rathottamāt
GE09ram_1-7u:8730: 3.049.001a ity uktasya yathānyāyaṃ rāvaṇasya jaṭāyuṣā 3.049.001c kruddhasyāgninibhāḥ sarvā rejur viṃśatidṛṣṭayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8732: 3.049.002c rākṣasendro 'bhidudrāva patagendram amarṣaṇaḥ 3.049.003a sa saṃprahāras tumulas tayos tasmin mahāvane
GE09ram_1-7u:8733: 3.049.003c babhūva vātoddhatayor meghayor gagane yathā 3.049.004a tad babhūvādbhutaṃ yuddhaṃ gṛdhrarākṣasayos tadā 3.049.004c sapakṣayor mālyavator mahāparvatayor iva
GE09ram_1-7u:8734: 3.049.005a tato nālīkanārācais tīkṣṇāgraiś ca vikarṇibhiḥ 3.049.005c abhyavarṣan mahāghorair gṛdhrarājaṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8735: 3.049.006a sa tāni śarajālāni gṛdhraḥ patraratheśvaraḥ 3.049.006c jaṭāyuḥ pratijagrāha rāvaṇāstrāṇi saṃyuge
GE09ram_1-7u:8736: 3.049.007a tasya tīkṣṇanakhābhyāṃ tu caraṇābhyāṃ mahābalaḥ 3.049.007c cakāra bahudhā gātre vraṇān patagasattamaḥ 3.049.008a atha krodhād daśagrīvo jagrāha daśamārgaṇān 3.049.008c mṛtyudaṇḍanibhān ghorāñ śatrumardanakāṅkṣayā
GE09ram_1-7u:8737: 3.049.009a sa tair bāṇair mahāvīryaḥ pūrṇamuktair ajihmagaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8738: 3.049.009c bibheda niśitais tīkṣṇair gṛdhraṃ ghoraiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8739: 3.049.010a sa rākṣasarathe paśyañ jānakīṃ bāṣpalocanām 3.049.010c acintayitvā bāṇāṃs tān rākṣasaṃ samabhidravat 3.049.011a tato 'sya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ muktāmaṇivibhūṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:8741: 3.049.012a tac cāgnisadṛśaṃ dīptaṃ rāvaṇasya śarāvaram 3.049.012c pakṣābhyāṃ ca mahātejā vyadhunot patageśvaraḥ 3.049.013a kāñcanoraśchadān divyān piśācavadanān kharān
GE09ram_1-7u:8742: 3.049.013c tāṃś cāsya javasaṃpannāñ jaghāna samare balī
GE09ram_1-7u:8745: 3.049.014e pūrṇacandrapratīkāśaṃ chatraṃ ca vyajanaiḥ saha 3.049.015a sa bhagnadhanvā viratho hatāśvo hatasārathiḥ 3.049.015c aṅkenādāya vaidehīṃ papāta bhuvi rāvaṇaḥ 3.049.016a dṛṣṭvā nipatitaṃ bhūmau rāvaṇaṃ bhagnavāhanam 3.049.016c sādhu sādhv iti bhūtāni gṛdhrarājam apūjayan
GE09ram_1-7u:8746: 3.049.017a pariśrāntaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā jarayā pakṣiyūthapam
GE09ram_1-7u:8747: 3.049.017c utpapāta punar hṛṣṭo maithilīṃ gṛhya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8748: 3.049.018a taṃ prahṛṣṭaṃ nidhāyāṅke gacchantaṃ janakātmajām 3.049.018c gṛdhrarājaḥ samutpatya jaṭāyur idam abravīt 3.049.019a vajrasaṃsparśabāṇasya bhāryāṃ rāmasya rāvaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:8749: 3.049.019c alpabuddhe harasy enāṃ vadhāya khalu rakṣasām
GE09ram_1-7u:8751: 3.049.020c viṣapānaṃ pibasy etat pipāsita ivodakam 3.049.021a anubandham ajānantaḥ karmaṇām
GE09ram_1-7u:8752: 3.049.021c śīghram eva vinaśyanti yathā tvaṃ vinaśiṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:8753: 3.049.022a baddhas tvaṃ kālapāśena kva gatas tasya mokṣyase
GE09ram_1-7u:8754: 3.049.022c vadhāya baḍiśaṃ gṛhya sāmiṣaṃ jalajo yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:8755: 3.049.023a na hi jātu durādharṣau kākutsthau tava rāvaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:8756: 3.049.023c dharṣaṇaṃ cāśramasyāsya kṣamiṣyete tu rāghavau 3.049.024a yathā tvayā kṛtaṃ karma bhīruṇā lokagarhitam
GE09ram_1-7u:8758: 3.049.025a yudhyasva yadi śūro 'si muhūrtaṃ tiṣṭha rāvaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:8759: 3.049.025c śayiṣyase hato bhūmau yathā bhrātā kharas tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:8760: 3.049.026a paretakāle puruṣo yat karma pratipadyate 3.049.026c vināśāyātmano 'dharmyaṃ pratipanno 'si karma tat 3.049.027a pāpānubandho vai yasya karmaṇaḥ ko nu tat pumān 3.049.027c kurvīta lokādhipatiḥ svayambhūr bhagavān api 3.049.028a evam uktvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ jaṭāyus tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8761: 3.049.028c nipapāta bhṛśaṃ pṛṣṭhe daśagrīvasya vīryavān 3.049.029a taṃ gṛhītvā nakhais tīkṣṇair virarāda samantataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8762: 3.049.029c adhirūḍho gajārohi yathā syād duṣṭavāraṇam 3.049.030a virarāda nakhair asya tuṇḍaṃ pṛṣṭhe samarpayan
GE09ram_1-7u:8764: 3.049.031a sa tathā gṛdhrarājena kliśyamāno muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8765: 3.049.031c amarṣasphuritauṣṭhaḥ san prākampata sa rākṣasaḥ 3.049.032a saṃpariṣvajya vaidehīṃ vāmenāṅkena rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8767: 3.049.033a jaṭāyus tam atikramya tuṇḍenāsya kharādhipaḥ 3.049.033c vāmabāhūn daśa tadā vyapāharad ariṃdamaḥ 3.049.034a tataḥ kruddho daśakrīvaḥ sītām utsṛjya vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:8768: 3.049.034c muṣṭibhyāṃ caraṇābhyāṃ ca gṛdhrarājam apothayat 3.049.035a tato muhūrtaṃ saṃgrāmo
GE09ram_1-7u:8769: 3.049.035c rākṣasānāṃ ca mukhyasya pakṣiṇāṃ pravarasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:8771: 3.049.036c pakṣau pādau ca pārśvau ca khaḍgam uddhṛtya so 'cchinat
GE09ram_1-7u:8772: 3.049.037a sa chinnapakṣaḥ sahasā rakṣasā raudrakarmaṇā 3.049.037c nipapāta hato gṛdhro dharaṇyām alpajīvitaḥ 3.049.038a taṃ dṛṣṭvā patitaṃ bhūmau kṣatajārdraṃ jaṭāyuṣam
GE09ram_1-7u:8773: 3.049.038c abhyadhāvata vaidehī svabandhum iva duḥkhitā 3.049.039a taṃ nīlajīmūtanikāśakalpaṃ; supāṇḍuroraskam udāravīryam 3.049.039c dadarśa laṅkādhipatiḥ pṛthivyāṃ; jaṭāyuṣaṃ śāntam ivāgnidāvam
GE09ram_1-7u:8774: 3.049.040a tatas tu taṃ patrarathaṃ mahītale; nipātitaṃ rāvaṇavegamarditam 3.049.040c punaḥ pariṣvajya śaśiprabhānanā; ruroda sītā janakātmajā tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:8775: 3.050.001a tam alpajīvitaṃ bhūmau sphurantaṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ 3.050.001c dadarśa gṛdhraṃ patitaṃ samīpe rāghavāśramāt 3.050.002a sā tu tārādhipamukhī rāvaṇena samīkṣya tam
GE09ram_1-7u:8779: 3.050.004a na nūnaṃ rāma jānāsi mahad vyasanam ātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8780: 3.050.004c dhāvanti nūnaṃ kākutstha madarthaṃ mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ 3.050.005a trāhi mām adya kākutstha lakṣmaṇeti varāṅganā
GE09ram_1-7u:8781: 3.050.005c susaṃtrastā samākrandac chṛṇvatāṃ tu yathāntike 3.050.006a tāṃ kliṣṭamālyābharaṇāṃ vilapantīm anāthavat
GE09ram_1-7u:8783: 3.050.007a tāṃ latām iva veṣṭantīm āliṅgantīṃ mahādrumān
GE09ram_1-7u:8784: 3.050.007c muñca muñceti bahuśaḥ pravadan rākṣasādhipaḥ 3.050.008a krośantīṃ rāma rāmeti rāmeṇa rahitāṃ vane
GE09ram_1-7u:8787: 3.050.009c jagat sarvam amaryādaṃ tamasāndhena saṃvṛtam 3.050.010a dṛṣṭvā sītāṃ parāmṛṣṭāṃ dīnāṃ divyena cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_1-7u:8788: 3.050.010c kṛtaṃ kāryam iti śrīmān vyājahāra pitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8789: 3.050.011a prahṛṣṭā vyathitāś cāsan sarve te paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8791: 3.050.012a sa tu tāṃ rāma rāmeti rudantīṃ lakṣmaṇeti ca 3.050.012c jagāmākāśam ādāya rāvaṇo
GE09ram_1-7u:8792: 3.050.013a taptābharaṇasarvāṅgī pītakauśeyavāsanī 3.050.013c rarāja rājaputrī tu vidyut saudāmanī yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:8793: 3.050.014a uddhūtena ca vastreṇa tasyāḥ pītena rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8794: 3.050.014c adhikaṃ paribabhrāja girir dīpa ivāgninā 3.050.015a tasyāḥ paramakalyāṇyās tāmrāṇi surabhīṇi ca 3.050.015c padmapatrāṇi vaidehyā abhyakīryanta rāvaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:8795: 3.050.016a tasyāḥ kauśeyam uddhūtam ākāśe kanakaprabham 3.050.016c babhau cādityarāgeṇa tāmram abhram ivātape 3.050.017a tasyās tad vimalaṃ vaktram ākāśe rāvaṇāṅkagam
GE09ram_1-7u:8796: 3.050.017c na rarāja vinā rāmaṃ vinālam iva paṅkajam
GE09ram_1-7u:8797: 3.050.018a babhūva jaladaṃ nīlaṃ bhittvā candra ivoditaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8799: 3.050.018e śuklaiḥ suvimalair dantaiḥ prabhāvadbhir alaṃkṛtam 3.050.019a ruditaṃ vyapamṛṣṭāstraṃ candravat priyadarśanam
GE09ram_1-7u:8801: 3.050.020a rākṣasendrasamādhūtaṃ tasyās tad vacanaṃ śubham 3.050.020c śuśubhe na vinā rāmaṃ divā candra ivoditaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8802: 3.050.021a sā hemavarṇā nīlāṅgaṃ maithilī rākṣasādhipam 3.050.021c śuśubhe kāñcanī kāñcī nīlaṃ maṇim ivāśritā
GE09ram_1-7u:8803: 3.050.022a sā padmagaurī hemābhā rāvaṇaṃ janakātmajā 3.050.022c vidyudghanam ivāviśya śuśubhe
GE09ram_1-7u:8805: 3.050.023c babhūva vimalo nīlaḥ saghoṣa iva toyadaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8808: 3.050.025a sā tu rāvaṇavegena puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ samantataḥ 3.050.025c samādhūtā daśagrīvaṃ punar
GE09ram_1-7u:8811: 3.050.027a caraṇān nūpuraṃ bhraṣṭaṃ vaidehyā ratnabhūṣitam 3.050.027c vidyunmaṇḍalasaṃkāśaṃ papāta madhurasvanam
GE09ram_1-7u:8813: 3.050.028c prāśobhayata vaidehī gajaṃ kaṣyeva kāñcanī 3.050.029a tāṃ maholkām ivākāśe dīpyamānāṃ svatejasā 3.050.029c jahārākāśam āviśya sītāṃ vaiśravaṇānujaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8814: 3.050.030a tasyās tāny agnivarṇāni bhūṣaṇāni mahītale 3.050.030c saghoṣāṇy avakīryanta kṣīṇās tārā ivāmbarāt 3.050.031a tasyāḥ stanāntarād bhraṣṭo hāras tārādhipadyutiḥ 3.050.031c vaidehyā nipatan bhāti gaṅgeva gaganāc cyutā
GE09ram_1-7u:8816: 3.050.032c mā bhair iti vidhūtāgrā vyājahrur iva pādapāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8818: 3.050.033c sakhīm iva gatotsāhāṃ śocantīva sma maithilīm
GE09ram_1-7u:8823: 3.050.036a hriyamāṇāṃ tu vaidehīṃ dṛṣṭvā dīno divākaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8825: 3.050.037a nāsti dharmaḥ kutaḥ satyaṃ nārjavaṃ nānṛśaṃsatā
GE09ram_1-7u:8826: 3.050.037c yatra rāmasya vaidehīṃ bhāryāṃ harati rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8827: 3.050.038a iti sarvāṇi bhūtāni gaṇaśaḥ paryadevayan 3.050.038c vitrastakā dīnamukhā rurudur
GE09ram_1-7u:8830: 3.050.040a vikrośantīṃ dṛḍhaṃ sītāṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥkhaṃ tathā gatām
GE09ram_1-7u:8831: 3.050.040c tāṃ tu lakṣmaṇa rāmeti krośantīṃ madhurasvarām
GE09ram_1-7u:8835: 3.050.042a tatas tu sā cārudatī śucismitā; vinākṛtā bandhujanena maithilī
GE09ram_1-7u:8836: 3.050.042c apaśyatī rāghavalakṣmaṇāv ubhau; vivarṇavaktrā bhayabhārapīḍitā 3.051.001a kham utpatantaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā maithilī janakātmajā
GE09ram_1-7u:8837: 3.051.001c duḥkhitā paramodvignā bhaye mahati vartinī 3.051.002a roṣarodanatāmrākṣī bhīmākṣaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:8838: 3.051.002c rudatī karuṇaṃ sītā hriyamāṇedam abravīt 3.051.003a na vyapatrapase nīca karmaṇānena rāvaṇa 3.051.003c jñātvā virahitāṃ yo māṃ corayitvā palāyase
GE09ram_1-7u:8839: 3.051.004a tvayaiva nūnaṃ duṣṭātman bhīruṇā hartum icchatā
GE09ram_1-7u:8841: 3.051.004e yo hi mām udyatas trātuṃ so 'py ayaṃ vinipātitaḥ 3.051.005a paramaṃ khalu te vīryaṃ dṛśyate rākṣasādhama
GE09ram_1-7u:8842: 3.051.005c viśrāvya nāmadheyaṃ hi yuddhe nāsti jitā tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:8843: 3.051.006a īdṛśaṃ garhitaṃ karma kathaṃ kṛtvā na lajjase
GE09ram_1-7u:8844: 3.051.006c striyāś ca haraṇaṃ nīca rahite ca parasya ca 3.051.007a kathayiṣyanti lokeṣu puruṣāḥ karma kutsitam 3.051.007c sunṛśaṃsam adharmiṣṭhaṃ tava śauṇḍīryamāninaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8845: 3.051.008a dhik te śauryaṃ ca sattvaṃ ca yat tvayā kathitaṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:8846: 3.051.008c kulākrośakaraṃ loke dhik te cāritram īdṛśam
GE09ram_1-7u:8847: 3.051.009a kiṃ śakyaṃ kartum evaṃ hi yaj javenaiva dhāvasi 3.051.009c muhūrtam api tiṣṭhasva na jīvan pratiyāsyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:8848: 3.051.010a na hi cakṣuḥpathaṃ prāpya tayoḥ pārthivaputrayoḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8849: 3.051.010c sasainyo 'pi samartaḥs tvaṃ muhūrtam api jīvitum 3.051.011a na tvaṃ tayoḥ śarasparśaṃ soḍhuṃ śaktaḥ kathaṃ cana 3.051.011c vane prajvalitasyeva sparśam agner vihaṃgamaḥ 3.051.012a sādhu kṛtvātmanaḥ pathyaṃ sādhu māṃ muñca rāvaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:8850: 3.051.012c matpradharṣaṇaruṣṭo hi bhrātrā saha patir mama
GE09ram_1-7u:8851: 3.051.012e vidhāsyati vināśāya tvaṃ māṃ yadi na muñcasi
GE09ram_1-7u:8852: 3.051.013a yena tvaṃ vyavasāyena balān māṃ hartum icchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:8853: 3.051.013c vyavasāyaḥ sa te nīca bhaviṣyati nirarthakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8854: 3.051.014a na hy ahaṃ tam apaśyantī bhartāraṃ vibudhopamam
GE09ram_1-7u:8855: 3.051.014c utsahe śatruvaśagā prāṇān dhārayituṃ ciram 3.051.015a na nūnaṃ cātmanaḥ śreyaḥ pathyaṃ vā samavekṣase
GE09ram_1-7u:8856: 3.051.015c mṛtyukāle yathā martyo viparītāni sevate 3.051.016a mumūrṣūṇāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ yat pathyaṃ tan na rocate 3.051.016c paśyāmīva hi kaṇṭhe tvāṃ kālapāśāvapāśitam 3.051.017a yathā cāsmin bhayasthāne na bibheṣe daśānana
GE09ram_1-7u:8857: 3.051.017c vyaktaṃ hiraṇmayān hi tvaṃ saṃpaśyasi mahīruhān
GE09ram_1-7u:8859: 3.051.018c khaḍgapatravanaṃ caiva bhīmaṃ paśyasi rāvaṇa 3.051.019a taptakāñcanapuṣpāṃ ca
GE09ram_1-7u:8860: 3.051.019c drakṣyase śālmalīṃ tīkṣṇām āyasaiḥ kaṇṭakaiś citām
GE09ram_1-7u:8861: 3.051.020a na hi tvam īdṛśaṃ kṛtvā tasyālīkaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8862: 3.051.020c dhārituṃ śakṣyasi ciraṃ viṣaṃ pītveva nirghṛṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8863: 3.051.021a baddhas tvaṃ kālapāśena durnivāreṇa rāvaṇa 3.051.021c kva gato lapsyase śarma bhartur mama mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8865: 3.051.022c rākṣasā nihatā yena sahasrāṇi caturdaśa 3.051.023a sa kathaṃ rāghavo vīraḥ sarvāstrakuśalo
GE09ram_1-7u:8866: 3.051.023c na tvāṃ hanyāc charais tīkṣṇair iṣṭabhāryāpahāriṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:8867: 3.051.024a etac cānyac ca paruṣaṃ vaidehī rāvaṇāṅkagā
GE09ram_1-7u:8869: 3.051.025a tathā bhṛśārtāṃ bahu caiva bhāṣiṇīṃ; vilalāpa pūrvaṃ karuṇaṃ ca bhāminīm 3.051.025c jahāra pāpas taruṇīṃ viveṣṭatīṃ; nṛpātmajām āgatagātravepathum 3.052.001a hriyamāṇā tu vaidehī kaṃ cin nātham apaśyatī
GE09ram_1-7u:8871: 3.052.002a teṣāṃ madhye viśālākṣī kauśeyaṃ kanakaprabham 3.052.002c uttarīyaṃ varārohā śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca 3.052.002e mumoca yadi rāmāya śaṃseyur iti maithilī
GE09ram_1-7u:8872: 3.052.003a vastram utsṛjya tan madhye vinikṣiptaṃ sabhūṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:8873: 3.052.003c saṃbhramāt tu daśagrīvas tat karma na ca buddhivān 3.052.004a piṅgākṣās tāṃ viśālākṣīṃ netrair animiṣair iva
GE09ram_1-7u:8874: 3.052.004c vikrośantīṃ tadā sītāṃ dadṛśur vānararṣabhāḥ 3.052.005a sa ca pampām atikramya laṅkām abhimukhaḥ purīm
GE09ram_1-7u:8875: 3.052.005c jagāma rudatīṃ gṛhya maithilīṃ rākṣaseśvaraḥ 3.052.006a tāṃ jahāra susaṃhṛṣṭo rāvaṇo mṛtyum ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8877: 3.052.007a vanāni saritaḥ śailān sarāṃsi ca vihāyasā
GE09ram_1-7u:8878: 3.052.007c sa kṣipraṃ samatīyāya śaraś cāpād iva cyutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8880: 3.052.008c saritāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatvā samatīyāya sāgaram 3.052.009a saṃbhramāt parivṛttormī
GE09ram_1-7u:8882: 3.052.010a antarikṣagatā vācaḥ sasṛjuś cāraṇās tadā 3.052.010c etad anto daśagrīva iti siddhās tadābruvan
GE09ram_1-7u:8883: 3.052.011a sa tu sītāṃ viveṣṭantīm aṅkenādāya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8884: 3.052.011c praviveśa purīṃ laṅkāṃ rūpiṇīṃ mṛtyum ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8886: 3.052.012c saṃrūḍhakakṣyā bahulaṃ svam antaḥpuram āviśat 3.052.013a tatra tām asitāpāṅgīṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:8887: 3.052.013c nidadhe rāvaṇaḥ sītāṃ mayo māyām ivāsurīm
GE09ram_1-7u:8888: 3.052.014a abravīc ca daśagrīvaḥ piśācīr ghoradarśanāḥ 3.052.014c yathā naināṃ pumān strī vā sītāṃ paśyaty asaṃmataḥ 3.052.015a muktāmaṇisuvarṇāni vastrāṇy ābharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:8889: 3.052.015c yad yad icchet tad evāsyā deyaṃ macchandato yathā 3.052.016a yā ca vakṣyati vaidehīṃ vacanaṃ kiṃ cid apriyam 3.052.016c ajñānād yadi vā jñānān na tasyā jīvitaṃ priyam 3.052.017a tathoktvā rākṣasīs tās tu rākṣasendraḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_1-7u:8890: 3.052.017c niṣkramyāntaḥpurāt tasmāt kiṃ kṛtyam iti cintayan
GE09ram_1-7u:8892: 3.052.018a sa tān dṛṣṭvā mahāvīryo varadānena mohitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8893: 3.052.018c uvācaitān idaṃ vākyaṃ praśasya balavīryataḥ 3.052.019a nānāpraharaṇāḥ kṣipram ito gacchata satvarāḥ 3.052.019c janasthānaṃ hatasthānaṃ bhūtapūrvaṃ kharālayam
GE09ram_1-7u:8895: 3.052.020c pauruṣaṃ balam āśritya trāsam utsṛjya dūrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8896: 3.052.021a balaṃ hi sumahad yan me janasthāne niveśitam
GE09ram_1-7u:8897: 3.052.021c sadūṣaṇakharaṃ yuddhe hataṃ tad rāmasāyakaiḥ 3.052.022a tataḥ krodho mamāpūrvo dhairyasyopari vardhate 3.052.022c vairaṃ ca sumahaj jātaṃ rāmaṃ prati sudāruṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:8898: 3.052.023a niryātayitum icchāmi tac ca vairam ahaṃ ripoḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8899: 3.052.023c na hi lapsyāmy ahaṃ nidrām ahatvā saṃyuge ripum 3.052.024a taṃ tv idānīm ahaṃ hatvā kharadūṣaṇaghātinam
GE09ram_1-7u:8900: 3.052.024c rāmaṃ śarmopalapsyāmi dhanaṃ labdhveva nirdhanaḥ 3.052.025a janasthāne vasadbhis tu bhavadbhī rāmam āśritā
GE09ram_1-7u:8901: 3.052.025c pravṛttir upanetavyā kiṃ karotīti tattvataḥ 3.052.026a apramādāc ca gantavyaṃ sarvair eva niśācaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8902: 3.052.026c kartavyaś ca sadā yatno rāghavasya vadhaṃ prati
GE09ram_1-7u:8903: 3.052.027a yuṣmākaṃ hi balajño 'haṃ bahuśo raṇamūrdhani 3.052.027c ataś cāsmiñ janasthāne mayā yūyaṃ niyojitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8904: 3.052.028a tataḥ priyaṃ vākyam upetya rākṣasā; mahārtham aṣṭāv abhivādya
GE09ram_1-7u:8906: 3.052.028c vihāya laṅkāṃ sahitāḥ pratasthire; yato janasthānam alakṣyadarśanāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8907: 3.052.029a tatas tu sītām upalabhya rāvaṇaḥ; susaṃprahṛṣṭaḥ parigṛhya maithilīm
GE09ram_1-7u:8908: 3.052.029c prasajya rāmeṇa ca vairam uttamaṃ; babhūva mohān muditaḥ sa rākṣasaḥ 3.053.001a saṃdiśya rākṣasān ghorān rāvaṇo 'ṣṭau mahābalān
GE09ram_1-7u:8911: 3.053.002c praviveśa gṛhaṃ ramyaṃ sītāṃ draṣṭum abhitvaran
GE09ram_1-7u:8912: 3.053.003a sa praviśya tu tadveśma rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8915: 3.053.004c vāyuvegair ivākrāntāṃ majjantīṃ nāvam arṇave 3.053.005a mṛgayūthaparibhraṣṭāṃ mṛgīṃ śvabhir ivāvṛtām
GE09ram_1-7u:8916: 3.053.005c adhomukhamukhīṃ dīnām abhyetya ca niśācaraḥ 3.053.006a tāṃ tu śokavaśāṃ dīnām avaśāṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8917: 3.053.006c sa balād darśayām āsa gṛhaṃ devagṛhopamam
GE09ram_1-7u:8919: 3.053.008a kāñcanais tāpanīyaiś ca sphāṭikai rājatais tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:8921: 3.053.009a divyadundubhinirhrādaṃ taptakāñcanatoraṇam 3.053.009c sopānaṃ kāñcanaṃ citram āruroha tayā saha
GE09ram_1-7u:8922: 3.053.010a dāntakā rājatāś caiva gavākṣāḥ priyadarśanāḥ 3.053.010c hemajālāvṛtāś cāsaṃs tatra prāsādapaṅktayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8926: 3.053.012c rāvaṇo darśayām āsa sītāṃ śokaparāyaṇām 3.053.013a darśayitvā tu vaidehīṃ kṛtsnaṃ tad bhavanottamam
GE09ram_1-7u:8927: 3.053.013c uvāca vākyaṃ pāpātmā rāvaṇo janakātmajām 3.053.014a daśarākṣasakoṭyaś ca dvāviṃśatir
GE09ram_1-7u:8928: 3.053.014c varjayitvā jarā vṛddhān bālāṃś ca rajanīcarān
GE09ram_1-7u:8929: 3.053.015a teṣāṃ prabhur ahaṃ sīte sarveṣāṃ bhīmakarmaṇām
GE09ram_1-7u:8930: 3.053.015c sahasram ekam ekasya mama kāryapuraḥsaram 3.053.016a yad idaṃ rājyatantraṃ me tvayi sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE09ram_1-7u:8931: 3.053.016c jīvitaṃ ca viśālākṣi tvaṃ me prāṇair garīyasī
GE09ram_1-7u:8933: 3.053.017c tāsāṃ tvam īśvarī sīte mama bhāryā bhava priye 3.053.018a sādhu kiṃ te 'nyayā buddhyā rocayasva vaco mama
GE09ram_1-7u:8934: 3.053.018c bhajasva mābhitaptasya prasādaṃ kartum arhasi 3.053.019a parikṣiptā samudreṇa laṅkeyaṃ śatayojanā
GE09ram_1-7u:8935: 3.053.019c neyaṃ dharṣayituṃ śakyā sendrair api surāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8936: 3.053.020a na deveṣu na yakṣeṣu na gandharveṣu narṣiṣu
GE09ram_1-7u:8937: 3.053.020c ahaṃ paśyāmi lokeṣu yo me vīryasamo bhavet
GE09ram_1-7u:8940: 3.053.022a bhajasva sīte mām eva bhartāhaṃ sadṛśas tava
GE09ram_1-7u:8941: 3.053.022c yauvanaṃ hy adhruvaṃ bhīru ramasveha mayā saha
GE09ram_1-7u:8942: 3.053.023a darśane mā kṛthā buddhiṃ rāghavasya varānane
GE09ram_1-7u:8943: 3.053.023c kāsya śaktir ihāgantum api sīte manorathaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8944: 3.053.024a na śakyo vāyur ākāśe pāśair baddhaṃ mahājavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8945: 3.053.024c dīpyamānasya vāpy agner grahītuṃ vimalāṃ śikhām
GE09ram_1-7u:8946: 3.053.025a trayāṇām api lokānāṃ na taṃ paśyāmi śobhane
GE09ram_1-7u:8947: 3.053.025c vikrameṇa nayed yas tvāṃ madbāhuparipālitām 3.053.026a laṅkāyāṃ sumahad rājyam idaṃ tvam anupālaya
GE09ram_1-7u:8948: 3.053.026c abhiṣekodakaklinnā tuṣṭā ca ramayasva mām 3.053.027a duṣkṛtaṃ yat purā karma vanavāsena tad gatam
GE09ram_1-7u:8949: 3.053.027c yaś ca te sukṛto dharmas tasyeha phalam āpnuhi 3.053.028a iha sarvāṇi mālyāni divyagandhāni maithili 3.053.028c bhūṣaṇāni ca mukhyāni tāni seva mayā saha
GE09ram_1-7u:8950: 3.053.029a puṣpakaṃ nāma suśroṇi bhrātur vaiśravaṇasya me
GE09ram_1-7u:8951: 3.053.029c vimānaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ ca tad vimānaṃ manojavam
GE09ram_1-7u:8952: 3.053.030a tatra sīte mayā sārdhaṃ viharasva yathāsukham
GE09ram_1-7u:8954: 3.053.031a śokārtaṃ tu varārohe na bhrājati varānane
GE09ram_1-7u:8955: 3.053.031c alaṃ vrīḍena vaidehi dharmalopa kṛtena te
GE09ram_1-7u:8957: 3.053.032c etau pādau mayā snigdhau śirobhiḥ paripīḍitau
GE09ram_1-7u:8958: 3.053.033a prasādaṃ kuru me kṣipraṃ vaśyo dāso 'ham asmi te 3.053.033c nemāḥ śūnyā mayā vācaḥ śuṣyamāṇena bhāṣitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8959: 3.053.034a na cāpi rāvaṇaḥ kāṃ cin mūrdhnā strīṃ praṇameta ha
GE09ram_1-7u:8960: 3.053.034c evam uktvā daśagrīvo maithilīṃ janakātmajām 3.053.035a kṛtāntavaśam āpanno mameyam iti manyate 3.054.001a sā tathoktā tu vaidehī nirbhayā śokakarṣitā
GE09ram_1-7u:8961: 3.054.001c tṛṇam antarataḥ kṛtvā rāvaṇaṃ pratyabhāṣata 3.054.002a rājā daśaratho nāma dharmasetur ivācalaḥ 3.054.002c satyasandhaḥ parijñāto yasya putraḥ sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8962: 3.054.003a rāmo nāma sa dharmātmā triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8963: 3.054.003c dīrghabāhur viśālākṣo daivataṃ sa patir mama
GE09ram_1-7u:8964: 3.054.004a ikṣvākūṇāṃ kule jātaḥ siṃhaskandho mahādyutiḥ 3.054.004c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā yas te prāṇāṃ hariṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:8965: 3.054.005a pratyakṣaṃ yady ahaṃ tasya tvayā syāṃ dharṣitā balāt 3.054.005c śayitā tvaṃ hataḥ saṃkhye janasthāne yathā kharaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8966: 3.054.006a ya ete rākṣasāḥ proktā ghorarūpā mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8967: 3.054.006c rāghave nirviṣāḥ sarve suparṇe pannagā yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:8968: 3.054.007a tasya jyāvipramuktās te śarāḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇāḥ 3.054.007c śarīraṃ vidhamiṣyanti gaṅgākūlam ivormayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8969: 3.054.008a asurair vā surair vā tvaṃ yady avadho 'si rāvaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:8970: 3.054.008c utpādya sumahad vairaṃ jīvaṃs tasya na mokṣyase
GE09ram_1-7u:8972: 3.054.009c paśor yūpagatasyeva jīvitaṃ tava durlabham 3.054.010a yadi paśyet sa rāmas tvāṃ roṣadīptena cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_1-7u:8973: 3.054.010c rakṣas tvam adya nirdagdho gaccheḥ sadyaḥ parābhavam
GE09ram_1-7u:8974: 3.054.011a yaś candraṃ nabhaso bhūmau pātayen nāśayeta vā
GE09ram_1-7u:8975: 3.054.011c sāgaraṃ śoṣayed vāpi sa sītāṃ mocayed iha
GE09ram_1-7u:8976: 3.054.012a gatāyus tvaṃ gataśrīko gatasattvo gatendriyaḥ 3.054.012c laṅkā vaidhavyasaṃyuktā tvatkṛtena bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:8977: 3.054.013a na te pāpam idaṃ karma sukhodarkaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:8978: 3.054.013c yāhaṃ nītā vinā bhāvaṃ patipārśvāt tvayā vanāt
GE09ram_1-7u:8979: 3.054.014a sa hi daivatasaṃyukto mama bhartā mahādyutiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8980: 3.054.014c nirbhayo vīryam āśritya śūnye vasati daṇḍake
GE09ram_1-7u:8981: 3.054.015a sa te darpaṃ balaṃ vīryam utsekaṃ ca tathāvidham 3.054.015c apaneṣyati gātrebhyaḥ śaravarṣeṇa saṃyuge
GE09ram_1-7u:8982: 3.054.016a yadā vināśo bhūtānāṃ dṛśyate kālacoditaḥ 3.054.016c tadā kārye pramādyanti narāḥ kālavaśaṃ gatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8983: 3.054.017a māṃ pradhṛṣya sa te kālaḥ prāpto 'yaṃ rakṣasādhama
GE09ram_1-7u:8984: 3.054.017c ātmano rākṣasānāṃ ca vadhāyāntaḥpurasya ca 3.054.018a na śakyā yajñamadhyasthā vediḥ srugbhāṇḍa maṇḍitā
GE09ram_1-7u:8985: 3.054.018c dvijātimantrasaṃpūtā caṇḍālenāvamarditum 3.054.019a idaṃ śarīraṃ niḥsaṃjñaṃ bandha vā ghātayasva vā
GE09ram_1-7u:8986: 3.054.019c nedaṃ śarīraṃ rakṣyaṃ me jīvitaṃ vāpi rākṣasa
GE09ram_1-7u:8987: 3.054.019e na hi śakṣyāmy upakrośaṃ pṛthivyāṃ dātum ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8988: 3.054.020a evam uktvā tu vaidehī kroddhāt suparuṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8989: 3.054.020c rāvaṇaṃ maithilī tatra punar novāca kiṃ cana
GE09ram_1-7u:8990: 3.054.021a sītāyā vacanaṃ śrutvā paruṣaṃ romaharṣaṇam 3.054.021c pratyuvāca tataḥ sītāṃ bhayasaṃdarśanaṃ vacaḥ 3.054.022a śṛṇu maithili madvākyaṃ māsān dvādaśa bhāmini
GE09ram_1-7u:8991: 3.054.022c kālenānena nābhyeṣi yadi māṃ cāruhāsini 3.054.022e tatas tvāṃ prātarāśārthaṃ sūdāś chetsyanti leśaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8992: 3.054.023a ity uktvā paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ rāvaṇaḥ śatrurāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8993: 3.054.023c rākṣasīś ca tataḥ kruddha idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:8994: 3.054.024a śīghram evaṃ hi rākṣasyo vikṛtā ghoradarśanāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8996: 3.054.025a vacanād eva tās tasya vikṛtā ghoradarśanāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8998: 3.054.026a sa tāḥ provāca rājā tu rāvaṇo ghoradarśanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:8999: 3.054.026c pracālya caraṇotkarṣair dārayann iva medinīm 3.054.027a aśokavanikāmadhye maithilī nīyatām iti
GE09ram_1-7u:9000: 3.054.027c tatreyaṃ rakṣyatāṃ gūḍham uṣmābhiḥ parivāritā 3.054.028a tatraināṃ tarjanair ghoraiḥ punaḥ sāntvaiś ca maithilīm
GE09ram_1-7u:9001: 3.054.028c ānayadhvaṃ vaśaṃ sarvā vanyāṃ gajavadhūm iva
GE09ram_1-7u:9002: 3.054.029a iti pratisamādiṣṭā rākṣasyo rāvaṇena tāḥ 3.054.029c aśokavanikāṃ jagmur maithilīṃ parigṛhya tām 3.054.030a sarvakāmaphalair vṛkṣair nānāpuṣpaphalair vṛtām
GE09ram_1-7u:9004: 3.054.031a sā tu śokaparītāṅgī maithilī janakātmajā 3.054.031c rākṣasī vaśam āpannā vyāghrīṇāṃ hariṇī yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:9005: 3.054.032a na vindate tatra tu śarma maithilī; virūpanetrābhir atīva tarjitā
GE09ram_1-7u:9006: 3.054.032c patiṃ smarantī dayitaṃ ca devaraṃ; vicetanābhūd bhayaśokapīḍitā 3.055.001a rākṣasaṃ mṛgarūpeṇa carantaṃ kāmarūpiṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:9007: 3.055.001c nihatya rāmo mārīcaṃ tūrṇaṃ pathi nyavartata
GE09ram_1-7u:9010: 3.055.003a sa tasya svaram ājñāya dāruṇaṃ romaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:9011: 3.055.003c cintayām āsa gomāyoḥ svareṇa pariśaṅkitaḥ 3.055.004a aśubhaṃ bata manye 'haṃ gomāyur vāśyate yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:9012: 3.055.004c svasti syād api vaidehyā rākṣasair bhakṣaṇaṃ vinā
GE09ram_1-7u:9013: 3.055.005a mārīcena tu vijñāya svaram ālakṣya māmakam
GE09ram_1-7u:9014: 3.055.005c vikruṣṭaṃ mṛgarūpeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ śṛṇuyād yadi 3.055.006a sa saumitriḥ svaraṃ śrutvā tāṃ ca hitvātha maithilīm 3.055.006c tayaiva prahitaḥ kṣipraṃ matsakāśam ihaiṣyati 3.055.007a rākṣasaiḥ sahitair nūnaṃ sītāyā īpsito vadhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9015: 3.055.007c kāñcanaś ca mṛgo bhūtvā vyapanīyāśramāt tu mām
GE09ram_1-7u:9016: 3.055.008a dūraṃ nītvā tu mārīco rākṣaso 'bhūc charāhataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9017: 3.055.008c hā lakṣmaṇa hato 'smīti yad vākyaṃ vyajahāra ha
