GE09ram_1-7u:9018: 3.055.009a api svasti bhaved dvābhyāṃ rahitābhyāṃ mayā vane
GE09ram_1-7u:9020: 3.055.009e nimittāni ca ghorāṇi dṛśyante 'dya bahūni ca 3.055.010a ity evaṃ cintayan rāmaḥ śrutvā gomāyuniḥsvanam
GE09ram_1-7u:9023: 3.055.011a taṃ dīnamānasaṃ dīnam āsedur mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ 3.055.011c savyaṃ kṛtvā mahātmānaṃ ghorāṃś ca sasṛjuḥ svarān
GE09ram_1-7u:9024: 3.055.012a tāni dṛṣṭvā nimittāni mahāghorāṇi rāghavaḥ 3.055.012c tato lakṣaṇam āyāntaṃ dadarśa vigataprabham 3.055.013a tato 'vidūre rāmeṇa samīyāya sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9025: 3.055.013c viṣaṇṇaḥ sa viṣaṇṇena duḥkhito duḥkhabhāginā 3.055.014a saṃjagarhe 'tha taṃ bhrātā jeṣṭho lakṣmaṇam āgatam 3.055.014c vihāya sītāṃ vijane vane rākṣasasevite 3.055.015a gṛhītvā ca karaṃ savyaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9026: 3.055.015c uvāca madhurodarkam idaṃ paruṣam ārtavat 3.055.016a aho lakṣmaṇa garhyaṃ te kṛtaṃ yat tvaṃ vihāya tām
GE09ram_1-7u:9027: 3.055.016c sītām ihāgataḥ saumya kaccit svasti bhaved iti
GE09ram_1-7u:9028: 3.055.017a na me 'sti saṃśayo vīra sarvathā janakātmajā
GE09ram_1-7u:9029: 3.055.017c vinaṣṭā bhakṣitā vāpa rākṣasair vanacāribhiḥ 3.055.018a aśubhāny eva bhūyiṣṭhaṃ yathā prādurbhavanti me
GE09ram_1-7u:9030: 3.055.018c api lakṣmaṇa sītāyāḥ sāmagryaṃ prāpnuyāvahe 3.055.019a idaṃ hi rakṣomṛgasaṃnikāśaṃ; pralobhya māṃ dūram anuprayātam
GE09ram_1-7u:9031: 3.055.019c hataṃ kathaṃ cin mahatā śrameṇa; sa rākṣaso 'bhūn mriyamāṇa eva 3.055.020a manaś ca me dīnam ihāprahṛṣṭaṃ; cakṣuś ca savyaṃ kurute vikāram 3.055.020c asaṃśayaṃ lakṣmaṇa nāsti sītā; hṛtā mṛtā vā pathi vartate vā
GE09ram_1-7u:9032: 3.056.001a sa dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇaṃ dīnaṃ śūnye daśarathātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9033: 3.056.001c paryapṛcchata dharmātmā vaidehīm āgataṃ vinā 3.056.002a prasthitaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ yā mām anujagāma ha
GE09ram_1-7u:9034: 3.056.002c kva sā lakṣmaṇa vaidehī yāṃ hitvā tvam ihāgataḥ 3.056.003a rājyabhraṣṭasya dīnasya daṇḍakān paridhāvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9035: 3.056.003c kva sā duḥkhasahāyā me vaidehī tanumadhyamā
GE09ram_1-7u:9036: 3.056.004a yāṃ vinā notsahe vīra muhūrtam api jīvitum
GE09ram_1-7u:9037: 3.056.004c kva sā prāṇasahāyā me sītā surasutopamā
GE09ram_1-7u:9038: 3.056.005a patitvam amarāṇāṃ vā pṛthivyāś cāpi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:9039: 3.056.005c vinā tāṃ tapanīyābhāṃ neccheyaṃ janakātmajām 3.056.006a kaccij jīvati vaidehī prāṇaiḥ priyatarā mama
GE09ram_1-7u:9040: 3.056.006c kaccit pravrājanaṃ saumya na me mithyā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:9041: 3.056.007a sītānimittaṃ saumitre mṛte mayi gate tvayi
GE09ram_1-7u:9042: 3.056.007c kaccit sakāmā sukhitā kaikeyī sā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:9044: 3.056.008c upasthāsyati kausalyā kaccin saumya na kaikayīm
GE09ram_1-7u:9045: 3.056.009a yadi jīvati vaidehī gamiṣyāmy āśramaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9046: 3.056.009c suvṛttā yadi vṛttā sā prāṇāṃs tyakṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:9047: 3.056.010a yadi mām āśramagataṃ vaidehī nābhibhāṣate 3.056.010c punaḥ prahasitā sītā vinaśiṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa 3.056.011a brūhi lakṣmaṇa vaidehī yadi jīvati vā na vā 3.056.011c tvayi pramatte rakṣobhir bhakṣitā vā tapasvinī
GE09ram_1-7u:9048: 3.056.012a sukumārī ca bālā ca nityaṃ cāduḥkhadarśinī
GE09ram_1-7u:9049: 3.056.012c madviyogena vaidehī vyaktaṃ śocati durmanāḥ 3.056.013a sarvathā rakṣasā tena jihmena sudurātmanā 3.056.013c vadatā lakṣmaṇety uccais tavāpi janitaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_1-7u:9050: 3.056.014a śrutaś ca śaṅke vaidehyā sa svaraḥ sadṛśo mama 3.056.014c trastayā preṣitas tvaṃ ca draṣṭuṃ māṃ śīghram āgataḥ 3.056.015a sarvathā tu kṛtaṃ kaṣṭaṃ sītām utsṛjatā vane
GE09ram_1-7u:9051: 3.056.015c pratikartuṃ nṛśaṃsānāṃ rakṣasāṃ dattam antaram 3.056.016a duḥkhitāḥ kharaghātena rākṣasāḥ piśitāśanāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9052: 3.056.016c taiḥ sītā nihatā ghorair bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9054: 3.056.017c kiṃ tv idānīṃ kariṣyāmi śaṅke prāptavyam īdṛśam
GE09ram_1-7u:9055: 3.056.018a iti sītāṃ varārohāṃ cintayann eva rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9057: 3.056.019a vigarhamāṇo 'nujam ārtarūpaṃ; kṣudhā śramāc caiva pipāsayā ca 3.056.019c viniḥśvasañ śuṣkamukho viṣaṇṇaḥ; pratiśrayaṃ prāpya samīkṣya
GE09ram_1-7u:9059: 3.056.020a svam āśramaṃ saṃpravigāhya vīro; vihāradeśān anusṛtya kāṃś cit
GE09ram_1-7u:9060: 3.056.020c etat tad ity eva nivāsabhūmau; prahṛṣṭaromā vyathito babhūva
GE09ram_1-7u:9062: 3.057.001c paripapraccha saumitriṃ rāmo duḥkhārditaḥ punaḥ 3.057.002a tam uvāca kimarthaṃ tvam āgato 'pāsya maithilīm
GE09ram_1-7u:9063: 3.057.002c yadā sā tava viśvāsād vane viharitā mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:9064: 3.057.003a dṛṣṭvaivābhyāgataṃ tvāṃ me maithilīṃ tyajya lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:9065: 3.057.003c śaṅkamānaṃ mahat pāpaṃ yat satyaṃ vyathitaṃ manaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9066: 3.057.004a sphurate nayanaṃ savyaṃ bāhuś ca hṛdayaṃ ca me 3.057.004c dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇa dūre tvāṃ sītāvirahitaṃ pathi
GE09ram_1-7u:9067: 3.057.005a evam uktas tu saumitrir lakṣmaṇaḥ śubhalakṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9068: 3.057.005c bhūyo duḥkhasamāviṣṭo duḥkhitaṃ rāmam abravīt 3.057.006a na svayaṃ kāmakāreṇa tāṃ tyaktvāham ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9070: 3.057.007a āryeṇeva parikruṣṭaṃ hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca
GE09ram_1-7u:9071: 3.057.007c paritrāhīti yad vākyaṃ maithilyās tac chrutiṃ gatam
GE09ram_1-7u:9072: 3.057.008a sā tam ārtasvaraṃ śrutvā tava snehena maithilī
GE09ram_1-7u:9073: 3.057.008c gaccha gaccheti mām āha rudantī bhayavihvalā
GE09ram_1-7u:9074: 3.057.009a pracodyamānena mayā gaccheti bahuśas tayā 3.057.009c pratyuktā maithilī vākyam idaṃ tvatpratyayānvitam 3.057.010a na tat paśyāmy ahaṃ rakṣo yad asya bhayam āvahet
GE09ram_1-7u:9075: 3.057.010c nirvṛtā bhava nāsty etat kenāpy evam udāhṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:9076: 3.057.011a vigarhitaṃ ca nīcaṃ ca katham āryo 'bhidhāsyati
GE09ram_1-7u:9077: 3.057.011c trāhīti vacanaṃ sīte yas trāyet tridaśān api
GE09ram_1-7u:9078: 3.057.012a kiṃnimittaṃ tu kenāpi bhrātur ālambya me svaram
GE09ram_1-7u:9079: 3.057.012c visvaraṃ vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇa trāhi mām iti
GE09ram_1-7u:9080: 3.057.012e na bhavatyā vyathā kāryā kunārījanasevitā 3.057.013a alaṃ vaiklavyam ālambya svasthā bhava nirutsukā
GE09ram_1-7u:9081: 3.057.013c na cāsti triṣu lokeṣu pumān yo rāghavaṃ raṇe 3.057.013e jāto vā jāyamāno vā saṃyuge yaḥ parājayet
GE09ram_1-7u:9082: 3.057.014a evam uktā tu vaidehī parimohitacetanā 3.057.014c uvācāśrūṇi muñcantī dāruṇaṃ mām idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9083: 3.057.015a bhāvo mayi tavātyarthaṃ pāpa eva niveśitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9084: 3.057.015c vinaṣṭe bhrātari prāpte na ca tvaṃ mām avāpsyasi 3.057.016a saṃketād bharatena tvaṃ rāmaṃ samanugacchasi 3.057.016c krośantaṃ hi yathātyarthaṃ nainam abhyavapadyase 3.057.017a ripuḥ pracchannacārī tvaṃ madartham anugacchasi 3.057.017c rāghavasyāntaraprepsus tathainaṃ nābhipadyase
GE09ram_1-7u:9085: 3.057.018a evam ukto hi vaidehyā saṃrabdho raktalocanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9087: 3.057.019a evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ saumitriṃ rāmaḥ saṃtāpamohitaḥ 3.057.019c abravīd duṣkṛtaṃ saumya tāṃ vinā yat tvam āgataḥ 3.057.020a jānann api samarthaṃ māṃ rakṣasāṃ vinivāraṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:9088: 3.057.020c anena krodhavākyena maithilyā niḥsṛto bhavān 3.057.021a na hi te parituṣyāmi tyaktvā yad yāsi maithilīm 3.057.021c kruddhāyāḥ paruṣaṃ śrutvā striyā yat tvam ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9089: 3.057.022a sarvathā tv apanītaṃ te sītayā yat pracoditaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9090: 3.057.022c krodhasya vaśam āgamya nākaroḥ śāsanaṃ mama
GE09ram_1-7u:9091: 3.057.023a asau hi rākṣasaḥ śete śareṇābhihato mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:9093: 3.057.024a vikṛṣya cāpaṃ paridhāya sāyakaṃ; salīla bāṇena ca tāḍito mayā 3.057.024c mārgīṃ tanuṃ tyajya ca viklavasvaro; babhūva keyūradharaḥ sa
GE09ram_1-7u:9095: 3.057.025a śarāhatenaiva tadārtayā girā; svaraṃ mamālambya sudūrasaṃśravam
GE09ram_1-7u:9096: 3.057.025c udāhṛtaṃ tad vacanaṃ sudāruṇaṃ; tvam āgato yena vihāya maithilīm 3.058.001a bhṛśam āvrajamānasya tasyādhovāmalocanam
GE09ram_1-7u:9097: 3.058.001c prāsphurac cāskhalad rāmo vepathuś cāsya jāyate
GE09ram_1-7u:9098: 3.058.002a upālakṣya nimittāni so 'śubhāni muhur muhuḥ 3.058.002c api kṣemaṃ tu sītāyā iti vai vyājahāra ha 3.058.003a tvaramāṇo jagāmātha sītādarśanalālasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9100: 3.058.004a udbhramann iva vegena vikṣipan raghunandanaḥ 3.058.004c tatra tatroṭajasthānam abhivīkṣya samantataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9101: 3.058.005a dadarśa parṇaśālāṃ ca rahitāṃ sītayā tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:9102: 3.058.005c śriyā virahitāṃ dhvastāṃ hemante padminīm iva
GE09ram_1-7u:9103: 3.058.006a rudantam iva vṛkṣaiś ca mlānapuṣpamṛgadvijam 3.058.006c śriyā vihīnaṃ vidhvastaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:9104: 3.058.007a viprakīrṇājinakuśaṃ vipraviddhabṛsīkaṭam 3.058.007c dṛṣṭvā śūnyoṭajasthānaṃ vilalāpa punaḥ punaḥ 3.058.008a hṛtā mṛtā vā naṣṭā vā bhakṣitā vā bhaviṣyati 3.058.008c nilīnāpy atha vā bhīrur atha vā vanam āśritā 3.058.009a gatā vicetuṃ puṣpāṇi phalāny api ca vā punaḥ 3.058.009c atha vā padminīṃ yātā jalārthaṃ vā nadīṃ gatā 3.058.010a yatnān mṛgayamāṇas tu nāsasāda vane priyām
GE09ram_1-7u:9105: 3.058.010c śokaraktekṣaṇaḥ śokād unmatta iva lakṣyate 3.058.011a vṛkṣād vṛkṣaṃ pradhāvan sa girīṃś cāpi nadīn nadīm 3.058.011c babhūva vilapan rāmaḥ śokapaṅkārṇavaplutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9106: 3.058.012a asti kaccit tvayā dṛṣṭā sā kadambapriyā priyā
GE09ram_1-7u:9107: 3.058.012c kadamba yadi jānīṣe śaṃsa sītāṃ śubhānanām
GE09ram_1-7u:9108: 3.058.013a snigdhapallavasaṃkāśāṃ pītakauśeyavāsinīm 3.058.013c śaṃsasva yadi vā dṛṣṭā bilva bilvopamastanī
GE09ram_1-7u:9109: 3.058.014a atha vārjuna śaṃsa tvaṃ priyāṃ tām arjunapriyām
GE09ram_1-7u:9110: 3.058.014c janakasya sutā bhīrur yadi jīvati vā na vā 3.058.015a kakubhaḥ kakubhoruṃ tāṃ vyaktaṃ jānāti maithilīm
GE09ram_1-7u:9111: 3.058.015c latāpallavapuṣpāḍhyo bhāti hy eṣa vanaspatiḥ 3.058.016a bhramarair upagītaś ca yathā drumavaro hy ayam
GE09ram_1-7u:9112: 3.058.016c eṣa vyaktaṃ vijānāti tilakas tilakapriyām 3.058.017a aśokaśokāpanuda śokopahatacetasaṃ 3.058.017c tvannāmānaṃ kuru kṣipraṃ priyāsaṃdarśanena mām 3.058.018a yadi tāla tvayā dṛṣṭā pakvatālaphalastanī 3.058.018c kathayasva varārohāṃ kāruṣyaṃ yadi te mayi
GE09ram_1-7u:9113: 3.058.019a yadi dṛṣṭā tvayā sītā jambujāmbūnadaprabhā 3.058.019c priyāṃ yadi vijānīṣe niḥśaṅkaṃ kathayasva me
GE09ram_1-7u:9114: 3.058.020a atha vā mṛgaśāvākṣīṃ mṛga jānāsi maithilīm
GE09ram_1-7u:9115: 3.058.020c mṛgaviprekṣaṇī kāntā mṛgībhiḥ sahitā bhavet 3.058.021a gaja sā gajanāsorur yadi dṛṣṭā tvayā bhavet
GE09ram_1-7u:9116: 3.058.021c tāṃ manye viditāṃ tubhyam ākhyāhi varavāraṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:9117: 3.058.022a śārdūla yadi sā dṛṣṭā priyā candranibhānanā
GE09ram_1-7u:9118: 3.058.022c maithilī mama visrabdhaḥ kathayasva na te bhayam
GE09ram_1-7u:9119: 3.058.023a kiṃ dhāvasi priye nūnaṃ dṛṣṭāsi kamalekṣaṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:9120: 3.058.023c vṛkṣeṇācchādya cātmānaṃ kiṃ māṃ na pratibhāṣase
GE09ram_1-7u:9121: 3.058.024a tiṣṭha tiṣṭha varārohe na te 'sti karuṇā mayi 3.058.024c nātyarthaṃ hāsyaśīlāsi kimarthaṃ mām upekṣase 3.058.025a pītakauśeyakenāsi sūcitā varavarṇini
GE09ram_1-7u:9122: 3.058.025c dhāvanty api mayā dṛṣṭā tiṣṭha yady asti sauhṛdam 3.058.026a naiva sā nūnam atha vā hiṃsitā cāruhāsinī
GE09ram_1-7u:9123: 3.058.026c kṛcchraṃ prāptaṃ hi māṃ nūnaṃ yathopekṣitum arhati
GE09ram_1-7u:9124: 3.058.027a vyaktaṃ sā bhakṣitā bālā rākṣasaiḥ piśitāśanaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9125: 3.058.027c vibhajyāṅgāni sarvāṇi mayā virahitā priyā 3.058.028a nūnaṃ tac chubhadantauṣṭhaṃ mukhaṃ niṣprabhatāṃ gatam
GE09ram_1-7u:9126: 3.058.028c sā hi campakavarṇābhā grīvā graiveya śobhitā
GE09ram_1-7u:9127: 3.058.029a komalā vilapantyās tu kāntāyā bhakṣitā śubhā
GE09ram_1-7u:9128: 3.058.029c nūnaṃ vikṣipyamāṇau tau bāhū pallavakomalau 3.058.030a bhakṣitau vepamānāgrau
GE09ram_1-7u:9129: 3.058.030c mayā virahitā bālā rakṣasāṃ bhakṣaṇāya vai
GE09ram_1-7u:9131: 3.058.031c hā lakṣmaṇa mahābāho paśyasi tvaṃ priyāṃ kva cit 3.058.032a hā priye kva gatā bhadre hā sīteti punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9132: 3.058.032c ity evaṃ vilapan rāmaḥ paridhāvan vanād vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:9133: 3.058.033a kva cid udbhramate vegāt kva cid vibhramate balāt 3.058.033c kva cin matta ivābhāti kāntān veṣaṇatatparaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9134: 3.058.034a sa vanāni nadīḥ śailān giriprasravaṇāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:9135: 3.058.034c kānanāni ca vegena bhramaty aparisaṃsthitaḥ 3.058.035a tathā sa gatvā vipulaṃ mahad vanaṃ; parītya sarvaṃ tv atha maithilīṃ prati
GE09ram_1-7u:9136: 3.058.035c aniṣṭhitāśaḥ sa cakāra mārgaṇe; punaḥ priyāyāḥ paramaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:9139: 3.059.001c rahitāṃ parṇaśālāṃ ca vidhvastāny āsanāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:9140: 3.059.002a adṛṣṭvā tatra vaidehīṃ saṃnirīkṣya ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9141: 3.059.002c uvāca rāmaḥ prākruśya pragṛhya rucirau bhujau
GE09ram_1-7u:9142: 3.059.003a kva nu lakṣmaṇa vaidehī kaṃ vā deśam ito gatā
GE09ram_1-7u:9143: 3.059.003c kenāhṛtā vā saumitre bhakṣitā kena vā priyā
GE09ram_1-7u:9144: 3.059.004a vṛṣkeṇāvārya yadi māṃ sīte hasitum icchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:9145: 3.059.004c alaṃ te hasitenādya māṃ bhajasva suduḥkhitam
GE09ram_1-7u:9146: 3.059.005a yaiḥ saha krīḍase sīte viśvastair mṛgapotakaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9147: 3.059.005c ete hīnās tvayā saumye dhyāyanty asrāvilekṣaṇāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9148: 3.059.006a mṛtaṃ śokena mahatā sītāharaṇajena mām 3.059.006c paraloke mahārājo nūnaṃ drakṣyati me pitā
GE09ram_1-7u:9149: 3.059.007a kathaṃ pratijñāṃ saṃśrutya mayā tvam abhiyojitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9150: 3.059.007c apūrayitvā taṃ kālaṃ matsakāśam ihāgataḥ 3.059.008a kāmavṛttam anāryaṃ māṃ mṛṣāvādinam eva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:9151: 3.059.008c dhik tvām iti pare loke vyaktaṃ vakṣyati me pitā
GE09ram_1-7u:9153: 3.059.009c mām ihotsṛjya karuṇaṃ kīrtir naram ivānṛjum
GE09ram_1-7u:9154: 3.059.010a kva gacchasi varārohe mām utsṛjya sumadhyame
GE09ram_1-7u:9155: 3.059.010c tvayā virahitaś cāhaṃ mokṣye jīvitam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9157: 3.059.011c na dadarśa suduḥkhārto rāghavo janakātmajām 3.059.012a anāsādayamānaṃ taṃ sītāṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:9158: 3.059.012c paṅkam āsādya vipulaṃ sīdantam iva kuñjaram
GE09ram_1-7u:9159: 3.059.012e lakṣmaṇo rāmam atyartham uvāca hitakāmyayā 3.059.013a mā viṣādaṃ mahābāho kuru yatnaṃ mayā saha
GE09ram_1-7u:9160: 3.059.013c idaṃ ca hi vanaṃ śūra bahukandaraśobhitam
GE09ram_1-7u:9162: 3.059.014c sā vanaṃ vā praviṣṭā syān nalinīṃ vā supuṣpitām 3.059.015a saritaṃ vāpi saṃprāptā
GE09ram_1-7u:9163: 3.059.015c vitrāsayitukāmā vā līnā syāt kānane kva cit
GE09ram_1-7u:9164: 3.059.015e jijñāsamānā vaidehī tvāṃ māṃ ca puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_1-7u:9165: 3.059.016a tasyā hy anveṣaṇe śrīman kṣipram eva yatāvahe
GE09ram_1-7u:9166: 3.059.016c vanaṃ sarvaṃ vicinuvo yatra sā janakātmajā
GE09ram_1-7u:9167: 3.059.016e manyase yadi kākutstha mā sma śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ 3.059.017a evam uktas tu sauhārdāl lakṣmaṇena samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9168: 3.059.017c saha saumitriṇā rāmo vicetum upacakrame 3.059.017e tau vanāni girīṃś caiva saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca 3.059.018a nikhilena vicinvantau sītāṃ daśarathātmajau
GE09ram_1-7u:9169: 3.059.018c tasya śailasya sānūni guhāś ca śikharāṇi ca
GE09ram_1-7u:9170: 3.059.019a nikhilena vicinvantau naiva tām abhijagmatuḥ 3.059.019c vicitya sarvataḥ śailaṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:9171: 3.059.020a neha paśyāmi saumitre vaidehīṃ parvate śubhe
GE09ram_1-7u:9172: 3.059.020c tato duḥkhābhisaṃtapto lakṣmaṇo vākyam abravīt 3.059.021a vicaran daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ bhrātaraṃ dīptatejasaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:9173: 3.059.021c prāpsyasi tvaṃ mahāprājña maithilīṃ janakātmajām 3.059.022a yathā viṣṇur mahābāhur baliṃ baddhvā mahīm imām
GE09ram_1-7u:9174: 3.059.022c evam uktas tu vīreṇa lakṣmaṇena sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9176: 3.059.023c vanaṃ sarvaṃ suvicitaṃ padminyaḥ phullapaṅkajāḥ 3.059.024a giriś cāyaṃ mahāprājña
GE09ram_1-7u:9177: 3.059.024c na hi paśyāmi vaidehīṃ prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasīm
GE09ram_1-7u:9178: 3.059.025a evaṃ sa vilapan rāmaḥ sītāharaṇakarśitaḥ 3.059.025c dīnaḥ śokasamāviṣṭo muhūrtaṃ vihvalo 'bhavat
GE09ram_1-7u:9181: 3.059.027a bahuśaḥ sa tu niḥśvasya rāmo rājīvalocanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9182: 3.059.027c hā priyeti vicukrośa bahuśo bāṣpagadgadaḥ 3.059.028a taṃ sāntvayām āsa tato lakṣmaṇaḥ priyabāndhavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9184: 3.059.029a anādṛtya tu tad vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇauṣṭhapuṭacyutam 3.059.029c apaśyaṃs tāṃ priyāṃ sītāṃ prākrośat sa punaḥ punaḥ 3.060.001a sa dīno dīnayā vācā lakṣmaṇaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:9185: 3.060.001c śīghraṃ lakṣmaṇa jānīhi gatvā godāvarīṃ nadīm
GE09ram_1-7u:9186: 3.060.001e api godāvarīṃ sītā padmāny ānayituṃ gatā
GE09ram_1-7u:9187: 3.060.002a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ punar eva hi 3.060.002c nadīṃ godāvarīṃ ramyāṃ jagāma laghuvikramaḥ 3.060.003a tāṃ lakṣmaṇas tīrthavatīṃ vicitvā rāmam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:9188: 3.060.003c naināṃ paśyāmi tīrtheṣu krośato na śṛṇoti me
GE09ram_1-7u:9189: 3.060.004a kaṃ nu sā deśam āpannā vaidehī kleśanāśinī
GE09ram_1-7u:9190: 3.060.004c na hi taṃ vedmi vai rāma yatra sā tanumadhyamā
GE09ram_1-7u:9191: 3.060.005a lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā dīnaḥ saṃtāpa mohitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9192: 3.060.005c rāmaḥ samabhicakrāma svayaṃ godāvarīṃ nadīm 3.060.006a sa tām upasthito rāmaḥ kva sītety evam abravīt 3.060.007a bhūtāni rākṣasendreṇa vadhārheṇa hṛtām api 3.060.007c na tāṃ śaśaṃsū rāmāya tathā godāvarī nadī
GE09ram_1-7u:9193: 3.060.008a tataḥ pracoditā bhūtaiḥ śaṃsāsmai tāṃ priyām iti
GE09ram_1-7u:9194: 3.060.008c na ca sābhyavadat sītāṃ pṛṣṭā rāmeṇa śocitā
GE09ram_1-7u:9195: 3.060.009a rāvaṇasya ca tad rūpaṃ karmāṇi ca durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9196: 3.060.009c dhyātvā bhayāt tu vaidehīṃ sā nadī na śaśaṃsa tām
GE09ram_1-7u:9197: 3.060.010a nirāśas tu tayā nadyā sītāyā darśane kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9199: 3.060.011a kiṃ nu lakṣmaṇa vakṣyāmi sametya janakaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9200: 3.060.011c mātaraṃ caiva vaidehyā vinā tām aham apriyam
GE09ram_1-7u:9201: 3.060.012a yā me rājyavihīnasya vane vanyena jīvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9202: 3.060.012c sarvaṃ vyapanayac chokaṃ vaidehī kva nu sā gatā 3.060.013a jñātipakṣavihīnasya rājaputrīm apaśyataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9203: 3.060.013c manye dīrghā bhaviṣyanti rātrayo mama jāgrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9204: 3.060.014a godāvarīṃ janasthānam imaṃ prasravaṇaṃ girim 3.060.014c sarvāṇy anucariṣyāmi yadi sītā hi dṛśyate
GE09ram_1-7u:9205: 3.060.015a evaṃ saṃbhāṣamāṇau tāv anyonyaṃ bhrātarāv ubhau
GE09ram_1-7u:9207: 3.060.016a tāṃ puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmo mahītale
GE09ram_1-7u:9208: 3.060.016c uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ vīro duḥkhito duḥkhitaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9210: 3.060.017c apinaddhāni vaidehyā mayā dattāni kānane 3.060.018a evam uktvā mahābāhur lakṣmaṇaṃ puruṣarṣabham 3.060.018c kruddho 'bravīd giriṃ tatra siṃhaḥ kṣudramṛgaṃ yathā 3.060.019a tāṃ hemavarṇāṃ hemābhāṃ sītāṃ darśaya parvata
GE09ram_1-7u:9211: 3.060.019c yāvat sānūni sarvāṇi na te vidhvaṃsayāmy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:9214: 3.060.021a imāṃ vā saritaṃ cādya śoṣayiṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:9215: 3.060.021c yadi nākhyāti me sītām adya candranibhānanām
GE09ram_1-7u:9216: 3.060.022a evaṃ sa ruṣito rāmo didhakṣann iva cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_1-7u:9217: 3.060.022c dadarśa bhūmau niṣkrāntaṃ rākṣasasya padaṃ mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:9218: 3.060.023a sa samīkṣya parikrāntaṃ sītāyā rākṣasasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:9219: 3.060.023c saṃbhrāntahṛdayo rāmaḥ śaśaṃsa bhrātaraṃ priyam 3.060.024a paśya lakṣmaṇa vaidehyāḥ śīrṇāḥ kanakabindavaḥ 3.060.024c bhūṣaṇānāṃ hi saumitre mālyāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:9221: 3.060.025c āvṛtaṃ paśya saumitre sarvato dharaṇītalam 3.060.026a manye lakṣmaṇa vaidehī rākṣasaiḥ kāmarūpibhiḥ 3.060.026c bhittvā bhittvā vibhaktā vā bhakṣitā vā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:9222: 3.060.027a tasya nimittaṃ vaidehyā dvayor vivadamānayoḥ 3.060.027c babhūva yuddhaṃ saumitre ghoraṃ rākṣasayor iha
GE09ram_1-7u:9224: 3.060.028c dharaṇyāṃ patitaṃ saumya kasya bhagnaṃ mahad dhanuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9225: 3.060.029a taruṇādityasaṃkāśaṃ vaidūryagulikācitam 3.060.029c viśīrṇaṃ patitaṃ bhūmau kavacaṃ kasya kāñcanam
GE09ram_1-7u:9227: 3.060.030c bhagnadaṇḍam idaṃ kasya bhūmau saumya nipātitam
GE09ram_1-7u:9229: 3.060.031c bhīmarūpā mahākāyāḥ kasya vā nihatā raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:9231: 3.060.032c apaviddhaś ca bhagnaś ca kasya sāṃgrāmiko rathaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9234: 3.060.034a vairaṃ śataguṇaṃ paśya mamedaṃ jīvitāntakam 3.060.034c sughorahṛdayaiḥ saumya rākṣasaiḥ kāmarūpibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9235: 3.060.035a hṛtā mṛtā vā sītā hi bhakṣitā vā tapasvinī 3.060.035c na dharmas trāyate sītāṃ hriyamāṇāṃ mahāvane
GE09ram_1-7u:9236: 3.060.036a bhakṣitāyāṃ hi vaidehyāṃ hṛtāyām api lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:9237: 3.060.036c ke hi loke priyaṃ kartuṃ śaktāḥ saumya mameśvarāḥ 3.060.037a kartāram api lokānāṃ śūraṃ karuṇavedinam 3.060.037c ajñānād avamanyeran sarvabhūtāni lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:9238: 3.060.038a mṛduṃ lokahite yuktaṃ dāntaṃ karuṇavedinam 3.060.038c nirvīrya iti manyante nūnaṃ māṃ tridaśeśvarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9239: 3.060.039a māṃ prāpya hi guṇo doṣaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ paśya lakṣmaṇa 3.060.039c adyaiva sarvabhūtānāṃ rakṣasām abhavāya ca 3.060.039e saṃhṛtyaiva śaśijyotsnāṃ mahān sūrya ivoditaḥ 3.060.040a naiva yakṣā na gandharvā na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ 3.060.040c kiṃnarā vā manuṣyā vā sukhaṃ prāpsyanti lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:9241: 3.060.041c niḥsaṃpātaṃ kariṣyāmi hy adya trailokyacāriṇām 3.060.042a saṃniruddhagrahagaṇam āvāritaniśākaram 3.060.042c vipranaṣṭānalamarudbhāskaradyutisaṃvṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:9242: 3.060.043a vinirmathitaśailāgraṃ śuṣyamāṇajalāśayam 3.060.043c dhvastadrumalatāgulmaṃ vipraṇāśitasāgaram 3.060.044a na tāṃ kuśalinīṃ sītāṃ pradāsyanti mameśvarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9243: 3.060.044c asmin muhūrte saumitre mama drakṣyanti vikramam
GE09ram_1-7u:9245: 3.060.045c mama cāpaguṇān muktair bāṇajālair nirantaram 3.060.046a arditaṃ mama nārācair
GE09ram_1-7u:9246: 3.060.046c samākulam amaryādaṃ jagat paśyādya lakṣmaṇa 3.060.047a ākarṇapūrṇair iṣubhir jīvalokaṃ durāvaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9248: 3.060.048a mama roṣaprayuktānāṃ sāyakānāṃ balaṃ surāḥ 3.060.048c drakṣyanty adya vimuktānām amarṣād dūragāminām 3.060.049a naiva devā na daiteyā na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ 3.060.049c bhaviṣyanti mama krodhāt trailokye vipraṇāśite 3.060.050a devadānavayakṣāṇāṃ lokā ye rakṣasām api 3.060.050c bahudhā nipatiṣyanti bāṇaughaiḥ śakulīkṛtāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9249: 3.060.050e nirmaryādān imāṃl lokān kariṣyāmy adya sāyakaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9250: 3.060.051a yathā jarā yathā mṛtyur yathākālo yathāvidhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9251: 3.060.051c nityaṃ na pratihanyante sarvabhūteṣu lakṣmaṇa 3.060.051e tathāhaṃ krodhasaṃyukto na nivāryo 'smy asaṃśayam
GE09ram_1-7u:9252: 3.060.052a pureva me cārudatīm aninditāṃ; diśanti sītāṃ yadi nādya maithilīm 3.060.052c sadevagandharvamanuṣya pannagaṃ; jagat saśailaṃ parivartayāmy
GE09ram_1-7u:9255: 3.061.001c lokānām abhave yuktaṃ sāmvartakam ivānalam 3.061.002a vīkṣamāṇaṃ dhanuḥ sajyaṃ niḥśvasantaṃ muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9256: 3.061.002c hantukāmaṃ paśuṃ rudraṃ kruddhaṃ dakṣakratau yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:9257: 3.061.003a adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ saṃkruddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9258: 3.061.003c abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ mukhena pariśuṣyatā 3.061.004a purā bhūtvā mṛdur dāntaḥ sarvabhūtahite rataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9259: 3.061.004c na krodhavaśam āpannaḥ prakṛtiṃ hātum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:9260: 3.061.005a candre lakṣṇīḥ prabhā sūrye gatir vāyau bhuvi kṣamā 3.061.005c etac ca niyataṃ sarvaṃ tvayi cānuttamaṃ yaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9261: 3.061.006a na tu jānāmi kasyāyaṃ bhagnaḥ sāṃgrāmiko rathaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9262: 3.061.006c kena vā kasya vā hetoḥ sāyudhaḥ saparicchadaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9265: 3.061.008a ekasya tu vimardo 'yaṃ na dvayor vadatāṃ vara
GE09ram_1-7u:9266: 3.061.008c na hi vṛttaṃ hi paśyāmi balasya mahataḥ padam 3.061.009a naikasya tu kṛte lokān vināśayitum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:9267: 3.061.009c yuktadaṇḍā hi mṛdavaḥ praśāntā vasudhādhipāḥ 3.061.010a sadā tvaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ śaraṇyaḥ paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9268: 3.061.010c ko nu dārapraṇāśaṃ te sādhu manyeta rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:9270: 3.061.011c nālaṃ te vipriyaṃ kartuṃ dīkṣitasyeva sādhavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9271: 3.061.012a yena rājan hṛtā sītā tam anveṣitum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:9273: 3.061.013a samudraṃ ca viceṣyāmaḥ parvatāṃś ca vanāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:9274: 3.061.013c guhāś ca vividhā ghorā nalinīḥ pārvatīś ca ha 3.061.014a devagandharvalokāṃś ca viceṣyāmaḥ samāhitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9276: 3.061.015a na cet sāmnā pradāsyanti patnīṃ te tridaśeśvarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9277: 3.061.015c kosalendra tataḥ paścāt prāptakālaṃ kariṣyasi 3.061.016a śīlena sāmnā vinayena sītāṃ; nayena na prāpsyasi cen narendra 3.061.016c tataḥ samutsādaya hemapuṅkhair; mahendravajrapratimaiḥ śaraughaiḥ 3.062.001a taṃ tathā śokasaṃtaptaṃ vilapantam anāthavat 3.062.001c mohena mahatāviṣṭaṃ paridyūnam acetanam
GE09ram_1-7u:9278: 3.062.002a tataḥ saumitrir āśvāsya muhūrtād iva lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9279: 3.062.002c rāmaṃ saṃbodhayām āsa caraṇau cābhipīḍayan 3.062.003a mahatā tapasā rāma mahatā cāpi karmaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:9281: 3.062.004a tava caiva guṇair baddhas tvadviyogān mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9282: 3.062.004c rājā devatvam āpanno bharatasya yathā śrutam
GE09ram_1-7u:9283: 3.062.005a yadi duḥkham idaṃ prāptaṃ kākutstha na sahiṣyase
GE09ram_1-7u:9284: 3.062.005c prākṛtaś cālpasattvaś ca itaraḥ kaḥ sahiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:9285: 3.062.006a duḥkhito hi bhavāṃl lokāṃs tejasā yadi dhakṣyate
GE09ram_1-7u:9286: 3.062.006c ārtāḥ prajā naravyāghra kva nu yāsyanti nirvṛtim
GE09ram_1-7u:9288: 3.062.007c gataḥ śakreṇa sālokyam anayas taṃ samaspṛśat
GE09ram_1-7u:9289: 3.062.008a maharṣayo vasiṣṭhas tu yaḥ pitur naḥ purohitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9290: 3.062.008c ahnā putraśataṃ jajñe tathaivāsya punar hatam
GE09ram_1-7u:9291: 3.062.009a yā ceyaṃ jagato mātā devī lokanamaskṛtā
GE09ram_1-7u:9292: 3.062.009c asyāś ca calanaṃ bhūmer dṛśyate satyasaṃśrava
GE09ram_1-7u:9293: 3.062.010a yau cemau jagatāṃ netre yatra sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE09ram_1-7u:9295: 3.062.011a sumahānty api bhūtāni devāś ca puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_1-7u:9296: 3.062.011c na daivasya pramuñcanti sarvabhūtāni dehinaḥ 3.062.012a śakrādiṣv api deveṣu vartamānau nayānayau 3.062.012c śrūyete naraśārdūla na tvaṃ vyathitum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:9297: 3.062.013a naṣṭāyām api vaidehyāṃ hṛtāyām api cānagha
GE09ram_1-7u:9298: 3.062.013c śocituṃ nārhase vīra yathānyaḥ prākṛtas tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:9299: 3.062.014a tvadvidhā hi na śocanti satataṃ satyadarśinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9301: 3.062.015a tattvato hi naraśreṣṭha buddhyā samanucintaya 3.062.015c buddhyā yuktā mahāprājñā vijānanti śubhāśubhe 3.062.016a adṛṣṭaguṇadoṣāṇām adhṛtānāṃ ca karmaṇām
GE09ram_1-7u:9302: 3.062.016c nāntareṇa kriyāṃ teṣāṃ phalam iṣṭaṃ pravartate
GE09ram_1-7u:9303: 3.062.017a mām eva hi purā vīra tvam eva bahuṣo 'nvaśāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9304: 3.062.017c anuśiṣyād dhi ko nu tvām api sākṣād bṛhaspatiḥ 3.062.018a buddhiś ca te mahāprājña devair api duranvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:9305: 3.062.018c śokenābhiprasuptaṃ te jñānaṃ saṃbodhayāmy aham 3.062.019a divyaṃ ca mānuṣaṃ caivam ātmanaś ca parākramam
GE09ram_1-7u:9307: 3.062.020a kiṃ te sarvavināśena kṛtena puruṣarṣabha 3.062.020c tam eva tu ripuṃ pāpaṃ vijñāyoddhartum
GE09ram_1-7u:9310: 3.063.002a saṃnigṛhya mahābāhuḥ pravṛddhaṃ kopam ātmanaḥ 3.063.002c avaṣṭabhya dhanuś citraṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:9311: 3.063.003a kiṃ kariṣyāvahe vatsa kva vā gacchāva lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:9312: 3.063.003c kenopāyena paśyeyaṃ sītām iti vicintaya 3.063.004a taṃ tathā paritāpārtaṃ lakṣmaṇo rāmam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:9313: 3.063.004c idam eva janasthānaṃ tvam anveṣitum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:9315: 3.063.005c santīha giridurgāṇi nirdarāḥ kandarāṇi ca 3.063.006a guhāś ca vividhā ghorā nānāmṛgagaṇākulāḥ 3.063.006c āvāsāḥ kiṃnarāṇāṃ ca gandharvabhavanāni ca 3.063.007a tāni yukto mayā sārdhaṃ tvam anveṣitum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:9317: 3.063.008a āpatsu na prakampante vāyuvegair ivācalāḥ 3.063.008c ity uktas tad vanaṃ sarvaṃ vicacāra salakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9318: 3.063.009a kruddho rāmaḥ śaraṃ ghoraṃ saṃdhāya dhanuṣi kṣuram
GE09ram_1-7u:9320: 3.063.010a dadarśa patitaṃ bhūmau kṣatajārdraṃ jaṭāyuṣam 3.063.010c taṃ dṛṣṭvā giriśṛṅgābhaṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:9321: 3.063.010e anena sītā vaidehī bhakṣitā nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9322: 3.063.011a gṛdhrarūpam idaṃ vyaktaṃ rakṣo bhramati kānanam
GE09ram_1-7u:9323: 3.063.011c bhakṣayitvā viśālākṣīm āste sītāṃ yathāsukham 3.063.011e enaṃ vadhiṣye dīptāgrair ghorair bāṇair ajihmagaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9324: 3.063.012a ity uktvābhyapatad gṛdhraṃ saṃdhāya dhanuṣi kṣuram
GE09ram_1-7u:9325: 3.063.012c kruddho rāmaḥ samudrāntāṃ cālayann iva medinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:9326: 3.063.013a taṃ dīnadīnayā vācā saphenaṃ rudhiraṃ vaman
GE09ram_1-7u:9327: 3.063.013c abhyabhāṣata pakṣī tu rāmaṃ daśarathātmajam 3.063.014a yām oṣadhim ivāyuṣmann anveṣasi mahāvane 3.063.014c sā devī mama ca prāṇā rāvaṇenobhayaṃ hṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:9328: 3.063.015a tvayā virahitā devī lakṣmaṇena ca rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:9329: 3.063.015c hriyamāṇā mayā dṛṣṭā rāvaṇena balīyasā 3.063.016a sītām abhyavapan no 'haṃ rāvaṇaś ca raṇe mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:9331: 3.063.017a etad asya dhanur bhagnam etad asya śarāvaram
GE09ram_1-7u:9332: 3.063.017c ayam asya raṇe rāma bhagnaḥ sāṃgrāmiko rathaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9333: 3.063.018a pariśrāntasya me pakṣau chittvā khaḍgena rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9334: 3.063.018c sītām ādāya vaidehīm utpapāta vihāyasaṃ 3.063.018e rakṣasā nihataṃ pūrvma na māṃ hantuṃ tvam arhasi 3.063.019a rāmas tasya tu vijñāya sītāsaktāṃ priyāṃ kathām
GE09ram_1-7u:9336: 3.063.020a ekam ekāyane durge niḥśvasantaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_1-7u:9337: 3.063.020c samīkṣya duḥkhito rāmaḥ saumitrim idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:9338: 3.063.021a rājyād bhraṃśo vane vāsaḥ sītā naṣṭā hato dvijaḥ 3.063.021c īdṛśīyaṃ mamālakṣmīr nirdahed api pāvakam 3.063.022a saṃpūrṇam api ced adya pratareyaṃ mahodadhim
GE09ram_1-7u:9339: 3.063.022c so 'pi nūnaṃ mamālakṣmyā viśuṣyet saritāṃ patiḥ 3.063.023a nāsty abhāgyataro loke matto 'smin sacarācare
GE09ram_1-7u:9340: 3.063.023c yeneyaṃ mahatī prāptā mayā vyasanavāgurā 3.063.024a ayaṃ pitṛvayasyo me gṛdhrarājo jarānvitaḥ 3.063.024c śete vinihato bhūmau mama bhāgyaviparyayāt 3.063.025a ity evam uktvā bahuśo rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9341: 3.063.025c jaṭāyuṣaṃ ca pasparśa pitṛsnehaṃ nidarśayan 3.063.026a nikṛttapakṣaṃ rudhirāvasiktaṃ; taṃ gṛdhrarājaṃ parirabhya rāmaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9342: 3.063.026c kva maithili prāṇasamā mameti; vimucya vācaṃ nipapāta bhūmau
GE09ram_1-7u:9343: 3.064.001a rāmaḥ prekṣya tu taṃ gṛdhraṃ bhuvi raudreṇa pātitam 3.064.001c saumitriṃ mitrasaṃpannam idaṃ vacanam abravīt 3.064.002a mamāyaṃ nūnam artheṣu yatamāno vihaṃgamaḥ 3.064.002c rākṣasena hataḥ saṃkhye prāṇāṃs tyajati dustyajān
GE09ram_1-7u:9344: 3.064.003a ayam asya śarīre 'smin prāṇo lakṣmaṇa vidyate
GE09ram_1-7u:9345: 3.064.003c tathā svaravihīno 'yaṃ viklavaṃ samudīkṣate 3.064.004a jaṭāyo yadi śaknoṣi vākyaṃ vyāharituṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9346: 3.064.004c sītām ākhyāhi bhadraṃ te vadham ākhyāhi cātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9347: 3.064.005a kiṃnimitto 'harat sītāṃ rāvaṇas tasya kiṃ mayā 3.064.005c aparāddhaṃ tu yaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇena hṛtā priyā
GE09ram_1-7u:9348: 3.064.006a kathaṃ tac candrasaṃkāśaṃ mukham āsīn manoharam
GE09ram_1-7u:9349: 3.064.006c sītayā kāni coktāni tasmin kāle dvijottama
GE09ram_1-7u:9350: 3.064.007a kathaṃvīryaḥ kathaṃrūpaḥ kiṃkarmā sa ca rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9351: 3.064.007c kva cāsya bhavanaṃ tāta brūhi me paripṛcchataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9352: 3.064.008a tam udvīkṣyātha dīnātmā vilapantam anantaram 3.064.008c vācātisannayā rāmaṃ jaṭāyur idam abravīt 3.064.009a sā hṛtā rākṣasendreṇa rāvaṇena vihāyasā 3.064.009c māyām āsthāya vipulāṃ vātadurdinasaṃkulām
GE09ram_1-7u:9353: 3.064.010a pariśrāntasya me tāta pakṣau chittvā niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9354: 3.064.010c sītām ādāya vaidehīṃ prayāto dakṣiṇā mukhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9355: 3.064.011a uparudhyanti me prāṇā dṛṣṭir bhramati rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:9357: 3.064.012a yena yāti muhūrtena sītām ādāya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9358: 3.064.012c vipranaṣṭaṃ dhanaṃ kṣipraṃ tat svāmipratipadyate 3.064.013a vindo nāma muhūrto 'sau sa ca kākutstha nābudhat
GE09ram_1-7u:9359: 3.064.013c jhaṣavad baḍiśaṃ gṛhya kṣipram eva vinaśyati
GE09ram_1-7u:9360: 3.064.014a na ca tvayā vyathā kāryā janakasya sutāṃ prati 3.064.014c vaidehyā raṃsyase kṣipraṃ hatvā taṃ rākṣasaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:9362: 3.064.015c āsyāt susrāva rudhiraṃ mriyamāṇasya sāmiṣam 3.064.016a putro viśravasaḥ sākṣād bhrātā vaiśravaṇasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:9363: 3.064.016c ity uktvā durlabhān prāṇān mumoca patageśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9364: 3.064.017a brūhi brūhīti rāmasya bruvāṇasya kṛtāñjaleḥ 3.064.017c tyaktvā śarīraṃ gṛdhrasya jagmuḥ prāṇā vihāyasaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:9365: 3.064.018a sa nikṣipya śiro bhūmau prasārya caraṇau tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:9366: 3.064.018c vikṣipya ca śarīraṃ svaṃ papāta dharaṇītale
GE09ram_1-7u:9367: 3.064.019a taṃ gṛdhraṃ prekṣya tāmrākṣaṃ gatāsum acalopamam
GE09ram_1-7u:9368: 3.064.019c rāmaḥ subahubhir duḥkhair dīnaḥ saumitrim abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:9369: 3.064.020a bahūni rakṣasāṃ vāse varṣāṇi vasatā sukham
GE09ram_1-7u:9370: 3.064.020c anena daṇḍakāraṇye vicīrṇam iha pakṣiṇā 3.064.021a anekavārṣiko yas tu cirakālaṃ samutthitaḥ 3.064.021c so 'yam adya hataḥ śete kālo hi duratikramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9371: 3.064.022a paśya lakṣmaṇa gṛdhro 'yam upakārī hataś ca me
GE09ram_1-7u:9372: 3.064.022c sītām abhyavapan no vai rāvaṇena balīyasā
GE09ram_1-7u:9374: 3.064.023c mama hetor ayaṃ prāṇān mumoca patageśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9375: 3.064.024a sarvatra khalu dṛśyante sādhavo dharmacāriṇaḥ 3.064.024c śūrāḥ śaraṇyāḥ saumitre tiryagyonigateṣv api 3.064.025a sītāharaṇajaṃ duḥkhaṃ na me saumya tathāgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:9376: 3.064.025c yathā vināśo gṛdhrasya matkṛte ca paraṃtapa
GE09ram_1-7u:9377: 3.064.026a rājā daśarathaḥ śrīmān yathā mama mayā yaśāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9378: 3.064.026c pūjanīyaś ca mānyaś ca tathāyaṃ patageśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9379: 3.064.027a saumitre hara kāṣṭhāni nirmathiṣyāmi pāvakam 3.064.027c gṛdhrarājaṃ didhakṣāmi matkṛte nidhanaṃ gatam 3.064.028a nāthaṃ patagalokasya citām āropayāmy aham 3.064.028c imaṃ dhakṣyāmi saumitre hataṃ raudreṇa rakṣasā
GE09ram_1-7u:9380: 3.064.029a yā gatir yajñaśīlānām āhitāgneś ca yā gatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9381: 3.064.029c aparāvartināṃ yā ca yā ca bhūmipradāyinām
GE09ram_1-7u:9382: 3.064.030a mayā tvaṃ samanujñāto gaccha lokān anuttamān
GE09ram_1-7u:9383: 3.064.030c gṛdhrarāja mahāsattva saṃskṛtaś ca mayā vraja
GE09ram_1-7u:9384: 3.064.031a evam uktvā citāṃ dīptām āropya patageśvaram
GE09ram_1-7u:9385: 3.064.031c dadāha rāmo dharmātmā svabandhum iva duḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9386: 3.064.032a rāmo 'tha sahasaumitrir vanaṃ yātvā sa vīryavān 3.064.032c sthūlān hatvā mahārohīn anu tastāra taṃ dvijam
GE09ram_1-7u:9388: 3.064.033c śakunāya dadau rāmo ramye haritaśādvale 3.064.034a yat tat pretasya martyasya kathayanti dvijātayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9389: 3.064.034c tat svargagamanaṃ tasya kṣipraṃ rāmo jajāpa ha
GE09ram_1-7u:9390: 3.064.035a tato godāvarīṃ gatvā nadīṃ naravarātmajau 3.064.035c udakaṃ cakratus tasmai gṛdhrarājāya tāv ubhau
GE09ram_1-7u:9391: 3.064.036a sa gṛdhrarājaḥ kṛtavān yaśaskaraṃ; suduṣkaraṃ karma raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:9393: 3.064.036c maharṣikalpena ca saṃskṛtas tadā; jagāma puṇyāṃ gatim ātmanaḥ śubhām 3.065.001a kṛtvaivam udakaṃ tasmai prasthitau rāghavau tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:9394: 3.065.001c avekṣantau vane sītāṃ paścimāṃ jagmatur diśam
GE09ram_1-7u:9395: 3.065.002a tāṃ diśaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ gatvā śaracāpāsidhāriṇau 3.065.002c aviprahatam aikṣvākau panthānaṃ pratipedatuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9396: 3.065.003a gulmair vṛkṣaiś ca bahubhir latābhiś ca praveṣṭitam
GE09ram_1-7u:9397: 3.065.003c āvṛtaṃ sarvato durgaṃ gahanaṃ ghoradarśanam 3.065.004a vyatikramya tu vegena gṛhītvā dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE09ram_1-7u:9398: 3.065.004c subhīmaṃ tan mahāraṇyaṃ vyatiyātau mahābalau 3.065.005a tataḥ paraṃ janasthānāt trikrośaṃ gamya rāghavau
GE09ram_1-7u:9399: 3.065.005c krauñcāraṇyaṃ viviśatur gahanaṃ tau mahaujasau 3.065.006a nānāmeghaghanaprakhyaṃ prahṛṣṭam iva sarvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9400: 3.065.006c nānāvarṇaiḥ śubhaiḥ puṣpair mṛgapakṣigaṇair yutam 3.065.007a didṛkṣamāṇau vaidehīṃ tad vanaṃ tau vicikyatuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9402: 3.065.008a lakṣmaṇas tu mahātejāḥ sattvavāñ śīlavāñ śuciḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9403: 3.065.008c abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ bhrātaraṃ dīptatejasaṃ 3.065.009a spandate me dṛḍhaṃ bāhur udvignam iva me manaḥ 3.065.009c prāyaśaś cāpy aniṣṭāni nimittāny upalakṣaye 3.065.010a tasmāt sajjībhavārya tvaṃ kuruṣva vacanaṃ hitam
GE09ram_1-7u:9404: 3.065.010c mamaiva hi nimittāni sadyaḥ śaṃsanti saṃbhramam
GE09ram_1-7u:9405: 3.065.011a eṣa vañculako nāma pakṣī paramadāruṇaḥ 3.065.011c āvayor vijayaṃ yuddhe śaṃsann iva vinardati
GE09ram_1-7u:9406: 3.065.012a tayor anveṣator evaṃ sarvaṃ tad vanam ojasā
GE09ram_1-7u:9407: 3.065.012c saṃjajñe vipulaḥ śabdaḥ prabhañjann iva tad vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:9409: 3.065.013c vanasya tasya śabdo 'bhūd divam āpūrayann iva
GE09ram_1-7u:9410: 3.065.014a taṃ śabdaṃ kāṅkṣamāṇas tu rāmaḥ kakṣe sahānujaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9412: 3.065.015a āsedatus tatas tatra tāv ubhau pramukhe sthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:9413: 3.065.015c vivṛddham aśirogrīvaṃ kabandham udare mukham 3.065.016a romabhir nicitais tīkṣṇair mahāgirim ivocchritam 3.065.016c nīlameghanibhaṃ raudraṃ meghastanitaniḥsvanam
GE09ram_1-7u:9418: 3.065.019a ghorau bhujau vikurvāṇam ubhau yojanam āyatau
GE09ram_1-7u:9419: 3.065.019c karābhyāṃ vividhān gṛhya ṛṣkān pakṣigaṇān mṛgān
GE09ram_1-7u:9421: 3.065.020c sthitam āvṛtya panthānaṃ tayor bhrātroḥ prapannayoḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9422: 3.065.021a atha tau samatikramya krośamātre dadarśatuḥ 3.065.021c mahāntaṃ dāruṇaṃ bhīmaṃ kabandhaṃ bhujasaṃvṛtam 3.065.022a sa mahābāhur atyarthaṃ prasārya vipulau bhujau
GE09ram_1-7u:9423: 3.065.022c jagrāha sahitāv eva rāghavau pīḍayan balāt
GE09ram_1-7u:9425: 3.065.023c bhrātarau vivaśaṃ prāptau kṛṣyamāṇau mahābalau 3.065.024a tāv uvāca mahābāhuḥ kabandho dānavottamaḥ 3.065.024c kau yuvāṃ vṛṣabhaskandhau mahākhaḍgadhanurdharau
GE09ram_1-7u:9426: 3.065.025a ghoraṃ deśam imaṃ prāptau mama bhakṣāv upasthitau
GE09ram_1-7u:9427: 3.065.025c vadataṃ kāryam iha vāṃ kimarthaṃ cāgatau yuvām
GE09ram_1-7u:9428: 3.065.026a imaṃ deśam anuprāptau kṣudhārtasyeha tiṣṭhataḥ 3.065.026c sabāṇacāpakhaḍgau ca tīkṣṇaśṛṅgāv ivarṣabhau
GE09ram_1-7u:9429: 3.065.026e mamāsyam anusaṃprāptau durlabhaṃ jīvitaṃ punaḥ 3.065.027a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā kabandhasya durātmanaḥ 3.065.027c uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmo mukhena pariśuṣyatā 3.065.028a kṛcchrāt kṛcchrataraṃ prāpya dāruṇaṃ satyavikrama 3.065.028c vyasanaṃ jīvitāntāya prāptam aprāpya tāṃ priyām
GE09ram_1-7u:9430: 3.065.029a kālasya sumahad vīryaṃ sarvabhūteṣu lakṣmaṇa 3.065.029c tvāṃ ca māṃ ca naravyāghra vyasanaiḥ paśya mohitau 3.065.029e nātibhāro 'sti daivasya sarvabhuteṣu lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:9431: 3.065.030a śūrāś ca balavantaś ca kṛtāstrāś ca raṇājire
GE09ram_1-7u:9433: 3.065.031a iti bruvāṇo dṛḍhasatyavikramo; mahāyaśā dāśarathiḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_1-7u:9434: 3.065.031c avekṣya saumitrim udagravikramaṃ; sthirāṃ tadā svāṃ matim ātmanākarot 3.066.001a tau tu tatra sthitau dṛṣṭvā bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:9436: 3.066.002a tiṣṭhataḥ kiṃ nu māṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣudhārtaṃ kṣatriyarṣabhau
GE09ram_1-7u:9437: 3.066.002c āhārārthaṃ tu saṃdiṣṭau daivena gatacetasau 3.066.003a tac chrutvā lakṣmaṇo vākyaṃ prāptakālaṃ hitaṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:9439: 3.066.004a tvāṃ ca māṃ ca purā tūrṇam ādatte rākṣasādhamaḥ 3.066.004c tasmād asibhyām asyāśu bāhū chindāvahe gurū
GE09ram_1-7u:9440: 3.066.005a tatas tau deśakālajñau khaḍgābhyām eva rāghavau
GE09ram_1-7u:9442: 3.066.006a dakṣiṇo dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum asaktam asinā tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9443: 3.066.006c ciccheda rāmo vegena savyaṃ vīras tu lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9444: 3.066.007a sa papāta mahābāhuś chinnabāhur mahāsvanaḥ 3.066.007c khaṃ ca gāṃ ca diśaś caiva nādayañ jalado yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:9445: 3.066.008a sa nikṛttau bhujau dṛṣṭvā śoṇitaughapariplutaḥ 3.066.008c dīnaḥ papraccha tau vīrau kau yuvām iti dānavaḥ 3.066.009a iti tasya bruvāṇasya lakṣmaṇaḥ śubhalakṣaṇaḥ 3.066.009c śaśaṃsa tasya kākutsthaṃ kabandhasya mahābalaḥ 3.066.010a ayam ikṣvākudāyādo rāmo nāma janaiḥ śrutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9446: 3.066.010c asyaivāvarajaṃ viddhi bhrātaraṃ māṃ ca lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:9447: 3.066.011a asya devaprabhāvasya vasato vijane vane 3.066.011c rakṣasāpahṛtā bhāryā yām icchantāv ihāgatau 3.066.012a tvaṃ tu ko vā kimarthaṃ vā kabandha sadṛśo vane
GE09ram_1-7u:9449: 3.066.013a evam uktaḥ kabandhas tu lakṣmaṇenottaraṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9450: 3.066.013c uvāca paramaprītas tad indravacanaṃ smaran 3.066.014a svāgataṃ vāṃ naravyāghrau diṣṭyā paśyāmi cāpy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:9451: 3.066.014c diṣṭyā cemau nikṛttau me yuvābhyāṃ bāhubandhanau
GE09ram_1-7u:9452: 3.066.015a virūpaṃ yac ca me rūpaṃ prāptaṃ hy avinayād yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:9453: 3.066.015c tan me śṛṇu naravyāghra tattvataḥ śaṃsatas tava
GE09ram_1-7u:9455: 3.067.001c rūpam āsīn mamācintyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam
GE09ram_1-7u:9456: 3.067.001e yathā somasya śakrasya sūryasya ca yathā vapuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9457: 3.067.002a so 'haṃ rūpam idaṃ kṛtvā lokavitrāsanaṃ mahat 3.067.002c ṛṣīn vanagatān rāma trāsayāmi tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9458: 3.067.003a tataḥ sthūlaśirā nāma maharṣiḥ kopito mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:9459: 3.067.003c saṃcinvan vividhaṃ vanyaṃ rūpeṇānena dharṣitaḥ 3.067.004a tenāham uktaḥ prekṣyaivaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:9460: 3.067.004c etad eva nṛśaṃsaṃ te rūpam astu vigarhitam
GE09ram_1-7u:9461: 3.067.005a sa mayā yācitaḥ kruddhaḥ śāpasyānto bhaved iti
GE09ram_1-7u:9463: 3.067.006a yadā chittvā bhujau rāmas tvāṃ dahed vijane vane 3.067.006c tadā tvaṃ prāpsyase rūpaṃ svam eva vipulaṃ śubham 3.067.007a śriyā virājitaṃ putraṃ danos tvaṃ viddhi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:9464: 3.067.007c indrakopād idaṃ rūpaṃ prāptam evaṃ raṇājire
GE09ram_1-7u:9465: 3.067.008a ahaṃ hi tapasogreṇa pitāmaham atoṣayam 3.067.008c dīrgham āyuḥ sa me prādāt tato māṃ vibhramo 'spṛśat
GE09ram_1-7u:9466: 3.067.009a dīrgham āyur mayā prāptaṃ kiṃ me śakraḥ kariṣyati 3.067.009c ity evaṃ buddhim āsthāya raṇe śakram adharṣayam
GE09ram_1-7u:9468: 3.067.010c sakthinī ca śiraś caiva śarīre saṃpraveśitam
GE09ram_1-7u:9469: 3.067.011a sa mayā yācyamānaḥ sann ānayad yamasādanam
GE09ram_1-7u:9470: 3.067.011c pitāmahavacaḥ satyaṃ tad astv iti mamābravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:9472: 3.067.012c vajreṇābhihataḥ kālaṃ sudīrgham api jīvitum 3.067.013a evam uktas tu me śakro bāhū yojanam āyatau 3.067.013c prādād āsyaṃ ca me kukṣau tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭram akalpayat
GE09ram_1-7u:9475: 3.067.015a sa tu mām abravīd indro yadā rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ 3.067.015c chetsyate samare bāhū tadā svargaṃ gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:9476: 3.067.016a sa tvaṃ rāmo 'si bhadraṃ te nāham anyena rāghava 3.067.016c śakyo hantuṃ yathātattvam evam uktaṃ maharṣiṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:9477: 3.067.017a ahaṃ hi matisācivyaṃ kariṣyāmi nararṣabha 3.067.017c mitraṃ caivopadekṣyāmi yuvābhyāṃ saṃskṛto 'gninā
GE09ram_1-7u:9478: 3.067.018a evam uktas tu dharmātmā danunā tena rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9480: 3.067.019a rāvaṇena hṛtā sītā mama bhāryā yaśasvinī
GE09ram_1-7u:9481: 3.067.019c niṣkrāntasya janasthānāt saha bhrātrā yathāsukham 3.067.020a nāmamātraṃ tu jānāmi na rūpaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9482: 3.067.020c nivāsaṃ vā prabhāvaṃ vā vayaṃ tasya na vidmahe 3.067.021a śokārtānām anāthānām evaṃ viparidhāvatām
GE09ram_1-7u:9483: 3.067.021c kāruṇyaṃ sadṛśaṃ kartum upakāre ca vartatām
GE09ram_1-7u:9484: 3.067.022a kāṣṭhāny ānīya śuṣkāṇi kāle bhagnāni kuñjaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9485: 3.067.022c bhakṣyāmas tvāṃ vayaṃ vīra śvabhre mahati kalpite
GE09ram_1-7u:9486: 3.067.023a sa tvaṃ sītāṃ samācakṣva yena vā yatra vā hṛtā
GE09ram_1-7u:9487: 3.067.023c kuru kalyāṇam atyarthaṃ yadi jānāsi tattvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9488: 3.067.024a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa vākyaṃ danur anuttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:9489: 3.067.024c provāca kuśalo vaktuṃ vaktāram api rāghavam
GE09ram_1-7u:9490: 3.067.025a divyam asti na me jñānaṃ nābhijānāmi maithilīm
GE09ram_1-7u:9491: 3.067.025c yas tāṃ jñāsyati taṃ vakṣye dagdhaḥ svaṃ rūpam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9492: 3.067.026a adagdhasya hi vijñātuṃ śaktir asti na me prabho 3.067.026c rākṣasaṃ taṃ mahāvīryaṃ sītā yena hṛtā tava
GE09ram_1-7u:9493: 3.067.027a vijñānaṃ hi mahad bhraṣṭaṃ śāpadoṣeṇa rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:9494: 3.067.027c svakṛtena mayā prāptaṃ rūpaṃ lokavigarhitam 3.067.028a kiṃ tu yāvan na yāty astaṃ savitā śrāntavāhanaḥ 3.067.028c tāvan mām avaṭe kṣiptvā daha rāma yathāvidhi
GE09ram_1-7u:9495: 3.067.029a dagdhas tvayāham avaṭe nyāyena raghunandana 3.067.029c vakṣyāmi tam ahaṃ vīra yas taṃ jñāsyati rākṣasaṃ 3.067.030a tena sakhyaṃ ca kartavyaṃ nyāyyavṛttena rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:9496: 3.067.030c kalpayiṣyati te prītaḥ sāhāyyaṃ laghuvikramaḥ 3.067.031a na hi tasyāsty avijñātaṃ triṣu lokeṣu rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:9497: 3.067.031c sarvān parisṛto lokān purā vai kāraṇāntare
GE09ram_1-7u:9498: 3.068.001a evam uktau tu tau vīrau kabandhena nareśvarau
GE09ram_1-7u:9500: 3.068.002a lakṣmaṇas tu maholkābhir jvalitābhiḥ samantataḥ 3.068.002c citām ādīpayām āsa sā prajajvāla sarvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9501: 3.068.003a tac charīraṃ kabandhasya ghṛtapiṇḍopamaṃ mahat 3.068.003c medasā pacyamānasya mandaṃ dahati pāvaka 3.068.004a sa vidhūya citām āśu vidhūmo 'gnir ivotthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9502: 3.068.004c araje vāsasī vibhran mālāṃ divyāṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9503: 3.068.005a tataś citāyā vegena bhāsvaro virajāmbaraḥ 3.068.005c utpapātāśu saṃhṛṣṭaḥ sarvapratyaṅgabhūṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9504: 3.068.006a vimāne bhāsvare tiṣṭhan haṃsayukte yaśaskare 3.068.006c prabhayā ca mahātejā diśo daśa virājayan
GE09ram_1-7u:9506: 3.068.007c śṛṇu rāghava tattvena yathā sīmām avāpsyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:9507: 3.068.008a rāma ṣaḍ yuktayo loke yābhiḥ sarvaṃ vimṛśyate
GE09ram_1-7u:9509: 3.068.009a daśābhāgagato hīnas tvaṃ rāma sahalakṣmaṇaḥ 3.068.009c yat kṛte vyasanaṃ prāptaṃ tvayā dārapradharṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:9510: 3.068.010a tad avaśyaṃ tvayā kāryaḥ sa suhṛt suhṛdāṃ vara 3.068.010c akṛtvā na hi te siddhim ahaṃ paśyāmi cintayan 3.068.011a śrūyatāṃ rāma vakṣyāmi sugrīvo nāma vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9511: 3.068.011c bhrātrā nirastaḥ kruddhena vālinā śakrasūnunā 3.068.012a ṛṣyamūke girivare pampāparyantaśobhite
GE09ram_1-7u:9512: 3.068.012c nivasaty ātmavān vīraś caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9513: 3.068.013a vayasyaṃ taṃ kuru kṣipram ito gatvādya rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:9515: 3.068.014a na ca te so 'vamantavyaḥ sugrīvo vānarādhipaḥ 3.068.014c kṛtajñaḥ kāmarūpī ca sahāyārthī ca vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:9516: 3.068.015a śaktau hy adya yuvāṃ kartuṃ kāryaṃ tasya cikīrṣitam 3.068.015c kṛtārtho vākṛtārtho vā kṛtyaṃ tava kariṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:9517: 3.068.016a sa ṛkṣarajasaḥ putraḥ pampām aṭati śaṅkitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9520: 3.068.017c kuru rāghava satyena vayasyaṃ vanacāriṇam 3.068.018a sa hi sthānāni sarvāṇi kārtsnyena kapikuñjaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9522: 3.068.019a na tasyāviditaṃ loke kiṃ cid asti hi rāghava 3.068.019c yāvat sūryaḥ pratapati sahasrāṃśur ariṃdama 3.068.020a sa nadīr vipulāñ śailān giridurgāṇi kandarān
GE09ram_1-7u:9524: 3.068.021a vānarāṃś ca mahākāyān preṣayiṣyati rāghava 3.068.021c diśo vicetuṃ tāṃ sītāṃ tvadviyogena śocatīm
GE09ram_1-7u:9527: 3.068.022c plavaṃgamānāṃ pravaras tava priyāṃ; nihatya rakṣāṃsi punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9530: 3.069.001c vākyam anvartham arthajñaḥ kabandhaḥ punar abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:9531: 3.069.002a eṣa rāma śivaḥ panthā yatraite puṣpitā drumāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9532: 3.069.002c pratīcīṃ diśam āśritya prakāśante manoramāḥ 3.069.003a jambūpriyālapanasāḥ plakṣanyagrodhatindukāḥ 3.069.003c aśvatthāḥ karṇikārāś ca cūtāś cānye ca pādapāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9533: 3.069.004a tān āruhyāthavā bhūmau pātayitvā ca tān balāt
GE09ram_1-7u:9535: 3.069.005a caṅkramantau varān deśāñ śailāc chailaṃ vanād vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:9536: 3.069.005c tataḥ puṣkariṇīṃ vīrau pampāṃ nāma gamiṣyathaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9539: 3.069.007a tatra haṃsāḥ plavāḥ krauñcāḥ kurarāś caiva rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:9541: 3.069.008a nodvijante narān dṛṣṭvā vadhasyākovidāḥ śubhāḥ 3.069.008c ghṛtapiṇḍopamān sthūlāṃs tān dvijān bhakṣayiṣyathaḥ 3.069.009a rohitān vakratuṇḍāṃś ca nalamīnāṃś ca rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:9542: 3.069.009c pampāyām iṣubhir matsyāṃs tatra rāma varān hatān
GE09ram_1-7u:9544: 3.069.010c tava bhaktyā samāyukto lakṣmaṇaḥ saṃpradāsyati 3.069.011a bhṛśaṃ te khādato matsyān pampāyāḥ puṣpasaṃcaye
GE09ram_1-7u:9545: 3.069.011c padmagandhi śivaṃ vāri sukhaśītam anāmayam 3.069.012a uddhṛtya sa tadākliṣṭaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:9548: 3.069.013c apāṃ lobhād upāvṛttān vṛṣabhān iva nardataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9549: 3.069.013e rūpānvitāṃś ca pampāyāṃ drakṣyasi tvaṃ narottama
GE09ram_1-7u:9550: 3.069.014a sāyāhne vicaran rāma viṭapī mālyadhāriṇaḥ 3.069.014c śītodakaṃ ca pampāyāṃ dṛṣṭvā śokaṃ vihāsyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:9551: 3.069.015a sumanobhiś citāṃs tatra tilakān naktamālakān 3.069.015c utpalāni ca phullāni paṅkajāni ca rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:9552: 3.069.016a na tāni kaś cin mālyāni tatrāropayitā naraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9554: 3.069.017a teṣāṃ bhārābhitaptānāṃ vanyam āharatāṃ guroḥ 3.069.017c ye prapetur mahīṃ tūrṇaṃ śarīrāt svedabindavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9555: 3.069.018a tāni mālyāni jātāni munīnāṃ tapasā tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:9557: 3.069.019a teṣām adyāpi tatraiva dṛśyate paricāriṇī 3.069.019c śramaṇī śabarī nāma kākutstha cirajīvinī 3.069.020a tvāṃ tu dharme sthitā nityaṃ sarvabhūtanamaskṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:9558: 3.069.020c dṛṣṭvā devopamaṃ rāma svargalokaṃ gamiṣyati 3.069.021a tatas tad rāma pampāyās tīram āśritya paścimam
GE09ram_1-7u:9559: 3.069.021c āśramasthānam atulaṃ guhyaṃ kākutstha paśyasi 3.069.022a na tatrākramituṃ nāgāḥ śaknuvanti tam āśramam
GE09ram_1-7u:9560: 3.069.022c ṛṣes tasya mataṅgasya vidhānāt tac ca kānanam
GE09ram_1-7u:9563: 3.069.024a ṛṣyamūkas tu pampāyāḥ purastāt puṣpitadrumaḥ 3.069.024c suduḥkhārohaṇo nāma
GE09ram_1-7u:9564: 3.069.024e udāro brahmaṇā caiva pūrvakāle vinirmitaḥ 3.069.025a śayānaḥ puruṣo rāma tasya śailasya mūrdhani
GE09ram_1-7u:9565: 3.069.025c yat svapne labhate vittaṃ tat prabuddho 'dhigacchati
GE09ram_1-7u:9566: 3.069.026a na tv enaṃ viṣamācāraḥ pāpakarmādhirohati 3.069.026c tatraiva praharanty enaṃ suptam ādāya rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9570: 3.069.028c pracaranti pṛthak kīrṇā meghavarṇās tarasvinaḥ 3.069.029a te tatra pītvā pānīyaṃ vimalaṃ śītam avyayam
GE09ram_1-7u:9572: 3.069.030a rāma tasya tu śailasya mahatī śobhate guhā
GE09ram_1-7u:9573: 3.069.030c śilāpidhānā kākutstha duḥkhaṃ cāsyāḥ praveśanam 3.069.031a tasyā guhāyāḥ prāgdvāre mahāñ śītodako hradaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9575: 3.069.032a tasyāṃ vasati sugrīvaś caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9576: 3.069.032c kadā cic chikhare tasya parvatasyāvatiṣṭhate 3.069.033a kabandhas tv anuśāsyaivaṃ tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:9577: 3.069.033c sragvī bhāskaravarṇābhaḥ khe vyarocata vīryavān 3.069.034a taṃ tu khasthaṃ mahābhāgaṃ kabandhaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:9578: 3.069.034c prasthitau tvaṃ vrajasveti vākyam ūcatur antikāt
GE09ram_1-7u:9579: 3.069.035a gamyatāṃ kāryasiddhyartham iti tāv abravīc ca saḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9580: 3.069.035c suprītau tāv anujñāpya kabandhaḥ prasthitas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:9581: 3.069.036a sa tat kabandhaḥ pratipadya rūpaṃ; vṛtaḥ śriyā bhāskaratulyadehaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9582: 3.069.036c nidarśayan rāmam avekṣya khasthaḥ; sakhyaṃ kuruṣveti tadābhyuvāca
GE09ram_1-7u:9583: 3.070.001a tau kabandhena taṃ mārgaṃ pampāyā darśitaṃ vane
GE09ram_1-7u:9584: 3.070.001c ātasthatur diśaṃ gṛhya pratīcīṃ nṛvarātmajau 3.070.002a tau śaileṣv ācitānekān
GE09ram_1-7u:9585: 3.070.002c vīkṣantau jagmatur draṣṭuṃ sugrīvaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇau 3.070.003a kṛtvā ca śailapṛṣṭhe tu tau vāsaṃ raghunandanau
GE09ram_1-7u:9586: 3.070.003c pampāyāḥ paścimaṃ tīraṃ rāghavāv upatasthatuḥ 3.070.004a tau puṣkariṇyāḥ pampāyās tīram āsādya paścimam
GE09ram_1-7u:9587: 3.070.004c apaśyatāṃ tatas tatra śabaryā ramyam āśramam
GE09ram_1-7u:9588: 3.070.005a tau tam āśramam āsādya drumair bahubhir āvṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:9590: 3.070.006a tau tu dṛṣṭvā tadā siddhā samutthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9591: 3.070.006c pādau jagrāha rāmasya lakṣmaṇasya ca dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9592: 3.070.007a tām uvāca tato rāmaḥ śramaṇīṃ saṃśitavratām
GE09ram_1-7u:9593: 3.070.007c kaccit te nirjitā vighnāḥ kaccit te vardhate tapaḥ 3.070.008a kaccit te niyataḥ kopa āhāraś ca tapodhane
GE09ram_1-7u:9594: 3.070.008c kaccit te niyamāḥ prāptāḥ kaccit te manasaḥ sukham 3.070.008e kaccit te guruśuśrūṣā saphalā cārubhāṣiṇi 3.070.009a rāmeṇa tāpasī pṛṣṭhā sā siddhā siddhasaṃmatā
GE09ram_1-7u:9595: 3.070.009c śaśaṃsa śabarī vṛddhā rāmāya pratyupasthitā 3.070.010a citrakūṭaṃ tvayi prāpte vimānair atulaprabhaiḥ 3.070.010c itas te divam ārūḍhā yān ahaṃ paryacāriṣam
GE09ram_1-7u:9596: 3.070.011a taiś cāham uktā dharmajñair mahābhāgair maharṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9597: 3.070.011c āgamiṣyati te rāmaḥ supuṇyam imam āśramam
GE09ram_1-7u:9599: 3.070.012c taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā varāṃl lokān akṣayāṃs tvaṃ gamiṣyasi 3.070.013a mayā tu vividhaṃ vanyaṃ saṃcitaṃ puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_1-7u:9601: 3.070.014a evam uktaḥ sa dharmātmā śabaryā śabarīm idam
GE09ram_1-7u:9602: 3.070.014c rāghavaḥ prāha vijñāne tāṃ nityam abahiṣkṛtām
GE09ram_1-7u:9603: 3.070.015a danoḥ sakāśāt tattvena prabhāvaṃ te mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9604: 3.070.015c śrutaṃ pratyakṣam icchāmi saṃdraṣṭuṃ yadi manyase
GE09ram_1-7u:9605: 3.070.016a etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā rāmavaktrād viniḥsṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:9606: 3.070.016c śabarī darśayām āsa tāv ubhau tad vanaṃ mahat 3.070.017a paśya meghaghanaprakhyaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:9607: 3.070.017c mataṅgavanam ity eva viśrutaṃ raghunandana 3.070.018a iha te bhāvitātmāno guravo me mahādyute
GE09ram_1-7u:9608: 3.070.018c juhavāṃś cakrire tīrthaṃ mantravan mantrapūjitam 3.070.019a iyaṃ pratyak sthalī vedī yatra te me susatkṛtāḥ 3.070.019c puṣpopahāraṃ kurvanti śramād udvepibhiḥ karaiḥ 3.070.020a teṣāṃ tapaḥ prabhāvena paśyādyāpi raghūttama 3.070.020c dyotayanti diśaḥ sarvāḥ śriyā vedyo 'tulaprabhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9611: 3.070.022a kṛtābhiṣekais tair nyastā valkalāḥ pādapeṣv iha
GE09ram_1-7u:9612: 3.070.022c adyāpi na viśuṣyanti pradeśe raghunandana 3.070.023a kṛtsnaṃ vanam idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śrotavyaṃ ca śrutaṃ tvayā 3.070.023c tad icchāmy abhyanujñātā tyaktum etat kalevaram
GE09ram_1-7u:9613: 3.070.024a teṣām icchāmy ahaṃ gantuṃ samīpaṃ bhāvitātmanām
GE09ram_1-7u:9614: 3.070.024c munīnām āśraṃmo yeṣām ahaṃ ca paricāriṇī
GE09ram_1-7u:9615: 3.070.025a dharmiṣṭhaṃ tu vacaḥ śrutvā rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9617: 3.070.026a anujñātā tu rāmeṇa hutvātmānaṃ hutāśane 3.070.026c jvalatpāvakasaṃkāśā svargam eva jagāma sā 3.070.027a yatra te sukṛtātmāno viharanti maharṣayaḥ 3.070.027c tat puṇyaṃ śabarīsthānaṃ jagāmātmasamādhinā
GE09ram_1-7u:9618: 3.071.001a divaṃ tu tasyāṃ yātāyāṃ śabaryāṃ svena karmaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:9619: 3.071.001c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā cintayām āsa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9620: 3.071.002a cintayitvā tu dharmātmā prabhāvaṃ taṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_1-7u:9623: 3.071.003c viśvastamṛgaśārdūlo nānāvihagasevitaḥ 3.071.004a saptānāṃ ca samudrāṇām eṣu tīrtheṣu lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:9624: 3.071.004c upaspṛṣṭaṃ ca vidhivat pitaraś cāpi tarpitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9625: 3.071.005a pranaṣṭam aśubhaṃ yat tat kalyāṇaṃ samupasthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:9626: 3.071.005c tena tv etat prahṛṣṭaṃ me mano lakṣmaṇa saṃprati 3.071.006a hṛdaye hi naravyāghra śubham āvirbhaviṣyati 3.071.006c tad āgaccha gamiṣyāvaḥ pampāṃ tāṃ priyadarśanām
GE09ram_1-7u:9627: 3.071.007a ṛśyamūko girir yatra nātidūre prakāśate 3.071.007c yasmin vasati dharmātmā sugrīvo 'ṃśumataḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9628: 3.071.007e nityaṃ vālibhayāt trastaś caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9629: 3.071.008a abhitvare ca taṃ draṣṭuṃ sugrīvaṃ vānararṣabham
GE09ram_1-7u:9630: 3.071.008c tadadhīnaṃ hi me saumya sītāyāḥ parimārgaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:9631: 3.071.009a iti bruvāṇaṃ taṃ rāmaṃ saumitrir idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:9632: 3.071.009c gacchāvas tvaritaṃ tatra mamāpi tvarate manaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9633: 3.071.010a āśramāt tu tatas tasmān niṣkramya sa viśāṃ patiḥ 3.071.010c ājagāma tataḥ pampāṃ lakṣmaṇena sahābhibhūḥ 3.071.011a samīkṣamāṇaḥ puṣpāḍhyaṃ sarvato vipuladrumam
GE09ram_1-7u:9634: 3.071.011c koyaṣṭibhiś cārjunakaiḥ śatapatraiś ca kīcakaiḥ 3.071.011e etaiś cānyaiś ca vividhair nāditaṃ tad vanaṃ mahat 3.071.012a sa rāmo vidhivān vṛkṣān sarāṃsi vividhāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:9635: 3.071.012c paśyan kāmābhisaṃtapto jagāma paramaṃ hradam 3.071.013a sa tām āsādya vai rāmo dūrād udakavāhinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:9637: 3.071.014a sa tu śokasamāviṣṭo rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ 3.071.014c viveśa nalinīṃ pampāṃ paṅkajaiś ca samāvṛtām
GE09ram_1-7u:9638: 3.071.015a tilakāśokapuṃnāgabakuloddāla kāśinīm 3.071.015c ramyopavanasaṃbādhāṃ padmasaṃpīḍitodakām 3.071.016a sphaṭikopamatoyāḍhyāṃ ślakṣṇavālukasaṃtatām 3.071.016c matsyakacchapasaṃbādhāṃ tīrasthadrumaśobhitām 3.071.017a sakhībhir iva yuktābhir latābhir anuveṣṭitām 3.071.017c kiṃnaroragagandharvayakṣarākṣasasevitām
GE09ram_1-7u:9640: 3.071.018a padmaiḥ saugandhikais tāmrāṃ śuklāṃ kumudamaṇḍalaiḥ 3.071.018c nīlāṃ kuvalayoddhātair bahuvarṇāṃ kuthām iva 3.071.019a aravindotpalavatīṃ padmasaugandhikāyutām 3.071.019c puṣpitāmravaṇopetāṃ barhiṇodghuṣṭanāditām 3.071.020a sa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā tataḥ pampāṃ rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha 3.071.020c vilalāpa ca tejasvī kāmād daśarathātmajaḥ 3.071.021a tilakair bījapūraiś ca vaṭaiḥ śukladrumais tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:9641: 3.071.021c puṣpitaiḥ karavīraiś ca puṃnāgaiś ca supuṣpitaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9642: 3.071.022a mālatīkundagulmaiś ca bhaṇḍīrair niculais tathā 3.071.022c aśokaiḥ saptaparṇaiś ca ketakair atimuktakaiḥ 3.071.022e anyaiś ca vividhair vṛkṣaiḥ pramadevopaśobhitām 3.071.023a asyās tīre tu pūrvoktaḥ parvato dhātumaṇḍitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9644: 3.071.024a harir ṛkṣarajo nāmnaḥ putras tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9645: 3.071.024c adhyāste taṃ mahāvīryaḥ sugrīva iti viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9646: 3.071.025a sugrīvam abhigaccha tvaṃ vānarendraṃ nararṣabha 3.071.025c ity uvāca punar vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ satyavikramam
GE09ram_1-7u:9647: 3.071.026a tato mahad vartma ca dūrasaṃkramaṃ; krameṇa gatvā pravilokayan
GE09ram_1-7u:9650: 4.001.001a sa tāṃ puṣkariṇīṃ gatvā padmotpalajhaṣākulām 4.001.001c rāmaḥ saumitrisahito
GE09ram_1-7u:9651: 4.001.002a tasya dṛṣṭvaiva tāṃ harṣād indriyāṇi cakampire
GE09ram_1-7u:9652: 4.001.002c sa kāmavaśam āpannaḥ saumitrim idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:9653: 4.001.003a saumitre paśya pampāyāḥ kānanaṃ śubhadarśanam 4.001.003c yatra rājanti śailābhā drumāḥ saśikharā iva
GE09ram_1-7u:9654: 4.001.004a māṃ tu śokābhisaṃtaptam ādhayaḥ pīḍayanti vai
GE09ram_1-7u:9655: 4.001.004c bharatasya ca duḥkhena vaidehyā haraṇena ca
GE09ram_1-7u:9656: 4.001.005a adhikaṃ pravibhāty etan nīlapītaṃ tu śādvalam
GE09ram_1-7u:9657: 4.001.005c drumāṇāṃ vividhaiḥ puṣpaiḥ paristomair ivārpitam 4.001.006a sukhānilo 'yaṃ saumitre kālaḥ pracuramanmathaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9659: 4.001.007a paśya rūpāṇi saumitre vanānāṃ puṣpaśālinām 4.001.007c sṛjatāṃ puṣpavarṣāṇi varṣaṃ toyamucām iva 4.001.008a prastareṣu ca ramyeṣu vividhāḥ kānanadrumāḥ 4.001.008c vāyuvegapracalitāḥ puṣpair avakiranti gām
GE09ram_1-7u:9660: 4.001.009a mārutaḥ sukhaṃ saṃsparśe vāti candanaśītalaḥ 4.001.009c ṣaṭpadair anukūjadbhir vaneṣu madhugandhiṣu
GE09ram_1-7u:9663: 4.001.011a puṣpitāgrāṃś ca paśyemān karṇikārān samantataḥ 4.001.011c hāṭakapratisaṃchannān narān pītāmbarān iva
GE09ram_1-7u:9666: 4.001.013a māṃ hi śokasamākrāntaṃ saṃtāpayati manmathaḥ 4.001.013c hṛṣṭaḥ pravadamānaś ca samāhvayati kokilaḥ 4.001.014a eṣa dātyūhako hṛṣṭo ramye māṃ vananirjhare
GE09ram_1-7u:9670: 4.001.016a māṃ hi sā mṛgaśāvākṣī cintāśokabalātkṛtam 4.001.016c saṃtāpayati saumitre krūraś
GE09ram_1-7u:9673: 4.001.018a paśya lakṣṇama nṛtyantaṃ mayūram upanṛtyati 4.001.018c śikhinī manmathārtaiṣā bhartāraṃ girisānuṣu
GE09ram_1-7u:9674: 4.001.019a mayūrasya vane nūnaṃ rakṣasā na hṛtā priyā
GE09ram_1-7u:9675: 4.001.019c mama tv ayaṃ vinā vāsaḥ puṣpamāse suduḥsahaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9676: 4.001.020a paśya lakṣmaṇa puṣpāṇi niṣphalāni bhavanti me
GE09ram_1-7u:9678: 4.001.021a vadanti rāvaṃ muditāḥ śakunāḥ saṃghaśaḥ kalam
GE09ram_1-7u:9680: 4.001.022a nūnaṃ paravaśā sītā sāpi śocaty ahaṃ yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:9681: 4.001.022c śyāmā padmapalāśākṣī mṛdubhāṣā ca me priyā
GE09ram_1-7u:9682: 4.001.023a eṣa puṣpavaho vāyuḥ sukhasparśo himāvahaḥ 4.001.023c tāṃ vicintayataḥ kāntāṃ pāvakapratimo mama 4.001.024a tāṃ vinātha vihaṃgo 'sau pakṣī praṇaditas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:9684: 4.001.025a eṣa vai tatra vaidehyā vihagaḥ pratihārakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9685: 4.001.025c pakṣī māṃ tu viśālākṣyāḥ samīpam upaneṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:9686: 4.001.026a paśya lakṣmaṇa saṃnādaṃ vane madavivardhanam 4.001.026c puṣpitāgreṣu vṛkṣeṣu dvijānām upakūjatām
GE09ram_1-7u:9687: 4.001.027a saumitre paśya pampāyāś citrāsu vanarājiṣu 4.001.027c nalināni prakāśante jale
GE09ram_1-7u:9692: 4.001.030a padmakośapalāśāni draṣṭuṃ dṛṣṭir hi manyate 4.001.030c sītāyā netrakośābhyāṃ sadṛśānīti lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:9693: 4.001.031a padmakesarasaṃsṛṣṭo vṛkṣāntaraviniḥsṛtaḥ 4.001.031c niḥśvāsa iva sītāyā vāti vāyur manoharaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9694: 4.001.032a saumitre paśya pampāyā dakṣiṇe girisānuni 4.001.032c puṣpitāṃ karṇikārasya yaṣṭiṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:9697: 4.001.034a giriprasthās tu saumitre sarvataḥ saṃprapuṣpitaiḥ 4.001.034c niṣpatraiḥ sarvato ramyaiḥ pradīpā iva kuṃśukaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9700: 4.001.036a ketakyaḥ sinduvārāś ca vāsantyaś ca supuṣpitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9701: 4.001.036c mādhavyo gandhapūrṇāś ca kundagulmāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9702: 4.001.037a ciribilvā madhūkāś ca vañjulā bakulās tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:9703: 4.001.037c campakās tilakāś caiva nāgavṛkṣāś ca puṣpitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9704: 4.001.038a nīpāś ca varaṇāś caiva kharjūrāś ca supuṣpitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9705: 4.001.038c aṅkolāś ca kuraṇṭāś ca cūrṇakāḥ pāribhadrakāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9706: 4.001.039a cūtāḥ pāṭalayaś caiva kovidārāś ca puṣpitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9708: 4.001.040a ketakoddālakāś caiva śirīṣāḥ śiṃśapā dhavāḥ 4.001.040c śālmalyaḥ kiṃśukāś caiva raktāḥ kurabakās tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:9709: 4.001.040e tiniśā nakta mālāś ca candanāḥ syandanās tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:9710: 4.001.041a vividhā vividhaiḥ puṣpais tair eva nagasānuṣu
GE09ram_1-7u:9711: 4.001.041c vikīrṇaiḥ pītaraktābhāḥ saumitre prastarāḥ kṛtāḥ 4.001.042a himānte paśya saumitre vṛkṣāṇāṃ puṣpasaṃbhavam 4.001.042c puṣpamāse hi taravaḥ saṃgharṣād iva puṣpitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9712: 4.001.043a paśya śītajalāṃ cemāṃ saumitre puṣkarāyutām 4.001.043c cakravākānucaritāṃ kāraṇḍavaniṣevitām 4.001.043e plavaiḥ krauñcaiś ca saṃpūrṇāṃ varāhamṛgasevitām 4.001.044a adhikaṃ śobhate pampāvikūjadbhir vihaṃgamaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9713: 4.001.045a dīpayantīva me kāmaṃ vividhā muditā dvijāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9714: 4.001.045c śyāmāṃ candramukhīṃ smṛtvā priyāṃ padmanibhekṣaṇām 4.001.046a paya sānuṣu citreṣu mṛgībhiḥ sahitān mṛgān
GE09ram_1-7u:9715: 4.001.046c māṃ punar mṛgaśāvākṣyā vaidehyā virahīkṛtam 4.001.047a evaṃ sa vilapaṃs tatra śokopahatacetanaḥ 4.001.047c avekṣata śivāṃ pampāṃ ramyavārivahāṃ śubhām 4.001.048a nirīkṣamāṇaḥ sahasā mahātmā; sarvaṃ vanaṃ nirjharakandaraṃ ca
GE09ram_1-7u:9716: 4.001.048c udvignacetāḥ saha lakṣmaṇena; vicārya duḥkhopahataḥ pratasthe
GE09ram_1-7u:9717: 4.001.049a tāv ṛṣyamūkaṃ sahitau prayātau; sugrīvaśākhāmṛgasevitaṃ tam 4.001.049c trastās tu dṛṣṭvā harayo babhūvur; mahaujasau rāghavalakṣmaṇau tau
GE09ram_1-7u:9718: 4.002.001a tau tu dṛṣṭvā mahātmānau bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:9721: 4.002.002c na vyatiṣṭhata kasmiṃś cid deśe vānarapuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9722: 4.002.003a naiva cakre manaḥ sthāne vīkṣamāṇo mahābalau
GE09ram_1-7u:9723: 4.002.003c kapeḥ paramabhītasya cittaṃ vyavasasāda ha 4.002.004a cintayitvā sa dharmātmā vimṛśya gurulāghavam 4.002.004c sugrīvaḥ paramodvignaḥ sarvair anucaraiḥ saha 4.002.005a tataḥ sa sacivebhyas tu sugrīvaḥ plavagādhipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9724: 4.002.005c śaśaṃsa paramodvignaḥ paśyaṃs tau rāmalakṣmaṇau 4.002.006a etau vanam idaṃ durgaṃ vālipraṇihitau dhruvam
GE09ram_1-7u:9727: 4.002.007c jagmur giritaṭāt tasmād anyac chikharam uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:9728: 4.002.008a te kṣipram abhigamyātha yūthapā yūthaparṣabham 4.002.008c harayo vānaraśreṣṭhaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:9729: 4.002.009a ekam ekāyanagatāḥ plavamānā girer girim 4.002.009c prakampayanto vegena girīṇāṃ śikharāṇi ca 4.002.010a tataḥ śākhāmṛgāḥ sarve plavamānā mahābalāḥ 4.002.010c babhañjuś ca nagāṃs tatra puṣpitān durgasaṃśritān
GE09ram_1-7u:9730: 4.002.011a āplavanto harivarāḥ sarvatas taṃ mahāgirim 4.002.011c mṛgamārjāraśārdūlāṃs trāsayanto yayus tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:9732: 4.002.012c saṃgamya kapimukhyena sarve prāñjalayaḥ sthitāḥ 4.002.013a tatas taṃ bhayasaṃtrastaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:9733: 4.002.013c uvāca hanumān vākyaṃ sugrīvaṃ vākyakovidaḥ 4.002.014a yasmād udvignacetās tvaṃ pradruto haripuṃgava 4.002.014c taṃ krūradarśanaṃ krūraṃ neha paśyāmi vālinam
GE09ram_1-7u:9734: 4.002.015a yasmāt tava bhayaṃ saumya pūrvajāt pāpakarmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9735: 4.002.015c sa neha vālī duṣṭātmā na te paśyāmy ahaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_1-7u:9736: 4.002.016a aho śākhāmṛgatvaṃ te vyaktam eva plavaṃgama
GE09ram_1-7u:9737: 4.002.016c laghucittatayātmānaṃ na sthāpayasi yo matau 4.002.017a buddhivijñānasaṃpanna iṅgitaiḥ sarvam ācara
GE09ram_1-7u:9738: 4.002.017c na hy abuddhiṃ gato rājā sarvabhūtāni śāsti hi 4.002.018a sugrīvas tu śubhaṃ vākyaṃ śrutvā sarvaṃ hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9739: 4.002.018c tataḥ śubhataraṃ vākyaṃ hanūmantam uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:9741: 4.002.019c kasya na syād bhayaṃ dṛṣṭvā etau surasutopamau
GE09ram_1-7u:9743: 4.002.020c rājāno bahumitrāś ca viśvāso nātra hi kṣamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9744: 4.002.021a arayaś ca manuṣyeṇa vijñeyāś channacāriṇaḥ 4.002.021c viśvastānām aviśvastāś chidreṣu praharanti hi 4.002.022a kṛtyeṣu vālī medhāvī rājāno bahudarśanāḥ 4.002.022c bhavanti parahantāras te jñeyāḥ prākṛtair naraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9745: 4.002.023a tau tvayā prākṛtenaiva gatvā jñeyau plavaṃgama
GE09ram_1-7u:9746: 4.002.023c śaṅkitānāṃ prakāraiś ca rūpavyābhāṣaṇena ca 4.002.024a lakṣayasva tayor bhāvaṃ prahṛṣṭamanasau yadi 4.002.024c viśvāsayan praśaṃsābhir iṅgitaiś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9747: 4.002.025a mamaivābhimukhaṃ sthitvā pṛccha tvaṃ haripuṃgava 4.002.025c prayojanaṃ praveśasya vanasyāsya dhanurdharau
GE09ram_1-7u:9748: 4.002.026a śuddhātmānau yadi tv etau jānīhi tvaṃ plavaṃgama
GE09ram_1-7u:9749: 4.002.026c vyābhāṣitair vā rūpair vā vijñeyā duṣṭatānayoḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9750: 4.002.027a ity evaṃ kapirājena saṃdiṣṭo mārutātmajaḥ 4.002.027c cakāra gamane buddhiṃ yatra tau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:9751: 4.002.028a tatheti saṃpūjya vacas tu tasya; kapeḥ subhītasya durāsadasya
GE09ram_1-7u:9752: 4.002.028c mahānubhāvo hanumān yayau tadā; sa yatra rāmo 'tibalaś ca lakṣmaṇaḥ 4.003.001a vaco vijñāya hanumān sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ 4.003.001c parvatād ṛśyamūkāt tu pupluve yatra rāghavau
GE09ram_1-7u:9753: 4.003.002a sa tatra gatvā hanumān balavān vānarottamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9754: 4.003.002c upacakrāma tau vāgbhir mṛdvībhiḥ satyavikramaḥ 4.003.003a svakaṃ rūpaṃ parityajya bhikṣurūpeṇa vānaraḥ 4.003.003c ābabhāṣe ca tau vīrau yathāvat praśaśaṃsa ca
GE09ram_1-7u:9756: 4.003.004c deśaṃ katham imaṃ prāptau bhavantau varavarṇinau
GE09ram_1-7u:9757: 4.003.005a trāsayantau mṛgagaṇān anyāṃś ca vanacāriṇaḥ 4.003.005c pampātīraruhān vṛkṣān vīkṣamāṇau samantataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9758: 4.003.006a imāṃ nadīṃ śubhajalāṃ śobhayantau tarasvinau 4.003.006c dhairyavantau suvarṇābhau kau yuvāṃ cīravāsasau 4.003.007a siṃhaviprekṣitau vīrau siṃhātibalavikramau
GE09ram_1-7u:9759: 4.003.007c śakracāpanibhe cāpe pragṛhya vipulair bhujaiḥ 4.003.008a śrīmantau rūpasaṃpannau
GE09ram_1-7u:9761: 4.003.009a prabhayā parvatendro 'yaṃ yuvayor avabhāsitaḥ 4.003.009c rājyārhāv amaraprakhyau kathaṃ deśam ihāgatau 4.003.010a padmapatrekṣaṇau vīrau jaṭāmaṇḍaladhāriṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:9765: 4.003.012a siṃhaskandhau mahāsattvau samadāv iva govṛṣau 4.003.012c āyatāś ca suvṛttāś ca bāhavaḥ parighottamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9766: 4.003.012e sarvabhūṣaṇabhūṣārhāḥ kim arthaṃ na vibhūṣitaḥ 4.003.013a ubhau yogyāv ahaṃ manye rakṣituṃ pṛthivīm imām
GE09ram_1-7u:9768: 4.003.014a ime ca dhanuṣī citre ślakṣṇe citrānulepane
GE09ram_1-7u:9770: 4.003.015a saṃpūrṇā niśitair bāṇair tūṇāś ca śubhadarśanāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9771: 4.003.015c jīvitāntakarair ghorair jvaladbhir iva pannagaiḥ 4.003.016a mahāpramāṇau vipulau
GE09ram_1-7u:9772: 4.003.016c khaḍgāv etau virājete nirmuktabhujagāv iva 4.003.017a evaṃ māṃ paribhāṣantaṃ kasmād vai nābhibhāṣathaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9773: 4.003.018a sugrīvo nāma dharmātmā kaś cid vānarayūthapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9774: 4.003.018c vīro vinikṛto bhrātrā jagad bhramati duḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9776: 4.003.019c rājñā vānaramukhyānāṃ hanumān nāma vānaraḥ 4.003.020a yuvābhyāṃ saha dharmātmā sugrīvaḥ sakhyam icchati
GE09ram_1-7u:9777: 4.003.020c tasya māṃ sacivaṃ vittaṃ vānaraṃ pavanātmajam
GE09ram_1-7u:9778: 4.003.021a bhikṣurūpapraticchannaṃ sugrīvapriyakāmyayā 4.003.021c ṛśyamūkād iha prāptaṃ kāmagaṃ kāmarūpiṇam 4.003.022a evam uktvā tu hanumāṃs tau vīrau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:9779: 4.003.022c vākyajñau vākyakuśalaḥ punar novāca kiṃ cana
GE09ram_1-7u:9780: 4.003.023a etac chrutvā vacas tasya rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:9781: 4.003.023c prahṛṣṭavadanaḥ śrīmān bhrātaraṃ pārśvataḥ sthitam 4.003.024a sacivo 'yaṃ kapīndrasya sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9782: 4.003.024c tam eva kāṅkṣamāṇasya mamāntikam upāgataḥ 4.003.025a tam abhyabhāṣa saumitre sugrīvasacivaṃ kapim 4.003.025c vākyajñaṃ madhurair vākyaiḥ snehayuktam ariṃdamam 4.004.001a tataḥ prahṛṣṭo hanumān kṛtyavān iti tad vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9783: 4.004.001c śrutvā madhurasaṃbhāṣaṃ sugrīvaṃ manasā gataḥ 4.004.002a bhavyo rājyāgamas tasya sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ 4.004.002c yad ayaṃ kṛtyavān prāptaḥ kṛtyaṃ caitad upāgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:9785: 4.004.003c pratyuvāca tato vākyaṃ rāmaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ 4.004.004a kimarthaṃ tvaṃ vanaṃ ghoraṃ pampākānanamaṇḍitam 4.004.004c āgataḥ sānujo durgaṃ nānāvyālamṛgāyutam
GE09ram_1-7u:9786: 4.004.005a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā lakṣmaṇo rāmacoditaḥ 4.004.005c ācacakṣe mahātmānaṃ rāmaṃ daśarathātmajam
GE09ram_1-7u:9787: 4.004.006a rājā daśaratho nāma dyutimān dharmavatsalaḥ 4.004.006c tasyāyaṃ pūrvajaḥ putro rāmo nāma janaiḥ śrutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9790: 4.004.008a rājyād bhraṣṭo vane vastuṃ mayā sārdham ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9791: 4.004.008c bhāryayā ca mahātejāḥ sītayānugato vaśī 4.004.008e dinakṣaye mahātejāḥ prabhayeva
GE09ram_1-7u:9792: 4.004.009a aham asyāvaro bhrātā guṇair dāsyam upāgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9793: 4.004.009c kṛtajñasya bahujñasya lakṣmaṇo nāma nāmataḥ 4.004.010a sukhārhasya mahārhasya
GE09ram_1-7u:9796: 4.004.011c tac ca na jñāyate rakṣaḥ patnī yenāsya sā hṛtā
GE09ram_1-7u:9797: 4.004.012a danur nāma śriyaḥ putraḥ śāpād rākṣasatāṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9798: 4.004.012c ākhyātas tena sugrīvaḥ samartho vānarādhipaḥ 4.004.013a sa jñāsyati mahāvīryas tava bhāryāpahāriṇam 4.004.013c evam uktvā danuḥ svargaṃ bhrājamāno gataḥ sukham
GE09ram_1-7u:9799: 4.004.014a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yāthātathyena pṛcchataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9800: 4.004.014c ahaṃ caiva hi rāmaś ca sugrīvaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatau 4.004.015a eṣa dattvā ca vittāni prāpya cānuttamaṃ yaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9801: 4.004.015c lokanāthaḥ purā bhūtvā sugrīvaṃ nātham icchati
GE09ram_1-7u:9802: 4.004.016a śokābhibhūte rāme tu śokārte śaraṇaṃ gate
GE09ram_1-7u:9803: 4.004.016c kartum arhati sugrīvaḥ prasādaṃ saha yūthapaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9804: 4.004.017a evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ saumitriṃ karuṇaṃ sāśrupātanam 4.004.017c hanūmān pratyuvācedaṃ vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9806: 4.004.018c draṣṭavyā vānarendreṇa diṣṭyā darśanam āgatāḥ 4.004.019a sa hi rājyāc ca vibhraṣṭaḥ kṛtavairaś ca vālinā 4.004.019c hṛtadāro vane trasto bhrātrā vinikṛto bhṛśam
GE09ram_1-7u:9807: 4.004.020a kariṣyati sa sāhāyyaṃ yuvayor bhāskarātmajaḥ 4.004.020c sugrīvaḥ saha cāsmābhiḥ sītāyāḥ parimārgaṇe 4.004.021a ity evam uktvā hanumāñ ślakṣṇaṃ madhurayā girā
GE09ram_1-7u:9809: 4.004.022a evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ dharmātmā hanūmantaṃ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9810: 4.004.022c pratipūjya yathānyāyam idaṃ provāca rāghavam 4.004.023a kapiḥ kathayate hṛṣṭo yathāyaṃ mārutātmajaḥ 4.004.023c kṛtyavān so 'pi saṃprāptaḥ kṛtakṛtyo 'si rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:9811: 4.004.024a prasannamukhavarṇaś ca vyaktaṃ hṛṣṭaś ca bhāṣate
GE09ram_1-7u:9812: 4.004.024c nānṛtaṃ vakṣyate vīro hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ 4.004.025a tataḥ sa tu mahāprājño hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9813: 4.004.025c jagāmādāya tau vīrau harirājāya rāghavau 4.004.026a sa tu vipula yaśāḥ kapipravīraḥ; pavanasutaḥ kṛtakṛtyavat prahṛṣṭaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9814: 4.004.026c girivaram uruvikramaḥ prayātaḥ; sa śubhamatiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:9816: 4.005.001a ṛśyamūkāt tu hanumān gatvā taṃ malayaṃ giram
GE09ram_1-7u:9817: 4.005.001c ācacakṣe tadā vīrau kapirājāya rāghavau 4.005.002a ayaṃ rāmo mahāprājñaḥ saṃprāpto dṛḍhavikramaḥ 4.005.002c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā rāmo 'yaṃ satyavikramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9818: 4.005.003a ikṣvākūṇāṃ kule jāto rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ 4.005.003c dharme nigaditaś caiva pitur nirdeśapālakaḥ 4.005.004a tasyāsya vasato 'raṇye niyatasya mahātmanaḥ 4.005.004c rakṣasāpahṛtā bhāryā sa tvāṃ śaraṇam āgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9820: 4.005.005c dakṣiṇāś ca tathotsṛṣṭā gāvaḥ śatasahasraśaḥ 4.005.006a tapasā satyavākyena vasudhā yena pālitā 4.005.006c strīhetos tasya putro 'yaṃ rāmas tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9821: 4.005.007a bhavatā sakhyakāmau tau bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau 4.005.007c pratigṛhyārcayasvemau pūjanīyatamāv ubhau
GE09ram_1-7u:9822: 4.005.008a śrutvā hanumato vākyaṃ sugrīvo hṛṣṭamānasaḥ 4.005.008c bhayaṃ sa rāghavād ghoraṃ prajahau vigatajvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9823: 4.005.009a sa kṛtvā mānuṣaṃ rūpaṃ sugrīvaḥ plavagādhipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9824: 4.005.009c darśanīyatamo bhūtvā prītyā provāca rāghavam 4.005.010a bhavān dharmavinītaś ca vikrāntaḥ sarvavatsalaḥ 4.005.010c ākhyātā vāyuputreṇa tattvato me bhavadguṇāḥ 4.005.011a tan mamaivaiṣa satkāro lābhaś caivottamaḥ prabho
GE09ram_1-7u:9825: 4.005.011c yat tvam icchasi sauhārdaṃ vānareṇa mayā saha
GE09ram_1-7u:9826: 4.005.012a rocate yadi vā sakhyaṃ bāhur eṣa prasāritaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9827: 4.005.012c gṛhyatāṃ pāṇinā pāṇir maryādā vadhyatāṃ dhruvā
GE09ram_1-7u:9828: 4.005.013a etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā sugrīvasya subhāṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:9829: 4.005.013c saṃprahṛṣṭamanā hastaṃ pīḍayām āsa pāṇinā 4.005.013e hṛdyaṃ sauhṛdam ālambya paryaṣvajata pīḍitam 4.005.014a tato hanūmān saṃtyajya bhikṣurūpam ariṃdamaḥ 4.005.014c kāṣṭhayoḥ svena rūpeṇa janayām āsa pāvakam
GE09ram_1-7u:9830: 4.005.015a dīpyamānaṃ tato vahniṃ puṣpair abhyarcya satkṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:9831: 4.005.015c tayor madhye tu suprīto nidadhe susamāhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9832: 4.005.016a tato 'gniṃ dīpyamānaṃ tau cakratuś ca pradakṣiṇam 4.005.016c sugrīvo rāghavaś caiva vayasyatvam upāgatau 4.005.017a tataḥ suprīta manasau tāv ubhau harirāghavau
GE09ram_1-7u:9833: 4.005.017c anyonyam abhivīkṣantau na tṛptim upajagmatuḥ 4.005.018a tataḥ sarvārthavidvāṃsaṃ rāmaṃ daśarathātmajam
GE09ram_1-7u:9834: 4.005.018c sugrīvaḥ prāha tejasvī vākyam ekamanās tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:9835: 4.006.001a ayam ākhyāti me rāma sacivo mantrisattamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9836: 4.006.001c hanumān yannimittaṃ tvaṃ nirjanaṃ vanam āgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9837: 4.006.002a lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vasataś ca vane tava
GE09ram_1-7u:9839: 4.006.003a tvayā viyuktā rudatī lakṣmaṇena ca dhīmatā
GE09ram_1-7u:9840: 4.006.003c antaraṃ prepsunā tena hatvā gṛdhraṃ jaṭāyuṣam
GE09ram_1-7u:9841: 4.006.004a bhāryāviyogajaṃ duḥkhaṃ nacirāt tvaṃ vimokṣyase 4.006.004c ahaṃ tām ānayiṣyāmi naṣṭāṃ vedaśrutiṃ yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:9842: 4.006.005a rasātale vā vartantīṃ vartantīṃ vā nabhastale
GE09ram_1-7u:9843: 4.006.005c aham ānīya dāsyāmi tava bhāryām ariṃdama
GE09ram_1-7u:9844: 4.006.006a idaṃ tathyaṃ mama vacas tvam avehi ca rāghava 4.006.006c tyaja śokaṃ mahābāho tāṃ kāntām ānayāmi te
GE09ram_1-7u:9845: 4.006.007a anumānāt tu jānāmi maithilī sā na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9846: 4.006.007c hriyamāṇā mayā dṛṣṭā rakṣasā krūrakarmaṇā 4.006.008a krośantī rāma rāmeti lakṣmaṇeti ca visvaram
GE09ram_1-7u:9848: 4.006.009a ātmanā pañcamaṃ māṃ hi dṛṣṭvā śailataṭe sthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:9849: 4.006.009c uttarīyaṃ tayā tyaktaṃ śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:9850: 4.006.010a tāny asmābhir gṛhītāni nihitāni ca rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:9851: 4.006.010c ānayiṣyāmy ahaṃ tāni pratyabhijñātum arhasi 4.006.011a tam abravīt tato rāmaḥ sugrīvaṃ priyavādinam
GE09ram_1-7u:9852: 4.006.011c ānayasva sakhe śīghraṃ kimarthaṃ pravilambase 4.006.012a evam uktas tu sugrīvaḥ śailasya gahanāṃ guhām
GE09ram_1-7u:9854: 4.006.013a uttarīyaṃ gṛhītvā tu śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:9855: 4.006.013c idaṃ paśyeti rāmāya darśayām āsa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9856: 4.006.014a tato gṛhītvā tadvāsaḥ śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:9858: 4.006.015a sītāsnehapravṛttena sa tu bāṣpeṇa dūṣitaḥ 4.006.015c hā priyeti rudan dhairyam utsṛjya nyapatat kṣitau
GE09ram_1-7u:9859: 4.006.016a hṛdi kṛtvā sa bahuśas tam alaṃkāram uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:9860: 4.006.016c niśaśvāsa bhṛśaṃ sarpo bilastha iva roṣitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9861: 4.006.017a avicchinnāśruvegas tu saumitriṃ vīkṣya pārśvataḥ 4.006.017c paridevayituṃ dīnaṃ rāmaḥ samupacakrame
GE09ram_1-7u:9862: 4.006.018a paśya lakṣmaṇa vaidehyā saṃtyaktaṃ hriyamāṇayā 4.006.018c uttarīyam idaṃ bhūmau śarīrād bhūṣaṇāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:9863: 4.006.019a śādvalinyāṃ dhruvaṃ bhūmyāṃ sītayā hriyamāṇayā 4.006.019c utsṛṣṭaṃ bhūṣaṇam idaṃ tathārūpaṃ hi dṛśyate
GE09ram_1-7u:9864: 4.006.020a brūhi sugrīva kaṃ deśaṃ hriyantī lakṣitā tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:9865: 4.006.020c rakṣasā raudrarūpeṇa mama prāṇasamā priyā 4.006.021a kva vā vasati tad rakṣo mahad vyasanadaṃ mama 4.006.021c yannimittam ahaṃ sarvān nāśayiṣyāmi rākṣasān 4.006.022a haratā maithilīṃ yena māṃ ca roṣayatā bhṛśam
GE09ram_1-7u:9867: 4.006.023a mama dayitatamā hṛtā vanād; rajanicareṇa vimathya yena sā
GE09ram_1-7u:9868: 4.006.023c kathaya mama ripuṃ tam adya vai; pravagapate yamasaṃnidhiṃ nayāmi
GE09ram_1-7u:9869: 4.007.001a evam uktas tu sugrīvo rāmeṇārtena vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9870: 4.007.001c abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ sabāṣpaṃ bāṣpagadgadaḥ 4.007.002a na jāne nilayaṃ tasya sarvathā pāparakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9871: 4.007.002c sāmarthyaṃ vikramaṃ vāpi dauṣkuleyasya vā kulam
GE09ram_1-7u:9872: 4.007.003a satyaṃ tu pratijānāmi tyaja śokam ariṃdama
GE09ram_1-7u:9873: 4.007.003c kariṣyāmi tathā yatnaṃ yathā prāpsyasi maithilīm
GE09ram_1-7u:9875: 4.007.004c tathāsmi kartā nacirād yathā prīto bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:9876: 4.007.005a alaṃ vaiklavyam ālambya dhairyam ātmagataṃ smara
GE09ram_1-7u:9877: 4.007.005c tvadvidhānāṃ na sadṛśam īdṛśaṃ buddhilāghavam 4.007.006a mayāpi vyasanaṃ prāptaṃ bhāryā haraṇajaṃ mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:9878: 4.007.006c na cāham evaṃ śocāmi na ca dhairyaṃ parityaje 4.007.007a nāhaṃ tām anuśocāmi prākṛto vānaro 'pi san
GE09ram_1-7u:9879: 4.007.007c mahātmā ca vinītaś cā kiṃ punar dhṛtimān bhavān 4.007.008a bāṣpam āpatitaṃ dhairyān nigrahītuṃ tvam arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:9880: 4.007.008c maryādāṃ sattvayuktānāṃ dhṛtiṃ notsraṣṭum arhasi 4.007.009a vyasane vārtha kṛcchre vā bhaye vā jīvitāntage
GE09ram_1-7u:9881: 4.007.009c vimṛśan vai svayā buddhyā dhṛtimān nāvasīdati
GE09ram_1-7u:9882: 4.007.010a bāliśas tu naro nityaṃ vaiklavyaṃ yo 'nuvartate
GE09ram_1-7u:9883: 4.007.010c sa majjaty avaśaḥ śoke bhārākrānteva naur jale
GE09ram_1-7u:9884: 4.007.011a eṣo 'ñjalir mayā baddhaḥ praṇayāt tvāṃ prasādaye 4.007.011c pauruṣaṃ śraya śokasya nāntaraṃ dātum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:9885: 4.007.012a ye śokam anuvartante na teṣāṃ vidyate sukham
GE09ram_1-7u:9886: 4.007.012c tejaś ca kṣīyate teṣāṃ na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi 4.007.013a hitaṃ vayasya bhāvena brūhi nopadiśāmi te
GE09ram_1-7u:9887: 4.007.013c vayasyatāṃ pūjayan me na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:9888: 4.007.014a madhuraṃ sāntvitas tena sugrīveṇa sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9890: 4.007.015a prakṛtiṣṭhas tu kākutsthaḥ sugrīvavacanāt prabhuḥ 4.007.015c saṃpariṣvajya sugrīvam idaṃ vacanam abravīt 4.007.016a kartavyaṃ yad vayasyena snigdhena ca hitena ca
GE09ram_1-7u:9891: 4.007.016c anurūpaṃ ca yuktaṃ ca kṛtaṃ sugrīva tat tvayā 4.007.017a eṣa ca prakṛtiṣṭho 'ham anunītas tvayā sakhe
GE09ram_1-7u:9892: 4.007.017c durlabho hīdṛśo bandhur asmin kāle viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9893: 4.007.018a kiṃ tu yatnas tvayā kāryo maithilyāḥ parimārgaṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:9894: 4.007.018c rākṣasasya ca raudrasya rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ 4.007.019a mayā ca yad anuṣṭheyaṃ visrabdhena tad ucyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:9895: 4.007.019c varṣāsv iva ca sukṣetre sarvaṃ saṃpadyate tava
GE09ram_1-7u:9896: 4.007.020a mayā ca yad idaṃ vākyam abhimānāt samīritam
GE09ram_1-7u:9897: 4.007.020c tat tvayā hariśārdūla tattvam ity upadhāryatām
GE09ram_1-7u:9898: 4.007.021a anṛtaṃ noktapūrvaṃ me na ca vakṣye kadā cana 4.007.021c etat te pratijānāmi satyenaiva śapāmi te
GE09ram_1-7u:9899: 4.007.022a tataḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ sugrīvo vānaraiḥ sacivaiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:9900: 4.007.022c rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā pratijñātaṃ viśeṣataḥ 4.007.023a mahānubhāvasya vaco niśamya; harir narāṇām ṛṣabhasya tasya
GE09ram_1-7u:9901: 4.007.023c kṛtaṃ sa mene harivīra mukhyas; tadā svakāryaṃ hṛdayena vidvān
GE09ram_1-7u:9902: 4.008.001a parituṣṭas tu sugrīvas tena vākyena vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9903: 4.008.001c lakṣmaṇasyāgrajaṃ rāmam idaṃ vacanam abravīt 4.008.002a sarvathāham anugrāhyo devatānām asaṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9904: 4.008.002c upapannaguṇopetaḥ sakhā yasya bhavān mama 4.008.003a śakyaṃ khalu bhaved rāma sahāyena tvayānagha
GE09ram_1-7u:9905: 4.008.003c surarājyam api prāptuṃ svarājyaṃ kiṃ punaḥ prabho
GE09ram_1-7u:9906: 4.008.004a so 'haṃ sabhājyo bandhūnāṃ suhṛdāṃ caiva rāghava 4.008.004c yasyāgnisākṣikaṃ mitraṃ labdhaṃ rāghavavaṃśajam
GE09ram_1-7u:9907: 4.008.005a aham apy anurūpas te vayasyo jñāsyase śanaiḥ
