GE09ram_1-7u:9908: 4.008.005c na tu vaktuṃ samartho 'haṃ svayam ātmagatān guṇān
GE09ram_1-7u:9909: 4.008.006a mahātmanāṃ tu bhūyiṣṭhaṃ tvadvidhānāṃ kṛtātmanām 4.008.006c niścalā bhavati prītir dhairyam ātmavatām iva
GE09ram_1-7u:9910: 4.008.007a rajataṃ vā suvarṇaṃ vā vastrāṇy ābharaṇāni vā
GE09ram_1-7u:9912: 4.008.008a āḍhyo vāpi daridro vā duḥkhitaḥ sukhito 'pi vā
GE09ram_1-7u:9913: 4.008.008c nirdoṣo vā sadoṣo vā vayasyaḥ paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9914: 4.008.009a dhanatyāgaḥ sukhatyāgo dehatyāgo 'pi vā punaḥ 4.008.009c vayasyārthe pravartante snehaṃ dṛṣṭvā tathāvidham 4.008.010a tat tathety abravīd rāmaḥ sugrīvaṃ priyavādinam
GE09ram_1-7u:9916: 4.008.011a tato rāmaṃ sthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_1-7u:9917: 4.008.011c sugrīvaḥ sarvataś cakṣur vane lolam apātayat
GE09ram_1-7u:9918: 4.008.012a sa dadarśa tataḥ sālam avidūre harīśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9920: 4.008.013a tasyaikāṃ parṇabahulāṃ bhaṅktvā śākhāṃ supuṣpitām 4.008.013c sālasyāstīrya sugrīvo niṣasāda sarāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9921: 4.008.014a tāv āsīnau tato dṛṣṭvā hanūmān api lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:9923: 4.008.015a tataḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ sugrīvaḥ ślakṣṇaṃ madhurayā girā
GE09ram_1-7u:9925: 4.008.016a ahaṃ vinikṛto bhrātrā carāmy eṣa bhayārditaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9927: 4.008.017a so 'haṃ trasto bhaye magno vasāmy udbhrāntacetanaḥ 4.008.017c vālinā nikṛto bhrātrā kṛtavairaś ca rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:9929: 4.008.018c mamāpi tvam anāthasya prasādaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:9930: 4.008.019a evam uktas tu tejasvī dharmajño dharmavatsalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9931: 4.008.019c pratyuvāca sa kākutsthaḥ sugrīvaṃ prahasann iva
GE09ram_1-7u:9933: 4.008.020c adyaiva taṃ haniṣyāmi tava bhāryāpahāriṇam 4.008.021a ime hi me mahāvegāḥ patriṇas
GE09ram_1-7u:9935: 4.008.022a kaṅkapatrapraticchannā mahendrāśanisaṃnibhāḥ 4.008.022c suparvāṇaḥ sutīkṣṇāgrā saroṣā bhujagā iva 4.008.023a bhrātṛsaṃjñam amitraṃ te vālinaṃ kṛtakilbiṣam 4.008.023c śarair vinihataṃ paśya vikīrṇam iva parvatam
GE09ram_1-7u:9936: 4.008.024a rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā sugrīvo vāhinīpatiḥ 4.008.024c praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe sādhu sādhv iti cābravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:9938: 4.008.025c vayasya iti kṛtvā hi tvayy ahaṃ paridevaye
GE09ram_1-7u:9940: 4.008.026c kṛtaḥ prāṇair bahumataḥ satyenāpi śapāmy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:9941: 4.008.027a vayasya iti kṛtvā ca visrabdhaṃ pravadāmy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:9942: 4.008.027c duḥkham antargataṃ yan me mano dahati nityaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9944: 4.008.028c bāṣpopahatayā vācā noccaiḥ śaknoti bhāṣitum 4.008.029a bāṣpavegaṃ tu sahasā nadīvegam ivāgatam 4.008.029c dhārayām āsa dhairyeṇa sugrīvo rāmasaṃnidhau 4.008.030a saṃnigṛhya tu taṃ bāṣpaṃ pramṛjya nayane śubhe
GE09ram_1-7u:9945: 4.008.030c viniḥśvasya ca tejasvī rāghavaṃ punar abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:9946: 4.008.031a purāhaṃ valinā rāma rājyāt svād avaropitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9948: 4.008.032a hṛtā bhāryā ca me tena prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasī
GE09ram_1-7u:9949: 4.008.032c suhṛdaś ca madīyā ye saṃyatā bandhaneṣu te
GE09ram_1-7u:9950: 4.008.033a yatnavāṃś ca suduṣṭātmā mad vināśāya rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:9951: 4.008.033c bahuśas tat prayuktāś ca vānarā nihatā mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:9952: 4.008.034a śaṅkayā tv etayā cāhaṃ dṛṣṭvā tvām api rāghava 4.008.034c nopasarpāmy ahaṃ bhīto bhaye sarve hi bibhyati
GE09ram_1-7u:9953: 4.008.035a kevalaṃ hi sahāyā me hanumat pramukhās tv ime 4.008.035c ato 'haṃ dhārayāmy adya prāṇān kṛcchra gato 'pi san
GE09ram_1-7u:9954: 4.008.036a ete hi kapayaḥ snigdhā māṃ rakṣanti samantataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9955: 4.008.036c saha gacchanti gantavye nityaṃ tiṣṭhanti ca sthite
GE09ram_1-7u:9956: 4.008.037a saṃkṣepas tv eṣa me rāma kim uktvā vistaraṃ hi te
GE09ram_1-7u:9957: 4.008.037c sa me jyeṣṭho ripur bhrātā vālī viśrutapauruṣaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9958: 4.008.038a tadvināśād dhi me duḥkhaṃ pranaṣṭaṃ syād anantaram
GE09ram_1-7u:9959: 4.008.038c sukhaṃ me jīvitaṃ caiva tadvināśanibandhanam 4.008.039a eṣa me rāma śokāntaḥ śokārtena niveditaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9960: 4.008.039c duḥkhito 'duḥkhito vāpi sakhyur nityaṃ sakhā gatiḥ 4.008.040a śrutvaitac ca vaco rāmaḥ sugrīvam idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:9961: 4.008.040c kiṃnimittam abhūd vairaṃ śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9962: 4.008.041a sukhaṃ hi kāraṇaṃ śrutvā vairasya tava vānara
GE09ram_1-7u:9964: 4.008.042a balavān hi mamāmarṣaḥ śrutvā tvām avamānitam
GE09ram_1-7u:9966: 4.008.043a hṛṣṭaḥ kathaya visrabdho yāvad āropyate dhanuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9967: 4.008.043c sṛṣṭaś ca hi mayā bāṇo nirastaś ca ripus tava
GE09ram_1-7u:9968: 4.008.044a evam uktas tu sugrīvaḥ kākutsthena mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:9969: 4.008.044c praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9971: 4.008.045c vairasya kāraṇaṃ tattvam ākhyātum upacakrame 4.009.001a vālī nāma mama bhrātā jyeṣṭhaḥ śatruniṣūdanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9972: 4.009.001c pitur bahumato nityaṃ mama cāpi tathā purā
GE09ram_1-7u:9973: 4.009.002a pitary uparate 'smākaṃ jyeṣṭho 'yam iti mantribhiḥ 4.009.002c kapīnām īśvaro rājye kṛtaḥ paramasaṃmataḥ 4.009.003a rājyaṃ praśāsatas tasya pitṛpaitāmahaṃ mahat 4.009.003c ahaṃ sarveṣu kāleṣu praṇataḥ preṣyavat sthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9974: 4.009.004a māyāvī nāma tejasvī pūrvajo dundubheḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9975: 4.009.004c tena tasya mahad vairaṃ strīkṛtaṃ viśrutaṃ purā
GE09ram_1-7u:9976: 4.009.005a sa tu supte jane rātrau kiṣkindhād vāram āgataḥ 4.009.005c nardati sma susaṃrabdho vālinaṃ cāhvayad raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:9977: 4.009.006a prasuptas tu mama bhrātā narditaṃ bhairavasvanam
GE09ram_1-7u:9978: 4.009.006c śrutvā na mamṛṣe vālī niṣpapāta javāt tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:9979: 4.009.007a sa tu vai niḥsṛtaḥ krodhāt taṃ hantum asurottamam 4.009.007c vāryamāṇas tataḥ strībhir mayā ca praṇatātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:9980: 4.009.008a sa tu nirdhūya sarvānno nirjagāma mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9981: 4.009.008c tato 'ham api sauhārdān niḥsṛto vālinā saha 4.009.009a sa tu me bhrātaraṃ dṛṣṭvā māṃ ca dūrād avasthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:9982: 4.009.009c asuro jātasaṃtrāsaḥ pradudrāva tadā bhṛśam 4.009.010a tasmin dravati saṃtraste hy āvāṃ drutataraṃ gatau
GE09ram_1-7u:9984: 4.009.011a sa tṛṇair āvṛtaṃ durgaṃ dharaṇyā vivaraṃ mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:9985: 4.009.011c praviveśāsuro vegād āvām āsādya viṣṭhitau 4.009.012a taṃ praviṣṭaṃ ripuṃ dṛṣṭvā bilaṃ roṣavaśaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9986: 4.009.012c mām uvāca tadā vālī vacanaṃ kṣubhitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9987: 4.009.013a iha tvaṃ tiṣṭha sugrīva biladvāri samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9988: 4.009.013c yāvad atra praviśyāhaṃ nihanmi samare ripum
GE09ram_1-7u:9989: 4.009.014a mayā tv etad vacaḥ śrutvā yācitaḥ sa paraṃtapa 4.009.014c śāpayitvā ca māṃ padbhyāṃ praviveśa bilaṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:9990: 4.009.015a tasya praviṣṭasya bilaṃ sāgraḥ saṃvatsaro gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9991: 4.009.015c sthitasya ca mama dvāri sa kālo vyatyavartata
GE09ram_1-7u:9992: 4.009.016a ahaṃ tu naṣṭaṃ taṃ jñātvā snehād āgatasaṃbhramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9993: 4.009.016c bhrātaraṃ na hi paśyāmi pāpaśaṅki ca me manaḥ 4.009.017a atha dīrghasya kālasya bilāt tasmād viniḥsṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:9994: 4.009.017c saphenaṃ rudhiraṃ raktam ahaṃ dṛṣṭvā suduḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9995: 4.009.018a nardatām asurāṇāṃ ca dhvanir me śrotram āgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9996: 4.009.018c nirastasya ca saṃgrāme krośato niḥsvano guroḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:9997: 4.009.019a ahaṃ tv avagato buddhyā cihnais tair bhrātaraṃ hatam 4.009.019c pidhāya ca biladvāraṃ śilayā girimātrayā 4.009.019e śokārtaś codakaṃ kṛtvā kiṣkindhām āgataḥ sakhe
GE09ram_1-7u:9998: 4.009.020a gūhamānasya me tattvaṃ yatnato mantribhiḥ śrutam
GE09ram_1-7u:10000: 4.009.021a rājyaṃ praśāsatas tasya nyāyato mama rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:10001: 4.009.021c ājagāma ripuṃ hatvā vālī tam asurottamam
GE09ram_1-7u:10002: 4.009.022a abhiṣiktaṃ tu māṃ dṛṣṭvā krodhāt saṃraktalocanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10003: 4.009.022c madīyān mantriṇo baddhvā paruṣaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:10004: 4.009.023a nigrahe 'pi samarthasya taṃ pāpaṃ prati rāghava 4.009.023c na prāvartata me buddhir bhrātṛgauravayantritā 4.009.024a mānayaṃs taṃ mahātmānaṃ yathāvac cābhyavādayam 4.009.024c uktāś ca nāśiṣas tena saṃtuṣṭenāntarātmanā 4.010.001a tataḥ krodhasamāviṣṭaṃ saṃrabdhaṃ tam upāgatam 4.010.001c ahaṃ prasādayāṃ cakre bhrātaraṃ priyakāmyayā 4.010.002a diṣṭyāsi kuśalī prāpto nihataś ca tvayā ripuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10005: 4.010.002c anāthasya hi me nāthas tvam eko 'nāthanandanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10006: 4.010.003a idaṃ bahuśalākaṃ te pūrṇacandram ivoditam 4.010.003c chatraṃ savālavyajanaṃ pratīcchasva mayodyatam
GE09ram_1-7u:10007: 4.010.004a tvam eva rājā mānārhaḥ sadā cāhaṃ yathāpurā
GE09ram_1-7u:10008: 4.010.004c nyāsabhūtam idaṃ rājyaṃ tava niryātayāmy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:10009: 4.010.005a mā ca roṣaṃ kṛthāḥ saumya mayi śatrunibarhaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:10010: 4.010.005c yāce tvāṃ śirasā rājan mayā baddho 'yam añjaliḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10011: 4.010.006a balād asmi samāgamya mantribhiḥ puravāsibhiḥ 4.010.006c rājabhāve niyukto 'haṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:10012: 4.010.007a snigdham evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ māṃ sa tu nirbhartsya vānaraḥ 4.010.007c dhik tvām iti ca mām uktvā bahu tat tad uvāca ha 4.010.008a prakṛtīś ca samānīya mantriṇaś caiva saṃmatān
GE09ram_1-7u:10013: 4.010.008c mām āha suhṛdāṃ madhye vākyaṃ paramagarhitam
GE09ram_1-7u:10014: 4.010.009a viditaṃ vo yathā rātrau māyāvī sa mahāsuraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10015: 4.010.009c māṃ samāhvayata krūro yuddhākāṅkṣī sudurmatiḥ 4.010.010a tasya tad garjitaṃ śrutvā niḥsṛto 'haṃ nṛpālayāt
GE09ram_1-7u:10016: 4.010.010c anuyātaś ca māṃ tūrṇam ayaṃ bhrātā sudāruṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10017: 4.010.011a sa tu dṛṣṭvaiva māṃ rātrau sadvitīyaṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10018: 4.010.011c prādravad bhayasaṃtrasto vīkṣyāvāṃ tam anudrutau 4.010.011e anudrutas tu vegena praviveśa mahābilam 4.010.012a taṃ praviṣṭaṃ viditvā tu sughoraṃ sumahad bilam
GE09ram_1-7u:10019: 4.010.012c ayam ukto 'tha me bhrātā mayā tu krūradarśanaḥ 4.010.013a ahatvā nāsti me śaktiḥ pratigantum itaḥ purīm
GE09ram_1-7u:10020: 4.010.013c biladvāri pratīkṣa tvaṃ yāvad enaṃ nihanmy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:10021: 4.010.014a sthito 'yam iti matvā tu praviṣṭo 'haṃ durāsadam
GE09ram_1-7u:10022: 4.010.014c taṃ ca me mārgamāṇasya gataḥ saṃvatsaras tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:10023: 4.010.015a sa tu dṛṣṭo mayā śatrur anirvedād bhayāvahaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10024: 4.010.015c nihataś ca mayā tatra so 'suro bandhubhiḥ saha 4.010.016a tasyāsyāt tu pravṛttena rudhiraugheṇa tad bilam
GE09ram_1-7u:10025: 4.010.016c pūrṇam āsīd durākrāmaṃ stanatas tasya bhūtale
GE09ram_1-7u:10026: 4.010.017a sūdayitvā tu taṃ śatruṃ vikrāntaṃ dundubheḥ sutam
GE09ram_1-7u:10027: 4.010.017c niṣkrāmann eva paśyāmi bilasya pihitaṃ mukham
GE09ram_1-7u:10028: 4.010.018a vikrośamānasya tu me sugrīveti punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10030: 4.010.019a pādaprahārais tu mayā bahuśas tad vidāritam
GE09ram_1-7u:10031: 4.010.019c tato 'haṃ tena niṣkramya yathā punar upāgataḥ 4.010.020a tatrānenāsmi saṃruddho rājyaṃ mārgayatātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10033: 4.010.021a evam uktvā tu māṃ tatra vastreṇaikena vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10034: 4.010.021c tadā nirvāsayām āsa vālī vigatasādhvasaḥ 4.010.022a tenāham apaviddhaś ca hṛtadāraś ca rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:10035: 4.010.022c tadbhayāc ca mahīkṛtsnā krānteyaṃ savanārṇavā 4.010.023a ṛśyamūkaṃ girivaraṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:10037: 4.010.024a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ vairānukathanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:10038: 4.010.024c anāgasā mayā prāptaṃ vyasanaṃ paśya rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:10040: 4.010.025c kartum arhasi me vīra prasādaṃ tasya nigrahāt
GE09ram_1-7u:10041: 4.010.026a evam uktaḥ sa tejasvī dharmajño dharmasaṃhitam
GE09ram_1-7u:10042: 4.010.026c vacanaṃ vaktum ārebhe sugrīvaṃ prahasann iva
GE09ram_1-7u:10043: 4.010.027a amoghāḥ sūryasaṃkāśā mameme niśitāḥ śarāḥ 4.010.027c tasmin vālini durvṛtte patiṣyanti ruṣānvitāḥ 4.010.028a yāvat taṃ na hi paśyeyaṃ tava bhāryāpahāriṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:10044: 4.010.028c tāvat sa jīvet pāpātmā vālī cāritradūṣakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10045: 4.010.029a ātmānumānāt paśyāmi magnaṃ tvāṃ śokasāgare 4.010.029c tvām ahaṃ tārayiṣyāmi kāmaṃ prāpsyasi puṣkalam
GE09ram_1-7u:10047: 4.011.001c sugrīvaḥ pūjayāṃ cakre rāghavaṃ praśaśaṃsa ca
GE09ram_1-7u:10048: 4.011.002a asaṃśayaṃ prajvalitais tīkṣṇair marmātigaiḥ śaraiḥ 4.011.002c tvaṃ daheḥ kupito lokān yugānta iva bhāskaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10049: 4.011.003a vālinaḥ pauruṣaṃ yat tad yac ca vīryaṃ dhṛtiś ca yā
GE09ram_1-7u:10050: 4.011.003c tan mamaikamanāḥ śrutvā vidhatsva yadanantaram 4.011.004a samudrāt paścimāt pūrvaṃ dakṣiṇād api cottaram
GE09ram_1-7u:10051: 4.011.004c krāmaty anudite sūrye vālī vyapagataklamaḥ 4.011.005a agrāṇy āruhya śailānāṃ śikharāṇi mahānty api
GE09ram_1-7u:10052: 4.011.005c ūrdhvam utkṣipya tarasā pratigṛhṇāti vīryavān 4.011.006a bahavaḥ sāravantaś ca vaneṣu vividhā drumāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10053: 4.011.006c vālinā tarasā bhagnā balaṃ prathayatātmanaḥ 4.011.007a mahiṣo dundubhir nāma
GE09ram_1-7u:10054: 4.011.007c balaṃ nāgasahasrasya dhārayām āsa vīryavān 4.011.008a vīryotsekena duṣṭātmā varadānāc ca mohitaḥ 4.011.008c jagāma sa mahākāyaḥ samudraṃ saritāṃ patim
GE09ram_1-7u:10056: 4.011.009c mama yuddhaṃ prayaccheti tam uvāca mahārṇavam
GE09ram_1-7u:10057: 4.011.010a tataḥ samudro dharmātmā samutthāya mahābalaḥ 4.011.010c abravīd vacanaṃ rājann asuraṃ kālacoditam 4.011.011a samartho nāsmi te dātuṃ yuddhaṃ yuddhaviśārada
GE09ram_1-7u:10058: 4.011.011c śrūyatām abhidhāsyāmi yas te yuddhaṃ pradāsyati
GE09ram_1-7u:10060: 4.011.012c śaṃkaraśvaśuro nāmnā himavān iti viśrutaḥ 4.011.013a guhā prasravaṇopeto bahukandaranirjharaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10061: 4.011.013c sa samarthas tava prītim atulāṃ kartum āhave
GE09ram_1-7u:10062: 4.011.014a taṃ bhītam iti vijñāya samudram asurottamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10063: 4.011.014c himavadvanam āgacchac charaś cāpād iva cyutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10064: 4.011.015a tatas tasya gireḥ śvetā gajendravipulāḥ śilāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10065: 4.011.015c cikṣepa bahudhā bhūmau dundubhir vinanāda ca
GE09ram_1-7u:10067: 4.011.016c himavān abravīd vākyaṃ sva eva śikhare sthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10068: 4.011.017a kleṣṭum arhasi māṃ na tvaṃ dundubhe dharmavatsala
GE09ram_1-7u:10069: 4.011.017c raṇakarmasv akuśalas tapasviśaraṇaṃ hy aham 4.011.018a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā girirājasya dhīmataḥ 4.011.018c uvāca dundubhir vākyaṃ krodhāt saṃraktalocanaḥ 4.011.019a yadi yuddhe 'samarthas tvaṃ madbhayād vā nirudyamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10070: 4.011.019c tam ācakṣva pradadyān me yo 'dya yuddhaṃ yuyutsataḥ 4.011.020a himavān abravīd vākyaṃ śrutvā vākyaviśāradaḥ 4.011.020c anuktapūrvaṃ dharmātmā krodhāt tam asurottamam 4.011.021a vālī nāma mahāprājñaḥ śakratulyaparākramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10071: 4.011.021c adhyāste vānaraḥ śrīmān kiṣkindhām atulaprabhām 4.011.022a sa samartho mahāprājñas tava yuddhaviśāradaḥ 4.011.022c dvandvayuddhaṃ mahad dātuṃ namucer iva vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10072: 4.011.023a taṃ śīghram abhigaccha tvaṃ yadi yuddham ihecchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:10073: 4.011.023c sa hi durdharṣaṇo nityaṃ śūraḥ samarakarmaṇi
GE09ram_1-7u:10074: 4.011.024a śrutvā himavato vākyaṃ krodhāviṣṭaḥ sa dundubhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10075: 4.011.024c jagāma tāṃ purīṃ tasya kiṣkindhāṃ vālinas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:10076: 4.011.025a dhārayan māhiṣaṃ rūpaṃ tīkṣṇaśṛṅgo bhayāvahaḥ 4.011.025c prāvṛṣīva mahāmeghas toyapūrṇo nabhastale
GE09ram_1-7u:10077: 4.011.026a tatas tu dvāram āgamya kiṣkindhāyā mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10078: 4.011.026c nanarda kampayan bhūmiṃ dundubhir dundubhir yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:10079: 4.011.027a samīpajān drumān bhañjan vasudhāṃ dārayan khuraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10080: 4.011.027c viṣāṇenollekhan darpāt taddvāraṃ dvirado yathā 4.011.028a antaḥpuragato vālī śrutvā śabdam amarṣaṇaḥ 4.011.028c niṣpapāta saha strībhis tārābhir iva candramāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10081: 4.011.029a mitaṃ vyaktākṣarapadaṃ tam uvāca sa dundubhim
GE09ram_1-7u:10082: 4.011.029c harīṇām īśvaro vālī sarveṣāṃ vanacāriṇām 4.011.030a kimarthaṃ nagaradvāram idaṃ ruddhvā vinardasi 4.011.030c dundubhe vidito me 'si rakṣa prāṇān mahābala
GE09ram_1-7u:10083: 4.011.031a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā vānarendrasya dhīmataḥ 4.011.031c uvāca dundubhir vākyaṃ krodhāt saṃraktalocanaḥ 4.011.032a na tvaṃ strīsaṃnidhau vīra vacanaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:10084: 4.011.032c mama yuddhaṃ prayaccha tvaṃ tato jñāsyāmi te balam 4.011.033a atha vā dhārayiṣyāmi krodham adya niśām imām
GE09ram_1-7u:10085: 4.011.033c gṛhyatām udayaḥ svairaṃ kāmabhogeṣu vānara 4.011.034a yo hi mattaṃ pramattaṃ vā suptaṃ vā rahitaṃ bhṛśam
GE09ram_1-7u:10086: 4.011.034c hanyāt sa bhrūṇahā loke tvadvidhaṃ madamohitam
GE09ram_1-7u:10087: 4.011.035a sa prahasyābravīn mandaṃ krodhāt tam asurottamam
GE09ram_1-7u:10088: 4.011.035c visṛjya tāḥ striyaḥ sarvās tārā prabhiṛtikās tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:10089: 4.011.036a matto 'yam iti mā maṃsthā yady abhīto 'si saṃyuge
GE09ram_1-7u:10090: 4.011.036c mado 'yaṃ saṃprahāre 'smin vīrapānaṃ samarthyatām 4.011.037a tam evam uktvā saṃkruddho mālām utkṣipya kāñcanīm
GE09ram_1-7u:10091: 4.011.037c pitrā dattāṃ mahendreṇa yuddhāya vyavatiṣṭhata 4.011.038a viṣāṇayor gṛhītvā taṃ dundubhiṃ girisaṃnibham 4.011.038c vālī vyāpātayāṃ cakre nanarda ca mahāsvanam
GE09ram_1-7u:10092: 4.011.039a yuddhe prāṇahare tasmin niṣpiṣṭo dundubhis tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:10093: 4.011.039c śrotrābhyām atha raktaṃ tu tasya susrāva pātyataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10094: 4.011.039e papāta ca mahākāyaḥ kṣitau pañcatvam āgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10095: 4.011.040a taṃ tolayitvā bāhubhyāṃ gatasattvam acetanam 4.011.040c cikṣepa vegavān vālī vegenaikena yojanam 4.011.041a tasya vegapraviddhasya vaktrāt kṣatajabindavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10097: 4.011.042a tān dṛṣṭvā patitāṃs tatra muniḥ śoṇitavipruṣaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10098: 4.011.042c utsasarja mahāśāpaṃ kṣeptāraṃ vālinaṃ prati 4.011.042e iha tenāpraveṣṭavyaṃ praviṣṭasya badho bhavet 4.011.043a sa maharṣiṃ samāsādya yācate sma kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10099: 4.011.044a tataḥ śāpabhayād bhīta ṛśyamūkaṃ mahāgirim 4.011.044c praveṣṭuṃ necchati harir draṣṭuṃ vāpi nareśvara
GE09ram_1-7u:10100: 4.011.045a tasyāpraveśaṃ jñātvāham idaṃ rāma mahāvanam 4.011.045c vicarāmi sahāmātyo viṣādena
GE09ram_1-7u:10103: 4.011.047a ime ca vipulāḥ sālāḥ sapta śākhāvalambinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10104: 4.011.047c yatraikaṃ ghaṭate vālī niṣpatrayitum ojasā 4.011.048a etad asyāsamaṃ vīryaṃ mayā rāma prakāśitam
GE09ram_1-7u:10105: 4.011.048c kathaṃ taṃ vālinaṃ hantuṃ samare śakṣyase nṛpa
GE09ram_1-7u:10106: 4.011.049a yadi bhindyād bhavān sālān imāṃs tv ekeṣuṇā tataḥ 4.011.049c jānīyāṃ tvāṃ mahābāho samarthaṃ vālino vadhe
GE09ram_1-7u:10107: 4.011.050a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ 4.011.050c rāghavo dundubheḥ kāyaṃ pādāṅguṣṭhena līlayā 4.011.050e tolayitvā mahābāhuś cikṣepa daśayojanam
GE09ram_1-7u:10108: 4.011.051a kṣiptaṃ dṛṣṭvā tataḥ kāyaṃ sugrīvaḥ punar abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:10109: 4.011.051c lakṣmaṇasyāgrato rāmam idaṃ vacanam arthavat 4.011.052a ārdraḥ samāṃsapratyagraḥ kṣiptaḥ kāyaḥ purā sakhe
GE09ram_1-7u:10110: 4.011.052c laghuḥ saṃprati nirmāṃsas tṛṇabhūtaś ca rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:10111: 4.011.052e nātra śakyaṃ balaṃ jñātuṃ tava vā tasya vādhikam 4.012.001a etac ca vacanaṃ śrutvā sugrīveṇa subhāṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:10112: 4.012.001c pratyayārthaṃ mahātejā rāmo jagrāha kārmukam 4.012.002a sa gṛhītvā dhanur ghoraṃ śaram ekaṃ ca mānadaḥ 4.012.002c sālān uddiśya cikṣepa jyāsvanaiḥ pūrayan diśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10113: 4.012.003a sa visṛṣṭo balavatā bāṇaḥ svarṇapariṣkṛtaḥ 4.012.003c bhittvā sālān giriprasthe sapta bhūmiṃ viveśa ha
GE09ram_1-7u:10114: 4.012.004a praviṣṭas tu muhūrtena rasāṃ bhittvā mahājavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10115: 4.012.004c niṣpatya ca punas tūrṇaṃ svatūṇīṃ praviveśa ha
GE09ram_1-7u:10116: 4.012.005a tān dṛṣṭvā sapta nirbhinnān sālān vānarapuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10117: 4.012.005c rāmasya śaravegena vismayaṃ paramaṃ gataḥ 4.012.006a sa mūrdhnā nyapatad bhūmau pralambīkṛtabhūṣaṇaḥ 4.012.006c sugrīvaḥ paramaprīto rāghavāya kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10118: 4.012.007a idaṃ covāca dharmajñaṃ karmaṇā tena harṣitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10119: 4.012.007c rāmaṃ sarvāstraviduṣāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ śūram avasthitam 4.012.008a sendrān api surān sarvāṃs tvaṃ bāṇaiḥ puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_1-7u:10120: 4.012.008c samarthaḥ samare hantuṃ kiṃ punar vālinaṃ prabho
GE09ram_1-7u:10121: 4.012.009a yena sapta mahāsālā girir bhūmiś ca dāritāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10122: 4.012.009c bāṇenaikena kākutstha sthātā te ko raṇāgrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10123: 4.012.010a adya me vigataḥ śokaḥ prītir adya parā mama 4.012.010c suhṛdaṃ tvāṃ samāsādya
GE09ram_1-7u:10124: 4.012.011a tam adyaiva priyārthaṃ me vairiṇaṃ bhrātṛrūpiṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:10125: 4.012.011c vālinaṃ jahi kākutstha mayā baddho 'yam añjaliḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10126: 4.012.012a tato rāmaḥ pariṣvajya sugrīvaṃ priyadarśanam 4.012.012c pratyuvāca mahāprājño lakṣmaṇānumataṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10127: 4.012.013a asmād gacchāma kiṣkindhāṃ kṣipraṃ gaccha tvam agrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10128: 4.012.013c gatvā cāhvaya sugrīva vālinaṃ bhrātṛgandhinam 4.012.014a sarve te tvaritaṃ gatvā kiṣkindhāṃ vālinaḥ purīm
GE09ram_1-7u:10129: 4.012.014c vṛkṣair ātmānam āvṛtya vyatiṣṭhan gahane vane
GE09ram_1-7u:10130: 4.012.015a sugrīvo vyanadad ghoraṃ vālino hvānakāraṇāt 4.012.015c gāḍhaṃ parihito vegān nādair bhindann ivāmbaram
GE09ram_1-7u:10131: 4.012.016a taṃ śrutvā ninadaṃ bhrātuḥ kruddho vālī mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10133: 4.012.017a tataḥ sutumulaṃ yuddhaṃ vālisugrīvayor abhūt 4.012.017c gagane grahayor ghoraṃ budhāṅgārakayor iva 4.012.018a talair aśanikalpaiś ca vajrakalpaiś ca muṣṭibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10134: 4.012.018c jaghnatuḥ samare 'nyonyaṃ bhrātarau krodhamūrchitau 4.012.019a tato rāmo dhanuṣpāṇis tāv ubhau samudīkṣya tu
GE09ram_1-7u:10135: 4.012.019c anyonyasadṛśau vīrāv ubhau devāv ivāśvinau 4.012.020a yan nāvagacchat sugrīvaṃ vālinaṃ vāpi rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10136: 4.012.020c tato na kṛtavān buddhiṃ moktum antakaraṃ śaram
GE09ram_1-7u:10137: 4.012.021a etasminn antare bhagnaḥ sugrīvas tena vālinā
GE09ram_1-7u:10138: 4.012.021c apaśyan rāghavaṃ nātham ṛśyamūkaṃ pradudruve 4.012.022a klānto rudhirasiktāṅgaḥ prahārair jarjarīkṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10140: 4.012.023a taṃ praviṣṭaṃ vanaṃ dṛṣṭvā vālī śāpabhayāt tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10141: 4.012.023c mukto hy asi tvam ity uktvā sa nivṛtto mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10142: 4.012.024a rāghavo 'pi saha bhrātrā saha caiva hanūmatā 4.012.024c tad eva vanam āgacchat sugrīvo yatra vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10143: 4.012.025a taṃ samīkṣyāgataṃ rāmaṃ sugrīvaḥ sahalakṣmaṇam 4.012.025c hrīmān dīnam uvācedaṃ vasudhām avalokayan 4.012.026a āhvayasveti mām uktvā darśayitvā ca vikramam
GE09ram_1-7u:10144: 4.012.026c vairiṇā ghātayitvā ca kim idānīṃ tvayā kṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:10145: 4.012.027a tām eva velāṃ vaktavyaṃ tvayā rāghava tattvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10146: 4.012.027c vālinaṃ na nihanmīti tato nāham ito vraje
GE09ram_1-7u:10147: 4.012.028a tasya caivaṃ bruvāṇasya sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ 4.012.028c karuṇaṃ dīnayā vācā rāghavaḥ punar abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:10148: 4.012.029a sugrīva śrūyatāṃ tātaḥ krodhaś ca vyapanīyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:10149: 4.012.029c kāraṇaṃ yena bāṇo 'yaṃ na mayā sa visarjitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10150: 4.012.030a alaṃkāreṇa veṣeṇa pramāṇena gatena ca 4.012.030c tvaṃ ca sugrīva vālī ca sadṛśau sthaḥ parasparam 4.012.031a svareṇa varcasā caiva prekṣitena ca vānara
GE09ram_1-7u:10151: 4.012.031c vikrameṇa ca vākyaiś ca vyaktiṃ vāṃ nopalakṣaye
GE09ram_1-7u:10154: 4.012.033a etanmuhūrte tu mayā paśya vālinam āhave
GE09ram_1-7u:10156: 4.012.034a abhijñānaṃ kuruṣva tvam ātmano vānareśvara 4.012.034c yena tvām abhijānīyāṃ dvandvayuddham upāgatam 4.012.035a gajapuṣpīm imāṃ phullām utpāṭya śubhalakṣaṇām 4.012.035c kuru lakṣmaṇa kaṇṭhe 'sya sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ 4.012.036a tato giritaṭe jātām utpāṭya kusumāyutām 4.012.036c lakṣmaṇo gajapuṣpīṃ tāṃ tasya kaṇṭhe vyasarjayat
GE09ram_1-7u:10157: 4.012.037a sa tathā śuśubhe śrīmāṃl latayā kaṇṭhasaktayā
GE09ram_1-7u:10158: 4.012.037c mālayeva balākānāṃ sasaṃdhya iva toyadaḥ 4.012.038a vibhrājamāno vapuṣā rāmavākyasamāhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10159: 4.012.038c jagāma saha rāmeṇa kiṣkindhāṃ vālipālitām 4.013.001a ṛśyamūkāt sa dharmātmā kiṣkindhāṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ 4.013.001c jagāma sahasugrīvo vālivikramapālitām
GE09ram_1-7u:10160: 4.013.002a samudyamya mahac cāpaṃ rāmaḥ kāñcanabhūṣitam 4.013.002c śarāṃś cāditya saṃkāśān gṛhītvā raṇasādhakān 4.013.003a agratas tu yayau tasya rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10161: 4.013.003c sugrīvaḥ saṃhatagrīvo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābalaḥ 4.013.004a pṛṣṭhato hanumān vīro nalo nīlaś ca vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10162: 4.013.004c tāraś caiva mahātejā hariyūthapa yūthapāḥ 4.013.005a te vīkṣamāṇā vṛkṣāṃś ca puṣpabhārāvalambinaḥ 4.013.005c prasannāmbuvahāś caiva saritaḥ sāgaraṃ gamāḥ 4.013.006a kandarāṇi ca śailāṃś ca nirjharāṇi guhās tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:10163: 4.013.006c śikharāṇi ca mukhyāni darīś ca priyadarśanāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10165: 4.013.007c śobhitān sajalān mārge taṭākāṃś ca vyalokayan
GE09ram_1-7u:10166: 4.013.008a kāraṇḍaiḥ sārasair haṃsair vañjūlair jalakukkuṭaiḥ 4.013.008c cakravākais tathā cānyaiḥ śakunaiḥ pratināditān 4.013.009a mṛduśaṣpāṅkurāhārān nirbhayān vanagocarān
GE09ram_1-7u:10169: 4.013.010c ghorān ekacarān vanyān dviradān kūlaghātinaḥ 4.013.011a vane vanacarāṃś cānyān khecarāṃś ca vihaṃgamān
GE09ram_1-7u:10171: 4.013.012a teṣāṃ tu gacchatāṃ tatra tvaritaṃ raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10172: 4.013.012c drumaṣaṇḍaṃ vanaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaḥ sugrīvam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:10173: 4.013.013a eṣa megha ivākāśe vṛkṣaṣaṇḍaḥ prakāśate 4.013.013c meghasaṃghātavipulaḥ paryantakadalīvṛtaḥ 4.013.014a kim etaj jñātum icchāmi sakhe kautūhalaṃ mama
GE09ram_1-7u:10174: 4.013.014c kautūhalāpanayanaṃ kartum icchāmy ahaṃ tvayā 4.013.015a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ 4.013.015c gacchann evācacakṣe 'tha sugrīvas tan mahad vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:10175: 4.013.016a etad rāghava vistīrṇam āśramaṃ śramanāśanam 4.013.016c udyānavanasaṃpannaṃ svādumūlaphalodakam 4.013.017a atra saptajanā nāma munayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ 4.013.017c saptaivāsann adhaḥśīrṣā niyataṃ jalaśāyinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10177: 4.013.018c divaṃ varṣaśatair yātāḥ saptabhiḥ sakalevarāḥ 4.013.019a teṣām evaṃ prabhāvena
GE09ram_1-7u:10178: 4.013.019c āśramaṃ sudurādharṣam api sendraiḥ surāsuraiḥ 4.013.020a pakṣiṇo varjayanty etat tathānye vanacāriṇaḥ 4.013.020c viśanti mohād ye 'py atra nivartante na te punaḥ 4.013.021a vibhūṣaṇaravāś cātra śrūyante sakalākṣarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10179: 4.013.021c tūryagītasvanāś cāpi gandho divyaś ca rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:10180: 4.013.022a tretāgnayo 'pi dīpyante dhūmo hy eṣa pradṛśyate 4.013.022c veṣṭayann iva vṛkṣāgrān kapotāṅgāruṇo ghanaḥ 4.013.023a kuru praṇāmaṃ dharmātmaṃs tān samuddiśya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10181: 4.013.023c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā prayataḥ saṃyatāñjaliḥ 4.013.024a praṇamanti hi ye teṣām ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām
GE09ram_1-7u:10182: 4.013.024c na teṣām aśubhaṃ kiṃ cic charīre rāma dṛśyate 4.013.025a tato rāmaḥ saha bhrātrā lakṣmaṇena kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10183: 4.013.025c samuddiśya mahātmānas tān ṛṣīn abhyavādayat 4.013.026a abhivādya ca dharmātmā rāmo bhrātā ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10184: 4.013.026c sugrīvo vānarāś caiva jagmuḥ saṃhṛṣṭamānasāḥ 4.013.027a te gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ tasmāt saptajanāśramāt
GE09ram_1-7u:10185: 4.013.027c dadṛśus tāṃ durādharṣāṃ kiṣkindhāṃ vālipālitām 4.014.001a sarve te tvaritaṃ gatvā kiṣkindhāṃ vālipālitām
GE09ram_1-7u:10186: 4.014.001c vṛkṣair ātmānam āvṛtya vyatiṣṭhan gahane vane
GE09ram_1-7u:10187: 4.014.002a vicārya sarvato dṛṣṭiṃ kānane kānanapriyaḥ 4.014.002c sugrīvo vipulagrīvaḥ krodham āhārayad bhṛśam 4.014.003a tataḥ sa ninadaṃ ghoraṃ kṛtvā yuddhāya cāhvayat
GE09ram_1-7u:10188: 4.014.003c parivāraiḥ parivṛto nādair bhindann ivāmbaram 4.014.004a atha bālārkasadṛśo dṛptasiṃhagatis tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:10189: 4.014.004c dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ kriyādakṣaṃ sugrīvo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:10191: 4.014.005c prāptāḥ sma dhvajayantrāḍhyāṃ kiṣkindhāṃ vālinaḥ purīm
GE09ram_1-7u:10192: 4.014.006a pratijñā yā tvayā vīra kṛtā vālivadhe purā
GE09ram_1-7u:10193: 4.014.006c saphalāṃ tāṃ kuru kṣipraṃ latāṃ kāla ivāgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10194: 4.014.007a evam uktas tu dharmātmā sugrīveṇa sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10195: 4.014.007c tam athovāca sugrīvaṃ vacanaṃ śatrusūdanaḥ 4.014.008a kṛtābhijñāna cihnas tvam anayā gajasāhvayā 4.014.008c viparīta ivākāśe sūryo nakṣatra mālayā 4.014.009a adya vālisamutthaṃ te bhayaṃ vairaṃ ca vānara
GE09ram_1-7u:10198: 4.014.010c vālī vinihato yāvad vane pāṃsuṣu veṣṭate
GE09ram_1-7u:10199: 4.014.011a yadi dṛṣṭipathaṃ prāpto jīvan sa vinivartate
GE09ram_1-7u:10200: 4.014.011c tato doṣeṇa mā gacchet sadyo garhec ca mā bhavān
GE09ram_1-7u:10201: 4.014.012a pratyakṣaṃ sapta te sālā mayā bāṇena dāritāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10202: 4.014.012c tato vetsi balenādya bālinaṃ nihataṃ mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:10203: 4.014.013a anṛtaṃ noktapūrvaṃ me vīra kṛcchre 'pi tiṣṭhatā
GE09ram_1-7u:10204: 4.014.013c dharmalobhaparītena na ca vakṣye kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_1-7u:10205: 4.014.014a saphalāṃ ca kariṣyāmi pratijñāṃ jahi saṃbhramam
GE09ram_1-7u:10206: 4.014.014c prasūtaṃ kalamaṃ kṣetre varṣeṇeva śatakratuḥ 4.014.015a tadāhvānanimittaṃ tvaṃ vālino hemamālinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10207: 4.014.015c sugrīva kuru taṃ śabdaṃ niṣpated yena vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10208: 4.014.016a jitakāśī jayaślāghī tvayā cādharṣitaḥ purāt 4.014.016c niṣpatiṣyaty asaṃgena vālī sa priyasaṃyugaḥ 4.014.017a ripūṇāṃ dharṣaṇaṃ śūrā marṣayanti na saṃyuge
GE09ram_1-7u:10209: 4.014.017c jānantas tu svakaṃ vīryaṃ strīsamakṣaṃ viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10210: 4.014.018a sa tu rāmavacaḥ śrutvā sugrīvo hemapiṅgalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10212: 4.014.019a tasya śabdena vitrastā gāvo yānti hataprabhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10214: 4.014.020a dravanti ca mṛgāḥ śīghraṃ bhagnā iva raṇe hayāḥ 4.014.020c patanti ca khagā bhūmau kṣīṇapuṇyā iva grahāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10215: 4.014.021a tataḥ sa jīmūtagaṇapraṇādo; nādaṃ vyamuñcat tvarayā pratītaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10216: 4.014.021c sūryātmajaḥ śauryavivṛddhatejāḥ; saritpatir vānilacañcalormiḥ 4.015.001a atha tasya ninādaṃ taṃ sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10218: 4.015.002a śrutvā tu tasya ninadaṃ sarvabhūtaprakampanam 4.015.002c madaś caikapade naṣṭaḥ krodhaś cāpatito mahān
GE09ram_1-7u:10219: 4.015.003a sa tu roṣaparītāṅgo vālī saṃdhyātapaprabhaḥ 4.015.003c uparakta ivādityaḥ sadyo niṣprabhatāṃ gataḥ 4.015.004a vālī daṃṣṭrā karālas tu krodhād dīptāgnisaṃnibhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10220: 4.015.004c bhāty utpatitapadmābhaḥ samṛṇāla iva hradaḥ 4.015.005a śabdaṃ durmarṣaṇaṃ śrutvā niṣpapāta tato hariḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10221: 4.015.005c vegena caraṇanyāsair dārayann iva medinīm 4.015.006a taṃ tu tārā pariṣvajya snehād darśitasauhṛdā
GE09ram_1-7u:10222: 4.015.006c uvāca trastasaṃbhrāntā hitodarkam idaṃ vacaḥ 4.015.007a sādhu krodham imaṃ vīra nadī vegam ivāgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:10223: 4.015.007c śayanād utthitaḥ kālyaṃ tyaja bhuktām iva srajam
GE09ram_1-7u:10224: 4.015.008a sahasā tava niṣkrāmo mama tāvan na rocate
GE09ram_1-7u:10226: 4.015.009a pūrvam āpatitaḥ krodhāt sa tvām āhvayate yudhi
GE09ram_1-7u:10227: 4.015.009c niṣpatya ca nirastas te hanyamāno diśo gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10228: 4.015.010a tvayā tasya nirastasya pīḍitasya viśeṣataḥ 4.015.010c ihaitya punar āhvānaṃ śaṅkāṃ janayatīva me
GE09ram_1-7u:10229: 4.015.011a darpaś ca vyavasāyaś ca yādṛśas tasya nardataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10230: 4.015.011c ninādasya ca saṃrambho naitad alpaṃ hi kāraṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:10231: 4.015.012a nāsahāyam ahaṃ manye sugrīvaṃ tam ihāgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:10232: 4.015.012c avaṣṭabdhasahāyaś ca yam āśrityaiṣa garjati 4.015.013a prakṛtyā nipuṇaś caiva buddhimāṃś caiva vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10234: 4.015.014a pūrvam eva mayā vīra śrutaṃ kathayato vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10235: 4.015.014c aṅgadasya kumārasya vakṣyāmi tvā hitaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10236: 4.015.015a tava bhrātur hi vikhyātaḥ sahāyo raṇakarkaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10238: 4.015.016a nivāsavṛkṣaḥ sādhūnām āpannānāṃ parā gatiḥ 4.015.016c ārtānāṃ saṃśrayaś caiva yaśasaś caikabhājanam 4.015.017a jñānavijñānasaṃpanno nideśo nirataḥ pituḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10239: 4.015.017c dhātūnām iva śailendro guṇānām ākaro mahān
GE09ram_1-7u:10240: 4.015.018a tatkṣamaṃ na virodhas te saha tena mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:10242: 4.015.019a śūra vakṣyāmi te kiṃ cin na cecchāmy abhyasūyitum 4.015.019c śrūyatāṃ kriyatāṃ caiva tava vakṣyāmi yad dhitam
GE09ram_1-7u:10243: 4.015.020a yauvarājyena sugrīvaṃ tūrṇaṃ sādhv abhiṣecaya 4.015.020c vigrahaṃ mā kṛthā vīra bhrātrā rājan balīyasā
GE09ram_1-7u:10244: 4.015.021a ahaṃ hi te kṣamaṃ manye tava rāmeṇa sauhṛdam 4.015.021c sugrīveṇa ca saṃprītiṃ vairam utsṛjya dūrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10245: 4.015.022a lālanīyo hi te bhrātā yavīyān eṣa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10246: 4.015.022c tatra vā sann ihastho vā sarvathā bandhur eva te
GE09ram_1-7u:10247: 4.015.023a yadi te matpriyaṃ kāryaṃ yadi cāvaiṣi māṃ hitām 4.015.023c yācyamānaḥ prayatnena sādhu vākyaṃ kuruṣva me
GE09ram_1-7u:10248: 4.016.001a tām evaṃ bruvatīṃ tārāṃ tārādhipanibhānanām 4.016.001c vālī nirbhartsayām āsa vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:10249: 4.016.002a garjato 'sya ca saṃrambhaṃ bhrātuḥ śatror viśeṣataḥ 4.016.002c marṣayiṣyāmy ahaṃ kena kāraṇena varānane 4.016.003a adharṣitānāṃ śūrāṇāṃ samareṣv anivartinām
GE09ram_1-7u:10251: 4.016.004a soḍhuṃ na ca samartho 'haṃ yuddhakāmasya saṃyuge 4.016.004c sugrīvasya ca saṃrambhaṃ hīnagrīvasya garjataḥ 4.016.005a na ca kāryo viṣādas te rāghavaṃ prati matkṛte 4.016.005c dharmajñaś ca kṛtajñaś ca kathaṃ pāpaṃ kariṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:10253: 4.016.006c sauhṛdaṃ darśitaṃ tāre mayi bhaktiḥ kṛtā tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:10254: 4.016.007a pratiyotsyāmy ahaṃ gatvā sugrīvaṃ jahi saṃbhramam
GE09ram_1-7u:10255: 4.016.007c darpaṃ cāsya vineṣyāmi na ca prāṇair vimokṣyate
GE09ram_1-7u:10256: 4.016.008a śāpitāsi mama prāṇair nivartasva jayena ca
GE09ram_1-7u:10257: 4.016.008c ahaṃ jitvā nivartiṣye tam alaṃ bhrātaraṃ raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:10258: 4.016.009a taṃ tu tārā pariṣvajya vālinaṃ priyavādinī
GE09ram_1-7u:10259: 4.016.009c cakāra rudatī mandaṃ dakṣiṇā sā pradakṣiṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:10260: 4.016.010a tataḥ svastyayanaṃ kṛtvā mantravad vijayaiṣiṇī 4.016.010c antaḥpuraṃ saha strībhiḥ praviṣṭā śokamohitā 4.016.011a praviṣṭāyāṃ tu tārāyāṃ saha strībhiḥ svam ālayam
GE09ram_1-7u:10261: 4.016.011c nagarān niryayau kruddho mahāsarpa iva śvasan
GE09ram_1-7u:10262: 4.016.012a sa niḥśvasya mahāvego vālī paramaroṣaṇaḥ 4.016.012c sarvataś cārayan dṛṣṭiṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:10263: 4.016.013a sa dadarśa tataḥ śrīmān sugrīvaṃ hemapiṅgalam
GE09ram_1-7u:10265: 4.016.014a sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā mahāvīryaṃ sugrīvaṃ paryavasthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:10266: 4.016.014c gāḍhaṃ paridadhe vāso vālī paramaroṣaṇaḥ 4.016.015a sa vālī gāḍhasaṃvīto muṣṭim udyamya vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:10267: 4.016.015c sugrīvam evābhimukho yayau yoddhuṃ kṛtakṣaṇaḥ 4.016.016a śliṣṭamuṣṭiṃ samudyamya saṃrabdhataram āgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10269: 4.016.017a taṃ vālī krodhatāmrākṣaḥ sugrīvaṃ raṇapaṇḍitam 4.016.017c āpatantaṃ mahāvegam idaṃ vacanam abravīt 4.016.018a eṣa muṣṭir mayā baddho gāḍhaḥ sunihitāṅguliḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10270: 4.016.018c mayā vegavimuktas te prāṇān ādāya yāsyati
GE09ram_1-7u:10271: 4.016.019a evam uktas tu sugrīvaḥ kruddho vālinam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:10272: 4.016.019c tavaiva ca haran prāṇān muṣṭiḥ patatu mūrdhani
GE09ram_1-7u:10273: 4.016.020a tāḍitas tena saṃkruddhaḥ samabhikramya vegataḥ 4.016.020c abhavac choṇitodgārī sotpīḍa iva parvataḥ 4.016.021a sugrīveṇa tu niḥsaṃgaṃ sālam utpāṭya tejasā
GE09ram_1-7u:10274: 4.016.021c gātreṣv abhihato vālī vajreṇeva mahāgiriḥ 4.016.022a sa tu vālī pracaritaḥ sālatāḍanavihvalaḥ 4.016.022c gurubhārasamākrāntā sāgare naur ivābhavat
GE09ram_1-7u:10277: 4.016.024a vālinā bhagnadarpas tu sugrīvo mandavikramaḥ 4.016.024c vālinaṃ prati sāmarṣo darśayām āsa lāghavam
GE09ram_1-7u:10278: 4.016.025a tato dhanuṣi saṃdhāya śaram āśīviṣopamam 4.016.025c rāghaveṇa mahābāṇo vālivakṣasi
GE09ram_1-7u:10280: 4.016.027a athokṣitaḥ śoṇitatoyavisravaiḥ ; supuṣpitāśoka ivāniloddhataḥ 4.016.027c vicetano vāsavasūnur āhave; prabhraṃśitendradhvajavat kṣitiṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10282: 4.017.001c papāta sahasā vālī nikṛtta iva pādapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10284: 4.017.002c apatad devarājasya muktaraśmir iva dhvajaḥ 4.017.003a tasmin nipatite bhūmau haryṛṣāṇāṃ gaṇeśvare 4.017.003c naṣṭacandram iva vyoma na vyarājata bhūtalam
GE09ram_1-7u:10285: 4.017.004a bhūmau nipatitasyāpi tasya dehaṃ mahātmanaḥ 4.017.004c na śrīr jahāti na prāṇā na tejo na parākramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10286: 4.017.005a śakradattā varā mālā kāñcanī ratnabhūṣitā 4.017.005c dadhāra harimukhyasya prāṇāṃs tejaḥ śriyaṃ ca sā
GE09ram_1-7u:10287: 4.017.006a sa tayā mālayā vīro haimayā hariyūthapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10289: 4.017.007a tasya mālā ca dehaś ca marmaghātī ca yaḥ śaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10290: 4.017.007c tridheva racitā lakṣmīḥ patitasyāpi śobhate 4.017.008a tad astraṃ tasya vīrasya svargamārgaprabhāvanam 4.017.008c rāmabāṇāsanakṣiptam āvahat paramāṃ gatim
GE09ram_1-7u:10291: 4.017.009a taṃ tathā patitaṃ saṃkhye gatārciṣam ivānalam
GE09ram_1-7u:10292: 4.017.009c yayātim iva puṇyānte devalokāt paricyutam 4.017.010a ādityam iva kālena yugānte bhuvi pātitam
GE09ram_1-7u:10293: 4.017.010c mahendram iva durdharṣaṃ mahendram iva duḥsaham
GE09ram_1-7u:10297: 4.017.012a sa dṛṣṭvā rāghavaṃ vālī lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_1-7u:10298: 4.017.012c abravīt praśritaṃ vākyaṃ paruṣaṃ dharmasaṃhitam 4.017.013a parāṅmukhavadhaṃ kṛtvā ko nu prāptas tvayā guṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10299: 4.017.013c yad ahaṃ yuddhasaṃrabdhas tvatkṛte nidhanaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10301: 4.017.014c rāmaḥ karuṇavedī ca prajānāṃ ca hite rataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10303: 4.017.015c iti te sarvabhūtāni kathayanti yaśo bhuvi
GE09ram_1-7u:10304: 4.017.016a tān guṇān saṃpradhāryāham agryaṃ cābhijanaṃ tava
GE09ram_1-7u:10305: 4.017.016c tārayā pratiṣiddhaḥ san sugrīveṇa samāgataḥ 4.017.017a na mām anyena saṃrabdhaṃ pramattaṃ veddhum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:10306: 4.017.017c iti me buddhir utpannā babhūvādarśane tava
GE09ram_1-7u:10307: 4.017.018a na tvāṃ vinihatātmānaṃ dharmadhvajam adhārmikam 4.017.018c jāne pāpasamācāraṃ tṛṇaiḥ kūpam ivāvṛtam 4.017.019a satāṃ veṣadharaṃ pāpaṃ pracchannam iva pāvakam
GE09ram_1-7u:10309: 4.017.020a viṣaye vā pure vā te yadā nāpakaromy aham 4.017.020c na ca tvāṃ pratijāne 'haṃ kasmāt tvaṃ haṃsy akilbiṣam
GE09ram_1-7u:10311: 4.017.021c mām ihāpratiyudhyantam anyena ca samāgatam 4.017.022a tvaṃ narādhipateḥ putraḥ pratītaḥ priyadarśanaḥ 4.017.022c liṅgam apy asti te rājan dṛśyate dharmasaṃhitam
GE09ram_1-7u:10312: 4.017.023a kaḥ kṣatriyakule jātaḥ śrutavān naṣṭasaṃśayaḥ 4.017.023c dharmaliṅga praticchannaḥ krūraṃ karma samācaret 4.017.024a rāma rājakule jāto dharmavān iti viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10314: 4.017.025a sāma dānaṃ kṣamā dharmaḥ satyaṃ dhṛtiparākramau
GE09ram_1-7u:10315: 4.017.025c pārthivānāṃ guṇā rājan daṇḍaś cāpy apakāriṣu
GE09ram_1-7u:10316: 4.017.026a vayaṃ vanacarā rāma mṛgā mūlaphalāśanāḥ 4.017.026c eṣā prakṛtir asmākaṃ puruṣas tvaṃ nareśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10317: 4.017.027a bhūmir hiraṇyaṃ rūpyaṃ ca nigrahe kāraṇāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:10318: 4.017.027c tatra kas te vane lobho madīyeṣu phaleṣu vā 4.017.028a nayaś ca vinayaś cobhau nigrahānugrahāv api
GE09ram_1-7u:10319: 4.017.028c rājavṛttir asaṃkīrṇā na nṛpāḥ kāmavṛttayaḥ 4.017.029a tvaṃ tu kāmapradhānaś ca kopanaś cānavasthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10321: 4.017.030a na te 'sty apacitir dharme nārthe buddhir avasthitā 4.017.030c indriyaiḥ kāmavṛttaḥ san kṛṣyase manujeśvara 4.017.031a hatvā bāṇena kākutstha mām ihānaparādhinam 4.017.031c kiṃ vakṣyasi satāṃ madhye karma kṛtvā jugupsitam
GE09ram_1-7u:10322: 4.017.032a rājahā brahmahā goghnaś coraḥ prāṇivadhe rataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10323: 4.017.032c nāstikaḥ parivettā ca sarve nirayagāminaḥ 4.017.033a adhāryaṃ carma me sadbhī romāṇy asthi ca varjitam 4.017.033c abhakṣyāṇi ca māṃsāni tvadvidhair dharmacāribhiḥ 4.017.034a pañca pañcanakhā bhakṣyā brahmakṣatreṇa rāghava 4.017.034c śalyakaḥ śvāvidho godhā śaśaḥ kūrmaś ca pañcamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10324: 4.017.035a carma cāsthi ca me rājan na spṛśanti manīṣiṇaḥ 4.017.035c abhakṣyāṇi ca māṃsāni so 'haṃ pañcanakho hataḥ 4.017.036a tvayā nāthena kākutstha na sanāthā vasuṃdharā
GE09ram_1-7u:10325: 4.017.036c pramadā śīlasaṃpannā dhūrtena patitā yathā 4.017.037a śaṭho naikṛtikaḥ kṣudro mithyā praśritamānasaḥ 4.017.037c kathaṃ daśarathena tvaṃ jātaḥ pāpo mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:10328: 4.017.039a dṛśyamānas tu yudhyethā mayā yudhi nṛpātmaja
GE09ram_1-7u:10329: 4.017.039c adya vaivasvataṃ devaṃ paśyes tvaṃ nihato mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:10331: 4.017.040c prasuptaḥ pannageneva naraḥ pānavaśaṃ gataḥ 4.017.041a sugrīvapriyakāmena yad ahaṃ nihatas tvayā 4.017.041c kaṇṭhe baddhvā pradadyāṃ te 'nihataṃ rāvaṇaṃ raṇe 4.017.042a nyastāṃ sāgaratoye vā pātāle vāpi maithilīm
GE09ram_1-7u:10332: 4.017.042c jānayeyaṃ tavādeśāc chvetām aśvatarīm iva 4.017.043a yuktaṃ yat prapnuyād rājyaṃ sugrīvaḥ svargate mayi
GE09ram_1-7u:10333: 4.017.043c ayuktaṃ yad adharmeṇa tvayāhaṃ nihato raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:10334: 4.017.044a kāmam evaṃvidhaṃ lokaḥ kālena viniyujyate 4.017.044c kṣamaṃ ced bhavatā prāptam uttaraṃ sādhu cintyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:10335: 4.017.045a ity evam uktvā pariśuṣkavaktraḥ; śarābhighātād vyathito mahātmā
GE09ram_1-7u:10336: 4.017.045c samīkṣya rāmaṃ ravisaṃnikāśaṃ; tūṣṇīṃ babhūvāmararājasūnuḥ 4.018.001a ity uktaḥ praśritaṃ vākyaṃ dharmārthasahitaṃ hitam
GE09ram_1-7u:10337: 4.018.001c paruṣaṃ vālinā rāmo nihatena vicetasā 4.018.002a taṃ niṣprabham ivādityaṃ muktatoyam ivāmbudam 4.018.002c uktavākyaṃ hariśreṣṭham upaśāntam ivānalam
GE09ram_1-7u:10339: 4.018.003c adhikṣiptas tadā rāmaḥ paścād vālinam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:10340: 4.018.004a dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca samayaṃ cāpi laukikam 4.018.004c avijñāya kathaṃ bālyān mām ihādya vigarhase
GE09ram_1-7u:10342: 4.018.005c saumya vānaracāpalyāt tvaṃ māṃ vaktum ihecchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:10345: 4.018.007a tāṃ pālayati dharmātmā bharataḥ satyavāg ṛjuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10347: 4.018.008a nayaś ca vinayaś cobhau yasmin satyaṃ ca susthitam 4.018.008c vikramaś ca yathā dṛṣṭaḥ sa rājā deśakālavit
GE09ram_1-7u:10348: 4.018.009a tasya dharmakṛtādeśā vayam anye ca pārthivaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10349: 4.018.009c carāmo vasudhāṃ kṛtsnāṃ dharmasaṃtānam icchavaḥ 4.018.010a tasmin nṛpatiśārdūla bharate dharmavatsale
GE09ram_1-7u:10350: 4.018.010c pālayaty akhilāṃ bhūmiṃ kaś cared dharmanigraham
GE09ram_1-7u:10351: 4.018.011a te vayaṃ mārgavibhraṣṭaṃ svadharme parame sthitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10353: 4.018.012a tvaṃ tu saṃkliṣṭadharmā ca karmaṇā ca vigarhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10354: 4.018.012c kāmatantrapradhānaś ca na sthito rājavartmani 4.018.013a jyeṣṭho bhrātā pitā caiva yaś ca vidyāṃ prayacchati 4.018.013c trayas te pitaro jñeyā dharme ca pathi vartinaḥ 4.018.014a yavīyān ātmanaḥ putraḥ śiṣyaś cāpi guṇoditaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10355: 4.018.014c putravat te trayaś cintyā dharmaś ced atra kāraṇam 4.018.015a sūkṣmaḥ paramadurjñeyaḥ satāṃ dharmaḥ plavaṃgama 4.018.015c hṛdisthaḥ sarvabhūtānām ātmā veda śubhāśubham 4.018.016a capalaś capalaiḥ sārdhaṃ vānarair akṛtātmabhiḥ 4.018.016c jātyandha iva jātyandhair mantrayan drakṣyase nu kim
GE09ram_1-7u:10356: 4.018.017a ahaṃ tu vyaktatām asya vacanasya bravīmi te
GE09ram_1-7u:10357: 4.018.017c na hi māṃ kevalaṃ roṣāt tvaṃ vigarhitum arhasi 4.018.018a tad etat kāraṇaṃ paśya yadarthaṃ tvaṃ mayā hataḥ 4.018.018c bhrātur vartasi bhāryāyāṃ tyaktvā dharmaṃ sanātanam
GE09ram_1-7u:10358: 4.018.019a asya tvaṃ dharamāṇasya sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ 4.018.019c rumāyāṃ vartase kāmāt snuṣāyāṃ pāpakarmakṛt 4.018.020a tad vyatītasya te dharmāt kāmavṛttasya vānara
GE09ram_1-7u:10360: 4.018.021a na hi dharmaviruddhasya lokavṛttād apeyuṣaḥ 4.018.021c daṇḍād anyatra paśyāmi nigrahaṃ hariyūthapa 4.018.022a aurasīṃ bhaginīṃ vāpi bhāryāṃ vāpy anujasya yaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10361: 4.018.022c pracareta naraḥ kāmāt tasya daṇḍo vadhaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10362: 4.018.023a bharatas tu mahīpālo vayaṃ tv ādeśavartinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10363: 4.018.023c tvaṃ ca dharmād atikrāntaḥ kathaṃ śakyam upekṣitum
GE09ram_1-7u:10366: 4.018.025a vayaṃ tu bharatādeśaṃ vidhiṃ kṛtvā harīśvara
GE09ram_1-7u:10368: 4.018.026a sugrīveṇa ca me sakhyaṃ lakṣmaṇena yathā tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:10369: 4.018.026c dārarājyanimittaṃ ca niḥśreyasi rataḥ sa me
GE09ram_1-7u:10370: 4.018.027a pratijñā ca mayā dattā tadā vānarasaṃnidhau
GE09ram_1-7u:10371: 4.018.027c pratijñā ca kathaṃ śakyā madvidhenānavekṣitum 4.018.028a tad ebhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ sarvair mahadbhir dharmasaṃhitaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10372: 4.018.028c śāsanaṃ tava yad yuktaṃ tad bhavān anumanyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:10373: 4.018.029a sarvathā dharma ity eva draṣṭavyas tava nigrahaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10375: 4.018.030a rājabhir dhṛtadaṇḍās tu kṛtvā pāpāni mānavāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10376: 4.018.030c nirmalāḥ svargam āyānti santaḥ sukṛtino yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:10377: 4.018.031a āryeṇa mama māndhātrā vyasanaṃ ghoram īpsitam
GE09ram_1-7u:10378: 4.018.031c śramaṇena kṛte pāpe yathā pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:10379: 4.018.032a anyair api kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ pramattair vasudhādhipaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10380: 4.018.032c prāyaścittaṃ ca kurvanti tena tac chāmyate rajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10381: 4.018.033a tad alaṃ paritāpena dharmataḥ parikalpitaḥ 4.018.033c vadho vānaraśārdūla na vayaṃ svavaśe sthitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10382: 4.018.034a vāgurābhiś ca pāśaiś ca kūṭaiś ca vividhair narāḥ 4.018.034c praticchannāś ca dṛśyāś ca gṛhṇanti subahūn mṛgān
GE09ram_1-7u:10383: 4.018.034e pradhāvitān vā vitrastān visrabdhān ativiṣṭhitān 4.018.035a pramattān apramattān vā narā māṃsārthino bhṛśam
GE09ram_1-7u:10384: 4.018.035c vidhyanti vimukhāṃś cāpi na ca doṣo 'tra vidyate
GE09ram_1-7u:10385: 4.018.036a yānti rājarṣayaś cātra mṛgayāṃ dharmakovidāḥ 4.018.036c tasmāt tvaṃ nihato yuddhe mayā bāṇena vānara
GE09ram_1-7u:10386: 4.018.036e ayudhyan pratiyudhyan vā yasmāc chākhāmṛgo hy asi
GE09ram_1-7u:10387: 4.018.037a durlabhasya ca dharmasya jīvitasya śubhasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:10388: 4.018.037c rājāno vānaraśreṣṭha pradātāro na saṃśayaḥ 4.018.038a tān na hiṃsyān na cākrośen nākṣipen nāpriyaṃ vadet 4.018.038c devā mānuṣarūpeṇa caranty ete mahītale 4.018.039a tvaṃ tu dharmam avijñāya kevalaṃ roṣam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10389: 4.018.039c pradūṣayasi māṃ dharme pitṛpaitāmahe sthitam 4.018.040a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa vālī pravyathito bhṛśam
GE09ram_1-7u:10390: 4.018.040c pratyuvāca tato rāmaṃ prāñjalir vānareśvaraḥ 4.018.041a yat tvam āttha naraśreṣṭha tad evaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ 4.018.041c prativaktuṃ prakṛṣṭe hi nāpakṛṣṭas tu śaknuyāt
GE09ram_1-7u:10391: 4.018.042a yad ayuktaṃ mayā pūrvaṃ pramādād vākyam apriyam
GE09ram_1-7u:10392: 4.018.042c tatrāpi khalu me doṣaṃ kartuṃ nārhasi rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:10393: 4.018.043a tvaṃ hi dṛṣṭārthatattvajñaḥ prajānāṃ ca hite rataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10394: 4.018.043c kāryakāraṇasiddhau te prasannā buddhir avyayā 4.018.044a mām apy avagataṃ dharmād vyatikrāntapuraskṛtam 4.018.044c dharmasaṃhitayā vācā dharmajña paripālaya
GE09ram_1-7u:10395: 4.018.045a bāṣpasaṃruddhakaṇṭhas tu vālī sārtaravaḥ śanaiḥ 4.018.045c uvāca rāmaṃ saṃprekṣya paṅkalagna iva dvipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10396: 4.018.046a na tv ātmānam ahaṃ śoce na tārāṃ nāpi bāndhavān
GE09ram_1-7u:10397: 4.018.046c yathā putraṃ guṇaśreṣṭham aṅgadaṃ kanakāṅgadam 4.018.047a sa mamādarśanād dīno bālyāt prabhṛti lālitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10398: 4.018.047c taṭāka iva pītāmbur upaśoṣaṃ gamiṣyati 4.018.048a sugrīve cāṅgade caiva vidhatsva matim uttamām
GE09ram_1-7u:10399: 4.018.048c tvaṃ hi śāstā ca goptā ca kāryākāryavidhau sthitaḥ 4.018.049a yā te narapate vṛttir bharate lakṣmaṇe ca yā 4.018.049c sugrīve cāṅgade rājaṃs tāṃ cintayitum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:10400: 4.018.050a maddoṣakṛtadoṣāṃ tāṃ yathā tārāṃ tapasvinīm 4.018.050c sugrīvo nāvamanyeta tathāvasthātum
GE09ram_1-7u:10401: 4.018.051a tvayā hy anugṛhītena śakyaṃ rājyam upāsitum
GE09ram_1-7u:10403: 4.018.052a sa tam āśvāsayad rāmo vālinaṃ vyaktadarśanam
GE09ram_1-7u:10404: 4.018.053a na vayaṃ bhavatā cintyā nāpy ātmā harisattama
GE09ram_1-7u:10406: 4.018.054a daṇḍye yaḥ pātayed daṇḍaṃ daṇḍyo yaś cāpi daṇḍyate 4.018.054c kāryakāraṇasiddhārthāv ubhau tau nāvasīdataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10407: 4.018.055a tad bhavān daṇḍasaṃyogād asmād vigatakalmaṣaḥ 4.018.055c gataḥ svāṃ prakṛtiṃ dharmyāṃ dharmadṛṣṭtena vartmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:10408: 4.018.056a sa tasya vākyaṃ madhuraṃ mahātmanaḥ; samāhitaṃ dharmapathānuvartinaḥ 4.018.056c niśamya rāmasya raṇāvamardino; vacaḥ suyuktaṃ nijagāda vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10409: 4.018.057a śarābhitaptena vicetasā mayā; pradūṣitas tvaṃ yad ajānatā prabho 4.018.057c idaṃ mahendropamabhīmavikrama; prasāditas tvaṃ kṣama me mahīśvara 4.019.001a sa vānaramahārājaḥ śayānaḥ śaravikṣataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10411: 4.019.002a aśmabhiḥ paribhinnāṅgaḥ pādapair āhato bhṛśam 4.019.002c rāmabāṇena cākrānto jīvitānte mumoha saḥ 4.019.003a taṃ bhāryābāṇamokṣeṇa rāmadattena saṃyuge
GE09ram_1-7u:10412: 4.019.003c hataṃ plavagaśārdūlaṃ tārā śuśrāva vālinam 4.019.004a sā saputrāpriyaṃ śrutvā vadhaṃ bhartuḥ sudāruṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:10413: 4.019.004c niṣpapāta bhṛśaṃ trastā vividhād girigahvarāt 4.019.005a ye tv aṅgadaparīvārā vānarā hi mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10414: 4.019.005c te sakārmukam ālokya rāmaṃ trastāḥ pradudruvuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10415: 4.019.006a sā dadarśa tatas trastān harīn āpatato drutam
GE09ram_1-7u:10416: 4.019.006c yūthād iva paribhraṣṭān mṛgān nihatayūthapān 4.019.007a tān uvāca samāsādya duḥkhitān duḥkhitā satī
GE09ram_1-7u:10417: 4.019.007c rāma vitrāsitān sarvān anubaddhān iveṣubhiḥ 4.019.008a vānarā rājasiṃhasya yasya yūyaṃ puraḥsarāḥ 4.019.008c taṃ vihāya suvitrastāḥ kasmād dravata durgatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10418: 4.019.009a rājyahetoḥ sa ced bhrātā bhrātā raudreṇa pātitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10419: 4.019.009c rāmeṇa prasṛtair dūrān mārgaṇair dūra pātibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10420: 4.019.010a kapipatnyā vacaḥ śrutvā kapayaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ 4.019.010c prāptakālam aviśliṣṭam ūcur vacanam aṅganām 4.019.011a jīva putre nivartasya putraṃ rakṣasva cāndagam
GE09ram_1-7u:10421: 4.019.011c antako rāma rūpeṇa hatvā nayati vālinam
GE09ram_1-7u:10422: 4.019.012a kṣiptān vṛkṣān samāvidhya vipulāś ca śilās tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:10423: 4.019.012c vālī vajrasamair bāṇair vajreṇeva nipātitaḥ 4.019.013a abhidrutam idaṃ sarvaṃ vidrutaṃ prasṛtaṃ balam
GE09ram_1-7u:10425: 4.019.014a rakṣyatāṃ nagaraṃ śūrair aṅgadaś cābhiṣicyatām 4.019.014c padasthaṃ vālinaḥ putraṃ bhajiṣyanti plavaṃgamāḥ 4.019.015a atha vā ruciraṃ sthānam iha te rucirānane
GE09ram_1-7u:10426: 4.019.015c āviśanti hi durgāṇi kṣipram adyaiva vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10427: 4.019.016a abhāryāḥ saha bhāryāś ca santy atra vanacāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10428: 4.019.016c lubdhebhyo viprayuktebhyaḥ svebhyo nas tumulaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_1-7u:10429: 4.019.017a alpāntaragatānāṃ tu śrutvā vacanam aṅganā 4.019.017c ātmanaḥ pratirūpaṃ sā babhāṣe cāruhāsinī 4.019.018a putreṇa mama kiṃ kāryaṃ kiṃ rājyena kim ātmanā 4.019.018c kapisiṃhe mahābhāge tasmin bhartari naśyati 4.019.019a pādamūlaṃ gamiṣyāmi tasyaivāhaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10431: 4.019.020a evam uktvā pradudrāva rudatī śokakarśitā 4.019.020c śiraś coraś ca bāhubhyāṃ duḥkhena samabhighnatī
GE09ram_1-7u:10432: 4.019.021a āvrajantī dadarśātha patiṃ nipatitaṃ bhuvi 4.019.021c hantāraṃ dānavendrāṇāṃ samareṣv anivartinām
GE09ram_1-7u:10433: 4.019.022a kṣeptāraṃ parvatendrāṇāṃ vajrāṇām iva vāsavam 4.019.022c mahāvātasamāviṣṭaṃ mahāmeghaughaniḥsvanam 4.019.023a śakratulyaparākrāntaṃ vṛṣṭvevoparataṃ ghanam
GE09ram_1-7u:10434: 4.019.023c nardantaṃ nardatāṃ bhīmaṃ śūraṃ śūreṇa pātitam
GE09ram_1-7u:10437: 4.019.025a nāgahetoḥ suparṇena caityam unmathitaṃ yathā 4.019.025c avaṣṭabhyāvatiṣṭhantaṃ dadarśa dhanur ūrjitam
GE09ram_1-7u:10438: 4.019.026a rāmaṃ rāmānujaṃ caiva bhartuś caivānujaṃ śubhā
GE09ram_1-7u:10439: 4.019.026c tān atītya samāsādya bhartāraṃ nihataṃ raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:10440: 4.019.027a samīkṣya vyathitā bhūmau saṃbhrāntā nipapāta ha
GE09ram_1-7u:10441: 4.019.027c supteva punar utthāya āryaputreti krośatī 4.019.028a ruroda sā patiṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃditaṃ mṛtyudāmabhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10442: 4.019.028c tām avekṣya tu sugrīvaḥ krośantīṃ kurarīm iva
GE09ram_1-7u:10443: 4.019.029a viṣādam agamat kaṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā cāṅgadam āgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:10445: 4.020.001c dṛṣṭvā vinihataṃ bhūmau tārā tārādhipānanā 4.020.002a sā samāsādya bhartāraṃ paryaṣvajata bhāminī 4.020.002c iṣuṇābhihataṃ dṛṣṭvā vālinaṃ kuñjaropamam
GE09ram_1-7u:10447: 4.020.003c tārā tarum ivonmūlaṃ paryadevayad āturā 4.020.004a raṇe dāruṇavikrānta pravīra plavatāṃ vara 4.020.004c kiṃ dīnām apurobhāgām adya tvaṃ nābhibhāṣase
GE09ram_1-7u:10449: 4.020.005c naivaṃvidhāḥ śerate hi bhūmau nṛpatisattamāḥ 4.020.006a atīva khalu te kāntā vasudhā vasudhādhipa
GE09ram_1-7u:10450: 4.020.006c gatāsur api yāṃ gātrair māṃ vihāya niṣevase
GE09ram_1-7u:10451: 4.020.007a vyaktam anyā tvayā vīra dharmataḥ saṃpravartatā
GE09ram_1-7u:10452: 4.020.007c kiṣkindheva purī ramyā svargamārge vinirmitā 4.020.008a yāny asmābhis tvayā sārdhaṃ vaneṣu madhugandhiṣu
GE09ram_1-7u:10453: 4.020.008c vihṛtāni tvayā kāle teṣām uparamaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10456: 4.020.010a hṛdayaṃ susthiraṃ mahyaṃ dṛṣṭvā vinihataṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_1-7u:10458: 4.020.011a sugrīvasya tvayā bhāryā hṛtā sa ca vivāsitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10459: 4.020.011c yat tat tasya tvayā vyuṣṭiḥ prāpteyaṃ plavagādhipa
GE09ram_1-7u:10460: 4.020.012a niḥśreyasaparā mohāt tvayā cāhaṃ vigarhitā 4.020.012c yaiṣābruvaṃ hitaṃ vākyaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:10461: 4.020.013a kālo niḥsaṃśayo nūnaṃ jīvitāntakaras tava 4.020.013c balād yenāvapanno 'si sugrīvasyāvaśo vaśam 4.020.014a vaidhavyaṃ śokasaṃtāpaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ kṛpaṇā satī 4.020.014c aduḥkhopacitā pūrvaṃ vartayiṣyāmy anāthavat
GE09ram_1-7u:10462: 4.020.015a lālitaś cāṅgado vīraḥ sukumāraḥ sukhocitaḥ 4.020.015c vatsyate kām avasthāṃ me pitṛvye krodhamūrchite
GE09ram_1-7u:10463: 4.020.016a kuruṣva pitaraṃ putra sudṛṣṭaṃ dharmavatsalam 4.020.016c durlabhaṃ darśanaṃ tv asya tava vatsa bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:10464: 4.020.017a samāśvāsaya putraṃ tvaṃ saṃdeśaṃ saṃdiśasva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:10465: 4.020.017c mūrdhni cainaṃ samāghrāya pravāsaṃ prasthito hy asi
GE09ram_1-7u:10466: 4.020.018a rāmeṇa hi mahat karma kṛtaṃ tvām abhinighnatā
GE09ram_1-7u:10467: 4.020.018c ānṛṇyaṃ tu gataṃ tasya sugrīvasya pratiśrave
GE09ram_1-7u:10468: 4.020.019a sakāmo bhava sugrīva rumāṃ tvaṃ pratipatsyase
GE09ram_1-7u:10469: 4.020.019c bhuṅkṣva rājyam anudvignaḥ śasto bhrātā ripus tava
GE09ram_1-7u:10470: 4.020.020a kiṃ mām evaṃ vilapatīṃ preṃṇā tvaṃ nābhibhāṣase
GE09ram_1-7u:10471: 4.020.020c imāḥ paśya varā bahvīr bhāryās te vānareśvara
GE09ram_1-7u:10472: 4.020.021a tasyā vilapitaṃ śrutvā vānaryaḥ sarvataś ca tāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10474: 4.020.022a kim aṅgadaṃ sāṅgada vīra bāho; vihāya yāsy adya cirapravāsaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:10475: 4.020.022c na yuktam evaṃ guṇasaṃnikṛṣṭaṃ; vihāya putraṃ priyaputra gantum
GE09ram_1-7u:10476: 4.020.023a kim apriyaṃ te priyacāruveṣa; kṛtaṃ mayā nātha sutena vā te
GE09ram_1-7u:10477: 4.020.023c sahāyinīm adya vihāya vīra; yamakṣayaṃ gacchasi durvinītam
GE09ram_1-7u:10478: 4.020.024a yady apriyaṃ kiṃ cid asaṃpradhārya; kṛtaṃ mayā syāt tava dīrghabāho 4.020.024c kṣamasva me tad dharivaṃśa nātha; vrajāmi mūrdhnā tava vīra pādau 4.020.025a tathā tu tārā karuṇaṃ rudantī; bhartuḥ samīpe saha vānarībhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10479: 4.020.025c vyavasyata prāyam anindyavarṇā; upopaveṣṭuṃ bhuvi yatra vālī
GE09ram_1-7u:10480: 4.021.001a tato nipatitāṃ tārāṃ cyutāṃ tārām ivāmbarāt
GE09ram_1-7u:10481: 4.021.001c śanair āśvāsayām āsa hanūmān hariyūthapaḥ 4.021.002a guṇadoṣakṛtaṃ jantuḥ svakarmaphalahetukam
GE09ram_1-7u:10482: 4.021.002c avyagras tad avāpnoti sarvaṃ pretya śubhāśubham
GE09ram_1-7u:10483: 4.021.003a śocyā śocasi kaṃ śocyaṃ dīnaṃ dīnānukampase
GE09ram_1-7u:10485: 4.021.004a aṅgadas tu kumāro 'yaṃ draṣṭavyo jīvaputrayā 4.021.004c āyatyā ca vidheyāni samarthāny asya cintaya
GE09ram_1-7u:10486: 4.021.005a jānāsy aniyatām evaṃ bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim
GE09ram_1-7u:10487: 4.021.005c tasmāc chubhaṃ hi kartavyaṃ paṇḍite naihalaukikam
GE09ram_1-7u:10488: 4.021.006a yasmin harisahasrāṇi prayutāny arbudāni ca 4.021.006c vartayanti kṛtāṃśāni so 'yaṃ diṣṭāntam āgataḥ 4.021.007a yad ayaṃ nyāyadṛṣṭārthaḥ sāmadānakṣamāparaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10489: 4.021.007c gato dharmajitāṃ bhūmiṃ nainaṃ śocitum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:10490: 4.021.008a sarve ca hariśārdūla putraś cāyaṃ tavāṅgadaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10492: 4.021.009a tāv imau śokasaṃtaptau śanaiḥ preraya bhāmini
GE09ram_1-7u:10494: 4.021.010a saṃtatiś ca yathādṛṣṭā kṛtyaṃ yac cāpi sāmpratam
GE09ram_1-7u:10495: 4.021.010c rājñas tat kriyatāṃ sarvam eṣa kālasya niścayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10496: 4.021.011a saṃskāryo harirājas tu aṅgadaś cābhiṣicyatām 4.021.011c siṃhāsanagataṃ putraṃ paśyantī śāntim eṣyasi 4.021.012a sā tasya vacanaṃ śrutvā bhartṛvyasanapīḍitā 4.021.012c abravīd uttaraṃ tārā hanūmantam avasthitam 4.021.013a aṅgada pratirūpāṇāṃ putrāṇām ekataḥ śatam 4.021.013c hatasyāpy asya vīrasya gātrasaṃśleṣaṇaṃ varam 4.021.014a na cāhaṃ harirājasya prabhavāmy aṅgadasya vā
GE09ram_1-7u:10498: 4.021.015a na hy eṣā buddhir āstheyā hanūmann aṅgadaṃ prati 4.021.015c pitā hi bandhuḥ putrasya na mātā harisattama
GE09ram_1-7u:10499: 4.021.016a na hi mama harirājasaṃśrayāt; kṣamataram asti paratra ceha vā 4.021.016c abhimukhahatavīrasevitaṃ; śayanam idaṃ mama sevituṃ kṣamam 4.022.001a vīkṣamāṇas tu mandāsuḥ sarvato mandam ucchvasan
GE09ram_1-7u:10500: 4.022.001c ādāv eva tu sugrīvaṃ dadarśa tv ātmajāgrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10501: 4.022.002a taṃ prāptavijayaṃ vālī sugrīvaṃ plavageśvaram 4.022.002c ābhāṣya vyaktayā vācā sasneham idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:10502: 4.022.003a sugrīvadoṣeṇa na māṃ gantum arhasi kilbiṣāt
GE09ram_1-7u:10503: 4.022.003c kṛṣyamāṇaṃ bhaviṣyeṇa buddhimohena māṃ balāt 4.022.004a yugapadvihitaṃ tāta na manye sukham āvayoḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10504: 4.022.004c sauhārdaṃ bhrātṛyuktaṃ hi tad idaṃ jātam anyathā
GE09ram_1-7u:10505: 4.022.005a pratipadya tvam adyaiva rājyam eṣāṃ vanaukasām
GE09ram_1-7u:10506: 4.022.005c mām apy adyaiva gacchantaṃ viddhi vaivasvatakṣayam
GE09ram_1-7u:10507: 4.022.006a jīvitaṃ ca hi rājyaṃ ca śriyaṃ ca vipulām imām
GE09ram_1-7u:10508: 4.022.006c prajahāmy eṣa vai tūrṇaṃ mahac cāgarhitaṃ yaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10509: 4.022.007a asyāṃ tv aham avasthāyāṃ vīra vakṣyāmi yad vacaḥ 4.022.007c yady apy asukaraṃ rājan kartum eva tad arhasi 4.022.008a sukhārhaṃ sukhasaṃvṛddhaṃ bālam enam abāliśam 4.022.008c bāṣpapūrṇamukhaṃ paśya bhūmau patitam aṅgadam 4.022.009a mama prāṇaiḥ priyataraṃ putraṃ putram ivaurasaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:10510: 4.022.009c mayā hīnam ahīnārthaṃ sarvataḥ paripālaya 4.022.010a tvam apy asya hi dātā ca paritrātā ca sarvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10511: 4.022.010c bhayeṣv abhayadaś caiva yathāhaṃ plavageśvara 4.022.011a eṣa tārātmajaḥ śrīmāṃs tvayā tulyaparākramaḥ 4.022.011c rakṣasāṃ tu vadhe teṣām agratas te bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:10512: 4.022.012a anurūpāṇi karmāṇi vikramya balavān raṇe 4.022.012c kariṣyaty eṣa tāreyas tarasvī taruṇo 'ṅgadaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10514: 4.022.013c autpātike ca vividhe sarvataḥ pariniṣṭhitā 4.022.014a yad eṣā sādhv iti brūyāt kāryaṃ tan muktasaṃśayam 4.022.014c na hi tārāmataṃ kiṃ cid anyathā parivartate
GE09ram_1-7u:10515: 4.022.015a rāghavasya ca te kāryaṃ kartavyam aviśaṅkayā
GE09ram_1-7u:10516: 4.022.015c syād adharmo hy akaraṇe tvāṃ ca hiṃsyād vimānitaḥ 4.022.016a imāṃ ca mālām ādhatsva divyāṃ sugrīvakāñcanīm
GE09ram_1-7u:10517: 4.022.016c udārā śrīḥ sthitā hy asyāṃ saṃprajahyān mṛte mayi 4.022.017a ity evam uktaḥ sugrīvo vālinā bhrātṛsauhṛdāt
GE09ram_1-7u:10518: 4.022.017c harṣaṃ tyaktvā punar dīno grahagrasta ivoḍurāṭ
GE09ram_1-7u:10519: 4.022.018a tad vālivacanāc chāntaḥ kurvan yuktam atandritaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10520: 4.022.018c jagrāha so 'bhyanujñāto mālāṃ tāṃ caiva kāñcanīm
GE09ram_1-7u:10521: 4.022.019a tāṃ mālāṃ kāñcanīṃ dattvā vālī dṛṣṭvātmajaṃ sthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:10522: 4.022.019c saṃsiddhaḥ pretya bhāvāya snehād aṅgadam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:10525: 4.022.021a yathā hi tvaṃ mahābāho lālitaḥ satataṃ mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:10526: 4.022.021c na tathā vartamānaṃ tvāṃ sugrīvo bahu maṃsyate
GE09ram_1-7u:10527: 4.022.022a māsyāmitrair gataṃ gaccher mā śatrubhir ariṃdama
GE09ram_1-7u:10528: 4.022.022c bhartur arthaparo dāntaḥ sugrīvavaśago bhava 4.022.023a na cātipraṇayaḥ kāryaḥ kartavyo 'praṇayaś ca te 4.022.023c ubhayaṃ hi mahādoṣaṃ tasmād antaradṛg bhava
GE09ram_1-7u:10529: 4.022.024a ity uktvātha vivṛttākṣaḥ śarasaṃpīḍito bhṛśam 4.022.024c vivṛtair daśanair bhīmair
GE09ram_1-7u:10530: 4.022.025a hate tu vīre plavagādhipe tadā; plavaṃgamās tatra na śarma lebhire 4.022.025c vanecarāḥ siṃhayute mahāvane; yathā hi gāvo nihate gavāṃ patau
GE09ram_1-7u:10531: 4.022.026a tatas tu tārā vyasanārṇava plutā; mṛtasyā bhartur vadanaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:10532: samīkṣya sā 4.022.026c jagāma bhūmiṃ parirabhya vālinaṃ; mahādrumaṃ chinnam ivāśritā
GE09ram_1-7u:10535: 4.023.001c patiṃ lokāc cyutaṃ tārā mṛtaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:10536: 4.023.002a śeṣe tvaṃ viṣame duḥkham akṛtvā vacanaṃ mama
GE09ram_1-7u:10538: 4.023.003a mattaḥ priyatarā nūnaṃ vānarendra mahī tava
GE09ram_1-7u:10539: 4.023.003c śeṣe hi tāṃ pariṣvajya māṃ ca na pratibhāṣase 4.023.004a sugrīva eva vikrānto vīra sāhasika priya
GE09ram_1-7u:10541: 4.023.005a eṣāṃ vilapitaṃ kṛcchram aṅgadasya ca śocataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10542: 4.023.005c mama cemāṃ giraṃ śrutvā kiṃ tvaṃ na pratibudhyase 4.023.006a idaṃ tac chūraśayanaṃ yatra śeṣe hato yudhi
GE09ram_1-7u:10543: 4.023.006c śāyitā nihatā yatra tvayaiva ripavaḥ purā
GE09ram_1-7u:10545: 4.023.007c mām anāthāṃ vihāyaikāṃ gatas tvam asi mānada
GE09ram_1-7u:10546: 4.023.008a śūrāya na pradātavyā kanyā khalu vipaścitā
GE09ram_1-7u:10547: 4.023.008c śūrabhāryāṃ hatāṃ paśya sadyo māṃ vidhavāṃ kṛtām
GE09ram_1-7u:10548: 4.023.009a avabhagnaś ca me māno bhagnā me śāśvatī gatiḥ 4.023.009c agādhe ca nimagnāsmi vipule śokasāgare 4.023.010a aśmasāramayaṃ nūnam idaṃ me hṛdayaṃ dṛḍham
GE09ram_1-7u:10549: 4.023.010c bhartāraṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā yan nādya śatadhā gatam
GE09ram_1-7u:10550: 4.023.011a suhṛc caiva hi bhartā ca prakṛtyā ca mama priyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10551: 4.023.011c āhave ca parākrāntaḥ śūraḥ pañcatvam āgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10552: 4.023.012a patihīnā tu yā nārī kāmaṃ bhavatu putriṇī
GE09ram_1-7u:10553: 4.023.012c dhanadhānyaiḥ supūrṇāpi vidhavety ucyate budhaiḥ 4.023.013a svagātraprabhave vīra śeṣe rudhiramaṇḍale
GE09ram_1-7u:10554: 4.023.013c kṛmirāgaparistome tvam evaṃ śayane yathā 4.023.014a reṇuśoṇitasaṃvītaṃ gātraṃ tava samantataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10555: 4.023.014c parirabdhuṃ na śaknomi bhujābhyāṃ plavagarṣabha 4.023.015a kṛtakṛtyo 'dya sugrīvo vaire 'sminn atidāruṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:10556: 4.023.015c yasya rāmavimuktena hṛtam ekeṣuṇā bhayam 4.023.016a śareṇa hṛdi lagnena gātrasaṃsparśane tava 4.023.016c vāryāmi tvāṃ nirīkṣantī tvayi pañcatvam āgate
GE09ram_1-7u:10557: 4.023.017a udbabarha śaraṃ nīlas tasya gātragataṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:10559: 4.023.018a tasya niṣkṛṣyamāṇasya bāṇasya ca babhau dyutiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10561: 4.023.019a petuḥ kṣatajadhārās tu vraṇebhyas tasya sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10566: 4.023.021c uvāca tārā piṅgākṣaṃ putram aṅgadam aṅganā
GE09ram_1-7u:10567: 4.023.022a avasthāṃ paścimāṃ paśya pituḥ putra sudāruṇām
GE09ram_1-7u:10570: 4.023.023c abhivādaya rājānaṃ pitaraṃ putra mānadam 4.023.024a evam uktaḥ samutthāya jagrāha caraṇau pituḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10571: 4.023.024c bhujābhyāṃ pīnavṛtābhyām aṅgado 'ham iti bruvan 4.023.025a abhivādayamānaṃ tvām aṅgadaṃ tvaṃ yathāpurā 4.023.025c dīrghāyur bhava putreti kimarthaṃ nābhibhāṣase 4.023.026a ahaṃ putrasahāyā tvām upāse gatacetanam 4.023.026c siṃhena nihataṃ sadyo gauḥ savatseva govṛṣam
GE09ram_1-7u:10573: 4.023.027c asminn avabhṛthe snātaḥ kathaṃ patnyā mayā vinā
GE09ram_1-7u:10574: 4.023.028a yā dattā devarājena tava tuṣṭena saṃyuge
GE09ram_1-7u:10575: 4.023.028c śātakumbhamayīṃ mālāṃ tāṃ te paśyāmi neha kim
GE09ram_1-7u:10576: 4.023.029a rājaśrīr na jahāti tvāṃ gatāsum api mānada
GE09ram_1-7u:10578: 4.023.030a na me vacaḥ pathyam idaṃ tvayā kṛtaṃ; na cāsmi śaktā hi nivāraṇe tava
GE09ram_1-7u:10579: 4.023.030c hatā saputrāsmi hatena saṃyuge; saha tvayā śrīr vijahāti mām iha
GE09ram_1-7u:10580: 4.024.001a gatāsuṃ vālinaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāghavas tadanantaram 4.024.001c abravīt praśritaṃ vākyaṃ sugrīvaṃ śatrutāpanaḥ 4.024.002a na śokaparitāpena śreyasā yujyate mṛtaḥ 4.024.002c yad atrānantaraṃ kāryaṃ tat samādhātum arhatha
GE09ram_1-7u:10581: 4.024.003a lokavṛttam anuṣṭheyaṃ kṛtaṃ vo bāṣpamokṣaṇam 4.024.003c na kālād uttaraṃ kiṃ cit karma śakyam upāsitum 4.024.004a niyataḥ kāraṇaṃ loke niyatiḥ karmasādhanam 4.024.004c niyatiḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ niyogeṣv iha kāraṇam 4.024.005a na kartā kasya cit kaś cin niyoge cāpi neśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10582: 4.024.005c svabhāve vartate lokas tasya kālaḥ parāyaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:10583: 4.024.006a na kālaḥ kālam atyeti na kālaḥ parihīyate
GE09ram_1-7u:10584: 4.024.006c svabhāvaṃ vā samāsādya na kaś cid ativartate
GE09ram_1-7u:10585: 4.024.007a na kālasyāsti bandhutvaṃ na hetur na parākramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10586: 4.024.007c na mitrajñātisaṃbandhaḥ kāraṇaṃ nātmano vaśaḥ 4.024.008a kiṃ tu kāla parīṇāmo draṣṭavyaḥ sādhu paśyatā
GE09ram_1-7u:10587: 4.024.008c dharmaś cārthaś ca kāmaś ca kālakramasamāhitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10588: 4.024.009a itaḥ svāṃ prakṛtiṃ vālī gataḥ prāptaḥ kriyāphalam
GE09ram_1-7u:10590: 4.024.010a svadharmasya ca saṃyogāj jitas tena mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:10591: 4.024.010c svargaḥ parigṛhītaś ca prāṇān aparirakṣatā 4.024.011a eṣā vai niyatiḥ śreṣṭhā yāṃ gato hariyūthapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10592: 4.024.011c tad alaṃ paritāpena prāptakālam upāsyatām 4.024.012a vacanānte tu rāmasya lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā 4.024.012c avadat praśritaṃ vākyaṃ sugrīvaṃ gatacetasaṃ 4.024.013a kuru tvam asya sugrīva pretakāryam anantaram
GE09ram_1-7u:10593: 4.024.013c tārāṅgadābhyāṃ sahito vālino dahanaṃ prati 4.024.014a samājñāpaya kāṣṭhāni śuṣkāṇi ca bahūni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:10595: 4.024.015a samāśvāsaya cainaṃ tvam aṅgadaṃ dīnacetasaṃ 4.024.015c mā bhūr bāliśabuddhis tvaṃ tvadadhīnam idaṃ puram
GE09ram_1-7u:10596: 4.024.016a aṅgadas tv ānayen mālyaṃ vastrāṇi vividhāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:10597: 4.024.016c ghṛtaṃ tailam atho gandhān yac cātra samanantaram
GE09ram_1-7u:10598: 4.024.017a tvaṃ tāra śibikāṃ śīghram ādāyāgaccha saṃbhramāt
GE09ram_1-7u:10599: 4.024.017c tvarā guṇavatī yuktā hy asmin kāle viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10601: 4.024.018c samarthā balinaś caiva nirhariṣyanti vālinam 4.024.019a evam uktvā tu sugrīvaṃ sumitrānandavardhanaḥ 4.024.019c tasthau bhrātṛsamīpastho lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā
GE09ram_1-7u:10602: 4.024.020a lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā tāraḥ saṃbhrāntamānasaḥ 4.024.020c praviveśa guhāṃ śīghraṃ śibikāsaktamānasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10603: 4.024.021a ādāya śibikāṃ tāraḥ sa tu paryāpayat punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10604: 4.024.021c vānarair uhyamānāṃ tāṃ śūrair udvahanocitaiḥ 4.024.022a tato vālinam udyamya sugrīvaḥ śibikāṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:10605: 4.024.022c āropayata vikrośann aṅgadena sahaiva tu 4.024.023a āropya śibikāṃ caiva vālinaṃ gatajīvitam 4.024.023c alaṃkāraiś ca vividhair mālyair vastraiś ca bhūṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:10606: 4.024.024a ājñāpayat tadā rājā sugrīvaḥ plavageśvaraḥ 4.024.024c aurdhvadehikam āryasya kriyatām anurūpataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10607: 4.024.025a viśrāṇayanto ratnāni vividhāni bahūni ca 4.024.025c agrataḥ plavagā yāntu śibikā tadanantaram 4.024.026a rājñām ṛddhiviśeṣā hi dṛśyante bhuvi yādṛśāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10608: 4.024.026c tādṛśaṃ vālinaḥ kṣipraṃ prākurvann aurdhvadehikam 4.024.027a aṅgadam aprigṛhyāśu tāraprabhṛtayas tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:10609: 4.024.027c krośantaḥ prayayuḥ sarve vānarā hatabāndhavāḥ 4.024.028a tārāprabhṛtayaḥ sarvā vānaryo hatayūthapāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10610: 4.024.028c anujagmur hi bhartāraṃ krośantyaḥ karuṇasvanāḥ 4.024.029a tāsāṃ ruditaśabdena vānarīṇāṃ vanāntare
GE09ram_1-7u:10611: 4.024.029c vanāni girayaḥ sarve vikrośantīva sarvataḥ 4.024.030a puline girinadyās tu vivikte jalasaṃvṛte 4.024.030c citāṃ cakruḥ subahavo vānarā vanacāriṇaḥ 4.024.031a avaropya tataḥ skandhāc chibikāṃ vahanocitāḥ 4.024.031c tasthur ekāntam āśritya sarve śokasamanvitāḥ 4.024.032a tatas tārā patiṃ dṛṣṭvā śibikātalaśāyinam 4.024.032c āropyāṅke śiras tasya vilalāpa suduḥkhitā 4.024.033a janaṃ ca paśyasīmaṃ tvaṃ kasmāc chokābhipīḍitam
GE09ram_1-7u:10612: 4.024.033c prahṛṣṭam iva te vaktraṃ gatāsor api mānada
GE09ram_1-7u:10613: 4.024.033e astārkasamavarṇaṃ ca lakṣyate jīvato yathā 4.024.034a eṣa tvāṃ rāmarūpeṇa kālaḥ karṣati vānara
GE09ram_1-7u:10614: 4.024.034c yena sma vidhavāḥ sarvāḥ kṛtā ekeṣuṇā raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:10615: 4.024.035a imās tās tava rājendravānaryo vallabhāḥ sadā
GE09ram_1-7u:10616: 4.024.035c pādair vikṛṣṭam adhvānam āgatāḥ kiṃ na budhyase
GE09ram_1-7u:10617: 4.024.036a taveṣṭā nanu nāmaitā bhāryāś candranibhānanāḥ 4.024.036c idānīṃ nekṣase kasmāt sugrīvaṃ plavageśvaram 4.024.037a ete hi sacivā rājaṃs tāraprabhṛtayas tava
GE09ram_1-7u:10620: 4.024.038c tataḥ krīḍāmahe sarvā vaneṣu madirotkaṭāḥ 4.024.039a evaṃ vilapatīṃ tārāṃ patiśokapariplutām
GE09ram_1-7u:10621: 4.024.039c utthāpayanti sma tadā vānaryaḥ śokakarśitāḥ 4.024.040a sugrīveṇa tataḥ sārdham aṅgadaḥ pitaraṃ rudan
GE09ram_1-7u:10623: 4.024.041a tato 'gniṃ vidhivad dattvā so 'pasavyaṃ cakāra ha 4.024.041c pitaraṃ dīrgham adhvānaṃ prasthitaṃ vyākulendriyaḥ 4.024.042a saṃskṛtya vālinaṃ te tu vidhipūrvaṃ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10624: 4.024.042c ājagmur udakaṃ kartuṃ nadīṃ śītajalāṃ śubhām
GE09ram_1-7u:10625: 4.024.043a tatas te sahitās tatra aṅgadaṃ sthāpya cāgrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10627: 4.024.044a sugrīveṇaiva dīnena dīno bhūtvā mahābalaḥ 4.024.044c samānaśokaḥ kākutsthaḥ pretakāryāṇy akārayat
GE09ram_1-7u:10630: 4.025.002c sthitāḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve pitāmaham ivarṣayaḥ 4.025.003a tataḥ kāñcanaśailābhas
GE09ram_1-7u:10631: 4.025.003c abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ hanumān mārutātmajaḥ 4.025.004a bhavatprasādāt sugrīvaḥ pitṛpaitāmahaṃ mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:10632: 4.025.004c vānarāṇāṃ suduṣprāpaṃ prāpto rājyam idaṃ prabho
GE09ram_1-7u:10633: 4.025.005a bhavatā samanujñātaḥ praviśya nagaraṃ śubham 4.025.005c saṃvidhāsyati kāryāṇi sarvāṇi sasuhṛjjanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10634: 4.025.006a snāto 'yaṃ vividhair gandhair auṣadhaiś ca yathāvidhi 4.025.006c arcayiṣyati ratnaiś ca mālyaiś ca tvāṃ viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10636: 4.025.007c kuruṣva svāmi saṃbandhaṃ vānarān saṃpraharṣayan 4.025.008a evam ukto hanumatā rāghavaḥ paravīrahā 4.025.008c pratyuvāca hanūmantaṃ buddhimān vākyakovidaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10637: 4.025.009a caturdaśasamāḥ saumya grāmaṃ vā yadi vā puram
GE09ram_1-7u:10638: 4.025.009c na pravekṣyāmi hanuman pitur nirdeśapālakaḥ 4.025.010a susamṛddhāṃ guhāṃ divyāṃ sugrīvo vānararṣabhaḥ 4.025.010c praviṣṭo vidhivad vīraḥ kṣipraṃ rājye 'bhiṣicyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:10639: 4.025.011a evam uktvā hanūmantaṃ rāmaḥ sugrīvam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:10642: 4.025.012c pravṛttāḥ saumya catvāro māsā vārṣikasaṃjñitāḥ 4.025.013a nāyam udyogasamayaḥ praviśa tvaṃ purīṃ śubhām
GE09ram_1-7u:10643: 4.025.013c asmin vatsyāmy ahaṃ saumya parvate sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10644: 4.025.014a iyaṃ giriguhā ramyā viśālā yuktamārutā 4.025.014c prabhūtasalilā saumya prabhūtakamalotpalā
GE09ram_1-7u:10645: 4.025.015a kārtike samanuprāpte tvaṃ rāvaṇavadhe yata 4.025.015c eṣa naḥ samayaḥ saumya praviśa tvaṃ svam ālayam 4.025.015e abhiṣiñcasva rājye ca suhṛdaḥ saṃpraharṣaya 4.025.016a iti rāmābhyanujñātaḥ sugrīvo vānararṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10646: 4.025.016c praviveśa purīṃ ramyāṃ kiṣkindhāṃ vālipālitām 4.025.017a taṃ vānarasahasrāṇi praviṣṭaṃ vānareśvaram
GE09ram_1-7u:10648: 4.025.018a tataḥ prakṛtayaḥ sarvā dṛṣṭvā harigaṇeśvaram 4.025.018c praṇamya mūrdhnā patitā vasudhāyāṃ samāhitāḥ 4.025.019a sugrīvaḥ prakṛtīḥ sarvāḥ saṃbhāṣyotthāpya vīryavān 4.025.019c bhrātur antaḥpuraṃ saumyaṃ praviveśa mahābalaḥ 4.025.020a praviśya tv abhiniṣkrāntaṃ sugrīvaṃ vānararṣabham 4.025.020c abhyaṣiñcanta suhṛdaḥ sahasrākṣam ivāmarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10649: 4.025.021a tasya pāṇḍuram ājahruś chatraṃ hemapariṣkṛtam 4.025.021c śukle ca bālavyajane hemadaṇḍe yaśaskare 4.025.022a tathā sarvāṇi ratnāni sarvabījauṣadhāni ca 4.025.022c sakṣīrāṇāṃ ca vṛkṣāṇāṃ prarohān kusumāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:10650: 4.025.023a śuklāni caiva vastrāṇi śvetaṃ caivānulepanam 4.025.023c sugandhīni ca mālyāni sthalajāny ambujāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:10651: 4.025.024a candanāni ca divyāni gandhāṃś ca vividhān bahūn
GE09ram_1-7u:10653: 4.025.025a dadhicarma ca vaiyāghraṃ vārāhī cāpy upānahau
GE09ram_1-7u:10655: 4.025.025e ājagmus tatra muditā varāḥ kanyās tu ṣoḍaśa
GE09ram_1-7u:10656: 4.025.026a tatas te vānaraśreṣṭhaṃ yathākālaṃ yathāvidhi 4.025.026c ratnair vastraiś ca bhakṣyaiś ca toṣayitvā dvijarṣabhān
GE09ram_1-7u:10658: 4.025.027c mantrapūtena haviṣā hutvā mantravido janāḥ 4.025.028a tato hemapratiṣṭhāne varāstaraṇasaṃvṛte
GE09ram_1-7u:10660: 4.025.029a prāṅmukhaṃ vividhiar mantraiḥ sthāpayitvā varāsane 4.025.029c nadīnadebhyaḥ saṃhṛtya tīrthebhyaś ca samantataḥ 4.025.030a āhṛtya ca samudrebhyaḥ sarvebhyo vānararṣabhāḥ 4.025.030c apaḥ kanakakumbheṣu nidhāya vimalāḥ śubhāḥ 4.025.031a śubhair vṛṣabhaśṛṅgaiś ca kalaśaiś cāpi kāñcanaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10662: 4.025.032a gajo gavākṣo gavayaḥ śarabho gandhamādanaḥ 4.025.032c maindaś ca dvividaś caiva hanūmāñ jāmbavān nalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10664: 4.025.033c salilena sahasrākṣaṃ vasavo vāsavaṃ yathā 4.025.034a abhiṣikte tu sugrīve sarve vānarapuṃgavāḥ 4.025.034c pracukruśur mahātmāno hṛṣṭās tatra sahasraśaḥ 4.025.035a rāmasya tu vacaḥ kurvan sugrīvo haripuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10666: 4.025.036a aṅgade cābhiṣikte tu sānukrośāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ 4.025.036c sādhu sādhv iti sugrīvaṃ mahātmāno 'bhyapūjayan
GE09ram_1-7u:10667: 4.025.037a hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākīrṇā patākādhvajaśobhitā 4.025.037c babhūva nagarī ramyā kṣikindhā girigahvare 4.025.038a nivedya rāmāya tadā mahātmane; mahābhiṣekaṃ kapivāhinīpatiḥ 4.025.038c rumāṃ ca bhāryāṃ pratilabhya vīryavān; avāpa rājyaṃ tridaśādhipo yathā 4.026.001a abhiṣikte tu sugrīve praviṣṭe vānare guhām
GE09ram_1-7u:10668: 4.026.001c ājagāma saha bhrātrā rāmaḥ prasravaṇaṃ girim
GE09ram_1-7u:10670: 4.026.002c nānāgulmalatāgūḍhaṃ bahupādapasaṃkulam 4.026.003a ṛkṣavānaragopucchair mārjāraiś ca niṣevitam
GE09ram_1-7u:10672: 4.026.004a tasya śailasya śikhare mahatīm āyatāṃ guhām
GE09ram_1-7u:10673: 4.026.004c pratyagṛhṇata vāsārthaṃ rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha 4.026.005a avasat tatra dharmātmā rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ 4.026.005c bahudṛśyadarīkuñje tasmin prasravaṇe girau
GE09ram_1-7u:10675: 4.026.006c vasatas tasya rāmasya ratir alpāpi nābhavat
GE09ram_1-7u:10676: 4.026.006e hṛtāṃ hi bhāryāṃ smarataḥ prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasīm
GE09ram_1-7u:10677: 4.026.007a udayābhyuditaṃ dṛṣṭvā śaśāṅkaṃ ca viśeṣataḥ 4.026.007c āviveśa na taṃ nidrā niśāsu śayanaṃ gatam
GE09ram_1-7u:10679: 4.026.008c taṃ śocamānaṃ kākutsthaṃ nityaṃ śokaparāyaṇam 4.026.008e tulyaduḥkho 'bravīd bhrātā lakṣmaṇo 'nunayan vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10680: 4.026.009a alaṃ vīra vyathāṃ gatvā na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi 4.026.009c śocato hy avasīdanti sarvārthā viditaṃ hi te
GE09ram_1-7u:10681: 4.026.010a bhavān kriyāparo loke bhavān devaparāyaṇaḥ 4.026.010c āstiko dharmaśīlaś ca vyavasāyī ca rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:10682: 4.026.011a na hy avyavasitaḥ śatruṃ rākṣasaṃ taṃ viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10683: 4.026.011c samarthas tvaṃ raṇe hantuṃ vikramair jihmakāriṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:10684: 4.026.012a samunmūlaya śokaṃ tvaṃ vyavasāyaṃ sthiraṃ kuru
GE09ram_1-7u:10685: 4.026.012c tataḥ saparivāraṃ taṃ nirmūlaṃ kuru rākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:10687: 4.026.013c parivartayituṃ śaktaḥ kim aṅga puna rāvaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:10688: 4.026.014a ahaṃ tu khalu te vīryaṃ prasuptaṃ pratibodhaye
GE09ram_1-7u:10689: 4.026.014c dīptair āhutibhiḥ kāle bhasmac channam ivānalam
GE09ram_1-7u:10690: 4.026.015a lakṣmaṇasya tu tad vākyaṃ pratipūjya hitaṃ śubham
GE09ram_1-7u:10691: 4.026.015c rāghavaḥ suhṛdaṃ snigdham idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:10692: 4.026.016a vācyaṃ yad anuraktena snigdhena ca hitena ca
GE09ram_1-7u:10693: 4.026.016c satyavikrama yuktena tad uktaṃ lakṣmaṇa tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:10695: 4.026.017c vikrameṣv apratihataṃ tejaḥ protsāhayāmy aham 4.026.018a śaratkālaṃ pratīkṣe 'ham iyaṃ prāvṛḍ upasthitā
GE09ram_1-7u:10696: 4.026.018c tataḥ sarāṣṭraṃ sagaṇaṃ rākṣasaṃ taṃ nihanmy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:10697: 4.026.019a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā hṛṣṭo rāmasya lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10698: 4.026.019c punar evābravīd vākyaṃ saumitrir mitranandanaḥ 4.026.020a etat te sadṛśaṃ vākyam uktaṃ śatrunibarhaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:10699: 4.026.020c idānīm asi kākutstha prakṛtiṃ svām upāgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10700: 4.026.021a vijñāya hy ātmano vīryaṃ tathyaṃ bhavitum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:10701: 4.026.021c etat sadṛśam uktaṃ te śrutasyābhijanasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:10704: 4.026.023a niyamya kopaṃ pratipālyatāṃ śarat; kṣamasva māsāṃś caturo mayā saha 4.026.023c vasācale 'smin mṛgarājasevite; saṃvardhayañ śatruvadhe samudyataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10705: 4.027.001a sa tadā vālinaṃ hatvā sugrīvam abhiṣicya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:10706: 4.027.001c vasan mālyavataḥ pṛṣṭe rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:10707: 4.027.002a ayaṃ sa kālaḥ saṃprāptaḥ samayo 'dya jalāgamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10708: 4.027.002c saṃpaśya tvaṃ nabho meghaiḥ saṃvṛtaṃ girisaṃnibhaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10709: 4.027.003a nava māsa dhṛtaṃ garbhaṃ bhāskārasya gabhastibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10710: 4.027.003c pītvā rasaṃ samudrāṇāṃ dyauḥ prasūte rasāyanam
GE09ram_1-7u:10717: 4.027.007c sīteva śokasaṃtaptā mahī bāṣpaṃ vimuñcati 4.027.008a meghodaravinirmuktāḥ kahlārasukhaśītalāḥ 4.027.008c śakyam añjalibhiḥ pātuṃ vātāḥ ketakigandhinaḥ 4.027.009a eṣa phullārjunaḥ śailaḥ ketakair adhivāsitaḥ 4.027.009c sugrīva iva śāntārir dhārābhir abhiṣicyate 4.027.010a meghakṛṣṇājinadharā dhārāyajñopavītinaḥ 4.027.010c mārutāpūritaguhāḥ prādhītā iva parvatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10718: 4.027.011a kaśābhir iva haimībhir vidyudbhir iva tāḍitam
GE09ram_1-7u:10720: 4.027.012a nīlameghāśritā vidyut sphurantī pratibhāti me 4.027.012c sphurantī rāvaṇasyāṅke vaidehīva tapasvinī
GE09ram_1-7u:10721: 4.027.013a imās tā manmathavatāṃ hitāḥ pratihatā diśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10724: 4.027.014c kuṭajān paśya saumitre puṣṭitān girisānuṣu 4.027.014e mama śokābhibhūtasya kāmasaṃdīpanān
GE09ram_1-7u:10725: 4.027.015a rajaḥ praśāntaṃ sahimo 'dya vāyur; nidāghadoṣaprasarāḥ praśāntāḥ 4.027.015c sthitā hi yātrā vasudhādhipānāṃ; pravāsino yānti narāḥ svadeśān
GE09ram_1-7u:10728: 4.027.017a kva cit prakāśaṃ kva cid aprakāśaṃ; nabhaḥ prakīrṇāmbudharaṃ vibhāti
GE09ram_1-7u:10729: 4.027.017c kva cit kva cit parvatasaṃniruddhaṃ; rūpaṃ yathā śāntamahārṇavasya
GE09ram_1-7u:10733: 4.027.019c anekavarṇaṃ pavanāvadhūtaṃ; bhūmau pataty āmraphalaṃ vipakvam
GE09ram_1-7u:10735: 4.027.020c garjanti meghāḥ samudīrṇanādā; mattagajendrā iva saṃyugasthaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10738: 4.027.022a nidrā śanaiḥ keśavam abhyupaiti; drutaṃ nadī sāgaram abhyupaiti
GE09ram_1-7u:10739: 4.027.022c hṛṣṭā balākā ghanam abhyupaiti; kāntā sakāmā priyam abhyupaiti
GE09ram_1-7u:10740: 4.027.023a jātā vanāntāḥ śikhisupranṛttā; jātāḥ kadambāḥ sakadambaśākhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10741: 4.027.023c jātā vṛṣā goṣu samānakāmā; jātā mahī sasyavanābhirāmā
GE09ram_1-7u:10742: 4.027.024a vahanti varṣanti nadanti bhānti; dhyāyanti nṛtyanti samāśvasanti
GE09ram_1-7u:10743: 4.027.024c nadyo ghanā mattagajā vanāntāḥ; priyāvinīhāḥ śikhinaḥ plavaṃgāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10745: 4.027.025c prapāta śabdākulitā gajendrāḥ; sārdhaṃ mayūraiḥ samadā nadanti
GE09ram_1-7u:10746: 4.027.026a dhārānipātair abhihanyamānāḥ; kadambaśākhāsu vilambamānāḥ 4.027.026c kṣaṇārjitaṃ puṣparasāvagāḍhaṃ; śanair madaṃ ṣaṭcaraṇās tyajanti
GE09ram_1-7u:10749: 4.027.027c jambūdrumāṇāṃ pravibhānti śākhā; nilīyamānā iva ṣaṭpadaughaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10751: 4.027.028c vibhānti rūpāṇi balāhakānāṃ; raṇodyatānām iva vāraṇānām
GE09ram_1-7u:10754: 4.027.030a muktāsakāśaṃ salilaṃ patad vai; sunirmalaṃ patrapuṭeṣu lagnam
GE09ram_1-7u:10755: 4.027.030c hṛṣṭā vivarṇacchadanā vihaṃgāḥ; surendradattaṃ tṛṣitāḥ pibanti
GE09ram_1-7u:10756: 4.027.031a nīleṣu nīlā navavāripūrṇā; megheṣu meghāḥ pravibhānti saktāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10757: 4.027.031c davāgnidagdheṣu davāgnidagdhāḥ; śaileṣu śailā iva baddhamūlāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10758: 4.027.032a mattā gajendrā muditā gavendrā; vaneṣu viśrāntatarā mṛgendrāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10759: 4.027.032c ramyā nagendrā nibhṛtā nagendrāḥ; prakrīḍito vāridharaiḥ surendraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10760: 4.027.033a vṛttā yātrā narendrāṇāṃ senā pratinivartate 4.027.033c vairāṇi caiva mārgāś ca salilena samīkṛtāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10761: 4.027.034a māsi prauṣṭhapade brahma brāhmaṇānāṃ vivakṣatām 4.027.034c ayam adhyāyasamayaḥ sāmagānām upasthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10764: 4.027.036a nūnam āpūryamāṇāyāḥ sarayvā vadhate rayaḥ 4.027.036c māṃ samīkṣya samāyāntam ayodhyāyā iva svanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10765: 4.027.037a imāḥ sphītaguṇā varṣāḥ sugrīvaḥ sukham aśnute
GE09ram_1-7u:10766: 4.027.037c vijitāriḥ sadāraś ca rājye mahati ca sthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10767: 4.027.038a ahaṃ tu hṛtadāraś ca rājyāc ca mahataś cyutaḥ 4.027.038c nadīkūlam iva klinnam avasīdāmi lakṣmaṇa 4.027.039a śokaś ca mama vistīrṇo varṣāś ca bhṛśadurgamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10768: 4.027.039c rāvaṇaś ca mahāñ śatrur apāraṃ pratibhāti me
GE09ram_1-7u:10769: 4.027.040a ayātrāṃ caiva dṛṣṭvemāṃ mārgāṃś ca bhṛśadurgamān
GE09ram_1-7u:10770: 4.027.040c praṇate caiva sugrīve na mayā kiṃ cid īritam 4.027.041a api cātiparikliṣṭaṃ cirād dāraiḥ samāgatam 4.027.041c ātmakāryagarīyastvād vaktuṃ necchāmi vānaram
GE09ram_1-7u:10771: 4.027.042a svayam eva hi viśramya jñātvā kālam upāgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:10772: 4.027.042c upakāraṃ ca sugrīvo vetsyate nātra saṃśayaḥ
