GE09ram_1-7u:10774: 4.027.043c sugrīvasya nadīnāṃ ca prasādam anupālayan 4.027.044a upakāreṇa vīro hi pratikāreṇa yujyate 4.027.044c akṛtajño 'pratikṛto hanti sattvavatāṃ manaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10775: 4.027.045a athaivam uktaḥ praṇidhāya lakṣmaṇaḥ; kṛtāñjalis tat pratipūjya
GE09ram_1-7u:10777: 4.027.045c uvāca rāmaṃ svabhirāma darśanaṃ; pradarśayan darśanam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10779: 4.027.046a yathoktam etat tava sarvam īpsitaṃ; narendra kartā nacirād
GE09ram_1-7u:10781: 4.027.046c śaratpratīkṣaḥ kṣamatām imaṃ bhavāñ; jalaprapātaṃ ripunigrahe dhṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10786: 4.028.003c prāptavantam abhipretān sarvān eva manorathān 4.028.004a svāṃ ca pātnīm abhipretāṃ tārāṃ cāpi samīpsitām
GE09ram_1-7u:10789: 4.028.005c mantriṣu nyastakāryaṃ ca mantriṇām anavekṣakam 4.028.006a utsannarājyasaṃdeśaṃ kāmavṛttam avasthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:10791: 4.028.007a prasādya vākyair madhurair hetumadbhir manoramaiḥ 4.028.007c vākyavid vākyatattvajñaṃ harīśaṃ mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10792: 4.028.008a hitaṃ tathyaṃ ca pathyaṃ ca sāmadharmārthanītimat
GE09ram_1-7u:10793: 4.028.008c praṇayaprītisaṃyuktaṃ viśvāsakṛtaniścayam 4.028.008e harīśvaram upāgamya hanumān vākyam abravīt 4.028.009a rājyaṃ prāptaṃ yaśaś caiva kaulī śrīr abhivarthitā
GE09ram_1-7u:10794: 4.028.009c mitrāṇāṃ saṃgrahaḥ śeṣas tad bhavān kartum arhati
GE09ram_1-7u:10795: 4.028.010a yo hi mitreṣu kālajñaḥ satataṃ sādhu vartate
GE09ram_1-7u:10796: 4.028.010c tasya rājyaṃ ca kīrtiś ca pratāpaś cābhivardhate
GE09ram_1-7u:10797: 4.028.011a yasya kośaś ca daṇḍaś ca mitrāṇy ātmā ca bhūmipa
GE09ram_1-7u:10798: 4.028.011c samavetāni sarvāṇi sa rājyaṃ mahad aśnute
GE09ram_1-7u:10799: 4.028.012a tad bhavān vṛttasaṃpannaḥ sthitaḥ pathi niratyaye
GE09ram_1-7u:10800: 4.028.012c mitrārtham abhinītārthaṃ yathāvat kartum arhati 4.028.013a yas tu kālavyatīteṣu mitrakāryeṣu vartate 4.028.013c sa kṛtvā mahato 'py arthān na mitrārthena yujyate
GE09ram_1-7u:10802: 4.028.014c tad idaṃ vīra kāryaṃ te kālātītam ariṃdama
GE09ram_1-7u:10803: 4.028.015a na ca kālam atītaṃ te nivedayati kālavit
GE09ram_1-7u:10804: 4.028.015c tvaramāṇo 'pi san prājñas tava rājan vaśānugaḥ 4.028.016a kulasya ketuḥ sphītasya dīrghabandhuś ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10805: 4.028.016c aprameyaprabhāvaś ca svayaṃ cāpratimo guṇaiḥ 4.028.017a tasya tvaṃ kuru vai kāryaṃ pūrvaṃ tena kṛtaṃ tava
GE09ram_1-7u:10807: 4.028.018a na hi tāvad bhavet kālo vyatītaś codanād ṛte 4.028.018c coditasya hi kāryasya bhavet kālavyatikramaḥ 4.028.019a akartur api kāryasya bhavān kartā harīśvara
GE09ram_1-7u:10808: 4.028.019c kiṃ punaḥ pratikartus te rājyena ca dhanena ca 4.028.020a śaktimān asi vikrānto vānararṣka gaṇeśvara 4.028.020c kartuṃ dāśaratheḥ prītim ājñāyāṃ kiṃ nu sajjase
GE09ram_1-7u:10809: 4.028.021a kāmaṃ khalu śarair śaktaḥ surāsuramahoragān 4.028.021c vaśe dāśarathiḥ kartuṃ tvatpratijñāṃ tu kāṅkṣate
GE09ram_1-7u:10810: 4.028.022a prāṇatyāgāviśaṅkena kṛtaṃ tena tava priyam 4.028.022c tasya mārgāma vaidehīṃ pṛthivyām api cāmbare
GE09ram_1-7u:10811: 4.028.023a na devā na ca gandharvā nāsurā na marudgaṇāḥ 4.028.023c na ca yakṣā bhayaṃ tasya kuryuḥ kim uta rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10812: 4.028.024a tad evaṃ śaktiyuktasya pūrvaṃ priyakṛtas tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:10813: 4.028.024c rāmasyārhasi piṅgeśa kartuṃ sarvātmanā priyam 4.028.025a nādhastād avanau nāpsu gatir nopari cāmbare
GE09ram_1-7u:10814: 4.028.025c kasya cit sajjate 'smākaṃ kapīśvara tavājñayā 4.028.026a tad ājñāpaya kaḥ kiṃ te kṛte vasatu kutra cit
GE09ram_1-7u:10815: 4.028.026c harayo hy apradhṛṣyās te santi koṭyagrato 'nagha
GE09ram_1-7u:10816: 4.028.027a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā kāle sādhuniveditam 4.028.027c sugrīvaḥ sattvasaṃpannaś cakāra matim uttamām 4.028.028a sa saṃdideśābhimataṃ nīlaṃ nityakṛtodyamam
GE09ram_1-7u:10817: 4.028.028c dikṣu sarvāsu sarveṣāṃ sainyānām upasaṃgrahe 4.028.029a yathā senā samagrā me yūthapālāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10818: 4.028.029c samāgacchanty asaṃgena senāgrāṇi tathā kuru 4.028.030a ye tv antapālāḥ plavagāḥ śīghragā vyavasāyinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10819: 4.028.030c samānayantu te sainyaṃ tvaritāḥ śāsanān mama
GE09ram_1-7u:10820: 4.028.030e svayaṃ cānantaraṃ sainyaṃ bhavān evānupaśyatu 4.028.031a tripañcarātrād ūrdhvaṃ yaḥ prāpnuyān neha vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10821: 4.028.031c tasya prāṇāntiko daṇḍo nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:10822: 4.028.032a harīṃś ca vṛddhān upayātu sāṅgado; bhavān mamājñām adhikṛtya
GE09ram_1-7u:10824: 4.028.032c iti vyavasthāṃ haripuṃgaveśvaro; vidhāya veśma praviveśa
GE09ram_1-7u:10826: 4.029.001a guhāṃ praviṣṭe sugrīve vimukte gagane ghanaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10828: 4.029.002a pāṇḍuraṃ gaganaṃ dṛṣṭvā vimalaṃ candramaṇḍalam 4.029.002c śāradīṃ rajanīṃ caiva dṛṣṭvā jyotsnānulepanām 4.029.003a kāmavṛttaṃ ca sugrīvaṃ naṣṭāṃ ca janakātmajām
GE09ram_1-7u:10829: 4.029.003c buddhvā kālam atītaṃ ca mumoha paramāturaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10830: 4.029.004a sa tu saṃjñām upāgamya muhūrtān matimān punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10831: 4.029.004c manaḥsthām api vaidehīṃ cintayām āsa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10833: 4.029.005c śāradaṃ gaganaṃ dṛṣṭva jagāma manasā priyām
GE09ram_1-7u:10834: 4.029.006a dṛṣṭvā ca vimalaṃ vyoma gatavidyudbalāhakam 4.029.006c sārasāravasaṃghuṣṭaṃ vilalāpārtayā girā
GE09ram_1-7u:10835: 4.029.007a sārasāravasaṃnādaiḥ sārasāravanādinī 4.029.007c yāśrame ramate bālā sādya me ramate katham
GE09ram_1-7u:10836: 4.029.008a puṣpitāṃś cāsanān dṛṣṭvā kāñcanān iva nirmalān
GE09ram_1-7u:10837: 4.029.008c kathaṃ sa ramate bālā paśyantī mām apaśyatī
GE09ram_1-7u:10838: 4.029.009a yā purā kalahaṃsānāṃ svareṇa kalabhāṣiṇī 4.029.009c budhyate cārusarvāṅgī sādya me budhyate katham
GE09ram_1-7u:10841: 4.029.011a sarāṃsi sarito vāpīḥ kānanāni vanāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:10842: 4.029.011c tāṃ vinā mṛgaśāvākṣīṃ caran nādya sukhaṃ labhe
GE09ram_1-7u:10843: 4.029.012a api tāṃ madviyogāc ca saukumāryāc ca bhāminīm
GE09ram_1-7u:10844: 4.029.012c na dūraṃ pīḍayet kāmaḥ śaradguṇanirantaraḥ 4.029.013a evamādi naraśreṣṭho vilalāpa
GE09ram_1-7u:10845: 4.029.013c vihaṃga iva sāraṅgaḥ salilaṃ tridaśeśvarāt 4.029.014a tataś cañcūrya ramyeṣu phalārthī girisānuṣu 4.029.014c dadarśa paryupāvṛtto lakṣmīvāṃl lakṣmaṇo 'grajam
GE09ram_1-7u:10846: 4.029.015a taṃ cintayā duḥsahayā parītaṃ; visaṃjñam ekaṃ vijane manasvī
GE09ram_1-7u:10847: 4.029.015c bhrātur viṣādāt paritāpadīnaḥ; samīkṣya saumitrir uvāca rāmam
GE09ram_1-7u:10848: 4.029.016a kim ārya kāmasya vaśaṃgatena; kim ātmapauruṣyaparābhavena 4.029.016c ayaṃ sadā saṃhṛiyate samādhiḥ; kim atra yogena nivartitena
GE09ram_1-7u:10849: 4.029.017a kriyābhiyogaṃ manasaḥ prasādaṃ; samādhiyogānugataṃ ca kālam
GE09ram_1-7u:10850: 4.029.017c sahāyasāmarthyam adīnasattva; svakarmahetuṃ ca kuruṣva hetum
GE09ram_1-7u:10851: 4.029.018a na jānakī mānavavaṃśanātha; tvayā sanāthā sulabhā pareṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:10852: 4.029.018c na cāgnicūḍāṃ jvalitām upetya; na dahyate vīravarārha kaś cit 4.029.019a salakṣmaṇaṃ lakṣmaṇam apradhṛṣyaṃ; svabhāvajaṃ vākyam uvāca
GE09ram_1-7u:10854: 4.029.019c hitaṃ ca pathyaṃ ca nayaprasaktaṃ; sasāmadharmārthasamāhitaṃ ca 4.029.020a niḥsaṃśayaṃ kāryam avekṣitavyaṃ; kriyāviśeṣo hy anuvartitavyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10855: 4.029.020c nanu pravṛttasya durāsadasya; kumārakāryasya phalaṃ na cintyam
GE09ram_1-7u:10857: 4.029.021c uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmo mukhena pariśuṣyatā 4.029.022a tarpayitvā sahasrākṣaḥ salilena
GE09ram_1-7u:10859: 4.029.023a snigdhagambhīranirghoṣāḥ śailadrumapurogamāḥ 4.029.023c visṛjya salilaṃ meghāḥ pariśrāntā nṛpātmaja 4.029.024a nīlotpaladalaśyāmaḥ śyāmīkṛtvā diśo daśa
GE09ram_1-7u:10860: 4.029.024c vimadā iva mātaṅgāḥ śāntavegāḥ payodharāḥ 4.029.025a jalagarbhā mahāvegāḥ kuṭajārjunagandhinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10861: 4.029.025c caritvā viratāḥ saumya vṛṣṭivātāḥ samudyatāḥ 4.029.026a ghanānāṃ vāraṇānāṃ ca mayūrāṇāṃ ca lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:10862: 4.029.026c nādaḥ prasravaṇānāṃ ca praśāntaḥ sahasānagha 4.029.027a abhivṛṣṭā mahāmeghair nirmalāś citrasānavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10864: 4.029.028a darśayanti śarannadyaḥ pulināni śanaiḥ śanaiḥ 4.029.028c navasaṃgamasavrīḍā jaghanānīva yoṣitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10869: 4.029.031a iyaṃ sā prathamā yātrā pārthivānāṃ nṛpātmaja
GE09ram_1-7u:10870: 4.029.031c na ca paśyāmi sugrīvam udyogaṃ vā tathāvidham
GE09ram_1-7u:10871: 4.029.032a catvāro vārṣikā māsā gatā varṣaśatopamāḥ 4.029.032c mama śokābhitaptasya saumya sītām apaśyataḥ 4.029.033a priyāvihīne duḥkhārte hṛtarājye vivāsite
GE09ram_1-7u:10872: 4.029.033c kṛpāṃ na kurute rājā sugrīvo mayi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:10874: 4.029.034c dīno dūragṛhaḥ kāmī māṃ caiva śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10875: 4.029.035a ity etaiḥ kāraṇaiḥ saumya sugrīvasya durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10877: 4.029.036a sa kālaṃ parisaṃkhyāya sītāyāḥ parimārgaṇe 4.029.036c kṛtārthaḥ samayaṃ kṛtvā durmatir nāvabudhyate 4.029.037a tvaṃ praviśya ca kiṣkindhāṃ brūhi vānarapuṃgavam
GE09ram_1-7u:10878: 4.029.037c mūrkhaṃ grāmya sukhe saktaṃ sugrīvaṃ vacanān mama
GE09ram_1-7u:10879: 4.029.038a arthinām upapannānāṃ pūrvaṃ cāpy upakāriṇām 4.029.038c āśāṃ saṃśrutya yo hanti sa loke puruṣādhamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10880: 4.029.039a śubhaṃ vā yadi vā pāpaṃ yo hi vākyam udīritam
GE09ram_1-7u:10881: 4.029.039c satyena parigṛhṇāti sa vīraḥ puruṣottamaḥ 4.029.040a kṛtārthā hy akṛtārthānāṃ mitrāṇāṃ na bhavanti ye
GE09ram_1-7u:10882: 4.029.040c tān mṛtān api kravyādaḥ kṛtaghnān nopabhuñjate
GE09ram_1-7u:10883: 4.029.041a nūnaṃ kāñcanapṛṣṭhasya vikṛṣṭasya mayā raṇe 4.029.041c draṣṭum icchanti cāpasya rūpaṃ vidyudgaṇopamam 4.029.042a ghoraṃ jyātalanirghoṣaṃ kruddhasya mama saṃyuge 4.029.042c nirghoṣam iva vajrasya punaḥ saṃśrotum icchati
GE09ram_1-7u:10884: 4.029.043a kāmam evaṃ gate 'py asya parijñāte parākrame
GE09ram_1-7u:10885: 4.029.043c tvatsahāyasya me vīra na cintā syān nṛpātmaja
GE09ram_1-7u:10886: 4.029.044a yadartham ayam ārambhaḥ kṛtaḥ parapuraṃjaya 4.029.044c samayaṃ nābhijānāti kṛtārthaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10888: 4.029.045c vyatītāṃś caturo māsān viharan nāvabudhyate 4.029.046a sāmātyapariṣat krīḍan pānam evopasevate
GE09ram_1-7u:10889: 4.029.046c śokadīneṣu nāsmāsu sugrīvaḥ kurute dayām 4.029.047a ucyatāṃ gaccha sugrīvas tvayā vatsa mahābala
GE09ram_1-7u:10890: 4.029.047c mama roṣasya yadrūpaṃ brūyāś cainam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10891: 4.029.048a na ca saṃkucitaḥ panthā yena vālī hato gataḥ 4.029.048c samaye tiṣṭha sugrīvamā vālipatham anvagāḥ 4.029.049a eka eva raṇe vālī śareṇa nihato mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:10892: 4.029.049c tvāṃ tu satyād atikrāntaṃ haniṣyāmi sabāndhavam
GE09ram_1-7u:10893: 4.029.050a tad evaṃ vihite kārye yad dhitaṃ puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_1-7u:10894: 4.029.050c tat tad brūhi naraśreṣṭha tvara kālavyatikramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10895: 4.029.051a kuruṣva satyaṃ mayi vānareśvara; pratiśrutaṃ dharmam avekṣya
GE09ram_1-7u:10897: 4.029.051c mā vālinaṃ pretya gato yamakṣayaṃ; tvam adya paśyer mama coditaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10898: 4.029.052a sa pūrvajaṃ tīvravivṛddhakopaṃ; lālapyamānaṃ prasamīkṣya dīnam
GE09ram_1-7u:10900: 4.030.001a sa kāminaṃ dīnam adīnasattvaḥ; śokābhipannaṃ samudīrṇakopam 4.030.001c narendrasūnur naradevaputraṃ; rāmānujaḥ pūrvajam ity uvāca
GE09ram_1-7u:10901: 4.030.002a na vānaraḥ sthāsyati sādhuvṛtte; na maṃsyate kāryaphalānuṣaṅgān
GE09ram_1-7u:10902: 4.030.002c na bhakṣyate vānararājyalakṣmīṃ; tathā hi nābhikramate 'sya
GE09ram_1-7u:10904: 4.030.003a matikṣayād grāmyasukheṣu saktas; tava prasādāpratikārabuddhiḥ 4.030.003c hato 'grajaṃ paśyatu vālinaṃ sa; na rājyam evaṃ viguṇasya deyam 4.030.004a na dhāraye kopam udīrṇavegaṃ; nihanmi sugrīvam asatyam adya
GE09ram_1-7u:10905: 4.030.004c haripravīraiḥ saha vāliputro; narendrapatnyā vicayaṃ karotu
GE09ram_1-7u:10906: 4.030.005a tam āttabāṇāsanam utpatantaṃ; niveditārthaṃ raṇacaṇḍakopam 4.030.005c uvaca rāmaḥ paravīrahantā; svavekṣitaṃ sānunayaṃ ca vākyam
GE09ram_1-7u:10907: 4.030.006a na hi vai tvadvidho loke pāpam evaṃ samācaret 4.030.006c pāpam āryeṇa yo hanti sa vīraḥ puruṣottamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10908: 4.030.007a nedam adya tvayā grāhyaṃ sādhuvṛttena lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:10909: 4.030.007c tāṃ prītim anuvartasva pūrvavṛttaṃ ca saṃgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:10911: 4.030.008c vaktum arhasi sugrīvaṃ vyatītaṃ kālaparyaye 4.030.009a so' grajenānuśiṣṭārtho yathāvat puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10912: 4.030.009c praviveśa purīṃ vīro lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā 4.030.010a tataḥ śubhamatiḥ prājño bhrātuḥ priyahite rataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10913: 4.030.010c lakṣmaṇaḥ pratisaṃrabdho jagāma bhavanaṃ kapeḥ 4.030.011a śakrabāṇāsanaprakhyaṃ dhanuḥ kālāntakopamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10914: 4.030.011c pragṛhya giriśṛṅgābhaṃ mandaraḥ sānumān iva 4.030.012a yathoktakārī vacanam uttaraṃ caiva sottaram 4.030.012c bṛhaspatisamo buddhyā mattvā rāmānujas tadā 4.030.013a kāmakrodhasamutthena bhrātuḥ kopāgninā vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10915: 4.030.013c prabhañjana ivāprītaḥ prayayau lakṣmaṇas tadā 4.030.014a sālatālāśvakarṇāṃś ca tarasā pātayan bahūn 4.030.014c paryasyan girikūṭāni drumān anyāṃś ca vegataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10916: 4.030.015a śilāś ca śakalīkurvan padbhyāṃ gaja ivāśugaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10917: 4.030.015c dūram ekapadaṃ tyaktvā yayau kāryavaśād drutam
GE09ram_1-7u:10920: 4.030.017a roṣāt prasphuramāṇauṣṭhaḥ sugrīvaṃ prati kalṣmaṇaḥ 4.030.017c dadarśa vānarān bhīmān kiṣkindhāyā bahiścarān 4.030.018a śailaśṛṅgāṇi śataśaḥ pravṛddhāṃś ca mahīruhān 4.030.018c jagṛhuḥ kuñjaraprakhyā vānarāḥ parvatāntare
GE09ram_1-7u:10921: 4.030.019a tān gṛhītapraharaṇān harīn dṛṣṭvā tu lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10922: 4.030.019c babhūva dviguṇaṃ kruddho bahvindhana ivānalaḥ 4.030.020a taṃ te bhayaparītāṅgāḥ kruddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10925: 4.030.021c krodham āgamanaṃ caiva lakṣmaṇasya nyavedayan 4.030.022a tārayā sahitaḥ kāmī saktaḥ kapivṛṣo rahaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10926: 4.030.022c na teṣāṃ kapivīrāṇāṃ śuśrāva vacanaṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:10930: 4.030.024c sarve śārdūladarpāś ca sarve ca vikṛtānanāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10931: 4.030.025a daśanāgabalāḥ ke cit ke cid daśaguṇottarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10932: 4.030.025c ke cin nāgasahasrasya babhūvus tulyavikramāḥ 4.030.026a kṛtsnāṃ hi kapibhir vyāptāṃ drumahastair mahābalaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10933: 4.030.026c apaśyal lakṣmaṇaḥ kruddhaḥ kiṣkindhāṃ tāṃ durāsadam
GE09ram_1-7u:10934: 4.030.027a tatas te harayaḥ sarve prākāraparikhāntarāt 4.030.027c niṣkramyodagrasattvās tu tasthur āviṣkṛtaṃ tadā 4.030.028a sugrīvasya pramādaṃ ca pūrvajaṃ cārtam ātmavān
GE09ram_1-7u:10935: 4.030.028c buddhvā kopavaśaṃ vīraḥ punar eva jagāma saḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10938: 4.030.030a bāṇaśalyasphurajjihvaḥ sāyakāsanabhogavān 4.030.030c svatejoviṣasaṃghātaḥ pañcāsya iva pannagaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10939: 4.030.031a taṃ dīptam iva kālāgniṃ nāgendram iva kopitam
GE09ram_1-7u:10940: 4.030.031c samāsādyāṅgadas trāsād viṣādam agamad bhṛśam 4.030.032a so 'ṅgadaṃ roṣatāmrākṣaḥ saṃdideśa mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10941: 4.030.032c sugrīvaḥ kathyatāṃ vatsa mamāgamanam ity uta
GE09ram_1-7u:10942: 4.030.033a eṣa rāmānujaḥ prāptas tvatsakāśam ariṃdamaḥ 4.030.033c bhrātur vyasanasaṃtapto dvāri tiṣṭhati lakṣmaṇaḥ 4.030.034a lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā śokāviṣṭo 'ṅgado 'bravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:10943: 4.030.034c pituḥ samīpam āgamya saumitrir ayam āgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10945: 4.030.035c siṃhanādaṃ samaṃ cakrur lakṣmaṇasya samīpataḥ 4.030.036a tena śabdena mahatā pratyabudhyata vānaraḥ 4.030.036c madavihvalatāmrākṣo vyākulasragvibhūṣaṇaḥ 4.030.037a athāṅgadavacaḥ śrutvā tenaiva ca samāgatau 4.030.037c mantriṇo vānarendrasya saṃmatodāradarśinau
GE09ram_1-7u:10946: 4.030.038a plakṣaś caiva prabhāvaś ca mantriṇāv arthadharmayoḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10947: 4.030.038c vaktum uccāvacaṃ prāptaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ tau śaśaṃsatuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10949: 4.030.039c āsīnaṃ paryupāsīnau yathā śakraṃ marutpatim 4.030.040a satyasaṃdhau mahābhāgau bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:10950: 4.030.040c vayasya bhāvaṃ saṃprāptau rājyārhau rājyadāyinau 4.030.041a tayor eko dhanuṣpāṇir dvāri tiṣṭhati lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10951: 4.030.041c yasya bhītāḥ pravepante nādān muñcanti vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10952: 4.030.042a sa eṣa rāghavabhrātā lakṣmaṇo vākyasārathiḥ 4.030.042c vyavasāya rathaḥ prāptas tasya rāmasya śāsanāt
GE09ram_1-7u:10953: 4.030.043a tasya mūrdhnā praṇamya tvaṃ saputraḥ saha bandhubhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10954: 4.030.043c rājaṃs tiṣṭha svasamaye bhava satyapratiśravaḥ 4.031.001a aṅgadasya vacaḥ śrutvā sugrīvaḥ sacivaiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:10955: 4.031.001c lakṣmaṇaṃ kupitaṃ śrutvā mumocāsanam ātmavān 4.031.002a sacivān abravīd vākyaṃ niścitya gurulāghavam 4.031.002c mantrajñān mantrakuśalo mantreṣu pariniṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10956: 4.031.003a na me durvyāhṛtaṃ kiṃ cin nāpi me duranuṣṭhitam 4.031.003c lakṣmaṇo rāghavabhrātā kruddhaḥ kim iti cintaye
GE09ram_1-7u:10958: 4.031.004c mama doṣān asaṃbhūtāñ śrāvito rāghavānujaḥ 4.031.005a atra tāvad yathābuddhi sarvair eva yathāvidhi
GE09ram_1-7u:10959: 4.031.005c bhavadbhir niścayas tasya vijñeyo nipuṇaṃ śanaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10960: 4.031.006a na khalv asti mama trāso lakṣmaṇān nāpi rāghavāt 4.031.006c mitraṃ tv asthāna kupitaṃ janayaty eva saṃbhramam
GE09ram_1-7u:10961: 4.031.007a sarvathā sukaraṃ mitraṃ duṣkaraṃ paripālanam 4.031.007c anityatvāt tu cittānāṃ prītir alpe 'pi bhidyate
GE09ram_1-7u:10963: 4.031.008c yan mamopakṛtaṃ śakyaṃ pratikartuṃ na tan mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:10964: 4.031.009a sugrīveṇaivam uktas tu hanumān haripuṃgavaḥ 4.031.009c uvāca svena tarkeṇa madhye vānaramantriṇām 4.031.010a sarvathā naitad āścaryaṃ yat tvaṃ harigaṇeśvara
GE09ram_1-7u:10965: 4.031.010c na vismarasi susnigdham upakārakṛtaṃ śubham 4.031.011a rāghaveṇa tu śūreṇa bhayam utsṛjya dūrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10967: 4.031.012a sarvathā praṇayāt kruddho rāghavo nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10968: 4.031.012c bhrātaraṃ sa prahitavāṃl lakṣmaṇaṃ lakṣmivardhanam 4.031.013a tvaṃ pramatto na jānīṣe kālaṃ kalavidāṃ vara
GE09ram_1-7u:10969: 4.031.013c phullasaptacchadaśyāmā pravṛttā tu śarac chivā 4.031.014a nirmala grahanakṣatrā dyauḥ pranaṣṭabalāhakā
GE09ram_1-7u:10970: 4.031.014c prasannāś ca diśaḥ sarvāḥ saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca 4.031.015a prāptam udyogakālaṃ tu nāvaiṣi haripuṃgava 4.031.015c tvaṃ pramatta iti vyaktaṃ lakṣmaṇo 'yam ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10972: 4.031.016c vacanaṃ marṣaṇīyaṃ te rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ 4.031.017a kṛtāparādhasya hi te nānyat paśyāmy ahaṃ kṣamam
GE09ram_1-7u:10974: 4.031.018a niyuktair mantribhir vācyo avaśyaṃ pārthivo hitam
GE09ram_1-7u:10975: 4.031.018c ata eva bhayaṃ tyaktvā bravīmy avadhṛtaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10976: 4.031.019a abhikruddhaḥ samartho hi cāpam udyamya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10978: 4.031.020a na sa kṣamaḥ kopayituṃ yaḥ prasādya punar bhavet 4.031.020c pūrvopakāraṃ smaratā kṛtajñena viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10979: 4.031.021a tasya mūrdhnā praṇamya tvaṃ saputraḥ sasuhṛjjanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10980: 4.031.021c rājaṃs tiṣṭha svasamaye bhartur bhāryeva tadvaśe
GE09ram_1-7u:10981: 4.031.022a na rāmarāmānujaśāsanaṃ tvayā; kapīndrayuktaṃ manasāpy apohitum
GE09ram_1-7u:10982: 4.031.022c mano hi te jñāsyati mānuṣaṃ balaṃ; sarāghavasyāsya surendravarcasaḥ 4.032.001a atha pratisamādiṣṭo lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā
GE09ram_1-7u:10983: 4.032.001c praviveśa guhāṃ ghorāṃ kiṣkindhāṃ rāmaśāsanāt 4.032.002a dvārasthā harayas tatra mahākāyā mahābalāḥ 4.032.002c babhūvur lakṣmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve prāñjalayaḥ sthitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10984: 4.032.003a niḥśvasantaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā kruddhaṃ daśarathātmajam
GE09ram_1-7u:10985: 4.032.003c babhūvur harayas trastā na cainaṃ paryavārayan
GE09ram_1-7u:10986: 4.032.004a sa taṃ ratnamayīṃ śrīmān divyāṃ puṣpitakānanām
GE09ram_1-7u:10987: 4.032.004c ramyāṃ ratnasamākīrṇāṃ dadarśa mahatīṃ guhām 4.032.005a harmyaprāsādasaṃbādhāṃ nānāpaṇyopaśobhitām 4.032.005c sarvakāmaphalair vṛkṣaiḥ puṣpitair upaśobhitām
GE09ram_1-7u:10993: 4.032.008c dadarśa girinadyaś ca vimalās tatra rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:10994: 4.032.009a aṅgadasya gṛhaṃ ramyaṃ maindasya dvividasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:10995: 4.032.009c gavayasya gavākṣasya gajasya śarabhasya ca 4.032.010a vidyunmāleś ca saṃpāteḥ sūryākṣasya hanūmataḥ 4.032.010c vīrabāhoḥ subāhoś ca nalasya ca mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11002: 4.032.014a pāṇḍureṇa tu śailena parikṣiptaṃ durāsadam 4.032.014c vānarendragṛhaṃ ramyaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:11009: 4.032.018a sugrīvasya gṛhaṃ ramyaṃ praviveśa mahābalaḥ 4.032.018c avāryamāṇaḥ saumitrir mahābhram iva bhāskaraḥ 4.032.019a sa sapta kakṣyā dharmātmā yānāsanasamāvṛtāḥ 4.032.019c praviśya sumahad guptaṃ dadarśāntaḥpuraṃ mahat 4.032.020a haimarājataparyaṅkair bahubhiś ca varāsanaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11011: 4.032.021a praviśann eva satataṃ śuśrāva madhurasvaram 4.032.021c tantrīgītasamākīrṇaṃ samagītapadākṣaram 4.032.022a bahvīś ca vividhākārā rūpayauvanagarvitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11012: 4.032.022c striyaḥ sugrīvabhavane dadarśa sa mahābalaḥ 4.032.023a dṛṣṭvābhijanasaṃpannāś citramālyakṛtasrajaḥ 4.032.023c varamālyakṛtavyagrā bhūṣaṇottamabhūṣitāḥ 4.032.024a nātṛptān nāti ca vyagrān nānudāttaparicchadān 4.032.024c sugrīvānucarāṃś cāpi lakṣayām āsa lakṣmaṇaḥ 4.032.025a tataḥ sugrīvam āsīnaṃ kāñcane paramāsane 4.032.025c mahārhāstaraṇopete dadarśādityasaṃnibham 4.032.026a divyābharaṇacitrāṅgaṃ divyarūpaṃ yaśasvinam
GE09ram_1-7u:11015: 4.032.027a rumāṃ tu vīraḥ parirabhya gāḍhaṃ; varāsanastho varahemavarṇaḥ 4.032.027c dadarśa saumitrim adīnasattvaṃ; viśālanetraḥ suviśālanetram 4.033.001a tam apratihataṃ kruddhaṃ praviṣṭaṃ puruṣarṣabham 4.033.001c sugrīvo lakṣmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā babhūva vyathitendriyaḥ 4.033.002a kruddhaṃ niḥśvasamānaṃ taṃ pradīptam iva tejasā
GE09ram_1-7u:11017: 4.033.003a utpapāta hariśreṣṭho hitvā sauvarṇam āsanam 4.033.003c mahān mahendrasya yathā svalaṃkṛta iva dhvajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11019: 4.033.004c sugrīvaṃ gagane pūrṇaṃ candraṃ tārāgaṇā iva
GE09ram_1-7u:11021: 4.033.005c babhūvāvasthitas tatra kalpavṛkṣo mahān iva 4.033.006a rumā dvitīyaṃ sugrīvaṃ nārīmadhyagataṃ sthitam 4.033.006c abravīl lakṣmaṇaḥ kruddhaḥ satāraṃ śaśinaṃ yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:11023: 4.033.007c kṛtajñaḥ satyavādī ca rājā loke mahīyate
GE09ram_1-7u:11024: 4.033.008a yas tu rājā sthito 'dharme mitrāṇām upakāriṇām 4.033.008c mithyāpratijñāṃ kurute ko nṛśaṃsataras tataḥ 4.033.009a śatam aśvānṛte hanti sahasraṃ tu gavānṛte
GE09ram_1-7u:11025: 4.033.009c ātmānaṃ svajanaṃ hanti puruṣaḥ puruṣānṛte 4.033.010a pūrvaṃ kṛtārtho mitrāṇāṃ na tat pratikaroti yaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11026: 4.033.010c kṛtaghnaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ sa vadhyaḥ plavageśvara 4.033.011a gīto 'yaṃ brahmaṇā ślokaḥ sarvalokanamaskṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11027: 4.033.011c dṛṣṭvā kṛtaghnaṃ kruddhena taṃ nibodha plavaṃgama
GE09ram_1-7u:11028: 4.033.012a brahmaghne ca surāpe ca core bhagnavrate tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:11029: 4.033.012c niṣkṛtir vihitā sadbhiḥ kṛtaghne nāsti niṣkṛtiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11030: 4.033.013a anāryas tvaṃ kṛtaghnaś ca mithyāvādī ca vānara
GE09ram_1-7u:11031: 4.033.013c pūrvaṃ kṛtārtho rāmasya na tat pratikaroṣi yat
GE09ram_1-7u:11032: 4.033.014a nanu nāma kṛtārthena tvayā rāmasya vānara
GE09ram_1-7u:11033: 4.033.014c sītāyā mārgaṇe yatnaḥ kartavyaḥ kṛtam icchatā
GE09ram_1-7u:11034: 4.033.015a sa tvaṃ grāmyeṣu bhogeṣu sakto mithyā pratiśravaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11035: 4.033.015c na tvāṃ rāmo vijānīte sarpaṃ maṇḍūkarāviṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:11037: 4.033.016c harīṇāṃ prāpito rājyaṃ tvaṃ durātmā mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:11039: 4.033.017c sadyas tvaṃ niśitair bāṇair hato drakṣyasi vālinam
GE09ram_1-7u:11040: 4.033.018a na ca saṃkucitaḥ panthā yena vālī hato gataḥ 4.033.018c samaye tiṣṭha sugrīva mā vālipatham anvagāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11041: 4.033.019a na nūnam ikṣvākuvarasya kārmukāc; cyutāñ śarān paśyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:11043: 4.033.019c tataḥ sukhaṃ nāma niṣevase sukhī; na rāmakāryaṃ manasāpy
GE09ram_1-7u:11045: 4.034.001a tathā bruvāṇaṃ saumitriṃ pradīptam iva tejasā
GE09ram_1-7u:11047: 4.034.002a naivaṃ lakṣmaṇa vaktavyo nāyaṃ paruṣam arhati
GE09ram_1-7u:11048: 4.034.002c harīṇām īśvaraḥ śrotuṃ tava vaktrād viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11049: 4.034.003a naivākṛtajñaḥ sugrīvo na śaṭho nāpi dāruṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11050: 4.034.003c naivānṛtakatho vīra na jihmaś ca kapīśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11051: 4.034.004a upakāraṃ kṛtaṃ vīro nāpy ayaṃ vismṛtaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11052: 4.034.004c rāmeṇa vīra sugrīvo yad anyair duṣkaraṃ raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:11053: 4.034.005a rāmaprasādāt kīrtiṃ ca kapirājyaṃ ca śāśvatam
GE09ram_1-7u:11054: 4.034.005c prāptavān iha sugrīvo rumāṃ māṃ ca paraṃtapa
GE09ram_1-7u:11055: 4.034.006a suduḥkhaṃ śāyitaḥ pūrvaṃ prāpyedaṃ sukham uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:11056: 4.034.006c prāptakālaṃ na jānīte viśvāmitro yathā muniḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11057: 4.034.007a ghṛtācyāṃ kila saṃsakto daśavarṣāṇi lakṣmaṇa 4.034.007c aho 'manyata dharmātmā viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11058: 4.034.008a sa hi prāptaṃ na jānīte kālaṃ kālavidāṃ varaḥ 4.034.008c viśvāmitro mahātejāḥ kiṃ punar yaḥ pṛthagjanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11060: 4.034.009c avitṛptasya kāmeṣu rāmaḥ kṣantum ihārhati 4.034.010a na ca roṣavaśaṃ tāta gantum arhasi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:11061: 4.034.010c niścayārtham avijñāya sahasā prākṛto yathā 4.034.011a sattvayuktā hi puruṣās tvadvidhāḥ puruṣarṣabha 4.034.011c avimṛśya na roṣasya sahasā yānti vaśyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:11062: 4.034.012a prasādaye tvāṃ dharmajña sugrīvārthe samāhitā 4.034.012c mahān roṣasamutpannaḥ saṃrambhas tyajyatām ayam 4.034.013a rumāṃ māṃ kapirājyaṃ ca dhanadhānyavasūni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11063: 4.034.013c rāmapriyārthaṃ sugrīvas tyajed iti matir mama
GE09ram_1-7u:11064: 4.034.014a samāneṣvyati sugrīvaḥ sītayā saha rāghavam 4.034.014c śaśāṅkam iva rohiṣyā nihatvā rāvaṇaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:11066: 4.034.015c ayutāni ca ṣaṭtriṃśat sahasrāṇi śatāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11067: 4.034.016a ahatvā tāṃś ca durdharṣān rākṣasān kāmarūpiṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11068: 4.034.016c na śakyo rāvaṇo hantuṃ yena sā maithilī hṛtā 4.034.017a te na śakyā raṇe hantum asahāyena lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:11069: 4.034.017c rāvaṇaḥ krūrakarmā ca sugrīveṇa viśeṣataḥ 4.034.018a evam ākhyātavān vālī sa hy abhijño harīśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11070: 4.034.018c āgamas tu na me vyaktaḥ śravāt tasya bravīmy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:11072: 4.034.019c ānetuṃ vānarān yuddhe subahūn hariyūthapān 4.034.020a tāṃś ca pratīkṣamāṇo 'yaṃ vikrāntān sumahābalān 4.034.020c rāghavasyārthasiddhyarthaṃ na niryāti harīśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11073: 4.034.021a kṛtā tu saṃsthā saumitre sugrīveṇa yathāpurā
GE09ram_1-7u:11074: 4.034.021c adya tair vānarair sarvair āgantavyaṃ mahābalaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11076: 4.034.022c adya tvām upayāsyanti jahi kopam ariṃdama
GE09ram_1-7u:11078: 4.034.023a tava hi mukham idaṃ nirīkṣya kopāt; kṣatajanibhe nayane nirīkṣamāṇāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11079: 4.034.023c harivaravanitā na yānti śāntiṃ; prathamabhayasya hi śaṅkitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11080: sma sarvāḥ 4.035.001a ity uktas tārayā vākyaṃ praśritaṃ dharmasaṃhitam
GE09ram_1-7u:11082: 4.035.002a tasmin pratigṛhīte tu vākye harigaṇeśvaraḥ 4.035.002c lakṣmaṇāt sumahat trāsaṃ vastraṃ klinnam ivātyajat
GE09ram_1-7u:11083: 4.035.003a tataḥ kaṇṭhagataṃ mālyaṃ citraṃ bahuguṇaṃ mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:11084: 4.035.003c ciccheda vimadaś cāsīt sugrīvo vānareśvaraḥ 4.035.004a sa lakṣmaṇaṃ bhīmabalaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:11085: 4.035.004c abravīt praśritaṃ vākyaṃ sugrīvaḥ saṃpraharṣayan 4.035.005a pranaṣṭā śrīś ca kīrtiś ca kapirājyaṃ ca śāśvatam 4.035.005c rāmaprasādāt saumitre punaḥ prāptam idaṃ mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:11086: 4.035.006a kaḥ śaktas tasya devasya khyātasya svena karmaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:11087: 4.035.006c tādṛśaṃ vikramaṃ vīra pratikartum ariṃdama 4.035.007a sītāṃ prāpsyati dharmātmā vadhiṣyati ca rāvaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:11088: 4.035.007c sahāyamātreṇa mayā rāghavaḥ svena tejasā 4.035.008a sahāyakṛtyaṃ hi tasya yena sapta mahādrumāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11089: 4.035.008c śailaś ca vasudhā caiva bāṇenaikena dāritāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11090: 4.035.009a dhanur visphāramāṇasya yasya śabdena lakṣmaṇa 4.035.009c saśailā kampitā bhūmiḥ sahāyais tasya kiṃ nu vai 4.035.010a anuyātrāṃ narendrasya kariṣye 'haṃ nararṣabha
GE09ram_1-7u:11091: 4.035.010c gacchato rāvaṇaṃ hantuṃ vairiṇaṃ sapuraḥsaram 4.035.011a yadi kiṃ cid atikrāntaṃ viśvāsāt praṇayena vā
GE09ram_1-7u:11092: 4.035.011c preṣyasya kṣamitavyaṃ me na kaś cin nāparādhyati
GE09ram_1-7u:11093: 4.035.012a iti tasya bruvāṇasya sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ 4.035.012c abhaval lakṣmaṇaḥ prītaḥ preṃṇā cedam uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:11094: 4.035.013a sarvathā hi mama bhrātā sanātho vānareśvara
GE09ram_1-7u:11095: 4.035.013c tvayā nāthena sugrīva praśritena viśeṣataḥ 4.035.014a yas te prabhāvaḥ sugrīva yac ca te śaucam uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:11096: 4.035.014c arhas taṃ kapirājyasya śriyaṃ bhoktum anuttamām
GE09ram_1-7u:11097: 4.035.015a sahāyena ca sugrīva tvayā rāmaḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_1-7u:11098: 4.035.015c vadhiṣyati raṇe śatrūn acirān nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11100: 4.035.016c upapannaṃ ca yuktaṃ ca sugrīva tava bhāṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:11101: 4.035.017a doṣajñaḥ sati sāmarthye ko 'nyo bhāṣitum arhati 4.035.017c varjayitvā mama jyeṣṭhaṃ tvāṃ ca vānarasattama
GE09ram_1-7u:11102: 4.035.018a sadṛśaś cāsi rāmasya vikrameṇa balena ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11103: 4.035.018c sahāyo daivatair dattaś cirāya haripuṃgava 4.035.019a kiṃ tu śīghram ito vīra niṣkrāma tvaṃ mayā saha
GE09ram_1-7u:11105: 4.035.020a yac ca śokābhibhūtasya śrutvā rāmasya bhāṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:11106: 4.035.020c mayā tvaṃ paruṣāṇy uktas tac ca tvaṃ kṣantum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:11107: 4.036.001a evam uktas tu sugrīvo lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:11108: 4.036.001c hanumantaṃ sthitaṃ pārśve sacivaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:11109: 4.036.002a mahendrahimavadvindhyakailāsaśikhareṣu ca 4.036.002c mandare pāṇḍuśikhare pañcaśaileṣu ye sthitāḥ 4.036.003a taruṇādityavarṇeṣu bhrājamāneṣu sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11110: 4.036.003c parvateṣu samudrānte paścimasyāṃ tu ye diśi
GE09ram_1-7u:11113: 4.036.005a añjanāmbudasaṃkāśāḥ kuñjarapratimaujasaḥ 4.036.005c añjane parate caiva ye vasanti
GE09ram_1-7u:11115: 4.036.006c merupārśvagatāś caiva ye ca dhūmragiriṃ śritāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11116: 4.036.007a taruṇādityavarṇāś ca parvate ye mahāruṇe 4.036.007c pibanto madhumaireyaṃ bhīmavegāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11117: 4.036.008a vaneṣu ca suramyeṣu sugandhiṣu mahatsu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11118: 4.036.008c tāpasānāṃ ca ramyeṣu vanānteṣu samantataḥ 4.036.009a tāṃs tāṃs tvam ānaya kṣipraṃ pṛthivyāṃ sarvavānarān
GE09ram_1-7u:11119: 4.036.009c sāmadānādibhiḥ kalpair āśu preṣaya vānarān 4.036.010a preṣitāḥ prathamaṃ ye ca mayā dūtā mahājavāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11120: 4.036.010c tvaraṇārthaṃ tu bhūyas tvaṃ harīn saṃpreṣayāparān
GE09ram_1-7u:11121: 4.036.011a ye prasaktāś ca kāmeṣu dīrghasūtrāś ca vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11122: 4.036.011c ihānayasva tān sarvāñ śīghraṃ tu mama śāsanāt
GE09ram_1-7u:11123: 4.036.012a ahobhir daśabhir ye ca nāgacchanti mamājñayā
GE09ram_1-7u:11125: 4.036.013a śatāny atha sahasrāṇi koṭyaś ca mama śāsanāt
GE09ram_1-7u:11126: 4.036.013c prayāntu kapisiṃhānāṃ diśo mama mate sthitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11128: 4.036.014c ghorarūpāḥ kapiśreṣṭhā yāntu macchāsanād itaḥ 4.036.015a te gatijñā gatiṃ gatvā pṛthivyāṃ sarvavānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11129: 4.036.015c ānayantu harīn sarvāṃs tvaritāḥ śāsanān mama
GE09ram_1-7u:11130: 4.036.016a tasya vānararājasya śrutvā vāyusuto vacaḥ 4.036.016c dikṣu sarvāsu vikrāntān preṣayām āsa vānarān
GE09ram_1-7u:11132: 4.036.017c prayātāḥ prahitā rājñā harayas tatkṣaṇena vai
GE09ram_1-7u:11133: 4.036.018a te samudreṣu giriṣu vaneṣu ca saritsu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11134: 4.036.018c vānarā vānarān sarvān rāmahetor acodayan 4.036.019a mṛtyukālopamasyājñāṃ rājarājasya
GE09ram_1-7u:11137: 4.036.020c tisraḥ koṭyaḥ plavaṃgānāṃ niryayur yatra rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11138: 4.036.021a astaṃ gacchati yatrārkas tasmin girivare ratāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11145: 4.036.024c vindhyād vānarakoṭīnāṃ sahasrāṇy apatan drutam 4.036.025a kṣīrodavelānilayās tamālavanavāsinaḥ 4.036.025c nārikelāśanāś caiva teṣāṃ saṃkhyā na vidyate
GE09ram_1-7u:11146: 4.036.026a vanebhyo gahvarebhyaś ca saridbhyaś ca mahājavāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11147: 4.036.026c āgacchad vānarī senā pibantīva divākaram 4.036.027a ye tu tvarayituṃ yātā vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11148: 4.036.027c te vīrā himavac chailaṃ dadṛśus taṃ mahādrumam
GE09ram_1-7u:11149: 4.036.028a tasmin girivare ramye yajño maheśvaraḥ purā
GE09ram_1-7u:11151: 4.036.029a annaviṣyandajātāni mūlāni ca phalāni ca 4.036.029c amṛtasvādukalpāni dadṛśus tatra vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11152: 4.036.030a tad anna saṃbhavaṃ divyaṃ phalaṃ mūlaṃ manoharam
GE09ram_1-7u:11153: 4.036.030c yaḥ kaś cit sakṛd aśnāti māsaṃ bhavati tarpitaḥ 4.036.031a tāni mūlāni divyāni phalāni ca phalāśanāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11154: 4.036.031c auṣadhāni ca divyāni jagṛhur hariyūthapāḥ 4.036.032a tasmāc ca yajñāyatanāt puṣpāṇi surabhīṇi ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11156: 4.036.033a te tu sarve harivarāḥ pṛthivyāṃ sarvavānarān
GE09ram_1-7u:11157: 4.036.033c saṃcodayitvā tvaritaṃ yūthānāṃ jagmur agrataḥ 4.036.034a te tu tena muhūrtena yūthapāḥ śīghrakāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11158: 4.036.034c kiṣkindhāṃ tvarayā prāptāḥ sugrīvo yatra vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11159: 4.036.035a te gṛhītvauṣadhīḥ sarvāḥ phalaṃ mūlaṃ ca vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11160: 4.036.035c taṃ pratigrāhayām āsur vacanaṃ cedam abruvan
GE09ram_1-7u:11161: 4.036.036a sarve parigatāḥ śailāḥ samudrāś ca vanāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11162: 4.036.036c pṛthivyāṃ vānarāḥ sarve śāsanād upayānti te
GE09ram_1-7u:11163: 4.036.037a evaṃ śrutvā tato hṛṣṭaḥ sugrīvaḥ plavagādhipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11164: 4.036.037c pratijagrāha ca prītas teṣāṃ sarvam upāyanam
GE09ram_1-7u:11165: 4.037.001a pratigṛhya ca tat sarvam upānayam upāhṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:11166: 4.037.001c vānarān sāntvayitvā ca sarvān eva vyasarjayat
GE09ram_1-7u:11167: 4.037.002a visarjayitvā sa harīñ śūrāṃs tān kṛtakarmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11168: 4.037.002c mene kṛtārtham ātmānaṃ rāghavaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_1-7u:11170: 4.037.003c abravīt praśritaṃ vākyaṃ sugrīvaṃ saṃpraharṣayan 4.037.003e kiṣkindhāyā viniṣkrāma yadi te saumya rocate
GE09ram_1-7u:11171: 4.037.004a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā lakṣmaṇasya subhāṣitam 4.037.004c sugrīvaḥ paramaprīto vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:11172: 4.037.005a evaṃ bhavatu gacchāmaḥ stheyaṃ tvacchāsane mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:11173: 4.037.005c tam evam uktvā sugrīvo lakṣmaṇaṃ śubhalakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:11174: 4.037.006a visarjayām āsa tadā tārām anyāś ca yoṣitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11175: 4.037.006c etety uccair harivarān sugrīvaḥ samudāharat 4.037.007a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā harayaḥ śīghram āyayuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11176: 4.037.007c baddhāñjalipuṭāḥ sarve ye syuḥ strīdarśanakṣamāḥ 4.037.008a tān uvāca tataḥ prāptān rājārkasadṛśaprabhaḥ 4.037.008c upasthāpayata kṣipraṃ śibikāṃ mama vānarāḥ 4.037.009a śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasya harayaḥ śīghravikramāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11178: 4.037.010a tām upasthāpitāṃ dṛṣṭvā śibikāṃ vānarādhipaḥ 4.037.010c lakṣmaṇāruhyatāṃ śīghram iti saumitrim abravīt 4.037.011a ity uktvā kāñcanaṃ yānaṃ sugrīvaḥ sūryasaṃnibham
GE09ram_1-7u:11179: 4.037.011c bṛhadbhir haribhir yuktam āruroha salakṣmaṇaḥ 4.037.012a pāṇḍureṇātapatreṇa dhriyamāṇena mūrdhani
GE09ram_1-7u:11180: 4.037.012c śuklaiś ca bālavyajanair dhūyamānaiḥ samantataḥ 4.037.013a śaṅkhabherīninādaiś ca bandibhiś cābhivanditaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11181: 4.037.013c niryayau prāpya sugrīvo rājyaśriyam anuttamām 4.037.014a sa vānaraśatais tīṣkṇair bahubhiḥ śastrapāṇibhiḥ 4.037.014c parikīrṇo yayau tatra yatra rāmo vyavasthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11182: 4.037.015a sa taṃ deśam anuprāpya śreṣṭhaṃ rāmaniṣevitam
GE09ram_1-7u:11185: 4.037.016c kṛtāñjalau sthite tasmin vānarāś cabhavaṃs tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:11186: 4.037.017a taṭākam iva tad dṛṣṭvā rāmaḥ kuḍmalapaṅkajam
GE09ram_1-7u:11187: 4.037.017c vānarāṇāṃ mahat sainyaṃ sugrīve prītimān abhūt
GE09ram_1-7u:11188: 4.037.018a pādayoḥ patitaṃ mūrdhnā tam utthāpya harīśvaram
GE09ram_1-7u:11189: 4.037.018c preṃṇā ca bahumānāc ca rāghavaḥ pariṣasvaje
GE09ram_1-7u:11191: 4.037.019c taṃ niṣaṇṇaṃ tato dṛṣṭvā kṣitau rāmo 'bravīd vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11192: 4.037.020a dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca kāle yas tu niṣevate
GE09ram_1-7u:11193: 4.037.020c vibhajya satataṃ vīra sa rājā harisattama
GE09ram_1-7u:11194: 4.037.021a hitvā dharmaṃ tathārthaṃ ca kāmaṃ yas tu niṣevate 4.037.021c sa vṛkṣāgre yathā suptaḥ patitaḥ pratibudhyate
GE09ram_1-7u:11195: 4.037.022a amitrāṇāṃ vadhe yukto mitrāṇāṃ saṃgrahe rataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11196: 4.037.022c trivargaphalabhoktā tu rājā dharmeṇa yujyate 4.037.023a udyogasamayas tv eṣa prāptaḥ śatruvināśana 4.037.023c saṃcintyatāṃ hi piṅgeśa haribhiḥ saha mantribhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11197: 4.037.024a evam uktas tu sugrīvo rāmaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:11198: 4.037.025a pranaṣṭā śrīś ca kīrtiś ca kapirājyaṃ ca śāśvatam 4.037.025c tvatprasādān mahābāho punaḥ prāptam idaṃ mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:11199: 4.037.026a tava devaprasadāc ca bhrātuś ca jayatāṃ vara
GE09ram_1-7u:11200: 4.037.026c kṛtaṃ na pratikuryād yaḥ puruṣāṇāṃ sa dūṣakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11201: 4.037.027a ete vānaramukhyāś ca śataśaḥ śatrusūdana 4.037.027c prāptāś cādāya balinaḥ pṛthivyāṃ sarvavānarān 4.037.028a ṛkṣāś cāvahitāḥ śūrā golāṅgūlāś ca rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:11204: 4.037.029c svaiḥ svaiḥ parivṛtāḥ sainyair vartante pathi rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:11205: 4.037.030a śataiḥ śatasahasraiś ca koṭibhiś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11206: 4.037.030c ayutaiś cāvṛtā vīrā śaṅkubhiś ca paraṃtapa
GE09ram_1-7u:11207: 4.037.031a arbudair arbudaśatair madhyaiś cāntaiś ca vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11208: 4.037.031c samudraiś ca parārdhaiś ca harayo hariyūthapāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11210: 4.037.032c merumandarasaṃkāśā vindhyamerukṛtālayāḥ 4.037.033a te tvām abhigamiṣyanti rākṣasaṃ ye sabāndhavam
GE09ram_1-7u:11211: 4.037.033c nihatya rāvaṇaṃ saṃkhye hy ānayiṣyanti maithilīm
GE09ram_1-7u:11212: 4.037.034a tatas tam udyogam avekṣya buddhimān; haripravīrasya nideśavartinaḥ 4.037.034c babhūva harṣād vasudhādhipātmajaḥ;
GE09ram_1-7u:11214: 4.038.001a iti bruvāṇaṃ sugrīvaṃ rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11216: 4.038.002a yad indro varṣate varṣaṃ na tac citraṃ bhaved bhuvi
GE09ram_1-7u:11217: 4.038.002c ādityo vā sahasrāṃśuḥ kuryād vitimiraṃ nabhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11218: 4.038.003a candramā raśmibhiḥ kuryāt pṛthivīṃ saumya nirmalām
GE09ram_1-7u:11219: 4.038.003c tvadvidho vāpi mitrāṇāṃ pratikuryāt paraṃtapa 4.038.004a evaṃ tvayi na tac citraṃ bhaved yat saumya śobhanam
GE09ram_1-7u:11220: 4.038.004c jānāmy ahaṃ tvāṃ sugrīva satataṃ priyavādinam
GE09ram_1-7u:11221: 4.038.005a tvatsanāthaḥ sakhe saṃkhye jetāsmi sakalān arīn
GE09ram_1-7u:11222: 4.038.005c tvam eva me suhṛn mitraṃ sāhāyyaṃ kartum arhasi 4.038.006a jahārātmavināśāya vaidehīṃ rākṣasādhamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11223: 4.038.006c vañcayitvā tu paulomīm anuhlādo yathā śacīm
GE09ram_1-7u:11224: 4.038.007a nacirāt taṃ haniṣyāmi rāvaṇaṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11225: 4.038.007c paulomyāḥ pitaraṃ dṛptaṃ śatakratur ivārihā 4.038.008a etasminn antare caiva rajaḥ samabhivartata 4.038.008c uṣṇāṃ tīvrāṃ sahasrāṃśoś chādayad gagane prabhām
GE09ram_1-7u:11226: 4.038.009a diśaḥ paryākulāś cāsan rajasā tena mūrchitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11227: 4.038.009c cacāla ca mahī sarvā saśailavanakānanā 4.038.010a tato nagendrasaṃkāśais tīkṣṇa daṃṣṭrair mahābalaiḥ 4.038.010c kṛtsnā saṃchāditā bhūmir asaṃkhyeyaiḥ plavaṃgamaiḥ 4.038.011a nimeṣāntaramātreṇa tatas tair hariyūthapaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11229: 4.038.012a nādeyaiḥ pārvatīyaiś ca sāmudraiś ca mahābalaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11230: 4.038.012c haribhir meghanirhrādair anyaiś ca vanacāribhiḥ 4.038.013a taruṇādityavarṇaiś ca śaśigauraiś ca vānaraiḥ 4.038.013c padmakesaravarṇaiś ca śvetair merukṛtālayaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11231: 4.038.014a koṭīsahasrair daśabhiḥ śrīmān parivṛtas tadā 4.038.014c vīraḥ śatabalir nāma vānaraḥ pratyadṛśyata 4.038.015a tataḥ kāñcanaśailābhas tārāyā vīryavān pitā 4.038.015c anekair daśasāhasraiḥ koṭibhiḥ pratyadṛśyata
GE09ram_1-7u:11234: 4.038.017c pitā hanumataḥ śrīmān kesarī pratyadṛśyata 4.038.018a golāṅgūlamahārājo gavākṣo
GE09ram_1-7u:11238: 4.038.020a mahācalanibhair ghoraiḥ panaso nāma yūthapaḥ 4.038.020c ājagāma mahāvīryas tisṛbhiḥ koṭibhir vṛtaḥ 4.038.021a nīlāñjanacayākāro nīlo nāmātha yūthapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11239: 4.038.021c adṛśyata mahākāyaḥ koṭibhir daśabhir vṛtaḥ 4.038.022a darīmukhaś ca balavān yūthapo 'bhyāyayau tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:11241: 4.038.023a maindaś ca dvividaś cobhāv aśviputrau mahāvalau
GE09ram_1-7u:11243: 4.038.024a tataḥ koṭisahasrāṇāṃ sahasreṇa śatena ca 4.038.024c pṛṣṭhato 'nugataḥ prāpto haribhir gandhamādanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11244: 4.038.025a tataḥ padmasahasreṇa vṛtaḥ śaṅkuśatena ca 4.038.025c yuvarājo 'ṅgadaḥ prāptaḥ pitṛtulyaparākramaḥ 4.038.026a tatas tārādyutis tāro harir bhīmaparākramaḥ 4.038.026c pañcabhir harikoṭībhir dūrataḥ pratyadṛśyata
GE09ram_1-7u:11245: 4.038.027a indrajānuḥ kapir vīro yūthapaḥ pratyadṛśyata 4.038.027c ekādaśānāṃ koṭīnām īśvaras taiś ca saṃvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11246: 4.038.028a tato rambhas tv anuprāptas taruṇādityasaṃnibhaḥ 4.038.028c ayutena vṛtaś caiva sahasreṇa śatena ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11247: 4.038.029a tato yūthapatir vīro durmukho nāma vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11248: 4.038.029c pratyadṛśyata koṭibhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ parivṛto balī 4.038.030a kailāsaśikharākārair vānarair bhīmavikramaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11250: 4.038.031a nalaś cāpi mahāvīryaḥ saṃvṛto drumavāsibhiḥ 4.038.031c koṭīśatena saṃprāptaḥ sahasreṇa śatena ca 4.038.032a śarabhaḥ kumudo vahnir vānaro rambha eva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11251: 4.038.032c ete cānye ca bahavo vānarāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11252: 4.038.033a āvṛtya pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ parvatāṃś ca vanāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11253: 4.038.033c āplavantaḥ plavantaś ca garjantaś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11254: 4.038.033e abhyavartanta sugrīvaṃ sūryam abhragaṇā iva 4.038.034a kurvāṇā bahuśabdāṃś ca prahṛṣṭā balaśālinaḥ 4.038.034c śirobhir vānarendrāya sugrīvāya nyavedayan
GE09ram_1-7u:11255: 4.038.035a apare vānaraśreṣṭhāḥ saṃgamya ca yathocitam 4.038.035c sugrīveṇa samāgamya sthitāḥ prāñjalayas tadā 4.038.036a sugrīvas tvarito rāme sarvāṃs tān vānararṣabhān
GE09ram_1-7u:11256: 4.038.036c nivedayitvā dharmajñaḥ sthitaḥ prāñjalir abravīt 4.038.037a yathā sukhaṃ parvatanirjhareṣu; vaneṣu sarveṣu ca vānarendrāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11257: 4.038.037c niveśayitvā vidhivad balāni; balaṃ balajñaḥ pratipattum īṣṭe
GE09ram_1-7u:11258: 4.039.001a atha rājā samṛddhārthaḥ sugrīvaḥ plavageśvaraḥ 4.039.001c uvāca naraśārdūlaṃ rāmaṃ parabalārdanam
GE09ram_1-7u:11259: 4.039.002a āgatā viniviṣṭāś ca balinaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ 4.039.002c vānarendrā mahendrābhā ye
GE09ram_1-7u:11260: 4.039.003a ta ime bahusāhasrair haribhir bhīmavikramaiḥ 4.039.003c āgatā vānarā ghorā daityadānavasaṃnibhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11264: 4.039.005c koṭyagraśa ime prāptā vānarās tava kiṃkarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11265: 4.039.006a nideśavartinaḥ sarve sarve guruhite ratāḥ 4.039.006c abhipretam anuṣṭhātuṃ tava śakṣyanty ariṃdama 4.039.007a yan manyase naravyāghra prāptakālaṃ tad ucyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:11266: 4.039.007c tat sainyaṃ tvadvaśe yuktam ājñāpayitum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:11267: 4.039.008a kāmam eṣām idaṃ kāryaṃ viditaṃ mama tattvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11268: 4.039.008c tathāpi tu yathā tattvam ājñāpayitum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:11269: 4.039.009a tathā bruvāṇaṃ sugrīvaṃ rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ 4.039.009c bāhubhyāṃ saṃpariṣvajya idaṃ vacanam abravīt 4.039.010a jñāyatāṃ saumya vaidehī yadi jīvati vā na vā 4.039.010c sa ca deśo mahāprājña yasmin vasati rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11270: 4.039.011a adhigamya ca vaidehīṃ nilayaṃ rāvaṇasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11271: 4.039.011c prāptakālaṃ vidhāsyāmi tasmin kāle saha tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:11272: 4.039.012a nāham asmin prabhuḥ kārye vānareśa na lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11273: 4.039.012c tvam asya hetuḥ kāryasya prabhuś ca plavageśvara
GE09ram_1-7u:11274: 4.039.013a tvam evājñāpaya vibho mama kāryaviniścayam 4.039.013c tvaṃ hi jānāsi yat kāryaṃ mama vīra na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11277: 4.039.015a evam uktas tu sugrīvo vinataṃ nāma yūthapam
GE09ram_1-7u:11278: 4.039.015c abravīd rāma sāmnidhye lakṣmaṇasya ca dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11284: 4.039.018a tatra sītāṃ ca vaidehīṃ nilayaṃ rāvaṇasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11285: 4.039.018c mārgadhvaṃ giridurgeṣu vaneṣu ca nadīṣu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11286: 4.039.019a nadīṃ bhāgīrathīṃ ramyāṃ sarayūṃ kauśikīṃ tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:11287: 4.039.019c kālindīṃ yamunāṃ ramyāṃ yāmunaṃ ca mahāgirim
GE09ram_1-7u:11288: 4.039.020a sarasvatīṃ ca sindhuṃ ca śoṇaṃ maṇinibhodakam
GE09ram_1-7u:11290: 4.039.021a brahmamālān videhāṃś ca mālavān kāśikosalān 4.039.021c māgadhāṃś ca mahāgrāmān puṇḍrān vaṅgāṃs tathaiva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11291: 4.039.022a pattanaṃ kośakārāṇāṃ bhūmiṃ ca rajatākarām 4.039.022c sarvam etad vicetavyaṃ mṛgayadbhir tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11292: 4.039.023a rāmasya dayitāṃ bhāryāṃ sītāṃ daśarataḥ snuṣām
GE09ram_1-7u:11293: 4.039.023c samudram avagāḍhāṃś ca parvatān pattanāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11294: 4.039.024a mandarasya ca ye koṭiṃ saṃśritāḥ ke cid āyatām 4.039.024c karṇaprāvaraṇāś caiva tathā cāpy oṣṭhakarṇakāḥ 4.039.025a ghorā lohamukhāś caiva javanāś caikapādakāḥ 4.039.025c akṣayā balavantaś ca puruṣāḥ puruṣādakāḥ 4.039.026a kirātāḥ karṇacūḍāś ca hemāṅgāḥ priyadarśanāḥ 4.039.026c āmamīnāśanās tatra kirātā dvīpavāsinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11295: 4.039.027a antarjalacarā ghorā naravyāghrā iti śrutāḥ 4.039.027c eteṣām ālayāḥ sarve viceyāḥ kānanaukasaḥ 4.039.028a giribhir ye ca gamyante plavanena plavena ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11298: 4.039.029c yavadvīpam atikramya śiśiro nāma parvataḥ 4.039.030a divaṃ spṛśati śṛṅgeṇa devadānavasevitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11299: 4.039.030c eteṣāṃ giridurgeṣu pratāpeṣu vaneṣu ca 4.039.031a rāvaṇaḥ saha vaidehyā mārgitavyas tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11300: 4.039.031c tataḥ samudradvīpāṃś ca subhīmān draṣṭum arhatha
GE09ram_1-7u:11301: 4.039.032a tatrāsurā mahākāyāś chāyāṃ gṛhṇanti nityaśaḥ 4.039.032c brahmaṇā samanujñātā dīrghakālaṃ bubhukṣitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11304: 4.039.034a tato raktajalaṃ bhīmaṃ lohitaṃ nāma sāgaram
GE09ram_1-7u:11305: 4.039.034c gatā drakṣyatha tāṃ caiva bṛhatīṃ kūṭaśālmalīm
GE09ram_1-7u:11308: 4.039.036a tatra śailanibhā bhīmā mandehā nāma rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11310: 4.039.037a te patanti jale nityaṃ sūryasyodayanaṃ prati
GE09ram_1-7u:11311: 4.039.037c abhitaptāś ca sūryeṇa lambante sma punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11312: 4.039.038a tataḥ pāṇḍurameghābhaṃ kṣīraudaṃ nāma sāgaram 4.039.038c gatā drakṣyatha durdharṣā mukhā hāram ivormibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11313: 4.039.039a tasya madhye mahāśveta ṛṣabho nāma parvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11314: 4.039.039c divyagandhaiḥ kusumitai rajataiś ca nagair vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11315: 4.039.040a saraś ca rājataiḥ padmair jvalitair hemakesaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11316: 4.039.040c nāmnā sudarśanaṃ nāma rājahaṃsaiḥ samākulam 4.039.041a vibudhāś cāraṇā yakṣāḥ kiṃnarāḥ sāpsarogaṇāḥ 4.039.041c hṛṣṭāḥ samabhigacchanti nalinīṃ tāṃ riraṃsavaḥ 4.039.042a kṣīrodaṃ samatikramya tato drakṣyatha vānarāḥ 4.039.042c jalodaṃ sāgaraśreṣṭhaṃ sarvabhūtabhayāvaham
GE09ram_1-7u:11317: 4.039.043a tatra tat kopajaṃ tejaḥ kṛtaṃ hayamukhaṃ mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:11318: 4.039.043c asyāhus tan mahāvegam odanaṃ sacarācaram 4.039.044a tatra vikrośatāṃ nādo bhūtānāṃ sāgaraukasām 4.039.044c śrūyate cāsamarthānāṃ dṛṣṭvā tad vaḍavāmukham 4.039.045a svādūdasyottare deśe yojanāni trayodaśa
GE09ram_1-7u:11322: 4.039.047a triśirāḥ kāñcanaḥ ketus tālas tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11324: 4.039.048a pūrvasyāṃ diśi nirmāṇaṃ kṛtaṃ tat tridaśeśvaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11325: 4.039.048c tataḥ paraṃ hemamayaḥ śrīmān udayaparvataḥ 4.039.049a tasya koṭir divaṃ spṛṣṭvā śatayojanam āyatā
GE09ram_1-7u:11327: 4.039.050a sālais tālais tamālaiś ca karṇikāraiś ca puṣpitaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11330: 4.039.051c śṛṅgaṃ saumanasaṃ nāma jātarūpamayaṃ dhruvam 4.039.052a tatra pūrvaṃ padaṃ kṛtvā purā viṣṇus trivikrame
GE09ram_1-7u:11331: 4.039.052c dvitīyaṃ śikharaṃ meroś cakāra puruṣottamaḥ 4.039.053a uttareṇa parikramya jambūdvīpaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:11332: 4.039.053c dṛśyo bhavati bhūyiṣṭhaṃ śikharaṃ tan mahocchrayam
GE09ram_1-7u:11333: 4.039.054a tatra vaikhānasā nāma vālakhilyā maharṣayaḥ 4.039.054c prakāśamānā dṛśyante sūryavarṇās tapasvinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11334: 4.039.055a ayaṃ sudarśano dvīpaḥ puro yasya prakāśate
GE09ram_1-7u:11335: 4.039.055c yasmiṃs tejaś ca cakṣuś ca sarvaprānabhṛtām api
GE09ram_1-7u:11336: 4.039.056a śailasya tasya kuñjeṣu kandareṣu vaneṣu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11337: 4.039.056c rāvaṇaḥ saha vaidehyā mārgitavyas tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11338: 4.039.057a kāñcanasya ca śailasya sūryasya ca mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11339: 4.039.057c āviṣṭā tejasā saṃdhyā pūrvā raktā prakāśate
GE09ram_1-7u:11340: 4.039.058a tataḥ paramagamyā syād dik pūrvā tridaśāvṛtā
GE09ram_1-7u:11342: 4.039.059a śaileṣu teṣu sarveṣu kandareṣu vaneṣu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11343: 4.039.059c ya ca noktā mayā deśā viceyā teṣu jānakī 4.039.060a etāvad vānaraiḥ śakyaṃ gantuṃ vānarapuṃgavāḥ 4.039.060c abhāskaram amaryādaṃ na jānīmas tataḥ param
GE09ram_1-7u:11344: 4.039.061a adhigamya tu vaidehīṃ nilayaṃ rāvaṇasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11345: 4.039.061c māse pūrṇe nivartadhvam udayaṃ prāpya parvatam
GE09ram_1-7u:11346: 4.039.062a ūrdhvaṃ māsān na vastavyaṃ vasan vadhyo bhaven mama 4.039.062c siddhārthāḥ saṃnivartadhvam adhigamya ca maithilīm 4.039.063a mahendrakāntāṃ vanaṣaṇḍa maṇḍitāṃ; diśaṃ caritvā nipuṇena
GE09ram_1-7u:11348: 4.039.063c avāpya sītāṃ raghuvaṃśajapriyāṃ; tato nivṛttāḥ sukhito
GE09ram_1-7u:11350: 4.040.001a tataḥ prasthāpya sugrīvas tan mahad vānaraṃ balam
GE09ram_1-7u:11351: 4.040.001c dakṣiṇāṃ preṣayām āsa vānarān abhilakṣitān 4.040.002a nīlam agnisutaṃ caiva hanumantaṃ ca vānaram
GE09ram_1-7u:11353: 4.040.003a suhotraṃ ca śarīraṃ ca śaragulmaṃ tathaiva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11354: 4.040.003c gajaṃ gavākṣaṃ gavayaṃ suṣeṇam ṛṣabhaṃ tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:11355: 4.040.004a maindaṃ ca dvividaṃ caiva vijayaṃ gandhamādanam
GE09ram_1-7u:11356: 4.040.004c ulkāmukham asaṅgaṃ ca hutāśana sutāv ubhau
GE09ram_1-7u:11359: 4.040.006a teṣām agreṣaraṃ caiva mahad balam asaṃgagam
GE09ram_1-7u:11360: 4.040.006c vidhāya harivīrāṇām ādiśad dakṣiṇāṃ diśam 4.040.007a ye ke cana samuddeśās tasyāṃ diśi sudurgamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11361: 4.040.007c kapīśaḥ kapimukhyānāṃ sa teṣāṃ tān udāharat
GE09ram_1-7u:11363: 4.040.008c narmadāṃ ca nadīṃ durgāṃ mahoraganiṣevitām 4.040.009a tato godāvarīṃ ramyāṃ kṛṣṇāveṇīṃ mahānadīm 4.040.009c varadāṃ ca mahābhāgāṃ mahoraganiṣevitām
GE09ram_1-7u:11364: 4.040.010a mekhalān utkalāṃś caiva daśārṇanagarāṇy api 4.040.010c avantīm abhravantīṃ ca sarvam evānupaśyata 4.040.011a vidarbhān ṛṣikāṃś caiva ramyān māhiṣakān api
GE09ram_1-7u:11365: 4.040.011c tathā baṅgān kaliṅgāṃś ca kauśikāṃś ca samantataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11367: 4.040.012c nadīṃ godāvarīṃ caiva sarvam evānupaśyata 4.040.013a tathaivāndhrāṃś ca puṇḍrāṃś ca colān pāṇḍyān sakeralān
GE09ram_1-7u:11368: 4.040.013c ayomukhaś ca gantavyaḥ parvato dhātumaṇḍitaḥ 4.040.014a vicitraśikharaḥ śrīmāṃś
GE09ram_1-7u:11370: 4.040.015a tatas tām āpagāṃ divyāṃ prasannasalilāṃ śivām
GE09ram_1-7u:11371: 4.040.015c tatra drakṣyatha kāverīṃ vihṛtām apsarogaṇaiḥ 4.040.016a tasyāsīnaṃ nagasyāgre malayasya mahaujasaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:11375: 4.040.018a sā candanavanair divyaiḥ pracchannā dvīpa śālinī
GE09ram_1-7u:11376: 4.040.018c kānteva yuvatiḥ kāntaṃ samudram avagāhate 4.040.019a tato hemamayaṃ divyaṃ muktāmaṇivibhūṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:11377: 4.040.019c yuktaṃ kavāṭaṃ pāṇḍyānāṃ gatā drakṣyatha vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11382: 4.040.022a nānāvidhair nagaiḥ phullair latābhiś copaśobhitam 4.040.022c devarṣiyakṣapravarair apsarobhiś ca sevitam
GE09ram_1-7u:11384: 4.040.023c tam upaiti sahasrākṣaḥ sadā parvasu parvasu
GE09ram_1-7u:11385: 4.040.024a dvīpas tasyāpare pāre śatayojanam āyataḥ 4.040.024c agamyo mānuṣair dīptas taṃ mārgadhvaṃ samantataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11386: 4.040.024e tatra sarvātmanā sītā mārgitavyā viśeṣataḥ 4.040.025a sa hi deśas tu vadhyasya rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11388: 4.040.026a dakṣiṇasya samudrasya madhye tasya tu rākṣasī
GE09ram_1-7u:11389: 4.040.026c aṅgāraketi vikhyātā chāyām ākṣipya bhojinī 4.040.027a tam atikramya lakṣmīvān samudre śatayojane 4.040.027c giriḥ puṣpitako nāma siddhacāraṇasevitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11390: 4.040.028a candrasūryāṃśusaṃkāśaḥ sāgarāmbusamāvṛtaḥ 4.040.028c bhrājate vipulaiḥ śṛṅgair ambaraṃ vilikhann iva
GE09ram_1-7u:11391: 4.040.029a tasyaikaṃ kāñcanaṃ śṛṅgaṃ sevate yaṃ divākaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11392: 4.040.029c śvetaṃ rājatam ekaṃ ca sevate yaṃ niśākaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11393: 4.040.030a na taṃ kṛtaghnāḥ paśyanti na nṛśaṃsā na nāstikāḥ 4.040.030c praṇamya śirasā śailaṃ taṃ vimārgata vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11394: 4.040.031a tam atikramya durdharṣāḥ sūryavān nāma parvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11396: 4.040.032a tatas tam apy atikramya vaidyuto nāma parvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11398: 4.040.033a tatra bhuktvā varārhāṇi mūlāni ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11399: 4.040.033c madhūni pītvā mukhyāni paraṃ gacchata vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11400: 4.040.034a tatra netramanaḥkāntaḥ kuñjaro nāma parvataḥ 4.040.034c agastyabhavanaṃ yatra nirmitaṃ viśvakarmaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:11403: 4.040.036a tatra bhogavatī nāma sarpāṇām ālayaḥ purī
GE09ram_1-7u:11405: 4.040.036e rakṣitā pannagair ghorais tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭrair mahāviṣaiḥ 4.040.037a sarparājo mahāghoro yasyāṃ vasati vāsukiḥ 4.040.037c niryāya mārgitavyā ca sā ca bhogavatī purī
GE09ram_1-7u:11406: 4.040.038a taṃ ca deśam atikramya mahān ṛṣabhasaṃsthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11407: 4.040.038c sarvaratnamayaḥ śrīmān ṛṣabho nāma parvataḥ 4.040.039a gośīrṣakaṃ padmakaṃ ca hariśyāmaṃ ca candanam
GE09ram_1-7u:11408: 4.040.039c divyam utpadyate yatra tac caivāgnisamaprabham 4.040.040a na tu tac candanaṃ dṛṣṭvā spraṣṭavyaṃ ca kadā cana
GE09ram_1-7u:11409: 4.040.040c rohitā nāma gandharvā ghorā rakṣanti tad vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:11411: 4.040.041c śailūṣo grāmaṇīr bhikṣuḥ śubhro babhrus tathaiva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11412: 4.040.042a ante pṛthivyā durdharṣās tatra svargajitaḥ sthitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11413: 4.040.042c tataḥ paraṃ na vaḥ sevyaḥ pitṛlokaḥ sudāruṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11415: 4.040.043a etāvad eva yuṣmābhir vīrā vānarapuṃgavāḥ 4.040.043c śakyaṃ vicetuṃ gantuṃ vā nāto gatimatāṃ gatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11416: 4.040.044a sarvam etat samālokya yac cānyad api dṛśyate
GE09ram_1-7u:11417: 4.040.044c gatiṃ viditvā vaidehyāḥ saṃnivartitam arhatha 4.040.045a yas tu māsān nivṛtto 'gre dṛṣṭā sīteti vakṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:11418: 4.040.045c mattulyavibhavo bhogaiḥ sukhaṃ sa vihariṣyati 4.040.046a tataḥ priyataro nāsti mama prāṇād viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11419: 4.040.046c kṛtāparādho bahuśo mama bandhur bhaviṣyati 4.040.047a amitabalaparākramā bhavanto; vipulaguṇeṣu kuleṣu ca prasūtāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11420: 4.040.047c manujapatisutāṃ yathā labhadhvaṃ; tad adhiguṇaṃ puruṣārtham
GE09ram_1-7u:11422: 4.041.001a tataḥ prasthāpya sugrīvas tān harīn dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE09ram_1-7u:11423: 4.041.001c buddhivikramasaṃpannān vāyuvegasamāñjave 4.041.002a athāhūya mahātejāḥ suṣeṇaṃ nāma yūthapam 4.041.002c tārāyāḥ pitaraṃ rājā śvaśurabhīmavikramam
GE09ram_1-7u:11424: 4.041.003a abravīt prāñjalir vākyam abhigamya praṇamya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11427: 4.041.004c abhigaccha diśaṃ saumya paścimāṃ vāruṇīṃ prabho
GE09ram_1-7u:11428: 4.041.005a surāṣṭrān saha bāhlīkāñ śūrābhīrāṃs tathaiva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11429: 4.041.005c sphītāñjanapadān ramyān vipulāni purāṇi ca 4.041.006a puṃnāgagahanaṃ kukṣiṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:11430: 4.041.006c tathā ketakaṣaṇḍāṃś ca mārgadhvaṃ hariyūthapāḥ 4.041.007a pratyak srotogamāś caiva nadyaḥ śītajalāḥ śivāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11431: 4.041.007c tāpasānām araṇyāni kāntārā girayaś ca ye
GE09ram_1-7u:11432: 4.041.008a girijālāvṛtāṃ durgāṃ mārgitvā paścimāṃ diśam 4.041.008c tataḥ paścimam āsādya samudraṃ draṣṭum arhatha
GE09ram_1-7u:11433: 4.041.008e timi nakrāyuta jalam akṣobhyam atha vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11436: 4.041.010a tatra sītāṃ ca mārgadhvaṃ nilayaṃ rāvaṇasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11437: 4.041.010c marīcipattanaṃ caiva ramyaṃ caiva jaṭīpuram 4.041.011a avantīm aṅgalopāṃ ca tathā cālakṣitaṃ vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:11438: 4.041.011c rāṣṭrāṇi ca viśālāni pattanāni tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11439: 4.041.012a sindhusāgarayoś caiva saṃgame tatra parvataḥ 4.041.012c mahān hemagirir nāma śataśṛṅgo mahādrumaḥ 4.041.013a tasya prastheṣu ramyeṣu siṃhāḥ pakṣagamāḥ sthitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11440: 4.041.013c timimatsyagajāṃś caiva nīḍāny āropayanti te 4.041.014a tāni nīḍāni siṃhānāṃ giriśṛṅgagatāś ca ye
GE09ram_1-7u:11441: 4.041.014c dṛptās tṛptāś ca mātaṅgās toyadasvananiḥsvanāḥ 4.041.014e vicaranti viśāle 'smiṃs toyapūrṇe samantataḥ 4.041.015a tasya śṛṅgaṃ divasparśaṃ kāñcanaṃ citrapādapam 4.041.015c sarvam āśu vicetavyaṃ kapibhiḥ kāmarūpibhiḥ 4.041.016a koṭiṃ tatra samudre tu kāñcanīṃ śatayojanam
GE09ram_1-7u:11442: 4.041.016c durdarśāṃ pariyātrasya gatā drakṣyatha vānarāḥ 4.041.017a koṭyas tatra caturviṃśad gandharvāṇāṃ tarasvinām 4.041.017c vasanty agninikāśānāṃ ghorāṇāṃ kāmarūpiṇām
GE09ram_1-7u:11444: 4.041.018c nādeyaṃ ca phalaṃ tasmād deśāt kiṃ cit plavaṃgamaiḥ 4.041.019a durāsadā hi te vīrāḥ sattvavanto mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11445: 4.041.019c phalamūlāni te tatra rakṣante bhīmavikramāḥ 4.041.020a tatra yatnaś ca kartavyo mārgitavyā ca jānakī
GE09ram_1-7u:11446: 4.041.020c na hi tebhyo bhayaṃ kiṃ cit kapitvam anuvartatām 4.041.021a caturbhāge samudrasya cakravān nāma parvataḥ 4.041.021c tatra cakraṃ sahasrāraṃ nirmitaṃ viśvakarmaṇā 4.041.022a tatra pañcajanaṃ hatvā hayagrīvaṃ ca dānavam
GE09ram_1-7u:11447: 4.041.022c ājahāra tataś cakraṃ śaṅkhaṃ ca puruṣottamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11448: 4.041.023a tasya sānuṣu citreṣu viśālāsu guhāsu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11449: 4.041.023c rāvaṇaḥ saha vaidehyā mārgitavyas tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11450: 4.041.024a yojanāni catuḥṣaṣṭir varāho nāma parvataḥ 4.041.024c suvarṇaśṛṅgaḥ suśrīmān agādhe varuṇālaye
GE09ram_1-7u:11451: 4.041.025a tatra prāgjyotiṣaṃ nāma jātarūpamayaṃ puram 4.041.025c yasmin vasti duṣṭātmā narako nāma guhāsu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11452: 4.041.026a tasya sānuṣu citreṣu viśālāsu guhāsu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11453: 4.041.026c rāvaṇaḥ saha vaidehyā mārgitavyas tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11456: 4.041.028a taṃ gajāś ca varāhāś ca siṃhā vyāghrāś ca sarvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11457: 4.041.028c abhigarjanti satataṃ tena śabdena darpitāḥ 4.041.029a tasmin harihayaḥ śrīmān mahendraḥ pākaśāsanaḥ 4.041.029c abhiṣiktaḥ surai rājā meghavān nāma parvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11462: 4.041.032a teṣāṃ madhye sthito rājā merur uttamaparvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11463: 4.041.032c ādityena prasannena śailo dattavaraḥ purā 4.041.033a tenaivam uktaḥ śailendraḥ sarva eva tvadāśrayāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11464: 4.041.033c matprasādād bhaviṣyanti divārātrau ca kāñcanāḥ 4.041.034a tvayi ye cāpi vatsyanti devagandharvadānavāḥ 4.041.034c te bhaviṣyanti raktāś ca prabhayā kāñcanaprabhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11465: 4.041.035a ādityā vasavo rudrā marutaś ca divaukasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11466: 4.041.035c āgamya paścimāṃ saṃdhyāṃ merum uttamaparvatam 4.041.036a ādityam upatiṣṭhanti taiś ca sūryo 'bhipūjitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11467: 4.041.036c adṛśyaḥ sarvabhūtānām astaṃ gacchati parvatam 4.041.037a yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi daśatāni divākaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11468: 4.041.037c muhūrtārdhena taṃ śīghram abhiyāti śiloccayam 4.041.038a śṛṅge tasya mahad divyaṃ bhavanaṃ sūryasaṃnibham
GE09ram_1-7u:11472: 4.041.040a antarā merum astaṃ ca tālo daśaśirā mahān
GE09ram_1-7u:11474: 4.041.041a teṣu sarveṣu durgeṣu saraḥsu ca saritsu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11475: 4.041.041c rāvaṇaḥ saha vaidehyā mārgitavyas tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11476: 4.041.042a yatra tiṣṭhati dharmātmā tapasā svena bhāvitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11477: 4.041.042c merusāvarṇir ity eva khyāto vai brahmaṇā samaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11479: 4.041.043c praṇamya śirasā bhūmau pravṛttiṃ maithilīṃ prati
GE09ram_1-7u:11481: 4.041.044c kṛtvā vitimiraṃ sarvam astaṃ gacchati parvatam
GE09ram_1-7u:11482: 4.041.045a etāvad vānaraiḥ śakyaṃ gantuṃ vānarapuṃgavāḥ 4.041.045c abhāskaram amaryādaṃ na jānīmas tataḥ param
GE09ram_1-7u:11483: 4.041.046a adhigamya tu vaidehīṃ nilayaṃ rāvaṇasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11484: 4.041.046c astaṃ parvatam āsādya pūrṇe māse nivartata
GE09ram_1-7u:11485: 4.041.047a ūrdhvaṃ māsān na vastavyaṃ vasan vadhyo bhaven mama 4.041.047c sahaiva śūro yuṣmābhiḥ śvaśuro me gamiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:11486: 4.041.048a śrotavyaṃ sarvam etasya bhavadbhir diṣṭa kāribhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11487: 4.041.048c gurur eṣa mahābāhuḥ śvaśuro me mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11488: 4.041.049a bhavantaś cāpi vikrāntāḥ pramāṇaṃ sarvakarmasu 4.041.049c pramāṇam enaṃ saṃsthāpya paśyadhvaṃ paścimāṃ diśam
GE09ram_1-7u:11489: 4.041.050a dṛṣṭāyāṃ tu narendrasyā patnyām amitatejasaḥ 4.041.050c kṛtakṛtyā bhaviṣyāmaḥ kṛtasya pratikarmaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:11490: 4.041.051a ato 'nyad api yat kiṃ cit kāryasyāsya hitaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_1-7u:11492: 4.041.052a tataḥ suṣeṇa pramukhāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ; sugrīvavākyaṃ nipuṇaṃ niśamya
GE09ram_1-7u:11493: 4.041.052c āmantrya sarve plavagādhipaṃ te; jagmur diśaṃ tāṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:11495: 4.042.001a tataḥ saṃdiśya sugrīvaḥ śvaśuraṃ paścimāṃ diśam
GE09ram_1-7u:11496: 4.042.001c vīraṃ śatabaliṃ nāma vānaraṃ vānararṣabhaḥ 4.042.002a uvāca rājā mantrajñaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11497: 4.042.002c vākyam ātmahitaṃ caiva rāmasya ca hitaṃ tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:11499: 4.042.003c vaivasvata sutaiḥ sārdhaṃ pratiṣṭhasva svamantribhiḥ 4.042.004a diśaṃ hy udīcīṃ vikrāntāṃ himaśailāvataṃsakām 4.042.004c sarvataḥ parimārgadhvaṃ rāmapatnīm aninditām
GE09ram_1-7u:11500: 4.042.005a asmin kārye vinivṛtte kṛte dāśaratheḥ priye
GE09ram_1-7u:11501: 4.042.005c ṛṇān muktā bhaviṣyāmaḥ kṛtārthārthavidāṃ varāḥ 4.042.006a kṛtaṃ hi priyam asmākaṃ rāghaveṇa mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:11502: 4.042.006c tasya cet pratikāro 'sti saphalaṃ jīvitaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_1-7u:11503: 4.042.007a etāṃ buddhiṃ samāsthāya dṛśyate jānakī yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:11505: 4.042.008a ayaṃ hi sarvabhūtānāṃ mānyas tu narasattamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11507: 4.042.009a imāni vanadurgāṇi nadyaḥ śailāntarāṇi ca 4.042.009c bhavantaḥ parimārgaṃs tu
GE09ram_1-7u:11508: 4.042.010a tatra mlecchān pulindāṃś ca śūrasenāṃs tathāiva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11509: 4.042.010c prasthālān bharatāṃś caiva kurūṃś ca saha madrakaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11510: 4.042.011a kāmbojān yavanāṃś caiva śakān āraṭṭakān api
GE09ram_1-7u:11511: 4.042.011c bāhlīkān ṛṣikāṃś caiva pauravān atha ṭaṅkaṇān
GE09ram_1-7u:11512: 4.042.012a cīnān paramacīnāṃś ca nīhārāṃś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11513: 4.042.012c anviṣya daradāṃś caiva himavantaṃ vicinvatha 4.042.013a lodhrapadmakaṣaṇḍeṣu devadāruvaneṣu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11514: 4.042.013c rāvaṇaḥ saha vaidehya mārgitavyas tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11516: 4.042.014c kālaṃ nāma mahāsānuṃ parvataṃ taṃ gamiṣyatha
GE09ram_1-7u:11517: 4.042.015a mahatsu tasya śṛṅgeṣu nirdareṣu guhāsu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11519: 4.042.016a tam atikramya śailendraṃ hemavargaṃ mahāgirim 4.042.016c tataḥ sudarśanaṃ nāma parvataṃ gantum arhatha
GE09ram_1-7u:11520: 4.042.017a tasya kānanaṣaṇḍeṣu nirdareṣu guhāsu ca 4.042.017c rāvaṇaḥ saha vaidehyā mārgitavyas tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11521: 4.042.018a tam atikramya cākāśaṃ sarvataḥ śatayojanam 4.042.018c aparvatanadī vṛkṣaṃ sarvasattvavivarjitam
GE09ram_1-7u:11522: 4.042.019a taṃ tu śīghram atikramya kāntāraṃ romaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:11523: 4.042.019c kailāsaṃ pāṇḍuraṃ śailaṃ prāpya hṛṣṭā bhaviṣyatha
GE09ram_1-7u:11527: 4.042.021c haṃsakāraṇḍavākīrṇā apsarogaṇasevitā 4.042.022a tatra vaiśravaṇo rājā sarvabhūtanamaskṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11528: 4.042.022c dhanado ramate śrīmān guhyakaiḥ saha yakṣarāṭ
GE09ram_1-7u:11529: 4.042.023a tasya candranikaśeṣu parvateṣu guhāsu ca 4.042.023c rāvaṇaḥ saha vaidehyā mārgitavyas tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11530: 4.042.024a krauñcaṃ tu girim āsādya bilaṃ tasya sudurgamam
GE09ram_1-7u:11531: 4.042.024c apramattaiḥ praveṣṭavyaṃ duṣpraveśaṃ hi tat smṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:11532: 4.042.025a vasanti hi mahātmānas tatra sūryasamaprabhāḥ 4.042.025c devair apy arcitāḥ samyag devarūpā maharṣayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11533: 4.042.026a krauñcasya tu guhāś cānyāḥ sānūni śikharāṇi ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11534: 4.042.026c nirdarāś ca nitambāś ca vicetavyās tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11535: 4.042.027a krauñcasya śikharaṃ cāpi nirīkṣya ca tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11536: 4.042.027c avṛkṣaṃ kāmaśailaṃ ca mānasaṃ vihagālayam 4.042.028a na gatis tatra bhūtānāṃ devadānavarakṣasām 4.042.028c sa ca sarvair vicetavyaḥ sasānuprasthabhūdharaḥ 4.042.029a krauñcaṃ girim atikramya maināko nāma parvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11537: 4.042.029c mayasya bhavanaṃ tatra dānavasya svayaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:11539: 4.042.030c strīṇām aśvamukhīnāṃ ca niketās tatra tatra tu
GE09ram_1-7u:11540: 4.042.031a taṃ deśaṃ samatikramya āśramaṃ siddhasevitam 4.042.031c siddhā vaikhānasās tatra vālakhilyāś ca tāpasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11541: 4.042.032a vandyās te tu tapaḥsiddhās tāpasā vītakalmaṣāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11542: 4.042.032c praṣṭavyāś cāpi sītāyāḥ pravṛttaṃ vinayānvitaiḥ 4.042.033a hemapuṣkarasaṃchannaṃ tatra vaikhānasaṃ saraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11544: 4.042.034a aupavāhyaḥ kuberasya sarvabhauma iti smṛtaḥ 4.042.034c gajaḥ paryeti taṃ deśaṃ sadā saha kareṇubhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11547: 4.042.036a gabhastibhir ivārkasya sa tu deśaḥ prakāśate
GE09ram_1-7u:11548: 4.042.036c viśrāmyadbhis tapaḥ siddhair devakalpaiḥ svayamprabhaiḥ 4.042.037a taṃ tu deśam atikramya śailodā nāma nimnagā
GE09ram_1-7u:11549: 4.042.037c ubhayos tīrayor yasyāḥ kīcakā nāma veṇavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11550: 4.042.038a te nayanti paraṃ tīraṃ siddhān pratyānayanti ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11554: 4.042.040a raktotpalavanaiś cātra maṇḍitāś ca hiraṇmayaiḥ 4.042.040c taruṇādityasadṛśair bhānti tatra jalāśayāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11556: 4.042.041c nīlotpalavanaiś citraiḥ sa deśaḥ sarvatovṛtaḥ 4.042.042a nistulābhiś ca muktābhir maṇibhiś ca mahādhanaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11557: 4.042.042c udbhūtapulinās tatra jātarūpaiś ca nimnagāḥ 4.042.043a sarvaratnamayaiś citrair avagāḍhā nagottamaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11561: 4.042.045a nānākārāṇi vāsāṃsi phalanty anye nagottamāḥ 4.042.045c muktāvaidūryacitrāṇi bhūṣaṇāni tathaiva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11562: 4.042.046a strīṇāṃ yāny anurūpāṇi puruṣāṇāṃ tathaiva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11564: 4.042.047a mahārhāṇi vicitrāṇi haimāny anye nagottamāḥ 4.042.047c śayanāni prasūyante citrāstāraṇavanti
GE09ram_1-7u:11565: 4.042.048a manaḥkāntāni mālyāni phalanty atrāpare drumāḥ 4.042.048c pānāni ca mahārhāṇi bhakṣyāṇi vividhāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11567: 4.042.049c gandharvāḥ kiṃnarā siddhā nāgā vidyādharās tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:11568: 4.042.049e ramante sahitās tatra nārībhir bhāskaraprabhāḥ 4.042.050a sarve sukṛtakarmāṇaḥ sarve ratiparāyaṇāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11569: 4.042.050c sarve kāmārthasahitā vasanti saha yoṣitaḥ 4.042.051a gītavāditranirghoṣaḥ sotkṛṣṭahasitasvanaḥ 4.042.051c śrūyate satataṃ tatra sarvabhūtamanoharaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11570: 4.042.052a tatra nāmuditaḥ kaś cin nāsti kaś cid asatpriyaḥ 4.042.052c ahany ahani vardhante guṇās tatra manoramāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11571: 4.042.053a samatikramya taṃ deśam uttaras toyasāṃ nidhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11572: 4.042.053c tatra somagirir nāma madhye hemamayo mahān
GE09ram_1-7u:11573: 4.042.054a indralokagatā ye ca brahmalokagatāś ca ye
GE09ram_1-7u:11574: 4.042.054c devās taṃ samavekṣante girirājaṃ divaṃ gatam
GE09ram_1-7u:11575: 4.042.055a sa tu deśo visūryo 'pi tasya bhāsā prakāśate
GE09ram_1-7u:11577: 4.042.056a bhagavān api viśvātmā śambhur ekādaśātmakaḥ 4.042.056c brahmā vasati deveśo
GE09ram_1-7u:11578: 4.042.057a na kathaṃ cana gantavyaṃ kurūṇām uttareṇa vaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11579: 4.042.057c anyeṣām api bhūtānāṃ nātikrāmati vai gatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11580: 4.042.058a sā hi somagirir nāma devānām api durgamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11581: 4.042.058c tam ālokya tataḥ kṣipram upāvartitum arhatha
GE09ram_1-7u:11582: 4.042.059a etāvad vānaraiḥ śakyaṃ gantuṃ vānarapuṃgavāḥ 4.042.059c abhāskaram amaryādaṃ na jānīmas tataḥ param
GE09ram_1-7u:11583: 4.042.060a sarvam etad vicetavyaṃ yan mayā parikīrtitam
GE09ram_1-7u:11584: 4.042.060c yad anyad api noktaṃ ca tatrāpi kriyatāṃ matiḥ 4.042.061a tataḥ kṛtaṃ dāśarather mahat priyaṃ; mahattaraṃ cāpi tato mama priyam 4.042.061c kṛtaṃ bhaviṣyaty anilānalopamā; videhajā darśanajena karmaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:11585: 4.042.062a tataḥ kṛtārthāḥ sahitāḥ sabāndhavā; mayārcitāḥ sarvaguṇair manoramaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11587: 4.043.001a viśeṣeṇa tu sugrīvo hanumatyartham uktavān 4.043.001c sa hi tasmin hariśreṣṭhe niścitārtho 'rthasādhane
GE09ram_1-7u:11588: 4.043.002a na bhūmau nāntarikṣe vā nāmbare nāmarālaye
GE09ram_1-7u:11589: 4.043.002c nāpsu vā gatisaṃgaṃ te paśyāmi haripuṃgava
GE09ram_1-7u:11592: 4.043.004a gatir vegaś ca tejaś ca lāghavaṃ ca mahākape 4.043.004c pitus te sadṛśaṃ vīra mārutasya mahaujasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11593: 4.043.005a tejasā vāpi te bhūtaṃ samaṃ bhuvi na vidyate 4.043.005c tad yathā labhyate sītā tattvam evopapādaya
GE09ram_1-7u:11594: 4.043.006a tvayy eva hanumann asti balaṃ buddhiḥ parākramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11595: 4.043.006c deśakālānuvṛttaś ca nayaś ca nayapaṇḍita 4.043.007a tataḥ kāryasamāsaṃgam avagamya
GE09ram_1-7u:11596: 4.043.007c viditvā hanumantaṃ ca cintayām āsa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11597: 4.043.008a sarvathā niścitārtho 'yaṃ hanūmati harīśvaraḥ 4.043.008c niścitārthataraś cāpi hanūmān kāryasādhane
GE09ram_1-7u:11598: 4.043.009a tad evaṃ prasthitasyāsya parijñātasya karmabhiḥ 4.043.009c bhartrā parigṛhītasya dhruvaḥ kāryaphalodayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11599: 4.043.010a taṃ samīkṣya mahātejā vyavasāyottaraṃ harim 4.043.010c kṛtārtha iva saṃvṛttaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11600: 4.043.011a dadau tasya tataḥ prītaḥ svanāmāṅkopaśobhitam 4.043.011c aṅgulīyam abhijñānaṃ rājaputryāḥ paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11601: 4.043.012a anena tvāṃ hariśreṣṭha cihnena janakātmajā 4.043.012c matsakāśād anuprāptam
GE09ram_1-7u:11602: 4.043.013a vyavasāyaś ca te vīra sattvayuktaś ca vikramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11603: 4.043.013c sugrīvasya ca saṃdeśaḥ siddhiṃ kathayatīva me
GE09ram_1-7u:11604: 4.043.014a sa tad gṛhya hariśreṣṭhaḥ sthāpya mūrdhni kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11605: 4.043.014c vanditvā caraṇau caiva prasthitaḥ plavagottamaḥ 4.043.015a sa tat prakarṣan hariṇāṃ balaṃ mahad; babhūva vīraḥ pavanātmajaḥ kapi 4.043.015c gatāmbude vyomni viśuddhamaṇḍalaḥ; śaśīva nakṣatragaṇopaśobhitaḥ 4.043.016a atibalabalam āśritas tavāhaṃ; harivaravikramavikramair analpaiḥ 4.043.016c pavanasuta yathābhigamyate sā; janakasutā hanumaṃs tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:11607: 4.044.001a tad ugraśāsanaṃ bhartur vijñāya haripuṃgavāḥ 4.044.001c śalabhā iva saṃchādya medinīṃ saṃpratasthire 4.044.002a rāmaḥ prasravaṇe tasmin nyavasat sahalakṣmaṇaḥ 4.044.002c pratīkṣamāṇas taṃ māsaṃ yaḥ sītādhigame kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11608: 4.044.003a uttarāṃ tu diśaṃ ramyāṃ girirājasamāvṛtām 4.044.003c pratasthe sahasā vīro hariḥ śatabalis tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:11609: 4.044.004a pūrvāṃ diśaṃ prati yayau vinato hariyūthapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11612: 4.044.006a paścimāṃ tu diśaṃ ghorāṃ suṣeṇaḥ plavageśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11614: 4.044.007a tataḥ sarvā diśo rājā codayitvā yathā tatham
GE09ram_1-7u:11615: 4.044.007c kapisenā patīn mukhyān mumoda sukhitaḥ sukham
GE09ram_1-7u:11616: 4.044.008a evaṃ saṃcoditāḥ sarve rājñā vānarayūthapāḥ 4.044.008c svāṃ svāṃ diśam abhipretya tvaritāḥ saṃpratasthire
GE09ram_1-7u:11617: 4.044.009a nadantaś connadantaś ca garjantaś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11618: 4.044.009c kṣvelanto dhāvamānāś ca yayuḥ plavagasattamāḥ 4.044.009e ānayiṣyāmahe sītāṃ haniṣyāmaś ca rāvaṇam 4.044.010a aham eko haniṣyāmi prāptaṃ rāvaṇam āhave
GE09ram_1-7u:11619: 4.044.010c tataś conmathya sahasā hariṣye janakātmajām 4.044.011a vepamānaṃ śrameṇādya bhavadbhiḥ sthīyatām iti 4.044.011c eka evāhariṣyāmi pātālād api jānakīm 4.044.012a vidhamiṣyāmy ahaṃ vṛkṣān dārayiṣyāmy ahaṃ girīn
GE09ram_1-7u:11621: 4.044.013a ahaṃ yojanasaṃkhyāyāḥ plavitā nātra saṃśayaḥ 4.044.013c śataṃ yojanasaṃkhyāyāḥ śataṃ samadhikaṃ hy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:11622: 4.044.014a bhūtale sāgare vāpi śaileṣu ca vaneṣu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11623: 4.044.014c pātālasyāpi vā madhye na mamācchidyate gatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11624: 4.044.015a ity ekaikaṃ tadā tatra vānarā baladarpitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11625: 4.044.015c ūcuś ca vacanaṃ tasmin harirājasya saṃnidhau
GE09ram_1-7u:11626: 4.045.001a gateṣu vānarendreṣu rāmaḥ sugrīvam abravīt 4.045.001c kathaṃ bhavān vinājīte sarvaṃ vai maṇḍalaṃ bhuvaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11627: 4.045.002a sugrīvas tu tato rāmam uvāca praṇatātmavān
GE09ram_1-7u:11628: 4.045.002c śrūyatāṃ sarvam ākhyāsye vistareṇa nararṣabha 4.045.003a yadā tu dundubhiṃ nāma dānavaṃ mahiṣākṛtim
GE09ram_1-7u:11629: 4.045.003c parikālayate vālī malayaṃ prati parvatam 4.045.004a tadā viveśa mahiṣo malayasya guhāṃ prati
GE09ram_1-7u:11630: 4.045.004c viveśa vālī tatrāpi malayaṃ tajjighāṃsayā 4.045.005a tato 'haṃ tatra nikṣipto guhād vārivinītavat
GE09ram_1-7u:11631: 4.045.005c na ca niṣkramate vālī tadā saṃvatsare gate
GE09ram_1-7u:11632: 4.045.006a tataḥ kṣatajavegena āpupūre tadā bilam 4.045.006c tad ahaṃ vismito dṛṣṭvā bhrātṛśokaviṣārditaḥ 4.045.007a athāhaṃ kṛtabuddhis tu suvyaktaṃ nihato guruḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11634: 4.045.007e aśaknuvan niṣkramituṃ mahiṣo vinaśed iti 4.045.008a tato 'ham āgāṃ kiṣkindhāṃ nirāśas tasya jīvite 4.045.008c rājyaṃ ca sumahat prāptaṃ tārā ca rumayā saha 4.045.008e mitraiś ca sahitas tatra vasāmi vigatajvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11635: 4.045.009a ājagāma tato vālī hatvāṃ taṃ dānavarṣabham
GE09ram_1-7u:11637: 4.045.010a sa māṃ jighāṃsur duṣṭātmā vālī pravyathitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11638: 4.045.010c parilākayate krodhād dhāvantaṃ sacivaiḥ saha 4.045.011a tato 'haṃ vālinā tena sānubandhaḥ pradhāvitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11639: 4.045.011c nadīś ca vividhāḥ paśyan vanāni nagarāṇi ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11640: 4.045.012a ādarśatalasaṃkāśā tato vai pṛthivī mayā 4.045.012c alātacakrapratimā dṛṣṭā goṣpadavat
GE09ram_1-7u:11641: 4.045.013a tataḥ pūrvam ahaṃ gatvā dakṣiṇām aham āśritaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11642: 4.045.013c diśaṃ ca paścimāṃ bhūyo gato 'smi bhayaśaṅkitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11643: 4.045.013e uttarāṃ tu diśaṃ yāntaṃ hanumān mām athābravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:11644: 4.045.014a idānīṃ me smṛtaṃ rājan yathā vālī harīśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11645: 4.045.014c mataṅgena tadā śapto hy asminn āśramamaṇḍale
GE09ram_1-7u:11646: 4.045.015a praviśed yadi vā vālī mūrdhāsya śatadhā bhavet
GE09ram_1-7u:11647: 4.045.015c tatra vāsaḥ sukho 'smākaṃ nirudvigno bhaviṣyati 4.045.016a tataḥ parvatam āsādya ṛśyamūkaṃ nṛpātmaja 4.045.016c na viveśa tadā vālī mataṅgasya bhayāt tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:11648: 4.045.017a evaṃ mayā tadā rājan pratyakṣam upalakṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:11649: 4.045.017c pṛthivīmaṇḍalaṃ kṛtsnaṃ guhām asmy āgatas tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11650: 4.046.001a darśanārthaṃ tu vaidehyāḥ sarvataḥ kapiyūthapāḥ 4.046.001c vyādiṣṭāḥ kapirājena yathoktaṃ jagmur añjasā 4.046.002a sarāṃsi saritaḥ kakṣān ākāśaṃ nagarāṇi ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11651: 4.046.002c nadīdurgāṃs tathā śailān vicinvanti samantataḥ 4.046.003a sugrīveṇa samākhyātān sarve vānarayūthapāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11653: 4.046.004a vicintya divasaṃ sarve sītādhigamane dhṛtāḥ 4.046.004c samāyānti sma medinyāṃ niśākāleśu vānarāḥ 4.046.005a sarvartukāṃś ca deśeṣu vānarāḥ saphalān drumān
GE09ram_1-7u:11654: 4.046.005c āsādya rajanīṃ śayyāṃ cakruḥ sarveṣv ahaḥsu te
GE09ram_1-7u:11655: 4.046.006a tad ahaḥ prathamaṃ kṛtvā māse prasravaṇaṃ gatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11657: 4.046.007a vicitya tu diśaṃ pūrvāṃ yathoktāṃ sacivaiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:11658: 4.046.007c adṛṣṭvā vinataḥ sītām ājagāma mahābalaḥ 4.046.008a uttarāṃ tu diśaṃ sarvāṃ vicitya sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11659: 4.046.008c āgataḥ saha sainyena vīraḥ śatabalis tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:11660: 4.046.009a suṣeṇaḥ paścimām āśāṃ vicitya saha vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11661: 4.046.009c sametya māse saṃpūrṇe sugrīvam upacakrame 4.046.010a taṃ prasravaṇapṛṣṭhasthaṃ samāsādyābhivādya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11662: 4.046.010c āsīnaṃ saha rāmeṇa sugrīvam idam abruvan
GE09ram_1-7u:11663: 4.046.011a vicitāḥ parvatāḥ sarve vanāni nagarāṇi ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11664: 4.046.011c nimnagāḥ sāgarāntāś ca sarve janapadās tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:11665: 4.046.012a guhāś ca vicitāḥ sarvā yās tvayā parikīrtitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11667: 4.046.013a gahaneṣu ca deśeṣu durgeṣu viṣameṣu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11668: 4.046.013c sattvāny atipramāṇāni vicitāni hatāni ca 4.046.013e ye caiva gahanā deśā vicitās te punaḥ punaḥ 4.046.014a udārasattvābhijano mahātmā; sa maithilīṃ drakṣyati vānarendraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11669: 4.046.014c diśaṃ tu yām eva gatā tu sītā; tām āsthito vāyusuto hanūmān
GE09ram_1-7u:11670: 4.047.001a sahatārāṅgadābhyāṃ tu gatvā sa hanumān kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11671: 4.047.001c sugrīveṇa yathoddiṣṭaṃ taṃ deśam upacakrame 4.047.002a sa tu dūram upāgamya sarvais taiḥ kapisattamaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11672: 4.047.002c vicinoti sma vindhyasya guhāś ca gahanāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11673: 4.047.003a parvatāgrān nadīdurgān sarāṃsi vipulān drumān 4.047.003c vṛkṣaṣaṇḍāṃś ca vividhān parvatān ghanapādapān 4.047.004a anveṣamāṇās te sarve vānarāḥ sarvato diśam
GE09ram_1-7u:11674: 4.047.004c na sītāṃ dadṛśur vīrā maithilīṃ janakātmajām
GE09ram_1-7u:11675: 4.047.005a te bhakṣayanto mūlāni phalāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11676: 4.047.005c anveṣamāṇā durdharṣā nyavasaṃs tatra tatra ha
GE09ram_1-7u:11677: 4.047.005e sa tu deśo duranveṣo guhāgahanavān mahān
GE09ram_1-7u:11678: 4.047.006a tyaktvā tu taṃ tadā deśaṃ sarve vai hariyūthapāḥ 4.047.006c deśam anyaṃ durādharṣaṃ viviśuś cākutobhayāḥ 4.047.007a yatra vandhyaphalā vṛkṣā vipuṣpāḥ parṇavarjitāḥ 4.047.007c nistoyāḥ sarito yatra mūlaṃ yatra sudurlabham
GE09ram_1-7u:11679: 4.047.008a na santi mahiṣā yatra na mṛgā na ca hastinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11680: 4.047.008c śārdūlāḥ pakṣiṇo vāpi ye cānye vanagocarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11681: 4.047.009a snigdhapatrāḥ sthale yatra padminyaḥ phullapaṅkajāḥ 4.047.009c prekṣaṇīyāḥ sugandhāś ca bhramaraiś cāpi varjitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11682: 4.047.010a kaṇḍur nāma mahābhāgaḥ satyavādī tapodhanaḥ 4.047.010c maharṣiḥ paramāmarṣī niyamair duṣpradharṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11683: 4.047.011a tasya tasmin vane putro bālako daśavārṣikaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11684: 4.047.011c pranaṣṭo jīvitāntāya kruddhas tatra mahāmuniḥ 4.047.012a tena dharmātmanā śaptaṃ kṛtsnaṃ tatra mahad vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:11686: 4.047.013a tasya te kānanāntāṃs tu girīṇāṃ kandarāṇi ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11688: 4.047.014a tatra cāpi mahātmāno nāpaśyañ janakātmajām 4.047.014c hartāraṃ rāvaṇaṃ vāpi
GE09ram_1-7u:11689: 4.047.015a te praviśya tu taṃ bhīmaṃ latāgulmasamāvṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:11691: 4.047.016a taṃ dṛṣṭvā vanarā ghoraṃ sthitaṃ śailam ivāparam
GE09ram_1-7u:11692: 4.047.016c gāḍhaṃ parihitāḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā taṃ parvatopamam
GE09ram_1-7u:11693: 4.047.017a so 'pi tān vānarān sarvān naṣṭāḥ sthety abravīd balī
GE09ram_1-7u:11694: 4.047.017c abhyadhāvata saṃkruddho muṣṭim udyamya saṃhitam 4.047.018a tam āpatantaṃ sahasā vāliputro 'ṅgadas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:11696: 4.047.019a sa vāliputrābhihato vaktrāc choṇitam udvaman 4.047.020a asuro nyapatad bhūmau paryasta iva parvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11697: 4.047.020c te tu tasmin nirucchvāse vānarā jitakāśinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11698: 4.047.020e vyacinvan prāyaśas tatra sarvaṃ tad girigahvaram
GE09ram_1-7u:11699: 4.047.021a vicitaṃ tu tataḥ kṛtvā sarve te kānanaṃ punaḥ 4.047.021c anyadevāparaṃ ghoraṃ viviśur girigahvaram
GE09ram_1-7u:11700: 4.047.022a te vicintya punaḥ khinnā viniṣpatya samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11701: 4.047.022c ekānte vṛkṣamūle tu niṣedur dīnamānasāḥ 4.048.001a athāṅgadas tadā sarvān vānarān idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:11702: 4.048.001c pariśrānto mahāprājñaḥ samāśvāsya śanair vacaḥ 4.048.002a vanāni girayo nadyo durgāṇi gahanāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11703: 4.048.002c daryo giriguhāś caiva vicitā naḥ samantataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11704: 4.048.003a tatra tatra sahāsmābhir jānakī na ca dṛśyate
GE09ram_1-7u:11705: 4.048.003c tad vā rakṣo hṛtā yena sītā surasutopamā
GE09ram_1-7u:11706: 4.048.004a kālaś ca no mahān yātaḥ sugrīvaś cograśāsanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11707: 4.048.004c tasmād bhavantaḥ sahitā vicinvantu samantataḥ 4.048.005a vihāya tandrīṃ śokaṃ ca nidrāṃ caiva samutthitām
GE09ram_1-7u:11708: 4.048.005c vicinudhvaṃ yathā sītāṃ paśyāmo janakātmajām 4.048.006a anirvedaṃ ca dākṣyaṃ ca manasaś cāparājayam
GE09ram_1-7u:11709: 4.048.006c kāryasiddhikarāṇy āhus tasmād etad bravīmy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:11710: 4.048.007a adyāpīdaṃ vanaṃ durgaṃ vicinvantu vanaukasaḥ 4.048.007c khedaṃ tyaktvā punaḥ sarvaṃ vanam etad vicīyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:11711: 4.048.008a avaśyaṃ kriyamāṇasya dṛśyate karmaṇaḥ phalam 4.048.008c alaṃ nirvedam āgamya na hi no malinaṃ kṣamam 4.048.009a sugrīvaḥ krodhano rājā tīkṣṇadaṇḍaś ca vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11712: 4.048.009c bhetavyaṃ tasya satataṃ rāmasya ca mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11713: 4.048.010a hitārtham etad uktaṃ vaḥ kriyatāṃ yadi rocate
GE09ram_1-7u:11714: 4.048.010c ucyatāṃ vā kṣamaṃ yan naḥ sarveṣām eva vānarāḥ 4.048.011a aṅgadasya vacaḥ śrutvā vacanaṃ gandhamādanaḥ 4.048.011c uvācāvyaktayā vācā pipāsā śramakhinnayā
GE09ram_1-7u:11715: 4.048.012a sadṛśaṃ khalu vo vākyam aṅgado yad uvāca ha 4.048.012c hitaṃ caivānukūlaṃ ca kriyatām asya bhāṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:11716: 4.048.013a punar mārgāmahe śailān kandarāṃś ca darīs tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:11717: 4.048.013c kānanāni ca śūnyāni giriprasravaṇāni ca 4.048.014a yathoddiṣṭhāni sarvāṇi sugrīveṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:11718: 4.048.014c vicinvantu vanaṃ sarve giridurgāṇi sarvaśaḥ 4.048.015a tataḥ samutthāya punar vānarās te mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11721: 4.048.016c śṛṅgavantaṃ darīvantam adhiruhya ca vānarāḥ 4.048.017a tatra lodhravanaṃ ramyaṃ saptaparṇavanāni ca 4.048.017c vicinvanto harivarāḥ sītādarśanakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11722: 4.048.018a tasyāgram adhirūḍhās te śrāntā vipulavikramāḥ 4.048.018c na paśyanti sma vaidehīṃ rāmasya mahiṣīṃ priyām
GE09ram_1-7u:11723: 4.048.019a te tu dṛṣṭigataṃ kṛtvā taṃ śailaṃ bahukandaram
GE09ram_1-7u:11725: 4.048.020a avaruhya tato bhūmiṃ śrāntā vigatacetasaḥ 4.048.020c sthitvā muhūrtaṃ tatrātha vṛkṣamūlam upāśritāḥ 4.048.021a te muhūrtaṃ samāśvastāḥ kiṃ cid bhagnapariśramāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11726: 4.048.021c punar evodyatāḥ kṛtsnāṃ mārgituṃ dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
