GE09ram_1-7u:11727: 4.048.022a hanumatpramukhās te tu prasthitāḥ plavagarṣabhāḥ 4.048.022c vindhyam evāditas tāvad vicerus te samantataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11728: 4.049.001a saha tārāṅgadābhyāṃ tu saṃgamya hanumān kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11729: 4.049.001c vicinoti sma vindhyasya guhāś ca gahanāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11730: 4.049.002a siṃhaśārdūlajuṣṭāś ca guhāś ca paritas tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:11732: 4.049.003a teṣāṃ tatraiva vasatāṃ sa kālo vyatyavartata
GE09ram_1-7u:11733: 4.049.004a sa hi deśo duranveṣo guhā gahanavān mahān
GE09ram_1-7u:11734: 4.049.004c tatra vāyusutaḥ sarvaṃ vicinoti sma parvatam
GE09ram_1-7u:11736: 4.049.005c gajo gavākṣo gavayaḥ śarabho gandhamādanaḥ 4.049.006a maindaś ca dvividaś caiva hanumāñ jāmbavān api
GE09ram_1-7u:11737: 4.049.006c aṅgado yuvarājaś ca tāraś ca vanagocaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11738: 4.049.007a girijālāvṛtān deśān mārgitvā dakṣiṇāṃ diśam 4.049.007c kṣutpipāsā parītāś ca śrāntāś ca salilārthinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11739: 4.049.007e avakīrṇaṃ latāvṛkṣair dadṛśus te mahābilam 4.049.008a tataḥ krauñcāś ca haṃsāś ca sārasāś cāpi niṣkraman 4.049.008c jalārdrāś cakravākāś ca raktāṅgāḥ padmareṇubhiḥ 4.049.009a tatas tad bilam āsādya sugandhi duratikramam
GE09ram_1-7u:11741: 4.049.010a saṃjātapariśaṅkās te tad bilaṃ plavagottamāḥ 4.049.010c abhyapadyanta saṃhṛṣṭās tejovanto mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11743: 4.049.011c abravīd vānarān sarvān kāntāra vanakovidaḥ 4.049.012a girijālāvṛtān deśān mārgitvā dakṣiṇāṃ diśam 4.049.012c vayaṃ sarve pariśrāntā na ca paśyāmi maithilīm
GE09ram_1-7u:11744: 4.049.013a asmāc cāpi bilād dhaṃsāḥ krauñcāś ca saha sārasaiḥ 4.049.013c jalārdrāś cakravākāś ca niṣpatanti sma sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11745: 4.049.014a nūnaṃ salilavān atra kūpo vā yadi vā hradaḥ 4.049.014c tathā ceme biladvāre snigdhās tiṣṭhanti pādapāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11746: 4.049.015a ity uktās tad bilaṃ sarve viviśus timirāvṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:11748: 4.049.016a tatas tasmin bile durge nānāpādapasaṃkule 4.049.016c anyonyaṃ saṃpariṣvajya jagmur yojanam antaram 4.049.017a te naṣṭasaṃjñās tṛṣitāḥ saṃbhrāntāḥ salilārthinaḥ 4.049.017c paripetur bile tasmin kaṃ cit kālam atandritāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11749: 4.049.018a te kṛśā dīnavadanāḥ pariśrāntāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ 4.049.018c ālokaṃ dadṛśur vīrā nirāśā jīvite tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:11750: 4.049.019a tatas taṃ deśam āgamya saumyaṃ vitimiraṃ vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:11752: 4.049.020a sālāṃs tālāṃś ca puṃnāgān kakubhān vañjulān dhavān
GE09ram_1-7u:11753: 4.049.020c campakān nāgavṛkṣāṃś ca karṇikārāṃś ca puṣpitān
GE09ram_1-7u:11755: 4.049.022a mahadbhiḥ kāñcanair vṛkṣair vṛtaṃ bālārka saṃnibhaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11756: 4.049.022c jātarūpamayair matsyair mahadbhiś ca sakacchapaiḥ 4.049.023a nalinīs tatra dadṛśuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11757: 4.049.023c kāñcanāni vimānāni rājatāni tathaiva ca 4.049.024a tapanīyagavākṣāṇi muktājālāvṛtāni
GE09ram_1-7u:11759: 4.049.025a dadṛśus tatra harayo gṛhamukhyāni sarvaśaḥ 4.049.025c puṣpitān phalino vṛkṣān
GE09ram_1-7u:11760: 4.049.026a kāñcanabhramarāṃś caiva madhūni ca samantataḥ 4.049.026c maṇikāñcanacitrāṇi śayanāny āsanāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11761: 4.049.027a mahārhāṇi ca yānāni dadṛśus te samantataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11763: 4.049.028a agarūṇāṃ ca divyānāṃ candanānāṃ ca saṃcayān
GE09ram_1-7u:11764: 4.049.028c śucīny abhyavahāryāṇi mūlāni ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11765: 4.049.029a mahārhāṇi ca pānāni madhūni rasavanti ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11766: 4.049.029c divyānām ambarāṇāṃ ca mahārhāṇāṃ ca saṃcayān
GE09ram_1-7u:11767: 4.049.029e kambalānāṃ ca citrāṇām ajinānāṃ ca saṃcayān
GE09ram_1-7u:11768: 4.049.030a tatra tatra vicinvanto bile tatra mahāprabhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11769: 4.049.030c dadṛśur vānarāḥ śūrāḥ striyaṃ kāṃ cid adūrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11771: 4.049.031c tāpasīṃ niyatāhārāṃ jvalantīm iva tejasā 4.049.032a tato hanūmān girisaṃnikāśaḥ; kṛtāñjalis tām abhivādya vṛddhām
GE09ram_1-7u:11772: 4.049.032c papraccha kā tvaṃ bhavanaṃ bilaṃ ca; ratnāni cemāni vadasva
GE09ram_1-7u:11774: 4.050.001a ity uktvā hanumāṃs tatra punaḥ kṛṣṇājināmbarām
GE09ram_1-7u:11775: 4.050.001c abravīt tāṃ mahābhāgāṃ tāpasīṃ dharmacāriṇīm 4.050.002a idaṃ praviṣṭāḥ sahasā bilaṃ timirasaṃvṛtam 4.050.002c kṣutpipāsā pariśrāntāḥ parikhinnāś ca sarvaśaḥ 4.050.003a mahad dhiraṇyā vivaraṃ praviṣṭāḥ sma pipāsitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11776: 4.050.003c imāṃs tv evaṃ vidhān bhāvān vividhān adbhutopamān
GE09ram_1-7u:11777: 4.050.003e dṛṣṭvā vayaṃ pravyathitāḥ saṃbhrāntā naṣṭacetasaḥ 4.050.004a kasyeme kāñcanā vṛkṣās taruṇādityasaṃnibhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11778: 4.050.004c śucīny abhyavahāryāṇi mūlāni ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11779: 4.050.005a kāñcanāni vimānāni rājatāni gṛhāṇi ca 4.050.005c tapanīya gavākṣāṇi maṇijālāvṛtāni
GE09ram_1-7u:11780: 4.050.006a puṣpitāḥ phālavantaś ca puṇyāḥ surabhigandhinaḥ 4.050.006c ime jāmbūnadamayāḥ pādapāḥ kasya tejasā 4.050.007a kāñcanāni ca padmāni jātāni vimale jale
GE09ram_1-7u:11781: 4.050.007c kathaṃ matsyāś ca sauvarṇā caranti saha kacchapaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11782: 4.050.008a ātmānam anubhāvaṃ ca kasya caitat tapobalam
GE09ram_1-7u:11783: 4.050.008c ajānatāṃ naḥ sarveṣāṃ sarvam ākhyātum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:11784: 4.050.009a evam uktā hanumatā tāpasī dharmacāriṇī 4.050.009c pratyuvāca hanūmantaṃ sarvabhūtahite
GE09ram_1-7u:11785: 4.050.010a mayo nāma mahātejā māyāvī dānavarṣabhaḥ 4.050.010c tenedaṃ nirmitaṃ sarvaṃ māyayā kāñcanaṃ vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:11786: 4.050.011a purā dānavamukhyānāṃ viśvakarmā babhūva ha 4.050.011c yenedaṃ kāñcanaṃ divyaṃ nirmitaṃ bhavanottamam 4.050.012a sa tu varṣasahasrāṇi tapas taptvā mahāvane
GE09ram_1-7u:11787: 4.050.012c pitāmahād varaṃ lebhe sarvam auśasanaṃ dhanam
GE09ram_1-7u:11788: 4.050.013a vidhāya sarvaṃ balavān sarvakāmeśvaras tadā 4.050.013c uvāsa sukhitaḥ kālaṃ kaṃ cid asmin mahāvane
GE09ram_1-7u:11789: 4.050.014a tam apsarasi hemāyāṃ saktaṃ dānavapuṃgavam 4.050.014c vikramyaivāśaniṃ gṛhya jaghāneśaḥ puraṃdaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11790: 4.050.015a idaṃ ca brahmaṇā dattaṃ hemāyai vanam uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:11791: 4.050.015c śāśvataḥ kāmabhogaś ca gṛhaṃ cedaṃ hiraṇmayam
GE09ram_1-7u:11792: 4.050.016a duhitā merusāvarṇer ahaṃ tasyāḥ svayaṃ prabhā
GE09ram_1-7u:11793: 4.050.016c idaṃ rakṣāmi bhavanaṃ hemāyā vānarottama 4.050.017a mama priyasakhī hemā nṛttagītaviśāradā
GE09ram_1-7u:11794: 4.050.017c tayā dattavarā cāsmi rakṣāmi bhavanottamam 4.050.018a kiṃ kāryaṃ kasya vā hetoḥ kāntārāṇi prapadyatha
GE09ram_1-7u:11795: 4.050.018c kathaṃ cedaṃ vanaṃ durgaṃ yuṣmābhir upalakṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:11796: 4.050.019a imāny abhyavahāryāṇi mūlāni ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11797: 4.050.019c bhuktvā pītvā ca pānīyaṃ sarvaṃ me vaktum arhatha 4.051.001a atha tān abravīt sarvān viśrāntān hariyūthapān
GE09ram_1-7u:11798: 4.051.001c idaṃ vacanam ekāgrā tāpasī dharmacāriṇī 4.051.002a vānarā yadi vaḥ khedaḥ pranaṣṭaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11799: 4.051.002c yadi caitan mayā śrāvyaṃ śrotum icchāmi kathyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:11800: 4.051.003a tasyās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā hanumān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11803: 4.051.004c rāmo dāśarathiḥ śrīmān praviṣṭo daṇḍakāvanam 4.051.005a lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vaidehyā cāpi bhāryayā
GE09ram_1-7u:11804: 4.051.005c tasya bhāryā janasthānād rāvaṇena hṛtā balāt
GE09ram_1-7u:11805: 4.051.006a vīras tasya sakhā rājñaḥ sugrīvo nāma vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11806: 4.051.006c rājā vānaramukhyānāṃ yena prasthāpitā vayam 4.051.007a agastyacaritām āśāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:11807: 4.051.007c sahaibhir vānarair mukhyair aṅgadapramukhair vayam 4.051.008a rāvaṇaṃ sahitāḥ sarve rākṣasaṃ kāmarūpiṇam 4.051.008c sītayā saha vaidehyā mārgadhvam iti coditāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11808: 4.051.009a vicitya tu vayaṃ sarve samagrāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE09ram_1-7u:11812: 4.051.011a cārayantas tataś cakṣur dṛṣṭavanto mahad bilam
GE09ram_1-7u:11814: 4.051.012a asmād dhaṃsā jalaklinnāḥ pakṣaiḥ salilareṇubhiḥ 4.051.012c kurarāḥ sārasāś caiva niṣpatanti patatriṇaḥ 4.051.012e sādhv atra praviśāmeti mayā tūktāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11815: 4.051.013a teṣām api hi sarveṣām anumānam upāgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:11817: 4.051.014a tato gāḍhaṃ nipatitā gṛhya hastau parasparam
GE09ram_1-7u:11818: 4.051.014c idaṃ praviṣṭāḥ sahasā bilaṃ timirasaṃvṛtam 4.051.015a etan naḥ kāyam etena kṛtyena vayam āgatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11819: 4.051.015c tvāṃ caivopagatāḥ sarve paridyūnā bubhukṣitāḥ 4.051.016a ātithyadharmadattāni mūlāni ca phalāni ca 4.051.016c asmābhir upabhuktāni bubhukṣāparipīḍitaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11820: 4.051.017a yat tvayā rakṣitāḥ sarve mriyamāṇā bubhukṣayā
GE09ram_1-7u:11821: 4.051.017c brūhi pratyupakārārthaṃ kiṃ te kurvantu vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11822: 4.051.018a evam uktā tu sarvajñā vānarais taiḥ svayaṃprabhā
GE09ram_1-7u:11823: 4.051.018c pratyuvāca tataḥ sarvān idaṃ vānarayūthapam 4.051.019a sarveṣāṃ parituṣṭāsmi vānarāṇāṃ tarasvinām
GE09ram_1-7u:11824: 4.051.019c carantyā mama dharmeṇa na kāryam iha kena cit 4.052.001a evam uktaḥ śubhaṃ vākyaṃ tāpasyā dharmasaṃhitam
GE09ram_1-7u:11825: 4.052.001c uvāca hanumān vākyaṃ tām aninditaceṣṭitām 4.052.002a śaraṇaṃ tvāṃ prapannāḥ smaḥ sarve vai dharmacāriṇi
GE09ram_1-7u:11826: 4.052.002c yaḥ kṛtaḥ samayo 'smākaṃ sugrīveṇa mahātmanā 4.052.002e sa tu kālo vyatikrānto bile ca parivartatām
GE09ram_1-7u:11827: 4.052.003a sā tvam asmād bilād ghorād uttārayitum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:11829: 4.052.004c trātum arhasi naḥ sarvān sugrīvabhayaśaṅkitān 4.052.005a mahac ca kāryam asmābhiḥ kartavyaṃ dharmacāriṇi
GE09ram_1-7u:11830: 4.052.005c tac cāpi na kṛtaṃ kāryam asmābhir iha vāsibhiḥ 4.052.006a evam uktā hanumatā tāpasī vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:11831: 4.052.006c jīvatā duṣkaraṃ manye praviṣṭena nivartitum 4.052.007a tapasas tu prabhāvena niyamopārjitena ca 4.052.007c sarvān eva bilād asmād uddhariṣyāmi vānarān
GE09ram_1-7u:11833: 4.052.008c na hi niṣkramituṃ śakyam animīlitalocanaiḥ 4.052.009a tataḥ saṃmīlitāḥ sarve sukumārāṅgulaiḥ karaiḥ 4.052.009c sahasā pidadhur dṛṣṭiṃ hṛṣṭā gamanakāṅkṣiṇaḥ 4.052.010a vānarās tu mahātmāno hastaruddhamukhās tadā 4.052.010c nimeṣāntaramātreṇa bilād uttāritās tayā
GE09ram_1-7u:11834: 4.052.011a tatas tān vānarān sarvāṃs tāpasī dharmacāriṇī
GE09ram_1-7u:11835: 4.052.011c niḥsṛtān viṣamāt tasmāt samāśvāsyedam abravīt 4.052.012a eṣa vindhyo giriḥ śrīmān nānādrumalatāyutaḥ 4.052.012c eṣa prasavaṇaḥ śailaḥ sāgaro 'yaṃ mahodadhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11837: 4.052.013c ity uktvā tad bilaṃ śrīmat praviveśa svayaṃprabhā
GE09ram_1-7u:11838: 4.052.014a tatas te dadṛśur ghoraṃ sāgaraṃ varuṇālayam
GE09ram_1-7u:11839: 4.052.014c apāram abhigarjantaṃ ghorair ūrmibhir ākulam 4.052.015a mayasya māyā vihitaṃ giridurgaṃ vicinvatām 4.052.015c teṣāṃ māso vyatikrānto yo rājñā samayaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11840: 4.052.016a vindhyasya tu gireḥ pāde saṃprapuṣpitapādape 4.052.016c upaviśya mahābhāgāś cintām āpedire tadā 4.052.017a tataḥ puṣpātibhārāgrāṃl latāśatasamāvṛtān
GE09ram_1-7u:11841: 4.052.017c drumān vāsantikān dṛṣṭvā babhūvur bhayaśaṅkitāḥ 4.052.018a te vasantam anuprāptaṃ prativedya parasparam 4.052.018c naṣṭasaṃdeśakālārthā nipetur dharaṇītale
GE09ram_1-7u:11842: 4.052.019a sa tu siṃharṣabha skandhaḥ pīnāyatabhujaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11843: 4.052.019c yuvarājo mahāprājña aṅgado vākyam abravīt 4.052.020a śāsanāt kapirājasya vayaṃ sarve vinirgatāḥ 4.052.020c māsaḥ pūrṇo bilasthānāṃ harayaḥ kiṃ na budhyate
GE09ram_1-7u:11844: 4.052.021a tasminn atīte kāle tu sugrīveṇa kṛte svayam
GE09ram_1-7u:11845: 4.052.021c prāyopaveśanaṃ yuktaṃ sarveṣāṃ ca vanaukasām 4.052.022a tīkṣṇaḥ prakṛtyā sugrīvaḥ svāmibhāve vyavasthitaḥ 4.052.022c na kṣamiṣyati naḥ sarvān aparādhakṛto gatān
GE09ram_1-7u:11846: 4.052.023a apravṛttau ca sītāyāḥ pāpam eva kariṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:11847: 4.052.023c tasmāt kṣamam ihādyaiva prāyopaviśanaṃ hi naḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11848: 4.052.024a tyaktvā putrāṃś ca dārāṃś ca dhanāni ca gṛhāṇi ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11849: 4.052.024c yāvan na ghātayed rājā sarvān pratigatān itaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11850: 4.052.024e vadhenāpratirūpeṇa śreyān mṛtyur ihaiva naḥ 4.052.025a na cāhaṃ yauvarājyena
GE09ram_1-7u:11852: 4.052.026a sa pūrvaṃ baddhavairo māṃ rājā dṛṣṭvā vyatikramam
GE09ram_1-7u:11854: 4.052.027a kiṃ me suhṛdbhir vyasanaṃ paśyadbhir jīvitāntare
GE09ram_1-7u:11855: 4.052.027c ihaiva prāyam āsiṣye puṇye sāgararodhasi 4.052.028a etac chrutvā kumāreṇa yuvarājena bhāṣitam 4.052.028c sarve te vānaraśreṣṭhāḥ karuṇaṃ vākyam abruvan
GE09ram_1-7u:11856: 4.052.029a tīkṣṇaḥ prakṛtyā sugrīvaḥ priyāsaktaś ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11857: 4.052.029c adṛṣṭāyāṃ ca vaidehyāṃ dṛṣṭvāsmāṃś ca samāgatān
GE09ram_1-7u:11859: 4.052.030c na kṣamaṃ cāparāddhānāṃ gamanaṃ svāmipārśvataḥ 4.052.031a plavaṃgamānāṃ tu bhayārditānāṃ; śrutvā vacas tāra idaṃ babhāṣe 4.052.031c alaṃ viṣādena bilaṃ praviśya; vasāma sarve yadi rocate vaḥ 4.052.032a idaṃ hi māyā vihitaṃ sudurgamaṃ; prabhūtavṛkṣodakabhojyapeyam
GE09ram_1-7u:11860: 4.052.032c ihāsti no naiva bhayaṃ puraṃdarān; na rāghavād vānararājato 'pi
GE09ram_1-7u:11862: 4.052.033a śrutvāṅgadasyāpi vaco 'nukūlam; ūcuś ca sarve harayaḥ pratītāḥ 4.052.033c yathā na hanyema tathāvidhānam; asaktam adyaiva vidhīyatāṃ naḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11863: 4.053.001a tathā bruvati tāre tu tārādhipativarcasi 4.053.001c atha mene hṛtaṃ rājyaṃ hanumān aṅgadena tat
GE09ram_1-7u:11864: 4.053.002a buddhyā hy aṣṭāṅgayā yuktaṃ caturbalasamanvitam 4.053.002c caturdaśaguṇaṃ mene hanumān vālinaḥ sutam 4.053.003a āpūryamāṇaṃ śaśvac ca tejobalaparākramaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11865: 4.053.003c śaśinaṃ śuklapakṣādau vardhamānam iva śriyā 4.053.004a bṛhaspatisamaṃ buddhyā vikrame sadṛśaṃ pituḥ 4.053.004c śuśrūṣamāṇaṃ tārasya śukrasyeva puraṃdaram
GE09ram_1-7u:11867: 4.053.005c abhisaṃdhātum ārebhe hanumān aṅgadaṃ tataḥ 4.053.006a sa caturṇām upāyānāṃ tṛtīyam upavarṇayan 4.053.006c bhedayām āsa tān sarvān vānarān vākyasaṃpadā
GE09ram_1-7u:11870: 4.053.008a tvaṃ samarthataraḥ pitrā yuddhe tāreya vai dhuram
GE09ram_1-7u:11871: 4.053.008c dṛḍhaṃ dhārayituṃ śaktaḥ kapirājyaṃ yathā pitā
GE09ram_1-7u:11872: 4.053.009a nityam asthiracittā hi kapayo haripuṃgava 4.053.009c nājñāpyaṃ viṣahiṣyanti putradārān vinā tvayā 4.053.010a tvāṃ naite hy anuyuñjeyuḥ pratyakṣaṃ pravadāmi te
GE09ram_1-7u:11873: 4.053.010c yathāyaṃ jāmbavān nīlaḥ suhotraś ca mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11874: 4.053.011a na hy ahaṃ ta ime sarve sāmadānādibhir guṇaiḥ 4.053.011c daṇḍena na tvayā śakyāḥ sugrīvād apakarṣitum
GE09ram_1-7u:11875: 4.053.012a vigṛhyāsanam apy āhur durbalena balīyasaḥ 4.053.012c ātmarakṣākaras tasmān na vigṛhṇīta durbalaḥ 4.053.013a yāṃ cemāṃ manyase dhātrīm etad bilam iti śrutam 4.053.013c etal lakṣmaṇabāṇānām īṣatkāryaṃ vidāraṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:11876: 4.053.014a svalpaṃ hi kṛtam indreṇa kṣipatā hy aśaniṃ purā 4.053.014c lakṣmaṇo niśitair bāṇair bhindyāt patrapuṭaṃ yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:11877: 4.053.014e lakṣmaṇasya ca nārācā bahavaḥ santi tadvidhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11878: 4.053.015a avasthāne yadaiva tvam āsiṣyasi paraṃtapa 4.053.015c tadaiva harayaḥ sarve tyakṣyanti kṛtaniścayāḥ 4.053.016a smarantaḥ putradārāṇāṃ nityodvignā bubhukṣitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11879: 4.053.016c kheditā duḥkhaśayyābhis tvāṃ kariṣyanti pṛṣṭhataḥ 4.053.017a sa tvaṃ hīnaḥ suhṛdbhiś ca hitakāmaiś ca bandhubhiḥ 4.053.017c tṛṇād api bhṛśodvignaḥ spandamānād bhaviṣyasi 4.053.018a na ca jātu na hiṃsyus tvāṃ ghorā lakṣmaṇasāyakāḥ 4.053.018c apavṛttaṃ jighāṃsanto mahāvegā durāsadāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11880: 4.053.019a asmābhis tu gataṃ sārdhaṃ vinītavad upasthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:11881: 4.053.019c ānupūrvyāt tu sugrīvo rājye tvāṃ sthāpayiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:11882: 4.053.020a dharmakāmaḥ pitṛvyas te prītikāmo dṛḍhavrataḥ 4.053.020c śuciḥ satyapratijñaś ca nā tvāṃ jātu jighāṃsati
GE09ram_1-7u:11883: 4.053.021a priyakāmaś ca te mātus tadarthaṃ cāsya jīvitam
GE09ram_1-7u:11884: 4.053.021c tasyāpatyaṃ ca nāsty anyat tasmād aṅgada gamyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:11885: 4.054.001a śrutvā hanumato vākyaṃ praśritaṃ dharmasaṃhitam 4.054.001c svāmisatkārasaṃyuktam aṅgado vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:11886: 4.054.002a sthairyaṃ sarvātmanā śaucam ānṛśaṃsyam athārjavam 4.054.002c vikramaiś caiva dhairyaṃ ca sugrīve nopapadyate
GE09ram_1-7u:11887: 4.054.003a bhrātur jyeṣṭhasya yo bhāryāṃ jīvito mahiṣīṃ priyām
GE09ram_1-7u:11888: 4.054.003c dharmeṇa mātaraṃ yas tu svīkaroti jugupsitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11889: 4.054.004a kathaṃ sa dharmaṃ jānīte yena bhrātrā durātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:11891: 4.054.005a satyāt pāṇigṛhītaś ca kṛtakarmā mahāyaśāḥ 4.054.005c vismṛto rāghavo yena sa kasya sukṛtaṃ smaret
GE09ram_1-7u:11893: 4.054.006c ādiṣṭā mārgituṃ sītāṃ dharmam asmin kathaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_1-7u:11894: 4.054.007a tasmin pāpe kṛtaghne tu smṛtihīne calātmani
GE09ram_1-7u:11895: 4.054.007c āryaḥ ko viśvasej jātu tat kulīno jijīviṣuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11896: 4.054.008a rājye putraṃ pratiṣṭhāpya saguṇo nirguṇo 'pi vā
GE09ram_1-7u:11897: 4.054.008c kathaṃ śatrukulīnaṃ māṃ sugrīvo jīvayiṣyati 4.054.009a bhinnamantro 'parāddhaś ca hīnaśaktiḥ kathaṃ hy aham 4.054.009c kiṣkindhāṃ prāpya jīveyam anātha iva durbalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11899: 4.054.010c śaṭhaḥ krūro nṛśaṃsaś ca sugrīvo rājyakāraṇāt
GE09ram_1-7u:11900: 4.054.011a bandhanāc cāvasādān me śreyaḥ prāyopaveśanam 4.054.011c anujānīta māṃ sarve gṛhān gacchantu vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11901: 4.054.012a ahaṃ vaḥ pratijānāmi na gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ purīm
GE09ram_1-7u:11902: 4.054.012c ihaiva prāyam āsiṣye śreyo maraṇam eva me
GE09ram_1-7u:11903: 4.054.013a abhivādanapūrvaṃ tu rājā kuśalam eva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11904: 4.054.013c vācyas tato yavīyān me sugrīvo vānareśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11905: 4.054.014a ārogyapūrvaṃ kuśalaṃ vācyā mātā rumā ca me
GE09ram_1-7u:11906: 4.054.014c mātaraṃ caiva me tārām āśvāsayitum arhatha
GE09ram_1-7u:11907: 4.054.015a prakṛtyā priyaputrā sā sānukrośā tapasvinī 4.054.015c vinaṣṭaṃ mām iha śrutvā vyaktaṃ hāsyati jīvitam
GE09ram_1-7u:11908: 4.054.016a etāvad uktvā vacanaṃ vṛddhān apy abhivādya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11909: 4.054.016c saṃviveśāṅgado bhūmau rudan darbheṣu durmanāḥ 4.054.017a tasya saṃviśatas tatra rudanto vānararṣabhāḥ 4.054.017c nayanebhyaḥ pramumucur uṣṇaṃ vai vāriduḥkhitāḥ 4.054.018a sugrīvaṃ caiva nindantaḥ praśaṃsantaś ca vālinam
GE09ram_1-7u:11910: 4.054.018c parivāryāṅgado sarve vyavasyan prāyam āsitum 4.054.019a mataṃ tad vāliputrasya vijñāya plavagarṣabhāḥ 4.054.019c upaspṛśyodakaṃ sarve prāṅmukhāḥ samupāviśan
GE09ram_1-7u:11912: 4.054.020a sa saṃviśadbhir bahubhir mahīdharo; mahādrikūṭapramitaiḥ plavaṃgamaiḥ 4.054.021c babhūva saṃnāditanirjharāntaro; bhṛśaṃ nadadbhir jaladair
GE09ram_1-7u:11914: 4.055.001a upaviṣṭās tu te sarve yasmin prāyaṃ giristhale
GE09ram_1-7u:11915: 4.055.001c harayo gṛdhrarājaś ca taṃ deśam upacakrame
GE09ram_1-7u:11916: 4.055.002a sāmpātir nāma nāmnā tu cirajīvī vihaṃgamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11918: 4.055.003a kandarād abhiniṣkramya sa vindhyasya mahāgireḥ 4.055.003c upaviṣṭān harīn dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭātmā giram abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:11919: 4.055.004a vidhiḥ kila naraṃ loke vidhānenānuvartate 4.055.004c yathāyaṃ vihito bhakṣyaś cirān mahyam upāgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11920: 4.055.005a paramparāṇāṃ bhakṣiṣye vānarāṇāṃ mṛtaṃ mṛtam 4.055.005c uvācaivaṃ vacaḥ pakṣī tān nirīkṣya plavaṃgamān
GE09ram_1-7u:11921: 4.055.006a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā bhakṣalubdhasya pakṣiṇaḥ 4.055.006c aṅgadaḥ param āyasto hanūmantam athābravīt 4.055.007a paśya sītāpadeśena sākṣād vaivasvato yamaḥ 4.055.007c imaṃ deśam anuprāpto vānarāṇāṃ vipattaye 4.055.008a rāmasya na kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ rājño na ca vacaḥ kṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:11922: 4.055.008c harīṇām iyam ajñātā vipattiḥ sahasāgatā 4.055.009a vaidehyāḥ priyakāmena kṛtaṃ karma jaṭāyuṣā 4.055.009c gṛdhrarājena yat tatra śrutaṃ vas tad aśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11923: 4.055.010a tathā sarvāṇi bhūtāni tiryagyonigatāny api 4.055.010c priyaṃ kurvanti rāmasya tyaktvā prāṇān yathā vayam
GE09ram_1-7u:11925: 4.055.011c kāntārāṇi prapannāḥ sma na ca paśyāma maithilīm
GE09ram_1-7u:11926: 4.055.012a sa sukhī gṛdhrarājas tu rāvaṇena hato raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:11927: 4.055.012c muktaś ca sugrīvabhayād gataś ca paramāṃ gatim
GE09ram_1-7u:11928: 4.055.013a jaṭāyuṣo vināśena rājño daśarathasya ca 4.055.013c haraṇena ca vaidehyāḥ saṃśayaṃ harayo gatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11929: 4.055.014a rāmalakṣmaṇayor vāsām araṇye saha sītayā 4.055.014c rāghavasya ca bāṇena vālinaś ca tathā vadhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11930: 4.055.015a rāmakopād aśeṣāṇāṃ rākṣasānāṃ tathā vadhaḥ 4.055.015c kaikeyyā varadānena idaṃ hi vikṛtaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:11931: 4.055.016a tat tu śrutvā tadā vākyam aṅgadasya mukhodgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:11932: 4.055.016c abravīd vacanaṃ gṛdhras tīkṣṇatuṇḍo mahāsvanaḥ 4.055.017a ko 'yaṃ girā ghoṣayati prāṇaiḥ priyatarasya me 4.055.017c jaṭāyuṣo vadhaṃ bhrātuḥ kampayann iva me manaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11933: 4.055.018a katham āsīj janasthāne yuddhaṃ rākṣasagṛdhrayoḥ 4.055.018c nāmadheyam idaṃ bhrātuś cirasyādya mayā śrutam
GE09ram_1-7u:11935: 4.055.019c tad iccheyam ahaṃ śrotuṃ vināśaṃ vānararṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11937: 4.055.020c tasyaiva ca mama bhrātuḥ sakhā daśarathaḥ katham
GE09ram_1-7u:11938: 4.055.020e yasya rāmaḥ priyaḥ putro jyeṣṭho gurujanapriyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11940: 4.055.021c iccheyaṃ parvatād asmād avatartum ariṃdamāḥ 4.056.001a śokād bhraṣṭasvaram api śrutvā te hariyūthapāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11941: 4.056.001c śraddadhur naiva tad vākyaṃ karmaṇā tasya śaṅkitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11942: 4.056.002a te prāyam upaviṣṭās tu dṛṣṭvā gṛdhraṃ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11943: 4.056.002c cakrur buddhiṃ tadā raudrāṃ sarvān no bhakṣayiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:11944: 4.056.003a sarvathā prāyam āsīnān yadi no bhakṣayiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:11945: 4.056.003c kṛtakṛtyā bhaviṣyāmaḥ kṣipraṃ siddhim ito gatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11946: 4.056.004a etāṃ buddhiṃ tataś cakruḥ sarve te vānararṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11947: 4.056.004c avatārya gireḥ śṛṅgād gṛdhram āhāṅgadas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:11948: 4.056.005a babhūvur kṣarajo nāma vānarendraḥ pratāpavān 4.056.005c mamāryaḥ pārthivaḥ pakṣin dhārmikau tasya cātmajau
GE09ram_1-7u:11949: 4.056.006a sugrīvaś caiva valī ca putrāv oghabalāv ubhau
GE09ram_1-7u:11950: 4.056.006c loke viśrutakarmābhūd rājā vālī pitā mama
GE09ram_1-7u:11951: 4.056.007a rājā kṛtsnasya jagata ikṣvākūṇāṃ mahārathaḥ 4.056.007c rāmo dāśarathiḥ śrīmān praviṣṭo daṇḍakāvanam 4.056.008a lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vaidehyā cāpi bhāryayā
GE09ram_1-7u:11952: 4.056.008c pitur nideśanirato dharmyaṃ panthānam āśritaḥ 4.056.008e tasya bhāryā janasthānād rāvaṇena hṛtā balāt
GE09ram_1-7u:11953: 4.056.009a rāmasya ca pitur mitraṃ jaṭāyur nāma gṛdhrarāṭ
GE09ram_1-7u:11954: 4.056.009c dadarśa sītāṃ vaidehīṃ hriyamāṇāṃ vihāyasā 4.056.010a rāvaṇaṃ virathaṃ kṛtvā sthāpayitvā ca maithilīm
GE09ram_1-7u:11955: 4.056.010c pariśrāntaś ca vṛddhaś ca rāvaṇena hato raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:11956: 4.056.011a evaṃ gṛdhro hatas tena rāvaṇena bahīyasā
GE09ram_1-7u:11957: 4.056.011c saṃskṛtaś cāpi rāmeṇa gataś ca gatim uttamām
GE09ram_1-7u:11958: 4.056.012a tato mama pitṛvyeṇa sugrīveṇa mahātmanā 4.056.012c cakāra rāghavaḥ sakhyaṃ so 'vadhīt pitaraṃ mama 4.056.013a māma pitrā viruddho hi sugrīvaḥ sacivaiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:11959: 4.056.013c nihatya vālinaṃ rāmas tatas tam abhiṣecayat
GE09ram_1-7u:11960: 4.056.014a sa rājye sthāpitas tena sugrīvo vānareśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11961: 4.056.014c rājā vānaramukhyānāṃ yena prasthāpitā vayam 4.056.015a evaṃ rāmaprayuktās tu mārgamāṇās tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11962: 4.056.015c vaidehīṃ nādhigacchāmo rātrau sūryaprabhām iva 4.056.016a te vayaṃ daṇdakāraṇyaṃ vicitya susamāhitāḥ 4.056.016c ajñānāt tu praviṣṭāḥ sma dharaṇyā vivṛtaṃ bilam
GE09ram_1-7u:11963: 4.056.017a mayasya māyā vihitaṃ tad bilaṃ ca vicinvatām
GE09ram_1-7u:11964: 4.056.017c vyatītas tatra no māso yo rājñā sāmayaḥ kṛtaḥ 4.056.018a te vayaṃ kapirājasya sarve vacanakāriṇaḥ 4.056.018c kṛtāṃ saṃsthām atikrāntā bhayāt prāyam upāsmahe
GE09ram_1-7u:11965: 4.056.019a kruddhe tasmiṃs tu kākutsthe sugrīve ca salakṣmaṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:11966: 4.056.019c gatānām api sarveṣāṃ tatra no nāsti jīvitam
GE09ram_1-7u:11967: 4.057.001a ity uktaḥ karuṇaṃ vākyaṃ vānarais tyaktajīvitaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11968: 4.057.001c sabāṣpo vānarān gṛdhraḥ pratyuvāca mahāsvanaḥ 4.057.002a yavīyān mama sa bhrātā jaṭāyur nāma vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11969: 4.057.002c yamākhyāta hataṃ yuddhe rāvaṇena balīyasā 4.057.003a vṛddhabhāvād apakṣatvāc chṛṇvaṃs tad api marṣaye
GE09ram_1-7u:11970: 4.057.003c na hi me śaktir adyāsti bhrātur vairavimokṣaṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:11971: 4.057.004a purā vṛtravadhe vṛtte sa cāhaṃ ca jayaiṣiṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:11972: 4.057.004c ādityam upayātau svo jvalantaṃ raśmimālinam 4.057.005a āvṛtyākāśamārgeṇa javena sma gatau bhṛśam 4.057.005c madhyaṃ prāpte ca sūrye ca jaṭāyur avasīdati
GE09ram_1-7u:11973: 4.057.006a tam ahaṃ bhrātaraṃ dṛṣṭvā sūryaraśmibhir arditam
GE09ram_1-7u:11974: 4.057.006c pakṣābhyaṃ chādayām āsa snehāt paramavihvalam 4.057.007a nirdagdhapakṣaḥ patito vindhye 'haṃ vānarottamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11975: 4.057.007c aham asmin vasan bhrātuḥ pravṛttiṃ nopalakṣaye
GE09ram_1-7u:11976: 4.057.008a jaṭāyuṣas tv evam ukto bhrātrā saṃpātinā tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:11978: 4.057.009a jaṭāyuṣo yadi bhrātā śrutaṃ te gaditaṃ mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:11979: 4.057.009c ākhyāhi yadi jānāsi nilayaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11980: 4.057.010a adīrghadarśinaṃ taṃ vā rāvaṇaṃ rākṣasādhipam 4.057.010c antike yadi vā dūre yadi jānāsi śaṃsa naḥ 4.057.011a tato 'bravīn mahātejā jyeṣṭho bhrātā jaṭāyuṣaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11982: 4.057.012a nirdagdhapakṣo gṛdhro 'haṃ gatavīryaḥ plavaṃgamāḥ 4.057.012c vāṅmātreṇa tu rāmasya kariṣye sāhyam uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:11983: 4.057.013a jānāmi vāruṇāl lokān viṣṇos traivikramān api
GE09ram_1-7u:11984: 4.057.013c devāsuravimardāṃś ca amṛtasya ca manthanam 4.057.014a rāmasya yad idaṃ kāryaṃ kartavyaṃ prathamaṃ mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:11985: 4.057.014c jarayā ca hṛtaṃ tejaḥ prāṇāś ca śithilā mama 4.057.015a taruṇī rūpasaṃpannā
GE09ram_1-7u:11986: 4.057.015c hriyamāṇā mayā dṛṣṭā rāvaṇena durātmanā 4.057.016a krośantī rāma rāmeti lakṣmaṇeti ca bhāminī
GE09ram_1-7u:11987: 4.057.016c bhūṣaṇāny apavidhyantī gātrāṇi ca vidhunvatī 4.057.017a sūryaprabheva śailāgre tasyāḥ kauśeyam uttamam 4.057.017c asite rākṣase bhāti yathā vā taḍidambude
GE09ram_1-7u:11988: 4.057.018a tāṃ tu sītām ahaṃ manye rāmasya parikīrtanāt
GE09ram_1-7u:11989: 4.057.018c śrūyatāṃ me kathayato nilayaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11990: 4.057.019a putro viśravasaḥ sākṣād bhrātā vaiśravaṇasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:11991: 4.057.019c adhyāste nagarīṃ laṅkāṃ rāvaṇo nāma rākasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11992: 4.057.020a ito dvīpe samudrasya saṃpūrṇe śatayojane 4.057.020c tasmiṃl laṅkā purī ramyā nirmitā viśvakarmaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:11993: 4.057.021a tasyāṃ vasati vaidehī dīnā kauśeyavāsinī 4.057.021c rāvaṇāntaḥpure ruddhā rākṣasībhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11994: 4.057.022a janakasyātmajāṃ rājñas tasyāṃ drakṣyatha maithilīm 4.057.022c laṅkāyām atha guptāyāṃ sāgareṇa samantataḥ 4.057.023a saṃprāpya sāgarasyāntaṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ śatayojanam
GE09ram_1-7u:11995: 4.057.023c āsādya dakṣiṇaṃ kūlaṃ tato drakṣyatha rāvaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:11996: 4.057.024a tatraiva tvaritāḥ kṣipraṃ vikramadhvaṃ plavaṃgamāḥ 4.057.024c jñānena khalu paśyāmi dṛṣṭvā pratyāgamiṣyatha 4.057.025a ādyaḥ panthāḥ kuliṅgānāṃ ye cānye dhānyajīvinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:11997: 4.057.025c dvitīyo balibhojānāṃ ye ca vṛkṣaphalāśinaḥ 4.057.026a bhāsās tṛtīyaṃ gacchanti krauñcāś ca kuraraiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:11998: 4.057.026c śyenāś caturthaṃ gacchanti gṛdhrā gacchanti pañcamam
GE09ram_1-7u:11999: 4.057.027a balavīryopapannānāṃ rūpayauvanaśālinām 4.057.027c ṣaṣṭhas tu panthā haṃsānāṃ vainateyagatiḥ parā
GE09ram_1-7u:12000: 4.057.027e vainateyāc ca no janma sarveṣāṃ vānararṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12001: 4.057.028a garhitaṃ tu kṛtaṃ karma yena sma piśitāśanāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12003: 4.057.029a asmākam api sauvarṇaṃ divyaṃ cakṣurbalaṃ tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:12004: 4.057.029c tasmād āhāravīryeṇa nisargeṇa ca vānarāḥ 4.057.029e āyojanaśatāt sāgrād vayaṃ paśyāma nityaśaḥ 4.057.030a asmākaṃ vihitā vṛttir nisārgeṇa ca dūrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12005: 4.057.030c vihitā pādamūle tu vṛttiś caraṇayodhinām 4.057.031a upāyo dṛśyatāṃ kaś cil laṅghane
GE09ram_1-7u:12006: 4.057.031c abhigamya tu vaidehīṃ samṛddhārthā gamiṣyatha 4.057.032a samudraṃ netum icchāmi bhavadbhir varuṇālayam 4.057.032c pradāsyāmy udakaṃ bhrātuḥ svargatasya mahātmanaḥ 4.057.033a tato nītvā tu taṃ deśaṃ tīre nadanadīpateḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12008: 4.057.034a punaḥ pratyānayitvā vai taṃ deśaṃ patageśvaram
GE09ram_1-7u:12009: 4.057.034c babhūvur vānarā hṛṣṭāḥ pravṛttim upalabhya te
GE09ram_1-7u:12010: 4.058.001a tatas tad amṛtāsvādaṃ gṛdhrarājena bhāṣitam 4.058.001c niśamya vadato hṛṣṭās te vacaḥ plavagarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12011: 4.058.002a jāmbavān vai hariśreṣṭhaḥ saha sarvaiḥ plavaṃgamaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12013: 4.058.003a kva sītā kena vā dṛṣṭā ko vā harati maithilīm
GE09ram_1-7u:12014: 4.058.003c tad ākhyātu bhavān sarvaṃ gatir bhava vanaukasām
GE09ram_1-7u:12016: 4.058.004c svayaṃ lakṣmaṇam uktānāṃ na cintayati vikramam
GE09ram_1-7u:12017: 4.058.005a sa harīn prītisaṃyuktān sītā śrutisamāhitān 4.058.005c punar āśvāsayan prīta idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:12018: 4.058.006a śrūyatām iha vaidehyā yathā me haraṇaṃ śrutam
GE09ram_1-7u:12019: 4.058.006c yena cāpi mamākhyātaṃ yatra cāyatalocanā 4.058.007a aham asmin girau durge bahuyojanam
GE09ram_1-7u:12021: 4.058.008a taṃ mām evaṃgataṃ putraḥ supārśvo nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12022: 4.058.008c āhāreṇa yathākālaṃ bibharti patatāṃ varaḥ 4.058.009a tīkṣṇakāmās tu gandharvās tīkṣṇakopā bhujaṃgamāḥ 4.058.009c mṛgāṇāṃ tu bhayaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ tatas tīkṣṇakṣudhā vayam
GE09ram_1-7u:12023: 4.058.010a sa kadā cit kṣudhārtasya mama cāhārakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12024: 4.058.010c gatasūryo 'hani prāpto mama putro hy anāmiṣaḥ 4.058.011a sa mayā vṛddhabhāvāc ca kopāc ca paribhartsitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12025: 4.058.011c kṣutpipāsā parītena kumāraḥ patatāṃ varaḥ 4.058.012a sa mamāhārasaṃrodhāt pīḍitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12026: 4.058.012c anumānya yathātattvam idaṃ vacanam abravīt 4.058.013a ahaṃ tāta yathākālam āmiṣārthī kham āplutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12027: 4.058.013c mahendrasya girer dvāram āvṛtya ca samāsthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12029: 4.058.014c panthānam eko 'dhyavasaṃ saṃniroddhum avāṅmukhaḥ 4.058.015a tatra kaś cin mayā dṛṣṭaḥ sūryodayasamaprabhām
GE09ram_1-7u:12030: 4.058.015c striyam ādāya gacchan vai bhinnāñjanacayopamaḥ 4.058.016a so 'ham abhyavahārārthī tau dṛṣṭvā kṛtaniścayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12031: 4.058.016c tena sāmnā vinītena panthānam abhiyācitaḥ 4.058.017a na hi sāmopapannānāṃ prahartā vidyate kva cit
GE09ram_1-7u:12032: 4.058.017c nīceṣv api janaḥ kaś cit kim aṅga bata madvidhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12033: 4.058.018a sa yātas tejasā vyoma saṃkṣipann iva vegataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12034: 4.058.018c athāhaṃ khe carair bhūtair abhigamya sabhājitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12035: 4.058.019a diṣṭyā jīvasi tāteti abruvan māṃ maharṣayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12036: 4.058.019c kathaṃ cit sakalatro 'sau gatas te svasty asaṃśayam
GE09ram_1-7u:12037: 4.058.020a evam uktas tato 'haṃ taiḥ siddhaiḥ paramaśobhanaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12038: 4.058.020c sa ca me rāvaṇo rājā rakṣasāṃ prativeditaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12039: 4.058.021a haran dāśarather bhāryāṃ rāmasya janakātmajām 4.058.021c bhraṣṭābharaṇakauśeyāṃ śokavegaparājitām 4.058.022a rāmalakṣmaṇayor nāma krośantīṃ muktamūrdhajām
GE09ram_1-7u:12040: 4.058.022c eṣa kālātyayas tāvad iti vākyavidāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12041: 4.058.023a etam arthaṃ samagraṃ me supārśvaḥ pratyavedayat
GE09ram_1-7u:12042: 4.058.023c tac chrutvāpi hi me buddhir nāsīt kā cit parākrame
GE09ram_1-7u:12043: 4.058.024a apakṣo hi kathaṃ pakṣī karma kiṃ cid upakramet 4.058.024c yat tu śakyaṃ mayā kartuṃ vāgbuddhiguṇavartinā
GE09ram_1-7u:12044: 4.058.025a śrūyatāṃ tat pravakṣyāmi bhavatāṃ pauruṣāśrayam 4.058.025c vāṅmatibhyāṃ hi sārveṣāṃ kariṣyāmi priyaṃ hi vaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12045: 4.058.025e yad dhi dāśaratheḥ kāryaṃ mama tan nātra saṃśayaḥ 4.058.026a te bhavanto matiśreṣṭhā balavanto manasvinaḥ 4.058.026c sahitāḥ kapirājena devair api durāsadāḥ 4.058.027a rāmalakṣmaṇabāṇāś ca niśitāḥ kaṅkapatriṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12046: 4.058.027c trayāṇām api lokānāṃ paryāptās trāṇanigrahe 4.058.028a kāmaṃ khalu daśagrīvas
GE09ram_1-7u:12047: 4.058.028c bhavatāṃ tu samarthānāṃ na kiṃ cid api duṣkaram 4.058.029a tad alaṃ kālasaṃgena kriyatāṃ buddhiniścayaḥ 4.058.029c na hi karmasu sajjante buddhimanto bhavadvidhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12048: 4.059.001a tataḥ kṛtodakaṃ snātaṃ taṃ gṛdhraṃ hariyūthapāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12049: 4.059.001c upaviṣṭā girau durge parivārya samantataḥ 4.059.002a tam aṅgadam upāsīnaṃ taiḥ sarvair haribhir vṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:12050: 4.059.002c janitapratyayo harṣāt saṃpātiḥ punar abravīt 4.059.003a kṛtvā niḥśabdam ekāgrāḥ śṛṇvantu harayo mama
GE09ram_1-7u:12051: 4.059.003c tattvaṃ saṃkīrtayiṣyāmi yathā jānāmi maithilīm 4.059.004a asya vindhyasya śikhare patito 'smi purā vane 4.059.004c sūryātapaparītāṅgo nirdagdhaḥ sūryaraśmibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12052: 4.059.005a labdhasaṃjñas tu ṣaḍrātrād vivaśo vihvalann iva
GE09ram_1-7u:12053: 4.059.005c vīkṣamāṇo diśaḥ sarvā nābhijānāmi kiṃ cana
GE09ram_1-7u:12054: 4.059.006a tatas tu sāgarāñ śailān nadīḥ sarvāḥ sarāṃsi ca 4.059.006c vanāny aṭavideśāṃś ca samīkṣya matir āgamat
GE09ram_1-7u:12055: 4.059.007a hṛṣṭapakṣigaṇākīrṇaḥ kandarāntarakūṭavān 4.059.007c dakṣiṇasyodadhes tīre vindhyo 'yam iti niścitaḥ 4.059.008a āsīc cātrāśramaṃ puṇyaṃ surair api supūjitam
GE09ram_1-7u:12056: 4.059.008c ṛṣir niśākaro nāma yasminn ugratapābhavat 4.059.009a aṣṭau varṣasahasrāṇi tenāsminn ṛṣiṇā vinā 4.059.009c vasato mama dharmajñāḥ svargate tu niśākare
GE09ram_1-7u:12057: 4.059.010a avatīrya ca vindhyāgrāt kṛcchreṇa viṣamāc chanaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12058: 4.059.010c tīkṣṇadarbhāṃ vasumatīṃ duḥkhena punar āgataḥ 4.059.011a tam ṛṣiṃ draṣṭu kāmo 'smi duḥkhenābhyāgato bhṛśam 4.059.011c jaṭāyuṣā mayā caiva bahuśo 'bhigato hi saḥ 4.059.012a tasyāśramapadābhyāśe vavur vātāḥ sugandhinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12059: 4.059.012c vṛkṣo nāpuṣpitaḥ kaś cid aphalo vā na dṛśyate 4.059.013a upetya cāśramaṃ puṇyaṃ vṛkṣamūlam upāśritaḥ 4.059.013c draṣṭukāmaḥ pratīkṣe ca bhagavantaṃ niśākaram 4.059.014a athāpaśyam adūrastham ṛṣiṃ jvalitatejasaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:12061: 4.059.015a tam ṛkṣāḥ sṛmarā vyāghrāḥ siṃhā nāgāḥ sarīsṛpāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12063: 4.059.016a tataḥ prāptam ṛṣiṃ jñātvā tāni sattvāni vai yayuḥ 4.059.016c praviṣṭe rājani yathā sarvaṃ sāmātyakaṃ balam
GE09ram_1-7u:12064: 4.059.017a ṛṣis tu dṛṣṭvā māṃ tuṣṭaḥ praviṣṭaś cāśramaṃ punaḥ 4.059.017c muhūrtamātrān niṣkramya tataḥ kāryam apṛcchata 4.059.018a saumya vaikalyatāṃ dṛṣṭvā roṃṇāṃ te nāvagamyate
GE09ram_1-7u:12065: 4.059.018c agnidagdhāv imau pakṣau tvak caiva vraṇitā tava
GE09ram_1-7u:12066: 4.059.019a dvau gṛdhrau dṛṣṭapūrvau me mātariśvasamau jave
GE09ram_1-7u:12067: 4.059.019c gṛdhrāṇāṃ caiva rājānau bhrātarau kāmarūpiṇau 4.059.020a jyeṣṭhas tvaṃ tu ca saṃpātir jaṭāyur anujas tava 4.059.020c mānuṣaṃ rūpam āsthāya gṛhṇītāṃ caraṇau mama
GE09ram_1-7u:12068: 4.059.021a kiṃ te vyādhisamutthānaṃ pakṣayoḥ patanaṃ katham
GE09ram_1-7u:12069: 4.059.021c daṇḍo vāyaṃ dhṛtaḥ kena sarvam ākhyāhi pṛcchataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12070: 4.060.001a tatas tad dāruṇaṃ karma duṣkaraṃ sāhasāt kṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:12071: 4.060.001c ācacakṣe muneḥ sarvaṃ sūryānugamanaṃ tathā 4.060.002a bhagavan vraṇayuktatvāl lajjayā cākulendriyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12072: 4.060.002c pariśrānto na śaknomi vacanaṃ paribhāṣitum 4.060.003a ahaṃ caiva jaṭāyuś ca saṃgharṣād darpamohitau
GE09ram_1-7u:12073: 4.060.003c ākāśaṃ patitau vīrau jighāsantau parākramam 4.060.004a kailāsaśikhare baddhvā munīnām agrataḥ paṇam 4.060.004c raviḥ syād anuyātavyo yāvad astaṃ mahāgirim
GE09ram_1-7u:12074: 4.060.005a athāvāṃ yugapat prāptāv apaśyāva mahītale 4.060.005c rathacakrapramāṇāni nagarāṇi pṛthak pṛthak
GE09ram_1-7u:12075: 4.060.006a kva cid vāditraghoṣāṃś ca brahmaghoṣāṃś ca śuśruva
GE09ram_1-7u:12076: 4.060.006c gāyantīś cāṅganā bahvīḥ paśyāvo raktavāsasaḥ 4.060.007a tūrṇam utpatya cākāśam ādityapatham āsthitau 4.060.007c āvām ālokayāvas tad vanaṃ śādvalasaṃsthitam 4.060.008a upalair iva saṃchannā dṛśyate bhūḥ śiloccayaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12077: 4.060.008c āpagābhiś ca saṃvītā sūtrair iva vasuṃdharā
GE09ram_1-7u:12078: 4.060.009a himavāṃś caiva vindhyaś ca meruś ca sumahān nagaḥ 4.060.009c bhūtale saṃprakāśante nāgā iva jalāśaye 4.060.010a tīvrasvedaś ca khedaś ca bhayaṃ cāsīt tadāvayoḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12079: 4.060.010c samāviśata mohaś ca mohān mūrchā ca dāruṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:12080: 4.060.011a na dig vijñāyate yāmyā nāgenyā na ca vāruṇī 4.060.011c yugānte niyato loko hato dagdha ivāgninā
GE09ram_1-7u:12081: 4.060.012a yatnena mahatā bhūyo raviḥ samavalokitaḥ 4.060.012c tulyaḥ pṛthvīpramāṇena bhāskaraḥ pratibhāti nau 4.060.013a jaṭāyur mām anāpṛcchya nipapāta mahīṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12082: 4.060.013c taṃ dṛṣṭvā tūrṇam ākāśād ātmānaṃ muktavān aham
GE09ram_1-7u:12083: 4.060.014a pakṣibhyāṃ ca mayā gupto jaṭāyur na pradahyata
GE09ram_1-7u:12084: 4.060.014c pramādāt tatra nirdagdhaḥ patan vāyupathād aham
GE09ram_1-7u:12085: 4.060.015a āśaṅke taṃ nipatitaṃ janasthāne jaṭāyuṣam 4.060.015c ahaṃ tu patito vindhye dagdhapakṣo jaḍīkṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12086: 4.060.016a rājyena hīno bhrātrā ca pakṣābhyāṃ vikrameṇa ca
GE09ram_1-7u:12087: 4.060.016c sarvathā martum evecchan patiṣye śikharād gireḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12088: 4.061.001a evam uktvā muniśreṣṭham arudaṃ duḥkhito bhṛśam
GE09ram_1-7u:12089: 4.061.001c atha dhyātvā muhūrtaṃ tu bhagavān idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:12090: 4.061.002a pakṣau ca te prapakṣau ca punar anyau bhaviṣyataḥ 4.061.002c cakṣuṣī caiva prāṇāś ca vikramaś ca balaṃ ca te
GE09ram_1-7u:12091: 4.061.003a purāṇe sumahat kāryaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ hi mayā śrutam
GE09ram_1-7u:12092: 4.061.003c dṛṣṭaṃ me tapasā caiva śrutvā ca viditaṃ mama 4.061.004a rājā daśaratho nāma kaś cid ikṣvākunandanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12093: 4.061.004c tasya putro mahātejā rāmo nāma bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:12094: 4.061.005a araṇyaṃ ca saha bhrātrā lakṣmaṇena gamiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:12095: 4.061.005c tasminn arthe niyuktaḥ san pitrā satyaparākramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12096: 4.061.006a nairṛto rāvaṇo nāma tasyā bhāryāṃ hariṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:12098: 4.061.007a sā ca kāmaiḥ pralobhyantī bhakṣyair bhojyaiś ca maithilī 4.061.007c na bhokṣyati mahābhāgā duḥkhamagnā yaśasvinī 4.061.008a paramānnaṃ tu vaidehyā jñātvā dāsyati vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12099: 4.061.008c yad annam amṛtaprakhyaṃ surāṇām api durlabham
GE09ram_1-7u:12100: 4.061.009a tad annaṃ maithilī prāpya vijñāyendrād idaṃ tv iti 4.061.009c agram uddhṛtya rāmāya bhūtale nirvapiṣyati 4.061.010a yadi jīvati me bhartā lakṣmaṇena saha prabhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12101: 4.061.010c devatvaṃ gatayor vāpi tayor annam idaṃ tv iti 4.061.011a eṣyanty anveṣakās tasyā rāmadūtāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ 4.061.011c ākhyeyā rāmamahiṣī tvayā tebhyo vihaṃgama 4.061.012a sarvathā tu na gantavyam īdṛśaḥ kva gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:12102: 4.061.012c deśakālau pratīkṣasva pakṣau tvaṃ pratipatsyase 4.061.013a utsaheyam ahaṃ kartum adyaiva tvāṃ sapakṣakam
GE09ram_1-7u:12103: 4.061.013c ihasthas tvaṃ tu lokānāṃ hitaṃ kāryaṃ kariṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:12104: 4.061.014a tvayāpi khalu tat kāryaṃ tayoś ca nṛpaputrayoḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12105: 4.061.014c brāhmaṇānāṃ surāṇāṃ ca munīnāṃ vāsavasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:12106: 4.061.015a icchāmy aham api draṣṭuṃ bhrātaru rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:12107: 4.061.015c necche ciraṃ dhārayituṃ prāṇāṃs tyakṣye kalevaram
GE09ram_1-7u:12108: 4.062.001a etair anyaiś ca bahubhir vākyair vākyaviśāradaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12109: 4.062.001c māṃ praśasyābhyanujñāpya praviṣṭaḥ sa svam āśramam
GE09ram_1-7u:12110: 4.062.002a kandarāt tu visarpitvā parvatasya śanaiḥ śanaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12111: 4.062.002c ahaṃ vindhyaṃ samāruhya bhavataḥ pratipālaye 4.062.003a adya tv etasya kālasya sāgraṃ varṣaśataṃ gatam
GE09ram_1-7u:12113: 4.062.004a mahāprasthānam āsādya svargate tu niśākare 4.062.004c māṃ nirdahati saṃtāpo vitarkair bahubhir vṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:12114: 4.062.005a utthitāṃ maraṇe buddhiṃ muni vākyair nivartaye
GE09ram_1-7u:12115: 4.062.005c buddhir yā tena me dattā prāṇasaṃrakṣaṇāya tu
GE09ram_1-7u:12117: 4.062.006a budhyatā ca mayā vīryaṃ rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12118: 4.062.006c putraḥ saṃtarjito vāgbhir na trātā maithilī katham
GE09ram_1-7u:12119: 4.062.007a tasyā vilapitaṃ śrutvā tau ca sītā vinākṛtau
GE09ram_1-7u:12120: 4.062.007c na me daśarathasnehāt putreṇotpāditaṃ priyam 4.062.008a tasya tv evaṃ bruvāṇasya saṃpāter vānaraiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:12121: 4.062.008c utpetatus tadā pakṣau samakṣaṃ vanacāriṇām 4.062.009a sa dṛṣṭvā svāṃ tanuṃ pakṣair udgatair aruṇacchadaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12122: 4.062.009c praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe vānarāṃś cedam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:12124: 4.062.010c ādityaraśminirdagdhau pakṣau me punar utthitau 4.062.011a yauvane vartamānasya mamāsīd yaḥ parākramaḥ 4.062.011c tam evādyāvagacchāmi balaṃ pauruṣam eva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:12125: 4.062.012a sarvathā kriyatāṃ yatnaḥ sītām adhigamiṣyatha 4.062.012c pakṣalābho mamāyaṃ vaḥ siddhipratyaya kārakaḥ 4.062.013a ity uktvā tān harīn sarvān saṃpātiḥ patatāṃ varaḥ 4.062.013c utpapāta gireḥ śṛṅgāj jijñāsuḥ khagamo gatim
GE09ram_1-7u:12129: 4.062.015c abhijidabhimukhāṃ diśaṃ yayur; janakasutā parimārgaṇonmukhāḥ 4.063.001a ākhyātā gṛdhrarājena samutpatya plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12131: 4.063.002a saṃpāter vacanaṃ śrutvā harayo rāvaṇakṣayam 4.063.002c hṛṣṭāḥ sāgaram ājagmuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12132: 4.063.003a abhikramya tu taṃ deśaṃ dadṛśur bhīmavikramāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12133: 4.063.003c kṛtsnaṃ lokasya mahataḥ pratibimbam iva sthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:12135: 4.063.004c saṃniveśaṃ tataś cakruḥ sahitā vānarottamāḥ 4.063.005a sattvair mahadbhir vikṛtaiḥ krīḍadbhir vividhair jale
GE09ram_1-7u:12136: 4.063.005c vyāttāsyaiḥ sumahākāyair ūrmibhiś ca samākulam 4.063.006a prasuptam iva cānyatra krīḍantam iva cānyataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12137: 4.063.006c kva cit parvatamātraiś ca jalarāśibhir āvṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:12140: 4.063.008a ākāśam iva duṣpāraṃ sāgaraṃ prekṣya vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12141: 4.063.008c viṣeduḥ sahasā sarve kathaṃ kāryam iti bruvan
GE09ram_1-7u:12142: 4.063.009a viṣaṇṇāṃ vāhinīṃ dṛṣṭvā sāgarasya nirīkṣaṇāt 4.063.009c āśvāsayām āsa harīn bhayārtān harisattamaḥ 4.063.010a na niṣādena naḥ kāryaṃ viṣādo doṣavattaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12143: 4.063.010c viṣādo hanti puruṣaṃ bālaṃ kruddha ivoragaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12145: 4.063.011c tejasā tasya hīnasya puruṣārtho na sidhyati
GE09ram_1-7u:12146: 4.063.012a tasyāṃ rātryāṃ vyatītāyām aṅgado vānaraiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:12147: 4.063.012c harivṛddhaiḥ samāgamya punar mantram amantrayat 4.063.013a sā vānarāṇāṃ dhvajinī parivāryāṅgadaṃ babhau 4.063.013c vāsavaṃ parivāryeva marutāṃ vāhinī sthitā 4.063.014a ko 'nyas tāṃ vānarīṃ senāṃ śaktaḥ stambhayituṃ bhavet
GE09ram_1-7u:12148: 4.063.014c anyatra vālitanayād anyatra ca hanūmataḥ 4.063.015a tatas tān harivṛddhāṃś ca tac ca sainyam ariṃdamaḥ 4.063.015c anumānyāṅgadaḥ śrīmān vākyam arthavad abravīt 4.063.016a ka idānīṃ mahātejā laṅghayiṣyati sāgaram 4.063.016c kaḥ kariṣyati sugrīvaṃ satyasaṃdham ariṃdamam 4.063.017a ko vīro yojanaśataṃ laṅghayeta plavaṃgamāḥ 4.063.017c imāṃś ca yūthapān sarvān mocayet ko mahābhayāt
GE09ram_1-7u:12149: 4.063.018a kasya prasādād dārāṃś ca putrāṃś caiva gṛhāṇi ca 4.063.018c ito nivṛttāḥ paśyema siddhārthāḥ sukhino vayam
GE09ram_1-7u:12150: 4.063.019a kasya prasādād rāmaṃ ca lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_1-7u:12151: 4.063.019c abhigacchema saṃhṛṣṭāḥ sugrīvaṃ ca mahābalam 4.063.020a yadi kaś cit samartho vaḥ sāgaraplavane hariḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12152: 4.063.020c sa dadātv iha naḥ śīghraṃ puṇyām abhayadakṣiṇām
GE09ram_1-7u:12153: 4.063.021a aṅgadasya vacaḥ śrutvā na kaś cit kiṃ cid abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:12154: 4.063.021c stimitevābhavat sarvā sā tatra harivāhinī 4.063.022a punar evāṅgadaḥ prāha tān harīn harisattamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12155: 4.063.022c sarve balavatāṃ śreṣṭhā bhavanto dṛḍhavikramāḥ 4.063.023a vyapadeśya kule jātāḥ pūjitāś cāpy abhīkṣṇaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12156: 4.063.023c na hi vo gamane saṃgaḥ kadā cid api kasya cit
GE09ram_1-7u:12157: 4.063.024a bruvadhvaṃ yasya yā śaktir gamane plavagarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12159: 4.064.001c svaṃ svaṃ gatau samutsāham āhus tatra yathākramam
GE09ram_1-7u:12160: 4.064.002a gajo gavākṣo gavayaḥ śarabho gandhamādanaḥ 4.064.002c maindaś ca dvividaś caiva suṣeṇo jāmbavāṃs tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:12161: 4.064.003a ābabhāṣe gajas tatra plaveyaṃ daśayojanam 4.064.003c gavākṣo yojanāny āha gamiṣyāmīti viṃśatim 4.064.004a gavayo vānaras tatra vānarāṃs tān uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:12162: 4.064.004c triṃśataṃ tu gamiṣyāmi yojanānāṃ plavaṃgamāḥ 4.064.005a śarabho vānaras tatra vānarāṃs tān uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:12163: 4.064.005c catvāriṃśad gamiṣyāmi yojanānāṃ na saṃśayaḥ 4.064.006a vānarāṃs tu mahātejā abravīd gandhamādanaḥ 4.064.006c yojanānāṃ gamiṣyāmi pañcāśat tu na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12164: 4.064.007a maindas tu vānaras tatra vānarāṃs tān uvāca ha 4.064.007c yojanānāṃ paraṃ ṣaṣṭim ahaṃ plavitum utsahe
GE09ram_1-7u:12165: 4.064.008a tatas tatra mahātejā dvividaḥ pratyabhāṣata 4.064.008c gamiṣyāmi na saṃdehaḥ saptatiṃ yojanāny aham
GE09ram_1-7u:12166: 4.064.009a suṣeṇas tu hariśreṣṭhaḥ proktavān kapisattamān 4.064.009c aśītiṃ yojanānāṃ tu plaveyaṃ plavagarṣabhāḥ 4.064.010a teṣāṃ kathayatāṃ tatra sarvāṃs tān anumānya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:12167: 4.064.010c tato vṛddhatamas teṣāṃ jāmbavān pratyabhāṣata 4.064.011a pūrvam asmākam apy āsīt kaś cid gatiparākramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12168: 4.064.011c te vayaṃ vayasaḥ pāram anuprāptāḥ sma sāmpratam
GE09ram_1-7u:12169: 4.064.012a kiṃ tu naivaṃ gate śakyam idaṃ kāryam upekṣitum 4.064.012c yad arthaṃ kapirājaś ca rāmaś ca kṛtaniścayau
GE09ram_1-7u:12170: 4.064.013a sāmprataṃ kālabhedena yā gatis tāṃ nibodhata
GE09ram_1-7u:12171: 4.064.013c navatiṃ yojanānāṃ tu gamiṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12172: 4.064.014a tāṃś ca sarvān hariśreṣṭhāñ jāmbavān punar abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:12173: 4.064.014c na khalv etāvad evāsīd gamane me parākramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12174: 4.064.015a mayā mahābalaiś caiva yajñe viṣṇuḥ sanātanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12176: 4.064.016a sa idānīm ahaṃ vṛddhaḥ plavane mandavikramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12177: 4.064.016c yauvane ca tadāsīn me balam apratimaṃ paraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12178: 4.064.017a saṃpraty etāvatīṃ śaktiṃ gamane tarkayāmy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:12179: 4.064.017c naitāvatā ca saṃsiddhiḥ kāryasyāsya bhaviṣyati 4.064.018a athottaram udārārtham abravīd aṅgadas tadā 4.064.018c anumānya mahāprājño jāmbavantaṃ mahākapim
GE09ram_1-7u:12180: 4.064.019a aham etad gamiṣyāmi yojanānāṃ śataṃ mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:12181: 4.064.019c nivartane tu me śaktiḥ syān na veti na niścitam
GE09ram_1-7u:12182: 4.064.020a tam uvāca hariśreṣṭho jāmbavān vākyakovidaḥ 4.064.020c jñāyate gamane śaktis tava haryṛkṣasattama 4.064.021a kāmaṃ śatasahasraṃ vā na hy eṣa vidhir ucyate 4.064.021c yojanānāṃ bhavāñ śakto gantuṃ pratinivartitum 4.064.022a na hi preṣayitā tata svāmī preṣyaḥ kathaṃ cana 4.064.022c bhavatāyaṃ janaḥ sarvaḥ preṣyaḥ plavagasattama 4.064.023a bhavān kalatram asmākaṃ svāmibhāve vyavasthitaḥ 4.064.023c svāmī kalatraṃ sainyasya gatir eṣā paraṃtapa
GE09ram_1-7u:12183: 4.064.024a tasmāt kalatravat tāta pratipālyaḥ sadā bhavān
GE09ram_1-7u:12184: 4.064.024c api caitasya kāryasya bhavān mūlam ariṃdama
GE09ram_1-7u:12185: 4.064.025a mūlam arthasya saṃrakṣyam eṣa kāryavidāṃ nayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12186: 4.064.025c mūle hi sati sidhyanti guṇāḥ puṣpaphalādayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12187: 4.064.026a tad bhavān asyā kāryasya sādhane satyavikramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12189: 4.064.027a guruś ca guruputraś ca tvaṃ hi naḥ kapisattama 4.064.027c bhavantam āśritya vayaṃ samarthā hy arthasādhane
GE09ram_1-7u:12192: 4.064.029a yadi nāhaṃ gamiṣyāmi nānyo vānarapuṃgavaḥ 4.064.029c punaḥ khalv idam asmābhiḥ kāryaṃ prāyopaveśanam
GE09ram_1-7u:12193: 4.064.030a na hy akṛtvā haripateḥ saṃdeśaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12194: 4.064.030c tatrāpi gatvā prāṇānāṃ paśyāmi parirakṣaṇam 4.064.031a sa hi prasāde cātyarthaṃ kope ca harir īśvaraḥ 4.064.031c atītya tasya saṃdeśaṃ vināśo gamane bhavet
GE09ram_1-7u:12195: 4.064.032a tad yathā hy asya kāryasya na bhavaty anyathā gatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12196: 4.064.032c tad bhavān eva dṛṣṭārthaḥ saṃcintayitum arhati
GE09ram_1-7u:12199: 4.064.034a asya te vīra kāryasya na kiṃ cit parihīyate 4.064.034c eṣa saṃcodayāmy enaṃ yaḥ kāryaṃ sādhayiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:12200: 4.064.035a tataḥ pratītaṃ plavatāṃ variṣṭham; ekāntam āśritya sukhopaviṣṭam
GE09ram_1-7u:12201: 4.064.035c saṃcodayām āsa haripravīro; haripravīraṃ hanumantam eva
GE09ram_1-7u:12205: 4.065.002c tūṣṇīm ekāntam āśritya hanuman kiṃ na jalpasi
GE09ram_1-7u:12206: 4.065.003a hanuman harirājasya sugrīvasya samo hy asi
GE09ram_1-7u:12207: 4.065.003c rāmalakṣmaṇayoś cāpi tejasā ca balena ca
GE09ram_1-7u:12209: 4.065.004c garutmān iva vikhyāta uttamaḥ sarvapakṣiṇām 4.065.005a bahuśo hi mayā dṛṣṭaḥ sāgare sa mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12210: 4.065.005c bhujagān uddharan pakṣī mahāvego mahāyaśāḥ 4.065.006a pakṣayor yad balaṃ tasya tāvad bhujabalaṃ tava
GE09ram_1-7u:12211: 4.065.006c vikramaś cāpi vegaś ca na te tenāpahīyate
GE09ram_1-7u:12212: 4.065.007a balaṃ buddhiś ca tejaś ca sattvaṃ ca harisattama 4.065.007c viśiṣṭaṃ sarvabhūteṣu kim ātmānaṃ na budhyase
GE09ram_1-7u:12214: 4.065.008c ajñaneti parikhyātā patnī kesariṇo hareḥ 4.065.009a abhiśāpād abhūt tāta vānarī kāmarūpiṇī 4.065.009c duhitā vānarendrasya kuñjarasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12215: 4.065.010a kapitve cārusarvāṅgī kadā cit kāmarūpiṇī 4.065.010c mānuṣaṃ vigrahaṃ kṛtvā yauvanottamaśālinī
GE09ram_1-7u:12217: 4.065.011c vicitramālyābharaṇā mahārhakṣaumavāsinī 4.065.012a tasyā vastraṃ viśālākṣyāḥ pītaṃ raktadaśaṃ śubham
GE09ram_1-7u:12219: 4.065.013a sa dadarśa tatas tasyā vṛttāv ūrū susaṃhatau
GE09ram_1-7u:12220: 4.065.013c stanau ca pīnau sahitau sujātaṃ cāru cānanam
GE09ram_1-7u:12223: 4.065.015a sa tāṃ bhujābhyāṃ pīnābhyāṃ paryaṣvajata mārutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12225: 4.065.016a sā tu tatraiva saṃbhrāntā suvṛttā vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:12226: 4.065.016c ekapatnīvratam idaṃ ko nāśayitum icchati 4.065.017a añjanāyā vacaḥ śrutvā mārutaḥ pratyabhāṣata 4.065.017c na tvāṃ hiṃsāmi suśroṇi mā bhūt te subhage bhayam
GE09ram_1-7u:12227: 4.065.018a manasāsmi gato yat tvāṃ pariṣvajya yaśasvini
GE09ram_1-7u:12228: 4.065.018c vīryavān buddhisaṃpannaḥ putras tava bhaviṣyati 4.065.019a abhyutthitaṃ tataḥ sūryaṃ bālo dṛṣṭvā mahāvane
GE09ram_1-7u:12229: 4.065.019c phalaṃ ceti jighṛkṣus tvam utplutyābhyapato divam
GE09ram_1-7u:12230: 4.065.020a śatāni trīṇi gatvātha yojanānāṃ mahākape 4.065.020c tejasā tasya nirdhūto na viṣādaṃ tato gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12231: 4.065.021a tāvad āpatatas tūrṇam antarikṣaṃ mahākape 4.065.021c kṣiptam indreṇa te vajraṃ krodhāviṣṭena dhīmatā
GE09ram_1-7u:12232: 4.065.022a tataḥ śailāgraśikhare vāmo hanur abhajyata 4.065.022c tato hi nāmadheyaṃ te hanumān iti kīrtyate
GE09ram_1-7u:12233: 4.065.023a tatas tvāṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā vāyur gandhavahaḥ svayam
GE09ram_1-7u:12234: 4.065.023c trailokye bhṛśasaṃkruddho na vavau vai prabhañjanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12235: 4.065.024a saṃbhrāntāś ca surāḥ sarve trailokye kṣubhite sati
GE09ram_1-7u:12237: 4.065.025a prasādite ca pavane brahmā tubhyaṃ varaṃ dadau
GE09ram_1-7u:12239: 4.065.026a vajrasya ca nipātena virujaṃ tvāṃ samīkṣya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:12240: 4.065.026c sahasranetraḥ prītātmā dadau te varam uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:12241: 4.065.027a svacchandataś ca maraṇaṃ te bhūyād iti vai prabho 4.065.027c sa tvaṃ kesariṇaḥ putraḥ kṣetrajo bhīmavikramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12242: 4.065.028a mārutasyaurasaḥ putras tejasā cāpi tatsamaḥ 4.065.028c tvaṃ hi vāyusuto vatsa plavane cāpi tatsamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12243: 4.065.029a vayam adya gataprāṇā bhavān asmāsu sāmpratam
GE09ram_1-7u:12246: 4.065.030c triḥ saptakṛtvaḥ pṛthivī parikrāntā pradakṣiṇam 4.065.031a tadā cauṣadhayo 'smābhiḥ saṃcitā devaśāsanāt 4.065.031c niṣpannam amṛtaṃ yābhis tadāsīn no mahad balam
GE09ram_1-7u:12247: 4.065.032a sa idānīm ahaṃ vṛddhaḥ parihīnaparākramaḥ 4.065.032c sāmprataṃ kālam asmākaṃ bhavān sarvaguṇānvitaḥ 4.065.033a tad vijṛmbhasva vikrāntaḥ plavatām uttamo hy asi
GE09ram_1-7u:12250: 4.065.034c parā hi sarvabhūtānāṃ hanuman yā gatis tava
GE09ram_1-7u:12251: 4.065.035a viṣāṇṇā harayaḥ sarve hanuman kim upekṣase
GE09ram_1-7u:12252: 4.065.035c vikramasva mahāvego viṣṇus trīn vikramān iva
GE09ram_1-7u:12253: 4.065.036a tatas tu vai jāmbavatābhicoditaḥ; pratītavegaḥ pavanātmajaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12254: 4.065.036c praharṣayaṃs tāṃ harivīra vāhinīṃ; cakāra rūpaṃ mahad ātmanas tadā 4.066.001a saṃstūyamāno hanumān vyavardhata mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12255: 4.066.001c samāvidhya ca lāṅgūlaṃ harṣāc ca balam eyivān
GE09ram_1-7u:12258: 4.066.003a yathā vijṛmbhate siṃho vivṛddho girigahvare 4.066.003c mārutasyaurasaḥ putras tathā saṃprati jṛmbhate 4.066.004a aśobhata mukhaṃ tasya jṛmbhamāṇasya dhīmataḥ 4.066.004c ambarīṣopamaṃ dīptaṃ vidhūma iva pāvakaḥ 4.066.005a harīṇām utthito madhyāt saṃprahṛṣṭatanūruhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12259: 4.066.005c abhivādya harīn vṛddhān hanumān idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:12261: 4.066.006c balavān aprameyaś ca vāyur ākāśagocaraḥ 4.066.007a tasyāhaṃ śīghravegasya śīghragasya
GE09ram_1-7u:12262: 4.066.007c mārutasyaurasaḥ putraḥ plavane nāsti me samaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12263: 4.066.008a utsaheyaṃ hi vistīrṇam ālikhantam ivāmbaram 4.066.008c meruṃ girim asaṃgena parigantuṃ sahasraśaḥ 4.066.009a bāhuvegapraṇunnena sāgareṇāham utsahe
GE09ram_1-7u:12268: 4.066.011c vainateyam ahaṃ śaktaḥ parigantuṃ sahasraśaḥ 4.066.012a udayāt prasthitaṃ vāpi jvalantaṃ raśmimālinam 4.066.012c anastamitam ādityam abhigantuṃ samutsahe
GE09ram_1-7u:12269: 4.066.013a tato bhūmim asaṃspṛśya punar āgantum utsahe
GE09ram_1-7u:12275: 4.066.016a latānāṃ vīrudhāṃ puṣpaṃ pādapānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12276: 4.066.016c anuyāsyati mām adya plavamānaṃ vihāyasā 4.066.016e bhaviṣyati hi me panthāḥ svāteḥ panthā ivāmbare
GE09ram_1-7u:12277: 4.066.017a carantaṃ ghoram ākāśam utpatiṣyantam eva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:12278: 4.066.017c drakṣyanti nipatantaṃ ca sarvabhūtāni vānarāḥ 4.066.018a mahāmerupratīkāśaṃ māṃ drakṣyadhvaṃ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12279: 4.066.018c divam āvṛtya gacchantaṃ grasamānam ivāmbaram 4.066.019a vidhamiṣyāmi jīmūtān kampayiṣyāmi parvatān
GE09ram_1-7u:12281: 4.066.020a vainateyasya vā śaktir mama vā mārutasya vā
GE09ram_1-7u:12282: 4.066.020c ṛte suparṇarājānaṃ mārutaṃ vā mahābalam 4.066.020e na hi bhūtaṃ prapaśyāmi yo māṃ plutam anuvrajet 4.066.021a nimeṣāntaramātreṇa nirālambhanam ambaram
GE09ram_1-7u:12283: 4.066.021c sahasā nipatiṣyāmi ghanād vidyud ivotthitā 4.066.022a bhaviṣyati hi me rūpaṃ plavamānasya sāgaram
GE09ram_1-7u:12284: 4.066.022c viṣṇoḥ prakramamāṇasya tadā trīn vikramān iva
GE09ram_1-7u:12285: 4.066.023a buddhyā cāhaṃ prapaśyāmi manaś ceṣṭā ca me tathā 4.066.023c ahaṃ drakṣyāmi vaidehīṃ pramodadhvaṃ plavaṃgamāḥ 4.066.024a mārutasya samo vege garuḍasya samo jave
GE09ram_1-7u:12286: 4.066.024c ayutaṃ yojanānāṃ tu gamiṣyāmīti me matiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12287: 4.066.025a vāsavasya savajrasya brahmaṇo vā svayambhuvaḥ 4.066.025c vikramya sahasā hastād amṛtaṃ tad ihānaye
GE09ram_1-7u:12288: 4.066.025e laṅkāṃ vāpi samutkṣipya gaccheyam iti me matiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12289: 4.066.026a tam evaṃ vānaraśreṣṭhaṃ garjantam amitaujasaṃ 4.066.026c uvāca parisaṃhṛṣṭo jāmbavān harisattamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12290: 4.066.027a vīra kesariṇaḥ putra vegavan mārutātmaja 4.066.027c jñātīnāṃ vipulaṃ śokas tvayā tāta praṇāśitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12293: 4.066.029a ṛṣīṇāṃ ca prasādena kapivṛddhamatena ca 4.066.029c gurūṇāṃ ca prasādena plavasva tvaṃ mahārṇavam
GE09ram_1-7u:12295: 4.066.030c tvadgatāni ca sarveṣāṃ jīvitāni vanaukasām 4.066.031a tatas tu hariśārdūlas tān uvāca vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12296: 4.066.031c neyaṃ mama mahī vegaṃ plavane dhārayiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:12298: 4.066.032c śikharāṇi mahendrasya sthirāṇi ca mahānti ca
GE09ram_1-7u:12299: 4.066.033a etāni mama niṣpeṣaṃ pādayoḥ patatāṃ varāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12300: 4.066.033c plavato dhārayiṣyanti yojanānām itaḥ śatam 4.066.034a tatas tu mārutaprakhyaḥ sa harir mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12303: 4.066.035c latākusumasaṃbādhaṃ nityapuṣpaphaladrumam 4.066.036a siṃhaśārdūlacaritaṃ mattamātaṅgasevitam 4.066.036c mattadvijagaṇodghuṣṭaṃ salilotpīḍasaṃkulam 4.066.037a mahadbhir ucchritaṃ śṛṅgair mahendraṃ sa mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12305: 4.066.038a pādābhyāṃ pīḍitas tena mahāśailo mahātmanā 4.066.038c rarāsa siṃhābhihato mahān matta iva dvipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12307: 4.066.039c vitrastamṛgamātaṅgaḥ prakampitamahādrumaḥ 4.066.040a nānāgandharvamithunaiḥ pānasaṃsargakarkaśaiḥ 4.066.040c utpatadbhir vihaṃgaiś ca vidyādharagaṇair api 4.066.041a tyajyamānamahāsānuḥ saṃnilīnamahoragaḥ 4.066.041c śailaśṛṅgaśilodghātas tadābhūt sa mahāgiriḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12308: 4.066.042a niḥśvasadbhis tadā tais tu bhujagair ardhaniḥsṛtaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12309: 4.066.042c sapatāka ivābhāti sa tadā dharaṇīdharaḥ 4.066.043a ṛṣibhis trāsa saṃbhrāntais tyajyamānaḥ śiloccayaḥ 4.066.043c sīdan mahati kāntāre sārthahīna ivādhvagaḥ 4.066.044a sa vegavān vegasamāhitātmā; haripravīraḥ paravīrahantā 4.066.044c manaḥ samādhāya mahānubhāvo; jagāma laṅkāṃ manasā manasvī
GE09ram_1-7u:12311: 5.001.001c iyeṣa padam anveṣṭuṃ cāraṇācarite pathi 5.001.002a atha vaidūryavarṇeṣu śādvaleṣu
GE09ram_1-7u:12313: 5.001.003a dvijān vitrāsayan dhīmān urasā pādapān haran
GE09ram_1-7u:12314: 5.001.003c mṛgāṃś ca subahūn nighnan pravṛddha iva kesarī
GE09ram_1-7u:12315: 5.001.004a nīlalohitamāñjiṣṭhapadmavarṇaiḥ sitāsitaiḥ 5.001.004c svabhāvavihitaiś citrair dhātubhiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:12318: 5.001.006a sa tasya girivaryasya tale nāgavarāyute 5.001.006c tiṣṭhan kapivaras tatra hrade nāga ivābabhau
GE09ram_1-7u:12319: 5.001.007a sa sūryāya mahendrāya pavanāya svayambhuve 5.001.007c bhūtebhyaś cāñjaliṃ kṛtvā cakāra gamane matim
GE09ram_1-7u:12321: 5.001.008c tato hi vavṛdhe gantuṃ dakṣiṇo dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE09ram_1-7u:12323: 5.001.009c vavṛdhe rāmavṛddhyarthaṃ samudra iva parvasu 5.001.010a niṣpramāṇa śarīraḥ saṃl lilaṅghayiṣur arṇavam 5.001.010c bāhubhyāṃ pīḍayām āsa caraṇābhyāṃ ca parvatam
GE09ram_1-7u:12324: 5.001.011a sa cacālācalāś cāru muhūrtaṃ kapipīḍitaḥ 5.001.011c tarūṇāṃ puṣpitāgrāṇāṃ sarvaṃ puṣpam aśātayat 5.001.012a tena pādapamuktena puṣpaugheṇa sugandhinā
GE09ram_1-7u:12325: 5.001.012c sarvataḥ saṃvṛtaḥ śailo babhau puṣpamayo yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:12326: 5.001.013a tena cottamavīryeṇa pīḍyamānaḥ sa parvataḥ 5.001.013c salilaṃ saṃprasusrāva madaṃ matta iva dvipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12327: 5.001.014a pīḍyamānas tu balinā mahendras tena parvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12329: 5.001.014e mumoca ca śilāḥ śailo viśālāḥ samanaḥśilāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12331: 5.001.015c guhāviṣṭāni bhūtāni vinedur vikṛtaiḥ svaraiḥ 5.001.016a sa mahāsattvasaṃnādaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12332: 5.001.016c pṛthivīṃ pūrayām āsa diśaś copavanāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:12334: 5.001.017c vamantaḥ pāvakaṃ ghoraṃ dadaṃśur daśanaiḥ śilāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12335: 5.001.018a tās tadā saviṣair daṣṭāḥ kupitais tair mahāśilāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12336: 5.001.018c jajvaluḥ pāvakoddīptā vibhiduś ca sahasradhā 5.001.019a yāni cauṣadhajālāni tasmiñ jātāni parvate 5.001.019c viṣaghnāny api nāgānāṃ na śekuḥ śamituṃ viṣam
GE09ram_1-7u:12337: 5.001.020a bhidyate 'yaṃ girir bhūtair iti matvā tapasvinaḥ 5.001.020c trastā vidyādharās tasmād utpetuḥ strīgaṇaiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:12339: 5.001.021c pātrāṇi ca mahārhāṇi karakāṃś ca hiraṇmayān
GE09ram_1-7u:12340: 5.001.022a lehyān uccāvacān bhakṣyān māṃsāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:12341: 5.001.022c ārṣabhāṇi ca carmāṇi khaḍgāṃś ca kanakatsarūn
GE09ram_1-7u:12343: 5.001.023c raktākṣāḥ puṣkarākṣāś ca gaganaṃ pratipedire 5.001.024a hāranūpurakeyūra pārihārya dharāḥ striyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12344: 5.001.024c vismitāḥ sasmitās tasthur ākāśe ramaṇaiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:12346: 5.001.025c sahitās tasthur ākāśe vīkṣāṃ cakruś ca parvatam
GE09ram_1-7u:12347: 5.001.026a śuśruvuś ca tadā śabdam ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām
GE09ram_1-7u:12351: 5.001.028a rāmārthaṃ vānarārthaṃ ca cikīrṣan karma duṣkaram
GE09ram_1-7u:12352: 5.001.028c samudrasya paraṃ pāraṃ duṣprāpaṃ prāptum icchati
GE09ram_1-7u:12353: 5.001.029a dudhuve ca sa romāṇi cakampe cācalopamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12354: 5.001.029c nanāda ca mahānādaṃ sumahān iva toyadaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12355: 5.001.030a ānupūrvyāc ca vṛttaṃ ca lāṅgūlaṃ romabhiś citam
GE09ram_1-7u:12357: 5.001.031a tasya lāṅgūlam āviddham ativegasya pṛṣṭhataḥ 5.001.031c dadṛśe garuḍeneva hriyamāṇo
GE09ram_1-7u:12359: 5.001.032c sasāda ca kapiḥ kaṭyāṃ caraṇau saṃcukopa ca
GE09ram_1-7u:12360: 5.001.033a saṃhṛtya ca bhujau śrīmāṃs tathaiva ca śirodharām
GE09ram_1-7u:12361: 5.001.033c tejaḥ sattvaṃ tathā vīryam āviveśa sa vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:12363: 5.001.034c rurodha hṛdaye prāṇān ākāśam avalokayan 5.001.035a padbhyāṃ dṛḍham avasthānaṃ kṛtvā sa kapikuñjaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12364: 5.001.035c nikuñcya karṇau hanumān utpatiṣyan mahābalaḥ 5.001.035e vānarān vānaraśreṣṭha idaṃ vacanam abravīt 5.001.036a yathā rāghavanirmuktaḥ śaraḥ śvasanavikramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12365: 5.001.036c gacchet tadvad gamiṣyāmi laṅkāṃ rāvaṇapālitām 5.001.037a na hi drakṣyāmi yadi tāṃ laṅkāyāṃ janakātmajām
GE09ram_1-7u:12366: 5.001.037c anenaiva hi vegena gamiṣyāmi surālayam 5.001.038a yadi vā tridive sītāṃ na drakṣyāmi
GE09ram_1-7u:12369: 5.001.039c ānayiṣyāmi vā laṅkāṃ samutpāṭya sarāvaṇām 5.001.040a evam uktvā tu hanumān vānarān
GE09ram_1-7u:12371: 5.001.041a samutpatati tasmiṃs tu vegāt te nagarohiṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12372: 5.001.041c saṃhṛtya viṭapān sarvān samutpetuḥ samantataḥ 5.001.042a sa mattakoyaṣṭibhakān pādapān puṣpaśālinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12374: 5.001.043a ūruvegoddhatā vṛkṣā muhūrtaṃ kapim anvayuḥ 5.001.043c prasthitaṃ dīrgham adhvānaṃ svabandhum iva bāndhavāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12375: 5.001.044a tam ūruvegonmathitāḥ sālāś cānye nagottamāḥ 5.001.044c anujagmur hanūmantaṃ sainyā iva mahīpatim 5.001.045a supuṣpitāgrair bahubhiḥ pādapair anvitaḥ kapiḥ 5.001.045c hanumān parvatākāro babhūvādbhutadarśanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12377: 5.001.046c bhayād iva mahendrasya parvatā varuṇālaye 5.001.047a sa nānākusumaiḥ kīrṇaḥ kapiḥ sāṅkurakorakaiḥ 5.001.047c śuśubhe meghasaṃkāśaḥ khadyotair iva parvataḥ 5.001.048a vimuktās tasya vegena muktvā puṣpāṇi te drumāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12378: 5.001.048c avaśīryanta salile nivṛttāḥ suhṛdo yathā 5.001.049a laghutvenopapannaṃ tad vicitraṃ sāgare 'patat
GE09ram_1-7u:12381: 5.001.050c babhau megha ivodyan vai vidyudgaṇavibhūṣitaḥ 5.001.051a tasya vegasamudbhūtaiḥ puṣpais toyam adṛśyata 5.001.051c tārābhir abhirāmābhir uditābhir ivāmbaram
GE09ram_1-7u:12383: 5.001.052c parvatāgrād viniṣkrāntau pañcāsyāv iva pannagau 5.001.053a pibann iva babhau cāpi sormijālaṃ mahārṇavam
GE09ram_1-7u:12384: 5.001.053c pipāsur iva cākāśaṃ dadṛśe sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12388: 5.001.055c cakṣuṣī saṃprakaśete candrasūryāv iva sthitau 5.001.056a mukhaṃ nāsikayā tasya tāmrayā tāmram ābabhau
GE09ram_1-7u:12389: 5.001.056c saṃdhyayā samabhispṛṣṭaṃ yathā sūryasya maṇḍalam 5.001.057a lāṅgalaṃ ca samāviddhaṃ plavamānasya śobhate 5.001.057c ambare vāyuputrasya śakradhvaja ivocchritaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12395: 5.001.060c kakṣāntaragato vāyur jīmūta iva garjati 5.001.061a khe yathā nipataty ulkā uttarāntād
GE09ram_1-7u:12396: 5.001.061c dṛśyate sānubandhā ca tathā sa kapikuñjaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12398: 5.001.062c pravṛddha iva mātaṃgaḥ kakṣyayā badhyamānayā 5.001.063a upariṣṭāc charīreṇa chāyayā cāvagāḍhayā
GE09ram_1-7u:12399: 5.001.063c sāgare mārutāviṣṭā naur ivāsīt tadā kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12400: 5.001.064a yaṃ yaṃ deśaṃ samudrasya jagāma sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12401: 5.001.064c sa sa tasyāṅgavegena sonmāda iva lakṣyate
GE09ram_1-7u:12403: 5.001.065c abhighnaṃs tu mahāvegaḥ pupluve sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12404: 5.001.066a kapivātaś ca balavān meghavātaś ca niḥsṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12405: 5.001.066c sāgaraṃ bhīmanirghoṣaṃ kampayām āsatur bhṛśam 5.001.067a vikarṣann ūrmijālāni bṛhanti lavaṇāmbhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:12406: 5.001.067c atyakrāman mahāvegas taraṅgān gaṇayann iva 5.001.068a plavamānaṃ samīkṣyātha bhujaṅgāḥ sāgarālayāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12407: 5.001.068c vyomni taṃ kapiśārdūlaṃ suparṇam iti menire
GE09ram_1-7u:12410: 5.001.070a śvetābhraghanarājīva vāyuputrānugāminī 5.001.070c tasya sā śuśubhe chāyā vitatā
GE09ram_1-7u:12411: 5.001.071a plavamānaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā plavagaṃ tvaritaṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:12413: 5.001.072a tatāpa na hi taṃ sūryaḥ plavantaṃ vānareśvaram
GE09ram_1-7u:12414: 5.001.072c siṣeve ca tadā vāyū rāmakāryārthasiddhaye 5.001.073a ṛṣayas tuṣṭuvuś cainaṃ plavamānaṃ vihāyasā 5.001.073c jaguś ca devagandharvāḥ praśaṃsanto mahaujasaṃ 5.001.074a nāgāś ca tuṣṭuvur yakṣā rakṣāṃsi vibudhāḥ khagāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12418: 5.001.076a sāhāyyaṃ vānarendrasya yadi nāhaṃ hanūmataḥ 5.001.076c kariṣyāmi bhaviṣyāmi sarvavācyo vivakṣatām
GE09ram_1-7u:12421: 5.001.078a tathā mayā vidhātavyaṃ viśrameta yathā kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12422: 5.001.078c śeṣaṃ ca mayi viśrāntaḥ sukhenātipatiṣyati 5.001.079a iti kṛtvā matiṃ sādhvīṃ samudraś channam ambhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:12426: 5.001.081a tvam eṣāṃ jñātavīryāṇāṃ punar evotpatiṣyatām 5.001.081c pātālasyāprameyasya dvāram āvṛtya tiṣṭhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:12427: 5.001.082a tiryag ūrdhvam adhaś caiva śaktis te śailavardhitum
GE09ram_1-7u:12428: 5.001.082c tasmāt saṃcodayāmi tvām uttiṣṭha nagasattama 5.001.083a sa eṣa kapiśārdūlas tvām uparyeti vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:12429: 5.001.083c hanūmān rāmakāryārthaṃ bhīmakarmā kham āplutaḥ 5.001.084a tasya sāhyaṃ mayā kāryam ikṣvākukulavartinaḥ 5.001.084c mama ikṣvākavaḥ pūjyāḥ paraṃ pūjyatamās tava
GE09ram_1-7u:12430: 5.001.085a kuru sācivyam asmākaṃ na naḥ kāryam atikramet
GE09ram_1-7u:12431: 5.001.085c kartavyam akṛtaṃ kāryaṃ satāṃ manyum udīrayet
GE09ram_1-7u:12432: 5.001.086a salilād ūrdhvam uttiṣṭha tiṣṭhatv eṣa kapis tvayi
GE09ram_1-7u:12433: 5.001.086c asmākam atithiś caiva pūjyaś ca plavatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12434: 5.001.087a cāmīkaramahānābha devagandharvasevita 5.001.087c hanūmāṃs tvayi viśrāntas tataḥ śeṣaṃ gamiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:12435: 5.001.088a kākutsthasyānṛśaṃsyaṃ ca maithilyāś ca vivāsanam 5.001.088c śramaṃ ca plavagendrasya samīkṣyotthātum arhasi 5.001.089a hiraṇyanābho maināko niśamya lavaṇāmbhasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12437: 5.001.090a sa sāgarajalaṃ bhittvā babhūvātyutthitas tadā 5.001.090c yathā jaladharaṃ bhittvā dīptaraśmir divākaraḥ 5.001.091a śātakumbhamayaiḥ śṛṅgaiḥ sakiṃnaramahoragaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12439: 5.001.092a tasya jāmbūnadaiḥ śṛṅgaiḥ parvatasya samutthitaiḥ 5.001.092c ākāśaṃ śastrasaṃkāśam abhavat kāñcanaprabham
GE09ram_1-7u:12440: 5.001.093a jātarūpamayaiḥ śṛṅgair bhrājamānaiḥ svayaṃ prabhaiḥ 5.001.093c ādityaśatasaṃkāśaḥ so 'bhavad girisattamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12441: 5.001.094a tam utthitam asaṃgena hanūmān agrataḥ sthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:12442: 5.001.094c madhye lavaṇatoyasya vighno 'yam iti niścitaḥ 5.001.095a sa tam ucchritam atyarthaṃ mahāvego mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12443: 5.001.095c urasā pātayām āsa jīmūtam iva mārutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12444: 5.001.096a sa tadā pātitas tena kapinā parvatottamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12445: 5.001.096c buddhvā tasya kaper vegaṃ jaharṣa ca nananda ca 5.001.097a tam ākāśagataṃ vīram ākāśe samavasthitam 5.001.097c prīto hṛṣṭamanā vākyam abravīt parvataḥ kapim
GE09ram_1-7u:12446: 5.001.097e mānuṣaṃ dharayan rūpam ātmanaḥ śikhare sthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12447: 5.001.098a duṣkaraṃ kṛtavān karma tvam idaṃ vānarottama
GE09ram_1-7u:12448: 5.001.098c nipatya mama śṛṅgeṣu viśramasva yathāsukham 5.001.099a rāghāvasya kule jātair udadhiḥ parivardhitaḥ 5.001.099c sa tvāṃ rāmahite yuktaṃ pratyarcayati sāgaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12449: 5.001.100a kṛte ca pratikartavyam eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12450: 5.001.100c so 'yaṃ tat pratikārārthī tvattaḥ saṃmānam arhati 5.001.101a tvannimittam anenāhaṃ bahumānāt pracoditaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12451: 5.001.101c yojanānāṃ śataṃ cāpi kapir eṣa samāplutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12452: 5.001.101e tava sānuṣu viśrāntaḥ śeṣaṃ prakramatām iti
GE09ram_1-7u:12453: 5.001.102a tiṣṭha tvaṃ hariśārdūla mayi viśramya gamyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:12454: 5.001.102c tad idaṃ gandhavat svādu kandamūlaphalaṃ bahu
GE09ram_1-7u:12456: 5.001.103a asmākam api saṃbandhaḥ kapimukhyas tvayāsti vai
GE09ram_1-7u:12458: 5.001.104a vegavantaḥ plavanto ye plavagā mārutātmaja 5.001.104c teṣāṃ mukhyatamaṃ manye tvām ahaṃ kapikuñjara
GE09ram_1-7u:12460: 5.001.105c dharmaṃ jijñāsamānena kiṃ punar yādṛśo bhavān
GE09ram_1-7u:12461: 5.001.106a tvaṃ hi devavariṣṭhasya mārutasya mahātmanaḥ 5.001.106c putras tasyaiva vegena sadṛśaḥ kapikuñjara 5.001.107a pūjite tvayi dharmajña pūjāṃ prāpnoti mārutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12462: 5.001.107c tasmāt tvaṃ pūjanīyo me śṛṇu cāpy atra kāraṇam 5.001.108a pūrvaṃ kṛtayuge tāta parvatāḥ pakṣiṇo 'bhavan
GE09ram_1-7u:12464: 5.001.109a tatas teṣu prayāteṣu devasaṃghāḥ saharṣibhiḥ 5.001.109c bhūtāni ca bhayaṃ jagmus teṣāṃ patanaśaṅkayā
GE09ram_1-7u:12465: 5.001.110a tataḥ kruddhaḥ sahasrākṣaḥ parvatānāṃ śatakratuḥ 5.001.110c pakṣāṃś ciccheda vajreṇa tatra tatra sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12466: 5.001.111a sa mām upagataḥ kruddho vajram udyamya devarāṭ
GE09ram_1-7u:12468: 5.001.112a asmiṃl lavaṇatoye ca prakṣiptaḥ plavagottama 5.001.112c guptapakṣaḥ samagraś ca tava pitrābhirakṣitaḥ 5.001.113a tato 'haṃ mānayāmi tvāṃ mānyo hi mama mārutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12469: 5.001.113c tvayā me hy eṣa saṃbandhaḥ kapimukhya mahāguṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12470: 5.001.114a asminn evaṃgate kārye sāgarasya mamaiva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:12471: 5.001.114c prītiṃ prītamanā kartuṃ tvam arhasi mahākape
GE09ram_1-7u:12472: 5.001.115a śramaṃ mokṣaya pūjāṃ ca gṛhāṇa kapisattama
GE09ram_1-7u:12473: 5.001.115c prītiṃ ca bahumanyasva prīto 'smi tava darśanāt 5.001.116a evam uktaḥ kapiśreṣṭhas taṃ nagottamam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:12475: 5.001.117a tvarate kāryakālo me ahaś cāpy ativartate
GE09ram_1-7u:12476: 5.001.117c pratijñā ca mayā dattā na sthātavyam ihāntarā
GE09ram_1-7u:12477: 5.001.118a ity uktvā pāṇinā śailam ālabhya haripuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12478: 5.001.118c jagāmākāśam āviśya vīryavān prahasann iva 5.001.119a sa parvatasamudrābhyāṃ bahumānād avekṣitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12480: 5.001.120a athordhvaṃ dūram utpatya hitvā śailamahārṇavau 5.001.120c pituḥ panthānam āsthāya jagāma vimale 'mbare
GE09ram_1-7u:12481: 5.001.121a bhūyaś cordhvagatiṃ prāpya giriṃ tam avalokayan
GE09ram_1-7u:12483: 5.001.122a tad dvitīyaṃ hanumato dṛṣṭvā karma suduṣkaram
GE09ram_1-7u:12484: 5.001.122c praśaśaṃsuḥ surāḥ sarve siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12485: 5.001.123a devatāś cābhavan hṛṣṭās tatrasthās tasya karmaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:12486: 5.001.123c kāñcanasya sunābhasya sahasrākṣaś ca vāsavaḥ 5.001.124a uvāca vacanaṃ dhīmān paritoṣāt sagadgadam 5.001.124c sunābhaṃ parvataśreṣṭhaṃ svayam eva śacīpatiḥ 5.001.125a hiraṇyanābhaśailendraparituṣṭo 'smi te bhṛśam 5.001.125c abhayaṃ te prayacchāmi tiṣṭha saumya yathāsukham
GE09ram_1-7u:12487: 5.001.126a sāhyaṃ kṛtaṃ te sumahad vikrāntasya hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12488: 5.001.126c kramato yojanaśataṃ nirbhayasya bhaye sati 5.001.127a rāmasyaiṣa hi dautyena yāti dāśarather hariḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12489: 5.001.127c satkriyāṃ kurvatā śakyā toṣito 'smi dṛḍhaṃ tvayā 5.001.128a tataḥ praharṣam alabhad vipulaṃ parvatottamaḥ 5.001.128c devatānāṃ patiṃ dṛṣṭvā parituṣṭaṃ śatakratum 5.001.129a sa vai dattavaraḥ śailo babhūvāvasthitas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:12490: 5.001.129c hanūmāṃś ca muhūrtena vyaticakrāma sāgaram 5.001.130a tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12492: 5.001.131a ayaṃ vātātmajaḥ śrīmān plavate sāgaropari 5.001.131c hanūmān nāma tasya tvaṃ muhūrtaṃ vighnam ācara
GE09ram_1-7u:12493: 5.001.132a rākṣasaṃ rūpam āsthāya sughoraṃ parvatopamam 5.001.132c daṃṣṭrākarālaṃ piṅgākṣaṃ vaktraṃ kṛtvā nabhaḥspṛśam 5.001.133a balam icchāmahe jñātuṃ bhūyaś cāsya parākramam
GE09ram_1-7u:12494: 5.001.133c tvāṃ vijeṣyaty upāyena viṣadaṃ vā gamiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:12495: 5.001.134a evam uktā tu sā devī daivatair abhisatkṛtā
GE09ram_1-7u:12496: 5.001.134c samudramadhye surasā bibhratī rākṣasaṃ vapuḥ 5.001.135a vikṛtaṃ ca virūpaṃ ca sarvasya ca bhayāvaham
GE09ram_1-7u:12497: 5.001.135c plavamānaṃ hanūmantam āvṛtyedam uvāca ha 5.001.136a mama bhakṣaḥ pradiṣṭas tvam īśvarair vānararṣabha
GE09ram_1-7u:12498: 5.001.136c ahaṃ tvāṃ bhakṣayiṣyāmi praviśedaṃ mamānanam 5.001.137a evam uktaḥ surasayā prāñjalir vānararṣabhaḥ 5.001.137c prahṛṣṭavadanaḥ śrīmān idaṃ vacanam abravīt 5.001.138a rāmo dāśarathir nāma praviṣṭo daṇḍakāvanam 5.001.138c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vaidehyā cāpi bhāryayā
GE09ram_1-7u:12500: 5.001.139c tasya sītā hṛtā bhāryā rāvaṇena yaśasvinī
GE09ram_1-7u:12501: 5.001.140a tasyāḥ sakāśaṃ dūto 'haṃ gamiṣye rāmaśāsanāt 5.001.140c kartum arhasi rāmasya sāhyaṃ viṣayavāsini 5.001.141a atha vā maithilīṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ cākliṣṭakāriṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:12502: 5.001.141c āgamiṣyāmi te vaktraṃ satyaṃ pratiśṛṇomi te
GE09ram_1-7u:12503: 5.001.142a evam uktā hanumatā surasā kāmarūpiṇī 5.001.142c abravīn nātivarten māṃ kaś cid eṣa varo mama 5.001.143a evam uktaḥ surasayā kruddho vānarapuṃgavaḥ 5.001.143c abravīt kuru vai vaktraṃ yena māṃ viṣahiṣyase
GE09ram_1-7u:12504: 5.001.144a ity uktvā surasāṃ kruddho daśayojanam āyataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12506: 5.001.145a taṃ dṛṣṭvā meghasaṃkāśaṃ daśayojanam āyatam 5.001.145c cakāra surasāpy āsyaṃ viṃśadyojanam āyatam 5.001.146a hanumāṃs tu tataḥ kruddhas triṃśadyojanam āyataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12507: 5.001.146c cakāra surasā vaktraṃ catvāriṃśat tathocchritam 5.001.147a babhūva hanumān vīraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12508: 5.001.147c cakāra surasā vaktraṃ ṣaṣṭiyojanam āyatam 5.001.148a tathaiva hanumān vīraḥ saptatiṃ yojanocchritaḥ 5.001.148c cakāra surasā vaktram aśītiṃ yojanāyatam 5.001.149a hanūmān acala prakhyo navatiṃ yojanocchritaḥ 5.001.149c cakāra surasā vaktraṃ śatayojanam āyatam 5.001.150a tad dṛṣṭvā vyāditaṃ tv āsyaṃ vāyuputraḥ sa buddhimān 5.001.150c dīrghajihvaṃ surasayā sughoraṃ narakopamam
GE09ram_1-7u:12509: 5.001.151a sa saṃkṣipyātmanaḥ kāyaṃ jīmūta iva mārutiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12511: 5.001.152a so 'bhipatyāśu tad vaktraṃ niṣpatya ca mahājavaḥ 5.001.152c antarikṣe sthitaḥ śrīmān idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:12512: 5.001.153a praviṣṭo 'smi hi te vaktraṃ dākṣāyaṇi namo 'stu te
GE09ram_1-7u:12513: 5.001.153c gamiṣye yatra vaidehī satyaṃ cāstu vacas tava
GE09ram_1-7u:12514: 5.001.154a taṃ dṛṣṭvā vadanān muktaṃ candraṃ rāhumukhād iva
GE09ram_1-7u:12515: 5.001.154c abravīt surasā devī svena rūpeṇa vānaram
GE09ram_1-7u:12516: 5.001.155a arthasiddhyai hariśreṣṭha gaccha saumya yathāsukham 5.001.155c samānaya ca vaidehīṃ rāghaveṇa mahātmanā 5.001.156a tat tṛtīyaṃ hanumato dṛṣṭvā karma suduṣkaram
GE09ram_1-7u:12517: 5.001.156c sādhu sādhv iti bhūtāni praśaśaṃsus tadā harim
GE09ram_1-7u:12518: 5.001.157a sa sāgaram anādhṛṣyam abhyetya varuṇālayam 5.001.157c jagāmākāśam āviśya vegena
GE09ram_1-7u:12519: 5.001.158a sevite vāridhāribhiḥ patagaiś ca niṣevite 5.001.158c carite kaiśikācāryair airāvataniṣevite
GE09ram_1-7u:12521: 5.001.159c vimānaiḥ saṃpatadbhiś ca vimalaiḥ samalaṃkṛte 5.001.160a vajrāśanisamāghātaiḥ pāvakair upaśobhite
GE09ram_1-7u:12523: 5.001.161a bahatā havyam atyantaṃ sevite citrabhānunā 5.001.161c grahanakṣatracandrārkatārāgaṇavibhūṣite
GE09ram_1-7u:12528: 5.001.164a bahuśaḥ sevite vīrair vidyādharagaṇair varaiḥ 5.001.164c kapinā kṛṣyamāṇāni mahābhrāṇi cakāśire
GE09ram_1-7u:12529: 5.001.165a praviśann abhrajālāni niṣpataṃś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12530: 5.001.165c prāvṛṣīndur ivābhāti niṣpatan praviśaṃs tadā 5.001.166a plavamānaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā siṃhikā nāma rākṣasī
GE09ram_1-7u:12531: 5.001.166c manasā cintayām āsa pravṛddhā kāmarūpiṇī 5.001.167a adya dīrghasya kālasya bhaviṣyāmy aham āśitā
GE09ram_1-7u:12532: 5.001.167c idaṃ hi me mahat sattvaṃ cirasya vaśam āgatam 5.001.168a iti saṃcintya manasā chāyām asya samakṣipat
GE09ram_1-7u:12533: 5.001.168c chāyāyāṃ saṃgṛhītāyāṃ cintayām āsa vānaraḥ 5.001.169a samākṣipto 'smi sahasā paṅgūkṛtaparākramaḥ 5.001.169c pratilomena vātena mahānaur iva sāgare 5.001.170a tiryag ūrdhvam adhaś caiva vīkṣamāṇas tataḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12534: 5.001.170c dadarśa sa mahāsattvam utthitaṃ lavaṇāmbhasi 5.001.171a kapirājñā yad ākhyātaṃ sattvam adbhutadarśanam 5.001.171c chāyāgrāhi mahāvīryaṃ tad idaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12535: 5.001.172a sa tāṃ buddhvārthatattvena siṃhikāṃ matimān kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12537: 5.001.173a tasya sā kāyam udvīkṣya vardhamānaṃ mahākapeḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12539: 5.001.174a sa dadarśa tatas tasyā vikṛtaṃ sumahan mukham
GE09ram_1-7u:12540: 5.001.174c kāyamātraṃ ca medhāvī marmāṇi ca mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12541: 5.001.175a sa tasyā vivṛte vaktre vajrasaṃhananaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12542: 5.001.175c saṃkṣipya muhur ātmānaṃ niṣpapāta mahābalaḥ 5.001.176a āsye tasyā nimajjantaṃ dadṛśuḥ siddhacāraṇāḥ 5.001.176c grasyamānaṃ yathā candraṃ pūrṇaṃ parvaṇi rāhuṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:12543: 5.001.177a tatas tasya nakhais tīkṣṇair marmāṇy utkṛtya vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12545: 5.001.178a tāṃ hatāṃ vānareṇāśu patitāṃ vīkṣya siṃhikām
GE09ram_1-7u:12546: 5.001.178c bhūtāny ākāśacārīṇi tam ūcuḥ plavagarṣabham 5.001.179a bhīmam adya kṛtaṃ karma mahat sattvaṃ tvayā hatam 5.001.179c sādhayārtham abhipretam ariṣṭaṃ plavatāṃ vara 5.001.180a yasya tv etāni catvāri vānarendra yathā tava
GE09ram_1-7u:12547: 5.001.180c dhṛtir dṛṣṭir matir dākṣyaṃ sa karmasu na sīdati 5.001.181a sa taiḥ saṃbhāvitaḥ pūjyaḥ pratipannaprayojanaḥ 5.001.181c jagāmākāśam āviśya pannagāśanavat kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12548: 5.001.182a prāptabhūyiṣṭha pāras tu sarvataḥ pratilokayan 5.001.182c yojanānāṃ śatasyānte vanarājiṃ dadarśa saḥ 5.001.183a dadarśa ca patann eva vividhadrumabhūṣitam 5.001.183c dvīpaṃ śākhāmṛgaśreṣṭho malayopavanāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:12550: 5.001.184c sāgarasya ca patnīnāṃ mukhāny api vilokayan
GE09ram_1-7u:12552: 5.001.185c nirundhantam ivākāśaṃ cakāra matimān matim 5.001.186a kāyavṛddhiṃ pravegaṃ ca mama dṛṣṭvaiva rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12553: 5.001.186c mayi kautūhalaṃ kuryur iti mene mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12554: 5.001.187a tataḥ śarīraṃ saṃkṣipya tan mahīdharasaṃnibham 5.001.187c punaḥ prakṛtim āpede vītamoha ivātmavān 5.001.188a sa cārunānāvidharūpadhārī; paraṃ samāsādya samudratīram
GE09ram_1-7u:12555: 5.001.188c parair aśakyapratipannarūpaḥ; samīkṣitātmā samavekṣitārthaḥ 5.001.189a tataḥ sa lambasya gireḥ samṛddhe; vicitrakūṭe nipapāta kūṭe
GE09ram_1-7u:12556: 5.001.189c saketakoddālakanālikere; mahādrikūṭapratimo mahātmā 5.001.190a sa sāgaraṃ dānavapannagāyutaṃ; balena vikramya mahormimālinam
GE09ram_1-7u:12557: 5.001.190c nipatya tīre ca mahodadhes tadā; dadarśa laṅkām amarāvatīm iva
GE09ram_1-7u:12558: 5.002.001a sa sāgaram anādhṛṣyam atikramya mahābalaḥ 5.002.001c trikūṭaśikhare laṅkāṃ sthitāṃ svastho dadarśa ha
GE09ram_1-7u:12560: 5.002.002c abhivṛṣṭaḥ sthitas tatra babhau puṣpamayo yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:12561: 5.002.003a yojanānāṃ śataṃ śrīmāṃs tīrtvāpy uttamavikramaḥ 5.002.003c aniśvasan kapis tatra na glānim adhigacchati
GE09ram_1-7u:12562: 5.002.004a śatāny ahaṃ yojanānāṃ krameyaṃ subahūny api
GE09ram_1-7u:12563: 5.002.004c kiṃ punaḥ sāgarasyāntaṃ saṃkhyātaṃ śatayojanam 5.002.005a sa tu vīryavatāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ plavatām api cottamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12564: 5.002.005c jagāma vegavāṃl laṅkāṃ laṅghayitvā mahodadhim 5.002.006a śādvalāni ca nīlāni gandhavanti vanāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:12565: 5.002.006c gaṇḍavanti ca madhyena jagāma nagavanti ca
GE09ram_1-7u:12566: 5.002.007a śailāṃś ca tarusaṃchannān vanarājīś ca puṣpitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12568: 5.002.008a sa tasminn acale tiṣṭhan vanāny upavanāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:12569: 5.002.008c sa nagāgre ca tāṃ laṅkāṃ dadarśa pavanātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12570: 5.002.009a saralān karṇikārāṃś ca kharjūrāṃś ca supuṣpitān
GE09ram_1-7u:12571: 5.002.009c priyālān muculindāṃś ca kuṭajān ketakān api
GE09ram_1-7u:12572: 5.002.010a priyaṅgūn gandhapūrṇāṃś ca nīpān saptacchadāṃs tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:12573: 5.002.010c asanān kovidārāṃś ca karavīrāṃś ca puṣpitān
GE09ram_1-7u:12574: 5.002.011a puṣpabhāranibaddhāṃś ca tathā mukulitān api 5.002.011c pādapān vihagākīrṇān
GE09ram_1-7u:12576: 5.002.012c ākrīḍān vividhān ramyān vividhāṃś ca jalāśayān
GE09ram_1-7u:12578: 5.002.013c udyānāni ca ramyāṇi dadarśa kapikuñjaraḥ 5.002.014a samāsādya ca lakṣmīvāṃl laṅkāṃ rāvaṇapālitām 5.002.014c parikhābhiḥ sapadmābhiḥ sotpalābhir alaṃkṛtām
GE09ram_1-7u:12580: 5.002.015c samantād vicaradbhiś ca rākṣasair ugradhanvibhiḥ 5.002.016a kāñcanenāvṛtāṃ ramyāṃ prākāreṇa mahāpurīm
GE09ram_1-7u:12582: 5.002.017c dadarśa hanumāṃl laṅkāṃ divi devapurīm iva
GE09ram_1-7u:12583: 5.002.018a girimūrdhni sthitāṃ laṅkāṃ pāṇḍurair bhavanaiḥ śubhaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12584: 5.002.018c dadarśa sa kapiḥ śrīmān puram ākāśagaṃ yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:12586: 5.002.019c plavamānām ivākāśe dadarśa hanumān purīm 5.002.020a saṃpūrṇāṃ rākṣasair ghorair nāgair bhogavatīm iva
GE09ram_1-7u:12587: 5.002.020c acintyāṃ sukṛtāṃ spaṣṭāṃ kuberādhyuṣitāṃ purā 5.002.021a daṃṣṭribhir bahubhiḥ śūraiḥ śūlapaṭṭiśapāṇibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12588: 5.002.021c rakṣitāṃ rākṣasair ghorair guhām āśīviṣair api
GE09ram_1-7u:12589: 5.002.022a vapraprākārajaghanāṃ vipulāmbunavāmbarām 5.002.022c śataghnīśūlakeśāntām aṭṭālakavataṃsakām 5.002.023a dvāram uttaram āsādya cintayām āsa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12592: 5.002.024a tasyāś ca mahatīṃ guptiṃ sāgaraṃ ca nirīkṣya saḥ 5.002.024c rāvaṇaṃ ca ripuṃ ghoraṃ cintayām āsa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12594: 5.002.025c na hi yuddhena vai laṅkā śakyā jetuṃ surair api
GE09ram_1-7u:12595: 5.002.026a imāṃ tu viṣamāṃ durgāṃ laṅkāṃ rāvaṇapālitām
GE09ram_1-7u:12596: 5.002.026c prāpyāpi sa mahābāhuḥ kiṃ kariṣyati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12597: 5.002.027a avakāśo na sāntvasya rākṣaseṣv abhigamyate 5.002.027c na dānasya na bhedasya naiva yuddhasya dṛśyate
