GE09ram_1-7u:12598: 5.002.028a caturṇām eva hi gatir vānarāṇāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_1-7u:12599: 5.002.028c vāliputrasya nīlasya mama rājñaś ca dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12600: 5.002.029a yāvaj jānāmi vaidehīṃ yadi jīvati vā na vā 5.002.029c tatraiva cintayiṣyāmi dṛṣṭvā tāṃ janakātmajām 5.002.030a tataḥ sa cintayām āsa muhūrtaṃ kapikuñjaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12601: 5.002.030c giriśṛṅge sthitas tasmin rāmasyābhyudaye rataḥ 5.002.031a anena rūpeṇa mayā na śakyā rakṣasāṃ purī
GE09ram_1-7u:12602: 5.002.031c praveṣṭuṃ rākṣasair guptā krūrair balasamanvitaiḥ 5.002.032a ugraujaso mahāvīryo balavantaś ca rākṣasāḥ 5.002.032c vañcanīyā mayā sarve jānakīṃ parimārgitā 5.002.033a lakṣyālakṣyeṇa rūpeṇa rātrau laṅkā purī mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:12603: 5.002.033c praveṣṭuṃ prāptakālaṃ me kṛtyaṃ sādhayituṃ mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:12604: 5.002.034a tāṃ purīṃ tādṛśīṃ dṛṣṭvā durādharṣāṃ surāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12605: 5.002.034c hanūmāṃś cintayām āsa viniḥśvasya muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12608: 5.002.036a na vinaśyet kathaṃ kāryaṃ rāmasya viditātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12609: 5.002.036c ekām ekaś ca paśyeyaṃ rahite janakātmajām
GE09ram_1-7u:12611: 5.002.037c viklavaṃ dūtam āsādya tamaḥ sūryodaye yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:12612: 5.002.038a arthānarthāntare buddhir niścitāpi na śobhate 5.002.038c ghātayanti hi kāryāṇi dūtāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥ 5.002.039a na vinaśyet kathaṃ kāryaṃ vaiklavyaṃ na kathaṃ bhavet 5.002.039c laṅghanaṃ ca samudrasya kathaṃ nu na vṛthā bhavet 5.002.040a mayi dṛṣṭe tu rakṣobhī rāmasya viditātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12613: 5.002.040c bhaved vyartham idaṃ kāryaṃ rāvaṇānartham icchataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12614: 5.002.041a na hi śakyaṃ kva cit sthātum avijñātena rākṣasaiḥ 5.002.041c api rākṣasarūpeṇa kim utānyena kena cit
GE09ram_1-7u:12615: 5.002.042a vāyur apy atra nājñātaś cared iti matir mama 5.002.042c na hy asty aviditaṃ kiṃ cid rākṣasānāṃ balīyasām 5.002.043a ihāhaṃ yadi tiṣṭhāmi svena rūpeṇa saṃvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12616: 5.002.043c vināśam upayāsyāmi bhartur arthaś ca hīyate
GE09ram_1-7u:12617: 5.002.044a tad ahaṃ svena rūpeṇa rajanyāṃ hrasvatāṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12619: 5.002.045a rāvaṇasya purīṃ rātrau praviśya sudurāsadām 5.002.045c vicinvan bhavanaṃ sarvaṃ drakṣyāmi janakātmajām 5.002.046a iti saṃcintya hanumān sūryasyāstamayaṃ kapiḥ 5.002.046c ācakāṅkṣe tadā vīrā vaidehyā darśanotsukaḥ 5.002.046e pṛṣadaṃśakamātraḥ san babhūvādbhutadarśanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12620: 5.002.047a pradoṣakāle hanumāṃs tūrṇam utpatya vīryavān 5.002.047c praviveśa purīṃ ramyāṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:12623: 5.002.049a saptabhaumāṣṭabhaumaiś ca sa dadarśa mahāpurīm 5.002.049c talaiḥ sphāṭikasaṃpūrṇaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12625: 5.002.050c talaiḥ śuśubhire tāni bhavanāny atra rakṣasām
GE09ram_1-7u:12626: 5.002.051a kāñcanāni vicitrāṇi toraṇāni ca rakṣasām 5.002.051c laṅkām uddyotayām āsuḥ sarvataḥ samalaṃkṛtām 5.002.052a acintyām adbhutākārāṃ dṛṣṭvā laṅkāṃ mahākapiḥ 5.002.052c āsīd viṣaṇṇo hṛṣṭaś ca vaidehyā darśanotsukaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12629: 5.002.054a candro 'pi sācivyam ivāsya kurvaṃs; tārāgaṇair madhyagato virājan
GE09ram_1-7u:12630: 5.002.054c jyotsnāvitānena vitatya lokam; uttiṣṭhate naikasahasraraśmiḥ 5.002.055a śaṅkhaprabhaṃ kṣīramṛṇālavarṇam; udgacchamānaṃ vyavabhāsamānam 5.002.055c dadarśa candraṃ sa kapipravīraḥ; poplūyamānaṃ sarasīva haṃsaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:12632: 5.003.001c sattvam āsthāya medhāvī hanumān mārutātmajaḥ 5.003.002a niśi laṅkāṃ mahāsattvo viveśa kapikuñjaraḥ 5.003.002c ramyakānanatoyāḍhyāṃ purīṃ rāvaṇapālitām
GE09ram_1-7u:12635: 5.003.004c cārutoraṇaniryūhāṃ pāṇḍuradvāratoraṇām 5.003.005a bhujagācaritāṃ guptāṃ śubhāṃ bhogavatīm iva 5.003.005c tāṃ savidyudghanākīrṇāṃ jyotirmārganiṣevitām
GE09ram_1-7u:12638: 5.003.007c āsādya sahasā hṛṣṭaḥ prākāram abhipedivān 5.003.008a vismayāviṣṭahṛdayaḥ purīm ālokya sarvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12641: 5.003.009c taptahāṭakaniryūhai rājatāmalapāṇḍuraiḥ 5.003.010a vaidūryatalasopānaiḥ sphāṭikāntarapāṃsubhiḥ 5.003.010c cārusaṃjavanopetaiḥ kham ivotpatitaiḥ śubhaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12644: 5.003.012c kham ivotpatitāṃ laṅkāṃ jaharṣa hanumān kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12645: 5.003.013a tāṃ samīkṣya purīṃ laṅkāṃ rākṣasādhipateḥ śubhām
GE09ram_1-7u:12646: 5.003.013c anuttamām ṛddhiyutāṃ cintayām āsa vīryavān 5.003.014a neyam anyena nagarī śakyā dharṣayituṃ balāt
GE09ram_1-7u:12649: 5.003.015c prasiddheyaṃ bhaved bhūmir maindadvividayor api 5.003.016a vivasvatas tanūjasya hareś ca kuśaparvaṇaḥ 5.003.016c ṛkṣasya ketumālasya mama caiva gatir bhavet
GE09ram_1-7u:12650: 5.003.017a samīkṣya tu mahābāho rāghavasya parākramam 5.003.017c lakṣmaṇasya ca vikrāntam abhavat prītimān kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12652: 5.003.018c yantrāgārastanīm ṛddhāṃ pramadām iva bhūṣitām 5.003.019a tāṃ naṣṭatimirāṃ dīpair bhāsvaraiś ca mahāgṛhaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12653: 5.003.019c nagarīṃ rākṣasendrasya dadarśa sa mahākapiḥ 5.003.020a praviṣṭaḥ sattvasaṃpanno niśāyāṃ mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12657: 5.003.021e gṛhamedhaiḥ purī ramyā babhāse dyaur ivāmbudaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12658: 5.003.022a prajajvāla tadā laṅkā rakṣogaṇagṛhaiḥ śubhaiḥ 5.003.022c sitābhrasadṛśaiś citraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12661: 5.003.023c rāghavārthaṃ carañ śrīmān dadarśa ca nananda ca
GE09ram_1-7u:12663: 5.003.024c strīṇāṃ madasamṛddhānāṃ divi cāpsarasām iva 5.003.025a śuśrāva kāñcīninādaṃ nūpurāṇāṃ ca niḥsvanam 5.003.025c sopānaninadāṃś caiva bhavaneṣu mahātmanam
GE09ram_1-7u:12664: 5.003.025e āsphoṭitaninādāṃś ca kṣveḍitāṃś ca tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12665: 5.003.026a svādhyāya niratāṃś caiva yātudhānān dadarśa saḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12667: 5.003.027a rājamārgaṃ samāvṛtya sthitaṃ rakṣobalaṃ mahat 5.003.027c dadarśa madhyame gulme rākṣasasya carān bahūn
GE09ram_1-7u:12672: 5.003.030a karālān bhugnavaktrāṃś ca vikaṭān vāmanāṃs tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:12673: 5.003.030c dhanvinaḥ khaḍginaś caiva śataghnī musalāyudhān 5.003.030e parighottamahastāṃś ca vicitrakavacojjvalān
GE09ram_1-7u:12675: 5.003.031c virūpān bahurūpāṃś ca surūpāṃś ca suvarcasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12677: 5.003.032c kṣepaṇīpāśahastāṃś ca dadarśa sa mahākapiḥ 5.003.033a sragviṇas tv anuliptāṃś ca varābharaṇabhūṣitān 5.003.033c tīkṣṇaśūladharāṃś caiva vajriṇaś ca mahābalān 5.003.034a śatasāhasram avyagram ārakṣaṃ madhyamaṃ kapiḥ 5.003.034c prākārāvṛtam atyantaṃ dadarśa sa mahākapiḥ 5.003.035a triviṣṭapanibhaṃ divyaṃ divyanādavināditam
GE09ram_1-7u:12679: 5.003.036a rathair yānair vimānaiś ca tathā gajahayaiḥ śubhaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12681: 5.003.037a bhūṣitaṃ ruciradvāraṃ mattaiś ca mṛgapakṣibhiḥ 5.003.037c rākṣasādhipater guptam āviveśa gṛhaṃ kapiḥ 5.004.001a tataḥ sa madhyaṃ gatam aṃśumantaṃ; jyotsnāvitānaṃ mahad udvamantam
GE09ram_1-7u:12682: 5.004.001c dadarśa dhīmān divi bhānumantaṃ; goṣṭhe vṛṣaṃ mattam iva bhramantam 5.004.002a lokasya pāpāni vināśayantaṃ; mahodadhiṃ cāpi samedhayantam
GE09ram_1-7u:12683: 5.004.002c bhūtāni sarvāṇi virājayantaṃ; dadarśa śītāṃśum athābhiyāntam
GE09ram_1-7u:12684: 5.004.003a yā bhāti lakṣmīr bhuvi mandarasthā; tathā pradoṣeṣu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:12686: 5.004.003c tathaiva toyeṣu ca puṣkarasthā; rarāja sā cāruniśākarasthā
GE09ram_1-7u:12687: 5.004.004a haṃso yathā rājatapañjurasthaḥ; siṃho yathā mandarakandarasthaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12688: 5.004.004c vīro yathā garvitakuñjarasthaś; candro 'pi babhrāja tathāmbarasthaḥ 5.004.005a sthitaḥ kakudmān iva tīkṣṇaśṛṅgo; mahācalaḥ śveta ivoccaśṛṅgaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12690: 5.004.006a prakāśacandrodayanaṣṭadoṣaḥ; pravṛddharakṣaḥ piśitāśadoṣaḥ 5.004.006c rāmābhirāmeritacittadoṣaḥ; svargaprakāśo bhagavān pradoṣaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12691: 5.004.007a tantrī svanāḥ karṇasukhāḥ pravṛttāḥ; svapanti nāryaḥ patibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12693: 5.004.007c naktaṃcarāś cāpi tathā pravṛttā; vihartum atyadbhutaraudravṛttāḥ 5.004.008a mattapramattāni samākulāni; rathāśvabhadrāsanasaṃkulāni
GE09ram_1-7u:12694: 5.004.008c vīraśriyā cāpi samākulāni; dadarśa dhīmān sa kapiḥ kulāni 5.004.009a parasparaṃ cādhikam ākṣipanti; bhujāṃś ca pīnān adhivikṣipanti
GE09ram_1-7u:12696: 5.004.010a rakṣāṃsi vakṣāṃsi ca vikṣipanti; gātrāṇi kāntāsu ca vikṣipanti
GE09ram_1-7u:12697: 5.004.010c dadarśa kāntāś ca samālapanti; tathāparās tatra punaḥ svapanti
GE09ram_1-7u:12698: 5.004.011a mahāgajaiś cāpi tathā nadadbhiḥ; sūpūjitaiś cāpi tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:12700: 5.004.011c rarāja vīraiś ca viniḥśvasadbhir; hrado bhujaṅgair iva
GE09ram_1-7u:12703: 5.004.012c nānāvidhānān rucirābhidhānān; dadarśa tasyāṃ puri yātudhānān
GE09ram_1-7u:12704: 5.004.013a nananda dṛṣṭvā sa ca tān surūpān; nānāguṇān ātmaguṇānurūpān 5.004.013c vidyotamānān sa ca tān surūpān; dadarśa kāṃś cic ca punar virūpān
GE09ram_1-7u:12705: 5.004.014a tato varārhāḥ suviśuddhabhāvās; teṣāṃ striyas tatra
GE09ram_1-7u:12707: 5.004.014c priyeṣu pāneṣu ca saktabhāvā; dadarśa tārā iva suprabhāvāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12708: 5.004.015a śriyā jvalantīs trapayopagūḍhā; niśīthakāle ramaṇopagūḍhāḥ 5.004.015c dadarśa kāś cit pramadopagūḍhā; yathā vihaṃgāḥ kusumopagūḍāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12709: 5.004.016a anyāḥ punar harmyatalopaviṣṭās; tatra priyāṅkeṣu sukhopaviṣṭāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12710: 5.004.016c bhartuḥ priyā dharmaparā niviṣṭā; dadarśa dhīmān manadābhiviṣṭāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12711: 5.004.017a aprāvṛtāḥ kāñcanarājivarṇāḥ; kāś cit parārdhyās tapanīyavarṇāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12712: 5.004.017c punaś ca kāś cic chaśalakṣmavarṇāḥ; kāntaprahīṇā rucirāṅgavarṇāḥ 5.004.018a tataḥ priyān prāpya mano'bhirāmān; suprītiyuktāḥ prasamīkṣya rāmāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12713: 5.004.018c gṛheṣu hṛṣṭāḥ paramābhirāmā; haripravīraḥ sa dadarśa rāmāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12714: 5.004.019a candraprakāśāś ca hi vaktramālā; vakrākṣipakṣmāś ca sunetramālāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12715: 5.004.019c vibhūṣaṇānāṃ ca dadarśa mālāḥ; śatahradānām iva cārumālāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12716: 5.004.020a na tv eva sītāṃ paramābhijātāṃ; pathi sthite rājakule prajātām
GE09ram_1-7u:12717: 5.004.020c latāṃ praphullām iva sādhujātāṃ; dadarśa tanvīṃ manasābhijātām
GE09ram_1-7u:12718: 5.004.021a sanātane vartmani saṃniviṣṭāṃ; rāmekṣaṇīṃ tāṃ madanābhiviṣṭām
GE09ram_1-7u:12719: 5.004.021c bhartur manaḥ śrīmad anupraviṣṭāṃ; strībhyo varābhyaś ca sadā viśiṣṭām 5.004.022a uṣṇārditāṃ sānusṛtāsrakaṇṭhīṃ; purā varārhottamaniṣkakaṇṭhīm 5.004.022c sujātapakṣmām abhiraktakaṇṭhīṃ; vane pravṛttām iva nīlakaṇṭhīm
GE09ram_1-7u:12720: 5.004.023a avyaktalekhām iva candralekhāṃ; pāṃsupradigdhām iva hemalekhām
GE09ram_1-7u:12721: 5.004.023c kṣataprarūḍhām iva bāṇalekhāṃ; vāyuprabhinnām iva meghalekhām
GE09ram_1-7u:12722: 5.004.024a sītām apaśyan manujeśvarasya; rāmasya patnīṃ vadatāṃ varasya
GE09ram_1-7u:12723: 5.004.024c babhūva duḥkhābhihataś cirasya; plavaṃgamo manda ivācirasya
GE09ram_1-7u:12724: 5.005.001a sa nikāmaṃ vināmeṣu vicaran kāmarūpadhṛk 5.005.001c vicacāra kapir laṅkāṃ lāghavena samanvitaḥ 5.005.002a āsasādātha lakṣmīvān rākṣasendraniveśanam
GE09ram_1-7u:12725: 5.005.002c prākāreṇārkavarṇena bhāsvareṇābhisaṃvṛtam 5.005.003a rakṣitaṃ rākṣasair bhīmaiḥ siṃhair iva mahad vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:12728: 5.005.004c vicitrābhiś ca kakṣyābhir dvāraiś ca rucirair vṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:12729: 5.005.005a gajāsthitair mahāmātraiḥ śūraiś ca vigataśramaiḥ 5.005.005c upasthitam asaṃhāryair hayaiḥ syandanayāyibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12730: 5.005.006a siṃhavyāghratanutrāṇair dāntakāñcanarājataiḥ 5.005.006c ghoṣavadbhir vicitraiś ca sadā vicaritaṃ rathaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12731: 5.005.007a bahuratnasamākīrṇaṃ parārdhyāsanabhājanam 5.005.007c mahārathasamāvāsaṃ mahārathamahāsanam 5.005.008a dṛśyaiś ca paramodārais tais taiś ca mṛgapakṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12733: 5.005.009a vinītair antapālaiś ca rakṣobhiś ca surakṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:12734: 5.005.009c mukhyābhiś ca varastrībhiḥ paripūrṇaṃ samantataḥ 5.005.010a muditapramadā ratnaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:12735: 5.005.010c varābharaṇanirhrādaiḥ samudrasvananiḥsvanam 5.005.011a tad rājaguṇasaṃpannaṃ mukhyaiś ca varacandanaiḥ 5.005.011c bherīmṛdaṅgābhirutaṃ śaṅkhaghoṣavināditam 5.005.012a nityārcitaṃ parvahutaṃ pūjitaṃ rākṣasaiḥ sadā 5.005.012c samudram iva gambhīraṃ samudram iva niḥsvanam
GE09ram_1-7u:12740: 5.005.015a gṛhād gṛhaṃ rākṣasānām udyānāni ca vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12741: 5.005.015c vīkṣamāṇo hy asaṃtrastaḥ prāsādāṃś ca cacāra saḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12745: 5.005.017c vibhīṣaṇasya ca tathā pupluve sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12746: 5.005.018a mahodarasya ca tathā virūpākṣasya caiva hi
GE09ram_1-7u:12747: 5.005.018c vidyujjihvasya bhavanaṃ vidyunmāles tathaiva ca 5.005.018e vajradaṃṣṭrasya ca tathā pupluve sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12748: 5.005.019a śukasya ca mahāvegaḥ sāraṇasya ca dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12749: 5.005.019c tathā cendrajito veśma jagāma hariyūthapaḥ 5.005.020a jambumāleḥ sumāleś ca jagāma hariyūthapaḥ 5.005.020c raśmiketoś ca bhavanaṃ sūryaśatros tathaiva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:12750: 5.005.021a dhūmrākṣasya ca saṃpāter bhavanaṃ mārutātmajaḥ 5.005.021c vidyudrūpasya bhīmasya ghanasya vighanasya ca 5.005.022a śukanābhasya vakrasya śaṭhasya vikaṭasya ca 5.005.022c hrasvakarṇasya daṃṣṭrasya romaśasya ca rakṣasaḥ 5.005.023a yuddhonmattasya mattasya dhvajagrīvasya nādinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12752: 5.005.024a karālasya piśācasya śoṇitākṣasya caiva hi 5.005.024c kramamāṇaḥ krameṇaiva hanūmān
GE09ram_1-7u:12753: 5.005.025a teṣu teṣu mahārheṣu bhavaneṣu mahāyaśāḥ 5.005.025c teṣām ṛddhimatām ṛddhiṃ dadarśa sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12759: 5.005.028a dadarśa vividhān gulmāṃs tasya rakṣaḥpater gṛhe
GE09ram_1-7u:12760: 5.005.029a raktāñ śvetān sitāṃś caiva harīṃś caiva mahājavān
GE09ram_1-7u:12763: 5.005.030c nihantṝn parasainyānāṃ gṛhe tasmin dadarśa saḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12764: 5.005.031a kṣarataś ca yathā meghān sravataś ca yathā girīn 5.005.031c meghastanitanirghoṣān durdharṣān samare paraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12768: 5.005.033c śibikā vividhākārāḥ sa kapir mārutātmajaḥ 5.005.034a latāgṛhāṇi citrāṇi citraśālāgṛhāṇi
GE09ram_1-7u:12770: 5.005.035a kāmasya gṛhakaṃ ramyaṃ divāgṛhakam eva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:12776: 5.005.038a arcirbhiś cāpi ratnānāṃ tejasā rāvaṇasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:12777: 5.005.038c virarājātha tad veśma raśmimān iva raśmibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12778: 5.005.039a jāmbūnadamayāny eva śayanāny āsanāni ca 5.005.039c bhājanāni ca śubhrāṇi dadarśa hariyūthapaḥ 5.005.040a madhvāsavakṛtakledaṃ maṇibhājanasaṃkulam 5.005.040c manoramam asaṃbādhaṃ kuberabhavanaṃ yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:12779: 5.005.041a nūpurāṇāṃ ca ghoṣeṇa kāñcīnāṃ ninadena ca
GE09ram_1-7u:12781: 5.005.042a prāsādasaṃghātayutaṃ strīratnaśatasaṃkulam 5.005.042c suvyūḍhakakṣyaṃ hanumān praviveśa mahāgṛham
GE09ram_1-7u:12783: 5.006.001c yathā mahat prāvṛṣi meghajālaṃ; vidyutpinaddhaṃ savihaṃgajālam 5.006.002a niveśanānāṃ vividhāś ca śālāḥ; pradhānaśaṅkhāyudhacāpaśālāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12784: 5.006.002c manoharāś cāpi punar viśālā; dadarśa veśmādriṣu candraśālāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12786: 5.006.003c sarvaiś ca doṣaiḥ parivarjitāni; kapir dadarśa svabalārjitāni
GE09ram_1-7u:12787: 5.006.004a tāni prayatnābhisamāhitāni; mayena sākṣād iva nirmitāni
GE09ram_1-7u:12789: 5.006.005a tato dadarśocchritamegharūpaṃ; manoharaṃ kāñcanacārurūpam 5.006.005c rakṣo'dhipasyātmabalānurūpaṃ; gṛhottamaṃ hy apratirūparūpam
GE09ram_1-7u:12790: 5.006.006a mahītale svargam iva prakīrṇaṃ; śriyā jvalantaṃ bahuratnakīrṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:12792: 5.006.007a nārīpravekair iva dīpyamānaṃ; taḍidbhir ambhodavad arcyamānam
GE09ram_1-7u:12793: 5.006.007c haṃsapravekair iva vāhyamānaṃ; śriyā yutaṃ khe sukṛtāṃ vimānam 5.006.008a yathā nagāgraṃ bahudhātucitraṃ; yathā nabhaś ca
GE09ram_1-7u:12795: 5.006.008c dadarśa yuktīkṛtameghacitraṃ; vimānaratnaṃ bahuratnacitram 5.006.009a mahī kṛtā parvatarājipūrṇā; śailāḥ kṛtā vṛkṣavitānapūrṇāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12796: 5.006.009c vṛkṣāḥ kṛtāḥ puṣpavitānapūrṇāḥ; puṣpaṃ kṛtaṃ kesarapatrapūrṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:12797: 5.006.010a kṛtāni veśmāni ca pāṇḍurāṇi; tathā supuṣpā api puṣkariṇyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12798: 5.006.010c punaś ca padmāni sakesarāṇi; dhanyāni citrāṇi tathā vanāni
GE09ram_1-7u:12799: 5.006.011a puṣpāhvayaṃ nāma virājamānaṃ; ratnaprabhābhiś ca vivardhamānam
GE09ram_1-7u:12800: 5.006.011c veśmottamānām api coccamānaṃ; mahākapis tatra mahāvimānam
GE09ram_1-7u:12801: 5.006.012a kṛtāś ca vaidūryamayā vihaṃgā; rūpyapravālaiś ca tathā vihaṃgāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12802: 5.006.012c citrāś ca nānāvasubhir bhujaṃgā; jātyānurūpās turagāḥ śubhāṅgāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12803: 5.006.013a pravālajāmbūnadapuṣpapakṣāḥ; salīlam āvarjitajihmapakṣāḥ 5.006.013c kāmasya sākṣād iva bhānti pakṣāḥ; kṛtā vihaṃgāḥ sumukhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12805: 5.006.014a niyujyamānāś ca gajāḥ suhastāḥ; sakesarāś cotpalapatrahastāḥ 5.006.014c babhūva devī ca kṛtā suhastā; lakṣmīs tathā padmini padmahastā
GE09ram_1-7u:12806: 5.006.015a itīva tad gṛham abhigamya śobhanaṃ; savismayo nagam iva
GE09ram_1-7u:12808: 5.006.015c punaś ca tat paramasugandhi sundaraṃ; himātyaye nagam iva
GE09ram_1-7u:12810: 5.006.016a tataḥ sa tāṃ kapir abhipatya pūjitāṃ; caran purīṃ daśamukhabāhupālitām
GE09ram_1-7u:12811: 5.006.016c adṛśya tāṃ janakasutāṃ supūjitāṃ; suduḥkhitāṃ patiguṇaveganirjitām 5.006.017a tatas tadā bahuvidhabhāvitātmanaḥ; kṛtātmano janakasutāṃ suvartmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12812: 5.006.017c apaśyato 'bhavad atiduḥkhitaṃ manaḥ; sucakṣuṣaḥ pravicarato mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12815: 5.007.002a ardhayojanavistīrṇam āyataṃ yojanaṃ hi tat 5.007.002c bhavanaṃ rākṣasendrasya
GE09ram_1-7u:12816: 5.007.003a mārgamāṇas tu vaidehīṃ sītām āyatalocanām 5.007.003c sarvataḥ paricakrāma hanūmān
GE09ram_1-7u:12817: 5.007.004a caturviṣāṇair dviradais triviṣāṇais tathaiva ca 5.007.004c parikṣiptam asaṃbādhaṃ rakṣyamāṇam udāyudhaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12818: 5.007.005a rākṣasībhiś ca patnībhī rāvaṇasya niveśanam 5.007.005c āhṛtābhiś ca vikramya rājakanyābhir āvṛtam 5.007.006a tan nakramakarākīrṇaṃ timiṃgilajhaṣākulam
GE09ram_1-7u:12820: 5.007.007a yā hi vaiśvaraṇe lakṣmīr yā cendre harivāhane
GE09ram_1-7u:12821: 5.007.007c sā rāvaṇagṛhe sarvā nityam evānapāyinī 5.007.008a yā ca rājñaḥ kuberasya yamasya varuṇasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:12822: 5.007.008c tādṛśī tad viśiṣṭā vā ṛddhī rakṣo gṛheṣv iha 5.007.009a tasya harmyasya madhyasthaṃ veśma cānyat sunirmitam
GE09ram_1-7u:12824: 5.007.010a brahmaṇo 'rthe kṛtaṃ divyaṃ divi yad viśvakarmaṇā 5.007.010c vimānaṃ puṣpakaṃ nāma sarvaratnavibhūṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:12825: 5.007.011a pareṇa tapasā lebhe yat kuberaḥ pitāmahāt
GE09ram_1-7u:12826: 5.007.011c kuberam ojasā jitvā lebhe tad rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12828: 5.007.012c sukṛtair ācitaṃ stambhaiḥ pradīptam iva ca śriyā
GE09ram_1-7u:12832: 5.007.014c hemasopānasaṃyuktaṃ cārupravaravedikam 5.007.015a jālavātāyanair yuktaṃ kāñcanaiḥ sthāṭikair api 5.007.015c indranīlamahānīlamaṇipravaravedikam
GE09ram_1-7u:12833: 5.007.015e vimānaṃ puṣpakaṃ divyam āruroha mahākapiḥ 5.007.016a tatrasthaḥ sa tadā gandhaṃ pānabhakṣyānnasaṃbhavam 5.007.016c divyaṃ saṃmūrchitaṃ jighran rūpavantam ivānilam 5.007.017a sa gandhas taṃ mahāsattvaṃ bandhur bandhum ivottamam
GE09ram_1-7u:12834: 5.007.017c ita ehīty uvāceva tatra yatra sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12835: 5.007.018a tatas tāṃ prasthitaḥ śālāṃ dadarśa mahatīṃ śubhām
GE09ram_1-7u:12836: 5.007.018c rāvaṇasya manaḥkāntāṃ kāntām iva varastriyam 5.007.019a maṇisopānavikṛtāṃ hemajālavirājitām 5.007.019c sphāṭikair āvṛtatalāṃ dantāntaritarūpikām
GE09ram_1-7u:12837: 5.007.020a muktābhiś ca pravālaiś ca rūpyacāmīkarair api
GE09ram_1-7u:12839: 5.007.021a samair ṛjubhir atyuccaiḥ samantāt suvibhūṣitaiḥ 5.007.021c stambhaiḥ pakṣair ivātyuccair divaṃ saṃprasthitām iva
GE09ram_1-7u:12845: 5.007.024c citrāṃ puṣpopahāreṇa kalmāṣīm iva suprabhām 5.007.025a manaḥsaṃhlādajananīṃ varṇasyāpi prasādinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:12846: 5.007.025c tāṃ śokanāśinīṃ divyāṃ śriyaḥ saṃjananīm iva
GE09ram_1-7u:12847: 5.007.026a indriyāṇīndriyārthais tu pañca pañcabhir uttamaiḥ 5.007.026c tarpayām āsa māteva tadā rāvaṇapālitā 5.007.027a svargo 'yaṃ devaloko 'yam indrasyeyaṃ purī bhavet
GE09ram_1-7u:12848: 5.007.027c siddhir veyaṃ parā hi syād ity amanyata mārutiḥ 5.007.028a pradhyāyata ivāpaśyat pradīpāṃs tatra kāñcanān 5.007.028c dhūrtān iva mahādhūrtair devanena parājitān 5.007.029a dīpānāṃ ca prakāśena tejasā rāvaṇasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:12849: 5.007.029c arcirbhir bhūṣaṇānāṃ ca pradīptety abhyamanyata 5.007.030a tato 'paśyat kuthāsīnaṃ nānāvarṇāmbarasrajam 5.007.030c sahasraṃ varanārīṇāṃ nānāveṣavibhūṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:12851: 5.007.031c krīḍitvoparataṃ rātrau suṣvāpa balavat tadā 5.007.032a tat prasuptaṃ viruruce
GE09ram_1-7u:12855: 5.007.034a prabuddhānīva padmāni tāsāṃ bhūtvā kṣapākṣaye 5.007.034c punaḥsaṃvṛtapatrāṇi rātrāv iva babhus tadā 5.007.035a imāni mukhapadmāni niyataṃ mattaṣaṭpadāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12856: 5.007.035c ambujānīva phullāni prārthayanti punaḥ punaḥ 5.007.036a iti vāmanyata śrīmān upapattyā mahākapiḥ 5.007.036c mene hi guṇatas tāni samāni salilodbhavaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12857: 5.007.037a sā tasya śuśubhe śālā tābhiḥ strībhir virājitā
GE09ram_1-7u:12858: 5.007.037c śāradīva prasannā dyaus tārābhir abhiśobhitā 5.007.038a sa ca tābhiḥ parivṛtaḥ śuśubhe rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12859: 5.007.038c yathā hy uḍupatiḥ śrīmāṃs tārābhir abhisaṃvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12860: 5.007.039a yāś cyavante 'mbarāt tārāḥ puṇyaśeṣasamāvṛtāḥ 5.007.039c imās tāḥ saṃgatāḥ kṛtsnā iti mene haris tadā 5.007.040a tārāṇām iva suvyaktaṃ mahatīnāṃ śubhārciṣām 5.007.040c prabhāvarṇaprasādāś ca virejus tatra yoṣitām 5.007.041a vyāvṛttagurupīnasrakprakīrṇavarabhūṣaṇāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12861: 5.007.041c pānavyāyāmakāleṣu nidrāpahṛtacetasaḥ 5.007.042a vyāvṛttatilakāḥ kāś cit kāś cid udbhrāntanūpurāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12862: 5.007.042c pārśve galitahārāś ca kāś cit paramayoṣitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12863: 5.007.043a mukhā hāravṛtāś cānyāḥ kāś cit prasrastavāsasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12864: 5.007.043c vyāviddharaśanā dāmāḥ kiśorya iva vāhitāḥ 5.007.044a sukuṇḍaladharāś cānyā vicchinnamṛditasrajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12865: 5.007.044c gajendramṛditāḥ phullā latā iva mahāvane 5.007.045a candrāṃśukiraṇābhāś ca hārāḥ kāsāṃ cid utkaṭāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12866: 5.007.045c haṃsā iva babhuḥ suptāḥ stanamadhyeṣu yoṣitām
GE09ram_1-7u:12867: 5.007.046a aparāsāṃ ca vaidūryāḥ kādambā iva pakṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12869: 5.007.047a haṃsakāraṇḍavākīrṇāś cakravākopaśobhitāḥ 5.007.047c āpagā iva tā rejur jaghanaiḥ pulinair iva
GE09ram_1-7u:12871: 5.007.048c bhāvagrāhā yaśastīrāḥ suptā nadya ivābabhuḥ 5.007.049a mṛduṣv aṅgeṣu kāsāṃ cit kucāgreṣu ca saṃsthitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12873: 5.007.050a aṃśukāntāś ca kāsāṃ cin mukhamārutakampitāḥ 5.007.050c upary upari vaktrāṇāṃ vyādhūyante punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12874: 5.007.051a tāḥ pātākā ivoddhūtāḥ patnīnāṃ ruciraprabhāḥ 5.007.051c nānāvarṇasuvarṇānāṃ vaktramūleṣu rejire
GE09ram_1-7u:12875: 5.007.052a vavalguś cātra kāsāṃ cit kuṇḍalāni śubhārciṣām
GE09ram_1-7u:12877: 5.007.053a śarkarāsavagandhaḥ sa prakṛtyā surabhiḥ sukhaḥ 5.007.053c tāsāṃ vadananiḥśvāsaḥ siṣeve rāvaṇaṃ tadā 5.007.054a rāvaṇānanaśaṅkāś ca kāś cid rāvaṇayoṣitaḥ 5.007.054c mukhāni sma sapatnīnām upājighran punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12878: 5.007.055a atyarthaṃ saktamanaso rāvaṇe tā varastriyaḥ 5.007.055c asvatantrāḥ sapatnīnāṃ priyam evācaraṃs tadā 5.007.056a bāhūn upanidhāyānyāḥ pārihārya vibhūṣitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12879: 5.007.056c aṃśukāni ca ramyāṇi pramadās tatra śiśyire
GE09ram_1-7u:12880: 5.007.057a anyā vakṣasi cānyasyās tasyāḥ kā cit punar bhujam 5.007.057c aparā tv aṅkam anyasyās tasyāś cāpy aparā bhujau 5.007.058a ūrupārśvakaṭīpṛṣṭham anyonyasya samāśritāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12882: 5.007.059c ekīkṛtabhujāḥ sarvāḥ suṣupus tatra yoṣitaḥ 5.007.060a anyonyabhujasūtreṇa strīmālāgrathitā hi sā
GE09ram_1-7u:12883: 5.007.060c māleva grathitā sūtre śuśubhe mattaṣaṭpadā 5.007.061a latānāṃ mādhave māsi phullānāṃ vāyusevanāt 5.007.061c anyonyamālāgrathitaṃ saṃsaktakusumoccayam 5.007.062a vyativeṣṭitasuskantham anyonyabhramarākulam 5.007.062c āsīd vanam ivoddhūtaṃ strīvanaṃ rāvaṇasya tat
GE09ram_1-7u:12884: 5.007.063a uciteṣv api suvyaktaṃ na tāsāṃ yoṣitāṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:12886: 5.007.064a rāvaṇe sukhasaṃviṣṭe tāḥ striyo vividhaprabhāḥ 5.007.064c jvalantaḥ kāñcanā dīpāḥ prekṣantānimiṣā iva 5.007.065a rājarṣipitṛdaityānāṃ gandharvāṇāṃ ca yoṣitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12887: 5.007.065c rakṣasāṃ cābhavan kanyās tasya kāmavaśaṃ gatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12888: 5.007.066a na tatra kā cit pramadā prasahya; vīryopapannena guṇena labdhā
GE09ram_1-7u:12889: 5.007.066c na cānyakāmāpi na cānyapūrvā; vinā varārhāṃ janakātmajāṃ tu
GE09ram_1-7u:12890: 5.007.067a na cākulīnā na ca hīnarūpā; nādakṣiṇā nānupacāra yuktā
GE09ram_1-7u:12891: 5.007.067c bhāryābhavat tasya na hīnasattvā; na cāpi kāntasya na kāmanīyā 5.007.068a babhūva buddhis tu harīśvarasya; yadīdṛśī rāghavadharmapatnī 5.007.068c imā yathā rākṣasarājabhāryāḥ; sujātam asyeti hi sādhubuddheḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12892: 5.007.069a punaś ca so 'cintayad ārtarūpo; dhruvaṃ viśiṣṭā guṇato hi sītā 5.007.069c athāyam asyāṃ kṛtavān mahātmā; laṅkeśvaraḥ kaṣṭam anāryakarma
GE09ram_1-7u:12893: 5.008.001a tatra divyopamaṃ mukhyaṃ sphāṭikaṃ ratnabhūṣitam 5.008.001c avekṣamāṇo hanumān dadarśa śayanāsanam
GE09ram_1-7u:12897: 5.008.003c gandhaiś ca vividhair juṣṭaṃ varadhūpena dhūpitam
GE09ram_1-7u:12903: 5.008.007a vṛtam ābharaṇair divyaiḥ surūpaṃ kāmarūpiṇam 5.008.007c savṛkṣavanagulmāḍhyaṃ prasuptam iva mandaram
GE09ram_1-7u:12906: 5.008.009a pītvāpy uparataṃ cāpi dadarśa sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12907: 5.008.009c bhāskare śayane vīraṃ prasuptaṃ rākṣasādhipam 5.008.010a niḥśvasantaṃ yathā nāgaṃ rāvaṇaṃ vānarottamaḥ 5.008.010c āsādya paramodvignaḥ so 'pāsarpat subhītavat
GE09ram_1-7u:12909: 5.008.011c suptaṃ rākṣasaśārdūlaṃ prekṣate sma mahākapiḥ 5.008.012a śuśubhe rākṣasendrasya svapataḥ śayanottamam
GE09ram_1-7u:12911: 5.008.013a kāñcanāṅgadanaddhau ca dadarśa sa mahātmanaḥ 5.008.013c vikṣiptau rākṣasendrasya bhujāv indradhvajopamau
GE09ram_1-7u:12912: 5.008.014a airāvataviṣāṇāgrair āpīḍitakṛtavraṇau 5.008.014c vajrollikhitapīnāṃsau viṣṇucakraparikṣitau 5.008.015a pīnau samasujātāṃsau saṃgatau balasaṃyutau
GE09ram_1-7u:12915: 5.008.016c vikṣiptau śayane śubhre pañcaśīrṣāv ivoragau 5.008.017a śaśakṣatajakalpena suśītena
GE09ram_1-7u:12918: 5.008.019a dadarśa sa kapis tasya bāhū śayanasaṃsthitau
GE09ram_1-7u:12919: 5.008.019c mandarasyāntare suptau mahārhī ruṣitāv iva 5.008.020a tābhyāṃ sa paripūrṇābhyāṃ bhujābhyāṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ 5.008.020c śuśubhe 'calasaṃkāśaḥ śṛṅgābhyām iva mandaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12920: 5.008.021a cūtapuṃnāgasurabhir bakulottamasaṃyutaḥ 5.008.021c mṛṣṭānnarasasaṃyuktaḥ pānagandhapuraḥsaraḥ 5.008.022a tasya rākṣasasiṃhasya niścakrāma mukhān mahān 5.008.022c śayānasya viniḥśvāsaḥ pūrayann iva tad gṛham
GE09ram_1-7u:12922: 5.008.023c mukuṭenāpavṛttena kuṇḍalojjvalitānanam 5.008.024a raktacandanadigdhena tathā hāreṇa śobhitā
GE09ram_1-7u:12926: 5.008.026c gāṅge mahati toyānte prasutamiva kuñjaram 5.008.027a caturbhiḥ kāñcanair dīpair dīpyamānaiś caturdiśam 5.008.027c prakāśīkṛtasarvāṅgaṃ meghaṃ vidyudgaṇair iva
GE09ram_1-7u:12928: 5.008.028c patnīḥ sa priyabhāryasya tasya rakṣaḥpater gṛhe
GE09ram_1-7u:12930: 5.008.030a nṛttavāditrakuśalā rākṣasendrabhujāṅkagāḥ 5.008.030c varābharaṇadhāriṇyo niṣannā dadṛśe kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12932: 5.008.031c dadarśa tāpanīyāni kuṇḍalāny aṅgadāni ca 5.008.032a tāsāṃ candropamair vaktraiḥ śubhair lalitakuṇḍalaiḥ 5.008.032c virarāja vimānaṃ tan nabhas tārāgaṇair iva
GE09ram_1-7u:12934: 5.008.033c teṣu teṣv avakāśeṣu prasuptās tanumadhyamāḥ 5.008.034a kā cid vīṇāṃ pariṣvajya prasuptā saṃprakāśate
GE09ram_1-7u:12937: 5.008.035c prasuptā bhāminī bhāti bālaputreva vatsalā 5.008.036a paṭahaṃ cārusarvāṅgī pīḍya śete śubhastanī 5.008.036c cirasya ramaṇaṃ labdhvā pariṣvajyeva kāminī 5.008.037a kā cid aṃśaṃ pariṣvajya suptā kamalalocanā
GE09ram_1-7u:12944: 5.008.040c prasuptā taruṇaṃ vatsam upagūhyeva bhāminī 5.008.041a kā cid āḍambaraṃ nārī bhujasaṃbhogapīḍitam 5.008.041c kṛtvā kamalapatrākṣī prasuptā madamohitā
GE09ram_1-7u:12945: 5.008.042a kalaśīm apaviddhyānyā prasuptā bhāti bhāminī 5.008.042c vasante puṣpaśabalā māleva parimārjitā
GE09ram_1-7u:12946: 5.008.043a pāṇibhyāṃ ca kucau kā cit suvarṇakalaśopamau
GE09ram_1-7u:12949: 5.008.044c anyām āliṅgya suśroṇī prasuptā madavihvalā 5.008.045a ātodyāni vicitrāṇi pariṣvajya
GE09ram_1-7u:12950: 5.008.045c nipīḍya ca kucaiḥ suptāḥ kāminyaḥ kāmukān iva
GE09ram_1-7u:12951: 5.008.046a tāsām ekāntavinyaste śayānāṃ śayane śubhe 5.008.046c dadarśa rūpasaṃpannām aparāṃ sa kapiḥ striyam
GE09ram_1-7u:12953: 5.008.047c vibhūṣayantīm iva ca svaśriyā bhavanottamam 5.008.048a gaurīṃ kanakavarṇābhām iṣṭām antaḥpureśvarīm
GE09ram_1-7u:12954: 5.008.048c kapir mandodarīṃ tatra śayānāṃ cārurūpiṇīm 5.008.049a sa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā mahābāhur bhūṣitāṃ mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12956: 5.008.049e harṣeṇa mahatā yukto nananda hariyūthapaḥ 5.008.050a āshpoṭayām āsa cucumba pucchaṃ; nananda cikrīḍa jagau jagāma
GE09ram_1-7u:12957: 5.008.050c stambhān arohan nipapāta bhūmau; nidarśayan svāṃ prakṛtiṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:12959: 5.009.001a avadhūya ca tāṃ buddhiṃ babhūvāvasthitas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:12960: 5.009.001c jagāma cāparāṃ cintāṃ sītāṃ prati mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12961: 5.009.002a na rāmeṇa viyuktā sā svaptum arhati bhāminī
GE09ram_1-7u:12962: 5.009.002c na bhoktuṃ nāpy alaṃkartuṃ na pānam upasevitum
GE09ram_1-7u:12963: 5.009.003a nānyaṃ naram upasthātuṃ surāṇām api ceśvaram
GE09ram_1-7u:12964: 5.009.003c na hi rāmasamaḥ kaś cid vidyate tridaśeṣv api 5.009.003e anyeyam iti niścitya pānabhūmau cacāra saḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12965: 5.009.004a krīḍitenāparāḥ klāntā gītena ca tathā parāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12966: 5.009.004c nṛttena cāparāḥ klāntāḥ pānaviprahatās tathā 5.009.005a murajeṣu mṛdaṅgeṣu pīṭhikāsu ca saṃsthitāḥ 5.009.005c tathāstaraṇamukhyyeṣu saṃviṣṭāś cāparāḥ striyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12968: 5.009.006c rūpasaṃlāpaśīlena yuktagītārthabhāṣiṇā 5.009.007a deśakālābhiyuktena yuktavākyābhidhāyinā 5.009.007c ratābhiratasaṃsuptaṃ dadarśa hariyūthapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12969: 5.009.008a tāsāṃ madhye mahābāhuḥ śuśubhe rākṣaseśvaraḥ 5.009.008c goṣṭhe mahati mukhyānāṃ gavāṃ madhye yathā vṛṣaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12970: 5.009.009a sa rākṣasendraḥ śuśubhe tābhiḥ parivṛtaḥ svayam
GE09ram_1-7u:12972: 5.009.010a sarvakāmair upetāṃ ca pānabhūmiṃ mahātmanaḥ 5.009.010c dadarśa kapiśārdūlas tasya rakṣaḥpater gṛhe 5.009.011a mṛgāṇāṃ mahiṣāṇāṃ ca varāhāṇāṃ ca bhāgaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12973: 5.009.011c tatra nyastāni māṃsāni pānabhūmau dadarśa saḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12974: 5.009.012a raukmeṣu ca viśaleṣu bhājaneṣv ardhabhakṣitān 5.009.012c dadarśa kapiśārdūla mayūrān kukkuṭāṃs tathā 5.009.013a varāhavārdhrāṇasakān dadhisauvarcalāyutān 5.009.013c śalyān mṛgamayūrāṃś ca hanūmān anvavaikṣata 5.009.014a kṛkarān vividhān siddhāṃś cakorān ardhabhakṣitān 5.009.014c mahiṣān ekaśalyāṃś ca chāgāṃś ca kṛtaniṣṭhitān
GE09ram_1-7u:12975: 5.009.014e lekhyam uccāvacaṃ peyaṃ bhojyāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:12978: 5.009.016a pānabhājanavikṣiptaiḥ phalaiś ca vividhair api 5.009.016c kṛtapuṣpopahārā bhūr adhikaṃ puṣyati śriyam 5.009.017a tatra tatra ca vinyastaiḥ suśliṣṭaiḥ śayanāsanaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12982: 5.009.019a divyāḥ prasannā vividhāḥ surāḥ kṛtasurā api
GE09ram_1-7u:12983: 5.009.019c śarkarāsavamādhvīkāḥ puṣpāsavaphalāsavāḥ 5.009.019e vāsacūrṇaiś ca vividhair mṛṣṭās tais taiḥ pṛthakpṛthak
GE09ram_1-7u:12984: 5.009.020a saṃtatā śuśubhe bhūmir mālyaiś ca bahusaṃsthitaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12985: 5.009.020c hiraṇmayaiś ca karakair bhājanaiḥ sphāṭikair api
GE09ram_1-7u:12987: 5.009.021a rājateṣu ca kumbheṣu jāmbūnadamayeṣu ca 5.009.021c pānaśreṣṭhaṃ tadā bhūri kapis tatra dadarśa ha
GE09ram_1-7u:12989: 5.009.022c rājatāni ca pūrṇāni bhājanāni mahākapiḥ 5.009.023a kva cid ardhāvaśeṣāṇi kva cit pītāni sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12990: 5.009.023c kva cin naiva prapītāni pānāni sa dadarśa ha 5.009.024a kva cid bhakṣyāṃś ca vividhān kva cit pānāni bhāgaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12991: 5.009.024c kva cid annāvaśeṣāṇi paśyan vai vicacāra ha
GE09ram_1-7u:12992: 5.009.025a kva cit prabhinnaiḥ karakaiḥ kva cid āloḍitair ghaṭaiḥ 5.009.025c kva cit saṃpṛktamālyāni jalāni ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:12993: 5.009.026a śayanāny atra nārīṇāṃ śūnyāni bahudhā punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12994: 5.009.026c parasparaṃ samāśliṣya kāś cit suptā varāṅganāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:12995: 5.009.027a kā cic ca vastram anyasyā apahṛtyopaguhya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:12997: 5.009.028a tāsām ucchvāsavātena vastraṃ mālyaṃ ca gātrajam
GE09ram_1-7u:12998: 5.009.028c nātyarthaṃ spandate citraṃ prāpya mandam ivānilam
GE09ram_1-7u:12999: 5.009.029a candanasya ca śītasya śīdhor madhurasasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:13000: 5.009.029c vividhasya ca mālyasya puṣpasya vividhasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:13001: 5.009.030a bahudhā mārutas tatra gandhaṃ vividham udvahan
GE09ram_1-7u:13002: 5.009.030c snānānāṃ candanānāṃ ca dhūpānāṃ caiva mūrchitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13003: 5.009.030e pravavau surabhir gandho vimāne puṣpake tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:13004: 5.009.031a śyāmāvadātās tatrānyāḥ kāś cit kṛṣṇā varāṅganāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13005: 5.009.031c kāś cit kāñcanavarṇāṅgyaḥ pramadā rākṣasālaye 5.009.032a tāsāṃ nidrāvaśatvāc ca madanena vimūrchitam 5.009.032c padminīnāṃ prasuptānāṃ rūpam āsīd yathaiva hi
GE09ram_1-7u:13006: 5.009.033a evaṃ sarvam aśeṣeṇa rāvaṇāntaḥpuraṃ kapiḥ 5.009.033c dadarśa sumahātejā na dadarśa ca jānakīm
GE09ram_1-7u:13007: 5.009.034a nirīkṣamāṇaś ca tatas tāḥ striyaḥ sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13010: 5.009.035c idaṃ khalu mamātyarthaṃ dharmalopaṃ kariṣyati 5.009.036a na hi me paradārāṇāṃ dṛṣṭir viṣayavartinī
GE09ram_1-7u:13011: 5.009.036c ayaṃ cātra mayā dṛṣṭaḥ paradāraparigrahaḥ 5.009.037a tasya prādurabhūc cintāpunar anyā manasvinaḥ 5.009.037c niścitaikāntacittasya kāryaniścayadarśinī 5.009.038a kāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā mayā sarvā viśvastā rāvaṇastriyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13012: 5.009.038c na tu me manasaḥ kiṃ cid vaikṛtyam upapadyate 5.009.039a mano hi hetuḥ sarveṣām indriyāṇāṃ pravartate
GE09ram_1-7u:13013: 5.009.039c śubhāśubhāsv avasthāsu tac ca me suvyavasthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:13014: 5.009.040a nānyatra hi mayā śakyā vaidehī parimārgitum
GE09ram_1-7u:13015: 5.009.040c striyo hi strīṣu dṛśyante sadā saṃparimārgaṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:13016: 5.009.041a yasya sattvasya yā yonis tasyāṃ tat parimārgyate
GE09ram_1-7u:13017: 5.009.041c na śakyaṃ pramadā naṣṭā mṛgīṣu parimārgitum
GE09ram_1-7u:13018: 5.009.042a tad idaṃ mārgitaṃ tāvac chuddhena manasā mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:13019: 5.009.042c rāvaṇāntaḥpuraṃ saraṃ dṛśyate na ca jānakī
GE09ram_1-7u:13020: 5.009.043a devagandharvakanyāś ca nāgakanyāś ca vīryavān 5.009.043c avekṣamāṇo hanumān naivāpaśyata jānakīm
GE09ram_1-7u:13021: 5.009.044a tām apaśyan kapis tatra paśyaṃś cānyā varastriyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13022: 5.009.044c apakramya tadā vīraḥ pradhyātum upacakrame 5.010.001a sa tasya madhye bhavanasya vānaro; latāgṛhāṃś citragṛhān niśāgṛhān
GE09ram_1-7u:13023: 5.010.001c jagāma sītāṃ prati darśanotsuko; na caiva tāṃ paśyati cārudarśanām 5.010.002a sa cintayām āsa tato mahākapiḥ; priyām apaśyan raghunandanasya
GE09ram_1-7u:13025: 5.010.002c dhruvaṃ nu sītā mriyate yathā na me; vicinvato darśanam eti
GE09ram_1-7u:13027: 5.010.003a sā rākṣasānāṃ pravareṇa bālā; svaśīlasaṃrakṣaṇa tat parā satī
GE09ram_1-7u:13028: 5.010.003c anena nūnaṃ pratiduṣṭakarmaṇā; hatā bhaved āryapathe pare sthitā 5.010.004a virūparūpā vikṛtā vivarcaso; mahānanā dīrghavirūpadarśanāḥ 5.010.004c samīkṣya sā rākṣasarājayoṣito; bhayād vinaṣṭā janakeśvarātmajā
GE09ram_1-7u:13029: 5.010.005a sītām adṛṣṭvā hy anavāpya pauruṣaṃ; vihṛtya kālaṃ saha vānaraiś ciram 5.010.005c na me 'sti sugrīvasamīpagā gatiḥ; sutīkṣṇadaṇḍo balavāṃś ca
GE09ram_1-7u:13031: 5.010.006a dṛṣṭam antaḥpuraṃ sarvaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇayoṣitaḥ 5.010.006c na sītā dṛśyate sādhvī vṛthā jāto mama śramaḥ 5.010.007a kiṃ nu māṃ vānarāḥ sarve gataṃ vakṣyanti saṃgatāḥ 5.010.007c gatvā tatra tvayā vīra kiṃ kṛtaṃ tad vadasva naḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13032: 5.010.008a adṛṣṭvā kiṃ pravakṣyāmi tām ahaṃ janakātmajām
GE09ram_1-7u:13033: 5.010.008c dhruvaṃ prāyam upeṣyanti kālasya vyativartane 5.010.009a kiṃ vā vakṣyati vṛddhaś ca jāmbavān aṅgadaś ca saḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13034: 5.010.009c gataṃ pāraṃ samudrasya vānarāś ca samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13035: 5.010.010a anirvedaḥ śriyo mūlam anirvedaḥ paraṃ sukham
GE09ram_1-7u:13036: 5.010.010c bhūyas tāvad viceṣyāmi na yatra vicayaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13037: 5.010.011a anirvedo hi satataṃ sarvārtheṣu pravartakaḥ 5.010.011c karoti saphalaṃ jantoḥ karma yac ca karoti saḥ 5.010.012a tasmād anirveda kṛtaṃ yatnaṃ ceṣṭe 'ham uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:13038: 5.010.012c adṛṣṭāṃś ca viceṣyāmi deśān rāvaṇapālitān 5.010.013a āpānaśālāvicitās tathā puṣpagṛhāṇi ca
GE09ram_1-7u:13039: 5.010.013c citraśālāś ca vicitā bhūyaḥ krīḍāgṛhāṇi ca
GE09ram_1-7u:13040: 5.010.014a niṣkuṭāntararathyāś ca vimānāni ca sarvaśaḥ 5.010.014c iti saṃcintya bhūyo 'pi vicetum upacakrame 5.010.015a bhūmīgṛhāṃś caityagṛhān gṛhātigṛhakān api
GE09ram_1-7u:13041: 5.010.015c utpatan nipataṃś cāpi tiṣṭhan gacchan punaḥ kva cit 5.010.016a apāvṛṇvaṃś ca dvārāṇi kapāṭāny avaghaṭṭayan 5.010.016c praviśan niṣpataṃś cāpi prapatann utpatann api
GE09ram_1-7u:13042: 5.010.016e sarvam apy avakāśaṃ sa vicacāra mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13044: 5.010.017c rāvaṇāntaḥpure tasmin yaṃ kapir na jagāma saḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13046: 5.010.018c śvabhrāś ca puṣkariṇyaś ca sarvaṃ tenāvalokitam
GE09ram_1-7u:13047: 5.010.019a rākṣasyo vividhākārā virūpā vikṛtās tathā 5.010.019c dṛṣṭā hanūmatā tatra na tu sā janakātmajā
GE09ram_1-7u:13048: 5.010.020a rūpeṇāpratimā loke varā vidyādhara striyaḥ 5.010.020c dṛṭā hanūmatā tatra na tu rāghavanandinī
GE09ram_1-7u:13050: 5.010.021c dṛṣṭā hanūmatā tatra na tu sītā sumadhyamā
GE09ram_1-7u:13051: 5.010.022a pramathya rākṣasendreṇa nāgakanyā balād dhṛtāḥ 5.010.022c dṛṣṭā hanūmatā tatra na sā janakanandinī
GE09ram_1-7u:13052: 5.010.023a so 'paśyaṃs tāṃ mahābāhuḥ paśyaṃś cānyā varastriyaḥ 5.010.023c viṣasāda mahābāhur hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13053: 5.010.024a udyogaṃ vānarendrāṇaṃ plavanaṃ sāgarasya ca 5.010.024c vyarthaṃ vīkṣyānilasutaś cintāṃ punar upāgamat 5.010.025a avatīrya vimānāc ca hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ 5.010.025c cintām upajagāmātha śokopahatacetanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13054: 5.011.001a vimānāt tu susaṃkramya prākāraṃ hariyūthapaḥ 5.011.001c hanūmān vegavān āsīd yathā vidyudghanāntare 5.011.002a saṃparikramya hanumān rāvaṇasya niveśanān
GE09ram_1-7u:13055: 5.011.002c adṛṣṭvā jānakīṃ sītām abravīd vacanaṃ kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13056: 5.011.003a bhūyiṣṭhaṃ loḍitā laṅkā rāmasya caratā priyam
GE09ram_1-7u:13057: 5.011.003c na hi paśyāmi vaidehīṃ sītāṃ sarvāṅgaśobhanām
GE09ram_1-7u:13058: 5.011.004a palvalāni taṭākāni sarāṃsi saritas tathā 5.011.004c nadyo 'nūpavanāntāś ca durgāś ca dharaṇīdharāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13059: 5.011.004e loḍitā vasudhā sarvā na ca paśyāmi jānakīm
GE09ram_1-7u:13060: 5.011.005a iha saṃpātinā sītā rāvaṇasya niveśane 5.011.005c ākhyātā gṛdhrarājena na ca paśyāmi tām aham
GE09ram_1-7u:13061: 5.011.006a kiṃ nu sītātha vaidehī maithilī janakātmajā
GE09ram_1-7u:13063: 5.011.007a kṣipram utpatato manye sītām ādāya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13064: 5.011.007c bibhyato rāmabāṇānām antarā patitā bhavet 5.011.008a atha vā hriyamāṇāyāḥ pathi siddhaniṣevite 5.011.008c manye patitam āryāyā hṛdayaṃ prekṣya sāgaram
GE09ram_1-7u:13066: 5.011.009c tayā manye viśālākṣyā tyaktaṃ jīvitam āryayā
GE09ram_1-7u:13067: 5.011.010a upary upari vā nūnaṃ sāgaraṃ kramatas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:13069: 5.011.011a āho kṣudreṇa cānena rakṣantī śīlam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13070: 5.011.011c abandhur bhakṣitā sītā rāvaṇena tapasvinī 5.011.012a atha vā rākṣasendrasya patnībhir asitekṣaṇā 5.011.012c aduṣṭā duṣṭabhāvābhir bhakṣitā sā bhaviṣyati 5.011.013a saṃpūrṇacandrapratimaṃ padmapatranibhekṣaṇam 5.011.013c rāmasya dhyāyatī vaktraṃ pañcatvaṃ kṛpaṇā gatā
GE09ram_1-7u:13071: 5.011.014a hā rāma lakṣmaṇety eva hāyodhyeti ca maithilī
GE09ram_1-7u:13072: 5.011.014c vilapya bahu vaidehī nyastadehā bhaviṣyati 5.011.015a atha vā nihitā manye rāvaṇasya
GE09ram_1-7u:13073: 5.011.015c nūnaṃ lālapyate mandaṃ pañjarastheva śārikā 5.011.016a janakasya kule jātā rāmapatnī sumadhyamā 5.011.016c katham utpalapatrākṣī rāvaṇasya vaśaṃ vrajet 5.011.017a vinaṣṭā vā pranaṣṭā vā mṛtā vā janakātmajā
GE09ram_1-7u:13074: 5.011.017c rāmasya priyabhāryasya na nivedayituṃ kṣamam 5.011.018a nivedyamāne doṣaḥ syād doṣaḥ syād anivedane
GE09ram_1-7u:13075: 5.011.018c kathaṃ nu khalu kartavyaṃ viṣamaṃ pratibhāti me
GE09ram_1-7u:13076: 5.011.019a asminn evaṃgate karye prāptakālaṃ kṣamaṃ ca kim
GE09ram_1-7u:13077: 5.011.019c bhaved iti matiṃ bhūyo hanumān pravicārayan
GE09ram_1-7u:13078: 5.011.020a yadi sītām adṛṣṭvāhaṃ vānarendrapurīm itaḥ 5.011.020c gamiṣyāmi tataḥ ko me puruṣārtho bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:13079: 5.011.021a mamedaṃ laṅghanaṃ vyarthaṃ sāgarasya bhaviṣyati 5.011.021c praveśaś civa laṅkāyā rākṣasānāṃ ca darśanam
GE09ram_1-7u:13080: 5.011.022a kiṃ vā vakṣyati sugrīvo harayo va samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13081: 5.011.022c kiṣkindhāṃ samanuprāptau tau vā daśarathātmajau 5.011.023a gatvā tu yadi kākutsthaṃ vakṣyāmi param apriyam
GE09ram_1-7u:13082: 5.011.023c na dṛṣṭeti mayā sītā tatas tyakṣyanti jīvitam
GE09ram_1-7u:13083: 5.011.024a paruṣaṃ dāruṇaṃ krūraṃ tīkṣṇam indriyatāpanam 5.011.024c sītānimittaṃ durvākyaṃ śrutvā sa na bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:13084: 5.011.025a taṃ tu kṛcchragataṃ dṛṣṭvā pañcatvagatamānasaṃ 5.011.025c bhṛśānurakto medhāvī na bhaviṣyati lakṣmaṇaḥ 5.011.026a vinaṣṭau bhrātarau śrutvā bharato 'pi mariṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:13085: 5.011.026c bharataṃ ca mṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā śatrughno na bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:13086: 5.011.027a putrān mṛtān samīkṣyātha na bhaviṣyanti mātaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13087: 5.011.027c kausalyā ca sumitrā ca kaikeyī ca na saṃśayaḥ 5.011.028a kṛtajñaḥ satyasaṃdhaś ca sugrīvaḥ plavagādhipaḥ 5.011.028c rāmaṃ tathā gataṃ dṛṣṭvā tatas tyakṣyanti jīvitam
GE09ram_1-7u:13088: 5.011.029a durmanā vyathitā dīnā nirānandā tapasvinī 5.011.029c pīḍitā bhartṛśokena rumā tyakṣyati jīvitam 5.011.030a vālijena tu duḥkhena pīḍitā śokakarśitā 5.011.030c pañcatvagamane rājñas tārāpi na bhaviṣyati 5.011.031a mātāpitror vināśena sugrīva vyasanena ca 5.011.031c kumāro 'py aṅgadaḥ kasmād dhārayiṣyati jīvitam
GE09ram_1-7u:13089: 5.011.032a bhartṛjena tu śokena abhibhūtā vanaukasaḥ 5.011.032c śirāṃsy abhihaniṣyanti talair muṣṭibhir eva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:13091: 5.011.033c lālitāḥ kapirājena prāṇāṃs tyakṣyanti vānarāḥ 5.011.034a na vaneṣu na śaileṣu na nirodheṣu vā punaḥ 5.011.034c krīḍām anubhaviṣyanti sametya kapikuñjarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13093: 5.011.035c śailāgrebhyaḥ patiṣyanti sametya viṣameṣu ca 5.011.036a viṣam udbandhanaṃ vāpi praveśaṃ jvalanasya vā
GE09ram_1-7u:13094: 5.011.036c upavāsam atho śastraṃ pracariṣyanti vānarāḥ 5.011.037a ghoram ārodanaṃ manye gate mayi bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:13095: 5.011.037c ikṣvākukulanāśaś ca nāśaś caiva vanaukasām 5.011.038a so 'haṃ naiva gamiṣyāmi kiṣkindhāṃ nagarīm itaḥ 5.011.038c na hi śakṣyāmy ahaṃ draṣṭuṃ sugrīvaṃ maithilīṃ vinā 5.011.039a mayy agacchati cehasthe dharmātmānau mahārathau 5.011.039c āśayā tau dhariṣyete vanarāś ca manasvinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13099: 5.011.041c citāṃ kṛtvā pravekṣyāmi samiddham araṇīsutam 5.011.042a upaviṣṭasya vā samyag liṅginaṃ sādhayiṣyataḥ 5.011.042c śarīraṃ bhakṣayiṣyanti vāyasāḥ śvāpadāni ca 5.011.043a idam apy ṛṣibhir dṛṣṭaṃ niryāṇam iti me matiḥ 5.011.043c samyag āpaḥ pravekṣyāmi na cet paśyāmi jānakīm
GE09ram_1-7u:13101: 5.011.044c prabhagnā cirarātrīyaṃ mama sītām apaśyataḥ 5.011.045a tāpaso vā bhaviṣyāmi niyato vṛkṣamūlikaḥ 5.011.045c netaḥ pratigamiṣyāmi tām adṛṣṭvāsitekṣaṇām
GE09ram_1-7u:13102: 5.011.046a yadītaḥ pratigacchāmi sītām anadhigamya tām 5.011.046c aṅgadaḥ sahitaiḥ sarvair vānarair na bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:13103: 5.011.047a vināśe bahavo doṣā jīvan prāpnoti bhadrakam
GE09ram_1-7u:13104: 5.011.047c tasmāt prāṇān dhariṣyāmi dhruvo jīvati saṃgamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13105: 5.011.048a evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ duḥkhaṃ manasā dhārayan muhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13106: 5.011.048c nādhyagacchat tadā pāraṃ śokasya kapikuñjaraḥ 5.011.049a rāvaṇaṃ vā vadhiṣyāmi daśagrīvaṃ mahābalam 5.011.049c kāmam astu hṛtā sītā pratyācīrṇaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:13107: 5.011.050a athavainaṃ samutkṣipya upary upari sāgaram 5.011.050c rāmāyopahariṣyāmi paśuṃ paśupater iva
GE09ram_1-7u:13108: 5.011.051a iti cintā samāpannaḥ sītām anadhigamya tām
GE09ram_1-7u:13109: 5.011.051c dhyānaśokā parītātmā cintayām āsa vānaraḥ 5.011.052a yāvat sītāṃ na paśyāmi rāmapatnīṃ yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:13110: 5.011.052c tāvad etāṃ purīṃ laṅkāṃ vicinomi punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13111: 5.011.053a saṃpāti vacanāc cāpi rāmaṃ yady ānayāmy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:13112: 5.011.053c apaśyan rāghavo bhāryāṃ nirdahet sarvavānarān 5.011.054a ihaiva niyatāhāro vatsyāmi
GE09ram_1-7u:13113: 5.011.054c na matkṛte vinaśyeyuḥ sarve te naravānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13115: 5.011.055c imām abhigamiṣyāmi na hīyaṃ vicitā mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:13116: 5.011.056a vasūn rudrāṃs tathādityān aśvinau maruto 'pi ca
GE09ram_1-7u:13118: 5.011.057a jitvā tu rākṣasān devīm ikṣvākukulanandinīm 5.011.057c saṃpradāsyāmi rāmāyā yathāsiddhiṃ tapasvine
GE09ram_1-7u:13119: 5.011.058a sa muhūrtam iva dhyātvā cintāvigrathitendriyaḥ 5.011.058c udatiṣṭhan mahābāhur hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13120: 5.011.059a namo 'stu rāmāya salakṣmaṇāya; devyai ca tasyai janakātmajāyai
GE09ram_1-7u:13123: 5.011.060a sa tebhyas tu namaskṛtvā sugrīvāya ca mārutiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13124: 5.011.060c diśaḥ sarvāḥ samālokya aśokavanikāṃ prati 5.011.061a sa gatvā manasā pūrvam aśokavanikāṃ śubhām
GE09ram_1-7u:13125: 5.011.061c uttaraṃ cintayām āsa vānaro mārutātmajaḥ 5.011.062a dhruvaṃ tu rakṣobahulā bhaviṣyati vanākulā 5.011.062c aśokavanikā cintyā sarvasaṃskārasaṃskṛtā
GE09ram_1-7u:13126: 5.011.063a rakṣiṇaś cātra vihitā nūnaṃ rakṣanti pādapān
GE09ram_1-7u:13127: 5.011.063c bhagavān api sarvātmā nātikṣobhaṃ pravāyati 5.011.064a saṃkṣipto 'yaṃ mayātmā ca rāmārthe rāvaṇasya ca 5.011.064c siddhiṃ me saṃvidhāsyanti devāḥ sarṣigaṇās tv iha
GE09ram_1-7u:13128: 5.011.065a brahmā svayambhūr bhagavān devāś caiva diśantu me
GE09ram_1-7u:13129: 5.011.065c siddhim agniś ca vāyuś ca puruhūtaś ca vajradhṛt 5.011.066a varuṇaḥ pāśahastaś ca somādityai tathaiva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:13130: 5.011.066c aśvinau ca mahātmānau marutaḥ sarva eva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:13131: 5.011.067a siddhiṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāni bhūtānāṃ caiva yaḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13132: 5.011.067c dāsyanti mama ye cānye adṛṣṭāḥ pathi gocarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13133: 5.011.068a tad unnasaṃ pāṇḍuradantam avraṇaṃ; śucismitaṃ padmapalāśalocanam 5.011.068c drakṣye tad āryāvadanaṃ kadā nv ahaṃ;
GE09ram_1-7u:13136: 5.011.069c balābhibhūtā abalā tapasvinī; kathaṃ nu me dṛṣṭapathe 'dya sā bhavet 5.012.001a sa muhūrtam iva dhyatvā manasā cādhigamya tām
GE09ram_1-7u:13137: 5.012.001c avapluto mahātejāḥ prākāraṃ tasya veśmanaḥ 5.012.002a sa tu saṃhṛṣṭasarvāṅgaḥ prākārastho mahākapiḥ 5.012.002c puṣpitāgrān vasantādau dadarśa vividhān drumān 5.012.003a sālān aśokān bhavyāṃś ca campakāṃś ca supuṣpitān
GE09ram_1-7u:13138: 5.012.003c uddālakān nāgavṛkṣāṃś cūtān kapimukhān api 5.012.004a athāmravaṇasaṃchannāṃ latāśatasamāvṛtām 5.012.004c jyāmukta iva nārācaḥ pupluve vṛkṣavāṭikām 5.012.005a sa praviṣya vicitrāṃ tāṃ vihagair abhināditām
GE09ram_1-7u:13139: 5.012.005c rājataiḥ kāñcanaiś caiva pādapaiḥ sarvatovṛtām 5.012.006a vihagair mṛgasaṃghaiś ca vicitrāṃ citrakānanām 5.012.006c uditādityasaṃkāśāṃ dadarśa hanumān kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13141: 5.012.007c kokilair bhṛṅgarājaiś ca mattair nityaniṣevitām 5.012.008a prahṛṣṭamanuje kale
GE09ram_1-7u:13143: 5.012.009c sukhaprasuptān vihagān bodhayām āsa vānaraḥ 5.012.010a utpatadbhir dvijagaṇaiḥ pakṣaiḥ sālāḥ samāhatāḥ 5.012.010c anekavarṇā vividhā mumucuḥ puṣpavṛṣṭayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13147: 5.012.012c dṛṣṭvā sarvāṇi bhūtāni vasanta iti menire
GE09ram_1-7u:13148: 5.012.013a vṛkṣebhyaḥ patitaiḥ puṣpair avakīrṇā pṛthagvidhaiḥ 5.012.013c rarāja vasudhā tatra pramadeva vibhūṣitā 5.012.014a tarasvinā te taravas tarasābhiprakampitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13149: 5.012.014c kusumāni vicitrāṇi sasṛjuḥ kapinā tadā 5.012.015a nirdhūtapatraśikharāḥ śīrṇapuṣpaphaladrumāḥ 5.012.015c nikṣiptavastrābharaṇā dhūrtā iva parājitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13150: 5.012.016a hanūmatā vegavatā kampitās te nagottamāḥ 5.012.016c puṣpaparṇaphalāny āśu mumucuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13151: 5.012.017a vihaṃgasaṃghair hīnās te skandhamātrāśrayā drumāḥ 5.012.017c babhūvur agamāḥ sarve māruteneva nirdhutāḥ 5.012.018a vidhūtakeśī yuvatir yathā mṛditavarṇikā
GE09ram_1-7u:13152: 5.012.018c niṣpītaśubhadantauṣṭhī nakhair dantaiś ca vikṣatā 5.012.019a tathā lāṅgūlahastaiś ca caraṇābhyāṃ ca marditā
GE09ram_1-7u:13153: 5.012.019c babhūvāśokavanikā prabhagnavarapādapā 5.012.020a mahālatānāṃ dāmāni vyadhamat tarasā kapiḥ 5.012.020c yathā prāvṛṣi vindhyasya meghajālāni mārutaḥ 5.012.021a sa tatra maṇibhūmīś ca rājatīś ca manoramāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13154: 5.012.021c tathā kāñcanabhūmīś ca vicaran dadṛśe kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13155: 5.012.022a vāpīś ca vividhākārāḥ pūrṇāḥ paramavāriṇā 5.012.022c mahārhair maṇisopānair upapannās tatas tataḥ 5.012.023a muktāpravālasikatā sphaṭikāntarakuṭṭimāḥ 5.012.023c kāñcanais tarubhiś citrais tīrajair upaśobhitāḥ 5.012.024a phullapadmotpalavanāś cakravākopakūjitāḥ 5.012.024c natyūharutasaṃghuṣṭā haṃsasārasanāditāḥ 5.012.025a dīrghābhir drumayuktābhiḥ saridbhiś ca samantataḥ 5.012.025c amṛtopamatoyābhiḥ śivābhir upasaṃskṛtāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13157: 5.012.026c nānāgulmāvṛtavanāḥ karavīrakṛtāntarāḥ 5.012.027a tato 'mbudharasaṃkāśaṃ pravṛddhaśikharaṃ girim 5.012.027c vicitrakūṭaṃ kūṭaiś ca sarvataḥ parivāritam 5.012.028a śilāgṛhair avatataṃ nānāvṛkṣaiḥ samāvṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:13158: 5.012.028c dadarśa kapiśārdūlo ramyaṃ jagati parvatam 5.012.029a dadarśa ca nagāt tasmān nadīṃ nipatitāṃ kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13159: 5.012.029c aṅkād iva samutpatya priyasya patitāṃ priyām
GE09ram_1-7u:13160: 5.012.030a jale nipatitāgraiś ca pādapair upaśobhitām 5.012.030c vāryamāṇām iva kruddhāṃ pramadāṃ priyabandhubhiḥ 5.012.031a punar āvṛttatoyāṃ ca dadarśa sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13161: 5.012.031c prasannām iva kāntasya kāntāṃ punar upasthitām
GE09ram_1-7u:13164: 5.012.033a kṛtrimāṃ dīrghikāṃ cāpi pūrṇāṃ śītena vāriṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:13165: 5.012.033c maṇipravarasopānāṃ muktāsikataśobhitām 5.012.034a vividhair mṛgasaṃghaiś ca vicitrāṃ citrakānanām 5.012.034c prāsādaiḥ sumahadbhiś ca nirmitair viśvakarmaṇā 5.012.034e kānanaiḥ kṛtrimaiś cāpi sarvataḥ samalaṃkṛtām 5.012.035a ye ke cit pādapās tatra puṣpopagaphalopagāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13167: 5.012.036a latāpratānair bahubhiḥ parṇaiś ca bahubhir vṛtām
GE09ram_1-7u:13168: 5.012.036c kāñcanīṃ śiṃśupām ekāṃ dadarśa sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13171: 5.012.038a teṣāṃ drumāṇāṃ prabhayā meror iva mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13173: 5.012.039a tāṃ kāñcanais tarugaṇair mārutena ca vījitām
GE09ram_1-7u:13176: 5.012.040c tām āruhya mahāvegaḥ śiṃśapāṃ parṇasaṃvṛtām 5.012.041a ito drakṣyāmi vaidehīṃ rāma darśanalālasām 5.012.041c itaś cetaś ca duḥkhārtāṃ saṃpatantīṃ yadṛcchayā
GE09ram_1-7u:13177: 5.012.042a aśokavanikā ceyaṃ dṛḍhaṃ ramyā durātmanaḥ 5.012.042c campakaiś candanaiś cāpi bakulaiś ca vibhūṣitā
GE09ram_1-7u:13178: 5.012.043a iyaṃ ca nalinī ramyā dvijasaṃghaniṣevitā 5.012.043c imāṃ sā rāmamahiṣī nūnam eṣyati jānakī
GE09ram_1-7u:13179: 5.012.044a sā rāma rāmamahiṣī rāghavasya priyā sadā
GE09ram_1-7u:13181: 5.012.045a atha vā mṛgaśāvākṣī vanasyāsya vicakṣaṇā 5.012.045c vanam eṣyati sā ceha rāmacintānukarśitā 5.012.046a rāmaśokābhisaṃtaptā sā devī vāmalocanā
GE09ram_1-7u:13183: 5.012.047a vanecarāṇāṃ satataṃ nūnaṃ spṛhayate purā 5.012.047c rāmasya dayitā bhāryā janakasya sutā satī
GE09ram_1-7u:13184: 5.012.048a saṃdhyākālamanāḥ śyāmā dhruvam eṣyati jānakī 5.012.048c nadīṃ cemāṃ śivajalāṃ saṃdhyārthe varavarṇinī 5.012.049a tasyāś cāpy anurūpeyam aśokavanikā śubhā 5.012.049c śubhā yā pārthivendrasya patnī rāmasya saṃmitā
GE09ram_1-7u:13185: 5.012.050a yadi jivati sā devī tārādhipanibhānanā 5.012.050c āgamiṣyati sāvaśyam imāṃ śivajalāṃ nadīm 5.012.051a evaṃ tu matvā hanumān mahātmā; pratīkṣamāṇo manujendrapatnīm 5.012.051c avekṣamāṇaś ca dadarśa sarvaṃ; supuṣpite parṇaghane nilīnaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13186: 5.013.001a sa vīkṣamāṇas tatrastho mārgamāṇaś ca maithilīm
GE09ram_1-7u:13187: 5.013.001c avekṣamāṇaś ca mahīṃ sarvāṃ tām anvavaikṣata
GE09ram_1-7u:13188: 5.013.002a santāna kalatābhiś ca pādapair upaśobhitām 5.013.002c divyagandharasopetāṃ sarvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13189: 5.013.003a tāṃ sa nandanasaṃkāśāṃ mṛgapakṣibhir āvṛtām 5.013.003c harmyaprāsādasaṃbādhāṃ kokilākulaniḥsvanām 5.013.004a kāñcanotpalapadmābhir vāpībhir upaśobhitām
GE09ram_1-7u:13190: 5.013.004c bahvāsanakuthopetāṃ bahubhūmigṛhāyutām 5.013.005a sarvartukusumai ramyaiḥ phalavadbhiś ca pādapaiḥ 5.013.005c puṣpitānām aśokānāṃ śriyā sūryodayaprabhām
GE09ram_1-7u:13191: 5.013.006a pradīptām iva tatrastho mārutiḥ samudaikṣata 5.013.006c niṣpatraśākhāṃ vihagaiḥ kriyamāṇām ivāsakṛt
GE09ram_1-7u:13194: 5.013.007c puṣpabhārātibhāraiś ca spṛśadbhir iva medinīm 5.013.008a karṇikāraiḥ kusumitaiḥ kiṃśukaiś ca supuṣpitaiḥ 5.013.008c sa deśaḥ prabhayā teṣāṃ pradīpta iva sarvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13195: 5.013.009a puṃnāgāḥ saptaparṇāś ca campakoddālakās tathā 5.013.009c vivṛddhamūlā bahavaḥ śobhante sma supuṣpitāḥ 5.013.010a śātakumbhanibhāḥ ke cit ke cid agniśikhopamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13196: 5.013.010c nīlāñjananibhāḥ ke cit tatrāśokāḥ sahasraśaḥ 5.013.011a nandanaṃ vividhodyānaṃ citraṃ caitrarathaṃ yathā 5.013.011c ativṛttam ivācintyaṃ divyaṃ ramyaṃ śriyā vṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:13198: 5.013.012c puṣparatnaśataiś citraṃ pañcamaṃ sāgaraṃ yathā 5.013.013a sarvartupuṣpair nicitaṃ pādapair madhugandhibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13199: 5.013.013c nānāninādair udyānaṃ ramyaṃ mṛgagaṇair dvijaiḥ 5.013.014a anekagandhapravahaṃ puṇyagandhaṃ manoramam
GE09ram_1-7u:13200: 5.013.014c śailendram iva gandhāḍhyaṃ dvitīyaṃ gandhamādanam 5.013.015a aśokavanikāyāṃ tu tasyāṃ vānarapuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13203: 5.013.016c pravālakṛtasopānaṃ taptakāñcanavedikam 5.013.017a muṣṇantam iva cakṣūṃṣi dyotamānam iva śriyā
GE09ram_1-7u:13206: 5.013.018c upavāsakṛśāṃ dīnāṃ niḥśvasāntīṃ punaḥ punaḥ 5.013.018e dadarśa śuklapakṣādau candrarekhām ivāmalām
GE09ram_1-7u:13208: 5.013.019c pinaddhāṃ dhūmajālena śikhām iva vibhāvasoḥ 5.013.020a pītenaikena saṃvītāṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:13209: 5.013.020c sapaṅkām analaṃkārāṃ vipadmām iva padminīm 5.013.021a vrīḍitāṃ duḥkhasaṃtaptāṃ parimlānāṃ tapasvinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:13211: 5.013.022a aśrupūrṇamukhīṃ dīnāṃ kṛśām ananaśena ca 5.013.022c śokadhyānaparāṃ dīnāṃ nityaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:13212: 5.013.023a priyaṃ janam apaśyantīṃ paśyantīṃ rākṣasīgaṇam 5.013.023c svagaṇena mṛgīṃ hīnāṃ śvagaṇābhivṛtām iva 5.013.024a nīlanāgābhayā veṇyā jaghanaṃ gatayaikayā
GE09ram_1-7u:13214: 5.013.025a tāṃ samīkṣya viśālākṣīm adhikaṃ malināṃ kṛśām
GE09ram_1-7u:13215: 5.013.025c tarkayām āsa sīteti kāraṇair upapādibhiḥ 5.013.026a hriyamāṇā tadā tena rakṣasā kāmarūpiṇā 5.013.026c yathārūpā hi dṛṣṭā vai tathārūpeyam aṅganā
GE09ram_1-7u:13217: 5.013.027c kurvantīṃ prabhayā devīṃ sarvā vitimirā diśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13218: 5.013.028a tāṃ nīlakeśīṃ bimbauṣṭhīṃ sumadhyāṃ supratiṣṭhitām 5.013.028c sītāṃ padmapalāśākṣīṃ manmathasya ratiṃ yathā 5.013.029a iṣṭāṃ sarvasya jagataḥ pūrṇacandraprabhām iva 5.013.029c bhūmau sutanum āsīnāṃ niyatām iva tāpasīm
GE09ram_1-7u:13220: 5.013.030c śokajālena mahatā vitatena na rājatīm 5.013.031a saṃsaktāṃ dhūmajālena śikhām iva vibhāvasoḥ 5.013.031c tāṃ smṛtīm iva saṃdighdām ṛddhiṃ nipatitām iva
GE09ram_1-7u:13221: 5.013.032a vihatām iva ca śraddhām āśāṃ pratihatām iva
GE09ram_1-7u:13222: 5.013.032c sopasargāṃ yathā siddhiṃ buddhiṃ sakaluṣām iva
GE09ram_1-7u:13224: 5.013.033c rāmoparodhavyathitāṃ rakṣoharaṇakarśitām 5.013.034a abalāṃ mṛgaśāvākṣīṃ vīkṣamāṇāṃ tatas tataḥ 5.013.034c bāṣpāmbupratipūrṇena kṛṣṇavaktrākṣipakṣmaṇā 5.013.034e vadanenāprasannena niḥśvasantīṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13227: 5.013.036a tasya saṃdidihe buddhir muhuḥ sītāṃ nirīkṣya tu
GE09ram_1-7u:13228: 5.013.036c āmnāyānām ayogena vidyāṃ praśithilām iva 5.013.037a duḥkhena bubudhe sītāṃ hanumān analaṃkṛtām 5.013.037c saṃskāreṇa yathāhīnāṃ vācam arthāntaraṃ gatām 5.013.038a tāṃ samīkṣya viśālākṣīṃ rājaputrīm aninditām 5.013.038c tarkayām āsa sīteti kāraṇair upapādayan 5.013.039a vaidehyā yāni cāṅgeṣu tadā rāmo 'nvakīrtayat
GE09ram_1-7u:13230: 5.013.040a sukṛtau karṇaveṣṭau ca śvadaṃṣṭrau ca susaṃsthitau
GE09ram_1-7u:13232: 5.013.041a śyāmāni cirayuktatvāt tathā saṃsthānavanti ca 5.013.041c tāny evaitāni manye 'haṃ yāni rāmo 'vnakīrtayat
GE09ram_1-7u:13233: 5.013.042a tatra yāny avahīnāni tāny ahaṃ nopalakṣaye
GE09ram_1-7u:13234: 5.013.042c yāny asyā nāvahīnāni tānīmāni na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13235: 5.013.043a pītaṃ kanakapaṭṭābhaṃ srastaṃ tad vasanaṃ śubham
GE09ram_1-7u:13236: 5.013.043c uttarīyaṃ nagāsaktaṃ tadā dṛṣṭaṃ plavaṃgamaiḥ 5.013.044a bhūṣaṇāni ca mukhyāni dṛṣṭāni dharaṇītale 5.013.044c anayaivāpaviddhāni svanavanti mahānti ca
GE09ram_1-7u:13238: 5.013.045c tathā hi nūnaṃ tad varṇaṃ tathā śrīmad yathetarat 5.013.046a iyaṃ kanakavarṇāṅgī rāmasya mahiṣī priyā 5.013.046c pranaṣṭāpi satī yasya manaso na praṇaśyati
GE09ram_1-7u:13239: 5.013.047a iyaṃ sā yat kṛte rāmaś caturbhiḥ paritapyate
GE09ram_1-7u:13241: 5.013.048a strī pranaṣṭeti kāruṇyād āśritety ānṛśaṃsyataḥ 5.013.048c patnī naṣṭeti śokena priyeti madanena ca
GE09ram_1-7u:13242: 5.013.049a asyā devyā yathā rūpam aṅgapratyaṅgasauṣṭhavam 5.013.049c rāmasya ca yathārūpaṃ tasyeyam asitekṣaṇā 5.013.050a asyā devyā manas tasmiṃs tasya cāsyāṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE09ram_1-7u:13243: 5.013.050c teneyaṃ sa ca dharmātmā muhūrtam api jīvati
GE09ram_1-7u:13244: 5.013.051a duṣkaraṃ kurute rāmo ya imāṃ mattakāśinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:13245: 5.013.051c sītāṃ vinā mahābāhur muhūrtam api jīvati
GE09ram_1-7u:13246: 5.013.052a evaṃ sītāṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭaḥ pavanasaṃbhavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13247: 5.013.052c jagāma manasā rāmaṃ praśaśaṃsa ca taṃ prabhum
GE09ram_1-7u:13248: 5.014.001a praśasya tu praśastavyāṃ sītāṃ tāṃ haripuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13250: 5.014.002a sa muhūrtam iva dhyātvā bāṣpaparyākulekṣaṇaḥ 5.014.002c sītām āśritya tejasvī hanumān vilalāpa ha
GE09ram_1-7u:13252: 5.014.003c yadi sītāpi duḥkhārtā kālo hi duratikramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13253: 5.014.004a rāmasya vyavasāyajñā lakṣmaṇasya ca dhīmataḥ 5.014.004c nātyarthaṃ kṣubhyate devī gaṅgeva jaladāgame 5.014.005a tulyaśīlavayovṛttāṃ tulyābhijanalakṣaṇām 5.014.005c rāghavo 'rhati vaidehīṃ taṃ ceyam asitekṣaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:13254: 5.014.006a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā navahemābhāṃ lokakāntām iva śriyam
GE09ram_1-7u:13255: 5.014.006c jagāma manasā rāmaṃ vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:13256: 5.014.007a asyā hetor viśālākṣyā hato vālī mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13257: 5.014.007c rāvaṇapratimo vīrye kabandhaś ca nipātitaḥ 5.014.008a virādhaś ca hataḥ saṃkhye rākṣaso bhīmavikramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13258: 5.014.008c vane rāmeṇa vikramya mahendreṇeva śambaraḥ 5.014.009a caturdaśasahasrāṇi rakṣasāṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:13260: 5.014.010a kharaś ca nihataḥ saṃkhye triśirāś ca nipātitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13261: 5.014.010c dūṣaṇaś ca mahātejā rāmeṇa viditātmanā 5.014.011a aiśvaryaṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca durlabhaṃ vālipālitam 5.014.011c asyā nimitte sugrīvaḥ prāptavāṃl lokasatkṛtam 5.014.012a sāgaraś ca mayā krāntaḥ śrīmān nadanadīpatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13262: 5.014.012c asyā hetor viśālākṣyāḥ purī ceyaṃ nirīkṣitā
GE09ram_1-7u:13263: 5.014.013a yadi rāmaḥ samudrāntāṃ medinīṃ parivartayet 5.014.013c asyāḥ kṛte jagac cāpi yuktam ity eva me matiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13264: 5.014.014a rājyaṃ vā triṣu lokeṣu sītā vā janakātmajā
GE09ram_1-7u:13265: 5.014.014c trailokyarājyaṃ sakalaṃ sītāyā nāpnuyāt kalām 5.014.015a iyaṃ sā dharmaśīlasya maithilasya mahātmanaḥ 5.014.015c sutā janakarājasya sītā bhartṛdṛḍhavratā
GE09ram_1-7u:13266: 5.014.016a utthitā medinīṃ bhittvā kṣetre halamukhakṣate 5.014.016c padmareṇunibhaiḥ kīrṇā śubhaiḥ kedārapāṃsubhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13268: 5.014.017c snuṣā daśarathasyaiṣā jyeṣṭhā rājño yaśasvinī 5.014.018a dharmajñasya kṛtajñasya rāmasya viditātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13269: 5.014.018c iyaṃ sā dayitā bhāryā rākṣasī vaśam āgatā
GE09ram_1-7u:13270: 5.014.019a sarvān bhogān parityajya bhartṛsnehabalāt kṛtā 5.014.019c acintayitvā duḥkhāni praviṣṭā nirjanaṃ vanam 5.014.020a saṃtuṣṭā phalamūlena bhartṛśuśrūṣaṇe ratā
GE09ram_1-7u:13271: 5.014.020c yā parāṃ bhajate prītiṃ vane 'pi bhavane yathā 5.014.021a seyaṃ kanakavarṇāṅgī nityaṃ susmitabhāṣiṇī
GE09ram_1-7u:13272: 5.014.021c sahate yātanām etām anarthānām abhāginī 5.014.022a imāṃ tu śīlasaṃpannāṃ draṣṭum icchati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13273: 5.014.022c rāvaṇena pramathitāṃ prapām iva pipāsitaḥ 5.014.023a asyā nūnaṃ punar lābhād rāghavaḥ prītim eṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:13274: 5.014.023c rājā rājyaparibhraṣṭaḥ punaḥ prāpyeva medinīm 5.014.024a kāmabhogaiḥ parityaktā hīnā bandhujanena ca 5.014.024c dhārayaty ātmano dehaṃ tatsamāgamakāṅkṣiṇī
GE09ram_1-7u:13275: 5.014.025a naiṣā paśyati rākṣasyo nemān puṣpaphaladrumān 5.014.025c ekasthahṛdayā nūnaṃ rāmam evānupaśyati
GE09ram_1-7u:13276: 5.014.026a bhartā nāma paraṃ nāryā bhūṣaṇaṃ bhūṣaṇād api
GE09ram_1-7u:13277: 5.014.026c eṣā hi rahitā tena śobhanārhā na śobhate
GE09ram_1-7u:13278: 5.014.027a duṣkaraṃ kurute rāmo hīno yad anayā prabhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13279: 5.014.027c dhārayaty ātmano dehaṃ na duḥkhenāvasīdati 5.014.028a imām asitakeśāntāṃ śatapatranibhekṣaṇām
GE09ram_1-7u:13280: 5.014.028c sukhārhāṃ duḥkhitāṃ dṛṣṭvā mamāpi vyathitaṃ manaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13282: 5.014.029c sā rākṣasībhir vikṛtekṣaṇābhiḥ; saṃrakṣyate saṃprati vṛkṣamūle
GE09ram_1-7u:13283: 5.014.030a himahatanalinīva naṣṭaśobhā; vyasanaparamparayā nipīḍyamānā 5.014.030c sahacararahiteva cakravākī; janakasutā kṛpaṇāṃ daśāṃ prapannā
GE09ram_1-7u:13284: 5.014.031a asyā hi puṣpāvanatāgraśākhāḥ; śokaṃ dṛḍhaṃ vai janayaty aśokāḥ 5.014.031c himavyapāyena ca mandaraśmir; abhyutthito naikasahasraraśmiḥ 5.014.032a ity evam arthaṃ kapir anvavekṣya; sīteyam ity eva
GE09ram_1-7u:13286: 5.014.032c saṃśritya tasmin niṣasāda vṛkṣe; balī harīṇām ṛṣabhas tarasvī
GE09ram_1-7u:13287: 5.015.001a tataḥ kumudaṣaṇḍābho nirmalaṃ nirmalaḥ svayam 5.015.001c prajagāma nabhaś candro haṃso nīlam ivodakam
GE09ram_1-7u:13288: 5.015.002a sācivyam iva kurvan sa prabhayā nirmalaprabhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13289: 5.015.002c candramā raśmibhiḥ śītaiḥ siṣeve pavanātmajam 5.015.003a sa dadarśa tataḥ sītāṃ pūrṇacandranibhānanām 5.015.003c śokabhārair iva nyastāṃ bhārair nāvam ivāmbhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:13292: 5.015.005a ekākṣīm ekakarṇāṃ ca karṇaprāvaraṇāṃ tathā 5.015.005c akarṇāṃ śaṅkukarṇāṃ ca
GE09ram_1-7u:13296: 5.015.007c lambauṣṭhīṃ cibukauṣṭhīṃ ca lambāsyāṃ lambajānukām 5.015.008a hrasvāṃ dīrghāṃ ca kubjāṃ ca vikaṭāṃ vāmanāṃ tathā 5.015.008c karālāṃ bhugnavastrāṃ ca piṅgākṣīṃ vikṛtānanām 5.015.009a vikṛtāḥ piṅgalāḥ kālīḥ krodhanāḥ kalahapriyāḥ 5.015.009c kālāyasamahāśūlakūṭamudgaradhāriṇīḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13299: 5.015.011c gokarṇīr hastikarṇīś ca harikarṇīs tathāparāḥ 5.015.012a anāsā atināsāś ca tiryan nāsā vināsikāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13302: 5.015.013c atimātraśirogrīvā atimātrakucodarīḥ 5.015.014a atimātrāsya netrāś ca dīrghajihvānakhās tathā 5.015.014c ajāmukhīr hastimukhīr gomukhīḥ sūkarīmukhīḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13305: 5.015.016a karālā dhūmrakeśīś ca rakṣasīr vikṛtānanāḥ 5.015.016c pibantīḥ satataṃ pānaṃ sadā māṃsasurāpriyāḥ 5.015.017a māṃsaśoṇitadigdhāṅgīr māṃsaśoṇitabhojanāḥ 5.015.017c tā dadarśa kapiśreṣṭho romaharṣaṇadarśanāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13307: 5.015.018c tasyādhastāc ca tāṃ devīṃ rājaputrīm aninditām
GE09ram_1-7u:13308: 5.015.019a lakṣayām āsa lakṣmīvān hanūmāñ janakātmajām 5.015.019c niṣprabhāṃ śokasaṃtaptāṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:13309: 5.015.020a kṣīṇapuṇyāṃ cyutāṃ bhūmau tārāṃ nipatitām iva
GE09ram_1-7u:13313: 5.015.022a viyūthāṃ siṃhasaṃruddhāṃ baddhāṃ gajavadhūm iva 5.015.022c candralekhāṃ payodānte śāradābhrair ivāvṛtām
GE09ram_1-7u:13314: 5.015.023a kliṣṭarūpām asaṃsparśād ayuktām iva vallakīm 5.015.023c sītāṃ bhartṛhite yuktām ayuktāṃ rakṣasāṃ vaśe
GE09ram_1-7u:13316: 5.015.024c tābhiḥ parivṛtāṃ tatra sagrahām iva rohiṇīm
GE09ram_1-7u:13317: 5.015.025a dadarśa hanumān devīṃ latām akusumām iva
GE09ram_1-7u:13318: 5.015.025c sā malena ca digdhāṅgī vapuṣā cāpy alaṃkṛtā
GE09ram_1-7u:13319: 5.015.026a mṛṇālī paṅkadighdeva vibhāti ca na bhāti ca
GE09ram_1-7u:13320: 5.015.026c malinena tu vastreṇa parikliṣṭena bhāminīm 5.015.027a saṃvṛtāṃ mṛgaśāvākṣīṃ dadarśa hanumān kapiḥ 5.015.027c tāṃ devīṃ dīnavadanām adīnāṃ bhartṛtejasā 5.015.028a rakṣitāṃ svena śīlena sītām asitalocanām 5.015.028c tāṃ dṛṣṭvā hanumān sītāṃ mṛgaśāvanibhekṣaṇām 5.015.029a mṛgakanyām iva trastāṃ vīkṣamāṇāṃ samantataḥ 5.015.029c dahantīm iva niḥśvāsair vṛkṣān pallavadhāriṇaḥ 5.015.030a saṃghātam iva śokānāṃ duḥkhasyormim ivotthitām 5.015.030c tāṃ kṣāmāṃ suvibhaktāṅgīṃ vinābharaṇaśobhinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:13321: 5.015.031a praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe mārutiḥ prekṣya maithilīm
GE09ram_1-7u:13322: 5.015.031c harṣajāni ca so 'śrūṇi tāṃ dṛṣṭvā madirekṣaṇām
GE09ram_1-7u:13323: 5.015.032a mumoca hanumāṃs tatra namaś cakre ca rāghavam
GE09ram_1-7u:13324: 5.015.032c namaskṛtvā ca rāmāya lakṣmaṇāya ca vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:13327: 5.016.001c vicinvataś ca vaidehīṃ kiṃ cic cheṣā niśābhavat
GE09ram_1-7u:13328: 5.016.002a ṣaḍaṅgavedaviduṣāṃ kratupravarayājinām 5.016.002c śuśrāva brahmaghoṣāṃś ca virātre brahmarakṣasām 5.016.003a atha maṅgalavāditraiḥ śabdaiḥ śrotramanoharaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13330: 5.016.004a vibudhya tu yathākālaṃ rākṣasendraḥ pratāvapān 5.016.004c srastamālyāmbaradharo vaidehīm anvacintayat
GE09ram_1-7u:13331: 5.016.005a bhṛśaṃ niyuktas tasyāṃ ca madanena madotkaṭaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13332: 5.016.005c na sa taṃ rākṣasaḥ kāmaṃ śaśākātmani gūhitum
GE09ram_1-7u:13333: 5.016.006a sa sarvābharaṇair yukto bibhrac chriyam anuttamām
GE09ram_1-7u:13334: 5.016.006c tāṃ nagair vividhair juṣṭāṃ sarvapuṣpaphalopagaiḥ 5.016.007a vṛtāṃ puṣkariṇībhiś ca nānāpuṣpopaśobhitām
GE09ram_1-7u:13335: 5.016.007c sadāmadaiś ca vihagair vicitrāṃ paramādbhutām 5.016.008a īhāmṛgaiś ca vividhaiś vṛtāṃ dṛṣṭimanoharaiḥ 5.016.008c vīthīḥ saṃprekṣamāṇaś ca maṇikāñcanatoraṇāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13338: 5.016.010a aṅganāśatamātraṃ tu taṃ vrajantam anuvrajat 5.016.010c mahendram iva paulastyaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:13339: 5.016.011a dīpikāḥ kāñcanīḥ kāś cij jagṛhus tatra yoṣitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13341: 5.016.012a kāñcanair api bhṛṅgārair jahruḥ salilam agrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13342: 5.016.012c maṇḍalāgrān asīṃś caiva gṛhyānyāḥ pṛṣṭhato yayuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13343: 5.016.013a kā cid ratnamayīṃ pātrīṃ pūrṇāṃ pānasya bhāminī
GE09ram_1-7u:13344: 5.016.013c dakṣiṇā dakṣiṇenaiva tadā jagrāha pāṇinā 5.016.014a rājahaṃsapratīkāśaṃ chatraṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:13345: 5.016.014c sauvarṇadaṇḍam aparā gṛhītvā pṛṣṭhato yayau 5.016.015a nidrāmadaparītākṣyo rāvaṇasyottamastriyaḥ 5.016.015c anujagmuḥ patiṃ vīraṃ ghanaṃ vidyullatā iva
GE09ram_1-7u:13346: 5.016.016a tataḥ kāñcīninādaṃ ca nūpurāṇāṃ ca niḥsvanam
GE09ram_1-7u:13347: 5.016.016c śuśrāva paramastrīṇāṃ sa kapir mārutātmajaḥ 5.016.017a taṃ cāpratimakarmāṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:13348: 5.016.017c dvāradeśam anuprāptaṃ dadarśa hanumān kapiḥ 5.016.018a dīpikābhir anekābhiḥ samantād avabhāsitam
GE09ram_1-7u:13351: 5.016.019c samakṣam iva kandarpam apaviddha śarāsanam 5.016.020a mathitāmṛtaphenābham arajo vastram uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:13352: 5.016.020c salīlam anukarṣantaṃ vimuktaṃ saktam aṅgade 5.016.021a taṃ patraviṭape līnaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13354: 5.016.022a avekṣamāṇaś ca tato dadarśa kapikuñjaraḥ 5.016.022c rūpayauvanasaṃpannā rāvaṇasya
GE09ram_1-7u:13355: 5.016.023a tābhiḥ parivṛto rājā surūpābhir mahāyaśāḥ 5.016.023c tanmṛgadvijasaṃghuṣṭaṃ praviṣṭaḥ pramadāvanam
GE09ram_1-7u:13357: 5.016.024c tena viśravasaḥ putraḥ sa dṛṣṭo rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13358: 5.016.025a vṛtaḥ paramanārībhis tārābhir iva candramāḥ 5.016.025c taṃ dadarśa mahātejās tejovantaṃ mahākapiḥ 5.016.026a rāvaṇo 'yaṃ mahābāhur iti saṃcintya vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13360: 5.016.027a sa tathāpy ugratejāḥ san nirdhūtas tasya tejasā
GE09ram_1-7u:13362: 5.016.028a sa tām asitakeśāntāṃ suśroṇīṃ saṃhatastanīm 5.016.028c didṛkṣur asitāpāṅgīm upāvartata rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13363: 5.017.001a tasminn eva tataḥ kāle rājaputrī tv aninditā
GE09ram_1-7u:13364: 5.017.001c rūpayauvanasaṃpannaṃ bhūṣaṇottamabhūṣitam 5.017.002a tato dṛṣṭvaiva vaidehī rāvaṇaṃ rākṣasādhipam 5.017.002c prāvepata varārohā pravāte kadalī yathā 5.017.003a ūrubhyām udaraṃ chādya bāhubhyāṃ ca payodharau
GE09ram_1-7u:13366: 5.017.004a daśagrīvas tu vaidehīṃ rakṣitāṃ rākṣasīgaṇaiḥ 5.017.004c dadarśa dīnāṃ duḥkhārtaṃ nāvaṃ sannām ivārṇave
GE09ram_1-7u:13368: 5.017.005c chinnāṃ prapatitāṃ bhūmau śākhām iva vanaspateḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13373: 5.017.007c duḥkhasyāntam apaśyantīṃ rāmāṃ rāmam anuvratām 5.017.008a veṣṭamānām athāviṣṭāṃ pannagendravadhūm iva
GE09ram_1-7u:13375: 5.017.009a vṛttaśīle kule jātām ācāravati dhārmike 5.017.009c punaḥ saṃskāram āpannāṃ jātam iva ca duṣkule
GE09ram_1-7u:13376: 5.017.010a sannām iva mahākīrtiṃ śraddhām iva vimānitām
GE09ram_1-7u:13377: 5.017.010c prajñām iva parikṣīṇām āśāṃ pratihatām iva
GE09ram_1-7u:13378: 5.017.011a āyatīm iva vidhvastām ājñāṃ pratihatām iva
GE09ram_1-7u:13379: 5.017.011c dīptām iva diśaṃ kāle pūjām apahṛtām iva
GE09ram_1-7u:13380: 5.017.012a padminīm iva vidhvastāṃ hataśūrāṃ camūm iva
GE09ram_1-7u:13381: 5.017.012c prabhām iva tapodhvastām upakṣīṇām ivāpagām 5.017.013a vedīm iva parāmṛṣṭāṃ śāntām agniśikhām iva
GE09ram_1-7u:13383: 5.017.014a utkṛṣṭaparṇakamalāṃ vitrāsitavihaṃgamām 5.017.014c hastihastaparāmṛṣṭām ākulāṃ padminīm iva
GE09ram_1-7u:13384: 5.017.015a patiśokāturāṃ śuṣkāṃ nadīṃ visrāvitām iva 5.017.015c parayā mṛjayā hīnāṃ kṛṣṇapakṣe niśām iva
GE09ram_1-7u:13389: 5.017.018a ekayā dīrghayā veṇyā śobhamānām ayatnataḥ 5.017.018c nīlayā nīradāpāye vanarājyā mahīm iva 5.017.019a upavāsena śokena dhyānena ca bhayena ca
GE09ram_1-7u:13390: 5.017.019c parikṣīṇāṃ kṛśāṃ dīnām alpāhārāṃ tapodhanām 5.017.020a āyācamānāṃ duḥkhārtāṃ prāñjaliṃ devatām iva 5.017.020c bhāvena raghumukhyasya daśagrīvaparābhavam
GE09ram_1-7u:13392: 5.017.021c anuvratāṃ rāmam atīva maithilīṃ; pralobhayām āsa vadhāya
GE09ram_1-7u:13394: 5.018.001a sa tāṃ parivṛtāṃ dīnāṃ nirānandāṃ tapasvinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:13395: 5.018.001c sākārair madhurair vākyair nyadarśayata rāvaṇaḥ 5.018.002a māṃ dṛṣṭvā nāganāsorugūhamānā
GE09ram_1-7u:13396: 5.018.002c adarśanam ivātmānaṃ bhayān netuṃ tvam icchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:13397: 5.018.003a kāmaye tvāṃ viśālākṣi bahumanyasva māṃ priye
GE09ram_1-7u:13398: 5.018.003c sarvāṅgaguṇasaṃpanne sarvalokamanohare 5.018.004a neha ke cin manuṣyā vā rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13399: 5.018.004c vyapasarpatu te sīte bhayaṃ mattaḥ samutthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:13400: 5.018.005a svadharme rakṣasāṃ bhīru sarvathaiṣa na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13401: 5.018.005c gamanaṃ vā parastrīṇāṃ haraṇaṃ saṃpramathya vā
GE09ram_1-7u:13402: 5.018.006a evaṃ caitad akāmāṃ ca na tvāṃ sprakṣyāmi maithili 5.018.006c kāmaṃ kāmaḥ śarīre me yathākāmaṃ pravartatām
GE09ram_1-7u:13403: 5.018.007a devi neha bhayaṃ kāryaṃ mayi viśvasihi priye
GE09ram_1-7u:13404: 5.018.007c praṇayasva ca tattvena maivaṃ bhūḥ śokalālasā
GE09ram_1-7u:13405: 5.018.008a ekaveṇī dharāśayyā dhyānaṃ malinam ambaram 5.018.008c asthāne 'py upavāsaś ca naitāny aupayikāni te 5.018.009a vicitrāṇi ca mālyāni candanāny agarūṇi ca
GE09ram_1-7u:13406: 5.018.009c vividhāni ca vāsāṃsi divyāny ābharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:13407: 5.018.010a mahārhāṇi ca pānāni yānāni śayanāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:13408: 5.018.010c gītaṃ nṛttaṃ ca vādyaṃ ca labha māṃ prāpya maithili
GE09ram_1-7u:13409: 5.018.011a strīratnam asi maivaṃ bhūḥ kuru gātreṣu bhūṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:13410: 5.018.011c māṃ prāpya tu kathaṃ hi syās tvam anarhā suvigrahe
GE09ram_1-7u:13411: 5.018.012a idaṃ te cārusaṃjātaṃ yauvanaṃ vyativartate 5.018.012c yad atītaṃ punar naiti srotaḥ śīghram apām iva 5.018.013a tvāṃ kṛtvoparato manye rūpakartā sa viśvakṛt
GE09ram_1-7u:13412: 5.018.013c na hi rūpopamā tv anyā tavāsti śubhadarśane
GE09ram_1-7u:13414: 5.018.014c kaḥ pumān ativarteta sākṣād api pitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13415: 5.018.015a yad yat paśyāmi te gātraṃ śītāṃśusadṛśānane
GE09ram_1-7u:13416: 5.018.015c tasmiṃs tasmin pṛthuśroṇi cakṣur mama nibadhyate
GE09ram_1-7u:13417: 5.018.016a bhava maithili bhāryā me moham enaṃ visarjaya
GE09ram_1-7u:13419: 5.018.017a lokebhyo yāni ratnāni saṃpramathyāhṛtāni me 5.018.017c tāni te bhīru sarvāṇi rājyaṃ caitad ahaṃ ca te
GE09ram_1-7u:13421: 5.018.018c janakāya pradāsyāmi tava hetor vilāsini 5.018.019a neha paśyāmi loke 'nyaṃ yo me pratibalo bhavet
GE09ram_1-7u:13422: 5.018.019c paśya me sumahad vīryam apratidvandvam āhave
GE09ram_1-7u:13423: 5.018.020a asakṛt saṃyuge bhagnā mayā vimṛditadhvajāḥ 5.018.020c aśaktāḥ pratyanīkeṣu sthātuṃ mama surāsurāḥ 5.018.021a iccha māṃ kriyatām adya pratikarma tavottamam
GE09ram_1-7u:13424: 5.018.021c saprabhāṇy avasajjantāṃ tavāṅge bhūṣaṇāni ca 5.018.021e sādhu paśyāmi te rūpaṃ saṃyuktaṃ pratikarmaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:13426: 5.018.022c bhuṅkṣva bhogān yathākāmaṃ piba bhīru ramasva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:13427: 5.018.022e yatheṣṭaṃ ca prayaccha tvaṃ pṛthivīṃ vā dhanāni ca 5.018.023a lalasva mayi visrabdhā dhṛṣṭam ājñāpayasva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:13428: 5.018.023c matprabhāvāl lalantyāś ca lalantāṃ bāndhavās tava
GE09ram_1-7u:13429: 5.018.024a ṛddhiṃ mamānupaśya tvaṃ śriyaṃ bhadre yaśaś ca me 5.018.024c kiṃ kariṣyasi rāmeṇa subhage cīravāsasā 5.018.025a nikṣiptavijayo rāmo gataśrīr vanagocaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13430: 5.018.025c vratī sthaṇḍilaśāyī ca śaṅke jīvati vā na vā 5.018.026a na hi vaidehi rāmas tvāṃ draṣṭuṃ vāpy upalapsyate 5.018.026c puro balākair asitair meghair jyotsnām ivāvṛtām
GE09ram_1-7u:13431: 5.018.027a na cāpi mama hastāt tvāṃ prāptum arhati rāghavaḥ 5.018.027c hiraṇyakaśipuḥ kīrtim indrahastagatām iva
GE09ram_1-7u:13433: 5.018.028c mano harasi me bhīru suparṇaḥ pannagaṃ yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:13435: 5.018.029c tāṃ dṛṣṭvā sveṣu dāreṣu ratiṃ nopalabhāmy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:13437: 5.018.030c yāvantyo mama sarvāsām aiśvaryaṃ kuru jānaki
GE09ram_1-7u:13438: 5.018.031a mama hy asitakeśānte trailokyapravarāḥ striyaḥ 5.018.031c tās tvāṃ paricariṣyanti śriyam apsaraso yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:13439: 5.018.032a yāni vaiśravaṇe subhru ratnāni ca dhanāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:13440: 5.018.032c tāni lokāṃś ca suśroṇi māṃ ca bhuṅkṣva yathāsukham 5.018.033a na rāmas tapasā devi na balena na vikramaiḥ 5.018.033c na dhanena mayā tulyas tejasā yaśasāpi vā
GE09ram_1-7u:13441: 5.018.034a piba vihara ramasva bhuṅkṣva bhogān; dhananicayaṃ pradiśāmi medinīṃ ca 5.018.034c mayi lala lalane yathāsukhaṃ tvaṃ; tvayi ca sametya lalantu bāndhavās te
GE09ram_1-7u:13442: 5.018.035a kusumitatarujālasaṃtatāni; bhramarayutāni samudratīrajāni 5.018.035c kanakavimalahārabhūṣitāṅgī; vihara mayā saha bhīru kānanāni 5.019.001a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā sītā raudrasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13443: 5.019.001c ārtā dīnasvarā dīnaṃ pratyuvāca śanair vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13444: 5.019.002a duḥkhārtā rudatī sītā vepamānā tapasvinī 5.019.002c cintayantī varārohā patim eva pativratā 5.019.003a tṛṇam antarataḥ kṛtvā pratyuvāca śucismitā 5.019.003c nivartaya mano mattaḥ svajane kriyatāṃ manaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13445: 5.019.004a na māṃ prārthayituṃ yuktas tvaṃ siddhim iva pāpakṛt 5.019.004c akāryaṃ na mayā kāryam ekapatnyā vigarhitam
GE09ram_1-7u:13446: 5.019.004e kulaṃ saṃprāptayā puṇyaṃ kule mahati jātayā
GE09ram_1-7u:13447: 5.019.005a evam uktvā tu vaidehī rāvaṇaṃ taṃ yaśasvinī
GE09ram_1-7u:13448: 5.019.005c rākṣasaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā bhūyo vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:13449: 5.019.006a nāham aupayikī bhāryā parabhāryā satī tava
GE09ram_1-7u:13450: 5.019.006c sādhu dharmam avekṣasva sādhu sādhuvrataṃ cara
GE09ram_1-7u:13451: 5.019.007a yathā tava tathānyeṣāṃ rakṣyā dārā niśācara
GE09ram_1-7u:13452: 5.019.007c ātmānam upamāṃ kṛtvā sveṣu dāreṣu ramyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:13453: 5.019.008a atuṣṭaṃ sveṣu dāreṣu capalaṃ calitendriyam 5.019.008c nayanti nikṛtiprajñāṃ paradārāḥ parābhavam
GE09ram_1-7u:13454: 5.019.009a iha santo na vā santi sato vā nānuvartase 5.019.009c vaco mithyā praṇītātmā pathyam uktaṃ vicakṣaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13455: 5.019.010a akṛtātmānam āsādya rājānam anaye ratam 5.019.010c samṛddhāni vinaśyanti rāṣṭrāṇi nagarāṇi ca 5.019.011a tatheyaṃ tvāṃ samāsādya laṅkā ratnaugha saṃkulā
GE09ram_1-7u:13459: 5.019.013a evaṃ tvāṃ pāpakarmāṇaṃ vakṣyanti nikṛtā janāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13460: 5.019.013c diṣṭyaitad vyasanaṃ prāpto raudra ity eva harṣitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13461: 5.019.014a śakyā lobhayituṃ nāham aiśvaryeṇa dhanena vā
GE09ram_1-7u:13462: 5.019.014c ananyā rāghaveṇāhaṃ bhāskareṇa prabhā yathā 5.019.015a upadhāya bhujaṃ tasya lokanāthasya satkṛtam 5.019.015c kathaṃ nāmopadhāsyāmi bhujam anyasya kasya cit
GE09ram_1-7u:13463: 5.019.016a aham aupayikī bhāryā tasyaiva vasudhāpateḥ 5.019.016c vratasnātasya viprasya vidyeva viditātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13464: 5.019.017a sādhu rāvaṇa rāmeṇa māṃ samānaya duḥkhitām
GE09ram_1-7u:13465: 5.019.017c vane vāśitayā sārdhaṃ kareṇveva gajādhipam 5.019.018a mitram aupayikaṃ kartuṃ rāmaḥ sthānaṃ parīpsatā
GE09ram_1-7u:13466: 5.019.018c vadhaṃ cānicchatā ghoraṃ tvayāsau puruṣarṣabhaḥ 5.019.019a varjayed vajram utsṛṣṭaṃ varjayed antakaś ciram
GE09ram_1-7u:13467: 5.019.019c tvadvidhaṃ na tu saṃkruddho lokanāthaḥ sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13468: 5.019.020a rāmasya dhanuṣaḥ śabdaṃ śroṣyasi tvaṃ mahāsvanam
GE09ram_1-7u:13470: 5.019.021a iha śīghraṃ suparvāṇo jvalitāsyā ivoragāḥ 5.019.021c iṣavo nipatiṣyanti rāmalakṣmaṇalakṣaṇāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13471: 5.019.022a rakṣāṃsi parinighnantaḥ puryām asyāṃ samantataḥ 5.019.022c asaṃpātaṃ kariṣyanti patantaḥ kaṅkavāsasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13474: 5.019.024a apaneṣyati māṃ bhartā tvattaḥ śīghram ariṃdamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13475: 5.019.024c asurebhyaḥ śriyaṃ dīptāṃ viṣṇus tribhir iva kramaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13476: 5.019.025a janasthāne hatasthāne nihate rakṣasāṃ bale 5.019.025c aśaktena tvayā rakṣaḥ kṛtam etad asādhu vai
GE09ram_1-7u:13477: 5.019.026a āśramaṃ tu tayoḥ śūnyaṃ praviśya narasiṃhayoḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13478: 5.019.026c gocaraṃ gatayor bhrātror apanītā tvayādhama 5.019.027a na hi gandham upāghrāya rāmalakṣmaṇayos tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:13479: 5.019.027c śakyaṃ saṃdarśane sthātuṃ śunā śārdūlayor iva
GE09ram_1-7u:13480: 5.019.028a tasya te vigrahe tābhyāṃ yugagrahaṇam asthiram
GE09ram_1-7u:13482: 5.019.029a kṣipraṃ tava sa nātho me rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha 5.019.029c toyam alpam ivādityaḥ prāṇān ādāsyate śaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13483: 5.019.030a giriṃ kuberasya gato 'thavālayaṃ; sabhāṃ gato vā varuṇasya rājñaḥ 5.019.030c asaṃśayaṃ dāśarather na mokṣyase; mahādrumaḥ kālahato 'śaner
GE09ram_1-7u:13485: 5.020.001a sītāyā vacanaṃ śrutvā paruṣaṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ 5.020.001c pratyuvāca tataḥ sītāṃ vipriyaṃ priyadarśanām 5.020.002a yathā yathā sāntvayitā vaśyaḥ strīṇāṃ tathā tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:13486: 5.020.002c yathā yathā priyaṃ vaktā paribhūtas tathā tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:13487: 5.020.003a saṃniyacchati me krodhaṃ tvayi kāmaḥ samutthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13488: 5.020.003c dravato mārgam āsādya hayān iva susārathiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13489: 5.020.004a vāmaḥ kāmo manuṣyāṇāṃ yasmin kila nibadhyate
GE09ram_1-7u:13490: 5.020.004c jane tasmiṃs tv anukrośaḥ snehaś ca kila jāyate 5.020.005a etasmāt kāraṇān na tāṃ ghatayāmi varānane
GE09ram_1-7u:13492: 5.020.006a paruṣāṇi hi vākyāni yāni yāni bravīṣi mām
GE09ram_1-7u:13493: 5.020.006c teṣu teṣu vadho yuktas tava maithili dāruṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13494: 5.020.007a evam uktvā tu vaidehīṃ rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13496: 5.020.008a dvau māsau rakṣitavyau me yo 'vadhis te mayā kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13497: 5.020.008c tataḥ śayanam āroha mama tvaṃ varavarṇini
GE09ram_1-7u:13498: 5.020.009a dvābhyām ūrdhvaṃ tu māsābhyāṃ bhartāraṃ mām anicchatīm
GE09ram_1-7u:13499: 5.020.009c mama tvāṃ prātarāśārtham ārabhante mahānase 5.020.010a tāṃ tarjyamānāṃ saṃprekṣya rākṣasendreṇa jānakīm 5.020.010c devagandharvakanyās tā viṣedur vipulekṣaṇāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13501: 5.020.011c sītām āśvāsayām āsus tarjitāṃ tena rakṣasā
GE09ram_1-7u:13502: 5.020.012a tābhir āśvāsitā sītā rāvaṇaṃ rākṣasādhipam 5.020.012c uvācātmahitaṃ vākyaṃ vṛttaśauṇḍīryagarvitam
GE09ram_1-7u:13503: 5.020.013a nūnaṃ na te janaḥ kaś cid asin niḥśreyase sthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13504: 5.020.013c nivārayati yo na tvāṃ karmaṇo 'smād vigarhitāt
GE09ram_1-7u:13505: 5.020.014a māṃ hi dharmātmanaḥ patnīṃ śacīm iva śacīpateḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13506: 5.020.014c tvadanyas triṣu lokeṣu prārthayen manasāpi kaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13508: 5.020.015c uktavān asi yat pāpaṃ kva gatas tasya mokṣyase 5.020.016a yathā dṛptaś ca mātaṅgaḥ śaśaś ca sahitau vane 5.020.016c tathā dviradavad rāmas tvaṃ nīca śaśavat smṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13509: 5.020.017a sa tvam ikṣvākunāthaṃ vai kṣipann iha na lajjase 5.020.017c cakṣuṣo viṣayaṃ tasya na tāvad upagacchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:13510: 5.020.018a ime te nayane krūre virūpe kṛṣṇapiṅgale
GE09ram_1-7u:13511: 5.020.018c kṣitau na patite kasmān mām anāryanirīkṣitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13512: 5.020.019a tasya dharmātmanaḥ patnīṃ snuṣāṃ daśarathasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:13513: 5.020.019c kathaṃ vyāharato māṃ te na jihvā pāpa śīryate 5.020.020a asaṃdeśāt tu rāmasya tapasaś cānupālanāt 5.020.020c na tvāṃ kurmi daśagrīva bhasma bhasmārhatejasā
GE09ram_1-7u:13514: 5.020.021a nāpahartum ahaṃ śakyā tasya rāmasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13515: 5.020.021c vidhis tava vadhārthāya vihito nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13516: 5.020.022a śūreṇa dhanadabhrātā balaiḥ samuditena ca 5.020.022c apohya rāmaṃ kasmād dhi dāracāuryaṃ tvayā kṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:13517: 5.020.023a sītāyā vacanaṃ śrutvā rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ 5.020.023c vivṛtya nayane krūre jānakīm anvavaikṣata 5.020.024a nīlajīmūtasaṃkāśo mahābhujaśirodharaḥ 5.020.024c siṃhasattvagatiḥ śrīmān dīptajihvogralocanaḥ
