GE09ram_1-7u:13524: 5.020.028c uvāca rāvaṇaḥ sītāṃ bhujaṃga iva niḥśvasan
GE09ram_1-7u:13526: 5.020.029c nāśayāmy aham adya tvāṃ sūryaḥ saṃdhyām ivaujasā
GE09ram_1-7u:13527: 5.020.030a ity uktvā maithilīṃ rājā rāvaṇaḥ śatrurāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13528: 5.020.030c saṃdideśa tataḥ sarvā rākṣasīr ghoradarśanāḥ 5.020.031a ekākṣīm ekakarṇāṃ ca karṇaprāvaraṇāṃ tathā 5.020.031c gokarṇīṃ hastikarṇīṃ ca lambakarṇīm akarṇikām 5.020.032a hastipadya śvapadyau ca gopadīṃ pādacūlikām 5.020.032c ekākṣīm ekapādīṃ ca pṛthupādīm apādikām 5.020.033a atimātraśirogrīvām atimātrakucodarīm 5.020.033c atimātrāsyanetrāṃ ca dīrghajihvām ajihvikām
GE09ram_1-7u:13530: 5.020.034a yathā madvaśagā sītā kṣipraṃ bhavati jānakī
GE09ram_1-7u:13531: 5.020.034c tathā kuruta rākṣasyaḥ sarvāḥ kṣipraṃ sametya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:13534: 5.020.036a iti pratisamādiśya rākṣasendraḥ punaḥ punaḥ 5.020.036c kāmamanyuparītātmā jānakīṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:13535: 5.020.037a upagamya tataḥ kṣipraṃ rākṣasī dhānyamālinī 5.020.037c pariṣvajya daśagrīvam idaṃ vacanam abravīt 5.020.038a mayā krīḍa mahārājasītayā kiṃ tavānayā 5.020.038c akāmāṃ kāmayānasya śarīram upatapyate
GE09ram_1-7u:13536: 5.020.038e icchantīṃ kāmayānasya prītir bhavati śobhanā 5.020.039a evam uktas tu rākṣasyā samutkṣiptas tato balī
GE09ram_1-7u:13538: 5.020.040a devagandharvakanyāś ca nāgakanyāś ca tās tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13539: 5.020.040c parivārya daśagrīvaṃ viviśus tad gṛhottamam 5.020.041a sa maithilīṃ dharmaparām avasthitāṃ; pravepamānāṃ paribhartsya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13540: 5.020.041c vihāya sītāṃ madanena mohitaḥ; svam eva veśma praviveśa bhāsvaram 5.021.001a ity uktvā maithilīṃ rājā rāvaṇaḥ śatrurāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13541: 5.021.001c saṃdiśya ca tataḥ sarvā rākṣasīr nirjagāma ha
GE09ram_1-7u:13542: 5.021.002a niṣkrānte rākṣasendre tu punar antaḥpuraṃ gate
GE09ram_1-7u:13543: 5.021.002c rākṣasyo bhīmarūpās tāḥ sītāṃ samabhidudruvuḥ 5.021.003a tataḥ sītām upāgamya rākṣasyaḥ krodhamūrchitāḥ 5.021.003c paraṃ paruṣayā vācā vaidehīm idam abruvan
GE09ram_1-7u:13545: 5.021.004c daśagrīvasya bhāryātvaṃ sīte na bahu manyase
GE09ram_1-7u:13546: 5.021.005a tatas tv ekajaṭā nāma rākṣasī vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:13548: 5.021.006a prajāpatīnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ tu caturtho yaḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13549: 5.021.006c mānaso brahmaṇaḥ putraḥ pulastya iti viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13550: 5.021.007a pulastyasya tu tejasvī maharṣir mānasaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13551: 5.021.007c nāmnā sa viśravā nāma prajāpatisamaprabhaḥ 5.021.008a tasya putro viśālākṣi rāvaṇaḥ śatrurāvaṇaḥ 5.021.008c tasya tvaṃ rākṣasendrasya bhāryā bhavitum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:13552: 5.021.008e mayoktaṃ cārusarvāṅgi vākyaṃ kiṃ nānumanyase 5.021.009a tato harijaṭā nāma rākṣasī vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:13554: 5.021.010a yena devās trayastriṃśad devarājaś ca nirjitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13555: 5.021.010c tasya tvaṃ rākṣasendrasya bhāryā bhavitum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:13557: 5.021.011c balino vīryayuktasyā bhāryātvaṃ kiṃ na lapsyase
GE09ram_1-7u:13558: 5.021.012a priyāṃ bahumatāṃ bhāryāṃ tyaktvā rājā mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13559: 5.021.012c sarvāsāṃ ca mahābhāgāṃ tvām upaiṣyati rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13561: 5.021.013c antaḥpuraṃ samutsṛjya tvām upaiṣyati rāvaṇaḥ 5.021.014a asakṛd devatā yuddhe
GE09ram_1-7u:13562: 5.021.014c nirjitāḥ samare yena sa te pārśvam upāgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13565: 5.021.016a yasya sūryo na tapati bhīto yasya ca mārutaḥ 5.021.016c na vāti smāyatāpāṅge kiṃ tvaṃ tasya na tiṣṭhasi 5.021.017a puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ ca taravo mumucur yasya vai bhayāt
GE09ram_1-7u:13566: 5.021.017c śailāś ca subhru pānīyaṃ jaladāś ca yadecchati
GE09ram_1-7u:13568: 5.021.018c kiṃ tvaṃ na kuruṣe buddhiṃ bhāryārthe rāvaṇasya hi 5.021.019a sādhu te tattvato devi kathitaṃ sādhu bhāmini
GE09ram_1-7u:13569: 5.021.019c gṛhāṇa susmite vākyam anyathā na bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:13570: 5.022.001a tataḥ sītām upāgamya rākṣasyo vikṛtānanāḥ 5.022.001c paruṣaṃ paruṣā nārya ūcus tā vākyam apriyam
GE09ram_1-7u:13571: 5.022.002a kiṃ tvam antaḥpure sīte sarvabhūtamanohare 5.022.002c mahārhaśayanopete na vāsam
GE09ram_1-7u:13572: 5.022.003a mānuṣī mānuṣasyaiva bhāryātvaṃ bahu manyase 5.022.003c pratyāhara mano rāmān na tvaṃ jātu bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:13573: 5.022.004a mānuṣī mānuṣaṃ taṃ tu rāmam icchasi śobhane
GE09ram_1-7u:13574: 5.022.004c rājyād bhraṣṭam asiddhārthaṃ viklavaṃ tam anindite
GE09ram_1-7u:13575: 5.022.005a rākṣasīnāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā sītā padmanibhekṣaṇā 5.022.005c netrābhyām aśrupūrṇābhyām idaṃ vacanam abravīt 5.022.006a yad idaṃ lokavidviṣṭam udāharatha saṃgatāḥ 5.022.006c naitan manasi vākyaṃ me kilbiṣaṃ pratitiṣṭhati
GE09ram_1-7u:13576: 5.022.007a na mānuṣī rākṣasasya bhāryā bhavitum arhati
GE09ram_1-7u:13577: 5.022.007c kāmaṃ khādata māṃ sarvā na kariṣyāmi vo vacaḥ 5.022.007e dīno vā rājyahīno vā yo me bhartā sa me guruḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13578: 5.022.008a sītāyā vacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasyaḥ krodhamūrchitāḥ 5.022.008c bhartsayanti sma paruṣair vākyai rāvaṇacoditāḥ 5.022.009a avalīnaḥ sa nirvākyo hanumāñ śiṃśapādrume 5.022.009c sītāṃ saṃtarjayantīs tā rākṣasīr aśṛṇot kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13579: 5.022.010a tām abhikramya saṃrabdhā vepamānāṃ samantataḥ 5.022.010c bhṛśaṃ saṃlilihur dīptān
GE09ram_1-7u:13580: 5.022.011a ūcuś ca paramakruddhāḥ pragṛhyāśu paraśvadhān 5.022.011c neyam arhati bhartāraṃ rāvaṇaṃ rākṣasādhipam 5.022.012a sā bhartsyamānā bhīmābhī rākṣasībhir varānanā 5.022.012c sā bāṣpam apamārjantī śiṃśapāṃ tām upāgamat
GE09ram_1-7u:13581: 5.022.013a tatas tāṃ śiṃśapāṃ sītā rākṣasībhiḥ samāvṛtā
GE09ram_1-7u:13584: 5.022.014c bhartsayāṃ cakrire bhīmā rākṣasyas tāḥ samantataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13585: 5.022.015a tatas tāṃ vinatā nāma rākṣasī bhīmadarśanā
GE09ram_1-7u:13587: 5.022.016a sīte paryāptam etāvad bhartṛsneho nidarśitaḥ 5.022.016c sarvatrātikṛtaṃ bhadre
GE09ram_1-7u:13588: 5.022.017a parituṣṭāsmi bhadraṃ te mānuṣas te kṛto vidhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13589: 5.022.017c mamāpi tu vacaḥ pathyaṃ bruvantyāḥ kuru maithili
GE09ram_1-7u:13590: 5.022.018a rāvaṇaṃ bhaja bhartāraṃ bhartāraṃ sarvarakṣasām 5.022.018c vikrāntaṃ rūpavantaṃ ca sureśam iva vāsavam
GE09ram_1-7u:13591: 5.022.019a dakṣiṇaṃ tyāgaśīlaṃ ca sarvasya priyavādinam 5.022.019c mānuṣaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ rāmaṃ tyaktvā rāvaṇam āśraya
GE09ram_1-7u:13593: 5.022.020c adya prabhṛti sarveṣāṃ lokānām īśvarī bhava
GE09ram_1-7u:13594: 5.022.020e agneḥ svāhā yathā devī śacīvendrasya śobhane
GE09ram_1-7u:13595: 5.022.021a kiṃ te rāmeṇa vaidehi kṛpaṇena gatāyuṣā
GE09ram_1-7u:13596: 5.022.022a etad uktaṃ ca me vākyaṃ yadi tvaṃ na kariṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:13597: 5.022.022c asmin muhūrte sarvās tvāṃ bhakṣayiṣyāmahe vayam
GE09ram_1-7u:13598: 5.022.023a anyā tu vikaṭā nāma lambamānapayodharā 5.022.023c abravīt kupitā sītāṃ muṣṭim udyamya garjatī
GE09ram_1-7u:13600: 5.022.024c anukrośān mṛdutvāc ca soḍhāni tava maithili
GE09ram_1-7u:13601: 5.022.024e na ca naḥ kuruṣe vākyaṃ hitaṃ kālapuraskṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:13602: 5.022.025a ānītāsi samudrasya pāram anyair durāsadam 5.022.025c rāvaṇāntaḥpuraṃ ghoraṃ praviṣṭā cāsi maithili 5.022.026a rāvaṇasya gṛhe rudhā asmābhis tu surakṣitā
GE09ram_1-7u:13603: 5.022.026c na tvāṃ śaktaḥ paritrātum api sākṣāt puraṃdaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13604: 5.022.027a kuruṣva hitavādinyā vacanaṃ mama maithili 5.022.027c alam aśruprapātena tyaja śokam anarthakam 5.022.028a bhaja prītiṃ praharṣaṃ ca tyajaitāṃ nityadainyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:13605: 5.022.028c sīte rākṣasarājena saha krīḍa yathāsukham 5.022.029a jānāsi hi yathā bhīru strīṇāṃ yauvanam adhruvam
GE09ram_1-7u:13606: 5.022.029c yāvan na te vyatikrāmet tāvat sukham avāpnuhi
GE09ram_1-7u:13607: 5.022.030a udyānāni ca ramyāṇi parvatopavanāni ca 5.022.030c saha rākṣasarājena cara tvaṃ madirekṣaṇe 5.022.031a strīsahasrāṇi te sapta vaśe sthāsyanti sundari
GE09ram_1-7u:13608: 5.022.031c rāvaṇaṃ bhaja bhartāraṃ bhartāraṃ sarvarakṣasām 5.022.032a utpāṭya vā te hṛdayaṃ bhakṣayiṣyāmi maithili
GE09ram_1-7u:13609: 5.022.032c yadi me vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ na yathāvat kariṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:13610: 5.022.033a tataś caṇḍodarī nāma rākṣasī krūradarśanā 5.022.033c bhrāmayantī mahac chūlam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:13612: 5.022.034c rāvaṇena hṛtāṃ dṛṣṭvā daurhṛdo me mahān abhūt
GE09ram_1-7u:13613: 5.022.035a yakṛtplīham athotpīḍaṃ hṛdayaṃ ca sabandhanam 5.022.035c antrāṇy api tathā śīrṣaṃ khādeyam iti me matiḥ 5.022.036a tatas tu praghasā nāma rākṣasī vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:13614: 5.022.036c kaṇṭham asyā nṛśaṃsāyāḥ pīḍayāmaḥ kim āsyate
GE09ram_1-7u:13615: 5.022.037a nivedyatāṃ tato rājñe mānuṣī sā mṛteti ha
GE09ram_1-7u:13616: 5.022.037c nātra kaś cana saṃdehaḥ khādateti sa vakṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:13617: 5.022.038a tatas tv ajāmukhī nāma rākṣasī vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:13618: 5.022.038c viśasyemāṃ tataḥ sarvān samān kuruta pīlukān
GE09ram_1-7u:13619: 5.022.039a vibhajāma tataḥ sarvā vivādo me na rocate
GE09ram_1-7u:13620: 5.022.039c peyam ānīyatāṃ kṣipraṃ mālyaṃ ca vividhaṃ bahu
GE09ram_1-7u:13621: 5.022.040a tataḥ śūrpaṇakhā nāma rākṣasī vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:13622: 5.022.040c ajāmukhā yad uktaṃ hi tad eva mama rocate 5.022.041a surā cānīyatāṃ kṣipraṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:13624: 5.022.042a evaṃ saṃbhartsyamānā sā sītā surasutopamā 5.022.042c rākṣasībhiḥ sughorābhir dhairyam utsṛjya roditi 5.023.001a tathā tāsāṃ vadantīnāṃ paruṣaṃ dāruṇaṃ bahu
GE09ram_1-7u:13626: 5.023.002a evam uktā tu vaidehī rākṣasībhir manasvinī
GE09ram_1-7u:13628: 5.023.003a na mānuṣī rākṣasasya bhāryā bhavitum arhati
GE09ram_1-7u:13629: 5.023.003c kāmaṃ khādata māṃ sarvā na kariṣyāmi vo vacaḥ 5.023.004a sā rākṣasī madhyagatā sītā surasutopamā 5.023.004c na śarma lebhe duḥkhārtā rāvaṇena ca tarjitā
GE09ram_1-7u:13630: 5.023.005a vepate smādhikaṃ sītā viśantīvāṅgam ātmanaḥ 5.023.005c vane yūthaparibhraṣṭā mṛgī kokair ivārditā 5.023.006a sā tv aśokasya vipulāṃ śākhām ālambya puṣpitām
GE09ram_1-7u:13631: 5.023.006c cintayām āsa śokena bhartāraṃ bhagnamānasā 5.023.007a sā snāpayantī vipulau stanau netrajalasravaiḥ 5.023.007c cintayantī na śokasya tadāntam adhigacchati 5.023.008a sā vepamānā patitā pravāte kadalī yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:13633: 5.023.009a tasyā sā dīrghavipulā vepantyāḥ sītayā tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:13634: 5.023.009c dadṛśe kampinī veṇī vyālīva parisarpatī 5.023.010a sā niḥśvasantī duḥkhārtā
GE09ram_1-7u:13635: 5.023.010c ārtā vyasṛjad aśrūṇi maithilī vilalāpa ha
GE09ram_1-7u:13636: 5.023.011a hā rāmeti ca duḥkhārtā punar hā lakṣmaṇeti ca 5.023.011c hā śvaśru mama kausalye hā sumitreti bhāvini
GE09ram_1-7u:13637: 5.023.012a lokapravādaḥ satyo 'yaṃ paṇḍitaiḥ samudāhṛtaḥ 5.023.012c akāle durlabho mṛtyuḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā
GE09ram_1-7u:13638: 5.023.013a yatrāham ābhiḥ krūrābhī rākṣasībhir ihārditā 5.023.013c jīvāmi hīnā rāmeṇa muhūrtam api duḥkhitā
GE09ram_1-7u:13640: 5.023.014c samudramadhye nau pūrṇā vāyuvegair ivāhatā 5.023.015a bhartāraṃ tam apaśyantī rākṣasīvaśam āgatā 5.023.015c sīdāmi khalu śokena kūlaṃ toyahataṃ yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:13642: 5.023.016c dhanyāḥ paśyanti me nāthaṃ kṛtajñaṃ priyavādinam
GE09ram_1-7u:13643: 5.023.017a sarvathā tena hīnāyā rāmeṇa viditātmanā 5.023.017c tīṣkṇaṃ viṣam ivāsvādya durlabhaṃ mama jīvitam
GE09ram_1-7u:13644: 5.023.018a kīdṛśaṃ tu mayā pāpaṃ purā dehāntare kṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:13645: 5.023.018c yenedaṃ prāpyate duḥkhaṃ mayā ghoraṃ sudāruṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:13646: 5.023.019a jīvitaṃ tyaktum icchāmi śokena mahatā vṛtā
GE09ram_1-7u:13647: 5.023.019c rākṣasībhiś ca rakṣantyā rāmo nāsādyate mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:13648: 5.023.020a dhig astu khalu mānuṣyaṃ dhig astu paravaśyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:13649: 5.023.020c na śakyaṃ yat parityaktum ātmacchandena jīvitam
GE09ram_1-7u:13655: 5.024.003c rāvaṇena pramathyāham ānītā krośatī balāt 5.024.004a rākṣasī vaśam āpannā bhartyamānā sudāruṇam 5.024.004c cintayantī suduḥkhārtā nāhaṃ jīvitum utsahe 5.024.005a na hi me jīvitenārtho naivārthair na ca bhūṣaṇaiḥ 5.024.005c vasantyā rākṣasī madhye vinā rāmaṃ mahāratham
GE09ram_1-7u:13656: 5.024.006a dhiṅ mām anāryām asatīṃ yāhaṃ tena vinā kṛtā 5.024.006c muhūrtam api rakṣāmi jīvitaṃ pāpajīvitā 5.024.007a kā ca me jīvite śraddhā sukhe vā taṃ priyaṃ vinā
GE09ram_1-7u:13657: 5.024.007c bhartāraṃ sāgarāntāyā vasudhāyāḥ priyaṃ vadam 5.024.008a bhidyatāṃ bhakṣyatāṃ vāpi śarīraṃ visṛjāmy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:13658: 5.024.008c na cāpy ahaṃ ciraṃ duḥkhaṃ saheyaṃ priyavarjitā
GE09ram_1-7u:13659: 5.024.009a caraṇenāpi savyena na spṛśeyaṃ niśācaram 5.024.009c rāvaṇaṃ kiṃ punar ahaṃ kāmayeyaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:13660: 5.024.010a pratyākhyātaṃ na jānāti nātmānaṃ nātmanaḥ kulam
GE09ram_1-7u:13661: 5.024.010c yo nṛśaṃsa svabhāvena māṃ prārthayitum icchati
GE09ram_1-7u:13662: 5.024.011a chinnā bhinnā vibhaktā vā dīpte vāgnau pradīpitā
GE09ram_1-7u:13663: 5.024.011c rāvaṇaṃ nopatiṣṭheyaṃ kiṃ pralāpena vaś ciram
GE09ram_1-7u:13664: 5.024.012a khyātaḥ prājñaḥ kṛtajñaś ca sānukrośaś ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13667: 5.024.013c yenaikena nirastāni sa māṃ kiṃ nābhipadyate
GE09ram_1-7u:13669: 5.024.014c samarthaḥ khalu me bhartā rāvaṇaṃ hantum āhave
GE09ram_1-7u:13671: 5.024.015c raṇe rāmeṇa nihataḥ sa māṃ kiṃ nābhipadyate
GE09ram_1-7u:13672: 5.024.016a kāmaṃ madhye samudrasya laṅkeyaṃ duṣpradharṣaṇā 5.024.016c na tu rāghavabāṇānāṃ gatirodhī ha vidyate
GE09ram_1-7u:13673: 5.024.017a kiṃ nu tat kāraṇaṃ yena rāmo dṛḍhaparākramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13675: 5.024.018a ihasthāṃ māṃ na jānīte śaṅke lakṣmaṇapūrvajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13676: 5.024.018c jānann api hi tejasvī dharṣaṇāṃ marṣayiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:13679: 5.024.020a kṛtaṃ karma mahat tena māṃ tadābhyavapadyatā
GE09ram_1-7u:13681: 5.024.021a yadi mām iha jānīyād vartamānāṃ sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13682: 5.024.021c adya bāṇair abhikruddhaḥ kuryāl lokam arākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:13683: 5.024.022a vidhamec ca purīṃ laṅkāṃ śoṣayec ca mahodadhim
GE09ram_1-7u:13684: 5.024.022c rāvaṇasya ca nīcasya kīrtiṃ nāma ca nāśayet
GE09ram_1-7u:13685: 5.024.023a tato nihatanathānāṃ rākṣasīnāṃ gṛhe gṛhe 5.024.023c yathāham evaṃ rudatī tathā bhūyo na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13686: 5.024.023e anviṣya rakṣasāṃ laṅkāṃ kuryād rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13687: 5.024.024a na hi tābhyāṃ ripur dṛṣṭo muhūtam api jīvati 5.024.024c citā dhūmākulapathā
GE09ram_1-7u:13688: 5.024.024e acireṇa tu laṅkeyaṃ śmaśānasadṛśī bhavet 5.024.025a acireṇaiva kālena prāpsyāmy eva manoratham 5.024.025c duṣprasthāno 'yam ākhyāti sarveṣāṃ vo viparyayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13689: 5.024.026a yādṛśāni tu dṛśyante laṅkāyām aśubhāni tu
GE09ram_1-7u:13691: 5.024.027a nūnaṃ laṅkā hate pāpe rāvaṇe rākṣasādhipe
GE09ram_1-7u:13692: 5.024.027c śoṣaṃ yāsyati durdharṣā pramadā vidhavā yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:13694: 5.024.028c bhaviṣyati purī laṅkā naṣṭabhartrī yathāṅganā 5.024.029a nūnaṃ rākṣasakanyānāṃ rudantīnāṃ gṛhe gṛhe 5.024.029c śroṣyāmi nacirād eva duḥkhārtānām iha dhvanim
GE09ram_1-7u:13696: 5.024.030c bhaviṣyati purī laṅkā nirdagdhā rāmasāyakaiḥ 5.024.031a yadi nāma sa śūro māṃ rāmo raktāntalocanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13697: 5.024.031c jānīyād vartamānāṃ hi rāvaṇasya niveśane 5.024.032a anena tu nṛśaṃsena rāvaṇenādhamena me 5.024.032c samayo yas tu nirdiṣṭas tasya kālo 'yam āgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13698: 5.024.033a akāryaṃ ye na jānanti nairṛtāḥ pāpakāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13699: 5.024.033c adharmāt tu mahotpāto bhaviṣyati hi sāmpratam
GE09ram_1-7u:13700: 5.024.034a naite dharmaṃ vijānanti rākṣasāḥ piśitāśanāḥ 5.024.034c dhruvaṃ māṃ prātarāśārthe rākṣasaḥ kalpayiṣyati 5.024.035a sāhaṃ kathaṃ kariṣyāmi taṃ vinā priyadarśanam
GE09ram_1-7u:13702: 5.024.036a yadi kaś cit pradātā me viṣasyādya bhaved iha 5.024.036c kṣipraṃ vaivasvataṃ devaṃ paśyeyaṃ patinā vinā
GE09ram_1-7u:13703: 5.024.037a nājānāj jīvatīṃ rāmaḥ sa māṃ lakṣmaṇapūrvajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13704: 5.024.037c jānantau tau na kuryātāṃ norvyāṃ hi mama mārgaṇam 5.024.038a nūnaṃ mamaiva śokena sa vīro lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13705: 5.024.038c devalokam ito yātas tyaktvā dehaṃ mahītale
GE09ram_1-7u:13706: 5.024.039a dhanyā devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13707: 5.024.039c mama paśyanti ye nāthaṃ rāmaṃ rājīvalocanam
GE09ram_1-7u:13708: 5.024.040a atha vā na hi tasyārthe dharmakāmasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13709: 5.024.040c mayā rāmasya rājarṣer bhāryayā paramātmanaḥ 5.024.041a dṛśyamāne bhavet prītaḥ sauhṛdaṃ nāsty apaśyataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13710: 5.024.041c nāśayanti kṛtaghrās tu na rāmo nāśayiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:13711: 5.024.042a kiṃ nu me na guṇāḥ ke cit kiṃ vā bhāgya kṣayo hi me
GE09ram_1-7u:13712: 5.024.042c yāhaṃ sītā varārheṇa hīnā rāmeṇa bhāminī
GE09ram_1-7u:13713: 5.024.043a śreyo me jīvitān martuṃ vihīnā yā mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:13715: 5.024.044a atha vā nyastaśastrau tau vane mūlaphalāśanau
GE09ram_1-7u:13716: 5.024.044c bhrātarau hi nara śreṣṭhau carantau vanagocarau
GE09ram_1-7u:13717: 5.024.045a atha vā rākṣasendreṇa rāvaṇena durātmanā 5.024.045c chadmanā ghātitau śūrau bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau 5.024.046a sāham evaṃgate kāle martum icchāmi sarvathā
GE09ram_1-7u:13718: 5.024.046c na ca me vihito mṛtyur asmin duḥkhe 'pi vartati
GE09ram_1-7u:13719: 5.024.047a dhanyāḥ khalu mahātmāno munayaḥ satyasaṃmatāḥ 5.024.047c jitātmāno mahābhāgā yeṣāṃ na staḥ priyāpriye
GE09ram_1-7u:13720: 5.024.048a priyān na saṃbhaved duḥkham apriyād adhikaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_1-7u:13721: 5.024.048c tābhyāṃ hi ye viyujyante namas teṣāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_1-7u:13722: 5.024.049a sāhaṃ tyaktā priyeṇeha rāmeṇa viditātmanā 5.024.049c prāṇāṃs tyakṣyāmi pāpasya rāvaṇasya gatā vaśam
GE09ram_1-7u:13723: 5.025.001a ity uktāḥ sītayā ghoraṃ rākṣasyaḥ krodhamūrchitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13724: 5.025.001c kāś cij jagmus tad ākhyātuṃ rāvaṇasya tarasvinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13725: 5.025.002a tataḥ sītām upāgamya rākṣasyo ghoradarśanāḥ 5.025.002c punaḥ paruṣam ekārtham anarthārtham athābruvan 5.025.003a hantedānīṃ tavānārye sīte pāpaviniścaye
GE09ram_1-7u:13726: 5.025.003c rākṣasyo bhakṣayiṣyanti māṃsam etad yathāsukham 5.025.004a sītāṃ tābhir anāryābhir dṛṣṭvā saṃtarjitāṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:13727: 5.025.004c rākṣasī trijaṭāvṛddhā śayānā vākyam abravīt 5.025.005a ātmānaṃ khādatānāryā na sītāṃ bhakṣayiṣyatha 5.025.005c janakasya sutām iṣṭāṃ snuṣāṃ daśarathasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:13728: 5.025.006a svapno hy adya mayā dṛṣṭo dāruṇo romaharṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13729: 5.025.006c rākṣasānām abhāvāya bhartur asyā bhavāya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:13730: 5.025.007a evam uktās trijaṭayā rākṣasyaḥ krodhamūrchitāḥ 5.025.007c sarvā evābruvan bhītās trijaṭāṃ tām idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13731: 5.025.008a kathayasva tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ svapne 'yaṃ kīdṛśo niśi 5.025.009a tāsāṃ śrutvā tu vacanaṃ rākṣasīnāṃ mukhodgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:13734: 5.025.010c yuktāṃ vājisahasreṇa svayam āsthāya rāghavaḥ 5.025.011a svapne cādya mayā dṛṣṭā sītā śuklāmbarāvṛtā
GE09ram_1-7u:13736: 5.025.011e rāmeṇa saṃgatā sītā bhāskareṇa prabhā yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:13737: 5.025.012a rāghavaś ca mayā dṛṣṭaś caturdantaṃ mahāgajam
GE09ram_1-7u:13739: 5.025.013a tatas tau naraśārdūlau dīpyamānau svatejasā 5.025.013c śuklamālyāmbaradharau jānakīṃ paryupasthitau
GE09ram_1-7u:13740: 5.025.014a tatas tasya nagasyāgre ākāśasthasya dantinaḥ 5.025.014c bhartrā parigṛhītasya jānakī skandham āśritā 5.025.015a bhartur aṅkāt samutpatya tataḥ kamalalocanā 5.025.015c candrasūryau mayā dṛṣṭā pāṇibhyāṃ parimārjatī 5.025.016a tatas tābhyāṃ kumārābhyām āsthitaḥ sa gajottamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13741: 5.025.016c sītayā ca viśālākṣyā laṅkāyā upari sthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13744: 5.025.017e lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā sītayā saha bhāryayā
GE09ram_1-7u:13745: 5.025.018a vimānāt puṣpakād adya rāvaṇaḥ patito bhuvi
GE09ram_1-7u:13746: 5.025.018c kṛṣyapāṇaḥ striyā dṛṣṭo muṇḍaḥ kṛṣṇāmbaraḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13748: 5.025.019c prayāto dakṣiṇām āśāṃ praviṣṭaḥ kardamaṃ hradam
GE09ram_1-7u:13749: 5.025.020a kaṇṭhe baddhvā daśagrīvaṃ pramadā raktavāsinī 5.025.020c kālī kardamaliptāṅgī diśaṃ yāmyāṃ prakarṣati 5.025.021a varāheṇa daśagrīvaḥ śiṃśumāreṇa cendrajit
GE09ram_1-7u:13750: 5.025.021c uṣṭreṇa kumbhakarṇaś ca prayāto dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE09ram_1-7u:13751: 5.025.022a samājaś ca mahān vṛtto gītavāditraniḥsvanaḥ 5.025.022c pibatāṃ raktamālyānāṃ rakṣasāṃ raktavāsasām
GE09ram_1-7u:13752: 5.025.023a laṅkā ceyaṃ purī ramyā savājirathasaṃkulā 5.025.023c sāgare patitā dṛṣṭā bhagnagopuratoraṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:13753: 5.025.024a pītva tailaṃ pranṛttāś ca prahasantyo mahāsvanāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13756: 5.025.025c raktaṃ nivasanaṃ gṛhya praviṣṭā gomayahrade 5.025.026a apagacchata naśyadhvaṃ sītām āpnoti rāghavaḥ 5.025.026c ghātayet paramāmarṣī sarvaiḥ sārdhaṃ hi rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13757: 5.025.027a priyāṃ bahumatāṃ bhāryāṃ vanavāsam anuvratām 5.025.027c bhartsitāṃ tarjitāṃ vāpi nānumaṃsyati rāghavaḥ 5.025.028a tad alaṃ krūravākyair vaḥ sāntvam evābhidhīyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:13758: 5.025.028c abhiyācāma vaidehīm etad dhi mama rocate
GE09ram_1-7u:13759: 5.025.029a yasyā hy evaṃ vidhaḥ svapno duḥkhitāyāḥ pradṛśyate
GE09ram_1-7u:13760: 5.025.029c sā duḥkhair bahubhir muktā priyaṃ prāpnoty anuttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:13761: 5.025.030a bhartsitām api yācadhvaṃ rākṣasyaḥ kiṃ vivakṣayā
GE09ram_1-7u:13762: 5.025.030c rāghavād dhi bhayaṃ ghoraṃ rākṣasānām upasthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:13763: 5.025.031a praṇipāta prasannā hi maithilī janakātmajā 5.025.031c alam eṣā paritrātuṃ rākṣasyo mahato bhayāt
GE09ram_1-7u:13764: 5.025.032a api cāsyā viśālākṣyā na kiṃ cid upalakṣaye
GE09ram_1-7u:13765: 5.025.032c viruddham api cāṅgeṣu susūkṣmam api lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:13766: 5.025.033a chāyā vaiguṇya mātraṃ tu śaṅke duḥkham upasthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:13767: 5.025.033c aduḥkhārhām imāṃ devīṃ vaihāyasam upasthitām 5.025.034a arthasiddhiṃ tu vaidehyāḥ paśyāmy aham upasthitām
GE09ram_1-7u:13768: 5.025.034c rākṣasendravināśaṃ ca vijayaṃ rāghavasya ca 5.025.035a nimittabhūtam etat tu śrotum asyā mahat priyam
GE09ram_1-7u:13769: 5.025.035c dṛśyate ca sphurac cakṣuḥ padmapatram ivāyatam
GE09ram_1-7u:13770: 5.025.036a īṣac ca hṛṣito vāsyā dakṣiṇāyā hy adakṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13771: 5.025.036c akasmād eva vaidehyā bāhur ekaḥ prakampate
GE09ram_1-7u:13773: 5.025.037c vepan sūcayatīvāsyā rāghavaṃ purataḥ sthitam 5.025.038a pakṣī ca śākhā nilayaṃ praviṣṭaḥ; punaḥ punaś cottamasāntvavādī
GE09ram_1-7u:13774: 5.025.038c sukhāgatāṃ vācam udīrayāṇaḥ; punaḥ punaś codayatīva hṛṣṭaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13775: 5.026.001a sā rākṣasendrasya vaco niśamya; tad rāvaṇasyāpriyam apriyārtā
GE09ram_1-7u:13776: 5.026.001c sītā vitatrāsa yathā vanānte; siṃhābhipannā gajarājakanyā 5.026.002a sā rākṣasī madhyagatā ca bhīrur; vāgbhir bhṛśaṃ rāvaṇatarjitā
GE09ram_1-7u:13778: 5.026.002c kāntāramadhye vijane visṛṣṭā; bāleva kanyā vilalāpa sītā
GE09ram_1-7u:13779: 5.026.003a satyaṃ batedaṃ pravadanti loke; nākālamṛtyur bhavatīti santaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13780: 5.026.003c yatrāham evaṃ paribhartsyamānā; jīvāmi kiṃ cit kṣaṇam apy apuṇyā
GE09ram_1-7u:13781: 5.026.004a sukhād vihīnaṃ bahuduḥkhapūrṇam; idaṃ tu nūnaṃ hṛdayaṃ sthiraṃ me
GE09ram_1-7u:13782: 5.026.004c vidīryate yan na sahasradhādya; vajrāhataṃ śṛṅgam ivācalasya
GE09ram_1-7u:13783: 5.026.005a naivāsti nūnaṃ mama doṣam atra; vadhyāham asyāpriyadarśanasya 5.026.005c bhāvaṃ na cāsyāham anupradātum; alaṃ dvijo mantram ivādvijāya
GE09ram_1-7u:13784: 5.026.006a nūnaṃ mamāṅgāny acirād anāryaḥ; śastraiḥ śitaiś chetsyati
GE09ram_1-7u:13786: 5.026.006c tasminn anāgacchati lokanāthe; garbhasthajantor iva śalyakṛntaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13787: 5.026.007a duḥkhaṃ batedaṃ mama duḥkhitāyā; māsau cirāyābhigamiṣyato dvau
GE09ram_1-7u:13788: 5.026.007c baddhasya vadhyasya yathā niśānte; rājāparādhād iva taskarasya
GE09ram_1-7u:13789: 5.026.008a hā rāma hā lakṣmaṇa hā sumitre; hā rāma mātaḥ saha me jananyā
GE09ram_1-7u:13790: 5.026.008c eṣā vipadyāmy aham alpabhāgyā; mahārṇave naur iva mūḍha vātā 5.026.009a tarasvinau dhārayatā mṛgasya; sattvena rūpaṃ manujendraputrau
GE09ram_1-7u:13791: 5.026.009c nūnaṃ viśastau mama kāraṇāt tau; siṃharṣabhau dvāv iva
GE09ram_1-7u:13793: 5.026.010a nūnaṃ sa kālo mṛgarūpadhārī; mām alpabhāgyāṃ lulubhe tadānīm
GE09ram_1-7u:13794: 5.026.010c yatrāryaputraṃ visasarja mūḍhā; rāmānujaṃ lakṣmaṇapūrvakaṃ ca
GE09ram_1-7u:13795: 5.026.011a hā rāma satyavrata dīrghavāho; hā pūrṇacandrapratimānavaktra 5.026.011c hā jīvalokasya hitaḥ priyaś ca; vadhyāṃ na māṃ vetsi hi rākṣasānām
GE09ram_1-7u:13796: 5.026.012a ananyadevatvam iyaṃ kṣamā ca; bhūmau ca śayyā niyamaś ca dharme
GE09ram_1-7u:13797: 5.026.012c pativratātvaṃ viphalaṃ mamedaṃ; kṛtaṃ kṛtaghneṣv iva mānuṣāṇām
GE09ram_1-7u:13798: 5.026.013a mogho hi dharmaś carito mamāyaṃ; tathaikapatnītvam idaṃ nirartham
GE09ram_1-7u:13799: 5.026.013c yā tvāṃ na paśyāmi kṛśā vivarṇā; hīnā tvayā saṃgamane nirāśā
GE09ram_1-7u:13800: 5.026.014a pitur nirdeśaṃ niyamena kṛtvā; vanān nivṛttaś caritavrataś ca
GE09ram_1-7u:13801: 5.026.014c strībhis tu manye vipulekṣaṇābhiḥ; saṃraṃsyase vītabhayaḥ kṛtārthaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13802: 5.026.015a ahaṃ tu rāma tvayi jātakāmā; ciraṃ vināśāya nibaddhabhāvā
GE09ram_1-7u:13803: 5.026.015c moghaṃ caritvātha tapovrataṃ ca; tyakṣyāmi dhig jīvitam
GE09ram_1-7u:13805: 5.026.016a sā jīvitaṃ kṣipram ahaṃ tyajeyaṃ; viṣeṇa śastreṇa śitena vāpi
GE09ram_1-7u:13806: 5.026.016c viṣasya dātā na tu me 'sti kaś cic; chastrasya vā veśmani
GE09ram_1-7u:13808: 5.026.017a śokābhitaptā bahudhā vicintya; sītātha veṇyudgrathanaṃ gṛhītvā
GE09ram_1-7u:13809: 5.026.017c udbadhya veṇyudgrathanena śīghram; ahaṃ gamiṣyāmi yamasya mūlam
GE09ram_1-7u:13810: 5.026.018a itīva sītā bahudhā vilapya; sarvātmanā rāmam anusmarantī
GE09ram_1-7u:13812: 5.026.019a upasthitā sā mṛdur sarvagātrī; śākhāṃ gṛhītvātha nagasya tasya
GE09ram_1-7u:13813: 5.026.019c tasyās tu rāmaṃ pravicintayantyā; rāmānujaṃ svaṃ ca kulaṃ śubhāṅgyāḥ 5.026.020a śokānimittāni tadā bahūni; dhairyārjitāni pravarāṇi loke
GE09ram_1-7u:13814: 5.026.020c prādurnimittāni tadā babhūvuḥ; purāpi siddhāny upalakṣitāni
GE09ram_1-7u:13815: 5.027.001a tathāgatāṃ tāṃ vyathitām aninditāṃ; vyapetaharṣāṃ paridīnamānasām 5.027.001c śubhāṃ nimittāni śubhāni bhejire; naraṃ śriyā juṣṭam
GE09ram_1-7u:13817: 5.027.002a tasyāḥ śubhaṃ vāmam arālapakṣma; rājīvṛtaṃ kṛṣṇaviśālaśuklam 5.027.002c prāspandataikaṃ nayanaṃ sukeśyā; mīnāhataṃ padmam ivābhitāmram
GE09ram_1-7u:13818: 5.027.003a bhujaś ca cārvañcitapīnavṛttaḥ; parārdhya kālāgurucandanārhaḥ 5.027.003c anuttamenādhyuṣitaḥ priyeṇa; cireṇa vāmaḥ samavepatāśu
GE09ram_1-7u:13819: 5.027.004a gajendrahastapratimaś ca pīnas; tayor dvayoḥ saṃhatayoḥ sujātaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13820: 5.027.004c praspandamānaḥ punar ūrur asyā; rāmaṃ purastāt sthitam ācacakṣe
GE09ram_1-7u:13821: 5.027.005a śubhaṃ punar hemasamānavarṇam; īṣadrajodhvastam ivāmalākṣyāḥ 5.027.005c vāsaḥ sthitāyāḥ śikharāgradantyāḥ; kiṃ cit parisraṃsata
GE09ram_1-7u:13823: 5.027.006a etair nimittair aparaiś ca subhrūḥ; saṃbodhitā prāg api
GE09ram_1-7u:13825: 5.027.006c vātātapaklāntam iva pranaṣṭaṃ; varṣeṇa bījaṃ pratisaṃjaharṣa
GE09ram_1-7u:13826: 5.027.007a tasyāḥ punar bimbaphalopamauṣṭhaṃ; svakṣibhrukeśāntam arālapakṣma 5.027.007c vaktraṃ babhāse sitaśukladaṃṣṭraṃ; rāhor mukhāc candra iva pramuktaḥ 5.027.008a sā vītaśokā vyapanītatandrī; śāntajvarā harṣavibuddhasattvā 5.027.008c aśobhatāryā vadanena śukle; śītānśunā rātrir ivoditena
GE09ram_1-7u:13827: 5.028.001a hanumān api vikrāntaḥ sarvaṃ śuśrāva tattvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13828: 5.028.001c sītāyās trijaṭāyāś ca rākṣasīnāṃ ca tarjanam
GE09ram_1-7u:13829: 5.028.002a avekṣamāṇas tāṃ devīṃ devatām iva nandane
GE09ram_1-7u:13830: 5.028.002c tato bahuvidhāṃ cintāṃ cintayām āsa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13831: 5.028.003a yāṃ kapīnāṃ sahasrāṇi subahūny ayutāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:13832: 5.028.003c dikṣu sarvāsu mārgante seyam āsāditā mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:13833: 5.028.004a cāreṇa tu suyuktena śatroḥ śaktim avekṣitā
GE09ram_1-7u:13834: 5.028.004c gūḍhena caratā tāvad avekṣitam idaṃ mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:13835: 5.028.005a rākṣasānāṃ viśeṣaś ca purī ceyam avekṣitā
GE09ram_1-7u:13836: 5.028.005c rākṣasādhipater asya prabhāvo rāvaṇasya ca 5.028.006a yuktaṃ tasyāprameyasya
GE09ram_1-7u:13839: 5.028.007c adṛṣṭaduḥkhāṃ duḥkhasya na hy antam adhigacchatīm
GE09ram_1-7u:13840: 5.028.008a yadi hy aham imāṃ devīṃ śokopahatacetanām
GE09ram_1-7u:13841: 5.028.008c anāśvāsya gamiṣyāmi doṣavad gamanaṃ bhavet 5.028.009a gate hi mayi tatreyaṃ rājaputrī yaśasvinī
GE09ram_1-7u:13842: 5.028.009c paritrāṇam avindantī jānakī jīvitaṃ tyajet 5.028.010a mayā ca sa mahābāhuḥ pūrṇacandranibhānanaḥ 5.028.010c samāśvāsayituṃ nyāyyaḥ sītādarśanalālasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13844: 5.028.011c kathaṃ nu khalu kartavyam idaṃ kṛcchra gato hy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:13845: 5.028.012a anena rātriśeṣeṇa yadi nāśvāsyate mayā 5.028.012c sarvathā nāsti saṃdehaḥ parityakṣyati jīvitam 5.028.013a rāmaś ca yadi pṛcchen māṃ kiṃ māṃ sītābravīd vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13846: 5.028.013c kim ahaṃ taṃ pratibrūyām asaṃbhāṣya sumadhyamām
GE09ram_1-7u:13847: 5.028.014a sītāsaṃdeśarahitaṃ mām itas tvarayā gatam 5.028.014c nirdahed api kākutsthaḥ kruddhas tīvreṇa cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_1-7u:13848: 5.028.015a yadi ced yojayiṣyāmi bhartāraṃ rāmakāraṇāt 5.028.015c vyartham āgamanaṃ tasya sasainyasya bhaviṣyati 5.028.016a antaraṃ tv aham āsādya rākṣasīnām iha sthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13850: 5.028.017a ahaṃ hy atitanuś caiva vanaraś ca viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13851: 5.028.017c vācaṃ codāhariṣyāmi mānuṣīm iha saṃskṛtām 5.028.018a yadi vācaṃ pradāsyāmi dvijātir iva saṃskṛtām
GE09ram_1-7u:13852: 5.028.018c rāvaṇaṃ manyamānā māṃ sītā bhītā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:13853: 5.028.019a avaśyam eva vaktavyaṃ mānuṣaṃ vākyam arthavat
GE09ram_1-7u:13854: 5.028.019c mayā sāntvayituṃ śakyā nānyatheyam aninditā 5.028.020a seyam ālokya me rūpaṃ jānakī bhāṣitaṃ tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:13855: 5.028.020c rakṣobhis trāsitā pūrvaṃ bhūyas trāsaṃ gamiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:13856: 5.028.021a tato jātaparitrāsā śabdaṃ kuryān manasvinī 5.028.021c jānamānā viśālākṣī rāvaṇaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:13857: 5.028.022a sītayā ca kṛte śabde sahasā rākṣasīgaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13859: 5.028.023a tato māṃ saṃparikṣipya sarvato vikṛtānanāḥ 5.028.023c vadhe ca grahaṇe caiva kuryur yatnaṃ yathābalam
GE09ram_1-7u:13860: 5.028.024a taṃ māṃ śākhāḥ praśākhāś ca skandhāṃś cottamaśākhinām
GE09ram_1-7u:13862: 5.028.025a mama rūpaṃ ca saṃprekṣya vanaṃ vicarato mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:13864: 5.028.026a tataḥ kuryuḥ samāhvānaṃ rākṣasyo rakṣasām api
GE09ram_1-7u:13867: 5.028.028a saṃkruddhas tais tu parito vidhaman rakṣasāṃ balam
GE09ram_1-7u:13868: 5.028.028c śaknuyaṃ na tu saṃprāptuṃ paraṃ pāraṃ mahodadheḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13869: 5.028.029a māṃ vā gṛhṇīyur āplutya bahavaḥ śīghrakāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13870: 5.028.029c syād iyaṃ cāgṛhītārthā mama ca grahaṇaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_1-7u:13871: 5.028.030a hiṃsābhirucayo hiṃsyur imāṃ vā janakātmajām 5.028.030c vipannaṃ syāt tataḥ kāryaṃ rāmasugrīvayor idam
GE09ram_1-7u:13872: 5.028.031a uddeśe naṣṭamārge 'smin rākṣasaiḥ parivārite 5.028.031c sāgareṇa parikṣipte gupte vasati jānakī 5.028.032a viśaste vā gṛhīte vā rakṣobhir mayi saṃyuge
GE09ram_1-7u:13873: 5.028.032c nānyaṃ paśyāmi rāmasya sahāyaṃ kāryasādhane 5.028.033a vimṛśaṃś ca na paśyāmi yo hate mayi vānaraḥ 5.028.033c śatayojanavistīrṇaṃ laṅghayeta mahodadhim
GE09ram_1-7u:13874: 5.028.034a kāmaṃ hantuṃ samartho 'smi sahasrāṇy api rakṣasām
GE09ram_1-7u:13875: 5.028.034c na tu śakṣyāmi saṃprāptuṃ paraṃ pāraṃ mahodadheḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13876: 5.028.035a asatyāni ca yuddhāni saṃśayo me na rocate
GE09ram_1-7u:13877: 5.028.035c kaś ca niḥsaṃśayaṃ kāryaṃ kuryāt prājñaḥ sasaṃśayam
GE09ram_1-7u:13878: 5.028.036a eṣa doṣo mahān hi syān mama sītābhibhāṣaṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:13879: 5.028.036c prāṇatyāgaś ca vaidehyā bhaved anabhibhāṣaṇe 5.028.037a bhūtāś cārthā vinaśyanti
GE09ram_1-7u:13880: 5.028.037c viklavaṃ dūtam āsādya tamaḥ sūryodaye yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:13881: 5.028.038a arthānarthāntare buddhir niścitāpi na śobhate 5.028.038c ghātayanti hi kāryāṇi dūtāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥ 5.028.039a na vinaśyet kathaṃ kāryaṃ vaiklavyaṃ na kathaṃ bhavet 5.028.039c laṅghanaṃ ca samudrasya kathaṃ nu na vṛthā bhavet 5.028.040a kathaṃ nu khalu vākyaṃ me śṛṇuyān nodvijeta ca 5.028.040c iti saṃcintya hanumāṃś cakāra matimān matim
GE09ram_1-7u:13886: 5.028.043a śrāvayiṣyāmi sarvāṇi madhurāṃ prabruvan giram 5.028.043c śraddhāsyati yathā hīyaṃ tathā sarvaṃ samādadhe
GE09ram_1-7u:13887: 5.028.044a iti sa bahuvidhaṃ mahānubhāvo; jagatipateḥ pramadām avekṣamāṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13888: 5.028.044c madhuram avitathaṃ jagāda vākyaṃ; drumaviṭapāntaram āsthito hanūmān
GE09ram_1-7u:13889: 5.029.001a evaṃ bahuvidhāṃ cintāṃ cintayitva mahākapiḥ 5.029.001c saṃśrave madhuraṃ vākyaṃ vaidehyā vyājahāra ha
GE09ram_1-7u:13891: 5.029.002c puṇyaśīlo mahākīrtir ṛjur āsīn mahāyaśāḥ 5.029.002e cakravartikule jātaḥ puraṃdarasamo
GE09ram_1-7u:13895: 5.029.004c pṛthivyāṃ caturantayāṃ viśrutaḥ sukhadaḥ sukhī 5.029.005a tasya putraḥ priyo jyeṣṭhas tārādhipanibhānanaḥ 5.029.005c rāmo nāma viśeṣajñaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sarvadhanuṣmatām 5.029.006a rakṣitā svasya vṛttasya svajanasyāpi rakṣitā 5.029.006c rakṣitā jīvalokasya dharmasya ca paraṃtapaḥ 5.029.007a tasya satyābhisaṃdhasya vṛddhasya vacanāt pituḥ 5.029.007c sabhāryaḥ saha ca bhrātrā vīraḥ pravrajito vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:13896: 5.029.008a tena tatra mahāraṇye mṛgayāṃ paridhāvatā 5.029.008c janasthānavadhaṃ śrutvā hatau ca kharadūṣaṇau 5.029.008e tatas tv amarṣāpahṛtā jānakī rāvaṇena tu
GE09ram_1-7u:13898: 5.029.009c aśrauṣaṃ rāghavasyāhaṃ seyam āsāditā mayā 5.029.010a virarāmaivam uktvāsau vācaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:13899: 5.029.010c jānakī cāpi tac chrutvā vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatā
GE09ram_1-7u:13900: 5.029.011a tataḥ sā vakrakeśāntā sukeśī keśasaṃvṛtam 5.029.011c unnamya vadanaṃ bhīruḥ śiṃśapāvṛkṣam aikṣata 5.029.012a sā tiryag ūrdhvaṃ ca tathāpy adhastān; nirīkṣamāṇā tam acintya
GE09ram_1-7u:13902: 5.029.012c dadarśa piṅgādhipater amātyaṃ; vātātmajaṃ sūryam ivodayastham
GE09ram_1-7u:13903: 5.030.001a tataḥ śākhāntare līnaṃ dṛṣṭvā calitamānasā 5.030.001c sā dadarśa kapiṃ tatra praśritaṃ priyavādinam
GE09ram_1-7u:13904: 5.030.002a sā tu dṛṣṭvā hariśreṣṭhaṃ vinītavad upasthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:13905: 5.030.002c maithilī cintayām āsa svapno 'yam iti bhāminī 5.030.003a sā taṃ samīkṣyaiva bhṛśaṃ visaṃjñā; gatāsukalpeva babhūva sītā
GE09ram_1-7u:13906: 5.030.003c cireṇa saṃjñāṃ pratilabhya caiva; vicintayām āsa viśālanetrā
GE09ram_1-7u:13907: 5.030.004a svapno mayāyaṃ vikṛto 'dya dṛṣṭaḥ; śākhāmṛgaḥ śāstragaṇair niṣiddhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13908: 5.030.004c svasty astu rāmāya salakṣmaṇāya; tathā pitur me janakasya rājñaḥ 5.030.005a svapno 'pi nāyaṃ na hi me 'sti nidrā; śokena duḥkhena ca
GE09ram_1-7u:13910: 5.030.005c sukhaṃ hi me nāsti yato 'smi hīnā; tenendupūrṇapratimānanena
GE09ram_1-7u:13911: 5.030.006a ahaṃ hi tasyādya mano bhavena; saṃpīḍitā tad gatasarvabhāvā
GE09ram_1-7u:13912: 5.030.006c vicintayantī satataṃ tam eva; tathaiva paśyāmi tathā śṛṇomi
GE09ram_1-7u:13913: 5.030.007a manorathaḥ syād iti cintayāmi; tathāpi buddhyā ca vitarkayāmi
GE09ram_1-7u:13914: 5.030.007c kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tasya hi nāsti rūpaṃ; suvyaktarūpaś ca vadaty ayaṃ mām 5.030.008a namo 'stu vācaspataye savajriṇe; svayambhuve caiva hutāśanāya
GE09ram_1-7u:13915: 5.030.008c anena coktaṃ yad idaṃ mamāgrato; vanaukasā tac ca tathāstu nānyathā 5.031.001a tām abravīn mahātejā hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ 5.031.001c śirasy añjalim ādhāya sītāṃ madhurayā girā
GE09ram_1-7u:13917: 5.031.002c drumasya śākhām ālambya tiṣṭhasi tvam aninditā
GE09ram_1-7u:13918: 5.031.003a kimarthaṃ tava netrābhyāṃ vāri sravati śokajam
GE09ram_1-7u:13921: 5.031.004c yakṣāṇāṃ kiṃnarāṇāṃ ca kā tvaṃ bhavasi śobhane
GE09ram_1-7u:13922: 5.031.005a kā tvaṃ bhavasi rudrāṇāṃ marutāṃ vā varānane
GE09ram_1-7u:13923: 5.031.005c vasūnāṃ vā varārohe devatā pratibhāsi me
GE09ram_1-7u:13924: 5.031.006a kiṃ nu candramasā hīnā patitā vibudhālayāt
GE09ram_1-7u:13925: 5.031.006c rohiṇī jyotiṣāṃ śreṣṭhā śreṣṭhā sarvaguṇānvitā 5.031.007a kopād vā yadi vā mohād bhartāram asitekṣaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:13926: 5.031.007c vasiṣṭhaṃ kopayitvā tvaṃ nāsi kalyāṇy arundhatī
GE09ram_1-7u:13927: 5.031.008a ko nau putraḥ pitā bhrāta bhartā vā te sumadhyame
GE09ram_1-7u:13928: 5.031.008c asmāl lokād amuṃ lokaṃ gataṃ tvam anuśocasi
GE09ram_1-7u:13929: 5.031.009a vyañjanāni hi te yāni lakṣaṇāni ca lakṣaye
GE09ram_1-7u:13930: 5.031.009c mahiṣī bhūmipālasya rājakanyāsi me matā 5.031.010a rāvaṇena janasthānād balād apahṛtā yadi 5.031.010c sītā tvam asi bhadraṃ te tan mamācakṣva pṛcchataḥ 5.031.011a sā tasya vacanaṃ śrutvā rāmakīrtanaharṣitā 5.031.011c uvāca vākyaṃ vaidehī hanūmantaṃ drumāśritam 5.031.012a duhitā janakasyāhaṃ vaidehasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13931: 5.031.012c sītā ca nāma nāmnāhaṃ bhāryā rāmasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13932: 5.031.013a samā dvādaśa tatrāhaṃ rāghavasya niveśane 5.031.013c bhuñjānā mānuṣān bhogān
GE09ram_1-7u:13936: 5.031.015c kaikeyī nāma bhartāraṃ devī vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:13937: 5.031.016a na pibeyaṃ na khādeyaṃ pratyahaṃ mama bhojanam
GE09ram_1-7u:13938: 5.031.016c eṣa me jīvitasyānto rāmo yady abhiṣicyate
GE09ram_1-7u:13939: 5.031.017a yat tad uktaṃ tvayā vākyaṃ prītyā nṛpatisattama
GE09ram_1-7u:13940: 5.031.017c tac cen na vitathaṃ kāryaṃ vanaṃ gacchatu rāghavaḥ 5.031.018a sa rājā satyavāg devyā varadānam anusmaran
GE09ram_1-7u:13941: 5.031.018c mumoha vacanaṃ śrutvā kaikeyyāḥ krūram apriyam
GE09ram_1-7u:13942: 5.031.019a tatas tu sthaviro rājā satyadharme vyavasthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13943: 5.031.019c jyeṣṭhaṃ yaśasvinaṃ putraṃ rudan rājyam ayācata
GE09ram_1-7u:13944: 5.031.020a sa pitur vacanaṃ śrīmān abhiṣekāt paraṃ priyam
GE09ram_1-7u:13945: 5.031.020c manasā pūrvam āsādya vācā pratigṛhītavān 5.031.021a dadyān na pratigṛhṇīyān na brūyat kiṃ cid apriyam 5.031.021c api jīvitahetor hi rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ 5.031.022a sa vihāyottarīyāṇi mahārhāṇi mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13946: 5.031.022c visṛjya manasā rājyaṃ jananyai māṃ samādiśat
GE09ram_1-7u:13947: 5.031.023a sāhaṃ tasyāgratas tūrṇaṃ prasthitā vanacāriṇī 5.031.023c na hi me tena hīnāyā vāsaḥ svarge 'pi rocate
GE09ram_1-7u:13948: 5.031.024a prāg eva tu mahābhāgaḥ saumitrir mitranandanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13950: 5.031.025a te vayaṃ bhartur ādeśaṃ bahu mānyadṛḍhavratāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13951: 5.031.025c praviṣṭāḥ sma purād dṛṣṭaṃ vanaṃ gambhīradarśanam
GE09ram_1-7u:13954: 5.031.027a dvau māsau tena me kālo jīvitānugrahaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13955: 5.031.027c ūrdhvaṃ dvābhyāṃ tu māsābhyāṃ tatas tyakṣyāmi jīvitam
GE09ram_1-7u:13956: 5.032.001a tasyās tadvacanaṃ śrutvā hanūmān hariyūthapaḥ 5.032.001c duḥkhād duḥkhābhibhūtāyāḥ sāntam uttaram abravīt 5.032.002a ahaṃ rāmasya saṃdeśād devi dūtas tavāgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13957: 5.032.002c vaidehi kuśalī rāmas tvāṃ ca kauśalam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:13958: 5.032.003a yo brāhmam astraṃ vedāṃś ca veda vedavidāṃ varaḥ 5.032.003c sa tvāṃ dāśarathī rāmo devi kauśalam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:13959: 5.032.004a lakṣmaṇaś ca mahātejā bhartus te 'nucaraḥ priyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13961: 5.032.005a sā tayoḥ kuśalaṃ devī niśamya narasiṃhayoḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13963: 5.032.006a kalyāṇī bata gatheyaṃ laukikī pratibhāti me
GE09ram_1-7u:13964: 5.032.006c ehi jīvantam ānado naraṃ varṣaśatād api
GE09ram_1-7u:13965: 5.032.007a tayoḥ samāgame tasmin prītir utpāditādbhutā 5.032.007c paraspareṇa cālāpaṃ viśvastau tau pracakratuḥ 5.032.008a tasyās tadvacanaṃ śrutvā hanūmān hariyūthapaḥ 5.032.008c sītāyāḥ śokadīnāyāḥ samīpam upacakrame
GE09ram_1-7u:13966: 5.032.009a yathā yathā samīpaṃ sa hanūmān upasarpati
GE09ram_1-7u:13967: 5.032.009c tathā tathā rāvaṇaṃ sā taṃ sītā pariśaṅkate
GE09ram_1-7u:13968: 5.032.010a aho dhig dhik kṛtam idaṃ kathitaṃ hi yad asya me
GE09ram_1-7u:13969: 5.032.010c rūpāntaram upāgamya sa evāyaṃ hi rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13970: 5.032.011a tām aśokasya śākhāṃ sā vimuktvā śokakarśitā
GE09ram_1-7u:13972: 5.032.012a avandata mahābāhus tatas tāṃ janakātmajām 5.032.012c sā cainaṃ bhayavitrastā bhūyo naivābhyudaikṣata 5.032.013a taṃ dṛṣṭvā vandamānaṃ tu sītā śaśinibhānanā
GE09ram_1-7u:13973: 5.032.013c abravīd dīrgham ucchvasya vānaraṃ madhurasvarā 5.032.014a māyāṃ praviṣṭo māyāvī yadi tvaṃ rāvaṇaḥ svayam
GE09ram_1-7u:13974: 5.032.014c utpādayasi me bhūyaḥ saṃtāpaṃ tan na śobhanam
GE09ram_1-7u:13975: 5.032.015a svaṃ parityajya rūpaṃ yaḥ parivrājakarūpadhṛt 5.032.015c janasthāne mayā dṛṣṭas tvaṃ sa evāsi rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13977: 5.032.016c saṃtāpayasi māṃ bhūyaḥ saṃtāpaṃ tan na śobhanam
GE09ram_1-7u:13978: 5.032.017a yadi rāmasya dūtas tvam āgato bhadram astu te 5.032.017c pṛcchāmi tvāṃ hariśreṣṭha priyā rāma kathā hi me 5.032.018a guṇān rāmasya kathaya priyasya mama vānara
GE09ram_1-7u:13979: 5.032.018c cittaṃ harasi me saumya nadīkūlaṃ yathā rayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13980: 5.032.019a aho svapnasya sukhatā yāham evaṃ cirāhṛtā
GE09ram_1-7u:13981: 5.032.019c preṣitaṃ nāma paśyāmi rāghaveṇa vanaukasaṃ 5.032.020a svapne 'pi yady ahaṃ vīraṃ rāghavaṃ sahalakṣmaṇam 5.032.020c paśyeyaṃ nāvasīdeyaṃ svapno 'pi mama matsarī 5.032.021a nāhaṃ svapnam imaṃ manye svapne dṛṣṭvā hi vānaram 5.032.021c na śakyo 'bhyudayaḥ prāptuṃ prāptaś cābhyudayo mama
GE09ram_1-7u:13982: 5.032.022a kiṃ nu syāc cittamoho 'yaṃ bhaved vātagatis tv iyam
GE09ram_1-7u:13983: 5.032.022c unmādajo vikāro vā syād iyaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇikā
GE09ram_1-7u:13984: 5.032.023a atha vā nāyam unmādo moho 'py unmādalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13985: 5.032.023c saṃbudhye cāham ātmānam imaṃ cāpi vanaukasaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:13986: 5.032.024a ity evaṃ bahudhā sītā saṃpradhārya balābalam
GE09ram_1-7u:13987: 5.032.024c rakṣasāṃ kāmarūpatvān mene taṃ rākṣasādhipam 5.032.025a etāṃ buddhiṃ tadā kṛtvā sītā sā tanumadhyamā
GE09ram_1-7u:13989: 5.032.026a sītāyāś cintitaṃ buddhvā hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ 5.032.026c śrotrānukūlair vacanais tadā tāṃ saṃpraharṣayat 5.032.027a āditya iva tejasvī lokakāntaḥ śaśī yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:13990: 5.032.027c rājā sarvasya lokasya devo vaiśravaṇo yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:13991: 5.032.028a vikrameṇopapannaś ca yathā viṣṇur mahāyaśāḥ 5.032.028c satyavādī madhuravāg devo vācaspatir yathā 5.032.029a rūpavān subhagaḥ śrīmān kandarpa iva mūrtimān
GE09ram_1-7u:13992: 5.032.029c sthānakrodhaprahartā ca śreṣṭho loke mahārathaḥ 5.032.029e bāhucchāyām avaṣṭabdho yasya loko mahātmanaḥ 5.032.030a apakṛṣyāśramapadān mṛgarūpeṇa rāghavam
GE09ram_1-7u:13993: 5.032.030c śūnye yenāpanītāsi tasya drakṣyasi yat phalam
GE09ram_1-7u:13994: 5.032.031a nacirād rāvaṇaṃ saṃkhye yo vadhiṣyati vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:13995: 5.032.031c roṣapramuktair iṣubhir jvaladbhir iva pāvakaiḥ 5.032.032a tenāhaṃ preṣito dūtas tvatsakāśam ihāgataḥ 5.032.032c tvadviyogena duḥkhārtaḥ sa tvāṃ kauśalam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:13997: 5.032.033c abhivādya mahābāhuḥ so 'pi kauśalam abravīt 5.032.034a rāmasya ca sakhā devi sugrīvo nāma vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:13998: 5.032.034c rājā vānaramukhyānāṃ sa tvāṃ kauśalam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:13999: 5.032.035a nityaṃ smarati rāmas tvāṃ sasugrīvaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14000: 5.032.035c diṣṭyā jīvasi vaidehi rākṣasī vaśam āgatā
GE09ram_1-7u:14001: 5.032.036a nacirād drakṣyase rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahāratham
GE09ram_1-7u:14003: 5.032.037a ahaṃ sugrīvasacivo hanūmān nāma vānaraḥ 5.032.037c praviṣṭo nagarīṃ laṅkāṃ laṅghayitvā mahodadhim 5.032.038a kṛtvā mūrdhni padanyāsaṃ rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ 5.032.038c tvāṃ draṣṭum upayāto 'haṃ samāśritya parākramam 5.032.039a nāham asmi tathā devi yathā mām avagacchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:14004: 5.032.039c viśaṅkā tyajyatām eṣā śraddhatsva vadato mama
GE09ram_1-7u:14005: 5.033.001a tāṃ tu rāma kathāṃ śrutvā vaidehī vānararṣabhāt
GE09ram_1-7u:14006: 5.033.001c uvāca vacanaṃ sāntvam idaṃ madhurayā girā
GE09ram_1-7u:14007: 5.033.002a kva te rāmeṇa saṃsargaḥ kathaṃ jānāsi lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:14008: 5.033.002c vānarāṇāṃ narāṇāṃ ca katham āsīt samāgamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14009: 5.033.003a yāni rāmasya liṅgāni lakṣmaṇasya ca vānara
GE09ram_1-7u:14010: 5.033.003c tāni bhūyaḥ samācakṣva na māṃ śokaḥ samāviśet
GE09ram_1-7u:14011: 5.033.004a kīdṛśaṃ tasya saṃsthānaṃ rūpaṃ rāmasya kīdṛśam
GE09ram_1-7u:14012: 5.033.004c katham ūrū kathaṃ bāhū lakṣmaṇasya ca śaṃsa me 5.033.005a evam uktas tu vaidehyā hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14013: 5.033.005c tato rāmaṃ yathātattvam ākhyātum upacakrame 5.033.006a jānantī bata diṣṭyā māṃ vaidehi paripṛcchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:14014: 5.033.006c bhartuḥ kamalapatrākṣi saṃkhyānaṃ lakṣmaṇasya ca 5.033.007a yāni rāmasya cihnāni lakṣmaṇasya ca yāni vai
GE09ram_1-7u:14015: 5.033.007c lakṣitāni viśālākṣi vadataḥ śṛṇu tāni me
GE09ram_1-7u:14020: 5.033.010a rakṣitā jīvalokasya svajanasya ca rakṣitā 5.033.010c rakṣitā svasya vṛttasya dharmasya ca paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14021: 5.033.011a rāmo bhāmini lokasya cāturvarṇyasya rakṣitā 5.033.011c maryādānāṃ ca lokasya kartā kārayitā ca saḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14022: 5.033.012a arciṣmān arcito 'tyarthaṃ brahmacaryavrate sthitaḥ 5.033.012c sādhūnām upakārajñaḥ pracārajñaś ca karmaṇām 5.033.013a rājavidyāvinītaś ca brāhmaṇānām upāsitā
GE09ram_1-7u:14023: 5.033.013c śrutavāñ śīlasaṃpanno vinītaś ca paraṃtapaḥ 5.033.014a yajurvedavinītaś ca vedavidbhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14024: 5.033.014c dhanurvede ca vede ca vedāṅgeṣu ca niṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14026: 5.033.015c gūḍhajatruḥ sutāmrākṣo rāmo devi janaiḥ śrutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14028: 5.033.016c samaḥ samavibhaktāṅgo varṇaṃ śyāmaṃ samāśritaḥ 5.033.017a tristhiras tripralambaś ca trisamas triṣu connataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14033: 5.033.019c daśapadmo daśabṛhat tribhir vyāpto dviśuklavān 5.033.019e ṣaḍunnato navatanus tribhir vyāpnoti rāghavaḥ 5.033.020a satyadharmaparaḥ śrīmān saṃgrahānugrahe rataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14034: 5.033.020c deśakālavibhāgajñaḥ sarvalokapriyaṃvadaḥ 5.033.021a bhrātā ca tasya dvaimātraḥ saumitrir aparājitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14035: 5.033.021c anurāgeṇa rūpeṇa guṇaiś caiva tathāvidhaḥ 5.033.022a tvām eva mārgamāṇo tau vicarantau vasuṃdharām
GE09ram_1-7u:14038: 5.033.023c bhrātur bhāryārtam āsīnaṃ sugrīvaṃ priyadarśanam 5.033.024a vayaṃ tu harirājaṃ taṃ sugrīvaṃ satyasaṃgaram
GE09ram_1-7u:14041: 5.033.025c ṛśyamūkasya śailasya ramyaṃ deśam upāgatau 5.033.026a sa tau dṛṣṭvā naravyāghrau dhanvinau vānararṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14042: 5.033.026c abhipluto gires tasya śikharaṃ bhayamohitaḥ 5.033.027a tataḥ sa śikhare tasmin vānarendro vyavasthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14043: 5.033.027c tayoḥ samīpaṃ mām eva preṣayām āsa satvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14044: 5.033.028a tāv ahaṃ puruṣavyāghrau sugrīvavacanāt prabhū 5.033.028c rūpalakṣaṇasaṃpannau kṛtāñjalir upasthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14046: 5.033.029c pṛṣṭham āropya taṃ deśaṃ prāpitau puruṣarṣabhau
GE09ram_1-7u:14047: 5.033.030a niveditau ca tattvena sugrīvāya mahātmane 5.033.030c tayor anyonyasaṃbhāṣād bhṛśaṃ prītir ajāyata 5.033.031a tatra tau kīrtisaṃpannau harīśvaranareśvarau
GE09ram_1-7u:14049: 5.033.032a taṃ tataḥ sāntvayām āsa sugrīvaṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14050: 5.033.032c strīhetor vālinā bhrātrā nirastam uru tejasā
GE09ram_1-7u:14051: 5.033.033a tatas tvan nāśajaṃ śokaṃ rāmasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ 5.033.033c lakṣmaṇo vānarendrāya sugrīvāya nyavedayat
GE09ram_1-7u:14052: 5.033.034a sa śrutvā vānarendras tu lakṣmaṇeneritaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14053: 5.033.034c tadāsīn niṣprabho 'tyarthaṃ grahagrasta ivāṃśumān 5.033.035a tatas tvadgātraśobhīni rakṣasā hriyamāṇayā
GE09ram_1-7u:14055: 5.033.036a tāni sarvāṇi rāmāya ānīya hariyūthapāḥ 5.033.036c saṃhṛṣṭā darśayām āsur gatiṃ tu na vidus tava 5.033.037a tāni rāmāya dattāni mayaivopahṛtāni ca 5.033.037c svanavanty avakīrṇanti tasmin vihatacetasi
GE09ram_1-7u:14056: 5.033.038a tāny aṅke darśanīyāni kṛtvā bahuvidhaṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14058: 5.033.039a paśyatas tasyā rudatas tāmyataś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14060: 5.033.040a śayitaṃ ca ciraṃ tena duḥkhārtena mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:14061: 5.033.040c mayāpi vividhair vākyaiḥ kṛcchrād utthāpitaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14062: 5.033.041a tāni dṛṣṭvā mahārhāṇi darśayitvā muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14063: 5.033.041c rāghavaḥ sahasaumitriḥ sugrīve sa nyavedayat 5.033.042a sa tavādarśanād ārye rāghavaḥ paritapyate 5.033.042c mahatā jvalatā nityam agninevāgniparvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14064: 5.033.043a tvatkṛte tam anidrā ca śokaś cintā ca rāghavam 5.033.043c tāpayanti mahātmānam agnyagāram ivāgnayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14066: 5.033.044c mahatā bhūmikampena mahān iva śiloccayaḥ 5.033.045a kānānāni suramyāṇi nadīprasravaṇāni
GE09ram_1-7u:14067: 5.033.045c caran na ratim āpnoti tvam apaśyan nṛpātmaje
GE09ram_1-7u:14068: 5.033.046a sa tvāṃ manujaśārdūlaḥ kṣipraṃ prāpsyati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14070: 5.033.047a sahitau rāmasugrīvāv ubhāv akurutāṃ tadā 5.033.047c samayaṃ vālinaṃ hantuṃ tava cānveṣaṇaṃ tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:14071: 5.033.048a tato nihatya tarasā rāmo vālinam āhave
GE09ram_1-7u:14073: 5.033.049a rāmasugrīvayor aikyaṃ devy evaṃ samajāyata 5.033.049c hanūmantaṃ ca māṃ viddhi tayor dūtam ihāgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:14074: 5.033.050a svarājyaṃ prāpya sugrīvaḥ samanīya mahāharīn 5.033.050c tvadarthaṃ preṣayām āsa diśo daśa mahābalān
GE09ram_1-7u:14077: 5.033.052a aṅgado nāma lakṣmīvān vālisūnur mahābalaḥ 5.033.052c prasthitaḥ kapiśārdūlas
GE09ram_1-7u:14078: 5.033.053a teṣāṃ no vipranaṣṭānāṃ vindhye parvatasattame 5.033.053c bhṛśaṃ śokaparītanām ahorātragaṇā gatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14079: 5.033.054a te vayaṃ kāryanairāśyāt kālasyātikrameṇa ca 5.033.054c bhayāc ca kapirājasya prāṇāṃs tyaktuṃ vyavasthitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14081: 5.033.055c anāsādya padaṃ devyāḥ prāṇāṃs tyaktuṃ vyavasthitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14082: 5.033.056a bhṛśaṃ śokārṇave magnaḥ paryadevayad aṅgadaḥ 5.033.056c tava nāśaṃ ca vaidehi vālinaś ca tathā vadham 5.033.056e prāyopaveśam asmākaṃ maraṇaṃ ca jaṭāyuṣaḥ 5.033.057a teṣāṃ naḥ svāmisaṃdeśān nirāśānāṃ mumūrṣatām 5.033.057c kāryahetor ivāyātaḥ śakunir vīryavān mahān 5.033.058a gṛdhrarājasya sodaryaḥ saṃpātir nāma gṛdhrarāṭ 5.033.058c śrutvā bhrātṛvadhaṃ kopād idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:14083: 5.033.059a yavīyān kena me bhrātā hataḥ kva ca vināśitaḥ 5.033.059c etad ākhyātum icchāmi bhavadbhir vānarottamāḥ 5.033.060a aṅgado 'kathayat tasya janasthāne mahad vadham
GE09ram_1-7u:14084: 5.033.060c rakṣasā bhīmarūpeṇa tvām uddiśya yathātatham 5.033.061a jaṭāyos tu vadhaṃ śrutvā duḥkhitaḥ so 'ruṇātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14085: 5.033.061c tvām āha sa varārohe vasantīṃ rāvaṇālaye
GE09ram_1-7u:14086: 5.033.062a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā saṃpāteḥ prītivardhanam 5.033.062c aṅgadapramukhāḥ sarve tataḥ saṃprasthitā vayam 5.033.062e tvaddarśanakṛtotsāhā hṛṣṭās tuṣṭāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14087: 5.033.063a athāhaṃ harisainyasya sāgaraṃ dṛśya sīdataḥ 5.033.063c vyavadhūya bhayaṃ tīvraṃ yojanānāṃ śataṃ plutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14088: 5.033.064a laṅkā cāpi mayā rātrau praviṣṭā rākṣasākulā
GE09ram_1-7u:14089: 5.033.064c rāvaṇaś ca mayā dṛṣṭas tvaṃ ca śokanipīḍitā
GE09ram_1-7u:14090: 5.033.065a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yathāvṛttam anindite
GE09ram_1-7u:14091: 5.033.065c abhibhāṣasva māṃ devi dūto dāśarather aham
GE09ram_1-7u:14092: 5.033.066a tvaṃ māṃ rāmakṛtodyogaṃ tvannimittam ihāgatam 5.033.066c sugrīva sacivaṃ devi budhyasva pavanātmajam 5.033.067a kuśalī tava kākutsthaḥ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ 5.033.067c guror ārādhane yukto lakṣmaṇaś ca sulakṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14093: 5.033.068a tasya vīryavato devi bhartus tava hite rataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14094: 5.033.068c aham ekas tu saṃprāptaḥ sugrīvavacanād iha
GE09ram_1-7u:14099: 5.033.071a diṣṭyā hi na mama vyarthaṃ devi sāgaralaṅghanam
GE09ram_1-7u:14100: 5.033.071c prāpsyāmy aham idaṃ diṣṭyā tvaddarśanakṛtaṃ yaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14101: 5.033.072a rāghavaś ca mahāvīryaḥ kṣipraṃ tvām abhipatsyate
GE09ram_1-7u:14103: 5.033.073a kaurajo nāma vaidehi girīṇām uttamo giriḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14104: 5.033.073c tato gacchati gokarṇaṃ parvataṃ kesarī hariḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14105: 5.033.074a sa ca devarṣibhir dṛṣṭaḥ pitā mama mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14106: 5.033.074c tīrthe nadīpateḥ puṇye śambasādanam uddharat 5.033.075a tasyāhaṃ hariṇaḥ kṣetre jāto vātena maithili
GE09ram_1-7u:14107: 5.033.075c hanūmān iti vikhyāto loke svenaiva karmaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:14108: 5.033.075e viśvāsārthaṃ tu vaidehi bhartur uktā mayā guṇāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14109: 5.033.076a evaṃ viśvāsitā sītā hetubhiḥ śokakarśitā 5.033.076c upapannair abhijñānair dūtaṃ tam avagacchati 5.033.077a atulaṃ ca gatā harṣaṃ praharṣeṇa tu jānakī
GE09ram_1-7u:14111: 5.033.078a cāru tac cānanaṃ tasyās tāmraśuklāyatekṣaṇam 5.033.078c aśobhata viśālākṣyā rāhumukta ivoḍurāṭ
GE09ram_1-7u:14112: 5.033.078e hanūmantaṃ kapiṃ vyaktaṃ manyate nānyatheti sā
GE09ram_1-7u:14113: 5.033.079a athovāca hanūmāṃs tām uttaraṃ priyadarśanām 5.033.080a hate 'sure saṃyati śambasādane; kapipravīreṇa maharṣicodanāt 5.033.080c tato 'smi vāyuprabhavo hi maithili; prabhāvatas tatpratimaś ca
GE09ram_1-7u:14115: 5.034.001a bhūya eva mahātejā hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ 5.034.001c abravīt praśritaṃ vākyaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:14117: 5.034.002c rāmanāmāṅkitaṃ cedaṃ paśya devy aṅgulīyakam 5.034.002e samāśvasihi bhadraṃ te kṣīṇaduḥkhaphalā hy asi
GE09ram_1-7u:14118: 5.034.003a gṛhītvā prekṣamāṇā sā bhartuḥ karavibhūṣaṇam 5.034.003c bhartāram iva saṃprāptā jānakī muditābhavat 5.034.004a cāru tad vadanaṃ tasyās tāmraśuklāyatekṣaṇam 5.034.004c babhūva praharṣodagraṃ rāhumukta ivoḍurāṭ
GE09ram_1-7u:14119: 5.034.005a tataḥ sā hrīmatī bālā bhartuḥ saṃdeśaharṣitā
GE09ram_1-7u:14120: 5.034.005c parituṭṣā priyaṃ śrutvā prāśaṃsata mahākapim 5.034.006a vikrāntas tvaṃ samarthas tvaṃ prājñas tvaṃ vānarottama
GE09ram_1-7u:14124: 5.034.008a na hi tvāṃ prākṛtaṃ manye vanaraṃ vanararṣabha
GE09ram_1-7u:14125: 5.034.008c yasya te nāsti saṃtrāso rāvaṇān nāpi saṃbhramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14126: 5.034.009a arhase ca kapiśreṣṭha mayā samabhibhāṣitum 5.034.009c yady asi preṣitas tena rāmeṇa viditātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:14127: 5.034.010a preṣayiṣyati durdharṣo rāmo na hy aparīkṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:14129: 5.034.011a diṣṭyā ca kuśalī rāmo dharmātmā dharmavatsalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14131: 5.034.012a kuśalī yadi kākutsthaḥ kiṃ nu sāgaramekhalām
GE09ram_1-7u:14132: 5.034.012c mahīṃ dahati kopena yugāntāgnir ivotthitaḥ 5.034.013a atha vā śaktimantau tau surāṇām api nigrahe
GE09ram_1-7u:14133: 5.034.013c mamaiva tu na duḥkhānām asti manye viparyayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14134: 5.034.014a kaccic ca vyathate rāmaḥ kaccin na paripatyate
GE09ram_1-7u:14135: 5.034.014c uttarāṇi ca kāryāṇi kurute puruṣottamaḥ 5.034.015a kaccin na dīnaḥ saṃbhrāntaḥ kāryeṣu ca na muhyati 5.034.015c kaccin puruṣakāryāṇi kurute nṛpateḥ sutaḥ 5.034.016a dvividhaṃ trividhopāyam upāyam api sevate 5.034.016c vijigīṣuḥ suhṛt kaccin mitreṣu ca paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14136: 5.034.017a kaccin mitrāṇi labhate mitraiś cāpy abhigamyate
GE09ram_1-7u:14137: 5.034.017c kaccit kalyāṇamitraś ca mitraiś cāpi puraskṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14138: 5.034.018a kaccid āśāsti devānāṃ prasādaṃ pārthivātmajaḥ 5.034.018c kaccit puruṣakāraṃ ca daivaṃ ca pratipadyate
GE09ram_1-7u:14139: 5.034.019a kaccin na vigatasneho vivāsān mayi rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14140: 5.034.019c kaccin māṃ vyasanād asmān mokṣayiṣyati vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14141: 5.034.020a sukhānām ucito nityam asukhānām anūcitaḥ 5.034.020c duḥkham uttaram āsādya kaccid rāmo na sīdati
GE09ram_1-7u:14142: 5.034.021a kausalyāyās tathā kaccit sumitrāyās tathaiva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:14143: 5.034.021c abhīkṣṇaṃ śrūyate kaccit kuśalaṃ bharatasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:14144: 5.034.022a mannimittena mānārhaḥ kaccic chokena rāghavaḥ 5.034.022c kaccin nānyamanā rāmaḥ kaccin māṃ tārayiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:14145: 5.034.023a kaccid akṣāuhiṇīṃ bhīmāṃ bharato bhrātṛvatsalaḥ 5.034.023c dhvajinīṃ mantribhir guptāṃ preṣayiṣyati matkṛte 5.034.024a vānarādhipatiḥ śrīmān sugrīvaḥ kaccid eṣyati 5.034.024c matkṛte haribhir vīrair vṛto dantanakhāyudhaiḥ 5.034.025a kaccic ca lakṣmaṇaḥ śūraḥ sumitrānandavardhanaḥ 5.034.025c astravic charajālena rākṣasān vidhamiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:14146: 5.034.026a raudreṇa kaccid astreṇa rāmeṇa nihataṃ raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:14147: 5.034.026c drakṣyāmy alpena kālena rāvaṇaṃ sasuhṛjjanam 5.034.027a kaccin na tad dhemasamānavarṇaṃ; tasyānanaṃ padmasamānagandhi 5.034.027c mayā vinā śuṣyati śokadīnaṃ; jalakṣaye padmam ivātapena
GE09ram_1-7u:14148: 5.034.028a dharmāpadeśāt tyajataś ca rājyāṃ; māṃ cāpy araṇyaṃ nayataḥ padātim 5.034.028c nāsīd vyathā yasya na bhīr na śokaḥ; kaccit sa dhairyaṃ hṛdaye karoti 5.034.029a na cāsya mātā na pitā na cānyaḥ; snehād viśiṣṭo 'sti mayā samo vā
GE09ram_1-7u:14149: 5.034.029c tāvad dhy ahaṃ dūtajijīviṣeyaṃ; yāvat pravṛttiṃ śṛṇuyāṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:14151: 5.034.030a itīva devī vacanaṃ mahārthaṃ; taṃ vānarendraṃ madhurārtham
GE09ram_1-7u:14153: 5.034.030c śrotuṃ punas tasya vaco 'bhirāmaṃ; rāmārthayuktaṃ virarāma rāmā
GE09ram_1-7u:14154: 5.034.031a sītāyā vacanaṃ śrutvā mārutir bhīmavikramaḥ 5.034.031c śirasy añjalim ādhāya vākyam uttaram abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:14155: 5.034.032a na tvām ihasthāṃ jānīte rāmaḥ kamalalocanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14156: 5.034.032c śrutvaiva tu vaco mahyaṃ kṣipram eṣyati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14159: 5.034.033e kariṣyati purīṃ laṅkāṃ kākutsthaḥ śāntarākṣasām 5.034.034a tatra yady antarā mṛtyur yadi devāḥ sahāsurāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14160: 5.034.034c sthāsyanti pathi rāmasya sa tān api vadhiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:14162: 5.034.035c na śarma labhate rāmaḥ siṃhārdita iva dvipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14163: 5.034.036a dardareṇa ca te devi śape mūlaphalena ca
GE09ram_1-7u:14164: 5.034.036c malayena ca vindhyena meruṇā mandareṇa ca
GE09ram_1-7u:14165: 5.034.037a yathā sunayanaṃ valgu bimbauṣṭhaṃ cārukuṇḍalam 5.034.037c mukhaṃ drakṣyasi rāmasya pūrṇacandram ivoditam 5.034.038a kṣipraṃ drakṣyasi vaidehi rāmaṃ prasravaṇe girau
GE09ram_1-7u:14167: 5.034.039a na māṃsaṃ rāghavo bhuṅkte na cāpi madhusevate
GE09ram_1-7u:14168: 5.034.039c vanyaṃ suvihitaṃ nityaṃ bhaktam aśnāti pañcamam
GE09ram_1-7u:14169: 5.034.040a naiva daṃśān na maśakān na kīṭān na sarīsṛpān 5.034.040c rāghavo 'panayed gatrāt tvadgatenāntarātmanā 5.034.041a nityaṃ dhyānaparo rāmo nityaṃ śokaparāyaṇaḥ 5.034.041c nānyac cintayate kiṃ cit sa tu kāmavaśaṃ gataḥ 5.034.042a anidraḥ satataṃ rāmaḥ supto 'pi ca narottamaḥ 5.034.042c sīteti madhurāṃ vāṇīṃ vyāharan pratibudhyate 5.034.043a dṛṣṭvā phalaṃ vā puṣpaṃ vā yac cānyat strīmanoharam 5.034.043c bahuśo hā priyety evaṃ śvasaṃs tvām abhibhāṣate
GE09ram_1-7u:14170: 5.034.044a sa devi nityaṃ paritapyamānas; tvām eva sītety abhibhāṣamāṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14171: 5.034.044c dhṛtavrato rājasuto mahātmā; tavaiva lābhāya kṛtaprayatnaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14177: 5.035.002c yac ca nānyamanā rāmo yac ca śokaparāyaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14178: 5.035.003a aiśvarye vā suvistīrṇe vyasane vā sudāruṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:14179: 5.035.003c rajjveva puruṣaṃ baddhvā kṛtāntaḥ parikarṣati 5.035.004a vidhir nūnam asaṃhāryaḥ prāṇināṃ plavagottama 5.035.004c saumitriṃ māṃ ca rāmaṃ ca vyasanaiḥ paśya mohitān 5.035.005a śokasyāsya kadā pāraṃ rāghavo 'dhigamiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:14180: 5.035.005c plavamānaḥ pariśrānto hatanauḥ sāgare yathā 5.035.006a rākṣasānāṃ kṣayaṃ kṛtvā sūdayitvā ca rāvaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:14181: 5.035.006c laṅkām unmūlitāṃ kṛtvā kadā drakṣyati māṃ patiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14182: 5.035.007a sa vācyaḥ saṃtvarasveti yāvad eva na pūryate
GE09ram_1-7u:14183: 5.035.007c ayaṃ saṃvatsaraḥ kālas tāvad dhi mama jīvitam
GE09ram_1-7u:14184: 5.035.008a vartate daśamo māso dvau tu śeṣau plavaṃgama
GE09ram_1-7u:14185: 5.035.008c rāvaṇena nṛśaṃsena samayo yaḥ kṛto mama
GE09ram_1-7u:14186: 5.035.009a vibhīṣaṇena ca bhrātrā mama niryātanaṃ prati
GE09ram_1-7u:14187: 5.035.009c anunītaḥ prayatnena na ca tat kurute matim
GE09ram_1-7u:14188: 5.035.010a mama pratipradānaṃ hi rāvaṇasya na rocate
GE09ram_1-7u:14189: 5.035.010c rāvaṇaṃ mārgate saṃkhye mṛtyuḥ kālavaśaṃ gatam
GE09ram_1-7u:14190: 5.035.011a jyeṣṭhā kanyānalā nama vibhīṣaṇasutā kape 5.035.011c tayā mamaitad ākhyātaṃ mātrā prahitayā svayam
GE09ram_1-7u:14191: 5.035.012a avindhyo nāma medhāvī vidvān rākṣasapuṃgavaḥ 5.035.012c dhṛtimāñ śīlavān vṛddho rāvaṇasya susaṃmataḥ 5.035.013a rāmāt kṣayam anuprāptaṃ rakṣasāṃ pratyacodayat 5.035.013c na ca tasyāpi duṣṭātmā śṛṇoti vacanaṃ hitam
GE09ram_1-7u:14192: 5.035.014a āśaṃseti hariśreṣṭha kṣipraṃ māṃ prāpsyate patiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14193: 5.035.014c antarātmā hi me śuddhas tasmiṃś ca bahavo guṇāḥ 5.035.015a utsāhaḥ pauruṣaṃ sattvam ānṛśaṃsyaṃ kṛtajñatā 5.035.015c vikramaś ca prabhāvaś ca santi vānararāghave
GE09ram_1-7u:14195: 5.035.016c janasthāne vinā bhrātrā śatruḥ kas tasya nodvijet
GE09ram_1-7u:14196: 5.035.017a na sa śakyas tulayituṃ vyasanaiḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14200: 5.035.019a iti saṃjalpamānāṃ tāṃ rāmārthe śokakarśitām 5.035.019c aśrusaṃpūrṇavadanām uvāca hanumān kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14201: 5.035.020a śrutvaiva tu vaco mahyaṃ kṣipram eṣyati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14203: 5.035.021a atha vā mocayiṣyāmi tām adyaiva hi rākṣasāt
GE09ram_1-7u:14204: 5.035.021c asmād duḥkhād upāroha mama pṛṣṭham anindite
GE09ram_1-7u:14205: 5.035.022a tvaṃ hi pṛṣṭhagatāṃ kṛtvā saṃtariṣyāmi sāgaram
GE09ram_1-7u:14206: 5.035.022c śaktir asti hi me voḍhuṃ laṅkām api sarāvaṇām 5.035.023a ahaṃ prasravaṇasthāya rāghavāyādya maithili
GE09ram_1-7u:14207: 5.035.023c prāpayiṣyāmi śakrāya havyaṃ hutam ivānalaḥ 5.035.024a drakṣyasy adyaiva vaidehi rāghavaṃ sahalakṣmaṇam 5.035.024c vyavasāya samāyuktaṃ viṣṇuṃ daityavadhe yathā 5.035.025a tvaddarśanakṛtotsāham āśramasthaṃ mahābalam
GE09ram_1-7u:14209: 5.035.026a pṛṣṭham āroha me devi mā vikāṅkṣasva śobhane
GE09ram_1-7u:14210: 5.035.026c yogam anviccha rāmeṇa śaśāṅkeneva rohiṇī 5.035.027a kathayantīva candreṇa sūryeṇeva
GE09ram_1-7u:14212: 5.035.028a na hi me saṃprayātasya tvām ito nayato 'ṅgane
GE09ram_1-7u:14213: 5.035.028c anugantuṃ gatiṃ śaktāḥ sarve laṅkānivāsinaḥ 5.035.029a yathaivāham iha prāptas tathaivāham asaṃśayam 5.035.029c yāsyāmi paśya vaidehi tvām udyamya vihāyasaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:14214: 5.035.030a maithilī tu hariśreṣṭhāc chrutvā vacanam adbhutam
GE09ram_1-7u:14216: 5.035.031a hanūman dūram adhvanaṃ kathaṃ māṃ voḍhum icchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:14217: 5.035.031c tad eva khalu te manye kapitvaṃ hariyūthapa
GE09ram_1-7u:14218: 5.035.032a kathaṃ vālpaśarīras tvaṃ mām ito netum icchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:14219: 5.035.032c sakāśaṃ mānavendrasya bhartur me plavagarṣabha 5.035.033a sītāyā vacanaṃ śrutvā hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ 5.035.033c cintayām āsa lakṣmīvān navaṃ paribhavaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:14220: 5.035.034a na me jānāti sattvaṃ vā prabhāvaṃ vāsitekṣaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:14221: 5.035.034c tasmāt paśyatu vaidehī yad rūpaṃ mama kāmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14222: 5.035.035a iti saṃcintya hanumāṃs tadā plavagasattamaḥ 5.035.035c darśayām āsa vaidehyāḥ svarūpam arimardanaḥ 5.035.036a sa tasmāt pādapād dhīmān āplutya plavagarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14225: 5.035.037c agrato vyavatasthe ca sītāyā vānararṣabhaḥ 5.035.038a hariḥ parvatasaṃkāśas tāmravaktro mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14226: 5.035.038c vajradaṃṣṭranakho bhīmo vaidehīm idam abravīt 5.035.039a saparvatavanoddeśāṃ sāṭṭaprākāratoraṇām 5.035.039c laṅkām imāṃ sanathāṃ vā nayituṃ śaktir asti me 5.035.040a tad avasthāpya tāṃ buddhir alaṃ devi vikāṅkṣayā
GE09ram_1-7u:14227: 5.035.040c viśokaṃ kuru vaidehi rāghavaṃ sahalakṣmaṇam 5.035.041a taṃ dṛṣṭvācalasaṃkāśam uvāca janakātmajā
GE09ram_1-7u:14229: 5.035.042a tava sattvaṃ balaṃ caiva vijānāmi mahākape
GE09ram_1-7u:14230: 5.035.042c vāyor iva gatiṃ cāpi tejaś cāgnir ivādbhutam
GE09ram_1-7u:14231: 5.035.043a prākṛto 'nyaḥ kathaṃ cemāṃ bhūmim āgantum arhati 5.035.043c udadher aprameyasya pāraṃ vānarapuṃgava
GE09ram_1-7u:14232: 5.035.044a jānāmi gamane śaktiṃ nayane cāpi te mama
GE09ram_1-7u:14234: 5.035.045a ayuktaṃ tu kapiśreṣṭha mayā gantuṃ tvayā saha
GE09ram_1-7u:14235: 5.035.045c vāyuvegasavegasya vego māṃ mohayet tava 5.035.046a aham ākāśam āsaktā upary upari sāgaram
GE09ram_1-7u:14236: 5.035.046c prapateyaṃ hi te pṛṣṭhād bhayād vegena gacchataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14238: 5.035.047c bhayeyam āśu vivaśā yādasām annam uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:14239: 5.035.048a na ca śakṣye tvayā sārdhaṃ gantuṃ śatruvināśana
GE09ram_1-7u:14240: 5.035.048c kalatravati saṃdehas tvayy api syād asaṃśayam
GE09ram_1-7u:14241: 5.035.049a hriyamāṇāṃ tu māṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasā bhīmavikramāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14243: 5.035.050a tais tvaṃ parivṛtaḥ śūraiḥ śūlam udgara pāṇibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14244: 5.035.050c bhaves tvaṃ saṃśayaṃ prāpto mayā vīra kalatravān
GE09ram_1-7u:14245: 5.035.051a sāyudhā bahavo vyomni rākṣasās tvaṃ nirāyudhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14246: 5.035.051c kathaṃ śakṣyasi saṃyātuṃ māṃ caiva parirakṣitum
GE09ram_1-7u:14247: 5.035.052a yudhyamānasya rakṣobhis tatas taiḥ krūrakarmabhiḥ 5.035.052c prapateyaṃ hi te pṛṣṭhad bhayārtā kapisattama
GE09ram_1-7u:14248: 5.035.053a atha rakṣāṃsi bhīmāni mahānti balavanti ca
GE09ram_1-7u:14249: 5.035.053c kathaṃ cit sāmparāye tvāṃ jayeyuḥ kapisattama
GE09ram_1-7u:14250: 5.035.054a atha vā yudhyamānasya pateyaṃ vimukhasya te
GE09ram_1-7u:14251: 5.035.054c patitāṃ ca gṛhītvā māṃ nayeyuḥ pāparākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14252: 5.035.055a māṃ vā hareyus tvaddhastād viśaseyur athāpi vā
GE09ram_1-7u:14253: 5.035.055c avyavasthau hi dṛśyete yuddhe jayaparājayau 5.035.056a ahaṃ vāpi vipadyeyaṃ rakṣobhir abhitarjitā 5.035.056c tvatprayatno hariśreṣṭha bhaven niṣphala eva tu
GE09ram_1-7u:14254: 5.035.057a kāmaṃ tvam api paryāpto nihantuṃ sarvarākṣasān
GE09ram_1-7u:14255: 5.035.057c rāghavasya yaśo hīyet tvayā śastais tu rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14256: 5.035.058a atha vādāya rakṣāṃsi nyasyeyuḥ saṃvṛte hi mām
GE09ram_1-7u:14257: 5.035.058c yatra te nābhijānīyur harayo nāpi rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14258: 5.035.059a ārambhas tu madartho 'yaṃ tatas tava nirarthakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14259: 5.035.059c tvayā hi saha rāmasya mahān āgamane guṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14260: 5.035.060a mayi jīvitam āyattaṃ rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ 5.035.060c bhrātṝṇāṃ ca mahābāho tava rājakulasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:14261: 5.035.061a tau nirāśau madarthe tu śokasaṃtāpakarśitau 5.035.061c saha sarvarkṣaharibhis tyakṣyataḥ prāṇasaṃgraham
GE09ram_1-7u:14262: 5.035.062a bhartur bhaktiṃ puraskṛtya rāmād anyasya vānara
GE09ram_1-7u:14263: 5.035.062c nāhaṃ spraṣṭuṃ padā gātram iccheyaṃ vānarottama
GE09ram_1-7u:14264: 5.035.063a yad ahaṃ gātrasaṃsparśaṃ rāvaṇasya gatā balāt
GE09ram_1-7u:14265: 5.035.063c anīśā kiṃ kariṣyāmi vināthā vivaśā satī
GE09ram_1-7u:14266: 5.035.064a yadi rāmo daśagrīvam iha hatvā sarākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:14267: 5.035.064c mām ito gṛhya gaccheta tat tasya sadṛśaṃ bhavet 5.035.065a śrutā hi dṛṣṭāś ca mayā parākramā; mahātmanas tasya raṇāvamardinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14268: 5.035.065c na devagandharvabhujaṃgarākṣasā; bhavanti rāmeṇa samā hi saṃyuge 5.035.066a samīkṣya taṃ saṃyati citrakārmukaṃ; mahābalaṃ vāsavatulyavikramam 5.035.066c salakṣmaṇaṃ ko viṣaheta rāghavaṃ; hutāśanaṃ dīptam ivānileritam
GE09ram_1-7u:14269: 5.035.067a salakṣmaṇaṃ rāghavam ājimardanaṃ; diśāgajaṃ mattam iva
GE09ram_1-7u:14271: 5.035.067c saheta ko vānaramukhya saṃyuge; yugāntasūryapratimaṃ śarārciṣam 5.035.068a sa me hariśreṣṭha salakṣmaṇaṃ patiṃ; sayūthapaṃ kṣipram ihopapādaya
GE09ram_1-7u:14272: 5.035.068c cirāya rāmaṃ prati śokakarśitāṃ; kuruṣva māṃ vānaramukhya
GE09ram_1-7u:14274: 5.036.001a tataḥ sa kapiśārdūlas tena vākyena harṣitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14275: 5.036.001c sītām uvāca tac chrutvā vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14276: 5.036.002a yuktarūpaṃ tvayā devi bhāṣitaṃ śubhadarśane 5.036.002c sadṛśaṃ strīsvabhāvasya sādhvīnāṃ vinayasya ca 5.036.003a strītvaṃ na tu samarthaṃ hi sāgaraṃ vyativartitum
GE09ram_1-7u:14277: 5.036.003c mām adhiṣṭhāya vistīrṇaṃ śatayojanam āyatam 5.036.004a dvitīyaṃ kāraṇaṃ yac ca bravīṣi vinayānvite
GE09ram_1-7u:14278: 5.036.004c rāmād anyasya nārhāmi saṃsparśam iti jānaki
GE09ram_1-7u:14279: 5.036.005a etat te devi sadṛśaṃ patnyās tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14280: 5.036.005c kā hy anyā tvām ṛte devi brūyād vacanam īdṛśam
GE09ram_1-7u:14281: 5.036.006a śroṣyate caiva kākutsthaḥ sarvaṃ niravaśeṣataḥ 5.036.006c ceṣṭitaṃ yat tvayā devi bhāṣitaṃ mama cāgrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14282: 5.036.007a kāraṇair bahubhir devi rāma priyacikīrṣayā 5.036.007c snehapraskannamanasā mayaitat
GE09ram_1-7u:14284: 5.036.008c sāmarthyād ātmanaś caiva mayaitat samudāhṛtam 5.036.009a icchāmi tvāṃ samānetum adyaiva raghubandhunā 5.036.009c gurusnehena bhaktyā ca nānyathā tad udāhṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:14285: 5.036.010a yadi notsahase yātuṃ mayā sārdham anindite
GE09ram_1-7u:14286: 5.036.010c abhijñānaṃ prayaccha tvaṃ jānīyād rāghavo hi yat
GE09ram_1-7u:14287: 5.036.011a evam uktā hanumatā sītā surasutopamā 5.036.011c uvāca vacanaṃ mandaṃ bāṣpapragrathitākṣaram
GE09ram_1-7u:14288: 5.036.012a idaṃ śreṣṭham abhijñānaṃ brūyās tvaṃ tu mama priyam 5.036.012c śailasya citrakūṭasya pāde pūrvottare tadā 5.036.013a tāpasāśramavāsinyāḥ prājyamūlaphalodake 5.036.013c tasmin siddhāśrame deśe mandākinyā adūrataḥ 5.036.014a tasyopavanaṣaṇḍeṣu nānāpuṣpasugandhiṣu 5.036.014c vihṛtya salilaklinnā tavāṅke samupāviśam
GE09ram_1-7u:14289: 5.036.015a paryāyeṇa prasuptaś ca mamāṅke bharatāgrajaḥ 5.036.016a tato māṃsasamāyukto vāyasaḥ paryatuṇḍayat
GE09ram_1-7u:14290: 5.036.016c tam ahaṃ loṣṭam udyamya vārayāmi sma vāyasaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:14291: 5.036.017a dārayan sa ca māṃ kākas tatraiva parilīyate
GE09ram_1-7u:14292: 5.036.017c na cāpy uparaman māṃsād bhakṣārthī balibhojanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14293: 5.036.018a utkarṣantyāṃ ca raśanāṃ kruddhāyāṃ mayi pakṣiṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:14294: 5.036.018c sraṃsamāne ca vasane tato dṛṣṭā tvayā hy aham 5.036.019a tvayā vihasitā cāhaṃ kruddhā saṃlajjitā tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:14295: 5.036.019c bhakṣya gṛddhena kālena dāritā tvām upāgatā
GE09ram_1-7u:14296: 5.036.020a āsīnasya ca te śrāntā punar utsaṅgam āviśam
GE09ram_1-7u:14297: 5.036.020c krudhyantī ca prahṛṣṭena tvayāhaṃ parisāntvitā 5.036.021a bāṣpapūrṇamukhī mandaṃ cakṣuṣī parimārjatī
GE09ram_1-7u:14298: 5.036.021c lakṣitāhaṃ tvayā nātha vāyasena prakopitā 5.036.022a āśīviṣa iva kruddhaḥ śvasān vākyam abhāṣathāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14299: 5.036.022c kena te nāganāsoru vikṣataṃ vai stanāntaram
GE09ram_1-7u:14300: 5.036.022e kaḥ krīḍati saroṣeṇa pañcavaktreṇa bhoginā 5.036.023a vīkṣamāṇas tatas taṃ vai vāyasaṃ samavaikṣathāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14301: 5.036.023c nakhaiḥ sarudhirais tīkṣṇair mām evābhimukhaṃ sthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:14302: 5.036.024a putraḥ kila sa śakrasya vāyasaḥ patatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14303: 5.036.024c dharāntaracaraḥ śīghraṃ pavanasya gatau samaḥ 5.036.025a tatas tasmin mahābāhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14304: 5.036.025c vāyase kṛtavān krūrāṃ matiṃ matimatāṃ vara
GE09ram_1-7u:14306: 5.036.026c sa dīpta iva kālāgnir jajvālābhimukho dvijam
GE09ram_1-7u:14307: 5.036.027a cikṣepitha pradīptāṃ tām iṣīkāṃ vāyasaṃ prati
GE09ram_1-7u:14308: 5.036.027c anusṛṣṭas tadā kālo jagāma vividhāṃ gatim
GE09ram_1-7u:14309: 5.036.027e trāṇakāma imaṃ lokaṃ sarvaṃ vai vicacāra ha
GE09ram_1-7u:14310: 5.036.028a sa pitrā ca parityaktaḥ suraiḥ sarvair maharṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14311: 5.036.028c trīṃl lokān saṃparikramya tvām eva śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14312: 5.036.029a taṃ tvaṃ nipatitaṃ bhūmau śaraṇyaḥ śaraṇāgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:14313: 5.036.029c vadhārham api kākutstha kṛpayā paryapālayaḥ 5.036.029e na śarma labdhvā lokeṣu tvām eva śaraṇaṃ gataḥ 5.036.030a paridyūnaṃ viṣaṇṇaṃ ca sa tvam āyāntam uktavān
GE09ram_1-7u:14314: 5.036.030c moghaṃ kartuṃ na śakyaṃ tu brāhmam astraṃ tad ucyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:14315: 5.036.031a tatas tasyākṣi kākasya hinasti sma sa dakṣiṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:14316: 5.036.032a sa te tadā namaskṛtvā rājñe daśarathāya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:14317: 5.036.032c tvayā vīra visṛṣṭas tu pratipede svam ālayam
GE09ram_1-7u:14318: 5.036.033a matkṛte kākamātre 'pi brahmāstraṃ samudīritam 5.036.033c kasmād yo māṃ harat tvattaḥ kṣamase taṃ mahīpate 5.036.034a sa kuruṣva mahotsāhaṃ kṛpāṃ mayi nararṣabha
GE09ram_1-7u:14319: 5.036.034c ānṛśaṃsyaṃ paro dharmas tvatta eva mayā śrutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14320: 5.036.035a jānāmi tvāṃ mahāvīryaṃ mahotsāhaṃ mahābalam 5.036.035c apārapāram akṣobhyaṃ gāmbhīryāt sāgaropamam
GE09ram_1-7u:14322: 5.036.036a evam astravidāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ sattvavān balavān api
GE09ram_1-7u:14323: 5.036.036c kimartham astraṃ rakṣaḥsu na yojayasi rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:14324: 5.036.037a na nāgā nāpi gandharvā nāsurā na marudgaṇāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14325: 5.036.037c rāmasya samare vegaṃ śaktāḥ prati samādhitum
GE09ram_1-7u:14326: 5.036.038a tasyā vīryavataḥ kaś cid yady asti mayi saṃbhramaḥ 5.036.038c kimarthaṃ na śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ kṣayaṃ nayati rākṣasān
GE09ram_1-7u:14327: 5.036.039a bhrātur ādeśam ādāya lakṣmaṇo vā paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14328: 5.036.039c kasya hetor na māṃ vīraḥ paritrāti mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14330: 5.036.040c surāṇām api durdharṣo kimarthaṃ mām upekṣataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14331: 5.036.041a mamaiva duṣkṛtaṃ kiṃ cin mahad asti na saṃśayaḥ 5.036.041c samarthāv api tau yan māṃ nāvekṣete paraṃtapau
GE09ram_1-7u:14332: 5.036.042a kausalyā lokabhartāraṃ suṣuve yaṃ manasvinī 5.036.042c taṃ mamārthe sukhaṃ pṛccha śirasā cābhivādaya
GE09ram_1-7u:14333: 5.036.043a srajaś ca sarvaratnāni priyā yāś ca varāṅganāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14334: 5.036.043c aiśvaryaṃ ca viśālāyāṃ pṛthivyām api durlabham
GE09ram_1-7u:14335: 5.036.044a pitaraṃ mātaraṃ caiva saṃmānyābhiprasādya ca 5.036.044c anupravrajito rāmaṃ sumitrā yena suprajāḥ 5.036.044e ānukūlyena dharmātmā tyaktvā sukham anuttamam 5.036.045a anugacchati kākutsthaṃ bhrātaraṃ pālayan vane 5.036.045c siṃhaskandho mahābāhur manasvī priyadarśanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14336: 5.036.046a pitṛvad vartate rāme mātṛvan māṃ samācaran
GE09ram_1-7u:14337: 5.036.046c hriyamāṇāṃ tadā vīro na tu māṃ veda lakṣmaṇaḥ 5.036.047a vṛddhopasevī lakṣmīvāñ śakto na bahubhāṣitā 5.036.047c rājaputraḥ priyaśreṣṭhaḥ sadṛśaḥ śvaśurasya me 5.036.048a mattaḥ priyataro nityaṃ bhrātā rāmasya lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14338: 5.036.048c niyukto dhuri yasyāṃ tu tām udvahati vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:14339: 5.036.049a yaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāghavo naiva vṛddham āryam anusmarat
GE09ram_1-7u:14340: 5.036.049c sa mamārthāya kuśalaṃ vaktavyo vacanān mama
GE09ram_1-7u:14341: 5.036.049e mṛdur nityaṃ śucir dakṣaḥ priyo rāmasya lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14342: 5.036.050a idaṃ brūyāś ca me nāthaṃ śūraṃ rāmaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14344: 5.036.050e ūrdhvaṃ māsān na jīveyaṃ satyenāhaṃ bravīmi te
GE09ram_1-7u:14346: 5.036.051c trātum arhasi vīra tvaṃ pātālād iva kauśikīm
GE09ram_1-7u:14347: 5.036.052a tato vastragataṃ muktvā divyaṃ cūḍāmaṇiṃ śubham
GE09ram_1-7u:14348: 5.036.052c pradeyo rāghavāyeti sītā hanumate dadau 5.036.053a pratigṛhya tato vīro maṇiratnam anuttamam 5.036.053c aṅgulyā yojayām āsa na hy asyā prābhavad bhujaḥ 5.036.054a maṇiratnaṃ kapivaraḥ pratigṛhyābhivādya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:14349: 5.036.054c sītāṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā praṇataḥ pārśvataḥ sthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14350: 5.036.055a harṣeṇa mahatā yuktaḥ sītādarśanajena saḥ 5.036.055c hṛdayena gato rāmaṃ śarīreṇa tu viṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14351: 5.036.056a maṇivaram upagṛhya taṃ mahārhaṃ; janakanṛpātmajayā dhṛtaṃ prabhāvāt
GE09ram_1-7u:14353: 5.037.001a maṇiṃ dattvā tataḥ sītā hanūmantam athābravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:14354: 5.037.001c abhijñānam abhijñātam etad rāmasya tattvataḥ 5.037.002a maṇiṃ tu dṛṣṭvā rāmo vai trayāṇāṃ saṃsmariṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:14355: 5.037.002c vīro jananyā mama ca rājño daśarathasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:14356: 5.037.003a sa bhūyas tvaṃ samutsāhe codito harisattama
GE09ram_1-7u:14358: 5.037.004a tvam asmin kāryaniryoge pramāṇaṃ harisattama 5.037.004c tasya cintaya yo yatno duḥkhakṣayakaro bhavet
GE09ram_1-7u:14359: 5.037.005a sa tatheti pratijñāya mārutir bhīmavikramaḥ 5.037.005c śirasāvandya vaidehīṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:14360: 5.037.006a jñātvā saṃprasthitaṃ devī vānaraṃ mārutātmajam 5.037.006c bāṣpagadgadayā vācā maithilī vākyam abravīt 5.037.007a kuśalaṃ hanuman brūyāḥ sahitau rāmalakṣmaṇau 5.037.007c sugrīvaṃ ca sahāmātyaṃ vṛddhān sarvāṃś ca vānarān
GE09ram_1-7u:14361: 5.037.008a yathā ca sa mahābāhur māṃ tārayati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14362: 5.037.008c asmād duḥkhāmbusaṃrodhāt tvaṃ samādhātum arhasi 5.037.009a jīvantīṃ māṃ yathā rāmaḥ saṃbhāvayati kīrtimān
GE09ram_1-7u:14363: 5.037.009c tat tvayā hanuman vācyaṃ vācā dharmam avāpnuhi
GE09ram_1-7u:14364: 5.037.010a nityam utsāhayuktāś ca vācaḥ śrutvā mayeritāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14366: 5.037.011a matsaṃdeśayutā vācas tvattaḥ śrutvaiva rāghavaḥ 5.037.011c parākramavidhiṃ vīro vidhivat saṃvidhāsyati
GE09ram_1-7u:14367: 5.037.012a sītāyās tad vacaḥ śrutvā hanumān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14368: 5.037.012c śirasy añjalim ādhāya vākyam uttaram abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:14369: 5.037.013a kṣipram eṣyati kākutstho haryṛkṣapravarair vṛtaḥ 5.037.013c yas te yudhi vijityārīñ śokaṃ vyapanayiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:14370: 5.037.014a na hi paśyāmi martyeṣu nāmareṣv asureṣu vā
GE09ram_1-7u:14371: 5.037.014c yas tasya vamato bāṇān sthātum utsahate 'grataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14372: 5.037.015a apy arkam api parjanyam api vaivasvataṃ yamam
GE09ram_1-7u:14373: 5.037.015c sa hi soḍhuṃ raṇe śaktas tavahetor viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14374: 5.037.016a sa hi sāgaraparyantāṃ mahīṃ śāsitum īhate
GE09ram_1-7u:14375: 5.037.016c tvan nimitto hi rāmasya jayo janakanandini
GE09ram_1-7u:14376: 5.037.017a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā samyak satyaṃ subhāṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:14377: 5.037.017c jānakī bahu mene 'tha vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:14378: 5.037.018a tatas taṃ prasthitaṃ sītā vīkṣamāṇā punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14379: 5.037.018c bhartuḥ snehānvitaṃ vākyaṃ sauhārdād anumānayat 5.037.019a yadi vā manyase vīra vasaikāham ariṃdama
GE09ram_1-7u:14380: 5.037.019c kasmiṃś cit saṃvṛte deśe viśrāntaḥ śvo gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:14381: 5.037.020a mama ced alpabhāgyāyāḥ sāmnidhyāt tava vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:14382: 5.037.020c asya śokasya mahato muhūrtaṃ mokṣaṇaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_1-7u:14383: 5.037.021a gate hi hariśārdūla punarāgamanāya tu 5.037.021c prāṇānām api saṃdeho mama syān nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14384: 5.037.022a tavādarśanajaḥ śoko bhūyo māṃ paritāpayet 5.037.022c duḥkhād duḥkhaparāmṛṣṭāṃ dīpayann iva vānara 5.037.023a ayaṃ ca vīra saṃdehas tiṣṭhatīva mamāgrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14386: 5.037.024a kathaṃ nu khalu duṣpāraṃ tariṣyanti mahodadhim
GE09ram_1-7u:14387: 5.037.024c tāni haryṛkṣasainyāni tau vā naravarātmajau 5.037.025a trayāṇām eva bhūtānāṃ sāgarasyeha laṅghane 5.037.025c śaktiḥ syād vainateyasya tava vā mārutasya vā
GE09ram_1-7u:14388: 5.037.026a tad asmin kāryaniryoge vīraivaṃ duratikrame 5.037.026c kiṃ paśyasi samādhānaṃ tvaṃ hi kāryavidāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14389: 5.037.027a kāmam asya tvam evaikaḥ kāryasya parisādhane
GE09ram_1-7u:14390: 5.037.027c paryāptaḥ paravīraghna yaśasyas te balodayaḥ 5.037.028a balaiḥ samagrair yadi māṃ rāvaṇaṃ jitya saṃyuge
GE09ram_1-7u:14391: 5.037.028c vijayī svapuraṃ yāyāt tat tu me syād yaśaskaram 5.037.029a balais tu saṃkulāṃ kṛtvā laṅkāṃ parabalārdanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14392: 5.037.029c māṃ nayed yadi kākutsthas tat tasya sadṛśaṃ bhavet 5.037.030a tad yathā tasya vikrāntam anurūpaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14393: 5.037.030c bhaved āhava śūrasya tathā tvam upapādaya
GE09ram_1-7u:14394: 5.037.031a tad arthopahitaṃ vākyaṃ sahitaṃ hetusaṃhitam 5.037.031c niśamya hanumāñ śeṣaṃ vākyam uttaram abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:14395: 5.037.032a devi haryṛkṣasainyānām īśvaraḥ plavatāṃ varaḥ 5.037.032c sugrīvaḥ sattvasaṃpannas tavārthe kṛtaniścayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14397: 5.037.033c kṣipram eṣyati vaidehi rākṣasānāṃ nibarhaṇaḥ 5.037.034a tasya vikramasaṃpannāḥ sattvavanto mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14399: 5.037.035a yeṣāṃ nopari nādhastān na tiryak sajjate gatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14400: 5.037.035c na ca karmasu sīdanti mahatsv amitatejasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14403: 5.037.037a madviśiṣṭāś ca tulyāś ca santi tatra vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14404: 5.037.037c mattaḥ pratyavaraḥ kaś cin nāsti sugrīvasaṃnidhau
GE09ram_1-7u:14405: 5.037.038a ahaṃ tāvad iha prāptaḥ kiṃ punas te mahābalāḥ 5.037.038c na hi prakṛṣṭāḥ preṣyante preṣyante hītare janāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14406: 5.037.039a tad alaṃ paritāpena devi śoko vyapaitu te
GE09ram_1-7u:14407: 5.037.039c ekotpātena te laṅkām eṣyanti hariyūthapāḥ 5.037.040a mama pṛṣṭhagatau tau ca candrasūryāv ivoditau
GE09ram_1-7u:14409: 5.037.041a tau hi vīrau naravarau sahitau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:14410: 5.037.041c āgamya nagarīṃ laṅkāṃ sāyakair vidhamiṣyataḥ 5.037.042a sagaṇaṃ rāvaṇaṃ hatvā rāghavo raghunandanaḥ 5.037.042c tvām ādāya varārohe svapuraṃ pratiyāsyati 5.037.043a tad āśvasihi bhadraṃ te bhava tvaṃ kālakāṅkṣiṇī
GE09ram_1-7u:14411: 5.037.043c nacirād drakṣyase rāmaṃ prajvajantam ivānilam 5.037.044a nihate rākṣasendre ca saputrāmātyabāndhave
GE09ram_1-7u:14412: 5.037.044c tvaṃ sameṣyasi rāmeṇa śaśāṅkeneva rohiṇī 5.037.045a kṣipraṃ tvaṃ devi śokasya pāraṃ yāsyasi maithili
GE09ram_1-7u:14414: 5.037.046a evam āśvasya vaidehīṃ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ 5.037.046c gamanāya matiṃ kṛtvā vaidehīṃ punar abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:14415: 5.037.047a tam arighnaṃ kṛtātmānaṃ kṣipraṃ drakṣyasi rāghavam
GE09ram_1-7u:14416: 5.037.047c lakṣmaṇaṃ ca dhanuṣpāṇiṃ laṅkādvāram upasthitam 5.037.048a nakhadaṃṣṭrāyudhān vīrān siṃhaśārdūlavikramān
GE09ram_1-7u:14417: 5.037.048c vānarān vāraṇendrābhān kṣipraṃ drakṣyasi saṃgatān 5.037.049a śailāmbudanikāśānāṃ laṅkāmalayasānuṣu 5.037.049c nardatāṃ kapimukhyānām ārye yūthāny anekaśaḥ 5.037.050a sa tu marmaṇi ghoreṇa tāḍito manmatheṣuṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:14418: 5.037.050c na śarma labhate rāmaḥ siṃhārdita iva dvipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14419: 5.037.051a mā rudo devi śokena mā bhūt te manaso 'priyam
GE09ram_1-7u:14420: 5.037.051c śacīva pathyā śakreṇa bhartrā nāthavatī hy asi
GE09ram_1-7u:14421: 5.037.052a rāmād viśiṣṭaḥ ko 'nyo 'sti kaś cit saumitriṇā samaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14422: 5.037.052c agnimārutakalpau tau bhrātarau tava saṃśrayau 5.037.053a nāsmiṃś ciraṃ vatsyasi devi deśe; rakṣogaṇair adhyuṣito 'tiraudre
GE09ram_1-7u:14423: 5.037.053c na te cirād āgamanaṃ priyasya; kṣamasva matsaṃgamakālamātram 5.038.001a śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasya vāyusūnor mahātmanaḥ
