GE09ram_1-7u:14425: 5.038.002a tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā priyavaktāraṃ saṃprahṛṣyāmi vānara 5.038.002c ardhasaṃjātasasyeva vṛṣṭiṃ prāpya vasuṃdharā
GE09ram_1-7u:14426: 5.038.003a yathā taṃ puruṣavyāghraṃ gātraiḥ śokābhikarśitaiḥ 5.038.003c saṃspṛśeyaṃ sakāmāhaṃ tathā kuru dayāṃ mayi
GE09ram_1-7u:14427: 5.038.004a abhijñānaṃ ca rāmasya dattaṃ harigaṇottama 5.038.004c kṣiptām īṣikāṃ kākasya kopād ekākṣiśātanīm 5.038.005a manaḥśilāyās tikalo gaṇḍapārśve niveśitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14428: 5.038.005c tvayā pranaṣṭe tilake taṃ kila smartum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:14429: 5.038.006a sa vīryavān kathaṃ sītāṃ hṛtāṃ samanumanyase
GE09ram_1-7u:14431: 5.038.007a eṣa cūḍāmaṇir divyo mayā suparirakṣitaḥ 5.038.007c etaṃ dṛṣṭvā prahṛṣyāmi vyasane tvām ivānagha
GE09ram_1-7u:14432: 5.038.008a eṣa niryātitaḥ śrīmān mayā te vārisaṃbhavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14433: 5.038.008c ataḥ paraṃ na śakṣyāmi jīvituṃ śokalālasā
GE09ram_1-7u:14434: 5.038.009a asahyāni ca duḥkhāni vācaś ca hṛdayacchidaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14435: 5.038.009c rākṣasīnāṃ sughorāṇāṃ tvatkṛte marṣayāmy aham 5.038.010a dhārayiṣyāmi māsaṃ tu jīvitaṃ śatrusūdana 5.038.010c māsād ūrdhvaṃ na jīviṣye tvayā hīnā nṛpātmaja
GE09ram_1-7u:14436: 5.038.011a ghoro rākṣasarājo 'yaṃ dṛṣṭiś ca na sukhā mayi 5.038.011c tvāṃ ca śrutvā vipadyantaṃ na jīveyam ahaṃ kṣaṇam 5.038.012a vaidehyā vacanaṃ śrutvā karuṇaṃ sāśrubhāṣitam 5.038.012c athābravīn mahātejā hanumān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14437: 5.038.013a tvacchokavimukho rāmo devi satyena te śape
GE09ram_1-7u:14438: 5.038.013c rāme śokābhibhūte tu lakṣmaṇaḥ paritapyate 5.038.014a dṛṣṭā kathaṃ cid bhavatī na kālaḥ pariśocitum
GE09ram_1-7u:14439: 5.038.014c imaṃ muhūrtaṃ duḥkhānām antaṃ drakṣyasi bhāmini
GE09ram_1-7u:14440: 5.038.015a tāv ubhau puruṣavyāghrau rājaputrāv aninditau 5.038.015c tvaddarśanakṛtotsāhau laṅkāṃ bhasmīkariṣyataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14441: 5.038.016a hatvā tu samare krūraṃ rāvaṇaṃ saha bāndhavam
GE09ram_1-7u:14442: 5.038.016c rāghavau tvāṃ viśālākṣi svāṃ purīṃ prāpayiṣyataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14443: 5.038.017a yat tu rāmo vijānīyād abhijñānam anindite
GE09ram_1-7u:14444: 5.038.017c prītisaṃjananaṃ tasya bhūyas tvaṃ dātum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:14445: 5.038.018a sābravīd dattam eveha mayābhijñānam uttamam 5.038.018c etad eva hi rāmasya dṛṣṭvā
GE09ram_1-7u:14446: 5.038.018e śraddheyaṃ hanuman vākyaṃ tava vīra bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:14447: 5.038.019a sa taṃ maṇivaraṃ gṛhya śrīmān plavagasattamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14453: 5.038.021c sugrīvaṃ ca sahāmātyaṃ sarvān brūyā anāmayam
GE09ram_1-7u:14454: 5.038.022a yathā ca sa mahābāhur māṃ tārayati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14455: 5.038.022c asmād duḥkhāmbusaṃrodhāt tat samādhātum arhasi 5.038.023a imaṃ ca tīvraṃ mama śokavegaṃ; rakṣobhir ebhiḥ paribhartsanaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:14457: 5.038.023c brūyās tu rāmasya gataḥ samīpaṃ; śivaś ca te 'dhvāstu
GE09ram_1-7u:14459: 5.038.024a sa rājaputryā prativeditārthaḥ; kapiḥ kṛtārthaḥ parihṛṣṭacetāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14460: 5.038.024c tad alpaśeṣaṃ prasamīkṣya kāryaṃ; diśaṃ hy udīcīṃ manasā jagāma 5.039.001a sa ca vāgbhiḥ praśastābhir gamiṣyan pūjitas tayā
GE09ram_1-7u:14461: 5.039.001c tasmād deśād apakramya cintayām āsa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14462: 5.039.002a alpaśeṣam idaṃ kāryaṃ dṛṣṭeyam asitekṣaṇā 5.039.002c trīn upāyān atikramya caturtha iha dṛśyate
GE09ram_1-7u:14463: 5.039.003a na sāma rakṣaḥsu guṇāya kalpate; na danam arthopaciteṣu vartate
GE09ram_1-7u:14464: 5.039.003c na bhedasādhyā baladarpitā janāḥ; parākramas tv eṣa mameha rocate 5.039.004a na cāsya kāryasya parākramād ṛte; viniścayaḥ kaś cid
GE09ram_1-7u:14466: 5.039.004c hṛtapravīrās tu raṇe hi rākṣasāḥ; kathaṃ cid īyur yad ihādya mārdavam
GE09ram_1-7u:14467: 5.039.005a kārye karmaṇi nirdiṣṭo yo bahūny api sādhayet
GE09ram_1-7u:14468: 5.039.005c pūrvakāryavirodhena sa kāryaṃ kartum arhati 5.039.006a na hy ekaḥ sādhako hetuḥ svalpasyāpīha karmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14469: 5.039.006c yo hy arthaṃ bahudhā veda sa samartho 'rthasādhane
GE09ram_1-7u:14470: 5.039.007a ihaiva tāvat kṛtaniścayo hy ahaṃ; yadi vrajeyaṃ plavageśvarālayam
GE09ram_1-7u:14471: 5.039.007c parātmasaṃmarda viśeṣatattvavit; tataḥ kṛtaṃ syān mama bhartṛśāsanam 5.039.008a kathaṃ nu khalv adya bhavet sukhāgataṃ; prasahya yuddhaṃ mama
GE09ram_1-7u:14472: rākṣasaiḥ saha 5.039.008c tathaiva khalv ātmabalaṃ ca sāravat; samānayen māṃ ca raṇe daśānanaḥ 5.039.009a idam asya nṛśaṃsasya nandanopamam uttamam 5.039.009c vanaṃ netramanaḥkāntaṃ nānādrumalatāyutam
GE09ram_1-7u:14473: 5.039.010a idaṃ vidhvaṃsayiṣyāmi śuṣkaṃ vanam ivānalaḥ 5.039.010c asmin bhagne tataḥ kopaṃ kariṣyati sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14474: 5.039.011a tato mahat sāśvamahārathadvipaṃ; balaṃ samāneṣv api
GE09ram_1-7u:14476: 5.039.011c triśūlakālāyasapaṭṭiśāyudhaṃ; tato mahad yuddham idaṃ bhaviṣyati 5.039.012a ahaṃ tu taiḥ saṃyati caṇḍavikramaiḥ; sametya rakṣobhir asaṃgavikramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14477: 5.039.012c nihatya tad rāvaṇacoditaṃ balaṃ; sukhaṃ gamiṣyāmi kapīśvarālayam
GE09ram_1-7u:14478: 5.039.013a tato mārutavat kruddho mārutir bhīmavikramaḥ 5.039.013c ūruvegena mahatā drumān kṣeptum athārabhat 5.039.014a tatas tad dhanumān vīro babhañja pramadāvanam
GE09ram_1-7u:14479: 5.039.014c mattadvijasamāghuṣṭaṃ nānādrumalatāyutam 5.039.015a tad vanaṃ mathitair vṛkṣair bhinnaiś ca salilāśayaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14481: 5.039.016a latāgṛhaiś citragṛhaiś ca nāśitair; mahoragair vyālamṛgaiś ca
GE09ram_1-7u:14483: 5.039.016c śilāgṛhair unmathitais tathā gṛhaiḥ; pranaṣṭarūpaṃ tad abhūn
GE09ram_1-7u:14484: mahad vanam 5.039.017a sa tasya kṛtvārthapater mahākapir; mahad vyalīkaṃ manaso
GE09ram_1-7u:14486: 5.039.017c yuyutsur eko bahubhir mahābalaiḥ; śriyā jvalaṃs toraṇam āśritaḥ kapiḥ 5.040.001a tataḥ pakṣininādena vṛkṣabhaṅgasvanena ca
GE09ram_1-7u:14488: 5.040.002a vidrutāś ca bhayatrastā vinedur mṛgapakṣuṇaḥ 5.040.002c rakṣasāṃ ca nimittāni krūrāṇi pratipedire 5.040.003a tato gatāyāṃ nidrāyāṃ rākṣasyo vikṛtānanāḥ 5.040.003c tad vanaṃ dadṛśur bhagnaṃ taṃ ca vīraṃ mahākapim 5.040.004a sa tā dṛṣṭva mahābāhur mahāsattvo mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14489: 5.040.004c cakāra sumahad rūpaṃ rākṣasīnāṃ bhayāvaham 5.040.005a tatas taṃ girisaṃkāśam atikāyaṃ mahābalam 5.040.005c rākṣasyo vānaraṃ dṛṣṭvā papracchur janakātmajām 5.040.006a ko 'yaṃ kasya kuto vāyaṃ kiṃnimittam ihāgataḥ 5.040.006c kathaṃ tvayā sahānena saṃvādaḥ kṛta ity uta
GE09ram_1-7u:14490: 5.040.007a ācakṣva no viśālākṣi mā bhūt te subhage bhayam 5.040.007c saṃvādam asitāpāṅge tvayā kiṃ kṛtavān ayam
GE09ram_1-7u:14491: 5.040.008a athābravīt tadā sādhvī sītā sarvāṅgaśobhanā 5.040.008c rakṣasāṃ kāmarūpāṇāṃ vijñāne mama kā gatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14492: 5.040.009a yūyam evāsya jānīta yo 'yaṃ yad vā kariṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:14493: 5.040.009c ahir eva aheḥ pādān vijānāti na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14494: 5.040.010a aham apy asya bhītāsmi nainaṃ jānāmi ko 'nvayam
GE09ram_1-7u:14495: 5.040.010c vedmi rākṣasam evainaṃ kāmarūpiṇam āgatam 5.040.011a vaidehyā vacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasyo vidrutā drutam
GE09ram_1-7u:14496: 5.040.011c sthitāḥ kāś cid gatāḥ kāś cid rāvaṇāya niveditum 5.040.012a rāvaṇasya samīpe tu rākṣasyo vikṛtānanāḥ 5.040.012c virūpaṃ vānaraṃ bhīmam ākhyatum upacakramuḥ 5.040.013a aśokavanikā madhye rājan bhīmavapuḥ kapiḥ 5.040.013c sītayā kṛtasaṃvādas tiṣṭhaty amitavikramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14497: 5.040.014a na ca taṃ jānakī sītā hariṃ hariṇalocaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:14498: 5.040.014c asmābhir bahudhā pṛṣṭā nivedayitum icchati 5.040.015a vāsavasya bhaved dūto dūto vaiśravaṇasya vā
GE09ram_1-7u:14500: 5.040.016a tena tvadbhūtarūpeṇa yat tat tava manoharam
GE09ram_1-7u:14502: 5.040.017a na tatra kaś cid uddeśo yas tena na vināśitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14503: 5.040.017c yatra sā jānakī sītā sa tena na vināśitaḥ 5.040.018a jānakīrakṣaṇārthaṃ vā śramād vā nopalabhyate 5.040.018c atha vā kaḥ śramas tasya saiva tenābhirakṣitā
GE09ram_1-7u:14504: 5.040.019a cārupallavapatrāḍhyaṃ yaṃ sītā svayam āsthitā 5.040.019c pravṛddhaḥ śiṃśapāvṛkṣaḥ sa ca tenābhirakṣitaḥ 5.040.020a tasyograrūpasyograṃ tvaṃ daṇḍam ājñātum arhasi 5.040.020c sītā saṃbhāṣitā yena tad vanaṃ ca vināśitam
GE09ram_1-7u:14506: 5.040.021c kaḥ sītām abhibhāṣeta yo na syāt tyaktajīvitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14507: 5.040.022a rākṣasīnāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ 5.040.022c hutāgir iva jajvāla
GE09ram_1-7u:14508: 5.040.023a ātmanaḥ sadṛśāñ śūrān kiṃkarān nāma rākṣasān
GE09ram_1-7u:14514: 5.040.026a te kapiṃ taṃ samāsādya toraṇastham avasthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:14515: 5.040.026c abhipetur mahāvegāḥ pataṅgā iva pāvakam 5.040.027a te gadābhir vicitrābhiḥ parighaiḥ kāñcanāṅgadaiḥ 5.040.027c ājaghnur vānaraśreṣṭhaṃ śarair ādityasaṃnibhaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14516: 5.040.028a hanūmān api tejasvī śrīmān parvatasaṃnibhaḥ 5.040.028c kṣitāv āvidhya lāṅgūlaṃ nanāda ca mahāsvanam
GE09ram_1-7u:14518: 5.040.029c dadṛśuś ca hanūmantaṃ saṃdhyāmegham ivonnatam 5.040.030a svāmisaṃdeśaniḥśaṅkās tatas te rākṣasāḥ kapim 5.040.030c citraiḥ praharaṇair bhīmair abhipetus tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14519: 5.040.031a sa taiḥ parivṛtaḥ śūraiḥ sarvataḥ sa mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14521: 5.040.032a sa taṃ parigham ādāya jaghāna rajanīcarān
GE09ram_1-7u:14522: 5.040.033a sa pannagam ivādāya sphurantaṃ vinatāsutaḥ 5.040.033c vicacārāmbare vīraḥ parigṛhya ca mārutiḥ 5.040.034a sa hatvā rākṣasān vīraḥ kiṃkarān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14523: 5.040.034c yuddhākāṅkṣī punar vīras toraṇaṃ samupasthitaḥ 5.040.035a tatas tasmād bhayān muktāḥ kati cit tatra rākṣasāḥ 5.040.035c nihatān kiṃkarān sarvān rāvaṇāya nyavedayan 5.040.036a sa rākṣasānāṃ nihataṃ mahābalaṃ; niśamya rājā parivṛttalocanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14525: 5.041.001a tataḥ sa kiṃkarān hatvā hanūmān dhyānam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14526: 5.041.001c vanaṃ bhagnaṃ mayā caityaprāsādo na vināśitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14527: 5.041.001e tasmāt prāsādam apy evam imaṃ vidhvaṃsayāmy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:14528: 5.041.002a iti saṃcintya hanumān manasā darśayan balam
GE09ram_1-7u:14531: 5.041.003a saṃpradhṛṣya ca durdharṣaś caityaprāsādam unnatam 5.041.003c hanūmān prajvalaṃl lakṣmyā pāriyātropamo 'bhavat
GE09ram_1-7u:14532: 5.041.004a sa bhūtvā tu mahākāyo hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14533: 5.041.004c dhṛṣṭam āsphoṭayām āsa laṅkāṃ śabdena pūrayan
GE09ram_1-7u:14535: 5.041.005c petur vihaṃgā gaganād uccaiś cedam aghoṣayat
GE09ram_1-7u:14536: 5.041.006a jayaty atibalo rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14538: 5.041.007a dāso 'haṃ kosalendrasya rāmasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ 5.041.007c hanumāñ śatrusainyānāṃ nihantā mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14539: 5.041.008a na rāvaṇasahasraṃ me yuddhe pratibalaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_1-7u:14540: 5.041.008c śilābhis tu praharataḥ pādapaiś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14541: 5.041.009a ardayitvā purīṃ laṅkām abhivādya ca maithilīm
GE09ram_1-7u:14543: 5.041.010a evam uktvā vimānasthaś caityasthān haripuṃgavaḥ 5.041.010c nanāda bhīmanirhrādo rakṣasāṃ janayan bhayam 5.041.011a tena śabdena mahatā caityapālāḥ śataṃ yayuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14544: 5.041.011c gṛhītvā vividhān astrān prāsān khaḍgān paraśvadhān
GE09ram_1-7u:14546: 5.041.012a āvarta iva gaṅgāyās toyasya vipulo mahān
GE09ram_1-7u:14547: 5.041.012c parikṣipya hariśreṣṭhaṃ sa babhau rakṣasāṃ gaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14548: 5.041.013a tato vātātmajaḥ kruddho bhīmarūpaṃ samāsthitaḥ 5.041.014a prāsādasya mahāṃs tasya stambhaṃ hemapariṣkṛtam 5.041.014c utpāṭayitvā vegena hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14549: 5.041.014e tatas taṃ bhrāmayām āsa śatadhāraṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14550: 5.041.015a sa rākṣasaśataṃ hatvā vajreṇendra ivāsurān 5.041.015c antarikṣasthitaḥ śrīmān idaṃ vacanam abravīt 5.041.016a mādṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi visṛṣṭāni mahātmanām
GE09ram_1-7u:14552: 5.041.017a śataiḥ śatasahasraiś ca koṭībhir ayutair api
GE09ram_1-7u:14553: 5.041.017c āgamiṣyati sugrīvaḥ sarveṣāṃ vo niṣūdanaḥ 5.041.018a neyam asti purī laṅkā na yūyaṃ na ca rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14554: 5.041.018c yasmād ikṣvākunāthena baddhaṃ vairaṃ mahātmanā 5.042.001a saṃdiṣṭo rākṣasendreṇa prahastasya suto balī 5.042.001c jambumālī mahādaṃṣṭro nirjagāma dhanurdharaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14557: 5.042.003a dhanuḥ śakradhanuḥ prakhyaṃ mahad rucirasāyakam 5.042.003c visphārayāṇo vegena
GE09ram_1-7u:14558: 5.042.004a tasya visphāraghoṣeṇa dhanuṣo mahatā diśaḥ 5.042.004c pradiśaś ca nabhaś caiva sahasā samapūryata
GE09ram_1-7u:14559: 5.042.005a rathena kharayuktena tam āgatam udīkṣya saḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14560: 5.042.005c hanūmān vegasaṃpanno jaharṣa ca nanāda ca
GE09ram_1-7u:14562: 5.042.006c jambumālī mahābāhur vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ 5.042.007a ardhacandreṇa vadane śirasy ekena karṇinā 5.042.007c bāhvor vivyādha nārācair daśabhis taṃ kapīśvaram
GE09ram_1-7u:14563: 5.042.008a tasya tac chuśubhe tāmraṃ śareṇābhihataṃ mukham
GE09ram_1-7u:14567: 5.042.010a tarasā tāṃ samutpāṭya cikṣepa balavad balī
GE09ram_1-7u:14568: 5.042.010c tāṃ śarair daśabhiḥ kruddhas tāḍayām āsa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14569: 5.042.011a vipannaṃ karma tad dṛṣṭvā hanūmāṃś caṇḍavikramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14570: 5.042.011c sālaṃ vipulam utpāṭya bhrāmayām āsa vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:14571: 5.042.012a bhrāmayantaṃ kapiṃ dṛṣṭvā sālavṛkṣaṃ mahābalam 5.042.012c cikṣepa subahūn bāṇāñ jambumālī mahābalaḥ 5.042.013a sālaṃ caturbhir ciccheda vānaraṃ pañcabhir bhuje
GE09ram_1-7u:14572: 5.042.013c urasy ekena bāṇena daśabhis tu stanāntare
GE09ram_1-7u:14573: 5.042.014a sa śaraiḥ pūritatanuḥ krodhena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14574: 5.042.014c tam eva parighaṃ gṛhya bhrāmayām āsa vegitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14575: 5.042.015a ativego 'tivegena bhrāmayitvā balotkaṭaḥ 5.042.015c parighaṃ pātayām āsa jambumāler mahorasi 5.042.016a tasya caiva śiro nāsti na bāhū na ca jānunī
GE09ram_1-7u:14576: 5.042.016c na dhanur na ratho nāśvās tatrādṛśyanta neṣavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14577: 5.042.017a sa hatas tarasā tena jambumālī mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14579: 5.042.018a jambumāliṃ ca nihataṃ kiṃkarāṃś ca mahābalān
GE09ram_1-7u:14582: 5.042.019c amātyaputrān ativīryavikramān; samādideśāśu niśācareśvaraḥ 5.043.001a tatas te rākṣasendreṇa coditā mantriṇaḥ sutāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14583: 5.043.001c niryayur bhavanāt tasmāt sapta saptārcivarcasaḥ 5.043.002a mahābalaparīvārā dhanuṣmanto mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14589: 5.043.005a jananyas tās tatas teṣāṃ viditvā kiṃkarān hatān
GE09ram_1-7u:14595: 5.043.008a avakīrṇas tatas tābhir hanūmāñ śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ 5.043.008c abhavat saṃvṛtākāraḥ śailarāḍ iva vṛṣṭibhiḥ 5.043.009a sa śarān vañcayām āsa teṣām āśucaraḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14597: 5.043.010a sa taiḥ krīḍan dhanuṣmadbhir vyomni vīraḥ prakāśate
GE09ram_1-7u:14598: 5.043.010c dhanuṣmadbhir yathā meghair mārutaḥ prabhur ambare
GE09ram_1-7u:14599: 5.043.011a sa kṛtvā ninadaṃ ghoraṃ trāsayaṃs tāṃ mahācamūm
GE09ram_1-7u:14600: 5.043.011c cakāra hanumān vegaṃ teṣu rakṣaḥsu vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:14601: 5.043.012a talenābhihanat kāṃś cit pādaiḥ kāṃś cit paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14602: 5.043.012c muṣṭinābhyahanat kāṃś cin nakhaiḥ kāṃś cid vyadārayat
GE09ram_1-7u:14603: 5.043.013a pramamāthorasā kāṃś cid ūrubhyām aparān kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14604: 5.043.013c ke cit tasyaiva nādena tatraiva patitā bhuvi
GE09ram_1-7u:14605: 5.043.014a tatas teṣv avapanneṣu bhūmau nipatiteṣu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:14606: 5.043.014c tat sainyam agamat sarvaṃ diśo daśabhayārditam
GE09ram_1-7u:14607: 5.043.015a vinedur visvaraṃ nāgā nipetur bhuvi vājinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14608: 5.043.015c bhagnanīḍadhvajacchatrair bhūś ca kīrṇābhavad rathaiḥ 5.043.016a sa tān pravṛddhān vinihatya rākṣasān; mahābalaś caṇḍaparākramaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14609: 5.043.016c yuyutsur anyaiḥ punar eva rākṣasais; tad eva vīro 'bhijagāma
GE09ram_1-7u:14611: 5.044.001a hatān mantrisutān buddhvā vānareṇa mahātmanā 5.044.001c rāvaṇaḥ saṃvṛtākāraś cakāra matim uttamām 5.044.002a sa virūpākṣayūpākṣau durdharaṃ caiva rākṣasaṃ 5.044.002c praghasaṃ bhāsakarṇaṃ ca pañcasenāgranāyakān
GE09ram_1-7u:14615: 5.044.004c savājirathamātaṅgāḥ sa kapiḥ śāsyatām iti 5.044.005a yat taiś ca khalu bhāvyaṃ syāt tam āsādya vanālayam
GE09ram_1-7u:14617: 5.044.006a na hy ahaṃ taṃ kapiṃ manye karmaṇā pratitarkayan 5.044.006c sarvathā tan mahad bhūtaṃ mahābalaparigraham 5.044.006e bhaved indreṇa vā sṛṣṭam asmadarthaṃ tapobalāt
GE09ram_1-7u:14618: 5.044.007a sanāgayakṣagandharvā devāsuramaharṣayaḥ 5.044.007c yuṣmābhiḥ sahitaiḥ sarvair mayā saha vinirjitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14619: 5.044.008a tair avaśyaṃ vidhātavyaṃ vyalīkaṃ kiṃ cid eva naḥ 5.044.008c tad eva nātra saṃdehaḥ prasahya parigṛhyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:14620: 5.044.009a nāvamanyo bhavadbhiś ca hariḥ krūraparākramaḥ 5.044.009c dṛṣṭā hi harayaḥ śīghrā mayā vipulavikramāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14621: 5.044.010a vālī ca saha sugrīvo jāmbavāṃś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14622: 5.044.010c nīlaḥ senāpatiś caiva ye cānye dvividādayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14623: 5.044.011a naiva teṣāṃ gatir bhīmā na tejo na parākramaḥ 5.044.011c na matir na balotsāho na rūpaparikalpanam
GE09ram_1-7u:14624: 5.044.012a mahat sattvam idaṃ jñeyaṃ kapirūpaṃ vyavasthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:14625: 5.044.012c prayatnaṃ mahad āsthāya kriyatām asya nigrahaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14626: 5.044.013a kāmaṃ lokās trayaḥ sendrāḥ sasurāsuramānavāḥ 5.044.013c bhavatām agrataḥ sthātuṃ na paryāptā raṇājire
GE09ram_1-7u:14627: 5.044.014a tathāpi tu nayajñena jayam ākāṅkṣatā raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:14628: 5.044.014c ātmā rakṣyaḥ prayatnena yuddhasiddhir hi cañcalā
GE09ram_1-7u:14629: 5.044.015a te svāmivacanaṃ sarve pratigṛhya mahaujasaḥ 5.044.015c samutpetur mahāvegā hutāśasamatejasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14630: 5.044.016a rathaiś ca mattair nāgaiś ca vājibhiś ca mahājavaiḥ 5.044.016c śastraiś ca vividhais tīkṣṇaiḥ sarvaiś copacitā balaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14631: 5.044.017a tatas taṃ dadṛśur vīrā dīpyamānaṃ mahākapim
GE09ram_1-7u:14635: 5.044.019a taṃ samīkṣyaiva te sarve dikṣu sarvāsv avasthitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14636: 5.044.019c tais taiḥ praharaṇair bhīmair abhipetus tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14637: 5.044.020a tasya pañcāyasās tīkṣṇāḥ sitāḥ pītamukhāḥ śarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14639: 5.044.021a sa taiḥ pañcabhir āviddhaḥ śaraiḥ śirasi vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14640: 5.044.021c utpapāta nadan vyomni diśo daśa vinādayan
GE09ram_1-7u:14641: 5.044.022a tatas tu durdharo vīraḥ sarathaḥ sajjakārmukaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14642: 5.044.022c kirañ śaraśatair naikair abhipede mahābalaḥ 5.044.023a sa kapir vārayām āsa taṃ vyomni śaravarṣiṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:14643: 5.044.023c vṛṣṭimantaṃ payodānte payodam iva mārutaḥ 5.044.024a ardyamānas tatas tena durdhareṇānilātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14644: 5.044.024c cakāra ninadaṃ bhūyo vyavardhata ca vegavān
GE09ram_1-7u:14645: 5.044.025a sa dūraṃ sahasotpatya durdharasya rathe hariḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14646: 5.044.025c nipapāta mahāvego vidyudrāśir girāv iva 5.044.026a tatas taṃ mathitāṣṭāśvaṃ rathaṃ bhagnākṣakūvaram 5.044.026c vihāya nyapatad bhūmau durdharas tyaktajīvitaḥ 5.044.027a taṃ virūpākṣayūpākṣau dṛṣṭvā nipatitaṃ bhuvi 5.044.027c saṃjātaroṣau durdharṣāv utpetatur ariṃdamau
GE09ram_1-7u:14648: 5.044.028c mudgarābhyāṃ mahābāhur vakṣasy abhihataḥ kapiḥ 5.044.029a tayor vegavator vegaṃ vinihatya mahābalaḥ 5.044.029c nipapāta punar bhūmau suparṇasamavikramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14649: 5.044.030a sa sālavṛkṣam āsādya samutpāṭya ca vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14650: 5.044.030c tāv ubhau rākṣasau vīrau jaghāna pavanātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14651: 5.044.031a tatas tāṃs trīn hatāñ jñātvā vānareṇa tarasvinā
GE09ram_1-7u:14652: 5.044.031c abhipede mahāvegaḥ prasahya praghaso harim 5.044.032a bhāsakarṇaś ca saṃkruddhaḥ śūlam ādāya vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:14655: 5.044.033c bhāsakarṇaś ca śūlena rākṣasaḥ kapisattamam 5.044.034a sa tābhyāṃ vikṣatair gātrair asṛgdigdhatanūruhaḥ 5.044.034c abhavad vānaraḥ kruddho bālasūryasamaprabhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14657: 5.044.035c jaghāna hanumān vīro rākṣasau kapikuñjaraḥ 5.044.036a tatas teṣv avasanneṣu senāpatiṣu pañcasu 5.044.036c balaṃ tad avaśeṣaṃ tu nāśayām āsa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14658: 5.044.037a aśvair aśvān gajair nāgān yodhair yodhān rathai rathān 5.044.037c sa kapir nāśayām āsa sahasrākṣa ivāsurān
GE09ram_1-7u:14659: 5.044.038a hatair nāgaiś ca turagair bhagnākṣaiś ca mahārathaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14660: 5.044.038c hataiś ca rākṣasair bhūmī ruddhamārgā samantataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14661: 5.044.039a tataḥ kapis tān dhvajinīpatīn raṇe; nihatya vīrān sabalān
GE09ram_1-7u:14663: 5.044.039c tad eva vīraḥ parigṛhya toraṇaṃ; kṛtakṣaṇaḥ kāla iva prajākṣaye
GE09ram_1-7u:14664: 5.045.001a senāpatīn pañca sa tu pramāpitān; hanūmatā sānucarān savāhanān
GE09ram_1-7u:14665: 5.045.001c samīkṣya rājā samaroddhatonmukhaṃ; kumāram akṣaṃ prasamaikṣatākṣatam
GE09ram_1-7u:14666: 5.045.002a sa tasya dṛṣṭyarpaṇasaṃpracoditaḥ; pratāpavān kāñcanacitrakārmukaḥ 5.045.002c samutpapātātha sadasy udīrito; dvijātimukhyair haviṣeva pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14668: 5.045.003c rathāṃ samāsthāya yayau sa vīryavān; mahāhariṃ taṃ prati
GE09ram_1-7u:14671: 5.045.004c patākinaṃ ratnavibhūṣitadhvajaṃ; manojavāṣṭāśvavaraiḥ suyojitam 5.045.005a surāsurādhṛṣyam asaṃgacāriṇaṃ; raviprabhaṃ vyomacaraṃ samāhitam
GE09ram_1-7u:14673: 5.045.006a virājamānaṃ pratipūrṇavastunā; sahemadāmnā śaśisūryavarvasā 5.045.006c divākarābhaṃ ratham āsthitas tataḥ; sa nirjagāmāmaratulyavikramaḥ 5.045.007a sa pūrayan khaṃ ca mahīṃ ca sācalāṃ;
GE09ram_1-7u:14675: 5.045.007c balaiḥ sametaiḥ sa hi toraṇasthitaṃ; samartham āsīnam upāgamat
GE09ram_1-7u:14677: 5.045.008a sa taṃ samāsādya hariṃ harīkṣaṇo; yugāntakālāgnim iva prajākṣaye
GE09ram_1-7u:14678: 5.045.008c avasthitaṃ vismitajātasaṃbhramaḥ; samaikṣatākṣo bahumānacakṣuṣā 5.045.009a sa tasya vegaṃ ca kaper mahātmanaḥ; parākramaṃ cāriṣu pārhtivātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14679: 5.045.009c vicārayan khaṃ ca balaṃ mahābalo; himakṣaye sūrya ivābhivardhate
GE09ram_1-7u:14680: 5.045.010a sa jātamanyuḥ prasamīkṣya vikramaṃ; sthiraḥ sthitaḥ saṃyati
GE09ram_1-7u:14682: 5.045.010c samāhitātmā hanumantam āhave; pracodayām āsa śarais tribhiḥ śitaiḥ 5.045.011a tataḥ kapiṃ taṃ prasamīkṣya garvitaṃ; jitaśramaṃ śatruparājayor jitam
GE09ram_1-7u:14683: 5.045.011c avaikṣatākṣaḥ samudīrṇamānasaḥ; sabāṇapāṇiḥ pragṛhītakārmukaḥ 5.045.012a sa hemaniṣkāṅgadacārukuṇḍalaḥ; samāsasādāśu parākramaḥ kapim
GE09ram_1-7u:14684: 5.045.012c tayor babhūvāpratimaḥ samāgamaḥ; surāsurāṇām api saṃbhramapradaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14685: 5.045.013a rarāsa bhūmir na tatāpa bhānumān; vavau na vāyuḥ pracacāla cācalaḥ 5.045.013c kapeḥ kumārasya ca vīkṣya saṃyugaṃ; nanāda ca dyaur udadhiś ca cukṣubhe
GE09ram_1-7u:14686: 5.045.014a tataḥ sa vīraḥ sumukhān patatriṇaḥ; suvarṇapuṅkhān saviṣān ivoragān
GE09ram_1-7u:14687: 5.045.014c samādhisaṃyogavimokṣatattvavic; charān atha trīn kapimūrdhny apātayat 5.045.015a sa taiḥ śarair mūrdhni samaṃ nipātitaiḥ; kṣarann asṛgdigdhavivṛttalocanaḥ 5.045.015c navoditādityanibhaḥ śarāṃśumān; vyarājatāditya ivāṃśumālikaḥ 5.045.016a tataḥ sa piṅgādhipamantrisattamaḥ; samīkṣya taṃ rājavarātmajaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:14690: 5.045.017a sa mandarāgrastha ivāṃśumālī; vivṛddhakopo balavīryasaṃyutaḥ 5.045.017c kumāram akṣaṃ sabalaṃ savāhanaṃ; dadāha netrāgnimarīcibhis tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:14691: 5.045.018a tataḥ sa bāṇāsanaśakrakārmukaḥ; śarapravarṣo yudhi rākṣasāmbudaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14692: 5.045.018c śarān mumocāśu harīśvarācale; balāhako vṛṣṭim ivācalottame
GE09ram_1-7u:14694: 5.045.019c kumāram akṣaṃ prasamīkṣya saṃyuge; nanāda harṣād ghanatulyavikramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14695: 5.045.020a sa bālabhāvād yudhi vīryadarpitaḥ; pravṛddhamanyuḥ kṣatajopamekṣaṇaḥ 5.045.020c samāsasādāpratimaṃ raṇe kapiṃ; gajo mahākūpam ivāvṛtaṃ tṛṇaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14696: 5.045.021a sa tena bāṇaiḥ prasabhaṃ nipātitaiś; cakāra nādaṃ ghananādaniḥsvanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14697: 5.045.021c samutpapātāśu nabhaḥ sa mārutir; bhujoruvikṣepaṇa ghoradarśanaḥ 5.045.022a samutpatantaṃ samabhidravad balī; sa rākṣasānāṃ pravaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14699: 5.045.022c rathī rathaśreṣṭhatamaḥ kirañ śaraiḥ; payodharaḥ śailam ivāśmavṛṣṭibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14700: 5.045.023a sa tāñ śarāṃs tasya vimokṣayan kapiś; cacāra vīraḥ pathi
GE09ram_1-7u:14702: 5.045.023c śarāntare mārutavad viniṣpatan; manojavaḥ saṃyati caṇḍavikramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14703: 5.045.024a tam āttabāṇāsanam āhavonmukhaṃ; kham āstṛṇantaṃ vividhaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14705: 5.045.024c avaikṣatākṣaṃ bahumānacakṣuṣā; jagāma cintāṃ ca sa mārutātmajaḥ 5.045.025a tataḥ śarair bhinnabhujāntaraḥ kapiḥ; kumāravaryeṇa mahātmanā nadan
GE09ram_1-7u:14706: 5.045.025c mahābhujaḥ karmaviśeṣatattvavid; vicintayām āsa raṇe parākramam
GE09ram_1-7u:14707: 5.045.026a abālavad bāladivākaraprabhaḥ; karoty ayaṃ karma mahan mahābalaḥ 5.045.026c na cāsya sarvāhavakarmaśobhinaḥ; pramāpaṇe me matir atra jāyate 5.045.027a ayaṃ mahātmā ca mahāṃś ca vīryataḥ; samāhitaś cātisahaś ca
GE09ram_1-7u:14709: 5.045.027c asaṃśayaṃ karmaguṇodayād ayaṃ; sanāgayakṣair munibhiś ca
GE09ram_1-7u:14713: 5.045.028c parākramo hy asya manāṃsi kampayet; surāsurāṇām api śīghrakāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14714: 5.045.029a na khalv ayaṃ nābhibhaved upekṣitaḥ; parākramo hy asya raṇe vivardhate 5.045.029c pramāpaṇaṃ tv eva mamāsya rocate; na vardhamāno 'gnir upekṣituṃ kṣamaḥ 5.045.030a iti pravegaṃ tu parasya tarkayan; svakarmayogaṃ ca vidhāya
GE09ram_1-7u:14716: 5.045.030c cakāra vegaṃ tu mahābalas tadā; matiṃ ca cakre 'sya vadhe mahākapiḥ 5.045.031a sa tasya tān aṣṭahayān mahājavān; samāhitān bhārasahān vivartane
GE09ram_1-7u:14717: 5.045.031c jaghāna vīraḥ pathi vāyusevite; talaprahālaiḥ pavanātmajaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14718: 5.045.032a tatas talenābhihato mahārathaḥ; sa tasya piṅgādhipamantrinirjitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14719: 5.045.032c sa bhagnanīḍaḥ parimuktakūbaraḥ; papāta bhūmau hatavājir
GE09ram_1-7u:14721: 5.045.033a sa taṃ parityajya mahāratho rathaṃ; sakārmukaḥ khaḍgadharaḥ kham utpatat 5.045.033c tapo'bhiyogād ṛṣir ugravīryavān; vihāya dehaṃ marutām ivālayam
GE09ram_1-7u:14722: 5.045.034a tataḥ kapis taṃ vicarantam ambare; patatrirājānilasiddhasevite
GE09ram_1-7u:14723: 5.045.034c sametya taṃ mārutavegavikramaḥ; krameṇa jagrāha ca pādayor dṛḍham 5.045.035a sa taṃ samāvidhya sahasraśaḥ kapir; mahoragaṃ gṛhya ivāṇḍajeśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14724: 5.045.035c mumoca vegāt pitṛtulyavikramo; mahītale saṃyati vānarottamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14725: 5.045.036a sa bhagnabāhūrukaṭīśiro dharaḥ; kṣarann asṛn nirmathitāsthilocanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14726: 5.045.036c sa bhinnasaṃdhiḥ pravikīrṇabandhano; hataḥ kṣitau vāyusutena
GE09ram_1-7u:14728: 5.045.037a mahākapir bhūmitale nipīḍya taṃ; cakāra rakṣo'dhipater mahad bhayam 5.045.038a maharṣibhiś cakracarair mahāvrataiḥ; sametya bhūtaiś ca
GE09ram_1-7u:14730: 5.045.038c suraiś ca sendrair bhṛśajātavismayair; hate kumāre sa kapir nirīkṣitaḥ 5.045.039a nihatya taṃ vajrasutopamaprabhaṃ; kumāram akṣaṃ kṣatajopamekṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:14731: 5.045.039c tad eva vīro 'bhijagāma toraṇaṃ; kṛtakṣaṇaḥ kāla iva prajākṣaye
GE09ram_1-7u:14732: 5.046.001a tatas tu rakṣo'dhipatir mahātmā; hanūmatākṣe nihate kumāre
GE09ram_1-7u:14733: 5.046.001c manaḥ samādhāya tadendrakalpaṃ; samādideśendrajitaṃ sa roṣāt
GE09ram_1-7u:14734: 5.046.002a tvam astravic chastrabhṛtāṃ variṣṭhaḥ; surāsurāṇām api śokadātā
GE09ram_1-7u:14736: 5.046.003a tavāstrabalam āsādya nāsurā na marudgaṇāḥ 5.046.003c na kaś cit triṣu lokeṣu saṃyuge na gataśramaḥ 5.046.004a bhujavīryābhiguptaś ca tapasā cābhirakṣitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14738: 5.046.005a na te 'sty aśakyaṃ samareṣu karmaṇā; na te 'sty akāryaṃ matipūrvamantraṇe 5.046.005c na so 'sti kaś cit triṣu saṃgraheṣu vai; na veda yas te
GE09ram_1-7u:14740: 5.046.006a mamānurūpaṃ tapaso balaṃ ca te; parākramaś cāstrabalaṃ ca
GE09ram_1-7u:14742: 5.046.006c na tvāṃ samāsādya raṇāvamarde; manaḥ śramaṃ gacchati
GE09ram_1-7u:14744: 5.046.007a nihatā iṃkarāḥ sarve jambumālī ca rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14745: 5.046.007c amātyaputrā vīrāś ca pañca senāgrayāyinaḥ 5.046.008a sahodaras te dayitaḥ kumāro 'kṣaś ca sūditaḥ 5.046.008c na tu teṣv eva me sāro yas tvayy ariniṣūdana
GE09ram_1-7u:14746: 5.046.009a idaṃ hi dṛṣṭvā matiman mahad balaṃ; kapeḥ prabhāvaṃ ca
GE09ram_1-7u:14747: parākramaṃ ca 5.046.009c tvam ātmanaś cāpi samīkṣya sāraṃ; kuruṣva vegaṃ svabalānurūpam
GE09ram_1-7u:14748: 5.046.010a balāvamardas tvayi saṃnikṛṣṭe; yathā gate śāmyati śāntaśatrau
GE09ram_1-7u:14749: 5.046.010c tathā samīkṣyātmabalaṃ paraṃ ca; samārabhasvāstravidāṃ variṣṭha 5.046.011a na khalv iyaṃ matiḥ śreṣṭhā yat tvāṃ saṃpreṣayāmy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:14750: 5.046.011c iyaṃ ca rājadharmāṇāṃ kṣatrasya ca matir matā
GE09ram_1-7u:14751: 5.046.012a nānāśastraiś ca saṃgrāme vaiśāradyam ariṃdama 5.046.012c avaśyam eva boddhavyaṃ kāmyaś ca vijayo raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:14752: 5.046.013a tataḥ pitus tad vacanaṃ niśamya; pradakṣiṇaṃ dakṣasutaprabhāvaḥ 5.046.013c cakāra bhartāram adīnasattvo; raṇāya vīraḥ pratipannabuddhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14753: 5.046.014a tatas taiḥ svagaṇair iṣṭair indrajit pratipūjitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14756: 5.046.015c nirjagāma mahātejāḥ samudra iva parvasu 5.046.016a sa pakṣi rājopamatulyavegair; vyālaiś caturbhiḥ sitatīkṣṇadaṃṣṭraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14757: 5.046.016c rathaṃ samāyuktam asaṃgavegaṃ; samārurohendrajid indrakalpaḥ 5.046.017a sa rathī dhanvināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ śastrajño 'stravidāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14759: 5.046.018a sa tasya rathanirghoṣaṃ jyāsvanaṃ kārmukasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:14761: 5.046.019a sumahac cāpam ādāya śitaśalyāṃś ca sāyakān
GE09ram_1-7u:14763: 5.046.020a tasmiṃs tataḥ saṃyati jātaharṣe; raṇāya nirgacchati bāṇapāṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:14764: 5.046.020c diśaś ca sarvāḥ kaluṣā babhūvur; mṛgāś ca raudrā bahudhā vineduḥ 5.046.021a samāgatās tatra tu nāgayakṣā; maharṣayaś cakracarāś ca siddhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14765: 5.046.021c nabhaḥ samāvṛtya ca pakṣisaṃghā; vinedur uccaiḥ paramaprahṛṣṭāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14766: 5.046.022a āyantaṃ sarathaṃ dṛṣṭvā tūrṇam indrajitaṃ kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14767: 5.046.022c vinanāda mahānādaṃ vyavardhata ca vegavān 5.046.023a indrajit tu rathaṃ divyam āsthitaś citrakārmukaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14769: 5.046.024a tataḥ sametāv atitīkṣṇavegau; mahābalau tau raṇanirviśaṅkau
GE09ram_1-7u:14770: 5.046.024c kapiś ca rakṣo'dhipateś ca putraḥ; surāsurendrāv iva baddhavairau
GE09ram_1-7u:14771: 5.046.025a sa tasya vīrasya mahārathasyā; dhanuṣmataḥ saṃyati saṃmatasya
GE09ram_1-7u:14772: 5.046.025c śarapravegaṃ vyahanat pravṛddhaś; cacāra mārge pitur aprameyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14773: 5.046.026a tataḥ śarān āyatatīkṣṇaśalyān; supatriṇaḥ kāñcanacitrapuṅkhān 5.046.026c mumoca vīraḥ paravīrahantā; susaṃtatān vajranipātavegān 5.046.027a sa tasya tat syandananiḥsvanaṃ ca; mṛdaṅgabherīpaṭahasvanaṃ ca 5.046.027c vikṛṣyamāṇasya ca kārmukasya; niśamya ghoṣaṃ punar utpapāta
GE09ram_1-7u:14774: 5.046.028a śarāṇām antareṣv āśu vyavartata mahākapiḥ 5.046.028c haris tasyābhilakṣasya mokṣayaṃl lakṣyasaṃgraham
GE09ram_1-7u:14775: 5.046.029a śarāṇām agratas tasya punaḥ samabhivartata 5.046.029c prasārya hastau hanumān
GE09ram_1-7u:14778: 5.046.031a hanūmato veda na rākṣaso 'ntaraṃ; na mārutis tasya mahātmano
GE09ram_1-7u:14780: 5.046.031c parasparaṃ nirviṣahau babhūvatuḥ; sametya tau devasamānavikramau
GE09ram_1-7u:14781: 5.046.032a tatas tu lakṣye sa vihanyamāne; śareṣu mogheṣu ca saṃpatatsu
GE09ram_1-7u:14783: 5.046.033a tato matiṃ rākṣasarājasūnuś; cakāra tasmin harivīramukhye
GE09ram_1-7u:14784: 5.046.033c avadhyatāṃ tasya kapeḥ samīkṣya; kathaṃ nigacched iti
GE09ram_1-7u:14786: 5.046.034a tataḥ paitāmahāṃ vīraḥ so 'stram astravidāṃ varaḥ 5.046.034c saṃdadhe sumahātejās taṃ haripravaraṃ prati 5.046.035a avadhyo 'yam iti jñātvā tam astreṇāstratattvavit
GE09ram_1-7u:14788: 5.046.036a tena baddhas tato 'streṇa rākṣasena sa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14789: 5.046.036c abhavan nirviceṣṭaś ca papāta ca mahītale
GE09ram_1-7u:14790: 5.046.037a tato 'tha buddhvā sa tadāstrabandhaṃ; prabhoḥ prabhāvād vigatālpavegaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14791: 5.046.037c pitāmahānugraham ātmanaś ca; vicintayām āsa haripravīraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14792: 5.046.038a tataḥ svāyambhuvair mantrair brahmāstram abhimantritam 5.046.038c hanūmāṃś cintayām āsa varadānaṃ pitāmahāt 5.046.039a na me 'strabandhasya ca śaktir asti; vimokṣaṇe lokaguroḥ prabhāvāt
GE09ram_1-7u:14793: 5.046.039c ity evam evaṃvihito 'strabandho; mayātmayoner anuvartitavyaḥ 5.046.040a sa vīryam astrasya kapir vicārya; pitāmahānugraham ātmanaś ca
GE09ram_1-7u:14795: 5.046.041a astreṇāpi hi baddhasya bhayaṃ mama na jāyate
GE09ram_1-7u:14797: 5.046.042a grahaṇe cāpi rakṣobhir mahan me guṇadarśanam
GE09ram_1-7u:14798: 5.046.042c rākṣasendreṇa saṃvādas tasmād gṛhṇantu māṃ pare
GE09ram_1-7u:14799: 5.046.043a sa niścitārthaḥ paravīrahantā; samīkṣya karī vinivṛttaceṣṭaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14800: 5.046.043c paraiḥ prasahyābhigatair nigṛhya; nanāda tais taiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14802: 5.046.044a tatas taṃ rākṣasā dṛṣṭvā nirviceṣṭam ariṃdamam
GE09ram_1-7u:14803: 5.046.044c babandhuḥ śaṇavalkaiś ca drumacīraiś ca saṃhataiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14804: 5.046.045a sa rocayām āsa paraiś ca bandhanaṃ; prasahya vīrair abhinigrahaṃ ca 5.046.045c kautūhalān māṃ yadi rākṣasendro; draṣṭuṃ vyavasyed iti
GE09ram_1-7u:14806: 5.046.046a sa baddhas tena valkena vimukto 'streṇa vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:14807: 5.046.046c astrabandhaḥ sa cānyaṃ hi na bandham anuvartate
GE09ram_1-7u:14808: 5.046.047a athendrajit taṃ drumacīrabandhaṃ; vicārya vīraḥ kapisattamaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:14810: 5.046.047c vimuktam astreṇa jagāma cintām; anyena baddho hy anuvartate
GE09ram_1-7u:14812: 5.046.048a aho mahat karma kṛtaṃ nirarthakaṃ; na rākṣasair mantragatir
GE09ram_1-7u:14814: 5.046.048c punaś ca nāstre vihate 'stram anyat; pravartate saṃśayitāḥ sma
GE09ram_1-7u:14816: 5.046.049a astreṇa hanumān mukto nātmānam avabudhyate 5.046.049c kṛṣyamāṇas tu rakṣobhis taiś ca bandhair nipīḍitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14817: 5.046.050a hanyamānas tataḥ krūrai rākṣasaiḥ kāṣṭhamuṣṭibhiḥ 5.046.050c samīpaṃ rākṣasendrasya prākṛṣyata sa vānaraḥ 5.046.051a athendrajit taṃ prasamīkṣya muktam; astreṇa baddhaṃ drumacīrasūtraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14818: 5.046.051c vyadarśayat tatra mahābalaṃ taṃ; haripravīraṃ sagaṇāya rājñe
GE09ram_1-7u:14819: 5.046.052a taṃ mattam iva mātaṅgaṃ baddhaṃ kapivarottamam
GE09ram_1-7u:14821: 5.046.053a ko 'yaṃ kasya kuto vāpi kiṃ kāryaṃ ko vyapāśrayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14822: 5.046.053c iti rākṣasavīrāṇāṃ tatra saṃjajñire kathāḥ 5.046.054a hanyatāṃ dahyatāṃ vāpi bhakṣyatām iti cāpare
GE09ram_1-7u:14823: 5.046.054c rākṣasās tatra saṃkruddhāḥ parasparam athābruvan 5.046.055a atītya mārgaṃ sahasā mahātmā; sa tatra rakṣo'dhipapādamūle
GE09ram_1-7u:14824: 5.046.055c dadarśa rājñaḥ paricāravṛddhān; gṛhaṃ mahāratnavibhūṣitaṃ ca
GE09ram_1-7u:14825: 5.046.056a sa dadarśa mahātejā rāvaṇaḥ kapisattamam 5.046.056c rakṣobhir vikṛtākāraiḥ kṛṣyamāṇam itas tataḥ 5.046.057a rākṣasādhipatiṃ cāpi dadarśa kapisattamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14827: 5.046.058a sa roṣasaṃvartitatāmradṛṣṭir; daśānanas taṃ kapim anvavekṣya
GE09ram_1-7u:14828: 5.046.058c athopaviṣṭān kulaśīlavṛddhān; samādiśat taṃ prati mantramukhyān
GE09ram_1-7u:14829: 5.046.059a yathākramaṃ taiḥ sa kapiś ca pṛṣṭaḥ; kāryārtham arthasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:14830: mūlam ādau 5.046.059c nivedayām āsa harīśvarasya; dūtaḥ sakāśād aham āgato 'smi
GE09ram_1-7u:14831: 5.047.001a tataḥ sa karmaṇā tasya vismito bhīmavikramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14835: 5.047.003a vajrasaṃyogasaṃyuktair mahārhamaṇivigrahaiḥ 5.047.003c haimair ābharaṇaiś citrair manaseva prakalpitaiḥ 5.047.004a mahārhakṣaumasaṃvītaṃ raktacandanarūṣitam 5.047.004c svanuliptaṃ vicitrābhir vividhabhiś ca bhaktibhiḥ 5.047.005a vipulair darśanīyaiś ca rakṣākṣair bhīmadarśanaiḥ 5.047.005c dīptatīkṣṇamahādaṃṣṭraiḥ pralambadaśanacchadaiḥ 5.047.006a śirobhir daśabhir vīraṃ bhrājamānaṃ mahaujasaṃ 5.047.006c nānāvyālasamākīrṇaiḥ śikharair iva mandaram
GE09ram_1-7u:14845: 5.047.011c mantribhir mantratattvajñair nikumbhena ca mantriṇā 5.047.012a upopaviṣṭaṃ rakṣobhiś caturbhir baladarpitaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14846: 5.047.012c kṛtsnaiḥ parivṛtaṃ lokaṃ caturbhir iva sāgaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14847: 5.047.013a mantribhir mantratattvajñair anyaiś ca śubhabuddhibhiḥ 5.047.013c anvāsyamānaṃ sacivaiḥ surair iva sureśvaram 5.047.014a apaśyad rākṣasapatiṃ hanūmān atitejasaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:14848: 5.047.014c viṣṭhitaṃ meruśikhare satoyam iva toyadam 5.047.015a sa taiḥ saṃpīḍyamāno 'pi rakṣobhir bhīmavikramaiḥ 5.047.015c vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatvā rakṣo'dhipam avaikṣata
GE09ram_1-7u:14849: 5.047.016a bhrājamānaṃ tato dṛṣṭvā hanumān rākṣaseśvaram 5.047.016c manasā cintayām āsa tejasā tasya mohitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14850: 5.047.017a aho rūpam aho dhairyam aho sattvam aho dyutiḥ 5.047.017c aho rākṣasarājasya
GE09ram_1-7u:14851: 5.047.018a yady adharmo na balavān syād ayaṃ rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14852: 5.047.018c syād ayaṃ suralokasya saśakrasyāpi rakṣitā 5.047.019a tena bibhyati khalv asmāl lokāḥ sāmaradānavāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14853: 5.047.019c ayaṃ hy utsahate kruddhaḥ kartum ekārṇavaṃ jagat
GE09ram_1-7u:14854: 5.047.020a iti cintāṃ bahuvidhām akaron matimān kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14856: 5.048.001a tam udvīkṣya mahābāhuḥ piṅgākṣaṃ purataḥ sthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:14858: 5.048.002a sa rājā roṣatāmrākṣaḥ prahastaṃ mantrisattamam 5.048.002c kālayuktam uvācedaṃ vaco vipulam arthavat 5.048.003a durātmā pṛcchyatām eṣa kutaḥ kiṃ vāsya kāraṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:14859: 5.048.003c vanabhaṅge ca ko 'syārtho rākṣasīnāṃ ca tarjane
GE09ram_1-7u:14860: 5.048.004a rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā prahasto vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:14861: 5.048.004c samāśvasihi bhadraṃ te na bhīḥ kāryā tvayā kape 5.048.005a yadi tāvat tvam indreṇa preṣito rāvaṇālayam
GE09ram_1-7u:14862: 5.048.005c tattvam ākhyāhi mā te bhūd bhayaṃ vānara mokṣyase 5.048.006a yadi vaiśravaṇasya tvaṃ yamasya varuṇasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:14863: 5.048.006c cārurūpam idaṃ kṛtvā yamasya varuṇasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:14864: 5.048.007a viṣṇunā preṣito vāpi dūto vijayakāṅkṣiṇā 5.048.007c na hi te vānaraṃ tejo rūpamātraṃ tu vānaram 5.048.008a tattvataḥ kathayasvādya tato vānara mokṣyase 5.048.008c anṛtaṃ vadataś cāpi durlabhaṃ tava jīvitam
GE09ram_1-7u:14865: 5.048.009a atha vā yannimittas te praveśo rāvaṇālaye
GE09ram_1-7u:14866: 5.048.010a evam ukto harivaras tadā rakṣogaṇeśvaram 5.048.010c abravīn nāsmi śakrasya yamasya varuṇasya vā
GE09ram_1-7u:14867: 5.048.011a dhanadena na me sakhyaṃ viṣṇunā nāsmi coditaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14868: 5.048.011c jātir eva mama tv eṣā vānaro 'ham ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14869: 5.048.012a darśane rākṣasendrasya durlabhe tad idaṃ mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:14871: 5.048.013a tatas te rākṣasāḥ prāptā balino yuddhakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14872: 5.048.013c rakṣaṇārthaṃ ca dehasya pratiyuddhā mayā raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:14873: 5.048.014a astrapāśair na śakyo 'haṃ baddhuṃ devāsurair api
GE09ram_1-7u:14876: 5.048.015c vimukto aham astreṇa rākṣasais tv atipīḍitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14878: 5.048.016c śrūyatāṃ cāpi vacanaṃ mama pathyam idaṃ prabho
GE09ram_1-7u:14879: 5.049.001a taṃ samīkṣya mahāsattvaṃ sattvavān harisattamaḥ 5.049.001c vākyam arthavad avyagras tam uvāca daśānanam
GE09ram_1-7u:14880: 5.049.002a ahaṃ sugrīvasaṃdeśād iha prāptas tavālayam 5.049.002c rākṣasendra harīśas tvāṃ bhrātā kuśalam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:14881: 5.049.003a bhrātuḥ śṛṇu samādeśaṃ sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ 5.049.003c dharmārthopahitaṃ vākyam iha cāmutra ca kṣamam
GE09ram_1-7u:14884: 5.049.005a jyeṣṭhas tasya mahābāhuḥ putraḥ priyakaraḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14885: 5.049.005c pitur nideśān niṣkrāntaḥ praviṣṭo daṇḍakāvanam 5.049.006a lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā sītayā cāpi bhāryayā
GE09ram_1-7u:14886: 5.049.006c rāmo nāma mahātejā dharmyaṃ panthānam āśritaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14887: 5.049.007a tasya bhāryā vane naṣṭā sītā patim anuvratā
GE09ram_1-7u:14888: 5.049.007c vaidehasya sutā rājño janakasya mahātmanaḥ 5.049.008a sa mārgamāṇas tāṃ devīṃ rājaputraḥ sahānujaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14889: 5.049.008c ṛśyamūkam anuprāptaḥ sugrīveṇa ca saṃgataḥ 5.049.009a tasya tena pratijñātaṃ sītāyāḥ parimārgaṇam 5.049.009c sugrīvasyāpi rāmeṇa harirājyaṃ niveditam
GE09ram_1-7u:14890: 5.049.010a tatas tena mṛdhe hatvā rājaputreṇa vālinam
GE09ram_1-7u:14891: 5.049.010c sugrīvaḥ sthāpito rājye haryṛkṣāṇāṃ gaṇeśvaraḥ 5.049.011a sa sītāmārgaṇe vyagraḥ sugrīvaḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ 5.049.011c harīn saṃpreṣayām āsa diśaḥ sarvā harīśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14892: 5.049.012a tāṃ harīṇāṃ sahasrāṇi śatāni niyutāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:14893: 5.049.012c dikṣu sarvāsu mārgante adhaś copari cāmbare
GE09ram_1-7u:14894: 5.049.013a vainateya samāḥ ke cit ke cit tatrānilopamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14896: 5.049.014a ahaṃ tu hanumān nāma mārutasyaurasaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14897: 5.049.014c sītāyās tu kṛte tūrṇaṃ śatayojanam āyatam
GE09ram_1-7u:14898: 5.049.014e samudraṃ laṅghayitvaiva tāṃ didṛkṣur ihāgataḥ 5.049.015a tad bhavān dṛṣṭadharmārthas tapaḥ kṛtaparigrahaḥ 5.049.015c paradārān mahāprājña noparoddhuṃ tvam arhasi 5.049.016a na hi dharmaviruddheṣu bahv apāyeṣu karmasu
GE09ram_1-7u:14901: 5.049.017c śarāṇām agrataḥ sthātuṃ śakto devāsureṣv api
GE09ram_1-7u:14902: 5.049.018a na cāpi triṣu lokeṣu rājan vidyeta kaś cana 5.049.018c rāghavasya vyalīkaṃ yaḥ kṛtvā sukham avāpnuyāt
GE09ram_1-7u:14903: 5.049.019a tat trikālahitaṃ vākyaṃ dharmyam arthānubandhi ca
GE09ram_1-7u:14905: 5.049.020a dṛṣṭā hīyaṃ mayā devī labdhaṃ yad iha durlabham 5.049.020c uttaraṃ karma yac cheṣaṃ nimittaṃ tatra rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14906: 5.049.021a lakṣiteyaṃ mayā sītā tathā śokaparāyaṇā 5.049.021c gṛhya yāṃ nābhijānāsi pañcāsyām iva pannagīm
GE09ram_1-7u:14907: 5.049.022a neyaṃ jarayituṃ śakyā sāsurair amarair api
GE09ram_1-7u:14908: 5.049.022c viṣasaṃsṛṣṭam atyarthaṃ bhuktam annam ivaujasā 5.049.023a tapaḥsaṃtāpalabdhas te yo 'yaṃ dharmaparigrahaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14909: 5.049.023c na sa nāśayituṃ nyāyya ātmaprāṇaparigrahaḥ 5.049.024a avadhyatāṃ tapobhir yāṃ bhavān samanupaśyati 5.049.024c ātmanaḥ sāsurair devair hetus tatrāpy ayaṃ mahān
GE09ram_1-7u:14910: 5.049.025a sugrīvo na hi devo 'yaṃ nāsuro na ca mānuṣaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14911: 5.049.025c na rākṣaso na gandharvo na yakṣo na ca pannagaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14912: 5.049.026a mānuṣo rāghavo rājan sugrīvaś ca harīśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14913: 5.049.026c tasmāt prāṇaparitrāṇaṃ kathaṃ rājan kariṣyasi 5.049.027a na tu dharmopasaṃhāram
GE09ram_1-7u:14914: 5.049.027c tad eva phalam anveti dharmaś cādharmanāśanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14915: 5.049.028a prāptaṃ dharmaphalaṃ tāvad bhavatā nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14916: 5.049.028c phalam asyāpy adharmasya kṣipram eva prapatsyase
GE09ram_1-7u:14917: 5.049.029a janasthānavadhaṃ buddhvā buddhvā vālivadhaṃ tathā 5.049.029c rāmasugrīvasakhyaṃ ca budhyasva hitam ātmanaḥ 5.049.030a kāmaṃ khalv aham apy ekaḥ savājirathakuñjarām
GE09ram_1-7u:14918: 5.049.030c laṅkāṃ nāśayituṃ śaktas tasyaiṣa tu viniścayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14920: 5.049.031c utsādanam amitrāṇāṃ sītā yais tu pradharṣitā
GE09ram_1-7u:14921: 5.049.032a apakurvan hi rāmasya sākṣād api puraṃdaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14922: 5.049.032c na sukhaṃ prāpnuyād anyaḥ kiṃ punas tvadvidho janaḥ 5.049.033a yāṃ sītety abhijānāsi yeyaṃ tiṣṭhati te vaśe
GE09ram_1-7u:14924: 5.049.034a tad alaṃ kālapāśena sītā vigraharūpiṇā 5.049.034c svayaṃ skandhāvasaktena kṣamam ātmani cintyatām 5.049.035a sītāyās tejasā dagdhāṃ rāmakopaprapīḍitām
GE09ram_1-7u:14925: 5.049.035c dahyamanām imāṃ paśya purīṃ sāṭṭapratolikām 5.049.036a sa sauṣṭhavopetam adīnavādinaḥ; kaper niśamyāpratimo 'priyaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:14927: 5.049.036c daśānanaḥ kopavivṛttalocanaḥ; samādiśat tasya vadhaṃ mahākapeḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14928: 5.050.001a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā vānarasya mahātmanaḥ 5.050.001c ājñāpayad vadhaṃ tasya rāvaṇaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ 5.050.002a vadhe tasya samājñapte rāvaṇena durātmanā 5.050.002c niveditavato dautyaṃ nānumene vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14929: 5.050.003a taṃ rakṣo'dhipatiṃ kruddhaṃ tac ca kāryam upasthitam 5.050.003c viditvā cintayām āsa kāryaṃ kāryavidhau sthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14931: 5.050.004c uvāca hitam atyarthaṃ vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ 5.050.005a rājan dharmaviruddhaṃ ca lokavṛtteś ca garhitam
GE09ram_1-7u:14932: 5.050.005c tava cāsadṛśaṃ vīra kaper asya pramāpaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:14933: 5.050.006a asaṃśayaṃ śatrur ayaṃ pravṛddhaḥ; kṛtaṃ hy anenāpriyam
GE09ram_1-7u:14935: 5.050.006c na dūtavadhyāṃ pravadanti santo; dūtasya dṛṣṭā bahavo hi daṇḍāḥ 5.050.007a vairūpyām aṅgeṣu kaśābhighāto; mauṇḍyaṃ tathā lakṣmaṇasaṃnipātaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14936: 5.050.007c etān hi dūte pravadanti daṇḍān; vadhas tu dūtasya na naḥ śruto
GE09ram_1-7u:14939: 5.050.008c bhavadvidhaḥ kopavaśe hi tiṣṭhet; kopaṃ niyacchanti hi
GE09ram_1-7u:14941: 5.050.009a na dharmavāde na ca lokavṛtte; na śāstrabuddhigrahaṇeṣu vāpi
GE09ram_1-7u:14942: 5.050.009c vidyeta kaś cit tava vīratulyas; tvaṃ hy uttamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14944: 5.050.010a na cāpy asya kaper ghāte kaṃ cit paśyāmy ahaṃ guṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:14945: 5.050.010c teṣv ayaṃ pātyatāṃ daṇḍo yair ayaṃ preṣitaḥ kapiḥ 5.050.011a sādhur vā yadi vāsādhur parair eṣa samarpitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14946: 5.050.011c bruvan parārthaṃ paravān na dūto vadham arhati
GE09ram_1-7u:14947: 5.050.012a api cāsmin hate rājan nānyaṃ paśyāmi khecaram
GE09ram_1-7u:14948: 5.050.012c iha yaḥ punar āgacchet paraṃ pāraṃ mahodadhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14949: 5.050.013a tasmān nāsya vadhe yatnaḥ kāryaḥ parapuraṃjaya
GE09ram_1-7u:14950: 5.050.013c bhavān sendreṣu deveṣu yatnam āsthātum arhati
GE09ram_1-7u:14951: 5.050.014a asmin vinaṣṭe na hi dūtam anyaṃ; paśyāmi yas tau nararājaputrau
GE09ram_1-7u:14952: 5.050.014c yuddhāya yuddhapriyadurvinītāv; udyojayed dīrghapathāvaruddhau 5.050.015a parākramotsāhamanasvināṃ ca; surāsurāṇām api durjayena
GE09ram_1-7u:14953: 5.050.015c tvayā manonandana nairṛtānāṃ; yuddhāyatir nāśayituṃ na yuktā
GE09ram_1-7u:14954: 5.050.016a hitāś ca śūrāś ca samāhitāś ca; kuleṣu jātāś ca mahāguṇeṣu
GE09ram_1-7u:14955: 5.050.016c manasvinaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ variṣṭhāḥ; koṭyagraśaste subhṛtāś ca
GE09ram_1-7u:14957: 5.050.017a tad ekadeśena balasya tāvat; ke cit tavādeśakṛto 'payāntu
GE09ram_1-7u:14958: 5.050.017c tau rājaputrau vinigṛhya mūḍhau; pareṣu te bhāvayituṃ prabhāvam
GE09ram_1-7u:14959: 5.051.001a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā daśagrīvo mahābalaḥ 5.051.001c deśakālahitaṃ vākyaṃ bhrātur uttamam abravīt 5.051.002a samyag uktaṃ hi bhavatā dūtavadhyā vigarhitā
GE09ram_1-7u:14960: 5.051.002c avaśyaṃ tu vadhād anyaḥ kriyatām asya nigrahaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14961: 5.051.003a kapīnāṃ kila lāṅgūlam iṣṭaṃ bhavati bhūṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:14962: 5.051.003c tad asya dīpyatāṃ śīghraṃ tena dagdhena gacchatu
GE09ram_1-7u:14963: 5.051.004a tataḥ paśyantv imaṃ dīnam aṅgavairūpyakarśitam 5.051.004c samitrā jñātayaḥ sarve bāndhavāḥ sasuhṛjjanāḥ 5.051.005a ājñāpayad rākṣasendraḥ puraṃ sarvaṃ sacatvaram 5.051.005c lāṅgūlena pradīptena rakṣobhiḥ pariṇīyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:14964: 5.051.006a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasāḥ kopakarkaśāḥ 5.051.006c veṣṭante tasya lāṅgūlaṃ jīrṇaiḥ kārpāsikaiḥ paṭaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14966: 5.051.007c śuṣkam indhanam āsādya vaneṣv iva hutāśanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14968: 5.051.009a lāṅgūlena pradīptena rākṣasāṃs tān apātayat 5.051.009c roṣāmarṣaparītātmā bālasūryasamānanaḥ 5.051.010a sa bhūyaḥ saṃgataiḥ krūrai rākasair harisattamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14969: 5.051.010c nibaddhaḥ kṛtavān vīras tatkālasadṛśīṃ matim 5.051.011a kāmaṃ khalu na me śaktā nibadhasyāpi rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14970: 5.051.011c chittvā pāśān samutpatya hanyām aham imān punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14971: 5.051.012a sarveṣām eva paryāpto rākṣasānām ahaṃ yudhi
GE09ram_1-7u:14972: 5.051.012c kiṃ tu rāmasya prītyarthaṃ viṣahiṣye 'ham īdṛśam
GE09ram_1-7u:14973: 5.051.013a laṅkā carayitavyā me punar eva bhaved iti
GE09ram_1-7u:14974: 5.051.013c rātrau na hi sudṛṣṭā me durgakarmavidhānataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14975: 5.051.013e avaśyam eva draṣṭavyā mayā laṅkā niśākṣaye
GE09ram_1-7u:14976: 5.051.014a kāmaṃ bandhaiś ca me bhūyaḥ pucchasyoddīpanena ca
GE09ram_1-7u:14977: 5.051.014c pīḍāṃ kurvantu rakṣāṃsi na me 'sti manasaḥ śramaḥ 5.051.015a tatas te saṃvṛtākāraṃ sattvavantaṃ mahākapim 5.051.015c parigṛhya yayur hṛṣṭā rākṣasāḥ kapikuñjaram 5.051.016a śaṅkhabherīninādais tair ghoṣayantaḥ svakarmabhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14978: 5.051.016c rākṣasāḥ krūrakarmāṇaś cārayanti sma tāṃ purīm
GE09ram_1-7u:14979: 5.051.017a hanumāṃś cārayām āsa rākṣasānāṃ mahāpurīm 5.051.017c athāpaśyad vimānāni vicitrāṇi
GE09ram_1-7u:14980: 5.051.018a saṃvṛtān bhūmibhāgāṃś ca suvibhaktāṃś ca catvarān
GE09ram_1-7u:14981: 5.051.018c rathyāś ca gṛhasaṃbādhāḥ kapiḥ śṛṅgāṭakāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:14982: 5.051.019a catvareṣu catuṣkeṣu rājamārge tathaiva ca 5.051.019c ghoṣayanti kapiṃ sarve cārīka iti rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14983: 5.051.020a dīpyamāne tatas tasya lāṅgūlāgre hanūmataḥ 5.051.020c rākṣasyas tā virūpākṣyaḥ śaṃsur devyās tad apriyam
GE09ram_1-7u:14984: 5.051.021a yas tvayā kṛtasaṃvādaḥ sīte tāmramukhaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14985: 5.051.021c lāṅgūlena pradīptena sa eṣa pariṇīyate 5.051.022a śrutvā tad vacanaṃ krūram ātmāpaharaṇopamam 5.051.022c vaidehī śokasaṃtaptā hutāśanam upāgamat
GE09ram_1-7u:14986: 5.051.023a maṅgalābhimukhī tasya sā tadāsīn mahākapeḥ 5.051.023c upatasthe viśālākṣī prayatā
GE09ram_1-7u:14987: 5.051.024a yady asti patiśuśrūṣā yady asti caritaṃ tapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14988: 5.051.024c yadi cāsty ekapatnītvaṃ śīto bhava hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14989: 5.051.025a yadi kaś cid anukrośas tasya mayy asti dhīmataḥ 5.051.025c yadi vā bhāgyaśeṣaṃ me śīto bhava hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14991: 5.051.026c sa vijānāti dharmātmā śīto bhava hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14992: 5.051.027a yadi māṃ tārayaty āryaḥ sugrīvaḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14993: 5.051.027c asmād duḥkhān mahābāhuḥ śīto bhava hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14995: 5.051.028c jajvāla mṛgaśāvākṣyāḥ śaṃsann iva śivaṃ kapeḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14996: 5.051.029a dahyamāne ca lāṅgūle cintayām āsa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14997: 5.051.029c pradīpto 'gnir ayaṃ kasmān na māṃ dahati sarvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:14998: 5.051.030a dṛśyate ca mahājvālaḥ karoti ca na me rujam 5.051.030c śiśirasyeva saṃpāto lāṅgūlāgre
GE09ram_1-7u:14999: 5.051.031a atha vā tad idaṃ vyaktaṃ yad dṛṣṭaṃ plavatā mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:15000: 5.051.031c rāmaprabhāvād āścaryaṃ parvataḥ saritāṃ patau 5.051.032a yadi tāvat samudrasya mainākasya ca dhīmatha
GE09ram_1-7u:15001: 5.051.032c rāmārthaṃ saṃbhramas tādṛk kim agnir na kariṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:15002: 5.051.033a sītāyāś cānṛśaṃsyena tejasā rāghavasya ca 5.051.033c pituś ca mama sakhyena na māṃ dahati pāvakaḥ 5.051.034a bhūyaḥ sa cintayām āsa muhūrtaṃ kapikuñjaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15003: 5.051.034c utpapātātha vegena nanāda ca mahākapiḥ 5.051.035a puradvāraṃ tataḥ śrīmāñ śailaśṛṅgam ivonnatam 5.051.035c vibhaktarakṣaḥsaṃbādham āsasādānilātmajaḥ 5.051.036a sa bhūtvā śailasaṃkāśaḥ kṣaṇena punar ātmavān
GE09ram_1-7u:15004: 5.051.036c hrasvatāṃ paramāṃ prāpto bandhanāny avaśātayat 5.051.037a vimuktaś cābhavac chrīmān punaḥ parvatasaṃnibhaḥ 5.051.037c vīkṣamāṇaś ca dadṛśe parighaṃ toraṇāśritam 5.051.038a sa taṃ gṛhya mahābāhuḥ kālāyasapariṣkṛtam 5.051.038c rakṣiṇas tān punaḥ sarvān sūdayām āsa mārutiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15005: 5.051.039a sa tān nihatvā raṇacaṇḍavikramaḥ; samīkṣamāṇaḥ punar eva laṅkām
GE09ram_1-7u:15006: 5.051.039c pradīptalāṅgūlakṛtārcimālī; prakāśatāditya ivāṃśumālī 5.052.001a vīkṣamāṇas tato laṅkāṃ kapiḥ kṛtamanorathaḥ 5.052.001c vardhamānasamutsāhaḥ kāryaśeṣam acintayat
GE09ram_1-7u:15007: 5.052.002a kiṃ nu khalv aviśiṣṭaṃ me kartavyam iha sāmpratam 5.052.002c yad eṣāṃ rakṣasāṃ bhūyaḥ saṃtāpajananaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_1-7u:15008: 5.052.003a vanaṃ tāvat pramathitaṃ prakṛṣṭā rākṣasā hatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15010: 5.052.004a durge vināśite karma bhavet sukhapariśramam 5.052.004c alpayatnena kārye 'smin mama syāt saphalaḥ śramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15011: 5.052.005a yo hy ayaṃ mama lāṅgūle dīpyate havyavāhanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15012: 5.052.005c asya saṃtarpaṇaṃ nyāyyaṃ kartum ebhir gṛhottamaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15013: 5.052.006a tataḥ pradīptalāṅgūlaḥ savidyud iva toyadaḥ 5.052.006c bhavanāgreṣu laṅkāyā vicacāra mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15015: 5.052.008a śvasanena ca saṃyogād ativego mahābalaḥ 5.052.008c kālāgnir iva jajvāla prāvardhata hutāśanaḥ 5.052.009a pradīptam agniṃ pavanas teṣu veśmasu cārayat
GE09ram_1-7u:15017: 5.052.010c bhavanāny avaśīryanta ratnavanti mahānti ca 5.052.011a tāni bhagnavimānāni nipetur
GE09ram_1-7u:15020: 5.052.012c vicitrān bhavanād dhātūn syandamānān dadarśa saḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15021: 5.052.013a nāgnis tṛpyati kāṣṭhānāṃ tṛṇānāṃ ca yathā tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:15022: 5.052.013c hanūmān rākṣasendrāṇāṃ vadhe kiṃ cin na tṛpyati
GE09ram_1-7u:15023: 5.052.014a hutāśanajvālasamāvṛtā sā; hatapravīrā parivṛttayodhā 5.052.014c hanūmātaḥ krodhabalābhibhūtā; babhūva śāpopahateva laṅkā
GE09ram_1-7u:15024: 5.052.015a sasaṃbhramaṃ trastaviṣaṇṇarākṣasāṃ; samujjvalaj jvālahutāśanāṅkitām 5.052.015c dadarśa laṅkāṃ hanumān mahāmanāḥ; svayambhukopopahatām ivāvanim 5.052.016a sa rākṣasāṃs tān subahūṃś ca hatvā; vanaṃ ca bhaṅktvā
GE09ram_1-7u:15025: bahupādapaṃ tat 5.052.016c visṛjya rakṣo bhavaneṣu cāgniṃ; jagāma rāmaṃ manasā mahātmā
GE09ram_1-7u:15026: 5.052.017a laṅkāṃ samastāṃ saṃdīpya lāṅgūlāgniṃ mahākapiḥ 5.052.017c nirvāpayām āsa tadā samudre harisattamaḥ 5.053.001a saṃdīpyamānāṃ vidhvastāṃ trastarakṣo gaṇāṃ purīm 5.053.001c avekṣya hānumāṃl laṅkāṃ cintayām āsa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15027: 5.053.002a tasyābhūt sumahāṃs trāsaḥ kutsā cātmany ajāyata
GE09ram_1-7u:15028: 5.053.002c laṅkāṃ pradahatā karma kiṃsvit kṛtam idaṃ mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:15029: 5.053.003a dhanyās te puruṣaśreṣṭha ye buddhyā kopam utthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:15030: 5.053.003c nirundhanti mahātmāno dīptam agnim ivāmbhasā 5.053.004a yadi dagdhā tv iyaṃ laṅkā nūnam āryāpi jānakī 5.053.004c dagdhā tena mayā bhartur hataṃ kāryam ajānatā
GE09ram_1-7u:15031: 5.053.005a yad artham ayam ārambhas tat kāryam avasāditam
GE09ram_1-7u:15032: 5.053.005c mayā hi dahatā laṅkāṃ na sītā parirakṣitā
GE09ram_1-7u:15033: 5.053.006a īṣatkāryam idaṃ kāryaṃ kṛtam āsīn na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15034: 5.053.006c tasya krodhābhibhūtena mayā mūlakṣayaḥ kṛtaḥ 5.053.007a vinaṣṭā jānakī vyaktaṃ na hy adagdhaḥ pradṛśyate
GE09ram_1-7u:15035: 5.053.007c laṅkāyāḥ kaś cid uddeśaḥ sarvā bhasmīkṛtā purī
GE09ram_1-7u:15036: 5.053.008a yadi tad vihataṃ kāryaṃ mayā prajñāviparyayāt
GE09ram_1-7u:15037: 5.053.008c ihaiva prāṇasaṃnyāso mamāpi hy atirocate 5.053.009a kim agnau nipatāmy adya āhosvid vaḍavāmukhe
GE09ram_1-7u:15038: 5.053.009c śarīram āho sattvānāṃ dadmi sāgaravāsinām 5.053.010a kathaṃ hi jīvatā śakyo mayā draṣṭuṃ harīśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15040: 5.053.011a mayā khalu tad evedaṃ roṣadoṣāt pradarśitam
GE09ram_1-7u:15041: 5.053.011c prathitaṃ triṣu lokeṣu kapitam anavasthitam 5.053.012a dhig astu rājasaṃ bhāvam anīśam anavasthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:15042: 5.053.012c īśvareṇāpi yad rāgān mayā sītā na rakṣitā
GE09ram_1-7u:15043: 5.053.013a vinaṣṭāyāṃ tu sītāyāṃ tāv ubhau vinaśiṣyataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15044: 5.053.013c tayor vināśe sugrīvaḥ sabandhur vinaśiṣyati 5.053.014a etad eva vacaḥ śrutvā bharato bhrātṛvatsalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15045: 5.053.014c dharmātmā sahaśatrughnaḥ kathaṃ śakṣyati jīvitum 5.053.015a ikṣvākuvaṃśe dharmiṣṭhe gate nāśam asaṃśayam 5.053.015c bhaviṣyanti prajāḥ sarvāḥ śokasaṃtāpapīḍitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15048: 5.053.017a iti cintayatas tasya nimittāny upapedire 5.053.017c pūram apy upalabdhāni sākṣāt punar acintayat
GE09ram_1-7u:15049: 5.053.018a atha vā cārusarvāṅgī rakṣitā svena tejasā
GE09ram_1-7u:15050: 5.053.018c na naśiṣyati kalyāṇī nāgnir agnau pravartate
GE09ram_1-7u:15051: 5.053.019a na hi dharmān manas tasya bhāryām amitatejasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15052: 5.053.019c svacāritrābhiguptāṃ tāṃ spraṣṭum arhati pāvakaḥ 5.053.020a nūnaṃ rāmaprabhāvena vaidehyāḥ sukṛtena ca 5.053.020c yan māṃ dahanakarmāyaṃ nādahad dhavyavāhanaḥ 5.053.021a trayāṇāṃ bharatādīnāṃ bhrātṝṇāṃ devatā ca yā
GE09ram_1-7u:15053: 5.053.021c rāmasya ca manaḥkāntā sā kathaṃ vinaśiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:15054: 5.053.022a yad vā dahanakarmāyaṃ sarvatra prabhur avyayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15055: 5.053.022c na me dahati lāṅgūlaṃ katham āryāṃ pradhakṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:15056: 5.053.023a tapasā satyavākyena ananyatvāc ca bhartari 5.053.023c api sā nirdahed agniṃ na tām agniḥ pradhakṣyati 5.053.024a sa tathā cintayaṃs tatra devyā dharmaparigraham
GE09ram_1-7u:15057: 5.053.024c śuśrāva hanumān vākyaṃ cāraṇānāṃ mahātmanām 5.053.025a aho khalu kṛtaṃ karma durviṣahyaṃ hanūmatā
GE09ram_1-7u:15060: 5.053.026c jānakī na ca dagdheti vismayo 'dbhuta eva naḥ 5.053.027a sa nimittaiś ca dṛṣṭārthaiḥ kāraṇaiś ca mahāguṇaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15061: 5.053.027c ṛṣivākyaiś ca hanumān abhavat prītamānasaḥ 5.053.028a tataḥ kapiḥ prāptamanorathārthas; tām akṣatāṃ rājasutāṃ viditvā
GE09ram_1-7u:15062: 5.053.028c pratyakṣatas tāṃ punar eva dṛṣṭvā; pratiprayāṇāya matiṃ cakāra
GE09ram_1-7u:15063: 5.054.001a tatas tu śiṃśapāmūle jānakīṃ paryavasthitām 5.054.001c abhivādyābravīd diṣṭyā paśyāmi tvām ihākṣatām 5.054.002a tatas taṃ prasthitaṃ sītā vīkṣamāṇā punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15065: 5.054.003a kāmam asya tvam evaikaḥ kāryasya parisādhane
GE09ram_1-7u:15066: 5.054.003c paryāptaḥ paravīraghna yaśasyas te balodayaḥ 5.054.004a balais tu saṃkulāṃ kṛtvā laṅkāṃ parabalārdanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15067: 5.054.004c māṃ nayed yadi kākutsthas tasya tat sādṛśaṃ bhavet 5.054.005a tad yathā tasya vikrāntam anurūpaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15069: 5.054.006a tad arthopahitaṃ vākyaṃ praśritaṃ hetusaṃhitam 5.054.006c niśamya hanumāṃs tasyā vākyam uttaram abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:15070: 5.054.007a kṣipram eṣyati kākutstho haryṛkṣapravarair vṛtaḥ 5.054.007c yas te yudhi vijityārīñ śokaṃ vyapanayiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:15071: 5.054.008a evam āśvāsya vaidehīṃ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ 5.054.008c gamanāya matiṃ kṛtvā vaidehīm abhyavādayat 5.054.009a tataḥ sa kapiśārdūlaḥ svāmisaṃdarśanotsukaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15074: 5.054.010c sālatālāśvakarṇaiś ca vaṃśaiś ca bahubhir vṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:15077: 5.054.013a latāpādapasaṃbādhaṃ siṃhākulitakandaram 5.054.013c vyāghrasaṃghasamākīrṇaṃ svādumūlaphaladrumam 5.054.014a tam ārurohātibalaḥ parvataṃ plavagottamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15079: 5.054.015c saghoṣāḥ samaśīryanta śilāś cūrṇīkṛtās tataḥ 5.054.016a sa tam āruhya śailendraṃ vyavardhata mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15080: 5.054.016c dakṣiṇād uttaraṃ pāraṃ prārthayaṃl lavaṇāmbhasaḥ 5.054.017a adhiruhya tato vīraḥ parvataṃ pavanātmajaḥ 5.054.017c dadarśa sāgaraṃ bhīmaṃ mīnoraganiṣevitam
GE09ram_1-7u:15082: 5.054.018c prapede hariśārdūlo dakṣiṇād uttarāṃ diśam 5.054.019a sa tadā pīḍitas tena kapinā
GE09ram_1-7u:15083: 5.054.019c rarāsa saha tair bhūtaiḥ prāviśad vasudhātalam
GE09ram_1-7u:15084: 5.054.019e kampamānaiś ca śikharaiḥ patadbhir api ca drumaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15086: 5.054.020c nipetur bhūtale rugṇāḥ śakrāyudhahatā iva 5.054.021a kandarodarasaṃsthānāṃ pīḍitānāṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:15087: 5.054.021c siṃhānāṃ ninado bhīmo nabho bhindan sa śuśruve
GE09ram_1-7u:15088: 5.054.022a srastavyāviddhavasanā vyākulīkṛtabhūṣaṇā 5.054.022c vidyādharyaḥ samutpetuḥ sahasā dharaṇīdharāt
GE09ram_1-7u:15091: 5.054.024a kiṃnaroragagandharvayakṣavidyādharās tathā 5.054.024c pīḍitaṃ taṃ nagavaraṃ tyaktvā gaganam āsthitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15092: 5.054.025a sa ca bhūmidharaḥ śrīmān balinā tena pīḍitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15095: 5.054.026c dharaṇyāṃ samatāṃ yātaḥ sa babhūva dharādharaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15100: 5.055.004c harann iva sanakṣatraṃ gaganaṃ sārkamaṇḍalam 5.055.005a mārutasyālayaṃ śrīmān kapir vyomacaro mahān 5.055.005c hanūmān meghajālāni vikarṣann iva gacchati 5.055.006a pāṇḍurāruṇavarṇāni nīlamāñjiṣṭhakāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:15102: 5.055.007a praviśann abhrajālāni niṣkramaṃś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15103: 5.055.007c pracchannaś ca prakāśaś ca candramā iva lakṣyate
GE09ram_1-7u:15105: 5.055.008c ājagāma mahātejāḥ punar madhyena sāgaram 5.055.009a parvatendraṃ sunābhaṃ ca samupaspṛśya vīryavān 5.055.009c jyāmukta iva nārāco mahāvego 'bhyupāgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15106: 5.055.010a sa kiṃ cid anusaṃprāptaḥ samālokya mahāgirim
GE09ram_1-7u:15108: 5.055.011a niśamya nadato nādaṃ vānarās te samantataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15111: 5.055.012c upāmantrya harīn sarvān idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:15113: 5.055.013c na hy asyākṛtakāryasya nāda evaṃvidho bhavet
GE09ram_1-7u:15114: 5.055.014a tasyā bāhūruvegaṃ ca ninādaṃ ca mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15115: 5.055.014c niśamya harayo hṛṣṭāḥ samutpetus tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15116: 5.055.015a te nagāgrān nagāgrāṇi śikharāc chikharāṇi ca
GE09ram_1-7u:15118: 5.055.016a te prītāḥ pādapāgreṣu gṛhya śākhāḥ supuṣpitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15121: 5.055.017c dṛṣṭvā te vānarāḥ sarve tasthuḥ prāñjalayas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:15122: 5.055.018a tatas tu vegavāṃs tasya girer girinibhaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15124: 5.055.019a tatas te prītamanasaḥ sarve vānarapuṃgavāḥ 5.055.019c hanūmantaṃ mahātmānaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:15125: 5.055.020a parivārya ca te sarve parāṃ prītim upāgatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15126: 5.055.020c prahṛṣṭavadanāḥ sarve tam arogam upāgatam 5.055.021a upāyanāni cādāya mūlāni ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:15128: 5.055.022a vinedur muditāḥ ke cic cakruḥ kila kilāṃ tathā 5.055.022c hṛṣṭāḥ pādapaśākhāś ca āninyur vānararṣabhāḥ 5.055.023a hanūmāṃs tu gurūn vṛddhāñ jāmbavat pramukhāṃs tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:15130: 5.055.024a sa tābhyāṃ pūjitaḥ pūjyaḥ kapibhiś ca prasāditaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15131: 5.055.024c dṛṣṭā devīti vikrāntaḥ saṃkṣepeṇa nyavedayat 5.055.025a niṣasāda ca hastena gṛhītvā vālinaḥ sutam
GE09ram_1-7u:15132: 5.055.025c ramaṇīye vanoddeśe mahendrasya gires tadā 5.055.026a hanūmān abravīd dhṛṣṭas tadā tān vānararṣabhān
GE09ram_1-7u:15137: 5.055.028a tato dṛṣṭeti vacanaṃ mahārtham amṛtopamam 5.055.028c niśamya māruteḥ sarve muditā vānarā bhavan
GE09ram_1-7u:15138: 5.055.029a kṣveḍanty anye nadanty anye garjanty anye mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15139: 5.055.029c cakruḥ kila kilām anye pratigarjanti cāpare
GE09ram_1-7u:15140: 5.055.030a ke cid ucchritalāṅgūlāḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ kapikuñjarāḥ 5.055.030c añcitāyatadīrghāṇi lāṅgūlāni pravivyadhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15141: 5.055.031a apare tu hanūmantaṃ vānarā vāraṇopamam 5.055.031c āplutya giriśṛṅgebhyaḥ saṃspṛśanti sma harṣitāḥ 5.055.032a uktavākyaṃ hanūmantam aṅgadas tu tadābravīt 5.055.032c sarveṣāṃ harivīrāṇāṃ madhye vācam anuttamām 5.055.033a sattve vīrye na te kaś cit samo vānaravidyate 5.055.033c yad avaplutya vistīrṇaṃ sāgaraṃ punar āgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15142: 5.055.034a diṣṭyā dṛṣṭā tvayā devī rāmapatnī yaśasvinī
GE09ram_1-7u:15143: 5.055.034c diṣṭyā tyakṣyati kākutsthaḥ śokaṃ sītā viyogajam
GE09ram_1-7u:15145: 5.055.035c parivārya pramuditā bhejire vipulāḥ śilāḥ 5.055.036a śrotukāmāḥ samudrasya laṅghanaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:15146: 5.055.036c darśanaṃ cāpi laṅkāyāḥ sītāyā rāvaṇasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:15147: 5.055.036e tasthuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve hanūmad vadanonmukhāḥ 5.055.037a tasthau tatrāṅgadaḥ śrīmān vānarair bahubhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15148: 5.055.037c upāsyamāno vibudhair divi devapatir yathā 5.055.038a hanūmatā kīrtimatā yaśasvinā;
GE09ram_1-7u:15149: 5.055.038c mudā tadādhyāsitam unnataṃ mahan; mahīdharāgraṃ jvalitaṃ śriyābhavat
GE09ram_1-7u:15150: 5.056.001a tatas tasya gireḥ śṛṅge mahendrasya mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15151: 5.056.001c hanumatpramukhāḥ prītiṃ harayo jagmur uttamām 5.056.002a taṃ tataḥ pratisaṃhṛṣṭaḥ prītimantaṃ mahākapim 5.056.002c jāmbavān kāryavṛttāntam apṛcchad anilātmajam
GE09ram_1-7u:15152: 5.056.003a kathaṃ dṛṣṭā tvayā devī kathaṃ vā tatra vartate 5.056.003c tasyāṃ vā sa kathaṃ vṛttaḥ krūrakarmā daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15153: 5.056.004a tattvataḥ sarvam etan naḥ prabrūhi tvaṃ mahākape
GE09ram_1-7u:15155: 5.056.005a yaś cārthas tatra vaktavyo gatair asmābhir ātmavān
GE09ram_1-7u:15156: 5.056.005c rakṣitavyaṃ ca yat tatra tad bhavān vyākarotu naḥ 5.056.006a sa niyuktas tatas tena saṃprahṛṣṭatanūruhaḥ 5.056.006c namasyañ śirasā devyai sītāyai pratyabhāṣata 5.056.007a pratyakṣam eva bhavatāṃ mahendrāgrāt kham āplutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15157: 5.056.007c udadher dakṣiṇaṃ pāraṃ kāṅkṣamāṇaḥ samāhitaḥ 5.056.008a gacchataś ca hi me ghoraṃ vighnarūpam ivābhavat
GE09ram_1-7u:15158: 5.056.008c kāñcanaṃ śikharaṃ divyaṃ paśyāmi sumanoharam 5.056.009a sthitaṃ panthānam āvṛtya mene vighnaṃ ca taṃ nagam 5.056.010a upasaṃgamya taṃ divyaṃ kāñcanaṃ nagasattamam 5.056.010c kṛtā me manasā buddhir bhettavyo 'yaṃ mayeti ca 5.056.011a prahataṃ ca mayā tasya lāṅgūlena mahāgireḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15160: 5.056.012a vyavasāyaṃ ca me buddhvā sa hovāca mahāgiriḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15161: 5.056.012c putreti madhurāṃ bāṇīṃ manaḥprahlādayann iva 5.056.013a pitṛvyaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi sakhāyaṃ mātariśvanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15162: 5.056.013c mainākam iti vikhyātaṃ nivasantaṃ mahodadhau 5.056.014a pakṣvavantaḥ purā putra babhūvuḥ parvatottamāḥ 5.056.014c chandataḥ pṛthivīṃ cerur bādhamānāḥ samantataḥ 5.056.015a śrutvā nagānāṃ caritaṃ mahendraḥ pākaśāsanaḥ 5.056.015c ciccheda bhagavān pakṣān vajreṇaiṣāṃ sahasraśaḥ 5.056.016a ahaṃ tu mokṣitas tasmāt tava pitrā mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:15164: 5.056.017a rāmasya ca mayā sāhye vartitavyam ariṃdama
GE09ram_1-7u:15166: 5.056.018a etac chrutvā mayā tasya mainākasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15167: 5.056.018c kāryam āvedya tu girer uddhataṃ ca mano mama 5.056.019a tena cāham anujñāto mainākena mahātmanā 5.056.019c uttamaṃ javam āsthāya śeṣam adhvānam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15169: 5.056.020c tataḥ paśyāmy ahaṃ devīṃ surasāṃ nāgamātaram
GE09ram_1-7u:15170: 5.056.021a samudramadhye sā devī vacanaṃ mām abhāṣata
GE09ram_1-7u:15171: 5.056.021c mama bhakṣyaḥ pradiṣṭas tvam amārair harisattamam
GE09ram_1-7u:15172: 5.056.021e tatas tvāṃ bhakṣayiṣyāmi vihitas tvaṃ cirasya me
GE09ram_1-7u:15173: 5.056.022a evam uktaḥ surasayā prāñjaliḥ praṇataḥ sthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15174: 5.056.022c vivarṇavadano bhūtvā vākyaṃ cedam udīrayam 5.056.023a rāmo dāśarathiḥ śrīmān praviṣṭo daṇḍakāvanam 5.056.023c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā sītayā ca paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15175: 5.056.024a tasya sītā hṛtā bhāryā rāvaṇena durātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:15176: 5.056.024c tasyāḥ sakāśaṃ dūto 'haṃ gamiṣye rāmaśāsanāt 5.056.025a kartum arhasi rāmasya sāhyaṃ viṣayavāsini 5.056.026a atha vā maithilīṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ cākliṣṭakāriṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:15177: 5.056.026c āgamiṣyāmi te vaktraṃ satyaṃ pratiśṛṇoti me
GE09ram_1-7u:15178: 5.056.027a evam uktā mayā sā tu surasā kāmarūpiṇī
GE09ram_1-7u:15179: 5.056.027c abravīn nātivarteta kaś cid eṣa varo mama
GE09ram_1-7u:15180: 5.056.028a evam uktaḥ surasayā daśayojanam āyataḥ 5.056.028c tato 'rdhaguṇavistāro babhūvāhaṃ kṣaṇena tu
GE09ram_1-7u:15181: 5.056.029a matpramāṇānurūpaṃ ca vyāditaṃ tanmukhaṃ tayā 5.056.029c tad dṛṣṭvā vyāditaṃ tv āsyaṃ hrasvaṃ hy akaravaṃ vapuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15182: 5.056.030a tasmin muhūrte ca punar babhūvāṅguṣṭhasaṃmitaḥ 5.056.030c abhipatyāśu tad vaktraṃ nirgato 'haṃ tataḥ kṣaṇāt 5.056.031a abravīt surasā devī svena rūpeṇa māṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15183: 5.056.031c arthasiddhyai hariśreṣṭha gaccha saumya yathāsukham 5.056.032a samānaya ca vaidehīṃ rāghaveṇa mahātmanā 5.056.032c sukhī bhava mahābāho prītāsmi tava vānara
GE09ram_1-7u:15185: 5.056.033c tato 'ntarikṣaṃ vipulaṃ pluto 'haṃ garuḍo yathā 5.056.034a chāyā me nigṛhītā ca na ca paśyāmi kiṃ cana
GE09ram_1-7u:15186: 5.056.034c so 'haṃ vigatavegas tu diśo daśa vilokayan 5.056.034e na kiṃ cit tatra paśyāmi yena me 'pahṛtā gatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15187: 5.056.035a tato me buddhir utpannā kiṃ nāma gamane mama 5.056.035c īdṛśo vighna utpanno rūpaṃ yatra na dṛśyate
GE09ram_1-7u:15188: 5.056.036a adho bhāgena me dṛṣṭiḥ śocatā pātitā mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:15189: 5.056.036c tato 'drākṣam ahaṃ bhīmāṃ rākṣasīṃ salile śayām 5.056.037a prahasya ca mahānādam ukto 'haṃ bhīmayā tayā 5.056.037c avasthitam asaṃbhrāntam idaṃ vākyam aśobhanam 5.056.038a kvāsi gantā mahākāya kṣudhitāyā mamepsitaḥ 5.056.038c bhakṣaḥ prīṇaya me dehaṃ ciram āhāravarjitam
GE09ram_1-7u:15190: 5.056.039a bāḍham ity eva tāṃ vāṇīṃ pratyagṛhṇām ahaṃ tataḥ 5.056.039c āsya pramāṇād adhikaṃ tasyāḥ kāyam apūrayam
GE09ram_1-7u:15191: 5.056.040a tasyāś cāsyaṃ mahad bhīmaṃ vardhate mama bhakṣaṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:15192: 5.056.040c na ca māṃ sā tu bubudhe mama vā vikṛtaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:15194: 5.056.041c tasyā hṛdayam ādāya prapatāmi nabhastalam 5.056.042a sā visṛṣṭabhujā bhīmā papāta lavaṇāmbhasi 5.056.042c mayā parvatasaṃkāśā nikṛttahṛdayā satī
GE09ram_1-7u:15195: 5.056.043a śṛṇomi khagatānāṃ ca siddhānāṃ cāraṇaiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:15196: 5.056.043c rākṣasī siṃhikā bhīmā kṣipraṃ hanumatā hṛtā
GE09ram_1-7u:15197: 5.056.044a tāṃ hatvā punar evāhaṃ kṛtyam ātyayikaṃ smaran
GE09ram_1-7u:15198: 5.056.044c gatvā ca mahad adhvānaṃ paśyāmi nagamaṇḍitam
GE09ram_1-7u:15199: 5.056.044e dakṣiṇaṃ tīram udadher laṅkā yatra ca sā purī 5.056.045a astaṃ dinakare yāte rakṣasāṃ nilayaṃ purīm
GE09ram_1-7u:15201: 5.056.046a tatrāhaṃ sarvarātraṃ tu vicinvañ janakātmajām 5.056.046c rāvaṇāntaḥpuragato na cāpaśyaṃ sumadhyamām
GE09ram_1-7u:15202: 5.056.047a tataḥ sītām apaśyaṃs tu rāvaṇasya niveśane
GE09ram_1-7u:15203: 5.056.047c śokasāgaram āsādya na pāram upalakṣaye 5.056.048a śocatā ca mayā dṛṣṭaṃ prākāreṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:15205: 5.056.049a sa prākāram avaplutya paśyāmi bahupādapam 5.056.050a aśokavanikāmadhye śiṃśapāpādapo
GE09ram_1-7u:15206: 5.056.050c tam āruhya ca paśyāmi kāñcanaṃ kadalī vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:15211: 5.056.053a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā tādṛśīṃ nārīṃ rāmapatnīm aninditām
GE09ram_1-7u:15212: 5.056.053c tatraiva śiṃśapāvṛkṣe paśyann aham avasthitaḥ 5.056.054a tato halahalāśabdaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:15215: 5.056.055c ahaṃ ca śiṃśapāvṛkṣe pakṣīva gahane sthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15216: 5.056.056a tato rāvaṇadārāś ca rāvaṇaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15217: 5.056.056c taṃ deśaṃ samanuprāptā yatra sītābhavat sthitā
GE09ram_1-7u:15218: 5.056.057a taṃ dṛṣṭvātha varārohā sītā rakṣogaṇeśvaram 5.056.057c saṃkucyorū stanau pīnau bāhubhyāṃ parirabhya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:15219: 5.056.058a tām uvāca daśagrīvaḥ sītāṃ paramaduḥkhitām 5.056.058c avākśirāḥ prapatito bahu manyasva mām iti
GE09ram_1-7u:15220: 5.056.059a yadi cet tvaṃ tu māṃ darpān nābhinandasi garvite 5.056.059c dvimāsānantaraṃ sīte pāsyāmi rudhiraṃ tava 5.056.060a etac chrutvā vacas tasya rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15221: 5.056.060c uvāca paramakruddhā sītā vacanam uttamam 5.056.061a rākṣasādhama rāmasya bhāryām
GE09ram_1-7u:15223: 5.056.061e avācyaṃ vadato jihvā kathaṃ na patitā tava
GE09ram_1-7u:15224: 5.056.062a kiṃsvid vīryaṃ tavānārya yo māṃ bhartur asaṃnidhau
GE09ram_1-7u:15226: 5.056.063a na tvaṃ rāmasya sadṛśo dāsye 'py asyā na yujyase
GE09ram_1-7u:15227: 5.056.063c yajñīyaḥ satyavāk caiva raṇaślāghī ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15228: 5.056.064a jānakyā paruṣaṃ vākyam evam ukto daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15229: 5.056.064c jajvāla sahasā kopāc citāstha iva pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15230: 5.056.065a vivṛtya nayane krūre muṣṭim udyamya dakṣiṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:15231: 5.056.065c maithilīṃ hantum ārabdhaḥ strībhir hāhākṛtaṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:15232: 5.056.066a strīṇāṃ madhyāt samutpatya tasya bhāryā durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15233: 5.056.066c varā mandodarī nāma tayā sa pratiṣedhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15234: 5.056.067a uktaś ca madhurāṃ vāṇīṃ tayā sa madanārditaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15235: 5.056.067c sītayā tava kiṃ kāryaṃ mahendrasamavikrama 5.056.067e mayā saha ramasvādya madviśiṣṭā na jānakī
GE09ram_1-7u:15237: 5.056.068c sārdhaṃ prabho ramasveha sītayā kiṃ kariṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:15238: 5.056.069a tatas tābhiḥ sametābhir nārībhiḥ sa mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15239: 5.056.069c utthāpya sahasā nīto bhavanaṃ svaṃ niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15240: 5.056.070a yāte tasmin daśagrīve rākṣasyo vikṛtānanāḥ 5.056.070c sītāṃ nirbhartsayām āsur vākyaiḥ krūraiḥ sudāruṇaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15241: 5.056.071a tṛṇavad bhāṣitaṃ tāsāṃ gaṇayām āsa jānakī
GE09ram_1-7u:15242: 5.056.071c tarjitaṃ ca tadā tāsāṃ sītāṃ prāpya nirarthakam
GE09ram_1-7u:15244: 5.056.072c rāvaṇāya śaśaṃsus tāḥ sītāvyavasitaṃ mahat 5.056.073a tatas tāḥ sahitāḥ sarvā vihatāśā nirudyamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15245: 5.056.073c parikṣipya samantāt tāṃ nidrāvaśam upāgatāḥ 5.056.074a tāsu caiva prasuptāsu sītā bhartṛhite ratā
GE09ram_1-7u:15246: 5.056.074c vilapya karuṇaṃ dīnā praśuśoca suduḥkhitā 5.056.075a tāṃ cāhaṃ tādṛśīṃ dṛṣṭvā sītāyā dāruṇāṃ daśām
GE09ram_1-7u:15247: 5.056.075c cintayām āsa viśrānto na ca me nirvṛtaṃ manaḥ 5.056.076a saṃbhāṣaṇārthe ca mayā jānakyāś cintito vidhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15248: 5.056.076c ikṣvākukulavaṃśas tu tato mama puraskṛtaḥ 5.056.077a śrutvā tu gaditāṃ vācaṃ rājarṣigaṇapūjitām 5.056.077c pratyabhāṣata māṃ devī bāṣpaiḥ pihitalocanā 5.056.078a kas tvaṃ kena kathaṃ ceha prāpto vānarapuṃgava
GE09ram_1-7u:15249: 5.056.078c kā ca rāmeṇa te prītis tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:15250: 5.056.079a tasyās tadvacanaṃ śrutvā aham apy abruvaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15251: 5.056.079c devi rāmasya bhartus te sahāyo bhīmavikramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15252: 5.056.079e sugrīvo nāma vikrānto vānarendo mahābalaḥ 5.056.080a tasya māṃ viddhi bhṛtyaṃ tvaṃ hanūmantam ihāgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:15254: 5.056.081a idaṃ ca puruṣavyāghraḥ śrīmān dāśarathiḥ svayam
GE09ram_1-7u:15255: 5.056.081c aṅgulīyam abhijñānam adāt tubhyaṃ yaśasvini 5.056.082a tad icchāmi tvayājñaptaṃ devi kiṃ karavāṇy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:15256: 5.056.082c rāmalakṣmaṇayoḥ pārśvaṃ nayāmi tvāṃ kim uttaram
GE09ram_1-7u:15257: 5.056.083a etac chrutvā viditvā ca sītā janakanandinī
GE09ram_1-7u:15258: 5.056.083c āha rāvaṇam utsādya rāghavo māṃ nayatv iti
GE09ram_1-7u:15259: 5.056.084a praṇamya śirasā devīm aham āryām aninditām
GE09ram_1-7u:15261: 5.056.085a evam uktā varārohā maṇipravaram uttamam 5.056.085c prāyacchat paramodvignā vācā māṃ saṃdideśa ha
GE09ram_1-7u:15262: 5.056.086a tatas tasyai praṇamyāhaṃ rājaputryai samāhitaḥ 5.056.086c pradakṣiṇaṃ parikrāmam
GE09ram_1-7u:15263: 5.056.087a uttaraṃ punar evāha niścitya manasā tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:15264: 5.056.087c hanūman mama vṛttāntaṃ vaktum arhasi rāghave
GE09ram_1-7u:15265: 5.056.088a yathā śrutvaiva nacirāt tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:15266: 5.056.088c sugrīvasahitau vīrāv upeyātāṃ tathā kuru 5.056.089a yady anyathā bhaved etad dvau māsau jīvitaṃ mama 5.056.089c na māṃ drakṣyati kākutstho mriye sāham anāthavat
GE09ram_1-7u:15267: 5.056.090a tac chrutvā karuṇaṃ vākyaṃ krodho mām abhyavartata
GE09ram_1-7u:15268: 5.056.090c uttaraṃ ca mayā dṛṣṭaṃ kāryaśeṣam anantaram
GE09ram_1-7u:15270: 5.056.091c yuddhakāṅkṣī vanaṃ tac ca vināśayitum ārabhe
GE09ram_1-7u:15271: 5.056.092a tad bhagnaṃ vanaṣaṇḍaṃ tu bhrāntatrastamṛgadvijam 5.056.092c pratibuddhā nirīkṣante rākṣasyo vikṛtānanāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15272: 5.056.093a māṃ ca dṛṣṭvā vane tasmin samāgamya tatas tataḥ 5.056.093c tāḥ samabhyāgatāḥ kṣipraṃ rāvaṇāyācacakṣire
GE09ram_1-7u:15273: 5.056.094a rājan vanam idaṃ durgaṃ tava bhagnaṃ durātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:15274: 5.056.094c vānareṇa hy avijñāya tava vīryaṃ mahābala
GE09ram_1-7u:15275: 5.056.095a durbuddhes tasya rājendra tava vipriyakāriṇaḥ 5.056.095c vadham ājñāpaya kṣipraṃ yathāsau vilayaṃ vrajet
GE09ram_1-7u:15276: 5.056.096a tac chrutvā rākṣasendreṇa visṛṣṭā bhṛśadurjayāḥ 5.056.096c rākṣasāḥ kiṃkarā nāma rāvaṇasya mano'nugāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15278: 5.056.097c mayā tasmin vanoddeśe parigheṇa niṣūditam 5.056.098a teṣāṃ tu hataśeṣā ye te gatā laghuvikramāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15279: 5.056.098c nihataṃ ca mayā sainyaṃ rāvaṇāyācacakṣire 5.056.099a tato me buddhir utpannā caityaprāsādam ākramam
GE09ram_1-7u:15280: 5.056.100a tatrasthān rākṣasān hatvā śataṃ stambhena vai punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15281: 5.056.100c lalāma bhūto laṅkāyā mayā vidhvaṃsito ruṣā
GE09ram_1-7u:15282: 5.056.101a tataḥ prahastasya sutaṃ jambumālinam ādiśat 5.056.102a tam ahaṃ balasaṃpannaṃ rākṣasaṃ raṇakovidam 5.056.102c parigheṇātighoreṇa sūdayāmi sahānugam
GE09ram_1-7u:15283: 5.056.103a tac chrutvā rākṣasendras tu mantriputrān mahābalān
GE09ram_1-7u:15285: 5.056.103e parigheṇaiva tān sarvān nayāmi yamasādanam 5.056.104a mantriputrān hatāñ śrutvā samare laghuvikramān 5.056.104c pañcasenāgragāñ śūrān preṣayām āsa rāvaṇaḥ 5.056.104e tān ahaṃ saha sainyān vai sarvān evābhyasūdayam
GE09ram_1-7u:15286: 5.056.105a tataḥ punar daśagrīvaḥ putram akṣaṃ mahābalam
GE09ram_1-7u:15287: 5.056.105c bahubhī rākasaiḥ sārdhaṃ preṣayām āsa saṃyuge
GE09ram_1-7u:15288: 5.056.106a taṃ tu mandodarī putraṃ kumāraṃ raṇapaṇḍitam
GE09ram_1-7u:15289: 5.056.106c sahasā khaṃ samutkrāntaṃ pādayoś ca gṛhītavān
GE09ram_1-7u:15291: 5.056.107a tam akṣam āgataṃ bhagnaṃ niśamya sa daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15292: 5.056.107c tata indrajitaṃ nāma dvitīyaṃ rāvaṇaḥ sutam
GE09ram_1-7u:15294: 5.056.108a tasyāpy ahaṃ balaṃ sarvaṃ taṃ ca rākṣasapuṃgavam
GE09ram_1-7u:15295: 5.056.108c naṣṭaujasaṃ raṇe kṛtvā paraṃ harṣam upāgamam
GE09ram_1-7u:15296: 5.056.109a mahatā hi mahābāhuḥ pratyayena mahābalaḥ 5.056.109c preṣito rāvaṇenaiṣa saha vīrair madotkaṭaiḥ 5.056.110a brāhmeṇāstreṇa sa tu māṃ prabadhnāc cātivegataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15297: 5.056.110c rajjūbhir abhibadhnanti tato māṃ tatra rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15298: 5.056.111a rāvaṇasya samīpaṃ ca gṛhītvā mām upānayan
GE09ram_1-7u:15299: 5.056.111c dṛṣṭvā saṃbhāṣitaś cāhaṃ rāvaṇena durātmanā 5.056.112a pṛṣṭaś ca laṅkāgamanaṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca tad vadham
GE09ram_1-7u:15300: 5.056.112c tat sarvaṃ ca mayā tatra sītārtham iti jalpitam 5.056.113a asyāhaṃ darśanākāṅkṣī prāptas tvadbhavanaṃ vibho 5.056.113c mārutasyaurasaḥ putro vānaro hanumān aham 5.056.114a rāmadūtaṃ ca māṃ viddhi sugrīvasacivaṃ kapim
GE09ram_1-7u:15302: 5.056.115a śṛṇu cāpi samādeśaṃ yad ahaṃ prabravīmi te
GE09ram_1-7u:15303: 5.056.115c rākṣaseśa harīśas tvāṃ vākyam āha samāhitam
GE09ram_1-7u:15305: 5.056.116a vasato ṛṣyamūke me parvate vipuladrume 5.056.116c rāghavo raṇavikrānto mitratvaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:15306: 5.056.117a tena me kathitaṃ rājan bhāryā me rakṣasā hṛtā 5.056.117c tatra sāhāyyahetor me samayaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:15307: 5.056.118a vālinā hṛtarājyena sugrīveṇa saha prabhuḥ 5.056.118c cakre 'gnisākṣikaṃ sakyaṃ rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15308: 5.056.119a tena vālinam utsādya śareṇaikena saṃyuge 5.056.119c vānarāṇāṃ mahārājaḥ kṛtaḥ saṃplavatāṃ prabhuḥ 5.056.120a tasya sāhāyyam asmābhiḥ kāryaṃ sarvātmanā tv iha
GE09ram_1-7u:15309: 5.056.120c tena prasthāpitas tubhyaṃ samīpam iha dharmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15310: 5.056.121a kṣipram ānīyatāṃ sītā dīyatāṃ rāghavasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:15311: 5.056.121c yāvan na harayo vīrā vidhamanti balaṃ tava
GE09ram_1-7u:15312: 5.056.122a vānarāṇāṃ prabhavo hi na kena viditaḥ purā
GE09ram_1-7u:15313: 5.056.122c devatānāṃ sakāśaṃ ca ye gacchanti nimantritāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15314: 5.056.123a iti vānararājas tvām āhety abhihito mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:15315: 5.056.123c mām aikṣata tato ruṣṭaś cakṣuṣā pradahann iva
GE09ram_1-7u:15317: 5.056.125a tato vibhīṣaṇo nāma tasya bhrātā mahāmatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15319: 5.056.126a dūtavadhyā na dṛṣṭā hi rājaśāstreṣu rākṣasa
GE09ram_1-7u:15320: 5.056.126c dūtena veditavyaṃ ca yathārthaṃ hitavādinā 5.056.127a sumahaty aparādhe 'pi
GE09ram_1-7u:15322: 5.056.128a vibhīṣaṇenaivam ukto rāvaṇaḥ saṃdideśa tān 5.056.128c rākṣasān etad evādya lāṅgūlaṃ dahyatām iti
GE09ram_1-7u:15323: 5.056.129a tatas tasya vacaḥ śrutvā mama pucchaṃ samantataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15324: 5.056.129c veṣṭitaṃ śaṇavalkaiś ca paṭaiḥ kārpāsakais tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:15325: 5.056.130a rākṣasāḥ siddhasaṃnāhās tatas te caṇḍavikramāḥ 5.056.130c tad ādīpyanta me pucchaṃ hanantaḥ kāṣṭhamuṣṭibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15326: 5.056.131a baddhasya bahubhiḥ pāśair yantritasya ca rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15327: 5.056.131c na me pīḍā bhavet kā cid didṛkṣor nagarīṃ divā
GE09ram_1-7u:15328: 5.056.132a tatas te rākṣasāḥ śūrā baddhaṃ mām agnisaṃvṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:15330: 5.056.133a tato 'haṃ sumahad rūpaṃ saṃkṣipya punar ātmanaḥ 5.056.133c vimocayitvā taṃ bandhaṃ prakṛtiṣṭhaḥ sthitaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15331: 5.056.134a āyasaṃ parighaṃ gṛhya tāni rakṣāṃsy asūdayam
GE09ram_1-7u:15332: 5.056.134c tatas tan nagaradvāraṃ vegenāplutavān aham 5.056.135a pucchena ca pradīptena tāṃ purīṃ sāṭṭagopurām
GE09ram_1-7u:15333: 5.056.135c dahāmy aham asaṃbhrānto yugāntāgnir iva prajāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15334: 5.056.136a dagdhvā laṅkāṃ punaś caiva śaṅkā mām abhyavartata
GE09ram_1-7u:15335: 5.056.136c dahatā ca mayā laṅkāṃ daghdā sītā na saṃśayaḥ 5.056.137a athāhaṃ vācam aśrauṣaṃ cāraṇānāṃ śubhākṣarām 5.056.137c jānakī na ca dagdheti vismayodantabhāṣiṇām 5.056.138a tato me buddhir utpannā śrutvā tām adbhutāṃ giram 5.056.138c punar dṛṣṭā ca vaidehī visṛṣṭaś ca tayā punaḥ 5.056.139a rāghavasya prabhāvena bhavatāṃ caiva tejasā 5.056.139c sugrīvasya ca kāryārthaṃ mayā sarvam anuṣṭhitam
GE09ram_1-7u:15336: 5.056.140a etat sarvaṃ mayā tatra yathāvad upapāditam
GE09ram_1-7u:15337: 5.056.140c atra yan na kṛtaṃ śeṣaṃ tat sarvaṃ kriyatām iti
GE09ram_1-7u:15338: 5.057.001a etad ākhyānaṃ tat sarvaṃ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15339: 5.057.001c bhūyaḥ samupacakrāma vacanaṃ vaktum uttaram 5.057.002a saphalo rāghavodyogaḥ sugrīvasya ca saṃbhramaḥ 5.057.002c śīlam āsādya sītāyā mama ca plavanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:15340: 5.057.003a āryāyāḥ sadṛśaṃ śīlaṃ sītāyāḥ plavagarṣabhāḥ 5.057.003c tapasā dhārayel lokān kruddhā vā nirdahed api
GE09ram_1-7u:15341: 5.057.004a sarvathātipravṛddho 'sau rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ 5.057.004c yasya tāṃ spṛśato gātraṃ tapasā na vināśitam
GE09ram_1-7u:15342: 5.057.005a na tad agniśikhā kuryāt saṃspṛṣṭā pāṇinā satī
GE09ram_1-7u:15345: 5.057.006c adhastāc chiṃśapāvṛkṣe sādhvī karuṇam āsthitā 5.057.007a rākṣasībhiḥ parivṛtā
GE09ram_1-7u:15348: 5.057.008c pativratā ca suśroṇī avaṣṭabdhā ca jānakī
GE09ram_1-7u:15349: 5.057.009a anuraktā hi vaidehī rāmaṃ sarvātmanā śubhā
GE09ram_1-7u:15350: 5.057.009c ananyacittā rāme ca paulomīva puraṃdare 5.057.010a tad ekavāsaḥsaṃvītā rajodhvastā tathaiva ca 5.057.010c śokasaṃtāpadīnāṅgī sītā bhartṛhite ratā
GE09ram_1-7u:15351: 5.057.011a sā mayā rākṣasī madhye tarjyamānā muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15352: 5.057.011c rākṣasībhir virūpābhir dṛṣṭā hi pramadā vane
GE09ram_1-7u:15356: 5.057.013c kathaṃ cin mṛgaśāvākṣī viśvāsam upapāditā 5.057.014a tataḥ saṃbhāṣitā caiva sarvam arthaṃ ca darśitā
