GE09ram_1-7u:15357: 5.057.014c rāmasugrīvasakhyaṃ ca śrutvā prītim upāgatā 5.057.015a niyataḥ samudācāro bhaktir bhartari cottamā 5.057.016a yan na hanti daśagrīvaṃ sa mahātmā daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15358: 5.057.016c nimittamātraṃ rāmas tu vadhe tasya bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:15359: 5.057.017a evam āste mahābhāgā sītā śokaparāyaṇā 5.057.017c yad atra pratikartavyaṃ tat sarvam upapādyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:15360: 5.058.001a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā vālisūnur abhāṣata 5.058.001c jāmbavatpramukhān sarvān anujñāpya mahākapīn
GE09ram_1-7u:15361: 5.058.002a asminn evaṃgate kārye bhavatāṃ ca nivedite
GE09ram_1-7u:15362: 5.058.002c nyāyyaṃ sma saha vaidehyā draṣṭuṃ tau pārthivātmajau
GE09ram_1-7u:15364: 5.058.003c tāṃ laṅkāṃ tarasā hantuṃ rāvaṇaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_1-7u:15365: 5.058.004a kiṃ punaḥ sahito vīrair balavadbhiḥ kṛtātmabhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15366: 5.058.004c kṛtāstraiḥ plavagaiḥ śaktair bhavadbhir vijayaiṣibhiḥ 5.058.005a ahaṃ tu rāvaṇaṃ yuddhe sasainyaṃ sapuraḥsaram
GE09ram_1-7u:15368: 5.058.006a brāhmam aindraṃ ca raudraṃ ca vāyavyaṃ vāruṇaṃ tathā 5.058.006c yadi śakrajito 'strāṇi durnirīkṣyāṇi saṃyuge 5.058.006e tāny ahaṃ vidhamiṣyāmi nihaniṣyāmi rākṣasān 5.058.007a bhavatām abhyanujñāto vikramo me ruṇaddhi tam
GE09ram_1-7u:15369: 5.058.008a mayātulā visṛṣṭā hi śailavṛṣṭir nirantarā 5.058.008c devān api raṇe hanyāt kiṃ punas tān niśācarān 5.058.009a sāgaro 'py atiyād velāṃ mandaraḥ pracaled api 5.058.009c na jāmbavantaṃ samare kampayed arivāhinī 5.058.010a sarvarākṣasasaṃghānāṃ rākṣasā ye ca pūrvakāḥ 5.058.010c alam eko vināśāya vīro vāyusutaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15371: 5.058.011c mandaro 'py avaśīryeta kiṃ punar yudhi rākṣasāḥ 5.058.012a sadevāsurayuddheṣu gandharvoragapakṣiṣu 5.058.012c maindasya pratiyoddhāraṃ śaṃsata dvividasya vā 5.058.013a aśviputrau mahāvegāv etau plavagasattamau
GE09ram_1-7u:15374: 5.058.014c sarvāvadhyatvam atulam anayor dattavān purā 5.058.015a varotsekena mattau ca pramathya mahatīṃ camūm
GE09ram_1-7u:15375: 5.058.015c surāṇām amṛtaṃ vīrau pītavantau plavaṃgamau 5.058.016a etāv eva hi saṃkruddhau savājirathakuñjarām 5.058.016c laṅkāṃ nāśayituṃ śaktau sarve tiṣṭhantu vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15376: 5.058.017a ayuktaṃ tu vinā devīṃ dṛṣṭabadbhiḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15377: 5.058.017c samīpaṃ gantum asmābhī rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ 5.058.018a dṛṣṭā devī na cānītā iti tatra nivedanam
GE09ram_1-7u:15378: 5.058.018c ayuktam iva paśyāmi bhavadbhiḥ khyātavikramaiḥ 5.058.019a na hi vaḥ plavate kaś cin nāpi kaś cit parākrame
GE09ram_1-7u:15380: 5.058.020a teṣv evaṃ hatavīreṣu rākṣaseṣu hanūmatā 5.058.020c kim anyad atra kartavyaṃ gṛhītvā yāma jānakīm
GE09ram_1-7u:15381: 5.058.021a tam evaṃ kṛtasaṃkalpaṃ jāmbavān harisattamaḥ 5.058.021c uvāca paramaprīto vākyam arthavad arthavit 5.058.022a na tāvad eṣā matir akṣamā no; yathā bhavān paśyati rājaputra
GE09ram_1-7u:15382: 5.058.022c yathā tu rāmasya matir niviṣṭā; tathā bhavān paśyatu
GE09ram_1-7u:15384: 5.059.001a tato jāmbavato vākyam agṛhṇanta vanaukasaḥ 5.059.001c aṅgadapramukhā vīrā hanūmāṃś ca mahākapiḥ 5.059.002a prītimantas tataḥ sarve vāyuputrapuraḥsarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15388: 5.059.004a sabhājyamānaṃ bhūtais tam ātmavantaṃ mahābalam 5.059.004c hanūmantaṃ mahāvegaṃ vahanta iva dṛṣṭibhiḥ 5.059.005a rāghave cārthanirvṛttiṃ bhartuś ca paramaṃ yaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15392: 5.059.007a plavamānāḥ kham āplutya tatas te kānanaukṣakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15394: 5.059.008a yat tan madhuvanaṃ nāma sugrīvasyābhirakṣitam 5.059.008c adhṛṣyaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:15395: 5.059.009a yad rakṣati mahāvīryaḥ sadā dadhimukhaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15397: 5.059.010a te tad vanam upāgamya babhūvuḥ paramotkaṭāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15399: 5.059.011a tatas te vānarā hṛṣṭā dṛṣṭvā madhuvanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:15401: 5.059.012a tataḥ kumāras tān vṛddhāñ jāmbavatpramukhān kapīn
GE09ram_1-7u:15402: 5.059.012c anumānya dadau teṣāṃ nisargaṃ madhubhakṣaṇe 5.059.013a tataś cānumatāḥ sarve saṃprahṛṣṭā vanaukasaḥ 5.059.013c muditāś ca tatas te ca pranṛtyanti tatas tataḥ 5.059.014a gāyanti ke cit praṇamanti ke cin; nṛtyanti ke cit prahasanti ke cit
GE09ram_1-7u:15403: 5.059.014c patanti ke cid vicaranti ke cit; plavanti ke cit pralapanti ke cit
GE09ram_1-7u:15404: 5.059.015a parasparaṃ ke cid upāśrayante; parasparaṃ ke cid atibruvante
GE09ram_1-7u:15405: 5.059.015c drumād drumaṃ ke cid abhiplavante; kṣitau nagāgrān nipatanti ke cit 5.059.016a mahītalāt ke cid udīrṇavegā; mahādrumāgrāṇy abhisaṃpatante 5.059.016c gāyantam anyaḥ prahasann upaiti; hasantam anyaḥ prahasann
GE09ram_1-7u:15407: 5.059.017a rudantam anyaḥ prarudann upaiti; nudantam anyaḥ praṇudann
GE09ram_1-7u:15409: 5.059.017c samākulaṃ tat kapisainyam āsīn; madhuprapānotkaṭa sattvaceṣṭam 5.059.017e na cātra kaś cin na babhūva matto; na cātra kaś cin na babhūva
GE09ram_1-7u:15411: 5.059.018a tato vanaṃ tat paribhakṣyamāṇaṃ; drumāṃś ca vidhvaṃsitapatrapuṣpān
GE09ram_1-7u:15412: 5.059.018c samīkṣya kopād dadhivaktranāmā; nivārayām āsa kapiḥ kapīṃs tān 5.059.019a sa taiḥ pravṛddhaiḥ paribhartsyamāno; vanasya goptā harivīravṛddhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15413: 5.059.019c cakāra bhūyo matim ugratejā; vanasya rakṣāṃ prati vānarebhyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15414: 5.059.020a uvāca kāṃś cit paruṣāṇi dhṛṣṭam; asaktam anyāṃś ca talair jaghāna 5.059.020c sametya kaiś cit kalahaṃ cakāra; tathaiva sāmnopajagāma kāṃś
GE09ram_1-7u:15416: 5.059.021a sa tair madāc cāprativārya vegair; balāc ca tenāprativāryamāṇaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15417: 5.059.021c pradharṣitas tyaktabhayaiḥ sametya; prakṛṣyate cāpy anavekṣya
GE09ram_1-7u:15419: 5.059.022a nakhais tudanto daśanair daśantas; talaiś ca pādaiś ca samāpnuvantaḥ 5.059.022c madāt kapiṃ taṃ kapayaḥ samagrā; mahāvanaṃ nirviṣayaṃ ca cakruḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15420: 5.060.001a tān uvāca hariśreṣṭho hanūmān vānararṣabhaḥ 5.060.001c avyagramanaso yūyaṃ madhu sevata vānarāḥ 5.060.002a śrutvā hanumato vākyaṃ harīṇāṃ pravaro 'ṅgadaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15421: 5.060.002c pratyuvāca prasannātmā pibantu harayo madhu 5.060.003a avaśyaṃ kṛtakāryasya vākyaṃ hanumato mayā 5.060.003c akāryam api kartavyaṃ kim aṅga punar īdṛśam
GE09ram_1-7u:15422: 5.060.004a andagasya mukhāc chrutvā vacanaṃ vānararṣabhāḥ 5.060.004c sādhu sādhv iti saṃhṛṣṭā vānarāḥ pratyapūjayan
GE09ram_1-7u:15424: 5.060.005c jagmur madhuvanaṃ yatra nadīvega iva drutam
GE09ram_1-7u:15425: 5.060.006a te prahṛṣṭā madhuvanaṃ pālān ākramya vīryataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15426: 5.060.006c atisargāc ca paṭavo dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca maithilīm
GE09ram_1-7u:15427: 5.060.007a utpatya ca tataḥ sarve vanapālān samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15428: 5.060.007c tāḍayanti sma śataśaḥ saktān madhuvane tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:15429: 5.060.008a madhūni droṇamātrāṇi bahubhiḥ parigṛhya te 5.060.008c ghnanti sma sahitāḥ sarve bhakṣayanti tathāpare
GE09ram_1-7u:15430: 5.060.009a ke cit pītvāpavidhyanti madhūni madhupiṅgalāḥ 5.060.009c madhūcciṣṭena ke cic ca jaghnur anyonyam utkaṭāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15431: 5.060.010a apare vṛkṣamūleṣu śākhāṃ gṛhya vyavasthitaḥ 5.060.010c atyarthaṃ ca madaglānāḥ parṇāny āstīrya śerate
GE09ram_1-7u:15432: 5.060.011a unmattabhūtāḥ plavagā madhumattāś ca hṛṣṭavat 5.060.011c kṣipanty api tathānyonyaṃ skhalanty api tathāpare
GE09ram_1-7u:15433: 5.060.012a ke cit kṣveḍān prakurvanti ke cit kūjanti hṛṣṭavat 5.060.012c harayo madhunā mattāḥ ke cit suptā mahītale
GE09ram_1-7u:15434: 5.060.013a ye 'py atra madhupālāḥ syuḥ preṣyā dadhimukhasya tu
GE09ram_1-7u:15435: 5.060.013c te 'pi tair vānarair bhīmaiḥ pratiṣiddhā diśo gatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15436: 5.060.014a jānubhiś ca prakṛṣṭāś ca devamārgaṃ ca darśitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15437: 5.060.014c abruvan paramodvignā gatvā dadhimukhaṃ vacaḥ 5.060.015a hanūmatā dattavarair hataṃ madhuvanaṃ balāt 5.060.015c vayaṃ ca jānubhiḥ kṛṣṭā devamārgaṃ ca darśitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15438: 5.060.016a tato dadhimukhaḥ kruddho vanapas tatra vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15439: 5.060.016c hataṃ madhuvanaṃ śrutvā sāntvayām āsa tān harīn
GE09ram_1-7u:15443: 5.060.018c punar vīrā madhuvanaṃ tenaiva sahitā yayuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15444: 5.060.019a madhye caiṣāṃ dadhimukhaḥ pragṛhya sumahātarum 5.060.019c samabhyadhāvad vegenā te ca sarve plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15445: 5.060.020a te śilāḥ pādapāṃś cāpi pāṣāṇāṃś cāpi vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15446: 5.060.020c gṛhītvābhyāgaman kruddhā yatra te kapikuñjarāḥ 5.060.021a te svāmivacanaṃ vīrā hṛdayeṣv avasajya tat
GE09ram_1-7u:15448: 5.060.022a vṛkṣasthāṃś ca talasthāṃś ca vānarān baladarpitān
GE09ram_1-7u:15449: 5.060.022c abhyakrāmanta te vīrāḥ pālās tatra sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15450: 5.060.023a atha dṛṣṭvā dadhimukhaṃ kruddhaṃ vānarapuṃgavāḥ 5.060.023c abhyadhāvanta vegena hanūmatpramukhās tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:15451: 5.060.024a taṃ savṛkṣaṃ mahābāhum āpatantaṃ mahābalam 5.060.024c āryakaṃ prāharat tatra bāhubhyāṃ kupito 'ṅgadaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15452: 5.060.025a madāndhaś a na vedainam āryako 'yaṃ mameti saḥ 5.060.025c athainaṃ niṣpipeṣāśu vegavad vasudhātale
GE09ram_1-7u:15453: 5.060.026a sa bhagnabāhur vimukho vihvalaḥ śoṇitokṣitaḥ 5.060.026c mumoha sahasā vīro muhūrtaṃ kapikuñjaraḥ 5.060.027a sa kathaṃ cid vimuktas tair vānarair vānararṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15454: 5.060.027c uvācaikāntam āgamya bhṛtyāṃs tān samupāgatān 5.060.028a ete tiṣṭhantu gacchāmo bhartā no yatra vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15455: 5.060.028c sugrīvo vipulagrīvaḥ saha rāmeṇa tiṣṭhati 5.060.029a sarvaṃ caivāṅgade doṣaṃ śrāvayiṣyāmi pārthiva 5.060.029c amarṣī vacanaṃ śrutvā ghātayiṣyati vānarān 5.060.030a iṣṭaṃ madhuvanaṃ hy etat sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15456: 5.060.030c pitṛpaitāmahaṃ divyaṃ devair api durāsadam 5.060.031a sa vānarān imān sarvān madhulubdhān gatāyuṣaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15458: 5.060.032a vadhyā hy ete durātmāno nṛpājñā paribhāvinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15459: 5.060.032c amarṣaprabhavo roṣaḥ saphalo no bhaviṣyati 5.060.033a evam uktvā dadhimukho vanapālān mahābalaḥ 5.060.033c jagāma sahasotpatya vanapālaiḥ samanvitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15460: 5.060.034a nimeṣāntaramātreṇa sa hi prāpto vanālayaḥ 5.060.034c sahasrāṃśusuto dhīmān sugrīvo yatra vānaraḥ 5.060.035a rāmaṃ ca lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva dṛṣṭvā sugrīvam eva ca 5.060.035c samapratiṣṭhāṃ jagatīm ākāśān nipapāta ha 5.060.036a sa nipatya mahāvīryaḥ sarvais taiḥ parivāritaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15461: 5.060.036c harir dadhimukhaḥ pālaiḥ pālānāṃ parameśvaraḥ 5.060.037a sa dīnavadano bhūtvā kṛtvā śirasi cāñjalim
GE09ram_1-7u:15462: 5.060.037c sugrīvasya śubhau mūrdhnā caraṇau pratyapīḍayat 5.061.001a tato mūrdhnā nipatitaṃ vānaraṃ vānararṣabhaḥ 5.061.001c dṛṣṭvaivodvignahṛdayo vākyam etad uvāca ha 5.061.002a uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha kasmāt tvaṃ pādayoḥ patito mama
GE09ram_1-7u:15463: 5.061.002c abhayaṃ te bhaved vīra satyam evābhidhīyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:15464: 5.061.003a sa tu viśvāsitas tena sugrīveṇa mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:15466: 5.061.004a naivarkṣarajasā rājan na tvayā nāpi vālinā
GE09ram_1-7u:15467: 5.061.004c vanaṃ nisṛṣṭapūrvaṃ hi bhakṣitaṃ tat tu vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15468: 5.061.005a ebhiḥ pradharṣitāś caiva vāritā vanarakṣibhiḥ 5.061.005c madhūny acintayitvemān bhakṣayanti pibanti ca 5.061.006a śiṣṭam atrāpavidhyanti bhakṣayanti tathāpare
GE09ram_1-7u:15469: 5.061.006c nivāryamāṇās te sarve bhruvau vai darśayanti hi
GE09ram_1-7u:15470: 5.061.007a ime hi saṃrabdhatarās tathā taiḥ saṃpradharṣitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15471: 5.061.007c vārayanto vanāt tasmāt kruddhair vānarapuṃgavaiḥ 5.061.008a tatas tair bahubhir vīrair vānarair vānararṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15473: 5.061.009a pāṇibhir nihatāḥ ke cit ke cij jānubhir āhatāḥ 5.061.009c prakṛṣṭāś ca yathākāmaṃ devamārgaṃ ca darśitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15474: 5.061.010a evam ete hatāḥ śūrās tvayi tiṣṭhati bhartari
GE09ram_1-7u:15475: 5.061.010c kṛtsnaṃ madhuvanaṃ caiva prakāmaṃ taiḥ prabhakṣyate
GE09ram_1-7u:15476: 5.061.011a evaṃ vijñāpyamānaṃ tu sugrīvaṃ vānararṣabham 5.061.011c apṛcchat taṃ mahāprājño lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā 5.061.012a kim ayaṃ vānaro rājan vanapaḥ pratyupasthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15477: 5.061.012c kaṃ cārtham abhinirdiśya duḥkhito vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:15478: 5.061.013a evam uktas tu sugrīvo lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:15480: 5.061.014a ārya lakṣmaṇa saṃprāha vīro dadhimukhaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15482: 5.061.015a naiṣām akṛtakṛtyānām īdṛśaḥ syād upakramaḥ 5.061.015c vanaṃ yathābhipannaṃ taiḥ sādhitaṃ karma vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15483: 5.061.016a dṛṣṭā devī na saṃdeho na cānyena hanūmatā
GE09ram_1-7u:15484: 5.061.016c na hy anyaḥ sādhane hetuḥ karmaṇo 'sya hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15485: 5.061.017a kāryasiddhir hanumati matiś ca haripuṃgava 5.061.017c vyavasāyaś ca vīryaṃ ca śrutaṃ cāpi pratiṣṭhitam
GE09ram_1-7u:15486: 5.061.018a jāmbavān yatra netā syād aṅgadasya baleśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15487: 5.061.018c hanūmāṃś cāpy adhiṣṭhātā na tasya gatir anyathā
GE09ram_1-7u:15488: 5.061.019a aṅgadapramukhair vīrair hataṃ madhuvanaṃ kila 5.061.019c vicintya dakṣiṇām āśām āgatair haripuṃgavaiḥ 5.061.020a āgataiś ca praviṣṭaṃ tad yathā madhuvanaṃ hi taiḥ 5.061.020c dharṣitaṃ ca vanaṃ kṛtsnam upayuktaṃ ca vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15489: 5.061.020e vāritāḥ sahitāḥ pālās tathā jānubhir āhatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15490: 5.061.021a etadartham ayaṃ prāpto vaktuṃ madhuravāg iha
GE09ram_1-7u:15491: 5.061.021c nāmnā dadhimukho nāma hariḥ prakhyātavikramaḥ 5.061.022a dṛṣṭā sītā mahābāho saumitre paśya tattvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15492: 5.061.022c abhigamya yathā sarve pibanti madhu vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15493: 5.061.023a na cāpy adṛṣṭvā vaidehīṃ viśrutāḥ puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_1-7u:15494: 5.061.023c vanaṃ dātta varaṃ divyaṃ dharṣayeyur vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15495: 5.061.024a tataḥ prahṛṣṭo dharmātmā lakṣmaṇaḥ saharāghavaḥ 5.061.024c śrutvā karṇasukhāṃ vāṇīṃ sugrīvavadanāc cyutām 5.061.025a prāhṛṣyata bhṛśaṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15496: 5.061.025c śrutvā dadhimukhasyedaṃ sugrīvas tu prahṛṣya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:15497: 5.061.025e vanapālaṃ punar vākyaṃ sugrīvaḥ pratyabhāṣata 5.061.026a prīto 'smi saumya yad bhuktaṃ vanaṃ taiḥ kṛtakarmabhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15498: 5.061.026c marṣitaṃ marṣaṇīyaṃ ca ceṣṭitaṃ kṛtakarmaṇām 5.061.027a icchāmi śīghraṃ hanumatpradhānān; śākhāmṛgāṃs tān mṛgarājadarpān
GE09ram_1-7u:15499: 5.061.027c draṣṭuṃ kṛtārthān saha rāghavābhyāṃ; śrotuṃ ca sītādhigame
GE09ram_1-7u:15501: 5.062.001a sugrīveṇaivam uktas tu hṛṣṭo dadhimukhaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15502: 5.062.001c rāghavaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva sugrīvaṃ cābhyavādayat 5.062.002a sa praṇamya ca sugrīvaṃ rāghavau ca mahābalau
GE09ram_1-7u:15503: 5.062.002c vānaraiḥ sahitaiḥ śūrair divam evotpapāta ha
GE09ram_1-7u:15504: 5.062.003a sa yathaivāgataḥ pūrvaṃ tathaiva tvarito gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15505: 5.062.003c nipatya gaganād bhūmau tad vanaṃ praviveśa ha
GE09ram_1-7u:15506: 5.062.004a sa praviṣṭo madhuvanaṃ dadarśa hariyūthapān 5.062.004c vimadān uddhatān sarvān mehamānān madhūdakam 5.062.005a sa tān upāgamad vīro baddhvā karapuṭāñjalim
GE09ram_1-7u:15507: 5.062.005c uvāca vacanaṃ ślakṣṇam idaṃ hṛṣṭavad aṅgadam
GE09ram_1-7u:15508: 5.062.006a saumya roṣo na kartavyo yad ebhir abhivāritaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15509: 5.062.006c ajñānād rakṣibhiḥ krodhād bhavantaḥ pratiṣedhitāḥ 5.062.007a yuvarājas tvam īśaś ca vanasyāsya mahābala
GE09ram_1-7u:15510: 5.062.007c maurkhyāt pūrvaṃ kṛto doṣas tad bhavān kṣantum arhati 5.062.008a yathaiva hi pitā te 'bhūt pūrvaṃ harigaṇeśvaraḥ 5.062.008c tathā tvam api sugrīvo nānyas tu harisattama
GE09ram_1-7u:15511: 5.062.009a ākhyātaṃ hi mayā gatvā pitṛvyasya tavānagha
GE09ram_1-7u:15513: 5.062.010a sa tvadāgamanaṃ śrutvā sahaibhir hariyūthapaiḥ 5.062.010c prahṛṣṭo na tu ruṣṭo 'sau vanaṃ śrutvā pradharṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:15514: 5.062.011a prahṛṣṭo māṃ pitṛvyas te sugrīvo vānareśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15515: 5.062.011c śīghraṃ preṣaya sarvāṃs tān iti hovāca pārthivaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15516: 5.062.012a śrutvā dadhimukhasyaitad vacanaṃ ślakṣṇam aṅgadaḥ 5.062.012c abravīt tān hariśreṣṭho vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ 5.062.013a śaṅke śruto 'yaṃ vṛttānto rāmeṇa hariyūthapāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15517: 5.062.013c tat kṣamaṃ neha naḥ sthātuṃ kṛte kārye paraṃtapāḥ 5.062.014a pītvā madhu yathākāmaṃ viśrāntā vanacāriṇaḥ 5.062.014c kiṃ śeṣaṃ gamanaṃ tatra sugrīvo yatra me guruḥ 5.062.015a sarve yathā māṃ vakṣyanti sametya hariyūthapāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15518: 5.062.015c tathāsmi kartā kartavye bhavadbhiḥ paravān aham
GE09ram_1-7u:15519: 5.062.016a nājñāpayitum īśo 'haṃ yuvarājo 'smi yady api 5.062.016c ayuktaṃ kṛtakarmāṇo yūyaṃ dharṣayituṃ mayā 5.062.017a bruvataś cāṅgadaś caivaṃ śrutvā vacanam avyayam
GE09ram_1-7u:15520: 5.062.017c prahṛṣṭamanaso vākyam idam ūcur vanaukasaḥ 5.062.018a evaṃ vakṣyati ko rājan prabhuḥ san vānararṣabha
GE09ram_1-7u:15521: 5.062.018c aiśvaryamadamatto hi sarvo 'ham iti manyate 5.062.019a tava cedaṃ susadṛśaṃ vākyaṃ nānyasya kasya cit
GE09ram_1-7u:15522: 5.062.019c saṃnatir hi tavākhyāti bhaviṣyac chubhabhāgyatām 5.062.020a sarve vayam api prāptās tatra gantuṃ kṛtakṣaṇāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15523: 5.062.020c sa yatra harivīrāṇāṃ sugrīvaḥ patir avyayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15524: 5.062.021a tvayā hy anuktair haribhir naiva śakyaṃ padāt padam 5.062.021c kva cid gantuṃ hariśreṣṭha brūmaḥ satyam idaṃ tu te
GE09ram_1-7u:15525: 5.062.022a evaṃ tu vadatāṃ teṣām aṅgadaḥ pratyabhāṣata
GE09ram_1-7u:15526: 5.062.022c bāḍhaṃ gacchāma ity uktvā utpapāta mahītalāt
GE09ram_1-7u:15527: 5.062.023a utpatantam anūtpetuḥ sarve te hariyūthapāḥ 5.062.023c kṛtvākāśaṃ nirākāśaṃ yajñotkṣiptā
GE09ram_1-7u:15529: 5.062.024c vinadanto mahānādaṃ ghanā vāteritā yathā 5.062.025a aṅgade hy ananuprāpte sugrīvo vānarādhipaḥ 5.062.025c uvāca śokopahataṃ rāmaṃ kamalalocanam
GE09ram_1-7u:15530: 5.062.026a samāśvasihi bhadraṃ te dṛṣṭā devī na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15531: 5.062.026c nāgantum iha śakyaṃ tair atīte samaye hi naḥ 5.062.027a na matsakāśam āgacchet kṛtye hi vinipātite
GE09ram_1-7u:15533: 5.062.028a yady apy akṛtakṛtyānām īdṛśaḥ syād upakramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15536: 5.062.029c na me madhuvanaṃ hanyād ahṛṣṭaḥ plavageśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15537: 5.062.030a kausalyā suprajā rāma samāśvasihi suvrata 5.062.030c dṛṣṭā devī na saṃdeho na cānyena hanūmatā
GE09ram_1-7u:15538: 5.062.030e na hy anyaḥ karmaṇo hetuḥ sādhane tadvidho bhavet 5.062.031a hanūmati hi siddhiś ca matiś ca matisattama
GE09ram_1-7u:15539: 5.062.031c vyavasāyaś ca vīryaṃ ca sūrye teja iva dhruvam 5.062.032a jāmbavān yatra netā syād aṅgadaś ca baleśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15540: 5.062.032c hanūmāṃś cāpy adhiṣṭhātā na tasya gatir anyathā
GE09ram_1-7u:15541: 5.062.033a mā bhūś cintā samāyuktaḥ saṃpraty amitavikrama
GE09ram_1-7u:15542: 5.062.034a tataḥ kila kilā śabdaṃ śuśrāvāsannam ambare
GE09ram_1-7u:15544: 5.062.034e kiṣkindhām upayātānāṃ siddhiṃ kathayatām iva 5.062.035a tataḥ śrutvā ninādaṃ taṃ kapīnāṃ kapisattamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15546: 5.062.036a ājagmus te 'pi harayo rāmadarśanakāṅkṣiṇaḥ 5.062.036c aṅgadaṃ purataḥ kṛtvā hanūmantaṃ ca vānaram
GE09ram_1-7u:15548: 5.062.037c nipetur harirājasya samīpe rāghavasya ca 5.062.038a hanūmāṃś ca mahābahuḥ praṇamya śirasā tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15549: 5.062.038c niyatām akṣatāṃ devīṃ rāghavāya nyavedayat 5.062.039a niścitārthaṃ tatas tasmin sugrīvaṃ pavanātmaje 5.062.039c lakṣmaṇaḥ prītimān prītaṃ bahumānād avaikṣata 5.062.040a prītyā ca ramamāṇo 'tha rāghavaḥ paravīrahā 5.062.040c bahu mānena mahatā hanūmantam avaikṣata 5.063.001a tataḥ prasravaṇaṃ śailaṃ te gatvā citrakānanam
GE09ram_1-7u:15550: 5.063.001c praṇamya śirasā rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_1-7u:15551: 5.063.002a yuvarājaṃ puraskṛtya sugrīvam abhivādya ca 5.063.002c pravṛttam atha sītāyāḥ pravaktum upacakramuḥ 5.063.003a rāvaṇāntaḥpure rodhaṃ rākṣasībhiś ca tarjanam 5.063.003c rāme samanurāgaṃ ca yaś cāpi samayaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15552: 5.063.004a etad ākhyānti te sarve harayo rāma saṃnidhau
GE09ram_1-7u:15553: 5.063.004c vaidehīm akṣatāṃ śrutvā rāmas tūttaram abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:15554: 5.063.005a kva sītā vartate devī kathaṃ ca mayi vartate 5.063.005c etan me sarvam ākhyāta vaidehīṃ prati vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15555: 5.063.006a rāmasya gaditaṃ śrutva harayo rāmasaṃnidhau 5.063.006c codayanti hanūmantaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:15556: 5.063.007a śrutvā tu vacanaṃ teṣāṃ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15557: 5.063.007c uvāca vākyaṃ vākyajñaḥ sītāyā darśanaṃ yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:15559: 5.063.008c agacchaṃ jānakīṃ sītāṃ mārgamāṇo didṛkṣayā 5.063.009a tatra laṅketi nagarī rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ 5.063.009c dakṣiṇasya samudrasya tīre vasati dakṣiṇe 5.063.010a tatra dṛṣṭā mayā sītā rāvaṇāntaḥpure satī
GE09ram_1-7u:15560: 5.063.010c saṃnyasya tvayi jīvantī rāmā rāma manoratham
GE09ram_1-7u:15561: 5.063.011a dṛṣṭā me rākṣasī madhye tarjyamānā muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15563: 5.063.012a duḥkham āpadyate devī tavāduḥkhocitā satī 5.063.012c rāvaṇāntaḥpure ruddhvā rākṣasībhiḥ surakṣitā
GE09ram_1-7u:15567: 5.063.014c devī kathaṃ cit kākutstha tvanmanā mārgitā mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:15569: 5.063.015c sa mayā naraśārdūla viśvāsam upapāditā 5.063.016a tataḥ saṃbhāṣitā devī sarvam arthaṃ ca darśitā
GE09ram_1-7u:15570: 5.063.016c rāmasugrīvasakhyaṃ ca śrutvā prītim upāgatā 5.063.017a niyataḥ samudācāro bhaktiś cāsyās tathā tvayi
GE09ram_1-7u:15571: 5.063.017c evaṃ mayā mahābhāgā dṛṣṭā janakanandinī 5.063.017e ugreṇa tapasā yuktā tvadbhaktyā puruṣarṣabha 5.063.018a abhijñānaṃ ca me dattaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ tavāntike
GE09ram_1-7u:15572: 5.063.018c citrakūṭe mahāprājña vāyasaṃ prati rāghava 5.063.019a vijñāpyaś ca nara vyāghro rāmo vāyusuta tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:15573: 5.063.019c akhileneha yad dṛṣṭam iti mām āha jānakī
GE09ram_1-7u:15574: 5.063.020a idaṃ cāsmai pradātavyaṃ yatnāt suparirakṣitam 5.063.020c bruvatā vacanāny evaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:15575: 5.063.021a eṣa cūḍāmaṇiḥ śrīmān mayā te yatnarakṣitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15576: 5.063.021c manaḥśilāyās tikalas taṃ smarasveti cābravīt 5.063.022a eṣa niryātitaḥ śrīmān mayā te vārisaṃbhavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15577: 5.063.022c etaṃ dṛṣṭvā pramodiṣye vyasane tvām ivānagha
GE09ram_1-7u:15579: 5.063.023c ūrdhvaṃ māsān na jīveyaṃ rakṣasāṃ vaśam āgatā
GE09ram_1-7u:15580: 5.063.024a iti mām abravīt sītā kṛśāṅgī dharma cāriṇī
GE09ram_1-7u:15582: 5.063.025a etad eva mayākhyātaṃ sarvaṃ rāghava yad yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:15584: 5.063.026a tau jātāśvāsau rājaputrau viditvā; tac cābhijñānaṃ rāghavāya
GE09ram_1-7u:15586: 5.063.026c devyā cākhyātaṃ sarvam evānupūrvyād; vācā saṃpūrṇaṃ vāyuputraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15588: 5.064.001a evam ukto hanumatā rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ 5.064.001c taṃ maṇiṃ hṛdaye kṛtvā praruroda
GE09ram_1-7u:15589: 5.064.002a taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā maṇiśreṣṭhaṃ rāghavaḥ śokakarśitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15590: 5.064.002c netrābhyām aśrupūrṇābhyāṃ sugrīvam idam abravīt 5.064.003a yathaiva dhenuḥ sravati snehād vatsasya vatsalā
GE09ram_1-7u:15591: 5.064.003c tathā mamāpi hṛdayaṃ maṇiratnasya darśanāt 5.064.004a maṇiratnam idaṃ dattaṃ vaidehyāḥ śvaśureṇa me
GE09ram_1-7u:15592: 5.064.004c vadhūkāle yathā baddham adhikaṃ mūrdhni śobhate
GE09ram_1-7u:15593: 5.064.005a ayaṃ hi jalasaṃbhūto maṇiḥ pravarapūjitaḥ 5.064.005c yajñe paramatuṣṭena dattaḥ śakreṇa dhīmatā 5.064.006a imaṃ dṛṣṭvā maṇiśreṣṭhaṃ tathā tātasya darśanam
GE09ram_1-7u:15594: 5.064.006c adyāsmy avagataḥ saumya vaidehasya tathā vibhoḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15595: 5.064.007a ayaṃ hi śobhate tasyāḥ priyāyā mūrdhni me maṇiḥ 5.064.007c adyāsya darśanenāhaṃ prāptāṃ tām iva cintaye
GE09ram_1-7u:15596: 5.064.008a kim āha sītā vaidehī brūhi saumya punaḥ punaḥ 5.064.008c parāsum iva toyena siñcantī vākyavāriṇā 5.064.009a itas tu kiṃ duḥkhataraṃ yad imaṃ vārisaṃbhavam
GE09ram_1-7u:15597: 5.064.009c maṇiṃ paśyāmi saumitre vaidehīm āgataṃ vinā
GE09ram_1-7u:15598: 5.064.010a ciraṃ jīvati vaidehī yadi māsaṃ dhariṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:15599: 5.064.010c kṣaṇaṃ saumya na jīveyaṃ vinā tām asitekṣaṇām
GE09ram_1-7u:15600: 5.064.011a naya mām api taṃ deśaṃ yatra dṛṣṭā mama priyā
GE09ram_1-7u:15601: 5.064.011c na tiṣṭheyaṃ kṣaṇam api pravṛttim upalabhya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:15602: 5.064.012a kathaṃ sā mama suśroṇi bhīru bhīruḥ satī tadā 5.064.012c bhayāvahānāṃ ghorāṇāṃ madhye tiṣṭhati rakṣasām 5.064.013a śāradas timironmukho nūnaṃ candra ivāmbudaiḥ 5.064.013c āvṛtaṃ vadanaṃ tasyā na virājati rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15603: 5.064.014a kim āha sītā hanumaṃs tattvataḥ kathayasva me
GE09ram_1-7u:15604: 5.064.014c etena khalu jīviṣye bheṣajenāturo yathā 5.064.015a madhurā madhurālāpā kim āha mama bhāminī
GE09ram_1-7u:15605: 5.064.015c madvihīnā varārohā hanuman kathayasva me 5.064.015e duḥkhād duḥkhataraṃ prāpya kathaṃ jīvati jānakī
GE09ram_1-7u:15606: 5.065.001a evam uktas tu hanumān rāghaveṇa mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:15607: 5.065.001c sītāyā bhāṣitaṃ sarvaṃ nyavedayata rāghave 5.065.002a idam uktavatī devī jānakī puruṣarṣabha 5.065.002c pūrvavṛttam abhijñānaṃ citrakūṭe yathā tatham 5.065.003a sukhasuptā tvayā sārdhaṃ jānakī pūrvam utthitā
GE09ram_1-7u:15609: 5.065.004a paryāyeṇa ca suptas tvaṃ devyaṅke bharatāgraja
GE09ram_1-7u:15610: 5.065.004c punaś ca kila pakṣī sa devyā janayati vyathām 5.065.005a tataḥ punar upāgamya virarāda bhṛśaṃ kila
GE09ram_1-7u:15611: 5.065.005c tatas tvaṃ bodhitas tasyāḥ śoṇitena samukṣitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15612: 5.065.006a vāyasena ca tenaiva satataṃ bādhyamānayā 5.065.006c bodhitaḥ kila devyās tvaṃ sukhasuptaḥ paraṃtapa
GE09ram_1-7u:15613: 5.065.007a tāṃ tu dṛṣṭvā mahābāho rāditāṃ ca stanāntare
GE09ram_1-7u:15614: 5.065.007c āśīviṣa iva kruddho niḥśvasann abhyabhāṣathāḥ 5.065.008a nakhāgraiḥ kena te bhīru dāritaṃ tu stanāntaram
GE09ram_1-7u:15615: 5.065.008c kaḥ krīḍati saroṣeṇa pañcavaktreṇa bhoginā 5.065.009a nirīkṣamāṇaḥ sahasā vāyasaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:15616: 5.065.009c nakhaiḥ sarudhirais tīkṣṇair mām evābhimukhaṃ sthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:15617: 5.065.010a sutaḥ kila sa śakrasya vāyasaḥ patatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15618: 5.065.010c dharāntaracaraḥ śīghraṃ pavanasya gatau samaḥ 5.065.011a tatas tasmin mahābāho
GE09ram_1-7u:15619: 5.065.011c vāyase tvaṃ kṛtvāḥ krūrāṃ matiṃ matimatāṃ vara
GE09ram_1-7u:15620: 5.065.012a sa darbhaṃ saṃstarād gṛhya brahmāstreṇa nyayojayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15621: 5.065.012c sa dīpta iva kālāgnir jajvālābhimukhaḥ khagam
GE09ram_1-7u:15622: 5.065.013a sa tvaṃ pradīptaṃ cikṣepa darbhaṃ taṃ vāyasaṃ prati 5.065.013c tatas tu vāyasaṃ dīptaḥ sa darbho 'nujagāma ha
GE09ram_1-7u:15623: 5.065.014a sa pitrā ca parityaktaḥ suraiḥ sarvair maharṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15624: 5.065.014c trīṃl lokān saṃparikramya trātāraṃ nādhigacchati 5.065.015a taṃ tvaṃ nipatitaṃ bhūmau śaraṇyaḥ śaraṇāgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:15625: 5.065.015c vadhārham api kākutstha kṛpayā paripālayaḥ 5.065.016a mogham astraṃ na śakyaṃ tu kartum ity eva rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:15626: 5.065.016c tatas tasyākṣikākasya hinasti sma sa dakṣiṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:15627: 5.065.017a rāma tvāṃ sa namaskṛtvā rājño daśarathasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:15628: 5.065.017c visṛṣṭas tu tadā kākaḥ pratipede kham ālayam
GE09ram_1-7u:15629: 5.065.018a evam astravidāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ sattvavāñ śīlavān api
GE09ram_1-7u:15630: 5.065.018c kimartham astraṃ rakṣaḥsu na yojayasi rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:15631: 5.065.019a na nāgā nāpi gandharvā nāsurā na marudgaṇāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15632: 5.065.019c tava rāma mukhe sthātuṃ śaktāḥ pratisamādhitum
GE09ram_1-7u:15633: 5.065.020a tava vīryavataḥ kaccin mayi yady asti saṃbhramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15634: 5.065.020c kṣipraṃ suniśitair bāṇair hanyatāṃ yudhi rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15635: 5.065.021a bhrātur ādeśam ādāya lakṣmaṇo vā paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15636: 5.065.021c sa kimarthaṃ naravaro na māṃ rakṣati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15638: 5.065.022c surāṇām api durdharṣau kimarthaṃ mām upekṣataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15639: 5.065.023a mamaiva duṣkṛtaṃ kiṃ cin mahad asti na saṃśayaḥ 5.065.023c samarthau sahitau yan māṃ nāpekṣete paraṃtapau
GE09ram_1-7u:15640: 5.065.024a vaidehyā vacanaṃ śrutvā karuṇaṃ sāśrubhāṣitam 5.065.024c punar apy aham āryāṃ tām idaṃ vacanam abruvam 5.065.025a tvacchokavimukho rāmo devi satyena te śape
GE09ram_1-7u:15641: 5.065.025c rāme duḥkhābhibhūte ca lakṣmaṇaḥ paritapyate 5.065.026a kathaṃ cid bhavatī dṛṣṭā na kālaḥ pariśocitum
GE09ram_1-7u:15642: 5.065.026c imaṃ muhūrtaṃ duḥkhānām antaṃ drakṣyasi bhāmini
GE09ram_1-7u:15643: 5.065.027a tāv ubhau naraśārdūlau rājaputrāv ariṃdamau 5.065.027c tvaddarśanakṛtotsāhau laṅkāṃ bhasmīkariṣyataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15644: 5.065.028a hatvā ca samare raudraṃ rāvaṇaṃ saha bāndhavam
GE09ram_1-7u:15645: 5.065.028c rāghavas tvāṃ mahābāhuḥ svāṃ purīṃ nayate dhruvam
GE09ram_1-7u:15646: 5.065.029a yat tu rāmo vijānīyād abhijñānam anindite
GE09ram_1-7u:15647: 5.065.029c prītisaṃjananaṃ tasya pradātuṃ tattvam arhasi 5.065.030a sābhivīkṣya diśaḥ sarvā veṇyudgrathanam uttamam 5.065.030c muktvā vastrād dadau mahyaṃ maṇim etaṃ mahābala
GE09ram_1-7u:15648: 5.065.031a pratigṛhya maṇiṃ divyaṃ tava heto raghūttama
GE09ram_1-7u:15649: 5.065.031c śirasā saṃpraṇamyainām aham āgamane tvare 5.065.032a gamane ca kṛtotsāham avekṣya varavarṇinī 5.065.032c vivardhamānaṃ ca hi mām uvāca janakātmajā
GE09ram_1-7u:15651: 5.065.033a hanuman siṃhasaṃkāśau tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau 5.065.033c sugrīvaṃ ca sahāmātyaṃ sarvān brūyā anāmayam
GE09ram_1-7u:15652: 5.065.034a yathā ca sa mahābāhur māṃ tārayati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15653: 5.065.034c asmād duḥkhāmbusaṃrodhāt tat samādhātum arhasi 5.065.035a imaṃ ca tīvraṃ mama śokavegaṃ; rakṣobhir ebhiḥ paribhartsanaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:15655: 5.065.035c brūyās tu rāmasya gataḥ samīpaṃ; śivaś ca te 'dhvāstu
GE09ram_1-7u:15657: 5.065.036a etat tavāryā nṛparājasiṃha; sītā vacaḥ prāha viṣādapūrvam
GE09ram_1-7u:15658: 5.065.036c etac ca buddhvā gaditaṃ mayā tvaṃ; śraddhatsva sītāṃ kuśalāṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:15660: 5.066.001a athāham uttaraṃ devyā punar uktaḥ sasaṃbhramam
GE09ram_1-7u:15661: 5.066.001c tava snehān naravyāghra sauhāryād anumānya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:15662: 5.066.002a evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ vācyo rāmo dāśarathis tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:15663: 5.066.002c yathā mām āpnuyāc chīghraṃ hatvā rāvaṇam āhave
GE09ram_1-7u:15664: 5.066.003a yadi vā manyase vīra vasaikāham ariṃdama
GE09ram_1-7u:15665: 5.066.003c kasmiṃś cit saṃvṛte deśe viśrāntaḥ śvo gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:15666: 5.066.004a mama cāpy alpabhāgyāyāḥ sāmnidhyāt tava vānara
GE09ram_1-7u:15667: 5.066.004c asya śokavipākasya muhūrtaṃ syād vimokṣaṇam 5.066.005a gate hi tvayi vikrānte punarāgamanāya vai
GE09ram_1-7u:15668: 5.066.005c prāṇānām api saṃdeho mama syān nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15669: 5.066.006a tavādarśanajaḥ śoko bhūyo māṃ paritāpayet 5.066.006c duḥkhād duḥkhaparābhūtāṃ durgatāṃ duḥkhabhāginīm
GE09ram_1-7u:15670: 5.066.007a ayaṃ tu vīrasaṃdehas tiṣṭhatīva mamāgrataḥ 5.066.007c sumahāṃs tvatsahāyeṣu haryṛkṣeṣu asaṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15671: 5.066.008a kathaṃ nu khalu duṣpāraṃ tariṣyanti mahodadhim
GE09ram_1-7u:15672: 5.066.008c tāni haryṛkṣasainyāni tau vā naravarātmajau 5.066.009a trayāṇām eva bhūtānāṃ sāgarasyāsya laṅghane 5.066.009c śaktiḥ syād vainateyasya vāyor vā tava vānagha
GE09ram_1-7u:15673: 5.066.010a tad asmin kāryaniyoge vīraivaṃ duratikrame 5.066.010c kiṃ paśyasi samādhānaṃ brūhi kāryavidāṃ vara
GE09ram_1-7u:15674: 5.066.011a kāmam asya tvam evaikaḥ kāryasya parisādhane
GE09ram_1-7u:15675: 5.066.011c paryāptaḥ paravīraghna yaśasyas te balodayaḥ 5.066.012a balaiḥ samagrair yadi māṃ hatvā rāvaṇam āhave
GE09ram_1-7u:15676: 5.066.012c vijayī svāṃ purīṃ rāmo nayet tat syād yaśaskaram 5.066.013a yathāhaṃ tasya vīrasya vanād upadhinā hṛtā
GE09ram_1-7u:15677: 5.066.013c rakṣasā tad bhayād eva tathā nārhati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15678: 5.066.014a balais tu saṃkulāṃ kṛtvā laṅkāṃ parabalārdanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15679: 5.066.014c māṃ nayed yadi kākutsthas tat tasya sadṛśaṃ bhavet 5.066.015a tad yathā tasya vikrāntam anurūpaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15680: 5.066.015c bhavaty āhavaśūrasya tathā tvam upapādaya 5.066.016a tad arthopahitaṃ vākyaṃ praśritaṃ hetusaṃhitam 5.066.016c niśamyāhaṃ tataḥ śeṣaṃ vākyam uttaram abruvam
GE09ram_1-7u:15681: 5.066.017a devi haryṛkṣasainyānām īśvaraḥ plavatāṃ varaḥ 5.066.017c sugrīvaḥ sattvasaṃpannas tavārthe kṛtaniścayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15684: 5.066.019a yeṣāṃ nopari nādhastān na tiryak sajjate gatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15685: 5.066.019c na ca karmasu sīdanti mahatsv amitatejasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15686: 5.066.020a asakṛt tair mahābhāgair vānarair balasaṃyutaiḥ 5.066.020c pradakṣiṇīkṛtā bhūmir
GE09ram_1-7u:15687: 5.066.021a madviśiṣṭāś ca tulyāś ca santi tatra vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15688: 5.066.021c mattaḥ pratyavaraḥ kaś cin nāsti sugrīvasaṃnidhau
GE09ram_1-7u:15689: 5.066.022a ahaṃ tāvad iha prāptaḥ kiṃ punas te mahābalāḥ 5.066.022c na hi prakṛṣṭāḥ preṣyante preṣyante hītare janāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15690: 5.066.023a tad alaṃ paritāpena devi manyur vyapaitu te
GE09ram_1-7u:15691: 5.066.023c ekotpātena te laṅkām eṣyanti hariyūthapāḥ 5.066.024a mama pṛṣṭhagatau tau ca candrasūryāv ivoditau
GE09ram_1-7u:15693: 5.066.025a arighnaṃ siṃhasaṃkāśaṃ kṣipraṃ drakṣyasi rāghavam 5.066.025c lakṣmaṇaṃ ca dhanuṣpāṇiṃ laṅkā dvāram upasthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:15695: 5.066.026c vānarān vānarendrābhān kṣipraṃ drakṣyasi saṃgatān 5.066.027a śailāmbudan nikāśānāṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:15696: 5.066.027c nardatāṃ kapimukhyānām acirāc choṣyase svanam 5.066.028a nivṛttavanavāsaṃ ca tvayā sārdham ariṃdamam 5.066.028c abhiṣiktam ayodhyāyāṃ kṣipraṃ drakṣyasi rāghavam 5.066.029a tato mayā vāgbhir adīnabhāṣiṇī; śivābhir iṣṭābhir abhiprasāditā
GE09ram_1-7u:15697: 5.066.029c jagāma śāntiṃ mama maithilātmajā; tavāpi śokena tathābhipīḍitā
GE09ram_1-7u:15698: 6.001.001a śrutvā hanumato vākyaṃ yathāvad abhibhāṣitam 6.001.001c rāmaḥ prītisamāyukto vākyam uttaram abravīt 6.001.002a kṛtaṃ hanumatā kāryaṃ sumahad bhuvi duṣkaram
GE09ram_1-7u:15699: 6.001.002c manasāpi yad anyena na śakyaṃ dharaṇītale
GE09ram_1-7u:15700: 6.001.003a na hi taṃ paripaśyāmi yas tareta mahārṇavam
GE09ram_1-7u:15701: 6.001.003c anyatra garuṇād vāyor anyatra ca hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15702: 6.001.004a devadānavayakṣāṇāṃ gandharvoragarakṣasām 6.001.004c apradhṛṣyāṃ purīṃ laṅkāṃ rāvaṇena surakṣitām 6.001.005a praviṣṭaḥ sattvam āśritya jīvan ko nāma niṣkramet
GE09ram_1-7u:15703: 6.001.005c ko viśet sudurādharṣāṃ rākṣasaiś ca surakṣitām
GE09ram_1-7u:15704: 6.001.005e yo vīryabalasaṃpanno na samaḥ syād dhanūmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15705: 6.001.006a bhṛtyakāryaṃ hanumatā sugrīvasya kṛtaṃ mahat 6.001.006c evaṃ vidhāya svabalaṃ sadṛśaṃ vikramasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:15706: 6.001.007a yo hi bhṛtyo niyuktaḥ san bhartrā karmaṇi duṣkare 6.001.007c kuryāt tadanurāgeṇa tam āhuḥ puruṣottamam 6.001.008a niyukto nṛpateḥ kāryaṃ na kuryād yaḥ samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15707: 6.001.008c bhṛtyo yuktaḥ samarthaś ca tam āhuḥ puruṣādhamam
GE09ram_1-7u:15708: 6.001.009a tanniyoge niyuktena kṛtaṃ kṛtyaṃ hanūmatā 6.001.009c na cātmā laghutāṃ nītaḥ sugrīvaś cāpi toṣitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15709: 6.001.010a ahaṃ ca raghuvaṃśaś ca lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15711: 6.001.011a idaṃ tu mama dīnasyā mano bhūyaḥ prakarṣati
GE09ram_1-7u:15712: 6.001.011c yad ihāsya priyākhyātur na kurmi sadṛśaṃ priyam
GE09ram_1-7u:15713: 6.001.012a eṣa sarvasvabhūtas tu pariṣvaṅgo hanūmataḥ 6.001.012c mayā kālam imaṃ prāpya dattas tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15714: 6.001.013a sarvathā sukṛtaṃ tāvat sītāyāḥ parimārgaṇam 6.001.013c sāgaraṃ tu samāsādya punar naṣṭaṃ mano mama
GE09ram_1-7u:15715: 6.001.014a kathaṃ nāma samudrasya duṣpārasya mahāmbhasaḥ 6.001.014c harayo dakṣiṇaṃ pāraṃ gamiṣyanti samāhitāḥ 6.001.015a yady apy eṣa tu vṛttānto vaidehyā gadito mama 6.001.015c samudrapāragamane harīṇāṃ kim ivottaram
GE09ram_1-7u:15716: 6.001.016a ity uktvā śokasaṃbhrānto rāmaḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ 6.001.016c hanūmantaṃ mahābāhus tato dhyānam upāgamat 6.002.001a taṃ tu śokaparidyūnaṃ rāmaṃ daśarathātmajam 6.002.001c uvāca vacanaṃ śrīmān sugrīvaḥ śokanāśanam 6.002.002a kiṃ tvaṃ saṃtapyase vīra yathānyaḥ prākṛtas tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:15717: 6.002.002c maivaṃ bhūs tyaja saṃtāpaṃ kṛtaghna iva sauhṛdam
GE09ram_1-7u:15718: 6.002.003a saṃtāpasya ca te sthānaṃ na hi paśyāmi rāghava 6.002.003c pravṛttāv upalabdhāyāṃ jñāte ca nilaye ripoḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15719: 6.002.004a dhṛtimāñ śāstravit prājñaḥ paṇḍitaś cāsi rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:15722: 6.002.005c laṅkām ārohayiṣyāmo haniṣyāmaś ca te ripum
GE09ram_1-7u:15725: 6.002.007a ime śūrāḥ samarthāś ca sarve no hariyūthapāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15726: 6.002.007c tvatpriyārthaṃ kṛtotsāhāḥ praveṣṭum api pāvakam 6.002.008a eṣāṃ harṣeṇa jānāmi tarkaś cāsmin dṛḍho mama
GE09ram_1-7u:15727: 6.002.008c vikrameṇa samāneṣye sītāṃ hatvā yathā ripum
GE09ram_1-7u:15728: 6.002.009a setur atra yathā vadhyed yathā paśyema tāṃ purīm 6.002.009c tasya rākṣasarājasya tathā tvaṃ kuru rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:15729: 6.002.010a dṛṣṭvā tāṃ hi purīṃ laṅkāṃ trikūṭaśikhare sthitām
GE09ram_1-7u:15730: 6.002.010c hataṃ ca rāvaṇaṃ yuddhe darśanād upadhāraya
GE09ram_1-7u:15731: 6.002.011a setubaddhaḥ samudre ca yāval laṅkā samīpataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15732: 6.002.011c sarvaṃ tīrṇaṃ ca vai sainyaṃ jitam ity upadhāryatām 6.002.012a ime hi samare śūrā harayaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15733: 6.002.012c tad alaṃ viklavā buddhī rājan sarvārthanāśanī
GE09ram_1-7u:15734: 6.002.013a puruṣasya hi loke 'smiñ śokaḥ śauryāpakarṣaṇaḥ 6.002.013c yat tu kāryaṃ manuṣyeṇa śauṇḍīryam avalambatā
GE09ram_1-7u:15735: 6.002.013e śūrāṇāṃ hi manuṣyāṇāṃ tvadvidhānāṃ mahātmanām 6.002.014a vinaṣṭe vā pranaṣṭe vā śokaḥ sarvārthanāśanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15736: 6.002.014c tvaṃ tu buddhimatāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ sarvaśāstrārthakovidaḥ 6.002.015a madvidhaiḥ sacivaiḥ sārtham ariṃ jetum ihārhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:15737: 6.002.015c na hi paśyāmy ahaṃ kaṃ cit triṣu lokeṣu rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:15738: 6.002.016a gṛhītadhanuṣo yas te tiṣṭhed abhimukho raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:15739: 6.002.016c vānareṣu samāsaktaṃ na te kāryaṃ vipatsyate
GE09ram_1-7u:15740: 6.002.017a acirād drakṣyase sītāṃ tīrtvā sāgaram akṣayam
GE09ram_1-7u:15741: 6.002.017c tad alaṃ śokam ālambya krodham ālamba bhūpate
GE09ram_1-7u:15742: 6.002.018a niśceṣṭāḥ kṣatriyā mandāḥ sarve caṇḍasya bibhyati
GE09ram_1-7u:15743: 6.002.018c laṅganārthaṃ ca ghorasya samudrasya nadīpateḥ 6.002.019a sahāsmābhir ihopetaḥ sūkṣmabuddhir vicāraya
GE09ram_1-7u:15744: 6.002.019c ime hi samare śūrā harayaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15746: 6.002.020c kathaṃ cit paripaśyāmas te vayaṃ varuṇālayam
GE09ram_1-7u:15747: 6.002.021a kim uktvā bahudhā cāpi sarvathā vijayī bhavān
GE09ram_1-7u:15748: 6.003.001a sugrīvasya vacaḥ śrutvā hetumat paramārthavit 6.003.001c pratijagrāha kākutstho hanūmantam athābravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:15750: 6.003.002c sarvathā susamartho 'smi sāgarasyāsya laṅghane 6.003.003a kati durgāṇi durgāyā laṅkāyās tad bravīhi me
GE09ram_1-7u:15751: 6.003.003c jñātum icchāmi tat sarvaṃ darśanād iva vānara
GE09ram_1-7u:15752: 6.003.004a balasya parimāṇaṃ ca dvāradurgakriyām api 6.003.004c gupti karma ca laṅkāyā rakṣasāṃ sadanāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:15753: 6.003.005a yathāsukhaṃ yathāvac ca laṅkāyām asi dṛṣṭavān
GE09ram_1-7u:15754: 6.003.005c saram ācakṣva tattvena sarvathā kuśalo hy asi
GE09ram_1-7u:15755: 6.003.006a śrutvā rāmasya vacanaṃ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ 6.003.006c vākyaṃ vākyavidāṃ śreṣṭho rāmaṃ punar athābravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:15757: 6.003.007c guptā purī yathā laṅkā rakṣitā ca yathā balaiḥ 6.003.008a parāṃ samṛddhiṃ laṅkāyāḥ sāgarasya ca bhīmatām
GE09ram_1-7u:15758: 6.003.008c vibhāgaṃ ca balaughasya nirdeśaṃ vāhanasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:15762: 6.003.010c dvārāṇi vipulāny asyāś catvāri sumahānti ca
GE09ram_1-7u:15764: 6.003.011c āgataṃ parasainyaṃ tais tatra pratinivāryate 6.003.012a dvāreṣu saṃskṛtā bhīmāḥ kālāyasamayāḥ śitāḥ 6.003.012c śataśo rocitā vīraiḥ śataghnyo rakṣasāṃ gaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15765: 6.003.013a sauvarṇaś ca mahāṃs tasyāḥ prākāro duṣpradharṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15767: 6.003.014a sarvataś ca mahābhīmāḥ śītatoyā mahāśubhāḥ 6.003.014c agādhā grāhavatyaś ca parikhā mīnasevitāḥ 6.003.015a dvāreṣu tāsāṃ catvāraḥ saṃkramāḥ paramāyatāḥ 6.003.015c yantrair upetā bahubhir mahadbhir dṛḍhasaṃdhibhiḥ 6.003.016a trāyante saṃkramās tatra parasainyāgame sati 6.003.016c yantrais tair avakīryante parikhāsu samantataḥ 6.003.017a ekas tv akampyo balavān saṃkramaḥ sumahādṛḍhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15768: 6.003.017c kāñcanair bahubhiḥ stambhair vedikābhiś ca śobhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15769: 6.003.018a svayaṃ prakṛtisaṃpanno yuyutsū rāma rāvaṇaḥ 6.003.018c utthitaś cāpramattaś ca balānām anudarśane 6.003.019a laṅkā purī nirālambā devadurgā bhayāvahā 6.003.019c nādeyaṃ pārvataṃ vanyaṃ kṛtrimaṃ ca caturvidham
GE09ram_1-7u:15770: 6.003.020a sthitā pāre samudrasya dūrapārasya rāghava 6.003.020c naupathaś cāpi nāsty atra nirādeśaś ca sarvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15771: 6.003.021a śailāgre racitā durgā sā pūr devapuropamā
GE09ram_1-7u:15773: 6.003.022a parighāś ca śataghnyaś ca yantrāṇi vividhāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:15774: 6.003.022c śobhayanti purīṃ laṅkāṃ rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ 6.003.023a ayutaṃ rakṣasām atra paścimadvāram āśritam 6.003.023c śūlahastā durādharṣāḥ sarve khaḍgāgrayodhinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15775: 6.003.024a niyutaṃ rakṣasām atra dakṣiṇadvāram āśritam 6.003.024c caturaṅgeṇa sainyena yodhās tatrāpy anuttamāḥ 6.003.025a prayutaṃ rakṣasām atra pūrvadvāraṃ samāśritam 6.003.025c carmakhaḍgadharāḥ sarve tathā sarvāstrakovidāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15776: 6.003.026a arbudaṃ rakṣasām atra uttaradvāram āśritam 6.003.026c rathinaś cāśvavāhāś ca kulaputrāḥ supūjitāḥ 6.003.027a śataṃ śatasahasrāṇāṃ madhyamaṃ gulmam āśritam 6.003.027c yātudhānā durādharṣāḥ sāgrakoṭiś ca rakṣasām 6.003.028a te mayā saṃkramā bhagnāḥ parikhāś cāvapūritāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15777: 6.003.028c dagdhā ca nagarī laṅkā prākārāś cāvasāditāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15778: 6.003.029a yena kena tu mārgeṇa tarāma varuṇālayam
GE09ram_1-7u:15779: 6.003.029c hateti nagarī laṅkāṃ vānarair avadhāryatām 6.003.030a aṅgado dvivido maindo jāmbavān panaso nalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15780: 6.003.030c nīlaḥ senāpatiś caiva balaśeṣeṇa kiṃ tava
GE09ram_1-7u:15781: 6.003.031a plavamānā hi gatvā tāṃ rāvaṇasya mahāpurīm
GE09ram_1-7u:15783: 6.003.032a evam ājñāpaya kṣipraṃ balānāṃ sarvasaṃgraham 6.003.032c muhūrtena tu yuktena prasthānam abhirocaya 6.004.001a śrutvā hanūmato vākyaṃ yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ 6.004.001c tato 'bravīn mahātejā rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15784: 6.004.002a yāṃ nivedayase laṅkāṃ purīṃ bhīmasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15785: 6.004.002c kṣipram enāṃ vadhiṣyāmi satyam etad bravīmi te
GE09ram_1-7u:15786: 6.004.003a asmin muhūrte sugrīva prayāṇam abhirocaye 6.004.003c yukto muhūrto vijayaḥ prāpto madhyaṃ divākaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15787: 6.004.004a uttarā phalgunī hy adya śvas tu hastena yokṣyate 6.004.004c abhiprayāma sugrīva
GE09ram_1-7u:15788: 6.004.005a nimittāni ca dhanyāni yāni prādurbhavanti me
GE09ram_1-7u:15789: 6.004.005c nihatya rāvaṇaṃ sītām ānayiṣyāmi jānakīm 6.004.006a upariṣṭād dhi nayanaṃ sphuramāṇam idaṃ mama
GE09ram_1-7u:15791: 6.004.007a agre yātu balasyāsya nīlo mārgam avekṣitum
GE09ram_1-7u:15794: 6.004.008c pathā madhumatā cāśu senāṃ senāpate naya
GE09ram_1-7u:15796: 6.004.009c rākṣasāḥ parirakṣethās tebhyas tvaṃ nityam udyataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15797: 6.004.010a nimneṣu vanadurgeṣu vaneṣu ca vanaukasaḥ 6.004.010c abhiplutyābhipaśyeyuḥ pareṣāṃ nihataṃ balam
GE09ram_1-7u:15800: 6.004.012a gajaś ca girisaṃkāśo gavayaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15801: 6.004.012c gavākṣaś cāgrato yāntu gavāṃ dṛptā ivarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15802: 6.004.013a yātu vānaravāhinyā vānaraḥ plavatāṃ patiḥ 6.004.013c pālayan dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvam ṛṣabho vānararṣabhaḥ 6.004.014a gandhahastīva durdharṣas tarasvī gandhamādanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15803: 6.004.014c yātu vānaravāhinyāḥ savyaṃ pārśvam adhiṣṭhitaḥ 6.004.015a yāsyāmi balamadhye 'haṃ balaugham abhiharṣayan 6.004.015c adhiruhya hanūmantam airāvatam iveśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15806: 6.004.017a jāmbavāṃś ca suṣeṇaś ca vegadarśī ca vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15807: 6.004.017c ṛkṣarājo mahāsattvaḥ kukṣiṃ rakṣantu te trayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15808: 6.004.018a rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā sugrīvo vāhinīpatiḥ 6.004.018c vyādideśa mahāvīryān vānarān vānararṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15809: 6.004.019a te vānaragaṇāḥ sarve samutpatya yuyutsavaḥ 6.004.019c guhābhyaḥ śikharebhyaś ca āśu pupluvire tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:15810: 6.004.020a tato vānararājena lakṣmaṇena ca pūjitaḥ 6.004.020c jagāma rāmo dharmātmā sasainyo dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE09ram_1-7u:15811: 6.004.021a śataiḥ śatasahasraiś ca koṭībhir ayutair api
GE09ram_1-7u:15812: 6.004.021c vāraṇābhiś ca haribhir yayau parivṛtas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:15813: 6.004.022a taṃ yāntam anuyāti sma mahatī harivāhinī
GE09ram_1-7u:15815: 6.004.023c āplavantaḥ plavantaś ca garjantaś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15816: 6.004.023e kṣvelanto ninadantaś ca jagmur vai dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE09ram_1-7u:15817: 6.004.024a bhakṣayantaḥ sugandhīni madhūni ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:15819: 6.004.025a anyonyaṃ sahasā dṛṣṭā nirvahanti kṣipanti ca
GE09ram_1-7u:15820: 6.004.025c patantaś cotpatanty anye pātayanty apare parān
GE09ram_1-7u:15821: 6.004.026a rāvaṇo no nihantavyaḥ sarve ca rajanīcarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15822: 6.004.026c iti garjanti harayo rāghavasya samīpataḥ 6.004.027a purastād ṛṣabho vīro nīlaḥ kumuda eva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:15823: 6.004.027c pathānaṃ śodhayanti sma vānarair bahubhiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:15824: 6.004.028a madhye tu rājā sugrīvo rāmo lakṣmaṇa eva ca 6.004.028c bahubhir balibhir bhīmair vṛtāḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ 6.004.029a hariḥ śatabalir vīraḥ koṭībhir daśabhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15825: 6.004.029c sarvām eko hy avaṣṭabhya rarakṣa harivāhinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:15827: 6.004.030c arkaś cātibalaḥ pārśvam ekaṃ tasyābhirakṣati 6.004.031a suṣeṇo jāmbavāṃś caiva ṛkṣair bahubhir āvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15828: 6.004.031c sugrīvaṃ purataḥ kṛtvā jaghanaṃ saṃrarakṣatuḥ 6.004.032a teṣāṃ senāpatir vīro nīlo vānarapuṃgavaḥ 6.004.032c saṃpatan patatāṃ śreṣṭhas tad balaṃ paryapālayat
GE09ram_1-7u:15829: 6.004.033a darīmikhaḥ prajaṅghaś ca jambho 'tha rabhasaḥ kapiḥ 6.004.033c sarvataś ca yayur vīrās tvarayantaḥ plavaṃgamān
GE09ram_1-7u:15830: 6.004.034a evaṃ te hariśārdūlā gacchanto baladarpitāḥ 6.004.034c apaśyaṃs te giriśreṣṭhaṃ sahyaṃ drumalatāyutam 6.004.035a sāgaraughanibhaṃ bhīmaṃ tad vānarabalaṃ mahat 6.004.035c niḥsasarpa mahāghoṣaṃ bhīmavega ivārṇavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15831: 6.004.036a tasya dāśaratheḥ pārśve śūrās te kapikuñjarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15832: 6.004.036c tūrṇam āpupluvuḥ sarve sadaśvā iva coditāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15833: 6.004.037a kapibhyām uhyamānau tau śuśubhate nararṣabhau 6.004.037c mahadbhyām iva saṃspṛṣṭau grāhābhyāṃ candrabhāskarau 6.004.038a tam aṅgadagato rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇaḥ śubhayā girā
GE09ram_1-7u:15835: 6.004.039a hṛtām avāpya vaidehīṃ kṣipraṃ hatvā ca rāvaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:15837: 6.004.040a mahānti ca nimittāni divi bhūmau ca rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:15838: 6.004.040c śubhānti tava paśyāmi sarvāṇy evārthasiddhaye 6.004.041a anu vāti śubho vāyuḥ senāṃ mṛduhitaḥ sukhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15840: 6.004.042a prasannāś ca diśaḥ sarvā vimalaś ca divākaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15841: 6.004.042c uśanā ca prasannārcir anu tvāṃ bhārgavo gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15842: 6.004.043a brahmarāśir viśuddhaś ca śuddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15843: 6.004.043c arciṣmantaḥ prakāśante dhruvaṃ sarve pradakṣiṇam 6.004.044a triśaṅkur vimalo bhāti rājarṣiḥ sapurohitaḥ 6.004.044c pitāmahavaro 'smākam iṣkvākūṇāṃ mahātmanām 6.004.045a vimale ca prakāśete viśākhe nirupadrave 6.004.045c nakṣatraṃ param asmākam ikṣvākūṇāṃ mahātmanām 6.004.046a nairṛtaṃ nairṛtānāṃ ca nakṣatram abhipīḍyate 6.004.046c mūlaṃ mūlavatā spṛṣṭaṃ dhūpyate dhūmaketunā 6.004.047a saraṃ caitad vināśāya rākṣasānām upasthitam 6.004.047c kāle kālagṛhītānāṃ nakatraṃ grahapīḍitam
GE09ram_1-7u:15844: 6.004.048a prasannāḥ surasāś cāpo vanāni phalavanti ca
GE09ram_1-7u:15845: 6.004.048c pravānty abhyadhikaṃ gandhā yathartukusumā drumāḥ 6.004.049a vyūḍhāni kapisainyāni prakāśante 'dhikaṃ prabho
GE09ram_1-7u:15846: 6.004.049c devānām iva sainyāni saṃgrāme tārakāmaye 6.004.050a evam ārya samīkṣyaitān prīto bhavitum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:15847: 6.004.050c iti bhrātaram āśvāsya hṛṣṭaḥ saumitrir abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:15848: 6.004.051a athāvṛtya mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ jagāma mahatī camūḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15850: 6.004.052a karāgraiś caraṇāgraiś ca vānarair uddhataṃ rajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15851: 6.004.052c bhaumam antardadhe lokaṃ nivārya savituḥ prabhām
GE09ram_1-7u:15852: 6.004.053a sā sma yāti divārātraṃ mahatī harivāhinī
GE09ram_1-7u:15854: 6.004.054a vanarās tvaritaṃ yānti sarve yuddhābhinandanaḥ 6.004.054c mumokṣayiṣavaḥ sītāṃ muhūrtaṃ kvāpi nāsata 6.004.055a tataḥ pādapasaṃbādhaṃ nānāmṛgasamākulam
GE09ram_1-7u:15855: 6.004.055c sahyaparvatam āsedur malayaṃ ca mahī dharam
GE09ram_1-7u:15857: 6.004.056c paśyann api yayau rāmaḥ sahyasya malayasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:15858: 6.004.057a campakāṃs tilakāṃś cūtān aśokān sinduvārakān 6.004.057c karavīrāṃś ca timiśān bhañjanti sma plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15859: 6.004.058a phalāny amṛtagandhīni mūlāni kusumāni ca 6.004.058c bubhujur vānarās tatra pādapānāṃ balotkaṭāḥ 6.004.059a droṇamātrapramāṇāni lambamānāni vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15860: 6.004.059c yayuḥ pibanto hṛṣṭās te madhūni madhupiṅgalāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15861: 6.004.060a pādapān avabhañjanto vikarṣantas tathā latāḥ 6.004.060c vidhamanto girivarān prayayuḥ plavagarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15863: 6.004.061c anye vṛkṣān prapadyante prapatanty api cāpare
GE09ram_1-7u:15864: 6.004.062a babhūva vasudhā tais tu saṃpūrṇā haripuṃgavaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15865: 6.004.062c yathā kamalakedāraiḥ pakvair iva vasuṃdharā 6.004.063a mahendram atha saṃprāpya rāmo rājīvalocanaḥ 6.004.063c adhyārohan mahābāhuḥ śikharaṃ drumabhūṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:15866: 6.004.064a tataḥ śikharam āruhya rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ 6.004.064c kūrmamīnasamākīrṇam apaśyat
GE09ram_1-7u:15867: 6.004.065a te sahyaṃ samatikramya malayaṃ ca mahāgirim
GE09ram_1-7u:15870: 6.004.066c rāmo ramayatāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ sasugrīvaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ 6.004.067a atha dhautopalatalāṃ toyaughaiḥ sahasotthitaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15871: 6.004.067c velām āsādya vipulāṃ rāmo vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:15872: 6.004.068a ete vayam anuprāptāḥ sugrīva varuṇālayam 6.004.068c ihedānīṃ vicintā sā yā na pūrvaṃ samutthitā
GE09ram_1-7u:15874: 6.004.069c na cāyam anupāyena śakyas taritum arṇavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15875: 6.004.070a tad ihaiva niveśo 'stu mantraḥ prastūyatām iha
GE09ram_1-7u:15876: 6.004.070c yathedaṃ vānarabalaṃ paraṃ pāram avāpnuyāt 6.004.071a itīva sa mahābāhuḥ sītāharaṇakarśitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15877: 6.004.071c rāmaḥ sāgaram āsādya vāsam ājñāpayat tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:15878: 6.004.072a saṃprāpto mantrakālo naḥ sāgarasyeha laṅghane 6.004.072c svāṃ svāṃ senāṃ samutsṛjya mā ca kaś cit kuto vrajet
GE09ram_1-7u:15879: 6.004.072e gacchantu vānarāḥ śūrā jñeyaṃ channaṃ bhayaṃ ca naḥ 6.004.073a rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā sugrīvaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ 6.004.073c senāṃ nyaveśayat tīre sāgarasya drumāyute 6.004.074a virarāja samīpasthaṃ sāgarasya tu tad balam
GE09ram_1-7u:15880: 6.004.074c madhupāṇḍujalaḥ śrīmān dvitīya iva sāgaraḥ 6.004.075a velāvanam upāgamya tatas te haripuṃgavāḥ 6.004.075c viniviṣṭāḥ paraṃ pāraṃ kāṅkṣamāṇā mahodadheḥ 6.004.076a sā mahārṇavam āsādya hṛṣṭā vānaravāhinī 6.004.076c vāyuvegasamādhūtaṃ paśyamānā mahārṇavam
GE09ram_1-7u:15888: 6.004.080c durgaṃ drugam amārgaṃ tam agādham asurālayam
GE09ram_1-7u:15889: 6.004.081a makarair nāgabhogaiś ca vigāḍhā vātalohitāḥ 6.004.081c utpetuś ca nipetuś ca pravṛddhā jalarāśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15893: 6.004.083c sāgaraṃ cāmbaraṃ ceti nirviśeṣam adṛśyata 6.004.084a saṃpṛktaṃ nabhasā hy ambhaḥ saṃpṛktaṃ ca nabho 'mbhasā
GE09ram_1-7u:15894: 6.004.084c tādṛgrūpe sma dṛśyete tārā ratnasamākule 6.004.085a samutpatitameghasya vīcci mālākulasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:15895: 6.004.085c viśeṣo na dvayor āsīt sāgarasyāmbarasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:15896: 6.004.086a anyonyair āhatāḥ saktāḥ sasvanur bhīmaniḥsvanāḥ 6.004.086c ūrmayaḥ sindhurājasya mahābherya ivāhave
GE09ram_1-7u:15902: 6.005.001a sā tu nīlena vidhivat svārakṣā susamāhitā
GE09ram_1-7u:15903: 6.005.001c sāgarasyottare tīre sādhu senā niveśitā 6.005.002a maindaś ca dvividhaś cobhau tatra vānarapuṃgavau
GE09ram_1-7u:15904: 6.005.002c viceratuś ca tāṃ senāṃ rakṣārthaṃ sarvato diśam
GE09ram_1-7u:15905: 6.005.003a niviṣṭāyāṃ tu senāyāṃ tīre nadanadīpateḥ 6.005.003c pārśvasthaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmo vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:15906: 6.005.004a śokaś ca kila kālena gacchatā hy apagacchati
GE09ram_1-7u:15907: 6.005.004c mama cāpaśyataḥ kāntām ahany ahani vardhate
GE09ram_1-7u:15908: 6.005.005a na me duḥkhaṃ priyā dūre na me duḥkhaṃ hṛteti ca
GE09ram_1-7u:15909: 6.005.005c etad evānuśocāmi vayo 'syā hy ativartate 6.005.006a vāhi vāta yataḥ kanyā tāṃ spṛṣṭvā mām api spṛśa
GE09ram_1-7u:15910: 6.005.006c tvayi me gātrasaṃsparśaś candre dṛṣṭisamāgamaḥ 6.005.007a tan me dahati gātrāṇi viṣaṃ pītam ivāśaye
GE09ram_1-7u:15911: 6.005.007c hā nātheti priyā sā māṃ hriyamāṇā yad abravīt 6.005.008a tadviyogendhanavatā taccintāvipulārciṣā 6.005.008c rātriṃ divaṃ śarīraṃ me dahyate madanāgninā
GE09ram_1-7u:15912: 6.005.009a avagāhyārṇavaṃ svapsye saumitre bhavatā vinā 6.005.009c kathaṃ cit prajvalan kāmaḥ samāsuptaṃ jale dahet
GE09ram_1-7u:15913: 6.005.010a bahv etat kāmayānasya śakyam etena jīvitum
GE09ram_1-7u:15914: 6.005.010c yad ahaṃ sā ca vāmorur ekāṃ dharaṇim āśritau 6.005.011a kedārasyeva kedāraḥ sodakasya nirūdakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15915: 6.005.011c upasnehena jīvāmi jīvantīṃ yac chṛṇomi tām
GE09ram_1-7u:15916: 6.005.012a kadā tu khalu susśoṇīṃ śatapatrāyatekṣaṇām 6.005.012c vijitya śatrūn drakṣyāmi sītāṃ sphītām iva śriyam
GE09ram_1-7u:15917: 6.005.013a kadā nu cārubimbauṣṭhaṃ tasyāḥ padmam ivānanam
GE09ram_1-7u:15919: 6.005.014a tau tasyāḥ saṃhatau pīnau stanau tālaphalopamau
GE09ram_1-7u:15920: 6.005.014c kadā nu khalu sotkampau hasantyā māṃ bhajiṣyataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15921: 6.005.015a sā nūnam asitāpāṅgī rakṣomadhyagatā satī 6.005.015c mannāthā nāthahīneva trātāraṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:15922: 6.005.016a kadā vikṣobhya rakṣāṃsi sā vidhūyotpatiṣyati 6.005.016c vidhūya jaladān nīlāñ śaśilekhā śaratsv iva
GE09ram_1-7u:15925: 6.005.018a kadā nu rākṣasendrasya nidhāyorasi sāyakān 6.005.018c sītāṃ pratyāhariṣyāmi śokam utsṛjya mānasaṃ 6.005.019a kadā nu khalu māṃ sādhvī sītāmarasutopamā
GE09ram_1-7u:15926: 6.005.019c sotkaṇṭhā kaṇṭham ālambya mokṣyaty ānandajaṃ jalam
GE09ram_1-7u:15927: 6.005.020a kadā śokam imaṃ ghoraṃ maithilī viprayogajam
GE09ram_1-7u:15928: 6.005.020c sahasā vipramokṣyāmi vāsaḥ śukletaraṃ yathā 6.005.021a evaṃ vilapatas tasya tatra rāmasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15930: 6.005.022a āśvāsito lakṣmaṇena rāmaḥ saṃdhyām upāsata 6.005.022c smaran kamalapatrākṣīṃ sītāṃ śokākulīkṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15931: 6.006.001a laṅkāyāṃ tu kṛtaṃ karma ghoraṃ dṛṣṭvā bhavāvaham
GE09ram_1-7u:15933: 6.006.001e abravīd rākṣasān sarvān hriyā kiṃ cid avāṅmukhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15934: 6.006.002a dharṣitā ca praviṣṭā ca laṅkā duṣprasahā purī
GE09ram_1-7u:15935: 6.006.002c tena vānaramātreṇa dṛṣṭā sītā ca jānakī
GE09ram_1-7u:15936: 6.006.003a prasādo dharṣitaś caityaḥ pravarā rākṣasā hatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15937: 6.006.003c āvilā ca purī laṅkā sarvā hanumatā kṛtā
GE09ram_1-7u:15938: 6.006.004a kiṃ kariṣyāmi bhadraṃ vaḥ kiṃ vā yuktam anantaram 6.006.004c ucyatāṃ naḥ samarthaṃ yat kṛtaṃ ca sukṛtaṃ bhavet 6.006.005a mantramūlaṃ hi vijayaṃ prāhur āryā manasvinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15939: 6.006.005c tasmād vai rocaye mantraṃ rāmaṃ prati mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15941: 6.006.006c teṣāṃ tu samavetānāṃ guṇadoṣaṃ vadāmy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:15943: 6.006.007c mitrair vāpi samānārthair bāndhavair api vā hitaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15944: 6.006.008a sahito mantrayitvā yaḥ karmārambhān pravartayet 6.006.008c daive ca kurute yatnaṃ tam āhuḥ puruṣottamam
GE09ram_1-7u:15945: 6.006.009a eko 'rthaṃ vimṛśed eko dharme prakurute manaḥ 6.006.009c ekaḥ kāryāṇi kurute tam āhur madhyamaṃ naram
GE09ram_1-7u:15947: 6.006.010c kariṣyāmīti yaḥ kāryam upekṣet sa narādhamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15949: 6.006.011c evaṃ mantro 'pi vijñeya uttamādhamamadhyamaḥ 6.006.012a aikamatyam upāgamya śāstradṛṣṭena cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_1-7u:15950: 6.006.012c mantriṇo yatra nirastās tam āhur mantram uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:15951: 6.006.013a bahvyo 'pi matayo gatvā mantriṇo hy arthanirṇaye 6.006.013c punar yatraikatāṃ prāptaḥ sa mantro madhyamaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15953: 6.006.014c na caikamatye śreyo 'sti mantraḥ so 'dhama ucyate
GE09ram_1-7u:15954: 6.006.015a tasmāt sumantritaṃ sādhu bhavanto mantrisattamāḥ 6.006.015c kāryaṃ saṃpratipadyantām etat kṛtyatamaṃ mama 6.006.016a vānarāṇāṃ hi vīrāṇāṃ sahasraiḥ parivāritaḥ 6.006.016c rāmo 'bhyeti purīṃ laṅkām asmākam uparodhakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15955: 6.006.017a tariṣyati ca suvyaktaṃ rāghavaḥ sāgaraṃ sukham
GE09ram_1-7u:15957: 6.006.018a asminn evaṃgate kārye viruddhe vānaraiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:15958: 6.006.018c hitaṃ pure ca sainye ca sarvaṃ saṃmantryatāṃ mama 6.007.001a ity uktā rākṣasendreṇa rākṣasās te mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15959: 6.007.001c ūcuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve rāvaṇaṃ rākṣaseśvaram 6.007.002a rājan parighaśaktyṛṣṭiśūlapaṭṭasasaṃkulam 6.007.002c sumahan no balaṃ kasmād viṣādaṃ bhajate bhavān
GE09ram_1-7u:15961: 6.007.003c sumahat kadanaṃ kṛtvā vaśyas te dhanadaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15962: 6.007.004a sa maheśvarasakhyena ślāghamānas tvayā vibho 6.007.004c nirjitaḥ samare roṣāl lokapālo mahābalaḥ 6.007.005a vinihatya ca yakṣaughān vikṣobhya ca vigṛhya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:15963: 6.007.005c tvayā kailāsaśikharād vimānam idam āhṛtam 6.007.006a mayena dānavendreṇa tvadbhayāt sakhyam icchatā 6.007.006c duhitā tava bhāryārthe dattā rākṣasapuṃgava 6.007.007a dānavendro madhur nāma vīryotsikto durāsadaḥ 6.007.007c vigṛhya vaśam ānītaḥ kumbhīnasyāḥ sukhāvahaḥ 6.007.008a nirjitās te mahābāho nāgā gatvā rasātalam
GE09ram_1-7u:15964: 6.007.008c vāsukis takṣakaḥ śaṅkho jaṭī ca vaśam āhṛtāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15965: 6.007.009a akṣayā balavantaś ca śūrā labdhavarāḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15966: 6.007.009c tvayā saṃvatsaraṃ yuddhvā samare dānavā vibho
GE09ram_1-7u:15967: 6.007.010a svabalaṃ samupāśritya nītā vaśam ariṃdama 6.007.010c māyāś cādhigatās tatra bahavo rākṣasādhipa 6.007.011a śūrāś ca balavantaś ca varuṇasya sutā raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:15969: 6.007.012a mṛtyudaṇḍamahāgrāhaṃ śālmalidvīpamaṇḍitam 6.007.012c avagāhya tvayā rājan yamasya balasāgaram 6.007.013a jayaś ca viplulaḥ prāpto mṛtyuś ca pratiṣedhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15970: 6.007.013c suyuddhena ca te sarve lokās tatra sutoṣitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15972: 6.007.014c āsīd vasumatī pūrṇā mahadbhir iva pādapaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15973: 6.007.015a teṣāṃ vīryaguṇotsāhair na samo rāghavo raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:15974: 6.007.015c prasahya te tvayā rājan hatāḥ paramadurjayāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15975: 6.007.016a rājan nāpad ayukteyam āgatā prākṛtāj janāt
GE09ram_1-7u:15976: 6.007.016c hṛdi naiva tvayā kāryā tvaṃ vadhiṣyasi rāghavam
GE09ram_1-7u:15977: 6.008.001a tato nīlāmbudanibhaḥ prahasto nāma rākṣasaḥ 6.008.001c abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ śūraḥ senāpatis tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:15978: 6.008.002a devadānavagandharvāḥ piśācapatagoragāḥ 6.008.002c na tvāṃ dharṣayituṃ śaktāḥ kiṃ punar vānarā raṇe 6.008.003a sarve pramattā viśvastā vañcitāḥ sma hanūmatā
GE09ram_1-7u:15979: 6.008.003c na hi me jīvato gacchej jīvan sa vanagocaraḥ 6.008.004a sarvāṃ sāgaraparyantāṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:15980: 6.008.004c karomy avānarāṃ bhūmim ājñāpayatu māṃ bhavān
GE09ram_1-7u:15981: 6.008.005a rakṣāṃ caiva vidhāsyāmi vānarād rajanīcara 6.008.005c nāgamiṣyati te duḥkhaṃ kiṃ cid ātmāparādhajam
GE09ram_1-7u:15982: 6.008.006a abravīc ca susaṃkruddho durmukho nāma rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15983: 6.008.006c idaṃ na kṣamaṇīyaṃ hi sarveṣāṃ naḥ pradharṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:15984: 6.008.007a ayaṃ paribhavo bhūyaḥ purasyāntaḥpurasya ca 6.008.007c śrīmato rākṣasendrasya
GE09ram_1-7u:15985: 6.008.008a asmin muhūrte hatvaiko nivartiṣyāmi vānarān 6.008.008c praviṣṭān sāgaraṃ bhīmam ambaraṃ vā rasātalam
GE09ram_1-7u:15988: 6.008.010a kiṃ vo hanumatā kāryaṃ kṛpaṇena tapasvinā
GE09ram_1-7u:15989: 6.008.010c rāme tiṣṭhati durdharṣe sugrīve sahalakṣmaṇe 6.008.011a adya rāmaṃ sasugrīvaṃ parigheṇa salakṣmaṇam 6.008.011c āgamiṣyāmi hatvaiko vikṣobhya harivāhinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:15990: 6.008.012a kaumbhakarṇis tato vīro nikumbho nāma vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:15992: 6.008.013a sarve bhavantas tiṣṭhantu mahārājena saṃgatāḥ 6.008.013c aham eko haniṣyāmi rāghavaṃ sahalakṣmaṇam 6.008.014a tato vajrahanur nāma rākṣasaḥ parvatopamaḥ 6.008.014c kruddhaḥ parilihan vaktraṃ jihvayā vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:15993: 6.008.015a svairaṃ kurvantu kāryāṇi bhavanto vigatajvarāḥ 6.008.015c eko 'haṃ bhakṣayiṣyāmi tān sarvān hariyūthapān
GE09ram_1-7u:15994: 6.008.016a svasthāḥ krīḍantu niścintāḥ pibantu madhuvāruṇīm 6.008.016c aham eko haniṣyāmi sugrīvaṃ sahalakṣmaṇam 6.008.016e sāṅgadaṃ ca hanūmantaṃ rāmaṃ ca raṇakuñjaram
GE09ram_1-7u:15995: 6.009.001a tato nikumbho rabhasaḥ sūryaśatrur mahābalaḥ 6.009.001c suptaghno yajñakopaś ca mahāpārśvo mahoaraḥ 6.009.002a agniketuś ca durdharṣo raśmiketuś ca rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15996: 6.009.002c indrajic ca mahātejā balavān rāvaṇātmajaḥ 6.009.003a prahasto 'tha virūpākṣo vajradaṃṣṭro mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15997: 6.009.003c dhūmrākṣaś cātikāyaś ca durmukhaś caiva rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:15999: 6.009.004c cāpāni ca sabāṇāni khaḍgāṃś ca vipulāñ śitān
GE09ram_1-7u:16000: 6.009.005a pragṛhya paramakruddhāḥ samutpatya ca rākṣasāḥ 6.009.005c abruvan rāvaṇaṃ sarve pradīptā iva tejasā
GE09ram_1-7u:16001: 6.009.006a adya rāmaṃ vadhiṣyāmaḥ sugrīvaṃ ca salakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:16002: 6.009.006c kṛpaṇaṃ ca hanūmantaṃ laṅkā yena pradharṣitā
GE09ram_1-7u:16003: 6.009.007a tān gṛhītāyudhān sarvān vārayitvā vibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.009.007c abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ punaḥ pratyupaveśya tān
GE09ram_1-7u:16004: 6.009.008a apy upāyais tribhis tāta yo 'rthaḥ prāptuṃ na śakyate
GE09ram_1-7u:16005: 6.009.008c tasya vikramakālāṃs tān yuktān āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16006: 6.009.009a pramatteṣv abhiyukteṣu daivena prahateṣu ca 6.009.009c vikramās tāta sidhyanti parīkṣya vidhinā kṛtāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16007: 6.009.010a apramattaṃ kathaṃ taṃ tu vijigīṣuṃ bale sthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:16009: 6.009.011a samudraṃ laṅghayitvā tu ghoraṃ nadanadīpatim 6.009.011c kṛtaṃ hanumatā karma duṣkaraṃ tarkayeta kaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16010: 6.009.012a balāny aparimeyāni vīryāṇi ca niśācarāḥ 6.009.012c pareṣāṃ sahasāvajñā na kartavyā kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_1-7u:16011: 6.009.013a kiṃ ca rākṣasarājasya rāmeṇāpakṛtaṃ purā 6.009.013c ājahāra janasthānād yasya bhāryāṃ yaśasvinaḥ 6.009.014a kharo yady ativṛttas tu rāmeṇa nihato raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:16012: 6.009.014c avaśyaṃ prāṇināṃ prāṇā rakṣitavyā yathā balam
GE09ram_1-7u:16013: 6.009.015a etannimittaṃ vaidehī bhayaṃ naḥ sumahad bhavet
GE09ram_1-7u:16014: 6.009.015c āhṛtā sā parityājyā kalahārthe kṛte na kim
GE09ram_1-7u:16015: 6.009.016a na naḥ kṣamaṃ vīryavatā tena dharmānuvartinā
GE09ram_1-7u:16016: 6.009.016c vairaṃ nirarthakaṃ kartuṃ dīyatām asya maithilī
GE09ram_1-7u:16017: 6.009.017a yāvan na sagajāṃ sāśvāṃ bahuratnasamākulām 6.009.017c purīṃ dārayate bāṇair dīyatām asya maithilī
GE09ram_1-7u:16018: 6.009.018a yāvat sughorā mahatī durdharṣā harivāhinī 6.009.018c nāvaskandati no laṅkāṃ tāvat sītā pradīyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:16019: 6.009.019a vinaśyed dhi purī laṅkā śūrāḥ sarve ca rākṣasāḥ 6.009.019c rāmasya dayitā patnī na svayaṃ yadi dīyate
GE09ram_1-7u:16020: 6.009.020a prasādaye tvāṃ bandhutvāt kuruṣva vacanaṃ mama
GE09ram_1-7u:16021: 6.009.020c hitaṃ pathyaṃ tv ahaṃ brūmi dīyatām asya maithilī 6.009.021a purā śaratsūryamarīcisaṃnibhān; navāgrapuṅkhān sudṛḍhān nṛpātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16022: 6.009.021c sṛjaty amoghān viśikhān vadhāya te; pradīyatāṃ dāśarathāya maithilī
GE09ram_1-7u:16023: 6.009.022a tyajasva kopaṃ sukhadharmanāśanaṃ; bhajasva dharmaṃ ratikīrtivardhanam
GE09ram_1-7u:16024: 6.009.022c prasīda jīvema saputrabāndhavāḥ; pradīyatāṃ dāśarathāya maithilī
GE09ram_1-7u:16025: 6.010.001a suniviṣṭaṃ hitaṃ vākyam uktavantaṃ vibhīṣaṇam 6.010.001c abravīt paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ rāvaṇaḥ kālacoditaḥ 6.010.002a vaset saha sapatnena kruddhenāśīviṣeṇa vā 6.010.002c na tu mitrapravādena saṃvasec chatrusevinā 6.010.003a jānāmi śīlaṃ jñātīnāṃ sarvalokeṣu rākṣasa 6.010.003c hṛṣyanti vyasaneṣv ete jñātīnāṃ jñātayaḥ sadā
GE09ram_1-7u:16026: 6.010.004a pradhānaṃ sādhakaṃ vaidyaṃ dharmaśīlaṃ ca rākṣasa
GE09ram_1-7u:16027: 6.010.004c jñātayo hy avamanyante śūraṃ paribhavanti ca
GE09ram_1-7u:16029: 6.010.005c pracchannahṛdayā ghorā jñātayas tu bhayāvahāḥ 6.010.006a śrūyante hastibhir gītāḥ ślokāḥ padmavane kva cit
GE09ram_1-7u:16030: 6.010.006c pāśahastān narān dṛṣṭvā śṛṇu tān gadato mama
GE09ram_1-7u:16031: 6.010.007a nāgnir nānyāni śastrāṇi na naḥ pāśā bhayāvahāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16032: 6.010.007c ghorāḥ svārthaprayuktās tu jñātayo no bhayāvahāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16033: 6.010.008a upāyam ete vakṣyanti grahaṇe nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16034: 6.010.008c kṛtsnād bhayāj jñātibhayaṃ sukaṣṭaṃ viditaṃ ca naḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16035: 6.010.009a vidyate goṣu saṃpannaṃ vidyate brāhmaṇe damaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16036: 6.010.009c vidyate strīṣu cāpalyaṃ vidyate jñātito bhayam
GE09ram_1-7u:16037: 6.010.010a tato neṣṭam idaṃ saumya yad ahaṃ lokasatkṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16038: 6.010.010c aiśvaryam abhijātaś ca ripūṇāṃ mūrdhni ca sthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16039: 6.010.011a anyas tv evaṃvidhaṃ brūyād vākyam etan niśācara
GE09ram_1-7u:16040: 6.010.011c asmin muhūrte na bhavet tvāṃ tu dhik kulapāṃsanam 6.010.012a ity uktaḥ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ nyāyavādī vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16041: 6.010.012c utpapāta gadāpāṇiś caturbhiḥ saha rākṣasaiḥ 6.010.013a abravīc ca tadā vākyaṃ jātakrodho vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16043: 6.010.014a sa tvaṃ bhrātāsi me rājan brūhi māṃ yad yad icchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:16044: 6.010.014c idaṃ tu paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ na kṣamāmy anṛtaṃ tava 6.010.015a sunītaṃ hitakāmena vākyam uktaṃ daśānana 6.010.015c na gṛhṇanty akṛtātmānaḥ kālasya vaśam āgatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16045: 6.010.016a sulabhāḥ puruṣā rājan satataṃ priyavādinaḥ 6.010.016c apriyasya tu pathyasya vaktā śrotā ca durlabhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16047: 6.010.017c na naśyantam upekṣeyaṃ pradīptaṃ śaraṇaṃ yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:16049: 6.010.018c na tvām icchāmy ahaṃ draṣṭuṃ rāmeṇa nihataṃ śaraiḥ 6.010.019a śūrāś ca balavantaś ca kṛtāstrāś ca raṇājire
GE09ram_1-7u:16051: 6.010.020a ātmānaṃ sarvathā rakṣa purīṃ cemāṃ sarākṣasām
GE09ram_1-7u:16052: 6.010.020c svasti te 'stu gamiṣyāmi sukhī bhava mayā vinā 6.010.021a nivāryamāṇasya mayā hitaiṣiṇā; na rocate te vacanaṃ niśācara 6.010.021c parītakālā hi gatāyuṣo narā; hitaṃ na gṛhṇanti suhṛdbhir īritam 6.011.001a ity uktvā paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ rāvaṇaṃ rāvaṇānujaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16053: 6.011.001c ājagāma muhūrtena yatra rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ 6.011.002a taṃ meruśikharākāraṃ dīptām iva śatahradām 6.011.002c gaganasthaṃ mahīsthās te dadṛśur vānarādhipāḥ 6.011.003a tam ātmapañcamaṃ dṛṣṭvā sugrīvo vānarādhipaḥ 6.011.003c vānaraiḥ saha durdharṣaś cintayām āsa buddhimān
GE09ram_1-7u:16054: 6.011.004a cintayitvā muhūrtaṃ tu vānarāṃs tān uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:16055: 6.011.004c hanūmatpramukhān sarvān idaṃ vacanam uttamam 6.011.005a eṣa sarvāyudhopetaś caturbhiḥ saha rākṣasaiḥ 6.011.005c rākṣaso 'bhyeti paśyadhvam asmān hantuṃ na saṃśayaḥ 6.011.006a sugrīvasya vacaḥ śrutvā sarve te vānarottamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16056: 6.011.006c sālān udyamya śailāṃś ca idaṃ vacanam abruvan
GE09ram_1-7u:16057: 6.011.007a śīghraṃ vyādiśa no rājan vadhāyaiṣāṃ durātmanām
GE09ram_1-7u:16058: 6.011.007c nipatantu hatāś caite dharaṇyām alpajīvitāḥ 6.011.008a teṣāṃ saṃbhāṣamāṇānām anyonyaṃ sa vibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.011.008c uttaraṃ tīram āsādya khastha eva vyatiṣṭhata
GE09ram_1-7u:16059: 6.011.009a uvāca ca mahāprājñaḥ svareṇa mahatā mahān
GE09ram_1-7u:16060: 6.011.009c sugrīvaṃ tāṃś ca saṃprekṣya khastha eva vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16061: 6.011.010a rāvaṇo nāma durvṛtto rākṣaso rākṣaseśvaraḥ 6.011.010c tasyāham anujo bhrātā vibhīṣaṇa iti śrutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16062: 6.011.011a tena sītā janasthānād dhṛtā hatvā jaṭāyuṣam
GE09ram_1-7u:16063: 6.011.011c ruddhvā ca vivaśā dīnā rākṣasībhiḥ surakṣitā
GE09ram_1-7u:16064: 6.011.012a tam ahaṃ hetubhir vākyair vividhaiś ca nyadarśayam
GE09ram_1-7u:16065: 6.011.012c sādhu niryātyatāṃ sītā rāmāyeti punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16066: 6.011.013a sa ca na pratijagrāha rāvaṇaḥ kālacoditaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16067: 6.011.013c ucyamāno hitaṃ vākyaṃ viparīta ivauṣadham 6.011.014a so 'haṃ paruṣitas tena dāsavac cāvamānitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16068: 6.011.014c tyaktvā putrāṃś ca dārāṃś ca rāghavaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ 6.011.015a sarvalokaśaraṇyāya rāghavāya mahātmane
GE09ram_1-7u:16069: 6.011.015c nivedayata māṃ kṣipraṃ vibhīṣaṇam upasthitam 6.011.016a etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā sugrīvo laghuvikramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16070: 6.011.016c lakṣmaṇasyāgrato rāmaṃ saṃrabdham idam abravīt 6.011.017a rāvaṇasyānujo bhrātā vibhīṣaṇa iti śrutaḥ 6.011.017c caturbhiḥ saha rakṣobhir bhavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16071: 6.011.018a rāvaṇena praṇihitaṃ tam avehi vibhīṣaṇam 6.011.018c tasyāhaṃ nigrahaṃ manye kṣamaṃ kṣamavatāṃ vara
GE09ram_1-7u:16073: 6.011.019c prahartuṃ māyayā channo viśvaste tvayi rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:16074: 6.011.020a badhyatām eṣa tīvreṇa daṇḍena sacivaiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:16075: 6.011.020c rāvaṇasya nṛśaṃsasya bhrātā hy eṣa vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16076: 6.011.021a evam uktvā tu taṃ rāmaṃ saṃrabdho vāhinīpatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16077: 6.011.021c vākyajño vākyakuśalaṃ tato maunam upāgamat 6.011.022a sugrīvasya tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvā rāmo mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16079: 6.011.023a yad uktaṃ kapirājena rāvaṇāvarajaṃ prati 6.011.023c vākyaṃ hetumad atyarthaṃ bhavadbhir api tac chrutam
GE09ram_1-7u:16080: 6.011.024a suhṛdā hy arthakṛccheṣu yuktaṃ buddhimatā satā
GE09ram_1-7u:16081: 6.011.024c samarthenāpi saṃdeṣṭuṃ śāśvatīṃ bhūtim icchatā 6.011.025a ity evaṃ paripṛṣṭās te svaṃ svaṃ matam atandritāḥ 6.011.025c sopacāraṃ tadā rāmam ūcur hitacikīrṣavaḥ 6.011.026a ajñātaṃ nāsti te kiṃ cit triṣu lokeṣu rāghava 6.011.026c ātmānaṃ pūjayan rāma pṛcchasy asmān suhṛttayā
GE09ram_1-7u:16082: 6.011.027a tvaṃ hi satyavrataḥ śūro dhārmiko dṛḍhavikramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16083: 6.011.027c parīkṣya kārā smṛtimān nisṛṣṭātmā suhṛtsu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:16084: 6.011.028a tasmād ekaikaśas tāvad bruvantu sacivās tava
GE09ram_1-7u:16085: 6.011.028c hetuto matisaṃpannāḥ samarthāś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16088: 6.011.030a śatroḥ sakāśāt saṃprāptaḥ sarvathā śaṅkya eva hi
GE09ram_1-7u:16089: 6.011.030c viśvāsayogyaḥ sahasā na kartavyo vibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.011.031a chādayitvātmabhāvaṃ hi caranti śaṭhabuddhayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16090: 6.011.031c praharanti ca randhreṣu so 'narthaḥ sumahān bhavet 6.011.032a arthānarthau viniścitya vyavasāyaṃ bhajeta ha 6.011.032c guṇataḥ saṃgrahaṃ kuryād doṣatas tu visarjayet
GE09ram_1-7u:16091: 6.011.033a yadi doṣo mahāṃs tasmiṃs tyajyatām aviśaṅkitam
GE09ram_1-7u:16092: 6.011.033c guṇān vāpi bahūñ jñātvā saṃgrahaḥ kriyatāṃ nṛpa
GE09ram_1-7u:16093: 6.011.034a śarabhas tv atha niścitya sārthaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:16094: 6.011.034c kṣipram asmin naravyāghra cāraḥ pratividhīyatām 6.011.035a praṇidhāya hi cāreṇa yathāvat sūkṣmabuddhinā 6.011.035c parīkṣya ca tataḥ kāryo yathānyāyaṃ parigrahaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16095: 6.011.036a jāmbavāṃs tv atha saṃprekṣya śāstrabuddhyā vicakṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16096: 6.011.036c vākyaṃ vijñāpayām āsa guṇavad doṣavarjitam 6.011.037a baddhavairāc ca pāpāc ca rākṣasendrād vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16097: 6.011.037c adeśa kāle saṃprāptaḥ sarvathā śaṅkyatām ayam
GE09ram_1-7u:16098: 6.011.038a tato maindas tu saṃprekṣya nayāpanayakovidaḥ 6.011.038c vākyaṃ vacanasaṃpanno babhāṣe hetumattaram
GE09ram_1-7u:16099: 6.011.039a vacanaṃ nāma tasyaiṣa rāvaṇasya vibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.011.039c pṛcchyatāṃ madhureṇāyaṃ śanair naravareśvara
GE09ram_1-7u:16100: 6.011.040a bhāvam asya tu vijñāya tatas tattvaṃ kariṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:16101: 6.011.040c yadi dṛṣṭo na duṣṭo vā buddhipūrvaṃ nararṣabha
GE09ram_1-7u:16103: 6.011.041c uvāca vacanaṃ ślakṣṇam arthavan madhuraṃ laghu
GE09ram_1-7u:16104: 6.011.042a na bhavantaṃ matiśreṣṭhaṃ samarthaṃ vadatāṃ varam
GE09ram_1-7u:16105: 6.011.042c atiśāyayituṃ śakto bṛhaspatir api bruvan 6.011.043a na vādān nāpi saṃgharṣān nādhikyān na ca kāmataḥ 6.011.043c vakṣyāmi vacanaṃ rājan yathārthaṃ rāmagauravāt 6.011.044a arthānarthanimittaṃ hi yad uktaṃ sacivais tava
GE09ram_1-7u:16106: 6.011.044c tatra doṣaṃ prapaśyāmi kriyā na hy upapadyate
GE09ram_1-7u:16107: 6.011.045a ṛte niyogāt sāmarthyam avaboddhuṃ na śakyate
GE09ram_1-7u:16108: 6.011.045c sahasā viniyogo hi doṣavān pratibhāti me
GE09ram_1-7u:16109: 6.011.046a cārapraṇihitaṃ yuktaṃ yad uktaṃ sacivais tava
GE09ram_1-7u:16111: 6.011.047a adeśa kāle saṃprāpta ity ayaṃ yad vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16112: 6.011.047c vivakṣā cātra me 'stīyaṃ tāṃ nibodha yathā mati
GE09ram_1-7u:16113: 6.011.048a sa eṣa deśaḥ kālaś ca bhavatīha yathā tathā 6.011.048c puruṣāt puruṣaṃ prāpya tathā doṣaguṇāv api
GE09ram_1-7u:16114: 6.011.049a daurātmyaṃ rāvaṇe dṛṣṭvā vikramaṃ ca tathā tvayi
GE09ram_1-7u:16115: 6.011.049c yuktam āgamanaṃ tasya sadṛśaṃ tasya buddhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16116: 6.011.050a ajñātarūpaiḥ puruṣaiḥ sa rājan pṛcchyatām iti
GE09ram_1-7u:16117: 6.011.050c yad uktam atra me prekṣā kā cid asti samīkṣitā
GE09ram_1-7u:16118: 6.011.051a pṛcchyamāno viśaṅketa sahasā buddhimān vacaḥ 6.011.051c tatra mitraṃ praduṣyeta mithyapṛṣṭaṃ sukhāgatam 6.011.052a aśakyaḥ sahasā rājan bhāvo vettuṃ parasya vai
GE09ram_1-7u:16119: 6.011.052c antaḥ svabhāvair gītais tair naipuṇyaṃ paśyatā bhṛśam
GE09ram_1-7u:16120: 6.011.053a na tv asya bruvato jātu lakṣyate duṣṭabhāvatā
GE09ram_1-7u:16121: 6.011.053c prasannaṃ vadanaṃ cāpi tasmān me nāsti saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16122: 6.011.054a aśaṅkitamatiḥ svastho na śaṭhaḥ parisarpati 6.011.054c na cāsya duṣṭā vāk cāpi tasmān nāstīha saṃśayaḥ 6.011.055a ākāraś chādyamāno 'pi na śakyo vinigūhitum
GE09ram_1-7u:16123: 6.011.055c balād dhi vivṛṇoty eva bhāvam antargataṃ nṛṇām
GE09ram_1-7u:16124: 6.011.056a deśakālopapannaṃ ca kāryaṃ kāryavidāṃ vara 6.011.056c saphalaṃ kurute kṣipraṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:16125: 6.011.057a udyogaṃ tava saṃprekṣya mithyāvṛttaṃ ca rāvaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:16126: 6.011.057c vālinaś ca vadhaṃ śrutvā sugrīvaṃ cābhiṣecitam
GE09ram_1-7u:16127: 6.011.058a rājyaṃ prārthayamānaś ca buddhipūrvam ihāgataḥ 6.011.058c etāvat tu puraskṛtya yujyate tv asya saṃgrahaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16128: 6.011.059a yathāśakti mayoktaṃ tu rākṣasasyārjavaṃ prati 6.011.059c tvaṃ pramāṇaṃ tu śeṣasya śrutvā buddhimatāṃ vara
GE09ram_1-7u:16129: 6.012.001a atha rāmaḥ prasannātmā śrutvā vāyusutasya ha
GE09ram_1-7u:16130: 6.012.001c pratyabhāṣata durdharṣaḥ śrutavān ātmani sthitam 6.012.002a mamāpi tu vivakṣāsti kā cit prati vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:16131: 6.012.002c śrutam icchāmi tat sarvaṃ bhavadbhiḥ śreyasi sthitaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16132: 6.012.003a mitrabhāvena saṃprāptaṃ na tyajeyaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_1-7u:16133: 6.012.003c doṣo yady api tasya syāt satām etad agarhitam 6.012.004a rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā sugrīvaḥ plavageśvaraḥ 6.012.004c pratyabhāṣata kākutsthaṃ sauhārdenābhicoditaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16134: 6.012.005a kim atra citraṃ dharmajña lokanāthaśikhāmaṇe 6.012.005c yat tvam āryaṃ prabhāṣethāḥ sattvavān sapathe sthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16135: 6.012.006a mama cāpy antarātmāyaṃ śuddhiṃ vetti vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:16136: 6.012.006c anumanāc ca bhāvāc ca sarvataḥ suparīkṣitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16137: 6.012.007a tasmāt kṣipraṃ sahāsmābhis tulyo bhavatu rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:16138: 6.012.007c vibhīṣaṇo mahāprājñaḥ sakhitvaṃ cābhyupaitu naḥ 6.012.008a sa sugrīvasya tad vākyayṃ rāmaḥ śrutvā vimṛśya ca 6.012.008c tataḥ śubhataraṃ vākyam uvāca haripuṃgavam 6.012.009a suduṣṭo vāpy aduṣṭo vā kim eṣa rajanīcaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16139: 6.012.009c sūkṣmam apy ahitaṃ kartuṃ mamāśaktaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_1-7u:16140: 6.012.010a piśācān dānavān yakṣān pṛthivyāṃ caiva rākṣasān
GE09ram_1-7u:16141: 6.012.010c aṅgulyagreṇa tān hanyām icchan harigaṇeśvara 6.012.011a śrūyate hi kapotena śatruḥ śaraṇam āgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16142: 6.012.011c arcitaś ca yathānyāyaṃ svaiś ca māṃsair nimantritaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16143: 6.012.012a sa hi taṃ pratijagrāha bhāryā hartāram āgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:16144: 6.012.012c kapoto vānaraśreṣṭha kiṃ punar madvidho janaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16145: 6.012.013a ṛṣeḥ kaṇvasya putreṇa kaṇḍunā paramarṣiṇā 6.012.013c śṛṇu gāthāṃ purā gītāṃ dharmiṣṭhāṃ satyavādinā
GE09ram_1-7u:16147: 6.012.014c na hanyād ānṛśaṃsyārtham api śatruṃ paraṃ pata
GE09ram_1-7u:16148: 6.012.015a ārto vā yadi vā dṛptaḥ pareṣāṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ 6.012.015c ariḥ prāṇān parityajya rakṣitavyaḥ kṛtātmanā 6.012.016a sa ced bhayād vā mohād vā kāmād vāpi na rakṣati
GE09ram_1-7u:16149: 6.012.016c svayā śaktyā yathātattvaṃ tat pāpaṃ lokagarhitam
GE09ram_1-7u:16150: 6.012.017a vinaṣṭaḥ paśyatas tasya rakṣiṇaḥ śaraṇāgataḥ 6.012.017c ādāya sukṛtaṃ tasya sarvaṃ gacched arakṣitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16151: 6.012.018a evaṃ doṣo mahān atra prapannānām arakṣaṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:16153: 6.012.019a kariṣyāmi yathārthaṃ tu kaṇḍor vacanam uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:16154: 6.012.019c dharmiṣṭhaṃ ca yaśasyaṃ ca svargyaṃ syāt tu phalodaye 6.012.020a sakṛd eva prapannāya tavāsmīti ca yācate
GE09ram_1-7u:16155: 6.012.020c abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo dadāmy etad vrataṃ mama
GE09ram_1-7u:16156: 6.012.021a ānayainaṃ hariśreṣṭha dattam asyābhayaṃ mayā 6.012.021c vibhīṣaṇo vā sugrīva yadi vā rāvaṇaḥ svayam
GE09ram_1-7u:16157: 6.012.022a tatas tu sugrīvavaco niśamya tad; dharīśvareṇābhihitaṃ nareśvaraḥ 6.012.022c vibhīṣaṇenāśu jagāma saṃgamaṃ; patatrirājena yathā puraṃdaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16159: 6.013.001c khāt papātāvaniṃ hṛṣṭo bhaktair anucaraiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:16160: 6.013.002a sa tu rāmasya dharmātmā nipapāta vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16161: 6.013.002c pādayoḥ śaraṇānveṣī caturbhiḥ saha rākṣasaiḥ 6.013.003a abravīc ca tadā rāmaṃ vākyaṃ tatra vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16162: 6.013.003c dharmayuktaṃ ca yuktaṃ ca sāmprataṃ saṃpraharṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:16163: 6.013.004a anujo rāvaṇasyāhaṃ tena cāsmy avamānitaḥ 6.013.004c bhavantaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ 6.013.005a parityaktā mayā laṅkā mitrāṇi ca dhanāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:16164: 6.013.005c bhavadgataṃ me rājyaṃ ca jīvitaṃ ca sukhāni ca 6.013.006a rākṣasānāṃ vadhe sāhyaṃ laṅkāyāś ca pradharṣaṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:16165: 6.013.006c kariṣyāmi yathāprāṇaṃ pravekṣyāmi ca vāhinīm 6.013.007a iti bruvāṇaṃ rāmas tu pariṣvajya vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:16166: 6.013.007c abravīl lakṣmaṇaṃ prītaḥ samudrāj jalam ānaya
GE09ram_1-7u:16167: 6.013.008a tena cemaṃ mahāprājñam abhiṣiñca vibhīṣaṇam 6.013.008c rājānaṃ rakṣasāṃ kṣipraṃ prasanne mayi mānada
GE09ram_1-7u:16168: 6.013.009a evam uktas tu saumitrir abhyaṣiñcad vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:16170: 6.013.010a taṃ prasādaṃ tu rāmasya dṛṣṭvā sadyaḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16171: 6.013.010c pracukruśur mahānādān sādhu sādhv iti cābruvan
GE09ram_1-7u:16172: 6.013.011a abravīc ca hanūmāṃś ca sugrīvaś ca vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:16173: 6.013.011c kathaṃ sāgaram akṣobhyaṃ tarāma varuṇālayam 6.013.012a upāyair abhigacchāmo yathā nadanadīpatim
GE09ram_1-7u:16174: 6.013.012c tarāma tarasā sarve sasainyā varuṇālayam 6.013.013a evam uktas tu dharmajñaḥ pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16175: 6.013.013c samudraṃ rāghavo rājā śaraṇaṃ gantum arhati
GE09ram_1-7u:16177: 6.013.014c kartum arhati rāmasya jñāteḥ kāryaṃ mahodadhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16180: 6.013.016a sa lakṣmaṇaṃ mahātejāḥ sugrīvaṃ ca harīśvaram
GE09ram_1-7u:16181: 6.013.016c satkriyārthaṃ kriyādakṣaḥ smitapūrvam uvāca ha 6.013.017a vibhīṣaṇasya mantro 'yaṃ mama lakṣmaṇa rocate
GE09ram_1-7u:16182: 6.013.017c brūhi tvaṃ sahasugrīvas tavāpi yadi rocate
GE09ram_1-7u:16183: 6.013.018a sugrīvaḥ paṇḍito nityaṃ bhavān mantravicakṣaṇaḥ 6.013.018c ubhābhyāṃ saṃpradhāryāryaṃ rocate yat tad ucyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:16184: 6.013.019a evam uktau tu tau vīrāv ubhau sugrīvalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:16185: 6.013.019c samudācāra saṃyuktam idaṃ vacanam ūcatuḥ 6.013.020a kimarthaṃ no naravyāghra na rociṣyati rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:16186: 6.013.020c vibhīṣaṇena yat tūktam asmin kāle sukhāvaham
GE09ram_1-7u:16188: 6.013.021c laṅkā nāsādituṃ śakyā sendrair api surāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16189: 6.013.022a vibhīṣaṇasya śūrasya yathārthaṃ kriyatāṃ vacaḥ 6.013.022c alaṃ kālātyayaṃ kṛtvā samudro 'yaṃ niyujyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:16190: 6.013.023a evam uktaḥ kuśāstīrṇe tīre nadanadīpateḥ 6.013.023c saṃviveśa tadā rāmo vedyām iva hutāśanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16191: 6.014.001a tasya rāmasya suptasya kuśāstīrṇe mahītale 6.014.001c niyamād apramattasya niśās tisro 'ticakramuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16192: 6.014.002a na ca darśayate mandas tadā rāmasya sāgaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16194: 6.014.003a samudrasya tataḥ kruddho rāmo raktāntalocanaḥ 6.014.003c samīpastham uvācedaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ śubhalakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:16195: 6.014.004a paśya tāvad anāryasya pūjyamānasya lakṣmaṇa 6.014.004c avalepaṃ samudrasya na darśayati yat svayam
GE09ram_1-7u:16196: 6.014.005a praśamaś ca kṣamā caiva ārjavaṃ priyavāditā
GE09ram_1-7u:16197: 6.014.005c asāmarthyaṃ phalanty ete nirguṇeṣu satāṃ guṇāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16199: 6.014.006c sarvatrotsṛṣṭadaṇḍaṃ ca lokaḥ satkurute naram 6.014.007a na sāmnā śakyate kīrtir na sāmnā śakyate yaśaḥ 6.014.007c prāptuṃ lakṣmaṇa loke 'smiñ jayo vā raṇamūdhani
GE09ram_1-7u:16201: 6.014.008c niruddhatoyaṃ saumitre plavadbhiḥ paśya sarvataḥ 6.014.009a mahābhogāni matsyānāṃ kariṇāṃ ca karān iha
GE09ram_1-7u:16202: 6.014.009c bhogāṃś ca paśya nāgānāṃ mayā bhinnāni lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:16204: 6.014.010c adya yuddhena mahatā samudraṃ pariśoṣaye 6.014.011a kṣamayā hi samāyuktaṃ mām ayaṃ makarālayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16205: 6.014.011c asamarthaṃ vijānāti dhik kṣamām īdṛśe jane
GE09ram_1-7u:16206: 6.014.012a cāpam ānaya saumitre śarāṃś cāśīviṣopamān 6.014.012c adyākṣobhyam api kruddhaḥ kṣobhayiṣyāmi sāgaram 6.014.013a velāsu kṛtamaryādaṃ sahasormisamākulam
GE09ram_1-7u:16209: 6.014.014c babhūva rāmo durdharṣo yugāntāgnir iva jvalan
GE09ram_1-7u:16210: 6.014.015a saṃpīḍya ca dhanur ghoraṃ kampayitvā śarair jagat
