GE09ram_1-7u:16211: 6.014.015c mumoca viśikhān ugrān vajrāṇīva śatakratuḥ 6.014.016a te jvalanto mahāvegās tejasā sāyakottamāḥ 6.014.016c praviśanti samudrasya salilaṃ trastapannagam
GE09ram_1-7u:16212: 6.014.017a tato vegaḥ samudrasya sanakramakaro mahān 6.014.017c saṃbabhūva mahāghoraḥ samārutaravas
GE09ram_1-7u:16214: 6.014.019a vyathitāḥ pannagāś cāsan dīptāsyā dīptalocanāḥ 6.014.019c dānavāś ca mahāvīryāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16217: 6.014.021a āghūrṇitataraṅgaughaḥ saṃbhrāntoragarākṣasaḥ 6.014.021c udvartita mahāgrāhaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ salilāśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16218: 6.015.001a tato madhyāt samudrasya sāgaraḥ svayam utthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16219: 6.015.001c udayan hi mahāśailān meror iva divākaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16220: 6.015.001e pannagaiḥ saha dīptāsyaiḥ samudraḥ pratyadṛśyata 6.015.002a snigdhavaidūryasaṃkāśo jāmbūnadavibhūṣitaḥ 6.015.002c raktamālyāmbaradharaḥ padmapatranibhekṣaṇaḥ 6.015.003a sāgaraḥ samatikramya pūrvam āmantrya vīryavān 6.015.003c abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ rāghavaṃ śarapāṇinam 6.015.004a pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16221: 6.015.004c svabhāve saumya tiṣṭhanti śāśvataṃ mārgam āśritāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16222: 6.015.005a tat svabhāvo mamāpy eṣa yad agādho 'ham aplavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16223: 6.015.005c vikāras tu bhaved rādha etat te pravadāmy aham 6.015.006a na kāmān na ca lobhād vā na bhayāt pārthivātmaja
GE09ram_1-7u:16225: 6.015.007a vidhāsye rāma yenāpi viṣahiṣye hy ahaṃ tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:16226: 6.015.007c grāhā na prahariṣyanti yāvat senā tariṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:16227: 6.015.008a ayaṃ saumya nalo nāma tanujo viśvakarmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16228: 6.015.008c pitrā dattavaraḥ śrīmān pratimo viśvakarmaṇaḥ 6.015.009a eṣa setuṃ mahotsāhaḥ karotu mayi vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16229: 6.015.009c tam ahaṃ dhārayiṣyāmi tathā hy eṣa yathā pitā 6.015.010a evam uktvodadhir naṣṭaḥ samutthāya nalas tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16230: 6.015.010c abravīd vānaraśreṣṭho vākyaṃ rāmaṃ mahābalaḥ 6.015.011a ahaṃ setuṃ kariṣyāmi vistīrṇe varuṇālaye 6.015.011c pituḥ sāmarthyam āsthāya tattvam āha mahodadhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16231: 6.015.012a mama mātur varo datto mandare viśvakarmaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:16232: 6.015.012c aurasas tasya putro 'haṃ sadṛśo viśvakarmaṇā 6.015.013a na cāpy aham anukto vai prabrūyām ātmano guṇān 6.015.013c kāmam adyaiva badhnantu setuṃ vānarapuṃgavāḥ 6.015.014a tato nisṛṣṭarāmeṇa sarvato hariyūthapāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16235: 6.015.015c babhañjur vānarās tatra pracakarṣuś ca sāgaram
GE09ram_1-7u:16236: 6.015.016a te sālaiś cāśvakarṇaiś ca dhavair vaṃśaiś ca vānarāḥ 6.015.016c kuṭajair arjunais tālais tikalais timiśair api
GE09ram_1-7u:16237: 6.015.017a bilvakaiḥ saptaparṇaiś ca karṇikāraiś ca puṣpitaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16238: 6.015.017c cūtaiś cāśokavṛkṣaiś ca sāgaraṃ samapūrayan 6.015.018a samūlāṃś ca vimūlāṃś ca pādapān harisattamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16239: 6.015.018c indraketūn ivodyamya prajahrur harayas tarūn 6.015.019a prakṣipyamāṇair acalaiḥ sahasā jalam uddhatam 6.015.019c samutpatitam ākāśam apāsarpat tatas tataḥ 6.015.020a daśayojanavistīrṇaṃ śatayojanam āyatam
GE09ram_1-7u:16240: 6.015.020c nalaś cakre mahāsetuṃ madhye nadanadīpateḥ 6.015.021a śilānāṃ kṣipyamāṇānāṃ śailānāṃ tatra pātyatām 6.015.021c babhūva tumulaḥ śabdas tadā tasmin mahodadhau
GE09ram_1-7u:16241: 6.015.022a sa nalena kṛtaḥ setuḥ sāgare makarālaye
GE09ram_1-7u:16242: 6.015.022c śuśubhe subhagaḥ śrīmān svātīpatha ivāmbare 6.015.023a tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16243: 6.015.024a āplavantaḥ plavantaś ca garjantaś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16244: 6.015.024c tam acintyam asahyaṃ ca adbhutaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:16247: 6.015.025c badhnantaḥ sāgare setuṃ jagmuḥ pāraṃ mahodadheḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16248: 6.015.026a viśālaḥ sukṛtaḥ śrīmān subhūmiḥ susamāhitaḥ 6.015.026c aśobhata mahāsetuḥ sīmanta iva sāgare 6.015.027a tataḥ pare samudrasya gadāpāṇir vibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.015.027c pareṣām abhighatārtham atiṣṭhat sacivaiḥ saha 6.015.028a agratas tasya sainyasya śrīmān rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16249: 6.015.028c jagāma dhanvī dharmātmā sugrīveṇa samanvitaḥ 6.015.029a anye madhyena gacchanti pārśvato 'nye plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16250: 6.015.029c salile prapatanty anye mārgam anye na lebhire
GE09ram_1-7u:16251: 6.015.029e ke cid vaihāyasa gatāḥ suparṇā iva pupluvuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16252: 6.015.030a ghoṣeṇa mahatā ghoṣaṃ sāgarasya samucchritam 6.015.030c bhīmam antardadhe bhīmā tarantī harivāhinī 6.015.031a vānarāṇāṃ hi sā tīrṇā vāhinī nala setunā
GE09ram_1-7u:16254: 6.015.032a tad adbhutaṃ rāghava karma duṣkaraṃ; samīkṣya devāḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:16256: 6.015.032c upetya rāmaṃ sahitā maharṣibhiḥ; samabhyaṣiñcan suśubhair jalaiḥ pṛthak 6.015.033a jayasva śatrūn naradeva medinīṃ; sasāgarāṃ pālaya śāśvatīḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16258: 6.015.033c itīva rāmaṃ naradevasatkṛtaṃ; śubhair vacobhir vividhair
GE09ram_1-7u:16260: 6.016.001a sabale sāgaraṃ tīrṇe rāme daśarathātmaje 6.016.001c amātyau rāvaṇaḥ śrīmān abravīc chukasāraṇau 6.016.002a samagraṃ sāgaraṃ tīrṇaṃ dustaraṃ vānaraṃ balam
GE09ram_1-7u:16262: 6.016.003a sāgare setubandhaṃ tu na śraddadhyāṃ kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_1-7u:16263: 6.016.003c avaśyaṃ cāpi saṃkhyeyaṃ tan mayā vānaraṃ balam
GE09ram_1-7u:16265: 6.016.004c parimāṇaṃ ca vīryaṃ ca ye ca mukhyāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ 6.016.005a mantriṇo ye ca rāmasya sugrīvasya ca saṃmatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16266: 6.016.005c ye pūrvam abhivartante ye ca śūrāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16267: 6.016.006a sa ca setur yathā baddhaḥ sāgare salilārṇave
GE09ram_1-7u:16268: 6.016.006c niveśaś ca yathā teṣāṃ vānarāṇāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_1-7u:16269: 6.016.007a rāmasya vyavasāyaṃ ca vīryaṃ praharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:16270: 6.016.007c lakṣmaṇasya ca vīrasya tattvato jñātum arhatha
GE09ram_1-7u:16271: 6.016.008a kaś ca senāpatis teṣāṃ vānarāṇāṃ mahaujasām
GE09ram_1-7u:16272: 6.016.008c etaj jñātvā yathātattvaṃ śīghram agantum arhathaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16274: 6.016.009c harirūpadharau vīrau praviṣṭau vānaraṃ balam 6.016.010a tatas tad vānaraṃ sainyam acintyaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:16275: 6.016.010c saṃkhyātuṃ nādhyagacchetāṃ tadā tau śukasāraṇau 6.016.011a tat sthitaṃ parvatāgreṣu nirdareṣu guhāsu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:16276: 6.016.011c samudrasya ca tīreṣu vaneṣūpavaneṣu ca 6.016.012a taramāṇaṃ ca tīrṇaṃ ca tartukāmaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16277: 6.016.012c niviṣṭaṃ niviśac caiva bhīmanādaṃ mahābalam 6.016.013a tau dadarśa mahātejāḥ pracchannau ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16280: 6.016.014a tau dṛṣṭvā vyathitau rāmaṃ nirāśau jīvite tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:16281: 6.016.014c kṛtāñjalipuṭau bhītau vacanaṃ cedam ūcatuḥ 6.016.015a āvām ihāgatau saumya rāvaṇaprahitāv ubhau 6.016.015c parijñātuṃ balaṃ kṛtsnaṃ tavedaṃ raghunandana 6.016.016a tayos tad vacanaṃ śrutvā rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16282: 6.016.016c abravīt prahasan vākyaṃ sarvabhūtahite rataḥ 6.016.017a yadi dṛṣṭaṃ balaṃ kṛtsnaṃ vayaṃ vā susamīkṣitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16283: 6.016.017c yathoktaṃ vā kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ chandataḥ pratigamyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:16284: 6.016.018a praviśya nagarīṃ laṅkāṃ bhavadbhyāṃ dhanadānujaḥ 6.016.018c vaktavyo rakṣasāṃ rājā yathoktaṃ vacanaṃ mama
GE09ram_1-7u:16285: 6.016.019a yad balaṃ ca samāśritya sītāṃ me hṛtavān asi 6.016.019c tad darśaya yathākāmaṃ sasainyaḥ sahabāndhavaḥ 6.016.020a śvaḥkāle nagarīṃ laṅkāṃ saprākārāṃ satoraṇām 6.016.020c rākṣasaṃ ca balaṃ paśya śarair vidhvaṃsitaṃ mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:16286: 6.016.021a ghoraṃ roṣam ahaṃ mokṣye balaṃ dhāraya rāvaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:16287: 6.016.021c śvaḥkāle vajravān vajraṃ dānaveṣv iva vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16289: 6.016.022c āgamya nagarīṃ laṅkām abrūtāṃ rākṣasādhipam 6.016.023a vibhīṣaṇagṛhītau tu vadhārhau
GE09ram_1-7u:16293: 6.016.025a rāmo dāśarathiḥ śrīmāṃl lakṣmaṇaś ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16295: 6.016.026a ete śaktāḥ purīṃ laṅkāṃ saprākārāṃ satoraṇām
GE09ram_1-7u:16296: 6.016.026c utpāṭya saṃkrāmayituṃ sarve tiṣṭhantu vānarāḥ 6.016.027a yādṛśaṃ tasya rāmasya rūpaṃ praharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:16297: 6.016.027c vadhiṣyati purīṃ laṅkām ekas tiṣṭhantu te trayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16298: 6.016.028a rāmalakṣmaṇaguptā sā sugrīveṇa ca vāhinī 6.016.028c babhūva durdharṣatarā sarvair api surāsuraiḥ 6.016.029a prahṛṣṭarūpā dhvajinī vanaukasāṃ; mahātmanāṃ saṃprati yoddhum
GE09ram_1-7u:16300: 6.016.029c alaṃ virodhena śamo vidhīyatāṃ; pradīyatāṃ dāśarathāya maithilī
GE09ram_1-7u:16301: 6.017.001a tad vacaḥ pathyam aklībaṃ sāraṇenābhibhāṣitam 6.017.001c niśamya rāvaṇo rājā pratyabhāṣata sāraṇam 6.017.002a yadi mām abhiyuñjīran devagandharvadānavāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16302: 6.017.002c naiva sītāṃ pradāsyāmi sarvalokabhayād api 6.017.003a tvaṃ tu saumya paritrasto haribhir nirjito bhṛśam
GE09ram_1-7u:16303: 6.017.003c pratipradānam adyaiva sītāyāḥ sādhu manyase 6.017.003e ko hi nāma sapatno māṃ samare jetum arhati 6.017.004a ity uktvā paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16304: 6.017.004c āruroha tataḥ śrīmān prāsādaṃ himapāṇḍuram 6.017.004e bahutālasamutsedhaṃ rāvaṇo 'tha didṛkṣayā
GE09ram_1-7u:16305: 6.017.005a tābhyāṃ carābhyāṃ sahito rāvaṇaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ 6.017.005c paśyamānaḥ samudraṃ ca parvatāṃś ca vanāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:16307: 6.017.006a tad apāram asaṃkhyeyaṃ vānarāṇāṃ mahad balam
GE09ram_1-7u:16308: 6.017.006c ālokya rāvaṇo rājā paripapraccha sāraṇam 6.017.007a eṣāṃ vānaramukhyānāṃ ke śūrāḥ ke mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16309: 6.017.007c ke pūrvam abhivartante mahotsāhāḥ samantataḥ 6.017.008a keṣāṃ śṛṇoti sugrīvaḥ ke vā yūthapayūthapāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16310: 6.017.008c sāraṇācakṣva me sarvaṃ ke pradhānāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16312: 6.017.009c ācacakṣe 'tha mukhyajño mukhyāṃs tāṃs tu vanaukasaḥ 6.017.010a eṣa yo 'bhimukho laṅkāṃ nardaṃs tiṣṭhati vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16314: 6.017.011a yasya ghoṣeṇa mahatā saprākārā satoraṇā 6.017.011c laṅkā pravepate sarvā saśailavanakānanā
GE09ram_1-7u:16316: 6.017.012c balāgre tiṣṭhate vīro nīlo nāmaiṣa yūthapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16317: 6.017.013a bāhū pragṛhya yaḥ padbhyāṃ mahīṃ gacchati vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:16318: 6.017.013c laṅkām abhimukhaḥ kopād abhīkṣṇaṃ ca vijṛmbhate
GE09ram_1-7u:16319: 6.017.014a giriśṛṅgapratīkāśaḥ padmakiñjalkasaṃnibhaḥ 6.017.014c sphoṭayaty abhisaṃrabdho lāṅgūlaṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16320: 6.017.015a yasya lāṅgūlaśabdena svanantīva diśo daśa 6.017.015c eṣa vānararājena surgrīveṇābhiṣecitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16322: 6.017.016a ye tu viṣṭabhya gātrāṇi kṣveḍayanti nadanti ca
GE09ram_1-7u:16323: 6.017.016c utthāya ca vijṛmbhante krodhena haripuṃgavāḥ 6.017.017a ete duṣprasahā ghorāś caṇḍāś caṇḍaparākramāḥ 6.017.017c aṣṭau śatasahasrāṇi daśakoṭiśatāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:16324: 6.017.018a ya enam anugacchanti vīrāś candanavāsinaḥ 6.017.018c eṣa āśaṃsate laṅkāṃ svenānīkena marditum 6.017.019a śveto rajatasaṃkāśaḥ sabalo bhīmavikramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16325: 6.017.019c buddhimān vānaraḥ śūras triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16326: 6.017.020a tūrṇaṃ sugrīvam āgamya punar gacchati vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16327: 6.017.020c vibhajan vānarīṃ senām anīkāni praharṣayan 6.017.021a yaḥ purā gomatītīre ramyaṃ paryeti parvatam
GE09ram_1-7u:16328: 6.017.021c nāmnā saṃkocano nāma nānānagayuto giriḥ 6.017.022a tatra rājyaṃ praśāsty eṣa kumudo nāma yūthapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16330: 6.017.023a yasya vālā bahuvyāmā dīrghalāṅgūlam āśritāḥ 6.017.023c tāmrāḥ pītāḥ sitāḥ śvetāḥ prakīrṇā ghorakarmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16331: 6.017.024a adīno roṣaṇaś caṇḍaḥ saṃgrāmam abhikāṅkṣati 6.017.024c eṣaivāśaṃsate laṅkāṃ svenānīkena marditum
GE09ram_1-7u:16332: 6.017.025a yas tv eṣa siṃhasaṃkāśaḥ kapilo dīrghakesaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16333: 6.017.025c nibhṛtaḥ prekṣate laṅkāṃ didhakṣann iva cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_1-7u:16334: 6.017.026a vindhyaṃ kṛṣṇagiriṃ sahyaṃ parvataṃ ca sudarśanam
GE09ram_1-7u:16335: 6.017.026c rājan satatam adhyāste rambho nāmaiṣa yūthapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16336: 6.017.027a śataṃ śatasahasrāṇāṃ triṃśac ca hariyūthapāḥ 6.017.027c parivāryānugacchanti laṅkāṃ marditum ojasā
GE09ram_1-7u:16337: 6.017.028a yas tu karṇau vivṛṇute jṛmbhate ca punaḥ punaḥ 6.017.028c na ca saṃvijate mṛtyor na ca yūthād vidhāvati 6.017.029a mahābalo vītabhayo ramyaṃ sālveya parvatam 6.017.029c rājan satatam adhyāste śarabho nāma yūthapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16338: 6.017.030a etasya balinaḥ sarve vihārā nāma yūthapāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16339: 6.017.030c rājañ śatasahasrāṇi catvāriṃśat tathaiva ca 6.017.031a yas tu megha ivākāśaṃ mahān āvṛtya tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_1-7u:16340: 6.017.031c madhye vānaravīrāṇāṃ surāṇām iva vāsavaḥ 6.017.032a bherīṇām iva saṃnādo yasyaiṣa śrūyate mahān
GE09ram_1-7u:16342: 6.017.033a eṣa parvatam adhyāste pāriyātram anuttamam 6.017.033c yuddhe duṣprasaho nityaṃ panaso nāma yūthapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16344: 6.017.034c yūthapā yūthapaśreṣṭhaṃ yeṣāṃ yūthāni bhāgaśaḥ 6.017.035a yas tu bhīmāṃ pravalgantīṃ camūṃ tiṣṭhati śobhayan
GE09ram_1-7u:16345: 6.017.035c sthitāṃ tīre samudrasya dvitīya iva sāgaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16346: 6.017.036a eṣa dardarasaṃkāśo vinato nāma yūthapaḥ 6.017.036c pibaṃś carati parṇāśāṃ nadīnām uttamāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_1-7u:16347: 6.017.037a ṣaṣṭiḥ śatasahasrāṇi balam asya plavaṃgamāḥ 6.017.037c tvām āhvayati yuddhāya krathano nāma yūthapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16348: 6.017.038a yas tu gairikavarṇābhaṃ vapuḥ puṣyati vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16349: 6.017.038c gavayo nāma tejasvī tvāṃ krodhād abhivartate
GE09ram_1-7u:16351: 6.017.039c eṣa āśaṃsate laṅkāṃ svenānīkena marditum 6.017.040a ete duṣprasahā ghorā balinaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ 6.017.040c yūthapā yūthapaśreṣṭhā yeṣāṃ saṃkhyā na vidyate
GE09ram_1-7u:16352: 6.018.001a tāṃs tu te 'haṃ pravakṣyāmi prekṣamāṇasya yūthapān
GE09ram_1-7u:16353: 6.018.001c rāghavārthe parākrāntā ye na rakṣanti jīvitam
GE09ram_1-7u:16354: 6.018.002a snigdhā yasya bahuśyāmā bālā lāṅgūlam āśritāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16355: 6.018.002c tāmrāḥ pītāḥ sitāḥ śvetāḥ prakīrṇā ghorakarmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16357: 6.018.003c pṛthivyāṃ cānukṛṣyante haro nāmaiṣa yūthapaḥ 6.018.004a yaṃ pṛṣṭhato 'nugacchanti śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16360: 6.018.005c ākāṅkṣate tvāṃ saṃgrāme jetuṃ parapuraṃjaya 6.018.006a nīlān iva mahāmeghāṃs tiṣṭhato yāṃs tu paśyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:16363: 6.018.007c asaṃkhyeyān anirdeśyān paraṃ pāram ivodadheḥ 6.018.008a parvateṣu ca ye ke cid viṣameṣu nadīṣu ca 6.018.008c ete tvām abhivartante rājann ṛṣkāḥ sudāruṇāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16364: 6.018.009a eṣāṃ madhye sthito rājan bhīmākṣo bhīmadarśanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16365: 6.018.009c parjanya iva jīmūtaiḥ samantāt parivāritaḥ 6.018.010a ṛkṣavantaṃ giriśreṣṭham adhyāste narmadāṃ piban 6.018.010c sarvarkṣāṇām adhipatir dhūmro nāmaiṣa yūthapaḥ 6.018.011a yavīyān asya tu bhrātā paśyainaṃ parvatopamam
GE09ram_1-7u:16366: 6.018.011c bhrātrā samāno rūpeṇa viśiṣṭas tu parākrame
GE09ram_1-7u:16367: 6.018.012a sa eṣa jāmbavān nāma mahāyūthapayūthapaḥ 6.018.012c praśānto guruvartī ca saṃprahāreṣv amarṣaṇaḥ 6.018.013a etena sāhyaṃ sumahat kṛtaṃ śakrasya dhīmatā
GE09ram_1-7u:16368: 6.018.013c devāsure jāmbavatā labdhāś ca bahavo varāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16370: 6.018.014c muñcanti vipulākārā na mṛtyor udvijanti ca
GE09ram_1-7u:16371: 6.018.015a rākṣasānāṃ ca sadṛśāḥ piśācānāṃ ca romaśāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16372: 6.018.015c etasya sainye bahavo vicaranty agnitejasaḥ 6.018.016a yaṃ tv enam abhisaṃrabdhaṃ plavamānam iva sthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:16373: 6.018.016c prekṣante vānarāḥ sarve sthitaṃ yūthapayūthapam 6.018.017a eṣa rājan sahasrākṣaṃ paryupāste harīśvaraḥ 6.018.017c balena balasaṃpanno rambho nāmaiṣa yūthapaḥ 6.018.018a yaḥ sthitaṃ yojane śailaṃ gacchan pārśvena sevate
GE09ram_1-7u:16374: 6.018.018c ūrdhvaṃ tathaiva kāyena gataḥ prāpnoti yojanam
GE09ram_1-7u:16375: 6.018.019a yasmān na paramaṃ rūpaṃ catuṣpādeṣu vidyate
GE09ram_1-7u:16376: 6.018.019c śrutaḥ saṃnādano nāma vānarāṇāṃ pitāmahaḥ 6.018.020a yena yuddhaṃ tadā dattaṃ raṇe śakrasya dhīmatā
GE09ram_1-7u:16377: 6.018.020c parājayaś ca na prāptaḥ so 'yaṃ yūthapayūthapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16380: 6.018.021c purā devāsure yuddhe sāhyārthaṃ tridivaukasām 6.018.022a yasya vaiśravaṇo rājā jambūm upaniṣevate 6.018.022c yo rājā parvatendrāṇāṃ bahukiṃnarasevinām
GE09ram_1-7u:16381: 6.018.023a vihārasukhado nityaṃ bhrātus te rākṣasādhipa 6.018.023c tatraiṣa vasati śrīmān balavān vānararṣabhaḥ 6.018.023e yuddheṣv akatthano nityaṃ krathano nāma yūthapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16384: 6.018.025a yo gaṅgām anu paryeti trāsayan hastiyūthapān
GE09ram_1-7u:16385: 6.018.025c hastināṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca pūrvavairam anusmaran 6.018.026a eṣa yūthapatir netā gacchan giriguhāśayaḥ 6.018.026c harīṇāṃ vāhinī mukhyo nadīṃ haimavatīm anu
GE09ram_1-7u:16386: 6.018.027a uśīra bījam āśritya parvataṃ mandaropamam 6.018.027c ramate vānaraśreṣṭho divi śakra iva svayam
GE09ram_1-7u:16388: 6.018.028c eṣa durmarṣaṇo rājan pramāthī nāma yūthapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16389: 6.018.029a vātenevoddhataṃ meghaṃ yam enam anupaśyasi 6.018.029c vivartamānaṃ bahuśo yatraitad bahulaṃ rajaḥ 6.018.030a ete 'sitamukhā ghorā golāṅgūlā mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16390: 6.018.030c śataṃ śatasahasrāṇi dṛṣṭvā vai setubandhanam 6.018.031a golāṅgūlaṃ mahāvegaṃ gavākṣaṃ nāma yūthapam 6.018.031c parivāryābhivartante laṅkāṃ marditum ojasā
GE09ram_1-7u:16393: 6.018.033a yasya bhāsā sadā bhānti tadvarṇā mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16394: 6.018.033c yasya prasthaṃ mahātmāno na tyajanti maharṣayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16395: 6.018.034a tatraiṣa ramate rājan ramye kāñcanaparvate 6.018.034c mukhyo vānaramukhyānāṃ kesarī nāma yūthapaḥ 6.018.035a ṣaṣṭir girisahasrāṇāṃ ramyāḥ kāñcanaparvatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16396: 6.018.035c teṣāṃ madhye girivaras tvam ivānagha rakṣasām
GE09ram_1-7u:16397: 6.018.036a tatraite kapilāḥ śvetās tāmrāsyā madhupiṅgalāḥ 6.018.036c nivasanty uttamagirau
GE09ram_1-7u:16398: 6.018.037a siṃha iva caturdaṃṣṭrā vyāghrā iva durāsadāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16400: 6.018.038a sudīrghāñcitalāṅgūlā mattamātaṃgasaṃnibhāḥ 6.018.038c mahāparvatasaṃkāśā mahājīmūtanisvanāḥ 6.018.039a eṣa caiṣām adhipatir madhye tiṣṭhati vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:16401: 6.018.039c nāmnā pṛthivyāṃ vikhyāto rājañ śatabalīti yaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16403: 6.018.040a gajo gavākṣo gavayo nalo nīlaś ca vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16404: 6.018.040c ekaika eva yūthānāṃ koṭibhir daśabhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16406: 6.018.041c na śakyante bahutvāt tu saṃkhyātuṃ laghuvikramāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16407: 6.018.042a sarve mahārāja mahāprabhāvāḥ; sarve mahāśailanikāśakāyāḥ 6.018.042c sarve samarthāḥ pṛthivīṃ kṣaṇena; kartuṃ pravidhvastavikīrṇaśailām 6.019.001a sāraṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā rāvaṇaṃ rākṣasādhipam 6.019.001c balam ālokayan sarvaṃ śuko vākyam athābravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:16408: 6.019.002a sthitān paśyasi yān etān mattān iva mahādvipān
GE09ram_1-7u:16409: 6.019.002c nyagrodhān iva gāṅgeyān sālān haimavatīn iva
GE09ram_1-7u:16410: 6.019.003a ete duṣprasahā rājan balinaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ 6.019.003c daityadānavasaṃkāśā yuddhe
GE09ram_1-7u:16411: 6.019.004a eṣāṃ koṭisahasrāṇi nava pañcaca sapta ca
GE09ram_1-7u:16412: 6.019.004c tathā śaṅkhasahasrāṇi tathā vṛndaśatāni ca 6.019.005a ete sugrīvasacivāḥ kiṣkindhānilayāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16414: 6.019.006a yau tau paśyasi tiṣṭhantau kumārau devarūpiṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:16415: 6.019.006c maindaś ca dvividaś cobhau tābhyāṃ nāsti samo yudhi 6.019.007a brahmaṇā samanujñātāv amṛtaprāśināv ubhau
GE09ram_1-7u:16416: 6.019.007c āśaṃsete yudhā laṅkām etau marditum ojasā
GE09ram_1-7u:16417: 6.019.008a yāv etāv etayoḥ pārśve sthitau parvatasaṃnibhau
GE09ram_1-7u:16418: 6.019.008c sumukho vimukhaś caiva mṛtyuputrau pituḥ samau
GE09ram_1-7u:16419: 6.019.009a yaṃ tu paśyasi tiṣṭhantaṃ prabhinnam iva kuñjaram
GE09ram_1-7u:16420: 6.019.009c yo balāt kṣobhayet kruddhaḥ samudram api vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16421: 6.019.010a eṣo 'bhigantā laṅkāyā vaidehyās tava ca prabho 6.019.010c enaṃ paśya purā dṛṣṭaṃ vānaraṃ punar āgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:16422: 6.019.011a jyeṣṭhaḥ kesariṇaḥ putro vātātmaja iti śrutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16423: 6.019.011c hanūmān iti vikhyāto laṅghito yena sāgaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16425: 6.019.012c anivāryagatiś caiva yathā satatagaḥ prabhuḥ 6.019.013a udyantaṃ bhāskaraṃ dṛṣṭvā bālaḥ kila pipāsitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16426: 6.019.013c triyojanasahasraṃ tu adhvānam avatīrya hi 6.019.014a ādityam āhariṣyāmi na me kṣut pratiyāsyati
GE09ram_1-7u:16427: 6.019.014c iti saṃcintya manasā puraiṣa baladarpitaḥ 6.019.015a anādhṛṣyatamaṃ devam api
GE09ram_1-7u:16429: 6.019.016a patitasya kaper asya hanur ekā śilātale
GE09ram_1-7u:16430: 6.019.016c kiṃ cid bhinnā dṛḍhahanor hanūmān eṣa tena vai 6.019.017a satyam āgamayogena mamaiṣa vidito hariḥ 6.019.017c nāsya śakyaṃ balaṃ rūpaṃ prabhāvo vānubhāṣitum
GE09ram_1-7u:16431: 6.019.018a eṣa āśaṃsate laṅkām eko marditum ojasā
GE09ram_1-7u:16433: 6.019.019a ikṣvākūṇām atiratho loke vikhyāta pauruṣaḥ 6.019.019c yasmin na calate dharmo yo dharmaṃ nātivartate
GE09ram_1-7u:16434: 6.019.020a yo brāhmam astraṃ vedāṃś ca veda vedavidāṃ varaḥ 6.019.020c yo bhindyād gaganaṃ bāṇaiḥ parvatāṃś cāpi dārayet
GE09ram_1-7u:16435: 6.019.021a yasya mṛtyor iva krodhaḥ śakrasyeva parākramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16436: 6.019.021c sa eṣa rāmas tvāṃ yoddhuṃ rājan samabhivartate
GE09ram_1-7u:16437: 6.019.022a yaś caiṣa dakṣiṇe pārśve śuddhajāmbūnadaprabhaḥ 6.019.022c viśālavakṣās tāmrākṣo
GE09ram_1-7u:16438: 6.019.023a eṣo 'sya lakṣmaṇo nāma bhrātā prāṇasamaḥ priyaḥ 6.019.023c naye yuddhe ca kuśalaḥ sarvaśāstraviśāradaḥ 6.019.024a amarṣī durjayo jetā vikrānto buddhimān balī
GE09ram_1-7u:16439: 6.019.024c rāmasya dakṣiṇo bāhur nityaṃ prāṇo bahiścaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16440: 6.019.025a na hy eṣa rāghavasyārthe jīvitaṃ parirakṣati
GE09ram_1-7u:16442: 6.019.026a yas tu savyam asau pakṣaṃ rāmasyāśritya tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_1-7u:16443: 6.019.026c rakṣogaṇaparikṣipto rājā hy eṣa vibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.019.027a śrīmatā rājarājena laṅkāyām
GE09ram_1-7u:16445: 6.019.028a yaṃ tu paśyasi tiṣṭhantaṃ madhye girim ivācalam
GE09ram_1-7u:16447: 6.019.029a tejasā yaśasā buddhyā jñānenābhijanena ca 6.019.029c yaḥ kapīn ati babhrāja himavān iva parvatān
GE09ram_1-7u:16448: 6.019.030a kiṣkindhāṃ yaḥ samadhyāste guhāṃ sagahanadrumām 6.019.030c durgāṃ parvatadurgasthāṃ pradhānaiḥ saha yūthapaiḥ 6.019.031a yasyaiṣā kāñcanī mālā śobhate śatapuṣkarā 6.019.031c kāntā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ yasyāṃ lakṣmīḥ pratiṣṭhitā 6.019.032a etāṃ ca mālāṃ tārāṃ ca kapirājyaṃ ca śāśvatam 6.019.032c sugrīvo vālinaṃ hatvā rāmeṇa pratipāditaḥ 6.019.033a evaṃ koṭisahasreṇa śaṅkūnāṃ ca śatena ca
GE09ram_1-7u:16449: 6.019.033c sugrīvo vānarendras tvāṃ yuddhārtham abhivartate 6.019.034a imāṃ mahārājasamīkṣya vāhinīm; upasthitāṃ prajvalitagrahopamām 6.019.034c tataḥ prayatnaḥ paramo vidhīyatāṃ; yathā jayaḥ syān na paraiḥ parājayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16450: 6.020.001a śukena tu samākhyātāṃs tān dṛṣṭvā hariyūthapān
GE09ram_1-7u:16451: 6.020.001c samīpasthaṃ ca rāmasya bhrātaraṃ svaṃ vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:16452: 6.020.002a lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahāvīryaṃ bhujaṃ rāmasya dakṣiṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:16454: 6.020.003a kiṃ cid āvignahṛdayo jātakrodhaś ca rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16455: 6.020.003c bhartsayām āsa tau vīrau kathānte śukasāraṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:16456: 6.020.004a adhomukhau tau praṇatāv abravīc chukasāraṇau 6.020.004c roṣagadgadayā vācā saṃrabdhaḥ paruṣaṃ vacaḥ 6.020.005a na tāvat sadṛśaṃ nāma sacivair upajīvibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16457: 6.020.005c vipriyaṃ nṛpater vaktuṃ nigrahapragrahe vibhoḥ 6.020.006a ripūṇāṃ pratikūlānāṃ yuddhārtham abhivartatām
GE09ram_1-7u:16458: 6.020.006c ubhābhyāṃ sadṛśaṃ nāma vaktum aprastave stavam
GE09ram_1-7u:16459: 6.020.007a ācāryā guravo vṛddhā vṛthā vāṃ paryupāsitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16460: 6.020.007c sāraṃ yad rājaśāstrāṇām anujīvyaṃ na gṛhyate
GE09ram_1-7u:16461: 6.020.008a gṛhīto vā na vijñāto bhāro jñānasya vochyate
GE09ram_1-7u:16462: 6.020.008c īdṛśaiḥ sacivair yukto mūrkhair diṣṭyā dharāmy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:16463: 6.020.009a kiṃ nu mṛtyor bhayaṃ nāsti māṃ vaktuṃ paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16464: 6.020.009c yasya me śāsato jihvā prayacchati śubhāśubham
GE09ram_1-7u:16465: 6.020.010a apy eva dahanaṃ spṛṣṭvā vane tiṣṭhanti pādapāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16467: 6.020.011a hanyām aham imau pāpau śatrupakṣapraśaṃsakau 6.020.011c yadi pūrvopakārair me na krodho mṛdutāṃ vrajet
GE09ram_1-7u:16468: 6.020.012a apadhvaṃsata gacchadhvaṃ saṃnikarṣād ito mama 6.020.012c na hi vāṃ hantum icchāmi smarann upakṛtāni vām 6.020.012e hatāv eva kṛtaghnau tau mayi snehaparāṅmukhau
GE09ram_1-7u:16469: 6.020.013a evam uktau tu savrīḍau tāv ubhau śukasāraṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:16471: 6.020.014a abravīt sa daśagrīvaḥ samīpasthaṃ mahodaram 6.020.014c upasthāpaya śīghraṃ me cārān nītiviśāradān 6.020.015a tataś carāḥ saṃtvaritāḥ prāptāḥ pārthivaśāsanāt 6.020.015c upasthitāḥ prāñjalayo vardhayitvā jayāśiṣā
GE09ram_1-7u:16472: 6.020.016a tān abravīt tato vākyaṃ rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16473: 6.020.016c cārān pratyayikāñ śūrān bhaktān vigatasādhvasān 6.020.017a ito gacchata rāmasya vyavasāyaṃ parīkṣatha 6.020.017c mantreṣv abhyantarā ye 'sya prītyā tena samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16474: 6.020.018a kathaṃ svapiti jāgarti kim anyac ca kariṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:16475: 6.020.018c vijñāya nipuṇaṃ sarvam āgantavyam aśeṣataḥ 6.020.019a cāreṇa viditaḥ śatruḥ paṇḍitair vasudhādhipaiḥ 6.020.019c yuddhe svalpena yatnena samāsādya nirasyate 6.020.020a cārās tu te tathety uktvā prahṛṣṭā rākṣaseśvaram
GE09ram_1-7u:16476: 6.020.020c kṛtvā pradakṣiṇaṃ jagmur yatra rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16477: 6.020.021a te suvelasya śailasya samīpe rāmalakṣmaṇau 6.020.021c pracchannā dadṛśur gatvā
GE09ram_1-7u:16478: 6.020.022a te tu dharmātmanā dṛṣṭā rākṣasendreṇa rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16480: 6.020.023a vānarair arditās te tu vikrāntair laghuvikramaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16481: 6.020.023c punar laṅkām anuprāptāḥ śvasanto naṣṭacetasaḥ 6.020.024a tato daśagrīvam upasthitās te; cārā bahirnityacarā niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16482: 6.020.024c gireḥ suvelasya samīpavāsinaṃ; nyavedayan bhīmabalaṃ mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16483: 6.021.001a tatas tam akṣobhya balaṃ laṅkādhipataye carāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16484: 6.021.001c suvele rāghavaṃ śaile niviṣṭaṃ pratyavedayan 6.021.002a cārāṇāṃ rāvaṇaḥ śrutvā prāptaṃ rāmaṃ mahābalam
GE09ram_1-7u:16485: 6.021.002c jātodvego 'bhavat kiṃ cic chārdūlaṃ vākyam abravīt 6.021.003a ayathāvac ca te varṇo dīnaś cāsi niśācara
GE09ram_1-7u:16486: 6.021.003c nāsi kaccid amitrāṇāṃ kruddhānāṃ vaśam āgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16487: 6.021.004a iti tenānuśiṣṭas tu vācaṃ mandam udīrayat
GE09ram_1-7u:16489: 6.021.005a na te cārayituṃ śakyā rājan vānarapuṃgavāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16490: 6.021.005c vikrāntā balavantaś ca rāghaveṇa ca rakṣitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16491: 6.021.006a nāpi saṃbhāṣituṃ śakyāḥ saṃpraśno 'tra na labhyate 6.021.006c sarvato rakṣyate panthā vānaraiḥ parvatopamaiḥ 6.021.007a praviṣṭamātre jñāto 'haṃ bale tasminn acārite
GE09ram_1-7u:16492: 6.021.007c balād gṛhīto bahubhir bahudhāsmi vidāritaḥ 6.021.008a jānubhir muṣṭibhir dantais talaiś cābhihato bhṛśam
GE09ram_1-7u:16496: 6.021.010a haribhir vadhyamānaś ca yācamānaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ 6.021.010c rāghaveṇa paritrāto jīvāmi ha yadṛcchayā 6.021.011a eṣa śailaiḥ śilābhiś ca pūrayitvā mahārṇavam
GE09ram_1-7u:16497: 6.021.011c dvāram āśritya laṅkāyā rāmas tiṣṭhati sāyudhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16498: 6.021.012a garuḍavyūham āsthāya sarvato haribhir vṛtaḥ 6.021.012c māṃ visṛjya mahātejā laṅkām evābhivartate 6.021.013a purā prākāram āyāti kṣipram ekataraṃ kuru
GE09ram_1-7u:16499: 6.021.013c sītāṃ cāsmai prayacchāśu suyuddhaṃ vā pradīyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:16500: 6.021.014a manasā saṃtatāpātha tac chrutvā rākṣasādhipaḥ 6.021.014c śārdūlasya mahad vākyam athovāca sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16502: 6.021.015c naiva sītāṃ pradāsyāmi sarvalokabhayād api 6.021.016a evam uktvā mahātejā rāvaṇaḥ punar abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:16503: 6.021.016c cāritā bhavatā senā ke 'tra śūrāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ 6.021.017a kīdṛśāḥ kiṃprabhāvāś ca vānarā ye durāsadāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16504: 6.021.017c kasya putrāś ca pautrāś ca tattvam ākhyāhi rākṣasa 6.021.018a tatr atra pratipatsyāmi jñātvā teṣāṃ balābalam
GE09ram_1-7u:16505: 6.021.018c avaśyaṃ balasaṃkhyānaṃ kartavyaṃ yuddham icchatā 6.021.019a athaivam uktaḥ śārdūlo rāvaṇenottamaś caraḥ 6.021.019c idaṃ vacanam ārebhe vaktuṃ rāvaṇasaṃnidhau 6.021.020a atharkṣarajasaḥ putro yudhi rājan sudurjayaḥ 6.021.020c gadgadasyātha putro 'tra jāmbavān iti viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16506: 6.021.021a gadgadasyaiva putro 'nyo guruputraḥ śatakratoḥ 6.021.021c kadanaṃ yasya putreṇa kṛtam ekena rakṣasām
GE09ram_1-7u:16507: 6.021.022a suṣeṇaś cāpi dharmātmā putro dharmasya vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:16508: 6.021.022c saumyaḥ somātmajaś cātra rājan dadhimukhaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16509: 6.021.023a sumukho durmukhaś cātra vegadarśī ca vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16510: 6.021.023c mṛtyur vānararūpeṇa nūnaṃ sṛṣṭaḥ svayambhuvā 6.021.024a putro hutavahasyātha nīlaḥ senāpatiḥ svayam 6.021.024c anilasya ca putro 'tra hanūmān iti viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16511: 6.021.025a naptā śakrasya durdharṣo balavān aṅgado yuvā
GE09ram_1-7u:16512: 6.021.025c maindaś ca dvividaś cobhau balināv aśvisaṃbhavau
GE09ram_1-7u:16514: 6.021.026c gajo gavākṣo gavayaḥ śarabho gandhamādanaḥ 6.021.027a śveto jyotirmukhaś cātra
GE09ram_1-7u:16515: 6.021.027c varuṇasya ca putro 'tha hemakūṭaḥ plavaṃgamaḥ 6.021.028a viśvakarmasuto vīro nalaḥ plavagasattamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16516: 6.021.028c vikrānto vegavān atra vasuputraḥ sudurdharaḥ 6.021.029a daśavānarakoṭyaś ca śūrāṇāṃ yuddhakāṅkṣiṇām
GE09ram_1-7u:16517: 6.021.029c śrīmatāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ śeṣān nākhyātum utsahe 6.021.030a putro daśarathasyaiṣa siṃhasaṃhanano yuvā
GE09ram_1-7u:16518: 6.021.030c dūṣaṇo nihato yena kharaś ca triśirās tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:16519: 6.021.031a nāsti rāmasya sadṛśo vikrame bhuvi kaś cana
GE09ram_1-7u:16520: 6.021.031c virādho nihato yena kabandhaś cāntakopamaḥ 6.021.032a vaktuṃ na śakto rāmasya naraḥ kaś cid guṇān kṣitau
GE09ram_1-7u:16521: 6.021.032c janasthānagatā yena tāvanto rākṣasā hatāḥ 6.021.033a lakṣmaṇaś cātra dharmātmā mātaṃgānām ivarṣabhaḥ 6.021.033c yasya bāṇapathaṃ prāpya na jīved api vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16522: 6.021.034a rākṣasānāṃ variṣṭhaś ca tava bhrātā vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16523: 6.021.034c parigṛhya purīṃ laṅkāṃ rāghavasya hite rataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16524: 6.021.035a iti sarvaṃ samākhyātaṃ tavedaṃ vānaraṃ balam
GE09ram_1-7u:16526: 6.022.001a tatas tam akṣobhyabalaṃ laṅkāyāṃ nṛpateś caraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16527: 6.022.001c suvele rāghavaṃ śaile niviṣṭaṃ pratyavedayan 6.022.002a cārāṇāṃ rāvaṇaḥ śrutvā prāptaṃ rāmaṃ mahābalam
GE09ram_1-7u:16528: 6.022.002c jātodvego 'bhavat kiṃ cit sacivāṃś cedam abravīt 6.022.003a mantriṇaḥ śīghram āyāntu sarve vai susamāhitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16529: 6.022.003c ayaṃ no mantrakālo hi saṃprāpta iva rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16530: 6.022.004a tasya tac chāsanaṃ śrutvā mantriṇo 'bhyāgaman drutam
GE09ram_1-7u:16531: 6.022.004c tataḥ saṃmantrayām āsa sacivai rākṣasaiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:16532: 6.022.005a mantrayitvā sa durdharṣaḥ kṣamaṃ yat samanantaram
GE09ram_1-7u:16533: 6.022.005c visarjayitvā sacivān praviveśa svam ālayam 6.022.006a tato rākṣasam āhūya vidyujjihvaṃ mahābalam 6.022.006c māyāvidaṃ mahāmāyaḥ prāviśad yatra maithilī 6.022.007a vidyujjihvaṃ ca māyājñam abravīd rākṣasādhipaḥ 6.022.007c mohayiṣyāmahe sītāṃ māyayā janakātmajām
GE09ram_1-7u:16534: 6.022.008a śiro māyāmayaṃ gṛhya rāghavasya niśācara 6.022.008c māṃ tvaṃ samupatiṣṭhasva mahac ca saśaraṃ dhanuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16535: 6.022.009a evam uktas tathety āha vidyujjihvo niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16536: 6.022.009c tasya tuṣṭo 'bhavad rājā pradadau ca vibhūṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:16538: 6.022.010c tato dīnām adainyārhāṃ dadarśa dhanadānujaḥ 6.022.010e adhomukhīṃ śokaparām upaviṣṭāṃ mahītale
GE09ram_1-7u:16539: 6.022.011a bhartāram eva dhyāyantīm aśokavanikāṃ gatām 6.022.011c upāsyamānāṃ ghorābhī rākṣasībhir adūrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16540: 6.022.012a upasṛtya tataḥ sītāṃ praharṣan nāma kīrtayan
GE09ram_1-7u:16541: 6.022.012c idaṃ ca vacanaṃ dhṛṣṭam uvāca janakātmajām
GE09ram_1-7u:16542: 6.022.013a sāntvyamānā mayā bhadre yam upāśritya valgase
GE09ram_1-7u:16543: 6.022.013c khara hantā sa te bhartā rāghavaḥ samare hataḥ 6.022.014a chinnaṃ te sarvato mūlaṃ darpas te nihato mayā 6.022.014c vyasanenātmanaḥ sīte mama bhāryā bhaviṣyasi 6.022.015a alpapuṇye nivṛttārthe mūḍhe paṇḍitamānini
GE09ram_1-7u:16544: 6.022.015c śṛṇu bhartṛbadhaṃ sīte ghoraṃ vṛtravadhaṃ yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:16545: 6.022.016a samāyātaḥ samudrāntaṃ māṃ hantuṃ kila rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16547: 6.022.017a saṃniviṣṭaḥ samudrasya tīram āsādya dakṣiṇam 6.022.017c balena mahatā rāmo vrajaty astaṃ divākare
GE09ram_1-7u:16548: 6.022.018a athādhvani pariśrāntam ardharātre sthitaṃ balam 6.022.018c sukhasuptaṃ samāsādya cāritaṃ prathamaṃ caraiḥ 6.022.019a tat prahastapraṇītena balena mahatā mama 6.022.019c balam asya hataṃ rātrau yatra rāmaḥ sulakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16549: 6.022.020a paṭṭasān parighān khaḍgāṃś cakrān daṇḍān mahāyasān
GE09ram_1-7u:16551: 6.022.021a yaṣṭīś ca tomarān prāsaṃś cakrāṇi musalāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:16553: 6.022.022a atha suptasya rāmasya prahastena pramāthinā 6.022.022c asaktaṃ kṛtahastena śiraś chinnaṃ mahāsinā 6.022.023a vibhīṣaṇaḥ samutpatya nigṛhīto yadṛcchayā
GE09ram_1-7u:16554: 6.022.023c diśaḥ pravrājitaḥ sarvair lakṣmaṇaḥ plavagaiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:16555: 6.022.024a sugrīvo grīvayā śete bhagnayā plavagādhipaḥ 6.022.024c nirastahanukaḥ śete hanūmān rākṣasair hataḥ 6.022.025a jāmbavān atha jānubhyām utpatan nihato yudhi
GE09ram_1-7u:16556: 6.022.025c paṭṭasair bahubhiś chinno nikṛttaḥ pādapo yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:16557: 6.022.026a maindaś ca dvividaś cobhau nihatau vānararṣabhau
GE09ram_1-7u:16558: 6.022.026c niḥśvasantau rudantau ca rudhireṇa samukṣitau 6.022.027a asinābhyāhataś chinno madhye ripuniṣūdanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16559: 6.022.027c abhiṣṭanati medinyāṃ panasaḥ panaso yathā 6.022.028a nārācair bahubhiś chinnaḥ śete daryāṃ darīmukhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16560: 6.022.028c kumudas tu mahātejā niṣkūjan sāyakair hataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16561: 6.022.029a aṅgado bahubhiś chinnaḥ śarair āsādya rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16563: 6.022.030a harayo mathitā nāgai rathajālais tathāpare 6.022.030c śāyitā mṛditās tatra vāyuvegair ivāmbudāḥ 6.022.031a pradrutāś ca pare trastā hanyamānā jaghanyataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16564: 6.022.031c abhidrutās tu rakṣobhiḥ siṃhair iva mahādvipāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16565: 6.022.032a sāgare patitāḥ ke cit ke cid gaganam āśritāḥ 6.022.032c ṛkṣā vṛkṣān upārūḍhā vānarais tu vimiśritāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16566: 6.022.033a sāgarasya ca tīreṣu śaileṣu ca vaneṣu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:16567: 6.022.033c piṅgākṣās te virūpākṣair bahubhir bahavo hatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16568: 6.022.034a evaṃ tava hato bhartā sasainyo mama senayā
GE09ram_1-7u:16569: 6.022.034c kṣatajārdraṃ rajodhvastam idaṃ cāsyāhṛtaṃ śiraḥ 6.022.035a tataḥ paramadurdharṣo rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16570: 6.022.035c sītāyām upaśṛṇvantyāṃ rākṣasīm idam abravīt 6.022.036a rākṣasaṃ krūrakarmāṇaṃ vidyujjihvaṃ tvam ānaya 6.022.036c yena tad rāghavaśiraḥ saṃgrāmāt svayam āhṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:16571: 6.022.037a vidyujjihvas tato gṛhya śiras tat saśarāsanam
GE09ram_1-7u:16572: 6.022.037c praṇāmaṃ śirasā kṛtvā rāvaṇasyāgrataḥ sthitaḥ 6.022.038a tam abravīt tato rājā rāvaṇo rākṣasaṃ sthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:16574: 6.022.039a agrataḥ kuru sītāyāḥ śīghraṃ dāśaratheḥ śiraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16575: 6.022.039c avasthāṃ paścimāṃ bhartuḥ kṛpaṇā sādhu paśyatu
GE09ram_1-7u:16576: 6.022.040a evam uktaṃ tu tad rakṣaḥ śiras tat priyadarśanam 6.022.040c upanikṣipya sītāyāḥ kṣipram antaradhīyata
GE09ram_1-7u:16577: 6.022.041a rāvaṇaś cāpi cikṣepa bhāsvaraṃ kārmukaṃ mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:16578: 6.022.041c triṣu lokeṣu vikhyātaṃ sītām idam uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:16579: 6.022.042a idaṃ tat tava rāmasya kārmukaṃ jyāsamanvitam
GE09ram_1-7u:16580: 6.022.042c iha prahastenānītaṃ hatvā taṃ niśi mānuṣam
GE09ram_1-7u:16581: 6.022.043a sa vidyujjihvena sahaiva tac chiro; dhanuś ca bhūmau vinikīrya rāvaṇaḥ 6.022.043c videharājasya sutāṃ yaśasvinīṃ; tato 'bravīt tāṃ bhava me
GE09ram_1-7u:16583: 6.023.001a sā sītā tac chiro dṛṣṭvā tac ca kārmukam uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:16585: 6.023.002a nayane mukhavarṇaṃ ca bhartus tat sadṛśaṃ mukham
GE09ram_1-7u:16586: 6.023.002c keśān keśāntadeśaṃ ca taṃ ca cūḍāmaṇiṃ śubham
GE09ram_1-7u:16587: 6.023.003a etaiḥ sarvair abhijñānair abhijñāya suduḥkhitā 6.023.003c vijagarhe 'tha kaikeyīṃ krośantī kurarī yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:16589: 6.023.004c kulam utsāditaṃ sarvaṃ tvayā kalahaśīlayā 6.023.005a āryeṇa kiṃ nu kaikeyyāḥ kṛtaṃ rāmeṇa vipriyam
GE09ram_1-7u:16590: 6.023.005c yad gṛhāc cīravasanas tayā prasthāpito vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:16591: 6.023.006a evam uktvā tu vaidehī vepamānā tapasvinī
GE09ram_1-7u:16592: 6.023.006c jagāma jagatīṃ bālā chinnā tu kadalī yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:16593: 6.023.007a sā muhūrtāt samāśvasya pratilabhya ca cetanām
GE09ram_1-7u:16595: 6.023.008a hā hatāsmi mahābāho vīravratam anuvratā 6.023.008c imāṃ te paścimāvasthāṃ gatāsmi vidhavā kṛtā
GE09ram_1-7u:16596: 6.023.009a prathamaṃ maraṇaṃ nāryā bhartur vaiguṇyam ucyate
GE09ram_1-7u:16597: 6.023.009c suvṛttaḥ sādhuvṛttāyāḥ saṃvṛttas tvaṃ mamāgrataḥ 6.023.010a duḥkhād duḥkhaṃ prapannāyā magnāyāḥ śokasāgare 6.023.010c yo hi mām udyatas trātuṃ so 'pi tvaṃ vinipātitaḥ 6.023.011a sā śvaśrūr mama kausalyā tvayā putreṇa rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:16598: 6.023.011c vatseneva yathā dhenur vivatsā vatsalā kṛtā
GE09ram_1-7u:16599: 6.023.012a ādiṣṭaṃ dīrgham āyus te yair acintyaparākrama
GE09ram_1-7u:16600: 6.023.012c anṛtaṃ vacanaṃ teṣām alpāyur asi rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:16601: 6.023.013a atha vā naśyati prajñā prājñasyāpi satas tava
GE09ram_1-7u:16602: 6.023.013c pacaty enaṃ tathā kālo bhūtānāṃ prabhavo hy ayam 6.023.014a adṛṣṭaṃ mṛtyum āpannaḥ kasmāt tvaṃ nayaśāstravit
GE09ram_1-7u:16603: 6.023.014c vyasanānām upāyajñaḥ kuśalo hy asi varjane
GE09ram_1-7u:16606: 6.023.016a upaśeṣe mahābāho māṃ vihāya tapasvinīm 6.023.016c priyām iva śubhāṃ nārīṃ pṛthivīṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:16607: 6.023.017a arcitaṃ satataṃ yatnād gandhamālyair mayā tava
GE09ram_1-7u:16608: 6.023.017c idaṃ te matpriyaṃ vīra dhanuḥ kāñcanabhūṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:16609: 6.023.018a pitrā daśarathena tvaṃ śvaśureṇa mamānagha 6.023.018c pūrvaiś ca pitṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ nūnaṃ svarge samāgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16610: 6.023.019a divi nakṣatrabhūtas tvaṃ mahat karma kṛtaṃ priyam
GE09ram_1-7u:16611: 6.023.019c puṇyaṃ rājarṣivaṃśaṃ tvam ātmanaḥ samupekṣase 6.023.020a kiṃ mān na prekṣase rājan kiṃ māṃ na pratibhāṣase
GE09ram_1-7u:16612: 6.023.020c bālāṃ bālena saṃprāptāṃ bhāryāṃ māṃ sahacāriṇīm
GE09ram_1-7u:16613: 6.023.021a saṃśrutaṃ gṛhṇatā pāṇiṃ cariṣyāmīti yat tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:16614: 6.023.021c smara tan mama kākutstha naya mām api duḥkhitām 6.023.022a kasmān mām apahāya tvaṃ gato gatimatāṃ vara
GE09ram_1-7u:16615: 6.023.022c asmāl lokād amuṃ lokaṃ tyaktvā mām iha duḥkhitām 6.023.023a kalyāṇair ucitaṃ yat tat pariṣvaktaṃ mayaiva tu
GE09ram_1-7u:16616: 6.023.023c kravyādais tac charīraṃ te nūnaṃ viparikṛṣyate
GE09ram_1-7u:16618: 6.023.024c agnihotreṇa saṃskāraṃ kena tvaṃ tu na lapsyase
GE09ram_1-7u:16619: 6.023.025a pravrajyām upapannānāṃ trayāṇām ekam āgatam 6.023.025c pariprakṣyati kausalyā lakṣmaṇaṃ śokalālasā
GE09ram_1-7u:16620: 6.023.026a sa tasyāḥ paripṛcchantyā vadhaṃ mitrabalasya te
GE09ram_1-7u:16621: 6.023.026c tava cākhyāsyate nūnaṃ niśāyāṃ rākṣasair vadham
GE09ram_1-7u:16622: 6.023.027a sā tvāṃ suptaṃ hataṃ śrutvā māṃ ca rakṣogṛhaṃ gatām
GE09ram_1-7u:16623: 6.023.027c hṛdayena vidīrṇena na bhaviṣyati rāghava 6.023.028a sādhu pātaya māṃ kṣipraṃ rāmasyopari rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16624: 6.023.028c samānaya patiṃ patnyā kuru kalyāṇam uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:16625: 6.023.029a śirasā me śiraś cāsya kāyaṃ kāyena yojaya
GE09ram_1-7u:16627: 6.023.029e muhūrtam api necchāmi jīvituṃ pāpajīvinā 6.023.030a śrutaṃ mayā vedavidāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ pitur gṛhe
GE09ram_1-7u:16628: 6.023.030c yāsāṃ strīṇāṃ priyo bhartā tāsāṃ lokā mahodayāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16629: 6.023.031a kṣamā yasmin damas tyāgaḥ satyaṃ dharmaḥ kṛtajñatā
GE09ram_1-7u:16630: 6.023.031c ahiṃsā caiva bhūtānāṃ tam ṛte kā gatir mama 6.023.032a iti sā duḥkhasaṃtaptā
GE09ram_1-7u:16631: 6.023.032c bhartuḥ śiro dhanus tatra samīkṣya janakātmajā
GE09ram_1-7u:16632: 6.023.033a evaṃ lālapyamānāyāṃ sītāyāṃ tatra rākṣasaḥ 6.023.033c abhicakrāma bhartāram anīkasthaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16633: 6.023.034a vijayasvāryaputreti so 'bhivādya prasādya ca 6.023.034c nyavedayad anuprāptaṃ prahastaṃ vāhinīpatim
GE09ram_1-7u:16634: 6.023.035a amātyaiḥ sahitaḥ sarvaiḥ prahastaḥ samupasthitaḥ 6.023.035c kiṃ cid ātyayikaṃ kāryaṃ teṣāṃ tvaṃ darśanaṃ kuru 6.023.036a etac chrutvā daśagrīvo rākṣasaprativeditam
GE09ram_1-7u:16635: 6.023.036c aśokavanikāṃ tyaktvā mantriṇāṃ darśanaṃ yayau 6.023.037a sa tu sarvaṃ samarthyaiva mantribhiḥ kṛtyam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16636: 6.023.037c sabhāṃ praviśya vidadhe viditvā rāmavikramam 6.023.038a antardhānaṃ tu tac chīrṣaṃ tac ca kārmukam uttamam 6.023.038c jagāma rāvaṇasyaiva niryāṇasamanantaram
GE09ram_1-7u:16637: 6.023.039a rākṣasendras tu taiḥ sārdhaṃ mantribhir bhīmavikramaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16642: 6.023.041c samānayadhvaṃ sainyāni vaktavyaṃ ca na kāraṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:16643: 6.023.042a tatas tatheti pratigṛhya tad vaco; balādhipās te mahad ātmano balam 6.023.042c samānayaṃś caiva samāgataṃ ca te; nyavedayan bhartari yuddhakāṅkṣiṇi
GE09ram_1-7u:16644: 6.024.001a sītāṃ tu mohitāṃ dṛṣṭvā saramā nāma rākṣasī
GE09ram_1-7u:16645: 6.024.001c āsasādāśu vaidehīṃ priyāṃ praṇayinī sakhī 6.024.002a sā hi tatra kṛtā mitraṃ sītayā rakṣyamāṇayā
GE09ram_1-7u:16646: 6.024.002c rakṣantī rāvaṇād iṣṭā sānukrośā dṛḍhavratā 6.024.003a sā dadarśa sakhīṃ sītāṃ saramā naṣṭacetanām
GE09ram_1-7u:16647: 6.024.003c upāvṛtyotthitāṃ dhvastāṃ vaḍavām iva pāṃsuṣu 6.024.004a tāṃ samāśvāsayām āsa sakhī snehena suvratā
GE09ram_1-7u:16648: 6.024.004c uktā yad rāvaṇena tvaṃ pratyuktaṃ ca svayaṃ tvayā 6.024.005a sakhīsnehena tad bhīru mayā sarvaṃ pratiśrutam
GE09ram_1-7u:16649: 6.024.005c līnayā ganahe śūhye bhayam utsṛjya rāvaṇāt
GE09ram_1-7u:16650: 6.024.005e tava hetor viśālākṣi na hi me jīvitaṃ priyam 6.024.006a sa saṃbhrāntaś ca niṣkrānto yat kṛte rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16651: 6.024.006c tac ca me viditaṃ sarvam abhiniṣkramya maithili
GE09ram_1-7u:16652: 6.024.007a na śakyaṃ sauptikaṃ kartuṃ rāmasya viditātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16653: 6.024.007c vadhaś ca puruṣavyāghre tasminn evopapadyate 6.024.008a na caiva vānarā hantuṃ śakyāḥ pādapayodhinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16654: 6.024.008c surā devarṣabheṇeva rāmeṇa hi surakṣitāḥ 6.024.009a dīrghavṛttabhujaḥ śrīmān mahoraskaḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_1-7u:16655: 6.024.009c dhanvī saṃhananopeto dharmātmā bhuvi viśrutaḥ 6.024.010a vikrānto rakṣitā nityam ātmanaś ca parasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:16656: 6.024.010c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā kuśalī nayaśāstravit 6.024.011a hantā parabalaughānām
GE09ram_1-7u:16657: 6.024.011c na hato rāghavaḥ śrīmān sīte śatrunibarhaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16658: 6.024.012a ayuktabuddhikṛtyena sarvabhūtavirodhinā 6.024.012c iyaṃ prayuktā raudreṇa māyā māyāvidā tvayi
GE09ram_1-7u:16659: 6.024.013a śokas te vigataḥ sarvaḥ kalyāṇaṃ tvām upasthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:16660: 6.024.013c dhruvaṃ tvāṃ bhajate lakṣmīḥ priyaṃ prītikaraṃ śṛṇu
GE09ram_1-7u:16661: 6.024.014a uttīrya sāgaraṃ rāmaḥ saha vānarasenayā 6.024.014c saṃniviṣṭaḥ samudrasya tīram āsādya dakṣiṇam 6.024.015a dṛṣṭo me paripūrṇārthaḥ kākutsthaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ 6.024.015c sahitaiḥ sāgarāntasthair balais tiṣṭhati rakṣitaḥ 6.024.016a anena preṣitā ye ca rākṣasā laghuvikramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16662: 6.024.016c rāghavas tīrṇa ity evaṃ pravṛttis tair ihāhṛtā
GE09ram_1-7u:16663: 6.024.017a sa tāṃ śrutvā viśālākṣi pravṛttiṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16664: 6.024.017c eṣa mantrayate sarvaiḥ sacivaiḥ saha rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16665: 6.024.018a iti bruvāṇā saramā rākṣasī sītayā saha
GE09ram_1-7u:16666: 6.024.018c sarvodyogena sainyānāṃ śabdaṃ śuśrāva bhairavam 6.024.019a daṇḍanirghātavādinyāḥ śrutvā bheryā mahāsvanam
GE09ram_1-7u:16667: 6.024.019c uvāca saramā sītām idaṃ madhurabhāṣiṇī 6.024.020a saṃnāhajananī hy eṣā bhairavā bhīru bherikā
GE09ram_1-7u:16668: 6.024.020c bherīnādaṃ ca gambhīraṃ śṛṇu toyadanisvanam 6.024.021a kalpyante mattamātaṃgā yujyante rathavājinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16669: 6.024.021c tatra tatra ca saṃnaddhāḥ saṃpatanti padātayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16671: 6.024.022c vegavadbhir nadadbhiś ca toyaughair iva sāgaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16672: 6.024.023a śāstrāṇāṃ ca prasannānāṃ carmaṇāṃ varmaṇāṃ tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:16673: 6.024.023c rathavājigajānāṃ ca bhūṣitānāṃ ca rakṣasām 6.024.024a prabhāṃ visṛjatāṃ paśya nānāvarṇāṃ samutthitām 6.024.024c vanaṃ nirdahato dharme yathārūpaṃ vibhāvasoḥ 6.024.025a ghaṇṭānāṃ śṛṇu nirghoṣaṃ rathānāṃ śṛṇu nisvanam
GE09ram_1-7u:16674: 6.024.025c hayānāṃ heṣamāṇānāṃ śṛṇu tūryadhvaniṃ yathā 6.024.026a udyatāyudhahastānāṃ rākṣasendrānuyāyinām 6.024.026c saṃbhramo rakṣasām eṣa tumulo lomaharṣaṇaḥ 6.024.027a śrīs tvāṃ bhajati śokaghnī rakṣasāṃ bhayam āgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:16675: 6.024.027c rāmāt kamalapatrākṣi daityānām iva vāsavāt 6.024.028a avajitya jitakrodhas tam
GE09ram_1-7u:16676: 6.024.028c rāvaṇaṃ samare hatvā bhartā tvādhigamiṣyati 6.024.029a vikramiṣyati rakṣaḥsu bhartā te sahalakṣmaṇaḥ 6.024.029c yathā śatruṣu śatrughno viṣṇunā saha vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16677: 6.024.030a āgatasya hi rāmasya kṣipram aṅkagatāṃ satīm
GE09ram_1-7u:16678: 6.024.030c ahaṃ drakṣyāmi siddhārthāṃ tvāṃ śatrau vinipātite
GE09ram_1-7u:16679: 6.024.031a aśrūṇy ānandajāni tvaṃ vartayiṣyasi śobhane 6.024.031c samāgamya pariṣvaktā tasyorasi mahorasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16680: 6.024.032a acirān mokṣyate sīte devi te jaghanaṃ gatām
GE09ram_1-7u:16681: 6.024.032c dhṛtām etāṃ bahūn māsān veṇīṃ rāmo mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16682: 6.024.033a tasya dṛṣṭvā mukhaṃ devi pūrṇacandram ivoditam
GE09ram_1-7u:16683: 6.024.033c mokṣyase śokajaṃ vāri nirmokam iva pannagī
GE09ram_1-7u:16684: 6.024.034a rāvaṇaṃ samare hatvā nacirād eva maithili
GE09ram_1-7u:16685: 6.024.034c tvayā samagraṃ priyayā sukhārho lapsyate sukham
GE09ram_1-7u:16686: 6.024.035a samāgatā tvaṃ rāmeṇa modiṣyasi mahātmanā 6.024.035c suvarṣeṇa samāyuktā yathā sasyena medinī 6.024.036a girivaram abhito 'nuvartamāno; haya iva maṇḍalam āśu yaḥ karoti
GE09ram_1-7u:16687: 6.024.036c tam iha śaraṇam abhyupehi devi; divasakaraṃ prabhavo hy ayaṃ prajānām 6.025.001a atha tāṃ jātasaṃtāpāṃ tena vākyena mohitām
GE09ram_1-7u:16688: 6.025.001c saramā hlādayām āsa pṛtivīṃ dyaur ivāmbhasā
GE09ram_1-7u:16689: 6.025.002a tatas tasyā hitaṃ sakhyāś cikīrṣantī sakhī vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16691: 6.025.003a utsaheyam ahaṃ gatvā tvadvākyam asitekṣaṇe 6.025.003c nivedya kuśalaṃ rāme praticchannā nivartitum 6.025.004a na hi me kramamāṇāyā nirālambe vihāyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:16692: 6.025.004c samartho gatim anvetuṃ pavano garuḍo 'pi vā
GE09ram_1-7u:16693: 6.025.005a evaṃ bruvāṇāṃ tāṃ sītā saramāṃ punar abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:16695: 6.025.006a samarthā gaganaṃ gantum api vā tvaṃ rasātalam
GE09ram_1-7u:16696: 6.025.006c avagacchāmy akartavyaṃ kartavyaṃ te madantare 6.025.007a matpriyaṃ yadi kartavyaṃ yadi buddhiḥ sthirā tava
GE09ram_1-7u:16697: 6.025.007c jñātum icchāmi taṃ gatvā kiṃ karotīti rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16698: 6.025.008a sa hi māyābalaḥ krūro rāvaṇaḥ śatrurāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16699: 6.025.008c māṃ mohayati duṣṭātmā pītamātreva vāruṇī 6.025.009a tarjāpayati māṃ nityaṃ bhartsāpayati cāsakṛt 6.025.009c rākṣasībhiḥ sughorābhir yā māṃ rakṣanti nityaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16700: 6.025.010a udvignā śaṅkitā cāsmi na ca svasthaṃ mano mama 6.025.010c tad bhayāc cāham udvignā aśokavanikāṃ gatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16701: 6.025.011a yadi nāma kathā tasya niścitaṃ vāpi yad bhavet 6.025.011c nivedayethāḥ sarvaṃ tat paro me syād anugrahaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16702: 6.025.012a sā tv evaṃ bruvatīṃ sītāṃ saramā valgubhāṣiṇī
GE09ram_1-7u:16703: 6.025.012c uvāca vacanaṃ tasyāḥ spṛśantī bāṣpaviklavam 6.025.013a eṣa te yady abhiprāyas tasmād gacchāmi jānaki
GE09ram_1-7u:16704: 6.025.013c gṛhya śatror abhiprāyam upāvṛttāṃ ca paśya mām
GE09ram_1-7u:16705: 6.025.014a evam uktvā tato gatvā samīpaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16706: 6.025.014c śuśrāva kathitaṃ tasya rāvaṇasya samantriṇaḥ 6.025.015a sā śrutvā niścayaṃ tasya niścayajñā durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16707: 6.025.015c punar evāgamat kṣipram aśokavanikāṃ tadā 6.025.016a sā praviṣṭā punas tatra dadarśa janakātmajām
GE09ram_1-7u:16708: 6.025.016c pratīkṣamāṇāṃ svām eva bhraṣṭapadmām iva śriyam
GE09ram_1-7u:16709: 6.025.017a tāṃ tu sītā punaḥ prāptāṃ saramāṃ valgubhāṣiṇīm
GE09ram_1-7u:16710: 6.025.017c pariṣvajya ca susnigdhaṃ dadau ca svayam āsanam
GE09ram_1-7u:16711: 6.025.018a ihāsīnā sukhaṃ sarvam ākhyāhi mama tattvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16712: 6.025.018c krūrasya niścayaṃ tasya rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ 6.025.019a evam uktā tu saramā sītayā vepamānayā
GE09ram_1-7u:16713: 6.025.019c kathitaṃ sarvam ācaṣṭa rāvaṇasya samantriṇaḥ 6.025.020a jananyā rākṣasendro vai tvanmokṣārthaṃ bṛhadvacaḥ 6.025.020c aviddhena ca vaidehi mantrivṛddhena bodhitaḥ 6.025.021a dīyatām abhisatkṛtya manujendrāya maithilī
GE09ram_1-7u:16714: 6.025.021c nidarśanaṃ te paryāptaṃ janasthāne yad adbhutam
GE09ram_1-7u:16715: 6.025.022a laṅghanaṃ ca samudrasya darśanaṃ ca hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16716: 6.025.022c vadhaṃ ca rakṣasāṃ yuddhe kaḥ kuryān mānuṣo bhuvi 6.025.023a evaṃ sa mantrivṛddhaiś ca mātrā ca bahu bhāṣitaḥ 6.025.023c na tvām utsahate moktum artahm arthaparo yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:16717: 6.025.024a notsahaty amṛto moktuṃ yuddhe tvām iti maithili
GE09ram_1-7u:16718: 6.025.024c sāmātyasya nṛśaṃsasya niścayo hy eṣa vartate
GE09ram_1-7u:16719: 6.025.025a tad eṣā susthirā buddhir mṛtyulobhād upasthitā
GE09ram_1-7u:16720: 6.025.025c bhayān na śaktas tvāṃ moktum anirastas tu saṃyuge 6.025.025e rākṣasānāṃ ca sarveṣām ātmanaś ca vadhena hi
GE09ram_1-7u:16721: 6.025.026a nihatya rāvaṇaṃ saṃkhye sarvathā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16722: 6.025.026c pratineṣyati rāmas tvām ayodhyām asitekṣaṇe 6.025.027a etasminn antare śabdo
GE09ram_1-7u:16723: 6.025.027c śruto vai sarvasainyānāṃ kampayan dharaṇītalam 6.025.028a śrutvā tu taṃ vānarasainyaśabdaṃ; laṅkāgatā rākṣasarājabhṛtyāḥ 6.025.028c naṣṭaujaso dainyaparītaceṣṭāḥ; śreyo na paśyanti nṛpasya doṣaiḥ 6.026.001a tena śaṅkhavimiśreṇa bherīśabdena rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16725: 6.026.002a taṃ ninādaṃ niśamyātha rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ 6.026.002c muhūrtaṃ dhyānam āsthāya sacivān abhyudaikṣata 6.026.003a atha tān sacivāṃs tatra sarvān ābhāṣya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16726: 6.026.003c sabhāṃ saṃnādayan sarvām ity uvāca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16728: 6.026.004c yad uktavanto rāmasya bhavantas tan mayā śrutam
GE09ram_1-7u:16729: 6.026.004e bhavataś cāpy ahaṃ vedmi yuddhe satyaparākramān
GE09ram_1-7u:16730: 6.026.005a tatas tu sumahāprājño mālyavān nāma rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16732: 6.026.006a vidyāsv abhivinīto yo rājā rājan nayānugaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16733: 6.026.006c sa śāsti ciram aiśvaryam arīṃś ca kurute vaśe 6.026.007a saṃdadhāno hi kālena vigṛhṇaṃś cāribhiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:16734: 6.026.007c svapakṣavardhanaṃ kurvan mahad aiśvaryam aśnute 6.026.008a hīyamānena kartavyo rājñā saṃdhiḥ samena ca
GE09ram_1-7u:16735: 6.026.008c na śatrum avamanyeta jyāyān kurvīta vigraham
GE09ram_1-7u:16736: 6.026.009a tan mahyaṃ rocate saṃdhiḥ saha rāmeṇa rāvaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:16737: 6.026.009c yadartham abhiyuktāḥ sma sītā tasmai pradīyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:16738: 6.026.010a tasya devarṣayaḥ sarve gandharvāś ca jayaiṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16739: 6.026.010c virodhaṃ mā gamas tena saṃdhis te tena rocatām 6.026.011a asṛjad bhagavān pakṣau dvāv eva hi pitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16740: 6.026.011c surāṇām asurāṇāṃ ca dharmādharmau tadāśrayau 6.026.012a dharmo hi śrūyate pakṣaḥ surāṇāṃ ca mahātmanām
GE09ram_1-7u:16741: 6.026.012c adharmo rakṣasaṃ pakṣo hy asurāṇāṃ ca rāvaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:16742: 6.026.013a dharmo vai grasate 'dharmaṃ tataḥ kṛtam abhūd yugam
GE09ram_1-7u:16743: 6.026.013c adharmo grasate dharmaṃ tatas tiṣyaḥ pravartate
GE09ram_1-7u:16744: 6.026.014a tat tvayā caratā lokān dharmo vinihato mahān
GE09ram_1-7u:16745: 6.026.014c adharmaḥ pragṛhītaś ca tenāsmadbalinaḥ pare 6.026.015a sa pramādād vivṛddhas te 'dharmo 'hir grasate hi naḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16746: 6.026.015c vivardhayati pakṣaṃ ca surāṇāṃ surabhāvanaḥ 6.026.016a viṣayeṣu prasaktena yatkiṃcitkāriṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:16747: 6.026.016c ṛṣīṇām agnikalpānām udvego janito mahān 6.026.016e teṣāṃ prabhāvo durdharṣaḥ pradīpta iva pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16749: 6.026.017c mukhyair yajñair yajanty ete nityaṃ tais tair dvijātayaḥ 6.026.018a juhvaty agnīṃś ca vidhivad vedāṃś coccair adhīyate
GE09ram_1-7u:16750: 6.026.018c abhibhūya ca rakṣāṃsi brahmaghoṣān udairayan 6.026.018e diśo vipradrutāḥ sarve stanayitnur ivoṣṇage 6.026.019a ṛṣīṇām agnikalpānām agnihotrasamutthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16751: 6.026.019c ādatte rakṣasāṃ tejo dhūmo vyāpya diśo daśa
GE09ram_1-7u:16752: 6.026.020a teṣu teṣu ca deśeṣu puṇyeṣu ca dṛḍhavrataiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16753: 6.026.020c caryamāṇaṃ tapas tīvraṃ saṃtāpayati rākṣasān 6.026.021a utpātān vividhān dṛṣṭvā ghorān bahuvidhāṃs tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:16754: 6.026.021c vināśam anupaśyāmi sarveṣāṃ rakṣasām aham 6.026.022a kharābhis tanitā ghorā meghāḥ pratibhayaṃkaraḥ 6.026.022c śoṇitenābhivarṣanti laṅkām uṣṇena sarvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16755: 6.026.023a rudatāṃ vāhanānāṃ ca prapatanty asrabindavaḥ 6.026.023c dhvajā dhvastā vivarṇāś ca na prabhānti yathāpuram
GE09ram_1-7u:16756: 6.026.024a vyālā gomāyavo gṛdhrā vāśanti ca subhairavam
GE09ram_1-7u:16757: 6.026.024c praviśya laṅkām aniśaṃ samavāyāṃś ca kurvate
GE09ram_1-7u:16758: 6.026.025a kālikāḥ pāṇḍurair dantaiḥ prahasanty agrataḥ sthitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16759: 6.026.025c striyaḥ svapneṣu muṣṇantyo gṛhāṇi pratibhāṣya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:16761: 6.026.026c kharā goṣu prajāyante mūṣikā nakulaiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:16762: 6.026.027a mārjārā dvīpibhiḥ sārdhaṃ sūkarāḥ śunakaiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:16763: 6.026.027c kiṃnarā rākṣasaiś cāpi sameyur mānuṣaiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:16764: 6.026.028a pāṇḍurā raktapādāś ca vihagāḥ kālacoditāḥ 6.026.028c rākṣasānāṃ vināśāya kapotā vicaranti ca 6.026.029a cīkī kūcīti vāśantyaḥ śārikā veśmasu sthitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16765: 6.026.029c patanti grathitāś cāpi nirjitāḥ kalahaiṣiṇaḥ 6.026.030a karālo vikaṭo muṇḍaḥ puruṣaḥ kṛṣṇapiṅgalaḥ 6.026.030c kālo gṛhāṇi sarveṣāṃ kāle kāle 'nvavekṣate
GE09ram_1-7u:16766: 6.026.030e etāny anyāni duṣṭāni nimittāny utpatanti ca
GE09ram_1-7u:16767: 6.026.031a viṣṇuṃ manyāmahe rāmaṃ mānuṣaṃ deham āsthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:16768: 6.026.031c na hi mānuṣamātro 'sau rāghavo dṛḍhavikramaḥ 6.026.032a yena baddhaḥ samudrasya sa setuḥ paramādbhutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16769: 6.026.032c kuruṣva nararājena saṃdhiṃ rāmeṇa rāvaṇa 6.026.033a idaṃ vacas tatra nigadya mālyavan; parīkṣya rakṣo'dhipater
GE09ram_1-7u:16770: manaḥ punaḥ 6.026.033c anuttameṣūttamapauruṣo balī; babhūva tūṣṇīṃ samavekṣya rāvaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:16771: 6.027.001a tat tu mālyavato vākyaṃ hitam uktaṃ daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16772: 6.027.001c na marṣayati duṣṭātmā kālasya vaśam āgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16773: 6.027.002a sa baddhvā bhrukuṭiṃ vaktre krodhasya vaśam āgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16775: 6.027.003a hitabuddhyā yad ahitaṃ vacaḥ paruṣam ucyate
GE09ram_1-7u:16776: 6.027.003c parapakṣaṃ praviśyaiva naitac chrotragataṃ mama 6.027.004a mānuṣaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ rāmam ekaṃ śākhāmṛgāśrayam 6.027.004c samarthaṃ manyase kena tyaktaṃ pitrā vanālayam
GE09ram_1-7u:16777: 6.027.005a rakṣasām īśvaraṃ māṃ ca devatānāṃ bhayaṃkaram
GE09ram_1-7u:16778: 6.027.005c hīnaṃ māṃ manyase kena ahīnaṃ sarvavikramaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16779: 6.027.006a vīradveṣeṇa vā śaṅke pakṣapātena vā ripoḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16780: 6.027.006c tvayāhaṃ paruṣāṇy uktaḥ paraprotsāhanena vā 6.027.007a prabhavantaṃ padasthaṃ hi paruṣaṃ ko 'hbidhāsyati
GE09ram_1-7u:16781: 6.027.007c paṇḍitaḥ śāstratattvajño vinā protsāhanād ripoḥ 6.027.008a ānīya ca vanāt sītāṃ padmahīnām iva śriyam
GE09ram_1-7u:16782: 6.027.008c kimarthaṃ pratidāsyāmi rāghavasya bhayād aham 6.027.009a vṛtaṃ vānarakoṭībhiḥ sasugrīvaṃ salakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:16783: 6.027.009c paśya kaiś cid ahobhis tvaṃ rāghavaṃ nihataṃ mayā 6.027.010a dvandve yasya na tiṣṭhanti daivatāny api saṃyuge
GE09ram_1-7u:16784: 6.027.010c sa kasmād rāvaṇo yuddhe bhayam āhārayiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:16785: 6.027.011a dvidhā bhajyeyam apy evaṃ na nameyaṃ tu kasya cit
GE09ram_1-7u:16786: 6.027.011c eṣa me sahajo doṣaḥ svabhāvo duratikramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16787: 6.027.012a yadi tāvat samudre tu setur baddho yadṛcchayā
GE09ram_1-7u:16788: 6.027.012c rāmeṇa vismayaḥ ko 'tra yena te bhayam āgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:16789: 6.027.013a sa tu tīrtvārṇavaṃ rāmaḥ saha vānarasenayā
GE09ram_1-7u:16790: 6.027.013c pratijānāmi te satyaṃ na jīvan pratiyāsyati
GE09ram_1-7u:16791: 6.027.014a evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ saṃrabdhaṃ ruṣṭaṃ vijñāya rāvaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:16792: 6.027.014c vrīḍito mālyavān vākyaṃ nottaraṃ pratyapadyata 6.027.015a jayāśiṣā ca rājānaṃ vardhayitvā yathocitam 6.027.015c mālyavān abhyanujñāto jagāma svaṃ niveśanam 6.027.016a rāvaṇas tu sahāmātyo mantrayitvā vimṛśya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:16793: 6.027.016c laṅkāyām atulāṃ guptiṃ kārayām āsa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16794: 6.027.017a vyādideśa ca pūrvasyāṃ prahastaṃ dvāri rākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:16796: 6.027.018a paścimāyām atho dvāri putram indrajitaṃ tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:16797: 6.027.018c vyādideśa mahāmāyaṃ rākṣasair bahubhir vṛtam 6.027.019a uttarasyāṃ puradvāri vyādiśya śukasāraṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:16798: 6.027.019c svayaṃ cātra bhaviṣyāmi mantriṇas tān uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:16802: 6.027.021c mene kṛtārtham ātmānaṃ kṛtāntavaśam āgataḥ 6.027.022a visarjayām āsa tataḥ sa mantriṇo; vidhānam ājñāpya purasya
GE09ram_1-7u:16804: 6.027.022c jayāśiṣā mantragaṇena pūjito; viveśa so 'ntaḥpuram ṛddhiman mahat 6.028.001a naravānararājau tau sa ca vāyusutaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16805: 6.028.001c jāmbavān ṛkṣarājaś ca rākṣasaś ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16806: 6.028.002a aṅgado vāliputraś ca saumitriḥ śarabhaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16807: 6.028.002c suṣeṇaḥ sahadāyādo maindo dvivida eva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:16808: 6.028.003a gajo gavākṣo kumudo nalo 'tha panasas tathā 6.028.003c amitraviṣayaṃ prāptāḥ samavetāḥ samarthayan
GE09ram_1-7u:16809: 6.028.004a iyaṃ sā lakṣyate laṅkā purī rāvaṇapālitā
GE09ram_1-7u:16812: 6.028.005c nityaṃ saṃnihito hy atra rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16815: 6.028.007a analaḥ śarabhaś caiva saṃpātiḥ praghasas tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:16816: 6.028.007c gatvā laṅkāṃ mamāmātyāḥ purīṃ punar ihāgatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16817: 6.028.008a bhūtvā śakunayaḥ sarve praviṣṭāś ca ripor balam
GE09ram_1-7u:16818: 6.028.008c vidhānaṃ vihitaṃ yac ca tad dṛṣṭvā samupasthitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16819: 6.028.009a saṃvidhānaṃ yathāhus te rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ 6.028.009c rāma tad bruvataḥ sarvaṃ yathātathyena me śṛṇu
GE09ram_1-7u:16820: 6.028.010a pūrvaṃ prahastaḥ sabalo dvāram āsādya tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_1-7u:16822: 6.028.011a indrajit paścimadvāraṃ rākṣasair bahubhir vṛtaḥ 6.028.011c paṭṭasāsidhanuṣmadbhiḥ śūlamudgarapāṇibhiḥ 6.028.012a nānāpraharaṇaiḥ śūrair āvṛto rāvaṇātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16823: 6.028.012c rākṣasānāṃ sahasrais tu bahubhiḥ śastrapāṇibhiḥ 6.028.013a yuktaḥ paramasaṃvigno rākṣasair bahubhir vṛtaḥ 6.028.013c uttaraṃ nagaradvāraṃ rāvaṇaḥ svayam āsthitaḥ 6.028.014a virūpākṣas tu mahatā śūlakhaḍgadhanuṣmatā
GE09ram_1-7u:16824: 6.028.014c balena rākṣasaiḥ sārdhaṃ madhyamaṃ gulmam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16825: 6.028.015a etān evaṃvidhān gulmāṃl laṅkāyāṃ samudīkṣya te
GE09ram_1-7u:16826: 6.028.015c māmakāḥ sacivāḥ sarve śīghraṃ punar ihāgatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16827: 6.028.016a gajānāṃ ca sahasraṃ ca rathānām ayutaṃ pure
GE09ram_1-7u:16828: 6.028.016c hayānām ayute dve ca sāgrakoṭī ca rakṣasām
GE09ram_1-7u:16829: 6.028.017a vikrāntā balavantaś ca saṃyugeṣv ātatāyinaḥ 6.028.017c iṣṭā rākṣasarājasya nityam ete niśācarāḥ 6.028.018a ekaikasyātra yuddhārthe rākṣasasya viśāṃ pate 6.028.018c parivāraḥ sahasrāṇāṃ sahasram upatiṣṭhate
GE09ram_1-7u:16830: 6.028.019a etāṃ pravṛttiṃ laṅkāyāṃ mantriproktaṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.028.019c rāmaṃ kamalapatrākṣam idam uttaram abravīt 6.028.020a kuberaṃ tu yadā rāma rāvaṇaḥ pratyayudhyata
GE09ram_1-7u:16831: 6.028.020c ṣaṣṭiḥ śatasahasrāṇi tadā niryānti rākṣasāḥ 6.028.021a parākrameṇa vīryeṇa tejasā
GE09ram_1-7u:16833: 6.028.022a atra manyur na kartavyo roṣaye tvāṃ na bhīṣaye 6.028.022c samartho hy asi vīryeṇa surāṇām api nigrahe
GE09ram_1-7u:16834: 6.028.023a tad bhavāṃś caturaṅgeṇa balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16836: 6.028.024a rāvaṇāvaraje vākyam evaṃ bruvati rāghavaḥ 6.028.024c śatrūṇāṃ pratighātārtham idaṃ vacanam abravīt 6.028.025a pūrvadvāre tu laṅkāyā nīlo vānarapuṃgavaḥ 6.028.025c prahastaṃ pratiyoddhā syād vānarair bahubhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16837: 6.028.026a aṅgado vāliputras tu balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16840: 6.028.027c praviśatv aprameyātmā bahubhiḥ kapibhir vṛtaḥ 6.028.028a daityadānavasaṃghānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca mahātmanām
GE09ram_1-7u:16842: 6.028.029a parikrāmati yaḥ sarvāṃl lokān saṃtāpayan prajāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16843: 6.028.029c tasyāhaṃ rākṣasendrasya svayam eva vadhe dhṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16844: 6.028.030a uttaraṃ nagaradvāram ahaṃ saumitriṇā saha 6.028.030c nipīḍyābhipravekṣyāmi sabalo yatra rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16845: 6.028.031a vānarendraś ca balavān ṛkṣarājaś ca jāmbavān
GE09ram_1-7u:16846: 6.028.031c rākṣasendrānujaś caiva gulme bhavatu madhyame 6.028.032a na caiva mānuṣaṃ rūpaṃ kāryaṃ haribhir āhave
GE09ram_1-7u:16847: 6.028.032c eṣā bhavatu naḥ saṃjñā yuddhe 'smin vānare bale 6.028.033a vānarā eva niścihnaṃ svajane 'smin bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:16848: 6.028.033c vayaṃ tu mānuṣeṇaiva sapta yotsyāmahe parān
GE09ram_1-7u:16849: 6.028.034a aham eva saha bhrātrā lakṣmaṇena mahaujasā
GE09ram_1-7u:16850: 6.028.034c ātmanā pañcamaś cāyaṃ sakhā mama vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16851: 6.028.035a sa rāmaḥ kāryasiddhyartham evam uktvā vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:16852: 6.028.035c suvelārohaṇe buddhiṃ cakāra matimān matim 6.028.036a tatas tu rāmo mahatā balena; pracchādya sarvāṃ pṛthivīṃ mahātmā
GE09ram_1-7u:16853: 6.028.036c prahṛṣṭarūpo 'bhijagāma laṅkāṃ; kṛtvā matiṃ so 'rivadhe mahātmā
GE09ram_1-7u:16854: 6.029.001a sa tu kṛtvā suvelasya matim ārohaṇaṃ prati
GE09ram_1-7u:16855: 6.029.001c lakṣmaṇānugato rāmaḥ sugrīvam idam abravīt 6.029.002a vibhīṣaṇaṃ ca dharmajñam anuraktaṃ niśācaram 6.029.002c mantrajñaṃ ca vidhijñaṃ ca ślakṣṇayā parayā girā
GE09ram_1-7u:16856: 6.029.003a suvelaṃ sādhu śailendram imaṃ dhātuśataiś citam
GE09ram_1-7u:16857: 6.029.003c adhyārohāmahe sarve vatsyāmo 'tra niśām imām 6.029.004a laṅkāṃ cālokayiṣyāmo nilayaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ 6.029.004c yena me maraṇāntāya hṛtā bhāryā durātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:16858: 6.029.005a yena dharmo na vijñāto na vṛttaṃ na kulaṃ tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:16859: 6.029.005c rākṣasyā nīcayā buddhyā yena tad garhitaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:16860: 6.029.006a yasmin me vardhate roṣaḥ kīrtite rākṣasādhame
GE09ram_1-7u:16861: 6.029.006c yasyāparādhān nīcasya vadhaṃ drakṣyāmi rakṣasām 6.029.007a eko hi kurute pāpaṃ kālapāśavaśaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16863: 6.029.008a evaṃ saṃmantrayann eva sakrodho rāvaṇaṃ prati
GE09ram_1-7u:16864: 6.029.008c rāmaḥ suvelaṃ vāsāya citrasānum upāruhat 6.029.009a pṛṣṭhato lakṣmaṇa cainam anvagacchat samāhitaḥ 6.029.009c saśaraṃ cāpam udyamya sumahad vikrame rataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16865: 6.029.010a tam anvarohat sugrīvaḥ sāmātyaḥ savibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.029.010c hanūmān aṅgado nīlo maindo dvivida eva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:16866: 6.029.011a gajo gavākṣo gavayaḥ śarabho gandhamādanaḥ 6.029.011c panasaḥ kumudaś caiva haro rambhaś ca yūthapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16867: 6.029.012a ete cānye ca bahavo vānarāḥ śīghragāminaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16868: 6.029.012c te vāyuvegapravaṇās taṃ giriṃ giricāriṇaḥ 6.029.012e adhyārohanta śataśaḥ suvelaṃ yatra rāghavaḥ 6.029.013a te tv adīrgheṇa kālena girim āruhya sarvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16869: 6.029.013c dadṛśuḥ śikhare tasya viṣaktām iva khe purīm
GE09ram_1-7u:16872: 6.029.015a prākāracayasaṃsthaiś ca tathā nīlair niśācaraiḥ 6.029.015c dadṛśus te hariśreṣṭhāḥ prākāram aparaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:16873: 6.029.016a te dṛṣṭvā vānarāḥ sarve rākṣasān yuddhakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16874: 6.029.016c mumucur vipulān nādāṃs tatra rāmasya paśyataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16877: 6.029.018a tataḥ sa rāmo harivāhinīpatir; vibhīṣaṇena pratinandya satkṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16880: 6.030.001a tāṃ rātrim uṣitās tatra suvele haripuṃgavāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16881: 6.030.001c laṅkāyāṃ dadṛśur vīrā vanāny upavanāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:16882: 6.030.002a samasaumyāni ramyāṇi viśālāny āyatāni ca 6.030.002c dṛṣṭiramyāṇi te dṛṣṭvā babhūvur jātavismayāḥ 6.030.003a campakāśokapuṃnāgasālatālasamākulā
GE09ram_1-7u:16883: 6.030.003c tamālavanasaṃchannā nāgamālāsamāvṛtā 6.030.004a hintālair arjunair nīpaiḥ saptaparṇaiś ca puṣpitaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16884: 6.030.004c tilakaiḥ karṇikāraiś ca paṭālaiś ca samantataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16885: 6.030.005a śuśubhe puṣpitāgraiś ca latāparigatair drumaiḥ 6.030.005c laṅkā bahuvidhair divyair yathendrasyāmarāvatī
GE09ram_1-7u:16886: 6.030.006a vicitrakusumopetai raktakomalapallavaiḥ 6.030.006c śādvalaiś ca tathā nīlaiś citrābhir vanarājibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16887: 6.030.007a gandhāḍhyāny abhiramyāṇi puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:16888: 6.030.007c dhārayanty agamās tatra bhūṣaṇānīva mānavāḥ 6.030.008a tac caitrarathasaṃkāśaṃ manojñaṃ nandanopamam
GE09ram_1-7u:16889: 6.030.008c vanaṃ sarvartukaṃ ramyaṃ śuśubhe ṣaṭpadāyutam 6.030.009a natyūhakoyaṣṭibhakair nṛtyamānaiś ca barhibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16890: 6.030.009c rutaṃ parabhṛtānāṃ ca śuśruve vananirjhare 6.030.010a nityamattavihaṃgāni bhramarācaritāni
GE09ram_1-7u:16894: 6.030.012a viviśus te tatas tāni vanāny upavanāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:16895: 6.030.012c hṛṣṭāḥ pramuditā vīrā harayaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ 6.030.013a teṣāṃ praviśatāṃ tatra vānarāṇāṃ mahaujasām 6.030.013c puṣpasaṃsargasurabhir vavau ghrāṇasukho 'nilaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16896: 6.030.014a anye tu harivīrāṇāṃ yūthān niṣkramya yūthapāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16899: 6.030.015c kampayantaś ca tāṃ laṅkāṃ nādaiḥ svair nadatāṃ varāḥ 6.030.016a kurvantas te mahāvegā mahīṃ cāraṇapīḍitām 6.030.016c rajaś ca sahasaivordhvaṃ jagāma caraṇoddhatam 6.030.017a ṛkṣāḥ siṃhā varāhāś ca mahiṣā vāraṇā mṛgāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16900: 6.030.017c tena śabdena vitrastā jagmur bhītā diśo daśa
GE09ram_1-7u:16901: 6.030.018a śikharaṃ tu trikūṭasya prāṃśu caikaṃ divispṛśam
GE09ram_1-7u:16904: 6.030.019c ślakṣṇaṃ śrīman mahac caiva duṣprāpaṃ śakunair api
GE09ram_1-7u:16905: 6.030.020a manasāpi durārohaṃ kiṃ punaḥ karmaṇā janaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16906: 6.030.020c niviṣṭā tatra śikhare laṅkā rāvaṇapālitā 6.030.021a sā purī gopurair uccaiḥ pāṇḍurāmbudasaṃnibhaiḥ 6.030.021c kāñcanena ca sālena rājatena ca śobhitā
GE09ram_1-7u:16907: 6.030.022a prāsādaiś ca vimānaiś ca laṅkā paramabhūṣitā
GE09ram_1-7u:16908: 6.030.022c ghanair ivātapāpāye madhyamaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ padam 6.030.023a yasyāṃ stambhasahasreṇa prāsādaḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16910: 6.030.024a caityaḥ sa rākṣasendrasya babhūva purabhūṣaṇam 6.030.024c śatena rakṣasāṃ nityaṃ yaḥ samagreṇa rakṣyate
GE09ram_1-7u:16911: 6.030.025a tāṃ samṛddhāṃ samṛddhārtho lakṣmīvāṃl lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ 6.030.025c rāvaṇasya purīṃ rāmo dadarśa saha vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16912: 6.030.026a tāṃ ratnapūrṇāṃ bahusaṃvidhānāṃ; prāsādamālābhir alaṃkṛtāṃ ca
GE09ram_1-7u:16913: 6.030.026c purīṃ mahāyantrakavāṭamukhyāṃ; dadarśa rāmo mahatā balena
GE09ram_1-7u:16914: 6.031.001a atha tasmin nimittāni dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇapūrvajaḥ 6.031.001c lakṣmaṇaṃ lakṣmisaṃpannam idaṃ vacanam abravīt 6.031.002a parigṛhyodakaṃ śītaṃ vanāni phalavanti ca 6.031.002c balaughaṃ saṃvibhajyemaṃ vyūhya tiṣṭhema lakṣmaṇa 6.031.003a lokakṣayakaraṃ bhīmaṃ bhayaṃ paśyāmy upasthitam 6.031.003c nibarhaṇaṃ pravīrāṇām ṛkṣavānararakṣasām
GE09ram_1-7u:16915: 6.031.004a vātāś ca paruṣaṃ vānti kampate ca vasuṃdharā
GE09ram_1-7u:16918: 6.031.005c krūrāḥ krūraṃ pravarṣanti miśraṃ śoṇitabindubhiḥ 6.031.006a raktacandanasaṃkāśā saṃdhyāparamadāruṇā 6.031.006c jvalac ca nipataty etad ādityād agnimaṇḍalam
GE09ram_1-7u:16919: 6.031.007a ādityam abhivāśyante janayanto mahad bhayam 6.031.007c dīnā dīnasvarā ghorā apraśastā mṛgadvijāḥ 6.031.008a rajanyām aprakāśaś ca saṃtāpayati candramāḥ 6.031.008c kṛṣṇaraktāṃśuparyanto yathā lokasya saṃkṣaye
GE09ram_1-7u:16921: 6.031.009c ādityamaṇḍale nīlaṃ lakṣma lakṣmaṇa dṛśyate 6.031.010a dṛśyante na yathāvac ca nakṣatrāṇy abhivartate
GE09ram_1-7u:16922: 6.031.010c yugāntam iva lokasya paśya lakṣmaṇa śaṃsati
GE09ram_1-7u:16923: 6.031.011a kākāḥ śyenās tathā gṛdhrā nīcaiḥ paripatanti ca
GE09ram_1-7u:16924: 6.031.011c śivāś cāpy aśivā vācaḥ pravadanti mahāsvanāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16925: 6.031.012a kṣipram adya durādharṣāṃ purīṃ rāvaṇapālitām 6.031.012c abhiyāma javenaiva sarvato haribhir vṛtāḥ 6.031.013a ity evaṃ tu vadan vīro lakṣmaṇaṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16926: 6.031.013c tasmād avātarac chīghraṃ parvatāgrān mahābalaḥ 6.031.014a avatīrya tu dharmātmā tasmāc chailāt sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16927: 6.031.014c paraiḥ paramadurdharṣaṃ dadarśa balam ātmanaḥ 6.031.015a saṃnahya tu sasugrīvaḥ kapirājabalaṃ mahat 6.031.015c kālajño rāghavaḥ kāle saṃyugāyābhyacodayat
GE09ram_1-7u:16928: 6.031.016a tataḥ kāle mahābāhur balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16929: 6.031.016c prasthitaḥ purato dhanvī laṅkām abhimukhaḥ purīm
GE09ram_1-7u:16930: 6.031.017a taṃ vibhīṣaṇa sugrīvau hanūmāñ jāmbavān nalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16931: 6.031.017c ṛkṣarājas tathā nīlo lakṣmaṇaś cānyayus tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:16933: 6.031.018c pracchādya mahatīṃ bhūmim anuyāti sma rāghavam
GE09ram_1-7u:16934: 6.031.019a śailaśṛṅgāṇi śataśaḥ pravṛddhāṃś ca mahīruhām 6.031.019c jagṛhuḥ kuñjaraprakhyā vānarāḥ paravāraṇāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16935: 6.031.020a tau tv adīrgheṇa kālena bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:16936: 6.031.020c rāvaṇasya purīṃ laṅkām āsedatur ariṃdamau 6.031.021a patākāmālinīṃ ramyām udyānavanaśobhitām
GE09ram_1-7u:16938: 6.031.022a tāṃ surair api durdharṣāṃ rāmavākyapracoditāḥ 6.031.022c yathānideśaṃ saṃpīḍya nyaviśanta vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16940: 6.031.023c rāmaḥ sahānujo dhanvī jugopa ca rurodha ca
GE09ram_1-7u:16941: 6.031.024a laṅkām upaniviṣṭaś ca rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ 6.031.024c lakṣmaṇānucaro vīraḥ purīṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:16942: 6.031.025a uttaradvāram āsādya yatra tiṣṭhati rāvaṇaḥ 6.031.025c nānyo rāmād dhi tad dvāraṃ samarthaḥ parirakṣitum
GE09ram_1-7u:16944: 6.031.026c sāyudhau rākṣasair bhīmair abhiguptaṃ samantataḥ 6.031.026e laghūnāṃ trāsajananaṃ pātālam iva dānavaiḥ 6.031.027a vinyastāni ca yodhānāṃ bahūni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:16946: 6.031.028a pūrvaṃ tu dvāram āsādya nīlo haricamūpatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16947: 6.031.028c atiṣṭhat saha maindena dvividena ca vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:16949: 6.031.029c ṛṣabheṇa gavākṣeṇa gajena gavayena ca 6.031.030a hanūmān paścimadvāraṃ rarakṣa balavān kapiḥ 6.031.030c pramāthi praghasābhyāṃ ca vīrair anyaiś ca saṃgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16950: 6.031.031a madhyame ca svayaṃ gulme sugrīvaḥ samatiṣṭhata
GE09ram_1-7u:16952: 6.031.032a vānarāṇāṃ tu ṣaṭtriṃśat koṭyaḥ prakhyātayūthapāḥ 6.031.032c nipīḍyopaniviṣṭāś ca sugrīvo yatra vānaraḥ 6.031.033a śāsanena tu rāmasya lakṣmaṇaḥ savibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.031.033c dvāre dvāre harīṇāṃ tu koṭiṃ koṭiṃ nyaveśayat
GE09ram_1-7u:16953: 6.031.034a paścimena tu rāmasya sugrīvaḥ saha jāmbavān
GE09ram_1-7u:16954: 6.031.034c adūrān madhyame gulme tasthau bahubalānugaḥ 6.031.035a te tu vānaraśārdūlāḥ śārdūlā iva daṃṣṭriṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16955: 6.031.035c gṛhītvā drumaśailāgrān hṛṣṭā yuddhāya tasthire 6.031.036a sarve vikṛtalāṅgūlāḥ sarve daṃṣṭrānakhāyudhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16956: 6.031.036c sarve vikṛtacitrāṅgāḥ sarve ca vikṛtānanāḥ 6.031.037a daśanāgabalāḥ ke cit ke cid daśaguṇottarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16957: 6.031.037c ke cin nāgasahasrasya babhūvus tulyavikramāḥ 6.031.038a santi caughā balāḥ ke cit ke cic chataguṇottarāḥ 6.031.038c aprameyabalāś cānye tatrāsan hariyūthapāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16958: 6.031.039a adbhutaś ca vicitraś ca teṣām āsīt samāgamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16960: 6.031.040a paripūrṇam ivākāśaṃ saṃchanneva ca medinī 6.031.040c laṅkām upaniviṣṭaiś ca saṃpatadbhiś ca vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16962: 6.031.041c laṅkā dvārāṇy upājagmur anye yoddhuṃ samantataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16963: 6.031.042a āvṛtaḥ sa giriḥ sarvais taiḥ samantāt plavaṃgamaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16964: 6.031.042c ayutānāṃ sahasraṃ ca purīṃ tām abhyavartata
GE09ram_1-7u:16965: 6.031.043a vānarair balavadbhiś ca babhūva drumapāṇibhiḥ 6.031.043c sarvataḥ saṃvṛtā laṅkā duṣpraveśāpi vāyunā 6.031.044a rākṣasā vismayaṃ jagmuḥ sahasābhinipīḍitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16967: 6.031.045a mahāñ śabdo 'bhavat tatra balaughasyābhivartataḥ 6.031.045c sāgarasyeva bhinnasya yathā syāt salilasvanaḥ 6.031.046a tena śabdena mahatā saprākārā satoraṇā 6.031.046c laṅkā pracalitā sarvā saśailavanakānanā
GE09ram_1-7u:16968: 6.031.047a rāmalakṣmaṇaguptā sā sugrīveṇa ca vāhinī 6.031.047c babhūva durdharṣatarā sarvair api surāsuraiḥ 6.031.048a rāghavaḥ saṃniveśyaivaṃ sainyaṃ svaṃ rakṣasāṃ vadhe
GE09ram_1-7u:16969: 6.031.048c saṃmantrya mantribhiḥ sārdhaṃ niścitya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16973: 6.031.050a gatvā saumya daśagrīvaṃ brūhi madvacanāt kape
GE09ram_1-7u:16974: 6.031.050c laṅghayitvā purīṃ laṅkāṃ bhayaṃ tyaktvā gatavyathaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16975: 6.031.051a bhraṣṭaśrīkagataiśvaryamumūrṣo naṣṭacetanaḥ 6.031.051c ṛṣīṇāṃ devatānāṃ ca gandharvāpsarasāṃ tathā 6.031.052a nāgānām atha yakṣāṇāṃ rājñāṃ ca rajanīcara
GE09ram_1-7u:16976: 6.031.052c yac ca pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mohād avaliptena rākṣasa
GE09ram_1-7u:16977: 6.031.053a nūnam adya gato darpaḥ svayambhū varadānajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16979: 6.031.053e daṇḍaṃ dhārayamāṇas tu laṅkādvare vyavasthitaḥ 6.031.054a padavīṃ devatānāṃ ca maharṣīṇāṃ ca rākṣasa
GE09ram_1-7u:16980: 6.031.054c rājarṣīṇāṃ ca sarveṇāṃ gamiṣyasi mayā hataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16981: 6.031.055a balena yena vai sītāṃ māyayā rākṣasādhama
GE09ram_1-7u:16982: 6.031.055c mām atikrāmayitvā tvaṃ hṛtavāṃs tad vidarśaya
GE09ram_1-7u:16983: 6.031.056a arākṣasam imaṃ lokaṃ kartāsmi niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16984: 6.031.056c na cec charaṇam abhyeṣi mām upādāya maithilīm
GE09ram_1-7u:16986: 6.031.057c laṅkaiśvaryaṃ dhruvaṃ śrīmān ayaṃ prāpnoty akaṇṭakam
GE09ram_1-7u:16987: 6.031.058a na hi rājyam adharmeṇa bhoktuṃ kṣaṇam api tvayā 6.031.058c śakyaṃ mūrkhasahāyena
GE09ram_1-7u:16988: 6.031.059a yudhyasva vā dhṛtiṃ kṛtvā śauryam ālambya rākṣasa
GE09ram_1-7u:16989: 6.031.059c maccharais tvaṃ raṇe śāntas tataḥ pūto bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:16990: 6.031.060a yady āviśasi lokāṃs trīn pakṣibhūto manojavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:16991: 6.031.060c mama cakṣuṣpathaṃ prāpya na jīvan pratiyāsyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:16992: 6.031.061a bravīmi tvāṃ hitaṃ vākyaṃ kriyatām aurdhvadekikam
GE09ram_1-7u:16993: 6.031.061c sudṛṣṭā kriyatāṃ laṅkā jīvitaṃ te mayi sthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:16994: 6.031.062a ity uktaḥ sa tu tāreyo rāmeṇākliṣṭakarmaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:16995: 6.031.062c jagāmākāśam āviśya mūrtimān iva havyavāṭ 6.031.063a so 'tipatya muhūrtena śrīmān
GE09ram_1-7u:16996: 6.031.063c dadarśāsīnam avyagraṃ rāvaṇaṃ sacivaiḥ saha 6.031.064a tatas tasyāvidūreṇa nipatya
GE09ram_1-7u:16998: 6.031.065a tad rāmavacanaṃ sarvam anyūnādhikam uttamam 6.031.065c sāmātyaṃ śrāvayām āsa nivedyātmānam ātmanā 6.031.066a dūto 'haṃ kosalendrasya rāmasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ 6.031.066c vāliputro 'ṅgado nāma yadi te śrotram āgataḥ 6.031.067a āha tvāṃ rāghavo rāmaḥ kausalyānandavardhanaḥ 6.031.067c niṣpatya pratiyudhyasva nṛśaṃsaṃ puruṣādhama
GE09ram_1-7u:17000: 6.031.068c nirudvignās trayo lokā bhaviṣyanti hate tvayi
GE09ram_1-7u:17001: 6.031.069a devadānavayakṣāṇāṃ gandharvoragarakṣasām 6.031.069c śatrum adyoddhariṣyāmi tvām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca kaṇṭakam
GE09ram_1-7u:17002: 6.031.070a vibhīṣaṇasya caiśvaryaṃ bhaviṣyati hate tvayi 6.031.070c na cet satkṛtya vaidehīṃ praṇipatya pradāsyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:17003: 6.031.071a ity evaṃ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ bruvāṇe haripuṃgave
GE09ram_1-7u:17005: 6.031.072a tataḥ sa roṣatāmrākṣaḥ śaśāsa sacivāṃs tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:17006: 6.031.072c gṛhyatām eṣa durmedhā vadhyatām iti cāsakṛt
GE09ram_1-7u:17008: 6.031.073c jagṛhus taṃ tato ghorāś catvāro rajanīcarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17009: 6.031.074a grāhayām āsa tāreyaḥ svayam ātmānam ātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:17010: 6.031.074c balaṃ darśayituṃ vīro yātudhānagaṇe tadā 6.031.075a sa tān bāhudvaye saktān ādāya patagān iva
GE09ram_1-7u:17013: 6.031.076c bhumau nipatitāḥ sarve rākṣasendrasya paśyataḥ 6.031.077a tataḥ prāsādaśikharaṃ śailaśṛṅgam ivonnatam
GE09ram_1-7u:17014: 6.031.077c tat paphāla tadākrāntaṃ daśagrīvasya paśyataḥ 6.031.078a bhaṅktvā prāsādaśikharaṃ nāma viśrāvya cātmanaḥ 6.031.078c vinadya sumahānādam utpapāta vihāyasā
GE09ram_1-7u:17015: 6.031.079a rāvaṇas tu paraṃ cakre krodhaṃ prāsādadharṣaṇāt
GE09ram_1-7u:17017: 6.031.080a rāmas tu bahubhir hṛṣṭair ninadadbhiḥ plavaṃgamaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17019: 6.031.081a suṣeṇas tu mahāvīryo girikūṭopamo hariḥ 6.031.081c bahubhiḥ saṃvṛtas tatra vānaraiḥ kāmarūpibhiḥ 6.031.082a caturdvārāṇi sarvāṇi sugrīvavacanāt kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17023: 6.031.084a rākṣasā vismayaṃ jagmus trāsaṃ jagmus tathāpare
GE09ram_1-7u:17025: 6.031.085a kṛtsnaṃ hi kapibhir vyāptaṃ prākāraparikhāntaram 6.031.085c dadṛśū rākṣasā dīnāḥ prākāraṃ vānarīkṛtam 6.031.086a tasmin mahābhīṣaṇake pravṛtte; kolāhale rākṣasarājadhānyām 6.031.086c pragṛhya rakṣāṃsi mahāyudhāni; yugāntavātā iva saṃviceruḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17026: 6.032.001a tatas te rākṣasās tatra gatvā rāvaṇamandiram
GE09ram_1-7u:17027: 6.032.001c nyavedayan purīṃ ruddhāṃ rāmeṇa saha vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17028: 6.032.002a ruddhāṃ tu nagarīṃ śrutvā jātakrodho niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17032: 6.032.004a sa dṛṣṭvā vānaraiḥ sarvāṃ vasudhāṃ kavalīkṛtām
GE09ram_1-7u:17034: 6.032.005a sa cintayitvā suciraṃ dhairyam ālambya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17036: 6.032.006a prekṣato rākṣasendrasya tāny anīkāni bhāgaśaḥ 6.032.006c rāghavapriyakāmārthaṃ laṅkām āruruhus tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:17037: 6.032.007a te tāmravaktrā hemābhā rāmārthe tyaktajīvitāḥ 6.032.007c laṅkām evāhyavartanta
GE09ram_1-7u:17038: 6.032.008a te drumaiḥ parvatāgraiś ca muṣṭibhiś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17039: 6.032.008c prāsādāgrāṇi coccāni mamantus toraṇāni ca 6.032.009a pārikhāḥ pūrayanti sma
GE09ram_1-7u:17040: 6.032.009c pāṃsubhiḥ parvatāgraiś ca tṛṇaiḥ kāṣṭhaiś ca vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17041: 6.032.010a tataḥ sahasrayūthāś ca koṭiyūthāś ca yūthapāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17042: 6.032.010c koṭīśatayutāś cānye laṅkām āruruhus tadā 6.032.011a kāñcanāni pramṛdnantas toraṇāni
GE09ram_1-7u:17044: 6.032.012a āplavantaḥ plavantaś ca garjantaś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17046: 6.032.013a jayaty atibalo rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17048: 6.032.014a ity evaṃ ghoṣayantaś ca garjantaś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17050: 6.032.015a vīrabāhuḥ subāhuś ca nalaś ca vanagocaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17053: 6.032.017a pūrvadvāraṃ tu kumudaḥ koṭibhir daśabhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17054: 6.032.017c āvṛtya balavāṃs tasthau haribhir jitakāśibhiḥ 6.032.018a dakṣiṇadvāram āgamya vīraḥ śatabaliḥ kapiḥ 6.032.018c āvṛtya balavāṃs tasthau viṃśatyā koṭibhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17055: 6.032.019a suṣeṇaḥ paścimadvāraṃ gatas tārā pitā hariḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17056: 6.032.019c āvṛtya balavāṃs tasthau ṣaṣṭi koṭibhir āvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17057: 6.032.020a uttaradvāram āsādya rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha 6.032.020c āvṛtya balavāṃs tasthau sugrīvaś ca harīśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17059: 6.032.021c vṛtaḥ koṭyā mahāvīryas tasthau rāmasya pārvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17061: 6.032.022c vṛtaḥ koṭyā mahāvīryas tasthau rāmasya pārśvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17062: 6.032.023a saṃnaddhas tu mahāvīryo gadāpāṇir vibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.032.023c vṛto yas tais tu sacivais tasthau tatra mahābalaḥ 6.032.024a gajo gavākṣo gavayaḥ śarabho gandhamādanaḥ 6.032.024c samantāt parighāvanto rarakṣur harivāhinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:17064: 6.032.025c niryāṇaṃ sarvasainyānāṃ drutam ājñāpayat tadā 6.032.026a niṣpatanti tataḥ sainyā hṛṣṭā rāvaṇacoditāḥ 6.032.026c samaye pūryamāṇasya vegā iva mahodadheḥ 6.032.027a etasminn antare ghoraḥ saṃgrāmaḥ samapadyata 6.032.027c rakṣasāṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca yathā devāsure purā
GE09ram_1-7u:17066: 6.032.028c nijaghnur vānarān ghorāḥ kathayantaḥ svavikramān 6.032.029a tathā vṛkṣair mahākāyāḥ parvatāgraiś ca vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17067: 6.032.029c rākṣasās tāni rakṣāṃsi nakhair dantaiś ca vegitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17068: 6.032.030a rākṣasās tv apare bhīmāḥ prākārasthā mahīgatān
GE09ram_1-7u:17069: 6.032.030c bhiṇḍipālaiś ca khaḍgaiś ca śūlaiś caiva vyadārayan
GE09ram_1-7u:17070: 6.032.031a vānarāś cāpi saṃkruddhāḥ prākārasthān mahīgatāḥ 6.032.031c rākṣasān pātayām āsuḥ samāplutya plavaṃgamāḥ 6.032.032a sa saṃprahāras tumulo māṃsaśoṇitakardamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17072: 6.033.001a yudhyatāṃ tu tatas teṣāṃ vānarāṇāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_1-7u:17074: 6.033.002a te hayaiḥ kāñcanāpīḍair dhvajaiś cāgniśikhopamaiḥ 6.033.002c rathaiś cādityasaṃkāśaiḥ kavacaiś ca manoramaiḥ 6.033.003a niryayū rākṣasavyāghrā nādayanto diśo daśa 6.033.003c rākṣasā bhīmakarmāṇo rāvaṇasya jayaiṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17075: 6.033.004a vānarāṇām api camūr mahatī jayam iccatām
GE09ram_1-7u:17076: 6.033.004c abhyadhāvata tāṃ senāṃ rakṣasāṃ kāmarūpiṇām 6.033.005a etasminn antare teṣām anyonyam abhidhāvatām 6.033.005c rakṣasāṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca dvandvayuddham avartata 6.033.006a aṅgadenendrajit sārdhaṃ vāliputreṇa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17078: 6.033.007a prajaṅghena ca saṃpātir nityaṃ durmarṣaṇo raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:17079: 6.033.007c jambūmālinam ārabdho hanūmān api vānaraḥ 6.033.008a saṃgataḥ sumahākrodho rākṣaso
GE09ram_1-7u:17081: 6.033.009a tapanena gajaḥ sārdhaṃ rākṣasena mahābalaḥ 6.033.009c nikumbhena mahātejā nīlo 'pi samayudhyata
GE09ram_1-7u:17082: 6.033.010a vānarendras tu sugrīvaḥ praghasena samāgataḥ 6.033.010c saṃgataḥ samare śrīmān virūpākṣeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ 6.033.011a agniketuś ca durdharṣo raśmiketuś ca rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17083: 6.033.011c suptaghno yajñakopaś ca rāmeṇa saha saṃgatāḥ
