GE09ram_1-7u:17086: 6.033.013a vīraḥ pratapano ghoro rākṣaso raṇadurdharaḥ 6.033.013c samare tīkṣṇavegena nalena
GE09ram_1-7u:17087: 6.033.014a dharmasya putro balavān suṣeṇa iti viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17088: 6.033.014c sa vidyunmālinā sārdham ayudhyata mahākapiḥ 6.033.015a vānarāś cāpare bhīmā rākṣasair aparaiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:17089: 6.033.015c dvandvaṃ samīyur bahudhā yuddhāya bahubhiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:17090: 6.033.016a tatrāsīt sumahad yuddhaṃ tumulaṃ lomaharṣaṇam 6.033.016c rakṣasāṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca vīrāṇāṃ jayam icchatām
GE09ram_1-7u:17095: 6.033.019a tasya kāñcanacitrāṅgaṃ rathaṃ sāśvaṃ sasārathim 6.033.019c jaghāna samare śrīmān aṅgado vegavān kapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17096: 6.033.020a saṃpātis tu tribhir bāṇaiḥ prajaṅghena samāhataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17098: 6.033.021a jambūmālī rathasthas tu rathaśaktyā mahābalaḥ 6.033.021c bibheda samare kruddho hanūmantaṃ stanāntare 6.033.022a tasya taṃ ratham āsthāya hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17099: 6.033.022c pramamātha talenāśu saha tenaiva rakṣasā 6.033.023a bhinnagātraḥ śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ kṣiprahastena rakṣasā 6.033.023c prajaghānādriśṛṅgeṇa tapanaṃ muṣṭinā gajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17100: 6.033.024a grasantam iva sainyāni praghasaṃ vānarādhipaḥ 6.033.024c sugrīvaḥ saptaparṇena nirbibheda jaghāna ca 6.033.025a prapīḍya śaravarṣeṇa rākṣasaṃ bhīmadarśanam
GE09ram_1-7u:17102: 6.033.026a agniketuś ca durdharṣo raśmiketuś ca rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17103: 6.033.026c suptighno yajñakopaś ca rāmaṃ nirbibhiduḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17104: 6.033.027a teṣāṃ caturṇāṃ rāmas tu śirāṃsi samare śaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17105: 6.033.027c kruddhaś caturbhiś ciccheda ghorair agniśikhopamaiḥ 6.033.028a vajramuṣṭis tu maindena muṣṭinā nihato raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:17106: 6.033.028c papāta sarathaḥ sāśvaḥ purāṭṭa iva bhūtale
GE09ram_1-7u:17109: 6.033.030a dvividaṃ vānarendraṃ tu drumayodhinam āhave 6.033.030c śarair aśanisaṃkāśaiḥ sa vivyādhāśaniprabhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17110: 6.033.031a sa śarair atividdhāṅgo dvividaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ 6.033.031c sālena sarathaṃ sāśvaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:17111: 6.033.032a nikumbhas tu raṇe nīlaṃ nīlāñjanacayaprabham 6.033.032c nirbibheda śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ karair megham ivāṃśumān
GE09ram_1-7u:17113: 6.033.033c bibheda samare nīlaṃ nikumbhaḥ prajahāsa ca
GE09ram_1-7u:17114: 6.033.034a tasyaiva rathacakreṇa nīlo viṣṇur ivāhave 6.033.034c śiraś ciccheda samare nikumbhasya ca sāratheḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17115: 6.033.035a vidyunmālī rathasthas tu śaraiḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇaiḥ 6.033.035c suṣeṇaṃ tāḍayām āsa nanāda ca muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17116: 6.033.036a taṃ rathastham atho dṛṣṭvā suṣeṇo vānarottamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17117: 6.033.036c giriśṛṅgeṇa mahatā ratham āśu nyapātayat 6.033.037a lāghavena tu saṃyukto vidyunmālī niśācaraḥ 6.033.037c apakramya rathāt tūrṇaṃ gadāpāṇiḥ kṣitau sthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17119: 6.033.038c śilāṃ sumahatīṃ gṛhya niśācaram abhidravat 6.033.039a tam āpatantaṃ gadayā vidyunmālī niśācaraḥ 6.033.039c vakṣasy abhijagnānāśu suṣeṇaṃ harisattamam
GE09ram_1-7u:17121: 6.033.040c tāṃ śilāṃ pātayām āsa tasyorasi mahāmṛdhe
GE09ram_1-7u:17123: 6.033.041c niṣpiṣṭahṛdayo bhūmau gatāsur nipapāta ha 6.033.042a evaṃ tair vānaraiḥ śūraiḥ śūrās te rajanīcarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17124: 6.033.042c dvandve vimṛditās tatra daityā iva divaukasaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17125: 6.033.043a bhallaiḥ khaḍgair gadābhiś ca śaktitomara paṭṭasaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17126: 6.033.043c apaviddhaś ca bhinnaś ca rathaiḥ sāṃgrāmikair hayaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17127: 6.033.044a nihataiḥ kuñjarair mattais tathā vānararākṣasaiḥ 6.033.044c cakrākṣayugadaṇḍaiś ca bhagnair dharaṇisaṃśritaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17131: 6.033.046a vidāryamāṇā haripuṃgavais tadā; niśācarāḥ śoṇitadigdhagātrāḥ 6.033.046c punaḥ suyuddhaṃ tarasā samāśritā;
GE09ram_1-7u:17133: 6.034.001a yudhyatām eva teṣāṃ tu tadā vānararakṣasām
GE09ram_1-7u:17134: 6.034.001c ravir astaṃ gato rātriḥ pravṛttā prāṇahāriṇī
GE09ram_1-7u:17135: 6.034.002a anyonyaṃ baddhavairāṇāṃ ghorāṇāṃ jayam icchatām 6.034.002c saṃpravṛttaṃ niśāyuddhaṃ tadā vāraṇarakṣasām
GE09ram_1-7u:17137: 6.034.003c anyonyaṃ samare jaghnus tasmiṃs tamasi dāruṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:17138: 6.034.004a jahi dāraya caitīti kathaṃ vidravasīti ca
GE09ram_1-7u:17139: 6.034.004c evaṃ sutumulaḥ śabdas tasmiṃs tamasi śuśruve
GE09ram_1-7u:17140: 6.034.005a kālāḥ kāñcanasaṃnāhās tasmiṃs tamasi rākṣasāḥ 6.034.005c saṃprādṛśyanta śailendrā dīptauṣadhivanā iva
GE09ram_1-7u:17141: 6.034.006a tasmiṃs tamasi duṣpāre rākṣasāḥ krodhamūrchitāḥ 6.034.006c paripetur mahāvegā bhakṣayantaḥ plavaṃgamān
GE09ram_1-7u:17142: 6.034.007a te hayān kāñcanāpīḍan dhvajāṃś cāgniśikhopamān 6.034.007c āplutya daśanais tīkṣṇair bhīmakopā vyadārayan 6.034.008a kuñjarān kuñjarārohān patākādhvajino rathān
GE09ram_1-7u:17143: 6.034.008c cakarṣuś ca dadaṃśuś ca daśanaiḥ krodhamūrchitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17144: 6.034.009a lakṣmaṇaś cāpi rāmaś ca śarair āśīviṣomapaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17147: 6.034.011a vartamāne tathā ghore saṃgrāme lomaharṣaṇe 6.034.011c rudhirodā mahāvegā nadyas tatra prasusruvuḥ 6.034.012a tato bherīmṛdaṅgānāṃ paṇavānāṃ ca nisvanaḥ 6.034.012c śaṅkhaveṇusvanonmiśraḥ saṃbabhūvādbhutopamaḥ 6.034.013a hatānāṃ stanamānānāṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca nisvanaḥ 6.034.013c śastrāṇāṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca saṃbabhūvātidāruṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17150: 6.034.015a sā babhūva niśā ghorā harirākṣasahāriṇī 6.034.015c kālarātrīva bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:17151: 6.034.016a tatas te rākṣasās tatra tasmiṃs tamasi dāruṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:17153: 6.034.017a teṣām āpatatāṃ śabdaḥ kruddhānām abhigarjatām 6.034.017c udvarta iva saptānāṃ samudrāṇām abhūt svanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17154: 6.034.018a teṣāṃ rāmaḥ śaraiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ ṣaḍ jaghāna niśācarān
GE09ram_1-7u:17157: 6.034.019c vajradaṃṣṭro mahākāyas tau cobhau śukasāraṇau 6.034.020a te tu rāmeṇa bāṇaughaḥ sarvamarmasu tāḍitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17160: 6.034.021c diśaś cakāra vimalāḥ pradiśaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17161: 6.034.022a ye tv anye rākṣasā vīrā rāmasyābhimukhe sthitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17162: 6.034.022c te 'pi naṣṭāḥ samāsādya pataṃgā iva pāvakam 6.034.023a suvarṇapuṅkhair viśikhaiḥ saṃpatadbhiḥ sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17163: 6.034.023c babhūva rajanī citrā khadyotair iva śāradī
GE09ram_1-7u:17164: 6.034.024a rākṣasānāṃ ca ninadair harīṇāṃ cāpi garjitaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17165: 6.034.024c sā babhūva niśā ghorā bhūyo ghoratarā tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:17166: 6.034.025a tena śabdena mahatā pravṛddhena samantataḥ 6.034.025c trikūṭaḥ kandarākīrṇaḥ pravyāharad ivācalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17169: 6.034.027a aṅgadas tu raṇe śatruṃ nihantuṃ samupasthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17170: 6.034.027c rāvaṇer nijaghānāśu sārathiṃ ca hayān api
GE09ram_1-7u:17171: 6.034.028a indrajit tu rathaṃ tyaktvā hatāśvo hatasārathiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17176: 6.034.030a sa rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva ghorair nāgamayaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17177: 6.034.030c bibheda samare kruddhaḥ sarvagātreṣu rākṣasaḥ 6.035.001a sa tasya gatim anvicchan rājaputraḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_1-7u:17179: 6.035.002a dvau suṣeṇasya dāyādau nīlaṃ ca plavagarṣabham
GE09ram_1-7u:17180: 6.035.002c aṅgadaṃ vāliputraṃ ca śarabhaṃ ca tarasvinam
GE09ram_1-7u:17181: 6.035.003a vinataṃ jāmbavantaṃ ca sānuprasthaṃ mahābalam 6.035.003c ṛṣabhaṃ carṣabhaskandham ādideśa paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17182: 6.035.004a te saṃprahṛṣṭā harayo bhīmān udyamya pādapān
GE09ram_1-7u:17183: 6.035.004c ākāśaṃ viviśuḥ sarve mārgāmāṇā diśo daśa
GE09ram_1-7u:17184: 6.035.005a teṣāṃ vegavatāṃ vegam iṣubhir vegavattaraiḥ 6.035.005c astravit paramāstreṇa vārayām āsa rāvaṇiḥ 6.035.006a taṃ bhīmavegā harayo nārācaiḥ kṣatavikṣatāḥ 6.035.006c andhakāre na dadṛśur meghaiḥ sūryam ivāvṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:17186: 6.035.007c bhṛśam āveśayām āsa rāvaṇiḥ samitiṃjayaḥ 6.035.008a nirantaraśarīrau tu bhrātarau
GE09ram_1-7u:17187: 6.035.008c kruddhenendrajotā vīrau pannagaiḥ śaratāṃ gataiḥ 6.035.009a tayoḥ kṣatajamārgeṇa susrāva rudhiraṃ bahu 6.035.009c tāv ubhau ca prakāśete puṣpitāv iva kiṃśukau
GE09ram_1-7u:17191: 6.035.011c draṣṭum āsādituṃ vāpi na śaktaḥ kiṃ punar yuvām 6.035.012a prāvṛtāv iṣujālena rāghavau kaṅkapatriṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:17193: 6.035.013a evam uktvā tu dharmajñau bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:17194: 6.035.013c nirbibheda śitair bāṇaiḥ prajaharṣa nanāda ca
GE09ram_1-7u:17196: 6.035.014c bhūyo bhūyaḥ śarān ghorān visasarja mahāmṛdhe
GE09ram_1-7u:17197: 6.035.015a tato marmasu marmajño majjayan niśitāñ śarān
GE09ram_1-7u:17198: 6.035.015c rāmalakṣmaṇayor vīro nanāda ca muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17199: 6.035.016a baddhau tu śarabandhena tāv ubhau raṇamūrdhani
GE09ram_1-7u:17202: 6.035.017c dhvajāv iva mahendrasya rajjumuktau prakampitau 6.035.018a tau saṃpracalitau vīrau marmabhedena karśitau 6.035.018c nipetatur maheṣvāsau jagatyāṃ jagatīpatī
GE09ram_1-7u:17203: 6.035.019a tau vīraśayane vīrau śayānau rudhirokṣitau 6.035.019c śaraveṣṭitasarvāṅgāv ārtau
GE09ram_1-7u:17204: 6.035.020a na hy aviddhaṃ tayor gātraṃ babhūvāṅgulam antaram
GE09ram_1-7u:17205: 6.035.020c nānirbhinnaṃ na cāstabdham ā karāgrād ajihmagaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17206: 6.035.021a tau tu krūreṇa nihatau rakṣasā kāmarūpiṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:17207: 6.035.021c asṛksusruvatus tīvraṃ jalaṃ prasravaṇāv iva 6.035.022a papāta prathamaṃ rāmo viddho marmasu mārgaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17208: 6.035.022c krodhād indrajitā yena purā śakro vinirjitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17209: 6.035.023a nāracair ardhanārācair bhallair añjalikair api 6.035.023c vivyādha vatsadantaiś ca siṃhadaṃṣṭraiḥ kṣurais tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:17210: 6.035.024a sa vīraśayane śiśye vijyam ādāya kārmukam
GE09ram_1-7u:17213: 6.035.025c sa tatra lakṣmaṇo dṛṣṭvā nirāśo jīvite 'bhavat
GE09ram_1-7u:17214: 6.035.026a baddhau tu vīrau patitau śayānau; tau vānarāḥ saṃparivārya
GE09ram_1-7u:17216: 6.035.026c samāgatā vāyusutapramukhyā; viṣadam ārtāḥ paramaṃ ca jagmuḥ 6.036.001a tato dyāṃ pṛthivīṃ caiva vīkṣamāṇā vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17217: 6.036.001c dadṛśuḥ saṃtatau bāṇair bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau 6.036.002a vṛṣṭvevoparate deve kṛtakarmaṇi rākṣase
GE09ram_1-7u:17218: 6.036.002c ājagāmātha taṃ deśaṃ sasugrīvo vibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.036.003a nīladvividamaindāś ca suṣeṇasumukhāṅgadāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17219: 6.036.003c tūrṇaṃ hanumatā sārdham anvaśocanta rāghavau 6.036.004a niśceṣṭau mandaniḥśvāsau
GE09ram_1-7u:17221: 6.036.005a niḥśvasantau yathā sarpau niśceṣṭau mandavikramau 6.036.005c rudhirasrāvadigdhāṅgau tāpanīyāv iva dhvajau
GE09ram_1-7u:17222: 6.036.006a tau vīraśayane vīrau śayānau mandaceṣṭitau 6.036.006c yūthapais taiḥ parivṛtau
GE09ram_1-7u:17224: 6.036.007c babhūvur vyathitāḥ sarve vānarāḥ savibhīṣaṇāḥ 6.036.008a antarikṣaṃ nirīkṣanto diśaḥ sarvāś ca vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17225: 6.036.008c na cainaṃ māyayā channaṃ dadṛśū rāvaṇiṃ raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:17226: 6.036.009a taṃ tu māyāpraticchinnaṃ māyayaiva vibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.036.009c vīkṣamāṇo dadarśātha bhrātuḥ putram avasthitam 6.036.010a tam apratima karmāṇam apratidvandvam āhave 6.036.010c dadarśāntarhitaṃ vīraṃ varadānād vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17227: 6.036.011a indrajit tv ātmanaḥ karma tau śayānau samīkṣya ca 6.036.011c uvāca paramaprīto harṣayan sarvanairṛtān
GE09ram_1-7u:17228: 6.036.012a dūṣaṇasya ca hantārau kharasya ca mahābalau
GE09ram_1-7u:17229: 6.036.012c sāditau māmakair bāṇair bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau 6.036.013a nemau mokṣayituṃ śakyāv etasmād iṣubandhanāt 6.036.013c sarvair api samāgamya sarṣisaṅghaiḥ surāsuraiḥ 6.036.014a yatkṛte cintayānasya śokārtasya pitur mama 6.036.014c aspṛṣṭvā śayanaṃ gātrais triyāmā yāti śarvatī
GE09ram_1-7u:17230: 6.036.015a kṛtsneyaṃ yatkṛte laṅkā nadī varṣāsv ivākulā
GE09ram_1-7u:17232: 6.036.016a rāmasya lakṣmaṇasyaiva sarveṣāṃ ca vanaukasām 6.036.016c vikramā niṣphalāḥ sarve yathā śaradi toyadāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17233: 6.036.017a evam uktvā tu tān sarvān rākṣasān paripārśvagān
GE09ram_1-7u:17234: 6.036.017c yūthapān api tān sarvāṃs tāḍayām āsa rāvaṇiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17235: 6.036.018a tān ardayitvā bāṇaughais trāsayitvā ca vānarān
GE09ram_1-7u:17236: 6.036.018c prajahāsa mahābāhur vacanaṃ cedam abravīt 6.036.019a śarabandhena ghoreṇa mayā baddhau camūmukhe 6.036.019c sahitau bhrātarāv etau niśāmayata rākṣasāḥ 6.036.020a evam uktās tu te sarve rākṣasāḥ kūṭayodhinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17237: 6.036.020c paraṃ vismayam ājagmuḥ karmaṇā tena toṣitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17238: 6.036.021a vineduś ca mahānādān sarve te jaladopamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17239: 6.036.021c hato rāma iti jñātvā rāvaṇiṃ samapūjayan
GE09ram_1-7u:17240: 6.036.022a niṣpandau tu tadā dṛṣṭvā tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:17241: 6.036.022c vasudhāyāṃ nirucchvāsau hatāv ity anvamanyata 6.036.023a harṣeṇa tu samāviṣṭa indrajit samitiṃjayaḥ 6.036.023c praviveśa purīṃ laṅkāṃ harṣayan sarvanairṛtān 6.036.024a rāmalakṣmaṇayor dṛṣṭvā śarīre sāyakaiś cite 6.036.024c sarvāṇi cāṅgopāṅgāni sugrīvaṃ bhayam āviśat 6.036.025a tam uvāca paritrastaṃ vānarendraṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.036.025c sabāṣpavadanaṃ dīnaṃ śokavyākulalocanam
GE09ram_1-7u:17242: 6.036.026a alaṃ trāsena sugrīva bāṣpavego nigṛhyatām 6.036.026c evaṃ prāyāṇi yuddhāni vijayo nāsti naiṣṭhikaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17244: 6.036.027c moham etau prahāsyete bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau 6.036.028a paryavasthāpayātmānam anāthaṃ māṃ ca vānara 6.036.028c satyadharmānuraktānāṃ nāsti mṛtyukṛtaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_1-7u:17245: 6.036.029a evam uktvā tatas tasya jalaklinnena pāṇinā
GE09ram_1-7u:17246: 6.036.029c sugrīvasya śubhe netre pramamārja vibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.036.030a pramṛjya vadanaṃ tasya kapirājasya dhīmataḥ 6.036.030c abravīt kālasaṃprātam asaṃbhrāntam idaṃ vacaḥ 6.036.031a na kālaḥ kapirājendra vaiklavyam anuvartitum 6.036.031c atisneho 'py akāle 'smin maraṇāyopapadyate
GE09ram_1-7u:17249: 6.036.033a atha vā rakṣyatāṃ rāmo yāvat saṃjñā viparyayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17250: 6.036.033c labdhasaṃjñau tu kākutsthau bhayaṃ no vyapaneṣyataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17251: 6.036.034a naitat kiṃ cana rāmasya na ca rāmo mumūrṣati 6.036.034c na hy enaṃ hāsyate lakṣmīr durlabhā yā gatāyuṣām 6.036.035a tasmād āśvāsayātmānaṃ balaṃ cāśvāsaya svakam 6.036.035c yāvat sarvāṇi sainyāni punaḥ saṃsthāpayāmy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:17252: 6.036.036a ete hy utphullanayanās trāsād āgatasādhvasāḥ 6.036.036c karṇe karṇe prakathitā harayo haripuṃgava 6.036.037a māṃ tu dṛṣṭvā pradhāvantam anīkaṃ saṃpraharṣitum
GE09ram_1-7u:17253: 6.036.037c tyajantu harayas trāsaṃ bhuktapūrvām iva srajam
GE09ram_1-7u:17254: 6.036.038a samāśvāsya tu sugrīvaṃ rākṣasendro vibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.036.038c vidrutaṃ vānarānīkaṃ tat samāśvāsayat punaḥ 6.036.039a indrajit tu mahāmāyaḥ sarvasainyasamāvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17255: 6.036.039c viveśa nagarīṃ laṅkāṃ pitaraṃ cābhyupāgamat 6.036.040a tatra rāvaṇam āsīnam abhivādya kṛtāñjaliḥ 6.036.040c ācacakṣe priyaṃ pitre nihatau rāmalakṣmaṇau 6.036.041a utpapāta tato hṛṣṭaḥ putraṃ ca pariṣasvaje
GE09ram_1-7u:17256: 6.036.041c rāvaṇo rakṣasāṃ madhye śrutvā śatrū nipātitau
GE09ram_1-7u:17257: 6.036.042a upāghrāya sa mūrdhny enaṃ papraccha prītamānasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17258: 6.036.042c pṛcchate ca yathāvṛttaṃ pitre sarvaṃ nyavedayat
GE09ram_1-7u:17259: 6.036.043a sa harṣavegānugatāntarātmā; śrutvā vacas tasya mahārathasya
GE09ram_1-7u:17260: 6.036.043c jahau jvaraṃ dāśaratheḥ samutthitaṃ; prahṛṣya vācābhinananda putram
GE09ram_1-7u:17261: 6.037.001a pratipraviṣṭe laṅkāṃ tu kṛtārthe rāvaṇātmaje 6.037.001c rāghavaṃ parivāryārtā rarakṣur vānararṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17262: 6.037.002a hanūmān aṅgado nīlaḥ suṣeṇaḥ kumudo nalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17263: 6.037.002c gajo gavākṣo gavayaḥ śarabho gandhamādanaḥ 6.037.003a jāmbavān ṛṣabhaḥ sundo rambhaḥ śatabaliḥ pṛthuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17264: 6.037.003c vyūḍhānīkāś ca yattāś ca drumān ādāya sarvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17265: 6.037.004a vīkṣamāṇā diśaḥ sarvās tiryag ūrdhvaṃ ca vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17266: 6.037.004c tṛṇeṣv api ca ceṣṭatsu rākṣasā iti menire
GE09ram_1-7u:17267: 6.037.005a rāvaṇaś cāpi saṃhṛṣṭo visṛjyendrajitaṃ sutam 6.037.005c ājuhāva tataḥ sītā rakṣaṇī rākṣasīs tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:17268: 6.037.006a rākṣasyas trijaṭā cāpi śāsanāt tam upasthitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17269: 6.037.006c tā uvāca tato hṛṣṭo rākṣasī rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17271: 6.037.007c puṣpakaṃ ca samāropya darśayadhvaṃ hatau raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:17272: 6.037.008a yad āśrayād avaṣṭabdho neyaṃ mām upatiṣṭhati
GE09ram_1-7u:17273: 6.037.008c so 'syā bhartā saha bhrātrā nirasto raṇamūrdhani 6.037.009a nirviśaṅkā nirudvignā nirapekṣā ca maithilī 6.037.009c mām upasthāsyate sītā sarvābharaṇabhūṣitā
GE09ram_1-7u:17274: 6.037.010a adya kālavaśaṃ prāptaṃ raṇe rāmaṃ salakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:17275: 6.037.010c avekṣya vinivṛttāśā nānyāṃ gatim apaśyatī 6.037.011a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ 6.037.011c rākṣasyas tās tathety uktvā prajagmur yatra puṣpakam
GE09ram_1-7u:17276: 6.037.012a tataḥ puṣpakam ādaya rākṣasyo rāvaṇājñayā 6.037.012c aśokavanikāsthāṃ tāṃ maithilīṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:17277: 6.037.013a tām ādāya tu rākṣasyo bhartṛśokaparāyaṇām 6.037.013c sītām āropayām āsur vimānaṃ puṣpakaṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:17278: 6.037.014a tataḥ puṣpakam āropya sītāṃ trijaṭayā saha
GE09ram_1-7u:17279: 6.037.014c rāvaṇo 'kārayal laṅkāṃ patākādhvajamālinīm 6.037.015a prāghoṣayata hṛṣṭaś ca laṅkāyāṃ rākṣaseśvaraḥ 6.037.015c rāghavo lakṣmaṇaś caiva hatāv indrajitā raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:17280: 6.037.016a vimānenāpi sītā tu gatvā trijaṭayā saha
GE09ram_1-7u:17281: 6.037.016c dadarśa vānarāṇāṃ tu sarvaṃ sinyaṃ nipātitam
GE09ram_1-7u:17284: 6.037.018a tataḥ sītā dadarśobhau śayānau śatatalpayoḥ 6.037.018c lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva rāmaṃ ca visaṃjñau śarapīḍitau
GE09ram_1-7u:17287: 6.037.020a tau dṛṣṭvā bhrātarau tatra vīrau sā puruṣarṣabhau
GE09ram_1-7u:17288: 6.037.020c duḥkhārtā subhṛśaṃ sītā karuṇaṃ vilalāpa ha
GE09ram_1-7u:17289: 6.037.021a sā bāṣpaśokābhihatā samīkṣya; tau bhrātarau devasamaprabhāvau
GE09ram_1-7u:17290: 6.037.021c vitarkayantī nidhanaṃ tayoḥ sā; duḥkhānvitā vākyam idaṃ jagāda
GE09ram_1-7u:17291: 6.038.001a bhartāraṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_1-7u:17292: 6.038.001c vilalāpa bhṛśaṃ sītā karuṇaṃ śokakarśitā 6.038.002a ūcur lakṣaṇikā ye māṃ putriṇy avidhaveti ca
GE09ram_1-7u:17294: 6.038.003a yajvano mahiṣīṃ ye mām ūcuḥ patnīṃ ca satriṇaḥ 6.038.003c te 'dya sarve hate rāme 'jñānino 'nṛtavādinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17295: 6.038.004a vīrapārthivapatnī tvaṃ ye dhanyeti ca māṃ viduḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17297: 6.038.005a ūcuḥ saṃśravaṇe ye māṃ dvijāḥ kārtāntikāḥ śubhām
GE09ram_1-7u:17299: 6.038.006a imāni khalu padmāni pādayor yaiḥ kila striyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17302: 6.038.007c nātmanas tāni paśyāmi paśyantī hatalakṣaṇā 6.038.008a satyānīmāni padmāni strīṇām uktvāni lakṣaṇe 6.038.008c tāny adya nihate rāme vitathāni bhavanti me
GE09ram_1-7u:17303: 6.038.009a keśāḥ sūkṣmāḥ samā nīlā bhruvau cāsaṃgate mama
GE09ram_1-7u:17304: 6.038.009c vṛtte cālomaśe jaṅghe dantāś cāviralā mama
GE09ram_1-7u:17305: 6.038.010a śaṅkhe netre karau pādau gulphāv ūrū ca me citau
GE09ram_1-7u:17306: 6.038.010c anuvṛttā nakhāḥ snigdhāḥ samāś cāṅgulayo mama
GE09ram_1-7u:17307: 6.038.011a stanau cāviralau pīnau mamemau magnacūcukau 6.038.011c magnā cotsaṅginī nābhiḥ pārśvoraskaṃ ca me citam
GE09ram_1-7u:17308: 6.038.012a mama varṇo maṇinibho mṛdūny aṅgaruhāṇi ca
GE09ram_1-7u:17309: 6.038.012c pratiṣṭhitāṃ dvadaśabhir mām ūcuḥ śubhalakṣaṇām 6.038.013a samagrayavam acchidraṃ pāṇipādaṃ ca varṇavat 6.038.013c mandasmitety eva ca māṃ kanyālakṣaṇikā viduḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17311: 6.038.014c kṛtāntakuśalair uktaṃ tat sarvaṃ vitathīkṛtam 6.038.015a śodhayitvā janasthānaṃ pravṛttim upalabhya ca 6.038.015c tīrtvā sāgaram akṣobhyaṃ bhrātarau goṣpade hatau
GE09ram_1-7u:17312: 6.038.016a nanu vāruṇam āgneyam aindraṃ vāyavyam eva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:17313: 6.038.016c astraṃ brahmaśiraś caiva rāghavau pratyapadyatām 6.038.017a adṛśyamānena raṇe māyayā vāsavopamau
GE09ram_1-7u:17314: 6.038.017c mama nāthāv anāthāyā nihatau rāmalakṣmaṇau 6.038.018a na hi dṛṣṭipathaṃ prāpya rāghavasya raṇe ripuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17315: 6.038.018c jīvan pratinivarteta yady api syān manojavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17317: 6.038.019c yatra rāmaḥ saha bhrātrā śete yudhi nipāthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17318: 6.038.020a nāhaṃ śocāmi bhartāraṃ nihataṃ na ca lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:17319: 6.038.020c nātmānaṃ jananī cāpi yathā śvaśrūṃ tapasvinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:17320: 6.038.021a sā hi cintayate nityaṃ samāptavratam āgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:17321: 6.038.021c kadā drakṣyāmi sītāṃ ca rāmaṃ ca sahalakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:17323: 6.038.022c mā viṣādaṃ kṛthā devi bhartāyaṃ tava jīvati
GE09ram_1-7u:17324: 6.038.023a kāraṇāni ca vakṣyāmi mahānti sadṛśāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:17325: 6.038.023c yathemau jīvato devi bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau 6.038.024a na hi kopaparītāni harṣaparyutsukāni ca 6.038.024c bhavanti yudhi yodhānāṃ mukhāni nihate patau
GE09ram_1-7u:17326: 6.038.025a idaṃ vimānaṃ vaidehi puṣpakaṃ nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17327: 6.038.025c divyaṃ tvāṃ dhārayen nedaṃ yady etau gajajīvitau
GE09ram_1-7u:17329: 6.038.026c senā bhramati saṃkhyeṣu hatakarṇeva naur jale
GE09ram_1-7u:17330: 6.038.027a iyaṃ punar asaṃbhrāntā nirudvignā tarasvinī 6.038.027c senā rakṣati kākutsthau māyayā nirjitau raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:17331: 6.038.028a sā tvaṃ bhava suvisrabdhā anumānaiḥ sukhodayaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17332: 6.038.028c ahatau paśya kākutsthau snehād etad bravīmi te
GE09ram_1-7u:17333: 6.038.029a anṛtaṃ noktapūrvaṃ me na ca vakṣye kadā cana 6.038.029c cāritrasukhaśīlatvāt praviṣṭāsi mano mama
GE09ram_1-7u:17334: 6.038.030a nemau śakyau raṇe jetuṃ sendrair api surāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17335: 6.038.030c etayor ānanaṃ dṛṣṭvā mayā cāveditaṃ tava
GE09ram_1-7u:17336: 6.038.031a idaṃ ca sumahac cihnaṃ śanaiḥ paśyasva maithili
GE09ram_1-7u:17337: 6.038.031c niḥsaṃjñāv apy ubhāv etau naiva lakṣmīr viyujyate
GE09ram_1-7u:17339: 6.038.032c dṛśyamāneṣu vaktreṣu paraṃ bhavati vaikṛtam 6.038.033a tyaja śokaṃ ca duḥkhaṃ ca mohaṃ ca janakātmaje 6.038.033c rāmalakṣmaṇayor arthe nādya śakyam ajīvitum 6.038.034a śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasyāḥ sītā surasutopamā
GE09ram_1-7u:17340: 6.038.034c kṛtāñjalir uvācedam evam astv iti maithilī
GE09ram_1-7u:17341: 6.038.035a vimānaṃ puṣpakaṃ tat tu samivartya manojavam
GE09ram_1-7u:17342: 6.038.035c dīnā trijaṭayā sītā laṅkām eva praveśitā
GE09ram_1-7u:17343: 6.038.036a tatas trijaṭayā sārdhaṃ puṣpakād avaruhya sā
GE09ram_1-7u:17345: 6.038.037a praviśya sītā bahuvṛkṣaṣaṇḍāṃ; tāṃ rākṣasendrasya vihārabhūmim
GE09ram_1-7u:17346: 6.038.037c saṃprekṣya saṃcintya ca rājaputrau; paraṃ viṣādaṃ samupājagāma
GE09ram_1-7u:17348: 6.039.001c niśvasantau yathā nāgau śayānau rudhirokṣitau 6.039.002a sarve te vānaraśreṣṭhāḥ sasugrīvā mahābalāḥ 6.039.002c parivārya mahātmānau tasthuḥ śokapariplutāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17349: 6.039.003a etasminn antere rāmaḥ pratyabudhyata vīryavān 6.039.003c sthiratvāt sattvayogāc ca śaraiḥ saṃdānito 'pi san
GE09ram_1-7u:17350: 6.039.004a tato dṛṣṭvā sarudhiraṃ viṣaṇṇaṃ gāḍham arpitam
GE09ram_1-7u:17352: 6.039.005a kiṃ nu me sītayā kāryaṃ kiṃ kāryaṃ jīvitena vā
GE09ram_1-7u:17353: 6.039.005c śayānaṃ yo 'dya paśyāmi bhrātaraṃ yudhi nirjitam
GE09ram_1-7u:17354: 6.039.006a śakyā sītā samā nārī prāptuṃ loke vicinvatā
GE09ram_1-7u:17355: 6.039.006c na lakṣmaṇasamo bhrātā sacivaḥ sāmparāyikaḥ 6.039.007a parityakṣyāmy ahaṃ prāṇān vānarāṇāṃ tu paśyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:17357: 6.039.008a kiṃ nu vakṣyāmi kausalyāṃ mātaraṃ kiṃ nu kaikayīm 6.039.008c katham ambāṃ sumitrāṃca
GE09ram_1-7u:17358: 6.039.009a vivatsāṃ vepamānāṃ ca krośantīṃ kurarīm iva
GE09ram_1-7u:17359: 6.039.009c katham āśvāsayiṣyāmi yadi yāsyāmi taṃ vinā
GE09ram_1-7u:17360: 6.039.010a kathaṃ vakṣyāmi śatrughnaṃ bharataṃ ca yaśasvinam
GE09ram_1-7u:17361: 6.039.010c mayā saha vanaṃ yāto vinā tenāgataḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17362: 6.039.011a upālambhaṃ na śakṣyāmi soḍhuṃ bata sumitrayā
GE09ram_1-7u:17363: 6.039.011c ihaiva dehaṃ tyakṣyāmi na hi jīvitum utsahe
GE09ram_1-7u:17364: 6.039.012a dhiṅ māṃ duṣkṛtakarmāṇam anāryaṃ yatkṛte hy asau
GE09ram_1-7u:17365: 6.039.012c lakṣmaṇaḥ patitaḥ śete śaratalpe gatāsuvat 6.039.013a tvaṃ nityaṃ suviṣaṇṇaṃ mām āśvāsayasi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:17366: 6.039.013c gatāsur nādya śaknoṣi mām ārtam abhibhāṣitum
GE09ram_1-7u:17367: 6.039.014a yenādya bahavo yuddhe rākṣasā nihatāḥ kṣitau
GE09ram_1-7u:17368: 6.039.014c tasyām eva kṣitau vīraḥ sa śete nihataḥ paraiḥ 6.039.015a śayānaḥ śaratalpe 'smin svaśoṇitapariplutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17369: 6.039.015c śarajālaiś cito bhāti bhāskaro 'stam iva vrajan 6.039.016a bāṇābhihatamarmatvān na śaknoty abhivīkṣitum
GE09ram_1-7u:17370: 6.039.016c rujā cābruvato hy asya dṛṣṭirāgeṇa sūcyate
GE09ram_1-7u:17371: 6.039.017a yathaiva māṃ vanaṃ yāntam anuyāto mahādyutiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17372: 6.039.017c aham apy anuyāsyāmi tathaivainaṃ yamakṣayam 6.039.018a iṣṭabandhujano nityaṃ māṃ ca nityam anuvrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17373: 6.039.018c imām adya gato 'vasthāṃ mamānāryasya durnayaiḥ 6.039.019a suruṣṭenāpi vīreṇa lakṣmaṇenā na saṃsmare 6.039.019c paruṣaṃ vipriyaṃ vāpi śrāvitaṃ na kadā cana
GE09ram_1-7u:17375: 6.039.020c iṣvastreṣv adhikas tasmāt kārtavīryāc ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17376: 6.039.021a astrair astrāṇi yo hanyāc chakrasyāpi mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17378: 6.039.022a tac ca mithyā pralaptaṃ māṃ pradhakṣyati na saṃśayaḥ 6.039.022c yan mayā na kṛto rājā rākṣasānāṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17380: 6.039.023c matvā hīnaṃ mayā rājan rāvaṇo 'bhidraved balī
GE09ram_1-7u:17381: 6.039.024a aṅgadaṃ tu puraskṛtya sasainyaḥ sasuhṛjjanaḥ 6.039.024c sāgaraṃ tara sugrīva punas tenaiva setunā
GE09ram_1-7u:17382: 6.039.025a kṛtaṃ hanumatā kāryaṃ yad anyair duṣkaraṃ raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:17384: 6.039.026a aṅgadena kṛtaṃ karma maindena dvividena ca
GE09ram_1-7u:17385: 6.039.026c yuddhaṃ kesariṇā saṃkhye ghoraṃ saṃpātinā kṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:17386: 6.039.027a gavayena gavākṣeṇa śarabheṇa gajena ca 6.039.027c anyaiś ca haribhir yuddhaṃ madārthe tyaktajīvitaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17387: 6.039.028a na cātikramituṃ śakyaṃ daivaṃ sugrīva mānuṣaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17388: 6.039.028c yat tu śakyaṃ vayasyena suhṛdā vā paraṃtapa
GE09ram_1-7u:17389: 6.039.028e kṛtaṃ sugrīva tat sarvaṃ bhavatādharmabhīruṇā 6.039.029a mitrakāryaṃ kṛtam idaṃ bhavadbhir vānararṣabhāḥ 6.039.029c anujñātā mayā sarve yatheṣṭaṃ gantum arhatha
GE09ram_1-7u:17390: 6.039.030a śuśruvus tasya te sarve vānarāḥ paridevitam
GE09ram_1-7u:17391: 6.039.030c vartayāṃ cakrur aśrūṇi netraiḥ kṛṣṇetarekṣaṇāḥ 6.039.031a tataḥ sarvāṇy anīkāni sthāpayitvā vibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.039.031c ājagāma gadāpāṇis tvarito yatra rāghavaḥ 6.039.032a taṃ dṛṣṭvā tvaritaṃ yāntaṃ nīlāñjanacayopamam 6.039.032c vānarā dudruvuḥ sarve manyamānās tu rāvaṇim
GE09ram_1-7u:17393: 6.040.001c kim iyaṃ vyathitā senā mūḍhavāteva naur jale
GE09ram_1-7u:17395: 6.040.002c na tvaṃ paśyasi rāmaṃ ca lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam 6.040.003a śarajālācitau vīrāv ubhau daśarathātmajau
GE09ram_1-7u:17397: 6.040.004a athābravīd vānarendraḥ sugrīvaḥ putram aṅgadam 6.040.004c nānimittam idaṃ manye bhavitavyaṃ bhayena tu
GE09ram_1-7u:17398: 6.040.005a viṣaṇṇavadanā hy ete tyaktapraharaṇā diśaḥ 6.040.005c prapalāyanti harayas trāsād
GE09ram_1-7u:17399: 6.040.006a anyonyasya na lajjante na nirīkṣanti pṛṣṭhataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17400: 6.040.006c viprakarṣanti cānyonyaṃ patitaṃ laṅghayanti ca 6.040.007a etasminn antare vīro gadāpāṇir vibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.040.007c sugrīvaṃ vardhayām āsa rāghavaṃ ca niraikṣata
GE09ram_1-7u:17401: 6.040.008a vibhīṣaṇaṃ taṃ sugrīvo dṛṣṭvā vānarabhīṣaṇam 6.040.008c ṛkṣarājaṃ samīpasthaṃ jāmbavantam uvāca ha 6.040.009a vibhīṣaṇo 'yaṃ saṃprāpto yaṃ dṛṣṭvā vānararṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17403: 6.040.010a śīghram etān suvitrastān bahudhā vipradhāvitān 6.040.010c paryavasthāpayākhyāhi vibhīṣaṇam upasthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:17404: 6.040.011a sugrīveṇaivam uktas tu jāmbavān ṛkṣapārthivaḥ 6.040.011c vānarān sāntvayām āsa saṃnivartya prahāvataḥ 6.040.012a te nivṛttāḥ punaḥ sarve vānarās tyaktasaṃbhramāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17405: 6.040.012c ṛkṣarājavacaḥ śrutvā taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:17406: 6.040.013a vibhīṣaṇas tu rāmasya dṛṣṭvā gātraṃ śaraiś citam
GE09ram_1-7u:17407: 6.040.013c lakṣmaṇasya ca dharmātmā babhūva vyathitendriyaḥ 6.040.014a jalaklinnena hastena tayor netre pramṛjya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:17409: 6.040.015a imau tau sattvasaṃpannau vikrāntau priyasaṃyugau 6.040.015c imām avasthāṃ gamitau rākasaiḥ kūṭayodhibhiḥ 6.040.016a bhrātuḥ putreṇa me tena duṣputreṇa durātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:17410: 6.040.016c rākṣasyā jihmayā buddhyā chalitāv ṛjuvikramau 6.040.017a śarair imāv alaṃ viddhau rudhireṇa samukṣitau
GE09ram_1-7u:17411: 6.040.017c vasudhāyām ima suptau dṛśyete śalyakāv iva
GE09ram_1-7u:17412: 6.040.018a yayor vīryam upāśritya pratiṣṭhā kāṅkṣitā mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:17413: 6.040.018c tāv ubhau dehanāśāya prasuptau puruṣarṣabhau 6.040.019a jīvann adya vipanno 'smi naṣṭarājyamanorathaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17414: 6.040.019c prāptapratijñaś ca ripuḥ sakāmo rāvaṇaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17415: 6.040.020a evaṃ vilapamānaṃ taṃ pariṣvajya vibhīṣaṇam 6.040.020c sugrīvaḥ sattvasaṃpanno harirājo 'bravīd idam
GE09ram_1-7u:17416: 6.040.021a rājyaṃ prāpsyasi dharmajña laṅkāyāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17417: 6.040.021c rāvaṇaḥ saha putreṇa sa rājyaṃ neha lapsyate
GE09ram_1-7u:17419: 6.040.022c tyaktvā mohaṃ vadhiṣyete sagaṇaṃ rāvaṇaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:17420: 6.040.023a tam evaṃ sāntvayitvā tu samāśvāsya ca rākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:17421: 6.040.023c suṣeṇaṃ śvaśuraṃ pārśve sugrīvas tam uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:17422: 6.040.024a saha śūrair harigaṇair labdhasaṃjñāv ariṃdamau 6.040.024c gaccha tvaṃ bhrātarau gṛhya kiṣkindhāṃ rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:17423: 6.040.025a ahaṃ tu rāvaṇaṃ hatvā saputraṃ sahabāndhavam
GE09ram_1-7u:17424: 6.040.025c maithilīm ānayiṣyāmi śakro naṣṭām iva śriyam
GE09ram_1-7u:17425: 6.040.026a śrutvaitad vānarendrasya suṣeṇo vākyam abravīt 6.040.026c devāsuraṃ mahāyuddham anubhūtaṃ sudāruṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:17426: 6.040.027a tadā sma dānavā devāñ śarasaṃsparśakovidāḥ 6.040.027c nijaghnuḥ śastraviduṣaś chādayanto muhur muhuḥ 6.040.028a tān ārtān naṣṭasaṃjñāṃś ca parāsūṃś ca bṛhaspatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17428: 6.040.029a tāny auṣadhāny ānayituṃ kṣīrodaṃ yāntu sāgaram
GE09ram_1-7u:17429: 6.040.029c javena vānarāḥ śīghraṃ saṃpāti panasādayaḥ 6.040.030a harayas tu vijānanti pārvatī te mahauṣadhī
GE09ram_1-7u:17431: 6.040.031a candraś ca nāma droṇaś ca parvatau sāgarottame
GE09ram_1-7u:17432: 6.040.031c amṛtaṃ yatra mathitaṃ tatra te paramauṣadhī
GE09ram_1-7u:17433: 6.040.032a te tatra nihite devaiḥ parvate paramauṣadhī
GE09ram_1-7u:17434: 6.040.032c ayaṃ vāyusuto rājan hanūmāṃs tatra gacchatu
GE09ram_1-7u:17435: 6.040.033a etasminn antare vāyur meghāṃś cāpi savidyutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17436: 6.040.033c paryasyan sāgare toyaṃ kampayann iva parvatān
GE09ram_1-7u:17439: 6.040.035a abhavan pannagās trastā bhoginas tatravāsinaḥ 6.040.035c śīghraṃ sarvāṇi yādāṃsi jagmuś ca lavaṇārṇavam
GE09ram_1-7u:17440: 6.040.036a tato muhūrtad garuḍaṃ vainateyaṃ mahābalam 6.040.036c vānarā dadṛśuḥ sarve jvalantam iva pāvakam
GE09ram_1-7u:17441: 6.040.037a tam āgatam abhiprekṣya nāgās te vipradudruvuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17442: 6.040.037c yais tau satpuruṣau baddhau śarabhūtair mahābalau
GE09ram_1-7u:17443: 6.040.038a tataḥ suparṇaḥ kākutsthau dṛṣṭvā pratyabhinandya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:17444: 6.040.038c vimamarśa ca pāṇibhyāṃ mukhe candrasamaprabhe 6.040.039a vainateyena saṃspṛṣṭās tayoḥ saṃruruhur vraṇāḥ 6.040.039c suvarṇe ca tanū snigdhe tayor āśu babhūvatuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17445: 6.040.040a tejo vīryaṃ balaṃ cauja utsāhaś ca mahāguṇāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17446: 6.040.040c pradarśanaṃ ca buddhiś ca smṛtiś ca dviguṇaṃ tayoḥ 6.040.041a tāv utthāpya mahāvīryau garuḍo vāsavopamau 6.040.041c ubhau tau sasvaje hṛṣṭau rāmaś cainam uvāca ha 6.040.042a bhavatprasādād vyasanaṃ rāvaṇiprabhavaṃ mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:17447: 6.040.042c āvām iha vyatikrāntau śīghraṃ ca balinau kṛtau
GE09ram_1-7u:17448: 6.040.043a yathā tātaṃ daśarathaṃ yathājaṃ ca pitāmaham
GE09ram_1-7u:17449: 6.040.043c tathā bhavantam āsādya hṛṣayaṃ me prasīdati
GE09ram_1-7u:17452: 6.040.045a tam uvāca mahātejā vainateyo mahābalaḥ 6.040.045c patatrirājaḥ prītātmā harṣaparyākulekṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17453: 6.040.046a ahaṃ sakhā te kākutstha priyaḥ prāṇo bahiścaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17454: 6.040.046c garutmān iha saṃprāpto yuvayoḥ sāhyakāraṇāt 6.040.047a asurā vā mahāvīryā dānavā vā mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17455: 6.040.047c surāś cāpi sagandharvāḥ puraskṛtya śatakratum 6.040.048a nemaṃ mokṣayituṃ śaktāḥ śarabandhaṃ sudāruṇam 6.040.048c māyā balād indrajitā nirmitaṃ krūrakarmaṇā 6.040.049a ete nāgāḥ kādraveyās tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭrāviṣolbaṇāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17456: 6.040.049c rakṣomāyā prabhāvena śarā bhūtvā tvadāśritāḥ 6.040.050a sabhāgyaś cāsi dharmajña rāma satyaparākrama 6.040.050c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā samare ripughātinā 6.040.051a imaṃ śrutvā tu vṛttāntaṃ tvaramāṇo 'ham āgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17457: 6.040.051c sahasā yuvayoḥ snehāt sakhitvam anupālayan 6.040.052a mokṣitau ca mahāghorād asmāt sāyakabandhanāt 6.040.052c apramādaś ca kartavyo yuvābhyāṃ nityam eva hi
GE09ram_1-7u:17458: 6.040.053a prakṛtyā rākṣasāḥ sarve saṃgrāme kūṭayodhinaḥ 6.040.053c śūrāṇāṃ śuddhabhāvānāṃ bhavatām ārjavaṃ balam 6.040.054a tan na viśvasitavyaṃ vo rākṣasānāṃ raṇājire
GE09ram_1-7u:17460: 6.040.055a evam uktvā tato rāmaṃ suparṇaḥ sumahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17462: 6.040.056a sakhe rāghava dharmajña ripūṇām api vatsala
GE09ram_1-7u:17464: 6.040.057a bālavṛddhāvaśeṣāṃ tu laṅkāṃ kṛtvā śarormibhiḥ 6.040.057c rāvaṇaṃ ca ripuṃ hatvā sītāṃ samupalapsyase
GE09ram_1-7u:17465: 6.040.058a ity evam uktvā vacanaṃ suparṇaḥ śīghravikramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17466: 6.040.058c rāmaṃ ca virujaṃ kṛtvā madhye teṣāṃ vanaukasām
GE09ram_1-7u:17467: 6.040.059a pradakṣiṇaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā pariṣvajya ca vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:17468: 6.040.059c jagāmākāśam āviśya suparṇaḥ pavano yathā 6.040.060a virujau rāghavau dṛṣṭvā tato vānarayūthapāḥ 6.040.060c siṃhanādāṃs tadā nedur lāṅgūlaṃ dudhuvuś ca te
GE09ram_1-7u:17469: 6.040.061a tato bherīḥ samājaghnur mṛdaṅgāṃś ca vyanādayan
GE09ram_1-7u:17470: 6.040.061c dadhmuḥ śaṅkhān saṃprahṛṣṭāḥ kṣvelanty api yathāpuram
GE09ram_1-7u:17472: 6.040.062c drumān utpāṭya vividhāṃs tasthuḥ śatasahasraśaḥ 6.040.063a visṛjanto mahānādāṃs trāsayanto niśācarān
GE09ram_1-7u:17474: 6.040.064a tatas tu bhīmas tumulo ninādo; babhūva śākhāmṛgayūthapānām 6.040.064c kṣaye nidāghasya yathā ghanānāṃ; nādaḥ subhīmo nadatāṃ niśīthe
GE09ram_1-7u:17475: 6.041.001a teṣāṃ sutumulaṃ śabdaṃ vānarāṇāṃ tarasvinām 6.041.001c nardatāṃ rākṣasaiḥ sārdhaṃ tadā śuśrāva rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17476: 6.041.002a snigdhagambhīranirghoṣaṃ śrutvā sa ninadaṃ bhṛśam 6.041.002c sacivānāṃ tatas teṣāṃ madhye vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:17478: 6.041.003c bahūnāṃ sumahān nādo meghānām iva garjatām
GE09ram_1-7u:17479: 6.041.004a vyaktaṃ sumahatī prītir eteṣāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17480: 6.041.004c tathā hi vipulair nādaiś cukṣubhe varuṇālayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17481: 6.041.005a tau tu baddhau śarais tīṣkṇair bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:17482: 6.041.005c ayaṃ ca sumahān nādaḥ śaṅkāṃ janayatīva me
GE09ram_1-7u:17483: 6.041.006a etat tu vacanaṃ coktvā mantriṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17485: 6.041.007a jñāyatāṃ tūrṇam etaṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ vanacāriṇām 6.041.007c śokakāle samutpanne harṣakāraṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:17486: 6.041.008a tathoktās tena saṃbhrāntāḥ prākāram adhiruhya te
GE09ram_1-7u:17487: 6.041.008c dadṛśuḥ pālitāṃ senāṃ sugrīveṇa mahātmanā 6.041.009a tau ca muktau sughoreṇa śarabandhena rāghavau
GE09ram_1-7u:17488: 6.041.009c samutthitau mahābhāgau viṣeduḥ prekṣya rākṣasāḥ 6.041.010a saṃtrastahṛdayā sarve prākārād avaruhya te 6.041.010c viṣaṇṇavadanāḥ sarve rākṣasendram upasthitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17489: 6.041.011a tad apriyaṃ dīnamukhā rāvaṇasya niśācarāḥ 6.041.011c kṛtsnaṃ nivedayām āsur yathāvad vākyakovidāḥ 6.041.012a yau tāv indrajitā yuddhe bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:17491: 6.041.013a vimuktau śarabandhena tau dṛśyete raṇājire 6.041.013c pāśān iva gajāu chittvā gajendrasamavikramau 6.041.014a tac chrutvā vacanaṃ teṣāṃ rākṣasendro mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17493: 6.041.015a ghorair dattavarair baddhau śarair āśīviṣomapaiḥ 6.041.015c amoghaiḥ sūryasaṃkāśaiḥ pramathyendrajitā yudhi
GE09ram_1-7u:17494: 6.041.016a tam astrabandham āsādya yadi muktau ripū mama
GE09ram_1-7u:17495: 6.041.016c saṃśayastham idaṃ sarvam anupaśyāmy ahaṃ balam
GE09ram_1-7u:17496: 6.041.017a niṣphalāḥ khalu saṃvṛttāḥ śarā vāsukitejasaḥ 6.041.017c ādattaṃ yais tu saṃgrāme ripūṇāṃ mama jīvitam
GE09ram_1-7u:17497: 6.041.018a evam uktvā tu saṃkruddho niśvasann urago yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:17498: 6.041.018c abravīd rakṣasāṃ madhye dhūmrākṣaṃ nāma rākasaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:17499: 6.041.019a balena mahatā yukto rakṣasāṃ bhīmakarmaṇām 6.041.019c tvaṃ vadhāyābhiniryāhi rāmasya saha vānaraiḥ 6.041.020a evam uktas tu dhūmrākṣo rākṣasendreṇa dhīmatā
GE09ram_1-7u:17500: 6.041.020c kṛtvā praṇāmaṃ saṃhṛṣṭo nirjagāma nṛpālayāt 6.041.021a abhiniṣkramya taddvāraṃ balādhyakṣam uvāca ha 6.041.021c tvarayasva balaṃ tūrṇaṃ kiṃ cireṇa yuyutsataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17501: 6.041.022a dhūmrākṣasya vacaḥ śrutvā balādhyakṣo balānugaḥ 6.041.022c balam udyojayām āsa rāvaṇasyājñayā drutam 6.041.023a te baddhaghaṇṭā balino ghorarūpā niśācarāḥ 6.041.023c vinardamānāḥ saṃhṛṣṭā dhūmrākṣaṃ paryavārayan
GE09ram_1-7u:17503: 6.041.024c gadābhiḥ paṭṭasair daṇḍair āyasair musalair bhṛśam
GE09ram_1-7u:17504: 6.041.025a parighair bhiṇḍipālaiś ca bhallaiḥ prāsaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17505: 6.041.025c niryayū rākṣasā ghorā nardanto jaladā yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:17506: 6.041.026a rathaiḥ kavacinas tv anye dhvajaiś ca samalaṃkṛtaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17508: 6.041.027a hayaiḥ paramaśīghraiś ca gajendraiś ca madotkaṭaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17509: 6.041.027c niryayū rākṣasavyāghrā vyāghrā iva durāsadāḥ 6.041.028a vṛkasiṃhamukhair yuktaṃ kharaiḥ kanakabhūṣaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17510: 6.041.028c āruroha rathaṃ divyaṃ dhūmrākṣaḥ kharanisvanaḥ 6.041.029a sa niryāto mahāvīryo dhūmrākṣo rākṣasair vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17511: 6.041.029c prahasan paścimadvāraṃ hanūmān yatra yūthapaḥ 6.041.030a prayāntaṃ tu mahāghoraṃ rākṣasaṃ bhīmadarśanam 6.041.030c antarikṣagatāḥ krūrāḥ śakunāḥ pratyavārayan
GE09ram_1-7u:17512: 6.041.031a rathaśīrṣe mahābhīmo gṛdhraś ca nipapāta ha
GE09ram_1-7u:17513: 6.041.031c dhvajāgre grathitāś caiva nipetuḥ kuṇapāśanāḥ 6.041.032a rudhirārdro mahāñ śvetaḥ kabandhaḥ patito bhuvi
GE09ram_1-7u:17514: 6.041.032c visvaraṃ cotsṛjan nādaṃ dhūmrākṣasya samīpataḥ 6.041.033a vavarṣa rudhiraṃ devaḥ saṃcacāla ca medinī
GE09ram_1-7u:17516: 6.041.033e timiraughāvṛtās tatra diśaś ca na cakāśire
GE09ram_1-7u:17517: 6.041.034a sa tūtpātāṃs tato dṛṣṭvā rākṣasānāṃ bhayāvahān
GE09ram_1-7u:17519: 6.041.035a tataḥ subhīmo bahubhir niśācarair; vṛto 'bhiniṣkramya raṇotsuko balī 6.041.035c dadarśa tāṃ rāghavabāhupālitāṃ; samudrakalpāṃ bahuvānarīṃ camūm
GE09ram_1-7u:17520: 6.042.001a dhūmrākṣaṃ prekṣya niryāntaṃ rākṣasaṃ bhīmanisvanam 6.042.001c vinedur vānarāḥ sarve prahṛṣṭā yuddhakāṅkṣiṇaḥ 6.042.002a teṣāṃ tu tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ saṃjajñe harirakṣasām
GE09ram_1-7u:17521: 6.042.002c anyonyaṃ pādapair ghorair nighnataṃ śūlamudgaraiḥ 6.042.003a rākṣasair vānarā ghorā vinikṛttāḥ samantataḥ 6.042.003c vānarai rākṣasāś cāpi drumair bhūmau samīkṛtāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17522: 6.042.004a rākṣasāś cāpi saṃkruddhā vānarān niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17524: 6.042.005a te gadābhiś ca bhīmābhiḥ paṭṭasaiḥ kūṭamudgaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17525: 6.042.005c ghoraiś ca parighaiś citrais triśūlaiś cāpi saṃśitaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17526: 6.042.006a vidāryamāṇā rakṣobhir vānarās te mahābalāḥ 6.042.006c amarṣāj janitoddharṣāś cakruḥ karmāṇy abhītavat 6.042.007a śaranirbhinnagātrās te śūlanirbhinnadehinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17527: 6.042.007c jagṛhus te drumāṃs tatra śilāś ca hariyūthapāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17528: 6.042.008a te bhīmavegā harayo nardamānās tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17529: 6.042.008c mamanthū rākṣasān bhīmān nāmāni ca babhāṣire
GE09ram_1-7u:17530: 6.042.009a tad babhūvādbhutaṃ ghoraṃ yuddhaṃ vānararakṣasām 6.042.009c śilābhir vividhābhiś ca bahuśākhaiś ca pādapaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17531: 6.042.010a rākṣasā mathitāḥ ke cid vānarair jitakāśibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17532: 6.042.010c vavarṣū rudhiraṃ ke cin mukhai rudhirabhojanāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17533: 6.042.011a pārśveṣu dāritāḥ ke cit ke cid rāśīkṛtā drumaiḥ 6.042.011c śilābhiś cūrṇitāḥ ke cit ke cid dantair vidāritāḥ 6.042.012a dhvajair vimathitair bhagnaiḥ kharaiś ca vinipātitaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17534: 6.042.012c rathair vidhvaṃsitaiś cāpi patitai rajanīcaraiḥ 6.042.013a vānarair bhīmavikrāntair āplutyāplutya vegitaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17535: 6.042.013c rākṣasāḥ karajais tīkṣṇair mukheṣu vinikartitāḥ 6.042.014a vivarṇavadanā bhūyo
GE09ram_1-7u:17537: 6.042.015a naye tu paramakruddhā rākṣasā bhīmavikramāḥ 6.042.015c talair evābhidhāvanti vajrasparśasamair harīn
GE09ram_1-7u:17538: 6.042.016a vanarair āpatantas te vegitā vegavattaraiḥ 6.042.016c muṣṭibhiś caraṇair dantaiḥ pādapaiś cāpapothitāḥ 6.042.017a sanyaṃ tu vidrutaṃ dṛṣṭvā dhūmrākṣo rākṣasarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17539: 6.042.017c krodhena kadanaṃ cakre vānarāṇāṃ yuyutsatām 6.042.018a prāsaiḥ pramathitāḥ ke cid vānarāḥ śoṇitasravāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17540: 6.042.018c mudgarair āhatāḥ ke cit patitā dharaṇītale
GE09ram_1-7u:17541: 6.042.019a parighair mathitaḥ ke cid bhiṇḍipālair vidāritāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17542: 6.042.019c paṭṭasair āhatāḥ ke cid vihvalanto gatāsavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17543: 6.042.020a ke cid vinihatā bhūmau rudhirārdrā vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17544: 6.042.020c ke cid vidrāvitā naṣṭāḥ saṃkruddhai rākṣasair yudhi
GE09ram_1-7u:17545: 6.042.021a vibhinnahṛdayāḥ ke cid ekapārśvena śāyitāḥ 6.042.021c vidāritāstraśūlai ca ke cid āntrair vinisrutāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17546: 6.042.022a tat subhīmaṃ mahad yuddhaṃ harirākasa saṃkulam
GE09ram_1-7u:17549: 6.042.024a dhūmrākṣas tu dhanuṣpāṇir vānarān raṇamūrdhani 6.042.024c hasan vidrāvayām āsa diśas tāñ śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17550: 6.042.025a dhūmrākṣeṇārditaṃ sainyaṃ vyathitaṃ dṛśya mārutiḥ 6.042.025c abhyavartata saṃkruddhaḥ pragṛhya vipulāṃ śilām 6.042.026a krodhād dviguṇatāmrākṣaḥ pitṛtulyaparākramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17551: 6.042.026c śilāṃ tāṃ pātayām āsa dhūmrākṣasya rathaṃ prati
GE09ram_1-7u:17552: 6.042.027a āpatantīṃ śilāṃ dṛṣṭvā gadām udyamya saṃbhramāt
GE09ram_1-7u:17553: 6.042.027c rathād āplutya vegena vasudhāyāṃ vyatiṣṭhata 6.042.028a sā pramathya rathaṃ tasya nipapāta śilābhuvi
GE09ram_1-7u:17555: 6.042.029a sa bhaṅktvā tu rathaṃ tasya hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17556: 6.042.029c rakṣasāṃ kadanaṃ cakre saskandhaviṭapair drumaiḥ 6.042.030a vibhinnaśiraso bhūtvā rākṣasāḥ śoṇitokṣitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17557: 6.042.030c drumaiḥ pramathitāś cānye nipetur dharaṇītale 6.042.031a vidrāvya rākṣasaṃ sainyaṃ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ 6.042.031c gireḥ śikharam ādāya dhūmrākṣam abhidudruve 6.042.032a tam āpatantaṃ dhūmrākṣo gadām udyamya vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:17559: 6.042.033a tataḥ kruddhas tu vegena gadāṃ tāṃ bahukaṇṭakām
GE09ram_1-7u:17560: 6.042.033c pātayām āsa dhūmrākṣo mastake tu hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17561: 6.042.034a tāḍitaḥ sa tayā tatra gadayā bhīmarūpayā
GE09ram_1-7u:17562: 6.042.034c sa kapir mārutabalas taṃ prahāram acintayan
GE09ram_1-7u:17563: 6.042.034e dhūmrākṣasya śiro madhye giriśṛṅgam apātayat 6.042.035a sa vihvalitasarvāṅgo giriśṛṅgeṇa tāḍitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17564: 6.042.035c papāta sahasā bhūmau vikīrṇa iva parvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17565: 6.042.036a dhūmrākṣaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā hataśeṣā niśācarāḥ 6.042.036c trastāḥ praviviśur laṅkāṃ vadhyamānāḥ plavaṃgamaiḥ 6.042.037a sa tu pavanasuto nihatya śatruṃ; kṣatajavahāḥ saritaś ca
GE09ram_1-7u:17567: 6.042.037c ripuvadhajanitaśramo mahātmā; mudam agamat kapibhiś ca pūjyamānaḥ 6.043.001a dhūmrākṣaṃ nihataṃ śrutvā rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ 6.043.001c balādhyakṣam uvācedaṃ kṛtāñjalim upasthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:17568: 6.043.002a śīghraṃ niryāntu durdharṣā rākṣasā bhīmavikramāḥ 6.043.002c akampanaṃ puraskṛtya
GE09ram_1-7u:17572: 6.043.004c rākasaiḥ saṃvṛto ghorais tadā niryāty akampanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17573: 6.043.005a na hi kampayituṃ śakyaḥ surair api mahāmṛdhe
GE09ram_1-7u:17574: 6.043.005c akampanas tatas teṣām āditya iva tejasā
GE09ram_1-7u:17576: 6.043.006c akasmād dainyam āgacchad dhayānāṃ rathavāhinām 6.043.007a vyasphuran nayanaṃ cāsya savyaṃ yuddhābhinandinaḥ 6.043.007c vivarṇo mukhavarṇaś ca gadgadaś cābhavat svaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17577: 6.043.008a abhavat sudine cāpi durdine rūkṣamārutam 6.043.008c ūcuḥ khagā mṛgāḥ sarve vācaḥ krūrā bhayāvahāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17579: 6.043.009c tān utpātān acintyaiva nirjagāma raṇājiram 6.043.010a tadā nirgacchatas tasya rakṣasaḥ saha rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17580: 6.043.010c babhūva sumahān nādaḥ kṣobhayann iva sāgaram
GE09ram_1-7u:17581: 6.043.011a tena śabdena vitrastā vānarāṇāṃ mahācamūḥ 6.043.011c drumaśailapraharaṇā yoddhuṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:17582: 6.043.012a teṣāṃ yuddhaṃ mahāraudraṃ saṃjajñe kapirakṣasām 6.043.012c rāmarāvaṇayor arthe
GE09ram_1-7u:17583: 6.043.013a sarve hy atibalāḥ śūrāḥ sarve parvatasaṃnibhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17586: 6.043.014c śuśruve sumahān krodhād anyonyam abhigarjatām 6.043.015a rajaś cāruṇavarṇābhaṃ subhīmam abhavad bhṛśam 6.043.015c uddhūtaṃ harirakṣobhiḥ saṃrurodha diśo daśa 6.043.016a anyonyaṃ rajasā tena kauśeyoddhūtapāṇḍunā
GE09ram_1-7u:17587: 6.043.016c saṃvṛtāni ca bhūtāni dadṛśur na raṇājire
GE09ram_1-7u:17588: 6.043.017a na dhvajo na patākāvā varma vā turago 'pi vā
GE09ram_1-7u:17589: 6.043.017c āyudhaṃ syandanaṃ vāpi dadṛśe tena reṇunā
GE09ram_1-7u:17590: 6.043.018a śabdaś ca sumahāṃs teṣāṃ nardatām abhidhāvatām
GE09ram_1-7u:17591: 6.043.018c śrūyate tumule yuddhe na rūpāṇi cakāśire
GE09ram_1-7u:17592: 6.043.019a harīn eva susaṃkruddhā harayo jaghnur āhave
GE09ram_1-7u:17593: 6.043.019c rākṣasāś cāpi rakṣāṃsi nijaghnus timire tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:17594: 6.043.020a parāṃś caiva vinighnantaḥ svāṃś ca vānararākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17595: 6.043.020c rudhirārdraṃ tadā cakrur mahīṃ paṅkānulepanām 6.043.021a tatas tu rudhiraugheṇa siktaṃ vyapagataṃ rajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17597: 6.043.022a drumaśaktiśilāprāsair gadāparighatomaraiḥ 6.043.022c harayo rākṣasās tūrṇaṃ jaghnur anyonyam ojasā
GE09ram_1-7u:17599: 6.043.023c harayo bhīmakarmāṇo rākṣasāñ jaghnur āhave 6.043.024a rākṣasāś cāpi saṃkruddhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17600: 6.043.024c kapīn nijaghnire tatra śastraiḥ paramadāruṇaiḥ 6.043.025a harayas tv api rakṣāṃsi mahādrumamahāśmabhiḥ 6.043.025c vidārayanty abhikramya śastrāṇy ācchidya vīryataḥ 6.043.026a etasminn antare vīrā harayaḥ kumudo nalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17601: 6.043.026c maindaś ca paramakruddhaś cakrur vegam anuttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:17602: 6.043.027a te tu vṛkṣair mahāvegā rākṣasānāṃ camūmukhe
GE09ram_1-7u:17603: 6.043.027c kadanaṃ sumaha cakrur līlayā hariyūthapāḥ 6.044.001a tad dṛṣṭvā sumahat karma kṛtaṃ vānarasattamaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17604: 6.044.001c krodham āhārayām āsa yudhi tīvram akampanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17606: 6.044.002c dṛṣṭvā tu karma śatrūṇāṃ sārathiṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:17607: 6.044.003a tatraiva tāvat tvaritaṃ rathaṃ prāpaya sārathe
GE09ram_1-7u:17608: 6.044.003c ete 'tra bahavo ghnanti subahūn rākṣasān raṇe 6.044.004a ete 'tra balavanto hi bhīmakāyāś ca vānarāḥ 6.044.004c drumaśailapraharaṇās tiṣṭhanti pramukhe mama
GE09ram_1-7u:17609: 6.044.005a etān nihantum icchāmi samaraślāghino hy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:17610: 6.044.005c etaiḥ pramathitaṃ sarvaṃ dṛśyate rākṣasaṃ balam
GE09ram_1-7u:17611: 6.044.006a tataḥ prajavitāśvena rathena rathināṃ varaḥ 6.044.006c harīn abhyahanat krodhāc charajālair akampanaḥ 6.044.007a na sthātuṃ vānarāḥ śekuḥ kiṃ punar yoddhum āhave 6.044.007c akampanaśarair bhagnāḥ sarva eva pradudruvuḥ 6.044.008a tān mṛtyuvaśam āpannān akampanavaśaṃ gatān 6.044.008c samīkṣya hanumāñ jñātīn upatasthe mahābalaḥ 6.044.009a taṃ mahāplavagaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve plavagayūthapāḥ 6.044.009c sametya samare vīrāḥ sahitāḥ paryavārayan 6.044.010a vyavasthitaṃ hanūmantaṃ te dṛṣṭvā hariyūthapāḥ 6.044.010c babhūvur balavanto hi balavantam upāśritāḥ 6.044.011a akampanas tu śailābhaṃ hanūmantam avasthitam 6.044.011c mahendra iva dhārābhiḥ śarair abhivavarṣa ha
GE09ram_1-7u:17612: 6.044.012a acintayitvā bāṇaughāñ śarīre patitāñ śitān 6.044.012c akampanavadhārthāya mano dadhre mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17613: 6.044.013a sa prahasya mahātejā hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ 6.044.013c abhidudrāva tad rakṣaḥ kampayann iva medinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:17615: 6.044.014c babhūva rūpaṃ durdharṣaṃ dīptasyeva vibhāvasoḥ 6.044.015a ātmānaṃ tv apraharaṇaṃ jñātvā krodhasamanvitaḥ 6.044.015c śailam utpāṭayām āsa vegena haripuṃgavaḥ 6.044.016a taṃ gṛhītvā mahāśailaṃ pāṇinaikena mārutiḥ 6.044.016c vinadya sumahānādaṃ bhrāmayām āsa vīryavān 6.044.017a tatas tam abhidudrāva rākṣasendram akampanam 6.044.017c yathā hi namuciṃ saṃkhye vajreṇeva puraṃdaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17616: 6.044.018a akampanas tu tad dṛṣṭvā giriśṛṅgaṃ samudyatam
GE09ram_1-7u:17617: 6.044.018c dūrād eva mahābāṇair ardhacandrair vyadārayat 6.044.019a tat parvatāgram ākāśe
GE09ram_1-7u:17618: 6.044.019c vikīrṇaṃ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā hanūmān krodhamūrchitaḥ 6.044.020a so 'śvakarṇaṃ samāsādya roṣadarpānvito hariḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17619: 6.044.020c tūrṇam utpāṭayām āsa mahāgirim ivocchritam 6.044.021a taṃ gṛhītvā mahāskandhaṃ so 'śvakarṇaṃ mahādyutiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17620: 6.044.021c prahasya parayā prītyā bhrāmayām āsa saṃyuge
GE09ram_1-7u:17621: 6.044.022a pradhāvann uruvegena prabhañjaṃs tarasā drumān 6.044.022c hanūmān paramakruddhaś caraṇair dārayat kṣitim 6.044.023a gajāṃś ca sagajārohān sarathān rathinas tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:17622: 6.044.023c jaghāna hanumān dhīmān rākṣasāṃś ca padātikān
GE09ram_1-7u:17623: 6.044.024a tam antakam iva kruddhaṃ samare prāṇahāriṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:17625: 6.044.025a tam āpatantaṃ saṃkruddhaṃ rākṣasānāṃ bhayāvaham 6.044.025c dadarśākampano vīraś cukrodha ca nanāda ca
GE09ram_1-7u:17626: 6.044.026a sa caturdaśabhir bāṇaiḥ śitair dehavidāraṇaiḥ 6.044.026c nirbibheda hanūmantaṃ mahāvīryam akampanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17627: 6.044.027a sa tathā pratividdhas tu bahvībhiḥ śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17628: 6.044.027c hanūmān dadṛśe vīraḥ prarūḍha iva sānumān
GE09ram_1-7u:17629: 6.044.028a tato 'nyaṃ vṛkṣam utpāṭya kṛtvā vegam anuttamam 6.044.028c śirasy abhijaghānāśu rākṣasendram akampanam
GE09ram_1-7u:17630: 6.044.029a sa vṛkṣeṇa hatas tena sakrodhena mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:17631: 6.044.029c rākṣaso vānarendreṇa papāta sa mamāra ca
GE09ram_1-7u:17632: 6.044.030a taṃ dṛṣṭvā nihataṃ bhūmau rākṣasendram akampanam
GE09ram_1-7u:17633: 6.044.030c vyathitā rākṣasāḥ sarve kṣitikampa iva drumāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17634: 6.044.031a tyaktapraharaṇāḥ sarve rākṣasās te parājitāḥ 6.044.031c laṅkām abhiyayus trastā vānarais tair abhidrutāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17635: 6.044.032a te muktakeśāḥ saṃbhrāntā bhagnamānāḥ parājitāḥ 6.044.032c sravacchramajalair aṅgaiḥ śvasanto vipradudruvuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17636: 6.044.033a anyonyaṃ pramamantus te viviśur nagaraṃ bhayāt
GE09ram_1-7u:17637: 6.044.033c pṛṣṭhatas te susaṃmūḍhāḥ prekṣamāṇā muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17638: 6.044.034a teṣu laṅkāṃ praviṣṭeṣu rākṣaseṣu mahābalāḥ 6.044.034c sametya harayaḥ sarve hanūmantam apūjayan 6.044.035a so 'pi prahṛṣṭas tān sarvān harīn saṃpratyapūjayat 6.044.035c hanūmān sattvasaṃpanno yathārham anukūlataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17639: 6.044.036a vineduś ca yathā prāṇaṃ harayo jitakāśinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17640: 6.044.036c cakarṣuś ca punas tatra saprāṇān eva rākṣasān
GE09ram_1-7u:17641: 6.044.037a sa vīraśobhām abhajan mahākapiḥ; sametya rakṣāṃsi nihatya
GE09ram_1-7u:17643: 6.044.037c mahāsuraṃ bhīmam amitranāśanaṃ; yathaiva viṣṇur balinaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:17645: 6.044.038a apūjayan devagaṇās tadā kapiṃ; svayaṃ ca rāmo 'tibalaś ca lakṣmaṇaḥ 6.044.038c tathaiva sugrīvamukhāḥ plavaṃgamā; vibhīṣaṇaś caiva mahābalas
GE09ram_1-7u:17647: 6.045.001a akampanavadhaṃ śrutvā kruddho vai rākṣaseśvaraḥ 6.045.001c kiṃ cid dīnamukhaś cāpi sacivāṃs tān udaikṣata
GE09ram_1-7u:17648: 6.045.002a sa tu dhyātvā muhūrtaṃ tu mantribhiḥ saṃvicārya ca 6.045.002c purīṃ pariyayau laṅkāṃ sarvān gulmān avekṣitum
GE09ram_1-7u:17649: 6.045.003a tāṃ rākṣasagaṇair guptāṃ gulmair bahubhir āvṛtām
GE09ram_1-7u:17651: 6.045.004a ruddhāṃ tu nagarīṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17654: 6.045.005c nānyaṃ yuddhāt prapaśyāmi mokṣaṃ yuddhaviśārada 6.045.006a ahaṃ vā kumbhakarṇo vā tvaṃ vā senāpatir mama 6.045.006c indrajid vā nikumbho vā vaheyur bhāram īdṛśam
GE09ram_1-7u:17655: 6.045.007a sa tvaṃ balam itaḥ śīghram ādāya parigṛhya ca 6.045.007c vijayāyābhiniryāhi yatra sarve vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17656: 6.045.008a niryāṇād eva te nūnaṃ capalā harivāhinī
GE09ram_1-7u:17657: 6.045.008c nardatāṃ rākṣasendrāṇāṃ śrutvā nādaṃ draviṣyati 6.045.009a capalā hy avinītāś ca calacittāś ca vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17658: 6.045.009c na sahiṣyanti te nādaṃ siṃhanādam iva dvipāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17659: 6.045.010a vidrute ca bale tasmin rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_1-7u:17662: 6.045.011c pratilomānulomaṃ vā yad vā no manyase hitam
GE09ram_1-7u:17663: 6.045.012a rāvaṇenaivam uktas tu prahasto vāhinīpatiḥ 6.045.012c rākṣasendram uvācedam asurendram ivośanā
GE09ram_1-7u:17664: 6.045.013a rājan mantritapūrvaṃ naḥ kuśalaiḥ saha mantribhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17665: 6.045.013c vivādaś cāpi no vṛttaḥ samavekṣya parasparam
GE09ram_1-7u:17666: 6.045.014a pradānena tu sītāyāḥ śreyo vyavasitaṃ mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:17667: 6.045.014c apradāne punar yuddhaṃ dṛṣṭam etat tathaiva naḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17668: 6.045.015a so 'haṃ dānaiś ca mānaiś ca satataṃ pūjitas tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:17669: 6.045.015c sāntvaiś ca vividhaiḥ kāle kiṃ na kuryāṃ priyaṃ tava
GE09ram_1-7u:17670: 6.045.016a na hi me jīvitaṃ rakṣyaṃ putradāradhanāni vā
GE09ram_1-7u:17671: 6.045.016c tvaṃ paśya māṃ juhūṣantaṃ tvadarthe jīvitaṃ yudhi
GE09ram_1-7u:17672: 6.045.017a evam uktvā tu bhartāraṃ rāvaṇaṃ vāhinīpatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17673: 6.045.017c samānayata me śīghraṃ rākṣasānāṃ mahad balam
GE09ram_1-7u:17675: 6.045.018c adya tṛpyantu māṃsena pakṣiṇaḥ kānanaukasām 6.045.019a ity uktās te prahastena balādhyakṣāḥ kṛtatvarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17676: 6.045.019c balam udyojayām āsus tasmin rākṣasamandire 6.045.020a sā babhūva muhūrtena tigmanānāvidhāyudhaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17677: 6.045.020c laṅkā rākṣasavīrais tair gajair iva samākulā
GE09ram_1-7u:17678: 6.045.021a hutāśanaṃ tarpayatāṃ brāhmaṇāṃś ca namasyatām 6.045.021c ājyagandhaprativahaḥ surabhir māruto vavau
GE09ram_1-7u:17679: 6.045.022a srajaś ca vividhākārā jagṛhus tv abhimantritāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17680: 6.045.022c saṃgrāmasajjāḥ saṃhṛṣṭā dhārayan rākṣasās tadā 6.045.023a sadhanuṣkāḥ kavacino vegād āplutya rākṣasāḥ 6.045.023c rāvaṇaṃ prekṣya rājānaṃ prahastaṃ paryavārayan 6.045.024a athāmantrya ca rājānaṃ bherīm āhatya bhairavām
GE09ram_1-7u:17681: 6.045.024c āruroha rathaṃ divyaṃ prahastaḥ sajjakalpitam 6.045.025a hayair mahājavair yuktaṃ samyak sūtasusaṃyutam 6.045.025c mahājaladanirghoṣaṃ sākṣāc candrārkabhāsvaram
GE09ram_1-7u:17684: 6.045.027a tatas taṃ ratham āsthāya rāvaṇārpitaśāsanaḥ 6.045.027c laṅkāyā niryayau tūrṇaṃ balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17686: 6.045.028c śuśruve śaṅkhaśabdaś ca prayāte vāhinīpatau 6.045.029a ninadantaḥ svarān ghorān rākṣasā jagmur agrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17688: 6.045.030a vyūḍhenaiva sughoreṇa pūrvadvārāt sa niryayau 6.045.030c gajayūthanikāśena balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17689: 6.045.031a sāgarapratimaughena vṛtas tena balena saḥ 6.045.031c prahasto niryayau tūrṇaṃ kruddhaḥ kālāntakopamaḥ 6.045.032a tasya niryāṇa ghoṣeṇa rākṣasānāṃ ca nardatām
GE09ram_1-7u:17690: 6.045.032c laṅkāyāṃ sarvabhūtāni vinedur vikṛtaiḥ svaraiḥ 6.045.033a vyabhram ākāśam āviśya
GE09ram_1-7u:17691: 6.045.033c maṇḍalāny apasavyāni khagāś cakrū rathaṃ prati
GE09ram_1-7u:17692: 6.045.034a vamantyaḥ pāvakajvālāḥ śivā ghorā vavāśire 6.045.035a antarikṣāt papātolkā vāyuś ca paruṣo vavau
GE09ram_1-7u:17693: 6.045.035c anyonyam abhisaṃrabdhā grahāś ca na cakāśire
GE09ram_1-7u:17694: 6.045.036a vavarṣū rudhiraṃ cāsya siṣicuś ca puraḥsarān
GE09ram_1-7u:17695: 6.045.036c ketumūrdhani gṛdhro 'sya vilīno dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ 6.045.037a sārather bahuśaś cāsya saṃgrāmam avagāhataḥ 6.045.037c pratodo nyapatad dhastāt sūtasya hayasādinaḥ 6.045.038a niryāṇa śrīś ca yāsyāsīd bhāsvarā ca sudurlabhā
GE09ram_1-7u:17696: 6.045.038c sā nanāśa muhūrtena same ca skhalitā hayāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17697: 6.045.039a prahastaṃ tv abhiniryāntaṃ prakhyāta balapauruṣam 6.045.039c yudhi nānāpraharaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:17698: 6.045.040a atha ghoṣaḥ sutumulo harīṇāṃ samajāyata 6.045.040c vṛkṣān ārujatāṃ caiva gurvīś cāgṛhṇatāṃ śilāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17701: 6.045.041e parasparaṃ cāhvayatāṃ ninādaḥ śrūyate mahān 6.045.042a tataḥ prahastaḥ kapirājavāhinīm; abhipratasthe vijayāya durmatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17702: 6.045.042c vivṛddhavegāṃ ca viveśa tāṃ camūṃ; yathā mumūrṣuḥ śalabho
GE09ram_1-7u:17704: 6.046.001a tataḥ prahastaṃ niryāntaṃ bhīmaṃ bhīmaparākramam 6.046.001c garjantaṃ sumahākāyaṃ rākṣasair abhisaṃvṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:17705: 6.046.002a dadarśa mahatī senā vānarāṇāṃ balīyasām 6.046.002c atisaṃjātaroṣāṇāṃ prahastam
GE09ram_1-7u:17706: 6.046.003a khaḍgaśaktyaṣṭibāṇāś ca śūlāni musalāni ca 6.046.003c gadāś ca parighāḥ prāsā vividhāś ca paraśvadhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17707: 6.046.004a dhanūṃṣi ca vicitrāṇi rākṣasānāṃ jayaiṣiṇām 6.046.004c pragṛhītāny aśobhanta vānarān abhidhāvatām
GE09ram_1-7u:17708: 6.046.005a jagṛhuḥ pādapāṃś cāpi puṣpitān vānararṣabhāḥ 6.046.005c śilāś ca vipulā dīrghā yoddhukāmāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17709: 6.046.006a teṣām anyonyam āsādya saṃgrāmaḥ sumahān abhūt
GE09ram_1-7u:17710: 6.046.006c bahūnām aśmavṛṣṭiṃ ca śaravṛṣṭiṃ ca varṣatām
GE09ram_1-7u:17711: 6.046.007a bahavo rākṣasā yuddhe bahūn vānarayūthapān 6.046.007c vānarā rākṣasāṃś cāpi nijaghnur bahavo bahūn
GE09ram_1-7u:17712: 6.046.008a śūlaiḥ pramathitāḥ ke cit ke cit tu paramāyudhaiḥ 6.046.008c parighair āhatāḥ ke cit ke cic chinnāḥ paraśvadhaiḥ 6.046.009a nirucchvāsāḥ punaḥ ke cit patitā dharaṇītale
GE09ram_1-7u:17714: 6.046.010a ke cid dvidhākṛtāḥ khaḍgaiḥ sphurantaḥ patitā bhuvi
GE09ram_1-7u:17715: 6.046.010c vānarā rākṣasaiḥ śūlaiḥ pārśvataś ca vidāritāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17716: 6.046.011a vānaraiś cāpi saṃkruddhai rākṣasaughāḥ samantataḥ 6.046.011c pādapair giriśṛṅgaiś ca saṃpiṣṭā vasudhātale 6.046.012a vajrasparśatalair hastair muṣṭibhiś ca hatā bhṛśam
GE09ram_1-7u:17718: 6.046.013a ārtasvaraṃ ca svanatāṃ siṃhanādaṃ ca nardatām
GE09ram_1-7u:17719: 6.046.013c babhūva tumulaḥ śabdo harīṇāṃ rakṣasāṃ yudhi
GE09ram_1-7u:17720: 6.046.014a vānarā rākṣasāḥ kruddhā vīramārgam anuvratāḥ 6.046.014c vivṛttanayanāḥ krūrāś cakruḥ karmāṇy abhītavat 6.046.015a narāntakaḥ kumbhahanur mahānādaḥ samunnataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17721: 6.046.015c ete prahastasacivāḥ sarve jaghnur vanaukasaḥ 6.046.016a teṣām āpatatāṃ śīghraṃ nighnatāṃ cāpi vānarān
GE09ram_1-7u:17723: 6.046.017a durmukhaḥ punar utpāṭya kapiḥ sa vipuladrumam
GE09ram_1-7u:17724: 6.046.017c rākṣasaṃ kṣiprahastas tu samunnatam apothayat 6.046.018a jāmbavāṃs tu susaṃkruddhaḥ pragṛhya mahatīṃ śilām
GE09ram_1-7u:17725: 6.046.018c pātayām āsa tejasvī mahānādasya vakṣasi 6.046.019a atha kumbhahanus tatra tāreṇāsādya vīryavān 6.046.019c vṛkṣeṇābhihato mūrdhni prāṇāṃs tatyāja rākṣasaḥ 6.046.020a amṛṣyamāṇas tat karma prahasto ratham āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17726: 6.046.020c cakāra kadanaṃ ghoraṃ dhanuṣpāṇir vanaukasām 6.046.021a āvarta iva saṃjajñe ubhayoḥ senayos tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:17728: 6.046.022a mahatā hi śaraugheṇa prahasto yuddhakovidaḥ 6.046.022c ardayām āsa saṃkruddho vānarān paramāhave 6.046.023a vānarāṇāṃ śarīrais tu rākṣasānāṃ ca medinī
GE09ram_1-7u:17729: 6.046.023c babhūva nicitā ghorā patitair iva parvataiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17731: 6.046.024c saṃchannā mādhave māsi palāśair iva puṣpitaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17733: 6.046.025c śoṇitaughamahātoyāṃ yamasāgaragāminīm 6.046.026a yakṛtplīhamahāpaṅkāṃ vinikīrṇāntraśaivalām 6.046.026c bhinnakāyaśiromīnām aṅgāvayavaśāḍvalām 6.046.027a gṛdhrahaṃsagaṇākīrṇāṃ kaṅkasārasasevitām 6.046.027c medhaḥphenasamākīrṇām ārtastanitanisvanām 6.046.028a tāṃ kāpuruṣadustārāṃ yuddhabhūmimayīṃ nadīm
GE09ram_1-7u:17735: 6.046.029a rākṣasāḥ kapimukhyāś ca terus tāṃ dustarāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_1-7u:17737: 6.046.030a tataḥ sṛjantaṃ bāṇaughān prahastaṃ syandane sthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:17738: 6.046.030c dadarśa tarasā nīlo vinighnantaṃ plavaṃgamān 6.046.031a sa taṃ paramadurdharṣam āpatantaṃ mahākapiḥ 6.046.031c prahastaṃ tāḍayām āsa vṛkṣam utpāṭya vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:17739: 6.046.032a sa tenābhihataḥ kruddho nadan rākṣasapuṃgavaḥ 6.046.032c vavarṣa śaravarṣāṇi plavagānāṃ camūpatau
GE09ram_1-7u:17741: 6.046.033c yathaiva govṛṣo varṣaṃ śāradaṃ śīghram āgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:17742: 6.046.034a evam eva prahastasya śaravarṣaṃ durāsadam 6.046.034c nimīlitākṣaḥ sahasā nīlaḥ sehe sudāruṇam 6.046.035a roṣitaḥ śaravarṣeṇa sālena mahatā mahān 6.046.035c prajaghāna hayān nīlaḥ prahastasya manojavān 6.046.036a vidhanus tu kṛtas tena prahasto vāhinīpatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17743: 6.046.036c pragṛhya musalaṃ ghoraṃ syandanād avapupluve 6.046.037a tāv ubhau vāhinīmukhyau jātaroṣau tarasvinau 6.046.037c sthitau kṣatajadigdhāṅgau prabhinnāv iva kuñjarau 6.046.038a ullikhantau sutīkṣṇābhir daṃṣṭrābhir itaretaram
GE09ram_1-7u:17745: 6.046.039c kāṅkṣamāṇau yaśaḥ prāptuṃ vṛtravāsavayoḥ samau 6.046.040a ājaghāna tadā nīlaṃ lalāṭe musalena saḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17746: 6.046.040c prahastaḥ paramāyastas tasya susrāva śoṇitam 6.046.041a tataḥ śoṇitadigdhāṅgaḥ pragṛhya sumahātarum
GE09ram_1-7u:17748: 6.046.042a tam acintyaprahāraṃ sa pragṛhya musalaṃ mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:17749: 6.046.042c abhidudrāva balinaṃ balī nīlaṃ plavaṃgamam 6.046.043a tam ugravegaṃ saṃrabdham āpatantaṃ mahākapiḥ 6.046.043c tataḥ saṃprekṣya jagrāha mahāvego mahāśilām 6.046.044a tasya yuddhābhikāmasya mṛdhe musalayodhinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17750: 6.046.044c prahastasya śilāṃ nīlo mūrdhni tūrṇam apātayat
GE09ram_1-7u:17751: 6.046.045a sā tena kapimukhyena vimuktā mahatī śilā
GE09ram_1-7u:17752: 6.046.045c bibheda bahudhā ghorā prahastasya śiras tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:17753: 6.046.046a sa gatāsur gataśrīko gatasattvo gatendriyaḥ 6.046.046c papāta sahasā bhūmau chinnamūla iva drumaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17755: 6.046.047c śarīrād api susrāva gireḥ prasravaṇaṃ yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:17756: 6.046.048a hate prahaste nīlena tad akampyaṃ mahad balam
GE09ram_1-7u:17757: 6.046.048c rakṣasām aprahṛṣṭānāṃ laṅkām abhijagāma ha 6.046.049a na śekuḥ samavasthātuṃ nihate vāhinīpatau 6.046.049c setubandhaṃ samāsādya viśīrṇaṃ salilaṃ yathā 6.046.050a hate tasmiṃś camūmukhye rākṣasas te nirudyamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17759: 6.046.051a tatas tu nīlo vijayī mahābalaḥ; praśasyamānaḥ svakṛtena karmaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:17760: 6.046.051c sametya rāmeṇa salakṣmaṇena; prahṛṣṭarūpas tu babhūva yūthapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17761: 6.047.001a tasmin hate rākṣasasainyapāle; plavaṃgamānām ṛṣabheṇa yuddhe
GE09ram_1-7u:17762: 6.047.001c bhīmāyudhaṃ sāgaratulyavegaṃ; pradudruve rākṣasarājasainyam 6.047.002a gatvā tu rakṣo'dhipateḥ śaśaṃsuḥ; senāpatiṃ pāvakasūnuśastam 6.047.002c tac cāpi teṣāṃ vacanaṃ niśamya; rakṣo'dhipaḥ krodhavaśaṃ jagāma 6.047.003a saṃkhye prahastaṃ nihataṃ niśamya; śokārditaḥ krodhaparītacetāḥ 6.047.003c uvāca tān nairṛtayodhamukhyān; indro yathā cāmarayodhamukhyān
GE09ram_1-7u:17763: 6.047.004a nāvajñā ripave kāryā yair indrabalasūdanaḥ 6.047.004c sūditaḥ sainyapālo me sānuyātraḥ sakuñjaraḥ 6.047.005a so 'haṃ ripuvināśāya vijayāyāvicārayan 6.047.005c svayam eva gamiṣyāmi raṇaśīrṣaṃ tad adbhutam
GE09ram_1-7u:17764: 6.047.006a adya tad vānarānīkaṃ rāmaṃ ca sahalakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:17765: 6.047.006c nirdahiṣyāmi bāṇaughair vanaṃ dīptair ivāgnibhiḥ 6.047.007a sa evam uktvā jvalanaprakāśaṃ; rathaṃ turaṃgottamarājiyuktam 6.047.007c prakāśamānaṃ vapuṣā jvalantaṃ; samārurohāmararājaśatruḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17767: 6.047.008c puṇyaiḥ stavaiś cāpy abhipūjyamānas; tadā yayau rākṣasarājamukhyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17768: 6.047.009a sa śailajīmūtanikāśa rūpair; māṃsāśanaiḥ pāvakadīptanetraiḥ 6.047.009c babhau vṛto rākṣasarājamukhyair; bhūtair vṛto rudra ivāmareśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17769: 6.047.010a tato nagaryāḥ sahasā mahaujā; niṣkramya tad vānarasainyam ugram
GE09ram_1-7u:17770: 6.047.010c mahārṇavābhrastanitaṃ dadarśa; samudyataṃ pādapaśailahastam 6.047.011a tad rākṣasānīkam atipracaṇḍam; ālokya rāmo bhujagendrabāhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17771: 6.047.011c vibhīṣaṇaṃ śastrabhṛtāṃ variṣṭham; uvāca senānugataḥ pṛthuśrīḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17774: 6.047.013a tatas tu rāmasya niśamya vākyaṃ; vibhīṣaṇaḥ śakrasamānavīryaḥ 6.047.013c śaśaṃsa rāmasya balapravekaṃ; mahātmanāṃ rākṣasapuṃgavānām 6.047.014a yo 'sau gajaskandhagato mahātmā; navoditārkopamatāmravaktraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17775: 6.047.014c prakampayan nāgaśiro 'bhyupaiti hy; akampanaṃ tv enam avehi rājan 6.047.015a yo 'sau rathastho mṛgarājaketur; dhūnvan dhanuḥ śakradhanuḥprakāśam
GE09ram_1-7u:17776: 6.047.015c karīva bhāty ugravivṛttadaṃṣṭraḥ; sa indrajin nāma
GE09ram_1-7u:17781: 6.047.017a yo 'sau navārkoditatāmracakṣur; āruhya ghaṇṭāninadapraṇādam 6.047.017c gajaṃ kharaṃ garjati vai mahātmā; mahodaro nāma sa eṣa vīraḥ 6.047.018a yo 'sau hayaṃ kāñcanacitrabhāṇḍam; āruhya saṃdhyābhragiriprakāśam 6.047.018c prāsaṃ samudyamya marīcinaddhaṃ; piśāca eṣāśanitulyavegaḥ 6.047.019a yaś caiṣa śūlaṃ niśitaṃ pragṛhya; vidyutprabhaṃ kiṃkaravajravegam 6.047.019c vṛṣendram āsthāya giriprakāśam; āyāti so 'sau triśirā yaśasvī 6.047.020a asau ca jīmūtanikāśa rūpaḥ; kumbhaḥ pṛthuvyūḍhasujātavakṣāḥ 6.047.020c samāhitaḥ pannagarājaketur; visphārayan bhāti dhanur vidhūnvan
GE09ram_1-7u:17782: 6.047.021a yaś caiṣa jāmbūnadavajrajuṣṭaṃ; dīptaṃ sadhūmaṃ parighaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:17785: 6.047.022a yaś caiṣa cāpāsiśaraughajuṣṭaṃ; patākinaṃ pāvakadīptarūpam 6.047.022c rathaṃ samāsthāya vibhāty udagro; narāntako 'sau nagaśṛṅgayodhī
GE09ram_1-7u:17788: 6.047.023c bhūtair vṛto bhāti vivṛttanetraiḥ; so 'sau surāṇām api darpahantā
GE09ram_1-7u:17789: 6.047.024a yatraitad indupratimaṃ vibhātic; chattraṃ sitaṃ sūkṣmaśalākam
GE09ram_1-7u:17791: 6.047.024c atraiṣa rakṣo'dhipatir mahātmā; bhūtair vṛto rudra ivāvabhāti
GE09ram_1-7u:17793: 6.047.025c mahendravaivasvatadarpahantā; rakṣo'dhipaḥ sūrya ivāvabhāti 6.047.026a pratyuvāca tato rāmo vibhīṣaṇam ariṃdamam 6.047.026c aho dīpto mahātejā rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ 6.047.027a āditya iva duṣprekṣyo raśmibhir bhāti rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17794: 6.047.027c suvyaktaṃ lakṣaye hy asya rūpaṃ tejaḥsamāvṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:17796: 6.047.028c yādṛśaṃ rākṣasendrasya vapur etat prakāśate 6.047.029a sarve parvatasaṃkāśāḥ sarve parvatayodhinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17797: 6.047.029c sarve dīptāyudhadharā yodhaś cāsya mahaujasaḥ 6.047.030a bhāti rākṣasarājo 'sau pradīptair bhīmavikramaiḥ 6.047.030c bhūtaiḥ parivṛtas tīkṣṇair dehavadbhir ivāntakaḥ 6.047.031a evam uktvā tato rāmo dhanur ādāya vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:17799: 6.047.032a tataḥ sa rakṣo'dhipatir mahātmā; rakṣāṃsi tāny āha mahābalāni
GE09ram_1-7u:17801: 6.047.033a visarjayitvā sahasā tatas tān; gateṣu rakṣaḥsu yathāniyogam
GE09ram_1-7u:17803: 6.047.034a tam āpatantaṃ sahasā samīkṣya; dīpteṣucāpaṃ yudhi rākṣasendram
GE09ram_1-7u:17804: 6.047.034c mahat samutpāṭya mahīdharāgraṃ; dudrāva rakṣo'dhipatiṃ harīśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17805: 6.047.035a tac chailaśṛṅgaṃ bahuvṛkṣasānuṃ; pragṛhya cikṣepa niśācarāya
GE09ram_1-7u:17806: 6.047.035c tam āpatantaṃ sahasā samīkṣya; bibheda bāṇais tapanīyapuṅkhaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17807: 6.047.036a tasmin pravṛddhottamasānuvṛkṣe; śṛṅge vikīrṇe patite pṛthivyām
GE09ram_1-7u:17808: 6.047.036c mahāhikalpaṃ śaram antakābhaṃ; samādade rākṣasalokanāthaḥ 6.047.037a sa taṃ gṛhītvānilatulyavegaṃ; savisphuliṅgajvalanaprakāśam
GE09ram_1-7u:17810: 6.047.038a sa sāyako rāvaṇabāhumuktaḥ; śakrāśaniprakhyavapuḥ śitāgraḥ 6.047.038c sugrīvam āsādya bibheda vegād; guheritā kraucam ivograśaktiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17811: 6.047.039a sa sāyakārto viparītacetāḥ; kūjan pṛthivyāṃ nipapāta vīraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17812: 6.047.039c taṃ prekṣya bhūmau patitaṃ visaṃjmaṃ; neduḥ prahṛṣṭā yudhi
GE09ram_1-7u:17814: 6.047.040a tato gavākṣo gavayaḥ sudaṃṣṭras; tatharṣabho jyotimukho nalaś
GE09ram_1-7u:17816: 6.047.040c śailān samudyamya vivṛddhakāyāḥ; pradudruvus taṃ prati
GE09ram_1-7u:17818: 6.047.041a teṣāṃ prahārān sa cakāra meghān; rakṣo'dhipo bāṇagaṇaiḥ śitāgraiḥ 6.047.041c tān vānarendrān api bāṇajālair; bibheda jāmbūnadacitrapuṅkhaiḥ 6.047.042a te vānarendrās tridaśāribāṇair; bhinnā nipetur bhuvi bhīmarūpāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17819: 6.047.042c tatas tu tad vānarasainyam ugraṃ; pracchādayām āsa sa
GE09ram_1-7u:17821: 6.047.043a te vadhyamānāḥ patitāgryavīrā; nānadyamānā bhayaśalyaviddhāḥ 6.047.043c śākhāmṛgā rāvaṇasāyakārtā; jagmuḥ śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ sma rāmam 6.047.044a tato mahātmā sa dhanur dhanuṣmān; ādāya rāmaḥ saharā jagāma
GE09ram_1-7u:17822: 6.047.044c taṃ lakṣmaṇaḥ prāñjalir abhyupetya; uvāca vākyaṃ paramārthayuktam
GE09ram_1-7u:17823: 6.047.045a kāmam āryaḥ suparyāpto vadhāyāsya durātmanaḥ 6.047.045c vidhamiṣyāmy ahaṃ nīcam anujānīhi māṃ vibho
GE09ram_1-7u:17824: 6.047.046a tam abravīn mahātejā rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ 6.047.046c gaccha yatnaparaś cāpi bhava lakṣmaṇa saṃyuge
GE09ram_1-7u:17826: 6.047.047c trailokyenāpi saṃkruddho duṣprasahyo na saṃśayaḥ 6.047.048a tasya cchidrāṇi mārgasva svacchidrāṇi ca gopaya
GE09ram_1-7u:17827: 6.047.048c cakṣuṣā dhanuṣā yatnād rakṣātmānaṃ samāhitaḥ 6.047.049a rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā saṃpariṣvajya pūjya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:17828: 6.047.049c abhivādya tato rāmaṃ yayau saumitrir āhavam
GE09ram_1-7u:17829: 6.047.050a sa rāvaṇaṃ vāraṇahastabāhur; dadarśa dīptodyatabhīmacāpam 6.047.050c pracchādayantaṃ śaravṛṣṭijālais; tān vānarān bhinnavikīrṇadehān
GE09ram_1-7u:17830: 6.047.051a tam ālokya mahātejā hanūmān mārutātmajā 6.047.051c nivārya śarajālāni pradudrāva sa rāvaṇam 6.047.052a rathaṃ tasya samāsādya bhujam udyamya dakṣiṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:17831: 6.047.052c trāsayan rāvaṇaṃ dhīmān hanūmān vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:17832: 6.047.053a devadānavagandharvā yakṣāś ca saha rākṣasaiḥ 6.047.053c avadhyatvāt tvayā bhagnā vānarebhyas tu te bhayam
GE09ram_1-7u:17833: 6.047.054a eṣa me dakṣiṇo bāhuḥ pañcaśākhaḥ samudyataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17834: 6.047.054c vidhamiṣyati te dehād bhūtātmānaṃ ciroṣitam 6.047.055a śrutvā hanūmato vākyaṃ rāvaṇo bhīmavikramaḥ 6.047.055c saṃraktanayanaḥ krodhād idaṃ vacanam abravīt 6.047.056a kṣipraṃ prahara niḥśaṅkaṃ sthirāṃ kīrtim avāpnuhi
GE09ram_1-7u:17835: 6.047.056c tatas tvāṃ jñātivikrāntaṃ nāśayiṣyāmi vānara 6.047.057a rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā vāyusūnur vaco 'bravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:17836: 6.047.057c prahṛtaṃ hi mayā pūrvam akṣaṃ smara sutaṃ tava 6.047.058a evam ukto mahātejā rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ 6.047.058c ājaghānānilasutaṃ talenorasi vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:17837: 6.047.059a sa talābhihatas tena cacāla ca muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17840: 6.047.061a saṃgrāme taṃ tathā dṛṣṭva rāvaṇaṃ talatāḍitam
GE09ram_1-7u:17841: 6.047.061c ṛṣayo vānarāḥ siddhā nedur devāḥ sahāsurāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17842: 6.047.062a athāśvasya mahātejā rāvaṇo vākyam abravīt 6.047.062c sādhu vānaravīryeṇa ślāghanīyo 'si me ripuḥ 6.047.063a rāvaṇenaivam uktas tu mārutir vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:17843: 6.047.063c dhig astu mama vīryaṃ tu yat tvaṃ jīvasi rāvaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:17844: 6.047.064a sakṛt tu praharedānīṃ durbuddhe kiṃ vikatthase
GE09ram_1-7u:17845: 6.047.064c tatas tvāṃ māmako muṣṭir nayiṣyāmi yathākṣayam
GE09ram_1-7u:17846: 6.047.064e tato mārutivākyena krodhas tasya tadājvalat 6.047.065a saṃraktanayano yatnān muṣṭim udyamya dakṣiṇam 6.047.065c pātayām āsa vegena vānarorasi vīryavān 6.047.065e hanūmān vakṣasi vyūdhe saṃcacāla hataḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17847: 6.047.066a vihvalaṃ taṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā hanūmantaṃ mahābalam
GE09ram_1-7u:17848: 6.047.066c rathenātirathaḥ śīghraṃ nīlaṃ prati samabhyagāt 6.047.067a pannagapratimair bhīmaiḥ paramarmātibhedibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17849: 6.047.067c śarair ādīpayām āsa nīlaṃ haricamūpatim 6.047.068a sa śaraughasamāyasto nīlaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17851: 6.047.069a hanūmān api tejasvī samāśvasto mahāmanāḥ 6.047.069c viprekṣamāṇo yuddhepsuḥ saroṣam idam abravīt 6.047.070a nīlena saha saṃyuktaṃ rāvaṇaṃ rākṣaseśvaram 6.047.070c anyena yudhyamānasya na yuktam abhidhāvanam 6.047.071a rāvaṇo 'pi mahātejās tac chṛṅgaṃ saptabhiḥ śaraiḥ 6.047.071c ājaghāna sutīkṣṇāgrais tad vikīrṇaṃ papāta ha
GE09ram_1-7u:17852: 6.047.072a tad vikīrṇaṃ gireḥ śṛṅgaṃ dṛṣṭvā haricamūpatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17853: 6.047.072c kālāgnir iva jajvāla krodhena paravīrahā 6.047.073a so 'śvakarṇān dhavān sālāṃś cūtāṃś cāpi supuṣpitān 6.047.073c anyāṃś ca vividhān vṛkṣān nīlaś cikṣepa saṃyuge
GE09ram_1-7u:17854: 6.047.074a sa tān vṛkṣān samāsādya praticiccheda rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17857: 6.047.075c hrasvaṃ kṛtvā tadā rūpaṃ dhvajāgre nipapāta ha
GE09ram_1-7u:17859: 6.047.076c jajvāla rāvaṇaḥ krodhāt tato nīlo nanāda ha
GE09ram_1-7u:17860: 6.047.077a dhvajāgre dhanuṣaś cāgre kirīṭāgre ca taṃ harim
GE09ram_1-7u:17861: 6.047.077c lakṣmaṇo 'tha hanūmāṃś ca dṛṣṭvā rāmaś ca vismitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17862: 6.047.078a rāvaṇo 'pi mahātejāḥ kapilāghavavismitaḥ 6.047.078c astram āhārayām āsa dīptam āgneyam adbhutam
GE09ram_1-7u:17863: 6.047.079a tatas te cukruśur hṛṣṭā labdhalakṣyāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17865: 6.047.080a vānarāṇāṃ ca nādena saṃrabdho rāvaṇas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:17866: 6.047.080c saṃbhramāviṣṭahṛdayo na kiṃ cit pratyapadyata 6.047.081a āgneyenātha saṃyuktaṃ gṛhītvā rāvaṇaḥ śaram 6.047.081c dhvajaśīrṣasthitaṃ nīlam udaikṣata niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17868: 6.047.082c kape lāghavayukto 'si māyayā parayānayā 6.047.083a jīvitaṃ khalu rakṣasva yadi śaknoṣi vānara
GE09ram_1-7u:17869: 6.047.083c tāni tāny ātmarūpāṇi sṛjase tvam anekaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17872: 6.047.085a evam uktvā mahābāhū rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ 6.047.085c saṃdhāya bāṇam astreṇa camūpatim atāḍayat 6.047.086a so 'strayuktena bāṇena nīlo vakṣasi tāḍitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17874: 6.047.087a pitṛmāhātmya saṃyogād ātmanaś cāpi tejasā 6.047.087c jānubhyām apatad bhūmau na ca prāṇair vyayujyata
GE09ram_1-7u:17875: 6.047.088a visaṃjñaṃ vānaraṃ dṛṣṭvā daśagrīvo raṇotsukaḥ 6.047.088c rathenāmbudanādena saumitrim abhidudruve
GE09ram_1-7u:17876: 6.047.089a tam āha saumitrir adīnasattvo; visphārayantaṃ dhanur aprameyam
GE09ram_1-7u:17877: 6.047.089c anvehi mām eva niśācarendra; na vānarāṃs tvaṃ prati yoddhum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:17878: 6.047.090a sa tasya vākyaṃ paripūrṇaghoṣaṃ; jyāśabdam ugraṃ ca niśamya rājā 6.047.090c āsādya saumitrim avasthitaṃ taṃ; kopānvitaṃ vākyam uvāca rakṣaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17881: 6.047.091c asmin kṣaṇe yāsyasi mṛtyudeśaṃ; saṃsādyamāno mama bāṇajālaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17882: 6.047.092a tam āha saumitrir avismayāno; garjantam udvṛttasitāgradaṃṣṭram 6.047.092c rājan na garjanti mahāprabhāvā; vikatthase pāpakṛtāṃ variṣṭha
GE09ram_1-7u:17883: 6.047.093a jānāmi vīryaṃ tava rākṣasendra; balaṃ pratāpaṃ ca parākramaṃ ca 6.047.093c avasthito 'haṃ śaracāpapāṇir; āgaccha kiṃ moghavikatthanena
GE09ram_1-7u:17884: 6.047.094a sa evam uktaḥ kupitaḥ sasarja; rakṣo'dhipaḥ saptaśarān supuṅkhān 6.047.094c tāṃl lakṣmaṇaḥ kāñcanacitrapuṅkhaiś; ciccheda bāṇair niśitāgradhāraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17885: 6.047.095a tān prekṣamāṇaḥ sahasā nikṛttān; nikṛttabhogān iva pannagendrān
GE09ram_1-7u:17886: 6.047.095c laṅkeśvaraḥ krodhavaśaṃ jagāma; sasarja cānyān niśitān pṛṣatkān
GE09ram_1-7u:17887: 6.047.096a sa bāṇavarṣaṃ tu vavarṣa tīvraṃ; rāmānujaḥ kārmukasaṃprayuktam 6.047.096c kṣurārdhacandrottamakarṇibhallaiḥ; śarāṃś ca ciccheda na cukṣubhe ca
GE09ram_1-7u:17888: 6.047.097a sa lakṣmaṇaś cāśu śarāñ śitāgrān; mahendravajrāśanitulyavegān
GE09ram_1-7u:17889: 6.047.097c saṃdhāya cāpe jvalanaprakāśān; sasarja rakṣo'dhipater vadhāya
GE09ram_1-7u:17890: 6.047.098a sa tān praciccheda hi rākṣasendraś; chittvā ca tāṃl lakṣmaṇam ājaghāna 6.047.098c śareṇa kālāgnisamaprabheṇa; svayambhudattena lalāṭadeśe 6.047.099a sa lakṣmaṇo rāvaṇasāyakārtaś; cacāla cāpaṃ śithilaṃ pragṛhya
GE09ram_1-7u:17891: 6.047.099c punaś ca saṃjñāṃ pratilabhya kṛcchrāc; ciccheda cāpaṃ tridaśendraśatroḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17892: 6.047.100a nikṛttacāpaṃ tribhir ājaghāna; bāṇais tadā dāśarathiḥ śitāgraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17893: 6.047.100c sa sāyakārto vicacāla rājā; kṛcchrāc ca saṃjñāṃ punar āsasāda 6.047.101a sa kṛttacāpaḥ śaratāḍitaś ca; svedārdragātro rudhirāvasiktaḥ 6.047.101c jagrāha śaktiṃ samudagraśaktiḥ; svayambhudattāṃ yudhi devaśatruḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17894: 6.047.102a sa tāṃ vidhūmānalasaṃnikāśāṃ; vitrāsanīṃ vānaravāhinīnām 6.047.102c cikṣepa śaktiṃ tarasā jvalantīṃ; saumitraye rākṣasarāṣṭranāthaḥ 6.047.103a tām āpatantīṃ bharatānujo 'strair; jaghāna bāṇaiś ca
GE09ram_1-7u:17896: 6.047.103c tathāpi sā tasya viveśa śaktir; bhujāntaraṃ dāśarather viśālam
GE09ram_1-7u:17897: 6.047.104a śaktyā brāmyā tu saumitris tāḍitas tu stanāntare
GE09ram_1-7u:17898: 6.047.104c viṣṇor acintyaṃ svaṃ bhāgam ātmānaṃ pratyanusmarat
GE09ram_1-7u:17901: 6.047.106a himavān mandaro merus trailokyaṃ vā sahāmaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17902: 6.047.106c śakyaṃ bhujābhyām uddhartuṃ na saṃkhye bharatānujaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17903: 6.047.107a athainaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ bhāgaṃ mānuṣaṃ deham āsthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:17905: 6.047.108a atha vāyusutaḥ kruddho rāvaṇaṃ samabhidravat 6.047.108c ājaghānorasi kruddho vajrakalpena muṣṭinā
GE09ram_1-7u:17907: 6.047.109c jānubhyām apatad bhūmau cacāla ca papāta ca
GE09ram_1-7u:17908: 6.047.110a visaṃjñaṃ rāvaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā samare bhīmavikramam 6.047.110c ṛṣayo vānarāś caiva nedur devāḥ savāsavāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17909: 6.047.111a hanūmān api tejasvī lakṣmaṇaṃ rāvaṇārditam 6.047.111c anayad rāghavābhyāśaṃ bāhubhyāṃ parigṛhya tam 6.047.112a vāyusūnoḥ suhṛttvena bhaktyā paramayā ca saḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17911: 6.047.113a taṃ samutsṛjya sā śaktiḥ saumitriṃ yudhi durjayam
GE09ram_1-7u:17912: 6.047.113c rāvaṇasya rathe tasmin sthānaṃ punar upāgamat
GE09ram_1-7u:17914: 6.047.114c ādade niśitān bāṇāñ jagrāha ca mahad dhanuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17915: 6.047.115a āśvastaś ca viśalyaś ca lakṣmaṇaḥ śatrusūdanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17916: 6.047.115c viṣṇor bhāgam amīmāṃsyam ātmānaṃ pratyanusmaran 6.047.116a nipātitamahāvīrāṃ vānarāṇāṃ mahācamūm
GE09ram_1-7u:17917: 6.047.116c rāghavas tu raṇe dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇaṃ samabhidravat
GE09ram_1-7u:17918: 6.047.117a athainam upasaṃgamya hanūmān vākyam abravīt 6.047.117c mama pṛṣṭhaṃ samāruhya rakṣasaṃ śāstum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:17919: 6.047.118a tac chrutvā rāghavo vākyaṃ vāyuputreṇa bhāṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:17920: 6.047.118c ārohat sahasā śūro hanūmantaṃ mahākapim 6.047.118e rathasthaṃ rāvaṇaṃ saṃkhye dadarśa manujādhipaḥ 6.047.119a tam ālokya mahātejāḥ pradudrāva sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17921: 6.047.119c vairocanam iva kruddho viṣṇur abhyudyatāyudhaḥ 6.047.120a jyāśabdam akarot tīvraṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:17922: 6.047.120c girā gambhīrayā rāmo rākṣasendram uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:17923: 6.047.121a tiṣṭha tiṣṭha mama tvaṃ hi kṛtvā vipriyam īdṛśam 6.047.121c kva nu rākṣasaśārdūla gato mokṣam avāpsyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:17924: 6.047.122a yadīndravaivasvata bhāskarān vā; svayambhuvaiśvānaraśaṃkarān vā 6.047.122c gamiṣyasi tvaṃ daśa vā diśo vā; tathāpi me nādya gato vimokṣyase 6.047.123a yaś caiṣa śaktyābhihatas tvayādya; icchan viṣādaṃ sahasābhyupetaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17925: 6.047.123c sa eṣa rakṣogaṇarāja mṛtyuḥ; saputradārasya tavādya yuddhe
GE09ram_1-7u:17926: 6.047.124a rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā rākṣasendro mahākapim 6.047.124c ājaghāna śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17929: 6.047.126a tato rāmo mahātejā rāvaṇena kṛtavraṇam 6.047.126c dṛṣṭvā plavagaśārdūlaṃ krodhasya vaśam eyivān 6.047.127a tasyābhisaṃkramya rathaṃ sacakraṃ;
GE09ram_1-7u:17933: 6.047.128a athendraśatruṃ tarasā jaghāna; bāṇena vajrāśanisaṃnibhena 6.047.128c bhujāntare vyūḍhasujātarūpe; vajreṇa meruṃ bhagavān ivendraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17934: 6.047.129a yo vajrapātāśanisaṃnipātān; na cukṣubhe nāpi cacāla rājā 6.047.129c sa rāmabāṇābhihato bhṛśārtaś; cacāla cāpaṃ ca mumoca vīraḥ 6.047.130a taṃ vihvalantaṃ prasamīkṣya rāmaḥ; samādade dīptam athārdhacandram
GE09ram_1-7u:17935: 6.047.130c tenārkavarṇaṃ sahasā kirīṭaṃ; ciccheda rakṣo'dhipater mahātmāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17937: 6.047.131c gataśriyaṃ kṛttakirīṭakūṭam; uvāca rāmo yudhi rākṣasendram
GE09ram_1-7u:17938: 6.047.132a kṛtaṃ tvayā karma mahat subhīmaṃ; hatapravīraś ca kṛtas
GE09ram_1-7u:17940: 6.047.132c tasmāt pariśrānta iti vyavasya; na tvaṃ śarair mṛtyuvaśaṃ nayāmi 6.047.133a sa evam ukto hatadarpaharṣo; nikṛttacāpaḥ sa hatāśvasūtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17941: 6.047.133c śarārditaḥ kṛttamahākirīṭo; viveśa laṅkāṃ sahasā sma rājā 6.047.134a tasmin praviṣṭe rajanīcarendre; mahābale dānavadevaśatrau 6.047.134c harīn viśalyān sahalakṣmaṇena; cakāra rāmaḥ paramāhavāgre
GE09ram_1-7u:17942: 6.047.135a tasmin prabhagne tridaśendraśatrau; surāsurā bhūtagaṇā diśaś ca
GE09ram_1-7u:17943: 6.047.135c sasāgarāḥ sarṣimahoragāś ca; tathaiva bhūmyambucarāś ca hṛṣṭāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17944: 6.048.001a sa praviśya purīṃ laṅkāṃ rāmabāṇabhayārditaḥ 6.048.001c bhagnadarpas tadā rājā babhūva vyathitendriyaḥ 6.048.002a mātaṃga iva siṃhena garuḍeneva pannagaḥ 6.048.002c abhibhūto 'bhavad rājā rāghaveṇa mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:17945: 6.048.003a brahmadaṇḍaprakāśānāṃ vidyutsadṛśavarcasām 6.048.003c smaran rāghavabāṇānāṃ vivyathe rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17946: 6.048.004a sa kāñcanamayaṃ divyam āśritya paramāsanam 6.048.004c vikprekṣamāṇo rakṣāṃsi rāvaṇo vākyam abravīt 6.048.005a sarvaṃ tat khalu me moghaṃ yat taptaṃ paramaṃ tapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17947: 6.048.005c yat samāno mahendreṇa mānuṣeṇāsmi nirjitaḥ 6.048.006a idaṃ tad brahmaṇo ghoraṃ vākyaṃ mām abhyupasthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:17948: 6.048.006c mānuṣebhyo vijānīhi bhayaṃ tvam iti tat tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:17949: 6.048.007a devadānavagandharvair yakṣarākṣasapannagaiḥ 6.048.007c avadhyatvaṃ mayā prāptaṃ mānuṣebhyo na yācitam
GE09ram_1-7u:17950: 6.048.008a etad evābhyupāgamya yatnaṃ kartum ihārhatha 6.048.008c rākṣasāś cāpi tiṣṭhantu
GE09ram_1-7u:17953: 6.048.010a sa parājitam ātmānaṃ prahastaṃ ca niṣūditam
