GE09ram_1-7u:17954: 6.048.010c jñātvā rakṣobalaṃ bhīmam ādideśa mahābalaḥ 6.048.011a dvāreṣu yatnaḥ kriyatāṃ prākārāś cādhiruhyatām 6.048.011c nidrāvaśasamāviṣṭaḥ kumbhakarṇo vibodhyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:17955: 6.048.012a nava ṣaṭ sapta cāṣṭau ca māsān svapiti rākṣasaḥ 6.048.012c taṃ tu bodhayata kṣipraṃ kumbhakarṇaṃ mahābalam
GE09ram_1-7u:17956: 6.048.013a sa hi saṃkhye mahābāhuḥ kakudaṃ sarvarakṣasām
GE09ram_1-7u:17957: 6.048.013c vānarān rājaputrau ca kṣipram eva vadhiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:17958: 6.048.014a kumbhakarṇaḥ sadā śete mūḍho grāmyasukhe rataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17960: 6.048.015a bhaviṣyati na me śokaḥ kumbhakarṇe vibodhite
GE09ram_1-7u:17961: 6.048.015c kiṃ kariṣyāmy ahaṃ tena śakratulyabalena hi
GE09ram_1-7u:17962: 6.048.016a īdṛśe vyasane prāpte yo na sāhyāya kalpate
GE09ram_1-7u:17963: 6.048.016c te tu tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasendrasya rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17966: 6.048.018a gandhamālyāṃs tathā bhakṣyān ādāya sahasā yayuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17967: 6.048.018c tāṃ praviśya mahādvārāṃ sarvato yojanāyatām 6.048.019a kumbhakarṇaguhāṃ ramyāṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:17968: 6.048.019c pratiṣṭhamānāḥ kṛcchreṇa yatnāt praviviśur guhām 6.048.020a tāṃ praviśya guhāṃ ramyāṃ śubhāṃ kāñcanakuṭṭimām
GE09ram_1-7u:17970: 6.048.021a te tu taṃ vikṛtaṃ suptaṃ vikīrṇam iva parvatam 6.048.021c kumbhakarṇaṃ mahānidraṃ sahitāḥ pratyabodhayan
GE09ram_1-7u:17975: 6.048.024a tataś cakrur mahātmānaḥ kumbhakarṇāgratas tadā 6.048.024c māṃsānāṃ merusaṃkāśaṃ rāśiṃ paramatarpaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:17976: 6.048.025a mṛgāṇāṃ mahiṣāṇāṃ ca varāhāṇāṃ ca saṃcayān
GE09ram_1-7u:17977: 6.048.025c cakrur nairṛtaśārdūlā rāśimann asya cādbhutam 6.048.026a tataḥ śoṇitakumbhāṃś ca madyāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:17979: 6.048.027a lilipuś ca parārdhyena candanena paraṃtapam 6.048.027c divyair ācchādayām āsur mālyair gandhaiḥ sugandhibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17980: 6.048.028a dhūpaṃ sugandhaṃ sasṛjus tuṣṭuvuś ca paraṃtapam
GE09ram_1-7u:17981: 6.048.028c jaladā iva conedur yātudhānāḥ sahasraśaḥ 6.048.029a śaṅkhān āpūrayām āsuḥ śaśāṅkasadṛśaprabhān
GE09ram_1-7u:17982: 6.048.029c tumulaṃ yugapac cāpi vineduś cāpy amarṣitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17983: 6.048.030a nedur āsphoṭayām āsuś cikṣipus te niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17984: 6.048.030c kumbhakarṇavibodhārthaṃ cakrus te vipulaṃ svanam 6.048.031a saśaṅkhabherīpaṭahapraṇādam;
GE09ram_1-7u:17985: 6.048.031c diśo dravantas tridivaṃ kirantaḥ; śrutvā vihaṃgāḥ sahasā
GE09ram_1-7u:17987: 6.048.032a yadā bhṛśaṃ tair ninadair mahātmā; na kumbhakarṇo bubudhe
GE09ram_1-7u:17989: 6.048.032c tato musuṇḍīmusalāni sarve; rakṣogaṇās te jagṛhur gadāś ca 6.048.033a taṃ śailaśṛṅgair musalair gadābhir; vṛkṣais talair mudgaramuṣṭibhiś ca 6.048.033c sukhaprasuptaṃ bhuvi kumbhakarṇaṃ; rakṣāṃsy udagrāṇi tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:17996: 6.048.036a nīlāñjanacayākāraṃ te tu taṃ pratyabodhayan 6.048.036c abhighnanto nadantaś ca naiva saṃvivide tu saḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:17997: 6.048.037a yadā cainaṃ na śekus te pratibodhayituṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:17998: 6.048.037c tato gurutaraṃ yatnaṃ dāruṇaṃ samupākraman 6.048.038a aśvān uṣṭrān kharān nāgāñ jaghnur daṇḍakaśāṅkuśaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18000: 6.048.039a nijaghnuś cāsya gātrāṇi mahākāṣṭhakaṭaṃ karaiḥ 6.048.039c mudgarair musalaiś caiva sarvaprāṇasamudyataiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18001: 6.048.040a tena śabdena mahatā laṅkā samabhipūritā 6.048.040c saparvatavanā sarvā so 'pi naiva prabudhyate 6.048.041a tataḥ sahasraṃ bherīṇāṃ yugapat samahanyata 6.048.041c mṛṣṭakāñcanakoṇānām asaktānāṃ samantataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18002: 6.048.042a evam apy atinidras tu yadā naiva prabudhyata
GE09ram_1-7u:18003: 6.048.042c śāpasya vaśam āpannas tataḥ kruddhā niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18005: 6.048.043c tad rakṣobodhayiṣyantaś cakrur anye parākramam 6.048.044a anye bherīḥ samājaghnur anye cakrur mahāsvanam
GE09ram_1-7u:18006: 6.048.044c keśān anye pralulupuḥ karṇāv anye daśanti ca
GE09ram_1-7u:18007: 6.048.044e na kumbhakarṇaḥ paspande mahānidrāvaśaṃ gataḥ 6.048.045a anye ca balinas tasya kūṭamudgarapāṇayaḥ 6.048.045c mūrdhni vakṣasi gātreṣu pātayan kūṭamudgarān 6.048.046a rajjubandhanabaddhābhiḥ śataghnībhiś ca sarvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18008: 6.048.046c vadhyamāno mahākāyo na prābudhyata rākṣasaḥ 6.048.047a vāraṇānāṃ sahasraṃ tu śarīre 'sya pradhāvitam
GE09ram_1-7u:18009: 6.048.047c kumbhakarṇas tato buddhaḥ sparśaṃ param abudhyata
GE09ram_1-7u:18010: 6.048.048a sa pātyamānair giriśṛṅgavṛkṣair; acintayaṃs tān vipulān
GE09ram_1-7u:18012: 6.048.048c nidrākṣayāt kṣudbhayapīḍitaś ca; vijṛmbhamāṇaḥ sahasotpapāta 6.048.049a sa nāgabhogācalaśṛṅgakalpau; vikṣipya bāhū giriśṛṅgasārau
GE09ram_1-7u:18013: 6.048.049c vivṛtya vaktraṃ vaḍavāmukhābhaṃ; niśācaro 'sau vikṛtaṃ jajṛmbhe 6.048.050a tasya jājṛmbhamāṇasya vaktraṃ pātālasaṃnibham
GE09ram_1-7u:18015: 6.048.051a vijṛmbhamāṇo 'tibalaḥ pratibuddho niśācaraḥ 6.048.051c niśvāsaś cāsya saṃjajñe parvatād iva mārutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18016: 6.048.052a rūpam uttiṣṭhatas tasya kumbhakarṇasya tad babhau
GE09ram_1-7u:18019: 6.048.053c dadṛśāte mahānetre dīptāv iva mahāgrahau 6.048.054a ādad bubhukṣito māṃsaṃ śoṇitaṃ tṛṣito 'pibat
GE09ram_1-7u:18020: 6.048.054c medaḥ kumbhaṃ ca madyaṃ ca papau śakraripus tadā 6.048.055a tatas tṛpta iti jñātvā samutpetur niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18021: 6.048.055c śirobhiś ca praṇamyainaṃ sarvataḥ paryavārayan 6.048.056a sa sarvān sāntvayām āsa nairṛtān nairṛtarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18022: 6.048.056c bodhanād vismitaś cāpi rākṣasān idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:18023: 6.048.057a kimartham aham āhatya bhavadbhiḥ pratibodhitaḥ 6.048.057c kaccit sukuśalaṃ rājño bhayaṃ vā neha kiṃ cana 6.048.058a atha vā dhruvam anyebhyo bhayaṃ param upasthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:18024: 6.048.058c yadartham eva tvaritair bhavadbhiḥ pratibodhitaḥ 6.048.059a adya rākṣasarājasya bhayam utpāṭayāmy aham 6.048.059c pātayiṣye mahendraṃ vā śātayiṣye tathānalam 6.048.060a na hy alpakāraṇe suptaṃ bodhayiṣyati māṃ bhṛśam
GE09ram_1-7u:18026: 6.048.061a evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ saṃrabdhaṃ kumbhakarṇam ariṃdamam 6.048.061c yūpākṣaḥ sacivo rājñaḥ kṛtāñjalir uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:18027: 6.048.062a na no devakṛtaṃ kiṃ cid bhayam asti kadā cana
GE09ram_1-7u:18028: 6.048.062c na daityadānavebhyo vā bhayam asti hi tādṛśam
GE09ram_1-7u:18029: 6.048.062e yādṛśaṃ mānuṣaṃ rājan bhayam asmān upasthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:18031: 6.048.063c sītāharaṇasaṃtaptād rāmān nas tumulaṃ bhayam 6.048.064a ekena vānareṇeyaṃ pūrvaṃ dagdhā mahāpurī 6.048.064c kumāro nihataś cākṣaḥ sānuyātraḥ sakuñjaraḥ 6.048.065a svayaṃ rakṣo'dhipaś cāpi paulastyo devakaṇṭakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18033: 6.048.066a yan na devaiḥ kṛto rājā nāpi daityair na dānavaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18034: 6.048.066c kṛtaḥ sa iha rāmeṇa vimuktaḥ prāṇasaṃśayāt
GE09ram_1-7u:18035: 6.048.067a sa yūpākṣavacaḥ śrutvā bhrātur yudhi parājayam
GE09ram_1-7u:18036: 6.048.067c kumbhakarṇo vivṛttākṣo yūpākṣam idam abravīt 6.048.068a sarvam adyaiva yūpākṣa harisainyaṃ salakṣmaṇam 6.048.068c rāghavaṃ ca raṇe hatvā paścād drakṣyāmi rāvaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:18038: 6.048.069c rāmalakṣmaṇayoś cāpi svayaṃ pāsyāmi śoṇitam 6.048.070a tat tasya vākyaṃ bruvato niśamya; sagarvitaṃ roṣavivṛddhadoṣam 6.048.070c mahodaro nairṛtayodhamukhyaḥ; kṛtāñjalir vākyam idaṃ babhāṣe
GE09ram_1-7u:18039: 6.048.071a rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā guṇadoṣu vimṛśya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:18040: 6.048.071c paścād api mahābāho śatrūn yudhi vijeṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:18045: 6.048.074a tato gatvā daśagrīvam āsīnaṃ paramāsane 6.048.074c ūcur baddhāñjalipuṭāḥ sarva eva niśācarāḥ 6.048.075a prabuddhaḥ kumbhakarṇo 'sau bhrātā te rākṣasarṣabha
GE09ram_1-7u:18046: 6.048.075c kathaṃ tatraiva niryātu drakṣyase tam ihāgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:18047: 6.048.076a rāvaṇas tv abravīd dhṛṣṭo yathānyāyaṃ ca pūjitam
GE09ram_1-7u:18048: 6.048.076c draṣṭum enam ihecchāmi yathānyāyaṃ ca pūjitam
GE09ram_1-7u:18049: 6.048.077a tathety uktvā tu te sarve punar āgamya rākṣasāḥ 6.048.077c kumbhakarṇam idaṃ vākyam ūcū rāvaṇacoditāḥ 6.048.078a draṣṭuṃ tvāṃ kāṅkṣate rājā sarvarākṣasapuṃgavaḥ 6.048.078c gamane kriyatāṃ buddhir bhrātaraṃ saṃpraharṣaya 6.048.079a kumbhakarṇas tu durdharṣo bhrātur ājñāya śāsanam
GE09ram_1-7u:18050: 6.048.079c tathety uktvā mahāvīryaḥ śayanād utpapāta ha
GE09ram_1-7u:18051: 6.048.080a prakṣālya vadanaṃ hṛṣṭaḥ snātaḥ paramabhūṣitaḥ 6.048.080c pipāsus tvarayām āsa pānaṃ balasamīraṇam 6.048.081a tatas te tvaritās tasya rājṣasā rāvaṇājñayā
GE09ram_1-7u:18052: 6.048.081c madyaṃ bhakṣyāṃś ca vividhān kṣipram evopahārayan
GE09ram_1-7u:18056: 6.048.084a bhrātuḥ sa bhavanaṃ gacchan rakṣobalasamanvitaḥ 6.048.084c kumbhakarṇaḥ padanyāsair akampayata medinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:18057: 6.048.085a sa rājamārgaṃ vapuṣā prakāśayan; sahasraraśmir dharaṇīm ivāṃśubhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18058: 6.048.085c jagāma tatrāñjalimālayā vṛtaḥ; śatakratur geham iva
GE09ram_1-7u:18060: 6.048.086a ke cic charaṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ sma rāmaṃ; vrajanti ke cid vyathitāḥ patanti 6.048.086c ke cid diśaḥ sma vyathitāḥ prayānti; ke cid bhayārtā bhuvi śerate sma
GE09ram_1-7u:18061: 6.048.087a tam adriśṛṅgapratimaṃ kirīṭinaṃ; spṛśantam ādityam ivātmatejasā
GE09ram_1-7u:18062: 6.048.087c vanaukasaḥ prekṣya vivṛddham adbhutaṃ; bhayārditā dudruvire tatas tataḥ 6.049.001a tato rāmo mahātejā dhanur ādāya vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:18063: 6.049.001c kirīṭinaṃ mahākāyaṃ kumbhakarṇaṃ dadarśa ha 6.049.002a taṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasaśreṣṭhaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:18064: 6.049.002c kramamāṇam ivākāśaṃ purā nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum 6.049.003a satoyāmbudasaṃkāśaṃ kāñcanāṅgadabhūṣaṇam 6.049.003c dṛṣṭvā punaḥ pradudrāva vānarāṇāṃ mahācamūḥ 6.049.004a vidrutāṃ vāhinīṃ dṛṣṭvā vardhamānaṃ ca rākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:18065: 6.049.004c savismayam idaṃ rāmo vibhīṣaṇam uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:18067: 6.049.005c laṅkāyāṃ dṛśyate vīraḥ savidyud iva toyadaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18069: 6.049.006c yaṃ dṛṣṭvā vānarāḥ sarve vidravanti tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18070: 6.049.007a ācakṣva me mahān ko 'sau rakṣo vā yadi vāsuraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18071: 6.049.007c na mayaivaṃvidhaṃ bhūtaṃ dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ kadā cana
GE09ram_1-7u:18073: 6.049.008c vibhīṣaṇo mahāprājñaḥ kākutstham idam abravīt 6.049.009a yena vaivasvato yuddhe vāsavaś ca parājitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18074: 6.049.009c saiṣa viśravasaḥ putraḥ kumbhakarṇaḥ pratāpavān 6.049.010a etena devā yudhi dānavāś ca; yakṣā bhujaṃgāḥ piśitāśanāś ca
GE09ram_1-7u:18077: 6.049.011c hantuṃ na śekus tridaśāḥ kālo 'yam iti mohitāḥ 6.049.012a prakṛtyā hy eṣa tejasvī kumbhakarṇo mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18080: 6.049.013c bhakṣitāni sahasrāṇi sattvānāṃ subahūny api 6.049.014a teṣu saṃbhakṣyamāṇeṣu prajā bhayanipīḍitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18081: 6.049.014c yānti sma śaraṇaṃ śakraṃ tam apy arthaṃ nyavedayan 6.049.015a sa kumbhakarṇaṃ kupito mahendro; jaghāna vajreṇa śitena vajrī
GE09ram_1-7u:18082: 6.049.015c sa śakravajrābhihato mahātmā; cacāla kopāc ca bhṛśaṃ nanāda 6.049.016a tasya nānadyamānasya kumbhakarṇasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18083: 6.049.016c śrutvā ninādaṃ vitrastā bhūyo bhūmir vitatrase
GE09ram_1-7u:18084: 6.049.017a tataḥ kopān mahendrasya kumbhakarṇo mahābalaḥ 6.049.017c vikṛṣyairāvatād dantaṃ jaghānorasi vāsavam
GE09ram_1-7u:18087: 6.049.019a prajābhiḥ saha śakraś ca yayau sthānaṃ svayambhuvaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18088: 6.049.019c kumbhakarṇasya daurātmyaṃ śaśaṃsus te prajāpateḥ 6.049.019e prajānāṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ cāpi devānāṃ cāpi dharṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:18089: 6.049.020a evaṃ prajā yadi tv eṣa bhakṣayiṣyati nityaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18090: 6.049.020c acireṇaiva kālena śūnyo loko bhaviṣyati 6.049.021a vāsavasya vacaḥ śrutvā sarvalokapitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18091: 6.049.021c rakṣāṃsy āvāhayām āsa kumbhakarṇaṃ dadarśa ha
GE09ram_1-7u:18093: 6.049.022c dṛṣṭvā niśvasya caivedaṃ svayambhūr idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:18095: 6.049.023c tasmāt tvam adya prabhṛti mṛtakalpaḥ śayiṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:18096: 6.049.023e brahmaśāpābhibhūto 'tha nipapātāgrataḥ prabhoḥ 6.049.024a tataḥ paramasaṃbhrānto rāvaṇo vākyam abravīt 6.049.024c vivṛddhaḥ kāñcano vṛkṣaḥ phalakāle nikṛtyate 6.049.025a na naptāraṃ svakaṃ nyāyyaṃ śaptum evaṃ prajāpate
GE09ram_1-7u:18097: 6.049.025c na mithyāvacanaś ca tvaṃ svapsyaty eṣa na saṃśayaḥ 6.049.025e kālas tu kriyatām asya śayane jāgare tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:18098: 6.049.026a rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā svayambhūr idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:18099: 6.049.026c śayitā hy eṣa ṣaṇ māsān ekāhaṃ jāgariṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:18100: 6.049.027a ekenāhnā tv asau vīraś caran bhūmiṃ bubhukṣitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18101: 6.049.027c vyāttāsyo bhakṣayel lokān saṃkruddha iva pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18103: 6.049.028c tvatparākramabhītaś ca rājā saṃprati rāvaṇaḥ 6.049.029a sa eṣa nirgato vīraḥ śibirād bhīmavikramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18106: 6.049.030c katham enaṃ raṇe kruddhaṃ vārayiṣyanti vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18107: 6.049.031a ucyantāṃ vānarāḥ sarve yantram etat samucchritam
GE09ram_1-7u:18108: 6.049.031c iti vijñāya harayo bhaviṣyantīha nirbhayāḥ 6.049.032a vibhīṣaṇavacaḥ śrutvā hetumat sumukhodgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:18109: 6.049.032c uvāca rāghavo vākyaṃ nīlaṃ senāpatiṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:18110: 6.049.033a gaccha sainyāni sarvāṇi vyūhya tiṣṭhasva pāvake
GE09ram_1-7u:18111: 6.049.033c dvārāṇy ādāya laṅkāyāś caryāś cāpy atha saṃkramān
GE09ram_1-7u:18112: 6.049.034a śailaśṛṅgāṇi vṛkṣāṃś ca śilāś cāpy upasaṃharan
GE09ram_1-7u:18113: 6.049.034c tiṣṭhantu vānarāḥ sarve sāyudhāḥ śailapāṇayaḥ 6.049.035a rāghaveṇa samādiṣṭo nīlo haricamūpatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18115: 6.049.036a tato gavākṣaḥ śarabho hanumān aṅgado nalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18116: 6.049.036c śailaśṛṅgāṇi śailābhā gṛhītvā dvāram abhyayuḥ 6.049.037a tato harīṇāṃ tad anīkam ugraṃ; rarāja śailodyatavṛkṣahastam 6.049.037c gireḥ samīpānugataṃ yathaiva; mahan mahāmbhodharajālam ugram
GE09ram_1-7u:18118: 6.050.001c rājamārgaṃ śriyā juṣṭaṃ yayau vipulavikramaḥ 6.050.002a rākṣasānāṃ sahasraiś ca vṛtaḥ paramadurjayaḥ 6.050.002c gṛhebhyaḥ puṣpavarṣeṇa kāryamāṇas tadā yayau 6.050.003a sa hemajālavitataṃ bhānubhāsvaradarśanam
GE09ram_1-7u:18120: 6.050.004a sa tat tadā sūrya ivābhrajālaṃ; praviśya rakṣo'dhipater
GE09ram_1-7u:18122: 6.050.004c dadarśa dūre 'grajam āsanasthaṃ; svayambhuvaṃ śakra ivāsanastham
GE09ram_1-7u:18123: 6.050.005a so 'bhigamya gṛhaṃ bhrātuḥ kakṣyām abhivigāhya ca 6.050.005c dadarśodvignam āsīnaṃ vimāne puṣpake gurum 6.050.006a atha dṛṣṭvā daśagrīvaḥ kumbhakarṇam upasthitam 6.050.006c tūrṇam utthāya saṃhṛṣṭaḥ saṃnikarṣam upānayat 6.050.007a athāsīnasya paryaṅke kumbhakarṇo mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18124: 6.050.007c bhrātur vavande caraṇāṃ kiṃ kṛtyam iti cābravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:18125: 6.050.007e utpatya cainaṃ mudito rāvaṇaḥ pariṣasvaje 6.050.008a sa bhrātrā saṃpariṣvakto yathāvac cābhinanditaḥ 6.050.008c kumbhakarṇaḥ śubhaṃ divyaṃ pratipede varāsanam 6.050.009a sa tadāsanam āśritya kumbhakarṇo mahābalaḥ 6.050.009c saṃraktanayanaḥ kopād rāvaṇaṃ vākyam abravīt 6.050.010a kimartham aham ādṛtya tvayā rājan prabodhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18126: 6.050.010c śaṃsa kasmād bhayaṃ te 'sti ko 'dya preto bhaviṣyati 6.050.011a bhrātaraṃ rāvaṇaḥ kruddhaṃ kumbhakarṇam avasthitam 6.050.011c īṣat tu parivṛttābhyāṃ netrābhyāṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:18127: 6.050.012a adya te sumahān kālaḥ śayānasya mahābala
GE09ram_1-7u:18128: 6.050.012c sukhitas tvaṃ na jānīṣe mama rāmakṛtaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_1-7u:18129: 6.050.013a eṣa dāśarathī rāmaḥ sugrīvasahito balī 6.050.013c samudraṃ sabalas tīrtvā mūlaṃ naḥ parikṛntati
GE09ram_1-7u:18130: 6.050.014a hanta paśyasva laṅkāyā vanāny upavanāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:18131: 6.050.014c setunā sukham āgamya vānaraikārṇavaṃ kṛtam 6.050.015a ye rākṣasā mukhyatamā hatās te vānarair yudhi
GE09ram_1-7u:18132: 6.050.015c vānarāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ yuddhe na paśyāmi kadā cana
GE09ram_1-7u:18133: 6.050.016a sarvakṣapitakośaṃ ca sa tvam abhyavapadya mām
GE09ram_1-7u:18135: 6.050.017a bhrātur arthe mahābāho kuru karma suduṣkaram
GE09ram_1-7u:18136: 6.050.017c mayaivaṃ noktapūrvo hi kaś cid bhrātaḥ paraṃtapa
GE09ram_1-7u:18137: 6.050.017e tvayy asti mama ca snehaḥ parā saṃbhāvanā ca me
GE09ram_1-7u:18139: 6.050.018c tvayā devāḥ prativyūhya nirjitāś cāsurā yudhi
GE09ram_1-7u:18140: 6.050.018e na hi te sarvabhūteṣu dṛśyate sadṛśo balī
GE09ram_1-7u:18141: 6.050.019a kuruṣva me priyahitam etad uttamaṃ; yathāpriyaṃ priyaraṇabāndhavapriya 6.050.019c svatejasā vidhama sapatnavāhinīṃ; śaradghanaṃ pavana ivodyato
GE09ram_1-7u:18145: 6.051.002a dṛṣṭo doṣo hi yo 'smābhiḥ purā mantravinirṇaye 6.051.002c hiteṣv anabhiyuktena so 'yam āsāditas tvayā 6.051.003a śīghraṃ khalv abhyupetaṃ tvāṃ phalaṃ pāpasya karmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18146: 6.051.003c nirayeṣv eva patanaṃ yathā duṣkṛtakarmaṇaḥ 6.051.004a prathamaṃ vai mahārāja kṛtyam etad acintitam
GE09ram_1-7u:18148: 6.051.005a yaḥ paścāt pūrvakāryāṇi kuryād aiśvaryam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18149: 6.051.005c pūrvaṃ cottarakāryāṇi na sa veda nayānayau
GE09ram_1-7u:18151: 6.051.006c kriyamāṇāni duṣyanti havīṃṣy aprayateṣv iva 6.051.007a trayāṇāṃ pañcadhā yogaṃ karmaṇāṃ yaḥ prapaśyati
GE09ram_1-7u:18152: 6.051.007c sacivaiḥ samayaṃ kṛtvā sa sabhye vartate pathi
GE09ram_1-7u:18153: 6.051.008a yathāgamaṃ ca yo rājā samayaṃ vicikīrṣati
GE09ram_1-7u:18154: 6.051.008c budhyate sacivān buddhyā suhṛdaś cānupaśyati 6.051.009a dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca sarvān vā rakṣasāṃ pate
GE09ram_1-7u:18155: 6.051.009c bhajate puruṣaḥ kāle trīṇi dvandvāni vā punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18156: 6.051.010a triṣu caiteṣu yac chreṣṭhaṃ śrutvā tan nāvabudhyate
GE09ram_1-7u:18157: 6.051.010c rājā vā rājamātro vā vyarthaṃ tasya bahuśrutam
GE09ram_1-7u:18158: 6.051.011a upapradānaṃ sāntvaṃ vā bhedaṃ kāle ca vikramam
GE09ram_1-7u:18159: 6.051.011c yogaṃ ca rakṣasāṃ śreṣṭha tāv ubhau ca nayānayau 6.051.012a kāle dharmārthakāmān yaḥ saṃmantrya sacivaiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:18160: 6.051.012c niṣevetātmavāṃl loke na sa vyasanam āpnuyāt
GE09ram_1-7u:18162: 6.051.013c rājā sahārthatattvajñaiḥ sacivaiḥ saha jīvati 6.051.014a anabhijñāya śāstrārthān puruṣāḥ paśubuddhayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18163: 6.051.014c prāgalbhyād vaktum icchanti mantreṣv abhyantarīkṛtāḥ 6.051.015a aśāstraviduṣāṃ teṣāṃ na kāryam ahitaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18165: 6.051.016a ahitaṃ ca hitākāraṃ dhārṣṭyāj jalpanti ye narāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18166: 6.051.016c avekṣya mantrabāhyās te kartavyāḥ kṛtyadūṣaṇāḥ 6.051.017a vināśayanto bhartāraṃ sahitāḥ śatrubhir budhaiḥ 6.051.017c viparītāni kṛtyāni kārayantīha mantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18167: 6.051.018a tān bhartā mitrasaṃkāśān amitrān mantranirṇaye 6.051.018c vyavahāreṇa jānīyāt sacivān upasaṃhitān
GE09ram_1-7u:18169: 6.051.019c chidram anye prapadyante krauñcasya kham iva dvijāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18170: 6.051.020a yo hi śatrum avajñāya nātmānam abhirakṣati
GE09ram_1-7u:18171: 6.051.020c avāpnoti hi so 'narthān sthānāc ca vyavaropyate
GE09ram_1-7u:18172: 6.051.021a tat tu śrutvā daśagrīvaḥ kumbhakarṇasya bhāṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:18173: 6.051.021c bhrukuṭiṃ caiva saṃcakre kruddhaś cainam uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:18174: 6.051.022a mānyo gurur ivācāryaḥ kiṃ māṃ tvam anuśāsati
GE09ram_1-7u:18175: 6.051.022c kim evaṃ vākśramaṃ kṛtvā kāle yuktaṃ vidhīyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:18176: 6.051.023a vibhramāc cittamohād vā balavīryāśrayeṇa vā 6.051.023c nābhipannam idānīṃ yad vyarthās tasya punaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18177: 6.051.024a asmin kāle tu yad yuktaṃ tad idānīṃ vidhīyatām 6.051.024c mamāpanayajaṃ doṣaṃ vikrameṇa samīkuru
GE09ram_1-7u:18178: 6.051.025a yadi khalv asti me sneho bhrātṛtvaṃ vāvagacchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:18179: 6.051.025c yadi vā kāryam etat te hṛdi kāryatamaṃ matam 6.051.026a sa suhṛdyo vipannārthaṃ dīnam abhyavapadyate 6.051.026c sa bandhur yo 'panīteṣu sāhāyyāyopakalpate
GE09ram_1-7u:18180: 6.051.027a tam athaivaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu vacanaṃ dhīradāruṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:18181: 6.051.027c ruṣṭo 'yam iti vijñāya śanaiḥ ślakṣṇam uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:18182: 6.051.028a atīva hi samālakṣya bhrātaraṃ kṣubhitendriyam 6.051.028c kumbhakarṇaḥ śanair vākyaṃ babhāṣe parisāntvayan 6.051.029a alaṃ rākṣasarājendra saṃtāpam upapadya te 6.051.029c roṣaṃ ca saṃparityajya svastho bhavitum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:18183: 6.051.030a naitan manasi kartavvyaṃ mayi jīvati pārthiva
GE09ram_1-7u:18184: 6.051.030c tam ahaṃ nāśayiṣyāmi yatkṛte paritapyase 6.051.031a avaśyaṃ tu hitaṃ vācyaṃ sarvāvasthaṃ mayā tava
GE09ram_1-7u:18185: 6.051.031c bandhubhāvād abhihitaṃ bhrātṛsnehāc ca pārthiva 6.051.032a sadṛśaṃ yat tu kāle 'smin kartuṃ snigdhena bandhunā
GE09ram_1-7u:18186: 6.051.032c śatrūṇāṃ kadanaṃ paśya kriyamāṇaṃ mayā raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:18187: 6.051.033a adya paśya mahābāho mayā samaramūrdhani 6.051.033c hate rāme saha bhrātrā dravantīṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:18188: 6.051.034a adya rāmasya tad dṛṣṭvā mayānītaṃ raṇāc chiraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18189: 6.051.034c sukhībhava mahābāho sītā bhavatu duḥkhitā 6.051.035a adya rāmasya paśyantu nidhanaṃ sumahat priyam
GE09ram_1-7u:18190: 6.051.035c laṅkāyāṃ rākṣasāḥ sarve ye te nihatabāndhavāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18192: 6.051.036c śatror yudhi vināśena karomy asrapramārjanam 6.051.037a adya parvatasaṃkāśaṃ sasūryam iva toyadam 6.051.037c vikīrṇaṃ paśya samare sugrīvaṃ plavageśvaram 6.051.038a na paraḥ preṣaṇīyas te yuddhāyātula vikrama
GE09ram_1-7u:18193: 6.051.038c aham utsādayiṣyāmi śatrūṃs tava mahābala 6.051.039a yadi śakro yadi yamo yadi
GE09ram_1-7u:18194: 6.051.039c tān ahaṃ yodhayiṣyāmi kubera varuṇāv api
GE09ram_1-7u:18196: 6.051.040c nardatas tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭrasya bibhīyāc ca puraṃdaraḥ 6.051.041a atha vā tyaktaśastrasya mṛdgatas tarasā ripūn
GE09ram_1-7u:18197: 6.051.041c na me pratimukhe kaś cic chaktaḥ sthātuṃ jijīviṣuḥ 6.051.042a naiva śaktyā na gadayā nāsinā na śitaiḥ śaraiḥ 6.051.042c hastābhyām eva saṃrabdho haniṣyāmy api vajriṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:18198: 6.051.043a yadi me muṣṭivegaṃ sa rāghavo 'dya sahiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:18199: 6.051.043c tataḥ pāsyanti bāṇaughā rudhiraṃ rāghavasya te
GE09ram_1-7u:18200: 6.051.044a cintayā bādhyase rājan kimarthaṃ mayi tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_1-7u:18202: 6.051.045a muñca rāmād bhayaṃ rājan haniṣyāmīha saṃyuge
GE09ram_1-7u:18203: 6.051.045c rāghavaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva sugrīvaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_1-7u:18204: 6.051.045e asādhāraṇam icchāmi tava dātuṃ mahad yaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18205: 6.051.046a vadhena te dāśaratheḥ sukhāvahaṃ; sukhaṃ samāhartum ahaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:18207: 6.051.046c nihatya rāmaṃ sahalakṣmaṇena; khādāmi sarvān hariyūthamukhyān
GE09ram_1-7u:18208: 6.051.047a ramasva kāmaṃ piba cāgryavāruṇīṃ; kuruṣva kṛtyāni vinīyatāṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:18210: 6.051.047c mayādya rāme gamite yamakṣayaṃ; cirāya sītā vaśagā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:18211: 6.052.001a tad uktam atikāyasya balino bāhuśālinaḥ 6.052.001c kumbhakarṇasya vacanaṃ śrutvovāca
GE09ram_1-7u:18213: 6.052.002c avalipto na śaknoṣi kṛtyaṃ sarvatra veditum
GE09ram_1-7u:18214: 6.052.003a na hi rājā na jānīte kumbhakarṇa nayānayau
GE09ram_1-7u:18215: 6.052.003c tvaṃ tu kaiśorakād dhṛṣṭaḥ kevalaṃ vaktum icchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:18216: 6.052.004a sthānaṃ vṛddhiṃ ca hāniṃ ca deśakālavibhāgavit
GE09ram_1-7u:18217: 6.052.004c ātmanaś ca pareṣāṃ ca budhyate rākṣasarṣabha
GE09ram_1-7u:18218: 6.052.005a yat tu śakyaṃ balavatā kartuṃ prākṛtabuddhinā
GE09ram_1-7u:18219: 6.052.005c anupāsitavṛddhena kaḥ kuryāt tādṛśaṃ budhaḥ 6.052.006a yāṃs tu dharmārthakāmāṃs tvaṃ bravīṣi pṛthag āśrayān
GE09ram_1-7u:18220: 6.052.006c anuboddhuṃ svabhāvena na hi lakṣaṇam asti te
GE09ram_1-7u:18221: 6.052.007a karma caiva hi sarveṣāṃ kāraṇānāṃ prayojanam
GE09ram_1-7u:18222: 6.052.007c śreyaḥ pāpīyasāṃ cātra phalaṃ bhavati karmaṇām
GE09ram_1-7u:18223: 6.052.008a niḥśreyasa phalāv eva dharmārthāv itarāv api
GE09ram_1-7u:18224: 6.052.008c adharmānarthayoḥ prāptiḥ phalaṃ ca pratyavāyikam 6.052.009a aihalaukikapāratryaṃ karma pumbhir niṣevyate
GE09ram_1-7u:18225: 6.052.009c karmāṇy api tu kalpyāni labhate kāmam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18226: 6.052.010a tatra kḷptam idaṃ rājñā hṛdi kāryaṃ mataṃ ca naḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18227: 6.052.010c śatrau hi sāhasaṃ yat syāt kim ivātrāpanīyate
GE09ram_1-7u:18228: 6.052.011a ekasyaivābhiyāne tu hetur yaḥ prakṛtas tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:18229: 6.052.011c tatrāpy anupapannaṃ te vakṣyāmi yad asādhu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:18231: 6.052.012c rākṣasā rāghavaṃ taṃ tvaṃ katham eko jayiṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:18232: 6.052.013a ye purā nirjitās tena janasthāne mahaujasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18233: 6.052.013c rākṣasāṃs tān pure sarvān bhītān adyāpi paśyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:18234: 6.052.014a taṃ siṃham iva saṃkruddhaṃ rāmaṃ daśarathātmajam
GE09ram_1-7u:18235: 6.052.014c sarpaṃ suptam ivābuddhyā prabodhayitum icchasi 6.052.015a jvalantaṃ tejasā nityaṃ krodhena ca durāsadam
GE09ram_1-7u:18236: 6.052.015c kas taṃ mṛtyum ivāsahyam āsādayitum arhati
GE09ram_1-7u:18237: 6.052.016a saṃśayastham idaṃ sarvaṃ śatroḥ pratisamāsane 6.052.016c ekasya gamanaṃ tatra na hi me rocate tava 6.052.017a hīnārthas tu samṛddhārthaṃ ko ripuṃ prākṛto yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:18238: 6.052.017c niścitaṃ jīvitatyāge vaśam ānetum icchati 6.052.018a yasya nāsti manuṣyeṣu sadṛśo rākṣasottama 6.052.018c katham āśaṃsase yoddhuṃ tulyenendravivasvatoḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18239: 6.052.019a evam uktvā tu saṃrabdhaṃ kumbhakarṇaṃ mahodaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18240: 6.052.019c uvāca rakṣasāṃ madhye rāvaṇo lokarāvaṇam 6.052.020a labdhvā punas tāṃ vaidehīṃ kimarthaṃ tvaṃ prajalpasi
GE09ram_1-7u:18241: 6.052.020c yadecchasi tadā sītā vaśagā te bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:18242: 6.052.021a dṛṣṭaḥ kaś cid upāyo me sītopasthānakārakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18243: 6.052.021c rucitaś cet svayā buddhyā rākṣaseśvara taṃ śṛṇu
GE09ram_1-7u:18244: 6.052.022a ahaṃ dvijihvaḥ saṃhrādī kumbhakarṇo vitardanaḥ 6.052.022c pañcarāmavadhāyaite niryāntīty avaghoṣaya
GE09ram_1-7u:18245: 6.052.023a tato gatvā vayaṃ yuddhaṃ dāsyāmas tasya yatnataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18246: 6.052.023c jeṣyāmo yadi te śatrūn nopāyaiḥ kṛtyam asti naḥ 6.052.024a atha jīvati naḥ śatrur vayaṃ ca kṛtasaṃyugāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18247: 6.052.024c tataḥ samabhipatsyāmo manasā yat samīkṣitum 6.052.025a vayaṃ yuddhād ihaiṣyāmo rudhireṇa samukṣitāḥ 6.052.025c vidārya svatanuṃ bāṇai rāmanāmāṅkitaiḥ śitaiḥ 6.052.026a bhakṣito rāghavo 'smābhir lakṣmaṇaś ceti vādinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18248: 6.052.026c tava pādau grahīṣyāmas tvaṃ naḥ kāma prapūraya
GE09ram_1-7u:18250: 6.052.027c hato rāmaḥ saha bhrātrā sasainya iti sarvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18251: 6.052.028a prīto nāma tato bhūtvā bhṛtyānāṃ tvam ariṃdama
GE09ram_1-7u:18252: 6.052.028c bhogāṃś ca parivārāṃś ca kāmāṃś ca vasudāpaya
GE09ram_1-7u:18253: 6.052.029a tato mālyāni vāsāṃsi vīrāṇām anulepanam 6.052.029c peyaṃ ca bahu yodhebhyaḥ svayaṃ ca muditaḥ piba 6.052.030a tato 'smin bahulībhūte kaulīne sarvato gate
GE09ram_1-7u:18254: 6.052.030c praviśyāśvāsya cāpi tvaṃ sītāṃ rahasi sāntvaya
GE09ram_1-7u:18255: 6.052.030e dhanadhānyaiś ca kāmaiś ca ratnaiś caināṃ pralobhaya
GE09ram_1-7u:18257: 6.052.031c akāmā tvadvaśaṃ sītā naṣṭanāthā gamiṣyati 6.052.032a rañjanīyaṃ hi bhartāraṃ vinaṣṭam avagamya sā
GE09ram_1-7u:18258: 6.052.032c nairāśyāt strīlaghutvāc ca tvadvaśaṃ pratipatsyate 6.052.033a sā purā sukhasaṃvṛddhā sukhārhā duḥkhakarṣitā 6.052.033c tvayy adhīnaḥ sukhaṃ jñātvā sarvathopagamiṣyati 6.052.034a etat sunītaṃ mama darśanena; rāmaṃ hi dṛṣṭvaiva bhaved anarthaḥ 6.052.034c ihaiva te setsyati motsuko bhūr; mahān ayuddhena sukhasya
GE09ram_1-7u:18260: 6.052.035a anaṣṭasainyo hy anavāptasaṃśayo; ripūn ayuddhena jayañ
GE09ram_1-7u:18262: 6.052.035c yaśaś ca puṇyaṃ ca mahan mahīpate; śriyaṃ ca kīrtiṃ ca ciraṃ samaśnute
GE09ram_1-7u:18263: 6.053.001a sa tathoktas tu nirbhartsya kumbhakarṇo mahodaram
GE09ram_1-7u:18264: 6.053.001c abravīd rākṣasaśreṣṭhaṃ bhrātaraṃ rāvaṇaṃ tataḥ 6.053.002a so 'haṃ tava bhayaṃ ghoraṃ vadhāt tasya durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18265: 6.053.002c rāmasyādya pramārjāmi nirvairas tvaṃ sukhībhava 6.053.003a garjanti na vṛthā śūra nirjalā iva toyadāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18266: 6.053.003c paśya saṃpādyamānaṃ tu garjitaṃ yudhi karmaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:18267: 6.053.004a na marṣayati cātmānaṃ saṃbhāvayati nātmanā 6.053.004c adarśayitvā śūrās tu karma kurvanti duṣkaram
GE09ram_1-7u:18269: 6.053.005c śṛṇvatām ādita idaṃ tvadvidhānāṃ mahodara 6.053.006a yuddhe kāpuruṣair nityaṃ bhavadbhiḥ priyavādibhiḥ 6.053.006c rājānam anugacchadbhiḥ kṛtyam etad vināśitam 6.053.007a rājaśeṣā kṛtā laṅkā kṣīṇaḥ kośo balaṃ hatam
GE09ram_1-7u:18270: 6.053.007c rājānam imam āsādya suhṛccihnam amitrakam 6.053.008a eṣa niryāmy ahaṃ yuddham udyataḥ śatrunirjaye
GE09ram_1-7u:18271: 6.053.008c durnayaṃ bhavatām adya samīkartuṃ mahāhave 6.053.009a evam uktavato vākyaṃ kumbhakarṇasya dhīmataḥ 6.053.009c pratyuvāca tato vākyaṃ prahasan rākṣasādhipaḥ 6.053.010a mahodaro 'yaṃ rāmāt tu paritrasto na saṃśayaḥ 6.053.010c na hi rocayate tāta yuddhaṃ yuddhaviśārada
GE09ram_1-7u:18272: 6.053.011a kaś cin me tvatsamo nāsti sauhṛdena balena ca 6.053.011c gaccha śatruvadhāya tvaṃ kumbhakarṇajayāya ca 6.053.012a ādade niśitaṃ śūlaṃ vegāc chatrunibarhaṇaḥ 6.053.012c sarvakālāyasaṃ dīptaṃ taptakāñcanabhūṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:18277: 6.053.014e kumbhakarṇo mahātejā rāvaṇaṃ vākyam abravīt 6.053.015a gamiṣyāmy aham ekākī tiṣṭhatv iha balaṃ mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:18278: 6.053.015c adya tān kṣudhitaḥ kruddho bhakṣayiṣyāmi vānarān
GE09ram_1-7u:18279: 6.053.016a kumbhakarṇavacaḥ śrutvā rāvaṇo vākyam abravīt 6.053.016c sainyaiḥ parivṛto gaccha
GE09ram_1-7u:18280: 6.053.017a vānarā hi mahātmānaḥ śīghrāś ca vyavasāyinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18281: 6.053.017c ekākinaṃ pramattaṃ vā nayeyur daśanaiḥ kṣayam
GE09ram_1-7u:18282: 6.053.018a tasmāt paramadurdharṣaiḥ sainyaiḥ parivṛto vraja 6.053.018c rakṣasām ahitaṃ sarvaṃ śatrupakṣaṃ nisūdaya 6.053.019a athāsanāt samutpatya srajaṃ maṇikṛtāntarām
GE09ram_1-7u:18284: 6.053.020a aṅgadān aṅgulīveṣṭān varāṇy ābharaṇāni ca 6.053.020c hāraṃ ca śaśisaṃkāśam ābabandha mahātmanaḥ 6.053.021a divyāni ca sugandhīni mālyadāmāni rāvaṇaḥ 6.053.021c śrotre cāsajjayām āsa śrīmatī cāsya kuṇḍale
GE09ram_1-7u:18285: 6.053.022a kāñcanāṅgadakeyūro niṣkābharaṇabhūṣitaḥ 6.053.022c kumbhakarṇo bṛhatkarṇaḥ suhuto 'gnir ivābabhau
GE09ram_1-7u:18288: 6.053.024a sa kāñcanaṃ bhārasahaṃ nivātaṃ; vidyutprabhaṃ dīptam ivātmabhāsā
GE09ram_1-7u:18289: 6.053.024c ābadhyamānaḥ kavacaṃ rarāja; saṃdhyābhrasaṃvīta ivādrirājaḥ 6.053.025a sarvābharaṇanaddhāṅgaḥ śūlapāṇiḥ sa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18291: 6.053.026a bhrātaraṃ saṃpariṣvajya kṛtvā cāpi pradakṣiṇam 6.053.026c praṇamya śirasā tasmai saṃpratasthe mahābaliḥ 6.053.026e tam āśīrbhiḥ praśastābhiḥ preṣayām āsa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18293: 6.053.027c taṃ gajaiś ca turaṃgaiś ca syandanaiś cāmbudasvanaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18294: 6.053.027e anujagmur mahātmānaṃ rathino rathināṃ varam 6.053.028a sarpair uṣṭraiḥ kharair aśvaiḥ siṃhadvipamṛgadvijaiḥ 6.053.028c anujagmuś ca taṃ ghoraṃ kumbhakarṇaṃ mahābalam
GE09ram_1-7u:18295: 6.053.029a sa puṣpavarṇair avakīryamāṇo; dhṛtātapatraḥ śitaśūlapāṇiḥ 6.053.029c madotkaṭaḥ śoṇitagandhamatto; viniryayau dānavadevaśatruḥ 6.053.030a padātayaś a bahavo mahānādā mahābalāḥ 6.053.030c anvayū rākṣasā bhīmā bhīmākṣāḥ śastrapāṇayaḥ 6.053.031a raktākṣāḥ sumahākāyā nīlāñjanacayopamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18296: 6.053.031c śūrān udyamya khaḍgāṃś ca niśitāṃś ca paraśvadhān
GE09ram_1-7u:18297: 6.053.032a bahuvyāmāṃś ca vipulān kṣepaṇīyān durāsadān 6.053.032c tālaskandhāṃś ca vipulān kṣepaṇīyān durāsadān 6.053.033a athānyad vapur ādāya dāruṇaṃ lomaharṣaṇam 6.053.033c niṣpapāta mahātejāḥ kumbhakarṇo mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18300: 6.053.035a saṃnipatya ca rakṣāṃsi dagdhaśailopamo mahān 6.053.035c kumbhakarṇo mahāvaktraḥ prahasann idam abravīt 6.053.036a adya vānaramukhyānāṃ tāni yūthāni bhāgaśaḥ 6.053.036c nirdahiṣyāmi saṃkruddhaḥ śalabhān iva pāvakaḥ 6.053.037a nāparādhyanti me kāmaṃ vānarā vanacāriṇaḥ 6.053.037c jātir asmadvidhānāṃ sā purodyānavibhūṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:18301: 6.053.038a purarodhasya mūlaṃ tu rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ 6.053.038c hate tasmin hataṃ sarvaṃ taṃ vadhiṣyāmi saṃyuge
GE09ram_1-7u:18302: 6.053.039a evaṃ tasya bruvāṇasya kumbhakarṇasya rākṣasāḥ 6.053.039c nādaṃ cakrur mahāghoraṃ kampayanta ivārṇavam 6.053.040a tasya niṣpatatas tūrṇaṃ kumbhakarṇasya dhīmataḥ 6.053.040c babhūvur ghorarūpāṇi nimittāni samantataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18303: 6.053.041a ulkāśaniyutā meghā vineduś ca sudāruṇāḥ 6.053.041c sasāgaravanā caiva vasudhā
GE09ram_1-7u:18304: 6.053.042a ghorarūpāḥ śivā neduḥ sajvālakavalair mukhaiḥ 6.053.042c maṇḍalāny apasavyāni babandhuś ca vihaṃgamāḥ 6.053.043a niṣpapāta ca gṛdhre 'sya śūle vai pathi gacchataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18305: 6.053.043c prāsphuran nayanaṃ cāsya savyo bāhur akampata
GE09ram_1-7u:18306: 6.053.044a niṣpapāta tadā coklā jvalantī bhīmanisvanā 6.053.044c ādityo niṣprabhaś cāsīn na pravāti sukho 'nilaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18309: 6.053.046a sa laṅghayitvā prākāraṃ padbhyāṃ parvatasaṃnibhaḥ 6.053.046c dadarśābhraghanaprakhyaṃ vānarānīkam adbhutam
GE09ram_1-7u:18310: 6.053.047a te dṛṣṭvā rākṣasaśreṣṭhaṃ vānarāḥ parvatopamam 6.053.047c vāyununnā iva ghanā yayuḥ sarvā diśas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:18311: 6.053.048a tad vānarānīkam atipracaṇḍaṃ; diśo dravad bhinnam ivābhrajālam
GE09ram_1-7u:18312: 6.053.048c sa kumbhakarṇaḥ samavekṣya harṣān; nanāda bhūyo ghanavad
GE09ram_1-7u:18314: 6.053.049a te tasya ghoraṃ ninadaṃ niśamya; yathā ninādaṃ divi vāridasya
GE09ram_1-7u:18315: 6.053.049c petur dharaṇyāṃ bahavaḥ plavaṃgā; nikṛttamūlā iva sālavṛkṣāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18316: 6.053.050a vipulaparighavān sa kumbhakarṇo; ripunidhanāya viniḥsṛto mahātmā
GE09ram_1-7u:18317: 6.053.050c kapi gaṇabhayam ādadat subhīmaṃ; prabhur iva kiṃkaradaṇḍavān
GE09ram_1-7u:18319: 6.054.001a sa nanāda mahānādaṃ samudram abhinādayan 6.054.001c janayann iva nirghātān vidhamann iva parvatān
GE09ram_1-7u:18320: 6.054.002a tam avadhyaṃ maghavatā yamena varuṇena ca
GE09ram_1-7u:18321: 6.054.002c prekṣya bhīmākṣam āyāntaṃ vānarā vipradudruvuḥ 6.054.003a tāṃs tu vidravato dṛṣṭvā vāliputro 'ṅgado 'bravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:18322: 6.054.003c nalaṃ nīlaṃ gavākṣaṃ ca kumudaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_1-7u:18323: 6.054.004a ātmānam atra vismṛtya vīryāṇy abhijanāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:18324: 6.054.004c kva gacchata bhayatrastāḥ prākṛtā harayo yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:18325: 6.054.005a sādhu saumyā nivartadhvaṃ kiṃ prāṇān parirakṣatha
GE09ram_1-7u:18326: 6.054.005c nālaṃ yuddhāya vai rakṣo mahatīyaṃ vibhīṣikāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18327: 6.054.006a mahatīm utthitām enāṃ rākṣasānāṃ vibhīṣikām 6.054.006c vikramād vidhamiṣyāmo nivartadhvaṃ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18328: 6.054.007a kṛcchreṇa tu samāśvāsya saṃgamya ca tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18330: 6.054.008a te nivṛtya tu saṃkruddhāḥ kumbhakarṇaṃ vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18331: 6.054.008c nijaghnuḥ paramakruddhāḥ samadā iva kuñjarāḥ 6.054.008e prāṃśubhir giriśṛṅgaiś ca śilābhiś ca mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18332: 6.054.009a pādapaiḥ puṣpitāgraiś ca hanyamāno na kampate
GE09ram_1-7u:18333: 6.054.009c tasya gātreṣu patitā bhidyante śataśaḥ śilāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18334: 6.054.009e pādapāḥ puṣpitāgrāś ca bhagnāḥ petur mahītale
GE09ram_1-7u:18336: 6.054.010c mamantha paramāyatto vanāny agnir ivotthitaḥ 6.054.011a lohitārdrās tu bahavaḥ śerate vānararṣabhāḥ 6.054.011c nirastāḥ patitā bhūmau tāmrapuṣpā iva drumāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18338: 6.054.012c ke cit samudre patitāḥ ke cid gaganam āśritāḥ 6.054.013a vadhyamānās tu te vīrā rākṣasena balīyasā
GE09ram_1-7u:18339: 6.054.013c sāgaraṃ yena te tīrṇāḥ pathā tenaiva dudruvuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18340: 6.054.014a te sthalāni tathā nimnaṃ viṣaṇṇavadanā bhayāt
GE09ram_1-7u:18341: 6.054.014c ṛkṣā vṛkṣān samārūḍhāḥ ke cit parvatam āśritāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18342: 6.054.015a mamajjur arṇave ke cid guhāḥ ke cit samāśritāḥ 6.054.015c niṣeduḥ plavagāḥ ke cit ke cin naivāvatasthire
GE09ram_1-7u:18343: 6.054.016a tān samīkṣyāṅgado bhaṅgān vānarān idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:18345: 6.054.017a bhagnānāṃ vo na paśyāmi parigamya mahīm imām
GE09ram_1-7u:18346: 6.054.017c sthānaṃ sarve nivartadhvaṃ kiṃ prāṇān parirakṣatha
GE09ram_1-7u:18348: 6.054.018c dārā hy apahasiṣyanti sa vai ghātas tu jīvitām 6.054.019a kuleṣu jātāḥ sarve sma vistīrṇeṣu mahatsu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:18349: 6.054.019c anāryāḥ khalu yad bhītās tyaktvā vīryaṃ pradhāvata
GE09ram_1-7u:18350: 6.054.020a vikatthanāni vo yāni yadā vai janasaṃsadi
GE09ram_1-7u:18351: 6.054.020c tāni vaḥ kva ca yatāni sodagrāṇi mahānti ca 6.054.021a bhīrupravādāḥ śrūyante yas tu jīvati dhikkṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18352: 6.054.021c mārgaḥ satpuruṣair juṣṭaḥ sevyatāṃ tyajyatāṃ bhayam
GE09ram_1-7u:18353: 6.054.022a śayāmahe vā nihatāḥ pṛthivyām alpajīvitāḥ 6.054.022c duṣprāpaṃ brahmalokaṃ vā prāpnumo yudhi sūditāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18354: 6.054.022e saṃprāpnuyāmaḥ kīrtiṃ vā nihatya śatrum āhave
GE09ram_1-7u:18355: 6.054.023a na kumbhakarṇaḥ kākutsthaṃ dṛṣṭvā jīvan gamiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:18356: 6.054.023c dīpyamānam ivāsādya pataṃgo jvalanaṃ yathā 6.054.024a palāyanena coddiṣṭāḥ prāṇān rakṣāmahe vayam 6.054.024c ekena bahavo bhagnā yaśo nāśaṃ gamiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:18357: 6.054.025a evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ taṃ śūram aṅgadaṃ kanakāṅgadam
GE09ram_1-7u:18358: 6.054.025c dravamāṇās tato vākyam ūcuḥ śūravigarhitam 6.054.026a kṛtaṃ naḥ kadanaṃ ghoraṃ kumbhakarṇena rakṣasā
GE09ram_1-7u:18359: 6.054.026c na sthānakālo gacchāmo dayitaṃ jīvitaṃ hi naḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18360: 6.054.027a etāvad uktvā vacanaṃ sarve te bhejire diśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18361: 6.054.027c bhīmaṃ bhīmākṣam āyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā vānarayūthapāḥ 6.054.028a dravamāṇās tu te vīrā aṅgadena valīmukhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18362: 6.054.028c sāntvaiś ca bahumānaiś ca tataḥ sarve nivartitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18365: 6.055.001a te nivṛttā mahākāyāḥ śrutvāṅgadavacas tadā 6.055.001c naiṣṭhikīṃ buddhim āsthāya sarve saṃgrāmakāṅkṣiṇaḥ 6.055.002a samudīritavīryās te samāropitavikramāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18367: 6.055.003a prayātāś ca gatā harṣaṃ maraṇe kṛtaniścayāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18368: 6.055.003c cakruḥ sutumulaṃ yuddhaṃ vānarās tyaktajīvitāḥ 6.055.004a atha vṛkṣān mahākāyāḥ sānūni sumahānti ca
GE09ram_1-7u:18369: 6.055.004c vānarās tūrṇam udyamya kumbhakarṇam abhidravan 6.055.005a sa kumbhakarṇaḥ saṃkruddho gadām udyamya vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:18370: 6.055.005c ardayan sumahākāyaḥ samantād vyākṣipad ripūn 6.055.006a śatāni sapta cāṣṭau ca sahasrāṇi ca vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18371: 6.055.006c prakīrṇāḥ śerate bhūmau kumbhakarṇena pothitāḥ 6.055.007a ṣoḍaśāṣṭau ca daśa ca viṃśat triṃśat tathaiva ca 6.055.007c parikṣipya ca bāhubhyāṃ khādan viparidhāvati 6.055.007e bhakṣayan bhṛśasaṃkruddho garuḍaḥ pannagān iva 6.055.008a hanūmāñ śailaśṛṅgāṇi vṛkṣāṃś ca vividhān bahūn
GE09ram_1-7u:18372: 6.055.008c vavarṣa kumbhakarṇasya śirasy ambaram āsthitaḥ 6.055.009a tāni parvataśṛṅgāṇi śūlena tu bibheda ha
GE09ram_1-7u:18373: 6.055.009c babhañja vṛkṣavarṣaṃ ca kumbhakarṇo mahābalaḥ 6.055.010a tato harīṇāṃ tad anīkam ugraṃ; dudrāva śūlaṃ niśitaṃ pragṛhya
GE09ram_1-7u:18374: 6.055.010c tasthau tato 'syāpatataḥ purastān; mahīdharāgraṃ hanumān pragṛhya
GE09ram_1-7u:18375: 6.055.011a sa kumbhakarṇaṃ kupito jaghāna; vegena śailottamabhīmakāyam 6.055.011c sa cukṣubhe tena tadābhibūto; medārdragātro rudhirāvasiktaḥ 6.055.012a sa śūlam āvidhya taḍitprakāśaṃ; giriṃ yathā prajvalitāgraśṛṅgam
GE09ram_1-7u:18376: 6.055.012c bāhvantare mārutim ājaghāna; guho 'calaṃ krauñcam ivograśaktyā 6.055.013a sa śūlanirbhinna mahābhujāntaraḥ; pravihvalaḥ śoṇitam udvaman
GE09ram_1-7u:18379: 6.055.014a tato vineduḥ sahasā prahṛṣṭā; rakṣogaṇās taṃ vyathitaṃ samīkṣya
GE09ram_1-7u:18380: 6.055.014c plavaṃgamās tu vyathitā bhayārtāḥ; pradudruvuḥ saṃyati kumbhakarṇāt
GE09ram_1-7u:18381: 6.055.015a nīlaś cikṣepa śailāgraṃ kumbhakarṇāya dhīmate 6.055.015c tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya muṣṭinābhijaghāna ha 6.055.016a muṣṭiprahārābhihataṃ tac chailāgraṃ vyaśīryata
GE09ram_1-7u:18383: 6.055.017a ṛṣabhaḥ śarabho nīlo gavākṣo gandhamādanaḥ 6.055.017c pañcavānaraśārdūlāḥ kumbhakarṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:18384: 6.055.018a śailair vṛkṣais talaiḥ pādair muṣṭibhiś ca mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18386: 6.055.019a sparśān iva prahārāṃs tān vedayāno na vivyathe
GE09ram_1-7u:18387: 6.055.019c ṛṣabhaṃ tu mahāvegaṃ bāhubhyāṃ pariṣasvaje 6.055.020a kumbhakarṇabhujābhyāṃ tu pīḍito vānararṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18389: 6.055.021a muṣṭinā śarabhaṃ hatvā jānunā nīlam āhave
GE09ram_1-7u:18390: 6.055.021c ājaghāna gavākṣaṃ ca talenendraripus tadā 6.055.022a dattapraharavyathitā mumuhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18391: 6.055.022c nipetus te tu medinyāṃ nikṛttā iva kiṃśukāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18394: 6.055.024a taṃ śailam iva śailābhāḥ sarve tu plavagarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18395: 6.055.024c samāruhya samutpatya dadaṃśuś ca mahābalāḥ 6.055.025a taṃ nakhair daśanaiś cāpi muṣṭibhir jānubhis tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:18396: 6.055.025c kumbhakarṇaṃ mahākāyaṃ te jaghnuḥ plavagarṣabhāḥ 6.055.026a sa vānarasahasrais tair ācitaḥ parvatopamaḥ 6.055.026c rarāja rākṣasavyāghro girir ātmaruhair iva 6.055.027a bāhubhyāṃ vānarān sarvān pragṛhya sa mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18397: 6.055.027c bhakṣayām āsa saṃkruddho garuḍaḥ pannagān iva
GE09ram_1-7u:18399: 6.055.028c nāsā puṭābhyāṃ nirjagmuḥ karṇābhyāṃ caiva vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18401: 6.055.029c babhañja vānarān sarvān saṃkruddho rākṣasottamaḥ 6.055.030a māṃsaśoṇitasaṃkledāṃ bhūmiṃ kurvan sa rākṣasaḥ 6.055.030c cacāra harisainyeṣu kālāgnir iva mūrchitaḥ 6.055.031a vajrahasto yathā śakraḥ pāśahasta ivāntakaḥ 6.055.031c śūlahasto babhau tasmin kumbhakarṇo mahābalaḥ 6.055.032a yathā śuṣkāṇy araṇyāni grīṣme dahati pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18403: 6.055.033a tatas te vadhyamānās tu hatayūthā vināyakāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18404: 6.055.033c vānarā bhayasaṃvignā vinedur visvaraṃ bhṛśam 6.055.034a anekaśo vadhyamānāḥ kumbhakarṇena vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18405: 6.055.034c rāghavaṃ śaraṇaṃ jagmur vyathitāḥ khinnacetasaḥ 6.055.035a tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya kumbhakarṇaṃ mahābalam 6.055.035c utpapāta tadā vīraḥ sugrīvo vānarādhipaḥ 6.055.036a sa parvatāgram utkṣipya samāvidhya mahākapiḥ 6.055.036c abhidudrāva vegena kumbhakarṇaṃ mahābalam
GE09ram_1-7u:18406: 6.055.037a tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya kumbhakarṇaḥ plavaṃgamam 6.055.037c tasthau vivṛtasarvāṅgo vānarendrasya saṃmukhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18408: 6.055.038c kumbhakarṇaṃ sthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sugrīvo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:18409: 6.055.039a pātitāś ca tvayā vīrāḥ kṛtaṃ karma suduṣkaram
GE09ram_1-7u:18410: 6.055.039c bhakṣitāni ca sainyāni prāptaṃ te paramaṃ yaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18411: 6.055.040a tyaja tad vānarānīkaṃ prākṛtaiḥ kiṃ kariṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:18412: 6.055.040c sahasvaikaṃ nipātaṃ me parvatasyāsya rākṣasa 6.055.041a tad vākyaṃ harirājasya
GE09ram_1-7u:18414: 6.055.042a prajāpates tu pautras tvaṃ tathaivarkṣarajaḥsutaḥ 6.055.042c śrutapauruṣasaṃpannas tasmād garjasi vānara
GE09ram_1-7u:18415: 6.055.043a sa kumbhakarṇasya vaco niśamya; vyāvidhya śailaṃ sahasā mumoca
GE09ram_1-7u:18416: 6.055.043c tenājaghānorasi kumbhakarṇaṃ; śailena vajrāśanisaṃnibhena 6.055.044a tac chailaśṛṅgaṃ sahasā vikīrṇaṃ; bhujāntare tasya tadā viśāle
GE09ram_1-7u:18417: 6.055.044c tato viṣeduḥ sahasā plavaṃgamā; rakṣogaṇāś cāpi mudā vineduḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18418: 6.055.045a sa śailaśṛṅgābhihataś cukopa; nanāda kopāc ca vivṛtya vaktram 6.055.045c vyāvidhya śūlaṃ ca taḍitprakāśaṃ; cikṣepa haryṛkṣapater vadhāya
GE09ram_1-7u:18419: 6.055.046a tat kumbhakarṇasya bhujapraviddhaṃ; śūlaṃ śitaṃ kāñcanadāmajuṣṭam
GE09ram_1-7u:18420: 6.055.046c kṣipraṃ samutpatya nigṛhya dorbhyāṃ; babhañja vegena suto
GE09ram_1-7u:18422: 6.055.047a kṛtaṃ bhārasahasrasya śūlaṃ kālāyasaṃ mahat 6.055.047c babhañja janaum āropya prahṛṣṭaḥ plavagarṣabhaḥ 6.055.048a sa tat tadā bhagnam avekṣya śūlaṃ; cukopa rakṣo'dhipatir
GE09ram_1-7u:18424: 6.055.048c utpāṭya laṅkāmalayāt sa śṛṅgaṃ; jaghāna sugrīvam upetya tena
GE09ram_1-7u:18425: 6.055.049a sa śailaśṛṅgābhihato visaṃjñaḥ; papāta bhūmau yudhi vānarendraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18426: 6.055.049c taṃ prekṣya bhūmau patitaṃ visaṃjñaṃ; neduḥ prahṛṣṭā yudhi
GE09ram_1-7u:18430: 6.055.050c jahāra sugrīvam abhipragṛhya; yathānilo megham atipracaṇḍaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18431: 6.055.051a sa taṃ mahāmeghanikāśarūpam; utpāṭya gacchan yudhi kumbhakarṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18432: 6.055.051c rarāja merupratimānarūpo; merur yathātyucchritaghoraśṛṅgaḥ 6.055.052a tataḥ samutpāṭya jagāma vīraḥ; saṃstūyamāno yudhi rākṣasendraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18434: 6.055.053a tatas tam ādāya tadā sa mene; harīndram indropamam indravīryaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18435: 6.055.053c asmin hṛte sarvam idaṃ hṛtaṃ syāt; sarāghavaṃ sainyam itīndraśatruḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18436: 6.055.054a vidrutāṃ vāhinīṃ dṛṣṭvā vānarāṇāṃ tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18437: 6.055.054c kumbhakarṇena sugrīvaṃ gṛhītaṃ cāpi vānaram 6.055.055a hanūmāṃś cintayām āsa matimān mārutātmajaḥ 6.055.055c evaṃ gṛhīte sugrīve kiṃ kartavyaṃ mayā bhavet
GE09ram_1-7u:18438: 6.055.056a yad vai nyāyyaṃ mayā kartuṃ tat kariṣyāmi sarvathā 6.055.056c bhūtvā parvatasaṃkāśo nāśayiṣyāmi rākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:18439: 6.055.057a mayā hate saṃyati kumbhakarṇe; mahābale muṣṭiviśīrṇadehe 6.055.057c vimocite vānarapārthive ca; bhavantu hṛṣṭāḥ pravagāḥ samagrāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18440: 6.055.058a atha vā svayam apy eṣa mokṣaṃ prāpsyati pārthivaḥ 6.055.058c gṛhīto 'yaṃ yadi bhavet tridaśaiḥ sāsuroragaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18441: 6.055.059a manye na tāvad ātmānaṃ budhyate vānarādhipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18443: 6.055.060a ayaṃ muhūrtāt sugrīvo labdhasaṃjño mahāhave 6.055.060c ātmano vānarāṇāṃ ca yat pathyaṃ tat kariṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:18444: 6.055.061a mayā tu mokṣitasyāsya sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ 6.055.061c aprītaś ca bhavet kaṣṭā kīrtināśaś ca śāśvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18445: 6.055.062a tasmān muhūrtaṃ kāṅkṣiṣye vikramaṃ pārthivasya naḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18446: 6.055.062c bhinnaṃ ca vānarānīkaṃ tāvad āśvāsayāmy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:18447: 6.055.063a ity evaṃ cintayitvā tu hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18448: 6.055.063c bhūyaḥ saṃstambhayām āsa vānarāṇāṃ mahācamūm 6.055.064a sa kumbhakarṇo 'tha viveśa laṅkāṃ; sphurantam ādāya mahāhariṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:18450: 6.055.064c vimānacaryāgṛhagopurasthaiḥ; puṣpāgryavarṣair avakīryamāṇaḥ 6.055.065a tataḥ sa saṃjñām upalabhya kṛcchrād; balīyasas tasya bhujāntarasthaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18451: 6.055.065c avekṣamāṇaḥ purarājamārgaṃ; vicintayām āsa muhur mahātmā
GE09ram_1-7u:18452: 6.055.066a evaṃ gṛhītena kathaṃ nu nāma; śakyaṃ mayā saṃprati kartum adya 6.055.066c tathā kariṣyāmi yathā harīṇāṃ; bhaviṣyatīṣṭaṃ ca hitaṃ ca kāryam 6.055.067a tataḥ karāgraiḥ sahasā sametya; rājā harīṇām amarendraśatroḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18453: 6.055.067c nakhaiś ca karṇau daśanaiś ca nāsāṃ; dadaṃśa pārśveṣu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:18455: 6.055.068a sa kumbhakarṇau hṛtakarṇanāso; vidāritas tena vimarditaś ca
GE09ram_1-7u:18456: 6.055.068c roṣābhibhūtaḥ kṣatajārdragātraḥ; sugrīvam āvidhya pipeṣa bhūmau
GE09ram_1-7u:18457: 6.055.069a sa bhūtale bhīmabalābhipiṣṭaḥ; surāribhis tair abhihanyamānaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18458: 6.055.069c jagāma khaṃ vegavad abhyupetya; punaś ca rāmeṇa samājagāma
GE09ram_1-7u:18460: 6.055.070c rarāja śoṇitotsikto giriḥ prasravaṇair iva 6.055.071a tataḥ sa puryāḥ sahasā mahātmā; niṣkramya tad vānarasainyam
GE09ram_1-7u:18462: 6.055.071c babhakṣa rakṣo yudhi kumbhakarṇaḥ; prajā yugāntāgnir iva
GE09ram_1-7u:18466: 6.055.072c cakhāda rakṣāṃsi harīn piśācān; ṛkṣāṃś ca mohād yudhi kumbhakarṇaḥ 6.055.073a ekaṃ dvau trīn bahūn kruddho vānarān saha rākṣasaiḥ 6.055.073c samādāyaikahastena pracikṣepa tvaran mukhe
GE09ram_1-7u:18467: 6.055.074a saṃprasravaṃs tadā medaḥ śoṇitaṃ ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18468: 6.055.074c vadhyamāno nagendrāgrair bhakṣayām āsa vānarān 6.055.074e te bhakṣyamāṇā harayo rāmaṃ jagmus tadā gatim
GE09ram_1-7u:18469: 6.055.075a tasmin kāle sumitrāyāḥ putraḥ parabalārdanaḥ 6.055.075c cakāra lakṣmaṇaḥ kruddho yuddhaṃ parapuraṃjayaḥ 6.055.076a sa kumbhakarṇasya śarāñ śarīre sapta vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:18470: 6.055.076c nicakhānādade cānyān visasarja ca lakṣmaṇaḥ 6.055.077a atikramya ca saumitriṃ kumbhakarṇo mahābalaḥ 6.055.077c rāmam evābhidudrāva dārayann iva medinīm 6.055.078a atha dāśarathī rāmo raudram astraṃ prayojayan
GE09ram_1-7u:18471: 6.055.078c kumbhakarṇasya hṛdaye sasarja niśitāñ śarān 6.055.079a tasya rāmeṇa viddhasya
GE09ram_1-7u:18472: 6.055.079c aṅgāramiśrāḥ kruddhasya mukhān niścerur arciṣaḥ 6.055.080a tasyorasi nimagnāś ca śarā barhiṇavāsasaḥ 6.055.080c hastāc cāsya paribhraṣṭā papātorvyāṃ mahāgadā 6.055.081a sa nirāyudham ātmānaṃ yadā mene mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18473: 6.055.081c muṣṭibhyāṃ cāraṇābhyāṃ ca cakāra kadanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:18474: 6.055.082a sa bāṇair atividdhāṅgaḥ kṣatajena samukṣitaḥ 6.055.082c rudhiraṃ parisusrāva giriḥ prasravaṇān iva 6.055.083a sa tīvreṇa ca kopena rudhireṇa ca mūrchitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18475: 6.055.083c vānarān rākṣasān ṛkṣān khādan viparidhāvati 6.055.084a tasmin kāle sa dharmātmā lakṣmaṇo rāmam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:18476: 6.055.084c kumbhakarṇavadhe yukto yogān parimṛśan bahūn 6.055.085a naivāyaṃ vānarān rājan na vijānāti rākṣasān
GE09ram_1-7u:18477: 6.055.085c mattaḥ śoṇitagandhena svān parāṃś caiva khādati
GE09ram_1-7u:18478: 6.055.086a sādhv enam adhirohantu sarvato vānararṣabhāḥ 6.055.086c yūthapāś ca yathāmukhyās tiṣṭhantv asya samantataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18479: 6.055.087a apy ayaṃ durmatiḥ kāle gurubhāraprapīḍitaḥ 6.055.087c prapatan rākṣaso bhūmau nānyān hanyāt plavaṃgamān
GE09ram_1-7u:18480: 6.055.088a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rājaputrasya dhīmataḥ 6.055.088c te samāruruhur hṛṣṭāḥ kumbhakarṇaṃ plavaṃgamāḥ 6.055.089a kumbhakarṇas tu saṃkruddhaḥ samārūḍhaḥ plavaṃgamaiḥ 6.055.089c vyadhūnayat tān vegena duṣṭahastīva hastipān 6.055.090a tān dṛṣṭvā nirdhūtān rāmo ruṣṭo 'yam iti rākṣasaḥ 6.055.090c samutpapāta vegena dhanur uttamam ādade 6.055.091a sa cāpam ādāya bhujaṃgakalpaṃ; dṛḍhajyam ugraṃ tapanīyacitram
GE09ram_1-7u:18481: 6.055.091c harīn samāśvāsya samutpapāta; rāmo nibaddhottamatūṇabāṇaḥ 6.055.092a sa vānaragaṇais tais tu vṛtaḥ paramadurjayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18483: 6.055.093a sa dadarśa mahātmānaṃ kirīṭinam ariṃdamam 6.055.093c śoṇitāplutasarvāṅgaṃ kumbhakarṇaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:18484: 6.055.094a sarvān samabhidhāvantaṃ yathāruṣṭaṃ diśā gajam 6.055.094c mārgamāṇaṃ harīn kruddhaṃ rākṣasaiḥ parivāritam 6.055.095a vindhyamandarasaṃkāśaṃ kāñcanāṅgadabhūṣaṇam 6.055.095c sravantaṃ rudhiraṃ vaktrād varṣamegham ivotthitam 6.055.096a jihvayā parilihyantaṃ śoṇitaṃ śoṇitokṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:18487: 6.055.097c visphārayām āsa tadā kārmukaṃ puruṣarṣabhaḥ 6.055.098a sa tasya cāpanirghoṣāt kupito nairṛtarṣabhaḥ 6.055.098c amṛṣyamāṇas taṃ ghoṣam abhidudrāva rāghavam 6.055.099a tatas tu vātoddhatameghakalpaṃ; bhujaṃgarājottamabhogabāhum
GE09ram_1-7u:18488: 6.055.099c tam āpatantaṃ dharaṇīdharābham; uvāca rāmo yudhi kumbhakarṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:18490: 6.055.100c avehi māṃ śakrasapatna rāmam; ayaṃ muhūrtād bhavitā vicetāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18492: 6.055.101c pātayann iva sarveṣāṃ hṛdayāni vanaukasām 6.055.102a prahasya vikṛtaṃ bhīmaṃ sa meghasvanitopamam 6.055.102c kumbhakarṇo mahātejā rāghavaṃ vākyam abravīt 6.055.103a nāhaṃ virādho vijñeyo na kabandhaḥ kharo na ca 6.055.103c na vālī na ca mārīcaḥ kumbhakarṇo 'ham āgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18493: 6.055.104a paśya me mudgaraṃ ghoraṃ sarvakālāyasaṃ mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:18494: 6.055.104c anena nirjitā devā dānavāś ca mayā purā
GE09ram_1-7u:18495: 6.055.105a vikarṇanāsa iti māṃ nāvajñātuṃ tvam arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:18496: 6.055.105c svalpāpi hi na me pīḍā karṇanāsāvināśanāt
GE09ram_1-7u:18497: 6.055.106a darśayekṣvākuśārdūla vīryaṃ gātreṣu me laghu 6.055.106c tatas tvāṃ bhakṣayiṣyāmi
GE09ram_1-7u:18498: 6.055.107a sa kumbhakarṇasya vaco niśamya; rāmaḥ supuṅkhān visasarja bāṇān
GE09ram_1-7u:18499: 6.055.107c tair āhato vajrasamapravegair; na cukṣubhe na vyathate surāriḥ 6.055.108a yaiḥ sāyakaiḥ sālavarā nikṛttā; vālī hato vānarapuṃgavaś ca
GE09ram_1-7u:18500: 6.055.108c te kumbhakarṇasya tadā śarīraṃ; vajropamā na vyathayāṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:18502: 6.055.109a sa vāridhārā iva sāyakāṃs tān; pibañ śarīreṇa mahendraśatruḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18503: 6.055.109c jaghāna rāmasya śarapravegaṃ; vyāvidhya taṃ mudgaram ugravegam
GE09ram_1-7u:18504: 6.055.110a tatas tu rakṣaḥ kṣatajānuliptaṃ; vitrāsanaṃ devamahācamūnām 6.055.110c vyāvidhya taṃ mudgaram ugravegaṃ; vidrāvayām āsa camūṃ harīṇām
GE09ram_1-7u:18505: 6.055.111a vāyavyam ādāya tato varāstraṃ; rāmaḥ pracikṣepa niśācarāya
GE09ram_1-7u:18506: 6.055.111c samudgaraṃ tena jahāra bāhuṃ; sa kṛttabāhus tumulaṃ nanāda
GE09ram_1-7u:18507: 6.055.112a sa tasya bāhur giriśṛṅgakalpaḥ; samudgaro rāghavabāṇakṛttaḥ 6.055.112c papāta tasmin harirājasainye; jaghāna tāṃ vānaravāhinīṃ ca
GE09ram_1-7u:18508: 6.055.113a te vānarā bhagnahatāvaśeṣāḥ; paryantam āśritya tadā viṣaṇṇāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18511: 6.055.114c utpāṭayām āsa kareṇa vṛkṣaṃ; tato 'bhidudrāva raṇe narendram 6.055.115a taṃ tasya bāhuṃ saha sālavṛkṣaṃ; samudyataṃ pannagabhogakalpam 6.055.115c aindrāstrayuktena jahāra rāmo; bāṇena jāmbūnadacitritena 6.055.116a sa kumbhakarṇasya bhujo nikṛttaḥ; papāta bhūmau girisaṃnikāśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18512: 6.055.116c viveṣṭamāno nijaghāna vṛkṣāñ; śailāñ śilāvānararākṣasāṃś ca
GE09ram_1-7u:18513: 6.055.117a taṃ chinnabāhuṃ samavekṣya rāmaḥ; samāpatantaṃ sahasā nadantam
GE09ram_1-7u:18514: 6.055.117c dvāv ardhacandrau niśitau pragṛhya; ciccheda pādau yudhi
GE09ram_1-7u:18517: 6.055.118c dudrāva rāmaṃ sahasābhigarjan; rāhur yathā candram ivāntarikṣe
GE09ram_1-7u:18518: 6.055.119a apūrayat tasya mukhaṃ śitāgrai; rāmaḥ śarair hemapinaddhapuṅkhaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18519: 6.055.119c sa pūrṇavaktro na śaśāka vaktuṃ; cukūja kṛcchreṇa mumoha cāpi
GE09ram_1-7u:18520: 6.055.120a athādade sūryamarīcikalpaṃ; sa brahmadaṇḍāntakakālakalpam 6.055.120c ariṣṭam aindraṃ niśitaṃ supuṅkhaṃ; rāmaḥ śaraṃ mārutatulyavegam
GE09ram_1-7u:18523: 6.055.122a sa sāyako rāghavabāhucodito; diśaḥ svabhāsā daśa saṃprakāśayan
GE09ram_1-7u:18524: 6.055.122c vidhūmavaiśvānaradīptadarśano; jagāma śakrāśanitulyavikramaḥ 6.055.123a sa tan mahāparvatakūṭasaṃnibhaṃ; vivṛttadaṃṣṭraṃ calacārukuṇḍalam 6.055.123c cakarta rakṣo'dhipateḥ śiras tadā; yathaiva vṛtrasya purā
GE09ram_1-7u:18526: 6.055.124a tad rāmabāṇābhihataṃ papāta; rakṣaḥśiraḥ parvatasaṃnikāśam 6.055.124c babhañja caryāgṛhagopurāṇi; prākāram uccaṃ tam apātayac ca 6.055.125a tac cātikāyaṃ himavatprakāśaṃ; rakṣas tadā toyanidhau papāta
GE09ram_1-7u:18527: 6.055.125c grāhān mahāmīnacayān bhujaṃgamān; mamarda bhūmiṃ ca tathā viveśa 6.055.126a tasmir hate brāhmaṇadevaśatrau; mahābale saṃyati kumbhakarṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:18528: 6.055.126c cacāla bhūr bhūmidharāś ca sarve; harṣāc ca devās tumulaṃ praṇeduḥ 6.055.127a tatas tu devarṣimaharṣipannagāḥ; surāś ca bhūtāni
GE09ram_1-7u:18531: 6.055.128a praharṣam īyur bahavas tu vānarāḥ; prabuddhapadmapratimair ivānanaiḥ 6.055.128c apūjayan rāghavam iṣṭabhāginaṃ; hate ripau bhīmabale durāsade
GE09ram_1-7u:18532: 6.055.129a sa kumbhakarṇaṃ surasainyamardanaṃ; mahatsu yuddheṣv aparājitaśramam
GE09ram_1-7u:18533: 6.055.129c nananda hatvā bharatāgrajo raṇe; mahāsuraṃ vṛtram ivāmarādhipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18534: 6.056.001a kumbhakarṇaṃ hataṃ dṛṣṭvā rāghaveṇa mahātmanā 6.056.001c rākṣasā rākṣasendrāya rāvaṇāya nyavedayan
GE09ram_1-7u:18535: 6.056.002a śrutvā vinihataṃ saṃkhye kumbhakarṇaṃ mahābalam 6.056.002c rāvaṇaḥ śokasaṃtapto mumoha ca papāta ca
GE09ram_1-7u:18537: 6.056.003c triśirāś cātikāyaś ca ruruduḥ śokapīḍitāḥ 6.056.004a bhrātaraṃ nihataṃ śrutvā
GE09ram_1-7u:18539: 6.056.005a tataḥ kṛcchrāt samāsādya saṃjñāṃ rākṣasapuṃgavaḥ 6.056.005c kumbhakarṇavadhād dīno vilalāpa sa rāvaṇaḥ 6.056.006a hā vīra ripudarpaghna kumbhakarṇa mahābala 6.056.006c śatrusainyaṃ pratāpyaikaḥ kva māṃ saṃtyajya gacchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:18540: 6.056.007a idānīṃ khalv ahaṃ nāsmi yasya me patito bhujaḥ 6.056.007c dakṣiṇo yaṃ samāśritya na bibhemi surāsurān
GE09ram_1-7u:18542: 6.056.008c kālāgnipratimo hy adya rāghaveṇa raṇe hataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18543: 6.056.009a yasya te vajraniṣpeṣo na kuryād vyasanaṃ sadā
GE09ram_1-7u:18545: 6.056.010a ete devagaṇāḥ sārdham ṛṣibhir gagane sthitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18546: 6.056.010c nihataṃ tvāṃ raṇe dṛṣṭvā ninadanti praharṣitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18547: 6.056.011a dhruvam adyaiva saṃhṛṣṭā labdhalakṣyāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ 6.056.011c ārokṣyantīha durgāṇi laṅkādvārāṇi sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18548: 6.056.012a rājyena nāsti me kāryaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmi sītayā
GE09ram_1-7u:18549: 6.056.012c kumbhakarṇavihīnasya jīvite nāsti me ratiḥ 6.056.013a yady ahaṃ bhrātṛhantāraṃ na hanmi yudhi rāghavam
GE09ram_1-7u:18550: 6.056.013c nanu me maraṇaṃ śreyo na cedaṃ vyarthajīvitam
GE09ram_1-7u:18551: 6.056.014a adyaiva taṃ gamiṣyāmi deśaṃ yatrānujo mama
GE09ram_1-7u:18552: 6.056.014c na hi bhrātṝn samutsṛjya kṣaṇaṃ jīvitum utsahe
GE09ram_1-7u:18553: 6.056.015a devā hi māṃ hasiṣyanti dṛṣṭvā pūrvāpakāriṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:18554: 6.056.015c katham indraṃ jayiṣyāmi kumbhakarṇahate tvayi 6.056.016a tad idaṃ mām anuprāptaṃ vibhīṣaṇavacaḥ śubham
GE09ram_1-7u:18555: 6.056.016c yad ajñānān mayā tasya na gṛhītaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18558: 6.056.018a tasyāyaṃ karmaṇaḥ prāto vipāko mama śokadaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18559: 6.056.018c yan mayā dhārmikaḥ śrīmān sa nirasto vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18560: 6.056.019a iti bahuvidham ākulāntarātmā; kṛpaṇam atīva vilapya
GE09ram_1-7u:18562: 6.056.019c nyapatad atha daśānano bhṛśārtas; tam anujam indraripuṃ hataṃ viditvā 6.057.001a evaṃ vilapamānasya rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18563: 6.057.001c śrutvā śokābhitaptasya triśirā vākyam abravīt 6.057.002a evam eva mahāvīryo hato nas tāta madhyamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18564: 6.057.002c na tu satpuruṣā rājan vilapanti yathā bhavān
GE09ram_1-7u:18565: 6.057.003a nūnaṃ tribhuvaṇasyāpi paryāptas tvam asi prabho
GE09ram_1-7u:18566: 6.057.003c sa kasmāt prākṛta iva śokasyātmānam īdṛśam
GE09ram_1-7u:18567: 6.057.004a brahmadattāsti te śaktiḥ kavacaḥ sāyako dhanuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18570: 6.057.005c sa sarvāyudhasaṃpanno rāghavaṃ śāstum arhasi 6.057.006a kāmaṃ tiṣṭha mahārājanirgamiṣyāmy ahaṃ raṇam 6.057.006c uddhariṣyāmi te śatrūn garuḍaḥ pannagān iha
GE09ram_1-7u:18571: 6.057.007a śambaro devarājena narako viṣṇunā yathā 6.057.007c tathādya śayitā rāmo mayā yudhi nipātitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18572: 6.057.008a śrutvā triśiraso vākyaṃ rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ 6.057.008c punar jātam ivātmānaṃ manyate kālacoditaḥ 6.057.009a śrutvā triśiraso vākyaṃ devāntakanarāntakau
GE09ram_1-7u:18573: 6.057.009c atikāyaś ca tejasvī babhūvur yuddhaharṣitāḥ 6.057.010a tato 'ham aham ity evaṃ garjanto nairṛtarṣabhāḥ 6.057.010c rāvaṇasya sutā vīrāḥ śakratulyaparākramāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18574: 6.057.011a antarikṣacarāḥ sarve sarve māyā viśāradāḥ 6.057.011c sarve tridaśadarpaghnāḥ sarve ca raṇadurmadāḥ 6.057.012a sarve 'strabalasaṃpannāḥ sarve vistīrṇa kīrtayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18575: 6.057.012c sarve samaram āsādya na śrūyante sma nirjitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18577: 6.057.013c sarve pravarajijñānāḥ sarve labdhavarās tathā 6.057.014a sa tais tathā bhāskaratulyavarcasaiḥ; sutair vṛtaḥ śatrubalapramardanaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18578: 6.057.014c rarāja rājā maghavān yathāmarair; vṛto mahādānavadarpanāśanaiḥ 6.057.015a sa putrān saṃpariṣvajya bhūṣayitvā ca bhūṣaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18579: 6.057.015c āśīrbhiś ca praśastābhiḥ preṣayām āsa saṃyuge
GE09ram_1-7u:18581: 6.057.016c rakṣaṇārthaṃ kumārāṇāṃ preṣayām āsa saṃyuge 6.057.017a te 'bhivādya mahātmānaṃ rāvaṇaṃ ripurāvaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:18582: 6.057.017c kṛtvā pradakṣiṇaṃ caiva mahākāyāḥ pratasthire 6.057.018a sarvauṣadhībhir gandhaiś ca samālabhya mahābalāḥ 6.057.018c nirjagmur nairṛtaśreṣṭhāḥ ṣaḍ ete yuddhakāṅkṣiṇaḥ 6.057.019a tataḥ sudarśanaṃ nāma nīlajīmūtasaṃnibham
GE09ram_1-7u:18587: 6.057.022a triśirā ratham āsthāya virarāja dhanurdharaḥ 6.057.022c savidyudulkaḥ sajvālaḥ sendracāpa ivāmbudaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18588: 6.057.023a tribhiḥ kirīṭais triśirāḥ śuśubhe sa rathottame
GE09ram_1-7u:18589: 6.057.023c himavān iva śailendras tribhiḥ kāñcanaparvataiḥ 6.057.024a atikāyo 'pi tejasvī rākṣasendrasutas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:18594: 6.057.026c bhūṣaṇaiś ca babhau meruḥ prabhābhir iva bhāsvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18595: 6.057.027a sa rarāja rathe tasmin rājasūnur mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18597: 6.057.028a hayam uccaiḥśravaḥ prakhyaṃ śvetaṃ kanakabhūṣaṇam 6.057.028c manojavaṃ mahākāyam āruroha narāntakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18598: 6.057.029a gṛhītvā prāsam uklābhaṃ virarāja narāntakaḥ 6.057.029c śaktim ādāya tejasvī guhaḥ śatruṣv ivāhave
GE09ram_1-7u:18600: 6.057.030c parigṛhya giriṃ dorbhyāṃ vapur viṣṇor viḍambayan
GE09ram_1-7u:18601: 6.057.031a mahāpārśvo mahātejā gadām ādāya vīryavān 6.057.031c virarāja gadāpāṇiḥ kubera iva saṃyuge 6.057.032a te pratasthur mahātmāno balair apratimair vṛtāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18602: 6.057.032c surā ivāmarāvatyāṃ balair apratimair vṛtāḥ 6.057.033a tān gajaiś ca turaṃgaiś ca rathaiś cāmbudanisvanaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18604: 6.057.034a te virejur mahātmāno kumārāḥ sūryavarcasaḥ 6.057.034c kirīṭinaḥ śriyā juṣṭā grahā dīptā ivāmbare
GE09ram_1-7u:18605: 6.057.035a pragṛhītā babhau teṣāṃ chatrāṇām āvaliḥ sitā
GE09ram_1-7u:18607: 6.057.036a maraṇaṃ vāpi niścitya śatrūṇāṃ vā parājayam
GE09ram_1-7u:18608: 6.057.036c iti kṛtvā matiṃ vīrā nirjagmuḥ saṃyugārthinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18609: 6.057.037a jagarjuś ca praṇeduś ca cikṣipuś cāpi sāyakān
GE09ram_1-7u:18610: 6.057.037c jahṛṣuś ca mahātmāno niryānto yuddhadurmadāḥ 6.057.038a kṣveḍitāsphoṭaninadaiḥ saṃcacāleva medinī
GE09ram_1-7u:18611: 6.057.038c rakṣasāṃ siṃhanādaiś ca pusphoṭeva tadāmbaram 6.057.039a te 'bhiniṣkramya muditā rākṣasendrā mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18614: 6.057.040c hastyaśvarathasaṃbādhaṃ kiṅkiṇīśatanāditam 6.057.041a nīlajīmūtasaṃkāśaṃ samudyatamahāyudham 6.057.041c dīptānalaraviprakhyair nairṛtaiḥ sarvato vṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:18615: 6.057.042a tad dṛṣṭvā balam āyāntaṃ labdhalakṣyāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18617: 6.057.043a tataḥ samudghuṣṭaravaṃ niśamya; rakṣogaṇā vānarayūthapānām 6.057.043c amṛṣyamāṇāḥ paraharṣam ugraṃ; mahābalā bhīmataraṃ vineduḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18618: 6.057.044a te rākṣasabalaṃ ghoraṃ praviśya hariyūthapāḥ 6.057.044c vicerur udyataiḥ śailair nagāḥ śikhariṇo yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:18619: 6.057.045a ke cid ākāśam āviśya ke cid urvyāṃ plavaṃgamāḥ 6.057.045c rakṣaḥsainyeṣu saṃkruddhāś cerur drumaśilāyudhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18620: 6.057.046a te pādapaśilāśailaiś cakrur vṛṣṭim anuttamām 6.057.046c bāṇaughair vāryamāṇāś ca harayo bhīmavikramāḥ 6.057.047a siṃhanādān vineduś ca raṇe rākṣasavānarāḥ 6.057.047c śilābhiś cūrṇayām āsur yātudhānān plavaṃgamāḥ 6.057.048a nijaghnuḥ saṃyuge kruddhāḥ kavacābharaṇāvṛtān
GE09ram_1-7u:18621: 6.057.048c ke cid rathagatān vīrān gajavājigatān api
GE09ram_1-7u:18624: 6.057.049e celuḥ petuś ca neduś ca tatra rākṣasapuṃgavāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18625: 6.057.050a tataḥ śailaiś ca khaḍgaiś ca visṛṣṭair harirākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18628: 6.057.051c ākṣiptāḥ kṣipyamāṇāś ca bhagnaśūlāś ca vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18629: 6.057.052a vānarān vānarair eva jagnus te rajanīcarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18630: 6.057.052c rākṣasān rākṣasair eva jaghnus te vānarā api
GE09ram_1-7u:18631: 6.057.053a ākṣipya ca śilās teṣāṃ nijaghnū rākṣasā harīn
GE09ram_1-7u:18632: 6.057.053c teṣāṃ cācchidya śastrāṇi jaghnū rakṣāṃsi vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18633: 6.057.054a nijaghnuḥ śailaśūlāstrair vibhiduś ca parasparam 6.057.054c siṃhanādān vineduś ca raṇe vānararākṣasāḥ 6.057.055a chinnavarmatanutrāṇā rākṣasā vānarair hatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18634: 6.057.055c rudhiraṃ prasrutās tatra rasasāram iva drumāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18635: 6.057.056a rathena ca rathaṃ cāpi vāraṇena ca vāraṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:18636: 6.057.056c hayena ca hayaṃ ke cin nijaghnur vānarā raṇe 6.057.057a kṣuraprair ardhacandraiś ca bhallaiś ca niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18637: 6.057.057c rākṣasā vānarendrāṇāṃ cicchiduḥ pādapāñ śilāḥ 6.057.058a vikīrṇaiḥ parvatāgraiś ca drumaiś chinnaiś ca saṃyuge
GE09ram_1-7u:18638: 6.057.058c hataiś ca kapirakṣobhir durgamā vasudhābhavat 6.057.059a tasmin pravṛtte tumule vimarde; prahṛṣyamāṇeṣu valī mukheṣu
GE09ram_1-7u:18639: 6.057.059c nipātyamāneṣu ca rākṣaseṣu; maharṣayo devagaṇāś ca neduḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18640: 6.057.060a tato hayaṃ mārutatulyavegam; āruhya śaktiṃ niśitāṃ pragṛhya
GE09ram_1-7u:18642: 6.057.061a sa vānarān saptaśatāni vīraḥ; prāsena dīptena vinirbibheda
GE09ram_1-7u:18643: 6.057.061c ekaḥ kṣaṇenendraripur mahātmā; jaghāna sainyaṃ haripuṃgavānām
GE09ram_1-7u:18644: 6.057.062a dadṛśuś ca mahātmānaṃ hayapṛṣṭhe pratiṣṭhitam 6.057.062c carantaṃ harisainyeṣu
GE09ram_1-7u:18645: 6.057.063a sa tasya dadṛśe mārgo māṃsaśoṇitakardamaḥ 6.057.063c patitaiḥ parvatākārair vānarair abhisaṃvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18646: 6.057.064a yāvad vikramituṃ buddhiṃ cakruḥ plavagapuṃgavāḥ 6.057.064c tāvad etān atikramya nirbibheda narāntakaḥ 6.057.065a jvalantaṃ prāsam udyamya saṃgrāmānte narāntakaḥ 6.057.065c dadāha harisainyāni vanānīva vibhāvasuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18647: 6.057.066a yāvad utpāṭayām āsur vṛkṣāñ śailān vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18648: 6.057.066c tāvat prāsahatāḥ petur vajrakṛttā ivācalāḥ 6.057.067a dikṣu sarvāsu balavān vicacāra narāntakaḥ 6.057.067c pramṛdnan sarvato yuddhe prāvṛṭkāle yathānilaḥ 6.057.068a na śekur dhāvituṃ vīrā na sthātuṃ spandituṃ kutaḥ 6.057.068c utpatantaṃ sthitaṃ yāntaṃ sarvān vivyādha vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:18650: 6.057.070a vajraniṣpeṣasadṛśaṃ prāsasyābhinipātanam 6.057.070c na śekur vānarāḥ soḍhuṃ te vinedur mahāsvanam
GE09ram_1-7u:18653: 6.057.072a ye tu pūrvaṃ mahātmānaḥ kumbhakarṇena pātitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18657: 6.057.074a vidrutāṃ vāhinīṃ dṛṣṭvā sa dadarśa narāntakam
GE09ram_1-7u:18661: 6.057.076a gacchainaṃ rākṣasaṃ vīra yo 'sau turagam āsthitaḥ 6.057.076c kṣobhayantaṃ haribalaṃ kṣipraṃ prāṇair viyojaya 6.057.077a sa bhartur vacanaṃ śrutvā niṣpapātāṅgadas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:18667: 6.057.080a tiṣṭha kiṃ prākṛtair ebhir haribhis tvaṃ kariṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:18668: 6.057.080c asmin vajrasamasparśe prāsaṃ kṣipa mamorasi 6.057.081a aṅgadasya vacaḥ śrutvā pracukrodha narāntakaḥ 6.057.081c saṃdaśya daśanair oṣṭhaṃ niśvasya ca bhujaṃgavat
GE09ram_1-7u:18669: 6.057.082a sa prāsam āvidhya tadāṅgadāya; samujjvalantaṃ sahasotsasarja 6.057.082c sa vāliputrorasi vajrakalpe; babhūva bhagno nyapatac ca bhūmau 6.057.083a taṃ prāsam ālokya tadā vibhagnaṃ; suparṇakṛttoragabhogakalpam
GE09ram_1-7u:18670: 6.057.083c talaṃ samudyamya sa vāliputras; turaṃgamasyābhijaghāna mūrdhni 6.057.084a nimagnapādaḥ sphuṭitākṣi tāro; niṣkrāntajihvo 'calasaṃnikāśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18671: 6.057.084c sa tasya vājī nipapāta bhūmau; talaprahāreṇa vikīrṇamūrdhā 6.057.085a narāntakaḥ krodhavaśaṃ jagāma; hataṃ turagaṃ patitaṃ nirīkṣya
GE09ram_1-7u:18672: 6.057.085c sa muṣṭim udyamya mahāprabhāvo; jaghāna śīrṣe yudhi vāliputram
GE09ram_1-7u:18675: 6.057.086c muhur vijajvāla mumoha cāpi; saṃjñāṃ samāsādya visiṣmiye ca
GE09ram_1-7u:18677: 6.057.087c nipātayām āsa tadā mahātmā; narāntakasyorasi vāliputraḥ 6.057.088a sa muṣṭiniṣpiṣṭavibhinnavakṣā; jvālāṃ vamañ śoṇitadigdhagātraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18678: 6.057.088c narāntako bhūmitale papāta; yathācalo vajranipātabhagnaḥ 6.057.089a athāntarikṣe tridaśottamānāṃ; vanaukasāṃ caiva mahāpraṇādaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18679: 6.057.089c babhūva tasmin nihate 'gryavīre; narāntake vālisutena saṃkhye
GE09ram_1-7u:18680: 6.057.090a athāṅgado rāmamanaḥ praharṣaṇaṃ; suduṣkaraṃ taṃ kṛtavān hi vikramam 6.057.090c visiṣmiye so 'py ativīrya vikramaḥ; punaś ca yuddhe sa babhūva harṣitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18681: 6.058.001a narāntakaṃ hataṃ dṛṣṭvā cukruśur nairṛtarṣabhāḥ 6.058.001c devāntakas trimūrdhā ca paulastyaś ca mahodaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18685: 6.058.003c ādāya parighaṃ dīptam aṅgadaṃ samabhidravat 6.058.004a ratham ādityasaṃkāśaṃ yuktaṃ paramavājibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18686: 6.058.004c āsthāya triśirā vīro vāliputram athābhyayāt 6.058.005a sa tribhir devadarpaghnair nairṛtendrair abhidrutaḥ 6.058.005c vṛkṣam utpāṭayām āsa mahāviṭapam aṅgadaḥ 6.058.006a devāntakāya taṃ vīraś cikṣepa sahasāṅgadaḥ 6.058.006c mahāvṛkṣaṃ mahāśākhaṃ śakro dīptam ivāśanim 6.058.007a triśirās taṃ praciccheda śarair āśīviṣopamaiḥ 6.058.007c sa vṛkṣaṃ kṛttam ālokya utpapāta tato 'ṅgadaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18687: 6.058.008a sa vavarṣa tato vṛkṣāñ śilāś ca kapikuñjaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18688: 6.058.008c tān praciccheda saṃkruddhas triśirā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18689: 6.058.009a parighāgreṇa tān vṛkṣān babhañja ca surāntakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18690: 6.058.009c triśirāś cāṅgadaṃ vīram abhidudrāva sāyakaiḥ 6.058.010a gajena samabhidrutya vāliputraṃ mahodaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18692: 6.058.011a devāntakaś ca saṃkruddhaḥ parigheṇa tadāṅgadam 6.058.011c upagamyābhihatyāśu vyapacakrāma vegavān
GE09ram_1-7u:18693: 6.058.012a sa tribhir nairṛtaśreṣṭhair yugapat samabhidrutaḥ 6.058.012c na vivyathe mahātejā vāliputraḥ pratāpavān 6.058.013a talena bhṛśam utpatya jaghānāsya mahāgajam 6.058.013c petatur locane tasya vinanāda sa vāraṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18694: 6.058.014a viṣāṇaṃ cāsya niṣkṛṣya vāliputro mahābalaḥ 6.058.014c devāntakam abhidrutya tāḍayām āsa saṃyuge 6.058.015a sa vihvalitasarvāṅgo vātoddhata iva drumaḥ 6.058.015c lākṣārasasavarṇaṃ ca susrāva rudhiraṃ mukhāt 6.058.016a athāśvāsya mahātejāḥ kṛcchrād devāntako balī 6.058.016c āvidhya parighaṃ ghoram ājaghāna tadāṅgadam 6.058.017a parighābhihataś cāpi vānarendrātmajas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:18695: 6.058.017c jānubhyāṃ patito bhūmau punar evotpapāta ha
GE09ram_1-7u:18699: 6.058.019c hanūmān api vijñāya nīlaś cāpi pratasthatuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18700: 6.058.020a tataś cikṣepa śailāgraṃ nīlas triśirase tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:18701: 6.058.020c tad rāvaṇasuto dhīmān bibheda niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18703: 6.058.021c savisphuliṅgaṃ sajvālaṃ nipapāta gireḥ śiraḥ 6.058.022a tato jṛmbhitam ālokya harṣād devāntakas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:18705: 6.058.023a tam āpatantam utpatya hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ 6.058.023c ājaghāna tadā mūrdhni vajravegena muṣṭinā 6.058.024a sa muṣṭiniṣpiṣṭavikīrṇamūrdhā; nirvāntadantākṣivilambijihvaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18706: 6.058.024c devāntako rākṣasarājasūnur; gatāsur urvyāṃ sahasā papāta
GE09ram_1-7u:18707: 6.058.025a tasmin hate rākṣasayodhamukhye; mahābale saṃyati devaśatrau
GE09ram_1-7u:18708: 6.058.025c kruddhas trimūrdhā niśitāgram ugraṃ; vavarṣa nīlorasi bāṇavarṣam
GE09ram_1-7u:18709: 6.058.026a sa taiḥ śaraughair abhivarṣyamāṇo; vibhinnagātraḥ kapisainyapālaḥ 6.058.026c nīlo babhūvātha visṛṣṭagātro; viṣṭambhitas tena mahābalena
GE09ram_1-7u:18710: 6.058.027a tatas tu nīlaḥ pratilabhya saṃjñāṃ; śailaṃ samutpāṭya savṛkṣaṣaṇḍam
GE09ram_1-7u:18711: 6.058.027c tataḥ samutpatya bhṛśogravego; mahodaraṃ tena jaghāna mūrdhni
GE09ram_1-7u:18712: 6.058.028a tataḥ sa śailābhinipātabhagno; mahodaras tena saha dvipena
GE09ram_1-7u:18713: 6.058.028c vipothito bhūmitale gatāsuḥ; papāta varjābhihato yathādriḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18714: 6.058.029a pitṛvyaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā triśirāś cāpam ādade
GE09ram_1-7u:18715: 6.058.029c hanūmantaṃ ca saṃkruddho vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18716: 6.058.030a hanūmāṃs tu samutpatya hayāṃs triśirasas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:18717: 6.058.030c vidadāra nakhaiḥ kruddho gajendraṃ mṛgarāḍ iva
GE09ram_1-7u:18718: 6.058.031a atha śaktiṃ samādāya kālarātrim ivāntakaḥ 6.058.031c cikṣepānilaputrāya triśirā
GE09ram_1-7u:18719: 6.058.032a divi kṣiptām ivolkāṃ tāṃ śaktiṃ kṣiptām asaṃgatām
GE09ram_1-7u:18720: 6.058.032c gṛhītvā hariśārdūlo babhañja ca nanāda ca
GE09ram_1-7u:18721: 6.058.033a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā ghorasaṃkāśāṃ śaktiṃ bhagnāṃ hanūmatā
GE09ram_1-7u:18722: 6.058.033c prahṛṣṭā vānaragaṇā vinedur jaladā iva 6.058.034a tataḥ khaḍgaṃ samudyamya triśirā rākṣasottamaḥ 6.058.034c nicakhāna tadā roṣād vānarendrasya vakṣasi 6.058.035a khaḍgaprahārābhihato hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18724: 6.058.036a sa talabhihatas tena srastahastāmbaro bhuvi 6.058.036c nipapāta mahātejās triśirās
GE09ram_1-7u:18725: 6.058.037a sa tasya patataḥ khaḍgaṃ samācchidya mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18727: 6.058.038a amṛṣyamāṇas taṃ ghoṣam utpapāta niśācaraḥ 6.058.038c utpatya ca hanūmantaṃ tāḍayām āsa muṣṭinā
GE09ram_1-7u:18729: 6.058.039c kupitaś ca nijagrāha kirīṭe rākṣasarṣabham 6.058.040a sa tasya śīrṣāṇy asinā śitena; kirīṭajuṣṭāni sakuṇḍalāni 6.058.040c kruddhaḥ praciccheda suto 'nilasya; tvaṣṭuḥ sutasyeva śirāṃsi
GE09ram_1-7u:18732: 6.058.041c petuḥ śirāṃsīndraripor dharaṇyāṃ; jyotīṃṣi muktāni yathārkamārgāt
GE09ram_1-7u:18733: 6.058.042a tasmin hate devaripau triśīrṣe; hanūmata śakraparākrameṇa 6.058.042c neduḥ plavaṃgāḥ pracacāla bhūmī; rakṣāṃsy atho dudruvire
GE09ram_1-7u:18735: 6.058.043a hataṃ triśirasaṃ dṛṣṭvā tathaiva ca mahodaram
GE09ram_1-7u:18738: 6.058.044c jagrāhārciṣmatīṃ cāpi gadāṃ sarvāyasīṃ śubhām 6.058.045a hemapaṭṭaparikṣiptāṃ māṃsaśoṇitalepanām 6.058.045c virājamānāṃ vapuṣā śatruśoṇitarañjitām
GE09ram_1-7u:18740: 6.058.046c airāvatamahāpadmasārvabhauma bhayāvahām 6.058.047a gadām ādāya saṃkruddho mahāpārśvo mahābalaḥ 6.058.047c harīn samabhidudrāva yugāntāgnir iva jvalan 6.058.048a atharṣayaḥ samutpatya vānaro ravaṇānujam
GE09ram_1-7u:18741: 6.058.048c mahāpārśvam upāgamya tasthau tasyāgrato balī 6.058.049a taṃ purastāt sthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā vānaraṃ parvatopamam
GE09ram_1-7u:18743: 6.058.050a sa tayābhihatas tena gadayā vānararṣabhaḥ 6.058.050c bhinnavakṣāḥ samādhūtaḥ susrāva rudhiraṃ bahu 6.058.051a sa saṃprāpya cirāt saṃjñām ṛṣabho vānararṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18745: 6.058.052a tāṃ gṛhītvā gadāṃ bhīmām āvidhya ca punaḥ punaḥ 6.058.052c mattānīkaṃ mahāpārśvaṃ jaghāna raṇamūrdhani
GE09ram_1-7u:18746: 6.058.053a sa svayā gadayā bhinno vikīrṇadaśanekṣaṇaḥ 6.058.053c nipapāta mahāpārśvo vajrāhata
GE09ram_1-7u:18747: 6.058.054a tasmin hate bhrātari rāvaṇasya; tan nairṛtānāṃ balam arṇavābham
GE09ram_1-7u:18748: 6.058.054c tyaktāyudhaṃ kevalajīvitārthaṃ; dudrāva bhinnārṇavasaṃnikāśam 6.059.001a svabalaṃ vyathitaṃ dṛṣṭvā tumulaṃ lomaharṣaṇam 6.059.001c bhrātṝṃś ca nihatān dṛṣṭvā śakratulyaparākramān 6.059.002a pitṛvyau cāpi saṃdṛśya samare saṃniṣūditau 6.059.002c mahodaramahāpārśvau bhrātarau rākṣasarṣabhau
GE09ram_1-7u:18749: 6.059.003a cukopa ca mahātejā brahmadattavaro yudhi 6.059.003c atikāyo 'drisaṃkāśo devadānavadarpahā
GE09ram_1-7u:18750: 6.059.004a sa bhāskarasahasrasya saṃghātam iva bhāsvaram 6.059.004c ratham āsthāya śakrārir abhidudrāva vānarān 6.059.005a sa visphārya mahac cāpaṃ kirīṭī mṛṣṭakuṇḍalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18751: 6.059.005c nāma viśrāvayām āsa nanāda ca mahāsvanam
GE09ram_1-7u:18753: 6.059.006c jyāśabdena ca bhīmena trāsayām āsa vānarān
GE09ram_1-7u:18754: 6.059.007a te tasya rūpam ālokya yathā viṣṇos trivikrame
GE09ram_1-7u:18755: 6.059.007c bhayārtā vānarāḥ sarve vidravanti diśo daśa
GE09ram_1-7u:18757: 6.059.008c śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ jagmur lakṣmaṇāgrajam āhave 6.059.009a tato 'tikāyaṃ kākutstho rathasthaṃ parvatopamam
GE09ram_1-7u:18758: 6.059.009c dadarśa dhanvinaṃ dūrād garjantaṃ kālameghavat 6.059.010a sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā mahātmānaṃ rāghavas tu suvismitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18759: 6.059.010c vānarān sāntvayitvā tu vibhīṣaṇam uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:18761: 6.059.011c yukte hayasahasreṇa viśāle syandane sthitaḥ 6.059.012a ya eṣa niśitaiḥ śūlaiḥ sutīkṣṇaiḥ prāsatomaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18762: 6.059.012c arciṣmadbhir vṛto bhāti bhūtair iva maheśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18764: 6.059.013c āvṛto rathaśaktībhir vidyudbhir iva toyadaḥ 6.059.014a dhanūṃsi cāsya sajyāni hemapṛṣṭhāni sarvaśaḥ 6.059.014c śobhayanti rathaśreṣṭhaṃ śakrapātam ivāmbaram
GE09ram_1-7u:18765: 6.059.015a ka eṣa rakṣaḥ śārdūlo raṇabhūmiṃ virājayan
GE09ram_1-7u:18767: 6.059.016a dhvajaśṛṅgapratiṣṭhena rāhuṇābhivirājate 6.059.016c sūryaraśmiprabhair bāṇair diśo daśa virājayan 6.059.017a triṇataṃ meghanirhrādaṃ hemapṛṣṭham alaṃkṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:18769: 6.059.018a sadhvajaḥ sapatākaś ca sānukarṣo mahārathaḥ 6.059.018c catuḥsādisamāyukto meghastanitanisvanaḥ 6.059.019a viṃśatir daśa cāṣṭau ca tūṇīraratham āsthitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18770: 6.059.019c kārmukāṇi ca bhīmāni jyāś ca kāñcanapiṅgalāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18771: 6.059.020a dvau ca khaḍgau rathagatau pārśvasthau pārśvaśobhinau
GE09ram_1-7u:18773: 6.059.021c kālaḥ kālamahāvaktro meghastha iva bhāskaraḥ 6.059.022a kāñcanāṅgadanaddhābhyāṃ bhujābhyām eṣa śobhate
GE09ram_1-7u:18774: 6.059.022c śṛṅgābhyām iva tuṅgābhyāṃ himavān parvatottamaḥ 6.059.023a kuṇḍalābhyāṃ tu yasyaitad bhāti vaktraṃ śubhekṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:18776: 6.059.024a ācakṣva me mahābāho tvam enaṃ rākṣasottamam
GE09ram_1-7u:18777: 6.059.024c yaṃ dṛṣṭvā vānarāḥ sarve bhayārtā vidrutā diśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18782: 6.059.027a tasyāsīd vīryavān putro rāvaṇapratimo raṇe 6.059.027c vṛddhasevī śrutadharaḥ sarvāstraviduṣāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18783: 6.059.028a aśvapṛṣṭhe rathe nāge khaḍge dhanuṣi karṣaṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:18784: 6.059.028c bhede sāntve ca dāne ca naye mantre ca saṃmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18785: 6.059.029a yasya bāhuṃ samāśritya laṅkā bhavati nirbhayā
GE09ram_1-7u:18786: 6.059.029c tanayaṃ dhānyamālinyā atikāyam imaṃ viduḥ 6.059.030a etenārādhito brahmā tapasā
GE09ram_1-7u:18787: 6.059.030c astrāṇi cāpy avāptāni ripavaś ca parājitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18788: 6.059.031a surāsurair avadhyatvaṃ dattam asmai svayambhuvā 6.059.031c etac ca kavacaṃ divyaṃ rathaś caiṣo 'rkabhāskaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18789: 6.059.032a etena śataśo devā dānavāś ca parājitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18790: 6.059.032c rakṣitāni ca rakṣāmi yakṣāś cāpi niṣūditāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18791: 6.059.033a vajraṃ viṣṭambhitaṃ yena bāṇair indrasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18792: 6.059.033c pāśaḥ salilarājasya yuddhe pratihatas tathā 6.059.034a eṣo 'tikāyo balavān rākṣasānām
GE09ram_1-7u:18793: 6.059.034c rāvaṇasya suto dhīmān devadanava darpahā 6.059.035a tad asmin kriyatāṃ yatnaḥ kṣipraṃ puruṣapuṃgava
GE09ram_1-7u:18794: 6.059.035c purā vānarasainyāni kṣayaṃ nayati sāyakaiḥ 6.059.036a tato 'tikāyo balavān praviśya
GE09ram_1-7u:18795: 6.059.036c visphārayām āsa dhanur nanāda ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18796: 6.059.037a taṃ bhīmavapuṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā rathasthaṃ rathināṃ varam
GE09ram_1-7u:18797: 6.059.037c abhipetur mahātmāno ye pradhānāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ 6.059.038a kumudo dvivido maindo nīlaḥ śarabha eva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:18798: 6.059.038c pādapair giriśṛṅgaiś ca yugapat samabhidravan 6.059.039a teṣāṃ vṛkṣāṃś ca śailāṃś ca śaraiḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18800: 6.059.040a tāṃś caiva sarān sa harīñ śaraiḥ sarvāyasair balī 6.059.040c vivyādhābhimukhaḥ saṃkhye bhīmakāyo niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18802: 6.059.041c na śekur atikāyasya pratikartuṃ mahāraṇe 6.059.042a tat sainyaṃ harivīrāṇāṃ trāsayām āsa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18803: 6.059.042c mṛgayūtham iva kruddho harir yauvanam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18804: 6.059.043a sa rāṣasendro harisainyamadhye; nāyudhyamānaṃ nijaghāna kaṃ cit
GE09ram_1-7u:18805: 6.059.043c upetya rāmaṃ sadhanuḥ kalāpī; sagarvitaṃ vākyam idaṃ babhāṣe
GE09ram_1-7u:18806: 6.059.044a rathe sthito 'haṃ śaracāpapāṇir; na prākṛtaṃ kaṃ cana yodhayāmi 6.059.044c yasyāsti śaktir vyavasāya yuktā; dadātuṃ me kṣipram ihādya yuddham 6.059.045a tat tasya vākyaṃ bruvato niśamya; cukopa saumitrir amitrahantā
GE09ram_1-7u:18807: 6.059.045c amṛṣyamāṇaś ca samutpapāta; jagrāha cāpaṃ ca tataḥ smayitvā 6.059.046a kruddhaḥ saumitrir utpatya tūṇād ākṣipya sāyakam
GE09ram_1-7u:18808: 6.059.046c purastād atikāyasya vicakarṣa mahad dhanuḥ 6.059.047a pūrayan sa mahīṃ śailān ākāśaṃ sāgaraṃ diśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18810: 6.059.048a saumitreś cāpanirghoṣaṃ śrutvā pratibhayaṃ tadā 6.059.048c visiṣmiye mahātejā rākṣasendrātmajo balī
GE09ram_1-7u:18811: 6.059.049a athātikāyaḥ kupito dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇam utthitam 6.059.049c ādāya niśitaṃ bāṇam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:18812: 6.059.050a bālas tvam asi saumitre vikrameṣv avicakṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18813: 6.059.050c gaccha kiṃ kālasadṛśaṃ māṃ yodhayitum icchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:18814: 6.059.051a na hi madbāhusṛṣṭānām astrāṇāṃ himavān api
GE09ram_1-7u:18815: 6.059.051c soḍhum utsahate vegam antarikṣam atho mahī
GE09ram_1-7u:18817: 6.059.052c nyasya cāpaṃ nivartasva mā prāṇāñ jahi madgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18818: 6.059.053a atha vā tvaṃ pratiṣṭabdho na nivartitum icchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:18819: 6.059.053c tiṣṭha prāṇān parityajya gamiṣyasi yamakṣayam 6.059.054a paśya me niśitān bāṇān aridarpaniṣūdanān 6.059.054c īśvarāyudhasaṃkāśāṃs taptakāñcanabhūṣaṇān 6.059.055a eṣa te sarpasaṃkāśo bāṇaḥ pāsyati śoṇitam
GE09ram_1-7u:18820: 6.059.055c mṛgarāja iva kruddho nāgarājasya śoṇitam 6.059.056a śrutvātikāyasya vacaḥ saroṣaṃ; sagarvitaṃ saṃyati rājaputraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18821: 6.059.056c sa saṃcukopātibalo bṛhacchrīr; uvāca vākyaṃ ca tato mahārtham 6.059.057a na vākyamātreṇa bhavān pradhāno; na katthanāt satpuruṣā
GE09ram_1-7u:18823: 6.059.057c mayi sthite dhanvini bāṇapāṇau; vidarśayasvātmabalaṃ durātman 6.059.058a karmaṇā sūcayātmānaṃ na vikatthitum arhasi 6.059.058c pauruṣeṇa tu yo yuktaḥ sa tu śūra iti smṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18824: 6.059.059a sarvāyudhasamāyukto dhanvī tvaṃ ratham āsthitaḥ 6.059.059c śarair vā yadi vāpy astrair darśayasva parākramam
GE09ram_1-7u:18825: 6.059.060a tataḥ śiras te niśitaiḥ pātayiṣyāmy ahaṃ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18826: 6.059.060c mārutaḥ kālasaṃpakvaṃ vṛntāt tālaphalaṃ yathā 6.059.061a adya te māmakā bāṇās taptakāñcanabhūṣaṇāḥ 6.059.061c pāsyanti rudhiraṃ gātrād bāṇaśalyāntarotthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:18827: 6.059.062a bālo 'yam iti vijñāya na māvajñātum arhasi 6.059.062c bālo vā yadi vā vṛddho mṛtyuṃ jānīhi saṃyuge 6.059.063a lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā hetumat paramārthavat 6.059.063c atikāyaḥ pracukrodha bāṇaṃ cottamam ādade 6.059.064a tato vidyādharā bhūtā devā daityā maharṣayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18828: 6.059.064c guhyakāś ca mahātmānas tad yuddhaṃ dadṛśus tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:18830: 6.059.065c lakṣmaṇasya pracikṣepa saṃkṣipann iva cāmbaram 6.059.066a tam āpatantaṃ niśitaṃ śaram āśīviṣopamam 6.059.066c ardhacandreṇa ciccheda lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā
GE09ram_1-7u:18831: 6.059.067a taṃ nikṛttaṃ śaraṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛttabhogam ivoragam
GE09ram_1-7u:18832: 6.059.067c atikāyo bhṛśaṃ kruddhaḥ pañcabāṇān samādade 6.059.068a tāñ śarān saṃpracikṣepa lakṣmaṇāya niśācaraḥ 6.059.068c tān aprāptāñ śarais tīkṣṇaiś ciccheda bharatānujaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18833: 6.059.069a sa tāṃś chittvā śarais tīkṣṇair lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā
GE09ram_1-7u:18834: 6.059.069c ādade niśitaṃ bāṇaṃ jvalantam iva tejasā
GE09ram_1-7u:18835: 6.059.070a tam ādāya dhanuḥ śreṣṭhe yojayām āsa lakṣmaṇaḥ
