GE09ram_1-7u:18836: 6.059.070c vicakarṣa ca vegena visasarja ca sāyakam
GE09ram_1-7u:18838: 6.059.071c lalāṭe rākṣasaśreṣṭham ājaghāna sa vīryavān 6.059.072a sa lalāṭe śaro magnas tasya bhīmasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18840: 6.059.073a rākṣasaḥ pracakampe ca lakṣmaṇeṣu prakampitaḥ 6.059.073c rudrabāṇahataṃ bhīmaṃ yathā tripuragopuram
GE09ram_1-7u:18841: 6.059.074a cintayām āsa cāśvasya vimṛśya ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18842: 6.059.074c sādhu bāṇanipātena śvāghanīyo 'si me ripuḥ 6.059.075a vicāryaivaṃ vinamyāsyaṃ vinamya ca bhujāv ubhau
GE09ram_1-7u:18843: 6.059.075c sa rathopastham āsthāya rathena pracacāra ha
GE09ram_1-7u:18844: 6.059.076a ekaṃ trīn pañca sapteti sāyakān rākṣasarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18845: 6.059.076c ādade saṃdadhe cāpi vicakarṣotsasarja ca 6.059.077a te bāṇāḥ kālasaṃkāśā rākṣasendradhanuś cyutāḥ 6.059.077c hemapuṅkhā raviprakhyāś cakrur dīptam ivāmbaram 6.059.078a tatas tān rākṣasotsṛṣṭāñ śaraughān rāvaṇānujaḥ 6.059.078c asaṃbhrāntaḥ praciccheda niśitair bahubhiḥ śaraiḥ 6.059.079a tāñ śarān yudhi saṃprekṣya nikṛttān rāvaṇātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18846: 6.059.079c cukopa tridaśendrārir jagrāha niśitaṃ śaram 6.059.080a sa saṃdhāya mahātejās taṃ bāṇaṃ sahasotsṛjat
GE09ram_1-7u:18847: 6.059.080c tataḥ saumitrim āyāntam ājaghāna stanāntare 6.059.081a atikāyena saumitris tāḍito yudhi vakṣasi 6.059.081c susrāva rudhiraṃ tīvraṃ madaṃ matta iva dvipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18848: 6.059.082a sa cakāra tadātmānaṃ viśalyaṃ sahasā vibhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18849: 6.059.082c jagrāha ca śaraṃ tīṣṇam astreṇāpi samādadhe
GE09ram_1-7u:18850: 6.059.083a āgneyena tadāstreṇa yojayām āsa sāyakam 6.059.083c sa jajvāla tadā bāṇo dhanuś cāsya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18852: 6.059.084c tena bāṇaṃ bhujaṃgābhaṃ hemapuṅkham ayojayat 6.059.085a tatas taṃ jvalitaṃ ghoraṃ lakṣmaṇaḥ śaram āhitam
GE09ram_1-7u:18855: 6.059.086c utsasarja tadā bāṇaṃ dīptaṃ sūryāstrayojitam 6.059.087a tāv ubhāv ambare bāṇāv anyonyam abhijaghnatuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18856: 6.059.087c tejasā saṃpradīptāgrau kruddhāv iva bhujaṃ gamau
GE09ram_1-7u:18857: 6.059.088a tāv anyonyaṃ vinirdahya petatur dharaṇītale 6.059.088c nirarciṣau bhasmakṛtau na bhrājete śarottamau 6.059.089a tato 'tikāyaḥ saṃkruddhas tv astram aiṣīkam utsṛjat 6.059.089c tat praciccheda saumitrir astram aindreṇa vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:18858: 6.059.090a aiṣīkaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā kumāro rāvaṇātmajaḥ 6.059.090c yāmyenāstreṇa saṃkruddho yojayām āsa sāyakam 6.059.091a tatas tad astraṃ cikṣepa lakṣmaṇāya niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18859: 6.059.091c vāyavyena tad astraṃ tu nijaghāna sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18860: 6.059.092a athainaṃ śaradhārābhir dhārābhir iva toyadaḥ 6.059.092c abhyavarṣata saṃkruddho lakṣmaṇo rāvaṇātmajam
GE09ram_1-7u:18862: 6.059.093c bhagnāgraśalyāḥ sahasā petur bāṇā mahītale 6.059.094a tān moghān abhisaṃprekṣya lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā 6.059.094c abhyavarṣata bāṇānāṃ sahasreṇa mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18863: 6.059.095a sa varṣyamāṇo bāṇaughair atikāyo mahābalaḥ 6.059.095c avadhyakavacaḥ saṃkhye rākṣaso naiva vivyathe 6.059.096a na śaśāka rujaṃ kartuṃ yudhi tasya narottamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18864: 6.059.096c athainam abhyupāgamya vāyur vākyam uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:18865: 6.059.097a brahmadattavaro hy eṣa avadhya kavacāvṛtaḥ 6.059.097c brāhmeṇāstreṇa bhindhy enam eṣa vadhyo hi nānyathā
GE09ram_1-7u:18866: 6.059.098a tataḥ sa vāyor vacanaṃ niśamya; saumitrir indrapratimānavīryaḥ 6.059.098c samādade bāṇam amoghavegaṃ; tad brāhmam astraṃ sahasā niyojya 6.059.099a tasmin varāstre tu niyujyamāne; saumitriṇā bāṇavare śitāgre
GE09ram_1-7u:18867: 6.059.099c diśaḥ sacandrārkamahāgrahāś ca; nabhaś ca tatrāsa rarāsa corvī 6.059.100a taṃ brahmaṇo 'streṇa niyujya cāpe; śaraṃ supuṅkhaṃ yamadūtakalpam
GE09ram_1-7u:18868: 6.059.100c saumitrir indrārisutasya tasya; sasarja bāṇaṃ yudhi vajrakalpam
GE09ram_1-7u:18869: 6.059.101a taṃ lakṣmaṇotsṛṣṭam amoghavegaṃ; samāpatantaṃ jvalanaprakāśam 6.059.101c suvarṇavajrottamacitrapuṅkhaṃ; tadātikāyaḥ samare dadarśa
GE09ram_1-7u:18870: 6.059.102a taṃ prekṣamāṇaḥ sahasātikāyo; jaghāna bāṇair niśitair anekaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18871: 6.059.102c sa sāyakas tasya suparṇavegas; tadātivegena jagāma pārśvam
GE09ram_1-7u:18872: 6.059.103a tam āgataṃ prekṣya tadātikāyo; bāṇaṃ pradīptāntakakālakalpam 6.059.103c jaghāna śaktyṛṣṭigadākuṭhāraiḥ; śūlair halaiś cāpy
GE09ram_1-7u:18874: 6.059.104a tāny āyudhāny adbhutavigrahāṇi; moghāni kṛtvā sa śaro
GE09ram_1-7u:18876: 6.059.104c prasahya tasyaiva kirīṭajuṣṭaṃ; tadātikāyasya śiro jahāra
GE09ram_1-7u:18877: 6.059.105a tac chiraḥ saśiras trāṇaṃ lakṣmaṇeṣuprapīḍitam 6.059.105c papāta sahasā bhūmau śṛṅgaṃ himavato yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:18878: 6.059.106a praharṣayuktā bahavas tu vānarā; prabuddhapadmapratimānanās tadā 6.059.106c apūjayaṃl lakṣmaṇam iṣṭabhāginaṃ; hate ripau bhīmabale durāsade
GE09ram_1-7u:18880: 6.060.001c rakṣogaṇās tatra hatāvaśiṣṭās; te rāvaṇāya tvaritaṃ śaśaṃsuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18881: 6.060.002a tato hatāṃs tān sahasā niśamya; rājā mumohāśrupariplutākṣaḥ 6.060.002c putrakṣayaṃ bhrātṛvadhaṃ ca ghoraṃ; vicintya rājā vipulaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:18883: 6.060.003a tatas tu rājānam udīkṣya dīnaṃ; śokārṇave saṃparipupluvānam 6.060.003c atharṣabho rākṣasarājasūnur; athendrajid vākyam idaṃ babhāṣe
GE09ram_1-7u:18884: 6.060.004a na tāta mohaṃ pratigantum arhasi; yatrendrajij jīvati rākṣasendra
GE09ram_1-7u:18885: 6.060.004c nendrāribāṇābhihato hi kaś cit; prāṇān samarthaḥ samare
GE09ram_1-7u:18888: 6.060.005c gatāyuṣaṃ bhūmitale śayānaṃ; śaraiḥ śitair ācitasarvagātram
GE09ram_1-7u:18889: 6.060.006a imāṃ pratijñāṃ śṛṇu śakraśatroḥ; suniścitāṃ pauruṣadaivayuktām 6.060.006c adyaiva rāmaṃ sahalakṣmaṇena; saṃtāpayiṣyāmi śarair amoghaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18891: 6.060.007c drakṣyanti me vikramam aprameyaṃ; viṣṇor ivograṃ baliyajñavāṭe
GE09ram_1-7u:18892: 6.060.008a sa evam uktvā tridaśendraśatrur; āpṛcchya rājānam adīnasattvaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18893: 6.060.008c samārurohānilatulyavegaṃ; rathaṃ kharaśreṣṭhasamādhiyuktam 6.060.009a samāsthāya mahātejā rathaṃ harirathopamam
GE09ram_1-7u:18894: 6.060.009c jagāma sahasā tatra yatra yuddham ariṃdama
GE09ram_1-7u:18895: 6.060.010a taṃ prasthitaṃ mahātmānam anujagmur mahābalāḥ 6.060.010c saṃharṣamāṇā bahavo
GE09ram_1-7u:18896: 6.060.011a gajaskandhagatāḥ ke cit ke cit paramavājibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18897: 6.060.011c prāsamudgaranistriṃśa paraśvadhagadādharāḥ 6.060.012a sa śaṅkhaninadair bhīmair bherīṇāṃ ca mahāsvanaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18900: 6.060.013c rarāja paripūrṇena nabhaś candramasā yathā 6.060.014a avījyata tato vīro haimair hemavibhūṣitaiḥ 6.060.014c cārucāmaramukhyaiś ca mukhyaḥ sarvadhanuṣmatām
GE09ram_1-7u:18901: 6.060.015a tatas tv indrajitā laṅkā sūryapratimatejasā 6.060.015c rarājāprativīryeṇa dyaur ivārkeṇa bhāsvatā
GE09ram_1-7u:18902: 6.060.016a sa tu dṛṣṭvā viniryāntaṃ balena mahatā vṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:18903: 6.060.016c rākṣasādhipatiḥ śrīmān rāvaṇaḥ putram abravīt 6.060.017a tvam apratirathaḥ putra jitas te yudhi vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18904: 6.060.017c kiṃ punar mānuṣaṃ dhṛṣyaṃ na vadhiṣyasi rāghavam
GE09ram_1-7u:18906: 6.060.018c rathenāśvayujā vīraḥ śīghraṃ gatvā nikumbhilām 6.060.019a sa saṃprāpya mahātejā yuddhabhūmim ariṃdamaḥ 6.060.019c sthāpayām āsa rakṣāṃsi rathaṃ prati samantataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18907: 6.060.020a tatas tu hutabhoktāraṃ hutabhuk sadṛśaprabhaḥ 6.060.020c juhuve rākṣasaśreṣṭho mantravad vidhivat tadā 6.060.021a sa havirjālasaṃskārair mālyagandhapuraskṛtaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18908: 6.060.021c juhuve pāvakaṃ tatra rākṣasendraḥ pratāpavān 6.060.022a śastrāṇi śarapatrāṇi samidho 'tha vibhītakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18909: 6.060.022c lohitāni ca vāsāṃsi sruvaṃ kārṣṇāyasaṃ tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:18910: 6.060.023a sa tatrāgniṃ samāstīrya śarapatraiḥ satomaraiḥ 6.060.023c chāgasya sarvakṛṣṇasya galaṃ jagrāha jīvataḥ 6.060.024a sakṛd eva samiddhasya vidhūmasya mahārciṣaḥ 6.060.024c babhūvus tāni liṅgāni vijayaṃ yāny adarśayan
GE09ram_1-7u:18911: 6.060.025a pradakṣiṇāvartaśikhas taptakāñcanasaṃnibhaḥ 6.060.025c havis tat pratijagrāha pāvakaḥ svayam utthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18912: 6.060.026a so 'stram āhārayām āsa brāhmam astravidāṃ varaḥ 6.060.026c dhanuś cātmarathaṃ caiva sarvaṃ tatrābhyamantrayat 6.060.027a tasminn āhūyamāne 'stre hūyamāne ca pāvake
GE09ram_1-7u:18914: 6.060.028a sa pāvakaṃ pāvakadīptatejā; hutvā mahendrapratimaprabhāvaḥ 6.060.028c sacāpabāṇāsirathāśvasūtaḥ; khe 'ntardadha ātmānam acintyarūpaḥ 6.060.029a sa sainyam utsṛjya sametya tūrṇaṃ; mahāraṇe vānaravāhinīṣu 6.060.029c adṛśyamānaḥ śarajālam ugraṃ; vavarṣa nīlāmbudharo yathāmbu
GE09ram_1-7u:18916: 6.060.030c raṇe nipetur harayo 'drikalpā; yathendravajrābhihatā nagendrāḥ 6.060.031a te kevalaṃ saṃdadṛśuḥ śitāgrān; bāṇān raṇe vānaravāhinīṣu
GE09ram_1-7u:18917: 6.060.031c māyā nigūḍhaṃ ca surendraśatruṃ; na cātra taṃ rākṣasam abhyapaśyan 6.060.032a tataḥ sa rakṣo'dhipatir mahātmā; sarvā diśo bāṇagaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18919: 6.060.032c pracchādayām āsa raviprakāśair; viṣādayām āsa ca vānarendrān
GE09ram_1-7u:18920: 6.060.033a sa śūlanistriṃśa paraśvadhāni; vyāvidhya dīptānalasaṃnibhāni 6.060.033c savisphuliṅgojjvalapāvakāni; vavarṣa tīvraṃ plavagendrasainye
GE09ram_1-7u:18922: 6.060.034c tāḍitāḥ śakrajidbāṇaiḥ praphullā iva kiṃśukāḥ 6.060.035a anyonyam abhisarpanto ninadantaś ca visvaram 6.060.035c rākṣasendrāstranirbhinnā nipetur vānararṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18923: 6.060.036a udīkṣamāṇā gaganaṃ ke cin netreṣu tāḍitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18924: 6.060.036c śarair viviśur anyonyaṃ petuś ca jagatītale
GE09ram_1-7u:18925: 6.060.037a hanūmantaṃ ca sugrīvam aṅgadaṃ gandhamādanam 6.060.037c jāmbavantaṃ suṣeṇaṃ ca vegadarśinam eva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:18926: 6.060.038a maindaṃ ca dvividaṃ nīlaṃ gavākṣaṃ gajagomukhau
GE09ram_1-7u:18927: 6.060.038c kesariṃ harilomānaṃ vidyuddaṃṣṭraṃ ca vānaram 6.060.039a sūryānanaṃ jyotimukhaṃ tathā dadhimukhaṃ harim 6.060.039c pāvakākṣaṃ nalaṃ caiva kumudaṃ caiva vānaram
GE09ram_1-7u:18928: 6.060.040a prāsaiḥ śūlaiḥ śitair bāṇair indrajinmantrasaṃhitaiḥ 6.060.040c vivyādha hariśārdūlān sarvāṃs tān rākṣasottamaḥ 6.060.041a sa vai gadābhir hariyūthamukhyān; nirbhidya bāṇais tapanīyapuṅkhaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18929: 6.060.041c vavarṣa rāmaṃ śaravṛṣṭijālaiḥ; salakṣmaṇaṃ bhāskararaśmikalpaiḥ 6.060.042a sa bāṇavarṣair abhivarṣyamāṇo; dhārānipātān iva tān vicintya
GE09ram_1-7u:18930: 6.060.042c samīkṣamāṇaḥ paramādbhutaśrī; rāmas tadā lakṣmaṇam ity uvāca 6.060.043a asau punar lakṣmaṇa rākṣasendro; brahmāstram āśritya surendraśatruḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18931: 6.060.043c nipātayitvā harisainyam ugram; asmāñ śarair ardayati prasaktam
GE09ram_1-7u:18933: 6.060.044c kathaṃ nu śakyo yudhi naṣṭadeho; nihantum adyendrajid udyatāstraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18934: 6.060.045a manye svayambhūr bhagavān acintyo; yasyaitad astraṃ prabhavaś
GE09ram_1-7u:18936: 6.060.045c bāṇāvapātāṃs tvam ihādya dhīman; mayā sahāvyagramanāḥ sahasva
GE09ram_1-7u:18937: 6.060.046a pracchādayaty eṣa hi rākṣasendraḥ; sarvā diśaḥ sāyakavṛṣṭijālaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18938: 6.060.046c etac ca sarvaṃ patitāgryavīraṃ; na bhrājate vānararājasainyam
GE09ram_1-7u:18939: 6.060.047a āvāṃ tu dṛṣṭvā patitau visaṃjñau; nivṛttayuddhau hataroṣaharṣau 6.060.047c dhruvaṃ pravekṣyaty amarārivāsaṃ; asau samādāya raṇāgralakṣmīm
GE09ram_1-7u:18940: 6.060.048a tatas tu tāv indrajid astrajālair; babhūvatus tatra tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:18942: 6.060.048c sa cāpi tau tatra viṣādayitvā; nanāda harṣād yudhi rākṣasendraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18943: 6.060.049a sa tat tadā vānararājasainyaṃ; rāmaṃ ca saṃkhye sahalakṣmaṇena
GE09ram_1-7u:18944: 6.060.049c viṣādayitvā sahasā viveśa; purīṃ daśagrīvabhujābhiguptām 6.061.001a tayos tadā sāditayo raṇāgre; mumoha sainyaṃ hariyūthapānām
GE09ram_1-7u:18945: 6.061.001c sugrīvanīlāṅgadajāmbavanto; na cāpi kiṃ cit pratipedire te
GE09ram_1-7u:18946: 6.061.002a tato viṣaṇṇaṃ samavekṣya sainyaṃ; vibhīṣaṇo buddhimatāṃ variṣṭhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18948: 6.061.003a mā bhaiṣṭa nāsty atra viṣādakālo; yad āryaputrāv avaśau
GE09ram_1-7u:18950: 6.061.003c svayambhuvo vākyam athodvahantau; yat sāditāv indrajidastrajālaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18951: 6.061.004a tasmai tu dattaṃ paramāstram etat; svayambhuvā brāhmam amoghavegam
GE09ram_1-7u:18952: 6.061.004c tan mānayantau yadi rājaputrau; nipātitau ko 'tra viṣādakālaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18953: 6.061.005a brāhmam astraṃ tadā dhīmān mānayitvā tu mārutiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18954: 6.061.005c vibhīṣaṇavacaḥ śrutvā hanūmāṃs tam athābravīt 6.061.006a etasmin nihate sainye vānarāṇāṃ tarasvinām 6.061.006c yo yo dhārayate prāṇāṃs taṃ tam āśvāsayāvahe
GE09ram_1-7u:18955: 6.061.007a tāv ubhau yugapad vīrau hanūmad rākṣasottamau
GE09ram_1-7u:18956: 6.061.007c ulkāhastau tadā rātrau raṇaśīrṣe viceratuḥ 6.061.008a chinnalāṅgūlahastorupādāṅguli śiro dharaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18957: 6.061.008c sravadbhiḥ kṣatajaṃ gātraiḥ prasravadbhiḥ samantataḥ 6.061.009a patitaiḥ parvatākārair vānarair abhisaṃkulām
GE09ram_1-7u:18958: 6.061.009c śastraiś ca patitair dīptair dadṛśāte vasuṃdharām
GE09ram_1-7u:18959: 6.061.010a sugrīvam aṅgadaṃ nīlaṃ śarabhaṃ gandhamādanam 6.061.010c jāmbavantaṃ suṣeṇaṃ ca vegadarśanam āhukam 6.061.011a maindaṃ nalaṃ jyotimukhaṃ dvividaṃ panasaṃ tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:18960: 6.061.011c vibhīṣaṇo hanūmāṃś ca dadṛśāte hatān raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:18961: 6.061.012a saptaṣaṣṭir hatāḥ koṭyo vānarāṇāṃ tarasvinām 6.061.012c ahnaḥ pañcamaśeṣeṇa vallabhena svayambhuvaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18962: 6.061.013a sāgaraughanibhaṃ bhīmaṃ dṛṣṭvā bāṇārditaṃ balam 6.061.013c mārgate jāmbavantaṃ sma hanūmān savibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.061.014a svabhāvajarayā yuktaṃ vṛddhaṃ śaraśataiś citam 6.061.014c prajāpatisutaṃ vīraṃ śāmyantam iva pāvakam 6.061.015a dṛṣṭvā tam upasaṃgamya paulastyo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:18963: 6.061.015c kaccid āryaśarais tīrṣṇair na prāṇā dhvaṃsitās tava
GE09ram_1-7u:18965: 6.061.016c kṛcchrād abhyudgiran vākyam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:18966: 6.061.017a nairṛtendramahāvīryasvareṇa tvābhilakṣaye 6.061.017c pīḍyamānaḥ śitair bāṇair na tvāṃ paśyāmi cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_1-7u:18967: 6.061.018a añjanā suprajā yena mātariśvā ca nairṛta
GE09ram_1-7u:18968: 6.061.018c hanūmān vānaraśreṣṭhaḥ prāṇān dhārayate kva cit
GE09ram_1-7u:18969: 6.061.019a śrutvā jāmbavato vākyam uvācedaṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.061.019c āryaputrāv atikramya kasmāt pṛcchasi mārutim 6.061.020a naiva rājani sugrīve nāṅgade nāpi rāghave
GE09ram_1-7u:18970: 6.061.020c ārya saṃdarśitaḥ sneho yathā vāyusute paraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18971: 6.061.021a vibhīṣaṇavacaḥ śrutvā jāmbavān vākyam abravīt 6.061.021c śṛṇu nairṛtaśārdūla yasmāt pṛcchāmi mārutim 6.061.022a tasmiñ jīvati vīre tu hatam apy ahataṃ balam 6.061.022c hanūmaty ujjhitaprāṇe jīvanto 'pi vayaṃ hatāḥ 6.061.023a dhriyate mārutis tāta mārutapratimo yadi 6.061.023c vaiśvānarasamo vīrye jīvitāśā tato bhavet 6.061.024a tato vṛddham upāgamya niyamenābhyavādayat
GE09ram_1-7u:18972: 6.061.024c gṛhya jāmbavataḥ pādau hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ 6.061.025a śrutvā hanumato vākyaṃ tathāpi vyathitendriyaḥ 6.061.025c punarjātam ivātmānaṃ sa mene ṛkṣapuṃgavaḥ 6.061.026a tato 'bravīn mahātejā hanūmantaṃ sa jāmbavān
GE09ram_1-7u:18974: 6.061.027a nānyo vikramaparyāptas tvam eṣāṃ paramaḥ sakhā
GE09ram_1-7u:18977: 6.061.028c viśalyau kuru cāpy etau sāditau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:18978: 6.061.029a gatvā paramam adhvānam upary upari sāgaram
GE09ram_1-7u:18979: 6.061.029c himavantaṃ nagaśreṣṭhaṃ hanūman gantum arhasi 6.061.030a tataḥ kāñcanam atyugram ṛṣabhaṃ parvatottamam 6.061.030c kailāsaśikharaṃ cāpi drakṣyasy ariniṣūdana
GE09ram_1-7u:18980: 6.061.031a tayoḥ śikharayor madhye pradīptam atulaprabham 6.061.031c sarvauṣadhiyutaṃ vīra drakṣyasy auṣadhiparvatam
GE09ram_1-7u:18982: 6.061.032c drakṣyasy oṣadhayo dīptā dīpayantyo diśo daśa
GE09ram_1-7u:18984: 6.061.033c sauvarṇakaraṇīṃ caiva saṃdhānīṃ ca mahauṣadhīm 6.061.034a tāḥ sarvā hanuman gṛhya kṣipram āgantum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:18985: 6.061.034c āśvāsaya harīn prāṇair yojya gandhavahātmajaḥ 6.061.035a śrutvā jāmbavato vākyaṃ hanūmān haripuṃgavaḥ 6.061.035c āpūryata baloddharṣais toyavegair ivārṇavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18987: 6.061.036c hanūmān dṛśyate vīro dvitīya iva parvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18989: 6.061.037c na śaśāka tadātmānaṃ soḍhuṃ bhṛśanipīḍitaḥ 6.061.038a tasya petur nagā bhūmau harivegāc ca jajvaluḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:18990: 6.061.038c śṛṅgāṇi ca vyakīryanta pīḍitasya hanūmatā 6.061.039a tasmin saṃpīḍyamāne tu
GE09ram_1-7u:18991: 6.061.039c na śekur vānarāḥ sthātuṃ ghūrṇamāne nagottame
GE09ram_1-7u:18993: 6.061.040c laṅkā trāsākulā rātrau pranṛttevābhavat tadā 6.061.041a pṛthivīdharasaṃkāśo nipīḍya dharaṇīdharam
GE09ram_1-7u:18994: 6.061.041c pṛthivīṃ kṣobhayām āsa sārṇavāṃ mārutātmajaḥ 6.061.042a padbhyāṃ tu śailam āpīḍya vaḍavāmukhavan mukham
GE09ram_1-7u:18995: 6.061.042c vivṛtyograṃ nanādoccais trāsayann iva rākṣasān 6.061.043a tasya nānadyamānasya śrutvā ninadam adbhutam 6.061.043c laṅkāsthā rākṣasāḥ sarve na śekuḥ spandituṃ bhayāt
GE09ram_1-7u:18997: 6.061.044c rāghavārthe paraṃ karma samaihata paraṃtapaḥ 6.061.045a sa puccham udyamya bhujaṃgakalpaṃ; vinamya pṛṣṭhaṃ śravaṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:18999: 6.061.045c vivṛtya vaktraṃ vaḍavāmukhābham; āpupluve vyomni sa caṇḍavegaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19000: 6.061.046a sa vṛkṣaṣaṇḍāṃs tarasā jahāra; śailāñ śilāḥ prākṛtavānarāṃś ca
GE09ram_1-7u:19002: 6.061.047a sa tau prasāryoragabhogakalpau; bhujau bhujaṃgārinikāśavīryaḥ 6.061.047c jagāma meruṃ nagarājam agryaṃ; diśaḥ prakarṣann iva vāyusūnuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19003: 6.061.048a sa sāgaraṃ ghūrṇitavīcimālaṃ; tadā bhṛśaṃ bhrāmitasarvasattvam
GE09ram_1-7u:19004: 6.061.048c samīkṣamāṇaḥ sahasā jagāma; cakraṃ yathā viṣṇukarāgramuktam
GE09ram_1-7u:19005: 6.061.049a sa parvatān vṛkṣagaṇān sarāṃsi; nadīs taṭākāni purottamāni
GE09ram_1-7u:19006: 6.061.049c sphītāñjanāṃs tān api saṃprapaśyañ; jagāma vegāt pitṛtulyavegaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19007: 6.061.050a ādityapatham āśritya jagāma sa gataśramaḥ 6.061.050c sa dadarśa hariśreṣṭho himavantaṃ nagottamam 6.061.051a nānāprasravaṇopetaṃ bahukaṃdaranirjharam 6.061.051c śvetābhracayasaṃkāśaiḥ śikharaiś cārudarśanaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19010: 6.061.053a sa brahmakośaṃ rajatālayaṃ ca; śakrālayaṃ rudraśarapramokṣam 6.061.053c hayānanaṃ brahmaśiraś ca dīptaṃ; dadarśa vaivasvata kiṃkarāṃś
GE09ram_1-7u:19012: 6.061.054a vajrālayaṃ vaiśvaraṇālayaṃ ca; sūryaprabhaṃ sūryanibandhanaṃ ca
GE09ram_1-7u:19013: 6.061.054c brahmāsanaṃ śaṃkarakārmukaṃ ca; dadarśa nābhiṃ ca vasuṃdharāyāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19014: 6.061.055a kailāsam agryaṃ himavacchilāṃ ca; tatharṣabhaṃ kāñcanaśailam agryam
GE09ram_1-7u:19015: 6.061.055c sa dīptasarvauṣadhisaṃpradīptaṃ; dadarśa sarvauṣadhiparvatendram 6.061.056a sa taṃ samīkṣyānalaraśmidīptaṃ; visiṣmiye vāsavadūtasūnuḥ 6.061.056c āplutya taṃ cauṣadhiparvatendraṃ; tatrauṣadhīnāṃ vicayaṃ cakāra
GE09ram_1-7u:19018: 6.061.058a mahauṣadhyas tu tāḥ sarvās tasmin parvatasattame
GE09ram_1-7u:19019: 6.061.058c vijñāyārthinam āyāntaṃ tato jagmur adarśanam 6.061.059a sa tā mahātmā hanumān apaśyaṃś; cukopa kopāc ca bhṛśaṃ nanāda 6.061.059c amṛṣyamāṇo 'gninikāśacakṣur; mahīdharendraṃ tam uvāca vākyam
GE09ram_1-7u:19020: 6.061.060a kim etad evaṃ suviniścitaṃ te; yad rāghave nāsi kṛtānukampaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19021: 6.061.060c paśyādya madbāhubalābhibhūto; vikīrṇam ātmānam atho nagendra
GE09ram_1-7u:19022: 6.061.061a sa tasya śṛṅgaṃ sanagaṃ sanāgaṃ; sakāñcanaṃ dhātusahasrajuṣṭam 6.061.061c vikīrṇakūṭaṃ calitāgrasānuṃ; pragṛhya vegāt sahasonmamātha
GE09ram_1-7u:19023: 6.061.062a sa taṃ samutpāṭya kham utpapāta; vitrāsya lokān sasurān
GE09ram_1-7u:19025: 6.061.062c saṃstūyamānaḥ khacarair anekair; jagāma vegād garuḍogravīryaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19026: 6.061.063a sa bhāskarādhvānam anuprapannas; tad bhāskarābhaṃ śikharaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:19028: 6.061.063c babhau tadā bhāskarasaṃnikāśo; raveḥ samīpe pratibhāskarābhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19029: 6.061.064a sa tena śailena bhṛśaṃ rarāja; śailopamo gandhavahātmajas tu
GE09ram_1-7u:19030: 6.061.064c sahasradhāreṇa sapāvakena; cakreṇa khe viṣṇur ivoddhṛtena
GE09ram_1-7u:19031: 6.061.065a taṃ vānarāḥ prekṣya tadā vineduḥ; sa tān api prekṣya mudā nanāda
GE09ram_1-7u:19032: 6.061.065c teṣāṃ samudghuṣṭaravaṃ niśamya; laṅkālayā bhīmataraṃ vineduḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19033: 6.061.066a tato mahātmā nipapāta tasmiñ; śailottame vānarasainyamadhye 6.061.066c haryuttamebhyaḥ śirasābhivādya; vibhīṣaṇaṃ tatra ca sasvaje saḥ 6.061.067a tāv apy ubhau mānuṣarājaputrau; taṃ gandham āghrāya
GE09ram_1-7u:19035: 6.061.067c babhūvatus tatra tadā viśalyāv; uttasthur anye ca haripravīrāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19036: 6.061.068a tato harir gandhavahātmajas tu; tam oṣadhīśailam udagravīryaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19037: 6.061.068c nināya vegād dhimavantam eva; punaś ca rāmeṇa samājagāma
GE09ram_1-7u:19039: 6.062.001c arthyaṃ vijāpayaṃś cāpi hanūmantaṃ mahābalam 6.062.002a yato hataḥ kumbhakarṇaḥ kumārāś ca niṣūditāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19040: 6.062.002c nedānīim upanirhāraṃ rāvaṇo dātum arhati 6.062.003a ye ye mahābalāḥ santi laghavaś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19041: 6.062.003c laṅkām abhyutpatantv āśu gṛhyolkāḥ plavagarṣabhāḥ 6.062.004a tato 'staṃ gata āditye raudre tasmin niśāmukhe 6.062.004c laṅkām abhimukhāḥ solkā jagmus te plavagarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19044: 6.062.006a gopurāṭṭa pratolīṣu caryāsu vividhāsu ca 6.062.006c prāsādeṣu ca saṃhṛṣṭāḥ sasṛjus te hutāśanam
GE09ram_1-7u:19045: 6.062.007a teṣāṃ gṛhasahasrāṇi dadāha hutabhuk tadā 6.062.007c āvāsān rākṣasānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ gṛhamedhinām 6.062.008a hemacitratanutrāṇāṃ sragdāmāmbaradhāriṇām 6.062.008c sīdhupānacalākṣāṇāṃ madavihvalagāminām 6.062.009a kāntālambitavastrāṇāṃ śatrusaṃjātamanyunām 6.062.009c gadāśūlāsi hastānāṃ khādatāṃ pibatām api 6.062.010a śayaneṣu mahārheṣu prasuptānāṃ priyaiḥ saha 6.062.010c trastānāṃ gacchatāṃ tūrṇaṃ putrān ādāya sarvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19047: 6.062.011c adahat pāvakas tatra jajvāla ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19053: 6.062.014c nāditāny acalābhāni veśmāny agnir dadāha saḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19055: 6.062.015c vidyudbhir iva naddhāni meghajālāni gharmage 6.062.016a vimāneṣu prasuptāś ca dahyamānā varāṅganāḥ 6.062.016c tyaktābharaṇasaṃyogā hāhety uccair vicukruśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19056: 6.062.017a tatra cāgniparītāni nipetur bhavanāny api 6.062.017c vajrivajrahatānīva śikharāṇi
GE09ram_1-7u:19059: 6.062.019a harmyāgrair dahyamānaiś ca jvālāprajvalitair api 6.062.019c rātrau sā dṛśyate laṅkā puṣpitair iva kiṃśukaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19060: 6.062.020a hastyadhyakṣair gajair muktair muktaiś ca turagair api
GE09ram_1-7u:19061: 6.062.020c babhūva laṅkā lokānte bhrāntagrāha ivārṇavaḥ 6.062.021a aśvaṃ muktaṃ gajo dṛṣṭvā kaccid bhīto 'pasarpati
GE09ram_1-7u:19062: 6.062.021c bhīto bhītaṃ gajaṃ dṛṣṭvā kva cid aśvo nivartate 6.062.022a sā babhūva muhūrtena haribhir dīpitā purī
GE09ram_1-7u:19063: 6.062.022c lokasyāsya kṣaye ghore pradīpteva vasuṃdharā 6.062.023a nārī janasya dhūmena vyāptasyoccair vineduṣaḥ 6.062.023c svano jvalanataptasya śuśruve daśayojanam
GE09ram_1-7u:19064: 6.062.024a pradagdhakāyān aparān rākṣasān nirgatān bahiḥ 6.062.024c sahasābhyutpatanti sma harayo 'tha yuyutsavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19065: 6.062.025a udghuṣṭaṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca rākṣasānāṃ ca nisvanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19066: 6.062.025c diśo daśa samudraṃ ca pṛthivīṃ cānvanādayat
GE09ram_1-7u:19067: 6.062.026a viśalyau tu mahātmānau tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:19068: 6.062.026c asaṃbhrāntau jagṛhatus tāv ubhau dhanuṣī vare
GE09ram_1-7u:19069: 6.062.027a tato visphārayāṇasya rāmasya dhanur uttamam 6.062.027c babhūva tumulaḥ śabdo rākṣasānāṃ bhayāvahaḥ 6.062.028a aśobhata tadā rāmo dhanur visphārayan mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:19070: 6.062.028c bhagavān iva saṃkruddho bhavo vedamayaṃ dhanuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19071: 6.062.029a vānarodghuṣṭaghoṣaś ca rākṣasānāṃ ca nisvanaḥ 6.062.029c jyāśabdaś cāpi rāmasya trayaṃ vyāpa diśo daśa
GE09ram_1-7u:19072: 6.062.030a tasya kārmukamuktaiś ca śarais tatpuragopuram 6.062.030c kailāsaśṛṅgapratimaṃ vikīrṇam apatad bhuvi
GE09ram_1-7u:19073: 6.062.031a tato rāmaśarān dṛṣṭvā vimāneṣu gṛheṣu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:19075: 6.062.032a teṣāṃ saṃnahyamānānāṃ siṃhanādaṃ ca kurvatām 6.062.032c śarvarī rākṣasendrāṇāṃ raudrīva samapadyata
GE09ram_1-7u:19076: 6.062.033a ādiṣṭā vānarendrās te sugrīveṇa mahātmanā 6.062.033c āsannā dvāram āsādya yudhyadhvaṃ plavagarṣabhāḥ 6.062.034a yaś ca vo vitathaṃ kuryāt tatra tatra vyavasthitaḥ 6.062.034c sa hantavyo 'bhisaṃplutya rājaśāsanadūṣakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19078: 6.062.035c sthiteṣu dvāram āsādya rāvaṇaṃ manyur āviśat
GE09ram_1-7u:19079: 6.062.036a tasya jṛmbhitavikṣepād vyāmiśrā vai diśo daśa
GE09ram_1-7u:19080: 6.062.036c rūpavān iva rudrasya manyur gātreṣv adṛśyata
GE09ram_1-7u:19081: 6.062.037a sa nikumbhaṃ ca kumbhaṃ ca kumbhakarṇātmajāv ubhau
GE09ram_1-7u:19082: 6.062.037c preṣayām āsa saṃkruddho rākṣasair bahubhiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:19083: 6.062.038a śaśāsa caiva tān sarvān rākṣasān rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19084: 6.062.038c rākṣasā gacchatātraiva siṃhanādaṃ ca nādayan 6.062.039a tatas tu coditās tena rākṣasā jvalitāyudhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19085: 6.062.039c laṅkāyā niryayur vīrāḥ praṇadantaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19090: 6.062.042a hemajālācitabhujaṃ vyāveṣṭitaparaśvadham 6.062.042c vyāghūrṇitamahāśastraṃ bāṇasaṃsaktakārmukam 6.062.043a gandhamālyamadhūtsekasaṃmodita mahānilam 6.062.043c ghoraṃ śūrajanākīrṇaṃ mahāmbudharanisvanam
GE09ram_1-7u:19091: 6.062.044a taṃ dṛṣṭvā balam āyāntaṃ rākṣasānāṃ sudāruṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:19092: 6.062.044c saṃcacāla plavaṃgānāṃ balam uccair nanāda ca
GE09ram_1-7u:19093: 6.062.045a javenāplutya ca punas tad rākṣasabalaṃ mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:19094: 6.062.045c abhyayāt pratyaribalaṃ pataṃga iva pāvakam 6.062.046a teṣāṃ bhujaparāmarśavyāmṛṣṭaparighāśani 6.062.046c rākṣasānāṃ balaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ bhūyastaram aśobhata 6.062.047a tathaivāpy apare teṣāṃ kapīnām asibhiḥ śitaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19095: 6.062.047c pravīrān abhito jaghnur ghorarūpā niśācarāḥ 6.062.048a ghnantam anyaṃ jaghānānyaḥ pātayantam apātayat 6.062.048c garhamāṇaṃ jagarhānye daśantam apare 'daśat
GE09ram_1-7u:19096: 6.062.049a dehīty anye dadāty anyo dadāmīty aparaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19097: 6.062.049c kiṃ kleśayasi tiṣṭheti tatrānyonyaṃ babhāṣire 6.062.050a samudyatamahāprāsaṃ muṣṭiśūlāsisaṃkulam 6.062.050c prāvartata mahāraudraṃ yuddhaṃ vānararakṣasām
GE09ram_1-7u:19098: 6.062.051a vānarān daśa sapteti rākṣasā abhyapātayan 6.062.051c rākṣasān daśasapteti vānarā jaghnur āhave 6.062.052a visrastakeśarasanaṃ vimuktakavacadhvajam 6.062.052c balaṃ rākṣasam ālambya vānarāḥ paryavārayan 6.063.001a pravṛtte saṃkule tasmin ghore vīrajanakṣaye 6.063.001c aṅgadaḥ kampanaṃ vīram āsasāda raṇotsukaḥ 6.063.002a āhūya so 'ṅgadaṃ kopāt tāḍayām āsa vegitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19099: 6.063.002c gadayā kampanaḥ pūrvaṃ sa cacāla bhṛśāhataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19100: 6.063.003a sa saṃjñāṃ prāpya tejasvī cikṣepa śikharaṃ gireḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19101: 6.063.003c arditaś ca prahāreṇa kampanaḥ patito bhuvi
GE09ram_1-7u:19103: 6.063.004c jagāmābhimukhī sā tu kumbhakarṇasuto yataḥ 6.063.004e āpatantīṃ ca vegena kumbhas tāṃ sāntvayac camūm
GE09ram_1-7u:19104: 6.063.005a sa dhanur dhanvināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ pragṛhya susamāhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19106: 6.063.006a tasya tac chuśubhe bhūyaḥ saśaraṃ dhanur uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:19112: 6.063.009a maindas tu bhrātaraṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagnaṃ tatra mahāhave
GE09ram_1-7u:19113: 6.063.009c abhidudrāva vegena pragṛhya mahatīṃ śilām 6.063.010a tāṃ śilāṃ tu pracikṣepa rākṣasāya mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19114: 6.063.010c bibheda tāṃ śilāṃ kumbhaḥ prasannaiḥ pañcabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19115: 6.063.011a saṃdhāya cānyaṃ sumukhaṃ śaram āśīviṣopamam 6.063.011c ājaghāna mahātejā vakṣasi
GE09ram_1-7u:19116: 6.063.012a sa tu tena prahāreṇa maindo vānarayūthapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19117: 6.063.012c marmaṇy abhihatas tena papāta bhuvi mūrchitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19118: 6.063.013a aṅgado mātulau dṛṣṭvā patitau tau mahābalau
GE09ram_1-7u:19120: 6.063.014a tam āpatantaṃ vivyādha kumbhaḥ pañcabhir āyasaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19121: 6.063.014c tribhiś cānyaiḥ śitair bāṇair mātaṃgam iva tomaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19122: 6.063.015a so 'ṅgadaṃ vividhair bāṇaiḥ kumbho vivyādha vīryavān 6.063.015c akuṇṭhadhārair niśitais tīkṣṇaiḥ kanakabhūṣaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19123: 6.063.016a aṅgadaḥ pratividdhāṅgo vāliputro na kampate 6.063.016c śilāpādapavarṣāṇi tasya mūrdhni vavarṣa ha 6.063.017a sa praciccheda tān sarvān bibheda ca punaḥ śilāḥ 6.063.017c kumbhakarṇātmajaḥ śrīmān vāliputrasamīritān
GE09ram_1-7u:19124: 6.063.018a āpatantaṃ ca saṃprekṣya kumbho vānarayūthapam 6.063.018c bhruvor vivyādha bāṇābhyām ulkābhyām iva kuñjaram
GE09ram_1-7u:19125: 6.063.019a aṅgadaḥ pāṇinā netre pidhāya rudhirokṣite 6.063.019c sālam āsannam ekena parijagrāha pāṇinā 6.063.020a tam indraketupratimaṃ vṛkṣaṃ mandarasaṃnibham
GE09ram_1-7u:19127: 6.063.021a sa ciccheda śitair bāṇaiḥ saptabhiḥ kāyabhedanaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19128: 6.063.021c aṅgado vivyathe 'bhīkṣṇaṃ sasāda ca mumoha ca
GE09ram_1-7u:19129: 6.063.022a aṅgadaṃ vyathitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sīdantam iva sāgare
GE09ram_1-7u:19131: 6.063.023a rāmas tu vyathitaṃ śrutvā vāliputraṃ mahāhave
GE09ram_1-7u:19133: 6.063.024a te tu vānaraśārdūlāḥ śrutvā rāmasya śāsanam
GE09ram_1-7u:19136: 6.063.025c rirakṣiṣanto 'bhyapatann aṅgadaṃ vānararṣabhāḥ 6.063.026a jāmbavāṃś ca suṣeṇaś ca vegadarśī ca vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19138: 6.063.027a samīkṣyātatatas tāṃs tu vānarendrān mahābalān 6.063.027c āvavāra śaraugheṇa nageneva jalāśayam
GE09ram_1-7u:19139: 6.063.028a tasya bāṇacayaṃ prāpya na śoker ativartitum
GE09ram_1-7u:19140: 6.063.028c vānarendrā mahātmāno velām iva mahodadhiḥ 6.063.029a tāṃs tu dṛṣṭvā harigaṇāñ śaravṛṣṭibhir arditān
GE09ram_1-7u:19141: 6.063.029c aṅgadaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā bhrātṛjaṃ plavageśvaraḥ 6.063.030a abhidudrāva vegena sugrīvaḥ kumbham āhave 6.063.030c śailasānu caraṃ nāgaṃ vegavān iva kesarī
GE09ram_1-7u:19142: 6.063.031a utpāṭya ca mahāśailān aśvakarṇān dhavān bahūn
GE09ram_1-7u:19143: 6.063.031c anyāṃś ca vividhān vṛkṣāṃś cikṣepa ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19144: 6.063.032a tāṃ chādayantīm ākāśaṃ vṛkṣavṛṣṭiṃ durāsadām 6.063.032c kumbhakarṇātmajaḥ śrīmāṃś ciccheda niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ 6.063.033a abhilakṣyeṇa tīvreṇa kumbhena niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ 6.063.033c ācitās te drumā rejur yathā ghorāḥ śataghnayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19145: 6.063.034a drumavarṣaṃ tu tac chinnaṃ dṛṣṭvā kumbhena vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:19146: 6.063.034c vānarādhipatiḥ śrīmān mahāsattvo na vivyathe 6.063.035a nirbhidyamānaḥ sahasā sahamānaś ca tāñ śarān
GE09ram_1-7u:19148: 6.063.036a avaplutya tataḥ śīghraṃ kṛtvā karma suduṣkaram
GE09ram_1-7u:19149: 6.063.036c abravīt kupitaḥ kumbhaṃ bhagnaśṛṅgam iva dvipam
GE09ram_1-7u:19150: 6.063.037a nikumbhāgraja vīryaṃ te bāṇavegaṃ tad adbhutam
GE09ram_1-7u:19151: 6.063.037c saṃnatiś ca prabhāvaś ca tava vā rāvaṇasya vā 6.063.038a prahrādabalivṛtraghnakuberavaruṇopama
GE09ram_1-7u:19152: 6.063.038c ekas tvam anujāto 'si pitaraṃ balavattaraḥ 6.063.039a tvām evaikaṃ mahābāhuṃ śūlahastam ariṃdamam 6.063.039c tridaśā nātivartante jitendriyam ivādhayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19153: 6.063.040a varadānāt pitṛvyas te sahate devadānavān 6.063.040c kumbhakarṇas tu vīryeṇa sahate ca surāsurān
GE09ram_1-7u:19154: 6.063.041a dhanuṣīndrajitas tulyaḥ pratāpe rāvaṇasya ca 6.063.041c tvam adya rakṣasāṃ loke śreṣṭho 'si balavīryataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19155: 6.063.042a mahāvimardaṃ samare mayā saha tavādbhutam 6.063.042c adya bhūtāni paśyantu śakraśambarayor iva 6.063.043a kṛtam apratimaṃ karma darśitaṃ cāstrakauśalam 6.063.043c pātitā harivīrāś ca tvayaite bhīmavikramāḥ 6.063.044a upālambhabhayāc cāpi nāsi vīra mayā hataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19156: 6.063.044c kṛtakarmā pariśrānto viśrāntaḥ paśya me balam
GE09ram_1-7u:19159: 6.063.046a tataḥ kumbhaḥ samutpatya sugrīvam abhipadya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:19161: 6.063.047a tasya carma ca pusphoṭa saṃjajñe cāsya śoṇitam
GE09ram_1-7u:19163: 6.063.048a tadā vegena tatrāsīt tejaḥ prajvālitaṃ muhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19165: 6.063.049a sa tatrābhihatas tena sugrīvo vānararṣabhaḥ 6.063.049c muṣṭiṃ saṃvartayām āsa vajrakalpaṃ mahābalaḥ 6.063.050a arciḥsahasravikacaṃ ravimaṇḍalasaprabham 6.063.050c sa muṣṭiṃ pātayām āsa kumbhasyorasi vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:19168: 6.063.052a kumbhasya patato rūpaṃ bhagnasyorasi muṣṭinā 6.063.052c babhau rudrābhipannasya yathārūpaṃ gavāṃ pateḥ 6.063.053a tasmin hate bhīmaparākrameṇa; plavaṃgamānām ṛṣabheṇa yuddhe
GE09ram_1-7u:19169: 6.063.053c mahī saśailā savanā cacāla; bhayaṃ ca rakṣāṃsy adhikaṃ viveśa 6.064.001a nikumbho bhrātaraṃ dṛṣṭvā sugrīveṇa nipātitam 6.064.001c pradahann iva kopena vānarendram avaikṣata 6.064.002a tataḥ sragdāmasaṃnaddhaṃ dattapañcāṅgulaṃ śubham
GE09ram_1-7u:19172: 6.064.004a tam āvidhya mahātejāḥ śakradhvajasamaṃ raṇe 6.064.004c vinanāda vivṛttāsyo nikumbho
GE09ram_1-7u:19173: 6.064.005a urogatena niṣkeṇa bhujasthair aṅgadair api 6.064.005c kuṇḍalābhyāṃ ca mṛṣṭābhyāṃ mālayā ca vicitrayā
GE09ram_1-7u:19174: 6.064.006a nikumbho bhūṣaṇair bhāti tena sma parigheṇa ca
GE09ram_1-7u:19177: 6.064.007c prajajvāla saghoṣaś ca vidhūma iva pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19179: 6.064.008c saha caivāmarāvatyā sarvaiś ca bhavanaiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:19184: 6.064.011a rākṣasā vānarāś cāpi na śekuḥ spandituṃ bhayāt
GE09ram_1-7u:19185: 6.064.011c hanūmaṃs tu vivṛtyoras tasthau pramukhato balī
GE09ram_1-7u:19187: 6.064.012c balī balavatas tasya pātayām āsa vakṣasi
GE09ram_1-7u:19188: 6.064.013a sthire tasyorasi vyūḍhe parighaḥ śatadhā kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19189: 6.064.013c viśīryamāṇaḥ sahasā ulkā śatam ivāmbare 6.064.014a sa tu tena prahāreṇa cacāla ca mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19191: 6.064.015a sa tathābhihatas tena hanūmān plavagottamaḥ 6.064.015c muṣṭiṃ saṃvartayām āsa
GE09ram_1-7u:19192: 6.064.016a tam udyamya mahātejā nikumbhorasi vīryavān 6.064.016c abhicikṣepa vegena vegavān
GE09ram_1-7u:19193: 6.064.017a tataḥ pusphoṭa carmāsya prasusrāva ca śoṇitam
GE09ram_1-7u:19194: 6.064.017c muṣṭinā tena saṃjajñe jvālā vidyud ivotthitā
GE09ram_1-7u:19195: 6.064.018a sa tu tena prahāreṇa nikumbho vicacāla ha
GE09ram_1-7u:19196: 6.064.018c svasthaś cāpi nijagrāha hanūmantaṃ mahābalam 6.064.019a vicukruśus tadā saṃkhye bhīmaṃ laṅkānivāsinaḥ 6.064.019c nikumbhenoddhṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā hanūmantaṃ mahābalam
GE09ram_1-7u:19197: 6.064.020a sa tathā hriyamāṇo 'pi kumbhakarṇātmajena hi 6.064.020c ājaghānānilasuto vajravegena
GE09ram_1-7u:19200: 6.064.022a nikṣipya paramāyatto nikumbhaṃ niṣpipeṣa ca 6.064.022c utpatya cāsya vegena papātorasi vīryavān 6.064.023a parigṛhya ca bāhubhyāṃ parivṛtya śirodharām 6.064.023c utpāṭayām āsa śiro bhairavaṃ nadato mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:19201: 6.064.024a atha vinadati sādite nikumbhe; pavanasutena raṇe babhūva
GE09ram_1-7u:19204: 6.065.001a nikumbhaṃ ca hataṃ śrutvā kumbhaṃ ca vinipātitam
GE09ram_1-7u:19206: 6.065.002a nairṛtaḥ krodhaśokābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ tu parimūrchitaḥ 6.065.002c kharaputraṃ viśālākṣaṃ makarākṣam acodayat
GE09ram_1-7u:19208: 6.065.003c rāghavaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva jahi tau savanaukasau
GE09ram_1-7u:19209: 6.065.004a rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā śūro mānī kharātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19210: 6.065.004c bāḍham ity abravīd dhṛṣṭo makarākṣo niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19212: 6.065.005c nirjagāma gṛhāc chubhrād rāvaṇasyājñayā balī 6.065.006a samīpasthaṃ balādhyakṣaṃ kharaputro 'bravīd idam
GE09ram_1-7u:19213: 6.065.006c ratham ānīyatāṃ śīghraṃ sainyaṃ cānīyatāṃ tvarāt
GE09ram_1-7u:19214: 6.065.007a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā balādhyakṣo niśācaraḥ 6.065.007c syandanaṃ ca balaṃ caiva samīpaṃ pratyapādayat
GE09ram_1-7u:19215: 6.065.008a pradakṣiṇaṃ rathaṃ kṛtvā āruroha niśācaraḥ 6.065.008c sūtaṃ saṃcodayām āsa śīghraṃ me ratham āvaha
GE09ram_1-7u:19216: 6.065.009a atha tān rākṣasān sarvān makarākṣo 'bravīd idam
GE09ram_1-7u:19217: 6.065.009c yūyaṃ sarve prayudhyadhvaṃ purastān mama rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19219: 6.065.010c ājñaptaḥ samare hantuṃ tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:19220: 6.065.011a adya rāmaṃ vadhiṣyāmi lakṣmaṇaṃ ca niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19221: 6.065.011c śākhāmṛgaṃ ca sugrīvaṃ vānarāṃś ca śarottamaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19222: 6.065.012a adya śūlanipātaiś ca vānarāṇāṃ mahācamūm 6.065.012c pradahiṣyāmi saṃprāptāṃ śuṣkendhanam ivānalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19223: 6.065.013a makarākṣasya tac chrutvā vacanaṃ te niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19225: 6.065.014a te kāmarūpiṇaḥ śūrā daṃṣṭriṇaḥ piṅgalekṣaṇāḥ 6.065.014c mātaṃgā iva nardanto dhvastakeśā bhayānakāḥ 6.065.015a parivārya mahākāyā mahākāyaṃ kharātmajam
GE09ram_1-7u:19226: 6.065.015c abhijagmus tadā hṛṣṭāś cālayanto vasuṃdharām 6.065.016a śaṅkhabherīsahasrāṇām āhatānāṃ samantataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19227: 6.065.016c kṣveḍitāsphoṭitānāṃ ca tataḥ śabdo mahān abhūt
GE09ram_1-7u:19228: 6.065.017a prabhraṣṭo 'tha karāt tasya pratodaḥ sārathes tadā 6.065.017c papāta sahasā caiva dhvajas tasya ca rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19229: 6.065.018a tasya te rathasaṃyuktā hayā vikramavarjitāḥ 6.065.018c caraṇair ākulair gatvā dīnāḥ sāsramukhā yayuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19230: 6.065.019a pravāti pavanas tasya sapāṃsuḥ kharadāruṇaḥ 6.065.019c niryāṇe tasya raudrasya makarākṣasya durmateḥ 6.065.020a tāni dṛṣṭvā nimittāni rākṣasā vīryavattamāḥ 6.065.020c acintyanirgatāḥ sarve yatra tau rāmalakṣmaṇau 6.065.021a ghanagajamahiṣāṅgatulyavarṇāḥ; samaramukheṣv asakṛd gadāsibhinnāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19231: 6.065.021c aham aham iti yuddhakauśalās te; rajanicarāḥ paribabhramur nadantaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19232: 6.066.001a nirgataṃ makarākṣaṃ te dṛṣṭvā vānarapuṃgavāḥ 6.066.001c āplutya sahasā sarve yoddhukāmā vyavasthitāḥ 6.066.002a tataḥ pravṛttaṃ sumahat tad yuddhaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:19233: 6.066.002c niśācaraiḥ plavaṃgānāṃ devānāṃ dānavair iva 6.066.003a vṛkṣaśūlanipātaiś ca
GE09ram_1-7u:19234: 6.066.003c anyonyaṃ mardayanti sma tadā kapiniśācarāḥ 6.066.004a śaktiśūlagadākhaḍgais tomaraiś ca niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19235: 6.066.004c paṭṭasair bhindipālaiś ca bāṇapātaiḥ samantataḥ 6.066.005a pāśamudgaradaṇḍaiś ca nirghātaiś cāparais tathā 6.066.005c kadanaṃ kapisiṃhānāṃ cakrus te rajanīcarāḥ 6.066.006a bāṇaughair arditāś cāpi kharaputreṇa vānarāḥ 6.066.006c saṃbhrāntamanasaḥ sarve dudruvur bhayapīḍitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19236: 6.066.007a tān dṛṣṭvā rākṣasāḥ sarve dravamāṇān vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19237: 6.066.007c nedus te siṃhavad dhṛṣṭā rākṣasā jitakāśinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19238: 6.066.008a vidravatsu tadā teṣu vānareṣu samantataḥ 6.066.008c rāmas tān vārayām āsa śaravarṣeṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:19239: 6.066.009a vāritān rākṣasān dṛṣṭvā makarākṣo niśācaraḥ 6.066.009c krodhān alasam āviṣṭo vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:19240: 6.066.010a tiṣṭha rāma mayā sārdhaṃ dvandvayuddhaṃ dadāmi te
GE09ram_1-7u:19241: 6.066.010c tyājayiṣyāmi te prāṇān dhanurmuktaiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19242: 6.066.011a yat tadā daṇḍakāraṇye pitaraṃ hatavān mama
GE09ram_1-7u:19244: 6.066.012a dahyante bhṛśam aṅgāni durātman mama rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:19245: 6.066.012c yan mayāsi na dṛṣṭas tvaṃ tasmin kāle mahāvane 6.066.013a diṣṭyāsi darśanaṃ rāma mama tvaṃ prāptavān iha
GE09ram_1-7u:19247: 6.066.014a adya madbāṇavegena pretarāḍ viṣayaṃ gataḥ 6.066.014c ye tvayā nihatāḥ śūrāḥ saha tais tvaṃ sameṣyasi 6.066.015a bahunātra kim uktena śṛṇu rāma vaco mama
GE09ram_1-7u:19248: 6.066.015c paśyantu sakalā lokās tvāṃ māṃ caiva raṇājire
GE09ram_1-7u:19249: 6.066.016a astrair vā gadayā vāpi bāhubhyāṃ vā mahāhave
GE09ram_1-7u:19250: 6.066.016c abhyastaṃ yena vā rāma tena vā vartatāṃ yudhi 6.066.017a makarākṣavacaḥ śrutvā rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19252: 6.066.018a caturdaśasahasrāṇi rakṣasāṃ tvatpitā ca yaḥ 6.066.018c triśirā dūṣaṇaś cāpi daṇḍake nihatā mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:19254: 6.066.019c bhaviṣyanty adya vai pāpa tīkṣṇatuṇḍanakhāṅkuśāḥ 6.066.020a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa kharaputro niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19255: 6.066.020c bāṇaughān asṛjat tasmai rāghavāya raṇājire 6.066.021a tāñ śarāñ śaravarṣeṇa rāmaś ciccheda naikadhā
GE09ram_1-7u:19256: 6.066.021c nipetur bhuvi te chinnā rukmapuṅkhāḥ sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19257: 6.066.022a tad yuddham abhavat tatra sametyānyonyam ojasā
GE09ram_1-7u:19258: 6.066.022c khara rākṣasaputrasya sūnor daśarathasya ca 6.066.023a jīmūtayor ivākāśe śabdo jyātalayos tadā 6.066.023c dhanur muktaḥ svanotkṛṣṭaḥ śrūyate ca raṇājire
GE09ram_1-7u:19260: 6.066.024c antarikṣagatāḥ sarve draṣṭukāmās tad adbhutam 6.066.025a viddham anyonyagātreṣu dviguṇaṃ vardhate balam 6.066.025c kṛtapratikṛtānyonyaṃ kurvāte tau raṇājire
GE09ram_1-7u:19261: 6.066.026a rāmam uktās tu bāṇaughān rākṣasas tv acchinad raṇe 6.066.026c rakṣomuktāṃs tu rāmo vai naikadhā prācchinac charaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19262: 6.066.027a bāṇaughavitatāḥ sarvā diśaś ca vidiśas tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:19263: 6.066.027c saṃchannā vasudhā caiva samantān na prakāśate
GE09ram_1-7u:19264: 6.066.028a tataḥ kruddho mahābāhur dhanuś ciccheda rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19265: 6.066.028c aṣṭābhir atha nārācaiḥ sūtaṃ vivyādha rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19266: 6.066.028e bhittvā śarai rathaṃ rāmo rathāśvān samapātayat
GE09ram_1-7u:19267: 6.066.029a viratho vasudhāṃ tiṣṭhan makarākṣo niśācaraḥ 6.066.029c atiṣṭhad vasudhāṃ rakṣaḥ śūlaṃ jagrāha pāṇinā
GE09ram_1-7u:19269: 6.066.030a vibhrāmya ca mahac chūlaṃ prajvalantaṃ niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19270: 6.066.030c sa krodhāt prāhiṇot tasmai rāghavāya mahāhave
GE09ram_1-7u:19271: 6.066.031a tam āpatantaṃ jvalitaṃ kharaputrakarāc cyutam 6.066.031c bāṇais tu tribhir ākāśe śūlaṃ ciccheda rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19274: 6.066.033a tac chūlaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmeṇādbhutakarmaṇā 6.066.033c sādhu sādhv iti bhūtāni vyāharanti nabhogatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19275: 6.066.034a tad dṛṣṭvā nihataṃ śūlaṃ makarākṣo niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19276: 6.066.034c muṣṭim udyamya kākutsthaṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:19277: 6.066.035a sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā patantaṃ vai prahasya raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19278: 6.066.035c pāvakāstraṃ tato rāmaḥ saṃdadhe svaśarāsane 6.066.036a tenāstreṇa hataṃ rakṣaḥ kākutsthena tadā raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:19279: 6.066.036c saṃchinnahṛdayaṃ tatra papāta ca mamāra ca
GE09ram_1-7u:19280: 6.066.037a dṛṣṭvā te rākṣasāḥ sarve makarākṣasya pātanam
GE09ram_1-7u:19281: 6.066.037c laṅkām eva pradhāvanta rāmabālārditās tadā 6.066.038a daśarathanṛpaputrabāṇavegai; rajanicaraṃ nihataṃ kharātmajaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:19283: 6.066.038c dadṛśur atha ca devatāḥ prahṛṣṭā; girim iva vajrahataṃ yathā viśīrṇam 6.067.001a makarākṣaṃ hataṃ śrutvā rāvaṇaḥ samitiṃjayaḥ 6.067.001c ādideśātha saṃkruddho raṇāyendrajitaṃ sutam
GE09ram_1-7u:19284: 6.067.002a jahi vīra mahāvīryau bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau 6.067.002c adṛśyo dṛśyamāno vā sarvathā tvaṃ balādhikaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19285: 6.067.003a tvam apratimakarmāṇam indraṃ jayasi saṃyuge 6.067.003c kiṃ punar mānuṣau dṛṣṭvā na vadhiṣyasi saṃyuge
GE09ram_1-7u:19286: 6.067.004a tathokto rākṣasendreṇa pratigṛhya pitur vacaḥ 6.067.004c yajñabhūmau sa vidhivat pāvakaṃ juhuve ndrajit
GE09ram_1-7u:19287: 6.067.005a juhvataś cāpi tatrāgniṃ raktoṣṇīṣadharāḥ striyaḥ 6.067.005c ājagmus tatra saṃbhrāntā rākṣasyo yatra rāvaṇiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19289: 6.067.006c lohitāni ca vāsāṃsi sruvaṃ kārṣṇāyasaṃ tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:19291: 6.067.007c chāgasya sarvakṛṣṇasya galaṃ jagrāha jīvataḥ 6.067.008a caruhomasamiddhasya vidhūmasya mahārciṣaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19292: 6.067.008c babhūvus tāni liṅgāni vijayaṃ darśayanti ca
GE09ram_1-7u:19293: 6.067.009a pradakṣiṇāvartaśikhas taptahāṭakasaṃnibhaḥ 6.067.009c havis tat pratijagrāha pāvakaḥ svayam utthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19296: 6.067.011a sa vājibhiś caturbhis tu bāṇaiś ca niśitair yutaḥ 6.067.011c āropitamahācāpaḥ śuśubhe syandanottame
GE09ram_1-7u:19298: 6.067.012c śaraiś candrārdhacandraiś ca sa rathaḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19300: 6.067.014a tena cādityakalpena brahmāstreṇa ca pālitaḥ 6.067.014c sa babhūva durādharṣo rāvaṇiḥ sumahābalaḥ 6.067.015a so 'bhiniryāya nagarād indrajit samitiṃjayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19302: 6.067.016a adya hatvāhave yau tau mithyā pravrajitau vane
GE09ram_1-7u:19303: 6.067.016c jayaṃ pitre pradāsyāmi rāvaṇāya raṇādhikam 6.067.017a kṛtvā nirvānarām urvīṃ hatvā rāmaṃ salakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:19304: 6.067.017c kariṣye paramāṃ prītim ity uktvāntaradhīyata 6.067.018a āpapātātha saṃkruddho daśagrīveṇa coditaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19305: 6.067.018c tīkṣṇakārmukanārācais tīkṣṇas tv indraripū raṇe 6.067.019a sa dadarśa mahāvīryau nāgau triśirasāv iva
GE09ram_1-7u:19307: 6.067.020a imau tāv iti saṃcintya sajyaṃ kṛtvā ca kārmukam 6.067.020c saṃtatāneṣudhārābhiḥ parjanya iva vṛṣṭimān
GE09ram_1-7u:19308: 6.067.021a sa tu vaihāyasaṃ prāpya saratho rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:19309: 6.067.021c acakṣur viṣaye tiṣṭhan vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19310: 6.067.022a tau tasya śaravegena parītau rāmalakṣmaṇau 6.067.022c dhanuṣī saśare kṛtvā divyam astraṃ pracakratuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19312: 6.067.023c tam astraiḥ surasaṃkāśau naiva pasparśatuḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19313: 6.067.024a sa hi dhūmāndhakāraṃ ca cakre pracchādayan nabhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19315: 6.067.025a naiva jyātalanirghoṣo na ca nemikhurasvanaḥ 6.067.025c śuśruve caratas tasya na ca rūpaṃ prakāśate
GE09ram_1-7u:19318: 6.067.027a sa rāmaṃ sūryasaṃkāśaiḥ śarair dattavaro bhṛśam
GE09ram_1-7u:19319: 6.067.027c vivyādha samare kruddhaḥ sarvagātreṣu rāvaṇiḥ 6.067.028a tau hanyamānau nārācair dhārābhir iva parvatau
GE09ram_1-7u:19320: 6.067.028c hemapuṅkhān naravyāghrau tigmān mumucatuḥ śarān 6.067.029a antarikṣaṃ samāsādya rāvaṇiṃ kaṅkapatriṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19321: 6.067.029c nikṛtya patagā bhūmau petus te śoṇitokṣitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19323: 6.067.030c tān iṣūn patato bhallair anekair nicakartatuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19324: 6.067.031a yato hi dadṛśāte tau śarān nipatitāñ śitān
GE09ram_1-7u:19326: 6.067.032a rāvaṇis tu diśaḥ sarvā rathenātirathaḥ patan
GE09ram_1-7u:19327: 6.067.032c vivyādha tau dāśarathī laghv astro niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19328: 6.067.033a tenātividdhau tau vīrau rukmapuṅkhaiḥ susaṃhataiḥ 6.067.033c babhūvatur dāśarathī puṣpitāv iva kiṃśukau 6.067.034a nāsya veda gatiṃ kaś cin na ca rūpaṃ dhanuḥ śarān
GE09ram_1-7u:19329: 6.067.034c na cānyad viditaṃ kiṃ cit sūryasyevābhrasaṃplave
GE09ram_1-7u:19330: 6.067.035a tena viddhāś ca harayo nihatāś ca gatāsavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19331: 6.067.035c babhūvuḥ śataśas tatra patitā dharaṇītale 6.067.036a lakṣmaṇas tu susaṃkruddho bhrātaraṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:19332: 6.067.036c brāhmam astraṃ prayokṣyāmi vadhārthaṃ sarvarakṣasām 6.067.037a tam uvāca tato rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ śubhalakṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:19333: 6.067.037c naikasya heto rakṣāṃsi pṛthivyāṃ hantum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:19335: 6.067.038c palāyantaṃ pramattaṃ vā na tvaṃ hantum ihārhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:19336: 6.067.039a asyaiva tu vadhe yatnaṃ kariṣyāvo mahābala
GE09ram_1-7u:19338: 6.067.040a tam enaṃ māyinaṃ kṣudram antarhitarathaṃ balāt
GE09ram_1-7u:19340: 6.067.041a yady eṣa bhūmiṃ viśate divaṃ vā; rasātalaṃ vāpi nabhastalaṃ vā
GE09ram_1-7u:19341: 6.067.041c evaṃ nigūḍho 'pi mamāstradagdhaḥ; patiṣyate bhūmitale gatāsuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19342: 6.067.042a ity evam uktvā vacanaṃ mahātmā; raghupravīraḥ plavagarṣabhair vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19343: 6.067.042c vadhāya raudrasya nṛśaṃsakarmaṇas; tadā mahātmā tvaritaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:19345: 6.068.001a vijñāya tu manas tasya rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19346: 6.068.001c saṃnivṛtyāhavāt tasmāt praviveśa puraṃ tataḥ 6.068.002a so 'nusmṛtya vadhaṃ teṣāṃ rākṣasānāṃ tarasvinām
GE09ram_1-7u:19348: 6.068.003a sa paścimena dvāreṇa niryayau rākṣasair vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19349: 6.068.003c indrajit tu mahāvīryaḥ paulastyo devakaṇṭakaḥ 6.068.004a indrajit tu tato dṛṣṭvā bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:19350: 6.068.004c raṇāyābhyudyatau vīrau māyāṃ prāduṣkarot tadā 6.068.005a indrajit tu rathe sthāpya sītāṃ māyāmayīṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:19351: 6.068.005c balena mahatāvṛtya tasyā vadham arocayat 6.068.006a mohanārthaṃ tu sarveṣāṃ buddhiṃ kṛtvā sudurmatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19352: 6.068.006c hantuṃ sītāṃ vyavasito vānarābhimukho yayau 6.068.007a taṃ dṛṣṭvā tv abhiniryāntaṃ nagaryāḥ kānanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19354: 6.068.008a hanūmān puratas teṣāṃ jagāma kapikuñjaraḥ 6.068.008c pragṛhya sumahac chṛṅgaṃ parvatasya durāsadam 6.068.009a sa dadarśa hatānandāṃ sītām indrajito rathe
GE09ram_1-7u:19358: 6.068.011a tāṃ nirīkṣya muhūrtaṃ tu maithilīm adhyavasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:19360: 6.068.012a abravīt tāṃ tu śokārtāṃ nirānandāṃ tapasvinām
GE09ram_1-7u:19361: 6.068.012c dṛṣṭvā rathe stitāṃ sītāṃ rākṣasendrasutāśritām 6.068.013a kiṃ samarthitam asyeti cintayan sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19362: 6.068.013c saha tair vānaraśreṣṭhair abhyadhāvata rāvaṇim 6.068.014a tad vānarabalaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇiḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ 6.068.014c kṛtvā viśokaṃ nistriṃśaṃ mūrdhni sītāṃ parāmṛśat
GE09ram_1-7u:19363: 6.068.015a taṃ striyaṃ paśyatāṃ teṣāṃ tāḍayām āsa rāvaṇiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19364: 6.068.015c krośantīṃ rāma rāmeti māyayā yojitāṃ rathe
GE09ram_1-7u:19365: 6.068.016a gṛhītamūrdhajāṃ dṛṣṭvā hanūmān dainyam āgataḥ 6.068.016c duḥkhajaṃ vārinetrābhyām utsṛjan mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19368: 6.068.017c brahmarṣīṇāṃ kule jāto rākṣasīṃ yonim āśritaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19369: 6.068.017e dhik tvāṃ pāpasamācāraṃ yasya te matir īdṛśī
GE09ram_1-7u:19371: 6.068.018c anāryasyedṛśaṃ karma ghṛṇā te nāsti nirghṛṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:19372: 6.068.019a cyutā gṛhāc ca rājyāc ca rāmahastāc ca maithilī 6.068.019c kiṃ tavaiṣāparāddhā hi yad enāṃ hantum icchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:19373: 6.068.020a sītāṃ ca hatvā na ciraṃ jīviṣyasi kathaṃ cana 6.068.020c vadhārhakarmaṇānena mama hastagato hy asi 6.068.021a ye ca strīghātināṃ lokā lokavadhyaiś ca kutsitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19374: 6.068.021c iha jīvitam utsṛjya pretya tān pratilapsyase
GE09ram_1-7u:19375: 6.068.022a iti bruvāṇo hanumān sāyudhair haribhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19377: 6.068.023a āpatantaṃ mahāvīryaṃ tad anīkaṃ vanaukasām 6.068.023c rakṣasāṃ bhīmavegānām anīkena nyavārayat
GE09ram_1-7u:19378: 6.068.024a sa tāṃ bāṇasahasreṇa vikṣobhya harivāhinīm 6.068.024c hariśreṣṭhaṃ hanūmantam indrajit pratyuvāca ha 6.068.025a sugrīvas tvaṃ ca rāmaś ca yannimittam ihāgatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19379: 6.068.025c tāṃ haniṣyāmi vaidehīm adyaiva tava paśyataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19380: 6.068.026a imāṃ hatvā tato rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ tvāṃ ca vānara 6.068.026c sugrīvaṃ ca vadhiṣyāmi taṃ cānāryaṃ vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:19381: 6.068.027a na hantavyāḥ striyaś ceti yad bravīṣi plavaṃgama
GE09ram_1-7u:19382: 6.068.027c pīḍā karam amitrāṇāṃ yat syāt kartavyam eta tat 6.068.028a tam evam uktvā rudatīṃ sītāṃ māyāmayīṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19385: 6.068.029c sā pṛthivyāṃ pṛthuśroṇī papāta priyadarśanā 6.068.030a tām indrajitstriyaṃ hatvā hanūmantam uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:19386: 6.068.030c mayā rāmasya paśyemāṃ kopena ca niṣūditām
GE09ram_1-7u:19387: 6.068.031a tataḥ khaḍgena mahatā hatvā tām indrajit svayam
GE09ram_1-7u:19388: 6.068.031c hṛṣṭaḥ sa ratham āsthāya vinanāda mahāsvanam
GE09ram_1-7u:19389: 6.068.032a vānarāḥ śuśruvuḥ śabdam adūre pratyavasthitāḥ 6.068.032c vyāditāsyasya nadatas tad durgaṃ saṃśritasya tu
GE09ram_1-7u:19390: 6.068.033a tathā tu sītāṃ vinihatya durmatiḥ; prahṛṣṭacetāḥ sa babhūva
GE09ram_1-7u:19392: 6.068.033c taṃ hṛṣṭarūpaṃ samudīkṣya vānarā; viṣaṇṇarūpāḥ samabhipradudruvuḥ 6.069.001a śrutvā taṃ bhīmanirhrādaṃ śakrāśanisamasvanam
GE09ram_1-7u:19393: 6.069.001c vīkṣamāṇā diśaḥ sarvā dudruvur vānararṣabhāḥ 6.069.002a tān uvāca tataḥ sarvān hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19394: 6.069.002c viṣaṇṇavadanān dīnāṃs trastān vidravataḥ pṛthak 6.069.003a kasmād viṣaṇṇavadanā vidravadhvaṃ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19395: 6.069.003c tyaktayuddhasamutsāhāḥ śūratvaṃ kva nu vo gatam
GE09ram_1-7u:19397: 6.069.004c śūrair abhijanopetair ayuktaṃ hi nivartitum 6.069.005a evam uktāḥ susaṃkruddhā vāyuputreṇa dhīmatā 6.069.005c śailaśṛṅgān drumāṃś caiva jagṛhur hṛṣṭamānasāḥ 6.069.006a abhipetuś ca garjanto rākṣasān vānararṣabhāḥ 6.069.006c parivārya hanūmantam anvayuś ca mahāhave 6.069.007a sa tair vānaramukhyais tu hanūmān sarvato vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19399: 6.069.008a sa rākṣasānāṃ kadanaṃ cakāra sumahākapiḥ 6.069.008c vṛto vānarasainyena kālāntakayamopamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19400: 6.069.009a sa tu śokena cāviṣṭaḥ krodhena ca mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19401: 6.069.009c hanūmān rāvaṇi rathe mahatīṃ pātayac chilām
GE09ram_1-7u:19402: 6.069.010a tām āpatantīṃ dṛṣṭvaiva rathaḥ sārathinā tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:19404: 6.069.011a tam indrajitam aprāpya rathathaṃ sahasārathim 6.069.011c viveśa dharaṇīṃ bhittvā sā śilāvyartham udyatā
GE09ram_1-7u:19405: 6.069.012a patitāyāṃ śilāyāṃ tu rakṣasāṃ vyathitā camūḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19406: 6.069.012c tam abhyadhāvañ śataśo nadantaḥ kānanaukasaḥ 6.069.013a te drumāṃś ca mahākāyā giriśṛṅgāṇi codyatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19407: 6.069.013c cikṣipur dviṣatāṃ madhye vānarā bhīmavikramāḥ 6.069.014a vānarair tair mahāvīryair ghorarūpā niśācarāḥ 6.069.014c vīryād abhihatā vṛkṣair vyaveṣṭanta raṇakṣitau 6.069.015a svasainyam abhivīkṣyātha vānarārditam indrajit
GE09ram_1-7u:19408: 6.069.015c pragṛhītāyudhaḥ kruddhaḥ parān abhimukho yayau 6.069.016a sa śaraughān avasṛjan
GE09ram_1-7u:19410: 6.069.017a śūlair aśanibhiḥ khaḍgaiḥ paṭṭasaiḥ kūṭamudgaraiḥ 6.069.017c te cāpy anucarāṃs tasya vānarā jaghnur āhave
GE09ram_1-7u:19411: 6.069.018a saskandhaviṭapaiḥ sālaiḥ śilābhiś ca mahābalaiḥ 6.069.018c hanūmān kadanaṃ cakre rakṣasāṃ bhīmakarmaṇām 6.069.019a sa nivārya parānīkam abravīt tān vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19412: 6.069.019c hanūmān saṃnivartadhvaṃ na naḥ sādhyam idaṃ balam
GE09ram_1-7u:19413: 6.069.020a tyaktvā prāṇān viceṣṭanto rāma priyacikīrṣavaḥ 6.069.020c yannimittaṃ hi yudhyāmo hatā sā janakātmajā
GE09ram_1-7u:19414: 6.069.021a imam arthaṃ hi vijñāpya rāmaṃ sugrīvam eva ca 6.069.021c tau yat pratividhāsyete tat kariṣyāmahe vayam
GE09ram_1-7u:19415: 6.069.022a ity uktvā vānaraśreṣṭho vārayan sarvavānarān 6.069.022c śanaiḥ śanair asaṃtrastaḥ sabalaḥ sa nyavartata
GE09ram_1-7u:19416: 6.069.023a sa tu prekṣya hanūmantaṃ vrajantaṃ yatra rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19417: 6.069.023c nikumbhilām adhiṣṭhāya pāvakaṃ juhuve ndrajit 6.069.024a yajñabhūmyāṃ tu vidhivat pāvakas tena rakṣasā
GE09ram_1-7u:19420: 6.069.025c saṃdhyāgata ivādityaḥ sa tīvrāgniḥ samutthitaḥ 6.069.026a athendrajid rākṣasabhūtaye tu; juhāva havyaṃ vidhinā vidhānavat
GE09ram_1-7u:19421: 6.069.026c dṛṣṭvā vyatiṣṭhanta ca rākṣasās te; mahāsamūheṣu nayānayajñāḥ 6.070.001a rāghavaś cāpi vipulaṃ taṃ rākṣasavanaukasām 6.070.001c śrutvā saṃgrāmanirghoṣaṃ jāmbavantam uvāca ha 6.070.002a saumya nūnaṃ hanumatā kṛtaṃ karma suduṣkaram
GE09ram_1-7u:19422: 6.070.002c śrūyate hi yathā bhīmaḥ sumahān āyudhasvanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19423: 6.070.003a tad gaccha kuru sāhāyyaṃ svabalenābhisaṃvṛtaḥ 6.070.003c kṣipram ṛṣkapate tasya kapiśreṣṭhasya yudhyataḥ 6.070.004a ṛkṣarājas tathety uktvā svenānīkena saṃvṛtaḥ 6.070.004c āgacchat paścimadvāraṃ hanūmān yatra vānaraḥ 6.070.005a athāyāntaṃ hanūmantaṃ dadarśarkṣapatiḥ pathi
GE09ram_1-7u:19425: 6.070.006a dṛṣṭvā pathi hanūmāṃś ca tad ṛṣkabalam udyatam
GE09ram_1-7u:19427: 6.070.007a sa tena harisainyena saṃnikarṣaṃ mahāyaśāḥ 6.070.007c śīghram āgamya rāmāya duḥkhito vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:19428: 6.070.008a samare yudhyamānānām asmākaṃ prekṣatāṃ ca saḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19429: 6.070.008c jaghāna rudatīṃ sītām indrajid rāvaṇātmajaḥ 6.070.009a udbhrāntacittas tāṃ dṛṣṭvā viṣaṇṇo 'ham ariṃdama
GE09ram_1-7u:19430: 6.070.009c tad ahaṃ bhavato vṛttaṃ vijñāpayitum āgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19431: 6.070.010a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rāghavaḥ śokamūrchitaḥ 6.070.010c nipapāta tadā bhūmau chinnamūla iva drumaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19432: 6.070.011a taṃ bhūmau devasaṃkāśaṃ patitaṃ dṛśya rāghavam
GE09ram_1-7u:19435: 6.070.012c pradahantam asahyaṃ ca sahasāgnim ivotthitam 6.070.013a taṃ lakṣmaṇo 'tha bāhubhyāṃ pariṣvajya suduḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19436: 6.070.013c uvāca rāmam asvasthaṃ vākyaṃ hetvarthasaṃhitam 6.070.014a śubhe vartmani tiṣṭhantaṃ tvām āryavijitendriyam 6.070.014c anarthebhyo na śaknoti trātuṃ dharmo nirarthakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19437: 6.070.015a bhūtānāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ ca jaṅgamānāṃ ca darśanam
GE09ram_1-7u:19438: 6.070.015c yathāsti na tathā dharmas tena nāstīti me matiḥ 6.070.016a yathaiva sthāvaraṃ vyaktaṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca tathāvidham
GE09ram_1-7u:19439: 6.070.016c nāyam arthas tathā yuktas tvadvidho na vipadyate
GE09ram_1-7u:19440: 6.070.017a yady adharmo bhaved bhūto rāvaṇo narakaṃ vrajet
GE09ram_1-7u:19441: 6.070.017c bhavāṃś ca dharmasaṃyukto naivaṃ vyasanam āpnuyāt
GE09ram_1-7u:19442: 6.070.018a tasya ca vyasanābhāvād vyasanaṃ ca gate tvayi
GE09ram_1-7u:19443: 6.070.018c dharmeṇopalabhed dharmam adharmaṃ cāpy adharmataḥ 6.070.019a yadi dharmeṇa yujyeran nādharmarucayo janāḥ 6.070.019c dharmeṇa caratāṃ dharmas tathā caiṣāṃ phalaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_1-7u:19444: 6.070.020a yasmād arthā vivardhante yeṣv adharmaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19445: 6.070.020c kliśyante dharmaśīlāś ca tasmād etau nirarthakau
GE09ram_1-7u:19446: 6.070.021a vadhyante pāpakarmāṇo yady adharmeṇa rāghava 6.070.021c vadhakarmahato dharmaḥ sa hataḥ kaṃ vadhiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:19447: 6.070.022a atha vā vihitenāyaṃ hanyate hanti vā param
GE09ram_1-7u:19448: 6.070.022c vidhir ālipyate tena na sa pāpena karmaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:19450: 6.070.023c kathaṃ śakyaṃ paraṃ prāptuṃ dharmeṇārivikarśana 6.070.024a yadi sat syāt satāṃ mukhya nāsat syāt tava kiṃ cana
GE09ram_1-7u:19451: 6.070.024c tvayā yadīdṛśaṃ prāptaṃ tasmāt san nopapadyate
GE09ram_1-7u:19452: 6.070.025a atha vā durbalaḥ klībo balaṃ dharmo 'nuvartate
GE09ram_1-7u:19453: 6.070.025c durbalo hṛtamaryādo na sevya iti me matiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19454: 6.070.026a balasya yadi ced dharmo guṇabhūtaḥ parākrame
GE09ram_1-7u:19455: 6.070.026c dharmam utsṛjya vartasva yathā dharme tathā bale
GE09ram_1-7u:19456: 6.070.027a atha cet satyavacanaṃ dharmaḥ kila paraṃtapa
GE09ram_1-7u:19457: 6.070.027c anṛtas tvayy akaruṇaḥ kiṃ na baddhas tvayā pitā 6.070.028a yadi dharmo bhaved bhūta adharmo vā paraṃtapa
GE09ram_1-7u:19458: 6.070.028c na sma hatvā muniṃ vajrī kuryād ijyāṃ śatakratuḥ 6.070.029a adharmasaṃśrito dharmo vināśayati rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:19459: 6.070.029c sarvam etad yathākāmaṃ kākutstha kurute naraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19460: 6.070.030a mama cedaṃ mataṃ tāta dharmo 'yam iti rāghava 6.070.030c dharmamūlaṃ tvayā chinnaṃ rājyam utsṛjatā tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:19461: 6.070.031a arthebhyo hi vivṛddhebhyaḥ saṃvṛddhebhyas tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19462: 6.070.031c kriyāḥ sarvāḥ pravartante parvatebhya ivāpagāḥ 6.070.032a arthena hi viyuktasya
GE09ram_1-7u:19463: 6.070.032c vyucchidyante kriyāḥ sarvā grīṣme kusarito yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:19465: 6.070.033c pāpam ārabhate kartuṃ tathā doṣaḥ pravartate
GE09ram_1-7u:19466: 6.070.034a yasyārthās tasya mitrāṇi yasyārthās tasya bāndhavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19467: 6.070.034c yasyārthāḥ sa pumāṃl loke yasyārthāḥ sa ca paṇḍitaḥ 6.070.035a yasyārthāḥ sa ca vikrānto yasyārthāḥ sa ca buddhimān 6.070.035c yasyārthāḥ sa mahābhāgo yasyārthāḥ sa mahāguṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19468: 6.070.036a arthasyaite parityāge doṣāḥ pravyāhṛtā mayā 6.070.036c rājyam utsṛjatā vīra yena buddhis tvayā kṛtā
GE09ram_1-7u:19469: 6.070.037a yasyārthā dharmakāmārthās tasya sarvaṃ pradakṣiṇam 6.070.037c adhanenārthakāmena nārthaḥ śakyo vicinvatā
GE09ram_1-7u:19470: 6.070.038a harṣaḥ kāmaś ca darpaś ca dharmaḥ krodhaḥ śamo damaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19471: 6.070.038c arthād etāni sarvāṇi pravartante narādhipa 6.070.039a yeṣāṃ naśyaty ayaṃ lokaś caratāṃ dharmacāriṇām
GE09ram_1-7u:19472: 6.070.039c te 'rthās tvayi na dṛśyante durdineṣu yathā grahāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19473: 6.070.040a tvayi pravrajite vīra guroś ca vacane sthite
GE09ram_1-7u:19474: 6.070.040c rakṣasāpahṛtā bhāryā prāṇaiḥ priyatarā tava 6.070.041a tad adya vipulaṃ vīra duḥkham indrajitā kṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:19475: 6.070.041c karmaṇā vyapaneṣyāmi tasmād uttiṣṭha rāghava 6.070.042a ayam anagha tavoditaḥ priyārthaṃ; janakasutā nidhanaṃ nirīkṣya
GE09ram_1-7u:19479: 6.071.001a rāmam āśvāsayāne tu lakṣmaṇe bhrātṛvatsale 6.071.001c nikṣipya gulmān svasthāne tatrāgacchad vibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.071.002a nānāpraharaṇair vīraiś caturbhiḥ sacivair vṛtaḥ 6.071.002c nīlāñjanacayākārair mātaṃgair iva yūthapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19483: 6.071.004c dadarśa moham āpannaṃ lakṣmaṇasyāṅkam āśritam 6.071.005a vrīḍitaṃ śokasaṃtaptaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.071.005c antarduḥkhena dīnātmā kim etad iti so 'bravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:19484: 6.071.006a vibhīṣaṇa mukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā sugrīvaṃ tāṃś ca vānarān
GE09ram_1-7u:19485: 6.071.006c uvāca lakṣmaṇo vākyam idaṃ bāṣpapariplutaḥ 6.071.007a hatām indrajitā sītām iha śrutvaiva rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19486: 6.071.007c hanūmad vacanāt saumya tato moham upāgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19487: 6.071.008a kathayantaṃ tu saumitriṃ saṃnivārya vibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.071.008c puṣkalārtham idaṃ vākyaṃ visaṃjñaṃ rāmam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:19488: 6.071.009a manujendrārtarūpeṇa yad uktas tvaṃ hanūmatā 6.071.009c tad ayuktam ahaṃ manye sāgarasyeva śoṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:19489: 6.071.010a abhiprāyaṃ tu jānāmi rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ 6.071.010c sītāṃ prati mahābāho na ca ghātaṃ kariṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:19491: 6.071.011c vaidehīm utsṛjasveti na ca tat kṛtavān vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19492: 6.071.012a naiva sāmnā na bhedena na dānena kuto yudhā 6.071.012c sā draṣṭum api śakyeta naiva cānyena kena cit 6.071.013a vānarān mohayitvā tu pratiyātaḥ sa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19493: 6.071.013c caityaṃ nikumbhilāṃ nāma yatra homaṃ kariṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:19494: 6.071.014a hutavān upayāto hi devair api savāsavaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19495: 6.071.014c durādharṣo bhavaty eṣa saṃgrāme rāvaṇātmajaḥ 6.071.015a tena mohayatā nūnam eṣā māyā prayojitā
GE09ram_1-7u:19496: 6.071.015c vighnam anvicchatā tāta vānarāṇāṃ parākrame 6.071.015e sasainyās tatra gacchāmo yāvat tan na samāpyate
GE09ram_1-7u:19498: 6.071.016c sīdate hi balaṃ sarvaṃ dṛṣṭvā tvāṃ śokakarśitam
GE09ram_1-7u:19499: 6.071.017a iha tvaṃ svastha hṛdayas tiṣṭha sattvasamucchritaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19501: 6.071.018a eṣa taṃ naraśārdūlo rāvaṇiṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19502: 6.071.018c tyājayiṣyati tat karma tato vadhyo bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:19504: 6.071.019c patatriṇa ivāsaumyāḥ śarāḥ pāsyanti śoṇitam 6.071.020a tat saṃdiśa mahābāho lakṣmaṇaṃ śubhalakṣaṇam 6.071.020c rākṣasasya vināśāya vajraṃ vajradharo yathā 6.071.021a manujavara na kālaviprakarṣo; ripunidhanaṃ prati yat kṣamo 'dya
GE09ram_1-7u:19506: 6.071.021c tvam atisṛja ripor vadhāya bāṇīm; asurapuronmathane yathā mahendraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19507: 6.071.022a samāptakarmā hi sa rākṣasendro; bhavaty adṛśyaḥ samare
GE09ram_1-7u:19509: 6.071.022c yuyutsatā tena samāptakarmaṇā; bhavet surāṇām api saṃśayo mahān 6.072.001a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rāghavaḥ śokakarśitaḥ 6.072.001c nopadhārayate vyaktaṃ yad uktaṃ tena rakṣasā
GE09ram_1-7u:19510: 6.072.002a tato dhairyam avaṣṭabhya rāmaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ 6.072.002c vibhīṣaṇam upāsīnam uvāca kapisaṃnidhau
GE09ram_1-7u:19511: 6.072.003a nairṛtādhipate vākyaṃ yad uktaṃ te vibhīṣaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:19512: 6.072.003c bhūyas tac chrotum icchāmi brūhi yat te vivakṣitam 6.072.004a rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ 6.072.004c yat tat punar idaṃ vākyaṃ babhāṣe sa vibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.072.005a yathājñaptaṃ mahābāho tvayā gulmaniveśanam
GE09ram_1-7u:19514: 6.072.006a tāny anīkāni sarvāṇi vibhaktāni samantataḥ 6.072.006c vinyastā yūthapāś caiva yathānyāyaṃ vibhāgaśaḥ 6.072.007a bhūyas tu mama vijāpyaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva mahāyaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19516: 6.072.008a tyaja rājann imaṃ śokaṃ mithyā saṃtāpam āgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:19517: 6.072.008c tad iyaṃ tyajyatāṃ cintā śatruharṣavivardhanī 6.072.009a udyamaḥ kriyatāṃ vīra harṣaḥ samupasevyatām 6.072.009c prāptavyā yadi te sītā hantavyaś vca niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19518: 6.072.010a raghunandana vakṣyāmi śrūyatāṃ me hitaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19519: 6.072.010c sādhv ayaṃ yātu saumitrir balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19520: 6.072.010e nikumbhilāyāṃ saṃprāpya hantuṃ rāvaṇim āhave 6.072.011a dhanurmaṇḍalanirmuktair āśīviṣaviṣopamaiḥ 6.072.011c śarair hantuṃ maheṣvāso rāvaṇiṃ samitiṃjayaḥ 6.072.012a tena vīreṇa tapasā varadānāt svayambhutaḥ 6.072.012c astraṃ brahmaśiraḥ prāptaṃ kāmagāś ca turaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19521: 6.072.013a nikumbhilām asaṃprāptam ahutāgniṃ ca yo ripuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19522: 6.072.013c tvām ātatāyinaṃ hanyād indraśatro sa te vadhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19523: 6.072.013e ity evaṃ vihito rājan vadhas tasyaiva dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19524: 6.072.014a vadhāyendrajito rāma taṃ diśasva mahābalam 6.072.014c hate tasmin hataṃ viddhi rāvaṇaṃ sasuhṛjjanam
GE09ram_1-7u:19525: 6.072.015a vibhīṣaṇavacaḥ śrutva rāmo vākyam athābravīt 6.072.015c jānāmi tasya raudrasya māyāṃ satyaparākrama 6.072.016a sa hi brahmāstravit prājño mahāmāyo mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19526: 6.072.016c karoty asaṃjñān saṃgrāme devān savaruṇān api
GE09ram_1-7u:19529: 6.072.018a rāghavas tu ripor jñātvā māyāvīryaṃ durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19530: 6.072.018c lakṣmaṇaṃ kīrtisaṃpannam idaṃ vacanam abravīt 6.072.019a yad vānarendrasya balaṃ tena sarveṇa saṃvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19534: 6.072.021a ayaṃ tvāṃ sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ mahātmā rajanīcaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19536: 6.072.022a rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā lakṣmaṇaḥ savibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.072.022c jagrāha kārmukaṃ śreṣṭham anyad bhīmaparākramaḥ 6.072.023a saṃnaddhaḥ kavacī khaḍgī sa śarī hemacāpadhṛk
GE09ram_1-7u:19537: 6.072.023c rāmapādāv upaspṛśya hṛṣṭaḥ saumitrir abravīt 6.072.024a adya matkārmukonmukhāḥ śarā nirbhidya rāvaṇim 6.072.024c laṅkām abhipatiṣyanti haṃsāḥ puṣkariṇīm iva 6.072.025a adyaiva tasya raudrasya śarīraṃ māmakāḥ śarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19539: 6.072.026a sa evam uktvā dyutimān vacanaṃ bhrātur agrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19540: 6.072.026c sa rāvaṇivadhākāṅkṣī lakṣmaṇas tvarito yayau 6.072.027a so 'bhivādya guroḥ pādau kṛtvā cāpi pradakṣiṇam 6.072.027c nikumbhilām abhiyayau caityaṃ rāvaṇipālitam
GE09ram_1-7u:19542: 6.072.028c kṛtasvastyayano bhrātrā lakṣmaṇas tvarito yayau 6.072.029a vānarāṇāṃ sahasrais tu hanūmān bahubhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19543: 6.072.029c vibhīṣaṇaḥ sahāmātyas tadā lakṣmaṇam anvagāt 6.072.030a mahatā harisainyena savegam abhisaṃvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19544: 6.072.030c ṛkṣarājabalaṃ caiva dadarśa pathi viṣṭhitam 6.072.031a sa gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ saumitrir mitranandanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19545: 6.072.031c rākṣasendrabalaṃ dūrād apaśyad vyūham āsthitam 6.072.032a sa saṃprāpya dhanuṣpāṇir māyāyogam ariṃdama 6.072.032c tasthau brahmavidhānena vijetuṃ raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19546: 6.072.033a vividham amalaśastrabhāsvaraṃ tad; dhvajagahanaṃ vipulaṃ mahārathaiś ca 6.072.033c pratibhayatamam aprameyavegaṃ; timiram iva dviṣatāṃ balaṃ viveśa 6.073.001a atha tasyām avasthāyāṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ rāvaṇānujaḥ 6.073.001c pareṣām ahitaṃ vākyam arthasādhakam abravīt 6.073.002a asyānīkasya mahato bhedane yatalakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:19548: 6.073.003a sa tvam indrāśaniprakhyaiḥ śarair avakiran parān
GE09ram_1-7u:19549: 6.073.003c abhidravāśu yāvad vai naitat karma samāpyate
GE09ram_1-7u:19555: 6.073.006c abhyadhāvanta sahitās tad anīkam avasthitam 6.073.007a rākṣasāś ca śitair bāṇair asibhiḥ śaktitomaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19557: 6.073.008a sa saṃprahāras tumulaḥ saṃjajñe kapirakṣasām 6.073.008c śabdena mahatā laṅkāṃ nādayan vai samantataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19558: 6.073.009a śastrair bahuvidhākāraiḥ śitair bāṇaiś ca pādapaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19559: 6.073.009c udyatair giriśṛṅgaiś ca ghorair ākāśam āvṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:19561: 6.073.010c niveśayantaḥ śastrāṇi cakrus te sumahad bhayam
GE09ram_1-7u:19562: 6.073.011a tathaiva sakalair vṛkṣair giriśṛṅgaiś ca vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19563: 6.073.011c abhijaghnur nijaghnuś ca samare rākṣasarṣabhān 6.073.012a ṛkṣavānaramukhyaiś ca mahākāyair mahābalaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19564: 6.073.012c rakṣasāṃ vadhyamānānāṃ mahad bhayam ajāyata 6.073.013a svam anīkaṃ viṣaṇṇaṃ tu śrutvā śatrubhir arditam
GE09ram_1-7u:19565: 6.073.013c udatiṣṭhata durdharṣas tat karmaṇy ananuṣṭhite 6.073.014a vṛkṣāndhakārān niṣkramya jātakrodhaḥ sa rāvaṇiḥ 6.073.014c āruroha rathaṃ sajjaṃ pūrvayuktaṃ sa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19567: 6.073.015c raktāsyanayanaḥ krūro babhau mṛtyur ivāntakaḥ 6.073.016a dṛṣṭvaiva tu rathasthaṃ taṃ paryavartata tad balam
GE09ram_1-7u:19569: 6.073.017a tasmin kāle tu hanumān udyamya sudurāsadam
GE09ram_1-7u:19571: 6.073.018a sa rākṣasānāṃ tat sainyaṃ kālāgnir iva nirdahan
GE09ram_1-7u:19572: 6.073.018c cakāra bahubhir vṛkṣair niḥsaṃjñaṃ yudhi vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19576: 6.073.020c śaktibhiḥ śaktihastāś ca paṭṭasaiḥ paṭṭasāyudhāḥ 6.073.021a parighaiś ca gadābhiś ca kuntaiś ca śubhadarśanaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19577: 6.073.021c śataśaś ca śataghnībhir āyasair api mudgaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19578: 6.073.022a ghoraiḥ paraśubhiś caiva bhiṇḍipālaiś ca rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19579: 6.073.022c muṣṭibhir vajravegaiś ca talair aśanisaṃnibhaiḥ 6.073.023a abhijaghnuḥ samāsādya samantāt parvatopamam
GE09ram_1-7u:19580: 6.073.023c teṣām api ca saṃkruddhaś cakāra kadanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:19581: 6.073.024a sa dadarśa kapiśreṣṭham acalopamam indrajit 6.073.024c sūdayānam amitraghnam amitrān pavanātmajam
GE09ram_1-7u:19582: 6.073.025a sa sārathim uvācedaṃ yāhi yatraiṣa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19583: 6.073.025c kṣayam eva hi naḥ kuryād rākṣasānām upekṣitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19584: 6.073.026a ity uktaḥ sārathis tena yayau yatra sa mārutiḥ 6.073.026c vahan paramadurdharṣaṃ sthitam indrajitaṃ rathe 6.073.027a so 'bhyupetya śarān khaḍgān paṭṭasāsiparaśvadhān
GE09ram_1-7u:19585: 6.073.027c abhyavarṣata durdharṣaḥ kapimūrdhni sa rākṣasaḥ 6.073.028a tāni śastrāṇi ghorāṇi pratigṛhya sa mārutiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19586: 6.073.028c roṣeṇa mahatāviṣo vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:19587: 6.073.029a yudhyasva yadi śūro 'si rāvaṇātmaja durmate 6.073.029c vāyuputraṃ samāsādya na jīvan pratiyāsyasi 6.073.030a bāhubhyāṃ saṃprayudhyasva yadi me dvandvam āhave
GE09ram_1-7u:19588: 6.073.030c vegaṃ sahasva durbuddhe tatas tvaṃ rakṣasāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19592: 6.073.032c sa eṣa ratham āsthāya hanūmantaṃ jighāṃsati
GE09ram_1-7u:19594: 6.073.033c jīvitāntakarair ghoraiḥ saumitre rāvaṇiṃ jahi 6.073.034a ity evam uktas tu tadā mahātmā; vibhīṣaṇenārivibhīṣaṇena
GE09ram_1-7u:19595: 6.073.034c dadarśa taṃ parvatasaṃnikāśaṃ; rathasthitaṃ bhīmabalaṃ durāsadam
GE09ram_1-7u:19596: 6.074.001a evam uktvā tu saumitriṃ jātaharṣo vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19597: 6.074.001c dhanuṣpāṇinam ādāya tvaramāṇo jagāma saḥ 6.074.002a avidūraṃ tato gatvā praviśya ca mahad vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:19598: 6.074.002c darśayām āsa tat karma lakṣmaṇāya vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19602: 6.074.004c upahṛtya tataḥ paścāt saṃgrāmam abhivartate 6.074.005a adṛśyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tato bhavati rākṣasaḥ 6.074.005c nihanti samare śatrūn badhnāti ca śarottamaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19603: 6.074.006a tam apraviṣṭaṃ nyagrodhaṃ balinaṃ rāvaṇātmajam 6.074.006c vidhvaṃsaya śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ sarathaṃ sāśvasārathim 6.074.007a tathety uktvā mahātejāḥ saumitrir mitranandanaḥ 6.074.007c babhūvāvasthitas tatra citraṃ visphārayan dhanuḥ 6.074.008a sa rathenāgnivarṇena balavān rāvaṇātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19604: 6.074.008c indrajit kavacī khaḍgī sadhvajaḥ pratyadṛśyata 6.074.009a tam uvāca mahātejāḥ paulastyam aparājitam 6.074.009c samāhvaye tvāṃ samare samyag yuddhaṃ prayaccha me
GE09ram_1-7u:19605: 6.074.010a evam ukto mahātejā manasvī rāvaṇātmajaḥ 6.074.010c abravīt paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ tatra dṛṣṭvā vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:19606: 6.074.011a iha tvaṃ jātasaṃvṛddhaḥ sākṣād bhrātā pitur mama
GE09ram_1-7u:19607: 6.074.011c kathaṃ druhyasi putrasya pitṛvyo mama rākṣasa
GE09ram_1-7u:19608: 6.074.012a na jñātitvaṃ na sauhārdaṃ na jātis tava durmate 6.074.012c pramāṇaṃ na ca sodaryaṃ na dharmo dharmadūṣaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:19609: 6.074.013a śocyas tvam asi durbuddhe nindanīyaś ca sādhubhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19610: 6.074.013c yas tvaṃ svajanam utsṛjya parabhṛtyatvam āgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19611: 6.074.014a naitac chithilayā buddhyā tvaṃ vetsi mahad antaram
GE09ram_1-7u:19612: 6.074.014c kva ca svajanasaṃvāsaḥ kva ca nīcaparāśrayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19613: 6.074.015a guṇavān vā parajanaḥ svajano nirguṇo 'pi vā
GE09ram_1-7u:19614: 6.074.015c nirguṇaḥ svajanaḥ śreyān yaḥ paraḥ para eva saḥ 6.074.016a niranukrośatā ceyaṃ yādṛśī te niśācara 6.074.016c svajanena tvayā śakyaṃ paruṣaṃ rāvaṇānuja 6.074.017a ity ukto bhrātṛputreṇa pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.074.017c ajānann iva macchīlaṃ kiṃ rākṣasa vikatthase
GE09ram_1-7u:19616: 6.074.018c kule yady apy ahaṃ jāto rakṣasāṃ krūrakarmaṇām
GE09ram_1-7u:19617: 6.074.018e guṇo 'yaṃ prathamo nṝṇāṃ tan me śīlam arākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:19618: 6.074.019a na rame dāruṇenāhaṃ na cādharmeṇa vai rame
GE09ram_1-7u:19619: 6.074.019c bhrātrā viṣamaśīlena kathaṃ bhrātā nirasyate 6.074.020a parasvānāṃ ca haraṇaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:19620: 6.074.020c suhṛdām atiśaṅkāṃ ca trayo doṣāḥ kṣayāvahāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19621: 6.074.021a maharṣīṇāṃ vadho ghoraḥ sarvadevaiś ca vigrahaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19622: 6.074.021c abhimānaś ca kopaś ca vairitvaṃ pratikūlatā
GE09ram_1-7u:19623: 6.074.022a ete doṣā mama bhrātur jīvitaiśvaryanāśanāḥ 6.074.022c guṇān pracchādayām āsuḥ parvatān iva toyadāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19624: 6.074.023a doṣair etaiḥ parityakto mayā bhrātā pitā tava
GE09ram_1-7u:19625: 6.074.023c neyam asti purī laṅkā na ca tvaṃ na ca te pitā 6.074.024a atimānī ca bālaś ca durvinītaś ca rākṣasa
GE09ram_1-7u:19626: 6.074.024c baddhas tvaṃ kālapāśena brūhi māṃ yad yad icchasi 6.074.025a adya te vyasanaṃ prāptaṃ kim iha tvaṃ tu vakṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:19627: 6.074.025c praveṣṭuṃ na tvayā śakyo nyagrodho rākṣasādhama
GE09ram_1-7u:19628: 6.074.026a dharṣayitvā tu kākutsthau na śakyaṃ jīvituṃ tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:19629: 6.074.026c yudhyasva naradevena lakṣmaṇena raṇe saha 6.074.026e hatas tvaṃ devatā kāryaṃ kariṣyasi yamakṣaye
GE09ram_1-7u:19630: 6.074.027a nidarśayasvātmabalaṃ samudyataṃ; kuruṣva sarvāyudhasāyakavyayam 6.074.027c na lakṣmaṇasyaitya hi bāṇagocaraṃ; tvam adya jīvan sabalo gamiṣyasi 6.075.001a vibhīṣaṇa vacaḥ śrutvā rāvaṇiḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ 6.075.001c abravīt paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ vegenābhyutpapāta ha 6.075.002a udyatāyudhanistriṃśo rathe tu samalaṃkṛte
GE09ram_1-7u:19632: 6.075.003a mahāpramāṇam udyamya vipulaṃ vegavad dṛḍham 6.075.003c dhanur bhīmaṃ parāmṛśya śarāṃś cāmitranāśanān 6.075.004a uvācainaṃ samārabdhaḥ saumitriṃ savibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:19633: 6.075.004c tāṃś ca vānaraśārdūlān paśyadhvaṃ me parākramam
GE09ram_1-7u:19635: 6.075.005c muktaṃ varṣam ivākāśe vārayiṣyatha saṃyuge 6.075.006a adya vo māmakā bāṇā mahākārmukaniḥsṛtāḥ 6.075.006c vidhamiṣyanti gātrāṇi tūlarāśim ivānalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19636: 6.075.007a tīkṣṇasāyakanirbhinnāñ śūlaśaktyṛṣṭitomaraiḥ 6.075.007c adya vo gamayiṣyāmi sarvān eva yamakṣayam
GE09ram_1-7u:19637: 6.075.008a kṣipataḥ śaravarṣāṇi kṣiprahastasya me yudhi 6.075.008c jīmūtasyeva nadataḥ kaḥ sthāsyati mamāgrataḥ 6.075.009a tac chrutvā rākṣasendrasya garjitaṃ lakṣmaṇas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:19638: 6.075.009c abhītavadanaḥ kruddho rāvaṇiṃ vākyam abravīt 6.075.010a uktaś ca durgamaḥ pāraḥ kāryāṇāṃ rākṣasa tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:19639: 6.075.010c kāryāṇāṃ karmaṇā pāraṃ yo gacchati sa buddhimān
GE09ram_1-7u:19640: 6.075.011a sa tvam arthasya hīnārtho duravāpasya kena cit
GE09ram_1-7u:19644: 6.075.013a yathā bāṇapathaṃ prāpya sthito 'haṃ tava rākṣasa 6.075.013c darśayasvādya tat tejo vācā tvaṃ kiṃ vikatthase
GE09ram_1-7u:19645: 6.075.014a evam ukto dhanur bhīmaṃ parāmṛśya mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19646: 6.075.014c sasarje niśitān bāṇān indrajit samijiṃjaya 6.075.015a te nisṛṣṭā mahāvegāḥ śarāḥ sarpaviṣopamāḥ 6.075.015c saṃprāpya lakṣmaṇaṃ petuḥ śvasanta iva pannagāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19648: 6.075.016c saumitrim indrajid yuddhe vivyādha śubhalakṣaṇam 6.075.017a sa śarair atividdhāṅgo rudhireṇa samukṣitaḥ 6.075.017c śuśubhe lakṣmaṇaḥ śrīmān vidhūma iva pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19649: 6.075.018a indrajit tv ātmanaḥ karma prasamīkṣyādhigamya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:19650: 6.075.018c vinadya sumahānādam idaṃ vacanam abravīt 6.075.019a patriṇaḥ śitadhārās te śarā matkārmukacyutāḥ 6.075.019c ādāsyante 'dya saumitre jīvitaṃ jīvitāntagāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19651: 6.075.020a adya gomāyusaṃghāś ca śyenasaṃghāś ca lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:19652: 6.075.020c gṛdhrāś ca nipatantu tvāṃ gatāsuṃ nihataṃ mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:19654: 6.075.021c bhaktaṃ bhrātaram adyaiva tvāṃ drakṣyati mayā hatam
GE09ram_1-7u:19656: 6.075.022c hṛtottamāṅgaṃ saumitre tvām adya nihataṃ mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:19657: 6.075.023a iti bruvāṇaṃ saṃrabdhaṃ paruṣaṃ rāvaṇātmajam 6.075.023c hetumadvākyam atyarthaṃ lakṣmaṇaḥ pratyuvāca ha 6.075.024a akṛtvā katthase karma kimartham iha rākṣasa
GE09ram_1-7u:19658: 6.075.024c kuru tat karma yenāhaṃ śraddadhyāṃ tava katthanam
GE09ram_1-7u:19659: 6.075.025a anuktvā paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ kiṃ cid apy anavakṣipan
GE09ram_1-7u:19660: 6.075.025c avikatthan vadhiṣyāmi tvāṃ paśya puruṣādana 6.075.026a ity uktvā pañcanārācān ākarṇāpūritāñ śarān 6.075.026c nicakhāna mahāvegāṃl lakṣmaṇo rākṣasorasi
GE09ram_1-7u:19661: 6.075.027a sa śarair āhatas tena saroṣo rāvaṇātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19662: 6.075.027c suprayuktais tribhir bāṇaiḥ prativivyādha lakṣmaṇam 6.075.028a sa babhūva mahābhīmo
GE09ram_1-7u:19664: 6.075.029a ubhau hi balasaṃpannāv ubhau vikramaśālinau 6.075.029c ubhāv api suvikrāntau
GE09ram_1-7u:19666: 6.075.030c yuyudhāte mahāvīrau grahāv iva nabho gatau
GE09ram_1-7u:19667: 6.075.031a balavṛtrāv iva hi tau yudhi vai duṣpradharṣaṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:19668: 6.075.031c yuyudhāte mahātmānau tadā kesariṇāv iva 6.075.032a bahūn avasṛjantau hi mārgaṇaughān avasthitau 6.075.032c nararākṣasasiṃhau tau prahṛṣṭāv abhyayudhyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:19669: 6.075.033a susaṃprahṛṣṭau nararākṣasottamau; jayaiṣiṇau mārgaṇacāpadhāriṇau 6.075.033c parasparaṃ tau pravavarṣatur bhṛśaṃ; śaraughavarṣeṇa balāhakāv iva
GE09ram_1-7u:19671: 6.076.001c sasarja rākṣasendrāya kruddhaḥ sarpa iva śvasan
GE09ram_1-7u:19672: 6.076.002a tasya jyātalanirghoṣaṃ sa śrutvā rāvaṇātmajaḥ 6.076.002c vivarṇavadano bhūtvā lakṣmaṇaṃ samudaikṣata
GE09ram_1-7u:19673: 6.076.003a taṃ viṣaṇṇamukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasaṃ rāvaṇātmajam 6.076.003c saumitriṃ yuddhasaṃsaktaṃ pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19674: 6.076.004a nimittāny anupaśyāmi yāny asmin rāvaṇātmaje 6.076.004c tvara tena mahābāho bhagna eṣa na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19675: 6.076.005a tataḥ saṃdhāya saumitriḥ śarān agniśikhopamān 6.076.005c mumoca niśitāṃs tasmai sarvān iva viṣolbaṇān
GE09ram_1-7u:19681: 6.076.008c abravīc cainam āsādya punaḥ sa paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19682: 6.076.009a kiṃ na smarasi tad yuddhe prathame matparākramam
GE09ram_1-7u:19683: 6.076.009c nibaddhas tvaṃ saha bhrātrā yadā yudhi viceṣṭase
GE09ram_1-7u:19684: 6.076.010a yuvā khalu mahāyuddhe śakrāśanisamaiḥ śaraiḥ 6.076.010c śāyinau prathamaṃ bhūmau visaṃjñau sapuraḥsarau 6.076.011a smṛtir vā nāsti te manye vyaktaṃ vā yamasādanam 6.076.011c gantum icchasi yasmāt tvaṃ māṃ dharṣayitum icchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:19685: 6.076.012a yadi te prathame yuddhe na dṛṣṭo matparākramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19686: 6.076.012c adya tvāṃ darśayiṣyāmi tiṣṭhedānīṃ vyavasthitaḥ 6.076.013a ity uktvā saptabhir bāṇair abhivivyādha lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:19687: 6.076.013c daśabhiś ca hanūmantaṃ tīkṣṇadhāraiḥ śarottamaiḥ 6.076.014a tataḥ śaraśatenaiva suprayuktena vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:19689: 6.076.015a tad dṛṣṭvendrajitaḥ karma kṛtaṃ rāmānujas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:19690: 6.076.015c acintayitvā prahasan naitat kiṃ cid iti bruvan
GE09ram_1-7u:19691: 6.076.016a mumoca sa śarān ghorān saṃgṛhya narapuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19692: 6.076.016c abhītavadanaḥ kruddho rāvaṇiṃ lakṣmaṇo yudhi 6.076.017a naivaṃ raṇagataḥ śūrāḥ praharanti niśācara 6.076.017c laghavaś cālpavīryāś ca sukhā hīme śarās tava
GE09ram_1-7u:19693: 6.076.018a naivaṃ śūrās tu yudhyante samare jayakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19694: 6.076.018c ity evaṃ taṃ bruvāṇas tu śaravarṣair avākirat
GE09ram_1-7u:19695: 6.076.019a tasya bāṇais tu vidhvastaṃ kavacaṃ hemabhūṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:19697: 6.076.020a vidhūtavarmā nārācair babhūva sa kṛtavraṇaḥ 6.076.020c indrajit samare śūraḥ prarūḍha iva sānumān
GE09ram_1-7u:19698: 6.076.021a abhīkṣṇaṃ niśvasantau hi yudhyetāṃ tumulaṃ yudhi
GE09ram_1-7u:19700: 6.076.022a astrāṇy astravidāṃ śreṣṭhau darśayantau punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19702: 6.076.023a vyapetadoṣam asyantau laghucitraṃ ca suṣṭhu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:19703: 6.076.023c ubhau tu tumulaṃ ghoraṃ cakratur nararākṣasau
GE09ram_1-7u:19704: 6.076.024a tayoḥ pṛthakpṛthag bhīmaḥ śuśruve talanisvanaḥ 6.076.024c sughorayor niṣṭanator gagane meghayor iva 6.076.025a te gātrayor nipatitā rukmapuṅkhāḥ śarā yudhi
GE09ram_1-7u:19706: 6.076.026a anyaiḥ suniśitaiḥ śastrair ākāśe saṃjaghaṭṭire 6.076.026c babhañjuś cicchiduś cāpi tayor bāṇāḥ sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19707: 6.076.027a sa babhūva raṇe ghoras tayor bāṇamayaś cayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19708: 6.076.027c agnibhyām iva dīptābhyāṃ satre kuśamayaś cayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19709: 6.076.028a tayoḥ kṛtavraṇau dehau śuśubhāte mahātmanoḥ 6.076.028c sapuṣpāv iva niṣpatrau vane śālmalikuṃśukau 6.076.029a cakratus tumulaṃ ghoraṃ saṃnipātaṃ muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19711: 6.076.030a lakṣmaṇo rāvaṇiṃ yuddhe rāvaṇiś cāpi lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:19712: 6.076.030c anyonyaṃ tāv abhighnantau na śramaṃ pratyapadyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:19714: 6.076.031c śuśubhāte mahāvīrau virūḍhāv iva parvatau 6.076.032a tayo rudhirasiktāni saṃvṛtāni śarair bhṛśam 6.076.032c babhrājuḥ sarvagātrāṇi jvalanta iva pāvakāḥ 6.076.033a tayor atha mahān kālo vyatīyād yudhyamānayoḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19715: 6.076.033c na ca tau yuddhavaimukhyaṃ śramaṃ vāpy upajagmatuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19716: 6.076.034a atha samarapariśramaṃ nihantuṃ; samaramukheṣv ajitasya lakṣmaṇasya
GE09ram_1-7u:19717: 6.076.034c priyahitam upapādayan mahaujāḥ; samaram upetya vibhīṣaṇo
GE09ram_1-7u:19719: 6.077.001a yudhyamānau tu tau dṛṣṭvā prasaktau nararākṣasau
GE09ram_1-7u:19720: 6.077.001c śūraḥ sa rāvaṇabhrātā tasthau saṃgrāmamūrdhani 6.077.002a tato visphārayām āsa mahad dhanur avasthitaḥ
