GE09ram_1-7u:19721: 6.077.002c utsasarja ca tīkṣṇāgrān rākṣaseṣu mahāśarān 6.077.003a te śarāḥ śikhisaṃkāśā nipatantaḥ samāhitāḥ 6.077.003c rākṣasān dārayām āsur vajrā iva mahāgirīn
GE09ram_1-7u:19723: 6.077.004c ciccheduḥ samare vīrān rākṣasān rākṣasottamāḥ 6.077.005a rākṣasais taiḥ parivṛtaḥ sa tadā tu vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19724: 6.077.005c babhau madhye prahṛṣṭānāṃ kalabhānām iva dvipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19725: 6.077.006a tataḥ saṃcodayāno vai harīn rakṣoraṇapriyān 6.077.006c uvāca vacanaṃ kāle kālajño rakṣasāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19727: 6.077.007c etac cheṣaṃ balaṃ tasya kiṃ tiṣṭhata harīśvarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19728: 6.077.008a asmin vinihate pāpe rākṣase raṇamūrdhani 6.077.008c rāvaṇaṃ varjayitvā tu śeṣam asya balaṃ hatam
GE09ram_1-7u:19729: 6.077.009a prahasto nihato vīro nikumbhaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19730: 6.077.009c kumbhakarṇaś ca kumbhaś ca dhūmrākṣaś ca niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19731: 6.077.010a akampanaḥ supārśvaś ca cakramālī ca rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19734: 6.077.011c bāhubhyāṃ sāgaraṃ tīrtvā laṅghyatāṃ goṣpadaṃ laghu
GE09ram_1-7u:19735: 6.077.012a etāvad iha śeṣaṃ vo jetavyam iha vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19736: 6.077.012c hatāḥ sarve samāgamya rākṣasā baladarpitāḥ 6.077.013a ayuktaṃ nidhanaṃ kartuṃ putrasya janitur mama
GE09ram_1-7u:19737: 6.077.013c ghṛṇām apāsya rāmārthe nihanyāṃ bhrātur ātmajam
GE09ram_1-7u:19738: 6.077.014a hantukāmasya me bāṣpaṃ cakśuś caiva nirudhyate
GE09ram_1-7u:19739: 6.077.014c tad evaiṣa mahābāhur lakṣmaṇaḥ śamayiṣyati 6.077.014e vānarā ghnantuṃ saṃbhūya bhṛtyān asya samīpagān
GE09ram_1-7u:19741: 6.077.015c vānarendrā jahṛṣire lāṅgalāni ca vivyadhuḥ 6.077.016a tatas te kapiśārdūlāḥ kṣveḍantaś ca muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19742: 6.077.016c mumucur vividhān nādān meghān dṛṣṭveva barhiṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19743: 6.077.017a jāmbavān api taiḥ sarvaiḥ svayūthair abhisaṃvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19744: 6.077.017c aśmabhis tāḍayām āsa nakhair dantaiś ca rākṣasān
GE09ram_1-7u:19745: 6.077.018a nighnantam ṛkṣādhipatiṃ rākṣasās te mahābalāḥ 6.077.018c parivavrur bhayaṃ tyaktvā tam anekavidhāyudhāḥ 6.077.019a śaraiḥ paraśubhis tīkṣṇaiḥ paṭṭasair yaṣṭitomaraiḥ 6.077.019c jāmbavantaṃ mṛdhe jaghnur nighnantaṃ rākṣasīṃ camūm
GE09ram_1-7u:19746: 6.077.020a sa saṃprahāras tumulaḥ saṃjajñe kapirākṣasām 6.077.020c devāsurāṇāṃ kruddhānāṃ yathā bhīmo mahāsvanaḥ 6.077.021a hanūmān api saṃkruddhaḥ sālam utpāṭya parvatāt
GE09ram_1-7u:19747: 6.077.021c rakṣasāṃ kadanaṃ cakre samāsādya sahasraśaḥ 6.077.022a sa dattvā tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ pitṛvyasyendrajid yudhi
GE09ram_1-7u:19749: 6.077.023a tau prayuddhau tadā vīrau mṛdhe lakṣmaṇarākṣasau
GE09ram_1-7u:19750: 6.077.023c śaraughān abhivarṣantau jaghnatus tau parasparam 6.077.024a abhīkṣṇam antardadhatuḥ śarajālair mahābalau
GE09ram_1-7u:19751: 6.077.024c candrādityāv ivoṣṇānte yathā meghais tarasvinau 6.077.025a na hy ādānaṃ na saṃdhānaṃ dhanuṣo vā parigrahaḥ 6.077.025c na vipramokṣo bāṇānāṃ na vikarṣo na vigrahaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19753: 6.077.026c adṛśyata tayos tatra yudhyatoḥ pāṇilāghavāt 6.077.027a cāpavegapramuktaiś ca bāṇajālaiḥ samantataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19755: 6.077.027e tamasā pihitaṃ sarvam āsīd bhīmataraṃ mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:19756: 6.077.028a na tadānīiṃ vavau vāyur na jajvāla ca pāvakaḥ 6.077.028c svastyas tu lokebhya iti jajalpaś ca maharṣayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19757: 6.077.028e saṃpetuś cātra saṃprāptā gandharvāḥ saha cāraṇaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19759: 6.077.029c śaraiś caturbhiḥ saumitrir vivyādha caturo hayān
GE09ram_1-7u:19761: 6.077.030c lāghavād rāghavaḥ śrīmāñ śiraḥ kāyād apāharat
GE09ram_1-7u:19762: 6.077.031a nihataṃ sārathiṃ dṛṣṭvā samare rāvaṇātmajaḥ 6.077.031c prajahau samaroddharṣaṃ viṣaṇṇaḥ sa babhūva ha
GE09ram_1-7u:19765: 6.077.033a tataḥ pramāthī śarabho rabhaso gandhamādanaḥ 6.077.033c amṛṣyamāṇāś catvāraś cakrur vegaṃ harīśvarāḥ 6.077.034a te cāsya hayamukhyeṣu tūrṇam utpatya vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19767: 6.077.035a teṣām adhiṣṭhitānāṃ tair vānaraiḥ parvatopamaiḥ 6.077.035c mukhebhyo rudhiraṃ vyaktaṃ hayānāṃ samavartata 6.077.036a te nihatya hayāṃs tasya pramathya ca mahāratham
GE09ram_1-7u:19768: 6.077.036c punar utpatya vegena tasthur lakṣmaṇapārśvataḥ 6.077.037a sa hatāśvād avaplutya rathān mathitasāratheḥ 6.077.037c śaravarṣeṇa saumitrim abhyadhāvata rāvaṇiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19769: 6.077.038a tato mahendrapratimaṃh sa lakṣmaṇaḥ; padātinaṃ taṃ niśitaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19771: 6.077.038c sṛjantam ādau niśitāñ śarottamān; bhṛśaṃ tadā bāṇagaṇair
GE09ram_1-7u:19773: 6.078.001a sa hatāśvo mahātejā bhūmau tiṣṭhan niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19775: 6.078.002a tau dhanvinau jighāṃsantāv anyonyam iṣubhir bhṛśam
GE09ram_1-7u:19778: 6.078.003c bhartāraṃ na jahur yuddhe saṃpatantas tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19779: 6.078.004a sa lakṣmaṇaṃ samuddiśya paraṃ lāghavam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19781: 6.078.005a muktam indrajitā tat tu śaravarṣam ariṃdamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19784: 6.078.006c lalāṭe lakṣmaṇaṃ bāṇaiḥ supuṅkhais tribhir indrajit
GE09ram_1-7u:19785: 6.078.006e avidhyat paramakruddhaḥ śīghram astraṃ pradarśayan 6.078.007a taiḥ pṛṣatkair lalāṭasthaiḥ śuśubhe raghunandanaḥ 6.078.007c raṇāgre samaraślāghī triśṛṅga iva parvataḥ 6.078.008a sa tathāpy ardito bāṇai rākṣasena mahāmṛdhe
GE09ram_1-7u:19786: 6.078.008c tam āśu prativivyādha lakṣmaṇaḥ panabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19788: 6.078.009c anyonyaṃ jaghnatur bāṇair viśikhair bhīmavikramau 6.078.010a tau parasparam abhyetya sarvagātreṣu dhanvinau 6.078.010c ghorair vivyadhatur bāṇaiḥ kṛtabhāvāv ubhau jaye
GE09ram_1-7u:19789: 6.078.011a tasmai dṛḍhataraṃ kruddho hatāśvāya vibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.078.011c vajrasparśasamān pañca sasarjorasi mārgaṇān
GE09ram_1-7u:19790: 6.078.012a te tasya kāyaṃ nirbhidya rukmapuṅkhā nimittagāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19791: 6.078.012c babhūvur lohitādigdhā rakṭā iva mahoragāḥ 6.078.013a sa pitṛvyasya saṃkruddha indrajic charam ādade
GE09ram_1-7u:19792: 6.078.013c uttamaṃ rakṣasāṃ madhye yamadattaṃ mahābalaḥ 6.078.014a taṃ samīkṣya mahātejā maheṣuṃ tena saṃhitam
GE09ram_1-7u:19794: 6.078.015a kubereṇa svayaṃ svapne yad dattam amitātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:19795: 6.078.015c durjayaṃ durviṣahyaṃ ca sendrair api surāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19796: 6.078.016a tābhyāṃ tau dhanuṣi śreṣṭhe saṃhitau sāyakottamau
GE09ram_1-7u:19797: 6.078.016c vikṛṣyamāṇau vīrābhyāṃ bhṛśaṃ jajvalatuḥ śriyā 6.078.017a tau bhāsayantāv ākāśaṃ dhanurbhyāṃ viśikhau cyutau
GE09ram_1-7u:19798: 6.078.017c mukhena mukham āhatya saṃnipetatur ojasā 6.078.018a tau mahāgrahasaṃkāśāv anyonyaṃ saṃnipatya ca 6.078.018c saṃgrāme śatadhā yātau medinyāṃ vinipetatuḥ 6.078.019a śarau pratihatau dṛṣṭvā tāv ubhau raṇamūrdhani
GE09ram_1-7u:19799: 6.078.019c vrīḍito jātaroṣau ca lakṣmaṇendrajitāv ubhau 6.078.020a susaṃrabdhas tu saumitrir astraṃ vāruṇam ādade
GE09ram_1-7u:19800: 6.078.020c raudraṃ mahedrajid yuddhe vyasṛjad yudhi viṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19804: 6.078.022c bhūtair bahubhir ākāśaṃ vismitair āvṛtaṃ babhau
GE09ram_1-7u:19805: 6.078.023a ṛṣayaḥ pitaro devā gandharvā garuṇoragāḥ 6.078.023c śatakratuṃ puraskṛtya rarakṣur lakṣmaṇaṃ raṇe 6.078.024a athānyaṃ mārgaṇaśreṣṭhaṃ saṃdadhe rāvaṇānujaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19810: 6.078.027a yena śakro mahātejā dānavān ajayat prabhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19811: 6.078.027c purā devāsure yuddhe vīryavān harivāhanaḥ 6.078.028a tad aindram astraṃ saumitriḥ saṃyugeṣv aparājitam
GE09ram_1-7u:19814: 6.078.029c sajyam āyamya durdharśaḥ kālo lokakṣaye yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:19815: 6.078.030a saṃdhāya dhanuṣi śreṣṭhe vikarṣann idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:19816: 6.078.030c lakṣmīvāṃl lakṣmaṇo vākyam arthasādhakam ātmanaḥ 6.078.031a dharmātmā satyasaṃdhaś ca rāmo dāśarathir yadi
GE09ram_1-7u:19817: 6.078.031c pauruṣe cāpratidvandvas tad enaṃ jahi rāvaṇim
GE09ram_1-7u:19818: 6.078.032a ity uktvā bāṇam ākarṇaṃ vikṛṣya tam ajihmagam
GE09ram_1-7u:19819: 6.078.032c lakṣmaṇaḥ samare vīraḥ sasarjendrajitaṃ prati 6.078.032e aindrāstreṇa samāyujya lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā
GE09ram_1-7u:19820: 6.078.033a tac chiraḥ saśiras trāṇaṃ śrīmaj jvalitakuṇḍalam
GE09ram_1-7u:19822: 6.078.034a tad rākṣasatanūjasya chinnaskandhaṃ śiro mahat 6.078.034c tapanīyanibhaṃ bhūmau dadṛśe rudhirokṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:19823: 6.078.035a hatas tu nipapātāśu dharaṇyāṃ rāvaṇātmajaḥ 6.078.035c kavacī saśirastrāṇo vidhvastaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19824: 6.078.036a cukruśus te tataḥ sarve vānarāḥ savibhīṣaṇāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19825: 6.078.036c hṛṣyanto nihate tasmin devā vṛtravadhe yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:19826: 6.078.037a athāntarikṣe bhūtānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca mahātmanām 6.078.037c abhijajñe ca saṃnādo gandharvāpsarasām api 6.078.038a patitaṃ samabhijñāya rākṣasī sā mahācamūḥ 6.078.038c vadhyamānā diśo bheje haribhir jitakāśibhiḥ 6.078.039a vanarair vadhyamānās te śastrāṇy utsṛjya rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19827: 6.078.039c laṅkām abhimukhāḥ sarve naṣṭasaṃjñāḥ pradhāvitāḥ 6.078.040a dudruvur bahudhā bhītā rākṣasāḥ śataśo diśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19829: 6.078.041a ke cil laṅkāṃ paritrastāḥ praviṣṭā vānarārditāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19830: 6.078.041c samudre patitāḥ ke cit ke cit parvatam āśritāḥ 6.078.042a hatam indrajitaṃ dṛṣṭvā śayānaṃ samarakṣitau 6.078.042c rākṣasānāṃ sahasreṣu na kaś cit pratyadṛśyata
GE09ram_1-7u:19831: 6.078.043a yathāstaṃ gata āditye nāvatiṣṭhanti raśmayaḥ 6.078.043c tathā tasmin nipatite rākṣasās te gatā diśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19832: 6.078.044a śāntarakśmir ivādityo nirvāṇa iva pāvakaḥ 6.078.044c sa babhūva mahātejā vyapāsta gatajīvitaḥ 6.078.045a praśāntapīḍā bahulo vinaṣṭāriḥ praharṣavān
GE09ram_1-7u:19833: 6.078.045c babhūva lokaḥ patite rākṣasendrasute tadā 6.078.046a harṣaṃ ca śakro bhagavān saha sarvaiḥ surarṣabhaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19834: 6.078.046c jagāma nihate tasmin rākṣase pāpakarmaṇi 6.078.047a śuddhā āpo nabhaś caiva jahṛṣur daityadānavāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19836: 6.078.048a ūcuś ca sahitāḥ sarve devagandharvadānavāḥ 6.078.048c vijvarāḥ śāntakaluṣā brāhmaṇā vicarantv iti 6.078.049a tato 'bhyanandan saṃhṛṣṭāḥ samare hariyūthapāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19837: 6.078.049c tam apratibalaṃ dṛṣṭvā hataṃ nairṛtapuṃgavam 6.078.050a vibhīṣaṇo hanūmāṃś ca jāmbavāṃś carkṣayūthapaḥ 6.078.050c vijayenābhinandantas tuṣṭuvuś cāpi lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:19838: 6.078.051a kṣveḍantaś ca nadantaś ca garjantaś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19840: 6.078.052a lāṅgūlāni pravidhyantaḥ sphoṭayantaś ca vānarāḥ 6.078.052c lakṣmaṇo jayatīty evaṃ vākyaṃ vyaśrāvayaṃs tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:19841: 6.078.053a anyonyaṃ ca samāśliṣya kapayo hṛṣṭamānasāḥ 6.078.053c cakrur uccāvacaguṇā rāghavāśrayajāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19842: 6.078.054a tad asukaram athābhivīkṣya hṛṣṭāḥ; priyasuhṛdo yudhi lakṣmaṇasya karma 6.078.054c paramam upalabhan manaḥpraharṣaṃ; vinihatam indraripuṃ niśamya
GE09ram_1-7u:19845: 6.079.001c babhūva hṛṣṭas taṃ hatvā śakrajetāram āhave
GE09ram_1-7u:19846: 6.079.002a tataḥ sa jāmbavantaṃ ca hanūmantaṃ ca vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:19847: 6.079.002c saṃnivartya mahātejās tāṃś ca sarvān vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19848: 6.079.003a ājagāma tataḥ śīghraṃ yatra sugrīvarāghavau 6.079.003c vibhīṣaṇam avaṣṭabhya hanūmantaṃ ca lakṣmaṇaḥ 6.079.004a tato rāmam abhikramya saumitrir abhivādya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:19850: 6.079.004e ācacakṣe tadā vīro ghoram indrajito vadham
GE09ram_1-7u:19851: 6.079.005a rāvaṇas tu śiraś chinnaṃ lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:19852: 6.079.005c nyavedayata rāmāya tadā hṛṣṭo vibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.079.006a upaveśya tam utsaṅge pariṣvajyāvapīḍitam
GE09ram_1-7u:19853: 6.079.006c mūrdhni cainam upāghrāya bhūyaḥ saṃspṛśya ca tvaran
GE09ram_1-7u:19854: 6.079.006e uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ vākyam āśvāsya puruṣarṣabhaḥ 6.079.007a kṛtaṃ paramakalyāṇaṃ karma duṣkarakāriṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:19855: 6.079.007c niramitraḥ kṛto 'smy adya niryāsyati hi rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19856: 6.079.007e balavyūhena mahatā śrutvā putraṃ nipātitam 6.079.008a taṃ putravadhasaṃtaptaṃ niryāntaṃ rākṣasādhipam
GE09ram_1-7u:19858: 6.079.009a tvayā lakṣmaṇa nāthena sītā ca pṛthivī ca me 6.079.009c na duṣprāpā hate tv adya śakrajetari cāhave
GE09ram_1-7u:19859: 6.079.010a sa taṃ bhrātaram āśvāsya pāriṣvajya ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19860: 6.079.010c rāmaḥ suṣeṇaṃ muditaḥ samābhāṣyedam abravīt 6.079.011a saśalyo 'yaṃ mahāprājñaḥ saumitrir mitravatsalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19861: 6.079.011c yathā bhavati susvasthas tathā tvaṃ samupācara
GE09ram_1-7u:19862: 6.079.011e viśalyaḥ kriyatāṃ kṣipraṃ saumitriḥ savibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.079.012a kṛṣa vānarasainyānāṃ śūrāṇāṃ drumayodhinām
GE09ram_1-7u:19863: 6.079.012c ye cānye 'tra ca yudhyantaḥ saśalyā vraṇinas tathā 6.079.012e te 'pi sarve prayatnena kriyantāṃ sukhinas tvayā 6.079.013a evam uktaḥ sa rāmeṇa mahātmā hariyūthapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19864: 6.079.013c lakṣmaṇāya dadau nastaḥ suṣeṇaḥ paramauṣadham 6.079.014a sa tasya gandham āghrāya viśalyaḥ samapadyata
GE09ram_1-7u:19865: 6.079.014c tadā nirvedanaś caiva saṃrūḍhavraṇa eva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:19866: 6.079.015a vibhīṣaṇa mukhānāṃ ca suhṛdāṃ rāghavājñayā 6.079.015c sarvavānaramukhyānāṃ cikitsāṃ sa tadākarot
GE09ram_1-7u:19867: 6.079.016a tataḥ prakṛtim āpanno hṛtaśalyo gatavyathaḥ 6.079.016c saumitrir muditas tatra kṣaṇena vigatajvaraḥ 6.079.017a tathaiva rāmaḥ plavagādhipas tadā; vibhīṣaṇaś carkṣapatiś ca
GE09ram_1-7u:19869: 6.079.017c avekṣya saumitrim arogam utthitaṃ; mudā sasainyaḥ suciraṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:19871: 6.079.018a apūjayat karma sa lakṣmaṇasya; suduṣkaraṃ dāśarathir mahātmā
GE09ram_1-7u:19872: 6.079.018c hṛṣṭā babhūvur yudhi yūthapendrā; niśamya taṃ śakrajitaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:19874: 6.080.001a tataḥ paulastya sacivāḥ śrutvā cendrajitaṃ hatam
GE09ram_1-7u:19876: 6.080.002a yuddhe hato mahārāja lakṣmaṇena tavātmajaḥ 6.080.002c vibhīṣaṇasahāyena miṣatāṃ no mahādyute
GE09ram_1-7u:19877: 6.080.003a śūraḥ śūreṇa saṃgamya saṃyugeṣv aparājitaḥ 6.080.003c lakṣṇanena hataḥ śūraḥ putras te vibudhendrajit
GE09ram_1-7u:19878: 6.080.004a sa taṃ pratibhayaṃ śrutvā vadhaṃ putrasya dāruṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:19879: 6.080.004c ghoram indrajitaḥ saṃkhye kaśmalaṃ prāviśan mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:19880: 6.080.005a upalabhya cirāt saṃjñāṃ rājā rākṣasapuṃgavaḥ 6.080.005c putraśokārdito dīno
GE09ram_1-7u:19881: 6.080.006a hā rākṣasacamūmukhya mama vatsa mahāratha 6.080.006c jitvendraṃ katham adya tvaṃ lakṣmaṇasya vaśaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19882: 6.080.007a nanu tvam iṣubhiḥ kruddho bhindyāḥ kālāntakāv api
GE09ram_1-7u:19883: 6.080.007c mandarasyāpi śṛṅgāṇi kiṃ punar lakṣmaṇaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:19884: 6.080.008a adya vaivasvato rājā bhūyo bahumato mama
GE09ram_1-7u:19885: 6.080.008c yenādya tvaṃ mahābāho saṃyuktaḥ kāladharmaṇā 6.080.009a eṣa panthāḥ suyodhānāṃ sarvāmaragaṇeṣv api 6.080.009c yaḥ kṛte hanyate bhartuḥ sa pumān svargam ṛcchati 6.080.010a adya devagaṇāḥ sarve lokapālās tatharṣayaḥ 6.080.010c hatam indrajitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sukhaṃ svapsyanti nirbhayāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19886: 6.080.011a adya lokās trayaḥ kṛtsnāḥ pṛthivī ca sakānanā
GE09ram_1-7u:19887: 6.080.011c ekenendrajitā hīnā śūṇyeva pratibhāti me 6.080.012a adya nairṛtakanyāyāṃ śroṣyāmy antaḥpure ravam 6.080.012c kareṇusaṃghasya yathā ninādaṃ girigahvare
GE09ram_1-7u:19888: 6.080.013a yauvarājyaṃ ca laṅkāṃ ca rakṣāṃsi ca paraṃtapa
GE09ram_1-7u:19889: 6.080.013c mātaraṃ māṃ ca bhāryāṃ ca kva gato 'si vihāya naḥ 6.080.014a mama nāma tvayā vīra gatasya yamasādanam
GE09ram_1-7u:19890: 6.080.014c pretakāryāṇi kāryāṇi viparīte hi vartase 6.080.015a sa tvaṃ jīvati sugrīve rāghave ca salakṣmaṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:19891: 6.080.015c mama śalyam anuddhṛtya kva gato 'si vihāya naḥ 6.080.016a evamādivilāpārtaṃ rāvaṇaṃ rākṣasādhipam
GE09ram_1-7u:19893: 6.080.017a ghoraṃ prakṛtyā rūpaṃ tat tasya krodhāgnimūrchitam
GE09ram_1-7u:19894: 6.080.017c babhūva rūpaṃ rudrasya kruddhasyeva durāsadam 6.080.018a tasya kruddhasya netrābhyāṃ prāpatann asrabindavaḥ 6.080.018c dīptābhyām iva dīpābhyāṃ sārciṣaḥ snehabindavaḥ 6.080.019a dantān vidaśatas tasya śrūyate daśanasvanaḥ 6.080.019c yantrasyāveṣṭyamānasya mahato dānavair iva
GE09ram_1-7u:19895: 6.080.020a kālāgnir iva saṃkruddho yāṃ yāṃ diśam avaikṣata
GE09ram_1-7u:19896: 6.080.020c tasyāṃ tasyāṃ bhayatrastā rākṣasāḥ saṃnililyire 6.080.021a tam antakam iva kruddhaṃ carācaracikhādiṣum 6.080.021c vīkṣamāṇaṃ diśaḥ sarvā rākṣasā nopacakramuḥ 6.080.022a tataḥ paramasaṃkruddho rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19897: 6.080.022c abravīd rakṣasāṃ madhye saṃstambhayiṣur āhave 6.080.023a mayā varṣasahasrāṇi caritvā duścaraṃ tapaḥ 6.080.023c teṣu teṣv avakāśeṣu svayambhūḥ paritoṣitaḥ 6.080.024a tasyaiva tapaso vyuṣṭyā prasādāc ca svayambhuvaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19898: 6.080.024c nāsurebhyo na devebhyo bhayaṃ mama kadā cana
GE09ram_1-7u:19899: 6.080.025a kavacaṃ brahmadattaṃ me yad ādityasamaprabham 6.080.025c devāsuravimardeṣu na bhinnaṃ vajraśaktibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19900: 6.080.026a tena mām adya saṃyuktaṃ rathastham iha saṃyuge
GE09ram_1-7u:19901: 6.080.026c pratīyāt ko 'dya mām ājau sākṣād api puraṃdaraḥ 6.080.027a yat tadābhiprasannena saśaraṃ kārmukaṃ mahat 6.080.027c devāsuravimardeṣu mama dattaṃ svayambhuvā
GE09ram_1-7u:19902: 6.080.028a adya tūryaśatair bhīmaṃ dhanur utthāpyatāṃ mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:19904: 6.080.029a sa putravadhasaṃtaptaḥ śūraḥ krodhavaśaṃ gataḥ 6.080.029c samīkṣya rāvaṇo buddhyā sītāṃ hantuṃ vyavasyata
GE09ram_1-7u:19905: 6.080.030a pratyavekṣya tu tāmrākṣaḥ sughoro ghoradarśanān 6.080.030c dīno dīnasvarān sarvāṃs tān uvāca niśācarān
GE09ram_1-7u:19906: 6.080.031a māyayā mama vatsena vañcanārthaṃ vanaukasām 6.080.031c kiṃ cid eva hataṃ tatra sīteyam iti darśitam 6.080.032a tad idaṃ satyam evāhaṃ kariṣye priyam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19908: 6.080.032e ity evam uktvā sacivān khaḍgam āśu parāmṛśat
GE09ram_1-7u:19910: 6.080.033c niṣpapāta sa vegena sabhāyāḥ sacivair vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19912: 6.080.034c saṃkruddhaḥ khaḍgam ādāya sahasā yatra maithilī
GE09ram_1-7u:19913: 6.080.035a vrajantaṃ rākṣasaṃ prekṣya siṃhanādaṃ pracukruśuḥ 6.080.035c ūcuś cānyonyam āśliṣya saṃkruddhaṃ prekṣya rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19914: 6.080.036a adyainaṃ tāv ubhau dṛṣṭvā bhrātarau pravyathiṣyataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19915: 6.080.036c lokapālā hi catvāraḥ kruddhenānena nirjitāḥ 6.080.036e bahavaḥ śatravaś cānye saṃyugeṣv abhipātitāḥ 6.080.037a teṣāṃ saṃjalpamānānām aśokavanikāṃ gatām
GE09ram_1-7u:19918: 6.080.038c abhyadhāvata saṃkruddhaḥ khe graho rohiṇīm iva
GE09ram_1-7u:19919: 6.080.039a maithilī rakṣyamāṇā tu rākṣasībhir aninditā 6.080.039c dadarśa rākṣasaṃ kruddhaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:19920: 6.080.040a taṃ niśāmya sanistriṃśaṃ vyathitā janakātmajā 6.080.040c nivāryamāṇaṃ bahuśaḥ suhṛdbhir anivartinam
GE09ram_1-7u:19921: 6.080.041a yathāyaṃ mām abhikruddhaḥ samabhidravati svayam 6.080.041c vadhiṣyati sanāthāṃ mām anāthām iva durmatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19922: 6.080.042a bahuśaś codayām āsa bhartāraṃ mām anuvratām
GE09ram_1-7u:19924: 6.080.043a so 'yaṃ mām anupasthānād vyaktaṃ nairāśyam āgataḥ 6.080.043c krodhamohasamāviṣṭo nihantuṃ māṃ samudyataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19925: 6.080.044a atha vā tau naravyāghrau bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:19927: 6.080.044e aho dhin mannimitto 'yaṃ vināśo rājaputrayoḥ 6.080.045a hanūmato hi tadvākyaṃ na kṛtaṃ kṣudrayā mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:19928: 6.080.045c yady ahaṃ tasya pṛṣṭhena tadāyāsam aninditā
GE09ram_1-7u:19929: 6.080.045e nādyaivam anuśoceyaṃ bhartur aṅkagatā satī 6.080.046a manye tu hṛdayaṃ tasyāḥ kausalyāyāḥ phaliṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:19930: 6.080.046c ekaputrā yadā putraṃ vinaṣṭaṃ śroṣyate yudhi
GE09ram_1-7u:19931: 6.080.047a sā hi janma ca bālyaṃ ca yauvanaṃ ca mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19932: 6.080.047c dharmakāryāṇi rūpaṃ ca rudatī saṃsramiṣyati 6.080.048a nirāśā nihate putre dattvā śrāddham acetanā
GE09ram_1-7u:19933: 6.080.048c agnim ārokṣyate nūnam apo vāpi pravekṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:19934: 6.080.049a dhig astu kubjām asatīṃ mantharāṃ pāpaniścayām
GE09ram_1-7u:19935: 6.080.049c yannimittam idaṃ duḥkhaṃ kausalyā pratipatsyate 6.080.050a ity evaṃ maithilīṃ dṛṣṭvā vilapantīṃ tapasvinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:19936: 6.080.050c rohiṇīm iva candreṇa vinā grahavaśaṃ gatām
GE09ram_1-7u:19937: 6.080.051a supārśvo nāma medhāvī rāvaṇaṃ rākṣaseśvaram 6.080.051c nivāryamāṇaṃ sacivair idaṃ vacanam abravīt 6.080.052a kathaṃ nāma daśagrīva sākṣād vaiśravaṇānuja 6.080.052c hantum icchasi vaidehīṃ krodhād dharmam apāsya hi
GE09ram_1-7u:19938: 6.080.053a veda vidyāvrata snātaḥ svadharmanirataḥ sadā 6.080.053c striyāḥ kasmād vadhaṃ vīra manyase rākṣaseśvara
GE09ram_1-7u:19940: 6.080.054c tvam eva tu sahāsmābhī rāghave krodham utsṛja
GE09ram_1-7u:19942: 6.080.055c kṛtvā niryāhy amāvāsyāṃ vijayāya balair vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19943: 6.080.056a śūro dhīmān rathī khaḍgī rathapravaram āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19944: 6.080.056c hatvā dāśarathiṃ rāmaṃ bhavān prāpsyati maithilīm
GE09ram_1-7u:19945: 6.080.057a sa tad durātmā suhṛdā niveditaṃ; vacaḥ sudharmyaṃ pratigṛhya
GE09ram_1-7u:19947: 6.080.057c gṛhaṃ jagāmātha tataś ca vīryavān; punaḥ sabhāṃ ca prayayau suhṛdvṛtaḥ 6.081.001a sa praviśya sabhāṃ rājā dīnaḥ paramaduḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19948: 6.081.001c niṣasādāsane mukhye siṃhaḥ kruddha iva śvasan
GE09ram_1-7u:19949: 6.081.002a abravīc ca tadā sarvān balamukhyān mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19951: 6.081.003a sarve bhavantaḥ sarveṇa hastyaśvena samāvṛtāḥ 6.081.003c niryāntu rathasaṃghaiś ca pādātaiś copaśobhitāḥ 6.081.004a ekaṃ rāmaṃ parikṣipya samare hantum arhatha
GE09ram_1-7u:19953: 6.081.005a atha vāhaṃ śarair tīṣkṇair bhinnagātraṃ mahāraṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:19954: 6.081.005c bhavadbhiḥ śvo nihantāsmi rāmaṃ lokasya paśyataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19955: 6.081.006a ity evaṃ rākṣasendrasya vākyam ādāya rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19956: 6.081.006c niryayus te rathaiḥ śīghraṃ nāgānīkaiś ca saṃvṛtāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19957: 6.081.007a sa saṃgrāmo mahābhīmaḥ sūryasyodayanaṃ prati 6.081.007c rakṣasāṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca tumulaḥ samapadyata 6.081.008a te gadābhir vicitrābhiḥ prāsaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19958: 6.081.008c anyonyaṃ samare jaghnus tadā vānararākṣasāḥ 6.081.009a mātaṃgarathakūlasya vājimatsyā
GE09ram_1-7u:19962: 6.081.011a keśān karṇalalāṭāṃś ca nāsikāś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19963: 6.081.011c rakṣasāṃ daśanais tīkṣṇair nakhaiś cāpi vyakartayan
GE09ram_1-7u:19964: 6.081.012a ekaikaṃ rākṣasaṃ saṃkhye śataṃ vānarapuṃgavāḥ 6.081.012c abhyadhāvanta phalinaṃ vṛkṣaṃ śakunayo yathā 6.081.013a tathā gadābhir gurvībhiḥ prāsaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19965: 6.081.013c nirjaghnur vānarān ghorān rākṣasāḥ parvatopamāḥ 6.081.014a rākṣasair vadhyamānānāṃ vānarāṇāṃ mahācamūḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19966: 6.081.014c śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ yātā rāmaṃ daśarathātmajam 6.081.015a tato rāmo mahātejā dhanur ādāya vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:19967: 6.081.015c praviśya rākṣasaṃ sainyaṃ śaravarṣaṃ vavarṣa ha
GE09ram_1-7u:19968: 6.081.016a praviṣṭaṃ tu tadā rāmaṃ meghāḥ sūryam ivāmbare
GE09ram_1-7u:19970: 6.081.017a kṛtāny eva sughorāṇi rāmeṇa rajanīcarāḥ 6.081.017c raṇe rāmasya dadṛśuḥ karmāṇy asukarāṇi ca
GE09ram_1-7u:19972: 6.081.018c dadṛśus te na vai rāmaṃ vātaṃ vanagataṃ yathā 6.081.019a chinnaṃ bhinnaṃ śarair dagdhaṃ prabhagnaṃ śastrapīḍitam
GE09ram_1-7u:19973: 6.081.019c balaṃ rāmeṇa dadṛśur na ramaṃ śīghrakāriṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:19974: 6.081.020a praharantaṃ śarīreṣu na te paśyanti rābhavam
GE09ram_1-7u:19975: 6.081.020c indriyārtheṣu tiṣṭhantaṃ bhūtātmānam iva prajāḥ 6.081.021a eṣa hanti gajānīkam eṣa hanti mahārathān
GE09ram_1-7u:19976: 6.081.021c eṣa hanti śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ padātīn vājibhiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:19977: 6.081.022a iti te rākṣasāḥ sarve rāmasya sadṛśān raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:19978: 6.081.022c anyonyakupitā jaghnuḥ sādṛśyād rāghavasya te 6.081.023a na te dadṛśire rāmaṃ dahantam arivāhinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:19980: 6.081.024a te tu rāma sahasrāṇi raṇe paśyanti rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19981: 6.081.024c punaḥ paśyanti kākutstham ekam eva mahāhave
GE09ram_1-7u:19982: 6.081.025a bhramantīṃ kāñcanīṃ koṭiṃ kārmukasya mahātmanaḥ 6.081.025c alātacakrapratimāṃ dadṛśus te na rāghavam 6.081.026a śarīranābhisattvārciḥ śarāraṃ nemikārmukam
GE09ram_1-7u:19983: 6.081.026c jyāghoṣatalanirghoṣaṃ tejobuddhiguṇaprabham 6.081.027a divyāstraguṇaparyantaṃ nighnantaṃ yudhi rākṣasān
GE09ram_1-7u:19984: 6.081.027c dadṛśū rāmacakraṃ tat kālacakram iva prajāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19988: 6.081.029c pūrṇe śatasahasre dve rākṣasānāṃ padātinām 6.081.030a divasasyāṣṭame bhāge śarair
GE09ram_1-7u:19989: 6.081.030c hatāny ekena rāmeṇa rakṣasāṃ kāmarūpiṇām 6.081.031a te hatāśvā hatarathāḥ śrāntā vimathitadhvajāḥ 6.081.031c abhipetuḥ purīṃ laṅkāṃ hataśeṣā niśācarāḥ 6.081.032a hatair gajapadāty aśvais tad babhūva raṇājiram
GE09ram_1-7u:19991: 6.081.033a tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19992: 6.081.033c sādhu sādhv iti rāmasya tat karma samapūjayan
GE09ram_1-7u:19993: 6.081.034a abravīc ca tadā rāmaḥ sugrīvaṃ pratyanantaram
GE09ram_1-7u:19994: 6.081.034c etad astrabalaṃ divyaṃ mama vā tryambakasya vā
GE09ram_1-7u:19995: 6.081.035a nihatya tāṃ rākṣasavāhinīṃ tu; rāmas tadā śakrasamo mahātmā
GE09ram_1-7u:19996: 6.081.035c astreṣu śastreṣu jitaklamaś ca; saṃstūyate devagaṇaiḥ prahṛṣṭaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:19997: 6.082.001a tāni nāgasahasrāṇi sārohāṇāṃ ca vājinām 6.082.001c rathānāṃ cāgnivarṇānāṃ sadhvajānāṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:20002: 6.082.004a dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca saṃbhrāntā hataśeṣā niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20003: 6.082.004c rākṣasyaś ca samāgamya dīnāś cintāpariplutāḥ 6.082.005a vidhavā hataputrāś ca krośantyo hatabāndhavāḥ 6.082.005c rākṣasyaḥ saha saṃgamya duḥkhārtāḥ paryadevayan 6.082.006a kathaṃ śūrpaṇakhā vṛddhā karālā nirṇatodarī 6.082.006c āsasāda vane rāmaṃ kandarpam iva rūpiṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:20005: 6.082.007c taṃ dṛṣṭvā lokavadhyā sā hīnarūpā prakāmitā
GE09ram_1-7u:20006: 6.082.008a kathaṃ sarvaguṇair hīnā guṇavantaṃ mahaujasaṃ 6.082.008c sumukhaṃ durmukhī rāmaṃ kāmayām āsa rākṣasī
GE09ram_1-7u:20009: 6.082.010a rākṣasānāṃ vināśāya dūṣaṇasya kharasya ca 6.082.010c cakārāpratirūpā sā rāghavasya
GE09ram_1-7u:20010: 6.082.011a tan nimittam idaṃ vairaṃ rāvaṇena kṛtaṃ mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:20011: 6.082.011c vadhāya nītā sā sītā daśagrīveṇa rakṣasā
GE09ram_1-7u:20012: 6.082.012a na ca sītāṃ daśagrīvaḥ prāpnoti janakātmajām
GE09ram_1-7u:20013: 6.082.012c baddhaṃ balavatā vairam akṣayaṃ rāghaveṇa ha
GE09ram_1-7u:20014: 6.082.013a vaidehīṃ prārthayānaṃ taṃ virādhaṃ prekṣya rākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:20015: 6.082.013c hatam ekena rāmeṇa paryāptaṃ tannidarśanam 6.082.014a caturdaśasahasrāṇi rakṣasāṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:20017: 6.082.015a kharaś ca nihataḥ saṃkhye dūṣaṇas triśirās tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:20019: 6.082.016a hato yojanabāhuś ca kabandho rudhirāśanaḥ 6.082.016c krodhārto vinadan so 'tha paryāptaṃ tannidarśanam 6.082.017a jaghāna balinaṃ rāmaḥ sahasranayanātmajam
GE09ram_1-7u:20021: 6.082.018a ṛśyamūke vasañ śaile dīno bhagnamanorathaḥ 6.082.018c sugrīvaḥ sthāpito rājye paryāptaṃ tannidarśanam 6.082.019a dharmārthasahitaṃ vākyaṃ sarveṣāṃ rakṣasāṃ hitam 6.082.019c yuktaṃ vibhīṣaṇenoktaṃ mohāt tasya na rocate
GE09ram_1-7u:20022: 6.082.020a vibhīṣaṇavacaḥ kuryād yadi sma dhanadānujaḥ 6.082.020c śmaśānabhūtā duḥkhārtā neyaṃ laṅkā purī bhavet
GE09ram_1-7u:20023: 6.082.021a kumbhakarṇaṃ hataṃ śrutvā rāghaveṇa mahābalam 6.082.021c priyaṃ cendrajitaṃ putraṃ rāvaṇo nāvabudhyate 6.082.022a mama putro mama bhrātā mama bhartā raṇe hataḥ 6.082.022c ity evaṃ śrūyate śabdo rākṣasānāṃ kule kule
GE09ram_1-7u:20024: 6.082.023a rathāś cāśvāś ca nāgāś ca hatāḥ śatasahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20025: 6.082.023c raṇe rāmeṇa śūreṇa rākṣasāś ca padātayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20026: 6.082.024a rudro vā yadi vā viṣṇur mahendro vā śatakratuḥ 6.082.024c hanti no rāmarūpeṇa yadi vā svayam antakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20027: 6.082.025a hatapravīrā rāmeṇa nirāśā jīvite vayam 6.082.025c apaśyantyo bhayasyāntam anāthā
GE09ram_1-7u:20028: 6.082.026a rāmahastād daśagrīvaḥ śūro dattavaro yudhi 6.082.026c idaṃ bhayaṃ mahāghoram utpannaṃ nāvabudhyate 6.082.027a na devā na ca gandharvā na piśācā na rākasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20029: 6.082.027c upasṛṣṭaṃ paritrātuṃ śaktā rāmeṇa saṃyuge 6.082.028a utpātāś cāpi dṛśyante rāvaṇasya raṇe raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:20032: 6.082.029c rāvaṇasyābhayaṃ dattaṃ mānuṣebhyo na yācitam 6.082.030a tad idaṃ mānuṣān manye prāptaṃ niḥsaṃśayaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_1-7u:20033: 6.082.030c jīvitāntakaraṃ ghoraṃ rakṣasāṃ rāvaṇasya ca 6.082.031a pīḍyamānās tu balinā varadānena rakṣasā 6.082.031c dīptais tapobhir vibudhāḥ pitāmaham apūjayan 6.082.032a devatānāṃ hitārthāya mahātmā vai pitāmahaḥ 6.082.032c uvāca devatāḥ sarvā idaṃ tuṣṭo mahad vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20034: 6.082.033a adya prabhṛti lokāṃs trīn sarve dānavarākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20035: 6.082.033c bhayena prāvṛtā nityaṃ vicariṣyanti śāśvatam 6.082.034a daivatais tu samāgamya sarvaiś cendrapurogamaiḥ 6.082.034c vṛṣadhvajas tripurahā mahādevaḥ prasāditaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20036: 6.082.035a prasannas tu mahādevo devān etad vaco 'bravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:20037: 6.082.035c utpatsyati hitārthaṃ vo nārī rakṣaḥkṣayāvahā 6.082.036a eṣā devaiḥ prayuktā tu kṣud yathā dānavān purā 6.082.036c bhakṣayiṣyati naḥ sītā rākṣasaghnī sarāvaṇān 6.082.037a rāvaṇasyāpanītena durvinītasya durmateḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20038: 6.082.037c ayaṃ niṣṭānako ghoraḥ śokena samabhiplutaḥ 6.082.038a taṃ na paśyāmahe loke yo naḥ śaraṇado bhavet 6.082.038c rāghaveṇopasṛṣṭānāṃ kāleneva yugakṣaye
GE09ram_1-7u:20039: 6.082.039a itīva sarvā rajanīcarastriyaḥ; parasparaṃ saṃparirabhya bāhubhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20040: 6.082.039c viṣedur ārtātibhayābhipīḍitā; vinedur uccaiś ca tadā sudāruṇam 6.083.001a ārtānāṃ rākṣasīnāṃ tu laṅkāyāṃ vai kule kule
GE09ram_1-7u:20041: 6.083.001c rāvaṇaḥ karuṇaṃ śabdaṃ śuśrāva pariveditam 6.083.002a sa tu dīrghaṃ viniśvasya muhūrtaṃ dhyānam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20044: 6.083.003c rākṣasair api durdarśaḥ kālāgnir iva mūrchitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20045: 6.083.004a uvāca ca samīpasthān rākṣasān rākṣaseśvaraḥ 6.083.004c bhayāvyaktakathāṃs tatra nirdahann iva cakṣuṣā 6.083.005a mahodaraṃ mahāpārśvaṃ virūpākṣaṃ ca rākṣasaṃ 6.083.005c śīghraṃ vadata sainyāni niryāteti mamājñayā 6.083.006a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasās te bhayārditāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20046: 6.083.006c codayām āsur avyagrān rākṣasāṃs tān nṛpājñayā
GE09ram_1-7u:20047: 6.083.007a te tu sarve tathety uktvā rākṣasā ghoradarśanāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20049: 6.083.008a pratipūjya yathānyāyaṃ rāvaṇaṃ te mahārathāḥ 6.083.008c tasthuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve bhartur vijayakāṅkṣiṇaḥ 6.083.009a athovāca prahasyaitān rāvaṇaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20052: 6.083.010c rāghavaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva neṣyāmi yamasādhanam 6.083.011a kharasya kumbhakarṇasya prahastendrajitos tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:20053: 6.083.011c kariṣyāmi pratīkāram adya śatruvadhād aham 6.083.012a naivāntarikṣaṃ na diśo na nadyo nāpi sāgaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20055: 6.083.013a adya vānarayūthānāṃ tāni yūthāni bhāgaśaḥ 6.083.013c dhanuḥsamudrād udbhūtair mathiṣyāmi śarormibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20056: 6.083.014a vyākośapadmacakrāṇi padmakesaravarcasām 6.083.014c adya yūthataṭākāni gajavat pramathāmy aham 6.083.015a saśarair adya vadanaiḥ saṃkhye vānarayūthapāḥ 6.083.015c maṇḍayiṣyanti vasudhāṃ sanālair iva paṅkalaiḥ 6.083.016a adya yuddhapracaṇḍānāṃ harīṇāṃ drumayodhinām
GE09ram_1-7u:20057: 6.083.016c muktenaikeṣuṇā yuddhe bhetsyāmi ca śataṃśatam 6.083.017a hato bhartā hato bhrātā yāsāṃ ca tanayā hatāḥ 6.083.017c vadhenādya ripos tāsāṃ karmomy asrapramārjanam 6.083.018a adya madbāṇanirbhinnaiḥ prakīrṇair gatacetanaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20058: 6.083.018c karomi vānarair yuddhe yatnāvekṣya talāṃ mahīm
GE09ram_1-7u:20059: 6.083.019a adya gomāyavo gṛdhrā ye ca māṃsāśino 'pare
GE09ram_1-7u:20060: 6.083.019c sarvāṃs tāṃs tarpayiṣyāmi śatrumāṃsaiḥ śarārditaiḥ 6.083.020a kalpyatāṃ me rathaśīghraṃ kṣipram ānīyatāṃ dhanuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20063: 6.083.021c balādhyakṣān sthitāṃs tatra balaṃ saṃtvaryatām iti
GE09ram_1-7u:20064: 6.083.022a balādhyakṣās tu saṃrabdhā rākṣasāṃs tān gṛhād gṛhāt
GE09ram_1-7u:20066: 6.083.023a tato muhūrtān niṣpetū rākṣasā bhīmavikramāḥ 6.083.023c nardanto bhīmavadanā nānāpraharaṇair bhujaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20067: 6.083.024a asibhiḥ paṭṭasaiḥ śūlair galābhir musalair halaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20069: 6.083.025a yaṣṭibhir vimalaiś cakrair niśitaiś ca paraśvadhaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20070: 6.083.025c bhiṇḍipālaiḥ śataghnībhir anyaiś cāpi varāyudhaiḥ 6.083.026a athānayan balādhyakṣāś catvāro rāvaṇājñayā
GE09ram_1-7u:20072: 6.083.027a āruroha rathaṃ divyaṃ dīpyamānaṃ svatejasā 6.083.027c rāvaṇaḥ sattvagāmbhīryād dārayann iva medinīm 6.083.028a rāvaṇenābhyanujñātau mahāpārśvamahodarau 6.083.028c virūpākṣaś ca durdharṣo rathān āruruhus tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:20073: 6.083.029a te tu hṛṣṭā vinardanto bhindata iva medinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:20074: 6.083.029c nādaṃ ghoraṃ vimuñcanto niryayur jayakāṅkṣiṇaḥ 6.083.030a tato yuddhāya tejasvī rakṣogaṇabalair vṛtaḥ 6.083.030c niryayāv udyatadhanuḥ kālāntakayamomapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20075: 6.083.031a tataḥ prajavanāśvena rathena sa mahārathaḥ 6.083.031c dvāreṇa niryayau tena yatra tau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:20076: 6.083.032a tato naṣṭaprabhaḥ sūryo diśaś ca timirāvṛtāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20077: 6.083.032c dvijāś ca nedur ghorāś ca saṃcacāla ca medinī 6.083.033a vavarṣa rudhiraṃ devaś caskhaluś ca turaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20078: 6.083.033c dhvajāgre nyapatad gṛdhro vineduś cāśivaṃ śivāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20079: 6.083.034a nayanaṃ cāsphurad vāmaṃ savyo bāhur akampata
GE09ram_1-7u:20080: 6.083.034c vivarṇavadanaś cāsīt kiṃ cid abhraśyata svaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20081: 6.083.035a tato niṣpatato yuddhe daśagrīvasya rakṣasaḥ 6.083.035c raṇe nidhanaśaṃsīni rūpāṇy etāni jajñire 6.083.036a antarikṣāt papātolkā nirghātasamanisvanā
GE09ram_1-7u:20082: 6.083.036c vinedur aśivaṃ gṛdhrā vāyasair anunāditāḥ 6.083.037a etān acintayan ghorān utpātān samupasthitān 6.083.037c niryayau rāvaṇo mohād vadhārthī kālacoditaḥ 6.083.038a teṣāṃ tu rathaghoṣeṇa rākṣasānāṃ mahātmanām 6.083.038c vānarāṇām api camūr yuddhāyaivābhyavartata
GE09ram_1-7u:20083: 6.083.039a teṣāṃ sutumulaṃ yuddhaṃ babhūva kapirakṣasām 6.083.039c anyonyam āhvayānānāṃ kruddhānāṃ jayam icchatām 6.083.040a tataḥ kruddho daśagrīvaḥ śaraiḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇaiḥ 6.083.040c vānarāṇām anīkeṣu cakāra kadanaṃ mahat 6.083.041a nikṛttaśirasaḥ ke cid rāvaṇena valīmukhāḥ 6.083.041c nirucchvāsā hatāḥ ke cit ke cit pārśveṣu dāritāḥ 6.083.041e ke cid vibhinnaśirasaḥ ke cic cakṣurvivarjitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20084: 6.083.042a daśānanaḥ krodhavivṛttanetro; yato yato 'bhyeti rathena saṃkhye 6.083.042c tatas tatas tasya śarapravegaṃ; soḍhuṃ na śekur hariyūthapās te 6.084.001a tathā taiḥ kṛttagātrais tu daśagrīveṇa mārgaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20085: 6.084.001c babhūva vasudhā tatra prakīrṇā haribhir vṛtā
GE09ram_1-7u:20087: 6.084.002c na śekuḥ sahituṃ dīptaṃ pataṃgā iva pāvakam
GE09ram_1-7u:20091: 6.084.004c sa yayau samare tasmin vidhaman rāvaṇaḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20092: 6.084.005a kadanaṃ tarasā kṛtvā rākṣasendro vanaukasām 6.084.005c āsasāda tato yuddhe rāghavaṃ tvaritas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:20093: 6.084.006a sugrīvas tān kapīn dṛṣṭvā bhagnān vidravato raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:20094: 6.084.006c gulme suṣeṇaṃ nikṣipya cakre yuddhe drutaṃ manaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20095: 6.084.007a ātmanaḥ sadṛśaṃ vīraṃ sa taṃ nikṣipya vānaram
GE09ram_1-7u:20097: 6.084.008a pārśvataḥ pṛṣṭhataś cāsya sarve yūthādhipāḥ svayam
GE09ram_1-7u:20098: 6.084.008c anujahrur mahāśailān vividhāṃś ca mahādrumān 6.084.009a sa nadan yudhi sugrīvaḥ svareṇa mahatā mahān
GE09ram_1-7u:20100: 6.084.010a mamarda ca mahākāyo rākṣasān vānareśvaraḥ 6.084.010c yugāntasamaye vāyuḥ pravṛddhān agamān iva 6.084.011a rākṣasānām anīkeṣu śailavarṣaṃ vavarṣa ha 6.084.011c aśvavarṣaṃ yathā meghaḥ pakṣisaṃgheṣu kānane 6.084.012a kapirājavimuktais taiḥ śailavarṣais tu rākṣasāḥ 6.084.012c vikīrṇaśirasaḥ petur nikṛttā iva parvatāḥ 6.084.013a atha saṃkṣīyamāṇeṣu rākṣaseṣu samantataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20101: 6.084.013c sugrīveṇa prabhagneṣu patatsu vinadatsu ca 6.084.014a virūpākṣaḥ svakaṃ nāma dhanvī viśrāvya rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20102: 6.084.014c rathād āplutya durdharṣo gajaskandham upāruhat 6.084.015a sa taṃ dviradam āruhya virūpākṣo mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20104: 6.084.016a sugrīve sa śarān ghorān visasarja camūmukhe
GE09ram_1-7u:20105: 6.084.016c sthāpayām āsā codvignān rākṣasān saṃpraharṣayan 6.084.017a so 'tividdhaḥ śitair bāṇaiḥ kapīndras tena rakṣasā 6.084.017c cukrodha ca mahākrodho vadhe cāsya mano dadhe
GE09ram_1-7u:20106: 6.084.018a tataḥ pādapam uddhṛtya śūraḥ saṃpradhane hariḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20107: 6.084.018c abhipatya jaghānāsya pramukhe taṃ mahāgajam 6.084.019a sa tu prahārābhihataḥ sugrīveṇa mahāgajaḥ 6.084.019c apāsarpad dhanurmātraṃ niṣasāda nanāda ca 6.084.020a gajāt tu mathitāt tūrṇam apakramya sa vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:20109: 6.084.021a ārṣabhaṃ carmakhaḍgaṃ ca pragṛhya laghuvikramaḥ 6.084.021c bhartsayann iva sugrīvam āsasāda vyavasthitam 6.084.022a sa hi tasyābhisaṃkruddhaḥ pragṛhya mahatīṃ śilām
GE09ram_1-7u:20111: 6.084.023a sa tāṃ śilām āpatantīṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasapuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20112: 6.084.023c apakramya suvikrāntaḥ khaḍgena prāharat tadā 6.084.024a tena khaḍgena saṃkruddhaḥ sugrīvasya camūmukhe 6.084.024c kavacaṃ pātayām āsa sa khaḍgābhihato 'patat
GE09ram_1-7u:20113: 6.084.025a sa samutthāya patitaḥ kapis tasya vyasarjayat
GE09ram_1-7u:20115: 6.084.026a talaprahāraṃ tad rakṣaḥ sugrīveṇa samudyatam 6.084.026c naipuṇyān mocayitvainaṃ muṣṭinorasy atāḍayat
GE09ram_1-7u:20116: 6.084.027a tatas tu saṃkruddhataraḥ sugrīvo vānareśvaraḥ 6.084.027c mokṣitaṃ cātmano dṛṣṭvā prahāraṃ tena rakṣasā
GE09ram_1-7u:20117: 6.084.028a sa dadarśāntaraṃ tasya virūpākṣasya vānaraḥ 6.084.028c tato nyapātayat krodhāc chaṅkhadeśe mahātalam 6.084.029a mahendrāśanikalpena talenābhihataḥ kṣitau
GE09ram_1-7u:20118: 6.084.029c papāta rudhiraklinnaḥ śoṇitaṃ sa samudvaman 6.084.030a vivṛttanayanaṃ krodhāt saphena rudhirāplutam
GE09ram_1-7u:20119: 6.084.030c dadṛśus te virūpākṣaṃ virūpākṣataraṃ kṛtam 6.084.031a sphurantaṃ parivarjantaṃ pārśvena rudhirokṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:20120: 6.084.031c karuṇaṃ ca vinardāntaṃ dadṛśuḥ kapayo ripum
GE09ram_1-7u:20121: 6.084.032a tathā tu tau saṃyati saṃprayuktau; tarasvinau vānararākṣasānām 6.084.032c balārṇavau sasvanatuḥ sabhīmaṃ; mahārṇavau dvāv iva bhinnavelau
GE09ram_1-7u:20122: 6.084.033a vināśitaṃ prekṣya virūpanetraṃ; mahābalaṃ taṃ haripārthivena
GE09ram_1-7u:20123: 6.084.033c balaṃ samastaṃ kapirākṣasānām; unmattagaṅgāpratimaṃ babhūva 6.085.001a hanyamāne bale tūrṇam anyonyaṃ te mahāmṛdhe
GE09ram_1-7u:20126: 6.085.002c babhūva dviguṇaṃ kruddho rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ 6.085.003a prakṣīṇaṃ tu balaṃ dṛṣṭvā vadhyamānaṃ valīmukhaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20127: 6.085.003c babhūvāsya vyathā yuddhe prekṣya daivaviparyayam 6.085.004a uvāca ca samīpasthaṃ mahodaram ariṃdamam 6.085.004c asmin kāle mahābāho jayāśā tvayi me sthitā
GE09ram_1-7u:20128: 6.085.005a jahi śatrucamūṃ vīra darśayādya parākramam 6.085.005c bhartṛpiṇḍasya kālo 'yaṃ nirveṣṭuṃ sādhu yudhyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:20129: 6.085.006a evam uktas tathety uktvā rākṣasendraṃ mahodaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20130: 6.085.006c praviveśārisenāṃ sa pataṃga iva pāvakam 6.085.007a tataḥ sa kadanaṃ cakre vānarāṇāṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:20131: 6.085.007c bhartṛvākyena tejasvī svena vīryeṇa coditaḥ 6.085.008a prabhagnāṃ samare dṛṣṭvā vānarāṇāṃ mahācamūm 6.085.008c abhidudrāva sugrīvo mahodaram anantaram
GE09ram_1-7u:20132: 6.085.009a pragṛhya vipulāṃ ghorāṃ mahīdhara samāṃ śilām
GE09ram_1-7u:20133: 6.085.009c cikṣepa ca mahātejās tad vadhāya harīśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20134: 6.085.010a tām āpatantīṃ sahasā śilāṃ dṛṣṭvā mahodaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20135: 6.085.010c asaṃbhrāntas tato bāṇair nirbibheda durāsadām 6.085.011a rakṣasā tena bāṇaughair nikṛttā sā sahasradhā
GE09ram_1-7u:20137: 6.085.012a tāṃ tu bhinnāṃ śilāṃ dṛṣṭvā sugrīvaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20138: 6.085.012c sālam utpāṭya cikṣepa rakṣase raṇamūrdhani 6.085.012e śaraiś ca vidadārainaṃ śūraḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ 6.085.013a sa dadarśa tataḥ kruddhaḥ parighaṃ patitaṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_1-7u:20139: 6.085.013c āvidhya tu sa taṃ dīptaṃ parighaṃ tasya darśayan 6.085.013e parighāgreṇa vegena jaghānāsya hayottamān
GE09ram_1-7u:20142: 6.085.015a gadāparighahastau tau yudhi vīrau samīyatuḥ 6.085.015c nardantau govṛṣaprakhyau ghanāv iva savidyutau 6.085.016a ājaghāna gadāṃ tasya parigheṇa harīśvaraḥ 6.085.016c papāta sa gadodbhinnaḥ parighas tasya bhūtale
GE09ram_1-7u:20143: 6.085.017a tato jagrāha tejasvī sugrīvo vasudhātalāt 6.085.017c āyasaṃ musalaṃ ghoraṃ sarvato hemabhūṣitam 6.085.018a taṃ samudyamya cikṣepa so 'py anyāṃ vyākṣipad gadām
GE09ram_1-7u:20144: 6.085.018c bhinnāv anyonyam āsādya petatur dharaṇītale 6.085.019a tato bhagnapraharaṇau muṣṭibhyāṃ tau samīyatuḥ 6.085.019c tejo balasamāviṣṭau dīptāv iva hutāśanau 6.085.020a jaghnatus tau tadānyonyaṃ nedatuś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20145: 6.085.020c talaiś cānyonyam āhatya petatur dharaṇītale 6.085.021a utpetatus tatas tūrṇaṃ jaghnatuś ca parasparam
GE09ram_1-7u:20146: 6.085.021c bhujaiś cikṣepatur vīrāv anyonyam aparājitau 6.085.022a ājahāra tadā khagḍam
GE09ram_1-7u:20147: 6.085.022c rākṣasaś carmaṇā sārdhaṃ mahāvego mahodaraḥ 6.085.023a tathaiva ca mahākhaḍgaṃ carmaṇā patitaṃ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:20149: 6.085.024a tau tu roṣaparītāṅgau nardantāv abhyadhāvatām 6.085.024c udyatāsī raṇe hṛṣṭau yudhi śastraviśāradau 6.085.025a dakṣiṇaṃ maṇḍalaṃ cobhau tau tūrṇaṃ saṃparīyatuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20150: 6.085.025c anyonyam abhisaṃkruddhau jaye praṇihitāv ubhau 6.085.026a sa tu śūro mahāvego vīryaślāghī mahodaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20151: 6.085.026c mahācarmaṇi taṃ khaḍgaṃ pātayām āsa durmatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20152: 6.085.027a lagnam utkarṣataḥ khaḍgaṃ khaḍgena kapikuñjaraḥ 6.085.027c jahāra saśiras trāṇaṃ kuṇḍalopahitaṃ śiraḥ 6.085.028a nikṛttaśirasas tasya patitasya mahītale
GE09ram_1-7u:20153: 6.085.028c tad balaṃ rākṣasendrasya dṛṣṭvā tatra na tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_1-7u:20154: 6.085.029a hatvā taṃ vānaraiḥ sārdhaṃ nanāda mudito hariḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20155: 6.085.029c cukrodha ca daśagrīvo babhau hṛṣṭaś ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20156: 6.086.001a mahodare tu nihate mahāpārśvo mahābalaḥ 6.086.001c aṅgadasya camūṃ bhīmāṃ kṣobhayām āsa sāyakaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20157: 6.086.002a sa vānarāṇāṃ mukhyānām uttamāṅgāni sarvaśaḥ 6.086.002c pātayām āsa kāyebhyaḥ phalaṃ vṛntād ivānilaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20158: 6.086.003a keṣāṃ cid iṣubhir bāhūn skandhāṃś cicheda rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20159: 6.086.003c vānarāṇāṃ susaṃkruddhaḥ pārśvaṃ keṣāṃ vyadārayat 6.086.004a te 'rditā bāṇavarṣeṇa mahāpārśvena vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20161: 6.086.005a nirīkṣya balam udvignam aṅgado rākṣasārditam 6.086.005c vegaṃ cakre mahābāhuḥ samudra iva parvaṇi
GE09ram_1-7u:20164: 6.086.007a sa tu tena prahāreṇa mahāpārśvo vicetanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20165: 6.086.007c sasūtaḥ syandanāt tasmād visaṃjñaḥ prāpatad bhuvi
GE09ram_1-7u:20167: 6.086.008c niṣpatya sumahāvīryaḥ svād yūthān meghasaṃnibhāt 6.086.009a pragṛhya giriśṛṅgābhāṃ kruddhaḥ sa vipulāṃ śilām
GE09ram_1-7u:20168: 6.086.009c aśvāñ jaghāna tarasā syandanaṃ ca babhañja tam
GE09ram_1-7u:20169: 6.086.010a muhūrtāl labdhasaṃjñas tu mahāpārśvo mahābalaḥ 6.086.010c aṅgadaṃ bahubhir bāṇair bhūyas taṃ pratyavidhyata
GE09ram_1-7u:20170: 6.086.011a jāmbavantaṃ tribhir bāṇair ājaghāna stanāntare 6.086.011c ṛkṣarājaṃ gavākṣaṃ ca jaghāna bahubhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20171: 6.086.012a gavākṣaṃ jāmbavantaṃ ca sa dṛṣṭvā śarapīḍitau
GE09ram_1-7u:20172: 6.086.012c jagrāha parighaṃ ghoram aṅgadaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ 6.086.013a tasyāṅgadaḥ prakupito rākṣasasya tam āyasaṃ 6.086.013c dūrasthitasya parighaṃ raviraśmisamaprabham
GE09ram_1-7u:20173: 6.086.014a dvābhyāṃ bhujābhyāṃ saṃgṛhya bhrāmayitvā ca vegavān
GE09ram_1-7u:20174: 6.086.014c mahāpārśvāya cikṣepa vadhārthaṃ vālinaḥ sutaḥ 6.086.015a sa tu kṣipto balavatā parighas tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20175: 6.086.015c dhanuś ca saśaraṃ hastāc chirastraṃ cāpy apātayat
GE09ram_1-7u:20176: 6.086.016a taṃ samāsādya vegena vāliputraḥ pratāpavān 6.086.016c talenābhyahanat kruddhaḥ karṇamūle sakuṇḍale
GE09ram_1-7u:20177: 6.086.017a sa tu kruddho mahāvego mahāpārśvo mahādyutiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20179: 6.086.018a taṃ tailadhautaṃ vimalaṃ śailasāramayaṃ dṛḍham 6.086.018c rākṣasaḥ paramakruddho vāliputre nyapātayat
GE09ram_1-7u:20181: 6.086.019c aṅgado mokṣayām āsa saroṣaḥ sa paraśvadham
GE09ram_1-7u:20182: 6.086.020a sa vīro vajrasaṃkāśam aṅgado muṣṭim ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20184: 6.086.021a rākṣasasya stanābhyāśe marmajño hṛdayaṃ prati 6.086.021c indrāśanisamasparśaṃ sa muṣṭiṃ vinyapātayat
GE09ram_1-7u:20185: 6.086.022a tena tasya nipātena rākṣasasya mahāmṛdhe 6.086.022c paphāla hṛdayaṃ cāśu sa papāta hato bhuvi
GE09ram_1-7u:20186: 6.086.023a tasmin nipatite bhūmau tat sainyaṃ saṃpracukṣubhe
GE09ram_1-7u:20187: 6.086.023c abhavac ca mahān krodhaḥ samare rāvaṇasya tu
GE09ram_1-7u:20188: 6.087.001a mahodaramahāpārśvau hatau dṛṣṭvā tu rākṣasau 6.087.001c tasmiṃś ca nihate vīre virūpākṣe mahābale
GE09ram_1-7u:20189: 6.087.002a āviveśa mahān krodho rāvaṇaṃ tu mahāmṛdhe
GE09ram_1-7u:20190: 6.087.002c sūtaṃ saṃcodayām āsa vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:20191: 6.087.003a nihatānām amātyānāṃ ruddhasya nagarasya ca 6.087.003c duḥkham eṣo 'paneṣyāmi hatvā tau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:20193: 6.087.004c praśākhā yasya sugrīvo jāmbavān kumudo nalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20194: 6.087.005a sa diśo daśa ghoṣeṇa rathasyātiratho mahān
GE09ram_1-7u:20195: 6.087.005c nādayan prayayau tūrṇaṃ rāghavaṃ cābhyavartata 6.087.006a pūritā tena śabdena
GE09ram_1-7u:20198: 6.087.007c nirdadāha kapīn sarvāṃs te prapetuḥ samantataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20199: 6.087.008a tāny anīkāny anekāni rāvaṇasya śarottamaiḥ 6.087.008c dṛṣṭvā bhagnāni śataśo rāghavaḥ paryavasthitaḥ 6.087.009a sa dadarśa tato rāmaṃ tiṣṭhantam aparājitam
GE09ram_1-7u:20200: 6.087.009c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā viṣṇunā vāsavaṃ yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:20201: 6.087.010a ālikhantam ivākāśam avaṣṭabhya mahad dhanuḥ 6.087.010c padmapatraviśālākṣaṃ dīrghabāhum ariṃdamam
GE09ram_1-7u:20202: 6.087.011a vānarāṃś ca raṇe bhagnān āpatantaṃ ca rāvaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:20203: 6.087.011c samīkṣya rāghavo hṛṣṭo madhye jagrāha kārmukam
GE09ram_1-7u:20204: 6.087.012a visphārayitum ārebhe tataḥ sa dhanur uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:20205: 6.087.012c mahāvegaṃ mahānādaṃ nirbhindann iva medinīm 6.087.013a tayoḥ śarapathaṃ prāpya rāvaṇo rājaputrayoḥ 6.087.013c sa babhūva yathā rāhuḥ samīpe śaśisūryayoḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20206: 6.087.014a rāvaṇasya ca bāṇaughai rāmavispharitena ca 6.087.014c śabdena rākṣasās tena petuś ca śataśas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:20207: 6.087.015a tam icchan prathamaṃ yoddhuṃ lakṣmaṇo niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20208: 6.087.015c mumoca dhanur āyamya śarān agniśikhopamān 6.087.016a tān muktamātrān ākāśe lakṣmaṇena dhanuṣmatā 6.087.016c bāṇān bāṇair mahātejā rāvaṇaḥ pratyavārayat 6.087.017a ekam ekena bāṇena tribhis trīn daśabhir daśa
GE09ram_1-7u:20211: 6.087.018c āsasāda tato rāmaṃ sthitaṃ śailam ivācalam
GE09ram_1-7u:20212: 6.087.019a sa saṃkhye rāmam āsādya krodhasaṃraktalocanaḥ 6.087.019c vyasṛjac charavarṇāni rāvaṇo rāghavopari
GE09ram_1-7u:20213: 6.087.020a śaradhārās tato rāmo rāvaṇasya dhanuścyutāḥ 6.087.020c dṛṣṭvaivāpatitāḥ śīghraṃ bhallāñ jagrāha satvaram 6.087.021a tāñ śaraughāṃs tato bhallais tīkṣṇaiś ciccheda rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20214: 6.087.021c dīpyamānān mahāvegān kruddhān āśīviṣān iva 6.087.022a rāghavo rāvaṇaṃ tūrṇaṃ rāvaṇo rāghavaṃ tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:20215: 6.087.022c anyonyaṃ vividhais tīkṣṇaiḥ śarair abhivavarṣatuḥ 6.087.023a ceratuś ca ciraṃ citraṃ maṇḍalaṃ savyadakṣiṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:20217: 6.087.024a tayor bhūtāni vitreṣur yugapat saṃprayudhyatoḥ 6.087.024c raudrayoḥ sāyakamucor
GE09ram_1-7u:20218: 6.087.025a saṃtataṃ vividhair bāṇair babhūva gaganaṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:20222: 6.087.027a śarāndhakāraṃ tau bhīmaṃ cakratuḥ paramaṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:20225: 6.087.028c anāsādyam acintyaṃ ca vṛtravāsavayor iva 6.087.029a ubhau hi parameṣvāsāv ubhau śastraviśāradau 6.087.029c ubhau cāstravidāṃ mukhyāv ubhau yuddhe viceratuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20226: 6.087.030a ubhau hi yena vrajatas tena tena śarormayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20227: 6.087.030c ūrmayo vāyunā viddhā jagmuḥ sāgarayor iva
GE09ram_1-7u:20228: 6.087.031a tataḥ saṃsaktahastas tu rāvaṇo lokarāvaṇaḥ 6.087.031c nārācamālāṃ rāmasya lalāṭe
GE09ram_1-7u:20230: 6.087.032c śirasā dhārayan rāmo na vyathāṃ pratyapadyata
GE09ram_1-7u:20231: 6.087.033a atha mantrān api japan raudram astram udīrayan
GE09ram_1-7u:20232: 6.087.033c śarān bhūyaḥ samādāya rāmaḥ krodhasamanvitaḥ 6.087.034a mumoca ca mahātejāś cāpam āyamya vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:20234: 6.087.035a te mahāmeghasaṃkāśe kavace patitāḥ śarāḥ 6.087.035c avadhye rākṣasendrasya na vyathāṃ janayaṃs tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:20235: 6.087.036a punar evātha taṃ rāmo rathasthaṃ rākṣasādhipam
GE09ram_1-7u:20237: 6.087.037a te bhittvā bāṇarūpāṇi pañcaśīrṣā ivoragāḥ 6.087.037c śvasanto viviśur bhūmiṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:20239: 6.087.038c āsuraṃ sumahāghoram anyad astraṃ samādade 6.087.039a siṃhavyāghramukhāṃś cānyān kaṅkakāka mukhān api 6.087.039c gṛdhraśyenamukhāṃś cāpi sṛgālavadanāṃs tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:20241: 6.087.040c pañcāsyāṃl lelihānāṃś ca sasarja niśitāñ śarān
GE09ram_1-7u:20244: 6.087.042a etāṃś cānyāṃś ca māyābhiḥ sasarja niśitāñ śarān
GE09ram_1-7u:20245: 6.087.042c rāmaṃ prati mahātejāḥ kruddhaḥ sarpa iva śvasan
GE09ram_1-7u:20248: 6.087.044a agnidīptamukhān bāṇāṃs tathā sūryamukhān api 6.087.044c candrārdhacandravaktrāṃś ca dhūmaketumukhān api
GE09ram_1-7u:20250: 6.087.045c vidyujjihvopamāṃś cānyān sasarja niśitāñ śarān 6.087.046a te rāvaṇaśarā ghorā
GE09ram_1-7u:20251: 6.087.046c vilayaṃ jagmur ākāśe jagmuś caiva sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20252: 6.087.047a tad astraṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmeṇākliṣṭakarmaṇā 6.087.047c hṛṣṭā nedus tataḥ sarve kapayaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20254: 6.088.001c krodhaṃ ca dviguṇaṃ cakre krodhāc cāstram anantaram
GE09ram_1-7u:20255: 6.088.002a mayena vihitaṃ raudram anyad astraṃ mahādyutiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20256: 6.088.002c utsraṣṭuṃ rāvaṇo ghoraṃ rāghavāya pracakrame 6.088.003a tataḥ śūlāni niścerur gadāś ca musalāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:20258: 6.088.004a kūṭamudgarapāśāś ca dīptāś cāśanayas tathā 6.088.004c niṣpetur vividhās tīkṣṇā vātā iva yugakṣaye
GE09ram_1-7u:20259: 6.088.005a tad astraṃ rāghavaḥ śrīmān uttamāstravidāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20262: 6.088.006c rāvaṇaḥ krodhatāmrākṣaḥ sauram astram udīrayat 6.088.007a tataś cakrāṇi niṣpetur bhāsvarāṇi mahānti ca
GE09ram_1-7u:20264: 6.088.008a tair āsīd gaganaṃ dīptaṃ saṃpatadbhir itas tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20265: 6.088.008c patadbhiś ca diśo dīptaiś candrasūryagrahair iva
GE09ram_1-7u:20266: 6.088.009a tāni ciccheda bāṇaughaiś cakrāṇi tu sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20268: 6.088.010a tad astraṃ tu hataṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20269: 6.088.010c vivyādha daśabhir bāṇai rāmaṃ sarveṣu marmasu
GE09ram_1-7u:20270: 6.088.011a sa viddho daśabhir bāṇair mahākārmukaniḥsṛtaiḥ 6.088.011c rāvaṇena mahātejā na prākampata rāghavaḥ 6.088.012a tato vivyādha gātreṣu sarveṣu samitiṃjayaḥ 6.088.012c rāghavas tu susaṃkruddho rāvaṇaṃ bahubhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20271: 6.088.013a etasminn antare kruddho rāghavasyānujo balī 6.088.013c lakṣmaṇaḥ sāyakān sapta jagrāha paravīrahā 6.088.014a taiḥ sāyakair mahāvegai rāvaṇasya mahādyutiḥ 6.088.014c dhvajaṃ manuṣyaśīrṣaṃ tu tasya ciccheda naikadhā
GE09ram_1-7u:20272: 6.088.015a sāratheś cāpi bāṇena śiro jvalitakuṇḍalam 6.088.015c jahāra lakṣmaṇaḥ śrīmān nairṛtasya mahābalaḥ 6.088.016a tasya bāṇaiś ca ciccheda dhanur gajakaropamam
GE09ram_1-7u:20273: 6.088.016c lakṣmaṇo rākṣasendrasya pañcabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ 6.088.017a nīlameghanibhāṃś cāsya sadaśvān parvatopamān
GE09ram_1-7u:20275: 6.088.018a hatāśvād vegavān vegād avaplutya mahārathāt 6.088.018c krodham āhārayat tīvraṃ bhrātaraṃ prati rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20276: 6.088.019a tataḥ śaktiṃ mahāśaktir dīptāṃ dīptāśanīm iva
GE09ram_1-7u:20278: 6.088.020a aprāptām eva tāṃ bāṇais tribhiś ciccheda lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20279: 6.088.020c athodatiṣṭhat saṃnādo vānarāṇāṃ tadā raṇe 6.088.021a sa papāta tridhā chinnā śaktiḥ kāñcanamālinī
GE09ram_1-7u:20280: 6.088.021c savisphuliṅgā jvalitā maholkeva divaś cyutā 6.088.022a tataḥ saṃbhāvitatarāṃ kālenāpi durāsadām
GE09ram_1-7u:20281: 6.088.022c jagrāha vipulāṃ śaktiṃ dīpyamānāṃ svatejasā 6.088.023a sā veginā balavatā rāvaṇena durātmanā 6.088.023c jajvāla sumahāghorā śakrāśanisamaprabhā
GE09ram_1-7u:20282: 6.088.024a etasminn antare vīro lakṣmaṇas taṃ vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:20284: 6.088.025a taṃ vimokṣayituṃ vīraś cāpam āyamya lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20285: 6.088.025c rāvaṇaṃ śaktihastaṃ taṃ śaravarṣair avākirat 6.088.026a kīryamāṇaḥ śaraugheṇa visṛṣṭtena mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:20286: 6.088.026c na prahartuṃ manaś cakre vimukhīkṛtavikramaḥ 6.088.027a mokṣitaṃ bhrātaraṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇena sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20287: 6.088.027c lakṣmaṇābhimukhas tiṣṭhann idaṃ vacanam abravīt 6.088.028a mokṣitas te balaślāghin yasmād evaṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20288: 6.088.028c vimucya rākṣasaṃ śaktis tvayīyaṃ vinipātyate 6.088.029a eṣā te hṛdayaṃ bhittvā śaktir lohitalakṣaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:20290: 6.088.030a ity evam uktvā tāṃ śaktim aṣṭaghaṇṭāṃ mahāsvanām
GE09ram_1-7u:20292: 6.088.031a lakṣmaṇāya samuddiśya jvalantīm iva tejasā 6.088.031c rāvaṇaḥ paramakruddhaś cikṣepa ca nanāda ca
GE09ram_1-7u:20294: 6.088.032c śaktir abhyapatad vegāl lakṣmaṇaṃ raṇamūrdhani 6.088.033a tām anuvyāharac chaktim āpatantīṃ sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20295: 6.088.033c svastyas tu lakṣmaṇāyeti moghā bhava hatodyamā
GE09ram_1-7u:20296: 6.088.034a nyapatat sā mahāvegā lakṣmaṇasya mahorasi 6.088.034c jihvevoragarājasya dīpyamānā
GE09ram_1-7u:20298: 6.088.035c śaktyā nirbhinnahṛdayaḥ papāta bhuvi lakṣmaṇaḥ 6.088.036a tadavasthaṃ samīpastho lakṣmaṇaṃ prekṣya rāghavaḥ 6.088.036c bhrātṛsnehān mahātejā viṣaṇṇahṛdayo 'bhavat
GE09ram_1-7u:20300: 6.088.037c babhūva saṃrabdhataro yugānta iva pāvakaḥ 6.088.038a na viṣādasya kālo 'yam iti saṃcintya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20301: 6.088.038c cakre sutumulaṃ yuddhaṃ rāvaṇasya vadhe dhṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20302: 6.088.039a sa dadarśa tato rāmaḥ śaktyā bhinnaṃ mahāhave
GE09ram_1-7u:20304: 6.088.040a tām api prahitāṃ śaktiṃ rāvaṇena balīyasā
GE09ram_1-7u:20305: 6.088.040c yatnatas te hariśreṣṭhā na śekur avamarditum
GE09ram_1-7u:20306: 6.088.040e arditāś caiva bāṇaughaiḥ kṣiprahastena rakṣasā 6.088.041a saumitriṃ sā vinirbhidya praviṣṭā dharaṇītalam 6.088.041c tāṃ karābhyāṃ parāmṛśya rāmaḥ śaktiṃ bhayāvahām
GE09ram_1-7u:20307: 6.088.041e babhañja samare kruddho balavad vicakarṣa ca
GE09ram_1-7u:20308: 6.088.042a tasya niṣkarṣataḥ śaktiṃ rāvaṇena balīyasā 6.088.042c śarāḥ sarveṣu gātreṣu pātitā marmabhedinaḥ 6.088.043a acintayitvā tān bāṇān samāśliṣyā ca lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:20309: 6.088.043c abravīc ca hanūmantaṃ sugrīvaṃ caiva rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20314: 6.088.045a asmin muhūrte nacirāt satyaṃ pratiśṛṇomi vaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20315: 6.088.045c arāvaṇam arāmaṃ vā jagad drakṣyatha vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20316: 6.088.046a rājyanāśaṃ vane vāsaṃ daṇḍake paridhāvanam 6.088.046c vaidehyāś ca parāmarśaṃ rakṣobhiś ca samāgamam
GE09ram_1-7u:20317: 6.088.047a prāptaṃ duḥkhaṃ mahad ghoraṃ kleśaṃ ca nirayopamam
GE09ram_1-7u:20318: 6.088.047c adya sarvam ahaṃ tyakṣye hatvā taṃ rāvaṇaṃ raṇe 6.088.048a yadarthaṃ vānaraṃ sainyaṃ samānītam idaṃ mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:20319: 6.088.048c sugrīvaś ca kṛto rājye nihatvā vālinaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:20320: 6.088.049a yadarthaṃ sāgaraḥ krāntaḥ setur baddhaś ca sāgare
GE09ram_1-7u:20321: 6.088.049c so 'yam adya raṇe pāpaś cakṣurviṣayam āgataḥ 6.088.050a cakṣurviṣayam āgamya nāyaṃ jīvitum arhati 6.088.050c dṛṣṭiṃ dṛṣṭiviṣasyeva sarpasya mama rāvaṇaḥ 6.088.051a svasthāḥ paśyata durdharṣā yuddhaṃ vānarapuṃgavāḥ 6.088.051c āsīnāḥ parvatāgreṣu mamedaṃ rāvaṇasya ca 6.088.052a adya rāmasya rāmatvaṃ paśyantu mama saṃyuge
GE09ram_1-7u:20322: 6.088.052c trayo lokāḥ sagandharvāḥ sadevāḥ sarṣicāraṇāḥ 6.088.053a adya karma kariṣyāmi yal lokāḥ sacarācarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20323: 6.088.053c sadevāḥ kathayiṣyanti yāvad bhūmir dhariṣyati 6.088.054a evam uktvā śitair bāṇais taptakāñcanabhūṣaṇaiḥ 6.088.054c ājaghāna daśagrīvaṃ raṇe rāmaḥ samāhitaḥ 6.088.055a atha pradīptair nārācair musalaiś cāpi rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20324: 6.088.055c abhyavarṣat tadā rāmaṃ dhārābhir iva toyadaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20326: 6.088.056c śarāṇāṃ ca śarāṇāṃ ca babhūva tumulaḥ svanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20327: 6.088.057a te bhinnāś ca vikīrṇāś ca rāmarāvaṇayoḥ śarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20331: 6.088.059a sa kīryamāṇaḥ śarajālavṛṣṭibhir; mahātmanā dīptadhanuṣmatārditaḥ 6.088.059c bhayāt pradudrāva sametya rāvaṇo; yathānilenābhihato balāhakaḥ 6.089.001a sa dattvā tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20332: 6.089.001c visṛjan eva bāṇaughān suṣeṇaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:20333: 6.089.002a eṣa rāvaṇavegena lakṣmaṇaḥ patitaḥ kṣitau 6.089.002c sarpavad veṣṭate vīro mama śokam udīrayan
GE09ram_1-7u:20334: 6.089.003a śoṇitārdram imaṃ vīraṃ prāṇair iṣṭataraṃ mama
GE09ram_1-7u:20335: 6.089.003c paśyato mama kā śaktir yoddhuṃ paryākulātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20336: 6.089.004a ayaṃ sa samaraślāghī bhrātā me śubhalakṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20337: 6.089.004c yadi pañcatvam āpannaḥ prāṇair me kiṃ sukhena vā 6.089.005a lajjatīva hi me vīryaṃ bhraśyatīva karād dhanuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20338: 6.089.005c sāyakā vyavasīdanti dṛṣṭir bāṣpavaśaṃ gatā 6.089.005e cintā me vardhate tīvrā mumūrṣā copajāyate
GE09ram_1-7u:20339: 6.089.006a bhrātaraṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇena durātmanā 6.089.006c paraṃ viṣādam āpanno
GE09ram_1-7u:20340: 6.089.007a na hi yuddhena me kāryaṃ naiva prāṇair na sītayā
GE09ram_1-7u:20341: 6.089.007c bhrātaraṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇaṃ raṇapāṃsuṣu 6.089.008a kiṃ me rājyena kiṃ prāṇair yuddhe kāryaṃ na vidyate
GE09ram_1-7u:20342: 6.089.008c yatrāyaṃ nihataḥ śete raṇamūrdhani lakṣmaṇaḥ 6.089.009a rāmam āśvāsayan vīraḥ suṣeṇo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:20344: 6.089.010a na cāsya vikṛtaṃ vaktraṃ nāpi śyāmaṃ na niṣprabham 6.089.010c suprabhaṃ ca prasannaṃ ca mukham asyābhilakṣyate
GE09ram_1-7u:20345: 6.089.011a padmaraktatalau hastau suprasanne ca locane 6.089.011c evaṃ na vidyate rūpaṃ gatāsūnāṃ viśāṃ pate
GE09ram_1-7u:20346: 6.089.011e māṃ viṣādaṃ kṛtvā vīra saprāṇo 'yam ariṃdama
GE09ram_1-7u:20348: 6.089.012c socchvāsaṃ hṛdayaṃ vīra kampamānaṃ muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20349: 6.089.013a evam uktvā tu vākyajñaḥ suṣeṇo rāghavaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20351: 6.089.014a saumya śīghram ito gatvā śailam oṣadhiparvatam
GE09ram_1-7u:20352: 6.089.014c pūrvaṃ hi kathito yo 'sau vīra jāmbavatā śubhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20353: 6.089.015a dakṣiṇe śikhare tasya jātām oṣadhim ānaya
GE09ram_1-7u:20355: 6.089.016a sauvarṇakaraṇīṃ cāpi tathā saṃjīvanīm api 6.089.016c saṃdhānakaraṇīṃ cāpi gatvā śīghram ihānaya 6.089.016e saṃjīvanārthaṃ vīrasya lakṣmaṇasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20356: 6.089.017a ity evam ukto hanumān gatvā cauṣadhiparvatam
GE09ram_1-7u:20357: 6.089.017c cintām abhyagamac chrīmān ajānaṃs tā mahauṣadhīḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20358: 6.089.018a tasya buddhiḥ samutpannā māruter amitaujasaḥ 6.089.018c idam eva gamiṣyāmi gṛhītvā śikharaṃ gireḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20359: 6.089.019a agṛhya yadi gacchāmi viśalyakaraṇīm aham 6.089.019c kālātyayena doṣaḥ syād vaiklavyaṃ ca mahad bhavet
GE09ram_1-7u:20360: 6.089.020a iti saṃcintya hanumān gatvā kṣipraṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20361: 6.089.020c utpapāta gṛhītvā tu hanūmāñ śikharaṃ gireḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20362: 6.089.021a oṣadhīr nāvagachāmi tā ahaṃ haripuṃgava 6.089.021c tad idaṃ śikharaṃ kṛtsnaṃ gires tasyāhṛtaṃ mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:20363: 6.089.022a evaṃ kathayamānaṃ taṃ praśasya pavanātmajam 6.089.022c suṣeṇo vānaraśreṣṭho jagrāhotpāṭya cauṣadhīḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20364: 6.089.023a tataḥ saṃkṣodayitvā tām oṣadhiṃ vānarottamaḥ 6.089.023c lakṣmaṇasya dadau nastaḥ suṣeṇaḥ sumahādyutiḥ 6.089.024a saśalyaḥ sa samāghrāya lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā 6.089.024c viśalyo virujaḥ śīghram udatiṣṭhan mahītalāt 6.089.025a samutthitaṃ te harayo bhūtalāt prekṣya lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:20365: 6.089.025c sādhu sādhv iti suprītāḥ suṣeṇaṃ pratyapūjayan
GE09ram_1-7u:20366: 6.089.026a ehy ehīty abravīd rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ paravīrahā
GE09ram_1-7u:20368: 6.089.027a abravīc ca pariṣvajya saumitriṃ rāghavas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:20369: 6.089.027c diṣṭyā tvāṃ vīra paśyāmi maraṇāt punar āgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:20370: 6.089.028a na hi me jīvitenārthaḥ sītayā ca jayena vā 6.089.028c ko hi me jīvitenārthas tvayi pañcatvam āgate
GE09ram_1-7u:20371: 6.089.029a ity evaṃ vadatas tasya rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20372: 6.089.029c khinnaḥ śithilayā vācā lakṣmaṇo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:20373: 6.089.030a tāṃ pratijñāṃ pratijñāya purā satyaparākrama 6.089.030c laghuḥ kaś cid ivāsattvo naivaṃ vaktum ihārhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:20374: 6.089.031a na pratijñāṃ hi kurvanti vitathāṃ sādhavo 'nagha
GE09ram_1-7u:20375: 6.089.031c lakṣmaṇaṃ hi mahat tv asya pratijñāparipālanam
GE09ram_1-7u:20376: 6.089.032a nairāśyam upagantuṃ te tad alaṃ matkṛte 'nagha
GE09ram_1-7u:20378: 6.089.033a na jīvan yāsyate śatrus tava bāṇapathaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20380: 6.089.034a ahaṃ tu vadham icchāmi śīghram asya durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20381: 6.089.034c yāvad astaṃ na yāty eṣa kṛtakarmā divākaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20382: 6.090.001a lakṣmaṇena tu tad vākyam uktaṃ śrutvā sa rāghavaḥ 6.090.001c rāvaṇāya śarān ghorān visasarja camūmukhe 6.090.002a daśagrīvo rathasthas tu rāmaṃ vajropamaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20383: 6.090.002c ājaghāna mahāghorair dhārābhir iva toyadaḥ 6.090.003a dīptapāvakasaṃkāśaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20384: 6.090.003c nirbibheda raṇe rāmo daśagrīvaṃ samāhitaḥ 6.090.004a bhūmisthitasya rāmasya rathasthasya ca rakṣasaḥ 6.090.004c na samaṃ yuddham ity āhur devagandharvadānavāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20390: 6.090.008a abravīc ca tadā rāmaṃ sapratodo rathe sthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20391: 6.090.008c prāñjalir mātalir vākyaṃ sahasrākṣasya sārathiḥ 6.090.009a sahasrākṣeṇa kākutstha ratho 'yaṃ vijayāya te 6.090.009c dattas tava mahāsattva śrīmāñ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ 6.090.010a idam aindraṃ mahaccāpaṃ kavacaṃ cāgnisaṃnibham 6.090.010c śarāś cādityasaṃkāśāḥ śaktiś ca vimalā śitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20392: 6.090.011a āruhyemaṃ rathaṃ vīra rākṣasaṃ jahi rāvaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:20393: 6.090.011c mayā sārathinā rāma mahendra iva dānavān
GE09ram_1-7u:20394: 6.090.012a ity uktaḥ sa parikramya rathaṃ tam abhivādya ca 6.090.012c āruroha tadā rāmo lokāṃl lakṣmyā virājayan
GE09ram_1-7u:20395: 6.090.013a tad babhūvādbhutaṃ yuddhaṃ dvairathaṃ lomaharṣaṇam 6.090.013c rāmasya ca mahābāho rāvaṇasya ca rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20396: 6.090.014a sa gāndharveṇa gāndharvaṃ daivaṃ daivena rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20398: 6.090.015a astraṃ tu paramaṃ ghoraṃ rākṣasaṃ rākasādhipa
GE09ram_1-7u:20399: 6.090.015c sasarja paramakruddhaḥ punar eva niśācaraḥ 6.090.016a te rāvaṇadhanurmuktāḥ śarāḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20400: 6.090.016c abhyavartanta kākutsthaṃ sarpā bhūtvā mahāviṣāḥ 6.090.017a te dīptavadanā dīptaṃ vamanto jvalanaṃ mukhaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20403: 6.090.018c diśaś ca saṃtatāḥ sarvāḥ pradiśaś ca samāvṛtāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20404: 6.090.019a tān dṛṣṭvā pannagān rāmaḥ samāpatata āhave
GE09ram_1-7u:20405: 6.090.019c astraṃ gārutmataṃ ghoraṃ prāduścakre bhayāvaham 6.090.020a te rāghavadhanurmuktā rukmapuṅkhāḥ śikhiprabhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20406: 6.090.020c suparṇāḥ kāñcanā bhūtvā viceruḥ sarpaśatravaḥ 6.090.021a te tān sarvāñ śarāñ jaghnuḥ sarparūpān mahājavān
GE09ram_1-7u:20408: 6.090.022a astre pratihate kruddho rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ 6.090.022c abhyavarṣat tadā rāmaṃ ghorābhiḥ śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ 6.090.023a tataḥ śarasahasreṇa rāmam akliṣṭakāriṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:20410: 6.090.024a pātayitvā rathopasthe rathāt ketuṃ ca kāñcanam
GE09ram_1-7u:20412: 6.090.025a viṣedur devagandharvā dānavāś cāraṇaiḥ saha 6.090.025c rāmam ārtaṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20413: 6.090.026a vyathitā vānarendrāś ca babhūvuḥ savibhīṣaṇāḥ 6.090.026c rāmacandramasaṃ dṛṣṭvā grastaṃ rāvaṇarāhuṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:20414: 6.090.027a prājāpatyaṃ ca nakṣatraṃ rohiṇīṃ śaśinaḥ priyām
GE09ram_1-7u:20415: 6.090.027c samākramya budhas tasthau prajānām aśubhāvahaḥ 6.090.028a sadhūmaparivṛttormiḥ prajvalann iva sāgaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20416: 6.090.028c utpapāta tadā kruddhaḥ spṛśann iva divākaram
GE09ram_1-7u:20419: 6.090.030a kosalānāṃ ca nakṣatraṃ vyaktam indrāgnidaivatam 6.090.030c ākramyāṅgārakas tasthau viśākhām api cāmbare 6.090.031a daśāsyo viṃśatibhujaḥ pragṛhītaśarāsanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20420: 6.090.031c adṛśyata daśagrīvo maināka iva parvataḥ 6.090.032a nirasyamāno rāmas tu daśagrīveṇa rakṣasā 6.090.032c nāśakad abhisaṃdhātuṃ sāyakān raṇamūrdhani
GE09ram_1-7u:20421: 6.090.033a sa kṛtvā bhrukuṭīṃ kruddhaḥ kiṃ cit saṃraktalocanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20422: 6.090.033c jagāma sumahākrodhaṃ nirdahann iva cakṣuṣā 6.091.001a tasya kruddhasya vadanaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20423: 6.091.001c sarvabhūtāni vitreṣuḥ prākampata ca medinī 6.091.002a siṃhaśārdūlavāñ śailaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20424: 6.091.002c babhūva cāpi kṣubhitaḥ samudraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20425: 6.091.003a khagāś ca kharanirghoṣā gagane paruṣasvanāḥ 6.091.003c autpātikā vinardantaḥ samantāt paricakramuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20426: 6.091.004a rāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā susaṃkruddham utpātāṃś ca sudāruṇān
GE09ram_1-7u:20428: 6.091.005a vimānasthās tadā devā gandharvāś ca mahoragāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20429: 6.091.005c ṛṣidānavadaityāś ca garutmantaś ca khecarāḥ 6.091.006a dadṛśus te tadā yuddhaṃ lokasaṃvartasaṃsthitam 6.091.006c nānāpraharaṇair bhīmaiḥ śūrayoḥ saṃprayudhyatoḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20430: 6.091.007a ūcuḥ surāsurāḥ sarve tadā vigraham āgatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20431: 6.091.007c prekṣamāṇā mahāyuddhaṃ vākyaṃ bhaktyā prahṛṣṭavat 6.091.008a daśagrīvaṃ jayety āhur asurāḥ samavasthitāḥ 6.091.008c devā rāmam athocus te tvaṃ jayeti punaḥ punaḥ 6.091.009a etasminn antare krodhād rāghavasya sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20432: 6.091.009c prahartukāmo duṣṭātmā spṛśan praharaṇaṃ mahat 6.091.010a vajrasāraṃ mahānādaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:20436: 6.091.012a trāsanaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ dāraṇaṃ bhedanaṃ tathā 6.091.012c pradīpta iva roṣeṇa śūlaṃ jagrāha rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20437: 6.091.013a tac chūlaṃ paramakruddho madhye jagrāha vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:20438: 6.091.013c anekaiḥ samare śūrai rākṣasaiḥ parivāritaḥ 6.091.014a samudyamya mahākāyo nanāda yudhi bhairavam 6.091.014c saṃraktanayano roṣāt svasainyam abhiharṣayan
GE09ram_1-7u:20439: 6.091.015a pṛthivīṃ cāntarikṣaṃ ca diśaś ca pradiśas tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:20440: 6.091.015c prākampayat tadā śabdo rākṣasendrasya dāruṇaḥ 6.091.016a atinādasya nādena tena tasya durātmanaḥ 6.091.016c sarvabhūtāni vitreṣuḥ sāgaraś ca pracukṣubhe 6.091.017a sa gṛhītvā mahāvīryaḥ śūlaṃ tad rāvaṇo mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:20441: 6.091.017c vinadya sumahānādaṃ rāmaṃ paruṣam abravīt 6.091.018a śūlo 'yaṃ vajrasāras te rāma roṣān mayodyataḥ 6.091.018c tava bhrātṛsahāyasya sadyaḥ prāṇān hariṣyati 6.091.019a rakṣasām adya śūrāṇāṃ nihatānāṃ camūmukhe 6.091.019c tvāṃ nihatya raṇaślāghin karomi tarasā samam
GE09ram_1-7u:20442: 6.091.020a tiṣṭhedānīṃ nihanmi tvām eṣa śūlena rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:20443: 6.091.020c evam uktvā sa cikṣepa tac chūlaṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20444: 6.091.021a āpatantaṃ śaraugheṇa vārayām āsa rāghavaḥ 6.091.021c utpatantaṃ yugāntāgniṃ jalaughair iva vāsavaḥ 6.091.022a nirdadāha sa tān bāṇān rāmakārmukaniḥsṛtān 6.091.022c rāvaṇasya mahāśūlaḥ pataṃgān iva pāvakaḥ 6.091.023a tān dṛṣṭvā bhasmasād bhūtāñ śūlasaṃsparśacūrṇitān 6.091.023c sāyakān antarikṣasthān rāghavaḥ krodham āharat 6.091.024a sa tāṃ mātalinānītāṃ śaktiṃ vāsavanirmitām 6.091.024c jagrāha paramakruddho rāghavo raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20445: 6.091.025a sā tolitā balavatā śaktir ghaṇṭākṛtasvanā 6.091.025c nabhaḥ prajvālayām āsa yugāntoklena saprabhā 6.091.026a sā kṣiptā rākṣasendrasya tasmiñ śūle papāta ha
GE09ram_1-7u:20446: 6.091.026c bhinnaḥ śaktyā mahāñ śūlo nipapāta gatadyutiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20447: 6.091.027a nirbibheda tato bāṇair hayān asya mahājavān
GE09ram_1-7u:20448: 6.091.027c rāmas tīkṣṇair mahāvegair vajrakalpaiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20449: 6.091.028a nirbibhedorasi tadā rāvaṇaṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ 6.091.028c rāghavaḥ paramāyatto lalāṭe patribhis tribhiḥ 6.091.029a sa śarair bhinnasarvāṅgo gātraprasruta śoṇitaḥ 6.091.029c rākṣasendraḥ samūhasthaḥ phullāśoka ivābabhau
GE09ram_1-7u:20450: 6.091.030a sa rāmabāṇair atividdhagātro; niśācarendraḥ kṣatajārdragātraḥ 6.091.030c jagāma khedaṃ ca samājamadhye; krodhaṃ ca cakre subhṛśaṃ tadānīm 6.092.001a sa tu tena tadā krodhāt kākutsthenārdito raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:20452: 6.092.002a sa dīptanayano roṣāc cāpam āyamya vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:20454: 6.092.003a bāṇadhārā sahasrais tu sa toyada ivāmbarāt
GE09ram_1-7u:20455: 6.092.003c rāghavaṃ rāvaṇo bāṇais taṭākam iva pūrayat
GE09ram_1-7u:20457: 6.092.004c mahāgirir ivākampyaḥ kākustho na prakampate 6.092.005a sa śaraiḥ śarajālāni vārayan samare sthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20458: 6.092.005c gabhastīn iva sūryasya pratijagrāha vīryavān 6.092.006a tataḥ śarasahasrāṇi kṣiprahasto niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20460: 6.092.007a sa śoṇita samādigdhaḥ samare lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ 6.092.007c dṛṣṭaḥ phulla ivāraṇye sumahān kiṃśukadrumaḥ 6.092.008a śarābhighātasaṃrabdhaḥ so 'pi jagrāha sāyakān 6.092.008c kākutsthaḥ sumahātejā yugāntādityavarcasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20464: 6.092.010c uvāca rāvaṇaṃ vīraḥ prahasya paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20465: 6.092.011a mama bhāryā janasthānād ajñānād rākṣasādhama 6.092.011c hṛtā te vivaśā yasmāt tasmāt tvaṃ nāsi vīryavān 6.092.012a mayā virahitāṃ dīnāṃ vartamānāṃ mahāvane 6.092.012c vaidehīṃ prasabhaṃ hṛtvā śūro 'ham iti manyase 6.092.013a strīṣu śūra vināthāsu paradārābhimarśake
GE09ram_1-7u:20466: 6.092.013c kṛtvā kāpuruṣaṃ karma śūro 'ham iti manyase 6.092.014a bhinnamaryāda nirlajja cāritreṣv anavasthita
GE09ram_1-7u:20467: 6.092.014c darpān mṛtyum upādāya śūro 'ham iti manyase 6.092.015a śūreṇa dhanadabhrātrā balaiḥ samuditena ca 6.092.015c ślāghanīyaṃ yaśasyaṃ ca kṛtaṃ karma mahat tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:20469: 6.092.016c karmaṇaḥ prāpnuhīdānīṃ tasyādya sumahat phalam 6.092.017a śūro 'ham iti cātmānam avagacchasi durmate
GE09ram_1-7u:20470: 6.092.017c naiva lajjāsti te sītāṃ coravad vyapakarṣataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20471: 6.092.018a yadi matsaṃnidhau sītā dharṣitā syāt tvayā balāt
GE09ram_1-7u:20472: 6.092.018c bhrātaraṃ tu kharaṃ paśyes tadā matsāyakair hataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20473: 6.092.019a diṣṭyāsi mama duṣṭātmaṃś cakṣurviṣayam āgataḥ 6.092.019c adya tvāṃ sāyakais tīkṣṇair nayāmi yamasādanam
GE09ram_1-7u:20474: 6.092.020a adya te maccharaiś chinnaṃ śiro jvalitakuṇḍalam
GE09ram_1-7u:20476: 6.092.021a nipatyorasi gṛdhrās te kṣitau kṣiptasya rāvaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:20478: 6.092.022a adya madbāṇābhinnasya gatāsoḥ patitasya te 6.092.022c karṣantv antrāṇi patagā garutmanta ivoragān 6.092.023a ity evaṃ sa vadan vīro rāmaḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20480: 6.092.024a babhūva dviguṇaṃ vīryaṃ balaṃ harṣaś ca saṃyuge
GE09ram_1-7u:20484: 6.092.026a śubhāny etāni cihnāni vijñāyātmagatāni saḥ 6.092.026c bhūya evārdayad rāmo rāvaṇaṃ rākṣasāntakṛt 6.092.027a harīṇāṃ cāśmanikaraiḥ śaravarṣaiś ca rāghavāt 6.092.027c hanyamāno daśagrīvo vighūrṇahṛdayo 'bhavat
GE09ram_1-7u:20485: 6.092.028a yadā ca śastraṃ nārebhe na vyakarṣac charāsanam
GE09ram_1-7u:20487: 6.092.029a kṣiptāś cāpi śarās tena śastrāṇi vividhāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:20489: 6.092.030a sūtas tu rathanetāsya tadavasthaṃ nirīkṣya tam
GE09ram_1-7u:20490: 6.092.030c śanair yuddhād asaṃbhānto rathaṃ tasyāpavāhayat 6.093.001a sa tu mohāt susaṃkruddhaḥ kṛtāntabalacoditaḥ 6.093.001c krodhasaṃraktanayano rāvaṇo sūtam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:20492: 6.093.002c bhīruṃ laghum ivāsattvaṃ vihīnam iva tejasā
GE09ram_1-7u:20493: 6.093.003a vimuktam iva māyābhir astrair iva bahiṣkṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:20494: 6.093.003c mām avajñāya durbuddhe svayā buddhyā viceṣṭase
GE09ram_1-7u:20495: 6.093.004a kimarthaṃ mām avajñāya macchandam anavekṣya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:20498: 6.093.005c yaśo vīryaṃ ca tejaś ca pratyayaś ca vināśitha 6.093.006a śatroḥ prakhyātavīryasya rañjanīyasya vikramaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20500: 6.093.007a yas tvaṃ ratham imaṃ mohān na codvahasi durmate 6.093.007c satyo 'yaṃ pratitarko me pareṇa tvam upaskṛtaḥ 6.093.008a na hīdaṃ vidyate karma suhṛdo hitakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20501: 6.093.008c ripūṇāṃ sadṛśaṃ caitan na tvayaitat svanuṣṭhitam
GE09ram_1-7u:20502: 6.093.009a nivartaya rathaṃ śīghraṃ yāvan nāpaiti me ripuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20503: 6.093.009c yadi vāpy uṣito 'si tvaṃ smaryante yadi vā guṇāḥ 6.093.010a evaṃ paruṣam uktas tu hitabuddhir abuddhinā
GE09ram_1-7u:20504: 6.093.010c abravīd rāvaṇaṃ sūto hitaṃ sānunayaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20505: 6.093.011a na bhīto 'smi na mūḍho 'smi nopajapto 'smi śatrubhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20506: 6.093.011c na pramatto na niḥsneho vismṛtā na ca satkriyā 6.093.012a mayā tu hitakāmena yaśaś ca parirakṣatā
GE09ram_1-7u:20507: 6.093.012c snehapraskannamanasā priyam ity apriyaṃ kṛtam 6.093.013a nāsminn arthe mahārāja tvaṃ māṃ priyahite ratam
GE09ram_1-7u:20508: 6.093.013c kaś cil laghur ivānāryo doṣato gantum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:20509: 6.093.014a śrūyatām abhidhāsyāmi yannimittaṃ mayā rathaḥ 6.093.014c nadīvega ivāmbhobhiḥ saṃyuge vinivartitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20511: 6.093.015c na hi te vīra saumukhyaṃ praharṣaṃ vopadhāraye
GE09ram_1-7u:20512: 6.093.016a rathodvahanakhinnāś ca ta ime rathavājinaḥ 6.093.016c dīnā gharmapariśrāntā gāvo varṣahatā iva 6.093.017a nimittāni ca bhūyiṣṭhaṃ yāni prādurbhavanti naḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20513: 6.093.017c teṣu teṣv abhipanneṣu lakṣayāmy apradakṣiṇam 6.093.018a deśakālau ca vijñeyau lakṣmaṇānīṅgitāni ca 6.093.018c dainyaṃ harṣaś ca khedaś ca rathinaś ca balābalam 6.093.019a sthalanimnāni bhūmeś ca samāni viṣamāṇi ca
GE09ram_1-7u:20516: 6.093.020c sarvam etad rathasthena jñeyaṃ rathakuṭumbinā 6.093.021a tava viśrāmahetos tu tathaiṣāṃ rathavājinām 6.093.021c raudraṃ varjayatā khedaṃ kṣamaṃ kṛtam idaṃ mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:20517: 6.093.022a na mayā svecchayā vīra ratho 'yam apavāhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20520: 6.093.023c tat kariṣyāmy ahaṃ vīraṃ gatānṛṇyena cetasā
GE09ram_1-7u:20521: 6.093.024a saṃtuṣṭas tena vākyena rāvaṇas tasya sāratheḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20523: 6.093.025a rathaṃ śīghram imaṃ sūta rāghavābhimukhaṃ kuru
GE09ram_1-7u:20524: 6.093.025c nāhatvā samare śatrūn nivartiṣyati rāvaṇaḥ 6.093.026a evam uktvā tatas tuṣṭo rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20525: 6.093.026c dadau tasya śubhaṃ hy ekaṃ hastābharaṇam uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:20526: 6.093.027a tato drutaṃ rāvaṇavākyacoditaḥ; pracodayām āsa hayān sa sārathiḥ 6.093.027c sa rākṣasendrasya tato mahārathaḥ; kṣaṇena rāmasya raṇāgrato
GE09ram_1-7u:20528: 6.094.001a tam āpatantaṃ sahasā svanavantaṃ mahādhvajam 6.094.001c rathaṃ rākṣasarājasya nararājo dadarśa ha 6.094.002a kṛṣṇavājisamāyuktaṃ yuktaṃ raudreṇa varcasā
GE09ram_1-7u:20530: 6.094.003a taṃ dṛṣṭvā meghasaṃkāśam āpatantaṃ rathaṃ ripoḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20532: 6.094.003e uvāca mātaliṃ rāmaḥ sahasrākṣasya sārathim 6.094.004a mātale paśya saṃrabdham āpatantaṃ rathaṃ ripoḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20533: 6.094.004c yathāpasavyaṃ patatā vegena mahatā punaḥ 6.094.004e samare hantum ātmānaṃ tathānena kṛtā matiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20534: 6.094.005a tad apramādam ātiṣṭha pratyudgaccha rathaṃ ripoḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20535: 6.094.005c vidhvaṃsayitum icchāmi vāyur megham ivotthitam 6.094.006a aviklavam asaṃbhrāntam
GE09ram_1-7u:20537: 6.094.007a kāmaṃ na tvaṃ samādheyaḥ puraṃdararathocitaḥ 6.094.007c yuyutsur aham ekāgraḥ smāraye tvāṃ na śikṣaye
GE09ram_1-7u:20538: 6.094.008a parituṣṭaḥ sa rāmasya tena vākyena mātaliḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20540: 6.094.009a apasavyaṃ tataḥ kurvan rāvaṇasya mahāratham 6.094.009c cakrotkṣiptena rajasā rāvaṇaṃ vyavadhūnayat
GE09ram_1-7u:20543: 6.094.011a dharṣaṇāmarṣito rāmo dhairyaṃ roṣeṇa laṅghayan 6.094.011c jagrāha sumahāvegam aindraṃ yudhi śarāsanam 6.094.011e śarāṃś ca sumahātejāḥ sūryaraśmisamaprabhān
GE09ram_1-7u:20544: 6.094.012a tad upoḍhaṃ mahad yuddham anyonyavadhakāṅkṣiṇoḥ 6.094.012c parasparābhimukhayor dṛptayor iva siṃhayoḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20545: 6.094.013a tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20548: 6.094.014c rāvaṇasya vināśāya rāghavasya jayāya ca 6.094.015a vavarṣa rudhiraṃ devo rāvaṇasya rathopari 6.094.015c vātā maṇḍalinas tīvrā apasavyaṃ pracakramuḥ 6.094.016a mahad gṛdhrakulaṃ cāsya bhramamāṇaṃ nabhastale 6.094.016c yena yena ratho yāti tena tena pradhāvati
GE09ram_1-7u:20551: 6.094.018a sanirghātā maholkāś ca saṃpracetur mahāsvanāḥ 6.094.018c viṣādayantyo rakṣāṃsi rāvaṇasya tadāhitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20552: 6.094.019a rāvaṇaś ca yatas tatra pracacāla vasuṃdharā
GE09ram_1-7u:20553: 6.094.019c rakṣasāṃ ca praharatāṃ gṛhītā iva bāhavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20554: 6.094.020a tāmrāḥ pītāḥ sitāḥ śvetāḥ patitāḥ sūryaraśmayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20556: 6.094.021a gṛdhrair anugatāś cāsya vamantyo jvalanaṃ mukhaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20557: 6.094.021c praṇedur mukham īkṣantyaḥ saṃrabdham aśivaṃ śivāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20558: 6.094.022a pratikūlaṃ vavau vāyū raṇe pāṃsūn samutkiran
GE09ram_1-7u:20560: 6.094.023a nipetur indrāśanayaḥ sainye cāsya samantataḥ 6.094.023c durviṣahya svanā ghorā vinā jaladharasvanam 6.094.024a diśaś ca pradiśaḥ sarvā babhūvus timirāvṛtāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20562: 6.094.025a kurvantyaḥ kalahaṃ ghoraṃ sārikās tadrathaṃ prati
GE09ram_1-7u:20563: 6.094.025c nipetuḥ śataśas tatra dāruṇā dāruṇasvanāḥ 6.094.026a jaghanebhyaḥ sphuliṅgāṃś ca netrebhyo 'śrūṇi saṃtatam
GE09ram_1-7u:20564: 6.094.026c mumucus tasya turagās tulyam agniṃ ca vāri ca 6.094.027a evaṃ prakārā bahavaḥ samutpātā bhayāvahāḥ 6.094.027c rāvaṇasya vināśāya dāruṇāḥ saṃprajajñire
GE09ram_1-7u:20565: 6.094.028a rāmasyāpi nimittāni saumyāni ca śivāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:20567: 6.094.029a tato nirīkṣyātmagatāni rāghavo; raṇe nimittāni nimittakovidaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20568: 6.094.029c jagāma harṣaṃ ca parāṃ ca nirvṛtiṃ; cakāra yuddhe 'bhyadhikaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:20569: ca vikramam 6.095.001a tataḥ pravṛttaṃ sukrūraṃ rāmarāvaṇayos tadā 6.095.001c sumahad dvairathaṃ yuddhaṃ sarvalokabhayāvaham
GE09ram_1-7u:20570: 6.095.002a tato rākṣasasainyaṃ ca harīṇāṃ ca mahad balam
GE09ram_1-7u:20572: 6.095.003a saṃprayuddhau tato dṛṣṭvā balavan nararākṣasau 6.095.003c vyākṣiptahṛdayāḥ sarve paraṃ vismayam āgatāḥ 6.095.004a nānāpraharaṇair vyagrair bhujair vismitabuddhayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20573: 6.095.004c tasthuḥ prekṣya ca saṃgrāmaṃ nābhijaghnuḥ parasparam
GE09ram_1-7u:20574: 6.095.005a rakṣasāṃ rāvaṇaṃ cāpi vānarāṇāṃ ca rāghavam
GE09ram_1-7u:20575: 6.095.005c paśyatāṃ vismitākṣāṇāṃ sainyaṃ citram ivābabhau 6.095.006a tau tu tatra nimittāni dṛṣṭvā rāghavarāvaṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:20577: 6.095.007a jetavyam iti kākutstho martavyam iti rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20579: 6.095.008a tataḥ krodhād daśagrīvaḥ śarān saṃdhāya vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:20580: 6.095.008c mumoca dhvajam uddiśya rāghavasya rathe sthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:20581: 6.095.009a te śarās tam anāsādya puraṃdararathadhvajam 6.095.009c raktaśaktiṃ parāmṛśya nipetur dharaṇītale
GE09ram_1-7u:20584: 6.095.011a rāvaṇadhvajam uddiśya mumoca niśitaṃ śaram 6.095.011c mahāsarpam ivāsahyaṃ jvalantaṃ svena tejasā 6.095.012a jagāma sa mahīṃ bhittvā daśagrīvadhvajaṃ śaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20587: 6.095.013c krodhajenāgninā saṃkhye pradīpta iva cābhavat 6.095.014a sa roṣavaśam āpannaḥ śaravarṣaṃ mahad vaman
GE09ram_1-7u:20588: 6.095.014c rāmasya turagān divyāñ śarair vivyādha rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20589: 6.095.015a te viddhā harayas tasya nāskhalan nāpi babhramuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20591: 6.095.016a teṣām asaṃbhramaṃ dṛṣṭvā vājināṃ rāvaṇas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:20592: 6.095.016c bhūya eva susaṃkruddhaḥ śaravarṣaṃ mumoca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:20593: 6.095.017a gadāś ca parighāṃś caiva cakrāṇi musalāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:20594: 6.095.017c giriśṛṅgāṇi vṛkṣāṃś ca tathā śūlaparaśvadhān 6.095.018a māyā vihitam etat tu śastravarṣam apātayat
GE09ram_1-7u:20597: 6.095.019c durdharṣam abhavad yuddhe naikaśastramayaṃ mahat 6.095.020a vimucya rāghavarathaṃ samantād vānare bale 6.095.020c sāyakair antarikṣaṃ ca cakārāśu nirantaram 6.095.020e mumoca ca daśagrīvo niḥsaṅgenāntarātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:20598: 6.095.021a vyāyacchamānaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā tatparaṃ rāvaṇaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:20599: 6.095.021c prahasann iva kākutsthaḥ saṃdadhe sāyakāñ śitān
GE09ram_1-7u:20600: 6.095.022a sa mumoca tato bāṇān raṇe śatasahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20601: 6.095.022c tān dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇaś cakre svaśaraiḥ khaṃ nirantaram
GE09ram_1-7u:20602: 6.095.023a tatas tābhyāṃ prayuktena śaravarṣeṇa bhāsvatā 6.095.023c śarabaddham ivābhāti dvitīyaṃ bhāsvad ambaram 6.095.024a nānimitto 'bhavad bāṇo nātibhettā na niṣphalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20603: 6.095.024c tathā visṛjator bāṇān rāmarāvaṇayor mṛdhe 6.095.025a prāyudhyetām avicchinnam asyantau savyadakṣiṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:20604: 6.095.025c cakratus tau śaraughais tu nirucchvāsam ivāmbaram
GE09ram_1-7u:20605: 6.095.026a rāvaṇasya hayān rāmo hayān rāmasya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20607: 6.096.001a tau tathā yudhyamānau tu samare rāmarāvaṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:20609: 6.096.002a ardayantau tu samare tayos tau syandanottamau
GE09ram_1-7u:20611: 6.096.003a maṇḍalāni ca vīthīś ca gatapratyāgatāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:20612: 6.096.003c darśayantau bahuvidhāṃ sūtau sārathyajāṃ gatim 6.096.004a ardayan rāvaṇaṃ rāmo rāghavaṃ cāpi rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20614: 6.096.005a kṣipatoḥ śarajālāni tayos tau syandanottamau 6.096.005c ceratuḥ saṃyugamahīṃ sāsārau jaladāv iva 6.096.006a darśayitvā tadā tau tu gatiṃ bahuvidhāṃ raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:20615: 6.096.006c parasparasyābhimukhau punar eva ca tasthatuḥ 6.096.007a dhuraṃ dhureṇa rathayor vaktraṃ vaktreṇa vājinām
GE09ram_1-7u:20616: 6.096.007c patākāś ca patākābhiḥ sameyuḥ sthitayos tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:20617: 6.096.008a rāvaṇasya tato rāmo dhanurmuktaiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20618: 6.096.008c caturbhiś caturo dīptān hayān pratyapasarpayat 6.096.009a sa krodhavaśam āpanno hayānām apasarpaṇe 6.096.009c mumoca niśitān bāṇān rāghavāya niśācaraḥ 6.096.010a so 'tividdho balavatā daśagrīveṇa rāghavaḥ
