GE09ram_1-7u:20619: 6.096.010c jagāma na vikāraṃ ca na cāpi vyathito 'bhavat
GE09ram_1-7u:20620: 6.096.011a cikṣepa ca punar bāṇān vajrapātasamasvanān 6.096.011c sārathiṃ vajrahastasya samuddiśya niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20621: 6.096.012a mātales tu mahāvegāḥ śarīre patitāḥ śarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20622: 6.096.012c na sūkṣmam api saṃmohaṃ vyathāṃ vā pradadur yudhi 6.096.013a tayā dharṣaṇayā kroddho mātaler na tathātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20623: 6.096.013c cakāra śarajālena rāghavo vimukhaṃ ripum 6.096.014a viṃśatiṃ triṃśataṃ ṣaṣṭiṃ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20624: 6.096.014c mumoca rāghavo vīraḥ sāyakān syandane ripoḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20625: 6.096.015a gadānāṃ musalānāṃ ca parighāṇāṃ ca nisvanaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20626: 6.096.015c śarāṇāṃ puṅkhavātaiś ca kṣubhitāḥ saptasāgarāḥ 6.096.016a kṣubdhānāṃ sāgarāṇāṃ ca pātālatalavāsinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20627: 6.096.016c vyathitāḥ pannagāḥ sarve dānavāś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20629: 6.096.017c bhāskaro niṣprabhaś cābhūn na vavau cāpi mārutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20630: 6.096.018a tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20633: 6.096.019c jayatāṃ rāghavaḥ saṃkhye rāvaṇaṃ rākṣaseśvaram 6.096.020a tataḥ kruddho mahābāhū raghūṇāṃ kīrtivardhanaḥ 6.096.020c saṃdhāya dhanuṣā rāmaḥ kṣuram āśīviṣopamam 6.096.020e rāvaṇasya śiro 'cchindac chrīmaj jvalitakuṇḍalam 6.096.021a tac chiraḥ patitaṃ bhūmau dṛṣṭaṃ lokais tribhis tadā 6.096.021c tasyaiva sadṛśaṃ cānyad rāvaṇasyotthitaṃ śiraḥ 6.096.022a tat kṣipraṃ kṣiprahastena rāmeṇa kṣiprakāriṇā 6.096.022c dvitīyaṃ rāvaṇaśiraś chinnaṃ saṃyati sāyakaiḥ 6.096.023a chinnamātraṃ ca tac chīrṣaṃ punar anyat sma dṛśyate 6.096.023c tad apy aśanisaṃkāśaiś chinnaṃ rāmeṇa sāyakaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20634: 6.096.024a evam eva śataṃ chinnaṃ śirasāṃ tulyavarcasām
GE09ram_1-7u:20635: 6.096.024c na caiva rāvaṇasyānto dṛśyate jīvitakṣaye 6.096.025a tataḥ sarvāstravid vīraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20636: 6.096.025c mārgaṇair bahubhir yuktaś cintayām āsa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20637: 6.096.026a mārīco nihato yais tu kharo yais tu sudūṣaṇaḥ 6.096.026c krañcāraṇye virādhas tu kabandho daṇḍakā vane
GE09ram_1-7u:20638: 6.096.027a ta ime sāyakāḥ sarve yuddhe pratyayikā mama
GE09ram_1-7u:20639: 6.096.027c kiṃ nu tat kāraṇaṃ yena rāvaṇe mandatejasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20640: 6.096.028a iti cintāparaś cāsīd apramattaś ca saṃyuge
GE09ram_1-7u:20644: 6.096.030a devadānavayakṣāṇāṃ piśācoragarakṣasām 6.096.030c paśyatāṃ tan mahad yuddhaṃ sarvarātram avartata
GE09ram_1-7u:20645: 6.096.031a naiva ratriṃ na divasaṃ na muhūrtaṃ na cakṣaṇam 6.096.031c rāmarāvaṇayor yuddhaṃ virāmam upagacchati
GE09ram_1-7u:20646: 6.097.001a atha saṃsmārayām āsa rāghavaṃ mātalis tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:20647: 6.097.001c ajānann iva kiṃ vīra tvam enam anuvartase
GE09ram_1-7u:20648: 6.097.002a visṛjāsmai vadhāya tvam astraṃ paitāmahaṃ prabho
GE09ram_1-7u:20649: 6.097.002c vināśakālaḥ kathito yaḥ suraiḥ so 'dya vartate
GE09ram_1-7u:20650: 6.097.003a tataḥ saṃsmārito rāmas tena vākyena mātaleḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20651: 6.097.003c jagrāha sa śaraṃ dīptaṃ niśvasantam ivoragam
GE09ram_1-7u:20652: 6.097.004a yam asmai prathamaṃ prādād agastyo bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20653: 6.097.004c brahmadattaṃ mahad bāṇam amoghaṃ yudhi vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:20654: 6.097.005a brahmaṇā nirmitaṃ pūrvam indrārtham amitaujasā 6.097.005c dattaṃ surapateḥ pūrvaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:20655: 6.097.006a yasya vājeṣu pavanaḥ phale pāvakabhāskarau 6.097.006c śarīram ākāśamayaṃ gaurave
GE09ram_1-7u:20658: 6.097.008a sadhūmam iva kālāgniṃ dīptam āśīviṣaṃ yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:20660: 6.097.009a dvārāṇāṃ parighāṇāṃ ca girīṇām api bhedanam
GE09ram_1-7u:20663: 6.097.010c sarvavitrāsanaṃ bhīmaṃ śvasantam iva pannagam 6.097.011a kaṅkagṛdhrabalānāṃ ca gomāyugaṇarakṣasām
GE09ram_1-7u:20664: 6.097.011c nityaṃ bhakṣapradaṃ yuddhe yamarūpaṃ bhayāvaham 6.097.012a nandanaṃ vānarendrāṇāṃ rakṣasām avasādanam
GE09ram_1-7u:20665: 6.097.012c vājitaṃ vividhair vājaiś cārucitrair garutmataḥ 6.097.013a tam uttameṣuṃ lokānām
GE09ram_1-7u:20667: 6.097.014a abhimantrya tato rāmas taṃ maheṣuṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20668: 6.097.014c vedaproktena vidhinā saṃdadhe kārmuke balī 6.097.015a sa rāvaṇāya saṃkruddho bhṛśam āyamya kārmukam
GE09ram_1-7u:20669: 6.097.015c cikṣepa param āyattas taṃ śaraṃ marmaghātinam
GE09ram_1-7u:20670: 6.097.016a sa vajra iva durdharṣo vajrabāhuvisarjitaḥ 6.097.016c kṛtānta iva cāvāryo nyapatad rāvaṇorasi 6.097.017a sa visṛṣṭo mahāvegaḥ śarīrāntakaraḥ śaraḥ 6.097.017c bibheda hṛdayaṃ tasya rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ 6.097.018a rudhirāktaḥ sa vegena jīvitāntakaraḥ śaraḥ 6.097.018c rāvaṇasya haran prāṇān viveśa dharaṇītalam 6.097.019a sa śaro rāvaṇaṃ hatvā rudhirārdrakṛtacchaviḥ 6.097.019c kṛtakarmā nibhṛtavat svatūṇīṃ punar āviśat 6.097.020a tasya hastād dhatasyāśu kārmukaṃ tat sasāyakam
GE09ram_1-7u:20671: 6.097.020c nipapāta saha prāṇair bhraśyamānasya jīvitāt 6.097.021a gatāsur bhīmavegas tu nairṛtendro mahādyutiḥ 6.097.021c papāta syandanād bhūmau vṛtro vajrahato yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:20672: 6.097.022a taṃ dṛṣṭvā patitaṃ bhūmau hataśeṣā niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20674: 6.097.023a nardantaś cābhipetus tān vānarā drumayodhinaḥ 6.097.023c daśagrīvavadhaṃ dṛṣṭvā vijayaṃ rāghavasya ca 6.097.024a arditā vānarair hṛṣṭair laṅkām abhyapatan bhayāt
GE09ram_1-7u:20676: 6.097.025a tato vineduḥ saṃhṛṣṭā vānarā jitakāśinaḥ 6.097.025c vadanto rāghavajayaṃ rāvaṇasya ca taṃ vadham
GE09ram_1-7u:20678: 6.097.026c divyagandhavahas tatra mārutaḥ susukho vavau 6.097.027a nipapātāntarikṣāc ca puṣpavṛṣṭis tadā bhuvi 6.097.027c kirantī rāghavarathaṃ duravāpā manoharāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20679: 6.097.028a rāghavas tava saṃyuktā gagane ca viśuśruve
GE09ram_1-7u:20680: 6.097.028c sādhu sādhv iti vāg agryā devatānāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_1-7u:20681: 6.097.029a āviveśa mahān harṣo devānāṃ cāraṇaiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:20683: 6.097.030a tataḥ sakāmaṃ sugrīvam aṅgadaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_1-7u:20684: 6.097.030c cakāra rāghavaḥ prīto hatvā rākṣasapuṃgavam 6.097.031a tataḥ prajagmuḥ praśamaṃ marudgaṇā; diśaḥ prasedur vimalaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:20686: 6.097.031c mahī cakampe na ca mārutā vavuḥ; sthiraprabhaś cāpy abhavad
GE09ram_1-7u:20688: 6.097.032a tatas tu sugrīvavibhīṣaṇādayaḥ; suhṛdviśeṣāḥ sahalakṣmaṇās tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:20691: 6.097.033a sa tu nihataripuḥ sthirapratijñaḥ; svajanabalābhivṛto raṇe rarāja
GE09ram_1-7u:20693: 6.098.001a rāvaṇaṃ nihataṃ śrutvā rāghaveṇa mahātmanā 6.098.001c antaḥpurād viniṣpetū rākṣasyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20695: 6.098.002c vimuktakeśyo duḥkhārtā gāvo vatsahatā yathā 6.098.003a uttareṇa viniṣkramya dvāreṇa saha rākṣasaiḥ 6.098.003c praviśyāyodhanaṃ ghoraṃ vicinvantyo hataṃ patim 6.098.004a āryaputreti vādinyo hā nātheti ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20698: 6.098.005c kareṇva iva nardantyo vinedur hatayūthapāḥ 6.098.006a dadṛśus tā mahākāyaṃ mahāvīryaṃ mahādyutim 6.098.006c rāvaṇaṃ nihataṃ bhūmau nīlāñjanacayopamam
GE09ram_1-7u:20699: 6.098.007a tāḥ patiṃ sahasā dṛṣṭvā śayānaṃ raṇapāṃsuṣu
GE09ram_1-7u:20700: 6.098.007c nipetus tasya gātreṣu chinnā vanalatā iva
GE09ram_1-7u:20701: 6.098.008a bahumānāt pariṣvajya kā cid enaṃ ruroda ha
GE09ram_1-7u:20702: 6.098.008c caraṇau kā cid āliṅgya kā cit kaṇṭhe 'valambya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:20703: 6.098.009a uddhṛtya ca bhujau kā cid bhūmau sma parivartate 6.098.009c hatasya vadanaṃ dṛṣṭvā kā cin moham upāgamat
GE09ram_1-7u:20704: 6.098.010a kā cid aṅke śiraḥ kṛtvā ruroda mukham īkṣatī 6.098.010c snāpayantī mukhaṃ bāṣpais tuṣārair iva paṅkajam
GE09ram_1-7u:20705: 6.098.011a evam ārtāḥ patiṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇaṃ nihataṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_1-7u:20706: 6.098.011c cukruśur bahudhā śokād bhūyas tāḥ paryadevayan
GE09ram_1-7u:20707: 6.098.012a yena vitrāsitaḥ śakro yena vitrāsito yamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20708: 6.098.012c yena vaiśravaṇo rājā puṣpakeṇa viyojitaḥ 6.098.013a gandharvāṇām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca surāṇāṃ ca mahātmanām
GE09ram_1-7u:20709: 6.098.013c bhayaṃ yena mahad dattaṃ so 'yaṃ śete raṇe hataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20710: 6.098.014a asurebhyaḥ surebhyo vā pannagebhyo 'pi vā tathā 6.098.014c na bhayaṃ yo vijānāti tasyedaṃ mānuṣād bhayam
GE09ram_1-7u:20711: 6.098.015a avadhyo devatānāṃ yas tathā dānavarakṣasām 6.098.015c hataḥ so 'yaṃ raṇe śete mānuṣeṇa padātinā
GE09ram_1-7u:20712: 6.098.016a yo na śakyaḥ surair hantuṃ na yakṣair nāsurais tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:20713: 6.098.016c so 'yaṃ kaś cid ivāsattvo mṛtyuṃ martyena lambhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20714: 6.098.017a evaṃ vadantyo bahudhā rurudus tasya tāḥ striyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20715: 6.098.017c bhūya eva ca duḥkhārtā vilepuś ca punaḥ punaḥ 6.098.018a aśṛṇvatā tu suhṛdāṃ satataṃ hitavādinām 6.098.018c etāḥ samam idānīṃ te vayam ātmā ca pātitāḥ 6.098.019a bruvāṇo 'pi hitaṃ vākyam iṣṭo bhrātā vibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.098.019c dhṛṣṭaṃ paruṣito mohāt tvayātmavadhakāṅkṣiṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:20716: 6.098.020a yadi niryātitā te syāt sītā rāmāya maithilī
GE09ram_1-7u:20717: 6.098.020c na naḥ syād vyasanaṃ ghoram idaṃ mūlaharaṃ mahat 6.098.021a vṛttakāmo bhaved bhrātā rāmo mitrakulaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_1-7u:20718: 6.098.021c vayaṃ cāvidhavāḥ sarvāḥ sakāmā na ca śatravaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20719: 6.098.022a tvayā punar nṛśaṃsena sītāṃ saṃrundhatā balāt
GE09ram_1-7u:20720: 6.098.022c rākṣasā vayam ātmā ca trayaṃ tulaṃ nipātitam
GE09ram_1-7u:20721: 6.098.023a na kāmakāraḥ kāmaṃ vā tava rākṣasapuṃgava
GE09ram_1-7u:20722: 6.098.023c daivaṃ ceṣṭayate sarvaṃ hataṃ daivena hanyate
GE09ram_1-7u:20723: 6.098.024a vānarāṇāṃ vināśo 'yaṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca te raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:20724: 6.098.024c tava caiva mahābāho daivayogād upāgataḥ 6.098.025a naivārthena na kāmena vikrameṇa na cājñayā
GE09ram_1-7u:20725: 6.098.025c śakyā daivagatir loke nivartayitum udyatā 6.098.026a vilepur evaṃ dīnās tā rākṣasādhipayoṣitaḥ 6.098.026c kurarya iva duḥkhārtā bāṣpaparyākulekṣaṇāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20727: 6.099.001c jyeṣṭhā patnī priyā dīnā bhartāraṃ samudaikṣata
GE09ram_1-7u:20729: 6.099.002c patiṃ mandodarī tatra kṛpaṇā paryadevayat 6.099.003a nanu nāma mahābāho tava vaiśravaṇānuja 6.099.003c kruddhasya pramukhe sthātuṃ trasyaty api puraṃdaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20730: 6.099.004a ṛṣayaś ca mahīdevā gandharvāś ca yaśasvinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20731: 6.099.004c nanu nāma tavodvegāc cāraṇāś ca diśo gatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20732: 6.099.005a sa tvaṃ mānuṣamātreṇa rāmeṇa yudhi nirjitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20733: 6.099.005c na vyapatrapase rājan kim idaṃ rākṣasarṣabha
GE09ram_1-7u:20734: 6.099.006a kathaṃ trailokyam ākramya śriyā vīryeṇa cānvitam
GE09ram_1-7u:20735: 6.099.006c aviṣahyaṃ jaghāna tvaṃ mānuṣo vanagocaraḥ 6.099.007a mānuṣāṇām aviṣaye carataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20736: 6.099.007c vināśas tava rāmeṇa saṃyuge nopapadyate 6.099.008a na caitat karma rāmasya śraddadhāmi
GE09ram_1-7u:20738: 6.099.009a indriyāṇi purā jitvā jitaṃ tribhuvaṇaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:20739: 6.099.009c smaradbhir iva tad vairam indriyair eva nirjitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20740: 6.099.010a atha vā rāmarūpeṇa vāsavaḥ svayam āgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20742: 6.099.011a yadaiva hi janasthāne rākṣasair bahubhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20743: 6.099.011c kharas tava hato bhrātā tadaivāsau na mānuṣaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20744: 6.099.012a yadaiva nagarīṃ laṅkāṃ duṣpraveṣāṃ surair api
GE09ram_1-7u:20745: 6.099.012c praviṣṭo hanumān vīryāt tadaiva vyathitā vayam
GE09ram_1-7u:20746: 6.099.013a kriyatām avirodhaś ca rāghaveṇeti yan mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:20747: 6.099.013c ucyamāno na gṛhṇāsi tasyeyaṃ vyuṣṭir āgatā
GE09ram_1-7u:20748: 6.099.014a akasmāc cābhikāmo 'si sītāṃ rākṣasapuṃgava 6.099.014c aiśvaryasya vināśāya dehasya svajanasya ca 6.099.015a arundhatyā viśiṣṭāṃ tāṃ rohiṇyāś cāpi durmate
GE09ram_1-7u:20749: 6.099.015c sītāṃ dharṣayatā mānyāṃ tvayā hy asadṛśaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:20750: 6.099.016a na kulena na rūpeṇa na dākṣiṇyena maithilī
GE09ram_1-7u:20751: 6.099.016c mayādhikā vā tulyā vā tvaṃ tu mohān na budhyase
GE09ram_1-7u:20752: 6.099.017a sarvathā sarvabhūtānāṃ nāsti mṛtyur alakṣaṇaḥ 6.099.017c tava tāvad ayaṃ mṛtyur maithilīkṛtalakṣaṇaḥ 6.099.018a maithilī saha rāmeṇa viśokā vihariṣyati 6.099.018c alpapuṇyā tv ahaṃ ghore patitā śokasāgare
GE09ram_1-7u:20753: 6.099.019a kailāse mandare merau tathā caitrarathe vane
GE09ram_1-7u:20754: 6.099.019c devodyāneṣu sarveṣu vihṛtya sahitā tvayā 6.099.020a vimānenānurūpeṇa yā yāmy atulayā śriyā 6.099.020c paśyantī vividhān deśāṃs tāṃs tāṃś citrasragambarā
GE09ram_1-7u:20755: 6.099.020e bhraṃśitā kāmabhogebhyaḥ sāsmi vīravadhāt tava 6.099.021a satyavāk sa mahābhāgo devaro me yad abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:20758: 6.099.022c tvayā kṛtam idaṃ sarvam anāthaṃ rakṣasāṃ kulam
GE09ram_1-7u:20759: 6.099.023a na hi tvaṃ śocitavyo me prakhyātabalapauruṣaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20760: 6.099.023c strīsvabhāvāt tu me buddhiḥ kāruṇye parivartate
GE09ram_1-7u:20761: 6.099.024a sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ ca tvaṃ gṛhītvā svāṃ gatiṃ gataḥ 6.099.024c ātmānam anuśocāmi tvadviyogena duḥkhitām
GE09ram_1-7u:20762: 6.099.025a nīlajīmūtasaṃkāśaḥ pītāmbaraśubhāṅgadaḥ 6.099.025c sarvagātrāṇi vikṣipya kiṃ śeṣe rudhirāplutaḥ 6.099.025e prasupta iva śokārtāṃ kiṃ māṃ na pratibhāṣase
GE09ram_1-7u:20764: 6.099.026c yātudhānasya dauhitrīṃ kiṃ tvaṃ māṃ nābhyudīkṣase
GE09ram_1-7u:20765: 6.099.027a yena sūdayase śatrūn samare sūryavarcasā 6.099.027c vajro vajradharasyeva so 'yaṃ te satatārcitaḥ 6.099.028a raṇe śatrupraharaṇo hemajālapariṣkṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20766: 6.099.028c parigho vyavakīrṇas te bāṇaiś chinnaḥ sahasradhā
GE09ram_1-7u:20767: 6.099.029a dhig astu hṛdayaṃ yasyā mamedaṃ na sahasradhā
GE09ram_1-7u:20768: 6.099.029c tvayi pañcatvam āpanne phalate śokapīḍitam 6.099.030a etasminn antare rāmo vibhīṣaṇam uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:20769: 6.099.030c saṃskāraḥ kriyatāṃ bhrātuḥ striyaś caitā nivartaya
GE09ram_1-7u:20770: 6.099.031a taṃ praśritas tato rāmaṃ śrutavākyo vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20771: 6.099.031c vimṛśya buddhyā dharmajño dharmārthasahitaṃ vacaḥ 6.099.031e rāmasyaivānuvṛttyartham uttaraṃ pratyabhāṣata
GE09ram_1-7u:20772: 6.099.032a tyaktadharmavrataṃ krūraṃ nṛśaṃsam anṛtaṃ tathā 6.099.032c nāham arho 'smi saṃskartuṃ paradārābhimarśakam 6.099.033a bhrātṛrūpo hi me śatrur eṣa sarvāhite rataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20774: 6.099.034a nṛśaṃsa iti māṃ rāma vakṣyanti manujā bhuvi
GE09ram_1-7u:20775: 6.099.034c śrutvā tasya guṇān sarve vakṣyanti sukṛtaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20776: 6.099.035a tac chrutvā paramaprīto rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20778: 6.099.036a tavāpi me priyaṃ kāryaṃ tvatprabhavāc ca me jitam 6.099.036c avaśyaṃ tu kṣamaṃ vācyo mayā tvaṃ rākṣaseśvara
GE09ram_1-7u:20780: 6.099.037c tejasvī balavāñ śūraḥ saṃgrāmeṣu ca nityaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20781: 6.099.038a śatakratumukhair devaiḥ śrūyate na parājitaḥ 6.099.038c mahātmā balasaṃpanno rāvaṇo lokarāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20782: 6.099.039a maraṇāntāni vairāṇi nirvṛttaṃ naḥ prayojanam 6.099.039c kriyatām asya saṃskāro mamāpy eṣa yathā tava
GE09ram_1-7u:20784: 6.099.040c kṣipram arhati dharmajña tvaṃ yaśobhāg bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:20785: 6.099.041a rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā tvaramāṇo vibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.099.041c saṃskāreṇānurūpeṇa yojayām āsa rāvaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:20786: 6.099.042a sa dadau pāvakaṃ tasya vidhiyuktaṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20787: 6.099.042c tāḥ striyo 'nunayām āsa sāntvam uktvā punaḥ punaḥ 6.099.043a praviṣṭāsu ca sarvāsu rākṣasīṣu vibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.099.043c rāmapārśvam upāgamya tadātiṣṭhad vinītavat
GE09ram_1-7u:20789: 6.099.044c harṣaṃ lebhe ripuṃ hatvā yathā vṛtraṃ śatakratuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20791: 6.100.001c jagmus tais tair vimānaiḥ svaiḥ kathayantaḥ śubhāḥ kathāḥ 6.100.002a rāvaṇasya vadhaṃ ghoraṃ rāghavasya parākramam 6.100.002c suyuddhaṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca sugrīvasay ca mantritam
GE09ram_1-7u:20792: 6.100.003a anurāgaṃ ca vīryaṃ ca saumitrer lakṣmaṇasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:20793: 6.100.003c kathayanto mahābhāgā jagmur hṛṣṭā yathāgatam 6.100.004a rāghavas tu rathaṃ divyam indradattaṃ śikhiprabham
GE09ram_1-7u:20796: 6.100.005c divyaṃ taṃ ratham āsthāya divam evāruroha saḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20797: 6.100.006a tasmiṃs tu divam ārūḍhe surasārathisattame 6.100.006c rāghavaḥ paramaprītaḥ sugrīvaṃ pariṣasvaje
GE09ram_1-7u:20800: 6.100.008a abravīc ca tadā rāmaḥ samīpaparivartinam 6.100.008c saumitriṃ sattvasaṃpannaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ dīptatejasaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:20801: 6.100.009a vibhīṣaṇam imaṃ saumya laṅkāyām abhiṣecaya 6.100.009c anuraktaṃ ca bhaktaṃ ca mama caivopakāriṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:20802: 6.100.010a eṣa me paramaḥ kāmo yad imaṃ rāvaṇānujam
GE09ram_1-7u:20803: 6.100.010c laṅkāyāṃ saumya paśyeyam abhiṣiktaṃ vibhīṣaṇam 6.100.011a evam uktas tu saumitrī rāghaveṇa mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:20804: 6.100.011c tathety uktvā tu saṃhṛṣṭaḥ sauvarṇaṃ ghaṭam ādade
GE09ram_1-7u:20805: 6.100.012a ghaṭena tena saumitrir abhyaṣiñcad vibhīṣaṇam 6.100.012c laṅkāyāṃ rakṣasāṃ madhye rājānaṃ rāmaśāsanāt 6.100.013a abhyaṣiñcat sa dharmātmā śuddhātmānaṃ vibhīṣaṇam 6.100.013c tasyāmātyā jahṛṣire bhaktā ye cāsya rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20807: 6.100.014c rāghavaḥ paramāṃ prītiṃ jagāma sahalakṣmaṇaḥ 6.100.015a sa tad rājyaṃ mahat prāpya rāmadattaṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20808: 6.100.015c prakṛtīḥ sāntvayitvā ca tato rāmam upāgamat
GE09ram_1-7u:20809: 6.100.016a akṣatān modakāṃl lājān divyāḥ sumanasas tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:20810: 6.100.016c ājahrur atha saṃhṛṣṭāḥ paurās tasmai niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20811: 6.100.017a sa tān gṛhītvā durdharṣo rāghavāya nyavedayat
GE09ram_1-7u:20812: 6.100.017c maṅgalyaṃ maṅgalaṃ sarvaṃ lakṣmaṇāya ca vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:20813: 6.100.018a kṛtakāryaṃ samṛddhārthaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmo vibhīṣaṇam 6.100.018c pratijagrāha tat sarvaṃ tasyaiva priyakāmyayā 6.100.019a tataḥ śailopamaṃ vīraṃ prāñjaliṃ pārśvataḥ sthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:20814: 6.100.019c abravīd rāghavo vākyaṃ hanūmantaṃ plavaṃgamam 6.100.020a anumānya mahārājam imaṃ saumya vibhīṣaṇam 6.100.020c praviśya rāvaṇagṛhaṃ vinayenopasṛtya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:20815: 6.100.021a vaidehyā māṃ kuśalinaṃ sasugrīvaṃ salakṣmaṇam 6.100.021c ācakṣva jayatāṃ śreṣṭha rāvaṇaṃ ca mayā hatam
GE09ram_1-7u:20816: 6.100.022a priyam etad udāhṛtya maithilyās tvaṃ harīśvara
GE09ram_1-7u:20817: 6.100.022c pratigṛhya ca saṃdeśam upāvartitum arhasi 6.101.001a iti pratisamādiṣṭo hanūmān
GE09ram_1-7u:20818: 6.101.001c praviveśa purīṃ laṅkāṃ pūjyamāno niśācaraiḥ 6.101.002a praviśya tu mahātejā rāvaṇasya niveśanam 6.101.002c dadarśa śaśinā hīnāṃ sātaṅkām iva rohiṇīm
GE09ram_1-7u:20820: 6.101.003c rāmasya vacanaṃ sarvam ākhyātum upacakrame 6.101.004a vaidehi kuśalī rāmaḥ sasugrīvaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ 6.101.004c kuśalaṃ cāha siddhārtho hataśatrur ariṃdamaḥ 6.101.005a vibhīṣaṇasahāyena rāmeṇa haribhiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:20821: 6.101.005c nihato rāvaṇo devi lakṣmaṇasya nayena ca
GE09ram_1-7u:20822: 6.101.006a pṛṣṭvā ca kuśalaṃ rāmo vīras tvāṃ raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20824: 6.101.007a priyam ākhyāmi te devi tvāṃ tu bhayaḥ sabhājaye 6.101.007c diṣṭyā jīvasi dharmajñe jayena mama saṃyuge
GE09ram_1-7u:20825: 6.101.008a labdho no vijayaḥ sīte svasthā bhava gatavyathā
GE09ram_1-7u:20826: 6.101.008c rāvaṇaḥ sa hataḥ śatrur laṅkā ceyaṃ vaśe sthitā 6.101.009a mayā hy alabdhanidreṇa dhṛtena tava nirjaye
GE09ram_1-7u:20827: 6.101.009c pratijñaiṣā vinistīrṇā baddhvā setuṃ mahodadhau 6.101.010a saṃbhramaś ca na kartavyo vartantyā rāvaṇālaye
GE09ram_1-7u:20828: 6.101.010c vibhīṣaṇa vidheyaṃ hi laṅkaiśvaryam idaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:20829: 6.101.011a tad āśvasihi viśvastā svagṛhe parivartase 6.101.011c ayaṃ cābhyeti saṃhṛṣṭas
GE09ram_1-7u:20830: 6.101.012a evam uktā samutpatya sītā śaśinibhānanā 6.101.012c praharṣeṇāvaruddhā sā vyājahāra na kiṃ cana
GE09ram_1-7u:20831: 6.101.013a abravīc ca hariśreṣṭhaḥ sītām apratijalpatīm 6.101.013c kiṃ tvaṃ cintayase devi kiṃ ca māṃ nābhibhāṣase 6.101.014a evam uktā hanumatā sītā dharme vyavasthitā
GE09ram_1-7u:20833: 6.101.015a priyam etad upaśrutya bhartur vijayasaṃśritam 6.101.015c praharṣavaśam āpannā nirvākyāsmi kṣaṇāntaram
GE09ram_1-7u:20834: 6.101.016a na hi paśyāmi sadṛśaṃ cintayantī plavaṃgama
GE09ram_1-7u:20836: 6.101.017a na ca paśyāmi tat saumya pṛthivyām api vānara 6.101.017c sadṛśaṃ matpriyākhyāne tava dātuṃ bhavet samam
GE09ram_1-7u:20837: 6.101.018a hiraṇyaṃ vā suvarṇaṃ vā ratnāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:20838: 6.101.018c rājyaṃ vā triṣu lokeṣu naitad arhati bhāṣitum
GE09ram_1-7u:20839: 6.101.019a evam uktas tu vaidehyā pratyuvāca plavaṃgamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20840: 6.101.019c pragṛhītāñjalir vākyaṃ sītāyāḥ pramukhe sthitaḥ 6.101.020a bhartuḥ priyahite yukte bhartur vijayakāṅkṣiṇi 6.101.020c snigdham evaṃvidhaṃ vākyaṃ tvam evārhasi bhāṣitum
GE09ram_1-7u:20841: 6.101.021a tavaitad vacanaṃ saumye sāravat snigdham eva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:20842: 6.101.021c ratnaughād vividhāc cāpi devarājyād viśiṣyate 6.101.022a arthataś ca mayā prāptā devarājyādayo guṇāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20843: 6.101.022c hataśatruṃ vijayinaṃ rāmaṃ paśyāmi yat sthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:20844: 6.101.023a imās tu khalu rākṣasyo yadi tvam anumanyase
GE09ram_1-7u:20845: 6.101.023c hantum icchāmy ahaṃ sarvā yābhis tvaṃ tarjitā purā 6.101.024a kliśyantīṃ patidevāṃ tvām aśokavanikāṃ gatām 6.101.024c ghorarūpasamācārāḥ krūrāḥ krūratarekṣaṇāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20846: 6.101.025a rākṣasyo dāruṇakathā varam etaṃ prayaccha me
GE09ram_1-7u:20847: 6.101.025c icchāmi vividhair ghātair hantum etāḥ sudāruṇāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20848: 6.101.026a muṣṭibhiḥ pāṇibhiś caiva caraṇaiś caiva śobhane
GE09ram_1-7u:20849: 6.101.026c ghorair jānuprahāraiś ca daśanānāṃ ca pātanaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20850: 6.101.027a bhakṣaṇaiḥ karṇanāsānāṃ keśānāṃ luñcanais tathā 6.101.027c bhṛśaṃ śuṣkamukhībhiś ca dāruṇair laṅghanair hataiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20852: 6.101.028c hantum icchāmy ahaṃ devi tavemāḥ kṛtakilbiṣāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20853: 6.101.029a evam uktā mahumatā vaidehī janakātmajā 6.101.029c uvāca dharmasahitaṃ hanūmantaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:20855: 6.101.030c vidheyānāṃ ca dāsīnāṃ kaḥ kupyed vānarottama
GE09ram_1-7u:20856: 6.101.031a bhāgyavaiṣamya yogena purā duścaritena ca 6.101.031c mayaitet prāpyate sarvaṃ svakṛtaṃ hy upabhujyate
GE09ram_1-7u:20857: 6.101.032a prāptavyaṃ tu daśā yogān mayaitad iti niścitam
GE09ram_1-7u:20859: 6.101.033a ājñaptā rāvaṇenaitā rākṣasyo mām atarjayan 6.101.033c hate tasmin na kuryur hi tarjanaṃ vānarottama
GE09ram_1-7u:20860: 6.101.034a ayaṃ vyāghrasamīpe tu purāṇo dharmasaṃhitaḥ 6.101.034c ṛkṣeṇa gītaḥ śloko me taṃ nibodha plavaṃgama
GE09ram_1-7u:20861: 6.101.035a na paraḥ pāpam ādatte pareṣāṃ pāpakarmaṇām
GE09ram_1-7u:20862: 6.101.035c samayo rakṣitavyas tu santaś cāritrabhūṣaṇāḥ 6.101.036a pāpānāṃ vā śubhānāṃ vā vadhārhāṇāṃ plavaṃgama
GE09ram_1-7u:20863: 6.101.036c kāryaṃ kāruṇyam āryeṇa na kaś cin nāparādhyati
GE09ram_1-7u:20865: 6.101.037c kurvatām api pāpāni naiva kāryam aśobhanam
GE09ram_1-7u:20866: 6.101.038a evam uktas tu hanumān sītayā vākyakovidaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20867: 6.101.038c pratyuvāca tataḥ sītāṃ rāmapatnīṃ yaśasvinīm 6.101.039a yuktā rāmasya bhavatī dharmapatnī yaśasvinī 6.101.039c pratisaṃdiśa māṃ devi gamiṣye yatra rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20868: 6.101.040a evam uktā hanumatā vaidehī janakātmajā 6.101.040c abravīd draṣṭum icchāmi bhartāraṃ vānarottama 6.101.041a tasyās tadvacanaṃ śrutvā hanumān pavanātmajaḥ 6.101.041c harṣayan maithilīṃ vākyam uvācedaṃ mahādyutiḥ 6.101.042a pūrṇacandrānanaṃ rāmaṃ drakṣyasy ārye salakṣmaṇam 6.101.042c sthiramitraṃ hatāmitraṃ śacīva tridaśeśvaram
GE09ram_1-7u:20869: 6.101.043a tām evam uktvā rājantīṃ sītāṃ sākṣād iva śriyam 6.101.043c ājagāma mahāvego hanūmān yatra rāghavaḥ 6.102.001a sa uvāca mahāprajñam abhigamya plavaṃgamaḥ 6.102.001c rāmaṃ vacanam arthajño varaṃ sarvadhanuṣmatām 6.102.002a yannimitto 'yam ārambhaḥ karmaṇāṃ ca phalodayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20870: 6.102.002c tāṃ devīṃ śokasaṃtaptāṃ maithilīṃ draṣṭum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:20872: 6.102.003c maithilī vijayaṃ śrutvā tava harṣam upāgamat
GE09ram_1-7u:20873: 6.102.004a pūrvakāt pratyayāc cāham ukto viśvastayā tayā
GE09ram_1-7u:20874: 6.102.004c bhartāraṃ draṣṭum icchāmi kṛtārthaṃ sahalakṣmaṇam 6.102.005a evam ukto hanumatā rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20875: 6.102.005c agacchat sahasā dhyānam āsīd bāṣpapariplutaḥ 6.102.006a dīrgham uṣṇaṃ ca niśvasya medinīm avalokayan
GE09ram_1-7u:20878: 6.102.007c iha sītāṃ śiraḥsnātām upasthāpaya māciram 6.102.008a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa tvaramāṇo
GE09ram_1-7u:20879: 6.102.008c praviśyāntaḥpuraṃ sītāṃ strībhiḥ svābhir acodayat 6.102.009a divyāṅgarāgā vaidehī
GE09ram_1-7u:20880: 6.102.009c yānam āroha bhadraṃ te bhartā tvāṃ draṣṭum icchati 6.102.010a evam uktā tu vaidehī pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:20881: 6.102.010c asnātā draṣṭum icchāmi bhartāraṃ rākṣasādhipa 6.102.011a tasyās tadvacanaṃ śrutvā pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.102.011c yathāhaṃ rāmo bhartā te tat tathā kartum arhasi 6.102.012a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā maithilī bhrātṛdevatā 6.102.012c bhartṛbhaktivratā sādhvī tatheti pratyabhāṣata
GE09ram_1-7u:20882: 6.102.013a tataḥ sītāṃ śiraḥsnātāṃ yuvatībhir alaṃkṛtām 6.102.013c mahārhābharaṇopetāṃ mahārhāmbaradhāriṇīm 6.102.014a āropya śibikāṃ dīptāṃ parārdhyāmbarasaṃvṛtām
GE09ram_1-7u:20883: 6.102.014c rakṣobhir bahubhir guptām ājahāra vibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.102.015a so 'bhigamya mahātmānaṃ jñātvābhidhyānam āsthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:20884: 6.102.015c praṇataś ca prahṛṣṭaś ca prāptāṃ sītāṃ nyavedayat
GE09ram_1-7u:20886: 6.102.016c harṣo dainyaṃ ca roṣaś ca trayaṃ rāghavam āviśat 6.102.017a tataḥ pārśvagataṃ dṛṣṭvā savimarśaṃ vicārayan 6.102.017c vibhīṣaṇam idaṃ vākyam ahṛṣṭo rāghavo 'bravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:20887: 6.102.018a rākṣasādhipate saumya nityaṃ madvijaye rata 6.102.018c vaidehī saṃnikarṣaṃ me śīghraṃ samupagacchatu 6.102.019a sa tadvacanam ājñāya rāghavasya vibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.102.019c tūrṇam utsāraṇe yatnaṃ kārayām āsa sarvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20890: 6.102.021a ṛkṣāṇāṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca rākṣasānāṃ ca sarvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20891: 6.102.021c vṛndāny utsāryamāṇāni dūram utsasṛjus tataḥ 6.102.022a teṣām utsāryamāṇānāṃ sarveṣāṃ dhvanir utthitaḥ 6.102.022c vāyunodvartamānasya sāgarasyeva nisvanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20892: 6.102.023a utsāryamāṇāṃs tān dṛṣṭvā samantāj jātasaṃbhramān 6.102.023c dākṣiṇyāt tadamarṣāc ca vārayām āsa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20893: 6.102.024a saṃrabdhaś cābravīd rāmaś cakṣuṣā pradahann iva
GE09ram_1-7u:20894: 6.102.024c vibhīṣaṇaṃ mahāprājñaṃ sopālambham idaṃ vacaḥ 6.102.025a kimarthaṃ mām anādṛtya kṛśyate 'yaṃ tvayā janaḥ 6.102.025c nivartayainam udyogaṃ jano 'yaṃ svajano mama 6.102.026a na gṛhāṇi na vastrāṇi na prākārās tiraskriyāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20895: 6.102.026c nedṛśā rājasatkārā vṛttam āvaraṇaṃ striyaḥ 6.102.027a vyasaneṣu na kṛcchreṣu na yuddhe na svayaṃ vare 6.102.027c na kratau no vivāhe ca darśanaṃ duṣyate striyaḥ 6.102.028a saiṣā yuddhagatā caiva kṛcchre mahati ca sthitā
GE09ram_1-7u:20896: 6.102.028c darśane 'syā na doṣaḥ syān matsamīpe viśeṣataḥ 6.102.029a tad ānaya samīpaṃ me śīghram enāṃ vibhīṣaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:20897: 6.102.029c sītā paśyatu mām eṣā suhṛdgaṇavṛtaṃ sthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:20898: 6.102.030a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa savimarśo vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20900: 6.102.031a tato lakṣmaṇasugrīvau hanūmāṃś ca plavaṃgamaḥ 6.102.031c niśamya vākyaṃ rāmasya babhūvur vyathitā bhṛśam
GE09ram_1-7u:20901: 6.102.032a kalatranirapekṣaiś ca iṅgitair asya dāruṇaiḥ 6.102.032c aprītam iva sītāyāṃ tarkayanti sma rāghavam
GE09ram_1-7u:20902: 6.102.033a lajjayā tv avalīyantī sveṣu gātreṣu maithilī
GE09ram_1-7u:20906: 6.102.035a vismayāc ca praharṣāc ca snehāc ca paridevatā
GE09ram_1-7u:20907: 6.102.035c udaikṣata mukhaṃ bhartuḥ saumyaṃ saumyatarānanā 6.102.036a atha samapanudan manaḥklamaṃ sā; suciram adṛṣṭam udīkṣya vai priyasya 6.102.036c vadanam uditapūrṇacandrakāntaṃ; vimalaśaśāṅkanibhānanā tadāsīt 6.103.001a tāṃ tu pārśve sthitāṃ prahvāṃ rāmaḥ saṃprekṣya maithilīm 6.103.001c hṛdayāntargatakrodho vyāhartum upacakrame
GE09ram_1-7u:20908: 6.103.002a eṣāsi nirjitā bhadre śatruṃ jitvā mayā raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:20909: 6.103.002c pauruṣād yad anuṣṭheyaṃ tad etad upapāditam
GE09ram_1-7u:20911: 6.103.003c avamānaś ca śatruś ca mayā yugapad uddhṛtau
GE09ram_1-7u:20912: 6.103.004a adya me pauruṣaṃ dṛṣṭam adya me saphalaḥ śramaḥ 6.103.004c adya tīrṇapratijñatvāt prabhavāmīha cātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20913: 6.103.005a yā tvaṃ virahitā nītā calacittena rakṣasā
GE09ram_1-7u:20914: 6.103.005c daivasaṃpādito doṣo mānuṣeṇa mayā jitaḥ 6.103.006a saṃprāptam avamānaṃ yas tejasā na pramārjati
GE09ram_1-7u:20916: 6.103.007a laṅghanaṃ ca samudrasya laṅkāyāś cāvamardanam 6.103.007c saphalaṃ tasya tac chlāghyam adya karma hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20917: 6.103.008a yuddhe vikramataś caiva hitaṃ mantrayataś ca me
GE09ram_1-7u:20919: 6.103.009a nirguṇaṃ bhrātaraṃ tyaktvā yo māṃ svayam upasthitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20921: 6.103.010a ity evaṃ bruvatas tasya sītā rāmasya tadvacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20922: 6.103.010c mṛgīvotphullanayanā babhūvāśrupariplutā 6.103.011a paśyatas tāṃ tu rāmasya bhūyaḥ krodho 'bhyavartata
GE09ram_1-7u:20924: 6.103.012a sa baddhvā bhrukuṭiṃ vaktre tiryakprekṣitalocanaḥ 6.103.012c abravīt paruṣaṃ sītāṃ madhye vānararakṣasām 6.103.013a yat kartavyaṃ manuṣyeṇa dharṣaṇāṃ parimārjatā 6.103.013c tat kṛtaṃ sakalaṃ sīte śatruhastād amarṣaṇāt
GE09ram_1-7u:20926: 6.103.014c agastyena durādharṣā muninā dakṣiṇeva dik 6.103.015a viditaś cāstu bhadraṃ te yo 'yaṃ raṇapariśramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20927: 6.103.015c sa tīrṇaḥ suhṛdāṃ vīryān na tvadarthaṃ mayā kṛtaḥ 6.103.016a rakṣatā tu mayā vṛttam apavādaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20930: 6.103.017c dīpo netrāturasyeva pratikūlāsi me dṛḍham 6.103.018a tad gaccha hy abhyanujñātā yateṣṭaṃ janakātmaje
GE09ram_1-7u:20931: 6.103.018c etā daśa diśo bhadre kāryam asti na me tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:20932: 6.103.019a kaḥ pumān hi kule jātaḥ striyaṃ paragṛhoṣitām
GE09ram_1-7u:20933: 6.103.019c tejasvi punar ādadyāt suhṛllekhena cetasā 6.103.020a rāvaṇāṅkaparibhraṣṭāṃ dṛṣṭāṃ duṣṭena cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_1-7u:20934: 6.103.020c kathaṃ tvāṃ punarādadyāṃ kulaṃ vyapadiśan mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:20935: 6.103.021a tadarthaṃ nirjitā me tvaṃ yaśaḥ pratyāhṛtaṃ mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:20936: 6.103.021c nāsti me tvayy abhiṣvaṅgo yatheṣṭaṃ gamyatām itaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20937: 6.103.022a iti pravyāhṛtaṃ bhadre mayaitat kṛtabuddhinā 6.103.022c lakṣmaṇe bharate vā tvaṃ kuru buddhiṃ yathāsukham
GE09ram_1-7u:20938: 6.103.023a sugrīve vānarendre vā rākṣasendre vibhīṣaṇe 6.103.023c niveśaya manaḥ śīte yathā vā sukham ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20939: 6.103.024a na hi tvāṃ rāvaṇo dṛṣṭvā divyarūpāṃ manoramām
GE09ram_1-7u:20940: 6.103.024c marṣayate ciraṃ sīte svagṛhe parivartinīm 6.103.025a tataḥ priyārhaśvaraṇā tad apriyaṃ; priyād upaśrutya cirasya
GE09ram_1-7u:20942: 6.103.025c mumoca bāṣpaṃ subhṛśaṃ pravepitā; gajendrahastābhihateva vallarī 6.104.001a evam uktā tu vaidehī paruṣaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:20944: 6.104.002a sā tad aśrutapūrvaṃ hi jane mahati maithilī
GE09ram_1-7u:20945: 6.104.002c śrutvā bhartṛvaco rūkṣaṃ lajjayā vrīḍitābhavat 6.104.003a praviśantīva gātrāṇi svāny eva janakātmajā 6.104.003c vākśalyais taiḥ saśalyeva bhṛśam aśrūṇy avartayat
GE09ram_1-7u:20946: 6.104.004a tato bāṣpaparikliṣṭaṃ pramārjantī svam ānanam 6.104.004c śanair gadgadayā vācā bhartāram idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:20947: 6.104.005a kiṃ mām asadṛśaṃ vākyam īdṛśaṃ śrotradāruṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:20948: 6.104.005c rūkṣaṃ śrāvayase vīra prākṛtaḥ prākṛtām iva
GE09ram_1-7u:20949: 6.104.006a na tathāsmi mahābāho yathā tvam avagacchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:20950: 6.104.006c pratyayaṃ gaccha me svena cāritreṇaiva te śape
GE09ram_1-7u:20951: 6.104.007a pṛthak strīṇāṃ pracāreṇa jātiṃ tvaṃ pariśaṅkase
GE09ram_1-7u:20952: 6.104.007c parityajemāṃ śaṅkāṃ tu yadi te 'haṃ parīkṣitā
GE09ram_1-7u:20953: 6.104.008a yady ahaṃ gātrasaṃsparśaṃ gatāsmi vivaśā prabho
GE09ram_1-7u:20954: 6.104.008c kāmakāro na me tatra daivaṃ tatrāparādhyati
GE09ram_1-7u:20955: 6.104.009a madadhīnaṃ tu yat tan me hṛdayaṃ tvayi vartate 6.104.009c parādhīneṣu gātreṣu kiṃ kariṣyāmy anīśvarā 6.104.010a sahasaṃvṛddhabhāvāc ca saṃsargeṇa ca mānada 6.104.010c yady ahaṃ te na vijñātā hatā tenāsmi śāśvatam 6.104.011a preṣitas te yadā vīro hanūmān avalokakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20956: 6.104.011c laṅkāsthāhaṃ tvayā vīra kiṃ tadā na visarjitā
GE09ram_1-7u:20958: 6.104.012c tvayā saṃtyaktayā vīra tyaktaṃ syāj jīvitaṃ mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:20959: 6.104.013a na vṛthā te śramo 'yaṃ syāt saṃśaye nyasya jīvitam
GE09ram_1-7u:20960: 6.104.013c suhṛjjanaparikleśo na cāyaṃ niṣphalas tava 6.104.014a tvayā tu naraśārdūla krodham evānuvartatā 6.104.014c laghuneva manuṣyeṇa strītvam eva puraskṛtam 6.104.015a apadeśena janakān notpattir vasudhātalāt
GE09ram_1-7u:20961: 6.104.015c mama vṛttaṃ ca vṛttajña bahu te na puraskṛtam 6.104.016a na pramāṇīkṛtaḥ pāṇir bālye bālena pīḍitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20962: 6.104.016c mama bhaktiś ca śīlaṃ ca sarvaṃ te pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:20964: 6.104.017c abravīl lakṣmaṇaṃ sītā dīnaṃ dhyānaparaṃ sthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:20965: 6.104.018a citāṃ me kuru saumitre vyasanasyāsya bheṣajam
GE09ram_1-7u:20967: 6.104.019a aprītasya guṇair bhartus tyaktayā janasaṃsadi 6.104.019c yā kṣamā me gatir gantuṃ pravekṣye havyavāhanam
GE09ram_1-7u:20968: 6.104.020a evam uktas tu vaidehyā lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā
GE09ram_1-7u:20971: 6.104.021c citāṃ cakāra saumitrir mate rāmasya vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:20972: 6.104.022a adhomukhaṃ tato rāmaṃ śanaiḥ kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:20974: 6.104.023a praṇamya devatābhyaś ca brāhmaṇebhyaś ca maithilī
GE09ram_1-7u:20976: 6.104.024a yathā me hṛdayaṃ nityaṃ nāpasarpati rāghavāt
GE09ram_1-7u:20977: 6.104.024c tathā lokasya sākṣī māṃ sarvataḥ pātu pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20978: 6.104.025a evam uktvā tu vaidehī parikramya hutāśanam
GE09ram_1-7u:20980: 6.104.026a janaḥ sa sumahāṃs tatra bālavṛddhasamākulaḥ 6.104.026c dadarśa maithilīṃ tatra praviśantīṃ hutāśanam 6.104.027a tasyām agniṃ viśantyāṃ tu hāheti vipulaḥ svanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20982: 6.105.001a tato vaiśravaṇo rājā yamaś cāmitrakarśanaḥ 6.105.001c sahasrākṣo mahendraś ca varuṇaś ca paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20984: 6.105.002c kartā sarvasya lokasya brahmā brahmavidāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20985: 6.105.003a ete sarve samāgamya vimānaiḥ sūryasaṃnibhaiḥ 6.105.003c āgamya nagarīṃ laṅkām abhijagmuś ca rāghavam
GE09ram_1-7u:20986: 6.105.004a tataḥ sahastābharaṇān pragṛhya vipulān bhujān 6.105.004c abruvaṃs tridaśaśreṣṭhāḥ prāñjaliṃ rāghavaṃ sthitam 6.105.005a kartā sarvasya lokasya śreṣṭho jñānavatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20987: 6.105.005c upekṣase kathaṃ sītāṃ patantīṃ havyavāhane 6.105.005e kathaṃ devagaṇaśreṣṭham ātmānaṃ nāvabudhyase
GE09ram_1-7u:20988: 6.105.006a ṛtadhāmā vasuḥ pūrvaṃ vasūnāṃ ca prajāpatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20989: 6.105.006c tvaṃ trayāṇāṃ hi lokānām ādikartā svayaṃprabhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20990: 6.105.007a rudrāṇām aṣṭamo rudraḥ sādhyānām api pañcamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20991: 6.105.007c aśvinau cāpi te karṇau candrasūryau ca cakṣuṣī
GE09ram_1-7u:20992: 6.105.008a ante cādau ca lokānāṃ dṛśyase tvaṃ paraṃtapa
GE09ram_1-7u:20993: 6.105.008c upekṣase ca vaidehīṃ mānuṣaḥ prākṛto yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:20994: 6.105.009a ity ukto lokapālais taiḥ svāmī lokasya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20995: 6.105.009c abravīt tridaśaśreṣṭhān rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ 6.105.010a ātmānaṃ mānuṣaṃ manye rāmaṃ daśarathātmajam 6.105.010c yo 'haṃ yasya yataś cāhaṃ bhagavāṃs tad bravītu me
GE09ram_1-7u:20996: 6.105.011a iti bruvāṇaṃ kākutsthaṃ brahmā brahmavidāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:20997: 6.105.011c abravīc chṛṇu me rāma satyaṃ satyaparākrama
GE09ram_1-7u:20998: 6.105.012a bhavān nārāyaṇo devaḥ śrīmāṃś cakrāyudho vibhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21000: 6.105.013a akṣaraṃ brahmasatyaṃ ca madhye cānte ca rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:21001: 6.105.013c lokānāṃ tvaṃ paro dharmo viṣvaksenaś caturbhujaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21003: 6.105.014c ajitaḥ khaḍgadhṛg viṣṇuḥ kṛṣṇaś caiva bṛhadbalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21004: 6.105.015a senānīr grāmaṇīś ca tvaṃ buddhiḥ sattaṃ kṣamā damaḥ 6.105.015c prabhavaś cāpyayaś ca tvam upendro madhusūdanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21005: 6.105.016a indrakarmā mahendras tvaṃ padmanābho raṇāntakṛt 6.105.016c śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ ca tvām āhur divyā maharṣayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21007: 6.105.017c tvaṃ yajñas tvaṃ vaṣaṭkāras tvam oṃkāraḥ paraṃtapa
GE09ram_1-7u:21008: 6.105.018a prabhavaṃ nidhanaṃ vā te na viduḥ ko bhavān iti
GE09ram_1-7u:21009: 6.105.018c dṛśyase sarvabhūteṣu brāhmaṇeṣu ca goṣu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:21010: 6.105.019a dikṣu sarvāsu gagane parvateṣu vaneṣu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:21012: 6.105.020a tvaṃ dhārayasi bhūtāni vasudhāṃ ca saparvatām
GE09ram_1-7u:21013: 6.105.020c ante pṛthivyāḥ salile dṛśyase tvaṃ mahoragaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21014: 6.105.021a trīṃl lokān dhārayan rāma devagandharvadānavān 6.105.021c ahaṃ te hṛdayaṃ rāma jihvā devī sarasvatī
GE09ram_1-7u:21015: 6.105.022a devā gātreṣu lomāni nirmitā brahmaṇā prabho
GE09ram_1-7u:21016: 6.105.022c nimeṣas te 'bhavad rātrir unmeṣas te 'bhavad divā
GE09ram_1-7u:21017: 6.105.023a saṃskārās te 'bhavan vedā na tad asti tvayā vinā
GE09ram_1-7u:21018: 6.105.023c jagat sarvaṃ śarīraṃ te sthairyamṃ te vasudhātalam
GE09ram_1-7u:21019: 6.105.024a agniḥ kopaḥ prasādas te somaḥ śrīvatsalakṣaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:21020: 6.105.024c tvayā lokās trayaḥ krāntāḥ purāṇe vikramais tribhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21021: 6.105.025a mahendraś ca kṛto rājā baliṃ baddhvā mahāsuram
GE09ram_1-7u:21022: 6.105.025c sītā lakṣmīr bhavān viṣṇur devaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21023: 6.105.026a vadhārthaṃ rāvaṇasyeha praviṣṭo mānuṣīṃ tanum 6.105.026c tad idaṃ naḥ kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ tvayā dharmabhṛtāṃ vara 6.105.027a nihato rāvaṇo rāma prahṛṣṭo divam ākrama
GE09ram_1-7u:21024: 6.105.027c amoghaṃ balavīryaṃ te amoghas te parākramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21025: 6.105.028a amoghās te bhaviṣyanti bhaktimantaś ca ye narāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21026: 6.105.028c ye tvāṃ devaṃ dhruvaṃ bhaktāḥ purāṇaṃ puruṣottamam
GE09ram_1-7u:21027: 6.105.029a ye narāḥ kīrtayiṣyanti nāsti teṣāṃ parābhavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21028: 6.106.001a etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ pitāmahasamīritam 6.106.001c aṅkenādāya vaidehīm utpapāta vibhāvasuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21031: 6.106.003c dadau rāmāya vaidehīm aṅke kṛtvā vibhāvasuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21032: 6.106.004a abravīc ca tadā rāmaṃ sākṣī lokasya pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21033: 6.106.004c eṣā te rāma vaidehī pāpam asyā na vidyate 6.106.005a naiva vācā na manasā nānudhyānān na cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_1-7u:21034: 6.106.005c suvṛttā vṛttaśauṇḍīrā na tvām aticacāra ha
GE09ram_1-7u:21036: 6.106.006c tvayā virahitā dīnā vivaśā nirjanād vanāt
GE09ram_1-7u:21037: 6.106.007a ruddhā cāntaḥpure guptā tvakcittā tvatparāyaṇā 6.106.007c rakṣitā rākṣasī saṃghair vikṛtair ghoradarśanaiḥ 6.106.008a pralobhyamānā vividhaṃ bhartsyamānā ca maithilī 6.106.008c nācintayata tad rakṣas tvadgatenāntarātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:21039: 6.106.009c na kiṃ cid abhidhātavyam aham ājñāpayāmi te
GE09ram_1-7u:21040: 6.106.010a evam ukto mahātejā dhṛtimān dṛḍhavikramaḥ 6.106.010c abravīt tridaśaśreṣṭhaṃ rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ 6.106.011a avaśyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu sītā pāvanam arhati
GE09ram_1-7u:21042: 6.106.012a bāliśaḥ khalu kāmātmā rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ 6.106.012c iti vakṣyanti māṃ santo jānakīm aviśodhya hi
GE09ram_1-7u:21044: 6.106.013c aham apy avagacchāmi maithilīṃ janakātmajām 6.106.014a pratyayārthaṃ tu lokānāṃ trayāṇāṃ satyasaṃśrayaḥ 6.106.014c upekṣe cāpi vaidehīṃ praviśantīṃ hutāśanam 6.106.015a imām api viśālākṣīṃ rakṣitāṃ svena tejasā
GE09ram_1-7u:21045: 6.106.015c rāvaṇo nātivarteta velām iva mahodadhiḥ 6.106.016a na hi śaktaḥ sa duṣṭātmā manasāpi hi maithilīm 6.106.016c pradharṣayitum aprāptāṃ dīptām agniśikhām iva 6.106.017a neyam arhati caiśvaryaṃ rāvaṇāntaḥpure śubhā 6.106.017c ananyā hi mayā sītāṃ bhāskareṇa prabhā yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:21046: 6.106.018a viśuddhā triṣu lokeṣu maithilī janakātmajā 6.106.018c na hi hātum iyaṃ śakyā kīrtir ātmavatā yathā 6.106.019a avaśyaṃ ca mayā kāryaṃ sarveṣāṃ vo vaco hitam 6.106.019c snigdhānāṃ lokamānyānām evaṃ ca bruvatāṃ hitam
GE09ram_1-7u:21047: 6.106.020a itīdam uktvā vacanaṃ mahābalaiḥ; praśasyamānaḥ svakṛtena karmaṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:21048: 6.106.020c sametya rāmaḥ priyayā mahābalaḥ; sukhaṃ sukhārho 'nubabhūva
GE09ram_1-7u:21050: 6.107.001a etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ rāghaveṇa subhāṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:21051: 6.107.001c idaṃ śubhataraṃ vākyaṃ vyājahāra maheśvaraḥ 6.107.002a puṣkarākṣa mahābāho mahāvakṣaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21052: 6.107.002c diṣṭyā kṛtam idaṃ karma tvayā śastrabhṛtāṃ vara
GE09ram_1-7u:21053: 6.107.003a diṣṭyā sarvasya lokasya pravṛddhaṃ dāruṇaṃ tamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21054: 6.107.003c apāvṛttaṃ tvayā saṃkhye rāma rāvaṇajaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_1-7u:21055: 6.107.004a āśvāsya bharataṃ dīnaṃ kausalyāṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:21056: 6.107.004c kaikeyīṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇamātaram
GE09ram_1-7u:21057: 6.107.005a prāpya rājyam ayodhyāyāṃ nandayitvā suhṛjjanam 6.107.005c ikṣvākūṇāṃ kule vaṃśaṃ sthāpayitvā mahābala 6.107.006a iṣṭvā turagamedhena prāpya cānuttamaṃ yaśaḥ 6.107.006c brāhmaṇebhyo dhanaṃ dattvā tridivaṃ gantum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:21058: 6.107.007a eṣa rājā vimānasthaḥ pitā daśarathas tava
GE09ram_1-7u:21059: 6.107.007c kākutstha mānuṣe loke gurus tava mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21060: 6.107.008a indralokaṃ gataḥ śrīmāṃs tvayā putreṇa tāritaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21061: 6.107.008c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā tvam enam abhivādaya
GE09ram_1-7u:21065: 6.107.010c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā dadarśa pitaraṃ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21067: 6.107.011c prāṇaiḥ priyataraṃ dṛṣṭvā putraṃ daśarathas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:21069: 6.107.012c bāhubhyāṃ saṃpariṣvajya tato vākyaṃ samādade 6.107.013a na me svargo bahumataḥ saṃmānaś ca surarṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21070: 6.107.013c tvayā rāma vihīnasya satyaṃ pratiśṛṇomi te
GE09ram_1-7u:21071: 6.107.014a kaikeyyā yāni coktāni vākyāni vadatāṃ vara
GE09ram_1-7u:21072: 6.107.014c tava pravrājanārthāni sthitāni hṛdaye mama 6.107.015a tvāṃ tu dṛṣṭvā kuśalinaṃ pariṣvajya salakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:21073: 6.107.015c adya duḥkhād vimukto 'smi nīhārād iva bhāskaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21075: 6.107.016c aṣṭāvakreṇa dharmātmā tārito brāhmaṇo yathā 6.107.017a idānīṃ ca vijānāmi yathā saumya sureśvaraiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21077: 6.107.018a siddhārthā khalu kausalyā yā tvāṃ rāma gṛhaṃ gatam 6.107.018c vanān nivṛttaṃ saṃhṛṣṭā drakṣyate śatrusūdana 6.107.019a siddhārthāḥ khalu te rāma narā ye tvāṃ purīṃ gatam
GE09ram_1-7u:21078: 6.107.019c jalārdram abhiṣiktaṃ ca drakṣyanti vasudhādhipam 6.107.020a anuraktena balinā śucinā dharmacāriṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:21079: 6.107.020c iccheyaṃ tvām ahaṃ draṣṭuṃ bharatena samāgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:21080: 6.107.021a caturdaśasamāḥ saumya vane niryāpitās tvayā 6.107.021c vasatā sītayā sārdhaṃ lakṣmaṇena ca dhīmatā
GE09ram_1-7u:21082: 6.107.022c rāvaṇaṃ ca raṇe hatvā devās te paritoṣitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21083: 6.107.023a kṛtaṃ karma yaśaḥ ślāghyaṃ prāptaṃ te śatrusūdana
GE09ram_1-7u:21084: 6.107.023c bhrātṛbhiḥ saha rājyastho dīrgham āyur avāpnuhi
GE09ram_1-7u:21085: 6.107.024a iti bruvāṇaṃ rājānaṃ rāmaḥ prāñjalir abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:21086: 6.107.024c kuru prasādaṃ dharmajña kaikeyyā bharatasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:21087: 6.107.025a saputrāṃ tvāṃ tyajāmīti yad uktā kaikayī tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:21088: 6.107.025c sa śāpaḥ kaikayīṃ ghoraḥ saputrāṃ na spṛśet prabho 6.107.026a sa tatheti mahārājo rāmam uktvā kṛtāñjalim
GE09ram_1-7u:21089: 6.107.026c lakṣmaṇaṃ ca pariṣvajya punar vākyam uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:21090: 6.107.027a rāmaṃ śuśrūṣatā bhaktyā vaidehyā saha sītayā
GE09ram_1-7u:21091: 6.107.027c kṛtā mama mahāprītiḥ prāptaṃ dharmaphalaṃ ca te
GE09ram_1-7u:21092: 6.107.028a dharmaṃ prāpsyasi dharmajña yaśaś ca vipulaṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_1-7u:21093: 6.107.028c rāme prasanne svargaṃ ca mahimānaṃ tathaiva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:21094: 6.107.029a rāmaṃ śuśrūṣa bhadraṃ te sumitrānandavardhana 6.107.029c rāmaḥ sarvasya lokasya śubheṣv abhirataḥ sadā
GE09ram_1-7u:21095: 6.107.030a ete sendrās trayo lokāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21097: 6.107.031a etat tad uktam avyaktam akṣaraṃ brahmanirmitam
GE09ram_1-7u:21098: 6.107.031c devānāṃ hṛdayaṃ saumya guhyaṃ rāmaḥ paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21099: 6.107.032a avāptaṃ dharmacaraṇaṃ yaśaś ca vipulaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:21100: 6.107.032c rāmaṃ śuśrūṣatā bhaktyā vaidehyā saha sītayā
GE09ram_1-7u:21101: 6.107.033a sa tathoktvā mahābāhur lakṣmaṇaṃ prāñjaliṃ sthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:21102: 6.107.033c uvāca rājā dharmātmā vaidehīṃ vacanaṃ śubham
GE09ram_1-7u:21103: 6.107.034a kartavyo na tu vaidehi manyus tyāgam imaṃ prati 6.107.034c rāmeṇa tvadviśuddhyarthaṃ kṛtam etad dhitaiṣiṇā 6.107.035a na tvaṃ subhru samādheyā patiśuśrūvaṇaṃ prati
GE09ram_1-7u:21104: 6.107.035c avaśyaṃ tu mayā vācyam eṣa te daivataṃ param 6.107.036a iti pratisamādiśya putrau sītāṃ tathā snuṣām
GE09ram_1-7u:21105: 6.107.036c indralokaṃ vimānena yayau daśaratho jvalan 6.108.001a pratiprayāte kākutsthe mahendraḥ pākaśāsanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21106: 6.108.001c abravīt paramaprīto rāghavaṃ prāñjaliṃ sthitam 6.108.002a amoghaṃ darśanaṃ rāma tavāsmākaṃ paraṃtapa 6.108.002c prītiyukto 'smi tena tvaṃ brūhi yan manasecchasi 6.108.003a evam uktas tu kākutsthaḥ pratyuvāca kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21107: 6.108.003c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā sītayā cāpi bhāryayā
GE09ram_1-7u:21108: 6.108.004a yadi prītiḥ samutpannā mayi sarvasureśvara 6.108.004c vakṣyāmi kuru me satyaṃ vacanaṃ vadatāṃ vara
GE09ram_1-7u:21109: 6.108.005a mama hetoḥ parākrāntā ye gatā yamasādanam
GE09ram_1-7u:21110: 6.108.005c te sarve jīvitaṃ prāpya samuttiṣṭhantu vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21111: 6.108.006a matpriyeṣv abhiraktāś ca na mṛtyuṃ gaṇayanti ca
GE09ram_1-7u:21112: 6.108.006c tvatprasādāt sameyus te varam etad ahaṃ vṛṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:21114: 6.108.007c golāṅgūlāṃs tathaivarkṣān draṣṭum icchāmi mānada 6.108.008a akāle cāpi mukhyāni mūlāni ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:21115: 6.108.008c nadyaś ca vimalās tatra tiṣṭheyur yatra vānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21116: 6.108.009a śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasya rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21118: 6.108.010a mahān ayaṃ varas tāta tvayokto raghunandana
GE09ram_1-7u:21119: 6.108.010c samutthāsyanti harayaḥ suptā nidrākṣaye yathā 6.108.011a suhṛdbhir bāndhavaiś caiva jñātibhiḥ svajanena ca
GE09ram_1-7u:21120: 6.108.011c sarva eva sameṣyanti saṃyuktāḥ parayā mudā
GE09ram_1-7u:21121: 6.108.012a akāle puṣpaśabalāḥ phalavantaś ca pādapāḥ 6.108.012c bhaviṣyanti maheṣvāsa nadyaś ca salilāyutāḥ 6.108.013a savraṇaiḥ prathamaṃ gātraiḥ saṃvṛtair nivraṇaiḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21122: 6.108.013c babhūvur vānarāḥ sarve kim etad iti vismitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21123: 6.108.014a kākutsthaṃ paripūrṇārthaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve surottamāḥ 6.108.014c ūcus te prathamaṃ stutvā stavārhaṃ sahalakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:21124: 6.108.015a gacchāyodhyām ito vīra visarjaya ca vānarān
GE09ram_1-7u:21126: 6.108.016a bhrātaraṃ paśya bharataṃ tvacchokād vratacāriṇam 6.108.016c abhiṣecaya cātmānaṃ paurān gatvā praharṣaya 6.108.017a evam uktvā tam āmantrya rāmaṃ saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_1-7u:21127: 6.108.017c vimānaiḥ sūryasaṃkāśair hṛṣṭā jagmuḥ surā divam
GE09ram_1-7u:21128: 6.108.018a abhivādya ca kākutsthaḥ sarvāṃs tāṃs tridaśottamān
GE09ram_1-7u:21129: 6.108.018c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vāsam ājñāpayat tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:21130: 6.108.019a tatas tu sā lakṣmaṇarāmapālitā; mahācamūr hṛṣṭajanā yaśasvinī
GE09ram_1-7u:21131: 6.108.019c śriyā jvalantī virarāja sarvato; niśāpraṇīteva hi śītaraśminā
GE09ram_1-7u:21132: 6.109.001a tāṃ rātrim uṣitaṃ rāmaṃ sukhotthitam ariṃdamam
GE09ram_1-7u:21133: 6.109.001c abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ jayaṃ pṛṣṭvā vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21134: 6.109.002a snānāni cāṅgarāgāṇi vastrāṇy ābharaṇāni ca 6.109.002c candanāni ca divyāni mālyāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:21136: 6.109.003c upasthitās tvāṃ vidhivat snāpayiṣyanti rāghava 6.109.004a evam uktas tu kākutsthaḥ pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:21138: 6.109.005a sa tu tāmyati dharmātmā mamahetoḥ sukhocitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21140: 6.109.006a taṃ vinā kaikeyīputraṃ bharataṃ dharmacāriṇam 6.109.006c na me snānaṃ bahumataṃ vastrāṇy ābharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:21141: 6.109.007a ita eva pathā kṣipraṃ pratigacchāma tāṃ purīm
GE09ram_1-7u:21142: 6.109.007c ayodhyām āyato hy eṣa panthāḥ paramadurgamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21143: 6.109.008a evam uktas tu kākutsthaṃ pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21144: 6.109.008c ahnā tvāṃ prāpayiṣyāmi tāṃ purīṃ pārthivātmaja
GE09ram_1-7u:21145: 6.109.009a puṣpakaṃ nāma bhadraṃ te vimānaṃ sūryasaṃnibham
GE09ram_1-7u:21146: 6.109.009c mama bhrātuḥ kuberasya rāvaṇenāhṛtaṃ balāt 6.109.010a tad idaṃ meghasaṃkāśaṃ vimānam iha tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_1-7u:21147: 6.109.010c tena yāsyasi yānena tvam ayodhyāṃ gajajvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21148: 6.109.011a ahaṃ te yady anugrāhyo yadi smarasi me guṇān 6.109.011c vasa tāvad iha prājña yady asti mayi sauhṛdam 6.109.012a lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vaidehyā cāpi bhāryayā
GE09ram_1-7u:21149: 6.109.012c arcitaḥ sarvakāmais tvaṃ tato rāma gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:21150: 6.109.013a prītiyuktas tu me rāma sasainyaḥ sasuhṛdgaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21151: 6.109.013c satkriyāṃ vihitāṃ tāvad gṛhāṇa tvaṃ mayodyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:21152: 6.109.014a praṇayād bahumānāc ca sauhṛdena ca rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:21153: 6.109.014c prasādayāmi preṣyo 'haṃ na khalv ājñāpayāmi te
GE09ram_1-7u:21154: 6.109.015a evam uktas tato rāmaḥ pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:21155: 6.109.015c rakṣasāṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ copaśṛṇvatām 6.109.016a pūjito 'haṃ tvayā vīra sācivyena paraṃtapa
GE09ram_1-7u:21156: 6.109.016c sarvātmanā ca ceṣṭibhiḥ sauhṛdenottamena ca 6.109.017a na khalv etan na kuryāṃ te vacanaṃ rākṣaseśvara 6.109.017c taṃ tu me bhrātaraṃ draṣṭuṃ bharataṃ tvarate manaḥ 6.109.018a māṃ nivartayituṃ yo 'sau citrakūṭam upāgataḥ 6.109.018c śirasā yācato yasya vacanaṃ na kṛtaṃ mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:21157: 6.109.019a kausalyāṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca kaikeyīṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:21158: 6.109.019c gurūṃś ca suhṛdaś caiva paurāṃś ca tanayaiḥ saha 6.109.020a upasthāpaya me kṣipraṃ vimānaṃ rākṣaseśvara 6.109.020c kṛtakāryasya me vāsaḥ kathaṃ cid iha saṃmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21160: 6.109.021c manyur na khalu kartavyas tvaritas tvānumānaye
GE09ram_1-7u:21163: 6.109.023a pāṇḍurābhiḥ patākābhir dhvajaiś ca samalaṃkṛtam 6.109.023c śobhitaṃ kāñcanair harmyair hemapadmavibhūṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:21168: 6.109.026a talaiḥ sphaṭikacitrāṅgair vaidūryaiś ca varāsanaiḥ 6.109.026c mahārhāstaraṇopetair upapannaṃ mahādhanaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21169: 6.109.027a upasthitam anādhṛṣyaṃ tad vimānaṃ manojavam 6.109.027c nivedayitvā rāmāya tasthau tatra vibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.110.001a upasthitaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā puṣpakaṃ puṣpabhūṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:21170: 6.110.001c avidūre sthitaṃ rāmaṃ pratyuvāca vibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.110.002a sa tu baddhāñjaliḥ prahvo vinīto rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21171: 6.110.002c abravīt tvarayopetaḥ kiṃ karomīti rāghavam 6.110.003a tam abravīn mahātejā lakṣmaṇasyopaśṛṇvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21172: 6.110.003c vimṛśya rāghavo vākyam idaṃ snehapuraskṛtam 6.110.004a kṛtaprayatnakarmāṇo vibhīṣaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:21173: 6.110.004c ratnair arthaiś ca vivibhair bhūṣaṇaiś cābhipūjaya
GE09ram_1-7u:21174: 6.110.005a sahaibhir arditā laṅkā nirjitā rākṣaseśvara 6.110.005c hṛṣṭaiḥ prāṇabhayaṃ tyaktvā saṃgrāmeṣv anivartibhiḥ 6.110.006a evaṃ saṃmānitāś ceme mānārhā mānada tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:21177: 6.110.007c yatas tvām avagacchanti tataḥ saṃbodhayāmi te
GE09ram_1-7u:21178: 6.110.008a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa vānarāṃs tān vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21180: 6.110.009a tatas tān pūjitān dṛṣṭvā ratnair arthaiś ca yūthapān 6.110.009c āruroha tato rāmas tad vimānam anuttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:21182: 6.110.010c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vikrāntena dhanuṣmatā 6.110.011a abravīc ca vimānasthaḥ kākutsthaḥ sarvavānarān 6.110.011c sugrīvaṃ ca mahāvīryaṃ rākṣasaṃ ca vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:21183: 6.110.012a mitrakāryaṃ kṛtam idaṃ bhavadbhir vānarottamāḥ 6.110.012c anujñātā mayā sarve yatheṣṭaṃ pratigacchata 6.110.013a yat tu kāryaṃ vayasyena suhṛdā vā paraṃtapa
GE09ram_1-7u:21184: 6.110.013c kṛtaṃ sugrīva tat sarvaṃ bhavatā dharmabhīruṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:21186: 6.110.014a svarājye vasa laṅkāyāṃ mayā datte vibhīṣaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:21187: 6.110.014c na tvāṃ dharṣayituṃ śaktāḥ sendrā api divaukasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21188: 6.110.015a ayodhyāṃ pratiyāsyāmi rājadhānīṃ pitur mama 6.110.015c abhyanujñātum icchāmi sarvān āmantrayāmi vaḥ 6.110.016a evam uktās tu rāmeṇa vānarās te mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21189: 6.110.016c ūcuḥ prāñjalayo rāmaṃ rākṣasaś ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21190: 6.110.016e ayodhyāṃ gantum icchāmaḥ sarvān nayatu no bhavān
GE09ram_1-7u:21191: 6.110.017a dṛṣṭvā tvām abhiṣekārdraṃ kausalyām abhivādya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:21192: 6.110.017c acireṇāgamiṣyāmaḥ svān gṛhān nṛpateḥ suta 6.110.018a evam uktas tu dharmātmā vānaraiḥ savibhīṣaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21194: 6.110.019a priyāt priyataraṃ labdhaṃ yad ahaṃ sasuhṛjjanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21195: 6.110.019c sarvair bhavadbhiḥ sahitaḥ prītiṃ lapsye purīṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21196: 6.110.020a kṣipram āroha sugrīva vimānaṃ vānaraiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:21198: 6.110.021a tatas tat puṣpakaṃ divyaṃ sugrīvaḥ saha senayā
GE09ram_1-7u:21199: 6.110.021c adhyārohat tvarañ śīghraṃ sāmātyaś ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21200: 6.110.022a teṣv ārūḍheṣu sarveṣu kauberaṃ paramāsanam 6.110.022c rāghaveṇābhyanujñātam utpapāta vihāyasaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:21201: 6.110.023a yayau tena vimānena haṃsayuktena bhāsvatā 6.110.023c prahṛṣṭaś ca pratītaś ca babhau rāmaḥ kuberavat
GE09ram_1-7u:21202: 6.111.001a anujñātaṃ tu rāmeṇa tad vimānam anuttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:21204: 6.111.002a pātayitvā tataś cakṣuḥ sarvato raghunandanaḥ 6.111.002c abravīn maithilīṃ sītāṃ rāmaḥ śaśinibhānanām 6.111.003a kailāsaśikharākāre trikūṭaśikhare sthitām
GE09ram_1-7u:21205: 6.111.003c laṅkām īkṣasva vaidehi nirmitāṃ viśvakarmaṇā 6.111.004a etad āyodhanaṃ paśya
GE09ram_1-7u:21206: 6.111.004c harīṇāṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca sīte viśasanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:21207: 6.111.005a tavahetor viśālākṣi rāvaṇo nihato mayā 6.111.005c kumbhakarṇo 'tra nihataḥ prahastaś ca niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21208: 6.111.006a lakṣmaṇenendrajic cātra rāvaṇir nihato raṇe 6.111.006c virūpākṣaś ca duṣprekṣyo
GE09ram_1-7u:21209: 6.111.007a akampanaś ca nihato balino 'nye ca rākṣasāḥ 6.111.007c triśirāś cātikāyaś ca
GE09ram_1-7u:21210: 6.111.008a atra mandodarī nāma bhāryā taṃ paryadevayat
GE09ram_1-7u:21212: 6.111.009a etat tu dṛśyate tīrthaṃ samudrasya varānane
GE09ram_1-7u:21213: 6.111.009c yatra sāgaram uttīrya tāṃ rātrim uṣitā vayam
GE09ram_1-7u:21214: 6.111.010a eṣa setur mayā baddhaḥ sāgare salilārṇave
GE09ram_1-7u:21216: 6.111.011a paśya sāgaram akṣobhyaṃ vaidehi varuṇālayam 6.111.011c apāram abhigarjantaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:21217: 6.111.012a hiraṇyanābhaṃ śailendraṃ kāñcanaṃ paśya maithili 6.111.012c viśramārthaṃ hanumato bhittvā sāgaram utthitam 6.111.013a atra rākṣasarājo 'yam ājagāma vibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.111.014a eṣā sā dṛśyate sīte kiṣkindhā citrakānanā
GE09ram_1-7u:21218: 6.111.014c sugrīvasya purī ramyā yatra vālī mayā hataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21219: 6.111.015a dṛśyate 'sau mahān sīte savidyud iva toyadaḥ 6.111.015c ṛśyamūko giriśreṣṭhaḥ kāñcanair dhātubhir vṛtaḥ 6.111.016a atrāhaṃ vānarendreṇa sugrīveṇa samāgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21220: 6.111.016c samayaś ca kṛtaḥ sīte vadhārthaṃ vālino mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:21221: 6.111.017a eṣā sā dṛśyate pampā nalinī citrakānanā
GE09ram_1-7u:21222: 6.111.017c tvayā vihīno yatrāhaṃ vilalāpa suduḥkhitaḥ 6.111.018a asyās tīre mayā dṛṣṭā śabarī dharmacāriṇī
GE09ram_1-7u:21223: 6.111.018c atra yojanabāhuś ca kabandho nihato mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:21225: 6.111.019c yatra yuddhaṃ mahad vṛttaṃ tavahetor vilāsini
GE09ram_1-7u:21226: 6.111.019e rāvaṇasya nṛśaṃsasya jaṭāyoś ca mahātmanaḥ 6.111.020a kharaś ca nihataś saṃkhye dūṣaṇaś ca nipātitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21227: 6.111.020c triśirāś ca mahāvīryo mayā bāṇair ajihmagaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21228: 6.111.021a parṇaśālā tathā citrā dṛśyate śubhadarśanā 6.111.021c yatra tvaṃ rākṣasendreṇa rāvaṇena hṛtā balāt
GE09ram_1-7u:21229: 6.111.022a eṣā godāvarī ramyā prasannasalilā śivā 6.111.022c agastyasyāśramo hy eṣa dṛśyate paśya maithili
GE09ram_1-7u:21230: 6.111.023a vaidehi dṛśyate cātra śarabhaṅgāśramo mahān 6.111.023c upayātaḥ sahasrākṣo yatra śakraḥ puraṃdaraḥ 6.111.024a ete te tāpasāvāsā dṛśyante tanumadhyame 6.111.024c atriḥ kulapatir yatra sūryavaiśvānaraprabhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21231: 6.111.024e atra sīte tvayā dṛṣṭā tāpasī dharmacāriṇī
GE09ram_1-7u:21232: 6.111.025a asmin deśe mahākāyo virādho nihato mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:21234: 6.111.026c yatra māṃ kaikayīputraḥ prasādayitum āgataḥ 6.111.027a eṣā sā yamunā dūrād dṛśyate
GE09ram_1-7u:21235: 6.111.027c bharadvājāśramo yatra śrīmān eṣa prakāśate 6.111.028a eṣā tripathagā gaṅgā dṛśyate varavarṇini 6.111.028c śṛṅgaverapuraṃ caitad guho yatra samāgataḥ 6.111.029a eṣā sā dṛśyate 'yodhyā rājadhānī pitur mama
GE09ram_1-7u:21236: 6.111.029c ayodhyāṃ kuru vaidehi praṇāmaṃ punar āgatā
GE09ram_1-7u:21237: 6.111.030a tatas te vānarāḥ sarve rākṣasaś ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21238: 6.111.030c utpatyotpatya dadṛśus tāṃ purīṃ śubhadarśanām 6.111.031a tatas tu tāṃ pāṇḍuraharmyamālinīṃ; viśālakakṣyāṃ gajavājisaṃkulām 6.111.031c purīm ayodhyāṃ dadṛśuḥ plavaṃgamāḥ; purīṃ mahendrasya yathāmarāvatīm
GE09ram_1-7u:21239: 6.112.001a pūrṇe caturdaśe varṣe pañcabhyāṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ 6.112.001c bharadvājāśramaṃ prāpya vavande niyato munim 6.112.002a so 'pṛcchad abhivādyainaṃ bharadvājaṃ tapodhanam
GE09ram_1-7u:21240: 6.112.002c śṛṇoṣi ka cid bhagavan subhikṣānāmayaṃ pure
GE09ram_1-7u:21241: 6.112.002e kaccic ca yukto bharato jīvanty api ca mātaraḥ 6.112.003a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa bharadvājo mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21243: 6.112.004a paṅkadigdhas tu bharato jaṭilas tvāṃ pratīkṣate
GE09ram_1-7u:21244: 6.112.004c pāduke te puraskṛtya sarvaṃ ca kuśalaṃ gṛhe
GE09ram_1-7u:21245: 6.112.005a tvāṃ purā cīravasanaṃ praviśantaṃ mahāvanam 6.112.005c strītṛtīyaṃ cyutaṃ rājyād dharmakāmaṃ ca kevalam
GE09ram_1-7u:21248: 6.112.007a dṛṣṭvā tu karuṇā pūrvaṃ mamāsīt samitiṃjaya
GE09ram_1-7u:21251: 6.112.008c samīkṣya vijitāriṃ tvāṃ mama prītir anuttamā
GE09ram_1-7u:21252: 6.112.009a sarvaṃ ca sukhaduḥkhaṃ te viditaṃ mama rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:21253: 6.112.009c yat tvayā vipulaṃ prāptaṃ janasthānavadhādikam 6.112.010a brāhmaṇārthe niyuktasya rakṣataḥ sarvatāpasān
GE09ram_1-7u:21254: 6.112.010c mārīcadarśanaṃ caiva sītonmathanam eva ca 6.112.011a kabandhadarśanaṃ caiva pampābhigamanaṃ tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:21255: 6.112.011c sugrīveṇa ca te sakhyaṃ yac ca vālī hatas tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:21256: 6.112.012a mārgaṇaṃ caiva vaidehyāḥ karma vātātmajasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:21257: 6.112.012c viditāyāṃ ca vaidehyāṃ nalasetur yathā kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21258: 6.112.012e yathā ca dīpitā laṅkā prahṛṣṭair hariyūthapaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21260: 6.112.013c yathā ca nihataḥ saṃkhye rāvaṇo devakaṇṭakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21261: 6.112.014a samāgamaś ca tridaśair yathādattaś ca te varaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21262: 6.112.014c sarvaṃ mamaitad viditaṃ tapasā dharmavatsala 6.112.015a aham apy atra te dadmi varaṃ śastrabhṛtāṃ vara 6.112.015c arghyaṃ pratigṛhāṇedam ayodhyāṃ śvo gamiṣyasi 6.112.016a tasya tac chirasā vākyaṃ pratigṛhya nṛpātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21263: 6.112.016c bāḍham ity eva saṃhṛṣṭaḥ śrīmān varam ayācata
GE09ram_1-7u:21264: 6.112.017a akālaphalino vṛkṣāḥ sarve cāpi madhusravāḥ 6.112.017c bhavantu mārge bhagavann ayodhyāṃ prati gacchataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21265: 6.112.018a niṣphalāḥ phalinaś cāsan vipuṣpāḥ puṣpaśālinaḥ 6.112.018c śuṣkāḥ samagrapatrās te nagāś caiva madhusravāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21266: 6.113.001a ayodhyāṃ tu samālokya cintayām āsa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21267: 6.113.001c cintayitvā tato dṛṣṭiṃ vānareṣu nyapātayat 6.113.002a priyakāmaḥ priyaṃ rāmas tatas tvaritavikramam 6.113.002c uvāca dhīmāṃs tejasvī hanūmantaṃ plavaṃgamam 6.113.003a ayodhyāṃ tvarito gaccha kṣipraṃ tvaṃ plavagottama
GE09ram_1-7u:21268: 6.113.003c jānīhi kaccit kuśalī jano nṛpatimandire 6.113.004a śṛṅgaverapuraṃ prāpya guhaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:21269: 6.113.004c niṣādādhipatiṃ brūhi kuśalaṃ vacanān mama 6.113.005a śrutvā tu māṃ kuśalinam arogaṃ vigatajvaram
GE09ram_1-7u:21270: 6.113.005c bhaviṣyati guhaḥ prītaḥ sa mamātmasamaḥ sakhā
GE09ram_1-7u:21271: 6.113.006a ayodhyāyāś ca te mārgaṃ pravṛttiṃ bharatasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:21273: 6.113.007a bharatas tu tvayā vācyaḥ kuśalaṃ vacanān mama
GE09ram_1-7u:21274: 6.113.007c siddhārthaṃ śaṃsa māṃ tasmai sabhāryaṃ sahalakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:21275: 6.113.008a haraṇaṃ cāpi vaidehyā rāvaṇena balīyasā 6.113.008c sugrīveṇa ca saṃvādaṃ vālinaś ca vadhaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:21276: 6.113.009a maithilyanveṣaṇaṃ caiva yathā cādhigatā tvayā 6.113.009c laṅghayitvā mahātoyam āpagāpatim avyayam
GE09ram_1-7u:21277: 6.113.010a upayānaṃ samudrasya sāgarasya ca darśanam 6.113.010c yathā ca kāritaḥ setū rāvaṇaś ca yathā hataḥ 6.113.011a varadānaṃ mahendreṇa brahmaṇā varuṇena ca 6.113.011c mahādevaprasādāc ca pitrā mama samāgamam 6.113.012a jitvā śatrugaṇān rāmaḥ prāpya cānuttamaṃ yaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21278: 6.113.012c upayāti samṛddhārthaḥ saha mitrair mahābalaḥ 6.113.013a etac chrutvā yamākāraṃ bhajate bharatas tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21279: 6.113.013c sa ca te veditavyaḥ syāt sarvaṃ yac cāpi māṃ prati
GE09ram_1-7u:21280: 6.113.014a jñeyāḥ sarve ca vṛttāntā bharatasyeṅgitāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:21281: 6.113.014c tattvena mukhavarṇena dṛṣṭyā vyābhāṣaṇena ca 6.113.015a sarvakāmasamṛddhaṃ hi
GE09ram_1-7u:21282: 6.113.015c pitṛpaitāmahaṃ rājyaṃ kasya nāvartayen manaḥ 6.113.016a saṃgatyā bharataḥ śrīmān rājyenārthī svayaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_1-7u:21283: 6.113.016c praśāstu vasudhāṃ sarvām akhilāṃ raghunandanaḥ 6.113.017a tasya buddhiṃ ca vijñāya vyavasāyaṃ ca vānara
GE09ram_1-7u:21284: 6.113.017c yāvan na dūraṃ yātāḥ smaḥ kṣipram āgantum arhasi 6.113.018a iti pratisamādiṣṭo hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21285: 6.113.018c mānuṣaṃ dhārayan rūpam ayodhyāṃ tvarito yayau
GE09ram_1-7u:21287: 6.113.019c gaṅgāyamunayor bhīmaṃ saṃnipātam atītya ca 6.113.020a śṛṅgaverapuraṃ prāpya guham āsādya vīryavān 6.113.020c sa vācā śubhayā hṛṣṭo hanūmān idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:21288: 6.113.021a sakhā tu tava kākutstho rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21289: 6.113.021c sasītaḥ saha saumitriḥ sa tvāṃ kuśalam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:21290: 6.113.022a pañcamīm adya rajanīm uṣitvā vacanān muneḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21294: 6.113.024a so 'paśyad rāmatīrthaṃ ca nadīṃ vālukinīṃ tathā 6.113.024c gomatīṃ tāṃ ca so 'paśyad bhīmaṃ sālavanaṃ tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:21295: 6.113.025a sa gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ tvaritaḥ kapikuñjaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21298: 6.113.026c dadarśa bharataṃ dīnaṃ kṛśam āśramavāsinam 6.113.027a jaṭilaṃ maladigdhāṅgaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:21301: 6.113.029a pāduke te puraskṛtya śāsantaṃ vai vasuṃdharām
GE09ram_1-7u:21302: 6.113.029c caturvarṇyasya lokasya trātāraṃ sarvato bhayāt 6.113.030a upasthitam amātyaiś ca śucibhiś ca purohitaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21303: 6.113.030c balamukhyaiś ca yuktaiś ca kāṣāyāmbaradhāribhiḥ 6.113.031a na hi te rājaputraṃ taṃ cīrakṛṣṇājināmbaram
GE09ram_1-7u:21304: 6.113.031c parimoktuṃ vyavasyanti paurā vai dharmavatsalāḥ 6.113.032a taṃ dharmam iva dharmajñaṃ devavantam ivāparam
GE09ram_1-7u:21305: 6.113.032c uvāca prāñjalir vākayṃ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ 6.113.033a vasantaṃ daṇḍakāraṇye yaṃ tvaṃ cīrajaṭādharam 6.113.033c anuśocasi kākutsthaṃ sa tvā kuśalam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:21306: 6.113.034a priyam ākhyāmi te deva śokaṃ tyakṣyasi dāruṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:21307: 6.113.034c asmin muhūrte bhrātrā tvaṃ rāmeṇa saha saṃgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21308: 6.113.035a nihatya rāvaṇaṃ rāmaḥ pratilabhya ca maithilīm
GE09ram_1-7u:21309: 6.113.035c upayāti samṛddhārthaḥ saha mitrair mahābalaiḥ 6.113.036a lakṣmaṇaś ca mahātejā vaidehī ca yaśasvinī
GE09ram_1-7u:21310: 6.113.036c sītā samagrā rāmeṇa mahendreṇa śacī yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:21311: 6.113.037a evam ukto hanumatā bharataḥ kaikayīsutaḥ 6.113.037c papāta sahasā hṛṣṭo harṣān mohaṃ jagāma ha
GE09ram_1-7u:21312: 6.113.038a tato muhūrtād utthāya pratyāśvasya ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21314: 6.113.039a aśokajaiḥ prītimayaiḥ kapim āliṅgya saṃbhramāt 6.113.039c siṣeca bharataḥ śrīmān vipulair aśrubindubhiḥ 6.113.040a devo vā mānuṣo vā tvam anukrośād ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21315: 6.113.040c priyākhyānasya te saumya dadāmi bruvataḥ priyam
GE09ram_1-7u:21316: 6.113.041a gavāṃ śatasahasraṃ ca grāmāṇāṃ ca śataṃ param
GE09ram_1-7u:21317: 6.113.041c sakuṇḍalāḥ śubhācārā bhāryāḥ kanyāś ca ṣoḍaśa
GE09ram_1-7u:21320: 6.113.043a niśamya rāmāgamanaṃ nṛpātmajaḥ; kapipravīrasya tadādbhutopamam 6.113.043c praharṣito rāmadidṛkṣayābhavat; punaś ca harṣād idam abravīd vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21321: 6.114.001a bahūni nāma varṣāṇi gatasya sumahad vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:21322: 6.114.001c śṛṇomy ahaṃ prītikaraṃ mama nāthasya kīrtanam
GE09ram_1-7u:21323: 6.114.002a kalyāṇī bata gātheyaṃ laukikī pratibhāti me
GE09ram_1-7u:21324: 6.114.002c eti jīvantam ānando naraṃ varṣaśatād api
GE09ram_1-7u:21325: 6.114.003a rāghavasya harīṇāṃ ca katham āsīt samāgamaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21326: 6.114.003c kasmin deśe kim āśritya tat tvam ākhyāhi pṛcchataḥ 6.114.004a sa pṛṣṭo rājaputreṇa bṛsyāṃ samupaveśitaḥ 6.114.004c ācacakṣe tataḥ sarvaṃ rāmasya caritaṃ vane
GE09ram_1-7u:21327: 6.114.005a yathā pravrajito rāmo mātur datte vare tava
GE09ram_1-7u:21328: 6.114.005c yathā ca putraśokena rājā daśaratho mṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21329: 6.114.006a yathā dūtais tvam ānītas tūrṇaṃ rājagṛhāt prabho
GE09ram_1-7u:21330: 6.114.006c tvayāyodhyāṃ praviṣṭena yathā rājyaṃ na cepsitam
GE09ram_1-7u:21332: 6.114.007c nimantritas tvayā bhrātā dharmam ācaritā satām
GE09ram_1-7u:21333: 6.114.008a sthitena rājño vacane yathā rājyaṃ visarjitam
GE09ram_1-7u:21334: 6.114.008c āryasya pāduke gṛhya yathāsi punar āgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21335: 6.114.009a sarvam etan mahābāho yathāvad viditaṃ tava
GE09ram_1-7u:21336: 6.114.009c tvayi pratiprayāte tu yad vṛttaṃ tan nibodha me 6.114.010a apayāte tvayi tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:21338: 6.114.011a teṣāṃ purastād balavān gacchatāṃ gahane vane
GE09ram_1-7u:21340: 6.114.012a tam utkṣipya mahānādam ūrdhvabāhum adhomukham 6.114.012c nikhāte prakṣipanti sma nadantam iva kuñjaram
GE09ram_1-7u:21341: 6.114.013a tat kṛtvā duṣkaraṃ karma bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_1-7u:21342: 6.114.013c sāyāhne śarabhaṅgasya ramyam āśramam īyatuḥ 6.114.014a śarabhaṅge divaṃ prāpte rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ 6.114.014c abhivādya munīn sarvāñ janasthānam upāgamat 6.114.015a caturdaśasahasrāṇi rakṣasāṃ bhīmakarmaṇām
GE09ram_1-7u:21343: 6.114.015c hatāni vasatā tatra rāghaveṇa mahātmanā 6.114.016a tataḥ paścāc chūrpaṇakhā rāmapārśvam upāgatā 6.114.016c tato rāmeṇa saṃdiṣṭo lakṣmaṇaḥ sahasotthitaḥ 6.114.017a pragṛhya khaḍgaṃ ciccheda karṇanāse mahābalaḥ 6.114.017c tatas tenārditā bālā rāvaṇaṃ samupāgatā 6.114.018a rāvaṇānucaro ghoro mārīco nāma rākṣasaḥ 6.114.018c lobhayām āsa vaidehīṃ bhūtvā ratnamayo mṛgaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21344: 6.114.019a sā rāmam abravīd dṛṣṭvā vaidehī gṛhyatām iti
GE09ram_1-7u:21345: 6.114.019c aho manoharaḥ kānta āśrame no bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:21346: 6.114.020a tato rāmo dhanuṣpāṇir dhāvantam anudhāvati 6.114.020c sa taṃ jaghāna dhāvantaṃ śareṇānataparvaṇā 6.114.021a atha saumyā daśagrīvo mṛgaṃ yāte tu rāghave
GE09ram_1-7u:21347: 6.114.021c lakṣmaṇe cāpi niṣkrānte praviveśāśramaṃ tadā 6.114.021e jagrāha tarasā sītāṃ grahaḥ khe rohiṇīm iva
GE09ram_1-7u:21348: 6.114.022a trātukāmaṃ tato yuddhe hatvā gṛdhraṃ jaṭāyuṣam
GE09ram_1-7u:21349: 6.114.022c pragṛhya sītāṃ sahasā jagāmāśu sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21350: 6.114.023a tatas tv adbhutasaṃkāśāḥ sthitāḥ parvatamūrdhani 6.114.023c sītāṃ gṛhītvā gacchantaṃ vānarāḥ parvatopamāḥ 6.114.023e dadṛśur vismitās tatra rāvaṇaṃ rākṣasādhipam 6.114.024a praviverśa tadā laṅkāṃ rāvaṇo lokarāvaṇaḥ 6.114.025a tāṃ suvarṇaparikrānte śubhe mahati veśmani 6.114.025c praveśya maithilīṃ vākyaiḥ sāntvayām āsa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21351: 6.114.026a nivartamānaḥ kākutstho dṛṣṭvā gṛdhraṃ pravivyathe 6.114.027a gṛdhraṃ hataṃ tadā dagdhvā rāmaḥ priyasakhaṃ pituḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21352: 6.114.027c godāvarīm anucaran vanoddeśāṃś ca puṣpitān 6.114.027e āsedatur mahāraṇye kabandhaṃ nāma rākṣasaṃ 6.114.028a tataḥ kabandhavacanād rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21353: 6.114.028c ṛśyamūkaṃ giriṃ gatvā sugrīveṇa samāgataḥ 6.114.029a tayoḥ samāgamaḥ pūrvaṃ prītyā hārdo vyajāyata
GE09ram_1-7u:21354: 6.114.029c itaretara saṃvādāt pragāḍhaḥ praṇayas tayoḥ 6.114.030a rāmaḥ svabāhuvīryeṇa svarājyaṃ pratyapādayat
GE09ram_1-7u:21355: 6.114.030c vālinaṃ samare hatvā mahākāyaṃ mahābalam 6.114.031a sugrīvaḥ sthāpito rājye sahitaḥ sarvavānaraiḥ 6.114.031c rāmāya pratijānīte rājaputryās tu mārgaṇam 6.114.032a ādiṣṭā vānarendreṇa sugrīveṇa mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:21356: 6.114.032c daśakoṭyaḥ plavaṃgānāṃ sarvāḥ prasthāpitā diśaḥ 6.114.033a teṣāṃ no vipranaṣṭānāṃ vindhye parvatasattame 6.114.033c bhṛśaṃ śokābhitaptānāṃ mahān kālo 'tyavartata
GE09ram_1-7u:21357: 6.114.034a bhrātā tu gṛdhrarājasya saṃpātir nāma vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:21358: 6.114.034c samākhyāti sma vasatiṃ sītāyā rāvaṇālaye 6.114.035a so 'haṃ duḥkhaparītānāṃ duḥkhaṃ tajjñātināṃ nudan
GE09ram_1-7u:21359: 6.114.035c ātmavīryaṃ samāsthāya yojanānāṃ śataṃ plutaḥ 6.114.036a tatrāham ekām adrākṣam aśokavanikāṃ gatām 6.114.036c kauśeyavastrāṃ malināṃ nirānandāṃ dṛḍhavratām
GE09ram_1-7u:21360: 6.114.037a tayā sametya vidhivat pṛṣṭvā sarvam aninditām
GE09ram_1-7u:21362: 6.114.038a mayā ca punar āgamya rāmasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ 6.114.038c abhijñānaṃ mayā dattam arciṣmān sa mahāmaṇiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21363: 6.114.039a śrutvā tāṃ maithilīṃ hṛṣṭas tv āśaśaṃse sa jīvitam 6.114.039c jīvitāntam anuprāptaḥ pītvāmṛtam ivāturaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21364: 6.114.040a udyojayiṣyann udyogaṃ dadhre laṅkāvadhe manaḥ 6.114.040c jighāṃsur iva lokāṃs te sarvāṃl lokān vibhāvasuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21365: 6.114.041a tataḥ samudram āsādya nalaṃ setum akārayat
GE09ram_1-7u:21366: 6.114.041c atarat kapivīrāṇāṃ vāhinī tena setunā 6.114.042a prahastam avadhīn nīlaḥ kumbhakarṇaṃ tu rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21367: 6.114.042c lakṣmaṇo rāvaṇasutaṃ svayaṃ rāmas tu rāvaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:21368: 6.114.043a sa śakreṇa samāgamya yamena varuṇena ca
GE09ram_1-7u:21369: 6.114.043c surarṣibhiś ca kākutstho varāṃl lebhe paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21370: 6.114.044a sa tu dattavaraḥ prītyā vānaraiś ca samāgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21372: 6.114.045a taṃ gaṅgāṃ punar āsādya vasantaṃ munisaṃnidhau
GE09ram_1-7u:21373: 6.114.045c avighnaṃ puṣyayogena śvo rāmaṃ draṣṭum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:21374: 6.114.046a tataḥ sa satyaṃ hanumadvaco mahan; niśamya hṛṣṭo bharataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21376: 6.114.046c uvāca vāṇīṃ manasaḥ praharṣiṇī; cirasya pūrṇaḥ khalu me manorathaḥ 6.115.001a śrutvā tu param ānandaṃ bharataḥ satyavikramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21377: 6.115.001c hṛṣṭam ājñāpayām āsa śatrughnaṃ paravīrahā 6.115.002a daivatāni ca sarvāṇi caityāni nagarasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:21378: 6.115.002c sugandhamālyair vāditrair arcantu śucayo narāḥ 6.115.003a rājadārās tathāmātyāḥ sainyāḥ senāgaṇāṅganāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21379: 6.115.003c abhiniryāntu rāmasya draṣṭuṃ śaśinibhaṃ mukham 6.115.004a bharatasya vacaḥ śrutvā śatrughnaḥ paravīrahā 6.115.004c viṣṭīr anekasāhasrīś codayām āsa vīryavān 6.115.005a samīkuruta nimnāni viṣamāṇi samāni ca 6.115.005c sthānāni ca nirasyantāṃ nandigrāmād itaḥ param
GE09ram_1-7u:21380: 6.115.006a siñcantu pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ himaśītena vāriṇā 6.115.006c tato 'bhyavakiraṃs tv anye lājaiḥ puṣpaiś ca sarvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21382: 6.115.007c śobhayantu ca veśmāni sūryasyodayanaṃ prati 6.115.008a sragdāmamuktapuṣpaiś ca sugandhaiḥ pañcavarṇakaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21383: 6.115.008c rājamārgam asaṃbādhaṃ kirantu śataśo narāḥ 6.115.009a mattair nāgasahasraiś ca śātakumbhavibhūṣitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21385: 6.115.009e niryayus tvarayā yuktā rathaiś ca sumahārathāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21386: 6.115.010a tato yānāny upārūḍhāḥ sarvā daśarathastriyaḥ 6.115.010c kausalyāṃ pramukhe kṛtvā sumitrāṃ cāpi niryayuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21389: 6.115.012a kṛtsnaṃ ca nagaraṃ tat tu nandigrāmam upāgamat
GE09ram_1-7u:21391: 6.115.013a mālyamodaka hastaiś ca mantribhir bharato vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21393: 6.115.014a āryapādau gṛhītvā tu śirasā dharmakovidaḥ 6.115.014c pāṇḍuraṃ chatram ādāya
GE09ram_1-7u:21394: 6.115.015a śukle ca vālavyajane rājārhe hemabhūṣite 6.115.015c upavāsakṛśo dīnaś cīrakṛṣṇājināmbaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21395: 6.115.016a bhrātur āgamanaṃ śrutvā tat pūrvaṃ harṣam āgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21396: 6.115.016c pratyudyayau tadā rāmaṃ mahātmā sacivaiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:21397: 6.115.017a samīkṣya bharato vākyam uvāca pavanātmajam 6.115.017c kaccin na khalu kāpeyī sevyate calacittatā
GE09ram_1-7u:21398: 6.115.017e na hi paśyāmi kākutsthaṃ rāmam āryaṃ paraṃtapam
GE09ram_1-7u:21399: 6.115.018a athaivam ukte vacane hanūmān idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:21400: 6.115.018c arthaṃ vijñāpayann eva bharataṃ satyavikramam 6.115.019a sadā phalān kusumitān vṛkṣān prāpya madhusravān
GE09ram_1-7u:21401: 6.115.019c bharadvājaprasādena mattabhramaranāditān 6.115.020a tasya caiṣa varo datto vāsavena
GE09ram_1-7u:21403: 6.115.021a nisvanaḥ śrūyate bhīmaḥ prahṛṣṭānāṃ vanaukasām 6.115.021c manye vānarasenā sā nadīṃ tarati gomatīm
GE09ram_1-7u:21404: 6.115.022a rajovarṣaṃ samudbhūtaṃ paśya vālukinīṃ prati 6.115.022c manye sālavanaṃ ramyaṃ lolayanti plavaṃgamāḥ 6.115.023a tad etad dṛśyate dūrād vimalaṃ candrasaṃnibham
GE09ram_1-7u:21405: 6.115.023c vimānaṃ puṣpakaṃ divyaṃ manasā brahmanirmitam 6.115.024a rāvaṇaṃ bāndhavaiḥ sārdhaṃ hatvā labdhaṃ mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:21406: 6.115.024c dhanadasya prasādena divyam etan manojavam 6.115.025a etasmin bhrātarau vīrau vaidehyā saha rāghavau
GE09ram_1-7u:21407: 6.115.025c sugrīvaś ca mahātejā rākṣasendro vibhīṣaṇaḥ 6.115.026a tato harṣasamudbhūto nisvano divam aspṛśat 6.115.026c strībālayuvavṛddhānāṃ rāmo 'yam iti kīrtitaḥ 6.115.027a rathakuñjaravājibhyas te 'vatīrya mahīṃ gatāḥ 6.115.027c dadṛśus taṃ vimānasthaṃ narāḥ somam ivāmbare
GE09ram_1-7u:21408: 6.115.028a prāñjalir bharato bhūtvā prahṛṣṭo rāghavonmukhaḥ 6.115.028c svāgatena yathārthena tato rāmam apūjayat 6.115.029a manasā brahmaṇā sṛṣṭe vimāne lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ 6.115.029c rarāja pṛthudīrghākṣo vajrapāṇir ivāparaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21409: 6.115.030a tato vimānāgragataṃ bharato bhrātaraṃ tadā 6.115.030c vavande praṇato rāmaṃ merustham iva bhāskaram
GE09ram_1-7u:21410: 6.115.031a āropito vimānaṃ tad bharataḥ satyavikramaḥ 6.115.031c rāmam āsādya muditaḥ punar evābhyavādayat 6.115.032a taṃ samutthāpya kākutsthaś cirasyākṣipathaṃ gatam 6.115.032c aṅke bharatam āropya muditaḥ pariṣaṣvaje 6.115.033a tato lakṣmaṇam āsādya vaidehīṃ ca paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21411: 6.115.033c abhyavādayata prīto bharato nāma cābravīt 6.115.034a sugrīvaṃ kaikayī putro jāmbavantaṃ tathāṅgadam 6.115.034c maindaṃ ca dvividaṃ nīlam ṛṣabhaṃ caiva sasvaje
GE09ram_1-7u:21412: 6.115.035a te kṛtvā mānuṣaṃ rūpaṃ vānarāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21413: 6.115.035c kuśalaṃ paryapṛṣhanta prahṛṣṭā bharataṃ tadā 6.115.036a vibhīṣaṇaṃ ca bharataḥ sāntvayan vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:21414: 6.115.036c diṣṭyā tvayā sahāyena kṛtaṃ karma suduṣkaram
GE09ram_1-7u:21415: 6.115.037a śatrughnaś ca tadā rāmam abhivādya salakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:21416: 6.115.037c sītāyāś caraṇau paścād vavande vinayānvitaḥ 6.115.038a rāmo mātaram āsādya viṣaṇṇaṃ śokakarśitām 6.115.038c jagrāha praṇataḥ pādau mano mātuḥ prasādayan
GE09ram_1-7u:21417: 6.115.039a abhivādya sumitrāṃ ca kaikeyīṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:21418: 6.115.039c sa mātṝś ca tadā sarvāḥ purohitam upāgamat
GE09ram_1-7u:21420: 6.115.040c iti prāñjalayaḥ sarve nāgarā rāmam abruvan
GE09ram_1-7u:21423: 6.115.042a pāduke te tu rāmasya gṛhītvā bharataḥ svayam
GE09ram_1-7u:21424: 6.115.042c caraṇābhyāṃ narendrasya yojayām āsa dharmavit 6.115.043a abravīc ca tadā rāmaṃ bharataḥ sa kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21425: 6.115.043c etat te rakṣitaṃ rājan rājyaṃ niryātitaṃ mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:21426: 6.115.044a adya janma kṛtārthaṃ me saṃvṛttaś ca manorathaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21427: 6.115.044c yas tvāṃ paśyāmi rājānam ayodhyāṃ punar āgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:21428: 6.115.045a avekṣatāṃ bhavān kośaṃ koṣṭhāgāraṃ puraṃ balam
GE09ram_1-7u:21429: 6.115.045c bhavatas tejasā sarvaṃ kṛtaṃ daśaguṇaṃ mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:21430: 6.115.046a tathā bruvāṇaṃ bharataṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ bhrātṛvatsalam
GE09ram_1-7u:21431: 6.115.046c mumucur vānarā bāṣpaṃ rākṣasaś ca vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21432: 6.115.047a tataḥ praharṣād bharatam aṅkam āropya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21433: 6.115.047c yayau tena vimānena sasainyo bharatāśramam 6.115.048a bharatāśramam āsādya sasainyo rāghavas tadā 6.115.048c avatīrya vimānāgrād avatasthe mahītale
GE09ram_1-7u:21434: 6.115.049a abravīc ca tadā rāmas tadvimānam anuttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:21435: 6.115.049c vaha vaiśravaṇaṃ devam anujānāmi gamyatām 6.115.050a tato rāmābhyanujñātaṃ tadvimānam
GE09ram_1-7u:21436: 6.115.050c uttarāṃ diśam uddiśya jagāma dhanadālayam 6.115.051a purohitasyātmasamasya rāghavo; bṛhaspateḥ śakra ivāmarādhīaph
GE09ram_1-7u:21437: 6.115.051c nipīḍya pādau pṛthag āsane śubhe; sahaiva tenopaviveśa vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:21439: 6.116.001c babhāṣe bharato jyeṣṭhaṃ rāmaṃ satyaparākramam 6.116.002a pūjitā māmikā mātā dattaṃ rājyam idaṃ mama
GE09ram_1-7u:21440: 6.116.002c tad dadāmi punas tubhyaṃ yathā tvam adadā mama 6.116.003a dhuram ekākinā nyastām ṛṣabheṇa balīyasā 6.116.003c kiśoravad guruṃ bhāraṃ na voḍhum aham utsahe
GE09ram_1-7u:21441: 6.116.004a vārivegena mahatā bhinnaḥ setur iva kṣaran
GE09ram_1-7u:21442: 6.116.004c durbandhanam idaṃ manye rājyacchidram asaṃvṛtam 6.116.005a gatiṃ khara ivāśvasya haṃsasyeva ca vāyasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21443: 6.116.005c nānvetum utsahe deva tava mārgam ariṃdama
GE09ram_1-7u:21444: 6.116.006a yathā ca ropito vṛkṣo jātaś cāntarniveśane
GE09ram_1-7u:21445: 6.116.006c mahāṃś ca sudurāroho mahāskandhaḥ praśākhavān 6.116.007a śīryeta puṣpito bhūtvā na phalāni pradarśayet
GE09ram_1-7u:21446: 6.116.007c tasya nānubhaved arthaṃ yasya hetoḥ sa ropyate
GE09ram_1-7u:21447: 6.116.008a eṣopamā mahābāho tvam arthaṃ vettum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:21448: 6.116.008c yady asmān manujendra tvaṃ bhaktān bhṛtyān na śādhi hi
GE09ram_1-7u:21449: 6.116.009a jagad adyābhiṣiktaṃ tvām anupaśyatu sarvataḥ 6.116.009c pratapantam ivādityaṃ madhyāhne dīptatejasaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:21450: 6.116.010a tūryasaṃghātanirghoṣaiḥ kāñcīnūpuranisvanaiḥ 6.116.010c madhurair gītaśabdaiś ca pratibudhyasva śeṣva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:21451: 6.116.011a yāvad āvartate cakraṃ yāvatī ca vasuṃdharā
GE09ram_1-7u:21452: 6.116.011c tāvat tvam iha sarvasya svāmitvam abhivartaya
GE09ram_1-7u:21453: 6.116.012a bharatasya vacaḥ śrutvā rāmaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ 6.116.012c tatheti pratijagrāha niṣasādāsane śubhe
GE09ram_1-7u:21455: 6.116.013c sukhahastāḥ suśīghrāś ca rāghavaṃ paryupāsata 6.116.014a pūrvaṃ tu bharate snāte lakṣmaṇe ca mahābale
GE09ram_1-7u:21456: 6.116.014c sugrīve vānarendre ca rākṣasendre vibhīṣaṇe 6.116.015a viśodhitajaṭaḥ snātaś
GE09ram_1-7u:21457: 6.116.015c mahārhavasanopetas tasthau tatra śriyā jvalan 6.116.016a pratikarma ca rāmasya kārayām āsa vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:21459: 6.116.017a pratikarma ca sītāyāḥ sarvā daśarathastriyaḥ 6.116.017c ātmanaiva tadā cakrur manasvinyo manoharam 6.116.018a tato rāghavapatnīnāṃ sarvāsām eva śobhanam 6.116.018c cakāra yatnāt kausalyā prahṛṣṭā putravatsalā 6.116.019a tataḥ śatrughnavacanāt sumantro nāma sārathiḥ 6.116.019c yojayitvābhicakrāma rathaṃ sarvāṅgaśobhanam
GE09ram_1-7u:21460: 6.116.020a arkamaṇḍalasaṃkāśaṃ divyaṃ dṛṣṭvā rathaṃ sthitam 6.116.020c āruroha mahābāhū rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21461: 6.116.021a ayodhyāyāṃ tu sacivā rājño daśarathasya ye
GE09ram_1-7u:21462: 6.116.021c purohitaṃ puraskṛtya mantrayām āsur arthavat 6.116.022a mantrayan rāmavṛddhyarthaṃ vṛttyarthaṃ nagarasya ca 6.116.022c sarvam evābhiṣekārthaṃ jayārhasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21463: 6.116.022e kartum arhatha rāmasya yad yan maṅgalapūrvakam
GE09ram_1-7u:21464: 6.116.023a iti te mantriṇaḥ sarve saṃdiśya tu purohitam
GE09ram_1-7u:21466: 6.116.024a hariyuktaṃ sahasrākṣo ratham indra ivānaghaḥ 6.116.024c prayayau ratham āsthāya rāmo nagaram uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:21467: 6.116.025a jagrāha bharato raśmīñ śatrughnaś chatram ādade
GE09ram_1-7u:21468: 6.116.025c lakṣmaṇo vyajanaṃ tasya mūrdhni saṃparyavījayat 6.116.026a śvetaṃ ca vālavyajanaṃ sugrīvo vānareśvaraḥ 6.116.026c aparaṃ candrasaṃkāśaṃ rākṣasendro vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21469: 6.116.027a ṛṣisaṃghair tadākāśe devaiś ca samarudgaṇaiḥ 6.116.027c stūyamānasya rāmasya śuśruve madhuradhvaniḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21470: 6.116.028a tataḥ śatruṃjayaṃ nāma kuñjaraṃ parvatopamam 6.116.028c āruroha mahātejāḥ sugrīvo
GE09ram_1-7u:21473: 6.116.030a śaṅkhaśabdapraṇādaiś ca dundubhīnāṃ ca nisvanaiḥ 6.116.030c prayayū puruṣavyāghras tāṃ purīṃ harmyamālinīm 6.116.031a dadṛśus te samāyāntaṃ rāghavaṃ sapuraḥsaram 6.116.031c virājamānaṃ vapuṣā rathenātirathaṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:21474: 6.116.032a te vardhayitvā kākutsthaṃ rāmeṇa pratinanditāḥ 6.116.032c anujagmur mahātmānaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ parivāritam
GE09ram_1-7u:21475: 6.116.033a amātyair brāhmaṇaiś caiva tathā prakṛtibhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21476: 6.116.033c śriyā viruruce rāmo nakṣatrair iva candramāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21478: 6.116.034c pravyāharadbhir muditair maṅgalāni yayau vṛtaḥ 6.116.035a akṣataṃ jātarūpaṃ ca gāvaḥ kanyās tathā dvijāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21479: 6.116.035c narā modakahastāś ca rāmasya purato yayuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21480: 6.116.036a sakhyaṃ ca rāmaḥ sugrīve prabhāvaṃ cānilātmaje
GE09ram_1-7u:21481: 6.116.036c vānarāṇāṃ ca tat karma vyācacakṣe 'tha mantriṇām
GE09ram_1-7u:21482: 6.116.036e śrutvā ca vismayaṃ jagmur ayodhyāpuravāsinaḥ 6.116.037a dyutimān etad ākhyāya rāmo vānarasaṃvṛtaḥ 6.116.037c hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākīrṇām ayodhyāṃ praviveśa ha
GE09ram_1-7u:21483: 6.116.038a tato hy abhyucchrayan paurāḥ patākās te gṛhe gṛhe 6.116.038c aikṣvākādhyuṣitaṃ ramyam āsasāda pitur gṛham 6.116.039a pitur bhavanam āsādya praviśya ca mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:21484: 6.116.039c kausalyāṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca kaikeyīṃ cābhyavādayat
GE09ram_1-7u:21485: 6.116.040a athābravīd rājaputro bharataṃ dharmiṇāṃ varam 6.116.040c athopahitayā vācā madhuraṃ
