GE09ram_1-7u:23254: 7.034.024c tasya bāhūruvegena pariśrāntaḥ patanti ca 7.034.025a vālimārgād apākrāman parvatendrā hi gacchataḥ 7.034.026a apakṣigaṇasaṃpāto vānarendro mahājavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23255: 7.034.026c kramaśaḥ sāgarān sarvān saṃdhyākālam avandata 7.034.027a sabhājyamāno bhūtais tu khecaraiḥ khecaro hariḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23256: 7.034.027c paścimaṃ sāgaraṃ vālī ājagāma sarāvaṇaḥ 7.034.028a tatra saṃdhyām upāsitvā snātvā japtvā ca vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23257: 7.034.028c uttaraṃ sāgaraṃ prāyād vahamāno daśānanam 7.034.029a uttare sāgare saṃdhyām upāsitvā daśānanam 7.034.029c vahamāno 'gamad vālī pūrvam ambumahānidhim
GE09ram_1-7u:23258: 7.034.030a tatrāpi saṃdhyām anvāsya vāsaviḥ sa harīśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23259: 7.034.030c kiṣkindhābhimukho gṛhya rāvaṇaṃ punar āgamat 7.034.031a caturṣv api samudreṣu saṃdhyām anvāsya vānaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23261: 7.034.032a rāvaṇaṃ tu mumocātha svakakṣāt kapisattamaḥ 7.034.032c kutas tvam iti covāca prahasan rāvaṇaṃ prati
GE09ram_1-7u:23262: 7.034.033a vismayaṃ tu mahad gatvā śramalokanirīkṣaṇaḥ 7.034.033c rākṣaseśo harīśaṃ tam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:23264: 7.034.034c yuddhepsur ahaṃ saṃprāptaḥ sa cādyāsāditas tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:23265: 7.034.035a aho balam aho vīryam aho gambhīratā ca te 7.034.035c yenāhaṃ paśuvad gṛhya bhrāmitaś caturo 'rṇavān
GE09ram_1-7u:23266: 7.034.036a evam aśrāntavad vīra śīghram eva ca vānara
GE09ram_1-7u:23267: 7.034.036c māṃ caivodvahamānas tu ko 'nyo vīraḥ kramiṣyati 7.034.037a trayāṇām eva bhūtānāṃ gatir eṣā plavaṃgama
GE09ram_1-7u:23270: 7.034.038c tvayā saha ciraṃ sakhyaṃ susnigdhaṃ pāvakāgrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23271: 7.034.039a dārāḥ putrāḥ puraṃ rāṣṭraṃ bhogācchādanabhojanam 7.034.039c sarvam evāvibhaktaṃ nau bhaviṣyati harīśvara 7.034.040a tataḥ prajvālayitvāgniṃ tāv ubhau harirākṣasau 7.034.040c bhrātṛtvam upasaṃpannau pariṣvajya parasparam
GE09ram_1-7u:23272: 7.034.041a anyonyaṃ lambitakarau tatas tau harirākṣasau 7.034.041c kiṣkindhāṃ viśatur hṛṣṭau siṃhau giriguhām iva
GE09ram_1-7u:23273: 7.034.042a sa tatra māsam uṣitaḥ sugrīva iva rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23275: 7.034.043a evam etat purāvṛttaṃ vālinā rāvaṇaḥ prabho
GE09ram_1-7u:23276: 7.034.043c dharṣitaś ca kṛtaś cāpi bhrātā pāvakasaṃnidhau
GE09ram_1-7u:23278: 7.034.044c so 'pi tayā vinirdagdhaḥ śalabho vahninā yathā 7.035.001a apṛcchata tato rāmo dakṣiṇāśālayaṃ munim 7.035.001c prāñjalir vinayopeta idam āha vaco 'rthavat
GE09ram_1-7u:23279: 7.035.002a atulaṃ balam etābhyāṃ vālino rāvaṇasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:23280: 7.035.002c na tv etau hanumadvīryaiḥ samāv iti matir mama 7.035.003a śauryaṃ dākṣyaṃ balaṃ dhairyaṃ prājñatā nayasādhanam
GE09ram_1-7u:23281: 7.035.003c vikramaś ca prabhāvaś ca hanūmati kṛtālayāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23283: 7.035.004c samāśvāsya kapīn bhūyo yojanānāṃ śataṃ plutaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23284: 7.035.005a dharṣayitvā purīṃ laṅkāṃ rāvaṇāntaḥpuraṃ tathā 7.035.005c dṛṣṭvā saṃbhāṣitā cāpi sītā viśvāsitā tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:23286: 7.035.006c ete hanumatā tatra ekena vinipātitāḥ 7.035.007a bhūyo bandhād vimuktena saṃbhāṣitvā daśānanam 7.035.007c laṅkā bhasmīkṛtā tena pāvakeneva medinī 7.035.008a na kālasya na śakrasya na viṣṇor vittapasya ca 7.035.008c karmāṇi tāni śrūyante yāni yuddhe hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23287: 7.035.009a etasya bāhuvīryeṇa laṅkā sītā ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23288: 7.035.009c prāpto mayā jayaś caiva rājyaṃ mitrāṇi bāndhavāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23289: 7.035.010a hanūmān yadi me na syād vānarādhipateḥ sakhā
GE09ram_1-7u:23290: 7.035.010c pravṛttam api ko vettuṃ jānakyāḥ śaktimān bhavet
GE09ram_1-7u:23292: 7.035.011c tadā vaire samutpanne na dagdho vīrudho yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:23293: 7.035.012a na hi veditavān manye hanūmān ātmano balam
GE09ram_1-7u:23294: 7.035.012c yad dṛṣṭavāñ jīviteṣṭaṃ kliśyantaṃ vānarādhipam 7.035.013a etan me bhagavan sarvaṃ hanūmati mahāmune
GE09ram_1-7u:23296: 7.035.014a rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā hetuyuktam ṛṣis tataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23297: 7.035.014c hanūmataḥ samakṣaṃ tam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:23298: 7.035.015a satyam etad raghuśreṣṭha yad bravīṣi hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23299: 7.035.015c na bale vidyate tulyo na gatau na matau paraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23300: 7.035.016a amoghaśāpaiḥ śāpas tu datto 'sya ṛṣibhiḥ purā 7.035.016c na veditā balaṃ yena balī sann arimardanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23301: 7.035.017a bālye 'py etena yat karma kṛtaṃ rāma mahābala
GE09ram_1-7u:23302: 7.035.017c tan na varṇayituṃ śakyam atibālatayāsya te
GE09ram_1-7u:23303: 7.035.018a yadi vāsti tv abhiprāyas tac chrotuṃ tava rāghava 7.035.018c samādhāya matiṃ rāma niśāmaya vadāmy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:23305: 7.035.019c yatra rājyaṃ praśāsty asya keṣarī nāma vai pitā 7.035.020a tasya bhāryā babhūveṣṭā hy añjaneti pariśrutā
GE09ram_1-7u:23306: 7.035.020c janayām āsa tasyāṃ vai vāyur ātmajam uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:23308: 7.035.021c phalāny āhartukāmā vai niṣkrāntā gahane carā
GE09ram_1-7u:23309: 7.035.022a eṣa mātur viyogāc ca kṣudhayā ca bhṛśārditaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23310: 7.035.022c ruroda śiśur atyarthaṃ śiśuḥ śarabharāḍ iva
GE09ram_1-7u:23312: 7.035.023c dadṛśe phalalobhāc ca utpapāta raviṃ prati
GE09ram_1-7u:23313: 7.035.024a bālārkābhimukho bālo bālārka iva mūrtimān 7.035.024c grahītukāmo bālārkaṃ plavate
GE09ram_1-7u:23314: 7.035.025a etasmin plavanāne tu śiśubhāve hanūmati 7.035.025c devadānavasiddhānāṃ vismayaḥ sumahān abhūt
GE09ram_1-7u:23315: 7.035.026a nāpy evaṃ vegavān vāyur garuḍo na manas tathā 7.035.026c yathāyaṃ vāyuputras tu kramate 'mbaram uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:23316: 7.035.027a yadi tāvac chiśor asya īdṛśau gativikramau
GE09ram_1-7u:23317: 7.035.027c yauvanaṃ balam āsādya kathaṃ vego bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:23318: 7.035.028a tam anuplavate vāyuḥ plavantaṃ putram ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23321: 7.035.029c pitur balāc ca bālyāc ca bhāskarābhyāśam āgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23322: 7.035.030a śiśur eṣa tv adoṣajña iti matvā divākaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23323: 7.035.030c kāryaṃ cātra samāyattam ity evaṃ na dadāha saḥ 7.035.031a yam eva divasaṃ hy eṣa grahītuṃ bhāskaraṃ plutaḥ 7.035.031c tam eva divasaṃ rāhur jighṛkṣati divākaram
GE09ram_1-7u:23324: 7.035.032a anena ca parāmṛṣṭo rāma sūryarathopati 7.035.032c apakrāntas tatas trasto rāhuś candrārkamardanaḥ 7.035.033a sa indrabhavanaṃ gatvā saroṣaḥ siṃhikāsutaḥ 7.035.033c abravīd bhrukuṭīṃ kṛtvā devaṃ devagaṇair vṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:23325: 7.035.034a bubhukṣāpanayaṃ dattvā candrārkau mama vāsava 7.035.034c kim idaṃ tat tvayā dattam anyasya balavṛtrahan
GE09ram_1-7u:23326: 7.035.035a adyāhaṃ parvakāle tu jighṛkṣuḥ sūryam āgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23327: 7.035.035c athānyo rāhur āsādya jagrāha sahasā ravim
GE09ram_1-7u:23328: 7.035.036a sa rāhor vacanaṃ śrutvā vāsavaḥ saṃbhramānvitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23332: 7.035.038a indraḥ karīndram āruhya rāhuṃ kṛtvā puraḥsaram
GE09ram_1-7u:23333: 7.035.038c prāyād yatrābhavat sūryaḥ sahānena hanūmatā 7.035.039a athātirabhasenāgād rāhur utsṛjya vāsavam
GE09ram_1-7u:23334: 7.035.039c anena ca sa vai dṛṣṭa ādhāvañ śailakūṭavat
GE09ram_1-7u:23335: 7.035.040a tataḥ sūryaṃ samutsṛjya rāhum evam avekṣya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:23336: 7.035.040c utpapāta punar vyoma grahītuṃ siṃhikā sutam
GE09ram_1-7u:23337: 7.035.041a utsṛjyārkam imaṃ rāma ādhāvantaṃ plavaṃgamam 7.035.041c dṛṣṭvā rāhuḥ parāvṛtya mukhaśeṣaḥ parāṅmukhaḥ 7.035.042a indram āśaṃsamānas tu trātāraṃ siṃhikāsutaḥ 7.035.042c indra indreti saṃtrāsān muhur muhur abhāṣata
GE09ram_1-7u:23338: 7.035.043a rāhor vikrośamānasya prāg evālakṣitaḥ svaraḥ 7.035.043c śrutvendrovāca māṃ bhaiṣīr ayam enaṃ nihanmy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:23339: 7.035.044a airāvataṃ tato dṛṣṭvā mahat tad idam ity api 7.035.044c phalaṃ taṃ hastirājānam abhidudrāva mārutiḥ 7.035.045a tadāsya dhāvato rūpam airāvatajighṛkṣayā
GE09ram_1-7u:23340: 7.035.045c muhūrtam abhavad ghoram indrāgnyor iva bhāsvaram
GE09ram_1-7u:23341: 7.035.046a evam ādhāvamānaṃ tu nātikruddhaḥ śacīpatiḥ 7.035.046c hastāntenātimuktena kuliśenābhyatāḍayat 7.035.047a tato girau papātaiṣa indravajrābhitāḍitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23342: 7.035.047c patamānasya caitasya vāmo hanur abhajyata 7.035.048a tasmiṃs tu patite bāle vajratāḍanavihvale 7.035.048c cukrodhendrāya pavanaḥ prajānām aśivāya ca 7.035.049a viṇmūtrāśayam āvṛtya prajāsv antargataḥ prabhuḥ 7.035.049c rurodha sarvabhūtāni yathā varṣāṇi vāsavaḥ 7.035.050a vāyuprakopād bhūtāni nirucchvāsāni sarvataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23349: 7.035.053c tvayā sma bhagavan sṛṣṭāḥ prajānātha caturvidhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23350: 7.035.054a tvayā datto 'yam asmākam āyuṣaḥ pavanaḥ patiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23351: 7.035.054c so 'smān prāṇeśvaro bhūtvā kasmād eṣo 'dya sattama
GE09ram_1-7u:23352: 7.035.055a rurodha duḥkhaṃ janayann antaḥpura iva striyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23353: 7.035.055c tasmāt tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ prāptā vāyunopahatā vibho
GE09ram_1-7u:23354: 7.035.056a vāyusaṃrodhajaṃ duḥkham idaṃ no nuda śatruhan
GE09ram_1-7u:23355: 7.035.057a etat prajānāṃ śrutvā tu prajānāthaḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23356: 7.035.057c kāraṇād iti tān uktvā prajāḥ punar abhāṣata
GE09ram_1-7u:23357: 7.035.058a yasmin vaḥ kāraṇe vāyuś cukrodha ca rurodha ca 7.035.058c prajāḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ tat sarvaṃ śrotavyaṃ cātmanaḥ kṣamam
GE09ram_1-7u:23359: 7.035.059c rāhor vacanam ājñāya rājñā vaḥ kopito 'nilaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23360: 7.035.060a aśarīraḥ śarīreṣu vāyuś carati pālayan 7.035.060c śarīraṃ hi vinā vāyuṃ samatāṃ yāti reṇubhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23361: 7.035.061a vāyuḥ prāṇāḥ sukhaṃ vāyur vāyuḥ sarvam idaṃ jagat 7.035.061c vāyunā saṃparityaktaṃ na sukhaṃ vindate jagat
GE09ram_1-7u:23362: 7.035.062a adyaiva ca parityaktaṃ vāyunā jagad āyuṣā
GE09ram_1-7u:23364: 7.035.063a tad yāmas tatra yatrāste māruto rukprado hi vaḥ 7.035.063c mā vināśaṃ gamiṣyāma aprasādyāditeḥ sutam 7.035.064a tataḥ prajābhiḥ sahitaḥ prajāpatiḥ;
GE09ram_1-7u:23366: 7.035.064c jagāma tatrāsyati yatra mārutaḥ; sutaṃ surendrābhihataṃ pragṛhya saḥ 7.035.065a tato 'rkavaiśvānarakāñcanaprabhaṃ; sutaṃ tadotsaṅgagataṃ sadā
GE09ram_1-7u:23370: 7.036.001a tataḥ pitāmahaṃ dṛṣṭvā vāyuḥ putravadhārditaḥ 7.036.001c śiśukaṃ taṃ samādāya uttasthau dhātur agrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23372: 7.036.002c pādayor nyapatad vāyus tisro' vasthāya vedhase 7.036.003a taṃ tu vedavidādyas tu lambābharaṇaśobhinā 7.036.003c vāyum utthāpya hastena śiśuṃ taṃ parimṛṣṭavān
GE09ram_1-7u:23373: 7.036.004a spṛṣṭamātras tataḥ so 'tha salīlaṃ padmajanmanā 7.036.004c jalasiktaṃ yathā sasyaṃ punar jīvitam āptavān
GE09ram_1-7u:23374: 7.036.005a prāṇavantam imaṃ dṛṣṭvā prāṇo gandhavaho mudā
GE09ram_1-7u:23378: 7.036.007a tatas triyugmas trikakut tridhāmā tridaśārcitaḥ 7.036.007c uvāca devatā brahmā
GE09ram_1-7u:23379: 7.036.008a bho mahendrāgnivaruṇadhaneśvaramaheśvarāḥ 7.036.008c jānatām api tat sarvaṃ hitaṃ vakṣyāmi śrūyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:23380: 7.036.009a anena śiśunā kāryaṃ kartavyaṃ vo bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:23381: 7.036.009c dadatāsya varān sarve mārutasyāsya tuṣṭidān 7.036.010a tataḥ sahasranayanaḥ prītiraktaḥ śubhānanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23382: 7.036.010c kuśe śayamayīṃ mālāṃ samutkṣipyedam abravīt 7.036.011a matkarotsṛṣṭavajreṇa hanur asya yathā kṣataḥ 7.036.011c nāmnaiṣa kapiśārdūlo bhavitā hanumān iti 7.036.012a aham evāsya dāsyāmi paramaṃ varam uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:23383: 7.036.012c ataḥ prabhṛti vajrasya mamāvadhyo bhaviṣyati 7.036.013a mārtāṇḍas tv abravīt tatra bhagavāṃs timirāpahaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23385: 7.036.014a yadā tu śāstrāṇy adhyetuṃ śaktir asya bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:23386: 7.036.014c tadāsya śāstraṃ dāsyāmi yena vāgmī bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:23387: 7.036.015a varuṇaś ca varaṃ prādān nāsya mṛtyur bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:23390: 7.036.016c diśate 'sya varaṃ tuṣṭa aviṣādaṃ ca saṃyuge 7.036.017a gadeyaṃ māmikā nainaṃ saṃyugeṣu vadhiṣyati 7.036.017c ity evaṃ varadaḥ prāha tadā hy ekākṣipiṅgalaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23391: 7.036.018a matto madāyudhānāṃ ca na vadhyo 'yaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:23392: 7.036.018c ity evaṃ śaṃkareṇāpi datto 'sya paramo varaḥ 7.036.019a sarveṣāṃ brahmadaṇḍānām avadhyo 'yaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:23393: 7.036.019c dīrghāayuś ca mahātmā ca iti brahmābravīd vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23394: 7.036.020a viśvakarmā tu dṛṣṭvainaṃ bālasūryopamaṃ śiśum 7.036.020c śilpinā pravaraḥ prāha varam asya mahāmatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23395: 7.036.021a vinirmitāni devānām āyudhānīha yāni tu 7.036.021c teṣāṃ saṃgrāmakāle tu avadhyo 'yaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:23396: 7.036.022a tataḥ surāṇāṃ tu varair dṛṣṭvā hy enam akaṃkṛtam 7.036.022c caturmukhas tuṣṭamukho vāyum āha jagadguruḥ 7.036.023a amitrāṇāṃ bhayakaro mitrāṇām abhayaṃkaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23397: 7.036.023c ajeyo bhavitā te 'tra putro mārutamārutiḥ 7.036.024a rāvaṇotsādanārthāni rāmaprītikarāṇi
GE09ram_1-7u:23398: 7.036.024c romaharṣakarāṇy eṣa kartā karmāṇi saṃyuge 7.036.025a evam uktvā tam āmantrya mārutaṃ te 'maraiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:23400: 7.036.026a so 'pi gandhavahaḥ putraṃ pragṛhya gṛham ānayat 7.036.026c añjanāyāstam ākhyāya varaṃ dattaṃ viniḥsṛtaḥ 7.036.027a prāpya rāma varān eṣa varadānabalānvitaḥ 7.036.027c balenātmani saṃsthena so 'pūryata yathārṇavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23403: 7.036.029a srugbhāṇḍān agnihotraṃ ca valkalānāṃ ca saṃcayān
GE09ram_1-7u:23405: 7.036.030a sarveṣāṃ brahmadaṇḍānām avadhyaṃ brahmaṇā kṛtam 7.036.030c jānanta ṛṣayas taṃ vai kṣamante tasya nityaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23406: 7.036.031a yadā keṣariṇā tv eṣa vāyunā sāñjanena ca
GE09ram_1-7u:23410: 7.036.033a bādhase yat samāśritya balam asmān plavaṃgama
GE09ram_1-7u:23411: 7.036.033c tad dīrghakālaṃ vettāsi nāsmākaṃ śāpamohitaḥ 7.036.034a tatas tu hṛtatejaujā
GE09ram_1-7u:23412: 7.036.034c eṣo śramāṇi nānyeti mṛdubhāvagataś caran 7.036.035a atha ṛkṣarajā nāma vālisugrīvayoḥ pitā 7.036.035c sarvavānararājāsīt tejasā iva bhāskaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23413: 7.036.036a sa tu rājyaṃ ciraṃ kṛtvā vānarāṇāṃ harīśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23414: 7.036.036c tatas tvarkṣarajā nāma kāladharmeṇa saṃgataḥ 7.036.037a tasminn astamite vālī mantribhir mantrakovidaiḥ 7.036.037c pitrye pade kṛto rājā sugrīvo vālinaḥ pade
GE09ram_1-7u:23415: 7.036.038a sugrīveṇa samaṃ tv asya advaidhaṃ chidravarjitam
GE09ram_1-7u:23416: 7.036.038c ahāryaṃ sakhyam abhavad anilasya yathāgninā 7.036.039a eṣa śāpavaśād eva na vedabalam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23418: 7.036.040a na hy eṣa rāma sugrīvo bhrāmyamāṇo 'pi vālinā
GE09ram_1-7u:23419: 7.036.040c vedayāno na ca hy eṣa balam ātmani mārutiḥ 7.036.041a parākramotsāha matipratāpaiḥ; sauśīlyamādhuryanayānayaiś ca 7.036.041c gāmbhīryacāturyasuvīryadhairyair; hanūmataḥ ko 'py adhiko 'sti
GE09ram_1-7u:23421: 7.036.042a asau purā vyākaraṇaṃ grahīṣyan; sūryonmukhaḥ pṛṣṭhagamaḥ kapīndraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23422: 7.036.042c udyadgirer astagiriṃ jagāma; granthaṃ mahad dhārayad aprameyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23423: 7.036.043a pravīvivikṣor iva sāgarasya; lokān didhakṣor iva pāvakasya
GE09ram_1-7u:23424: 7.036.043c lokakṣayeṣv eva yathāntakasya; hanūmataḥ sthāsyati kaḥ purastāt
GE09ram_1-7u:23425: 7.036.044a eṣo 'pi cānye ca mahākapīndrāḥ; sugrīvamaindadvividāḥ sanīlāḥ 7.036.044c satāratāreyanalāḥ sarambhās; tvatkāraṇād rāma surair hi sṛṣṭāḥ 7.036.045a tad etat kathitaṃ sarvaṃ yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi 7.036.045c hanūmato bālabhāve karmaitat kathitaṃ mayā 7.036.046a dṛṣṭaḥ saṃbhāṣitaś cāsi rāma gacchamahe vayam
GE09ram_1-7u:23426: 7.036.046c evam uktvā gatāḥ sarve ṛṣayas te yathāgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:23427: 7.037.001a vimṛśya ca tato rāmo vayasyam akutobhayam
GE09ram_1-7u:23429: 7.037.002a darśitā bhavatā prītir darśitaṃ sauhṛdaṃ param
GE09ram_1-7u:23430: 7.037.002c udyogaś ca kṛto rājan bharatena tvayā saha
GE09ram_1-7u:23431: 7.037.003a tad bhavān adya kāśeyīṃ purīṃ vārāṇasīṃ vraja
GE09ram_1-7u:23432: 7.037.003c ramaṇīyāṃ tvayā guptāṃ suprākārāṃ sutoraṇām 7.037.004a etāvad uktvā utthāya kākutsthaḥ paramāsanāt 7.037.004c paryaṣvajata dharmātmā nirantaram urogatam
GE09ram_1-7u:23433: 7.037.005a visṛjya taṃ vayasyaṃ sa svāgatān pṛthivīpatīn
GE09ram_1-7u:23434: 7.037.005c prahasan rāghavo vākyam uvāca madhurākṣaram 7.037.006a bhavatāṃ prītir avyagrā tejasā parirakṣitā 7.037.006c dharmaś ca niyato nityaṃ satyaṃ ca bhavatāṃ sadā 7.037.007a yuṣmākaṃ ca prabhāvena tejasā ca mahātmanām
GE09ram_1-7u:23435: 7.037.007c hato durātmā durbuddhī rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ 7.037.008a hetumātram ahaṃ tatra bhavatāṃ tejasāṃ hataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23436: 7.037.008c rāvaṇaḥ sagaṇo yuddhe saputraḥ sahabāndhavaḥ 7.037.009a bhavantaś ca samānītā bharatena mahātmanā 7.037.009c śrutvā janakarājasya kānane tanayāṃ hṛtām 7.037.010a udyuktānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ pārthivānāṃ mahātmanām 7.037.010c kālo hy atītaḥ sumahān gamane rocatāṃ matiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23437: 7.037.011a pratyūcus taṃ ca rājāno harṣeṇa mahatānvitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23438: 7.037.011c diṣṭyā tvaṃ vijayī rāma rājyaṃ cāpi pratiṣṭhitam
GE09ram_1-7u:23439: 7.037.012a diṣṭyā pratyāhṛtā sītā diṣṭyā śatruḥ parājitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23440: 7.037.012c eṣa naḥ paramaḥ kāma eṣā naḥ kīrtir uttamā 7.037.013a yat tvāṃ vijayinaṃ rāma paśyāmo hataśātravam
GE09ram_1-7u:23441: 7.037.013c upapannaṃ ca kākutstha yat tvam asmān praśaṃsasi
GE09ram_1-7u:23442: 7.037.014a praśaṃsārhā hi jānanti praśaṃsāṃ vaktum īdṛśīm
GE09ram_1-7u:23443: 7.037.014c āpṛcchāmo gamiṣyāmo hṛdistho naḥ sadā bhavān
GE09ram_1-7u:23444: 7.037.015a bhavec ca te mahārāja prītir asmāsu nityadā
GE09ram_1-7u:23445: 7.038.001a te prayātā mahātmānaḥ pārthivāḥ sarvato diśam
GE09ram_1-7u:23446: 7.038.001c kampayanto mahīṃ vīrāḥ svapurāṇi prahṛṣṭavat 7.038.002a akṣauhiṇī sahasrais te samavetās tv anekaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23447: 7.038.002c hṛṣṭāḥ pratigatāḥ sarve rāghavārthe samāgatāḥ 7.038.003a ūcuś caiva mahīpālā
GE09ram_1-7u:23448: 7.038.003c na nāma rāvaṇaṃ yuddhe paśyāmaḥ purataḥ sthitam
GE09ram_1-7u:23449: 7.038.004a bharatena vayaṃ paścāt samānītā nirarthakam 7.038.004c hatā hi rākṣasās tatra pārthivaiḥ syur na saṃśayaḥ 7.038.005a rāmasya bāhuvīryeṇa pālitā lakṣmaṇasya ca 7.038.005c sukhaṃ pāre samudrasya yudhyema vigatajvarāḥ 7.038.006a etāś cānyāś ca rājānaḥ kathās tatra sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23450: 7.038.006c kathayantaḥ svarāṣṭrāṇi viviśus te mahārathāḥ 7.038.007a yathāpurāṇi te gatvā ratnāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:23451: 7.038.007c rāmāya priyakāmārtham upahārān nṛpā daduḥ 7.038.008a aśvān ratnāni vastrāṇi hastinaś ca madotkaṭān
GE09ram_1-7u:23452: 7.038.008c candanāni ca divyāni divyāny ābharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:23453: 7.038.009a bharato lakṣmaṇaś caiva śatrughnaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23454: 7.038.009c ādāya tāni ratnāni ayodhyām agaman punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23455: 7.038.010a āgatāś ca purīṃ ramyām ayodhyāṃ puruṣarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23456: 7.038.010c daduḥ sarvāṇi ratnāni rāghavāya mahātmane 7.038.011a pratigṛhya ca tat sarvaṃ prītiyuktaḥ sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23457: 7.038.011c sarvāṇi tāni pradadau sugrīvāya mahātmane 7.038.012a vibhīṣaṇāya ca dadau ye cānye ṛkṣavānarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23458: 7.038.012c hanūmatpramukhā vīrā rākṣasāś ca mahābalāḥ 7.038.013a te sarve hṛṣṭamanaso rāmadattāni tāny atha
GE09ram_1-7u:23459: 7.038.013c śirobhir dhārayām āsur bāhubhiś ca mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23460: 7.038.014a papuś caiva sugandhīni madhūni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:23461: 7.038.014c māṃsāni ca sumṛṣṭāni phalāny āsvādayanti ca
GE09ram_1-7u:23462: 7.038.015a evaṃ teṣāṃ nivasatāṃ māsaḥ sāgro gatas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:23463: 7.038.015c muhūrtam iva tat sarvaṃ rāmabhaktyā samarthayan
GE09ram_1-7u:23464: 7.038.016a reme rāmaḥ sa taiḥ sārdhaṃ vānaraiḥ kāmarūpibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23465: 7.038.016c rājabhiś ca mahāvīryai rākṣasaiś ca mahābalaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23466: 7.038.017a evaṃ teṣāṃ yayau māso dvitīyaḥ śaiśiraḥ sukham
GE09ram_1-7u:23467: 7.038.017c vānarāṇāṃ prahṛṣṭānāṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ 7.039.001a tathā sma teṣāṃ vasatām ṛkṣavānararakṣasām 7.039.001c rāghavas tu mahātejāḥ sugrīvam idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:23468: 7.039.002a gamyatāṃ saumya kiṣkindhāṃ durādharṣaṃ surāsuraiḥ 7.039.002c pālayasva sahāmātyai rājyaṃ nihatakaṇṭakam
GE09ram_1-7u:23469: 7.039.003a aṅgadaṃ ca mahābāho prītyā paramayānvitaḥ 7.039.003c paśya tvaṃ hanumantaṃ ca nalaṃ ca sumahābalam
GE09ram_1-7u:23470: 7.039.004a suṣeṇaṃ śvaśuraṃ śūraṃ tāraṃ ca balināṃ varam
GE09ram_1-7u:23471: 7.039.004c kumudaṃ caiva durdharṣaṃ nīlaṃ ca sumahābalam
GE09ram_1-7u:23472: 7.039.005a vīraṃ śatabaliṃ caiva maindaṃ dvividam eva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:23473: 7.039.005c gajaṃ gavākṣaṃ gavayaṃ śarabhaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_1-7u:23474: 7.039.006a ṛkṣarājaṃ ca durdharṣaṃ jāmbavantaṃ mahābalam 7.039.006c paśya prītisamāyukto gandhamādanam eva ca 7.039.007a ye cānye sumahātmāno madarthe tyaktajīvitāḥ 7.039.007c paśya tvaṃ prītisaṃyukto mā caiṣāṃ vipriyaṃ kṛthāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23475: 7.039.008a evam uktvā ca sugrīvaṃ praśasya ca punaḥ punaḥ 7.039.008c vibhīṣaṇam athovāca rāmo madhurayā girā 7.039.009a taṅkāṃ praśādhi dharmeṇa saṃmato hy asi pārthiva
GE09ram_1-7u:23476: 7.039.009c purasya rākṣasānāṃ ca bhrātur vaiśvaraṇasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:23477: 7.039.010a mā ca buddhim adharme tvaṃ kuryā rājan kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_1-7u:23478: 7.039.010c buddhimanto hi rājāno dhruvam aśnanti medinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:23479: 7.039.011a ahaṃ ca nityaśo rājan sugrīvasahitas tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:23480: 7.039.011c smartavyaḥ parayā prītyā gaccha tvaṃ vigatajvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23482: 7.039.012c sādhu sādhv iti kākutsthaṃ praśaśaṃsuḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23483: 7.039.013a tava buddhir mahābāho vīryam adbhutam eva ca
GE09ram_1-7u:23484: 7.039.013c mādhuryaṃ paramaṃ rāma svayambhor iva nityadā
GE09ram_1-7u:23485: 7.039.014a teṣām evaṃ bruvāṇānāṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca rakṣasām
GE09ram_1-7u:23486: 7.039.014c hanūmatpraṇato bhūtvā rāghavaṃ vākyam abravīt 7.039.015a sneho me paramo rājaṃs tvayi nityaṃ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23487: 7.039.015c bhaktiś ca niyatā vīra bhāvo nānyatra gacchati
GE09ram_1-7u:23489: 7.039.016c tāvac charīre vatsyantu mama prāṇā na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23490: 7.039.017a evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ rājendro hanūmantam athāsanāt 7.039.017c utthāya ca pariṣvajya vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:23491: 7.039.018a evam etat kapiśreṣṭha bhavitā nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23492: 7.039.018c lokā hi yāvat sthāsyanti tāvat sthāsyati me kathā 7.039.019a cariṣyati kathā yāval lokān eṣā hi māmikā
GE09ram_1-7u:23493: 7.039.019c tāvac charīre vatsyanti prāṇās tava na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23494: 7.039.020a tato 'sya hāraṃ candrābhaṃ mucya kaṇṭhāt sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23496: 7.039.021a tenorasi nibaddhena hāreṇa sa mahākapiḥ 7.039.021c rarāja hemaśailendraś candreṇākrāntamastakaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23497: 7.039.022a śrutvā tu rāghavasyaitad utthāyotthāya vānarāḥ 7.039.022c praṇamya śirasā pādau prajagmus te mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23498: 7.039.023a sugrīvaś caiva rāmeṇa pariṣvakto mahābhujaḥ 7.039.023c vibhīṣaṇaś ca dharmātmā nirantaram urogataḥ 7.039.024a sarve ca te bāṣpagalāḥ sāśrunetrā vicetasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23499: 7.039.024c saṃmūḍhā iva duḥkhena tyajante rāghavaṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:23501: 7.040.001c bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito rāmaḥ pramumoda sukhī sukham
GE09ram_1-7u:23503: 7.040.002c śuśrāva madhurāṃ vāṇīm antarikṣāt prabhāṣitām 7.040.003a saumya rāma nirīkṣasva saumyena vadanena mām
GE09ram_1-7u:23504: 7.040.003c kailāsaśikharāt prāptaṃ viddhi māṃ puṣkaraṃ prabho
GE09ram_1-7u:23505: 7.040.004a tava śāsanam ājñāya gato 'smi dhanadaṃ prati 7.040.004c upasthātuṃ naraśreṣṭha sa ca māṃ pratyabhāṣata
GE09ram_1-7u:23506: 7.040.005a nirjitas tvaṃ narendreṇa rāghaveṇa mahātmanā 7.040.005c nihatya yudhi durdharṣaṃ rāvaṇaṃ rākṣasādhipam 7.040.006a mamāpi paramā prītir hate tasmin durātmani
GE09ram_1-7u:23508: 7.040.007a sa tvaṃ rāmeṇa laṅkāyāṃ nirjitaḥ paramātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:23509: 7.040.007c vaha saumya tam eva tvam aham ājñāpayāmi te 7.040.008a eṣa me paramaḥ kāmo yat tvaṃ rāghavanandanam
GE09ram_1-7u:23510: 7.040.008c vaher lokasya saṃyānaṃ gacchasva vigatajvaraḥ 7.040.009a tacchāsanam ahaṃ jñātvā dhanadasya mahātmanaḥ 7.040.009c tvatsakāśaṃ punaḥ prāptaḥ sa evaṃ pratigṛhṇa mām
GE09ram_1-7u:23511: 7.040.010a bāḍham ity eva kākutsthaḥ puṣpakaṃ samapūjayat
GE09ram_1-7u:23512: 7.040.010c lājākṣataiś ca puṣpaiś ca gandhaiś ca susugandhibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23513: 7.040.011a gamyatāṃ ca yathākāmam āgacches tvaṃ yadā smare
GE09ram_1-7u:23514: 7.040.011c evam astv iti rāmeṇa visṛṣṭaḥ puṣpakaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23515: 7.040.011e abhipretāṃ diśaṃ prāyāt puṣpakaḥ puṣpabhūṣitaḥ 7.040.012a evam antarhite tasmin puṣpake vividhātmani 7.040.012c bharataḥ prāñjalir vākyam uvāca raghunandanam 7.040.013a atyadbhutāni dṛśyante tvayi rājyaṃ praśāsati 7.040.013c amānuṣāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ vyāhṛtāni muhur muhuḥ 7.040.014a anāmayāc ca martyānāṃ sāgro māso gato hy ayam 7.040.014c jīrṇānām api sattvānāṃ mṛtyur nāyāti rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:23516: 7.040.015a putrān nāryaḥ prasūyante vapuṣmantaś ca mānavāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23517: 7.040.015c harṣaś cābhyadhiko rājañ janasya puravāsinaḥ 7.040.016a kāle ca vāsavo varṣaṃ pātayaty amṛtopamam
GE09ram_1-7u:23518: 7.040.016c vāyavaś cāpi vāyante sparśavantaḥ sukhapradāḥ 7.040.017a īdṛśo naś ciraṃ rājā bhavatv iti nareśvara
GE09ram_1-7u:23519: 7.040.017c kathayanti pure paurā janā janapadeṣu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:23520: 7.040.018a etā vācaḥ sumadhurā bharatena samīritāḥ 7.040.018c śrutvā rāmo mudā yuktaḥ pramumoda sukhī sukham
GE09ram_1-7u:23521: 7.041.001a sa visṛjya tato rāmaḥ puṣpakaṃ hemabhūṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:23523: 7.041.002a candanāgaru cūtaiś ca tuṅga kāleyakair api
GE09ram_1-7u:23525: 7.041.003a priyaṅgubhiḥ kadambaiś ca tathā kurabakair api
GE09ram_1-7u:23526: 7.041.003c jambūbhiḥ pāṭalībhiś ca kovidāraiś ca saṃvṛtām
GE09ram_1-7u:23527: 7.041.004a sarvadā kusumai ramyaiḥ phalavadbhir manoramaiḥ 7.041.004c cārupallavapuṣpāḍhyair mattabhramarasaṃkulaiḥ 7.041.005a kokilair bhṛṅgarājaiś ca nānāvarṇaiś ca pakṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23529: 7.041.006a śātakumbhanibhāḥ ke cit ke cid agniśikhopamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23530: 7.041.006c nīlāñjananibhāś cānye bhānti tatra sma pādapāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23533: 7.041.008a phullapadmotpalavanāś cakravākopaśobhitāḥ 7.041.008c prākārair vividhākāraiḥ śobhitāś ca śilātalaiḥ 7.041.009a tatra tatra vanoddeśe vaidūryamaṇisaṃnibhaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23535: 7.041.010a nandanaṃ hi yathendrasya brāhmaṃ caitrarathaṃ yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:23536: 7.041.010c tathārūpaṃ hi rāmasya kānanaṃ tan niveśitam
GE09ram_1-7u:23540: 7.041.013a sītāṃ saṃgṛhya bāhubhyāṃ madhumaireyam uttamam 7.041.013c pāyayām āsa kākutsthaḥ śacīm indro yathāmṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:23541: 7.041.014a māṃsāni ca vicitrāṇi phalāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:23544: 7.041.015c bālāś ca rūpavatyaś ca striyaḥ pānavaśaṃ gatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23545: 7.041.016a evaṃ rāmo mudā yuktā sītāṃ surucirānanām
GE09ram_1-7u:23546: 7.041.016c ramayām āsa vaidehīm ahany ahani devavat
GE09ram_1-7u:23547: 7.041.017a tathā tu ramamāṇasya tasyaivaṃ śiśiraḥ śubhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23549: 7.041.018a pūrvāhṇe paurakṛtyāni kṛtvā dharmeṇa dharmavit 7.041.018c śeṣaṃ divasabhāgārdham antaḥpuragato 'bhavat
GE09ram_1-7u:23550: 7.041.019a sītā ca devakāryāṇi kṛtvā paurvāhṇikāni tu
GE09ram_1-7u:23551: 7.041.019c śvaśrūṇām aviśeṣeṇa sarvāsāṃ prāñjaliḥ sthitā 7.041.020a tato rāmam upāgacchad
GE09ram_1-7u:23552: 7.041.020c triviṣṭape sahasrākṣam upaviṣṭaṃ yathā śacī 7.041.021a dṛṣṭvā tu rāghavaḥ patnīṃ kalyāṇena samanvitām
GE09ram_1-7u:23553: 7.041.021c praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe sādhu sādhv iti cābravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:23555: 7.041.022c kim icchasi hi tad brūhi kaḥ kāmaḥ kriyatāṃ tava
GE09ram_1-7u:23556: 7.041.023a prahasantī tu vaidehī rāmaṃ vākyam athābravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:23557: 7.041.023c tapovanāni puṇyāni draṣṭum icchāmi rāghava 7.041.024a gaṅgātīre niviṣṭāni ṛṣīṇāṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:23559: 7.041.025a eṣa me paramaḥ kāmo yan mūlaphalabhojiṣu
GE09ram_1-7u:23560: 7.041.025c apy ekarātraṃ kākutstha vaseyaṃ puṇyaśāliṣu 7.041.026a tatheti ca pratijñātaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:23561: 7.041.026c visrabdhā bhava vaidehi śvo gamiṣyasy asaṃśayam
GE09ram_1-7u:23562: 7.041.027a evam uktvā tu kākutstho maithilīṃ janakātmajām
GE09ram_1-7u:23565: 7.042.001c kathānāṃ bahurūpāṇāṃ hāsya kārāḥ samantataḥ 7.042.002a vijayo madhumattaś ca kāśyapaḥ piṅgalaḥ kuśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23566: 7.042.002c surājiḥ kāliyo bhadro dantavakraḥ samāgadhaḥ 7.042.003a ete kathā bahuvidhā
GE09ram_1-7u:23567: 7.042.003c kathayanti sma saṃhṛṣṭā rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ 7.042.004a tataḥ kathāyāṃ kasyāṃ cid rāghavaḥ samabhāṣata
GE09ram_1-7u:23568: 7.042.004c kāḥ kathā nagare bhadra vartante viṣayeṣu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:23569: 7.042.005a mām āśritāni kāny āhuḥ paurajānapadā janāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23570: 7.042.005c kiṃ ca sītāṃ samāśritya bharataṃ kiṃ nu lakṣmaṇam 7.042.006a kiṃ nu śatrughnam āśritya kaikeyīṃ mātaraṃ ca me 7.042.006c vaktavyatāṃ ca rājāno nave rājye vrajanti hi
GE09ram_1-7u:23571: 7.042.007a evam ukte tu rāmeṇa bhadraḥ prāñjalir abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:23572: 7.042.007c sthitāḥ kathāḥ śubhā rājan vartante puravāsinām
GE09ram_1-7u:23573: 7.042.008a ayaṃ tu vijayaḥ saumya daśagrīvavadhāśritaḥ 7.042.008c bhūyiṣṭhaṃ svapure pauraiḥ kathyate puruṣarṣabha 7.042.009a evam uktas tu bhadreṇa rāghavo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:23574: 7.042.009c kathayasva yathā tathyaṃ sarvaṃ niravaśeṣataḥ 7.042.010a śubhāśubhāni vākyāni yāny āhuḥ puravāsinaḥ 7.042.010c śrutvedānīṃ śubhaṃ kuryāṃ na kuryām aśubhāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:23575: 7.042.011a kathayasva ca visrabdho nirbhayo vigatajvaraḥ 7.042.011c kathayante yathā paurā janā janapadeṣu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:23576: 7.042.012a rāghaveṇaivam uktas tu bhadraḥ suruciraṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23578: 7.042.013a śṛṇu rājan yathā paurāḥ kathayanti śubhāśubham
GE09ram_1-7u:23580: 7.042.014a duṣkaraṃ kṛtavān rāmaḥ samudre setubandhanam 7.042.014c akṛtaṃ pūrvakaiḥ kaiś cid devair api sadānavaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23581: 7.042.015a rāvaṇaś ca durādharṣo hataḥ sabalavāhanaḥ 7.042.015c vānarāś ca vaśaṃ nītā ṛṣkāś ca saha rākṣasaiḥ 7.042.016a hatvā ca rāvaṇaṃ yuddhe sītām āhṛtya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23582: 7.042.016c amarṣaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā svaveśma punar ānayat
GE09ram_1-7u:23583: 7.042.017a kīdṛśaṃ hṛdaye tasya sītāsaṃbhogajaṃ sukham 7.042.017c aṅkam āropya hi purā rāvaṇena balād dhṛtām
GE09ram_1-7u:23584: 7.042.018a laṅkām api punar nītām aśokavanikāṃ gatām
GE09ram_1-7u:23585: 7.042.018c rakṣasāṃ vaśam āpannāṃ kathaṃ rāmo na kutsate
GE09ram_1-7u:23586: 7.042.019a asmākam api dāreṣu sahanīyaṃ bhaviṣyati 7.042.019c yathā hi kurute rājā prajā tam anuvartate
GE09ram_1-7u:23587: 7.042.020a evaṃ bahuvidhā vāco vadanti puravāsinaḥ 7.042.020c nagareṣu ca sarveṣu rājañ janapadeṣu ca
GE09ram_1-7u:23588: 7.042.021a tasyaitad bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā rāghavaḥ paramārtavat 7.042.021c uvāca sarvān suhṛdaḥ katham etan nivedyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:23589: 7.042.022a sarve tu śirasā bhūmāv abhivādya praṇamya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:23590: 7.042.022c pratyūcū rāghavaṃ dīnam evam etan na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23591: 7.042.023a śrutvā tu vākyaṃ kākutsthaḥ sarveṣāṃ samudīritam
GE09ram_1-7u:23592: 7.042.023c visarjayām āsa tadā sarvāṃs tāñ śatrutāpanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23593: 7.043.001a visṛjya tu suhṛdvargaṃ buddhyā niścitya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23594: 7.043.001c samīpe dvāḥstham āsīnam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:23595: 7.043.002a śīghram ānaya saumitriṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ śubhalakṣaṇam 7.043.002c bharataṃ ca mahābāhuṃ śatrughnaṃ cāparājitam 7.043.003a rāmasya bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā dvāḥstho mūrdhni kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23597: 7.043.004a uvāca ca tadā vākyaṃ vardhayitvā kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23598: 7.043.004c draṣṭum icchasi rājā tvāṃ gamyatāṃ tatra māciram
GE09ram_1-7u:23599: 7.043.005a bāḍham ity eva saumitriḥ śrutvā rāghava śāsanam
GE09ram_1-7u:23600: 7.043.005c prādravad ratham āruhya rāghavasya niveśanam 7.043.006a prayāntaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā dvāḥstho bharatam antikāt
GE09ram_1-7u:23601: 7.043.006c uvāca prāñjalir vākyaṃ rājā tvāṃ draṣṭum icchati
GE09ram_1-7u:23602: 7.043.007a bharatas tu vacaḥ śrutvā dvāḥsthād rāmasamīritam
GE09ram_1-7u:23604: 7.043.008a dṛṣṭvā prayāntaṃ bharataṃ tvaramāṇaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ 7.043.008c śatrughnabhavanaṃ gatvā tato vākyaṃ jagāda ha
GE09ram_1-7u:23605: 7.043.009a ehy āgaccha raghuśreṣṭha rājā tvāṃ draṣṭum icchati
GE09ram_1-7u:23606: 7.043.009c gato hi lakṣmaṇaḥ pūrvaṃ bharataś ca mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23607: 7.043.010a śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasya śatrughno rāmaśāsanam
GE09ram_1-7u:23608: 7.043.010c śirasā vandya dharaṇīṃ prayayau yatra rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23610: 7.043.011c avākśirā dīnamanā dvāḥsthaṃ vacanam abravīt 7.043.012a praveśaya kumārāṃs tvaṃ matsamīpaṃ tvarānvitaḥ 7.043.012c eteṣu jīvitaṃ mahyam ete prāṇā bahiścarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23611: 7.043.013a ājñaptās tu narendreṇa kumārāḥ śuklavāsasaḥ 7.043.013c prahvāḥ prāñjalayo bhūtvā viviśus te samāhitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23612: 7.043.014a te tu dṛṣṭvā mukhaṃ tasya sagrahaṃ śaśinaṃ yathā 7.043.014c saṃdhyāgatam ivādityaṃ prabhayā parivarjitam
GE09ram_1-7u:23613: 7.043.015a bāṣpapūrṇe ca nayane dṛṣṭva rāmasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23614: 7.043.015c hataśobhāṃ yathā padmaṃ mukhaṃ vīkṣya ca tasya te 7.043.016a tato 'bhivādya tvaritāḥ pādau rāmasya mūrdhabhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23615: 7.043.016c tasthuḥ samāhitāḥ sarve rāmaś cāśrūṇy avartayat
GE09ram_1-7u:23616: 7.043.017a tān pariṣvajya bāhubhyām utthāpya ca mahābhujaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23617: 7.043.017c āsaneṣv ādhvam ity uktvā tato vākyaṃ jagāda ha 7.043.018a bhavanto mama sarvasvaṃ bhavanto mama jīvitam
GE09ram_1-7u:23618: 7.043.018c bhavadbhiś ca kṛtaṃ rājyaṃ pālayāmi nareśvarāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23619: 7.043.019a bhavantaḥ kṛtaśāstrārthā buddhau ca pariniṣṭhitāḥ 7.043.019c saṃbhūya ca madartho 'yam anveṣṭavyo nareśvarāḥ 7.044.001a teṣāṃ samupaviṣṭānāṃ sarveṣāṃ dīnacetasām
GE09ram_1-7u:23620: 7.044.001c uvāca vākyaṃ kākutstho mukhena pariśuṣyatā 7.044.002a sarve śṛṇuta bhadraṃ vo mā kurudhvaṃ mano 'nyathā
GE09ram_1-7u:23621: 7.044.002c paurāṇāṃ mama sītāyāṃ yādṛśī vartate kathā
GE09ram_1-7u:23622: 7.044.003a paurāpavādaḥ sumahāṃs tathā janapadasya ca 7.044.003c vartate mayi bībhatsaḥ sa me marmāṇi kṛntati
GE09ram_1-7u:23623: 7.044.004a ahaṃ kila kule jata ikṣvākūṇāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_1-7u:23624: 7.044.004c sītāṃ pāpasamācārām ānayeyaṃ kathaṃ pure 7.044.005a jānāsi hi yathā saumya daṇḍake vijane vane
GE09ram_1-7u:23625: 7.044.005c rāvaṇena hṛtā sītā sa ca vidhvaṃsito mayā
GE09ram_1-7u:23626: 7.044.006a pratyakṣaṃ tava saumitre devanāṃ havyavāhanaḥ 7.044.006c apāpāṃ maithilīm āha vāyuś cākāśagocaraḥ 7.044.007a candrādityau ca śaṃsete surāṇāṃ saṃnidhau purā
GE09ram_1-7u:23627: 7.044.007c ṛṣīṇāṃ caiva sarveṣām apāpāṃ janakātmajām 7.044.008a evaṃ śuddha samācārā devagandharvasaṃnidhau
GE09ram_1-7u:23628: 7.044.008c laṅkādvīpe mahendreṇa mama haste niveśitā 7.044.009a antarātmā ca me vetti sītāṃ śuddhāṃ yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_1-7u:23629: 7.044.009c tato gṛhītvā vaidehīm ayodhyām aham āgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23630: 7.044.010a ayaṃ tu me mahān vādaḥ śokaś ca hṛdi vartate
GE09ram_1-7u:23631: 7.044.010c paurāpavādaḥ sumahāṃs tathā janapadasya ca 7.044.011a akīrtir yasya gīyeta loke bhūtasya kasya cit
GE09ram_1-7u:23632: 7.044.011c pataty evādhamāṃl lokān yāvac chabdaḥ sa kīrtyate
GE09ram_1-7u:23633: 7.044.012a akīrtir nindyate daivaiḥ kīrtir deveṣu pūjyate
GE09ram_1-7u:23634: 7.044.012c kīrtyarthaṃ ca samārambhaḥ sarva eva mahātmanām
GE09ram_1-7u:23635: 7.044.013a apy ahaṃ jīvitaṃ jahyāṃ yuṣmān vā puruṣarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23636: 7.044.013c apavādabhayād bhītāḥ kiṃ punar janakātmajām 7.044.014a tasmād bhavantaḥ paśyantu patitaṃ śokasāgare 7.044.014c na hi paśyāmy ahaṃ bhūyaḥ kiṃ cid duḥkham ato 'dhikam
GE09ram_1-7u:23637: 7.044.015a śvas tvaṃ prabhāte saumitre sumantrādhiṣṭhitaṃ ratham
GE09ram_1-7u:23638: 7.044.015c āruhya sītām āropya viṣayānte samutsṛja 7.044.016a gaṅgāyās tu pare pāre vālmīkeḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23640: 7.044.017a tatraināṃ vijane kakṣe visṛjya raghunandana 7.044.017c śīghram āgaccha saumitre kuruṣva vacanaṃ mama
GE09ram_1-7u:23641: 7.044.018a na cāsmi prativaktavyaḥ sītāṃ prati kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_1-7u:23642: 7.044.018c aprītiḥ paramā mahyaṃ bhavet tu prativārite
GE09ram_1-7u:23643: 7.044.019a śāpitāś ca mayā yūyaṃ bhujābhyāṃ jīvitena ca
GE09ram_1-7u:23644: 7.044.019c ye māṃ vākyāntare brūyur anunetuṃ kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_1-7u:23645: 7.044.020a mānayantu bhavanto māṃ yadi macchāsane sthitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23646: 7.044.020c ito 'dya nīyatāṃ sītā kuruṣva vacanaṃ mama 7.044.021a pūrvam ukto 'ham anayā gaṅgātīre mahāśramān
GE09ram_1-7u:23647: 7.044.021c paśyeyam iti tasyāś ca kāmaḥ saṃvartyatām ayam
GE09ram_1-7u:23648: 7.044.022a evam uktvā tu kākutstho bāṣpeṇa pihitekṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23649: 7.044.022c praviveśa sa dharmātmā bhrātṛbhiḥ parivāritaḥ 7.045.001a tato rajanyāṃ vyuṣṭāyāṃ lakṣmaṇo dīnacetanaḥ 7.045.001c sumantram abravīd vākyaṃ mukhena pariśuṣyatā 7.045.002a sārathe turagāñ śīghraṃ yojayasva rathottame 7.045.002c svāstīrṇaṃ rājabhavanāt sītāyāś cāsanaṃ śubham 7.045.003a sītā hi rājabhavanād āśramaṃ puṇyakarmaṇām 7.045.003c mayā netā maharṣīṇāṃ śīghram ānīyatāṃ rathaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23650: 7.045.004a sumantras tu tathety uktvā yuktaṃ paramavājibhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23653: 7.045.005c ratho 'yaṃ samanuprāpto yat kāryaṃ kriyatāṃ prabho 7.045.006a evam uktaḥ sumantreṇa rājaveśma sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23654: 7.045.006c praviśya sītām āsādya vyājahāra nararṣabhaḥ 7.045.007a gaṅgātīre mayā devi munīnām āśrame śubhe
GE09ram_1-7u:23655: 7.045.007c śīghraṃ gatvopaneyāsi śāsanāt pārthivasya naḥ 7.045.008a evam uktā tu vaidehī lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:23656: 7.045.008c praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe gamanaṃ cābhyarocayat 7.045.009a vāsāṃsi ca mahārhāṇi ratnāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:23658: 7.045.010a imāni munipatnīnāṃ dāsyāmy ābharaṇāny aham 7.045.010c saumitris tu tathety uktvā ratham āropya maithilīm
GE09ram_1-7u:23660: 7.045.011a abravīc ca tadā sītā lakṣmaṇaṃ lakṣmivardhanam
GE09ram_1-7u:23661: 7.045.011c aśubhāni bahūny adya paśyāmi raghunandana 7.045.012a nayanaṃ me sphuraty adya gātrotkampaś ca jāyate
GE09ram_1-7u:23662: 7.045.012c hṛdayaṃ caiva saumitre asvastham iva lakṣaye
GE09ram_1-7u:23663: 7.045.013a autsukyaṃ paramaṃ cāpi adhṛtiś ca parā mama
GE09ram_1-7u:23664: 7.045.013c śūnyām iva ca paśyāmi pṛthivīṃ pṛthulocana
GE09ram_1-7u:23665: 7.045.014a api svasti bhavet tasya bhrātus te bhrātṛbhiḥ saha 7.045.014c śvaśrūṇāṃ caiva me vīra sarvāsām aviśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23666: 7.045.015a pure janapade caiva kuśalaṃ prāṇinām api
GE09ram_1-7u:23667: 7.045.015c ity añjalikṛtā sītā devatā abhyayācata 7.045.016a lakṣmaṇo 'rthaṃ tu taṃ śrutvā śirasā vandya maithilīm
GE09ram_1-7u:23668: 7.045.016c śivam ity abravīd dhṛṣṭo hṛdayena viśuṣyatā
GE09ram_1-7u:23669: 7.045.017a tato vāsam upāgamya gomatītīra āśrame 7.045.017c prabhāte punar utthāya saumitriḥ sūtam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:23670: 7.045.018a yojayasva rathaṃ śīghram adya bhāgīrathī jalam
GE09ram_1-7u:23671: 7.045.018c śirasā dhārayiṣyāmi tryambakaḥ parvate yathā 7.045.019a so 'śvān vicārayitvāśu rathe yuktvā manojavān
GE09ram_1-7u:23672: 7.045.019c ārohasveti vaidehīṃ sūtaḥ prāñjalir abravīt 7.045.020a sā tu sūtasya vacanād āruroha rathottamam
GE09ram_1-7u:23673: 7.045.020c sītā saumitriṇā sārdhaṃ sumitreṇa ca dhīmatā
GE09ram_1-7u:23675: 7.045.021c nirīkṣya lakṣmaṇo dīnaḥ praruroda mahāsvanam 7.045.022a sītā tu paramāyattā dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇam āturam
GE09ram_1-7u:23676: 7.045.022c uvāca vākyaṃ dharmajña kim idaṃ rudyate tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:23677: 7.045.023a jāhvanī tīram āsādya cirābhilaṣitaṃ mama 7.045.023c harṣakāle kim arthaṃ māṃ viṣādayasi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:23678: 7.045.024a nityaṃ tvaṃ rāmapādeṣu vartase puruṣarṣabha 7.045.024c kaccid vinā kṛtas tena dvirātre śokam āgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23679: 7.045.025a mamāpi dayito rāmo jīvitenāpi lakṣmaṇa 7.045.025c na cāham evaṃ śocāmi maivaṃ tvaṃ bāliśo bhava 7.045.026a tārayasva ca māṃ gaṅgāṃ darśayasva ca tāpasān
GE09ram_1-7u:23680: 7.045.026c tato dhanāni vāsāṃsi dāsyāmy ābharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:23681: 7.045.027a tataḥ kṛtvā maharṣīṇāṃ yathārham abhivādanam 7.045.027c tatra caikāṃ niśām uṣya yāsyāmas tāṃ purīṃ punaḥ 7.045.028a tasyās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā pramṛjya nayane śubhe
GE09ram_1-7u:23682: 7.045.028c titīrṣur lakṣmaṇo gaṅgāṃ śubhāṃ nāvam upāharat
GE09ram_1-7u:23683: 7.046.001a atha nāvaṃ suvistīrṇāṃ naiṣādīṃ rāghavānujaḥ 7.046.001c āruroha samāyuktāṃ pūrvam āropya maithilīm 7.046.002a sumantraṃ caiva sarathaṃ sthīyatām iti lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23684: 7.046.002c uvāca śokasaṃtaptaḥ prayāhīti ca nāvikam 7.046.003a tatas tīram upāgamya bhāgīrathyāḥ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23685: 7.046.003c uvāca maithilīṃ vākyaṃ prāñjalir bāṣpagadgadaḥ 7.046.004a hṛdgataṃ me mahac chalyaṃ yad asmy āryeṇa dhīmatā 7.046.004c asmin nimitte vaidehi lokasya vacanīkṛtaḥ 7.046.005a śreyo hi maraṇaṃ me 'dya mṛtyor vā yat paraṃ bhavet 7.046.005c na cāsminn īdṛśe kārye niyojyo lokanindite
GE09ram_1-7u:23686: 7.046.006a prasīda na ca me roṣaṃ kartum arhasi suvrate 7.046.006c ity añjalikṛto bhūmau nipapāta sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23687: 7.046.007a rudantaṃ prāñjaliṃ dṛṣṭvā kāṅkṣantaṃ mṛtyum ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23688: 7.046.007c maithilī bhṛśasaṃvignā lakṣmaṇaṃ vākyam abravīt 7.046.008a kim idaṃ nāvagacchāmi brūhi tattvena lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:23689: 7.046.008c paśyāmi tvāṃ ca na svatham api kṣemaṃ mahīpateḥ 7.046.009a śāpito 'si narendreṇa yat tvaṃ saṃtāpam ātmanaḥ 7.046.009c tad brūyāḥ saṃnidhau mahyam aham ājñāpayāmi te
GE09ram_1-7u:23690: 7.046.010a vaidehyā codyamānas tu lakṣmaṇo dīnacetanaḥ 7.046.010c avāṅmukho bāṣpagalo vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:23691: 7.046.011a śrutvā pariṣado madhye apavādaṃ sudāruṇam 7.046.011c pure janapade caiva tvatkṛte janakātmaje 7.046.012a na tāni vacanīyāni mayā devi tavāgrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23692: 7.046.012c yāni rājñā hṛdi nyastāny amarṣaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23693: 7.046.013a sā tvāṃ tyaktā nṛpatinā nirdoṣā mama saṃnidhau
GE09ram_1-7u:23694: 7.046.013c paurāpavāda bhītena grāhyaṃ devi na te 'nyathā
GE09ram_1-7u:23695: 7.046.014a āśramānteṣu ca mayā tyaktavyā tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:23696: 7.046.014c rājñaḥ śāsanam ājñāya tavaivaṃ kila daurhṛdam
GE09ram_1-7u:23697: 7.046.015a tad etaj jāhnavītīre brahmarṣīṇāṃ tapovanam 7.046.015c puṇyaṃ ca ramaṇīyaṃ ca mā viṣādaṃ kṛthāḥ śubhe 7.046.016a rājño daśarathasyaiṣa pitur me munipuṃgavaḥ 7.046.016c sakhā paramako vipro vālmīkiḥ sumahāyaśāḥ 7.046.017a pādacchāyām upāgamya sukham asya mahātmanaḥ 7.046.017c upavāsaparaikāgrā vasa tvaṃ janakātmaje
GE09ram_1-7u:23698: 7.046.018a pativratātvam āsthāya rāmaṃ kṛtvā sadā hṛdi
GE09ram_1-7u:23699: 7.046.018c śreyas te paramaṃ devi tathā kṛtvā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:23700: 7.047.001a lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā dāruṇaṃ janakātmajā 7.047.001c paraṃ viṣādam āgamya vaidehī nipapāta ha
GE09ram_1-7u:23702: 7.047.002c lakṣmaṇaṃ dīnayā vācā uvāca janakātmajā 7.047.003a māmikeyaṃ tanur nūnaṃ sṛṣṭā duḥkhāya lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:23703: 7.047.003c dhātrā yasyās tathā me 'dya duḥkhamūrtiḥ pradṛśyate 7.047.004a kiṃ nu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ ko vā dārair viyojitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23704: 7.047.004c yāhaṃ śuddha samācārā tyaktā nṛpatinā satī
GE09ram_1-7u:23707: 7.047.006a sā kathaṃ hy āśrame saumya vatsyāmi vijanīkṛtā
GE09ram_1-7u:23708: 7.047.006c ākhyāsyāmi ca kasyāhaṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkhaparāyaṇā 7.047.007a kiṃ ca vakṣyāmi muniṣu kiṃ mayāpakṛtaṃ nṛpe
GE09ram_1-7u:23709: 7.047.007c kasmin vā kāraṇe tyaktā rāghaveṇa mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:23710: 7.047.008a na khalv adyaiva saumitre jīvitaṃ jāhnavī jale
GE09ram_1-7u:23711: 7.047.008c tyajeyaṃ rājavaṃśas tu bhartur me parihāsyate
GE09ram_1-7u:23712: 7.047.009a yathājñāṃ kuru saumitre tyaja māṃ duḥkhabhāginīm
GE09ram_1-7u:23713: 7.047.009c nideśe sthīyatāṃ rājñaḥ śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama
GE09ram_1-7u:23714: 7.047.010a śvaśrūṇām aviśeṣeṇa prāñjaliḥ pragraheṇa ca 7.047.010c śirasā vandya caraṇau kuśalaṃ brūhi pārthivam
GE09ram_1-7u:23715: 7.047.011a yathā bhrātṛṣu vartethās tathā paureṣu nityadā
GE09ram_1-7u:23716: 7.047.011c paramo hy eṣa dharmaḥ syād eṣā kīrtir anuttamā 7.047.012a yat tvaṃ paurajanaṃ rājan dharmeṇa samavāpnuyāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23717: 7.047.012c ahaṃ tu nānuśocāmi svaśarīraṃ nararṣabha 7.047.012e yathāpavādaṃ paurāṇāṃ tathaiva
GE09ram_1-7u:23718: 7.047.013a evaṃ bruvantyāṃ sītāyāṃ lakṣmaṇo dīnacetanaḥ 7.047.013c śirasā dharaṇīṃ gatvā vyāhartuṃ na śaśāka ha
GE09ram_1-7u:23719: 7.047.014a pradakṣiṇaṃ ca kṛtvā sa rudann eva mahāsvanam
GE09ram_1-7u:23720: 7.047.014c āruroha punar nāvaṃ nāvikaṃ cābhyacodayat 7.047.015a sa gatvā cottaraṃ kūlaṃ śokabhārasamanvitaḥ 7.047.015c saṃmūḍha iva duḥkhena ratham adhyāruhad drutam
GE09ram_1-7u:23721: 7.047.016a muhur muhur apāvṛtya dṛṣṭvā sītām anāthavat
GE09ram_1-7u:23722: 7.047.016c veṣṭantīṃ paratīrasthāṃ lakṣmaṇaḥ prayayāv atha 7.047.017a dūrasthaṃ ratham ālokya lakṣmaṇaṃ ca muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23723: 7.047.017c nirīkṣamāṇām udvignāṃ sītāṃ śokaḥ samāviśat 7.047.018a sā duḥkhabhārāvanatā tapasvinī; yaśodharā nātham apaśyatī satī
GE09ram_1-7u:23724: 7.047.018c ruroda sā barhiṇanādite vane; mahāsvanaṃ duḥkhaparāyaṇā satī
GE09ram_1-7u:23725: 7.048.001a sītāṃ tu rudatīṃ dṛṣṭvā ye tatra munidārakāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23726: 7.048.001c prādravan yatra bhagavān āste vālmīkir agryadhīḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23727: 7.048.002a abhivādya muneḥ pādau muniputrā maharṣaye 7.048.002c sarve nivedayām āsus tasyās tu ruditasvanam
GE09ram_1-7u:23728: 7.048.003a adṛṣṭapūrvā bhagavan kasyāpy eṣā mahātmanaḥ 7.048.003c patnī śrīr iva saṃmohād virauti vikṛtasvarā
GE09ram_1-7u:23729: 7.048.004a bhagavan sādhu paśyemāṃ devatām iva khāc cyutām
GE09ram_1-7u:23730: 7.048.004c na hy enāṃ mānuṣīṃ vidmaḥ satkriyāsyāḥ prayujyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:23731: 7.048.005a teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā buddhyā niścitya dharmavit
GE09ram_1-7u:23732: 7.048.005c tapasā labdhacakṣuṣmān prādravad yatra maithilī 7.048.006a taṃ tu deśam abhipretya kiṃ cit padbhyāṃ mahāmuniḥ 7.048.006c arghyam ādāya ruciraṃ jāhvanī tīram āśritaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23733: 7.048.006e dadarśa rāghavasyeṣṭāṃ patnīṃ sītām anāthavat 7.048.007a tāṃ sitāṃ śokabhārārtāṃ vālmīkir munipuṃgavaḥ 7.048.007c uvāca madhurāṃ vāṇīṃ hlādayann iva tejasā
GE09ram_1-7u:23734: 7.048.008a snuṣā daśarāthasya tvaṃ rāmasya mahiṣī satī
GE09ram_1-7u:23735: 7.048.008c janakasya sutā rājñaḥ svāgataṃ te pativrate
GE09ram_1-7u:23736: 7.048.009a āyānty evāsi vijñātā mayā dharmasamādhinā 7.048.009c kāraṇaṃ caiva sarvaṃ me hṛdayenopalakṣitam 7.048.010a apāpāṃ vedmi sīte tvāṃ tapo labdhena cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_1-7u:23737: 7.048.010c viśuddhabhāvā vaidehi sāmprataṃ mayi vartase 7.048.011a āśramasyāvidūre me tāpasyas tapasi sthitāḥ 7.048.011c tās tvāṃ vatse yathā vatsaṃ pālayiṣyanti nityaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23738: 7.048.012a idam arghyaṃ pratīccha tvaṃ visrabdhā vigatajvarā
GE09ram_1-7u:23739: 7.048.012c yathā svagṛham abhyetya viṣādaṃ caiva mā kṛthāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23740: 7.048.013a śrutvā tu bhāṣitaṃ sītā muneḥ paramam adbhutam
GE09ram_1-7u:23741: 7.048.013c śirasā vandya caraṇau tathety āha kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23742: 7.048.014a taṃ prayāntaṃ muniṃ sītā prāñjaliḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nvagāt
GE09ram_1-7u:23743: 7.048.014c anvayād yatra tāpasyo dharmanityāḥ samāhitāḥ 7.048.015a taṃ dṛṣṭvā munim āyāntaṃ vaidehyānugataṃ tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:23744: 7.048.015c upājagmur mudā yuktā vacanaṃ caidam abruvan
GE09ram_1-7u:23745: 7.048.016a svāgataṃ te muniśreṣṭha cirasyāgamanaṃ prabho 7.048.016c abhivādayāmaḥ sarvās tvām ucyatāṃ kiṃ ca kurmahe
GE09ram_1-7u:23746: 7.048.017a tāsāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā vālmīkir idam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:23747: 7.048.017c sīteyaṃ samanuprāptā patnī rāmasya dhīmataḥ 7.048.018a snuṣā daśaradhasyaiṣā janakasya sutā satī 7.048.018c apāpā patinā tyaktā paripālyā mayā sadā
GE09ram_1-7u:23748: 7.048.019a imāṃ bhavatyaḥ paśyantu snehena parameṇa ha
GE09ram_1-7u:23749: 7.048.019c gauravān mama vākyasya pūjyā vo 'stu viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23750: 7.048.020a muhur muhuś ca vaidehīṃ parisāntvya mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23751: 7.048.020c svam āśramaṃ śiṣya vṛtaḥ punar āyān mahātapāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23752: 7.049.001a dṛṣṭvā tu maithilīṃ sītām āśramaṃ saṃraveśitām
GE09ram_1-7u:23753: 7.049.001c saṃtāpam akarod ghoraṃ lakṣmaṇo dīnacetanaḥ 7.049.002a abravīc ca mahātejāḥ sumantraṃ mantrasārathim 7.049.002c sītāsaṃtāpajaṃ duḥkhaṃ paśya rāmasya dhīmataḥ 7.049.003a ato duḥkhataraṃ kiṃ nu rāghavasya bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:23755: 7.049.004a vyaktaṃ daivād ahaṃ manye rāghavasya vinā bhavam
GE09ram_1-7u:23756: 7.049.004c vaidehyā sārathe sārdhaṃ daivaṃ hi duratikramam
GE09ram_1-7u:23757: 7.049.005a yo hi devān sagandharvān asurān saha rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23758: 7.049.005c nihanyād rāghavaḥ kruddhaḥ sa daivam anuvartate
GE09ram_1-7u:23759: 7.049.006a purā mama pitur vākyair daṇḍake vijane vane
GE09ram_1-7u:23760: 7.049.006c uṣito navavarṣāṇi pañca caiva sudāruṇe 7.049.007a tato duḥkhataraṃ bhūyaḥ sītāyā vipravāsanam 7.049.007c paurāṇāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā nṛśaṃsaṃ pratibhāti me
GE09ram_1-7u:23761: 7.049.008a ko nu dharmāśrayaḥ sūta karmaṇy asmin yaśohare
GE09ram_1-7u:23762: 7.049.008c maithilīṃ prati saṃprāptaḥ paurair hīnārthavādibhiḥ 7.049.009a etā bahuvidhā vācaḥ śrutvā lakṣmaṇabhāṣitāḥ 7.049.009c sumantraḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:23763: 7.049.010a na saṃtāpas tvayā kāryaḥ saumitre maithilīṃ prati
GE09ram_1-7u:23764: 7.049.010c dṛṣṭam etat purā vipraiḥ pitus te lakṣmaṇāgrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23766: 7.049.011c tvāṃ caiva maithilīṃ caiva śatrughnabharatau tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:23767: 7.049.011e saṃtyajiṣyati dharmātmā kālena mahatā mahān 7.049.012a na tv idaṃ tvayi vaktavyaṃ saumitre bharate 'pi vā
GE09ram_1-7u:23768: 7.049.012c rājñā vo 'vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ durvāsā yad uvāca ha 7.049.013a mahārājasamīpe ca mama caiva nararṣabha 7.049.013c ṛṣiṇā vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ vasiṣṭhasya ca saṃnidhau
GE09ram_1-7u:23769: 7.049.014a ṛṣes tu vacanaṃ śrutvā mām āha puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23770: 7.049.014c sūta na kva cid evaṃ te vaktavyaṃ janasaṃnidhau 7.049.015a tasyāhaṃ lokapālasya vākyaṃ tat susamāhitaḥ 7.049.015c naiva jātv anṛtaṃ kuryām iti me saumya darśanam 7.049.016a sarvathā nāsty avaktavyaṃ mayā saumya tavāgrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23771: 7.049.016c yadi te śravaṇe śraddhā śrūyatāṃ raghunandana
GE09ram_1-7u:23772: 7.049.017a yady apy ahaṃ narendreṇa rahasyaṃ śrāvitaḥ purā
GE09ram_1-7u:23773: 7.049.017c tac cāpy udāhariṣyāmi daivaṃ hi duratikramam
GE09ram_1-7u:23774: 7.049.018a tac chrutvā bhāṣitaṃ tasya gambhīrārthapadaṃ mahat
GE09ram_1-7u:23775: 7.049.018c tathyaṃ brūhīti saumitriḥ sūtaṃ vākyam athābravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:23776: 7.050.001a tathā saṃcoditaḥ sūto lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā 7.050.001c tad vākyam ṛṣiṇā proktaṃ vyāhartum upacakrame
GE09ram_1-7u:23777: 7.050.002a purā nāmnā hi durvāsā atreḥ putro mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23778: 7.050.002c vasiṣṭhasyāśrame puṇye sa vārṣikyam uvāsa ha
GE09ram_1-7u:23779: 7.050.003a tam āśramaṃ mahātejāḥ pitā te sumahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23780: 7.050.003c purodhasaṃ mahātmānaṃ didṛkṣur agamat svayam 7.050.004a sa dṛṣṭvā sūryasaṃkāśaṃ jvalantam iva tejasā
GE09ram_1-7u:23781: 7.050.004c upaviṣṭaṃ vasiṣṭhasya savye pārśve mahāmunim 7.050.004e tau munī tāpasa śreṣṭhau vinītas tv abhyavādayat
GE09ram_1-7u:23782: 7.050.005a sa tābhyāṃ pūjito rājā svāgatenāsanena ca
GE09ram_1-7u:23783: 7.050.005c pādyena phalamūlaiś ca so 'py āste munibhiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:23784: 7.050.006a teṣāṃ tatropaviṣṭānāṃ tās tāḥ sumadhurāḥ kathāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23786: 7.050.007a tataḥ kathāyāṃ kasyāṃ cit prāñjaliḥ pragraho nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23787: 7.050.007c uvāca taṃ mahātmānam atreḥ putraṃ tapodhanam
GE09ram_1-7u:23788: 7.050.008a bhagavan kiṃ pramāṇena mama vaṃśo bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:23789: 7.050.008c kimāyuś ca hi me rāmaḥ putrāś cānye kimāyuṣaḥ 7.050.009a rāmasya ca sutā ye syus teṣām āyuḥ kiyad bhavet
GE09ram_1-7u:23790: 7.050.009c kāmyayā bhagavan brūhi vaṃśasyāsya gatiṃ mama
GE09ram_1-7u:23791: 7.050.010a tac chrutvā vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ rājño daśarathasya tu
GE09ram_1-7u:23793: 7.050.011a ayodhyāyāḥ patī rāmo dīrghakālaṃ bhaviṣyati 7.050.011c sukhinaś ca samṛddhāś ca bhaviṣyanty asya cānujāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23794: 7.050.012a kasmiṃś cit karaṇe tvāṃ ca maithilīṃ ca yaśasvinīm 7.050.012c saṃtyajiṣyati dharmātmā kālena mahatā kila 7.050.013a daśavarṣasahasraṇi daśavarṣaśatāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:23795: 7.050.013c rāmo rājyam upāsitvā brahmalokaṃ gamiṣyati 7.050.014a samṛddhair hayamedhaiś ca iṣṭvā parapuraṃjayaḥ 7.050.014c rājavaṃśāṃś ca kākutstho bahūn saṃsthāpayiṣyati 7.050.015a sa sarvam akhilaṃ rājño vaṃśasyāsya gatāgatam
GE09ram_1-7u:23796: 7.050.015c ākhyāya sumahātejās tūṣṇīm āsīn mahādyutiḥ 7.050.016a tūṣṇīṃbhūte munau tasmin rājā daśarathas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:23797: 7.050.016c abhivādya mahātmānau punar āyāt purottamam 7.050.017a etad vaco mayā tatra muninā vyāhṛtaṃ purā
GE09ram_1-7u:23798: 7.050.017c śrutaṃ hṛdi ca nikṣiptaṃ nānyathā tad bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:23799: 7.050.018a evaṃgate na saṃtāpaṃ gantum arhasi rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:23800: 7.050.018c sītārthe rāghavārthe vā dṛḍho bhava narottama
GE09ram_1-7u:23801: 7.050.019a tac chrutvā vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ sūtasya paramādbhutam
GE09ram_1-7u:23802: 7.050.019c praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe sādhu sādhv iti cābravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:23803: 7.050.020a tayoḥ saṃvadator evaṃ sūtalakṣmaṇayoḥ pathi 7.050.020c astam arko gato vāsaṃ gomatyāṃ tāv athoṣatuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23804: 7.051.001a tatra tāṃ rajanīm uṣya gomatyāṃ raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23805: 7.051.001c prabhāte punar utthāya lakṣmaṇaḥ prayayau tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:23808: 7.051.003a saumitris tu paraṃ dainyaṃ jagāma sumahāmatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23809: 7.051.003c rāmapādau samāsādya vakṣyāmi kim ahaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23814: 7.051.006a sa dṛṣṭvā rāghavaṃ dīnam āsīnaṃ paramāsane
GE09ram_1-7u:23816: 7.051.007a jagrāha caraṇau tasya lakṣmaṇo dīnacetanaḥ 7.051.007c uvāca dīnayā vācā prāñjaliḥ susamāhitaḥ 7.051.008a āryasyājñāṃ puraskṛtya visṛjya janakātmajām
GE09ram_1-7u:23817: 7.051.008c gaṅgātīre yathoddiṣṭe vālmīker āśrame śubhe 7.051.008e punar asmy āgato vīra pādamūlam upāsitum
GE09ram_1-7u:23818: 7.051.009a mā śucaḥ puruṣavyāghra kālasya gatir īdṛśī
GE09ram_1-7u:23819: 7.051.009c tvadvidhā na hi śocanti sattvavanto manasvinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23820: 7.051.010a sarve kṣayāntā nicayāḥ patanāntāḥ samucchrayāḥ 7.051.010c saṃyogā viprayogāntā maraṇāntaṃ ca jīvitam 7.051.011a śaktas tvam ātmanātmānaṃ vijetuṃ manasaiva hi
GE09ram_1-7u:23821: 7.051.011c lokān sarvāṃś ca kākutstha kiṃ punar duḥkham īdṛśam 7.051.012a nedṛśeṣu vimuhyanti tvadvidhāḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23822: 7.051.012c yadarthaṃ maithilī tyaktā apavādabhayān nṛpa 7.051.013a sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla dhairyeṇa susamāhitaḥ 7.051.013c tyajemāṃ durbalāṃ buddhiṃ saṃtāpaṃ mā kuruṣva ha
GE09ram_1-7u:23823: 7.051.014a evam uktas tu kākutstho lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:23824: 7.051.014c uvāca parayā prītyā saumitriṃ mitravatsalam 7.051.015a evam etan naraśreṣṭha yathā vadasi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:23825: 7.051.015c paritoṣaś ca me vīra mama kāryānuśāsane
GE09ram_1-7u:23826: 7.051.016a nirvṛtiś ca kṛtā saumya saṃtāpaś ca nirākṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23828: 7.052.001a tataḥ sumantras tv āgamya rāghavaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:23829: 7.052.001c ete nivāritā rājan dvāri tiṣṭhanti tāpasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23830: 7.052.002a bhārgavaṃ cyavanaṃ nāma puraskṛtya maharṣayaḥ 7.052.002c darśanaṃ te mahārāja codayanti kṛtatvarāḥ 7.052.002e prīyamāṇā naravyāghra yamunātīravāsinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23831: 7.052.003a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rāmaḥ provāca dharmavit
GE09ram_1-7u:23833: 7.052.004a rājñas tv ājñāṃ puraskṛtya dvāḥstho mūrdhni kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23834: 7.052.004c praveśayām āsa tatas tāpasān saṃmatān bahūn
GE09ram_1-7u:23835: 7.052.005a śataṃ samadhikaṃ tatra dīpyamānaṃ svatejasā 7.052.005c praviṣṭaṃ rājabhavanaṃ tāpasānāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_1-7u:23837: 7.052.006c gṛhītvā phalamūlaṃ ca rāmasyābhyāharan bahu 7.052.007a pratigṛhya tu tat sarvaṃ rāmaḥ prītipuraskṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23838: 7.052.007c tīrthodakāni sarvāṇi phalāni vividhāni ca 7.052.008a uvāca ca mahābāhuḥ sarvān eva mahāmunīn
GE09ram_1-7u:23840: 7.052.009a rāmasya bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā sarva eva maharṣayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23841: 7.052.009c bṛsīṣu rucirākhyāsu niṣeduḥ kāñcanīṣu te 7.052.010a upaviṣṭān ṛṣīṃs tatra dṛṣṭvā parapuraṃjayaḥ 7.052.010c prayataḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā rāghavo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:23842: 7.052.011a kim āgamanakaryaṃ vaḥ kiṃ karomi tapodhanāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23844: 7.052.012a idaṃ rājyaṃ ca sakalaṃ jīvitaṃ ca hṛdi sthitam 7.052.012c sarvam etad dvijārthaṃ me satyam etad bravīmi vaḥ 7.052.013a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā sādhuvādo mahān abhūt
GE09ram_1-7u:23846: 7.052.014a ūcuś ca te mahātmāno harṣeṇa mahatānvitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23847: 7.052.014c upapannaṃ naraśreṣṭha tavaiva bhuvi nānyataḥ 7.052.015a bahavaḥ pārthivā rājann atikrāntā mahābalāḥ 7.052.015c kāryagauravam aśrutvā pratijñāṃ nābhyarocayan
GE09ram_1-7u:23848: 7.052.016a tvayā punar brāhmaṇa gauravād iyaṃ; kṛtvā pratijñā hy anavekṣya kāraṇam 7.052.016c kuruṣva kartā hy asi nātra saṃśayo; mahābhayāt trātum ṛṣīṃs
GE09ram_1-7u:23849: tvam arhasi 7.053.001a bruvadbhir evam ṛṣibhiḥ kākutstho vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:23850: 7.053.001c kiṃ kāryaṃ brūta bhavatāṃ bhayaṃ nāśayitāsmi vaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23851: 7.053.002a tathā vadati kākutsthe bhargavo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:23852: 7.053.002c bhayaṃ naḥ śṛṇu yan mūlaṃ deśasya ca nareśvara 7.053.003a pūrvaṃ kṛtayuge rāma daiteyaḥ sumahābalaḥ 7.053.003c lolāputro 'bhavaj jyeṣṭho madhur nāma mahāsuraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23853: 7.053.004a brahmaṇyaś ca śaraṇyaś ca buddhyā ca pariniṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23854: 7.053.004c suraiś ca paramodāraiḥ prītis tasyātulābhavat 7.053.005a sa madhur vīryasaṃpanno dharme ca susamāhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23855: 7.053.005c bahumānāc ca rudreṇa dattas tasyādbhuto varaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23856: 7.053.006a śūlaṃ śūlād viniṣkṛṣya mahāvīryaṃ mahāprabham 7.053.006c dadau mahātmā suprīto vākayṃ caitad uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:23857: 7.053.007a tvayāyam atulo dharmo matprasādāt kṛtaḥ śubhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23858: 7.053.007c prītyā paramayā yukto dadāmy āyudham uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:23859: 7.053.008a yāvat suraiś ca vipraiś ca na virudhyer mahāsura 7.053.008c tāvac chūlaṃ tavedaṃ syād anyathā nāśam āpnuyāt
GE09ram_1-7u:23860: 7.053.009a yaś ca tvām abhiyuñjīta yuddhāya vigatajvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23861: 7.053.009c taṃ śūlaṃ bhasmasāt kṛtvā punar eṣyati te karam 7.053.010a evaṃ rudrād varaṃ labdhvā bhūya eva mahāsuraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23862: 7.053.010c praṇipatya mahādevaṃ vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:23863: 7.053.011a bhagavan mama vaṃśasya śūlam etad anuttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:23864: 7.053.011c bhavet tu satataṃ deva surāṇām īśvaro hy asi 7.053.012a taṃ bruvāṇaṃ madhuṃ devaḥ sarvabhūtapatiḥ śivaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23865: 7.053.012c pratyuvāca mahādevo naitad evaṃ bhaviṣyati 7.053.013a mā bhūt te viphalā bāṇī matprāsādakṛtā śubhā
GE09ram_1-7u:23866: 7.053.013c bhavataḥ putram ekaṃ tu śūlam etad gamiṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:23867: 7.053.014a yāvat karasthaḥ śūlo 'yaṃ bhaviṣyati sutasya te
GE09ram_1-7u:23869: 7.053.015a evaṃ madhuvaraṃ labdhvā devāt sumahad adbhutam
GE09ram_1-7u:23870: 7.053.015c bhavanaṃ cāsuraśreṣṭhaḥ kārayām āsa suprabham 7.053.016a tasya patnī mahābhagā priyā kumbhīnasī hi yā
GE09ram_1-7u:23871: 7.053.016c viśvāsayor apatyaṃ sā hy analāyāṃ mahāprabhā
GE09ram_1-7u:23872: 7.053.017a tasyāḥ putro mahāvīryo lavaṇo nāma dāruṇaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23873: 7.053.017c bālyāt prabhṛti duṣṭātmā pāpāny eva samācarat
GE09ram_1-7u:23874: 7.053.018a taṃ putraṃ durvinītaṃ tu dṛṣṭvā duḥkhasamanvitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23875: 7.053.018c madhuḥ sa śokam āpede na cainaṃ kiṃ cid abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:23876: 7.053.019a sa vihāya imaṃ lokaṃ praviṣṭo varuṇālayam
GE09ram_1-7u:23877: 7.053.019c śūlaṃ niveśya lavaṇe varaṃ tasmai nyavedayat
GE09ram_1-7u:23878: 7.053.020a sa prabhāvena śūlasya daurātmyenātmanas tathā 7.053.020c saṃtāpayati lokāṃs trīn viśeṣeṇa tu tāpasān
GE09ram_1-7u:23879: 7.053.021a evaṃprabhāvo lavaṇaḥ śūlaṃ caiva tathāvidham 7.053.021c śrutvā pramāṇaṃ kākutsthaṃ tvaṃ hi naḥ paramā gatiḥ 7.053.022a bahavaḥ pārthivā rāma bhayārtair ṛṣibhiḥ purā
GE09ram_1-7u:23880: 7.053.022c abhayaṃ yācitā vīra trātāraṃ na ca vidmahe
GE09ram_1-7u:23881: 7.053.023a te vayaṃ rāvaṇaṃ śrutvā hataṃ sabalavāhanam
GE09ram_1-7u:23882: 7.053.023c trātāraṃ vidmahe rāma nānyaṃ bhuvi narādhipam
GE09ram_1-7u:23883: 7.053.023e tat paritrātum icchāmo lavaṇād bhayapīḍitāḥ 7.054.001a tathokte tān ṛṣīn rāmaḥ pratyuvāca kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23884: 7.054.001c kimāhāraḥ kimācāro lavaṇaḥ kva ca vartate
GE09ram_1-7u:23885: 7.054.002a rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā ṛṣayaḥ sarva eva te
GE09ram_1-7u:23886: 7.054.002c tato nivedayām āsur lavaṇo vavṛdhe yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:23887: 7.054.003a āhāraḥ sarvasattvāni viśeṣeṇa ca tāpasāḥ 7.054.003c ācāro raudratā nityaṃ vāso madhuvane sadā
GE09ram_1-7u:23889: 7.054.004c mānuṣāṃś caiva kurute nityam āhāram āhnikam
GE09ram_1-7u:23892: 7.054.006a tac chrutvā rāghavo vākyam uvāca sa mahāmunīn
GE09ram_1-7u:23893: 7.054.006c ghātayiṣyāmi tad rakṣo vyapagacchatu vo bhayam
GE09ram_1-7u:23894: 7.054.007a tathā teṣāṃ pratijñāya munīnām ugratejasām 7.054.007c sa bhrātṝn sahitān sarvān uvāca raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23895: 7.054.008a ko hantā lavaṇaṃ vīrāḥ kasyāṃśaḥ sa vidhīyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:23897: 7.054.009a rāghaveṇaivam uktas tu bharato vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:23898: 7.054.009c aham enaṃ badhiṣyāmi mamāṃśaḥ sa vidhīyatām
GE09ram_1-7u:23900: 7.054.010c lakṣmaṇāvarajas tasthau hitvā sauvarṇam āsanam 7.054.011a śatrughnas tv abravīd vākyaṃ praṇipatya narādhipam
GE09ram_1-7u:23902: 7.054.012a āryeṇa hi purā śūnyā ayodhyā rakṣitā purī
GE09ram_1-7u:23903: 7.054.012c saṃtāpaṃ hṛdaye kṛtvā āryasyāgamanaṃ prati 7.054.013a duḥkhāni ca bahūnīha anubhūtāni pārthiva 7.054.013c śayāno duḥkhaśayyāsu nandigrāme mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:23906: 7.054.014e preṣye mayi sthite rājan na bhūyaḥ kleśam āpnuyāt 7.054.015a tathā bruvati śatrughne rāghavaḥ punar abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:23907: 7.054.015c evaṃ bhavatu kākutstha kriyatāṃ mama śāsanam
GE09ram_1-7u:23908: 7.054.016a rājye tvām abhiṣekṣyāmi maghos tu nagare śubhe
GE09ram_1-7u:23909: 7.054.016c niveśaya mahābāho bharataṃ yady avekṣase 7.054.017a śūras tvaṃ kṛtavidyaś ca samarthaḥ saṃniveśane
GE09ram_1-7u:23910: 7.054.017c nagaraṃ madhunā juṣṭaṃ tathā janapadāñ śubhān
GE09ram_1-7u:23911: 7.054.018a yo hi vaṃśaṃ samutpāṭya pārthivasya punaḥ kṣaye
GE09ram_1-7u:23912: 7.054.018c na vidhatte nṛpaṃ tatra narakaṃ sa nigacchati
GE09ram_1-7u:23913: 7.054.019a sa tvaṃ hatvā madhusutaṃ lavaṇaṃ pāpaniścayam
GE09ram_1-7u:23914: 7.054.019c rājyaṃ praśādhi dharmeṇa vākyaṃ me yady avekṣase
GE09ram_1-7u:23915: 7.054.020a uttaraṃ ca na vaktavyaṃ śūra vākyāntare mama
GE09ram_1-7u:23916: 7.054.020c bālena pūrvajasyājñā kartavyā nātra saṃśayaḥ 7.054.021a abhiṣekaṃ ca kākutstha pratīcchasva mayodyatam 7.054.021c vasiṣṭhapramukhair viprair vidhimantrapuraskṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:23917: 7.055.001a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa parāṃ vrīḍām upāgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23918: 7.055.001c śatrughno vīryasaṃpanno mandaṃ mandam uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:23919: 7.055.002a avaśyaṃ karaṇīyaṃ ca śāsanaṃ puruṣarṣabha 7.055.002c tava caiva mahābhāga śāsanaṃ duratikramam 7.055.002e ayaṃ kāmakaro rājaṃs tavāsmi puruṣarṣabha 7.055.003a evam ukte tu śūreṇa śatrughnena mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:23920: 7.055.003c uvāca rāmaḥ saṃhṛṣṭo lakṣmaṇaṃ bharataṃ tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:23923: 7.055.005a purodhasaṃ ca kākutsthau naigamān ṛtvijas tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:23924: 7.055.005c mantriṇaś caiva me sarvān ānayadhvaṃ mamājñayā
GE09ram_1-7u:23925: 7.055.006a rājñaḥ śāsanam ājñāya tathākurvan mahārathaḥ 7.055.006c abhiṣekasamārambhaṃ puraskṛtya purodhasaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:23928: 7.055.007c saṃpraharṣakaraḥ śrīmān rāghavasya purasya ca 7.055.008a tato 'bhiṣiktaṃ śatrughnam aṅkam āropya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23929: 7.055.008c uvāca madhurāṃ vāṇīṃ tejas tasyābhipūrayan 7.055.009a ayaṃ śaras tv amoghas te divyaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23930: 7.055.009c anena lavaṇaṃ saumya hantāsi raghunandana 7.055.010a sṛṣṭaḥ śaro 'yaṃ kākutstha yadā śete mahārṇave
GE09ram_1-7u:23931: 7.055.010c svayambhūr ajito devo yaṃ nāpaśyan surāsurāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23932: 7.055.011a adṛśyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tenāyaṃ hi śarottamaḥ 7.055.011c sṛṣṭaḥ krodhābhibhūtena vināśārthaṃ durātmanoḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23934: 7.055.012a sraṣṭukāmena lokāṃs trīṃs tau cānena hatau yudhi
GE09ram_1-7u:23935: 7.055.012c anena śaramukhyena tato lokāṃś cakāra saḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23936: 7.055.013a nāyaṃ mayā śaraḥ pūrvaṃ rāvaṇasya vadhārthinā
GE09ram_1-7u:23937: 7.055.013c mukhaḥ śatrughna bhūtānāṃ mahāṃs trāso bhaved iti
GE09ram_1-7u:23938: 7.055.014a yac ca tasya mahac chūlaṃ tryambakeṇa mahātmanā
GE09ram_1-7u:23939: 7.055.014c dattaṃ śatruvināśāya madhor āyudham uttamam 7.055.015a tat saṃnikṣipya bhavane pūjyamānaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23940: 7.055.015c diśaḥ sarvāḥ samālokya prāpnoty āhāram ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23941: 7.055.016a yadā tu yuddham ākāṅkṣan kaś cid enaṃ samāhvayet 7.055.016c tadā śūlaṃ gṛhītvā tad bhasma rakṣaḥ karoti tam 7.055.017a sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla tam āyudhavivarjitam 7.055.017c apraviṣṭapuraṃ pūrvaṃ dvāri tiṣṭha dhṛtāyudhaḥ 7.055.018a apraviṣṭaṃ ca bhavanaṃ yuddhāya puruṣarṣabha 7.055.018c āhvayethā mahābāho tato hantāsi rākṣasaṃ 7.055.019a anyathā kriyamāṇe tu avadhyaḥ sa bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:23942: 7.055.019c yadi tv evaṃ kṛte vīra vināśam upayāsyati
GE09ram_1-7u:23943: 7.055.020a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ śūlasya ca viparyayam
GE09ram_1-7u:23944: 7.055.020c śrīmataḥ śitikaṇṭhasya kṛtyaṃ hi duratikramam 7.056.001a evam uktvā tu kākutsthaṃ praśasya ca punaḥ punaḥ 7.056.001c punar evāparaṃ vākyam uvāca raghunandanaḥ 7.056.002a imāny aśvasahasrāṇi catvāri puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_1-7u:23945: 7.056.002c rathānāṃ ca sahasre dve gajānāṃ śatam eva ca 7.056.003a antarāpaṇavīthyaś ca
GE09ram_1-7u:23949: 7.056.005a balaṃ ca subhṛtaṃ vīra hṛṣṭapuṣṭam anuttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:23951: 7.056.006a na hy arthās tatra tiṣṭhanti na dārā na ca bāndhavāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23952: 7.056.006c suprīto bhṛtyavargas tu yatra tiṣṭhati rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:23953: 7.056.007a ato hṛṣṭajanākīrṇāṃ prasthāpya mahatīṃ camūm 7.056.007c eka eva dhanuṣpānis tad gaccha tvaṃ madhor vanam 7.056.008a yathā tvāṃ na prajānāti gacchantaṃ yuddhakāṅkṣiṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:23954: 7.056.008c lavaṇas tu madhoḥ putras tathā gaccher aśaṅkitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23955: 7.056.009a na tasya mṛtyur anyo 'sti kaścid dhi puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_1-7u:23956: 7.056.009c darśanaṃ yo 'bhigaccheta sa vadhyo lavaṇena hi
GE09ram_1-7u:23957: 7.056.010a sa grīṣme vyapayāte tu varṣarātra upasthite
GE09ram_1-7u:23958: 7.056.010c hanyās tvaṃ lavaṇaṃ saumya sa hi kālo 'sya durmateḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23959: 7.056.011a maharṣīṃs tu puraskṛtya prayāntu tava sainikāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23961: 7.056.012a tataḥ sthāpya balaṃ sarvaṃ nadītīre samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23962: 7.056.012c agrato dhanuṣā sārdhaṃ gaccha tvaṃ laghuvikrama
GE09ram_1-7u:23963: 7.056.013a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa śatrughnas tān mahābalān
GE09ram_1-7u:23964: 7.056.013c senāmukhyān samānīya tato vākyam uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:23965: 7.056.014a ete vo gaṇitā vāsā yatra yatra nivatsyatha
GE09ram_1-7u:23966: 7.056.014c sthātavyaṃ cāvirodhena yathā bādhā na kasya cit
GE09ram_1-7u:23967: 7.056.015a tathā tāṃs tu samājñāpya niryāpya ca mahad balam 7.056.015c kausalyāṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca kaukeyīṃ cābhyavādayat
GE09ram_1-7u:23968: 7.056.016a rāmaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā śirasābhipraṇamya ca 7.056.016c rāṇeṇa cābhyanujñātaḥ śatrughnaḥ śatrutāpanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23969: 7.056.017a lakṣmaṇaṃ bharataṃ caiva praṇipatya kṛtāñjaliḥ 7.056.017c purodhasaṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ ca śatrughnaḥ prayatātmavān 7.056.017e pradakṣiṇam atho kṛtvā nirjagāma mahābalaḥ 7.057.001a prasthāpya tad balaṃ sarvaṃ māsamātroṣitaḥ pathi
GE09ram_1-7u:23970: 7.057.001c eka evāśu śatrughno jagāma tvaritas tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:23971: 7.057.002a dvirātram antare śūra uṣya rāghavanandanaḥ 7.057.002c vālmīker āśramaṃ puṇyam agacchad vāsam uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:23973: 7.057.003c kṛtāñjalir atho bhūtvā vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:23974: 7.057.004a bhagavan vastum icchāmi guroḥ kṛtyād ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23975: 7.057.004c śvaḥ prabhāte gamiṣyāmi pratīcīṃ vāruṇīṃ diśam
GE09ram_1-7u:23976: 7.057.005a śatrughnasya vacaḥ śrutvā prahasya munipuṃgavaḥ 7.057.005c pratyuvaca mahātmānaṃ svāgataṃ te mahāyaśaḥ 7.057.006a svam āśramam idaṃ saumya rāghavāṇāṃ kulasya ha
GE09ram_1-7u:23977: 7.057.006c āsanaṃ pādyam arghyaṃ ca nirviśaṅkaḥ pratīccha me
GE09ram_1-7u:23978: 7.057.007a pratigṛhya tataḥ pūjāṃ phalamūlaṃ ca bhojanam
GE09ram_1-7u:23979: 7.057.007c bhakṣayām āsa kākutsthas tṛptiṃ ca paramāṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23980: 7.057.008a sa tu bhuktvā mahābāhur maharṣiṃ tam uvāca ha 7.057.008c pūrvaṃ yajñavibhūtīyaṃ
GE09ram_1-7u:23981: 7.057.009a tasya tadbhāṣitaṃ śrutvā vālmīkir vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:23982: 7.057.009c śatrughna śṛṇu yasyedaṃ babhūvāyatanaṃ purā 7.057.010a yuṣmākaṃ pūrvako rājā sudāsasya mahātmanaḥ 7.057.010c putro mitrasaho nāma vīryavān atidhārmikaḥ 7.057.011a sa bāla eva saudāso mṛgayām upacakrame
GE09ram_1-7u:23983: 7.057.011c cañcūryamāṇaṃ dadṛśe sa śūro rākṣasadvayam 7.057.012a śārdūlarūpiṇau ghorau mṛgān bahusahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23984: 7.057.012c bhakṣayāṇāv asaṃtuṣṭau paryāptiṃ ca na jagmatuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23985: 7.057.013a sa tu tau rākṣasau dṛṣṭvā nirmṛgaṃ ca vanaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:23987: 7.057.014a vinipātya tam ekaṃ tu saudāsaḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23989: 7.057.015a nirīkṣamāṇaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā sahāyas tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:23990: 7.057.015c saṃtāpam akarod ghoraṃ saudāsaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:23991: 7.057.016a yasmād anaparāddhaṃ tvaṃ sahāyaṃ mama jaghnivān
GE09ram_1-7u:23992: 7.057.016c tasmāt tavāpu pāpiṣṭha pradāsyāmi pratikriyām 7.057.017a evam uktvā tu taṃ rakṣas
GE09ram_1-7u:23996: 7.057.019a tatra yajño mahān āsīd bahuvarṣa gaṇāyutān
GE09ram_1-7u:23999: 7.057.020c vasiṣṭharūpī rājānam iti hovāca rākṣasaḥ 7.057.021a adya yajñāvasānānte sāmiṣaṃ bhojanaṃ mama 7.057.021c dīyatām iti śīghraṃ vai nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:24000: 7.057.022a tac chrutvā vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ rakṣasā kāmarūpiṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:24002: 7.057.023a haviṣyaṃ sāmiṣaṃ svādu yathā bhavati bhojanam
GE09ram_1-7u:24003: 7.057.023c tathā kuruṣva śīghraṃ vai parituṣyed yathā guruḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24005: 7.057.024c sa ca rakṣaḥ punas tatra sūdaveṣam athākarot
GE09ram_1-7u:24006: 7.057.025a sa mānuṣam atho māṃsaṃ pārthivāya nyavedayat
GE09ram_1-7u:24007: 7.057.025c idaṃ svāduhaviṣyaṃ ca sāmiṣaṃ cānnam āhṛtam
GE09ram_1-7u:24008: 7.057.026a sa bhojanaṃ vasiṣṭhāya patnyā sārdham upāharat
GE09ram_1-7u:24009: 7.057.026c madayantyā naravyāghra sāmiṣaṃ rakṣasā hṛtam 7.057.027a jñātvā tadāmiṣaṃ vipro mānuṣaṃ bhojanāhṛtam 7.057.027c krodhena mahatāviṣṭo vyāhartum upacakrame
GE09ram_1-7u:24010: 7.057.028a yasmāt tvaṃ bhojanaṃ rājan mamaitad dātum icchasi
GE09ram_1-7u:24011: 7.057.028c tasmād bhojanam etat te bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24012: 7.057.029a sa rājā saha patnyā vai praṇipatya muhur muhuḥ 7.057.029c punar vasiṣṭhaṃ provāca yad uktaṃ brahmarūpiṇā
GE09ram_1-7u:24013: 7.057.030a tac chrutā pārthivendrasya rakṣasā vikṛtaṃ ca tat
GE09ram_1-7u:24014: 7.057.030c punaḥ provāca rājānaṃ vasiṣṭhaḥ puruṣarṣabham 7.057.031a mayā roṣaparītena yad idaṃ vyāhṛtaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24015: 7.057.031c naitac chakyaṃ vṛthā kartuṃ pradāsyāmi ca te varam 7.057.032a kālo dvādaśa varṣāṇi śāpasyāsya bhaviṣyati 7.057.032c matprasādāc ca rājendra atītaṃ na smariṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:24016: 7.057.033a evaṃ sa rājā taṃ śāpam upabhujyārimardanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24017: 7.057.033c pratilebhe punā rājyaṃ prajāś caivānvapālayat 7.057.034a tasya kalmāṣapādasya yajñasyāyatanaṃ śubham
GE09ram_1-7u:24019: 7.057.035a tasya tāṃ pārthivendrasya kathāṃ śrutvā sudāruṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:24020: 7.057.035c viveśa parṇaśālāyāṃ maharṣim abhivādya ca 7.058.001a yām eva rātriṃ śatrughna parṇaśālāṃ samāviśat
GE09ram_1-7u:24021: 7.058.001c tām eva rātriṃ sītāpi prasūtā dārakadvayam
GE09ram_1-7u:24022: 7.058.002a tato 'rdharātrasamaye bālakā munidārakāḥ 7.058.002c vālmīkeḥ priyam ācakhyuḥ sītāyāḥ prasavaṃ śubham
GE09ram_1-7u:24023: 7.058.002e tasya rakṣāṃ mahātejaḥ kuru bhūtavināśinīm 7.058.003a teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā munir harṣam upāgamat
GE09ram_1-7u:24024: 7.058.003c bhūtaghnīṃ cākarot tābhyā rakṣāṃ rakṣovināśinīm 7.058.004a kuśamuṣṭim upādāya lavaṃ caiva tu sa dvijaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24025: 7.058.004c vālmīkiḥ pradadau tābhyāṃ rakṣāṃ bhūtavināśinīm 7.058.005a yas tayoḥ pūrvajo jātaḥ sa kuśair mantrasaṃskṛtaiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24026: 7.058.005c nirmārjanīyas tu bhavet kuśa ity asya nāmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24027: 7.058.006a yaś cāparo bhavet tābhyāṃ lavena susamāhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24028: 7.058.006c nirmārjanīyo vṛddhābhir lavaś ceti sa nāmataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24029: 7.058.007a evaṃ kuśalavau nāmnā tāv ubhau yamajātakau
GE09ram_1-7u:24030: 7.058.007c matkṛtabhyāṃ ca namābhyāṃ khyātiyuktau bhaviṣyataḥ 7.058.008a te rakṣāṃ jagṛhus tāṃ ca munihastāt samāhitāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24031: 7.058.008c akurvaṃś ca tato rakṣāṃ tayor vigatakalmaṣāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24032: 7.058.009a tathā tāṃ kriyamāṇāṃ tu rakṣāṃ gotraṃ ca nāma ca
GE09ram_1-7u:24033: 7.058.009c saṃkīrtanaṃ ca rāmasya sītāyāḥ prasavau śubhau
GE09ram_1-7u:24034: 7.058.010a ardharātre tu śatrughnaḥ śuśrāva sumahat priyam
GE09ram_1-7u:24035: 7.058.010c parṇaśālāṃ gato rātrau diṣṭyā diṣṭyeti cābravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:24036: 7.058.011a tatha tasya prahṛṣṭasya śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ 7.058.011c vyatītā vārṣikī rātriḥ śrāvaṇī laghuvikramā 7.058.012a prabhāte tu mahāvīryaḥ kṛtvā paurvāhṇikaṃ kramam
GE09ram_1-7u:24037: 7.058.012c muniṃ prāñjalir āmantrya prāyāt paścānmukhaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24038: 7.058.013a sa gatvā yamunātīraṃ saptarātroṣitaḥ pathi 7.058.013c ṛṣīṇāṃ puṇyakīrtīnām āśrame vāsam abhyayāt 7.058.014a sa tatra munibhiḥ sārdhaṃ bhārgavapramukhair nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24039: 7.058.014c kathābhir bahurūpābhir vāsaṃ cakre mahāyaśāḥ 7.059.001a atha rātryāṃ pravṛttāyāṃ śatrughno bhṛgunandanam 7.059.001c papraccha cyavanaṃ vipraṃ lavaṇasya balābalam 7.059.002a śūlasya ca balaṃ brahman ke ca pūrvaṃ nipātitāḥ 7.059.002c anena śūlamukhena dvandvayuddham upāgatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24040: 7.059.003a tasya tadbhāṣitaṃ śrutvā śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ 7.059.003c pratyuvāca mahātejāś cyavano raghunandanam
GE09ram_1-7u:24041: 7.059.004a asaṃkhyeyāni karmāṇi yāny asya puruṣarṣabha 7.059.004c ikṣvākuvaṃśaprabhave yad vṛttaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva me
GE09ram_1-7u:24042: 7.059.005a ayodhyāyāṃ purā rājā yuvanāśvasuto balī 7.059.005c māndhatā iti vikhyātas triṣu lokeṣu vīryavān
GE09ram_1-7u:24043: 7.059.006a sa kṛtvā pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ śāsane pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24044: 7.059.006c suralokam atho jetum udyogam akaron nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24045: 7.059.007a indrasya tu bhayaṃ tīvraṃ surāṇāṃ ca mahātmanām
GE09ram_1-7u:24047: 7.059.008a ardhāsanena śakrasya rājyārdhena ca pārthivaḥ 7.059.008c vandyamānaḥ suragaṇaiḥ pratijñām adhyarohata
GE09ram_1-7u:24048: 7.059.009a tasya pāpam abhiprāyaṃ viditvā pākaśāsanaḥ 7.059.009c sāntvapūrvam idaṃ vākyam uvāca yuvanāśvajam 7.059.010a rājā tvaṃ mānuṣaṃ loke na tāvat puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_1-7u:24049: 7.059.010c akṛtvā pṛthivīṃ vaśyāṃ devarājyam ihecchasi 7.059.011a yadi vīra samagrā te medinī nikhilā vaśe
GE09ram_1-7u:24051: 7.059.012a indram evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu māndhātā vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:24052: 7.059.012c kva me śakrapratihataṃ śāsanaṃ pṛthivītale 7.059.013a tam uvāca sahasrākṣo lavaṇo nāma rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24054: 7.059.014a tac chrutvā vipriyaṃ ghoraṃ sahasrākṣeṇa bhāṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:24055: 7.059.014c vrīḍito 'vāṅmukho rājā vyāhartuṃ na śaśāka ha 7.059.015a āmantrya tu sahasrākṣaṃ hriyā kiṃ cid avāṅmukhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24056: 7.059.015c punar evāgamac chrīmān imaṃ lokaṃ nareśvaraḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24058: 7.059.016c ājagāma madhoḥ putraṃ vaśe kartum aninditaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24059: 7.059.017a sa kāṅkṣamāṇo lavaṇaṃ yuddhāya puruṣarṣabhaḥ 7.059.017c dūtaṃ saṃpreṣayām āsa sakāśaṃ lavaṇasya saḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24060: 7.059.018a sa gatvā vipriyāṇy āha bahūni madhunaḥ sutam
GE09ram_1-7u:24061: 7.059.018c vadantam evaṃ taṃ dūtaṃ bhakṣayām āsa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24062: 7.059.019a cirāyamāṇe dūte tu rājā krodhasamanvitaḥ 7.059.019c ardayām āsa tad rakṣaḥ śaravṛṣṭyā
GE09ram_1-7u:24063: 7.059.020a tataḥ prahasya lavaṇaḥ śūlaṃ jagrāha pāṇinā
GE09ram_1-7u:24065: 7.059.021a tac chūlaṃ dīpyamānaṃ tu sabhṛtyabalavāhanam 7.059.021c bhasmīkṛtya nṛpaṃ bhūyo lavaṇasyāgamat karam 7.059.022a evaṃ sa rājā sumahān hataḥ sabalavāhanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24066: 7.059.022c śūlasya ca balaṃ vīra aprameyam anuttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:24067: 7.059.023a śvaḥ prabhāte tu lavaṇaṃ vadhiṣyasi na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24068: 7.059.023c agṛhītāyudhaṃ kṣipraṃ dhruvo hi vijayas tava
GE09ram_1-7u:24069: 7.060.001a kathāṃ kathayatāṃ teṣāṃ jayaṃ cākāṅkṣatāṃ śubham
GE09ram_1-7u:24070: 7.060.001c vyatītā rajanī śīghraṃ śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ 7.060.002a tataḥ prabhāte vimale tasmin kāle sa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24071: 7.060.002c nirgatas tu purād vīro bhakṣāhārapracoditaḥ 7.060.003a etasminn antare śūraḥ śatrughno yamunāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_1-7u:24074: 7.060.004c āgacchad bahusahasraṃ prāṇinām udvahan bharam 7.060.005a tato dadarśa śatrughnaṃ sthitaṃ dvāri dhṛtāyudham
GE09ram_1-7u:24075: 7.060.005c tam uvāca tato rakṣaḥ kim anena kariṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:24077: 7.060.006c bhakṣitāni mayā roṣāt kālam ākāṅkṣase nu kim
GE09ram_1-7u:24078: 7.060.007a āhāraś cāpy asaṃpūrṇo mamāyaṃ puruṣādhama 7.060.007c svayaṃ praviṣṭo nu mukhaṃ katham āsādya durmate
GE09ram_1-7u:24079: 7.060.008a tasyaivaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya hasataś ca muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24080: 7.060.008c śatrughno vīryasaṃpanno roṣād aśrūṇy avartayat 7.060.009a tasya roṣābhibhūtasya śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24081: 7.060.009c tejomayā marīcyas tu sarvagātrair viniṣpatan 7.060.010a uvāca ca susaṃkruddhaḥ śatrughnas taṃ niśācaram
GE09ram_1-7u:24082: 7.060.010c yoddhum icchāmi durbuddhe dvandvayuddhaṃ tvayā saha
GE09ram_1-7u:24083: 7.060.011a putro daśarathasyāhaṃ bhrātā rāmasya dhīmataḥ 7.060.011c śatrughno nāma śatrughno vadhākāṅkṣī tavāgataḥ 7.060.012a tasya me yuddhakāmasya dvandvayuddhaṃ pradīyatām 7.060.012c śatrus tvaṃ sarvajīvānāṃ na me jīvan gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:24084: 7.060.013a tasmiṃs tathā bruvāṇe tu rākṣasaḥ prahasann iva
GE09ram_1-7u:24086: 7.060.014a mama mātṛṣvasur bhrātā rāvaṇo nāma rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24087: 7.060.014c hato rāmeṇa durbuddhe strīhetoḥ puruṣādhama 7.060.015a tac ca sarvaṃ mayā kṣāntaṃ rāvaṇasyā kulakṣayam
GE09ram_1-7u:24088: 7.060.015c avajñāṃ purataḥ kṛtvā mayā yūyaṃ viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24089: 7.060.016a na hatāś ca hi me sarve paribhūtās tṛṇaṃ yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:24090: 7.060.016c bhūtaś caiva bhaviṣyāś ca yūyaṃ ca puruṣādhamāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24091: 7.060.017a tasya te yuddhakāmasyā yuddhaṃ dāsyāmi durmate
GE09ram_1-7u:24092: 7.060.017c īpsitaṃ yādṛśaṃ tubhyaṃ sajjaye yāvad āyudham
GE09ram_1-7u:24093: 7.060.018a tam uvācātha śatrughna kva me jīvan gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_1-7u:24094: 7.060.018c durbalo 'py āgataḥ śatrur na moktavyaḥ kṛtātmanā 7.060.019a yo hi viklavayā buddhyā prasaraṃ śatrave dadau
GE09ram_1-7u:24095: 7.060.019c sa hato mandabuddhitvād yathā kāpuruṣas tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:24096: 7.061.001a tac chrutvā bhāṣitaṃ tasya śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24097: 7.061.001c krodham āhārayat tīvraṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:24098: 7.061.002a pāṇau pāṇiṃ viniṣpiṣya dantān kaṭakaṭāyya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:24099: 7.061.002c lavaṇo raghuśārdūlam āhvayām āsa cāsakṛt 7.061.003a taṃ bruvāṇaṃ tathā vākyaṃ lavaṇaṃ ghoravikramam
GE09ram_1-7u:24100: 7.061.003c śatrughno deva śatrughna idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:24101: 7.061.004a śatrughno na tadā jāto yadānye nirjitās tvayā
GE09ram_1-7u:24102: 7.061.004c tad adya bāṇābhihato vraja taṃ yamasādanam
GE09ram_1-7u:24103: 7.061.005a ṛṣayo 'py adya pāpātman mayā tvāṃ nihataṃ raṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:24104: 7.061.005c paśyantu viprā vidvāṃsas tridaśā iva rāvaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:24106: 7.061.006c puraṃ janapadaṃ cāpi kṣemam etad bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_1-7u:24108: 7.061.007c pravekṣyate te hṛdayaṃ padmam aṃśur ivārkajaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24109: 7.061.008a evam ukto mahāvṛkṣaṃ lavaṇaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ 7.061.008c śatrughnorasi cikṣepa taṃ śūraḥ śatadhācchinat 7.061.009a tad dṛṣṭvā viphalaṃ karma rākṣasaḥ punar eva tu 7.061.009c pādapān subahūn gṛhya śatrughne vyasṛjad balī
GE09ram_1-7u:24110: 7.061.010a śatrughnaś cāpi tejasvī vṛkṣān āpatato bahūn
GE09ram_1-7u:24111: 7.061.010c tribhiś caturbhir ekaikaṃ ciccheda nataparvabhiḥ 7.061.011a tato bāṇamayaṃ varṣaṃ vyasṛjad rākṣasor asi
GE09ram_1-7u:24112: 7.061.011c śatrughno vīryasaṃpanno vivyathe na ca rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24113: 7.061.012a tataḥ prahasya lavaṇo vṛkṣam utpāṭya līlayā
GE09ram_1-7u:24114: 7.061.012c śirasy abhyahanac chūraṃ srastāṅgaḥ sa mumoha vai
GE09ram_1-7u:24115: 7.061.013a tasmin nipatite vīre hāhākāro mahān abhūt
GE09ram_1-7u:24116: 7.061.013c ṛṣīṇāṃ deva saṃghānāṃ gandharvāpsarasām api 7.061.014a tam avajñāya tu hataṃ śatrughnaṃ bhuvi pātitam
GE09ram_1-7u:24117: 7.061.014c rakṣo labdhāntaram api na viveśa svam ālayam
GE09ram_1-7u:24118: 7.061.015a nāpi śūlaṃ prajagrāha taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhuvi pātitam
GE09ram_1-7u:24119: 7.061.015c tato hata iti jñātvā tān bhakṣān samudāvahat
GE09ram_1-7u:24120: 7.061.016a muhūrtāl labdhasaṃjñas tu punas tasthau dhṛtāyudhaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24122: 7.061.017a tato divyam amoghaṃ taṃ jagrāha śaram uttamam
GE09ram_1-7u:24123: 7.061.017c jvalantaṃ tejasā ghoraṃ pūrayantaṃ diśo daśa
GE09ram_1-7u:24125: 7.061.018c nataṃ parvasu sarveṣu saṃyugeṣv aparājitam 7.061.019a asṛkcandanadigdhāṅgaṃ cārupatraṃ patatriṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:24127: 7.061.020a taṃ dīptam iva kālāgniṃ yugānte samupasthite
GE09ram_1-7u:24128: 7.061.020c dṛṣṭvā sarvāṇi bhūtāni paritrāsam upāgaman 7.061.021a sadevāsuragandharvaṃ samuniṃ
