GE09ram_1-7u:24975: 7.094.008a so 'haṃ saṃnyastabhāro hi tvām upāse jagatpatim 7.094.008c rakṣāṃ vidhatsva bhūteṣu mama tejaḥ karo bhavān
GE09ram_1-7u:24976: 7.094.009a tatas tvam api durdharṣas tasmād bhāvāt sanātanāt
GE09ram_1-7u:24978: 7.094.010a adityāṃ vīryavān putro bhrātṝṇāṃ harṣavardhanaḥ 7.094.010c samutpanneṣu kṛtyeṣu lokasāhyāya kalpase
GE09ram_1-7u:24979: 7.094.011a sa tvaṃ vitrāsyamānāsu prajāsu jagatāṃ vara
GE09ram_1-7u:24982: 7.094.012c kṛtvā vāsasya niyatiṃ svayam evātmanaḥ purā
GE09ram_1-7u:24983: 7.094.013a sa tvaṃ manomayaḥ putraḥ pūrṇāyur mānuṣeṣv iha
GE09ram_1-7u:24985: 7.094.014a yadi bhūyo mahārāja prajā icchasy upāsitum
GE09ram_1-7u:24986: 7.094.014c vasa vā vīra bhadraṃ te evam āha pitāmahaḥ 7.094.015a atha vā vijigīṣā te suralokāya
GE09ram_1-7u:24987: 7.094.015c sanāthā viṣṇunā devā bhavantu vigatajvarāḥ 7.094.016a śrutvā pitāmahenoktaṃ vākyaṃ kālasamīritam
GE09ram_1-7u:24988: 7.094.016c rāghavaḥ prahasan vākyaṃ sarvasaṃhāram abravīt 7.094.017a śrutaṃ me devadevasya vākyaṃ paramam adbhutam
GE09ram_1-7u:24989: 7.094.017c prītir hi mahatī jātā tavāgamanasaṃbhavā 7.094.018a bhadraṃ te 'stu gamiṣyāmi yata evāham āgataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24990: 7.094.018c hṛd gato hy asi saṃprāpto na me 'sty atra vicāraṇā 7.094.019a mayā hi sarvakṛtyeṣu devānāṃ vaśavartinām 7.094.019c sthātavyaṃ sarvasaṃhāre yathā hy āha pitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24991: 7.095.001a tathā tayoḥ kathayator durvāsā bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:24994: 7.095.002c rāmaṃ darśaya me śīghraṃ purā me 'rtho 'tivartate
GE09ram_1-7u:24995: 7.095.003a munes tu bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā
GE09ram_1-7u:24996: 7.095.003c abhivādya mahātmānaṃ vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:24997: 7.095.004a kiṃ kāryaṃ brūhi bhagavan ko vārthaḥ kiṃ karomy aham
GE09ram_1-7u:24998: 7.095.004c vyagro hi rāghavo brahman muhūrtaṃ vā pratīkṣatām
GE09ram_1-7u:24999: 7.095.005a tac chrutvā ṛṣiśārdūlaḥ krodhena kaluṣīkṛtaḥ 7.095.005c uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ vākyaṃ nirdahann iva cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_1-7u:25000: 7.095.006a asmin kṣaṇe māṃ saumitre rāmāya prativedaya
GE09ram_1-7u:25001: 7.095.006c viṣayaṃ tvāṃ puraṃ caiva śapiṣye rāghavaṃ tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:25002: 7.095.007a bharataṃ caiva saumitre yuṣmākaṃ yā ca saṃtatiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25003: 7.095.007c na hi śakṣyāmy ahaṃ bhūyo manyuṃ dhārayituṃ hṛdi 7.095.008a tac chrutvā ghorasaṃkāśaṃ vākyaṃ tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25004: 7.095.008c cintayām āsa manasā tasya vākyasya niścayam
GE09ram_1-7u:25005: 7.095.009a ekasya maraṇaṃ me 'stu mā bhūt sarvavināśanam
GE09ram_1-7u:25006: 7.095.009c iti buddhyā viniścitya rāghavāya nyavedayat 7.095.010a lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā rāmaḥ kālaṃ visṛjya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:25007: 7.095.010c niṣpatya tvaritaṃ rājā atreḥ putraṃ dadarśa ha
GE09ram_1-7u:25009: 7.095.011c kiṃ kāryam iti kākutsthaḥ kṛtāñjalir abhāṣata
GE09ram_1-7u:25010: 7.095.012a tad vākyaṃ rāghaveṇṇoktaṃ śrutvā munivaraḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25011: 7.095.012c pratyāha rāmaṃ durvāsāḥ śrūyatāṃ dharmavatsala 7.095.013a adya varṣasahasrasya samāptir mama rāghava 7.095.013c so 'haṃ bhojanam icchāmi yathāsiddhaṃ tavānagha
GE09ram_1-7u:25012: 7.095.014a tac chrutvā vacanaṃ rāmo harṣeṇa mahatānvitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25014: 7.095.015a sa tu bhuktvā muniśreṣṭhas tad annam amṛtopamam
GE09ram_1-7u:25015: 7.095.015c sādhu rāmeti saṃbhāṣya svam āśramam upāgamat
GE09ram_1-7u:25016: 7.095.016a tasmin gate mahātejā rāghavaḥ prītamānasaḥ 7.095.016c saṃsmṛtya kālavākyāni tato duḥkham upeyivān 7.095.017a duḥkhena ca susaṃtaptaḥ smṛtvā tad ghoradarśanam
GE09ram_1-7u:25017: 7.095.017c avānmukho dīnamanā vyāhartuṃ na śaśāka ha
GE09ram_1-7u:25018: 7.095.018a tato buddhyā viniścitya kālavākyāni rāghavaḥ 7.095.018c naitad astīti coktvā sa tūṣṇīm āsīn mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25019: 7.096.001a avāṅmukham atho dīnaṃ dṛṣṭvā somam ivāplutam
GE09ram_1-7u:25020: 7.096.001c rāghavaṃ lakṣmaṇo vākyaṃ hṛṣṭo madhuram abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:25021: 7.096.002a na saṃtāpaṃ mahābāho madarthaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:25022: 7.096.002c pūrvanirmāṇabaddhā hi kālasya gatir īdṛśī 7.096.003a jahi māṃ saumya visrabdaḥ pratijñāṃ paripālaya
GE09ram_1-7u:25023: 7.096.003c hīnapratijñāḥ kākutstha prayānti narakaṃ narāḥ 7.096.004a yadi prītir mahārāja yady anugrāhyatā mayi
GE09ram_1-7u:25024: 7.096.004c jahi māṃ nirviśaṅkas tvaṃ dharmaṃ vardhaya rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:25025: 7.096.005a lakṣmaṇena tathoktas tu rāmaḥ pracalitendriyaḥ 7.096.005c mantriṇaḥ samupānīya tathaiva ca purodhasaṃ 7.096.006a abravīc ca yathāvṛttaṃ teṣāṃ madhye narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25027: 7.096.007a tac chrutvā mantriṇaḥ sarve sopādhyāyāḥ samāsata
GE09ram_1-7u:25028: 7.096.007c vasiṣṭhas tu mahātejā vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:25029: 7.096.008a dṛṣṭam etan mahābāho kṣayaṃ te lomaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_1-7u:25030: 7.096.008c lakṣmaṇena viyogaś ca tava rāma mahāyaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25031: 7.096.009a tyajainaṃ balavān kālo mā pratijñāṃ vṛthā kṛthāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25032: 7.096.009c vinaṣṭāyāṃ pratijñāyāṃ dharmo hi vilayaṃ vrajet
GE09ram_1-7u:25033: 7.096.010a tato dharme vinaṣṭe tu trailokye sacarācaram
GE09ram_1-7u:25034: 7.096.010c sadevarṣigaṇaṃ sarvaṃ vinaśyeta na saṃśayaḥ 7.096.011a sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla
GE09ram_1-7u:25035: 7.096.011c lakṣmaṇasya vadhenādya jagat svasthaṃ kuruṣva ha
GE09ram_1-7u:25036: 7.096.012a teṣāṃ tat samavetānāṃ vākyaṃ dharmārthasaṃhitam 7.096.012c śrutvā pariṣado madhye rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:25037: 7.096.013a visarjaye tvāṃ saumitre mā bhūd dharmaviparyayaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25038: 7.096.013c tyāgo vadho vā vihitaḥ sādhūnām ubhayaṃ samam
GE09ram_1-7u:25040: 7.096.014c lakṣmaṇas tvaritaḥ prāyāt svagṛhaṃ na viveśa ha
GE09ram_1-7u:25041: 7.096.015a sa gatvā sarayūtīram upaspṛśya kṛtāñjaliḥ 7.096.015c nigṛhya sarvasrotāṃsi niḥśvāsaṃ na mumoca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:25042: 7.096.016a anucchvasantaṃ yuktaṃ taṃ saśakrāḥ sāpsarogaṇāḥ 7.096.016c devāḥ sarṣigaṇāḥ sarve puṣpair avakiraṃs tadā
GE09ram_1-7u:25043: 7.096.017a adṛśyaṃ sarvam anujaiḥ saśarīraṃ mahābalam 7.096.017c pragṛhya lakṣmaṇaṃ śakro divaṃ saṃpraviveśa ha
GE09ram_1-7u:25044: 7.096.018a tato viṣṇoś caturbhāgam āgataṃ surasattamāḥ 7.096.018c hṛṣṭāḥ pramuditāḥ sarve 'pūjayan ṛṣibhiḥ saha 7.097.001a visṛjya lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmo duḥkhaśokasamanvitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25045: 7.097.001c purodhasaṃ mantriṇaś ca naigamāṃś cedam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:25046: 7.097.002a adya rājye 'bhiṣekṣyāmi bharataṃ dharmavatsalam 7.097.002c ayodhyāyāṃ patiṃ vīraṃ tato yāsyāmy ahaṃ vanam
GE09ram_1-7u:25047: 7.097.003a praveśayata saṃbhārān mā bhūt kālātyayo yathā
GE09ram_1-7u:25048: 7.097.003c adyaivāhaṃ gamiṣyāmi lakṣmaṇena gatāṃ gatim 7.097.004a tac chrutvā rāghaveṇoktaṃ sarvāḥ prakṛtayo bhṛśam
GE09ram_1-7u:25049: 7.097.004c mūrdhabhiḥ praṇatā bhūmau gatasattvā ivābhavan 7.097.005a bharataś ca visaṃjño 'bhūc chrutvā rāmasya bhāṣitam
GE09ram_1-7u:25050: 7.097.005c rājyaṃ vigarhayām āsa rāghavaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:25051: 7.097.006a satyena hi śape rājan svargaloke na caiva hi 7.097.006c na kāmaye yathā rājyaṃ tvāṃ vinā raghunandana
GE09ram_1-7u:25052: 7.097.007a imau kuśīlavau rājann abhiṣiñca narādhipa 7.097.007c kosaleṣu kuśaṃ vīram uttareṣu tathā lavam
GE09ram_1-7u:25053: 7.097.008a śatrughnasya tu gacchantu dūtās tvaritavikramāḥ 7.097.008c idaṃ gamanam asmākaṃ svargāyākhyāntu māciram 7.097.009a tac chrutvā bharatenoktaṃ dṛṣṭvā cāpi hy adho mukhān 7.097.009c paurān duḥkhena saṃtaptān vasiṣṭho vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:25054: 7.097.010a vatsa rāma imāḥ paśya dharaṇīṃ prakṛtīr gatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25055: 7.097.010c jñātvaiṣām īpsitaṃ kāryaṃ mā caiṣāṃ vipriyaṃ kṛthāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25056: 7.097.011a vasiṣṭhasya tu vākyena utthāpya prakṛtījanam 7.097.011c kiṃ karomīti kākutsthaḥ sarvān vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:25057: 7.097.012a tataḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtayo rāmaṃ vacanam abruvan
GE09ram_1-7u:25058: 7.097.012c gacchantam anugacchāmo yato rāma gamiṣyasi 7.097.013a eṣā naḥ paramā prītir eṣa dharmaḥ paro mataḥ 7.097.013c hṛdgatā naḥ sadā tuṣṭis tavānugamane dṛḍhā
GE09ram_1-7u:25059: 7.097.014a paureṣu yadi te prītir yadi sneho hy anuttamaḥ 7.097.014c saputradārāḥ kākutstha samaṃ gacchāma satpatham 7.097.015a tapovanaṃ vā durgaṃ vā nadīm ambhonidhiṃ tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:25060: 7.097.015c vayaṃ te yadi na tyājyāḥ sarvān no naya īśvara
GE09ram_1-7u:25061: 7.097.016a sa teṣāṃ niścayaṃ jñātvā kṛtāntaṃ ca nirīkṣyaca
GE09ram_1-7u:25062: 7.097.016c paurāṇāṃ dṛḍhabhaktiṃ ca bāḍham ity eva so 'bravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:25063: 7.097.017a evaṃ viniścayaṃ kṛtvā tasminn ahani rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25064: 7.097.017c kosaleṣu kuśaṃ vīram uttareṣu tathā lavam
GE09ram_1-7u:25065: 7.097.018a abhiṣiñcan mahātmānāv ubhāv eva kuśīlavau 7.097.018c rathānāṃ tu sahasrāṇi trīṇi nāgāyutāni ca
GE09ram_1-7u:25066: 7.097.019a daśa cāśvasahasrāṇi ekaikasya dhanaṃ dadau 7.097.019c bahuratnau bahudhanau
GE09ram_1-7u:25067: 7.097.020a abhiṣicya tu tau vīrau prasthāpya svapure tathā
GE09ram_1-7u:25068: 7.097.020c dūtān saṃpreṣayām āsa śatrughnāya mahātmane 7.098.001a te dūtā rāmavākyena coditā laghuvikramāḥ 7.098.001c prajagmur madhurāṃ śīghraṃ cakrur vāsaṃ na cādhvani
GE09ram_1-7u:25069: 7.098.002a tatas tribhir aho rātraiḥ saṃprāpya madhurām atha
GE09ram_1-7u:25070: 7.098.002c śatrughnāya yathāvṛttam ācakhyuḥ sarvam eva tat
GE09ram_1-7u:25071: 7.098.003a lakṣmaṇasya parityāgaṃ pratijñāṃ rāghavasya ca 7.098.003c putrayor abhiṣekaṃ ca paurānugamanaṃ tathā 7.098.004a kuśasya nagarī ramyā vindhyaparvatarodhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:25072: 7.098.004c kuśāvatīti nāmnā sā kṛtā rāmeṇa dhīmatā
GE09ram_1-7u:25073: 7.098.005a śrāvitā ca purī ramyā śrāvatīti lavasya ca
GE09ram_1-7u:25074: 7.098.005c ayodhyāṃ vijanāṃ caiva bharataṃ rāghavānugam 7.098.006a evaṃ sarvaṃ nivedyāśu śatrughnāya mahātmane 7.098.006c viremus te tato dūtās tvara rājann iti bruvan 7.098.007a śrutvā taṃ ghorasaṃkāśaṃ kulakṣayam upasthitam 7.098.007c prakṛtīs tu samānīya kāñcanaṃ ca purohitam
GE09ram_1-7u:25075: 7.098.008a teṣāṃ sarvaṃ yathāvṛttam ākhyāya raghunandanaḥ 7.098.008c ātmanaś ca viparyāsaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE09ram_1-7u:25077: 7.098.009c subāhur madhurāṃ lebhe śatrughātī ca vaidiśam
GE09ram_1-7u:25078: 7.098.010a dvidhākṛtvā tu tāṃ senāṃ mādhurīṃ putrayor dvayoḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25080: 7.098.011a tato visṛjya rājānaṃ vaidiśe śatrughātinam 7.098.011c jagāma tvarito 'yodhyāṃ rathenaikena rāghavaḥ 7.098.012a sa dadarśa mahātmānaṃ jvalantam iva pāvakam
GE09ram_1-7u:25083: 7.098.013c uvāca vākyaṃ dharmajño dharmam evānucintayan 7.098.014a kṛtvābhiṣekaṃ sutayor yuktaṃ rāghavayor dhanaiḥ 7.098.014c tavānugamane rājan viddhi māṃ kṛtaniścayam 7.098.015a na cānyad atra vaktavyaṃ dustaraṃ tava śāsanam
GE09ram_1-7u:25084: 7.098.015c tyaktuṃ nārhasi māṃ vīra bhaktimantaṃ viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25085: 7.098.016a tasya tāṃ buddhim aklībāṃ vijñāya raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25086: 7.098.016c bāḍham ity eva śatrughnaṃ rāmo vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:25087: 7.098.017a tasya vākyasya vākyānte vānarāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ 7.098.017c ṛkṣarākṣasasaṃghāś ca samāpetur anekaśaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25088: 7.098.018a devaputrā ṛṣisutā gandharvāṇāṃ sutās tathā 7.098.018c rāma kṣayaṃ viditvā te sarva eva samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25089: 7.098.019a te rāmam abhivādyāhuḥ sarva eva samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25090: 7.098.019c tavānugamane rājan saṃprāptāḥ sma mahāyaśaḥ 7.098.020a yadi rāma vināsmābhir gacches tvaṃ puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_1-7u:25091: 7.098.020c yamadaṇḍam ivodyamya tvayā sma vinipātitāḥ 7.098.021a evaṃ teṣāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā ṛṣkavānararakṣasām 7.098.021c vibhīṣaṇam athovāca madhuraṃ ślakṣṇayā girā 7.098.022a yāvat prajā dhariṣyanti tāvat tvaṃ vai vibhīṣaṇa
GE09ram_1-7u:25092: 7.098.022c rākṣasendra mahāvīrya laṅkāsthaḥ svaṃ dhariṣyasi 7.098.023a prajāḥ saṃrakṣa dharmeṇa nottaraṃ vaktum arhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:25093: 7.098.024a tam evam uktvā kākutstho hanūmantam athābravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:25094: 7.098.024c jīvite kṛtabuddhis tvaṃ mā pratijñāṃ vilopaya
GE09ram_1-7u:25095: 7.098.025a matkathāḥ pracariṣyanti yāval loke harīśvara 7.098.025c tāvat tvaṃ dhārayan prāṇān pratijñām anupālaya
GE09ram_1-7u:25096: 7.098.026a tathaivam uktvā kākutsthaḥ sarvāṃs tān ṛkṣavānarān
GE09ram_1-7u:25097: 7.098.026c mayā sārdhaṃ prayāteti tadā tān rāghavo 'bravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:25098: 7.099.001a prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ pṛthuvakṣā mahāyaśāḥ 7.099.001c rāmaḥ kamalapatrākṣaḥ purodhasam athābravīt
GE09ram_1-7u:25099: 7.099.002a agnihotraṃ vrajatv agre sarpir jvalitapāvakam 7.099.002c vājapeyātapatraṃ ca śobhayānaṃ mahāpatham
GE09ram_1-7u:25100: 7.099.003a tato vasiṣṭhas tejasvī sarvaṃ niravaśeṣataḥ 7.099.003c cakāra vidhivad dharmyaṃ mahāprāsthānikaṃ vidhim 7.099.004a tataḥ kṣaumāmbaradharo brahma cāvartayan param 7.099.004c kuśān gṛhītvā pāṇibhyāṃ prasajya prayayāv atha
GE09ram_1-7u:25101: 7.099.005a avyāharan kva cit kiṃ cin niśceṣṭo niḥsukhaḥ pathi 7.099.005c nirjagāma gṛhāt tasmād dīpyamāno yathāṃśumān 7.099.006a rāmasya pārśve savye tu padmā śrīḥ susamāhitā
GE09ram_1-7u:25102: 7.099.006c dakṣiṇe hrīr viśālākṣī vyavasāyas tathāgrataḥ 7.099.007a śarā nānāvidhāś cāpi dhanur āyatavigraham 7.099.007c anuvrajanti kākutsthaṃ sarve puruṣavigrahāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25105: 7.099.009a ṛṣayaś ca mahātmānaḥ sarva eva mahīsurāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25107: 7.099.010a taṃ yāntam anuyānti sma antaḥpuracarāḥ striyaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25108: 7.099.010c savṛddhabāladāsīkāḥ savarṣavarakiṃkarāḥ 7.099.011a sāntaḥpuraś ca bharataḥ śatrughnasahito yayau 7.099.011c rāmavratam upāgamya rāghavaṃ samanuvratāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25109: 7.099.012a tato viprā mahātmānaḥ sāgnihotrāḥ samāhitāḥ 7.099.012c saputradārāḥ kākutstham anvagacchan mahāmatim
GE09ram_1-7u:25110: 7.099.013a mantriṇo bhṛtyavargāś ca saputrāḥ sahabāndhavāḥ 7.099.013c sānugā rāghavaṃ sarve anvagacchan prahṛṣṭavat 7.099.014a tataḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtayo hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanāvṛtāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25112: 7.099.015a snātaṃ pramuditaṃ sarvaṃ hṛṣṭapuṣpam anuttamam 7.099.015c dṛptaṃ kilikilāśabdaiḥ sarvaṃ rāmam anuvratam 7.099.016a na tatra kaś cid dīno 'bhūd vrīḍito vāpi duḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25113: 7.099.016c hṛṣṭaṃ pramuditaṃ sarvaṃ babhūva paramādbhutam 7.099.017a draṣṭukāmo 'tha niryāṇaṃ rājño jānapado janaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25114: 7.099.017c saṃprāptaḥ so 'pi dṛṣṭvaiva saha sarvair anuvrataḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25116: 7.099.018c agachan parayā bhaktyā pṛṣṭhataḥ susamāhitāḥ 7.100.001a adhyardhayojanaṃ gatvā nadīṃ paścān mukhāśritām 7.100.001c sarayūṃ puṇyasalilāṃ dadarśa raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25117: 7.100.002a atha tasmin muhūrte tu brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25118: 7.100.002c sarvaiḥ parivṛto devair ṛṣibhiś ca mahātmabhiḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25119: 7.100.003a āyayau yatra kākutsthaḥ svargāya samupasthitaḥ 7.100.003c vimānaśatakoṭībhir divyābhir abhisaṃvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25120: 7.100.004a papāta puṣpavṛṣṭiś ca vāyumuktā mahaughavat 7.100.005a tasmiṃs tūryaśatākīrṇe
GE09ram_1-7u:25122: 7.100.006a tataḥ pitāmaho vāṇīm antarikṣād abhāṣata 7.100.006c āgaccha viṣṇo bhadraṃ te diṣṭyā prāpto 'si rāghava
GE09ram_1-7u:25123: 7.100.007a bhrātṛbhiḥ saha devābhaiḥ praviśasva svakāṃ tanum
GE09ram_1-7u:25124: 7.100.007c vaiṣṇavīṃ tāṃ mahātejas tad ākāśaṃ sanātanam
GE09ram_1-7u:25125: 7.100.008a tvaṃ hi lokagatir deva na tvāṃ ke cit prajānate
GE09ram_1-7u:25126: 7.100.008c ṛte māyāṃ viśālākṣa tava pūrvaparigrahām 7.100.009a tvam acintyaṃ mahad bhūtam akṣayaṃ sarvasaṃgraham
GE09ram_1-7u:25127: 7.100.009c yām icchasi mahātejas tāṃ tanuṃ praviśa svayam
GE09ram_1-7u:25129: 7.100.010c viveśa vaiṣṇavaṃ tejaḥ saśarīraḥ sahānujaḥ 7.100.011a tato viṣṇugataṃ devaṃ pūjayanti sma devatāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25130: 7.100.011c sādhyā marudgaṇāś caiva sendrāḥ sāgnipurogamāḥ 7.100.012a ye ca divyā ṛṣigaṇā gandharvāpsarasaś ca yāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25132: 7.100.013a sarvaṃ hṛṣṭaṃ pramuditaṃ sarvaṃ pūrṇamanoratham 7.100.013c sādhu sādhv iti tat sarvaṃ tridivaṃ gatakalmaṣam
GE09ram_1-7u:25133: 7.100.014a atha viṣṇur mahātejāḥ pitāmaham uvāca ha
GE09ram_1-7u:25134: 7.100.014c eṣāṃ lokāñ janaughānāṃ dātum arhasi suvrata
GE09ram_1-7u:25135: 7.100.015a ime hi sarve snehān mām anuyātā manasvinaḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25136: 7.100.015c bhaktā bhājayitavyāś ca tyaktātmānaś ca matkṛte
GE09ram_1-7u:25137: 7.100.016a tac chrutvā viṣṇuvacanaṃ brahmā lokaguruḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25138: 7.100.016c lokān sāntānikān nāma yāsyantīme samāgatāḥ 7.100.017a yac ca tiryaggataṃ kiṃ cid rāmam evānucintayat
GE09ram_1-7u:25139: 7.100.017c prāṇāṃs tyakṣyati bhaktyā vai saṃtāne tu nivatsyati
GE09ram_1-7u:25140: 7.100.017e sarvair eva guṇair yukte brahmalokād anantare
GE09ram_1-7u:25141: 7.100.018a vānarāś ca svakāṃ yonim ṛkṣāś caiva tathā yayuḥ 7.100.018c yebhyo viniḥsṛtā ye ye surādibhyaḥ susaṃbhavāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25142: 7.100.019a ṛṣibhyo nāgayakṣebhyas tāṃs tān eva prapedire
GE09ram_1-7u:25145: 7.100.020c avagāhya jalaṃ yo yaḥ prāṇī hy āsīt prahṛṣṭavat 7.100.021a mānuṣaṃ deham utsṛjya vimānaṃ so 'dhyarohata
GE09ram_1-7u:25147: 7.100.022a divyā divyena vapuṣā devā dīptā ivābhavan
GE09ram_1-7u:25148: 7.100.022c gatvā tu sarayūtoyaṃ sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca
GE09ram_1-7u:25149: 7.100.023a prāpya tat toyavikledaṃ devalokam upāgaman 7.100.023c devānāṃ yasya yā yonir vānarā ṛṣka rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_1-7u:25150: 7.100.024a tām eva viviśuḥ sarve devān nikṣipya cāmbhasi
GE09ram_1-7u:25151: 7.100.024c tathā svargagataṃ sarvaṃ kṛtvā lokagurur divam
GE09ram_1-7u:25152: 7.100.025a jagāma tridaśaiḥ sārdhaṃ hṛṣṭair hṛṣṭo mahāmatiḥ
